B01_01_Matthew_V1	Ukunguut	nengllugutet,	sivunghi	Jesus	Christ-am.	Tagikaaguq	David-em	nengllugutanganeng.	David	Abraham-enkuneng	pinguuq.
B01_01_Matthew_V2	Abraham	atakaa	Isaac-em,	Isaac	atakaa	Jacob-em,	Jacob	atakaat	Judah-nkut	anglegutkullghiit,
B01_01_Matthew_V3	Judah	atakaak	Perez-enkuk,	Zerah-nkuk	(Naangak	Tamar),	Perez	atakaa	Hezron-em,	Hezron	atakaa	Ram-em,
B01_01_Matthew_V4	Ram	atakaa	Amminadab-em,	Amminadab	atakaa	Nahshon-em,	Nahshon	atakaa	Salmon-em,
B01_01_Matthew_V5	Salmon	atakaa	Boaz-em,	(Boaz-em	naakaa	Rahab).	Boaz	atakaa	Obed-em,	(Obed-em	naakaa	Ruth),	Obed	atakaa	Jesse-m,
B01_01_Matthew_V6	Jesse	atakaa	Umiilgem	David-em.	David	atakaa	Solomon-em.	(Solomon-em	naakaa	Uriah-m	nulighqesaqanga.)
B01_01_Matthew_V7	Solomon	atakaa	Rehoboam-em,	Rehoboam	atakaa	Abijah-m,	Abijah	atakaa	Asa-m,
B01_01_Matthew_V8	Asa	atakaa	Jehoshaphat-em,	Jehoshaphat	atakaa	Joram-em,	Joram	atakaa	Uzziah-m.
B01_01_Matthew_V9	Uzziah	atakaa	Jotham-em,	Jotham	atakaa	Ahaz-em,	Ahaz	atakaa	Hezekiah-m,
B01_01_Matthew_V10	Hezekiah	atakaa	Manasseh-m,	Manasseh	atakaa	Amos-em,	Amos	atakaa	Josiah-m.
B01_01_Matthew_V11	Josiah	atakaat,	Jechoniah-nkut	anglegutkullghhiit	allgeqaagut	tamaani	Jews-et	tuguluki	aglaataqngatki	Babylon-mun.
B01_01_Matthew_V12	Kingunganeng	aglaatellghita	Babylon-mun,	Jechoniah	atakaa	Shealtiel-em,	Shealtiel	atakaa	Zerubbabel-em,
B01_01_Matthew_V13	Zerubbabel	atakaa	Abiud-em,	Abiud	atakaa	Eliakim-em,	Eliakim	atakaa	Azor-em,
B01_01_Matthew_V14	Azor	atakaa	Zadok-em,	Zadok	atakaa	Achim-em,	Achim	atakaa	Eliud-em,
B01_01_Matthew_V15	Eliud	atakaa	Eleazar-em,	Eleazar	atakaa	Matthan-em,	Matthan	atakaa	Jacob-em,
B01_01_Matthew_V16	Jacob	atakaa	Joseph-em.	Joseph	ugiikaa	Mary-m.	Mary	naakaa	Jesus-em.	Jesus	Messiah-nguuq.
B01_01_Matthew_V17	Sivunghi	Jesus	Christ-am	whatetut:	14-ngukaagut	kingunqullghiit	Abraham-emeng	David-mun.	14-ngukaagutlu	kingunqullghiit	David-meng	kenlanga	Jews-et	tuguluki	aglaatellghitnun	Babylon-mun.	Taagken	Babylon-mun	aglaatellghitneng	14-ngukaagutlu	kingunqullghiit	kenlanga	Christ-am	allgellghanun.
B01_01_Matthew_V18	Jesus	Christ-a	allgeqaaguq	whaten:	naanga	Mary	aang'ghutngwaaqaq	Joseph-mun,	iwernga	nengughutellghillukek	Agleghnalghiim	Taghnegham	qumingestekaa.
B01_01_Matthew_V19	Ugikaghqaan	Joseph-em	kenqigneghutmineng	kayngusaakneghmeng	Mary	piluku,	aksaqluku	peggnaqegkaa.
B01_01_Matthew_V20	Sumeghtaghaatkumaluku	tawaten	pilleghqani,	Atanghem	yaqulgan	aliighvikluku	qavangukun	pikaa,	“Joseph,	David-em	kingungha,	alingegpenang	nulighqigu	Mary	qayughllak	Agleghnalghiim	Taghnegham	aqsangestekaqaa.
B01_01_Matthew_V21	Ighnengnaqnguuq;	atighnaken	Jesus-meng	qayughllak	ellmi	yuni	yuguliyaghqaqii	seghleghqellghitneng.”
B01_01_Matthew_V22	Qamaglluni	tawaten	aneghtekaaguq	apeghiighnaluku	Atanghem	akuzitkegkaa	uuknaliqistekun	whaten,
B01_01_Matthew_V23	“Aghnaghaq	yugem	atuqellghilkanga	qumingluni,	ighnengellequq.	Aatqesaghqaqaa	Emmanuel”	whaten	pisiq,	“Kiyaghneq	whangkunnilnguq.”
B01_01_Matthew_V24	Enkaam	Joseph	taghtughluni	Atanghem	yaqulgan	pisqellghatun	pikaq.	Mary	nulighqegkaa,
B01_01_Matthew_V25	iwernga	atuqumangilkanga	kenlanga	ighnengellghanun.	Taagken	Joseph-em	Jesus-meng	atiqaa.
B01_02_Matthew_V1	Jesus	allgeghaqngan	Bethlehem-emi	Judea-melngughmi,	Herod	umiilgulghii.	Allgellghan	kingunganeng	ighaleqetaaghneng	liitkaghllaget	asivaghmeng	kaatkat	Jerusalem-emun.
B01_02_Matthew_V2	Aapqughwaaqat,	“Naagu	taghnughhaq	allgelghii	umiilgat	Jews-et?	Ighaleqetaagha	esghaamaaghput	asivaghmelluku	enkaam	manigughyaghtughaqaghput.”
B01_02_Matthew_V3	Umiilgem	Herod-em	nagaqughluku	teggellghiighllakaq,	qamagtengngwaaghlutengllu	Jerusalem-eghmiit	maligulluteng.
B01_02_Matthew_V4	Tagsiqlighteghluki	qamaglluki	chief	priest-etlu,	apeghtughikayugetlu	Liilightuusaneng	aaptekii,	“Nani	Christ-a	allgeghyaghqaawa?”
B01_02_Matthew_V5	Kiimsiqaat,	“Bethlehem-emi	Judea-melngughmi.	Uuknaliqistem	whaten	igaqegkaqaa:
B01_02_Matthew_V6	‘Elpek	Bethlehem,	Judah-melnguq,	igleghutisteyaggiitneng	Judah-m	ukavantelleghpigaanghituten,	qayughllak	elpeneng	taginaqnguuq	igleghutista,	igleghutiyaghqaq	yumneng	Israel-eghmiineng.’”
B01_02_Matthew_V7	Taagken	Herod-em	aksaqluku	tagsiqliqii	ighaleqetaaghneng	liitkaghllaget,	liigiknaluku	qavngaq	aliighyuwhaaqaatanga	ighaleqetaaq.
B01_02_Matthew_V8	Taagken	pikii,	“Bethlehem-emun	aghulaqlusi	elngaatall	ivaghteggu	taghnughhaq.	Naalkegkufsigu	ungipaasaghtughnakefsinga,	whangallu	manigughyaghtughlleqaqa.”
B01_02_Matthew_V9	Tawaten	umiilgem	piyisteng	igleghtekat.	Esghaghlaataqaat	ataasiq	taana	ighaleqetaaq	asivaghmelluku,	enkaam	elngaatall	quyateghllakat.	Maligtekaat	kenlanga	aghuliillghanun	taghnughhaam	nengan	quulngani.
B01_02_Matthew_V11	Iteghluteng	mangteghamun	esghaqaat	taghnughhaq,	naangallu	Mary.	Segesqughquulluteng	maniguqaat.	Taagken	aqeftaghaateng	qelpeghlluki	tunquqaat	tunusameng:	gold-meng,	frankincense-meng,	myrrh-meng.
B01_02_Matthew_V12	Taagken	Kiyaghneghem	qavangukun	yitkii	Herod-mun	uteghnifqiita	pisqelluki	enkaam	aglaqat	nunameggnun	allatgun	tumetgun.
B01_02_Matthew_V13	Ighaleqetaaghneng	liitkaghllaget	aghulaqsata,	qavangukun	Atanghem	yaqulgan	aliighvikluku	Joseph	pikaa,	“Makelluten	taghnughhaqlu	naangallu	anagutikek	Egypt-mun.	Tamaanlleghhaten	uteghniisqellemnun	kenlanga	qayughllak	Herod-em	ivaghtesnaqa	taghnughhaq	tuqutesnaluku.”
B01_02_Matthew_V14	Enkaam	unugmi	tawani	Joseph-em	makelluni	aghulaqutkakek	taghnughhaqlu	naangallu	Egypt-mun.
B01_02_Matthew_V15	Tamaantekat	kenlanga	Herod-em	tuqullghanun.	Enkaam	apeghiiqaaguq	Atanghem	akuzitkegkaa	uuknaliqistekun	whaten,	“Tuqluqaqaqa	ighneqa	tagisqelluku	Egypt-meng.”
B01_02_Matthew_V16	Herod-em	liigiksamigu	ighaleqetaaghneng	liitkaghllagnun	puughsimaniluni	sakriteghllakaq.	Taagken	pilluwaghtet	kayagtekii	Bethlehem-emun,	uvitanganunllu	tuquqiisqelluki	qamaglluki	mekelghiighhaat	allgenghhaghhaghneng,	maalghugegnun	ayumiqulleghtutkalghiinun	kenlanga.	Tamaakut	taghnughhaat	nakmikegkaqii	qayughllak	ighaleqetaaghem	allgellghaneng	maalghugughlleghhiik	ayumiqullghek,	ighaleqetaaghneng	liitkaghllaget	apellghitni.
B01_02_Matthew_V17	Tawaten	pilleghqun	uuknaliqistem	Jeremiah-am	uuknaliqellgha	apeghiiqaq:
B01_02_Matthew_V18	“Ramah-mi	nagaquqaat	leghaghllagaataq.	Rachel-nguftuq	qiyalghii	avaqutaminun,	repall	ilutughsaghyaghqaaghhaagpenani,	qayughllak	qamaglluteng	tuqulaghaatkat.”
B01_02_Matthew_V19	Joseph-enkut	Egypt-melluki	Herod	tuqukaq,	qavangukun	Atanghem	yaqulgan	aliighvikegkaa	Joseph
B01_02_Matthew_V20	pikaa,	“Makelluten	taghnughhaqlu	naangallu	uteghniitikek	Israel-mun,	qayughllak	tuqutinaqsalghiit	taghnughhaghmeng	tuqulaghaasimaat.”
B01_02_Matthew_V21	Enkaam	Joseph-em	makelluni	taghnughhaqlu	naangallu	aglaatkakek	Israel-mun.
B01_02_Matthew_V22	Iwernga	Joseph-em	nagaqughluku	nutaghaq	umiilga	Judea-m,	Archelaus-nguniluku	Herod-em	ighnegha,	alingegkaq	tawavek	aglaneghmeng.	Qavangukun	Kiyaghneghem	ungipaatkaa	Joseph	Judea-tefqaan	pisqelluku,	enkaam	Nazareth-mun	aglaqat	Galilee-melngughmun.	Tamaantekat	uuknaliqistet	whaten	pillghat,	apeghiighesqelluku,	“Messiah	Nazareth-eghmiinguyaghqaaguq.”
B01_03_Matthew_V1	Taakwaningani	John	Paaptaayesta	aglaghluni	kilgaanganun	Judea-m,	piinliqaq	ungipaqimeng.
B01_03_Matthew_V2	Whaten	pikaq,	“Avuteghqellusi	taaqitek	seghleghqenneghmeng,	qayughllak	Ataneghpagullgha	Qilagem	kaasaghtuumaaq.”
B01_03_Matthew_V3	John-nguuq	uuknaliqistem	Isaiah-am	akuzitkegkaa	whaten	piiqngami,	“Kilgaani	kina	akilghuugaquq	whaten:	‘Yataaghqiteggu	Atanghem	tuumkaghqaa,	taklaghrukegsaghteggu	igleghavigkaa!’”
B01_03_Matthew_V4	John-em	aatkii	camel-em	melqwaaneng	ulimaaghet,	meqameng	tafsiluni,	neqekluni	locust-mengllu	honey-mengllu.
B01_03_Matthew_V5	Yuget	aglaghtuutkat	ellnganun	Jerusalem-emengllu	Judea-mengllu	uvitanganengllu	Kiiwem	Jordan-em.
B01_03_Matthew_V6	Seghleghqelleteng	qayvighqenghatki,	John-em	paaptaayaaqegkangi	Jordan-egni.
B01_03_Matthew_V7	John-em	esghaghluki	Pharisees-elghutetlu	Sadducees-elghutetlu	tagilghiit	ellminun	paaptaayesqelluteng	pikii,	“Elpesi	nemeghyani!	Kitum	anagesqisi	Kiyaghneghem	nanqigtelleghqaaneng	kaannaqelghiimeng?
B01_03_Matthew_V8	Sivuklusi	pinitun	pilleghpesigun	ipapighqiteggu	seghleghqelleghpesineng	avuteghqelleghsi.
B01_03_Matthew_V9	Whaten'ngam	sumeghtaghaghpenasi,	‘Kiyaghneghem	nanqiggnaanghitiinkut	qayughllak	kingunqiinkut	Abraham-em.’	Ungipaatamsi	Kiyaghneghem	Abraham	kingunengllaannayaghaa	maaken	uyghagneng!
B01_03_Matthew_V10	Whaa	maaten	qalqalimayaqleggiinaghlluteng	ayuqut	uqfiget	akwiitgun.	Qamaglluteng	uqfiget	pinilghiimeng	piitestinghilnguut	kepluki,	kenghegnun	miluusaghqaagut.
B01_03_Matthew_V11	Meghqun	paaptaayeghiiqunga	avuteghkegkanun	seghleghqelleghmeggneng.	Iwernga	tagiyaghqam	kingumneng	paaptaayelleqiisi	Agleghnalghiignengllu	Taghneghagneng,	keneghmengllu.	Aghtughyaghqaanghiteghllagtuq	whangamneng,	repall	talwa	kamegkek	tugumiiqepagningitagka.
B01_03_Matthew_V12	Taana	tagiyaghqaq	nanqigtiyaqleggiinaaguq.	Aafsaghqaqii	pinilghiit	yuget	seghleghneng,	katam	piitesiighaghtem	pekutamineng	malliillghatun	grain-et.	Kagpagluki	grain-et	mallaq	tamaana	miluusaghqaqaa	qaamyaghqaanghilnguugnun	kenghegnun.”
B01_03_Matthew_V13	Taagken	Jesus	Galilee-meng	tagikaq	Jordan-egnun,	John-mun	paaptaayesqelluni.
B01_03_Matthew_V14	Iwernga	John-em	akuzinnaqutkegkaqsaqanga	whaten,	“Whanga	elpek	paaptaayeyaghqaqsaghaghpenga.	Sangavek	whangamnun	tagizin?”
B01_03_Matthew_V15	Iwernga	Jesus-em	pikaa,	“Legan	saaqsin	paaptaayenga	qayughllak	tawaten	pikumtung	apeghiighlleqaghpung	Kiyaghneghem	piyukellgha.”	Enkaam	John-em	paaptaayekaa.
B01_03_Matthew_V16	Jesus	paaptaayeyatni	meghmeng	aanegkaq.	Taagken	qilak	qelpeghluni	esghaqakek	Kiyaghneghem	Taghneghakek	ukilghiik	dove-etun	ayuqlutek,	enkaam	ellngakun	nalukak.
B01_03_Matthew_V17	Taagken	ma	qilagmeng	pikaq,	“Unanguuq	piniqegkaghllaka	Ighneqa,	efquqepigtaqa.”
B01_04_Matthew_V1	Taagken	Agleghnalghiim	Taghnegham	aghulaqutkaa	Jesus	kilgaanun,	Tughneghaghmun	seghleghqesnaqutkesqelluku.
B01_04_Matthew_V2	40	aghneq,	40	unuk	Jesus	neghumangilnguq;	taagken	taakut	aghneghet	kingungitneng	iyataqaq.
B01_04_Matthew_V3	Taagken	Tughneghaam	takuluku	pikaa,	“Kiyaghneghem	Ighneqngukangaten,	neqngughtesqiki	tamaakut	uyghaget.”
B01_04_Matthew_V4	Iwernga	Jesus-em	pikaa,	“Akuzitet	Igaqegkat	pikaagut,	‘Yuuk	kiyaghhnaanghituq	neqnginaghhaghqun,	iwernga	kiyaghsaghqaaguq	tamaghhaakun	Kiyaghneghem	akuzitangakun.’”
B01_04_Matthew_V5	Taagken	Tughneghaam	Jesus	aglaatkaa	Jerusalem-emun,	Agleghnalghiimun	Neghllagmun.	Tawani	Temple-m	uusqallghakun	nekevesluku
B01_04_Matthew_V6	pikaa,	“Kiyaghneghem	Ighneqngukangaten,	qetgeghi	tesamavek;	qayughllak	Akuzitet	Igaqegkat	pikaagut,	‘Kiyaghneghemnguq	yaqulegminun	paqnasightesaghtughlleqaaten;	iiggmeggneng	nuqneqelleqaaten	luuraq	itegaghten	uyghaghquunnayukata.’”
B01_04_Matthew_V7	Jesus-em	pikaa,	“Iwernga	Akuzitet	Igaqegkat	whatenllu	pikaagut,	‘Ataneq	Kiyaghneghen	nanghiiqugpenaan	sasqelluku	ellngan	piyukelqenghilkanganeng.’”
B01_04_Matthew_V8	Taagken	Tughneghaam	Jesus	mayuulluku	uusqapiglleghiimun	naayghamun	kelgutkii	qamagtengngwaaghluki	ataneghpagullghi	nunam,	pinighnalleghllagillu.
B01_04_Matthew_V9	Enkaam	pikaa,	“Qamagtengngwaaghluki	maakut	tuunelleqanka	elpenun,	segesqughlluten	manigughyaquvnga.”
B01_04_Matthew_V10	Taagken	Jesus-em	pikaa,	“Tughneghaq,	iqiten!	Akuzitet	Igaqegkat	whaten	pikaagut,	‘Manigughyaghqaqan	Ataneq	Kiyaghneghen,	ellnginaaguqlu	qepghaasaghqan!’”
B01_04_Matthew_V11	Taagken	Tughneghaam	unisagu	Jesus,	yaqulget	aflengaksaghtuqaat.
B01_04_Matthew_V12	Jesus-em	nagaqughluku	John	anusimingllaghvigmenniluku,	Galilee-mun	uteghniqaq.
B01_04_Matthew_V13	Nazareth-meng	aglaqaq	Capernaum-emun	tamaannaluni.	Capernaum	esnenganituq	Naayvam	Galilee-m,	nunami	Zebulun-enkuk	Naphtali-nkuk	kingunghita	kiyaghfigitni.
B01_04_Matthew_V14	Jesus-em	tawaten	pilleghmikun	apeghiiqaa	uuknaliqistem	Isaiah-m	uuknaliqellgha.	Qavngarugllak	Isaiah-m	uuknaliqutkegkaqii	yuget	kiyaghlleghhiit	nunagkeni	Zebulun-enkuk	Naphtali-nkuk.	Taakuk	nunak	naayvam	tunganganilnguuk,	nallangani	Kiiwem	Jordan-em,	Galilee-melngughmi	Gentile-et	kiyaghfigitni!
B01_04_Matthew_V16	Isaiah-m	pikaqegkangi	whaten,	“Tamaakut	kiyaghlleghhiit	seghleghqellghem	mamleghqestellghani	esghaasaghqaagut	nighugllagmeng.	Alingellghita	tuqumeng	llangaqa	nunangat	saapngalghii	taghneghangutellghaneng	tuqullghem.	Iwernga	maaten	aghtaghaataqii.”
B01_04_Matthew_V17	Galilee-mun	uteghnilleghmineng	kenlekluku	Jesus-em	piinliqaa	ungipaqilleni,	“Avuteghqellusi	seghleghqennanightek,	qayughllak	Ataneghpagullgha	Qilagem	kaasaghtuumaaq.”
B01_04_Matthew_V18	Jesus-em	igleghutkelluku	esnengani	Naayvam	Galilee-m,	esghaqakek	anglegutkullghiik,	Simon-enkunguftuk	(aatghan	allgha	Peter),	Andrew-nkuk.	Iqalliniilghiik	negaghpagtek	miluutaqluku	naayvamun.
B01_04_Matthew_V19	Taagken	Jesus-em	pikakek,	“Maligtegnenga,	apeghtughlleqamtek	iqalliniightengughtesqellutek	yugneng.”
B01_04_Matthew_V20	Tawaninginaq	negaghpatek	unilluki	maligtekaak.
B01_04_Matthew_V21	Taaganiqaaghaq	esghaqakek	anglegutkullghiik,	James-enkuk	John-enkuk	ighneghqek	Zebedee-m.	Angyameggni	atakullghiit	negaghpateng	ilaaghtughaqeftiit.	Jesus-em	tuqluqakek.
B01_04_Matthew_V22	Tawaninginaq	angyaghtek	unitkaak	atayeklu	enkaam	Jesus	maligtekaak.
B01_04_Matthew_V23	Jesus	igleghakaq	tamanganun	Galilee-mi,	synagogue-ngitni	apeghtughiiqluni.	Nani	alngunak	ungipaqaq	Pinilghiineng	Ungipaaneng	Ataneghpagullghem,	naallghuquqaq	tamaghhaaneng	aqnighneghnengllu,	qinuyugnengllu.
B01_04_Matthew_V24	Ungipaq	mingitkaalghii	naallghuqullgha	tamaghhaani	Syria-mi.	Enkaam	yuget	tagitkiit	ellnganun	qamaglluki	qinuyulghiit,	allaaghhiinaaghneng	aqnighnelget,	ikfiqngalghiit,	tughneghalget,	sayugpagtaqayuget,	uniiqatlu.	Qamaglluki	Jesus-em	naallghutkii.
B01_04_Matthew_V25	Uglaapiglleghhiim	maligtekaat	Galilee-meng,	Decapolis-meng,	Jerusalem-emeng,	Judea-meng,	Jordan-emllu	inglunganeng	taagegken.
B01_05_Matthew_V1	Jesus-em	esghaghluki	yulghuteghllaget	maligullghiit,	qemimun	mayughluni	aqumegkaq.	Maligsaaghtemi	takulaghaasatni,
B01_05_Matthew_V2	apeghtughikaq:
B01_05_Matthew_V3	“Tamaakut	liisimakilghiit	aklukingalleghmeggneng	Kiyaghneghem	kayusillghaneng	quyastellelguut,	qayughllak	yukii	Ataneghpagullghan	Qilagem.
B01_05_Matthew_V4	Tamaakut	qivghulghiit	quyastellelguut,	qayughllak	Kiyaghneghem	ilutughsaghyaghqaqii.
B01_05_Matthew_V5	Tamaakut	qusevegngalghiit	quyastellelguut,	qayughllak	Kiyaghneghem	tuunyaghqaqaa	nuna	ellngitnun.
B01_05_Matthew_V6	Tamaakut	atuqiyupiglleghhiit	Kiyaghneghem	piyukellghaneng	quyastellelguut,	qayughllak	Kiyaghneghem	tuunyaghqaqii	piyukellghitneng.
B01_05_Matthew_V7	Tamaakut	nangllegtalghiit	quyastellelguut,	qayughllak	Kiyaghneghem	nangllegyagusaghqaqii.
B01_05_Matthew_V8	Tamaakut	umyugaqegtat	quyastellelguut,	qayughllak	esghaghyaghqaqaat	Kiyaghneq.
B01_05_Matthew_V9	Tamaakut	nekeggmellengestikayuget	yugneng	quyastellelguut,	qayughllak	Kiyaghneghem	avaqutaqniyaghqaqii.
B01_05_Matthew_V10	Tamaakut	amyuutkellengelghiit	atuqutmeggneng	Kiyaghneghem	piyukellgha,	qaatkutngatmeggneng	quyastellelguut,	qayughllak	yukii	Ataneghpagullghan	Qilagem.
B01_05_Matthew_V11	“Quyastellelguusi	yuget	seghlequuqangisi,	amyuutkegkangisi,	iqlengiqutkegkangisi	maligsaaghtengutegpesineng	whangamnun.
B01_05_Matthew_V12	Elngaatall	quyaghllagtek	qayughllak	qilagmi	pama	akileghtuusaghqalegllaguusi.	Amenqun,	neghighluku	uuknaliqistet	amyuutkegkiit	katam	maaten	amyuutkellghistun	elpesi.
B01_05_Matthew_V13	“Taghyustun	ayuqusi	nunam	yuganun.	Iwernga	taghyuq	taghyughningiiskuni,	alla	naten	taghyughnighsaghqaanghituq.	Atuunanighllequq	samun	alngunak	enkaam	egllequq	taagken	yuget	tutmaasghaqelleqaat.”
B01_05_Matthew_V14	“Nighugestun	ayuqusi	nunam	yuganun.	Neghllak	qemim	qaaynganilnguq	talughngayaghqaanghituq.
B01_05_Matthew_V15	Talwa	kitum	alngunak	kenelghutak	kumaghllukek	sagneghmun	asingiinnaanghitaak.	Itupill	quulvaqun	llilleqaak	nighugutesqellukek	tamaghhaanun	ilunganilngughnun.
B01_05_Matthew_V16	Tawateghpigaq	nighugsi	kuukgutesteggu	yugnun	esghiisqelluku	aneghneghqilleghsi,	enkaam	usuqnakangat	Atazi	qilagmelnguq.
B01_05_Matthew_V17	“Sumeghtaghaatkegpenanga	taaqesaghtuuniluki	atuqneghmeng	Moses-em	Liilightuusiillu	uuknaliqistetlu	apeghtuusiit.	Tagingunga	apeghtuutkennaluki	ipa	sameng	pisighpigaatangi.
B01_05_Matthew_V18	Ipa	piimsi,	qilagenkuk	nunankuk	kenletghuutellghegkenun	kenlanga,	talwa	sasquvegaghhaq	allangughhnaanghituq	Liilightuusanilnguq	kenlanga	qamaglluteng	Liilightuusanilnguut	apeghiillghitnun.
B01_05_Matthew_V19	Enkaangam	kitum	alngunak	qaatkenghilkumigu	ataasiq	Liilightuusaq,	apeghtuusaqegkumigullu	yugnun	qaatkefqaan	pisqelluku,	Kiyaghneghem	pilleqaa	ukalighpigaaniluku	Ataneghpagullghani	Qilagem.	Naqamenraq	kitum	alngunak	qaatkegkumiki	Liilightuusat,	apeghtuqumikillu	ilangi	yuget	qaatkesqelluki,	Kiyaghneghem	pilleqaa	aangyaghqaaniluku	Ataneghpagullghani	Qilagem.
B01_05_Matthew_V20	Enkaam	ungipaatamsi,	iteghnaanghitusi	Ataneghpagullghanun	Qilagem,	wetkuqun	qaatkutngaaghataghaqufsi	Kiyaghneghmun,	apeghtughikayugneng	Liilightuusaneng,	Pharisees-enengllu.
B01_05_Matthew_V21	“Nagaquqaqaghsi	sivunesinguq	ungipaatkaqiit,	‘Yugtaghpenasi.	Kina	alngunak	yugtalghii	nanqigsaqleguuq	aghyuughyaghqaaluni.’
B01_05_Matthew_V22	Iwernga	whanga	piimsi,	kitum	alngunak	ugumiyaguskumigu	yulgutni,	nanqigtivigmun	aglaghsaqleguuq.	Kitum	alngunak	pikumigu	yulgutni,	‘Uyuq	nallughllak’,	agghistenun	aglaghsaqleguuq.	Kitum	alngunak	sasiinghinnikumigu	yulgutni,	aglaghsaqleguuq	kumaghulghiimun	hell-mun.
B01_05_Matthew_V23	Enkaangam	aghqefigegni	Kiyaghneghmun	tuuninaqumaluten	tunusaghpeneng,	neqaaskuvgu	sugagsimaniluku	yulguten,
B01_05_Matthew_V24	tunusan	unilluku	ilaliighyaghtughnaken.	Taagken	tagiluten	tunusan	tuunaken	Kiyaghneghmun.
B01_05_Matthew_V25	“Kitum	avutkumakangaten	seghletun	pimaniluni,	ilaliighaghhnaken	aglaasimaluten	nanqigtivigmun,	luuraq	avutkistegpek	tuunayukangaten	nanqigtistemun.	Taagken	nanqigtistem	kelengakistemun	anusimingllaghtesnayukangaten.
B01_05_Matthew_V26	Ipa	piimken,	anusimingllaghtesimakangaten	aanaanghituten	kenlanga	nanqigtistem	llivikesqellgha	qamaglluku	llivikegkuvgu.
B01_05_Matthew_V27	“Nagaquqaqaghsi	whaten	pilleq,	‘Gelgaghniighpenasi’.
B01_05_Matthew_V28	Iwernga	whanga	piimsi,	kitum	alngunak	esghaghluku	aghnaq	qiliiqegkumigu	taawa	gelgaghniighuuq	qamagun	ilumikun.
B01_05_Matthew_V29	Enkaam	aghenqigneghem	iyegpek	seghleghqestekangaten,	iikluku	eggnaken!	Itagnaghyaghqaaguq	yugusin	nalighneghiteghngaaghmi,	iingunaghmi	hell-mun	miluutelleghqaaneng.
B01_05_Matthew_V30	Aghenqigneghem	iiggegpek	seghleghqestekangaten,	kepluki	eggnaketen!	Pinighataghaghyaghqaaguq	yugusin	nalighneghiteghngaaghmi,	iingunaghmi	hell-mun	pilleghqaaneng.
B01_05_Matthew_V31	“Nagaquqaqaghsi	whaten	pilleq,	‘Kitum	alngunak	nuliini	pegtekumigu,	igangllaannakanga	kelgutusighqameng	pegsimaniluku.’
B01_05_Matthew_V32	Iwernga	whanga	piimsi,	yugem	nuliini	pegsaghqaqenghita	wetkuqun	gelgaghniiqan.	Gelgaghniinghiteghngaan	pegtekumigu,	gelghaghniightesleqaa	allaneng	yugmeng	ugiiqan.	Kitum	nulighkegkumigu,	taana	yuuk	ellngallu	gelgaghniighullequq.
B01_05_Matthew_V33	“Nagaquqaqaghsillu	sivunesinguq	ungipaatkaqiit,	‘Akequsan	avelghaghpenaan,	iwernga	Ataneghmun	akequsan	atuqaqigu’.
B01_05_Matthew_V34	Iwernga	whanga	piimsi,	akeqigpenang	atuqluku	Kiyaghneghem	aatgha,	nalighmeng	sakun	alngunak.	Akeqigpenang	qilagkun	qayughllak	aqumutaqaa	Kiyaghneghem	igleghutilleghminun,
B01_05_Matthew_V35	nalighmeng	nunakun	qayughllak	itegaghiitaqaa	Kiyaghneghem,	nalighmeng	Jerusalem-kun	qayughllak	neghllakaa	Umiilegpagllagem.
B01_05_Matthew_V36	Akeqigpenangllu	naasqughpegun	qayughllak	talwa	ataasighhaq	nuyaq	qateghtesnaanghitan	nalighmeng	tagneghtesnaanghitan.
B01_05_Matthew_V37	Yeghlegi	legan	‘aang'ghhaasi’,	nalighmeng	‘nakaaghhaasi’.	Sangwaat	ilaskufsiki	taakugnun	Tughneghaghmeng	pinguut.
B01_05_Matthew_V38	“Nagaquqaqaghsi	whaten	pilleq,	‘Kina	iiyngiquvgu	elpeklu	iiyngighyaghqaaguten.	Kitum	gguutnga	mughugaghtekuvgu	elpeklu	gguten	mughugaghsaghqaaguq’.
B01_05_Matthew_V39	“Iwernga	whanga	piimsi,	seghletun	pistesi	akitegpenaki.	Kitum	qasaghtekangaten	ullungagpegun	inglungallu	tuunaken.
B01_05_Matthew_V40	Enkaam	kitum	aglaaskangaten	nanqigtistemun,	ggategken	ellmi	pinalukek	qaasligkenllu	tuunakegken	ellnganun.
B01_05_Matthew_V41	Kitum	alngunak	qelghuskagu	akmagtani	igleghutesqelluku	ataasimun	mile-mun,	alla	ataasiq	mile-a	ilannaken.
B01_05_Matthew_V42	Kitum	sameng	tungsighvikegkangaten,	tuunaken.	Kitum	sameng	navghaghvikegkangaten,	navghinnaken.
B01_05_Matthew_V43	“Nagaquqaqaghsi	whaten	pilleq,	‘Piniqluki	ilakumtaasi,	ugumikluki	ugumikilghiit	elpesineng’.
B01_05_Matthew_V44	Iwernga	whanga	piimsi,	‘Piniqluki	ugumikilghiit	elpesineng,	yughaatkaqitekillu	amyuutkistesi	Kiyaghneghmun	quyastesqelluki’.
B01_05_Matthew_V45	Tawaten	pikufsi	yuget	liisimakelleqiisi	avaqutaqutsi	Atagpesinun	qilagmelngughmun.	Yuuk	tamaghhaan	tawateghlluwaaq	piiqaa.	Siqineni	piitestaqaa	seghleghnunllu	pinilghiinunllu.	Tawateghpigaq	eslallugughtestaqaa	qaatkutkayugnunllu	qaatkusigalngughnunllu.
B01_05_Matthew_V46	Kiyaghneghem	akileghtughlleqisii-i	piniqistenginaghhasi	piniqegkufsiki?	Talwa	tax-meng	qerngughtistet	piniqaqiit	piniqisteteng.
B01_05_Matthew_V47	Enkaam	ilakumtaghhiinasi	quyakaataqufsiki,	naten	allangulleqetsi	ilangitneng	yuget?	Talwa	maniguusigalnguut	Kiyaghneghmun	quyakaqiit	ilakumtaateng!
B01_05_Matthew_V48	Elpesi	avaqutaqngutanganeng	Atagpesi	qilagmelnguum	pinightek	tawateghpigaq	Atagpesi	pinillghatun.”
B01_06_Matthew_V1	Jesus-em	apeghtuusani	nagneghutkii,	“Wataghllak	pinitun	pillesi	esghaghsaqegpenaki.	Esghaghsaqegkufsiki	Atagpesi	qilagmelnguum	akileghtughnaanghitiisi.
B01_06_Matthew_V2	“Enkaam	tuunikuvek	aklumalghiinun,	piniiyugneghestun	pigpenang.	Qalghightaghtestikayuguut	tuunivagilgameng	esghiisqelluteng.	Tawaten	piiqut,	synagogue-nillu	tumenillu	usuqesqelluteng.	Ipa	ungipaatamsi	akileghtuusangwaaghluteng	ayuqut.
B01_06_Matthew_V3	Iwernga	tuunikuvek	aklumalghiinun,	kina	alngunak	ungipaategpenaan,
B01_06_Matthew_V4	kitumun	alngunak	nallukesqelluku	tuuniillghen.	Atagpek	esghapagaqaaten	enkaam	akileghtughlleqaaten.”
B01_06_Matthew_V5	“Yughaneghpesini	piniiyugneghestun	pigpenasi.	Yughaghyuneghtuut	nekevghaghmeng	synagogue-nillu	tumenillu	esghiisqelluteng	yugnun.	Ipa	ungipaatamsi	akileghtuusangwaaghluteng	ayuqut.
B01_06_Matthew_V6	Iwernga	yughaghnaqneghpeni,	iteghluten	negpenun	uumgulluten	yughaghaqi	Atagpenun	aliinneghilgughmun.	Atagpek	liisimakaa	aksaqluku	sallghen	enkaam	akileghtughlleqaaten.
B01_06_Matthew_V7	“Yughaneghpesini	Kiyaghnepigmun	maniguusigalngughestun	pigpenasi.	Yughaneghmeggni	uteghpagtaghaqiit	akuzitet	sameng	pisiinghilnguut.	Sumeghmeggni	akuzilleghllagmegteggun	kiimsighlleqniluki	yughalleteng	piiqiit.
B01_06_Matthew_V8	Ellngistun	ayuqegpenasi	qayughllak	Atagpesi	liisimakaa	aklukegkaghsi,	talwa	aaptestegpenasi.
B01_06_Matthew_V9	“Enkaam	whaten	yughaghaqitek,	‘Whangkuta	Atavut	qilagmelnguq	pamani,	agleghnalghii	aatghen	quulvallengli.
B01_06_Matthew_V10	Yughaghtukut	Ataneghpagullghen	tagisqelluku,	piyukellghenllu	apeghiighesqelluku	nunami	whani,	katam	qilagmelngughestun.
B01_06_Matthew_V11	Neghyaghqaliteqeghtikut	aghneghmi	whani.
B01_06_Matthew_V12	Seghevutaghtiki	seghleghqelleput	seghevusimaluki	seghletun	pisteput.
B01_06_Matthew_V13	Nanghiiqullengestegpenaamta,	iwernga	yugulikut	taagken	Seghleghmeng.	Ataneghpagulleq,	aghtughyaghqaanghilleq,	nighughqelleq,	elpek	pikaten	quunperugllak.	Amen.’
B01_06_Matthew_V14	“Seghevuskufsiki	seghletun	pistesi,	Atagpesi	qilagmelnguum	seghevulleqiisi.
B01_06_Matthew_V15	Iwernga	seghevunneghilkufsiki	seghletun	pistesi,	Atagpesi	seghevunnaanghitii	seghleghqellesi.
B01_06_Matthew_V16	“Fast-eneghpesini	iilqesugnighqegpenasi	piniiyugneghestun.	Aghmigigatut,	mesuunangigatut	liigikesqelluteng	fast-enguniluteng.	Ipa	ungipaatamsi,	akileghtuusangwaaghluteng	ayuqut.
B01_06_Matthew_V17	Fast-eneghpeni	aghmigaqillu	mesuunaaqillu,
B01_06_Matthew_V18	ilagpenun	nallukesqelluku	fast-ellghen.	Iwernga	Atagpek	aliinneghilnguum	liisimakaa	saaquten	enkaam	akileghtughlleqaaten.
B01_06_Matthew_V19	“Nunami	whani	kagpagpenasi	aklungimeng	qayughllak	kingugemllu	anaghtaallghemllu	naafqelleqii,	teglegniightetlu	naafqiiluteng	teglegllequt.
B01_06_Matthew_V20	Iwernga	elpesineng	katam	qilagmi	kagpagitek	aklungimeng	qayughllak	moth-ngituq,	anaghtaangituq	naafqiiyaghqameng,	tegleghniightengituqlu	naafqiiluteng	teglegughyaghqameng.
B01_06_Matthew_V21	Sumeghtaghaatkumanginaghlleqaghsi	aklungigpesinun	kagpagvigsi.
B01_06_Matthew_V22	“Iyek	kenelghutastun	ayuquk	yugusimun.	Iiskegtekuvek	iingunaghmi	yugusin	nighugllagullequq,
B01_06_Matthew_V23	iwernga	iyellugmeskuvek	iingunaghmi	yugusin	mamlegllagullequq.	Enkaam	nighuk	ilugpenilnguq	mamlegukumi,	elngaatall	mamlepigtuq!
B01_06_Matthew_V24	“Kitum	alngunak	qepghaannaanghitaak	maalghuk	umiilgek.	Maalghugegneng	umiilelgukumi	ugumikelleqaa	ataasiq,	piniqelleqaa	ilanga.	Qaatkutngallequq	ataasimun,	pitkennaanghitaa	ilanga.	Enkaam	piniqnaanghitaghsi	Kiyaghneq	piniqumaluku	mani.
B01_06_Matthew_V25	“Tamaaken	apalluqluku	ungipaatamsi,	nulqaviighutkegpenaan	ungvalleghsi,	sameng	neghelleghqaghsi,	meghelleghqaghsi,	nalighmeng	sameng	aatelleghqaghsi.	Sumeghtaghaqaghtekqun,	unguvalleq	megnunaghataghaghtuq	neqmeng,	yugusiqlu	megnunaghataghaghtuq	aatkaneng.
B01_06_Matthew_V26	Esghaqaghtekiqun	qawaaget,	piitesighiigatut,	unatiigatut,	kagpagingigatut.	Naqamllu	Atagpesi	qilagmelnguum	neghqaqii!	Elpesi	megnunaghataghanghitsii	qawaagneng?
B01_06_Matthew_V27	Nalighpesi	nulqaviighutkelluku	unguvalleni	taakughlleqaguu?
B01_06_Matthew_V28	“Sangan	nulqaviightaqetsi	aasaghqameng?	Esghaqaghtekiqun	piitesighaat	piitellghit,	qepghiigatut	talwa	aatkanglliigatut	ellmeggneng.
B01_06_Matthew_V29	Ungipaatamsi	talwa	Solomon	aklungighllagmini	aasigatuq	piitesighaghestun	pinightutkalghiimeng.
B01_06_Matthew_V30	Kiyaghneghem	aasightughaqii	vegaaghet,	iwernga	aga	unaami	quukaqiit.	Kiyaghneghem	aasightuqayugukaki	veghaaget,	aasightughataghaghnaanghitisii	elpesi?	Ugpeqilleghqestaapigutsi!
B01_06_Matthew_V31	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	nulqaviightegpenasi	whaten,	‘Sameng	neghnaqesta?’	nalighmeng	‘Sameng	meghnaqesta?’	nalighmeng	‘Sameng	aannaqesta?’
B01_06_Matthew_V32	Gentile-et	tamaana	nulqaviighutkaqaat.	Atagpesi	qilagmelnguum	liisimakii	qamaglluki	aklukegkasi.
B01_06_Matthew_V33	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	kiyaghtelleghpesini	megnunalleghpigaaghtestekek	Kiyaghneghem	Ataneghpagullghallu,	piyukellghallu.	Tawaten	pikufsi	Kiyaghneghem	tuunelleqii	qamaglluki	aklukegkasi.
B01_06_Matthew_V34	Nulqaviighutkegpenaan	unaamilleghqaq,	qayughllak	unaamim	seghleliighi	itagnaghyaghqaagut	tawavek	aghneghmun.	Seghleliiq	pikayuguuq	aghhutanga	tamaghhaan,	ilaaghataghaghpenaan	unaamim	seghleliilleghqaaneng.”
B01_07_Matthew_V1	Jesus-em	apeghtuusani	nagneghutkii,	“Nanqigtigpenasi	ilagpesineng	enkaam	Kiyaghneghem	nanqiggneghillisi,
B01_07_Matthew_V2	qayughllak	Kiyaghneghem	nanqiglleqiisi	tawatengngwaaq	nanqigtilleghpesistun	ilagpesineng.	Atuqelleqiillu	elpesinun	ataasit	tamaakut	pikasi	ilagpesinun.
B01_07_Matthew_V3	Sangan	esghaghsigu	yulgutegpek	iisqughutnga,	elpek	katam	iisqughuten	unaghsighllak	avelghaghluku?
B01_07_Matthew_V4	Salghiimeng	yulguten	pizigu,	‘Entaa-a	iisqughutngiqaghlaken’,	elpek	paninang	iisqughutelguluten	unaghsighllagmeng?
B01_07_Matthew_V5	Uyuq	piniiyugneq!	Sivukluku	unaghsighllak	iyegpeneng	nusugluku	elngaatall	whateghlluwaaq	esghaghluku	yulguten	iisqughutngighnaken.”
B01_07_Matthew_V6	Taagken	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Legasiighwaghtenun	apeghtuusaqegpenaki	Kiyaghneghem	Akuzitangi,	qayughllak	qikmistunllu	kurugaghestunllu	ayuqut.	Sangwaat	agleghnalghiit	tuunegpenaki	qikminun	luuraq	sughugnayukangisi.	Akituqat	sungaat	miluutegpenaki	kurugaghnun,	luuraq	tutmaasghaqnayukatki.
B01_07_Matthew_V7	“Aaptek,	allgeghullequsi;	ivaghitek,	naalkullequsi;	tenglugtughtek	amigkun,	qelpeghulleqiisi.
B01_07_Matthew_V8	Qayughllak	kina	alngunak	aapleghhii,	allgeghusaghqaaguq;	kina	alngunak	ivaghilghii,	naalkusaghqaaguq,	kina	alngunak	tenglugtulghii	amigkun,	qelpeghulleqaa.
B01_07_Matthew_V9	Kitum	yugem	ighneni	tungsiqan	neqekrangllameng,	tuunelleqaguu	uyghagmeng?
B01_07_Matthew_V10	Nalighmeng	tungsiqan	iqallugmeng,	tuunelleqaguu	nemeghyameng?
B01_07_Matthew_V11	Seghleghughngaaghpesi,	avaqutasi	tuunyaghqaqasi	pinilghiimeng	tunusameng.	Atazi	qilagmelnguq	tuuniyugataghaghluni	ayuquq	pinilghiimeng	tunusameng	tamaakunun	aapleghhinun	ellminun.
B01_07_Matthew_V12	“Enkaam	yulgutegpesinun	pinitun	pistesukufsi,	elpesillu	pinitun	piiqiteki.	Tawaten	apeghtughinguut	Moses-em	Liilightuusiillu,	uuknaliqistetlu	igaqegkiit.”
B01_07_Matthew_V13	Taagken	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Iteghtek	kagpestaaghhaghqun	amigkun.	Amik	hell-mun	ayuqelghii	nuqutuuq,	tuumkegtuqlu	enkaam	uglaq	taakwagun	igleghtaquq.
B01_07_Matthew_V14	Iwernga	amik	unguvalleghmun	ayuqelghii	kagpestaaghhaaguq,	tuumllugmetuqlu	enkaam	qafsinkuuraghhaam	naalkaqii	tumet	unguvalleghmun	ayuqelghiit.
B01_07_Matthew_V15	“Kelengalusi	uuknaliqistesighwaaghneng.	Takulleqiisi	penniighsugnighqelluteng,	taawanginaq	ugighsalghiistun	amaastun	ayuqut.
B01_07_Matthew_V16	Liigikelleqasi	nangaghneghitgun	liigikelleghpesistun	uqfiget	sameng	piitestillghitgun.	Sikughlluget	piitestingigatut	grapes-meng	nalighmeng	figs-meng,	tawateghpigaq	seghleghet	yuget	pinitun	pingigatut.
B01_07_Matthew_V17	Uqfik	pinilghii	piitestiyaghqaaguq	pinilghiimeng,	taawanginaq	uqfik	seghleq	piitestiyaghqaaguq	seghleghmeng.
B01_07_Matthew_V18	Uqfik	pinilghii	piitestinaanghituq	seghleghmeng,	uqfik	seghleq	piitestinaanghituq	pinilghiimeng.
B01_07_Matthew_V19	Enkaam	alngunak	uqfik	piitestinghilnguq	pinilghiimeng	kepluni	kumaghsaghqaaguq.
B01_07_Matthew_V20	Enkaangam	tawatetellghitgun	liigikelleqasi	uuknaliqistesighwaaghutangi.”
B01_07_Matthew_V21	Jesus-em	apeghtuusani	nagneghutkii,	“Ilangi	yugem	whangamnun	maligsaaghtekniiqut	enkaam	piiqaatnga,	‘Atanqamken’	iwernga	iteghnaanghitut	Ataneghpagullghanun	Qilagem.	Tamaakunginaat	atuqilghiit	piyukellghaneng	Atama	qilagmelnguum	iteghyaghqaagut	Ataneghpagullghanun	Qilagem.
B01_07_Matthew_V22	Nanqigtillghem	Aghneghani,	uglam	piyaghqaqaanga	whaten,	‘Ataneq,	Ataneq!	Ateghpegun	Kiyaghneghem	ungipaa	aapqaqaghput.	Ateghpegun	aanesquqaqaput	tughneghaat	uglalghiineng	yugneng.	Ateghpegun	allaaghlluwhaghtiighaataqaagukut	uglaghngaan!’
B01_07_Matthew_V23	Iwernga	whaten	pilleqanka,	‘Nallukngwaaghamsi,	iqitek	whangamneng,	seghletun	pisteni’.
B01_07_Matthew_V24	“Kina	alngunak	nagallghii	apeghtughillemnun,	qaatkegkumiki	peghqinelghiitun	yugtun	ayuquq	mangteghangllaqaq	uyghagem	qaayngakun.
B01_07_Matthew_V25	Eslallugughteghllagyalghiimi,	kiiwet	ulevumaghmeng,	anuqlighllagyalghiimillu,	tawallima	mangteghaq	uullghumangilnguq	qayughllak	uyghagkun	nekeftekaalghii.
B01_07_Matthew_V26	“Iwernga	kina	alngunak	nagateghngaaghmi	apeghtughillemnun,	qaatkenghilkumiki,	nalluqatun	yugtun	ayuquq	mangteghangllaqaq	qenaaghllugkun.
B01_07_Matthew_V27	Eslallugughteghllagyalghiimi,	kiiwet	ulevumaghmeng,	anuqlighllagyalghiimillu,	aga	mangteghaq	uulqaq	naavngwaaghluni.”
B01_07_Matthew_V28	Jesus	tamaaken	apeghtughineghmeng	taaqsan,	yulghuteghllaget	saghiighayukat,
B01_07_Matthew_V29	qayughllak	apeghtughikaq	aghtughyaghqaanghillelighluni,	apeghtughikayugestun	Liilightuusameng	pigpenani.
B01_08_Matthew_V1	Jesus	qemimeng	ukigyan,	yulghuteghllagem	maligtekaa.
B01_08_Matthew_V2	Taagken	yuuk,	leprosy-lek,	tagiluni	ellnganun,	segesqughfikluku,	pikaa,	“Ataneq,	piyukelqegkuvgu,	ukmangiqaghnga.”
B01_08_Matthew_V3	Enkaam	Jesus-em	tawavek	saafluku	pikaa,	“Piyukelqaqa,	ukmangiighten!”	Tawaninginaq	leprosy-ngiitkaq.
B01_08_Matthew_V4	Taagken	Jesus-em	pikaa,	“Wataghllak	kina	alngunak	ungipaategpenaan	naallghutelleghpeneng,	yeghlegi	aglaa	priest-mun	esghaghligu	naallghutellghen.	Taagken	aghqerraaghhaaten	Moses-em	Liilightuusaan	pisqellghatun	ipapighqesqelluku	naallghutellghen.”
B01_08_Matthew_V5	Taagken	Jesus	Capernaum-emun	pikaq.	Kaataquqlu,	Rome-em	umiilwaaghan	takuluku	kayusiitaghtesqelluni	pikaa,
B01_08_Matthew_V6	“Ataneq,	whangkunni	qepghaghteka,	uniighumaaq,	ikfiqeghllaguuq.”
B01_08_Matthew_V7	Jesus-em	pikaa,	“Naallghusaghtughnaqaqa.”
B01_08_Matthew_V8	Iwernga	umiilwaaghem	pikaa,	“Ataneq,	itagnanghitunga	elpenun	iteghviksaghqaalunga	mangteghamnun.	Legan	tawanlluten	naallghutesqigu	qepghaghteka	enkaam	naallghulli.
B01_08_Matthew_V9	Qelghikayugmeng	umiilelguunga	enkaam	whangallu	qelghaqanka	pilluwaghtenka.	Ataasiq	qelqumkun,	‘Aghulaqi’	aga	aghulaqellequq.	Ilanga	whaten	pikumkun,	‘Tagi’	tagillequq.	Qepghaghteka	qelqumkun,	‘Una	piightigu’,	aga	pilleqaa.”
B01_08_Matthew_V10	Jesus-em	nagalluku	saghiighayukaq,	enkaam	yuget	maligullghiit	ellminun	pikii,	“Ipa	ungipaatamsi,	nallaasigatunga	kitumeng	alngunak	Israel-eghmiimeng,	uutun	yugtun	ugpeqineghtutkalghiimeng.
B01_08_Matthew_V11	Ungipaatamsi,	asivaghmengllu	pakfallamengllu	yulghutet	tagilaghaasaghqaagut	Ataneghpagullghanun	Qilagem.	Tawani	aqumuulluteng	neghelgusighlleqiit	sivuneput	Abraham-enkut,	Isaac-enkut,	Jacob-enkut.
B01_08_Matthew_V12	Iwernga	tamaakut	Ataneghpagulleghmesaghqaayalghiit	aanesaghqaagut	mamlegllagmun,	tawani	elngaatall	qiyaaghwaghllagllequt	gguteteng	terqitaagtaamiita	avuteghqem	angtalanganeng.”
B01_08_Matthew_V13	Taagken	Jesus-em	pikaa	umiilwaaq,	“Aglaghhaaten,	ugpeqilleghpetun	apeghiighllequq.”	Enkaam	tawaninginaq	umiilwaaghem	qepghaghtenga	naallghutkaq.
B01_08_Matthew_V14	Jesus	Peter-enkunun	piluni,	esghaqaa	aghnaq	Peter-em	sakinga	qavaghvigmeteftuq	puqleghaluni.
B01_08_Matthew_V15	Saafsaqminigu	iiggakun	puqleghangiitkaq,	aga	makelluni	kepsiiqukaa.
B01_08_Matthew_V16	Ighivgaghyagu	Jesus-mun	tagiquutkiit	tughneghalget	ilumegteggun	enkaam	aanesquqii	tughneghiit	akuzilleghmikun,	qamagllukillu	qinuyuget	naallghutkii.
B01_08_Matthew_V17	Tawaten	pikaq	apeghiighnaluku	uuknaliqistem	Isaiah-m	whaten	pillgha,	“Tugukaqii	qinuyulleput,	iqitkaqii	aqnighneput.”
B01_08_Matthew_V18	Jesus-em	esghaghluki	uvitminilnguut	yulghuteghllaget,	yataaghqesqegkii	naayvam	inglunganun	aghvighnaluteng.
B01_08_Matthew_V19	Taagken	apeghtughikayugem	Liilightuusameng	takuluku	pikaa,	“Apeghtughista,	maliglleqamken	natmun	alngunak	pikuvek.”
B01_08_Matthew_V20	Jesus-em	pikaa,	“Kaviighet	riigtelguut,	qawaaget	unglutelguut,	iwernga	Ighnegha	Yugem	ingaghfigitaquq.”
B01_08_Matthew_V21	Ilangan	maligsaaghtengan	pikaa,	“Ataneq,	maliglleqamken	iwernga	sivukluku	ataka	lliveghyaghtuqaghlakun.”
B01_08_Matthew_V22	Iwernga	Jesus-em	pikaa,	“Maligtinga.	Tamaakut	maligusunghilnguut	whangamnun	tuqukaagut	taghneghamegteggun;	lliveghlitki	tuqumasliiteng.”
B01_08_Matthew_V23	Taagken	Jesus	angyamun	uugsan	maligsaaghtengillu	uuglleghaatkat.
B01_08_Matthew_V24	Puglellghita	kiingungiighhaaneng	esla	nuuskagllagan	naafteghllakaq,	naayvaqlu	imaghllugughteghllagumaghmi,	repall	angyaq	imighaataqegkaa.	Iwernga	Jesus	qavaalghii.
B01_08_Matthew_V25	Maligsaaghtet	takuluku	taghtughtekaat	whaten	pimaan,	“Ataneq,	yugulikut!	Tuqulaghaannaqukut!”
B01_08_Matthew_V26	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Sangafsi	alingetsi?	Ugpeqilleghqestaapiguusi!”	Taagken	nekevluni	ineghtekakek	anuqallu	imaghllugetlu	enkaam	amsanaghllugughtekaq.
B01_08_Matthew_V27	Qamaglluteng	saghiighayukat.	Whaten	pikat,	“Natelnguuwa	yuuk	una?	Talwa	anuqemllu	imaghllugetlu	qaatkegkangat!”
B01_08_Matthew_V28	Jesus-enkut	kaasameng	inglunganun	naayvam,	aglaqat	Gadara-ghmiit	nunangitnun.	Taagken	maalghuk	yugek	tughneghalgek	ilumegnegun	tagilutek	lliveghneng	nallaqaak	Jesus.	Suugllugllagek	repall	kina	alngunak	taakwagun	tuumkun	igleghsigalnguq.
B01_08_Matthew_V29	Legan	esghaghluku	Jesus	akilghuukak,	“Sanaqsikut,	Ighneghani	Kiyaghneghem?	Ikfiqesnaqsikut	pilleghqaq	kaatestegpenaan?”
B01_08_Matthew_V30	Taawanguq	qantaghani	kurugalghutet,	neghaqeftut.
B01_08_Matthew_V31	Tughneghaat	maniguutepiglluteng	Jesus	pikaat,	“Aanestekufkut,	kurugaghnun	iteghaatesnakefkut.”
B01_08_Matthew_V32	Enkaam	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Aanleghaatek!”	Aanleghaalluteng	kurugaghnun	iteghaatkat.	Aga	kurugaat	pangalgutkat	asitmun	naayvamun	nagneghluteng	meghmi	tuqulaghaatkat.
B01_08_Matthew_V33	Kurugaghneng	aflengakilghiit	qimaaguutkat	nemun.	Tawani	aapqagket	samatkek	tughneghalguyalghiik	ilumegnegun,	samatangillu	kurugalghutet.
B01_08_Matthew_V34	Enkaam	qamagtengngwaaghluteng	tamaakumiit	esghaghyaghtuutkaat	Jesus.	Esghaghyamegteggu	maniguutepiglluteng	aghulaqesqegkaat	nunameggneng.
B01_09_Matthew_V1	Taagken	Jesus	angyamun	uuglluni	inglunganun	naayvam	aghviqaq.	Enkaam	Capernaum-emun	aglaqaq	neminun.
B01_09_Matthew_V2	Ilangita	yuget	ellnganun	tagitkaat	uniiqaq	yuuk	allighaakun.	Jesus-em	liigikluki	ugpeqilleghtulngit,	pikaa	uniiqaq,	“Ighnemni,	quya!	Seghleghqelleghten	seghevutut.”
B01_09_Matthew_V3	Taagken	ilangi	apeghtughikayuget	Liilightuusaneng	sumeghtaghaqat,	“Una	yuuk	seghleghqeghllagtuq.	Kiyaghneghuyugtuq	seghevutilleghmikun	seghleghqelleghneng!”
B01_09_Matthew_V4	Jesus-em	liisimakluki	sumeghtaghallghit,	pikii,	“Sangan	seghleghmeng	sumeghtaghaghetsi?
B01_09_Matthew_V5	Naliq	akuzilleq	piyaqniita,	‘Seghleghqelleghten	seghevutut’	nalighmeng	‘Makelluten	piyugi’?
B01_09_Matthew_V6	Liigikesnaqamsi	Ighnegha	Yugem	seghevutilleghqalgutanga	seghleghqelleghmeng	nunami	whani.”	Enkaam	uniiqaq	yuuk	pikaa,	“Makelluten,	allighan	tuguluku,	aglaa!”
B01_09_Matthew_V7	Yuuk	makelluni	aglaqaq.
B01_09_Matthew_V8	Yulghutet	esghapagluku	tallughyukat,	usuqegkaat	Kiyaghneq	tawatelngughmeng	aghtughyaghqaanghilleliskangi	yuget.
B01_09_Matthew_V9	Taam	kingunganeng	Jesus-em	igleghutkelluku	esghaqaa	tax-em	qerngughtistenga,	aqumluni	qepghaghvigmini;	Matthew-nguftuq.	Pikaa,	“Maligtinga.”	Enkaam	Matthew-m	nekevluni	maligtekaa.
B01_09_Matthew_V10	Mulugpenateng	Jesus-enkut	maligsaaghtekullghiit	neghyaghtuqat	Matthew-nkunun.	Neghuusimaluki	tax-meng	qerngughtistelghutetlu,	seghleghqestelghutetlu	aqumluteng	Jesus-enkut	neghelgusiqiit.
B01_09_Matthew_V11	Ilangita	Pharisees-et	esghaghluku	neghelgusiighilghii,	maligsaaghtengi	aaptekiit,	“Sangan	apeghtughistegpesi	neghelgusightaki	tax-meng	qerngughtistetlu,	seghleghqestetlu?”
B01_09_Matthew_V12	Jesus-em	nagalluki	kiimsiqii,	“Yugunqegtat	aghallegtaghsughniitut,	tamaakunginaat	qinuyulghiit.
B01_09_Matthew_V13	Liisaghtughteggu	sameng	pisiitanga	una	Akuzitnilnguq	Igaqegkaq	whaten	pilghii,	‘Piyukenghitanka	aghqutesi,	itupill	nangllegtaghtesugamsi.’	Tagingunghitunga	tagsighnaluki	elqughutngalghiit,	iwernga	taginguunga	tagsighnaluki	seghleghqestet.”
B01_09_Matthew_V14	Taagken	John-em	Paaptaayestem	maligsaaghtengita	takuluku	Jesus	aaptekaat,	“Sangan	whangkutallu	Pharisees-etlu	awen	fast-aaqesta,	naqam	maligsaaghteten	fast-egpenateng?”
B01_09_Matthew_V15	Jesus-em	kiimsiqii,	“Nulightughyaghqam	tagsiqliqii	qivghungayaghqaawaat	tawanlluku	nulightughnaqelghii?	Yeghlegillu!	Iwernga	pilleghqaq	kaasaghqaaguq	nulightughnaqelghii	ellngitneng	iqitestekumegteggu,	elngaatall	tamaani	aghneghni	fast-ellequt.”
B01_09_Matthew_V16	Taagken	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Kitum	alngunak	ilaaghnaanghitaak	aatkalugek	nutaghameng	liiqneghmeng.	Ilaalleq	qellughtekumi	piigullequq,	enkaam	piilleq	sullevellequq.
B01_09_Matthew_V17	Talwa	kitum	alngunak	wine-eghraghaghmeng	imighnaanghitaa	awataghpaluk	qayughllak	awataghpaluk	imiqumi	aafkaghluni	imiighullequq.	Enkaam	awataghpaluk	atuuyaghqaananighllequq.	Iwernga	awataghpagraghaq	imiqumi	wine-eghraghaghmeng	qerngaagmek	naavnaanghituk.”
B01_09_Matthew_V18	Paninang	Jesus	akuzimaluku	Jews-et	igleghutistengat	iteghluni	segesqughlluni	manungakun	pikaa,	“Panika	whaa	tuqun'ghhaaguq,	iwernga	takuluku	saaftekuvgu	unguvaghllequq.”
B01_09_Matthew_V19	Enkaam	Jesus-em	nekevluni	maligtekaa,	maligsaaghtengillu	maligutkat.
B01_09_Matthew_V20	Aglaamaluki,	qinuyulghiim	aghnam	takukaa	Jesus	tunutanganeng.	Qula	maalghuk	siipneqluku	ayumiqulleq	kiitelqungigalnguq.	Whaten	sumeghtaghaqaq,	“Saafteqeghsaqumkun	aatkaakun,	naallghunnayaghtunga.”	Enkaam	saaftekaa	atkuyaaghan	keniikun.
B01_09_Matthew_V22	Jesus-em	qiivutkelluku	esghaghluku	aghnaq	pikaa,	“Panimni	alingegpenang!	Ugpeqilleghpegun	naallghututen.”	Aga	aghnaq	naallghutkaq.
B01_09_Matthew_V23	Taagken	Jesus-em	kaalluni	igleghutistenkunun,	esghaqii	tuqiilghiini	qalghightaghtetlu,	yulghutetlu	qiyaaghuuteghllalghiit.
B01_09_Matthew_V24	Tawavek	pikii,	“Aanleghaatek!	Aghnaghaghhaq	tuqullghituq	qavaaguq!”	Iwernga	nenglaqegkaat.
B01_09_Matthew_V25	Aanleghaatesatki,	iteghluni	Jesus-em	tugukaa	iiggakun,	enkaam	aghnaghaghhaq	unguvaqaq.
B01_09_Matthew_V26	Enkaam	taana	allaaghlluwhaghtilleq	ungipaqegkaat	tamangani.
B01_09_Matthew_V27	Taagken	Jesus	aghulaqegkaq	nemeng.	Ayaakak	yugek	maligsaaqaak,	akilghuumaagmek	whaten,	“Ighneghani	David-em,	nangllegyagutikung!”
B01_09_Matthew_V28	Aga	mangteghamun	iteghyan	maligtekaak,	enkaam	Jesus-em	aaptekakek,	“Ugpeqestegneguu	naallghutilleghqaqa?”	Kiimsiqaak,	“Aa-a	Ataneq!”
B01_09_Matthew_V29	Taagken	Jesus-em	iyegkenkun	saaflukek	pikakek,	“Ugpeqilleghpetegetun	apeghiighli.”
B01_09_Matthew_V30	Enkaam	esghaghyagutkak.	Jesus-em	ineghtengngwaaqakek,	“Ungipaghpenatek	kitumun	alngunak.”
B01_09_Matthew_V31	Iwernga	navek	pineghmegni	aapghaqegkangak	Jesus-em	apeghiiqaa	ellmegnun.
B01_09_Matthew_V32	Taakuk	yugek	aghulaqumalukek,	Jesus-mun	tagitkaat	yuuk	akuzingigalnguq	qayughllak	ilumikun	tughneghalek.
B01_09_Matthew_V33	Legan	Jesus-em	tughneghaq	aanestaa,	yuuk	aga	akuzikaq.	Enkaam	yulghutet	saghiighayugulluteng	whaten	pikat,	“Whatelngughmeng	allaaghlluwaghtilleghmeng	esghaasigatukut	Israel-mi!”
B01_09_Matthew_V34	Iwernga	Pharisees-et	pikat,	“Umiilgita	tughneghaat	aghtughyaghqaanghillelisimaat	aanesqiisqelluku	tughneghaghneng.”
B01_09_Matthew_V35	Taagken	Jesus	igleghtekaq	tamaghhaani	Galilee-mi,	apeghtughimaghmi	synagogue-ngitni,	ungipaqimaghmillu	Pinilghiineng	Ungipaaneng	Ataneghpagullghem.	Naallghuquqii	qamaglluki	aqnighnelgetlu	qinuyulghiitlu.
B01_09_Matthew_V36	Esghaghluki	yulghuteghllaget	nangllegyagutkii,	qayughllak	seghleliighngaghllaget,	kayutngunateng;	penniighestun	penniighnightengilngughestun.
B01_09_Matthew_V37	Taagken	maligsaaghteni	pikii,	“Uglalghiim	yugem	ugpeqsugaqiit	Pinilghiit	Ungipat.	Tamaakunguut	usputngalghiit	nunivagseghanun	unataghyaqleggiinaaghtekat.	Taawanginaq	palapiguut	qepghaghtet.
B01_09_Matthew_V38	Enkaangam	yughaghtek	Atanghanun	unataghyaghqat,	kayagtisqelluku	qepghaghtekaghqameng	unataghyaghqaanun.”
B01_10_Matthew_V1	Jesus-em	qerngughlluki	qula	maalghuk	siipneqluku	maligsaaghteni,	aghtughyaghqaanghillelitkii	aanestiyaghqaaluki	tughneghaghneng,	naallghutiyaghqaaluki	tamaghhaaneng	aqnighneghnengllu,	qinuyugnengllu.
B01_10_Matthew_V2	Ukunguut	qula	maalghuk	siipneqluku	apostle-et:	sivuliq,	Simon	(alla	atelek	Peter-meng),	Andrew	(anglegutanga),	James-enkuk	John-enkuk	(Zebedee-m	ighneghqek),
B01_10_Matthew_V3	Philip-enkut,	Bartholomew-nkut,	Thomas-enkut,	Matthew-nkut	(tax-meng	qerngughtistenguyalghii),	James-enkut	(ighnegha	Alphaeus-em),	Thaddaeus-enkut,
B01_10_Matthew_V4	Simon-enkut	Zealot-a,	Judas	Iscariot-lu	(uveghpagutiyaghqaq	Jesus-meng).
B01_10_Matthew_V5	Jesus-em,	taakut	qula	maalghuk	siipneqluku	apostle-et	kayagtekii	qelghuumiita,	“Gentile-etlu,	Samaria-ghmiitlu	nunangitnun	pifqaafsi.
B01_10_Matthew_V6	Yeghlegi	Israel-eghmiinun	pitek	qayughllak	iflakastun	penniighestun	ayuqut.
B01_10_Matthew_V7	Navek	alngunak	pineghpesini	whaten	ungipaghaqitek,	‘Ataneghpagullgha	Qilagem	kaasaghtuumaaq!’
B01_10_Matthew_V8	Qinuyuget	naallghuteki,	tuqukat	unguvaghteki,	leprosy-lget	naallghuteki,	tughneghaatlu	aanesqughteki	yugneng.	Akingunaan	allgeghutkaagusi,	enkaam	akingunaan	tuunitek.
B01_10_Matthew_V9	Kelqegpenasi	manimeng:	gold-meng,	silver-meng,	talwa	copper-meng.
B01_10_Matthew_V10	Kelqegpenasi	akmagtameng,	simiitkaghqameng,	kamegmeng	talwa	ayaviighmeng,	qayughllak	qepghaghta	aklukegkaaneng	tuunyaghqaaguq.
B01_10_Matthew_V11	“Town-enun	nalighmeng	village-enun	kaanneghpesini	ivaghiiqitek	kitumeng	pinilghiimeng	enkaam	ellnganitaqitek	kenlanga	aghulaqsaghqaaghtelleghpesinun.
B01_10_Matthew_V12	Iitqufsi	mangteghaanun	quyastaqiteki	tawanlenguut	whaten,	‘Kiyaghneghem	nekeggmellgha	elpesinilli.’
B01_10_Matthew_V13	Upughaskangisi,	quyastilleghsi	tawantesnakesi.	Iwernga	upughanneghilkangisi,	quyastilleghsi	veghhnakesi.
B01_10_Matthew_V14	Kitum	alngunak	upughanneghilkangisi	nalighmeng	naganneghilkangisi,	aanutkelluku	mangteghameng	nalighmeng	aghulaqutkelluku	town-meng,	itegaghpesi	pagulangi	ufsugunnakesi.
B01_10_Matthew_V15	Ipa	ungipaatamsi,	Nanqigtillghem	Aghneghani,	Sodom-eghmiitlu	Gomorah-ghmiitlu	aghyuulleghqestaaghhaayaghqaagut	taam	nem	yuganeng!”
B01_10_Matthew_V16	“Ukughsi!	Kayagtekumsi	penniighestun	qungangitnilngughestun	amaat	lliighlequsi	enkaam	peghqinghulusi	nemeghyastun,	nekeggmellusi	doves-tun.
B01_10_Matthew_V17	Kelengalusi,	qayughllak	yuget	tugulusi	aglaalleqiisi	agghistenun,	kagsagmiglleqiisillu	synagogue-meggni.
B01_10_Matthew_V18	Whanga	apalluqlunga,	nekevesleqiisi	sivungitgun	igleghutistetlu	umiilgetlu.	Enkaam	liigikesaghqaaghlleqaghpesinga	ellngitnunllu	Gentile-enunllu.
B01_10_Matthew_V19	Nanqigtestemun	aglaaskangisi,	teggellghiighpenasi	naten	akuzilleghqaghpesineng,	nalighmeng	sameng	pilleghqaghpesineng.	Akuziyaghqaaghtekufsi	akuzitkaghqalgullequsi.
B01_10_Matthew_V20	Akuzitet	elpesi	pikenghitasi	qayughllak	Atagpesi	Taghneghakek	akuzillequk	elpesigun.
B01_10_Matthew_V21	“Yuget	ellmeng	katam	angleguteteng	tuqutesleqiit,	atatlu	avaqutateng	tawaten	piyaghqaqiit.	Avaqutat	anguyiilluki	angayuqateng	tuqutesleqiit.
B01_10_Matthew_V22	Whangamneng	apalluqlusi	yugem	qamaglluni	ugumikelleqiisi.	Iwernga	nuqenneghtuqat	kenlanga	kenlemun	yugulillengyaghqaagut.
B01_10_Matthew_V23	Takukaghpesini	amyuutkegkangisi,	ilanganun	town-em	qimaggaasi.	Ipa	ungipaatamsi,	qamaggnaanghitasi	Israel-em	town-ngi,	sivungani	Ighneghan	Yugem	tagilleghqaan.
B01_10_Matthew_V24	“Maligsaaghta	qaasghutinganghituq	apeghtughistemineng,	talwa	qepghaghta	qaasghutinganghituq	umiilegmineng.
B01_10_Matthew_V25	Itagnaghiyaghqaaguq	maligsaaghta	apeghtughistemitun	lliiqumi,	qepghaghtallu	umiilegmitun	lliiqumi.	Naasquutilghii	nengllugutmineng,	Beelzebul-meng	atiimakatgu,	nengllugutangi	seghleghataghaaluki	atighyaghqaqiit.
B01_10_Matthew_V26	“Enkaam	alikegpenaki	tamaakut	amyuqetaghtet.	Sangwaa	alngunak	nallukegkaq	liitesaghqaaguq,	qamagllunillu	aksaqegkaq	qayvighqesaghqaaguq.
B01_10_Matthew_V27	Elpesinun	sangwaat	aapqanka	apeghyaghqaqasi	tamanganun.	Sigutquutkegkanka	elpesinun,	ungipaqsaghqaqasi	mangteghat	qaayngitneng.
B01_10_Matthew_V28	“Enkaam	alikegpenaki	yuget	tuqutikayuget	yugusighhiinaghmeng	iwernga	tuqutinaanghitut	unguvasimeng.	Itupill	alikiteggu	Kiyaghneq,	qayughllak	hell-mi	naafqiiyaghqaaguq	tamaghhaagkeneng	yugusimengllu	unguvasimengllu.
B01_10_Matthew_V29	Penny-meng	tukfighyaghqaqagsi	qawaaggaak,	naqamllu	aallgha	ifkaqan	Atagpesi	liisimakaa.
B01_10_Matthew_V30	Iwernga	elpesi	aflengakataghaghlusi	ayuqiisi,	qayughllak	talwa	nuyaghpesi	uglaghtalngi	liisimakii.
B01_10_Matthew_V31	Enkaam	alingegpenasi,	Atagpesi	megnukataghaghiisi	qawaaggaghneng!
B01_10_Matthew_V32	“Kitum	alngunak	ungipaaskaki	yuget,	whangamnun	pikniluni,	whangallu	Ataka	qilagmelnguq	ungipaalleqaqa	whangamnun	pikniluku.
B01_10_Matthew_V33	Iwernga	kitum	alngunak	ungipaaskaki	yuget	whangamnun	pikenghinniluni	whangallu	Ataka	qilagmelnguq	ungipaalleqaqa	whangamnun	pikenghinniluku.”
B01_10_Matthew_V34	Jesus-em	paninang	aleghquqii,	“Sumeghtaghaghpenasi	nekeggmellengestiyaghtuunilunga	nunam	yuganun.	Yeghlegillu!	Nekeggmellengestiyaghtuunghitunga,	taawanginaq	pillugutestiyaghtuugunga.
B01_10_Matthew_V35	Taginguunga	yugmun	anguyaliitesqelluku	atanga,	aghnamun	anguyaliitesqelluku	naanga,	ukaaghanun	anguyaliitesqelluku	sakinga	aghnaq.
B01_10_Matthew_V36	Enkaam	yuuk	nengllugutangita	anguyaliilleqaat.
B01_10_Matthew_V37	“Kitum	alngunak	piniqegkumigu	atani	nalighmeng	naani	pakiggulluku	whangamneng,	whanga	pikepagningitaqa.	Kitum	alngunak	piniqegkumigu	ighneni	nalighmeng	panini	pakiggulluku	whangamneng,	whanga	pikepagningitaqa.
B01_10_Matthew_V38	Kitum	alngunak	qaquurani	tuguyunghilkumigu	maliggnaanghitaanga,	enkaam	whangamni	itagnanghituq.
B01_10_Matthew_V39	Kitum	alngunak	unguvalleni	ellminun	piknikumigu	iflayaghqaqaa.	Iwernga	kitum	alngunak	unguvalleni	pegtekumigu	whanga	apalluqlunga	allgeghsaghqaqaa	unguvallepik.
B01_10_Matthew_V40	“Kitum	alngunak	upughaskangisi,	whangallu	upughalleqaanga,	enkaam	kitum	alngunak	upughaskuminga,	upughalleqaa	kayagtisteka.
B01_10_Matthew_V41	Kitum	alngunak	upughaskumigu	uuknaliqista	uuknaliqistengutanganeng,	akileghtuusangellequq	uuknaliqistetun.	Kitum	alngunak	upughaskumigu	elqughutngalghii	yuuk	elqughutngatanganeng,	akileghtuusangellequq	elqughutngalghiitun	yugtun.
B01_10_Matthew_V42	Kitum	alngunak	nenglekeglleghhiimeng	meghsikumigu	ukalighpigaq	maligsaaghteka	apalluqluku	maligsaaghtekutemneng,	ipa	piimsi	akileghtuusangepestaaghyaghqaaguq.”
B01_11_Matthew_V1	Jesus-em	qula	maalghuk	siipneqluku	maligsaaghteni	apeghiighyamiki	apeghtughaneghmeng,	tamaaken	aghulaqegkaq	ilangitnun	town-et	apeghtughinalunillu	ungipaqinalunillu.
B01_11_Matthew_V2	Anusimingllaghvigmelluni	John-em	Paaptaayestem	nagaqughluku	Christ-a	saaqutanga,	ilangi	maligsaaghteni	kayagtekii	Jesus-mun.
B01_11_Matthew_V3	Aaptekaat	Jesus,	“Elpengwaa	taginaqnikaat,	nalighmeng	kina	tagiyaghqaawaa?”
B01_11_Matthew_V4	Jesus-em	kiimsiqii,	“Ungipaasaghtughteggu	John	nagatkaghpesinengllu	esghaqaghpesinengllu:
B01_11_Matthew_V5	ayakaayalghiit	esghaghyagutut,	piyugigasalghiit	piyugyagutut,	leprosy-lguyalghiit	naallghutut,	tuuslaghyalghiit	nagaquusagutut,	tuqukaayalghiit	unguvaghtut,	aklumalghiinunllu	Pinilghiit	Ungipat	ungipaqut.
B01_11_Matthew_V6	Kina	alngunak	ugpeqinaninghilkumi	whangamneng	quyastekaaguq!”
B01_11_Matthew_V7	Aga	John-em	maligsaaghtengi	aghulaqsata,	Jesus-em	akuzitkegkaa	John	yulghutnun,	“Kilgaanun	piiqngafsi,	sangwaa	esghaghyaghtughesteggu?	Vegaaq	anuqem	ufsuguskangaa?
B01_11_Matthew_V8	Saqutsimi?	Esghaghnalukuu	aatkaqegtaq	yuuk?	Tamaaken	aatkaqelghiit	kiyaghtaqut	umiilget	mangteghiitni!
B01_11_Matthew_V9	Sangwaami	esghaghyaghtughesteggu?	Uuknaliqistaa?	Aa-a,	ungipaatamsi,	esghaqaghsi	John	uuknaliqistenginaanghituq.	Megnunaghataghaghtuq
B01_11_Matthew_V10	qayughllak	ellnganguuq	Akuzitet	Igaqegkat	aapqaat	whaten,	‘Kiyaghneq	piiq,	Sivugpeni	kayaglleqaqa	ungipaghteka,	yataaghqesaghtiisqelluku	tuumkaghqan’.
B01_11_Matthew_V11	Ipa	ungipaatamsi,	John	Paaptaayesta	megnunalleghpigaaguq	yugneng	allgeqaghyaggaghneng.	Iwernga	kina	alngunak	ukalighpigaq	Ataneghpagullghani	Qilagem	John-meng	megnunaghataghaghtuq.
B01_11_Matthew_V12	John	Paaptaayesta	ungipaqiyuggaallghaneng	whavemun	kenlanga,	suuglluget	wayaghnaqutkaqaat	Ataneghpagullgha	Qilagem.
B01_11_Matthew_V13	Qamaglluteng	uuknaliqistetlu	Moses-emllu	Liilightuusiita	uuknaliqutkengngwaat	Ataneghpagullgha	Qilagem	kenlanga	John-em	tagillghanun.
B01_11_Matthew_V14	John-nguuq	uuknaliqistet	uuknaliqutkegkaat	taginaqnilleghmeggteggun	Elijah.	Ugpeqsukufsigu	uuknaliqelleq,	John	Elijah-nguuq.
B01_11_Matthew_V15	Sigutelguusi,	nagatek!
B01_11_Matthew_V16	“Maaten	kiyaghlleghhit	yuget	samun	uspunnaqsingi?	Taghnughhaaghestun	ayuqut	aqumuulluteng	akilpegaghvigni,	naghaalgutmeggnun	akilghuullghiit	whaten,
B01_11_Matthew_V17	‘Qalghightaatamsi,	tukaleganghitusi!	Qiyiqutukut,	qiyiqenghitusi!’
B01_11_Matthew_V18	“John	tagiiqngami	fast-aaquq,	meghigatuqlu	wine-meng,	enkaam	yuget	whaten	pikaagut,	‘Tughneghalguuq’.
B01_11_Matthew_V19	Ighnegha	Yugem	tagiiqngami,	neghelgusighaqii,	meghelgusighaqiillu	yuget,	enkaam	yuget	whaten	pikaagut,	‘Yuukqun	taana	esghaqaghteggu!	Neghetupigtuq,	meghetupigtuq,	ilakumtaaqaatlu	tax-em	qerngughtistengita,	seghleghqestetlu!’	Naqamllu	Kiyaghneghem	peghqinellgha	ipapighqengngaaq	sallghakun.”
B01_11_Matthew_V20	Jesus-em	allulluki	allaaghlluwhaghtilleni	atuqegkaqii	Chorazin-mi,	Bethsaida-mi,	Capernaum-emillu.	Iwernga	yugit	avuteghqelluteng	taaqellghilnguut	seghleghqenneghmeng	enkaam	Jesus-em	aghyuughmikii.
B01_11_Matthew_V21	Pikii,	“Seghleghwaaghunaqnguusi,	Chorazin-eghmiini!	Seghleghwaaghunaqnguusi,	Bethsaida-ghmiini!	Elpesini	allaaghlluwaghtilleghllaget	apeghiiqat	pikaayaqata	Tyre-millu	Sidon-millu,	neghipiglluteng	yugit	avuteghqelluteng	seghleghqennanighnayaghtut.	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	suvinalghiimeng	qiipaghaghqameng	aalluteng	aqumnayaghtut	panetelleghteggun.
B01_11_Matthew_V22	Ipa	ungipaatamsi,	Nanqigtillghem	Aghneghani	Tyre-eghmiitlu	Sidon-eghmiitlu	aghyulleghqestaaghhaayaghqaagut	elpesineng!
B01_11_Matthew_V23	Enkaam	elpesi,	Capernaum-eghmiini!	Qaywa	anglisteghllagyaghngaaghpesi	elpesineng	katam	repall	sumeghpesini	usuqellengelleqnillusi	qilagmi,	yeghlegi	ukiglleqiisi	hell-mun.	Allaaghlluwhaghtilleghllaget	pikaayaqata	Sodom-emi,	paninang	aghneghmi	whani	nekevghanayaghtuq!
B01_11_Matthew_V24	Iwernga	ungipaatamsi	Nanqigtillghem	Aghneghani	Kiyaghneghem	nangllekataghaghyaghqaqii	Sodom-eghmiit	pakiggulluki	elpesineng!”
B01_11_Matthew_V25	Taagken	Jesus	pikaq,	“Kaay	Ata,	Atanqaaten	qilagemllu	nunamllu!	Iyamsiqayugvikamken	qayughllak	liitkaanghilngughnun	liitestekaqan	ipapighqelleq	iiqan	liitkanengllu	peghqineghnengllu.
B01_11_Matthew_V26	Aa-a,	Ataay,	efquqelleghpetun	pikaaguten.
B01_11_Matthew_V27	“Atama	tagivaqaqaa	sangwaa	qamagtengngwaaghluku.	Kitum	alngunak	nallukaa	Ighneq,	iwerngaqun	Atam.	Kitum	alngunak	nallukaa	Ata,	iwerngaqun	Ighneghem,	enkaam	Ighneghem	nakmikegkaminun	liitesleqaa	Ata.
B01_11_Matthew_V28	“Tagitek	whangamnun	qamagllusi	ughleghilghiini,	uqigtuqamengllu	akmalegllagni,	meghnaalisleqamsi.
B01_11_Matthew_V29	Iisqaghmiitagka	aallukek	liitivikitengnga,	qayughllak	yakumanginneghitunga,	iluka	qusevegngaaq.	Enkaam	meghnaalillequsi	unguvasighpesinun.
B01_11_Matthew_V30	Iisqaghmiitagka	piyaqniituk,	akmakallu	uqengestaaghhaaguq.”
B01_12_Matthew_V1	Taagken	Sabbath-em	aghneghani	Jesus	igleghtekaq	wheat-em	piitfigakun.	Maligsaaghtengi	iyataqat	enkaam	wheat-meng	qesugutaqluteng	neghegkat.
B01_12_Matthew_V2	Pharisees-et	esghaghluki	maligsaaghtet	wheat-meng	qesugutaatalghiit,	Jesus	pikaat,	“Ii-i,	Sabbath-mi	maligsaaghteten	qepghaghtut,	Liilightuusaq	naafqaat!”
B01_12_Matthew_V3	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Atightuumangistegguu	David-enkut	yukullghiit	sakaatangi	iyataghaqngameng?
B01_12_Matthew_V4	Iitqaaguq	tabernacle-mun	enkaam	yukullghiit	neghegkaqaat	neqekrangllaq	Kiyaghneghmun	tuunegkaq.	Tawaten	pilleghmegteggun	Liilightuusaq	naafqegkaqaat	qayughllak	priest-nginaat	neghyaghqaqsaqangat.
B01_12_Matthew_V5	Atightiigasteggullu	Liilightuusanilnguq	priest-et	Temple-mi	qepghaneghmeggni	Sabbath-mi	naafqaqegkangat	Sabbath-em	Liilightuusaa?	Naqamllu	priest-et	anaggusigatut.
B01_12_Matthew_V6	Ungipaatamsi,	whaantuq	Temple-mi	kina	aangataghalghii.
B01_12_Matthew_V7	Akuzitni	Igaqegkani	Kiyaghneq	pikaaguq,	‘Nangllegtiisqesugamsi	yulgutegpesinun	pakiggulluku	aghqutegpesineng.’	Taakut	akuzitet	liigikngwaaghyaqufsiki	sameng	pitangi,	nanqiggnayanghitasi	aghyuughyaghqaaluki	anaggutellghilnguut,
B01_12_Matthew_V8	qayughllak	Ighnegha	Yugem,	Atanqaa	Sabbath-em.”
B01_12_Matthew_V9	Taaken	Jesus	aglaghluni	synagogue-ngitnun	iitqaq.
B01_12_Matthew_V10	Taawanguq	yuuk	iiggan	inglungi	uniiqat.	Ilangita	yuget	tawanlenguut	aaptekaat	Jesus	naalkefiknaluku	anaggutelleghmeng,	“Liilightuusamnni	itagnaghtaa-a	naallghutilleghqaq	Sabbath-mi?”
B01_12_Matthew_V11	Jesus-em	kiimsiqii,	“Nalighpesi	penniigha	kalefkagsaqan	laawaaghmun	Sabbath-mi,	nusugnayaghestegguu?
B01_12_Matthew_V12	Yuuk	megnunaghataghaghtuq	penniighmeng!	Enkaam	Liilightuusani	itagnalghiinguuq	pinitun	pilleghqaq	Sabbath-mi.”
B01_12_Matthew_V13	Taagken	yuuk	uniighngalghiimeng	iiggelek	pikaa,	“Nengugutiki	iiggeten.”	Iiggeni	nengugutkii,	aga	naallghutkat,	inglumegestun	lliiqat.
B01_12_Matthew_V14	Taagken	Pharisees-et	aanluteng	agghisaghtuqat	naten	tuqunnaluku	Jesus.
B01_12_Matthew_V15	Jesus-em	liisimakluku	agghillghat,	aghulaqegkaq.	Yulghuteghllaget	maliglleghaatkaat,	enkaam	naallghuquqii	qinuyulghiit	qamaglluki,
B01_12_Matthew_V16	ineghtekiillu	ungipaqefqaami	pisqelluni.
B01_12_Matthew_V17	Tawaten	pilleghmikun	apeghiiqaa	Kiyaghneghem	pillgha	uuknaliqistekun	Isaiah-kun	whaten:
B01_12_Matthew_V18	“Una	esgha	nakmikegkaqa	qepghaghtenguluku.	Piniqegkaqa	unguvasigma	efquqepigtaa.	Taghneghagka	ellngakun	nekeglleqagka.	Ungipaalleqii	Gentile-et	tawateghlluwaaq	nanqigtilleghqamneng	tamaghhaanun	yugnun.
B01_12_Matthew_V19	Aaghtiiraaghnaanghituq	nalighmeng	akilghuunaanghituq,	tumeni	iglagtupiglluni	akuzinaanghituq.
B01_12_Matthew_V20	Iiknaanghitaa	vegaaq	ulleghngalghii,	qaamyaghtuungestaqak	kenelghutak	qaamnnaanghitaak.	Tawaten	piyaghqaaguq	kenlanga	qamaglluni	yuuk	whaten	piyugluni	lliiqan,	Kiyaghneghem	nanqigtellgha	yugneng	avutangituq.
B01_12_Matthew_V21	Enkaam	Kiyaghneghem	nakmikegkaakun	Gentile-et	sighimallequt.”
B01_12_Matthew_V22	Taagken	Jesus-mun	tagitkaat	yuuk	ayaakaq,	akuzingigalnguq	qayughllak	ilumikun	tughneghalek.	Jesus-em	naallghutkaa	enkaam	akuziyagutkaqlu	esghaasagutkaqlu.
B01_12_Matthew_V23	Yulghuteghllaget	saghiighayugllakat	repall	ellmeggneng	aapqughaaghutkat	whaten,	“Una	David-em	Ighneqenghitaguu?”
B01_12_Matthew_V24	Pharisees-et	nagalluteng	pikat,	“Yugneng	aanestaqii	tughneghaat	qayughllak	atuqngukanga	aghtughyaghqaanghillgha	Beelzebul-em,	igleghutistengat	Tughneghaat.”
B01_12_Matthew_V25	Jesus-em	liisimakegkangi	sumeghtaghallghit	enkaam	pikii,	“Alngunak	ataneghpagulleq	aafquulluni	pilluguskumi,	naavellequq.	Tanemlleqa	neghllaget	nalighmeng	nengllugutet	aafquulluteng	pilluguskumeng,	qerngaghmennaanghitut.
B01_12_Matthew_V26	Tawateghpigaq	Tughneghaam	aanestekumigu	Tughneghaq,	taawa	ellmineng	pilluwaaguq	enkaam	ataneghpagullgha	kenletghuullequq.
B01_12_Matthew_V27	Aanesquungukuma	tughneghaghneng	Beelzebul-kun,	natenmi	yugpesi	aanesqughaqatki	tughneghaat?	Enkaam	yusi	nanqigtistekelleqasi.
B01_12_Matthew_V28	Iwernga	Kiyaghneghem	Taghneghagkenka	aghtughyaghqaanghillghakun	aanesquungukuma	tughneghaghneng,	taawa	taam	ipapighqaa	Ataneghpagullgha	Kiyaghneghem	kaasimaaq	elpesinun.
B01_12_Matthew_V29	“Kina	alngunak	iteghyukumi	iknaqelghiim	yugem	mangteghaanun	teglegughnaluni	saghyanganeng,	sivukluku	yuuk	asighqesaghqaqaa.	Taagken	wayaghteghlleqii	saghyangi.
B01_12_Matthew_V30	“Kina	alngunak	whangamninneghilnguq	kipullginaaghtekaqa;	kitum	alngunak	qerngughtilgusinghilkuminga	mingitistenguuq.
B01_12_Matthew_V31	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	ungipaatamsi	yuget	seghevutellengyaghqaagut	alngunak	seghleghqelleghmeggneng,	alngunaklu	seghlequulleghmeggneng.	Iwernga	kitum	alngunak	seghlequuqumikek	Agleghnalghiik	Taghneghak,	seghevutellengnaanghituq.
B01_12_Matthew_V32	Kitum	alngunak	kipullegmun	sameng	pikumigu	Ighnegha	Yugem,	seghevutellengyaghqaaguq.	Iwernga	kitum	alngunak	kipullegmun	sameng	pikumikek	Agleghnalghiik	Taghneghak,	seghevutellengnaanghituq	maaten	kiyaghtaalleghmi,	nalighmeng	tuunglighhaani.
B01_12_Matthew_V33	“Uqfik	aflengakegkaq	pinilghiinguuq,	piitestekii	pinightut.	Uqfik	aflengakellghilnguq	seghleghuuq,	piitestekii	seghleghuut.	Piitestillghakun	liisimakelleqaghsi	uqfigem	natetulanga.
B01_12_Matthew_V34	Ukughsi	nemeghyani!	Naten	akuziiqetsi	pinilghiimeng	seghleghughngaaghpesi?	Sangwaa	alngunak	yugem	ilunganilnguq	aanegkaayuguuq	akuzillghakun.
B01_12_Matthew_V35	Pinilghii	yuuk	pinilghiimeng	ilumikilghii	pinilghiimeng	aanestikayuguuq.	Seghleq	yuuk	seghleghmeng	ilumikilghii	seghleghmeng	aanestikayuguuq.
B01_12_Matthew_V36	“Ungipaatamsi,	Nanqigtillghem	Aghneghani	yuget	apeghyaghqapestaaqiit	Kiyaghneghmun	qamaglluki	seghleghet	akuzitet	atuqegkateng	sangita	atuqumatangi.
B01_12_Matthew_V37	Qayughllak	Kiyaghneghem	nanqiglleqaaten	akuzitegpegun.	Akuzitegpek	ipapighqelleqaaten	avutnginniluten	nalighmeng	nanqiglleqaaten	aghyuughyaghqaaluten.”
B01_12_Matthew_V38	Taagken	ilangita	apeghtughistengita	Liilightuusam,	ilangitallu	Pharisees-et	pikaat	Jesus,	“Apeghtughista,	allaaghlluwhaghtilghiiten	esghapagyuwamken	liigiknaluku	aghtughyaghqaanghillghen	Kiyaghneghmeng	pingutanga.”
B01_12_Matthew_V39	Iwernga	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Aghneghem	uum	yugi	seghleghqumanguut,	ataasiighneghilnguut	Kiyaghneghmun.	Naqam	allaaghlluwhaghtitesqut	whangamnun.	Yeghlegillu!	Taananginaghhaq	allaaghlluwhaghtilleq	esghaghlleqaghsi	Kiyaghneghem	allaaghlluwhaaghtillgha	Jonah-mun.
B01_12_Matthew_V40	Jonah	iqallugrugllagem	aqsaqghwanitkaaguq	pingayut	aghneghet,	pingayut	unuget.	Tawateghpigaq	Ighnegha	Yugem	samansaghqaaguq	nunami	pingayut	aghneghet,	pingayut	unuget.
B01_12_Matthew_V41	Nanqigtillghem	Aghneghani	Kiyaghneghem	nanqigtekangisi	elpesi	kiyaghlleghhiini	aghneghmi	whani,	Nineveh-ghmiit	nekevluteng	anaggunnilleqiisi	aghyuughyaghqapestaaghunilusi.	Uuknaliqista	Jonah	ungipaghyan	Nineveh-ghmiit	avuteghqelluteng	seghleghqennaniqaagut.	Iwernga	elpesi	avuteghqellusi	seghleghqennanillghitusi	qaywa	nagatkaqeghngaaghpesigu	kina	aangataghalghii	Jonah-meng.
B01_12_Matthew_V42	Nanqigtillghem	Aghneghani	Kiyaghneghem	nanqigtekangisi	elpesi	kiyaghlleghhiini	aghneghmi	whani,	Queen-ngan	Sheba-m	nekevluni	nanqigsaghqaanilleqiisi.	Tagikaaguq	uyavaghpanilngughmeng	nemineng	nagannaluku	Solomon-em	peghqineghllak	apeghtughillgha.	Iwernga	kina	aangataghalghii	Solomon-meng	whaantuq,	tawalliima	ighsakaqaghsi.”
B01_12_Matthew_V43	“Tughneghaq	yugmeng	aanegkumi	igleghllequq	meqraggiilngughmi	nunami,	ivaghillequq	meghnaalivigkameng.	Iwernga	naalkunneghisami,
B01_12_Matthew_V44	pikaq,	‘Kiyaghfiksaqemnun	uteghhnaqunga.’	Kaasalghiimi	paaghqiteftuq,	aallwaaghluni,	mingllegtengngwaaghluni	ayuqeftuq.
B01_12_Matthew_V45	Taagken	aanluni	tagitkii	maaghraghvinlek	tughneghaat	ellmineng	seghleghataghalghiit.	Iteghaalluteng	yugmun	tawantekat.	Enkaam	taana	yuuk	sivunghaneng	wataqaaghaq	seghleghwaaghughtekaq.	Tawateghpigaq	ayuqsaghqaagut	seghleghet	yuget	kiyaghlleghhiit	maaten,	wataqaaghaq	seghleghughtaghaghyaghqaagut	sivunghani	pilleghmeggneng.”
B01_12_Matthew_V46	Paninang	Jesus-em	aleghquumaluki	yuget,	Jesus-em	naangallu	anglegutangillu	kaalluteng	manughami	aleghqughyukaat.
B01_12_Matthew_V47	Enkaam	kitum	ungipaatkaa,	“Ii-i,	qakma	naanllu	anglegutetenllu,	aleghqughyugaqaaten.”
B01_12_Matthew_V48	Jesus-em	aaptekaa,	“Kinangaawa	naaka?	Kinkungaawat	anglegutenka?”
B01_12_Matthew_V49	Taagken	kenighluki	maligsaaghteni,	pikaq,	“Taakusta	naakallu	anglegutenkallu!
B01_12_Matthew_V50	Kina	alngunak	Atama	qilagmelnguum	piyukellghatun	pikumi,	anglegutkaqa,	nayakaqa,	naakaqallu!”
B01_13_Matthew_V1	Tawani	ataasimi	aghneghmi	Jesus	aanluni	mangteghameng,	naayvam	esnengakun	aqumluni	apeghtughikaq.
B01_13_Matthew_V2	Yulghuteghllaget	kanglluqaghsatni,	angyamun	uuglluni	aqumegkaq,	enkaam	yulghuteghllaget	esnemetkat.
B01_13_Matthew_V3	Ungipaghaatetgun	allaaghhiinaghmeng	apeghtuqii.	Pikii,	“Piitesighaghta	piitesighaghvigminun	aglaghluni,	ifkaghquqaq	piitutneng.
B01_13_Matthew_V4	Piitesighaghvigmini	ifkaghqiyalghiimi	piitutneng,	ilangi	tumetgun	tekitkat,	enkaam	qawaaget	tagiluteng	neghuqiit.
B01_13_Matthew_V5	Ilangi	piitutet	tekitkat	uyghagaghtuqakun	sunapagilngughqun.	Tawaninginaq	piitkat	qayughllak	sunanga	ugmestaaghhaq.
B01_13_Matthew_V6	Iwernga	siqineq	piisalghiimi	maatneghan	paneghtekii	qayughllak	akupagilnguut.
B01_13_Matthew_V7	Ilangi	piitutem	tekitkat	sikughllugtuqakun,	sikughlluget	piisalghiimeng	piitfigiqiit	piitutet.
B01_13_Matthew_V8	Iwernga	ilangi	piitutet	tekitkat	sunakegtakun	piitestikat	grain-meng,	ilangi	100,	ilangi	60,	ilangi	30.
B01_13_Matthew_V9	Sigutelguusi,	nagatek!”
B01_13_Matthew_V10	Taagken	maligsaaghtengita	takuluku	Jesus	aaptekaat,	“Sangan	ungipaghaatmeng	atuqaqsin	apeghtuneghpeki	yuget?”
B01_13_Matthew_V11	Jesus-em	kiimsiqii,	“Elpesinun	Kiyaghneghem	liitestekaqaa	talughngalghii	ipapighqellgha	Ataneghpagullghan	Qilagem,	iwernga	ellngitnun	liitesimangitaa.
B01_13_Matthew_V12	Enkaam	yuuk	liigikellengegkaq,	wataqaaghaq	liigikellengataghaghyaghqaaguq,	iwernga	yuuk	liigikellepagilnguq	liigikellgha	iqillequq.
B01_13_Matthew_V13	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	apeghtughaqanka	ungipaghaatetgun,	qayughllak	esghaateghngaaghmeng	esghaasigalnguut,	nagateghngaaghmeng	nagaqiigalnguut,	talwa	liigikigalnguut.
B01_13_Matthew_V14	Enkaam	ellngitgun	Isaiah-m	uuknaliqutkillgha	apeghiightuq.	Taaggun	uuknaliqellghakun	Kiyaghneq	pikaaguq,	‘Ellngit	nagatepestaaghllequt	taawanginaq	liigiknaanghitiit;	esghaatepestaaghllequt,	taawanginaq	liigiknaanghitiit	esghaqateng,
B01_13_Matthew_V15	qayughllak	ellngita	umyugiit	pineghllugtekaagut.	Sigutngit	tusaqneghlluugtekaagut,	iyetengllu	quneghtekaqiit.	Tawatelnguunghisaqumeng	iiymeggneng	esghaannayaghtut,	sigutmeggneng	nagaquunnayaghtut,	umyugamegteggun	liigiknayaghtut,	enkaam	qiivnayaghtut	whangamnun	naallghutesqelluteng.’
B01_13_Matthew_V16	“Iwernga	quyanaghhalek	elpesi!	Iyesi	esghaataqut,	sigutesillu	nagaquutaqut.
B01_13_Matthew_V17	Ipa	ungipaatamsi,	uuknaliqistelghutetlu,	yulghutanganllu	Kiyaghneghem,	esghaghyukaqsaghiit	esghaqasi,	iwernga	esghaamangitiit.	Nagaqughyukaqsaghiitlu	nagaquqasi,	iwernga	nagaquumangitiit.
B01_13_Matthew_V18	“Nagateggu	sameng	piiqutanga	ungipaghaatkegkaqa	piitesighaghta.
B01_13_Matthew_V19	Piitutet	tumet	saaghwitgun	tekitkat	usputngaat	kitumun	alngunak	nagaquullghiimun	ungipameng	Ataneghpagulleghmeng	ayuqelghiimeng.	Liigikenghilkagu	ungipaq	Tughneghaam	tagiluni	wayaghlleqaa	tekitkaayalghii	ilungakun.
B01_13_Matthew_V20	Tamaakut	piitutet	uyghagtuqakun	sunakun	tekitkat	usputngaat	kitumun	alngunak	nagaquullghiimun	ungipameng,	tawaninginaq	ungipaq	tugukliqaa	quyakusiqluku.
B01_13_Matthew_V21	Iwernga	ungipaq	ilungani	mulumangilnguq	qayughllak	akungellghilnguq.	Enkaam	seghleliighyalghiimi	nalighmeng	amyuqetaatkellengyalghiimi,	apalluqluku	ungipaq	tawaninginaq	ugpeqinanightuq.
B01_13_Matthew_V22	Tamaakut	piitutet	sikughllugtuqakun	sunakun	tekitkat	usputngaat	kitumun	alngunak	nagaquullghiimun	ungipameng,	taawanginaq	teggellghiillghan	kiyaghtaaghusighqameng,	aklungighiyulleghllaganllu	piitfigighaqaa	ungipaq.	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	piitestingigatuq.
B01_13_Matthew_V23	Tamaakut	piitutet	tekitkat	sunakegtakun	usputngaat	yugnun	nagaquullghiinunllu	liigikilghiinunllu	ungipameng.	Enkaam	piitesqughaqut	ilangi	100,	ilangi	60,	ilangi	30.”
B01_13_Matthew_V24	Taagken	Jesus-em	aapqaa	ilanga	ungipaghaan	ellngitnun,	pikii,	“Ataneghpagullgha	Qilagem	yugtun	piitesighaqatun	pinilghiimeng	piitutmeng	piitesighaghvigmini	ayuquq.
B01_13_Matthew_V25	Unugmi	ataasimi	qavasimaluki,	anguyaga	tagiluni	piitesighaqaq	weeds-meng	akulngitgun	wheat-et,	taagken	aghulaqegkaq.
B01_13_Matthew_V26	Nunivagseghat	piisalghiimeng,	wheat-et	akumluteng	weeds-meng	ayuqeftut.
B01_13_Matthew_V27	Piitesighaghta	qepghaghtelghutngan	takuluku	aaptekaat,	‘Ataneq,	pinilghiimengmi	piitutmeng	piitesiighaghsin	piitesighaghvigpeni;	naken	weeds-et	piit?’
B01_13_Matthew_V28	Yugem	kiimsiiqii,	‘Anguyagem	tawaten	pikaqii’.	Aaptekaat,	‘Weeds-et	ikuultekii?’
B01_13_Matthew_V29	Kiimsiqii,	‘Nakaa,	qayughllak	weeds-et	ikuqufsiki	qemall	wheat-etlu	ilalkiilleqasi.
B01_13_Matthew_V30	Qerngiita	wheat-etlu	weeds-etlu	nagusteki	kenlanga	unatalleghqamun.	Enan	unataghyaghqaaghtekata	unataghtet	ungipaannaaghanka	weeds-et	sivukesqelluki,	qepughluki	paneghsaghqaaluki.	Enkaam	wheat-et	unataghtesluki	kagpagtesnaaghanka	kagpagvimnun.’”
B01_13_Matthew_V31	Allameng	Jesus-em	aapqaa	ungipaghaan,	“Ataneghpagullgha	Qilagem	piitutngatun	mustard-em	ayuquq.	Piitutem	mekestaalleghpigaqaa,	iwernga	yugem	piitesighaneghminigu	piitesighaghvigmikun	nunivagseghaghyaggaghneng	aangelleghpigaakayuguuq.	Uqfigughhneghani	qawaaget	tagiluteng	avayaakun	unglusiiqut.”
B01_13_Matthew_V33	Allameng	Jesus-em	aapqaa	ungipaghaan,	“Ataneghpagullgha	Qilagem	yeast-atun	ayuquq.	Aghnam	tuguluku	akuutuskanga	avlawaghllagmun,	enkaam	akuutaghllaga	ghhuughtesteghllakaa.”
B01_13_Matthew_V34	Jesus-em	apeghtuneghminiki	yulghuteghllaget	quunpeng	atuqaqii	ungipaghaatet.	Ipapestaaq	sangwaa	qamaglluku	apeghtuusaqegkaa	ungipaghaatetgun	ayuquq.
B01_13_Matthew_V35	Tawaten	pikaalghii	apeghiighnaluku	uuknaliqistem	pillgha,	“Ungipaghaatet	atuqelleqanka	aleghququmki.	Ungipaalleqanka	Kiyaghneghem	liitesimangilkanganeng	ima	ulimayuggaallghaneng	nuna.”
B01_13_Matthew_V36	Taagken	Jesus-em	unilluki	yulghutet	iitqaq	mangteghamun.	Maligsaaghtengita	takuluku	aaptekaat,	“Sameng	pisiigwat	ungipaghaatkegkaghten	weeds-et	piitesighaghvigmelnguut?”
B01_13_Matthew_V37	Jesus-em	kiimsiqii,	“Yuuk	piitesighaqaq	pinilghiimeng	piitutmeng,	Ighneqaa	Yugem;
B01_13_Matthew_V38	piitesighaghvik	nunanguuq;	pinilghiit	piitutet	yuguut	Ataneghpagullghem	pikii;	weeds-et	yuguut	Tughneghaam	pikii.
B01_13_Matthew_V39	Anguyak	piitestikaq	weeds-meng	Tughneghaaguq.	Unatalleq	nunam	kenletghuutelqaa,	unataghtet	yaqulguut.
B01_13_Matthew_V40	Unatalleghmi	weeds-et	qerngughlluki	paneghtaqiit.	Tawateghpigaq	kenletghuutellghani	nunam,	yuget	Tughneghaam	pingi	qerngughlluki	paneghsaghqaagut.
B01_13_Matthew_V41	Ighnegha	Yugem	yaqulegmineng	kayagtiyaghqaaguq	iqitesqelluki	Ataneghpagulleghmineng	qamaglluki	seghleghqusitlu,	seghletunllu	pistet.
B01_13_Matthew_V42	Enkaam	kenghegnun	miluulleqiit,	tawani	qiyaaghwaghllagllequt,	gguteteng	terqitaagtaamiita.
B01_13_Matthew_V43	Taagken	Kiyaghneghem	yugi	kuukgullequt	siqineghtun	Ataneghpagullghani	Atameng.	Sigutelguusi,	nagatek!”
B01_13_Matthew_V44	“Ataneghpagullgha	Qilagem	aklungistun	ayuquq	iighngalghii	piitesighaghvigmi.	Yugem	naalkelluki	iinqigtekii.	Quyam	angtalanganeng,	aghulaqluni	qamaglluki	saghyani	akikluki,	taagken	taana	piitesighaghvik	tukfiqaa.”
B01_13_Matthew_V45	“Whatetuqlu	Ataneghpagullgha	Qilagem:	tukfightughta	ivaghilghii	piniipiglleghhiimeng	pearl-meng	tukfighyaghqameng.
B01_13_Matthew_V46	Naalkunneghmini	piniipiglleghhiimeng	akituqameng,	akikughaqaa	qamaglluku	saghyani,	tukfighnaluku	taana	pearl-a.”
B01_13_Matthew_V47	“Ataneghpagullgha	Qilagem,	negaghpagtunllu	ayuquq.	Iqalliniightet	negaghpagteng	naayvamun	ateghlluku	aghqellaaqut	enkaam	allaaghhiinaghmeng	iqallugteghllagaqut.
B01_13_Matthew_V48	Negaghpak	sayugluku	quutmun,	aqumluteng	iqalluget	avughaqiit,	pinilghit	kanaghsimiita	qaltanun,	enkaam	seghlellghi	egtaqiit.
B01_13_Matthew_V49	Tawatesaghqaaguq	kenletghuutellghani	nunam.	Yaqulget	tagiluteng	avughlleqiit	seghleghet	yuget	pinilghiineng.
B01_13_Matthew_V50	Enkaam	seghleghet	kenghegnun	miluulleqiit,	tawani	qiyaaghwaghllagllequt,	gguteteng	terqitaagtaamiita.”
B01_13_Matthew_V51	Taagken	Jesus-em	aaptekii	maligsaaghteni,	“Qamaglluki	tamaakut	liigikestekii?”	Kiimsiqaat,	“Aa-a.”
B01_13_Matthew_V52	Taagken	pikii,	“Tamaghhaghmi	apeghtughikayuk	Liilightuusaneng	apeghtuqaq	Ataneghpagullghaneng	Qilagem	whatelnguuguq:	mangteghalek	yuuk	nusugralghii	kagpagvigmineng	nutaghamengllu	neghightamengllu.”
B01_13_Matthew_V53	Jesus	taaqsami	apeghtughineghmeng	ungipaghaatneng	aghulaqegkaq.
B01_13_Matthew_V54	Aglaghluni	neminun	apeghtughiyan	synagogue-ngitni,	yuget	saghiighayagutkaat.	Ellmeggneng	aapqughaaghutkat,	“Naken	peghqinellenga?	Nakenllu	aghtughyaghqaanghillenga	allaaghlluwhaghtimun?
B01_13_Matthew_V55	Ighneqenghitaguu	kaapentam?	Mary	naakenghitaguu,	uuk	anglegutkenghitakii	James-enkut,	Joseph-enkut,	Simon-enkut,	Judas-enkut?
B01_13_Matthew_V56	Nayagillu	maanneghitaat?	Naken	liitellengeghllagtallu	aghtughyaghqaanghillengallu?”
B01_13_Matthew_V57	Enkaam	tuguklighyunghitkaat.	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Nani	alngunak	yuget	siivakaqaat	uuknaliqista	iwerngaqun	ellngan	katam	nunanganillu	nengllugutanganillu.”
B01_13_Matthew_V58	Tamaani	allaaghlluwhaghtipagumangilnguq	qayughllak	ugpeqenghilkangat.
B01_14_Matthew_V1	Tamaani	pilleghmi	Herod-em,	igleghutistengan	Galilee-m,	nagaquqaa	Jesus-em	apeghseghuumallgha.
B01_14_Matthew_V2	Herod-em	qepghaghteni	pikii,	“Ipa	una	John-nguuq	Paaptaayesta,	unguvaamaaq.	Esghaghhuqun	aghtughyaghqaanghillelek	allaaghlluwhaghtilleghmun.”
B01_14_Matthew_V3	Qavnganghhaq	Herod-em	tuqutestekaqegkanga	John	Paaptaayesta,	qayughllak	John-em	ungipaatkaqegkanga,	“Qaatkunneghituten	Liilightuusamnnun	tugulleghpegun	Herodias,	anglegutegpek	nulighha.”	(Herodias-em	ugiksaqanga	Philip,	Herod-em	uyughaa.)	John-em	ungipaatellgha	apalluqluku	Herod-em	tugusqegkaa	John,	asighqelluku	anusimingllaghvigmun	kanaghtesqelluku.	Herod-em	tuqutesuguyaqanga	John,	naqam	alikegkii	Jews-et	seghleliighqiinayukata	qayughllak	ugpeqeqkangat	John	uuknaliqestenguniluku.
B01_14_Matthew_V6	Taagken	Herod-em	allgeghvigan	aghneghani,	Herodias-em	paniga	tukalegaqaq	Herod-emllu	aqelqatlu	sivungitni.	Elngaatall	Herod	efqughyugllakaq,
B01_14_Matthew_V7	repall	akeqegkaa,	“Ipapestaaq	sameng	alngunak	tungsiquvek	tuunelleqamken.”
B01_14_Matthew_V8	Naami	kayagtellghatun	pikaa,	“Whaa	maaten	tagivaghhu	qayuutaghraagkun	lliluku	naasqwa	John-em	Paaptaayestem.”
B01_14_Matthew_V9	Umiilek	qivghukaq	iwernga	akeqikaatmineng	aqelqami	sivungitni	piyukellgha	kayagutkaa.
B01_14_Matthew_V10	Enkaam	Herod-em	anusimingllaghvigmi	John-em	naasqwa	kepestekaa.
B01_14_Matthew_V11	Naasquq	qayuutaghraagkun	lliluku	tuunegkaat	aghnaghaghmun,	enkaam	naaminun	aglaatkaa.
B01_14_Matthew_V12	John-em	maligsaaghtengi	tagiluteng	yugusii	lliveghyaghtuqaat.	Taagken	Jesus	ungipaasaghtuqaat.
B01_14_Matthew_V13	Jesus-em	nagaqughyamigu	ungipaq,	angyamun	uuglluni	aghulaqegkaq	paaghqillghanun	ellnginaghhaanaluni.	Iwernga	yulghutet	nagaqughyamegteggu	nemeggneng	maligtekaat	piyugmeng.
B01_14_Matthew_V14	Jesus	quutmun	uuglluni	esghaghluki	yulghuteghllaget	nangllegyaguteghllakii,	enkaam	naallghuquqii	qinuyugtengit.
B01_14_Matthew_V15	Whanikuyagu	maligsaaghtengita	takuluku	pikaat,	“Whanikwaa,	maana	paaghqituq;	aglaghtuutesqiki	nenun	ellngitneng	neqengesqelluki.”
B01_14_Matthew_V16	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Maanllit.	Elpesi	neghyaghqaliteki.”
B01_14_Matthew_V17	Pikaat,	“Whaa	legan	tallimaggaagut	neqekrangllat,	iqalluggaaklu.”
B01_14_Matthew_V18	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Tagiteki	whavek.”
B01_14_Matthew_V19	Taagken	yulghutet	aqumuutesqegkii	vegaaghqun.	Tuguluki	tallimat	neqekrangllat,	iqalluggaaklu,	sivuglluni	qilagmun	Kiyaghneq	iyamsiqayugvikegkaa.	Iiggmineng	aavgughluki	neqekrangllat,	maligsaaghteminun	tuunegkii	uyegtesqelluki	yulghutnun.
B01_14_Matthew_V20	Qamaglluni	neghuutkaq	kepsuulluni.	Taagken	maligsaaghtet	tugukiit	qula	maalghuk	siipneqluku	pasketet	esleqngalghiit	kagimleghitneng	neqekrangllat	siipneghet.
B01_14_Matthew_V21	Entaqun	5,000-nguut	yuget	neghuutkat,	aghnatlu	taghnughhaatlu	kesutkegpenaki.
B01_14_Matthew_V22	Taagken	Jesus-em	maligsaaghteni	kayagtekii	angyakun	aghviqestiisqelluki	naayvam	inglunganun,	ellngan	aglaghtuutesimaluki	yulghuteghllaget.
B01_14_Matthew_V23	Yulghuteghllaget	aglaghtuutesamiki	ellnginaghmi	naayghamun	mayuqaq	yughaghnaluni.	Tawani	ighivgaghmi	Jesus	ellnginaamaluku,
B01_14_Matthew_V24	angyat	un'ga	naayvami	awavaghluteng,	elngaatall	imaghlliiqat	qayughllak	aygughnaghuskangi.
B01_14_Matthew_V25	Akulegkeni	three-kellaagenkuk,	six-eklaagenkuk	unaanguluku	Jesus-em	takukii	maligsaaghteni	meghem	qaayngakun	piyugmeng.
B01_14_Matthew_V26	Maligsaaghtet	esghaghluku	meghqun	piyulghii	kakavniiqat.	Enkaam	akilghuukat,	“Taghneghaaguq.”
B01_14_Matthew_V27	Tawaninginaq	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Alingegpenasi,	Whanganguunga!”
B01_14_Matthew_V28	Taagken	Peter-em	pikaa,	“Ataneq,	ipa	elpengukuvek	tagsighnga	elpenun	aglaghlanga	meghem	qaayngakun.”
B01_14_Matthew_V29	Jesus-em	pikaa,	“Tagi.”	Enkaam	Peter	ateghluni	angyameng,	meghem	qaayngakun	piyugmeng	aglaqaq	Jesus-mun.
B01_14_Matthew_V30	Iwernga	anuqa	elpeksamigu	alingegkaq,	kalevutkelluku	akilghuukaq,	“Ataneq,	yugulinga!”
B01_14_Matthew_V31	Tawaninginaq	Jesus-em	akuqaghluku	pikaa,	“Ugpeqilleghqestaapiguuten!	Sangavek	malghuklizin?”
B01_14_Matthew_V32	Angyamun	uugtaquklu	ellmaaragtekaq.
B01_14_Matthew_V33	Enkaam	angyamelnguut	maniguqaat	Jesus.	Pikaat,	“Ipapestaaq	Kiyaghneghem	Ighneqaaten!”
B01_14_Matthew_V34	Taagken	naayvaq	aghvighluku	tamlakat	Gennesaret-kun.
B01_14_Matthew_V35	Tamaakumiit	liisuqsamegteggu	Jesus,	ungipaasaghtiisqegkiit	village-enilnguut	qinuyugtiighit	tagitesqelluki	Jesus-mun.
B01_14_Matthew_V36	Maniguututkiit	qinuyulghiit	waran	saaftesqelluku	keniikun	enkaam	qamaglluteng	tamaakut	saaftilghiit	naallghutellengegkat.
B01_15_Matthew_V1	Taagken	ilangi	Pharisees-etlu,	apeghtughikayugetlu	Liilightuusaneng	Jerusalem-emeng	tagiluteng	aaptekaat	Jesus,
B01_15_Matthew_V2	“Sangameng	maligsaaghteten	qaatkusigatat	sivunemta	apeghtuusiitnun?	Neghnaqneghmeggni	uughtiigatut	elqughulluteng	apeghtuusiitnun.”
B01_15_Matthew_V3	Jesus-em	aaptekii,	“Sangan	elpesi	qaatkigataqestiki	Kiyaghneghem	qelghusii	maliggnaluki	elpesi	katam	apeghtuusasi?
B01_15_Matthew_V4	Kiyaghneghem	qelghusaqaa,	‘Quulvaghlukek	atanllu	naanllu’.	Whatenllu	pikaaguq,	‘Kitum	alngunak	atani,	nalighmeng	naani	seghlepestaatun	akuzitkegkumigu,	tuqusaghqaaguq’.
B01_15_Matthew_V5	Iwernga	elpesi	apeghtughiiqusi,	‘Yugem	quulvanghisaghngaagu	atani	nalighmeng	naani	whaten	pikagu,’	Kayusiisaghqalguunga	elpenun,	iwernga	tuunaanghitaqa	qayughllak	akequsaqegkaqaqa	tuunelleqniluku	Kiyaghneghmun.	Tawaten	pilleghpesigun	pakigaqasi	Kiyaghneghem	Liilightuusii	apalluqluki	elpesi	katam	apeghtuusasi.
B01_15_Matthew_V7	Ukughsi	piniiyugneghni!	Elqughllusi	whaten	Isaiah-m	uuknaliqutkegkaqiisi!
B01_15_Matthew_V8	Kiyaghneq	piiq,	‘Ukut	yuget	akuzitmegteggun	quulvaghaqaatnga,	nakaan	ilumeggneng.
B01_15_Matthew_V9	Temngi	manigughaqaatnga	qayughllak	apeghtuusaqaqiit	liilightuusangllaqateng,	katam	whanga	Liilightuusaqepiglleghhiistun.’”
B01_15_Matthew_V10	Taagken	Jesus-em	yulghutet	tagsighluki	pikii,	“Nagallunga	liigikitek!
B01_15_Matthew_V11	Yugem	sangwaa	qaneghminun	kanaghtekaa	nukeggnaghqingigatuq,	iwernga	yugem	qaanghaneng	aanegkaq	nukeggnaghqikayuguuq.”
B01_15_Matthew_V12	Taagken	maligsaaghtengita	takuluku	aaptekaat,	“Liisimakenghisiguu	Pharisees-et	anagteketen	tawaten	pilleghpegun?”
B01_15_Matthew_V13	Jesus-em	kiimsiqii,	“Nunivagseghaq	qamaglluku	Atama	qilagmelnguum	piitesighaamangilkanga	nusugyaghqaaguq.
B01_15_Matthew_V14	Avelghaqiinaghluki	Pharisees-et!	Ayaakastun	maghyaghqughiiqut.	Yugem	ayaakam	ilanga	ayaakaq	tasluqumigu,	laagwaaghmun	kalefkagtaallequk.”
B01_15_Matthew_V15	Peter-em	aaptekaa,	“Ungipaataghtikut,	sameng	pisiigwa	ungipaghaaten	yuget	nukeggnaghqiganniketen	neghegkamegteggun?”
B01_15_Matthew_V16	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Elpesillu	salin	liigikigatsii?
B01_15_Matthew_V17	Liisimakenghisteggu	sangwaa	alngunak	yugem	qaneghminun	kanaghtekaa	aqsaqghwanun	piiquq,	taagken	aanaquq	yugusiineng?
B01_15_Matthew_V18	Iwernga	sangwaa	qamaken	aanegkaq	qaneghqun	nukeggnaghqikayuguuq	yugmeng.
B01_15_Matthew_V19	Qayughllak	yugem	ilunganeng	seghleq	sumeghtaghalleq	pikaayuguuq,	yugtaq,	gelgaghniiq,	allaniiq,	teglegniiq,	iqlengiqutki,	seghlequuq	yugneng.
B01_15_Matthew_V20	Tamaakusta	nukeggnaghqikayuget	yugneng,	iwernga	uughtughpenani	neghellghem	nukeggnaghqennaanghitaa	yuuk.”
B01_15_Matthew_V21	Taagken	Jesus	aghulaqegkaq	tamaaken	nunameng	tungegkenun	Tyre-enkuk	Sidon-enkuk.
B01_15_Matthew_V22	Taawanguq	Canaan-eghmii	aghnaq.	Jesus	takukaa	akilghuumaghmi,	“Kaay	Ataneq,	Ighnegha	David-em,	nangllegyaguteqeghtinga!	Panika	tughneghaam	iitghumaa,	seghleghwaaghuuq.”
B01_15_Matthew_V23	Iwernga	Jesus-em	avelghaqiinaqaa.	Maligsaaghtengita	takuluku	kayagtaghwaaqaat,	“Iqitesqigu!	Maligsaaghumaamta	akilghuuguq!”
B01_15_Matthew_V24	Taagken	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Kiyaghneghem	kayagtekaqaanga	Israel-eghmiinginaghhaghnun,	penniighestun	iflakastun	ayuqelghiinun.”
B01_15_Matthew_V25	Iwernga	aghnaq	tagiluni	Jesus-em	sivungakun	qungughtutkelluku	pikaq,	“Ataneq,	kayusiitaghtinga!”
B01_15_Matthew_V26	Jesus-em	pikaa,	“Anaggutngaaq	taghnughhaat	neqngit	tuguluki	qikminun	miluuskumeng.”
B01_15_Matthew_V27	Aghnam	pikaa,	“Aa-a,	Ataneq,	talwa	yugem	qikmii	ifkaghqellghaneng	neghaqut.”
B01_15_Matthew_V28	Taagken	Jesus-em	pikaa,	“Aghnaq	elpek,	ugpeqilleghtupigtuten!	Apeghiighli	piyukelleghpetun.”	Tawaninginaq	paniga	naallghutkaq.
B01_15_Matthew_V29	Taagken	Jesus	aghulaqegkaq	tamaaken	nunameng,	esnengakun	Naayvam	Galilee-m.	Qemimun	mayughluni	aqumegkaq.
B01_15_Matthew_V30	Yulghuteghllaget	takulaghaatkaat,	tagisimiita	Jesus-em	sivunganun	piyugpagningilnguut,	aqnightekat,	ayaakat,	akuzingigalnguut,	ilangillu	qinuyulghiit.	Enkaam	naallghuquqii.
B01_15_Matthew_V31	Yulghuteghllaget	saghiighayukat	esghapagluki	akuzingigalnguut	akuziyagullghiit,	aqnightekat	naallghullghiit,	piyugpagningilnguut	piyugyagullghiit,	ayaakatlu	esghaasagullghiit.	Enkaam	usuqegkaat	Kiyaghnegha	Israel-em.
B01_15_Matthew_V32	Taagken	Jesus-em	maligsaaghteni	tagsighluki	pikii,	“Maakut	nangllegyagutepigtanka	qayughllak	whangamnitut	pingayut	aghneghet,	talwa	neghyaghqiitut.	Neghestegpenaki	aghulaqesunghitanka,	luuraq	tumangani	kayaalinayukata.”
B01_15_Matthew_V33	Maligsaaghtengita	aaptekaat,	“Maani	kilgaani	naken	neqengnaqesta	naamayaghqameng	yulghuteghllagnun?”
B01_15_Matthew_V34	Jesus-em	aaptekii,	“Naten	uglaghqakaan	neqekrangllalgutsi?”	Kiimsiqaat,	“Maaghraghvinleguut,	qafsinatlu	iqalluggaat.”
B01_15_Matthew_V35	Enkaam	Jesus-em	yulghuteghllaget	qelqii	aqumuutesqelluki	nunakun.
