B01_15_Matthew_V36	Taagken	tuguluki	maaghraghvinlek	neqekrangllat	iqallugetlu,	Kiyaghneq	iyamsiqayugvikegkaa.	Aavgughluki	tuunegkii	maligsaaghteminun	enkaam	uyegtekiit	yulghuteghllagnun.
B01_15_Matthew_V37	Qamaglluteng	neghuutkat	kepsuulluteng.	Taagken	maligsaaghtet	siipneq	qerngughlluku	maaghraghvinlek	pasketet	imiiqiit	esleqaghaghluki.
B01_15_Matthew_V38	Uglaghtalangit	neghuutkat	yuget	4,000-nguftut,	kesutkegpenaki	aghnatlu	taghnughhaatlu.
B01_15_Matthew_V39	Taagken	Jesus-em	yulghuteghllaget	aglaghtuutesluki	ellngitnun	ellnga	angyamun	uuglluni	uvitanganun	Magadan-em	aglaqaq.
B01_16_Matthew_V1	Taagken	ilangi	Pharisees-etlu	Sadducees-etlu	tagikat	Jesus-mun	anagniilqavigighnaluku.	Enkaam	allaaghlluwhaghtisqegkaat	esghaasighqaaluku	aghtughyaghqaanghillgha	Kiyaghneghmeng	pingutanga.
B01_16_Matthew_V2	Iwernga	Jesus-em	kiimsiqii,	“Siqineq	tevighyaghtungestanghani	esla	kavighrugunghani	piiqusi,	‘Unaami	pinighnaquq.’
B01_16_Matthew_V3	Siqineq	piitekestanghani	qilaga	kavighrugunghanillu	qilagiinghanillu	piiqusi,	‘Aghneghmi	esla	seghleghunaquq.’	Esghapagluku	qilaga	liisimakaqaghsi	esla	natennaqutanga.	Iwernga	esghapaneghpesiki	sallghet	aghneghni	maani	liigikepagningitasi	sameng	pisiitangi.
B01_16_Matthew_V4	Aghneghem	uum	yugi	seghleghqumanguut,	ataasiighneghilnguut	Kiyaghneghmun,	naqam	allaaghlluwhaghtitesqut	whangamnun.	Yeghlegillu!	Taananginaghhaq	allaaghlluwhaghtilleq	esghaghlleqaghsi	Kiyaghneghem	allaaghlluwhaghtillgha	Jonah-mun.”	Taagken	Jesus-em	unilluki	aghulaqegkat.
B01_16_Matthew_V5	Maligsaaghtekullghiit	inglunganun	naayvam	kaalluteng,	maligsaaghtet	piyalghiimeng	puygumalghiit	neqekrangllameng	kelqegpenateng.
B01_16_Matthew_V6	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Kelengalusi	Pharisees-etlu	Sadducees-etlu	yeast-angitneng.”
B01_16_Matthew_V7	Ellmeggneng	akuzimghhutkegkaat,	“Tawaten	piiq	qayughllak	kelqenghilnguukut	neqekrangllameng.”
B01_16_Matthew_V8	Jesus-em	liisimakegkangi	sameng	pitangi	enkaam	pikii,	“Elpesi	yugni,	ugpeqilleghqestaapiguusi!	Sangafsi	neqekranglliinnitsi?
B01_16_Matthew_V9	Taawa	liigikigatsii?	Neqamikenghistekii	tallimat	neqekrangllat	aavguqanka	5,000	yugnun,	qafsin'gutangillu	pasketet	siipneghmeng	imiqasi	esleqaghaghlluki?
B01_16_Matthew_V10	Taakutlu	neqamikenghistekii	maaghraghvinlek	neqekrangllat	4,000	yugnun	neghestekanka,	qafsin'gutangitlu	pasketet	siipneghmeng	imiqasi	esleqaghaghlluki?
B01_16_Matthew_V11	Naten	sangan	liigikenghitesteggu	neqekrangllaanghilnguq	akuzitkegkegka?	Kelengalusi	Pharisees-etlu	Sadducees-etlu	yeast-angitneng!”
B01_16_Matthew_V12	Taagken	maligsaaghtet	liigikegkaat	sameng	piiqutanga.	Yeast-angunghiteftuq	neqekrangllamelnguq	kelengasaaghutkegkaa,	iwernga	kelengasqaqeftii	apeghtuusiitneng	Pharisees-etlu	Sadducees-etlu.
B01_16_Matthew_V13	Taagken	Jesus	kaasami	tunganganun	Caesarea	Philippi-em,	aaptekii	maligsaaghteni,	“Yuget	kinanguniiqatgu	Ighnegha	Yugem?”
B01_16_Matthew_V14	Kiimsiqaat,	“Ilangi	piiqut	John-nguniluku	Paaptaayesta,	ilangita	Elijah,	paninang	ilangita	Jeremiah-nguniiqaat	nalighmeng	naliit	uuknaliqistet.”
B01_16_Matthew_V15	Aaptekii,	“Elpesimi	kinanguniiqestengnga?”
B01_16_Matthew_V16	Simon	Peter-em	kiimsiqaa,	“Christ-anguuten,	Ighnegha	unguvalghiim	Kiyaghneghem.”
B01_16_Matthew_V17	Jesus-em	pikaa,	“Quyastellelguuten,	Simon,	ighnegha	Jonah-m!	Qayughllak	yugmeng	liisimangitan,	Atama	qilagmelnguum	elpenun	liitestekaqaa.
B01_16_Matthew_V18	Enkaam	piimken,	Peter-nguuten,	Uyghak.	Whagun	uyghagkun	nekefleqaqa	yughaghvika,	tuqullghem	aghtughyaghqaanghillghan	kayaalqesaghqaqenghitngwhaaghaa.
B01_16_Matthew_V19	Elpenun	tuunelleqanka	key-ngi	Ataneghpagullghan	Qilagem.	Sangwaa	alngunak	asightekuvgu	nunami	whani,	asighsaghqaaguq	qilagmillu.	Sangwaa	alngunak	itemuskuvgu	nunami	whani,	itemusaghqaaguq	qilagmillu.”
B01_16_Matthew_V20	Taagken	Jesus	maligsaaghteminun	apeghtesnanighwaaqaq	kitumun	alngunak	Christ-anguniluni.
B01_16_Matthew_V21	Taagken	kenlanga	Jesus-em	liigikesnaqegkii	maligsaaghteni,	Jerusalem-etepestaaghyaghqaaniluni,	tawani	allaaghhiinakun	ikfiqesleqniluni	Elder-enun,	chief	priest-enun,	apeghtughikayugnunllu	Liilightuusameng.	Ungipaatkii	tuqusaghqaaniluni	taagken	pingayaani	aghneghem	Kiyaghneghmun	unguvaghsaghqaaniluni.
B01_16_Matthew_V22	Peter-em	iqitulluku	aghyuuniiqaa,	“Ataneq,	Kiyaghneghem	pisnaanghitaaten!	Tawaten	pinaanghituten!”
B01_16_Matthew_V23	Jesus-em	qiivluku	Peter	pikaa,	“Tughneghaq,	iqiten	whangamneng!	Amigighaghpenga,	qayughllak	sumeghtaghallghen	yugem	sumeghtaghalqaa,	Kiyaghneghem	sumeghtaghalqenghitaa!”
B01_16_Matthew_V24	Taagken	Jesus-em	maligsaaghteni	pikii,	“Kitum	alngunak	maligsukuminga,	ellmi	katam	piyukelleni	peglluku,	qaquurani	uyamigluku	maligllinga.
B01_16_Matthew_V25	Qayughllak	kitum	alngunak	unguvalleni	ellminun	katam	piknikumigu	iflayaghqaqaa.	Kitum	alngunak	pegtekumigu	unguvalleni	whanga	apalluqlunga	allgeghlleqaa.
B01_16_Matthew_V26	Sangwaangam	yugem	pinighqusiqelleqagu	piliilluku	nunaghllak,	iflakumigu	unguvasigni?	Taawa	avangituq	veghtusighqameng	unguvasigminun.
B01_16_Matthew_V27	Aapghanka	tamaakut	elpesinun	qayughllak	Ighnegha	Yugem	tagiyaghqaaguq	Atamineng	aghtughyaghqaanghillelighluni	yaqulegtuumaghmi.	Taagken	tamaghhaa	yuuk	nallangightughlleqaa	apeghiighutellghatun.
B01_16_Matthew_V28	Ipa	ungipaatamsi,	whaanlenguut	ilagpesi	unguvalleghmeggni	esghaghyaghqaqaat	Ighnegha	Yugem	tagilghii	Umiilguluni.”
B01_17_Matthew_V1	Aghvinlek	aghneq	atughluku,	Jesus-em	kelqegkii	Peter,	James-enkuklu,	John-enkuk,	anglegutkullghiik,	mayuutkii	uusqalghiimun	naayghamun	ellnginiita.
B01_17_Matthew_V2	Iiyngitneng	taagken	Jesus	allangughtekaq:	gginaa	kuukgutkaq	siqineghtun,	aatkiillu	qateghrakguughtekat	nighugestun.
B01_17_Matthew_V3	Taagken	maligsaaghtet	esghaqagket	Moses-enkuk	Elijah-nkuk	aliighlutek	aleghquqangak	Jesus.
B01_17_Matthew_V4	Enkaam	Peter-em	pikaa	Jesus,	“Ataneq,	itagnapigtuq	whaantelleghput!	Piyukelqegkuvgu	nekeflangi	pingayut	azigutat,	elpenunllu,	Moses-munllu,	Elijah-munllu.”
B01_17_Matthew_V5	Salin	akuzimaluku,	qilagwaaghem	nighugrakegtam	saapegkii,	enkaam	qilawaaghmeng	mem	pikii,	“Una	Ighneqaqa,	piniqepigtaqa,	efquqepigtaqa,	nagataqiteggu!”
B01_17_Matthew_V6	Maligsaaghtet	nagalluku	ma,	alingruughem	angtalanganeng	niinghutkat	nunamun.
B01_17_Matthew_V7	Taagken	Jesus-em	takuluki	saafluki,	pikii,	“Nekevitek,	alingegpenasi!”
B01_17_Matthew_V8	Sivugsalghiimeng	Jesus-nginaghhaq	esghaqaat.
B01_17_Matthew_V9	Ukigutkelluku	naayghameng	Jesus-em	ineghtengngwaaqii,	“Kitumun	alngunak	apeghyaqunaan	esghaghwaalleq	pinakesi	kenlanga	Ighnegha	Yugem	unguvaghtekan	tuqulleghmeng.”
B01_17_Matthew_V10	Taagken	maligsaaghtet	aaptekaat	Jesus,	“Sangan	apeghtughistengita	Liilightuusat	piiqatgu	Elijah	sivukluni	tagipestaaghyaghqaaniluku?”
B01_17_Matthew_V11	Jesus-em	kiimsiqii,	“Ipa	Elijah	tagipestaaghyaghqaaguq,	enkaam	sangwaa	qamagtengngwaaghluku	nallghusanqiglleqaa.
B01_17_Matthew_V12	Iwernga	ungipaatamsi	Elijah	tagingwaaqaaguq,	iwernga	yuget	kinangutanga	nallukegkaqaat,	piyukelleghmegestunllu	pikaqaat.	Tawateghpigaq	Ighnegha	Yugem	ikfiqesleqaat.”
B01_17_Matthew_V13	Taagken	maligsaaghtet	liigikegkaat	John	Paaptaayesta	akuzitkaqeftaa.
B01_17_Matthew_V14	Yulghuteghllagnun	uteghnighyata,	yugem	takuluku	Jesus,	aga	segesqughtengnginaamaghmi	manungakun	pikaq.
B01_17_Matthew_V15	Pikaa,	“Ataneq,	ighneqa	nangllegyagutaghtigu!	Sayugpagtalguuq,	elngaatall	ikfiqnguuq.	Awen	kenghegnun	uullghaghtaquq	nalighmeng	meghquutaquq.
B01_17_Matthew_V16	Maligsaagtegpenun	tagisaghaqa,	iwernga	naallghutepagningitkaat.”
B01_17_Matthew_V17	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Elpesi	yugni,	ugpeqillghitusillu,	seghleghwaaghuusillu!	Naten	tagkaan	elpesininnaqsinga	ugpeqesqellunga?	Mekelghiiq	whavek	tagiteggu!”
B01_17_Matthew_V18	Jesus-em	aghyuuqaa	tughneghaq,	taagken	aanegkaq	mekelghiighmeng	enkaam	tawaninginaq	naallghutkaq	mekelghiiq.
B01_17_Matthew_V19	Taagken	Jesus	ellnginaaghsan	maligsaagtengita	takuluku	aaptekaat,	“Sangan	whangkuta	aanesneghmeng	aghtughesteggu	tughneghaq?”
B01_17_Matthew_V20	Jesus-em	kiimsiqii,	“Qayughllak	ugpeqilleghqestaaghhaalghiisi.	Ipa	ungipaatamsi,	ugpeqillelguyaqufsi	mustard-em	piitutesqughhan	angtalngatun,	una	naayghaq	pikufsigu,	‘Ingavek	nuugten!’	nuuggnayaghtuq.	Enkaam	sangwaa	alngunak	aghtughnayanghitaghsi!”
B01_17_Matthew_V21	Iwernga	tawatelnguq	tughneghaq	yughaghhiinaghqunllu,	fast-elleghqunllu	aanesaghqaqaghsi.
B01_17_Matthew_V22	Maligsaaghtet	qerngughusata	Galilee-mi	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Ighnegha	Yugem	tuguluku	tuunelleqaat	yugnun,
B01_17_Matthew_V23	enkaam	tuqulleqaat.	Iwernga	pingayiitangani	aghneghem	unguvaghtesaghqaaguq.”	Taagken	maligsaaghtet	qivghughllakat.
B01_17_Matthew_V24	Taagken	Jesus-enkut	maligsaaghtekullghiit	Capernaum-emun	tagiyata,	Temple-em	tax-meng	qerngughtistengita	takuluku	Peter	aaptekaat,	“Apeghtughistezi	Temple-em	tax-nganeng	llivikiiqaa?”
B01_17_Matthew_V25	Peter-em	kiimsiqii,	“Aa-a,	piiquq.”	Peter	iteghyan	mangteghamun	Jesus-em	aleghqughyuwhaaqaa,	“Simon,	nateta	elpek	sumeghpeni?	Kinkungwaaqat	nunat	umiilgita	llivikistaqegkangit	allaaghhiinaghmeng	tax-emeng?	Nunalgutmeggneng	piiqaat	nalighmeng	nakumiineng?”
B01_17_Matthew_V26	Peter-em	kiimsiqaa,	“Nakumiineng.”	Jesus-em	pikaa,	“Enkaam	umiilget	yugit	llivikinaanghitut.
B01_17_Matthew_V27	Iwernga	seghleghyugsunghitapung	tax-meng	qerngughtistet.	Enkaam	nulughyaa	naayvamun	iqallugtaqsuggaaghpek	qaanghani	naalkelleqan	mani.	Tuguluku	llivikusaghtughnakefkung.”
B01_18_Matthew_V1	Taam	kingunginaaneng	maligsaaghtet	Jesus-mun	tagiluteng	aaptekaat,	“Ataneghpagullghani	Qilagem	kina	angelleghpigaawa?”
B01_18_Matthew_V2	Jesus-em	tagsighluku	taghnughhaq	nekevestekaa	qukiitgun.
B01_18_Matthew_V3	Pikii,	“Ipa	ungipaatamsi,	iteghnaanghitngwaaghtusi	Ataneghpagullghanun	Qilagem	wetqukun	taghnughhaghestun	lliiqufsi.
B01_18_Matthew_V4	Kina	alngunak	ukaliighlleghhii	uutun	taghnughhaghtun,	angelleghpigaaguq	Ataneghpagullghani	Qilagem.
B01_18_Matthew_V5	Kitum	alngunak	atemkun	tuguklineghminigu	whatelnguq	taghnughhaq,	whanga	tuguklighaqaanga.
B01_18_Matthew_V6	Iwernga	kitum	alngunak	seghleghqestekagu	naliit	mekestaaghhaat	ugpeqingalghiit	whangamneng,	itagnaghnayaghtuq	yuget	qaamqaghfikluku	uyaqwaghkun	uyghagllagmeng	kalefsaqumegteggu	uusqallghanun	kelliim.
B01_18_Matthew_V7	“Seghleghwaaghunaqnguut	yuget	qayughllak	nunami	whani	nanghiiqulleghtupigtut	seghleghqelleghmun.	Nanghiiqullghet	seghleghqistimun	piyaghqaagut,	iwernga	seghleghwaaghunaqnguuq	kina	seghleghqestilghii	yugneng!
B01_18_Matthew_V8	“Iiggegpek	nalighmeng	itegaghpek	seghleghqestekangaten,	kepluki	eggnaketen!	Itagnaghataghaghnayaghtuten	kenlengilngughmun	unguvalleghmun	iitquvek,	iiggiteghngaaghpek	nalighmeng	itegiiteghngaaghpek	miluutelleghqaghpeneng	kenlengilnguugnun	kenghegnun,	inglugtun	iiggelighluten	nalighmeng	itegalighluten.
B01_18_Matthew_V9	Iyegpeklu	seghleghqestekangaten	ipugluku	eggnaken!	Itagnaghataghaghnayaghtuten	kenlengilngughmun	unguvalleghmun	iitquvek	inglupigaq	iiskelluku,	miluutelleghqaghpeneng	kenghanun	hell-em	inglugtun	iyelguluten.
B01_18_Matthew_V10	“Wataghllak,	ukaliqegpenaki	nalighhiiniit	ukut	mekestaghhaat.	Ungipaatamsi,	qilagmi	yaqulgita	quunpeng	Atama	qilagmelnguum	gginaa	esghaghaqaat.
B01_18_Matthew_V11	Ighnegha	Yugem	tagikaaguq	yugulinaluki	iflakat.
B01_18_Matthew_V12	“Sumeghpesini	sanayaghta	yuuk	100	penniilek,	ataasiq	aghulaqsaqan?	Ivaghyaghtughnayaghtaguu	aghulaqegkaq	unilluki	99	penniini	qeminilluki?
B01_18_Matthew_V13	Ipa	piimsi,	naalkegkumigu	quyakeghllagyaghqaqaa	pakiggulluku	99-eneng	aghulaqumangilngughneng.
B01_18_Matthew_V14	Tawateghpigaq	Atagpesi	qilagmelnguum	piyukelqenghitaa	nalighhiiniit	maakut	mekestaghhaat	iflasqelluki.
B01_18_Matthew_V15	“Ugpeqaalgutegpek	seghletun	pikangaten,	ellnginaaghulluku	ungipaannaken	anaggutellghaneng.	Nagaskumiten	taawa	ilaliighunneqigllequtek.
B01_18_Matthew_V16	Iwernga	nagasunghilkangaten,	takunqiggnaken	kelqelluku	ataasiq	nalighmeng	maalghuk	ugpeqaalgutek	liisimakestengulukek	sameng	pilleghpetegneng.	Tawaten	pilghaaten	qayughllak	Akuzitet	Igaqegkat	apeghtuusaqaat	maalghuk	nalighmeng	pingayut	liisimakistet	ipapighqesaghqaqaat	anaggutelleq.
B01_18_Matthew_V17	Iwernga	nagasunghilkaki	apeghnakesi	yughaghvigem	yugitnun.	Nagasunghilkaki	talwa	yughaghvigem	yugi,	kiyaghunnakesi	Gentile-ngulghiistun,	tax-mengllu	qerngughtistengulghiistun.
B01_18_Matthew_V18	“Ipa	ungipaatamsi,	sangwaa	alngunak	asightekufsigu	nunami	whani,	asighsaghqaaguq	qilagmillu.	Sangwaa	alngunak	itemuskufsigu	nunami	whani,	itemusaghqaaguq	qilagmillu.
B01_18_Matthew_V19	“Ilanganengllu	ungipaannaqamsi,	nunami	whani	maalghugulutek	itagnaqutngukuftek	aapnalutek	sameng	alngunak,	Atama	qilagmelnguum	apeghiighlleqaa	elpetegnun.
B01_18_Matthew_V20	Qayughllak	maalghuggaat	nalighmeng	pingayuggaat	qerngughuskata	whanga	atemkun,	akulngitnisaghqaagunga.”
B01_18_Matthew_V21	Taagken	Peter-em	takuluku	Jesus	aaptekaa,	“Ataneq,	ugpeqaalgutma	seghletun	pimanginaqanganga	naten	uglaghqakaan	seghevusaghqaqsikun?	Ketwell	maaghraghvinlaak?”
B01_18_Matthew_V22	Jesus-em	kiimsiqaa,	“Maaghraghvinleggiinaq	seghevusaghqaqenghitan,	iwernga	70	x	7.
B01_18_Matthew_V23	Tawaten	piimken	qayughllak	Kiyaghneghem	igleghutillgha	Ataneghpagullghani	Qilagem	whatetuq:	Umiilgem	qepghaghtemi	igiit	yuvghiighyaghtuqii	esghaghnaluki	asengetulangit.
B01_18_Matthew_V24	Iiwenllu	igiit	yuvghiighaqii,	umiilegmun	itghutkaat	qepghaghta	asengelek	10,000	manimeng.
B01_18_Matthew_V25	Tawaten	angkaan	maningilnguq	llivikuusaghqameng	asengeminun.	Enkaam	umiilgem	akikesqegkii	ellnga,	nulighha,	avaqutii,	saghyangillu	llivikuusaaluki	asengenganun.
B01_18_Matthew_V26	Iwernga	qepghaghta	sikmuulluni	umiilegmi	manungakun	maniguutepiglluni	pikaa,	‘Utaqiigaghten!	Lliviknaaghaqa	qamagtengngwaaghluku!’
B01_18_Matthew_V27	Umiilgem	nangllegyagulluku	puygusqegkaa	asengenga	enkaam	aanestekaa.
B01_18_Matthew_V28	“Taagken	taana	qepghaghta	aanluni	nallaqaa	qepghaghtelgutni	100	manimeng	asengekaq.	Akuqaghluku	uyaqwhakun	pikaa,	‘Llivikinga	asengegpeneng!’
B01_18_Matthew_V29	Qepghalgutangan	sikmuulluni	nangllegsipiglluni	pikaa,	‘Utaqiigaghten,	llivikelleqamken’.
B01_18_Matthew_V30	Iwernga	yugem	nagasimangilkanga,	yeghlegi	anusimingllaghtestekaa	kenlanga	asengenga	llivikellghanun.
B01_18_Matthew_V31	Ilangita	qepghaghtet	esghapagluku	tawaten	pillgha,	seghleghyaguteghllagluku	umiilegmeggnun	apeghyaghtuqaat.
B01_18_Matthew_V32	Enkaam	umiilgem	qepghaghta	taana	tagsiqlighluku	pikaa,	‘Uyuq	seghlepestaaq	qepghaghta!	Legan'ngam	seghevutamken	asengeghllagpeneng,	qayughllak	nangllegsilghiiten.
B01_18_Matthew_V33	Qepghalguten	nangllegyagusaqlegestun	katam	whanga	nangllegyagutellemtun	elpek!’
B01_18_Matthew_V34	Umiilgem	sakritepiglluni	taana	qepghaghta	aglaatestekaa	amyuutkistenun	anusimingllaghvigmelngughnun	kenlanga	qamagtengngwaaghluku	asengenga	llivikellghanun.
B01_18_Matthew_V35	“Esgha	tawateghpigaq	Atama	qilagmelnguum	qamagllusi	piyaghqiisi,	qamaken	ilugpesineng	seghevunneghilkufsiki	yulgutesi.”
B01_19_Matthew_V1	Jesus-em	tamaakut	apeghtuusaqneghmeng	taaqsamiki	aghulaqegkaq	Galilee-meng,	nunanganun	Judea-m,	inglunganilngughmun	Kiiwem	Jordan-em.
B01_19_Matthew_V2	Yulghuteghllaget	maliglleghaatkaat	enkaam	tawani	naallghuquqii	qinuyuget.
B01_19_Matthew_V3	Ilangita	Pharisees-et	takuluku	anagniilqavigighnaluku	aaptekaat,	“Liilightuusamnni	itagnaghtaa	yugem	pegtekumigu	nuliini	sangwaa	alngunak	apalluqluku?”
B01_19_Matthew_V4	Jesus-em	kiimsiqii,	“Atightiigastekii	Akuzitet	Igaqegkat	whaten	pillghit,	‘Piinlighyuwhaalleghmi	Kiyaghneq	yungllaghaqngami	ulimakaqegkek	yugenkuk	aghnaankuk’?”
B01_19_Matthew_V5	Enkaam	pikii,	“Taana	apalluqluku	yugem	atanillu	naanillu	unillukek,	nulighqullghiik	qerngughullequk,	enkaam	ataasiighllequk	yugusiik.
B01_19_Matthew_V6	Enkaangam	maalghugunanightuk,	ataasiightuk	yugusiik.	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	Kiyaghneghem	qerngughutestekakek	yeqay	yugem	pellghututesneghillikek.”
B01_19_Matthew_V7	Pharisees-et	aaptekaat,	“Sanganmi	Moses-em	Liilightuusalitinkut	yugmun	igalitesqelluku	nulighha	pegtugsighqameng,	aanesimaanllu?”
B01_19_Matthew_V8	Jesus-em	kiimsiqii,	“Moses-em	pegtesaghqaaghtestekaqii	nuliisi	qayughllak	pineghllugulghiisi.	Iwernga	piinlighyuggaalleghmeng	Kiyaghneghem	tawatetesaghqaanghinniluku	pikaqsaghaa.
B01_19_Matthew_V9	Enkaam	whanga	piimsi,	yugem	pegsaghqaqenghitaa	nuliini	wetkuqun	gelghaghniiqan.	Pegtekumigu	sameng	allaneng	apallulighluni,	nulightunqigtekumi	gelgaghniighullequq	nulighqenghhamikun.”
B01_19_Matthew_V10	Maligsaaghtengita	pikaat,	“Taananginaghhaakan	apalluq	yugem	pegtusighqaa	nuliighminun,	yuuk	nulightunghiteghngaaghmi	itagnaghnayaghtuq.”
B01_19_Matthew_V11	Iwernga	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Taana	apalluq	tamaghhaghmi	tuguklighnaanghitaat,	iwernga	Kiyaghneghem	ilangitnun	tuguklighyaghqaaghtestekaqaa.
B01_19_Matthew_V12	Ilangi	yuget	nulightiigatut	allgeqaatmeggneng	eunuch-ngnguluteng.	Ilangi	nulightiigatut	qayughllak	yuget	eunuch-engllaqaqiit.	Paninang	ilangi	eunuch-ngwaaqut	pinighataghatun	qepghaannaluku	Kiyaghneq	Ataneghpagullghani	Qilagem.	Kitum	alngunak	taana	tuguklighyaghqaqegkumigu,	tuguklighligu.”
B01_19_Matthew_V13	Taagken	taghnughhaat	tagitkiit	Jesus-mun	saafluki	yughaatkesqelluki.	Taawanginaq	maligsaaghtet	ineghtekiit	tagitistengit	taghnughhaat.
B01_19_Matthew_V14	Iwernga	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Yeqay	taghnughhaat	tagilit	whangamnun.	Ineghtegpenaki,	qayughllak	Ataneghpagullgha	Qilagem	taghnughhaghestun	ayuqelghiit	pikaat.”
B01_19_Matthew_V15	Enkaam	saaftaqluki	quyastekii,	taagken	aghulaqegkaq.
B01_19_Matthew_V16	Taagken	yugem	takuluku	Jesus	aaptekaa,	“Apeghtughista,	sangwaa	pinilghii	piyaghqaqsikun	allgeghutusighqaaluku	kenlengilngughmeng	unguvalleghmeng?”
B01_19_Matthew_V17	Jesus-em	pikaa,	“Sangan	aapsinga	sangwaa	piniitanga?	Ataasighhaaguq	pinilghii.	Kenlengilngughmeng	unguvallengyukuvek	qaatkiki	Kiyaghneghem	qelghusii.”
B01_19_Matthew_V18	Nukalpigam	aaptekaa,	“Nakut?”	Jesus-em	kiimsiqaa,	“Yugtaghpenang,	Gelgaghniighpenang,	Teglegpenang,	Iqlengiqutkigpenang,
B01_19_Matthew_V19	Quulvaghlukek	atanllu	naanllu,	Piniqluki	yulguteten	piniqelleghpetun	elpeneng.”
B01_19_Matthew_V20	Nukalpigam	pikaa,	“Qamaglluki	taakut	qaatkaqanka.	Sangwaallu	piyaghqaqsikun?”
B01_19_Matthew_V21	Jesus-em	kiimsiqaa,	“Naamigtengngwaaghyukuvgu	Kiyaghneghem	pisqellgha	elpenun,	aglaghluten	qamaglluku	saghyan	akikluku,	akinga	tamaana	aklumalghiinun	tunqughnaken.	Enkaam	qilagmi	aklungilgullequten,	taagken	tagiluten	maliggnakevnga.”
B01_19_Matthew_V22	Nukalpigam	nagalluku,	aghulaqegkaq	iilqepiglluni	qayughllak	aklungitepiglleghhii.
B01_19_Matthew_V23	Taagken	Jesus-em	maligsaaghteni	pikii,	“Ipa	piimsi,	piyaqnaghyaghqaaguq	aklungilngughmun	yugmun	itelleghqaa	Ataneghpagullghanun	Qilagem.
B01_19_Matthew_V24	Ungipaannaqlaataghamsi	ilanganeng,	piyaqniisaghqaaguq	camel-em	suflughutelleghqaa	sikuum	iiyngakun,	aklungilnguum	yugem	itelleghqaaneng	Ataneghpagullghanun	Kiyaghneghem.”
B01_19_Matthew_V25	Maligsaaghtet	nagasamegteggu	tawaten	pilleq	saghiighayugllagumaghmeng	pikat,	“Kinangam	yugulillengelleqa?”
B01_19_Matthew_V26	Iwernga	Jesus-em	tawaveghlluwaaq	esghaghluki	pikii,	“Yuget	piyaghqaqenghilkangit,	Kiyaghneghem	piyaghqaqii.”
B01_19_Matthew_V27	Taagken	Peter-em	pikaa,	“Esghaqaghqutqun,	sangwaa	qamaglluku	unilluku	maligtekaqamken.	Sangwaangam	allgeghlleqesteggu?”
B01_19_Matthew_V28	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Ipa	piimsi,	nutaghami	nunami	Ighnegha	Yugem	aqumellequq	umiilgusignekun	aqumutagmikun	nighughqelleghmini.	Taagken	elpesillu	maligutkani	whangamnun	aqumlusi	qula	maalghuk	siipneqluku	umiilgem	aqumutiitgun,	igleghutillequsi	qula	maalghuk	siipneqluku	ramkenganeng	Israel-em.
B01_19_Matthew_V29	Enkaam	whanga	apalluqlunga	kinkut	alngunak	uniskumegteki	mangteghateng,	angleguteteng,	nayateng,	atateng,	naateng,	avaqutateng,	nalighmeng	piitesighaghviteng,	nulallequt	100-alpagluku.	Kenlengilngughmengllu	unguvalleghmeng	allgeghullequt.
B01_19_Matthew_V30	Iwernga	aangelghiilghutet	ukaliighllequt	enkaam	ukavanlenguut	angellghughllequt.”
B01_20_Matthew_V1	Paninang	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Ataneghpagullgha	Qilagem	yugtun	ayuquq	grapes-meng	piitesighaghvilek.	Unaanguluku	aanluni	tugulaasaghtuqaq	qepghaghtekaghqameng	piitesighaghvigminun.
B01_20_Matthew_V2	Aghneghmun	tawavek	itagnaqegkii	akileghtughnaluki	ataasikaghtaan	denarius-meng,	taagken	qepghaghyaghtestekii.
B01_20_Matthew_V3	Nine-eklaagmi	aaneqiglluni	esghaqii	yuget	nekevghataaghullghiit	sagpenateng	akilpegaghvigmi.
B01_20_Matthew_V4	Enkaam	pikii,	‘Elpesillu	piitesighaghvimnun	qepghaghyaghtek,	akileghtughnaaghamsi	qepghalleghpesistun’.
B01_20_Matthew_V5	Enkaangam	qepghaghyaatkat.	Taagken	aghneghem	qukaanillu,	three-klaagmillu	tawaten	pilaataqaq.
B01_20_Matthew_V6	Iiwenllu	five-eklaagnaqaqaa,	akilpegaghvigmun	pikaq,	taawanguq	paninang	yugem	ilangi	nekevghataaghaqeftut.	Aaptekii,	‘Sangafsi	whaantaqetsi	aghnelqusiq	sagpenasi?’
B01_20_Matthew_V7	Kiimsiqaat,	‘Qayughllak	kitum	alngunak	tugunghilkanginkut	qepghaghtenguluta.’	Enkaam	pikii,	‘Naqam	elpesillu	qepghaghyaghtek	piitesighaghvimnun’.
B01_20_Matthew_V8	“Ighivgaghyagu	piitesighaghvilgem	pikaa	qepghaghtet	naasquutistengat,	‘Qepghaghtet	tuqlughteghluki	akileghtughteghqi	kingulighneng	sivulighnun.’
B01_20_Matthew_V9	Five-eklaagmi	qepghaghyaatkat	tagilaghaasameng	akileghtuusangegkat	denarius-kaghtaan.
B01_20_Matthew_V10	Enkaam	sivuliit	qepghaghtet	akileghtuusangataghaghnaqniluteng	pikaayalghiit,	iwernga	tagilaghaasalghiimeng	ellngitlu	akileghtuusangegkat	denarius-kaghtaan.
B01_20_Matthew_V11	Akileghtuusangyameng	qivraaghutkaat	piitesighaghvigem	yuga.
B01_20_Matthew_V12	Pikaat,	‘Kinguliiluki	tugukaghten	qepghaghtut	ataasighhaghmun	aflumun.	Whangkuta	ughleghiightukut	puqlaghllagmi	aghnelqusiq,	iwernga	akileghtughaten	whangkutestun	angkaan.’
B01_20_Matthew_V13	Iwernga	yugem	pikaa	ataasiq,	‘Nagataghten,	ilakumtaamni,	puughhneghitamken.	Itagnaqegkaqan	qepghaghnaluten	ataasimun	denarius-mun.
B01_20_Matthew_V14	Enkaam	tuguluku	akileghtuusan	aglaa.	Akileghtughyuganka	kinguliit	yuget	tugukanka	akileghtuusaghpetun	angkaan.
B01_20_Matthew_V15	Piyukellemtun	manika	atughyaghqaqaqa.	Aqinaziin	ighlegitutemneng?’”
B01_20_Matthew_V16	Taagken	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Enkaam	tamaakut	kinguliit	sivuliighsaghqaagut,	sivuliit	kinguliighsaghqaagut.”
B01_20_Matthew_V17	Jesus-em	Jerusalem-emun	mayuutkelluku	yulghutneng	aafutkii	qula	maalghuk	siipneqluku	maligsaaghteni	aleghqughnaaluki.
B01_20_Matthew_V18	Pikii,	“Nagatek,	Jerusalem-emun	mayughnaqukut.	Tawani	Ighnegha	Yugem	tuunelleqaat	chief	priest-enunllu,	apeghtughikayugnunllu	Liilightuusaneng	enkaam	nanqiglluku	tuqusaghqaanilleqaat.
B01_20_Matthew_V19	Taagken	Gentile-enun	tuunelleqaat.	Tawani	legasiighwaatkelleqaat,	kagsagmiglleqaat,	qaquuraghlleqaatlu.	Iwernga	pingayiitangani	aghneghem	unguvaghtesaghqaaguq.”
B01_20_Matthew_V20	Taagken	Zebedee-m	ighneghegkenka	naangak	tagikaq	Jesus-mun	ighneghegni	kelqellukek.	Manungakun	segesqughtekaq	aapfiknaluku.
B01_20_Matthew_V21	Jesus-em	aaptekaa,	“Sameng	piighsin?”	Aghnam	kiimsiqaa,	“Akeqinga	Ataneghpagulleghpeni	ighneghegka	aqumesnakegken	aallgha	aghenqigneghpegun,	ilanga	saghumigneghpegun.”
B01_20_Matthew_V22	Iwernga	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Liigikenghitaghsi	sangutanga	tungsiqaghsi.	Meghviknayaghestegneguu	qayuusiq	meghyaghqaqa?”	Kiimsiqaak,	“Piyaqleguukung.”
B01_20_Matthew_V23	Jesus-em	pikakek,	“Qaywa	qayuusimneng	meghellequtek,	iwernga	whangangunghituq	nakmiighyaghqaq	kinkuk	aqumyaghqaatkek	aghenqignemkunllu	saghumignemkunllu.	Atama	yataaghqegkaqaak	taakuk	aqumvigkak	nakmikegkaminun.”
B01_20_Matthew_V24	Taakut	ilangita	qula	maligsaaghtet	nagaqughyamegtekek	samatkek	anglegutkullghiik	ugumiyagutkagket.
B01_20_Matthew_V25	Taagken	Jesus-em	tuqlughluki	maligsaaghteni,	pikii,	“Liisimakasi	Gentile-et	igleghutistengita	atanghutaqiit	yuteng,	aangwaaghughtekatlu	yugita	yukeghqutkaqiit.
B01_20_Matthew_V26	Iwernga	elpesi	tawatesaghqaanghitusi.	Nalighsi	igleghutistenguyukumi	qepghaghtengughlli	elpesinun.
B01_20_Matthew_V27	Nalighsi	aangelleghpigaayukumi	qepghaghtelaaghughsaghqaaguq	elpesinun,
B01_20_Matthew_V28	katam	tawaten	Ighneghan	Yugem	pillghatun.	Tagimangituq	qepghaatesqelluni	iwernga	tagikaaguq	qepghaatinaluni,	tuunalukullu	unguvalleni	naveghqellisiqnaluku	uglapiglleghhiinun	yugnun.”
B01_20_Matthew_V29	Jesus-enkut	maligsaaghtekullghiit	Jericho-meng	aghulaqumaluki	yulghuteghllagem	maligtekaat	Jesus.
B01_20_Matthew_V30	Taawanguq	tumet	saningitni	ayaakak	yugek	aqumlutek.	Nagaqughyamegnegu	Jesus	naghughhniluku	akilghuukak,	“Ataneq,	Ighneghani	David-em,	nangllegyagutaghtikung!”
B01_20_Matthew_V31	Yulghutem	ineghtekakek,	nepiighesqellukek.	Iwernga	qevuutaghalluku	wata	akilghuukak,	“Ataneq,	Ighneghani	David-em,	nangllegyagutaghtikung!”
B01_20_Matthew_V32	Enkaam	Jesus-em	aghuliighluni	tuqlughlukek	aaptekakek,	“Sasqellutek	piiqestek	whangamnun?”
B01_20_Matthew_V33	Kiimsiqaak,	“Ataneq,	iyepung	esghaghtestaghtiki!”
B01_20_Matthew_V34	Jesus-em	nangllegyagullukek	iiyngik	saaftekii.	Tawaninginaq	esghaasagutkak	enkaam	maligtekaak.
B01_21_Matthew_V1	Jesus-enkut	maligsaaghtekullghiit	tughaaghyalghiimeng	Jerusalem-emun,	kaatkaat	Bethphage-mun	Mount	Olives-melngughmun.	Tawani	kayagtekakek	maalghuk	maligsaaghtegni	igleghtekestiisqellukek.
B01_21_Matthew_V2	Whaten	pikakek,	“Ingavek	nenun	aglaghlutek	tawaninginaq	esghaghlleqaghtek	petugngalghii	donkey	nughalek.	Itemllukek	taginnakegtek	whangamnun.
B01_21_Matthew_V3	Kitum	alngunak	sameng	pikangistek,	whaten	pinaketek,	‘Atanghem	aklukaak.’	Tawaninginaq	tagitesleqaak	whangamnun.”
B01_21_Matthew_V4	Whaten	pikaaftuq	apeghiighnaluku	uuknaliqistem	pillgha,
B01_21_Matthew_V5	“Ungipaasaghtughqi,	Zion-eghmiit,	‘Esghaqaghtegguqun,	umiilegpesi	takwaaqiisi.	Qusevegngaaq	donkey-kun	igleghtaquq,	donkey-m	nughaakun.’”
B01_21_Matthew_V6	Enkaam	maligsaaghtek	igleghtekestaghlutek	sivungitni,	Jesus-em	pisqellghatun	pikak.
B01_21_Matthew_V7	Donkey	nughaghtuumaan	tagitkaak	Jesus-mun.	Qaasliit	aatkateng	mataghlluki	teghikusak	qaayngitgun	llikiit.	Taagken	Jesus	aqumegkaq.
B01_21_Matthew_V8	Yulghuteghllagem	tumetgun	aatkateng	saagtekiit,	enkaam	ilangi	uqfigem	avayaaneng	ikutaqluteng	tumet	llilaghtughvikegkiit.
B01_21_Matthew_V9	Yulghuteghlaget	Jesus-em	sivunganilnguutlu	kingunganilnguutlu	akilghuutkat,	“Usuqnaghhalek	Ighnegha	David-em!	Kiyaghneghem	quyasligu	tagilghii	aatghakun	Atanghem!	Usuqilleq	qilagmelngughmun!”
B01_21_Matthew_V10	Jesus	iteghyan	Jerusalem-emun,	qamaglluteng	Jerusalem-eghmiit	kagaygunneqegsaatkat	whaten	pimaghmeng,	“Kinangaawa	una	yuuk?”
B01_21_Matthew_V11	Jesus-em	maligtestengita	yulghuteghllaget	kiimsiqiit,	“Jesus-nguuq,	uuknaliqista,	Nazareth-meng	Galilee-melngughmeng	pinguuq.”
B01_21_Matthew_V12	Jesus	Temple-mun	iteghluni	aanesquqii	qamaglluki	tukfightulghiitlu,	akikulghiitlu.	Taagken	manimeng	naveghqughtetlu	tipelngit	ulleghquqii,	aqumutiitlu	qawaagmeng	akilpegaghtet.
B01_21_Matthew_V13	Enkaam	pikii,	“Igaqngaaq	Akuzitni	Igaqegkani,	‘Mangteghama	atilqesaghqaqaa,	Yughaghvik.’	Iwernga	elpesi	iighaghvigughtaghsi	teglegniightenun!”
B01_21_Matthew_V14	Taagken	ayaakatlu,	ighullugmelnguutlu	takukaat	Jesus	Temple-mun,	enkaam	naallghuquqii.
B01_21_Matthew_V15	Chief	priest-etlu	apeghtughikayugetlu	Liilightuusaneng	esghapagluki	allaaghlluwhaghtillghi	Jesus-em,	nagallukillu	taghnughhaat	Temple-mi	akilghuulghiit	whaten,	“Usuqilleq	Ighneghanun	David-em!”	elngaatall	ugumiyukat.
B01_21_Matthew_V16	Enkaam	Jesus	aaptekaat,	“Naganneghisikii	taghnughhaat	sameng	pitangi?”	Jesus-em	kiimsiqii,	“Aa-a,	nagatanka.	Atightiigastegguu	Akuzitet	Igaqegkat	pillghit,	‘Qaanghitgun	taghnughhaatlu	allgenghhaghhaatlu	yataaghqegkaqan	usuqilleq	elpenun	katam?’”
B01_21_Matthew_V17	Taagken	Jesus-em	unilluki,	Jerusalem-emeng	Bethany-tkaq	qavaghnaluni	tamaani.
B01_21_Matthew_V18	Jesus	unaanguluku	uteghniitkelluku	Jerusalem-emun	iyataqaq.
B01_21_Matthew_V19	Tumet	saaghwitni	esghaqaa	figs-em	uqfiga.	Takuluku	piyaqminigu	ququngaraaghinaaftuq	figs-ngunani.	Enkaam	uqfik	tawavek	pikaa,	“Allamengllu	piitestinaanghituten.”	Tawaninginaq	uqfik	paliqaq.
B01_21_Matthew_V20	Maligsaaghtet	tawaten	pilghii	esghapagluku,	saghiighayugutkelluku	aaptekaat,	“Naten	uqfik	sukatepiglluni	palighta?”
B01_21_Matthew_V21	Jesus-em	kiimsiqii,	“Ipa	piimsi,	malghuklillngunaan	ugpeqillelgukufsi,	whangamtun	pillequsi,	esghapalleghpesistun	figs-em	uqfiga.	Tawatenginaq	pinaanghitusi	talwa	una	naayghaq	kayagtekufsigu,	‘Iikluten	elpeneng	meghmun	miluuten’,	legan	pillequq.
B01_21_Matthew_V22	Sameng	alngunak	aaptekufsi	yughakun	ugpeqillelgukufsi	allgeghusaghqaagusi.”
B01_21_Matthew_V23	Jesus	kaalluni	Jerusalem-emun	Temple-mun	iitqaq.	Apeghtughimaluku,	chief	priest-etlu,	siivanlleghetlu	takuluku	aaptekaat,	“Ungipaatikut	kitum	qeleghtaten	tawaten	pisqelluten,	nalighmeng	kitum	qelellghakun	tawaten	pinguzin?”
B01_21_Matthew_V24	Jesus-em	kiimsiqii,	“Whangallu	aapnaqamsi.	Kiimsiqufsinga	whangallu	ungipaalleqamsi	kitumun	qelghumatka.
B01_21_Matthew_V25	Kitum	qeleghtagu	John	paaptaayeghisqelluku?	Kiyaghneghtaawaa	nalighmeng	yugmeng	pingwaa?”	Taagken	ellmeggneng	akuzimghhutkat,	“Sameng	pinaqesteggu?	Kiimsiqumteggu	Kiyaghneghmeng	pinguniluku,	whaten	pilleqiinkut,	‘Sangan'ngam	ugpeqenghisteggu	John?’
B01_21_Matthew_V26	Iwernga,	‘Yugmeng	pingunikumteggu’,	qemall	yulghutet	salleqiinkut,	qayughllak	qamaglluteng	ugpeqegkaat	John	uuknaliqistenguniluku.”
B01_21_Matthew_V27	Enkaam	kiimsiqaat	Jesus,	“Nallukaghput.”	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Whangallu	ungipaannaanghitamsi	kitumun	qelellengegkaatka	tawaten	pillemnun.”
B01_21_Matthew_V28	Taagken	Jesus-em	aaptekii,	“Naten	una	sumeghtaghaatkelleqesteggu?	Yugnguq	taawa	maalghugegneng	ighnelek.	Sivulighmun	piluni	pikaa,	‘Ighnemni,	aghneghmi	whani	grapes-meng	piitesighaghvimnun	qepghaghyaghhaaten!’
B01_21_Matthew_V29	Ighneghan	pikaa,	‘Wiin	piyunghitunga.’	Iwernga	aghneghmi	taakwani	avuteghqelluni	qepghaghyaqaq.
B01_21_Matthew_V30	Taagken	tuunglighhaanun	ighneghmi	piluni,	tawateghpigaq	pikaa.	Ighneghan	pikaa,	‘Aa-a,	pillequnga’,	iwernga	pimangilnguq.”
B01_21_Matthew_V31	Jesus-em	aaptekii,	“Naliim	ighneghan	qaatkegkaqagu	atani?”	Kiimsiqaat,	“Sivuliim.”	Enkaam	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Ungipaatamsi	tax-meng	qerngughtestetlu,	aghnatlu	akikikayuget	yugusimeggneng	sivugpesini	iteghaatnguut	Ataneghpagullghanun	Kiyaghneghem.
B01_21_Matthew_V32	John-em	Paaptaayestem	ungipaasaghtuqaqiisi	naten	kiyaghtelleghqameng	Kiyaghneghem	piyukellghatun,	iwernga	ugpequmangitaghsi.	Naqam	tax-meng	qerngughtistetlu,	aghnatlu	akikikayuget	yugusimeggneng	ugpeqegkaqaat.	Talwa	kingunganeng	esghapakaqeghngaaghpesiki	ugpeqegkangat	John,	paninang	elpesi	avuteghqellusillu	seghleghqennanillghitusi,	ugpequmangitaghsillu.”
B01_21_Matthew_V33	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Ilanga	ungipaghaan	nagateggu.	Taawanguq	yuuk	piitesighaqaq	grapes-meng	nunamikun.	Minglluluku,	laagutkakek	grapes-mun	qageghquusik,	nekeftekaallu	uusqalghii	kelengakivigkaq.	Taagken	navghitkaa	grapes-meng	piitesighaghvini	piitesighaghtenun	aflengakesqelluku.	Taagken	ellnga	ilanganun	nunam	aglaqaq.
B01_21_Matthew_V34	Saghnayaghqaaghsata	grapes-et,	piitesighaghvilgem	qepghaghteni	kayagtekii	nengini	aqfasqelluki.
B01_21_Matthew_V35	Iwernga	piitesighaghtet	akuqaghluki	qepghaghtet,	ataasiq	anaguleghtaakaat,	ilanga	tuqutkaat,	pingayaat	milughpagaataghhiinaq	tuqutkaat.
B01_21_Matthew_V36	Qepghaghtemi	ilangi	kayagllaataqii,	sivulighneng	uglaghataghaghluki,	ellngitlu	tawatengwaaq	pilaataqiit.
B01_21_Matthew_V37	Qenwat	ighneni	kayagtekaa	ellngitnun,	whaten	pimaghmi,	‘Ipapestaaq	siivakelleqaat	ighneqa.’
B01_21_Matthew_V38	Iwernga	piitesighaghtet	esghaghluku	piitesighaghvilgem	ighnegha	whaten	pikat,	‘Uum	ighneghan	piliilleqaa	una	nuna	atani	tuqukan.	Tuquskumteggu	whangkuta	piliilleqaghput	una	grapes-meng	piitesighaghvik.’
B01_21_Matthew_V39	Enkaangam	akuqaghluku,	piitesighaghvigmeng	miluulluku	tuqutkaat.”
B01_21_Matthew_V40	Jesus-em	aaptekii,	“Piitesighaghvilgem	tagikumi	salleqaki	piitesighaghtet?”
B01_21_Matthew_V41	Chief	priest-etlu	siivanlleghetlu	kiimsiqaat,	“Seghlepestaatun	tuqulleqii	taakut	seghleghet	yuget.	Taagken	navghilleqaa	piitesighaghvini	allanun	piitesighaghtenun.	Saghnalleghqaq	kaaskan	nengiilleqaat.”
B01_21_Matthew_V42	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Atightiigastekii	Akuzitet	Igaqegkat	whaten	pillghit?	‘Uyghak	taana	mangteghangllaghtet	ighsakegkaat	megnunalleghpigaaghtekaaguq	uyghak.	Taana	Atanghem	pilqaa,	urang	pinilleghpigaaguq	whangkunnun!’
B01_21_Matthew_V43	“Enkaangam	ungipaatamsi,	Ataneghpagullgha	Kiyaghneghem	elpesineng	awisaghqaaguq,	enkaam	tuunyaghqaaguq	yugnun	piitestiyaghqanun	fruit-nganeng	Ataneghpagullghem.”
B01_21_Matthew_V44	“Kina	alngunak	taaggun	uyghagkun	iqukumi,	pelimyaghqaaguq.	Kina	alngunak	taam	uyghagem	ifkaghvikegkumigu	siftaaghqelleqaa.”
B01_21_Matthew_V45	Chief	priest-etlu	Pharisees-etlu	nagalluki	Jesus-em	ungipaghaatangi	liigikegkat	Jesus-emnguq	ellngit	akuzitkaqeftii.
B01_21_Matthew_V46	Enkaam	tuguyukaqsaqangat,	iwernga	alingegkat	yulghuteghllagneng	qayughllak	ugpeqegkangat	Jesus	uuknaliqistenguniluku.
B01_22_Matthew_V1	Taagken	Jesus-em	apeghtughlaataqii	taakut	yuget	ungipaghaatetgun.	Pikaq,
B01_22_Matthew_V2	“Ataneghpagullgha	Qilagem	whatetuq,	umiilgem	ighneni	nengughhnaqelghii	yataaghqutkaa	neqenghaghqunnaluku.
B01_22_Matthew_V3	Qepghaghteni	kayagtekii	ungipaasaghtiisqelluki	tagsiqliqat	nengughutem	neqenghaghqellghanun	tagilaghaatesqelluki,	iwernga	tagiyunghitkat.
B01_22_Matthew_V4	Taagken	umiilgem	pikii	ilangi	qepghaghteni,	‘Ungipaasaghtughteki	tagsiqliqanka	neqenghaghqellemnun,	neghyaghqan'nguq	apeghiightut.	Tuqutiightesimaanka	yugtaaneghneng	teghikusaneng,	quwintalghiinengllu	nughaghneng.	Enkaam	sangwaa	qamaglluni	apeghiightuq.	Tagilin'nguq	nengughutem	neqenghaghqellghanun!’
B01_22_Matthew_V5	Iwernga	aqelqaghqat	tagsiqliqiit	waakumangilnguut.	Yeghlegi	navek	sayaghtuutkat,	ataasiq	piitesighaghvigminun	pikaq,	ilanga	estugaghminun,
B01_22_Matthew_V6	umiilgem	qepghaghtengi	ilangita	akuqaghluki	sakusiiqluki	tuququqiit.
B01_22_Matthew_V7	Umiilek	sakriteghllakaq	enkaam	pilluwaghteni	kayagtekii.	Tuququqiit	yugtaqat,	kumaghtekaatlu	nengat.
B01_22_Matthew_V8	Taagken	qepghaghteni	pikii,	‘Nengughhnaqem	neqenghaghqusighqii	apeghiightut.	Aqelqangllaqaqsaqenka	seghletun	pikaatmeggneng	tagipagningitut.
B01_22_Matthew_V9	Enkaangam	aanlusi	tumenun	nallaqasi	qamaglluki	yuget	neqenghaghqesaghtiisqiteki.’
B01_22_Matthew_V10	Qepghaghtet	aanluteng	tumeni	qamaglluki	nallaqateng	seghleghuyaghngaata,	pinighyaghngaata	neghyaghtiisqegkiit,	enkaam	nengughutfik	esleqaghaghtekaq.
B01_22_Matthew_V11	“Umiilgem	esghaghyaghtughyaqminiki	aqelqat,	esghaqaa	yuuk	aasimangilnguq	nengughhnaqelghiim	aatkaaneng.
B01_22_Matthew_V12	Enkaam	aaptekaa,	‘Ilakumtaamni,	naten	iteghsin	nengughhnaqelghiim	aatkaaneng	aategpenang?’	Yugem	kiimsighpagningitkaa.
B01_22_Matthew_V13	Taagken	umiilgem	qepghaghtet	pikii,	‘Iiggillu,	itegiillu	asighlluki	qagavek	mamlegmun	miluuteggu,	tawani	yuget	qiyallequt	ggutetengllu	terqitaagtaghlleqiit.’”
B01_22_Matthew_V14	Jesus-em	taaqniqii	akuzilleni	whaten,	“Uglapestaaq	tagsiqliqaaghngaan,	iwernga	palaghhaagut	nakmikegkat.”
B01_22_Matthew_V15	Taagken	Pharisees-et	unilluku	Jesus	agghitkat	naten	anagniilqavigighnaluku	Jesus	akuzillghakun.
B01_22_Matthew_V16	Enkaam	kayagtekiit	ilangi	maligsaaghteteng,	ilangillu	Herodian-et	Jesus-mun.	Whaten	pikaat,	“Apeghtughista,	liisimakamken	akuziiquten	ipanguluku.	Apeghtuusanllu	naten	Kiyaghneghem	kiyaghtesqesullgha	ipanguuq.	Aangwaaghuyaghngaata,	ukavansaghngaata	paninang	apeghtughaqaten	tawateghpigaq.
B01_22_Matthew_V17	Enkaam	ungipaataghtikut	naten	sumeghtaghalleghpeneng.	Kiyaghneghem	Liilightuusaani	elqughutngaa	llivikilleghqaghput	tax-emeng	Caesar-mun?	Llivikiltaa-a	nalighmeng	pinghitelta?”
B01_22_Matthew_V18	Jesus-em	liisimakegkii	seghletun	piyugukangat,	enkaam	pikii,	“Piniiyugneghni	elpesi!	Sangama	anagniilqavigighnaqutkestengnga?
B01_22_Matthew_V19	Kelguvikitengnga	manimeng	tax-mun	llivikisighqameng.”	Enkaam	tagitkaat	manimeng.
B01_22_Matthew_V20	Taagken	aaptekii,	“Kitum	gginaqagu	una?	Kitum	aatqagu	una?”
B01_22_Matthew_V21	Kiimsiqaat,	“Caesar-em.”	Enkaangam	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Tuuniteki	Caesar-mun	tamaakut	Caesar-em	pingi,	tuuniteki	Kiyaghneghmun	tamaakut	Kiyaghneghem	pingi.”
B01_22_Matthew_V22	Nagasamegteggu	saghiighayukat	taagken	unilluku	aghulaqegkat.
B01_22_Matthew_V23	Tawani	aghneghmi	Sadducees-et	aapsaghtuqaat	Jesus.	Tamaakunguut	ugpeqingigalnguut	tuqukat	unguvaghtekayugutangi.
B01_22_Matthew_V24	Pikaat,	“Apeghtughista,	Moses-em	Liilightuusii	pikaagut,	‘Yuuk	nulightughluni	tuqukan	avaqutigpenani,	anglegutangan	tuguyaghqaqaa	ugingighaq	avaqutinnaluku	anglegutni	tuqukaq.’
B01_22_Matthew_V25	Maansaghtut	maaghraghvinlek	yuget	anglegutkullghiit.	Nuyekliq	nulightughluni	avaqutigpenani	tuqukaaguq.	Enkaam	nulighha	anglegutangan	tugukaa.
B01_22_Matthew_V26	Tuunglighhaallu	anglegutanga	tuquuq	avaqutigpenani.	Enkaam	pingayaan	anglegutangan	tugaa	taana	aghnaq.	Qamaglluteng	tugaaqluku	tuqulaghaatut	avaqutigpenateng.
B01_22_Matthew_V27	Kinguliiluni	aghnaq	tuqukaaguq.
B01_22_Matthew_V28	Ungipaataghtikut,	unguvaghtuutellghem	aghneghani	kitum	aghnaq	nulighqelleqagu,	qamagllutengqun	tugukaqegkangat?”
B01_22_Matthew_V29	Jesus-em	kiimsiqii,	“Anaggutngaasi	qayughllak	liigikigatasi	Akuzitet	Igaqegkat,	talwa	aghtughyaghqaanghillgha	Kiyaghneghem.
B01_22_Matthew_V30	Tuqukat	unguvaghtuuskumeng	nengughusaghqaanghitut,	yaqulgestun	qilagmelngughestun.
B01_22_Matthew_V31	Atightiigastegguu	Kiyaghneghem	apellgha	elpesinun	tuqukat	unguvaghtuutelleghqiitneng?	Whaten	pikaaguq,
B01_22_Matthew_V32	‘Kiyaghneqaanga	Abraham-em,	Kiyaghneqaanga	Isaac-em,	Kiyaghneqaangallu	Jacob-em.’	Kiyaghneq	Kiyaghneqaat	unguvalghiit,	nakaan	tuqukat.”
B01_22_Matthew_V33	Jesus-em	apeghtughillgha	yulghuteghllaget	nagalluku,	saghiighayaguteghllakaat.
B01_22_Matthew_V34	Pharisees-et	nagaqughyamegteki	Sadducees-et	Jesus-mun	nepiighqwaaniluki	qerngughutkat.
B01_22_Matthew_V35	Ataasim	Pharisees-em	apeghtughistengan	Liilightuusat	aapqughaaqaa	Jesus	anagniilqavigighnaluku.
B01_22_Matthew_V36	Whaten	aaptekaa,	“Apeghtughista,	natungaawa	angelleghpigaq	Liilightuusani?”
B01_22_Matthew_V37	Jesus-em	kiimsiqaa,	“‘Ataneq	Kiyaghneghen	piniqsaghqaqan	qamaglluku	ilugpegun,	qamaglluku	unguvasighpegun,	qamaglluku	umyugaghpegun.’
B01_22_Matthew_V38	Taana	angelleghpigaaguqlu,	megnunalleghpigaaguqlu	Liilightuusaq.
B01_22_Matthew_V39	Tuunglighhaa	angelleghpigaq	Liilightuusaq	sivulightun	ayuquq:	‘Piniqsaghqaqaten	yulguteten	piniqelleghpetun	elpeneng	katam.’
B01_22_Matthew_V40	Taakuk	Liilightuusak	tunemaaguk	tamaghhitnun	Liilightuusanunllu,	apeghtuusiitnunllu	uuknaliqistet.”
B01_22_Matthew_V41	Taagken	Jesus-em	aaptekii	Pharisees-et	qerngughutngamaluki,
B01_22_Matthew_V42	“Naten	sumeghtaghaatkaqesteggu	Christ-a?	Kitum	ighneqagu?”	Kiimsiqaat,	“Ighneqaa	David-em.”
B01_22_Matthew_V43	Jesus-em	aaptekii,	“Sangan'ngam	David-em	akuziiqngami	Agleghnalghiignekun	Taghneghagnekun	atightagu,	‘Ataneghmeng’?	Whaten	pikaalghii,
B01_22_Matthew_V44	‘Atanghem	pii	Atanqa,	Aqumi	aghenqignemkun,	kenlanga	anguyagten	itegaghpek	asinganun	lliightellemnun.’
B01_22_Matthew_V45	David-em	atiimakagu,	‘Ataneghmeng’	naten	ighneqagu?”
B01_22_Matthew_V46	Nalighhiiniita	Pharisees-et	kiimsighpagningitkaat	Jesus.	Taagken	kenlekluku	kitum	alngunak	tetugyagutkaat	aapneghmeng.
B01_23_Matthew_V1	Taagken	Jesus-em	pikii	yulghutetlu,	maligsaaghtenillu,
B01_23_Matthew_V2	“Apeghtughikayugetlu	Liilightuusaneng,	Pharisees-etlu	aqumgaat	Moses-em	aqumutaakun.
B01_23_Matthew_V3	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	qaatkaqiteki	qamaglluki	apeghtuusiit	elpesinun,	iwernga	ellngita	sallghit	maligtegpenaki.	Sasqaqiisi	naqam	ellngita	pingigatiit.
B01_23_Matthew_V4	Apeghtughillghit	Liilightuusaneng	piyaqnapigtut	yugnun	qaatkesaghqaaluteng.	Apeghtuusiit	uqigtuqastun	akmagestun	ayuqut	akmagtestaqegkangit	yugnun,	naqamllu	talwa	ataasighhaq	ighneghwaaghteng	atuqigataat	kayusiinnaluki	akmagitneng.
B01_23_Matthew_V5	“Qamaglluki	pinitun	pilleteng	piiqiit	esghaghsaqnaluki	yugnun.	Tallimegteggunllu	qagumegteggunllu	qillghutaqiit	pateghtaaghalluki	salngawaaghhaat	Akuzitneng	Igaqegkaneng	imalget,	qaaslimengllu	qughalkutiit	taakluki	ulimaaqiit.
B01_23_Matthew_V6	Neqenghaghqemmi,	aqumyuneghtuut	aangwaaghughtekat	aqumutiitgun,	synagogue-nillu	tawatelngughteggun	aqumyuneghtuut.
B01_23_Matthew_V7	Quulvaghtesugaqut	akilpegaghvigni,	atiisqesugaqutlu,	‘Apeghtughistemeng’.
B01_23_Matthew_V8	Iwernga	elpesi	atightestegpenasi,	‘Apeghtughistemeng’	qayughllak	ataasiiguq	Apeghtughistezi,	anglegutkullghiistun	ayuqusi.
B01_23_Matthew_V9	Kina	alngunak	atighpenaan,	‘Atameng’	nunami	whani,	qayughllak	ataasiiguq	Atazi	qilagmelnguq.
B01_23_Matthew_V10	Talwa	kitumun	alngunak	atightestegpenasi,	‘Igleghutistemeng’	qayughllak	ataasiiguq	igleghutistezi,	Christ-anguuq.
B01_23_Matthew_V11	Taana	angelleghpigaq	qepghaghtekaghqaqaghsi.
B01_23_Matthew_V12	Kina	alngunak	ellmineng	anglistekumi	qusevegtesaghqaaguq,	enkaam	kina	alngunak	ellmineng	qusevegtekumi	anglistellengyaghqaaguq.
B01_23_Matthew_V13	“Iwernga	seghleghwaaghunaqnguusi	elpesi	apeghtughikayugni	Liilightuusaneng,	Pharisees-enillu!	Piniiyugneghuusi!	Uumgutaqasi	iteghnaqelghiit	Ataneghpagullghanun	Qilagem.	Elpesi	katam	iitghigatusi,	aghuliightaqasillu	iteghyulghiit!
B01_23_Matthew_V14	“Seghleghwaaghunaqnguusi	elpesi	apeghtughikayugni	Liilightuusaneng,	Pharisees-enillu!	Piniiyugneghuusi!	Esghaghlaataquluki	ugingighat	mangteghiighaqasi.	Taagken	pinighnilusi	pisqellusi	taakluku	yughaghaqusi.	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	aghyuullengeghllagyaghqaagusi!
B01_23_Matthew_V15	“Seghleghwaaghunaqnguusi	elpesi	apeghtughikayugni	Liilightuusaneng,	Pharisees-enillu!	Piniiyugneghuusi!	Igleghaaqusi	kelliikunllu,	quutkunllu	ivaghnaluku	ataasiq	yuuk	ugpeghhnnaluku	elpesistun.	Taagken	apeghtuusasi	ugpeqegkaki	apeghtuusaghpesi	aglaghtesaghqaaghlleqaa	hell-mun,	enkaam	elpesi	aghyuulleghpesineng	malghughqengngaan	aghyuullengyaghqaaguq!
B01_23_Matthew_V16	“Seghleghwaaghunaqnguusi	elpesi,	ayaakani	igleghutisteni!	Apeghtughiiqusi	whaten,	‘Kina	whaten	pikumi,	“Akeqiinga	Temple-kun”	taana	pitngunghituq.	Iwernga	kina	whaten	pikumi,	“Akeqiinga	gold-ngakun	Temple-em”	piyaghqapestaaqaa	akequsani’.
B01_23_Matthew_V17	Elpesi	ayaakani	temngitwhasteni!	Nalikek	megnunaghataghaghtak,	gold-a,	nalighmeng	Temple-a	agleghnaghtestilghii	gold-meng?
B01_23_Matthew_V18	Apeghtughiiqusillu	whaten,	‘Kina	whaten	pikumi,	“Akeqiinga	aghqefigegnekun”,	taana	pitngunghituq.	Iwernga	kina	whaten	pikumi,	“Akeqiinga	tunusakun	aghqefigegnilngughqun,”	piyaghqapestaaqaa	akequsani.’
B01_23_Matthew_V19	Ayaangaghhaalek	elpesi!	Nalikek	megnunaghataghaghtak,	tunusaq	nalighmeng	aghqefigek	agleghnaghtestilghiik	tunusameng?
B01_23_Matthew_V20	Enkaangam	kina	akeqikumi	aghqefigegnekun,	akeqinguuq	taaggunllu	sakunllu	tamaghhaakun	aghqefigegnilngughqun.
B01_23_Matthew_V21	Kinallu	akeqikumi	Temple-kun,	akeqinguuq	taaggunllu	kiyaghlleghhiikunllu	tawani.
B01_23_Matthew_V22	Kinallu	akeqikumi	qilagkun,	akeqinguuq	Kiyaghneghem	aqumutagkenkunllu	aqumgalghiikunllu	tawani.
B01_23_Matthew_V23	“Seghleghwaaghunaqnguusi	elpesi	apeghtughikayugni	Liilightuusaneng,	Pharisees-enillu!	Piniiyugneghuusi!	Kiyaghneghmun	tuunaqasi	qulaghqellghi	neqmun	neqnighsaatet,	mint-et,	dill-et,	cummin-et.	Iwernga	avelghaghaqasi	apeghtuusat	megnunaghataghalghiit	Liilightuusanilnguut	katam:	taniillghitelleq,	nangllegtalleq,	ataasiighmetelleq.	Taakut	atughqaqsaghasi	avelghafqiita	ilangillu	Liilightuusat.
B01_23_Matthew_V24	Ayaakani	igleghutisteni!	Yugtun	ayuqusi	nguuyngaaghaq	meghyaghqamineng	iqilluku	taagken	camel-a	tuufleqaa!
B01_23_Matthew_V25	“Seghleghwaaghunaqnguusi	elpesi	apeghtughikayugni	Liilightuusaneng,	Pharisees-enillu!	Piniiyugneghuusi!	Qayuusisillu	sagnesillu	qaayngi	sangigtaqasi,	naqam	imighngaat	wayaghniiqaghpesinengllu,	pakigniilleghpesinengllu.
B01_23_Matthew_V26	Ayaangalghii	Pharisee!	Sivuklukek	sangigtikek	ilungik	qayuusimllu	sagneghemllu	enkaam	qaaskulluteklu	ukmangiillik!
B01_23_Matthew_V27	“Seghleghwaaghunaqnguusi	apeghtughikayugni	Liilightuusaneng,	Pharisees-enillu!	Piniiyugneghuusi!	Tuqukat	salngagistun	ayuqusi	piineqegkat	qatelghiimeng.	Esghaqaaluteng	qaayngi	pinighhalek,	iwernga	qama	imaqut	neghqughrugmengllu	aghulleghmengllu.
B01_23_Matthew_V28	Elpesillu	tawatetusi.	Qayegpesineng	pinighsugnighllaget,	iwernga	ilugpesini	piniiyugneghuusi,	apeghtuutkasi	Liilightuusat	atuqigatasi.”
B01_23_Matthew_V29	“Seghleghwaaghunaqnguusi	elpesi	apeghtughikayugni	Liilightuusaneng,	Pharisees-enillu!	Piniiyugneghuusi!	Mangteghasqwaangllaghaqasi	lliivghitgun	uuknaliqistet,	pinighnaghsaghaqasillu	lliivghit	tamaakut	kiyaghtekat	elqughulluteng	Kiyaghneghmun.
B01_23_Matthew_V30	Taagken	whatenllu	piiqusi,	‘Neghighluku	kiyaghtekaayaqumta	sivunemnni,	tuququlgusighnayanghitngwaaghaput	uuknaliqisteneng’.
B01_23_Matthew_V31	Tawaten	akuzilleghpesigun	liigikestusi,	kingunqennilusi	tuququghtengitnun	uuknaliqistet.
B01_23_Matthew_V32	Enkaam	saaqetsi	sivuneghpesi	piinliqaat	apeghiighteggu.
B01_23_Matthew_V33	Nemeghyani	elpesi,	avaqutiitni	nemeghyat!	Kiyaghneghem	nanqigtekangisi	aghyuughyaghqaanilusi,	naten	anagnaqesteggu	aghyuulleghqaghsi	hell-mi?
B01_23_Matthew_V34	Enkaam	ungipaatamsi	kayagfikamsi	uuknaliqistenengllu,	liisimalghiinengllu,	apeghtughistenengllu.	Ilangit	tuququghlleqasi,	ilangit	qaquuraghlleqasi,	enkaam	ilangit	synagogue-egpesini	kagsagmiglleqasi,	ilangit	town-eneng	ilangitnun	malighqughlleqasi.
B01_23_Matthew_V35	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	elpesi	Kiyaghneghem	aghyuughyaghqaqiisi	tuququllghitnun	qamaglluki	kiyaghtekat	elqughulluteng	Kiyaghneghmun	nunami	whani,	Abel-meng	Zechariah-mun,	ighnegha	Barachiah-m.	Tuqutkaghsi	akulegkeni	Temple-emllu	aghqefigemllu.
B01_23_Matthew_V36	Ipa	ungipaatamsi,	elpesi	unguvalghiini	maaten	Kiyaghneghem	aghyuughyaghqaqiisi	tamaakunun	seghletun	pilleghnun!
B01_23_Matthew_V37	“Kaay,	Jerusalem,	Jerusalem!	Tuququqaqaten	uuknaliqistet,	milughpagaataghlukillu	tuququqaten	kayagtekanka	elpenun.	Uglaapiglluku	qerngughsugaqsaghanka	yugten	whangamnun,	katam	qawaagem	qerngughtellghatun	amaaghaghhani	yaqugmi	asinganun,	iwernga	tawaten	pistesugumangitaghpenga.
B01_23_Matthew_V38	Enkaangam	mangteghan	paaghqiilleqaa.
B01_23_Matthew_V39	Ungipaatamsi,	whaken	kenlekluku	esghaghnaanghitaghpesinga	alla	kenlanga	whaten	pilleghpesinun,	‘Kiyaghneghem	quyasligu	tagilghii	aatghakun	Atanghem.’”
B01_24_Matthew_V1	Jesus	aanluni	Temple-meng	aghulaqumaluku	maligsaaghtengita	takuluku	kelgutkiit	mangteghat	Temple-em	pingi.
B01_24_Matthew_V2	Pikii,	“Esghaghasi	tamaakut	mangteghat.	Ipa	piimsi,	talwa	ataasiq	uyghak	nemininnaanghituq.	Qamaglluteng	ulleghqughyaghqaagut.”
B01_24_Matthew_V3	Jesus	aqumyan	Mount	Olives-kun,	maligsaaghtengita	takuluku	ellnginaghhaamaaghluteng	aaptekaat,	“Ungipaatikut,	qakun	tamaakut	piyaghqaawat?	Sangulleqa	liisimakusighqaghput	tagilleghqaghpenun,	nunamllu	iqugtelleghqaanun?”
B01_24_Matthew_V4	Jesus-em	kiimsiqii,	“Kelengalusi,	kitumun	alngunak	puughtestegpenasi.
B01_24_Matthew_V5	Qayughllak	uglaapiglleghhii	tagiyaghqaaguq	atuqluku	aatqa,	whaten	piiqluteng,	‘Whanga	Christ-anguunga’,	puughqughtaayaghqaqaatlu	yulghun.
B01_24_Matthew_V6	Nagaquullequsi	pilluwaneng,	akusqaghtaatkellghitnengllu	pilluwat;	alingegpenasi	qayughllak	tamaana	piyaghqaaguq.	Iwernga	salin	iquggnaqngunghituq.
B01_24_Matthew_V7	Nunat	yugit	pillugutullequt,	ataneghpagullghetlu	pillugutullequt,	nani	alngunak	neqangisagllagllequq,	nunat	uvelegtaghllagllequt.
B01_24_Matthew_V8	Qamaglluni	tamaana	aghnam	ighniyukestallghatun	ayuqellequq.
B01_24_Matthew_V9	“Taagken	tamaana	pimaluku	yuget	tugulleqiisi,	amyuqetaatkelleqiisi,	tuqulleqiisillu.	Nunataghhaan	tamaghhaan	ramkengan	ugumiilleqiisi	whanga	apalluqlunga.
B01_24_Matthew_V10	Enkaam	uglaapiglleghhiim	ugpeqnanighlleqaatnga,	uveghpagutusagullequt,	ugumiisagullequtlu.
B01_24_Matthew_V11	Taagken	uuknaliqistesighwaalghutet	tagiluteng	puughqughlleqiit	yulghutet.
B01_24_Matthew_V12	Seghleq	nulam	angtalanganeng	apalluqluku	allulluteng	yuget	piniqinanighllequt.
B01_24_Matthew_V13	Iwernga	kina	alngunak	nuqenneghtuqaq	kenlemun	yugulillengyaghqaaguq.
B01_24_Matthew_V14	Ukutlu	Pinilghiit	Ungipat	Kiyaghneghem	Ataneghpagullghaneng	ayuqelghiit	ungipaqsaghqaagut	nunataghhaani	tamaghhaani	ramkengitnun	nagaqiisqelluki.	Taagken	nuna	iqugllequq.”
B01_24_Matthew_V15	“Yeqay	atightughtem	liigikligu	sameng	pisiitanga	uuknaliqistem	Daniel-em	uuknaliqutkegkaa.	Uuknaliqutkegkaa	taana	agleghniilnguuguq	paaghqiitestilghii	agleghnalghiimi	nemi.	Esghaqufsigu	tesqamani	nekevelghii,
B01_24_Matthew_V16	Judea-melnguut	anagniighhaat	naayghanun.
B01_24_Matthew_V17	Yuuk	mangtegham	qaaynganilnguq	ukigluni	saghyaqufqaami	pilghaaq.
B01_24_Matthew_V18	Yuuk	piitesiighaghvigmelnguq	qaaslighqufqaami	pilghaaq.
B01_24_Matthew_V19	Tamaani	aghneghni	seghleghwaaghunaqnguut	qumilget	aghnat,	mamaghtalgetlu!
B01_24_Matthew_V20	Yughaghtek	anagniifqaafsi	uksumi	pisqellusi	nalighmeng	Sabbath-mi,
B01_24_Matthew_V21	qayughllak	tamaani	seghleliiq	elngaatall	seghleghllagughsaghqaaguq.	Seghleghataghaayaghqaaguq	seghleliighaqelleghneng	ima	piinlighyuggaallghaneng	nunam	whavemun	kenlanga.	Allamengllu	tawatelnguq	pinaanghitngwaaghtuq.
B01_24_Matthew_V22	Tamaakut	aghneghet	Kiyaghneghem	palallimangisaqaki,	kina	alngunak	unguvanayanghituq.	Iwernga	apalluqluki	nakmikegkani	aghneghet	palalliyaghqaqii.
B01_24_Matthew_V23	“Tamaani	kitum	alngunak	pikangisi,	‘Ii-i,	Christ-a	whaa’,	nalighmeng,	‘Tazingantuq!’	ugpeqegpenaan,
B01_24_Matthew_V24	qayughllak	Christ-asighwaaghetlu,	uuknaliqistesighwaaghetlu	tagillequt.	Allaaghlluwhaghtighllagllequt,	saghiighanaghqeghllagllequtlu	puughhnaluki	yuget,	talwa	Kiyaghneghem	nakmikegkii	puughsaqlegukumegteki.
B01_24_Matthew_V25	Taawa	ungipaatamsi	sivutghulluku	pilleghqaq.
B01_24_Matthew_V26	“Enkaangam	whaten	pikangisi,	‘Ii-i,	Christ-a	paaghqillghanituq!’	takugpenaan;	nalighmeng	whaten	pikata,	‘Ii-i,	mangtegham	ilunganituq’,	ugpeqegpenaki.
B01_24_Matthew_V27	Qayughllak	Ighnegha	Yugem	tagikumi	tawatesaghqaaguq	nighugpaguutelleghtun	kuukgullequq	asivaghmeng	pakfallamun.
B01_24_Matthew_V28	“Qawaagpaget	qerngughtaqut	nani	alngunak	kemegqwaalgunghani.
B01_24_Matthew_V29	“‘Kingungiighhiitneng	tamaakut	seghleliilleghllaget	Kiyaghneghem	siqineq	mamlegtesleqaa,	tanqiq	nighugunnanightesleqaa,	ighaleqetaaghet	ifkaquutesleqii	qilagameng,	aghtughyaghqaanghillghet	qilagamelnguut	igleghallghit	allangughquutesleqii.’
B01_24_Matthew_V30	“Taagken	qilagakun	sangwaa	allgeghllequq	liisimakusighqaq	Ighneghaneng	Yugem.	Taagken	qamagtengngwaaghluteng	nunam	ramkengi	qivghum	qiyaaghuuteghllagllequt.	Esghaghlleqaat	Ighnegha	Yugem	tagilghii	qilagwaaghteggun,	aghtughyaghqaanghilleghtuumaghmillu	nighughqellelighllaglunillu.
B01_24_Matthew_V31	Enkaam	Ighneghan	Yugem	qalghightaan	qalghightesteghllakumigu	kayaglleqii	yaquleni	navek	alngunak	qerngughtesqelluki	nakmikegkani	nunataghhaaneng	tamaghhaaneng.
B01_24_Matthew_V32	“Liitfikiteggu	uqfiga	figs-em.	Esghaqufsiki	avayii	uniilliighalghiit,	ququngii	piitekestalghiit,	liisimakaghsi	kiigyaghtungestaghaa.
B01_24_Matthew_V33	Tawateghpigaq	qamagtengngwaaghluki	aapqanka	tamaakut	esghaqufsiki,	liisimakelleqaghsi	ellnga	kaasaghtungestaamaaq,	aaqun	amigmun	lliighumaaq.
B01_24_Matthew_V34	Ipa	ungipaatamsi,	maaten	unguvalghiit	tuqulaghaatestegpenaki	qamaglluteng	tamaakut	piyaghqaagut.
B01_24_Matthew_V35	Qilagallu,	nunallu	aviighusaghqaaguk,	iwernga	whanga	akuzitenka	aviighunnaanghitut.
B01_24_Matthew_V36	“Kitum	alngunak	nallukaa	taam	aghneghem	aflunga	qakun	kaasaghqaatanga.	Talwa	qilagmelnguut	yaqulget	nallukaat,	Ighneghemllu	nallukaa,	Atanginaghhaam	liisimakaa.
B01_24_Matthew_V37	Katam	tamaani	Noah-m	kiyaghtellghani,	yuget	tawatesaghqaagut	Ighneghan	Yugem	tagilleghqaani.
B01_24_Matthew_V38	Tamaani	aghneghni,	sivungani	ulevem	yuget	neghaqluteng,	meghaqluteng,	nengughutaqluteng	ayuqegkat	kenlanga	tawavek	aghneghmun	Noah-nkut	itellghitnun	ark-mun.
B01_24_Matthew_V39	Nallukegkaat	natesaghqaatanga	kenlanga	ulevelleghmun,	enkaam	qamagtengngwaaghluteng	tuqulaghaatkat.	Tawateghpigaq	Ighnegha	Yugem	tagikan,	nallukelleqaat	natesaghqaatanga.
B01_24_Matthew_V40	Tawani	pilleghmi	maalghuk	yugek	piitesiighaghvigmegni	qepghaatek,	aallgha	tugulleqaa,	ilanga	uneglleqaa.
B01_24_Matthew_V41	Aghnak	kagimtilghiik	grain-meng,	aallgha	tugulleqaa,	ilanga	uneglleqaa.
B01_24_Matthew_V42	“Enkaangam	kelengalusi,	qayughllak	nallukngwaaghaghsi	nani	aghneghmi	Ataneghpesi	tagilleghqaa.
B01_24_Matthew_V43	Nalluneqniituq,	mangtegham	yugan	liisimaksaqumigu	teglegniightem	tagilleghqaa,	qavaghpenani	kelenganayaghtuq	naafqulluni	iteghnayukan	mangteghaminun.
B01_24_Matthew_V44	Enkaam	tamaaken	apalluqluku	elpesillu	apeghiighsaghlusi	quunpeng,	qayughllak	Ighnegha	Yugem	tagiyaghqaaguq	waakenghillghaghllusi.
B01_24_Matthew_V45	“Kinangaawa	ataasiighmelnguq	peghqinelghii	qepghaghta?	Taananguuq	umiilgan	igleghutistengllaqaa	qepghaghtelgutanganun,	neqelitaatiisqellukillu	aghhutanga	tamaghhaan.
B01_24_Matthew_V46	Taana	qepghaghta	quyastellengyaghqaaguq	umiilgan	kaalluni	esghaqumigu	qelelleghmitun	pilghii.
B01_24_Matthew_V47	Ipa	ungipaatamsi,	taana	qepghaghta	umiilgan	aflengakistengllaghyaghqaqaa	saminun	tamaghhaanun.
B01_24_Matthew_V48	Iwernga	taana	qepghaghta	seghleghukumi	sumeghtaghaghllequq	whaten,	‘Umiilka	tagilghaghtughnaanghituq’,
B01_24_Matthew_V49	enkaam	amyuutkesagulleqii	qepghaghtelgutni.	Ilallequqlu	suumelghiinun,	neghelgusighaqluki,	meghelgusighaqluki	lliighllequq.
B01_24_Matthew_V50	Taagken	ataasimi	aghneghmi	umiilga	kaallequq	qepghaghta	yataaghqellghillukullu,	sighimakellghillukullu.
B01_24_Matthew_V51	Enkaam	umiilgan	qevuulluku	aghyuughlleqaa,	aglaghtesleqaa	piniiyugneghnun	aghyuughyaghqaaluku	maligulluku.	Tawani	qiyiqellequt,	gguteteng	terqitaagtaamiita.
B01_25_Matthew_V1	“Tawani	pilleghmi	Ataneghpagullgha	Qilagem	uspusaghqaaguq	qulaghyagnun	aghnaghaghnun	kelqelluki	kenelghutateng	paayghilghiit	nulightughnaqelghiimeng.
B01_25_Matthew_V2	Tallimat	nalluuqat	tallimat	peghqinelghiit.
B01_25_Matthew_V3	Nalluuqat	kelqegkiit	kenelghutateng	uqughqangunaki,
B01_25_Matthew_V4	iwernga	peghqinelghiit	kelqegkiit	kenelghutateng	uqughqalighluki.
B01_25_Matthew_V5	Nulightughnaqelghii	muluuqaq,	qenwat	aghnaghaat	qavaghnikat	enkaam	qavatghutkat.
B01_25_Matthew_V6	“Unugem	qukaani	kina	akilghuukaq	whaten,	‘Uka	tagiiquq	nulightughyaghqaq!	Aanlusi	payeghteggu!’
B01_25_Matthew_V7	Aghnaghaat	taghtughaghtaalluteng	kenelghutateng	kenghit	nallghusaqiit.
B01_25_Matthew_V8	Taagken	nalluuqat	pikat	peghqinelghiinun,	‘Uqughqalitaghtikut,	kenelghutaput	qaamnaqut.’
B01_25_Matthew_V9	Peghqinellghita	pikiit,	‘Seghleghhalek	tamaghhamnnun	uqughqapagitukut,	akilpegaghtenun	tukfighiyaghtughtek.’
B01_25_Matthew_V10	Enkaam	nalluuqat	uqughqangyaghtuutkat.	Aviisimaluki	nulightughnaqelghii	kaatkaq.	Taakut	yataaghqengngalghiit	itelgusiqaat	nengughutem	neqenghaghqellghanun,	enkaam	amik	uumkaat.
B01_25_Matthew_V11	“Kingunganeng	nalluuqat	aghnaghaat	kaalluteng,	akilghuukat,	‘Ataneq,	Ataneq!	Qelpeghutaghtikut!’
B01_25_Matthew_V12	Iwernga	nulightughnaqelghiim	kiimsiqii,	‘Ipa	ungipaatamsi,	nallukamsi	kinkungutsi.’”
B01_25_Matthew_V13	Jesus-em	ungipaghaatni	taaqniqaa	whaten,	“Enkaangam	kelengatek,	qayughllak	nallukaghsi	natungutanga	aghneq	nalighmeng	natungutanga	aflu	Ighneghan	Yugem	tagilleghqaa.
B01_25_Matthew_V14	“Ataneghpagullgha	Qilagem	uspusaghqaaguq	whavek	ungipaghaatmun:	Taawanguq	yuuk	igleghanaqelghii	navek	uyavanun.	Tuqluqii	qepghaghteni	aviilleghmini	aflengakistenguluki	saghyaminun.
B01_25_Matthew_V15	Ataasimun	5,000	manit	tuunegkii,	ilanganun	2,000,	kingulighmun	1,000.	Tamaghhiita	tunquqii	pillegtulngistun.	Taagken	aghulaqegkaq.
B01_25_Matthew_V16	Yuuk	taana	5,000-nengegkaq,	tawaninginaq	aghulaqluni	akiksaghqameng	tukfightuqaq.	Enkaam	alla	5,000	allgeghtekaa.
B01_25_Matthew_V17	Taanallu	2,000-nengegkaq,	allgeghutkaq	alla	2,000-meng.
B01_25_Matthew_V18	Iwernga	taana	1,000-nengegkaq	aanluni	laagulluki	iiqii	umiilegmi	maningi.
B01_25_Matthew_V19	“Muluughllagluni	qepghaghtet	umiilgat	uteghnighyami	ungipaghsuqii	samatangi	manini.
B01_25_Matthew_V20	5,000-nengegkam	esnevaghluni	pikaa,	‘Umiilemni,	tagivaqaqaten	5,000	manit.	Taawa	alla	5,000	allgeghsimaaqaa.’
B01_25_Matthew_V21	Umiilgan	pikaa,	‘Seghleghhalek	itagnapigtuten,	pinightuten	ataasiighmelnguq	qepghaghta!	Ataasiighmetkaategpeneng	palaghhaghnun	aflengakistengughtesnaqamken	uglalghiinun.	Iitghi	quyalgusighyaghtughnga!’
B01_25_Matthew_V22	Taagken	2,000-nengegkam	esnevaghluni	pikaa,	‘Umiilemni,	tagivaqaqaten	2,000	manit.	Taawa	alla	2,000	allgeghsimaaqa.’
B01_25_Matthew_V23	Umiilgan	pikaa,	‘Seghleghhalek	itagnapigtuten,	pinightuten	ataasiighmelnguq	qepghaghta!	Ataasiighmetkaategpeneng	palaghhaghnun	aflengakistengughtesnaqamken	uglalghiinun.	Iitghi	quyalgusighyaghtughnga!’
B01_25_Matthew_V24	Taagken	1,000-nengegkam	esnevaghluni	pikaa,	‘Umiilemni,	liisimakamken	elpek	aaghsaghqaanghituten.	Unataghaquten	piitesighaqaqenghilkegpeneng.	Qerngughtaqaten	piitkat	piitutngit	ifkaghquqaqenghilketeng.
B01_25_Matthew_V25	Enkaam	alinglunga	laagulluki	maniten	iiqaqanka.	Ang,	taawa	elpek	pin.’
B01_25_Matthew_V26	Iwernga	umiilgan	pikaa,	‘Uyuq	seghleq,	ighsanitalghii	qepghaghta!	Elpek	piighpenga	unataghaqnilunga	piitesighaqaqenghilkemneng,	qerngughtiiqnilungallu	piitkaneng	piitutngit	ifkaghquqaqenghilkemneng.
B01_25_Matthew_V27	Sangan'ngam	manika	kanaghhnanighsigu	bank-amun?	Tawaten	pikaqsaquvgu,	uteghnillemni	veghhnayaghaqa	allgeghnelighluku.’
B01_25_Matthew_V28	Taagken	umiilgem	qepghaghteni	pikii,	‘Tuguluku	1,000	maninga,	tuuniteggu	taamun	10,000-nelegmun.
B01_25_Matthew_V29	Tamaakut	pilget	tuunataghaghyaghqaagut	enkaam	siiptiillequt.	Iwernga	taana	avangilnguq	pillgaayaghngaan	iqisaghqaqiit	ellnganeng.’
B01_25_Matthew_V30	Taagken	umiilgem	pikii,	‘Aanesteggu	taana	satngunghilnguq	qepghaghta	qagavek	mamlegllagmun.	Tawaani	yuget	qiyaaghwaghllagllequt,	ggutetengllu	terqitaagtaamiita.’
B01_25_Matthew_V31	“Ighnegha	Yugem	tagikumi	nighughqelleghmikun,	yaqulegtuumaghllagmi,	taagken	aqumellequq	nighughqengngalghiignekun	aqumutagmikun.
B01_25_Matthew_V32	Sivungakun	qerngughutesleqiit	qamagtengngwaaghluki	nunam	yugi.	Taagken	avughlleqii,	katam	penniighniightem	avullghatun	penniighet	goat-neng.
B01_25_Matthew_V33	Penniighet	aghenqigneghminitesleqii,	goat-et	saghumigneghmini.
B01_25_Matthew_V34	Taagken	Umiilgem	aghenqigneghminilnguut	pilleqii,	‘Tagitek,	Atama	quyastekiitni,	piliiteggu	Ataneghpagulleq	yataaghqegkaq	elpesinun	ima	nuna	ulimaaqngan.
B01_25_Matthew_V35	Iyatiqngulunga	neghqegkaqaghpesinga;	meqsugulunga	meghsikaqaghpesinga;	allaneghtaalunga	upughatkaqaghpesinga.
B01_25_Matthew_V36	Amsikaghmellunga	aasightuqaqaghpesinga,	qinuyugulunga	laalighfikegkaqaghpesinga,	anusimingllaghaalunga	esghaghyaghtuqaqaghpesinga.’
B01_25_Matthew_V37	Taagken	elqughutngalghiit	pilleqaat,	‘Ataneq,	qavngaq	iyatiqnguluten	neghesiken,	nalighmeng	meqsuguluten	meghsiziken?
B01_25_Matthew_V38	Qavngaq	allaneghtaaluten	upughasiken,	nalighmeng	amsikaghmelluten	aasightughsiken?
B01_25_Matthew_V39	Qavngaq	qinuyuguluten,	nalighmeng	anusimingllaghvigmelluten	laalighfiksiken?’
B01_25_Matthew_V40	Umiilgem	kiimsighlleqii,	‘Ipapestaaq	ungipaatamsi,	sangwaa	alngunak	pikaghsi	ukalighpigaghnun	anglegutemnun,	whangamnun	piiqasi!’
B01_25_Matthew_V41	“Taagken	Umiilgem	saghumigneghminilnguut	pilleqii,	‘Elpesinguut	Kiyaghneghem	aghyuughyaghqii.	Awiitek	whangamneng,	aglaghtek	kenlengilnguugnun	kenghegnun	Kiyaghneghem	yataaghqegkaanun	Tughneghaghmunllu,	yaqulganunllu!
B01_25_Matthew_V42	Iyatiqngulunga	neghestellghitaghpesinga,	meqsugulunga	meghsillghitaghpesinga,
B01_25_Matthew_V43	allaneghtaalunga	upughatellghitaghpesinga,	amsikaghmellunga	aasightuumangitaghpesinga.	Qinuyugulungallu,	anusimingllaghvigmellungallu	laalighfikumangitaghpesinga.’
B01_25_Matthew_V44	Taagken	pilleqaat,	‘Ataneq,	qavngaq	iyatiqnguluten,	meqsuguluten,	allaneghtaaluten,	amsikaghmelluten,	qinuyuguluten,	nalighmeng	anusimingllaghvigmelluten,	kayusiisimangisiken?’
B01_25_Matthew_V45	Taagken	Umiilgem	kiimsighlleqii,	‘Ipapestaaq	ungipaatamsi,	tawaten	pinghitelleghpesistun	nalighhiiniitnun	ukut	ukalighpigaat,	whanga	pinghitaqaghpesinga.’
B01_25_Matthew_V46	Enkaam	taakut	aglaghllequt	kenlengilngughmun	aghyuulleghmun,	iwernga	elqughutngalghiit	aglaghllequt	kenlengilngughmun	unguvalleghmun.”
B01_26_Matthew_V1	Jesus-em	taaqsamiki	apeghtuusaqneghmeng	tamaakut,	maligsaaghteni	pikii,
B01_26_Matthew_V2	“Liisimakaghsi	maalghuk	aghneghek	atughlukek	Neqenghaghqelleghqaa	Passover-em	pinaqnguuq.	Enkaam	Ighnegha	Yugem	tuunelleqaat	qaquuriisqelluku.”
B01_26_Matthew_V3	Tawani	aghneghmi,	chief	priest-etlu,	siivanlleghetlu	qerngughutkat	palace-ngani	High	Priest-em,	Caiaphas-em.
B01_26_Matthew_V4	Agghitkegkaat	Jesus	aksaqluklu	tuguluku,	tuqunnaluku.
B01_26_Matthew_V5	Iwernga	pikat,	“Neqenghaghqemmi	pinaanghitaghput,	luuraq	yuget	seghleliighqiighllagnayukata.”
B01_26_Matthew_V6	Jesus	Bethany-metaqngami	Simon-enkunitkaq	leprosy-lguyalghiimi.
B01_26_Matthew_V7	Aghnam	takukaa	Jesus,	tugumiiqlukek	alabaster-ek	aqimleghutak	imalgek	akitupiglleghhiimeng	tepengllaasimeng.	Neghumaluku	naasqwakun	kuuvegkakek	tepengllaasik.
B01_26_Matthew_V8	Iwernga	maligsaaghtet	esghaghluku	tawaten	pilghii,	ugumiyagutkaat	whaten	pimaghmeng,	“Sangan	sakusiiqakek?
B01_26_Matthew_V9	Akikegkaqsaqumikek	tepengllaasik	maningutkeghllaglukek	aklumalghiinun	tunqughnayaghaa!”
B01_26_Matthew_V10	Jesus-em	liisimakluki	sameng	pitangi	pikii,	“Sangan	seghlequughesteggu	aghnaq?	Piniipigtuq	whangamnun	tawaten	pillgha.
B01_26_Matthew_V11	Aklumalghiit	quunpeng	tamaansaghqaagut,	iwernga	whanga	quunpeng	elpesininnaanghitunga.
B01_26_Matthew_V12	Tepengllaghqelleghmikun	yugusiqa	yataaghqengngwaa	llivelleghqamnun.
B01_26_Matthew_V13	Ipa	ungipaatamsi,	nunataghhaani	tamaghhaani	nani	alngunak	una	Pinilghii	Ungipaq	ungipaqneghmegteggu,	aghnam	tawaten	pillgha	aapghaqelleqaat	yugnun	neqamikesqelluku.”
B01_26_Matthew_V14	Taagken	Judas	Iscariot	ilangat	qula	maalghuk	siipneqluku	maligsaaghtet,	chief	priest-enun	piluni,
B01_26_Matthew_V15	aaptekii,	“Sameng	tuunelleqestengnga	Jesus	elpesinun	tuunegkumkun?”	Enkaam	kestulluku	30	silver	manimeng	llivikegkaat.
B01_26_Matthew_V16	Taagken	kenlekluku	Judas	pilleghqangnaqegkaq	uveghpagunnaluku	Jesus.
B01_26_Matthew_V17	Sivulighmi	aghneghani	Neqenghaghqellghan	Yeast-alillghillnguum	Neqekrangllam,	maligsaaghtet	Jesus	takuluku	aaptekaat,	“Nani	yataaghqutesugsin	whangkunnun	Passover-em	Neqenghaghqellghaneng	neghesqelluten?”
B01_26_Matthew_V18	Jesus-em	kiimsiqii,	“Jerusalem-emun	pitek.	Yuuk	tamaantuq;	ungipaannakesi,	‘Apeghtughista	piiq,	Pilleghqaqa	kaannaquq.	Maligsaaghtekullghiini	neghnaqaghput	Passover-em	Neqenghaghqellgha	elpesini.’”
B01_26_Matthew_V19	Maligsaaghtet	Jesus-em	pisqellghatun	pikat,	Passover-em	Neqenghaghqellgha	yataaghqegkaat.
B01_26_Matthew_V20	Ighivgaghyagu	Jesus-enkut	qula	maalghuk	siipneqluku	maligsaaghtekullghiit	tipelngi	aqumuutkat	neghnaluteng.
B01_26_Matthew_V21	Neghuusimaluki,	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Ipa	piimsi,	nalighpesi	uveghpagunnaqngwaanga.”
B01_26_Matthew_V22	Maligsaaghtet	qivghughllagumaghmeng	tuungliqutaghluteng	aaptaataqaat,	“Ataneq,	whangangwaa?”
B01_26_Matthew_V23	Jesus-em	kiimsiqii,	“Uveghpagutiyaghqaq	taananguuq	neqni	neptekanga	sagneghmun	whangamnun	maligulluni.
B01_26_Matthew_V24	Ipapestaaq	Ighnegha	Yugem	tuquyaghqaaguq	Akuzitet	Igaqegkat	pinaqnillghistun.	Iwernga	seghleghwaaghunaqnguuq	taana	yuuk	uveghpagutilghii	Ighneghaneng	Yugem!	Itagnaghnayaghtuq	allgeghumangisaqumi!”
B01_26_Matthew_V25	Uveghpagutistem	Judas-em	aaptekaa,	“Apeghtughista,	whangangwaa?”	Jesus-em	pikaa,	“Taawa	elpeneng	apeghtuten.”
B01_26_Matthew_V26	Neghuutnguluteng	Jesus-em	tuguluku	neqekrangllaq	iyamsiqayugvikluku	Kiyaghneq,	aavgughluku	tunquqii	maligsaaghteni.	Pikii,	“Tuguluku	neghiteggu,	una	yugusiqaqa.”
B01_26_Matthew_V27	Taagken	tuguluku	qayuusiq	wine-meng	imalek	iyamsiqayugvikluku	Kiyaghneq	tuunegkaa	ellngitnun.	Pikii,	“Meghvikaataghteggu	qamagllusi.
B01_26_Matthew_V28	Taana	aakwaqa,	taaggun	Kiyaghneghem	akequsaa	apeghiighyaghqaaguq.	Tuqukuma	aakwa	kuuvellequq	uglapiglleghhiinun	yugnun	seghevutusiiluni	seghleghqellghitnun.
B01_26_Matthew_V29	Ungipaatamsi,	wine-meng	alla	meghnaanghitunga	kenlanga	aghneghmi	tawani,	wine-eghraghaghmeng	meghelgusighlleqamsi	Atama	Ataneghpagullghani.”
B01_26_Matthew_V30	Taagken	ilagaghluteng	aanluteng	Mount	Olives-mun	pikat.
B01_26_Matthew_V31	Taagken	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Unugmi	whani,	whanga	apalluqlunga	uniqaghaalleqaghpesinga,	qayughllak	Akuzitni	Igaqegkani	Kiyaghneq	pikaaguq,	‘Tuqulleqaqa	penniighniighta	enkaam	penniighet	mingiqellequt.’
B01_26_Matthew_V32	Iwernga	unguvaghtestekanganga	tuqulleghmeng	sivugpesini	aglaghllequnga	Galilee-mun.”
B01_26_Matthew_V33	Peter-em	pikaa	Jesus,	“Apalluqluten	elpek	qaywa	ilama	uniqaghaateghngaaten,	whanga	uninnaanghitngwaaghamken!”
B01_26_Matthew_V34	Jesus-em	pikaa,	“Ipa	ungipaatamken,	unukun	rooster-a	qalghightestegpenaan,	pingayuneng	ketwell	nallunqelleqaghpenga.”
B01_26_Matthew_V35	Peter-em	pikaa,	“Qaywa	tuqumalgusighyaghngaamken,	nallunqennaanghitamken.”	Maligsaaghtetlu	qamaglluteng	ungipaatkaat	tawaten.
B01_26_Matthew_V36	Taagken	Jesus-enkut	maligsaaghtekullghiit	kaatkat	tawavek	atilqelghiimeng	Gethsemane-meng.	Pikii,	“Aqumuutek	taaggun,	ingavek	yughaghyaghtuumalunga.”
B01_26_Matthew_V37	Tazingavek	kelqegkii,	Peter,	Zebedee-mllu	ighneghqek.	Taagken	qivghughllagemllu	seghleliighemllu	kaatekestaqaa,
B01_26_Matthew_V38	enkaam	pikii,	“Qaamnaka	qivghughllaguuq,	repall	tuquyaghqaaghllunga.	Tawanllusi	kelengalgusightengnga.”
B01_26_Matthew_V39	Tazingapighqaaghluni	nunamun	sikmuulluni	yughaqaq,	“Atamni,	piyaghqaakan,	meghenghillanga	whaken	qayuusimeng;	iwernga	nakaan	piyukellemtun,	elpek	piyukelleghpetun	pigu.”
B01_26_Matthew_V40	Taagken	Jesus-em	takuyaqminiki	pingayut	maligsaaghteni	qavaaftut.	Enkaam	Peter	pikaa,	“Kelengalgusighpagningitestengngaa	ataasiq	aflu?
B01_26_Matthew_V41	Kelengatek,	yughaghtek	nanghiiqullengenghitesqellusi.	Ipaapestaaq	taghneghak	piyaghqaaghngaaghmek,	iwerngaqun	yugusiq	kayaatuq.”
B01_26_Matthew_V42	Allameng	Jesus	tazingavek	aglaghluni	yughaqaq,	“Atamni,	meghyaghqaqngukumkun	una	qayuusiq	elpek	piyukelleghpetun	apeghiighli.”
B01_26_Matthew_V43	Takunqigsaqminiki	maligsaaghteni,	taawa	qavaatnguftut,	qayughllak	qavam	sakniqestekangi.
B01_26_Matthew_V44	Jesus-em	unillaataghluki,	tazingani	pingayiqii	yughalleni	taakut	ataasit	yughat	atuqluki.
B01_26_Matthew_V45	Taagken	maligsaaghteni	takuluki	pikii,	“Taawa	qavaawaqetsii,	meghnaaliiqetsii?	Taawa	aflu	kaatuq,	Ighnegha	Yugem	uveghpagusaghqaaghtuq	seghleghqestenun.
B01_26_Matthew_V46	Nekevitek,	igleghtelta.	Ii-i,	uka	uveghpagutisteka.”
B01_26_Matthew_V47	Jesus	paninang	akuzimaluku,	Judas	kaatkaq,	qula	maalghuk	siipneqluku	maligsaaghtet	ilangat.	Yulghutet	maligtekaat,	ilangi	savigpalighluteng,	ilangi	anagutalighluteng.	Chief	priest-etlu,	siivanlleghetlu	kayagtekiit	maligtesqelluku	Judas.
B01_26_Matthew_V48	Uveghpagutistem	Judas-em	kaatfagilgameng	ilani	salleghqamineng	ungipaatkaqegkangi,	“Yuuk	naaghyaghqaqa	ellnganguuq	piyukegkaghsi.	Tugunakesi.”
B01_26_Matthew_V49	Judas-em	takwaaghaghlluku	Jesus	pikaa,	“Seghleghhalek,	Apeghtughista!”	Taagken	naaqaa.
B01_26_Matthew_V50	Jesus-em	pikaa,	“Ilakumtaamni,	aga	saaqsin	pilleghqan	pigu!”	Taagken	takuluku	Jesus	akuqaghluku	nuqneghteqaat.
B01_26_Matthew_V51	Tawani	naliita	yuget	Jesus-melnguut	savigpani	nusugluku	kepqaghtekaa	sigutnga	High	Priest-em	qepghaghtelaaghan.
B01_26_Matthew_V52	Taagken	Jesus-em	pikaa,	“Savigpagen	kanaghtigu	qantanun,	qayughllak	qamaglluteng	savigpagmeng	atuqilghiit	savigpagkun	tuqusaghqaagut.
B01_26_Matthew_V53	Sumeghpenii-i	Ataka	kayutengllaghnaanghinniluku	piziguu?	Aaptekumkun	tawaninginaq	72,000-eneng	uglalghiit	yaqulelghuteghllaget	pilluwaghtet	kayaggnayaghii.
B01_26_Matthew_V54	Iwernga	tawaten	pinaanghitunga	qayughllak	Akuzitet	Igaqegkat	apeghiighyaghqaalghiit	igaqelleghmegestun.”
B01_26_Matthew_V55	Taagken	Jesus-em	yulghutet	pikii,	“Tuguyaghtughestengngaa	savigpagtuumaghpesi,	anagutaghtuumaghpesi,	nikimqun	wayaghniightestun	ayuqlunga?	Aghhutanga	tamaghhaan	aqumlunga	apeghtughiiqunga	Temple-mi	tugungigataghpesinga.
B01_26_Matthew_V56	Iwernga	qamaglluteng	tamaakut	tawaten	pinguut,	apeghiighnaluki	uuknaliqistet	igaqegkiit	Akuzitni	Igaqegkani.”	Taagken	qamaglluteng	maligsaaghtet	unilluku	qimaguutkat.
B01_26_Matthew_V57	Taagken	Jesus-em	tugustengita	aglaatkaat	High	Priest-em,	Caiaphas-em,	mangteghaanun.	Tawani	apeghtughikayuget	Liilightuusaneng,	siivanlleghetlu	qerngughutkat.
B01_26_Matthew_V58	Uyavaqaanlluni	Peter-em	maligtekaa	courtyard-nganun	High	Priest-em	mangteghaan.	Iteghluni	aqumelgusiqii	kelengakistet	esghapagnaluku	Jesus	sayaghqaatangat.
B01_26_Matthew_V59	Chief	priest-etlu,	qamagllutengllu	agghistet	iqlengiqutkestengnaqutkegkat	Jesus	tuqutestepigesnaghnaluku.
B01_26_Matthew_V60	Iwernga	naalkunneghmeng	aghtuqat.	Qaywa	uglalghiim	esnevaghaqluteng	aapghaataghyaghngaaghmegteggu	aapqiit	allakutkat.	Qenwatlu	yugek	esnevaghlutek
B01_26_Matthew_V61	pikak,	“Una	yuuk	whaten	pikaaguq,	‘Temple-a	naafqesaqlegwaaqa	enkaam	nekefleqaqa	pingayani	aghneghem.’”
B01_26_Matthew_V62	Taagken	High	Priest-em	nekevluni	aaptekaa	Jesus,	“Sameng	piyaghqiisiin	yugek	apellghegkenun?”
B01_26_Matthew_V63	Iwernga	Jesus	qaalkaamangilnguq.	Enkaam	High	Priest-em	aaplaataqaa,	“Aatghakun	Unguvalghiim	Kiyaghneghem	qelghamken	ungipaatikut	Christ-anguziin?	Ighneqaten	Kiyaghneghem?”
B01_26_Matthew_V64	Jesus-em	kiimsiqaa,	“Elpek	pilleghpetun	ayuquq.	Iwernga	ungipaatamsi,	uum	kingunganeng	esghaghlleqaghsi	Ighnegha	Yugem	aqumluni	aghenqigneghakun	Aghtughyaghqaanghilnguum,	esghaghlleqaghsillu	tagilghii	qilawaaghitgun	qilagam.”
B01_26_Matthew_V65	Taagken	tawaten	piyatni	High	Priest-em	aatkani	piiguumiita	pikaq,	“Una	yuuk	Kiyaghneghuniluni	pilghii!	Alla	liisimakistengisaghngaamta	pilta.	Legan	whaa	nagataghsi	Kiyaghneghunilghii!
B01_26_Matthew_V66	Naten	elpesi	nanqigtesteggu?”	Kiimsiqaat,	“Tuqusaghqaaghsimaaq.”
B01_26_Matthew_V67	Taagken	gginaakun	qesiqukaat,	tenglugpagaataqaatlu,	enkaam	qasaghtestengita
B01_26_Matthew_V68	pikaat,	“Elpek	Christ-a	uuknaliqutikut!	Kitum	tenglugtaten?”
B01_26_Matthew_V69	Tawaten	taakut	pimaluki	courtyard-mi	Peter	aqumgakaq.	Qepghaghtem	aghnaghaam	takuluku	pikaa,	“Elpeklu	Jesus-metkaaguten,	Galilee-ghmiimi.”
B01_26_Matthew_V70	Iwernga	Peter	mesighaqaq	sivungitni	tamaakut	pikaa,	“Nallukaqa	sameng	piiquten.”
B01_26_Matthew_V71	Aanyan	courtyard-em	iteghviganun	ilangan	qepghaghtem	aghnaghaam	esghaghluku	Peter,	tawanlenguut	pikii,	“Una	yuuk	Jesus-metkaaguq	Nazareth-eghmiimi.”
B01_26_Matthew_V72	Peter	mesighaghlaataqaq,	“Ipapestaaq	piimsi,	Kiyaghneghem	aatghakun	nallukngwaaghaqa	yuuk.”
B01_26_Matthew_V73	Mulunghituq,	yuget	nekevghataaghullghiit	tagiluteng,	Peter	pikaat,	“Ipa	ilakaaten	Jesus-em	malighsaghtengita	qayughllak	akuzillghen	Galilee-ghmiistun	ayuquq!”
B01_26_Matthew_V74	Taagken	Peter-em	pikii,	“Ipapestaaq	Kiyaghneghem	aatghakun	ungipaatamsi	nallukngwaaghaqa	yuuk!	Iqlengiqngukuma	Kiyaghneghem	aghyuughlinga!”	Tawaninginaq	rooster-a	qalghiqaq.
B01_26_Matthew_V75	Taagken	Peter-em	neqaatkaa	Jesus-em	pillgha,	“Rooster-a	qalghightestegpenaan	pingayuneng	nallunqelleqaghpenga.”	Enkaam	aanluni	qiyaaghwaghllakaq.
B01_27_Matthew_V1	Unaanguluku	qamaglluteng	chief	priest-etlu,	siivanlleghetlu	agghitkegkaat	tuqutesnaluku	Jesus.
B01_27_Matthew_V2	Enkaam	asighqelluku	aglaalluku	tuunegkaat	Pilate-mun,	Rome-em	governor-nganun.
B01_27_Matthew_V3	Uveghpagutistem	Judas-em,	liigiksaqminiki	agghistet	nanqigsimakangat	Jesus	tuqutesaghqaaluku,	qemall	avuteghqeghllakaq.	Enkaam	chief	priest-enunllu,	siivanlleghnunllu	veghusaghtuqii	30	silver-et	manit.
B01_27_Matthew_V4	Pikii,	“Seghleghqumaanga	uveghpagutellemkun	seghleghqumangilnguq	yuuk	tuqutesqelluku!”	Pikaat,	“Whangkunnun	sasiilleqa?	Elpek	tawaten	pilqan!”
B01_27_Matthew_V5	Enkaam	Judas-em	miluutkii	manit	Temple-em	ilunganun.	Taagken	aghulaqluni	qemitkaq.
B01_27_Matthew_V6	Chief	priest-et	saghnatkelluki	manit	pikat,	“Liilightuusamnni	ukut	manit	kanaghsaghqaanghitut	manilghutaanun	Temple-em	qayughllak	llivikuusaqegkaagut	tuqutusighqaaluteng	yugmun.”
B01_27_Matthew_V7	Enkaam	agghitkegkaat	mani	tukfighisiqnaluku	nunamun	atelqelghii,	“Potterʼs	Field”	lliveghvigkaaluku	nakuumiinun.
B01_27_Matthew_V8	Enkaam	whavemun	kenlanga	taam	nunam	ateliitkaa,	“Nunanga	Aawem”.
B01_27_Matthew_V9	Neghighluku	uuknaliqistem	Jeremiah-m	uuknaliqutkegkaqii	whaten,	“Ilangita	Israel-eghmiit	itagnaqegkaqiit	angtalangit	30	silver	manit,	qayughllak	sumeghmeggni	tawaten	akitutkaniluku	pikaat.	Taagken	taakut	manit	tukfighisiqegkiit	Potterʼs	Field-mun.	Tawaten	Atanghem	qelqaqaanga.”	Jeremiah-m	uuknaliqellgha	apeghiightestekaqaat	chief	priest-et	tukfighaqngamegteggu	Potterʼs	Field.
B01_27_Matthew_V11	Tawani	Jesus	nekevghalghii	sivungakun	Rome-em	governor-ngan.	Governor-em	aaptekaa,	“Jews-et	Umiilkataan?”	Jesus-em	kiimsiqaa,	“Elpek	tawatenniluku	piin.”
B01_27_Matthew_V12	Iwernga	chief	priest-etlu,	siivanlleghetlu	anaggunnighngaatni,	sameng	pimangitkaq.
B01_27_Matthew_V13	Taagken	Pilate-em	aaptekaa,	“Nagasikii	qamaglluki	anaggunnillghit?”
B01_27_Matthew_V14	Iwernga	Jesus-em	kiimsiimangilkanga	talwa	ataasimun	anaggunnilleghmun,	enkaam	governor-a	saghiighayugllakaq.
B01_27_Matthew_V15	Ayumiitanga	tamaghhaan	Passover-em	Neqenghaghqellghani	Rome-em	governor-ngan	itemutaqaa	ataasiq	anusimingllaghaq	yulghutet	nakmikegkaat.
B01_27_Matthew_V16	Tamaani	pilleghni	tamaanteftuq	apeghseghuq	anusimingllaghaq,	aatgha	Barabbas.
B01_27_Matthew_V17	Enkaam	yulghun	qerngughsan,	Pilate-em	aaptekii,	“Naliq	itemutesugesteggu	Barabbas	nalighmeng	Jesus,	atilqelghii	Christ-ameng?”
B01_27_Matthew_V18	Pilate-em	liisimakngukangi	Jews-et	igleghutistengita	aqinakluku	Jesus	tagitngukangat	ellminun.
B01_27_Matthew_V19	Pilate	aqumgamaluku	nanqigtivigmi,	nulighhan	ungipaatesaghtuqaa,	“Sanaqefqaan	taana	seghleghqellghilnguq	yuuk	qayughllak	qavanguqegkaqaqa	enkaam	aghnelqusiq	seghleliighusiqaqa.”
B01_27_Matthew_V20	Tawaten	pimaluku	chief	priest-etlu,	siivanlleghetlu	aaghqutaqegkiit	yulghutet	itemutesqelluku	Barabbas,	Jesus	tuqutesqelluku.
B01_27_Matthew_V21	Governor-em	aaplaataqii	yulghutet,	“Naliq	itemutesugesteggu	elpesinun?”	Kiimsiqaat,	“Barabbas!”
B01_27_Matthew_V22	Pilate-em	aaptekii,	“Sanaqsikun'ngam	Jesus	atilqelghii	Christ-ameng?”	Kiimsiqaat,	“Qaquuraghtestigu!”
B01_27_Matthew_V23	Pilate-em	aaptekii,	“Sangan?	Sangwaa	seghleq	pikaqagu?”	Iwernga	iglagtaaghalluteng	akilghuukat,	“Qaquuraghtestigu!”
B01_27_Matthew_V24	Pilate	liigikluni	alla	sapagningisami	esghaghluki	yulghutet	seghleliiqestalghiit,	tugulukek	aghmigusik	uughtuqaq	sivungitni	yulghutet.	Taagken	pikii,	“Whanga	avutngitunga	tuqutelleghqaanun,	elpesi	tawaten	pistengngwaaghsi!”
B01_27_Matthew_V25	Yulghutem	iingunaghhaghmeng	akitkaat,	“Whangkuta	kingunqullghiini	avutngullequkut	tuqutellghanun.”
B01_27_Matthew_V26	Taagken	Pilate-em	Barabbas	itemulluku,	enkaam	Jesus	kagsagmigtesluku	tuunegkaa	pilluwaghtenun	qaquuriisqelluku.
B01_27_Matthew_V27	Taagken	governor-em	pilluwaghtengita	aglaatkaat	Jesus	qerngughtaaghvigmeggnun	governor-em	mangteghaani.	Tawani	ilateng	qerngughlluki	kangllukaat.
B01_27_Matthew_V28	Aatkii	mataghqughluki,	kavirrakegtagneng	atkuyaaghegneng	aatesfikegkaat.
B01_27_Matthew_V29	Taagken	sikughllugtuqameng	avayameng	qaghpangllaghluku	naasqwakun	aatestekaat.	Aghenqigneghanllu	iiggakun	tugusluku	unaghsiighwaq,	segesqughquulluteng	sivungakun	legasiighwaatkegkaat.	Pikaat,	“Quulvaghamken	Umiilgat	Jews-et!”
B01_27_Matthew_V30	Taagken	qesiquluku,	tuguluku	unaghsiighwaq	naasqwakun	anagulqaat.
B01_27_Matthew_V31	Legasiighwaatkenneghmeng	apeghiighyamegteggu,	atkuyaaghqek	mataghllukek	ellngan	katam	aatkii	aatesquqiit.	Taagken	qaquuraghyaghtuqaat.
B01_27_Matthew_V32	Aanumaluteng	neghllagmeng	esghaghluku	yuuk,	Cyrene-eghmii,	aatgha	Simon,	qelqaat	uyamigesqelluku	Jesus-em	qaquuraa.
B01_27_Matthew_V33	Kaasameng	Golgotha-mun	(Golgotha	whaten	pisiiguq,	“Yugem	Naasqwan	Nenga”),
B01_27_Matthew_V34	pilluwaghtet	Jesus-mun	tuunegkaat	meghesqelluku	wine-a	sungaghnilngughmeng	akumegkaq.	Iwernga	naasiighluku	meghyunghitkaa.
B01_27_Matthew_V35	Pilluwaghtet	qaquuraghyamegteggu,	nengiitkiit	aatkii	ateghtiiraaghutkaqluki.
B01_27_Matthew_V36	Taagken	tawani	aqumuulluteng	kelengakegkaat.
B01_27_Matthew_V37	Naasqwan	quulngakun	nekegtekaat	qaquurallghanun	apalluq	igaqngalghii	whaten,	UNA	JESUS-NGUUQ,	UMIILGAT	JEWS-ET.
B01_27_Matthew_V38	Maalghuklu	wayaghniightek	qaquuraqagket,	aallgha	aghenqigneghakun,	ilanga	saghumigneghakun.
B01_27_Matthew_V39	Yuget	naghughlleghhiit,	legasiighwaatkegkaat	Jesus,	naasquteng	ufsugusimiita
B01_27_Matthew_V40	akilghuukaat,	“Elpek	pikaaguten	Temple-a	naafqennaqniluku	enkaam	pingayuni	aghneghni	nekefneqiggnaqniluku.	Kiyaghneghem	Ighneqngukangaten	elpeneng	katam	yuguli,	qaquurameng	ukigi!”
B01_27_Matthew_V41	Tawateghpigaq	Chief	priest-et,	maligulluteng	apeghtughikayugnun	Liilightuusaneng,	siivanlleghnunllu,	legasiighwaatkegkaat,
B01_27_Matthew_V42	“Yuguliiqii	ilangi,	naqam	ellmineng	katam	yugulipagningituq!	Umiilgukuni	Israel-eghmiinun	ukigli	qaquuramineng	enkaam	ugpeqnayaghaghput.
B01_27_Matthew_V43	Neghyukngwaa	Kiyaghneq,	piiquqlu	Kiyaghneghmun	Ighneqniluni.	Kiyaghneghem	piyukngukumigu	yuguliligu	maaten.”
B01_27_Matthew_V44	Qaquuralgutegkenkallu	wayaghniightek	legasiighwaatkegkaak.
B01_27_Matthew_V45	Taagken	qamaglluni	nuna	mamleghqwaakaq	aghneghem	qukaaneng	kenlanga	three-klaagmun.
B01_27_Matthew_V46	Tamani	nani	three-klaagmi	Jesus	akilghuughllakaq	whaten,	“Eli,	Eli,	lama	sabachthani?”	Whaten	pisiq,	“Kiyaghnemni,	Kiyaghnemni,	sangama	unisinga?”
B01_27_Matthew_V47	Ilangita	yuget	tawanlenguut	nekevghallghiit	nagalluku	pikat,	“Uum	yugem	Elijah	tuqlughaghaa.”
B01_27_Matthew_V48	Tawaninginaq	yuuk	ataasiq	aqfaquqaq	nepsagusimeng.	Taagken	nepluku	quwaalghiimun	wine-mun,	unaghsiighwaghqun	nekeglluku	nengugutkaa	Jesus-mun	melugriisqelluku.
B01_27_Matthew_V49	Iwernga	ilangita	pikaat,	“Wiintaku,	esghapakaalteggu	Elijah-m	yuguliyaghtughnayukagu!”
B01_27_Matthew_V50	Allameng	Jesus	araghllagluni	pegtekakek	taghneghagni.
B01_27_Matthew_V51	Tawani	pilleghmi	Temple-melnguq	safkaaghun,	pikegken	kanavek	piikaq	malghughqelluni.	Nuna	ufsugusan,	uyghaget	quupaghtaatkat,
B01_27_Matthew_V52	lliivghet	qelpeghaghtaatkat,	uglalghiitlu	Kiyaghneghem	yugi	tuqulaghaatkaayalghiit	unguvaghtuutkat,
B01_27_Matthew_V53	enkaam	lliveghmeggneng	aanleghaatkat.	Kingunganeng	Jesus-em	unguvaghtellghan	aglaghtuutkat	Agleghnalghiimun	Neghllagmun,	tawani	yulghutem	esghaqiit.
B01_27_Matthew_V54	Tawani	qaquuraghvigmi,	umiilwaaghenkut	pilluwaghtekullghhiit	kelengakegkangat	Jesus,	esghaghyamegteggu	nuna	qapragllalghii,	tamaanallu	sangwaa	piyan,	alingruughuteghllakat.	Pikat,	“Ipapestaaq	una	Ighnequmayaghtagu	Kiyaghneghem!”
B01_27_Matthew_V55	Tamaanteftut	aghnalghutet	esghapalghiit	uyavaneng.	Galilee-meng	maligtekaat	Jesus	kayusiinnaluki.
B01_27_Matthew_V56	Akulngitniteftut	Mary	Magdala-ghmii,	Mary-llu	naangak	James-enkuk	Joseph-enkuk,	Zebedee-mllu	ighneghegkenka	naangak.
B01_27_Matthew_V57	Whanikuyagu	aklungilnguq	yuuk	aatgha	Joseph,	Arimathea-ghmii,	maligsaaghtenga	Jesus-em	kaatkaq.
B01_27_Matthew_V58	Pilate-mun	piluni	Jesus-em	yugusii	tungsiqaa.	Enkaam	Pilate-em	qelghutkaa	yugusiq	Joseph-mun	tuunesqelluku.
B01_27_Matthew_V59	Enkaangam	tuguluku	yugusii,	nutaghaghllugkun	qiipaghakun	iimgutkaa.
B01_27_Matthew_V60	Taagken	llikaa	ellmi	lliveghraghaghmikun,	uyghagrugllagkun	laagtestekamikun	siklaqumeng.	Taagken	paaynganun	ullghitaghlluku	uyghagllak,	apeghiighyami	aghulaqegkaq.
B01_27_Matthew_V61	Tawanteftuk	Mary	Magdala-ghmiinkuk,	aallghallu	Mary	lliveghmun	ayuqlutek	aqumgalghiik.
B01_27_Matthew_V62	Unaamingani	kingunganeng	Yataghqefigem	Aghneghan,	chief	priest-etlu,	Pharisees-etlu	aleghqughyaghtuqaat	Pilate.
B01_27_Matthew_V63	Pikaat,	“Yuguniiq,	neqamikaghput	taana	puughtista	salin	unguvaluni	pikaaguq,	‘Pingayut	aghneghet	atughluki	unguvaghteslequnga.’
B01_27_Matthew_V64	Enkaangam	kayagutigu	lliivgha	kelengakngwaaghesqelluku	pingayunun	aghneghnun,	luuraq	maligsaaghtengita	yugusii	teglegluku	ungipaannayukatki	yuget	unguvaamaniluku.	Una	iqlengaq	seghleghataghaayaghqaaguq	sivulighmeng.”
B01_27_Matthew_V65	Pilate-em	pikii,	“Kelengakistelguusi,	elngaatall	kelengakestengngwaaghteggu	lliveq.”
B01_27_Matthew_V66	Enkaam	lliveghmun	aglaghluteng	maghqalluku	nalluniiqaat	uyghak	qelpeghhnayukatgu.	Taagken	qelghutkaat	pilluwaghtenun	kelengakesqelluku.
B01_28_Matthew_V1	Sabbath-em	kingunganeng,	aghtaghaghaqaallu	sivulighmi	aghneghani	santillghem,	Mary	Magdala-ghmii,	ilangallu	Mary-m,	lliveq	esghaghyaghtuqaak.
B01_28_Matthew_V2	Tawani	pilleghmi	nuna	qapragllakaq	qayughllak	Atanghem	yaqulga	qilagmeng	ukikaq.	Lliivghem	paayngan	uyghaga	ullghitaghtaghluku	aqumegkaa.
B01_28_Matthew_V3	Esghaqaaluni	nighugpaguullghiistun	nighugtutkaghmi,	aatkiillu	qatelghiit	anigustun.
