B01_28_Matthew_V4	Kelengakistet	yaqulegmeng	alingruuqat	repall	ungeleglluteng,	tuqukastunllu	lliiqat.
B01_28_Matthew_V5	Iwernga	aghnak	yaqulgem	pikakek,	“Alingegpenatek.	Liisimakamtek	Jesus	ivaghaqaghtek,	qaquuraqaayalghii.
B01_28_Matthew_V6	Whaanneghituq;	unguvaamaaq	pinaqnilleghmitun.	Tagitek,	esghaghyaghtughtegnegu	lliviksaqanga.
B01_28_Matthew_V7	Enkaam	ungipaatqaghsaghtughtegneki	maligsaaghtengi	unguvaamaniluku	tuqulleghmeng,	agallu	sivullgaaghumaaq	Galilee-mun.	Taagani	esghaghlleqaghsi!	Taawa	ungipaatamtek.”
B01_28_Matthew_V8	Enkaangam	tawaninginaq	lliveghmeng	aghulaqegkak,	alingumaagmeklu	quyaghllagumaagmeklu,	ketanqusnaq	ungipaasaghtuqiik	maligsaaghtengi.
B01_28_Matthew_V9	Jesus-em	aliighaghfiklukek	pikakek,	“Nekeggmelleq	elpetegnilli.”	Enkaam	taakuk	aghnak	takuluku,	itegii	nuqneqluki	maniguqaak.
B01_28_Matthew_V10	Taagken	Jesus-em	pikakek,	“Alingegpenatek.	Ungipaasaghtughtegneki	malighsaaghtenka	anglegusiitkanka,	Galilee-mun'nguq	aglaghlit	taaganinguq	esghaghlleqaatnga.”
B01_28_Matthew_V11	Aghnak	igleghsimalukek,	lliveghmelnguut	ilangi	kelengakistet	Jerusalem-emun	iteghluteng,	chief	priest-enun	aapqaat	qamaglluku	tamaana	apeghiiqaq.
B01_28_Matthew_V12	Enkaam	chief	priest-etlu,	siivanlleghetlu	qerngughlluteng	agghitkat.	Taagken	maniliteghllagluki	pilluwaghtet,
B01_28_Matthew_V13	pikiit,	“Ungipaannakesi	yuget,	‘Unugmi	qavaasimaluta	maligsaaghtengita	tagiluteng	teglegumaat	yugusii.’
B01_28_Matthew_V14	Governor-em	nagaquumakagu	whangkuta	aleghqughlleqaghput	enkaam	seghleliillengnaanghitusi.”
B01_28_Matthew_V15	Kelengakistet	mani	tuguluku	pisqelleghmegestun	pikat.	Enkaam	whavemun	kenlanga	Jews-et	paninang	aapghaqaat	Jesus-em	yugusii	teglekaqniluku	maligsaaghtenganun.
B01_28_Matthew_V16	Tawaten	pimaluki,	taakut	qula	ataasiq	siipneqluku	maligsaaghtet	aglaqat	Galilee-mun,	naayghamun	Jesus-em	pisqellghatun	tawaten.
B01_28_Matthew_V17	Esghaghyamegteggu	Jesus	maniguqaat,	iwernga	ilangita	aygughikegkaat	ellngangutanga.
B01_28_Matthew_V18	Jesus-em	takuluki	pikii,	“Qamaglluni	aghtughyaghqaanghilleq	qilagmillu,	nunamillu	whangamnun	tagivaqaaguq.
B01_28_Matthew_V19	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	aghulaqlusi	qamaglluki	yuget	maligsaaghtengllaghteki	whangamnun,	paaptaayelaghteki	Aatghakun	Atam,	Ighneghem,	Agleghnalghiimllu	Taghnegham.
B01_28_Matthew_V20	Apeghtuusaqiteki	qaatkesqelluki	qamaglluki	qelghutkanka	elpesinun.	Elpesinitepestaaghllequnga	quunpeng	kenlanga	kenletghuutellghanun	nunam.”
B02_01_Mark_V1	Pinilghiit	Ungipat	Jesus	Christ-ameng	ayuqelghiit,	Ighneghaneng	Kiyaghneghem	piinliqaagut	whaten:
B02_01_Mark_V2	Uuknaliqistem	Isaiah-m	igaqegkaqaa	Kiyaghneghem	whaten	pillgha,	“Ungipaghteka	kayagtekestaghnaqaqa	sivugpeni	yataaghqesqelluku	tuumkaghqan.
B02_01_Mark_V3	Kilgaani	ma	akilghuugaquq	whaten,	‘Atanghem	tuumnga	yataaghqiteggu,	taklaghteggullu!’”
B02_01_Mark_V4	Taana	ungipaghta	John-nguuq	Paaptaayesta.	Kilgaani	paaptaayelaghaquqlu	ungipaghaquqlu	whaten,	“Avuteghqellusi,	seghleghqennanighlusi	paaptaayetek,	enkaam	Kiyaghneghem	seghevulleqiisi.”
B02_01_Mark_V5	Judea-ghmiitlu	Jerusalem-eghmiitlu	nagasaghtuutkaat	John.	Enkaam	seghleghqelleteng	apeghranghatki	paaptaayaaqegkangi	kiiwegni	Jordan-meng	aatqelghiigni.
B02_01_Mark_V6	John-em	aatkii	camel-em	melqwaneng	ulimaaghet,	meqameng	tafsiluni,	neghaqelghii	locust-mengllu	honey-mengllu.
B02_01_Mark_V7	Ungipaqikaq	whaten,	“Kingumneng	yuuk	tagiyaghqaaguq	aghtughyaghqaanghitaghalghii	whangamneng.	Whanga	sasiinghitunga	repall	itemtepagningitanka	singii.
B02_01_Mark_V8	Meghmeng	paaptaayaaqamsi,	iwernga	ellngan	paaptaayelleqiisi	Agleghnalghiigneng	Taghneghagneng.”
B02_01_Mark_V9	John	tawaten	aneghsimaluku	Jesus	kaatkaq	Nazareth-meng,	Galilee-melngughmeng,	enkaam	John-em	paaptaayekaa	Jordan-egni.
B02_01_Mark_V10	Paaptaayeneghmeng	taaqsatni	Jesus-em	tawaninginaq	esghaqii	qilaget	qelpelghiit,	Agleghnalghiiklu	Taghneghak	ukilghiik	ellminun	dove-etun	ayuqlutek.
B02_01_Mark_V11	Memllu	qilagmeng	pikaa,	“Ighneqamken,	piniqegkamni.	Efquqepigtamken.”
B02_01_Mark_V12	Tawaninginaq	Agleghnalghiim	Taghnegham	Jesus	aghulaqestekaa	kilgaanun.
B02_01_Mark_V13	Ellnginaghhaakaq	iwerngaqun	nuyaalghiit	teghikusat	tamaantekat.	Tamaansimaluku	Tughneghaam	nanghiiqukaa	ketwhell	40	aghneq,	iwernga	yaqulget	aflengakegkaat.
B02_01_Mark_V14	Tagtalmi	taakwani	kingunganeng	John-em	anusimingllallghan,	Jesus	Galilee-lluni	ungipaqikaq	Pinilghiineng	Ungipaneng	Kiyaghneghtaneng.
B02_01_Mark_V15	Pikaq,	“Pilleghqaq	whaa	kaasimaaq	enkaam	Ataneghpagullgha	Kiyaghneghem	whaa	whaantuq!	Avuteghqellusi,	seghleghqennanighlusi	ugpeqiteki	Pinilghiit	Ungipat!”
B02_01_Mark_V16	Jesus	igleghutkelluku	Naayvam	Galilee-m	esnengakun	esghaqakek	maalghuk	iqalliniightek	siiftilghiik	negaghpagmeng.	Simon-enkunguftuk	Andrew-nkuk	anglegutkullghiik.
B02_01_Mark_V17	Jesus-em	pikakek,	“Maligtegnenga,	apeghtughnaqamtek	yugmeng	naapsagutesqellutek.”
B02_01_Mark_V18	Tawaninginaq	negaghpatek	unilluki	maligtekaak.
B02_01_Mark_V19	Tazingapighqaaghluni	esghaghlaataqakek	James-enkuk	John-enkuk	anglegutkullghiik,	ighneghqek	Zebedee-m.	Negaghpagmegneng	ilaaghtulghiik	angyamegni.
B02_01_Mark_V20	Jesus-em	esghaqiinaghlukek	pikakek,	“Maligtegnenga!”	Enkaam	angyakun	unilluku	atayek	Zebedee,	taakutlu	qepghaghtenguluki	tugukateng,	maligtekaak	Jesus.
B02_01_Mark_V21	Jesus-enkut	maligsaaghtekullghiit	Capernaum-emun	kaatkat.	Sabbath-ngughsagu,	Jesus	synagogue-elluni	apeghtughikaq.
B02_01_Mark_V22	Nagallghiit	saghiighayagutkaat	apeghtughillgha,	qayughllak	apeghtughikaq	Kiyaghneghem	pilleghqalitellghakun,	apeghtughistengistun	Liilightuusat	pigpenani.
B02_01_Mark_V23	Taagken	yuuk	ilumikun	tughneghalek	iteghluni	synagogue-mun	akilghuukaq,
B02_01_Mark_V24	“Jesus,	Nazareth-eghmii,	sangamta	qinuyugsikut?	Naafqesaghtuuzikuut?	Kinanguten	liisimakaqa,	Yugulighistenguuten	Kiyaghneghem	akequsaqegkaa	kayaglleqniluku.”
B02_01_Mark_V25	Jesus-em	aghyuuqaa	tughneghaq,	“Nepngunang,	aani	yugmeng.”
B02_01_Mark_V26	Tughneghaam	yuuk	sayugpagtaghtesluku,	araghllagumaghmi	aanegkaq.
B02_01_Mark_V27	Yuget	saghiighayugluteng	ellmeggneng	aapqughaaghutkat,	“Una	sangaawa?	Una	apeghtuusaghraghaaguq!	Kiyaghneghem	aghtughyaghqaanghillghakun	uum	yugem	qelghii	tughneghaat	aanesqelluki,	legan	qaatkaat.”
B02_01_Mark_V28	Enkaam	Galilee-lqaaghaghmi	yuget	ungipaqnginaamaan	Jesus	pikaat.
B02_01_Mark_V29	Taagken	Jesus	aanaghesnaghluni	synagogue-meng,	Simon-enkuk	Andrew-nkuk	mangteghiitnun	pikaq,	James-enkuklu	John-enkuk	maligtekaak.
B02_01_Mark_V30	Simon-em	sakinga	ingaghmeteftuq,	puqleghaluni.	Legan	Jesus	kaatuq	ungipaatkaat	aghnaq	qinuyuguniluku.
B02_01_Mark_V31	Iteghluni	aghnaq	iiggakun	tuguluku	nekevestekaa	enkaam	puqleghangiilluni,	kepsiiqunginaamiita	pikii.
B02_01_Mark_V32	Sabbath-em	ighivgaani	siqineq	tevighyan	Jesus-mun	tagiquutkiit	qinuyulghiit,	tamaakutlu	tughneghalget	ilumegteggun.
B02_01_Mark_V33	Qamagtengngwaaghluteng	Capernaum-eghmiit	mangtegham	manughaani	qerngughutkat.
B02_01_Mark_V34	Enkaam	Jesus-em	uglalghiit	naallghuquqii	allaaghhiinaghneng	aqnighneghitneng,	aanesquqiillu	tughneghaat	yulghutet	ilungitneng.	Tughneghaat	sameng	pisimangilkangi,	qayughllak	kinangutanga	liisimakegkangat.
B02_01_Mark_V35	Salin	aghsugniiteghllagluku,	Jesus	makelluni	aanegkaq	yughaghnaluni	kilgaani.
B02_01_Mark_V36	Simon-enkut	ilakulghiit	ivaghyaghtuqaat,
B02_01_Mark_V37	naalkesamegteggu	pikaat,	“Yuget	ivanghiighutaqaaten.”
B02_01_Mark_V38	Yeghlegi	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Ilangitnun	nunat	pinaqukut.	Ellngitnillu	ungipaqiyaghqaagunga,	qayughllak	tamaaken	apalluqluku	taginguunga.”
B02_01_Mark_V39	Enkaam	Galilee-lqaaghaghmi	igleghutkelluku	ungipaqikaq	synagogue-nni,	aanesquqiillu	tughneghaat	yuget	ilungitneng.
B02_01_Mark_V40	Yuuk	leprosy-lek	tagiluni	Jesus-mun	manungakun	segesqughlluni	nangllegsipiglluni	pikaa,	“Piyukelqegkuvgu	naallghutaghtinga	ukmangiightesqellunga.”
B02_01_Mark_V41	Jesus-em	nangllegyagulluku	nengugluku	saaftutkelluku	pikaa,	“Piyukelqaqa,	naallghuten!”
B02_01_Mark_V42	Tawaninginaq	yuuk	naallghulluni	ukmangiightekaq.
B02_01_Mark_V43	Taagken	Jesus-em	ineghtengngwaaqaa,	“Nagataghten,	wataghllak	kinkut	alngunak	ungipaategpenaki	naallghunniluten	whangamnun.	Itupill	priest-mun	yuvghiighsighyaghtaa.	Enkaam	aghqerraaghhaaten	Moses-em	Liilightuusiita	pisqellghistun	ipapighqesqelluku	yugnun	naallghutellghen.”	Taagken	tawaninginaq	aghulaqestekaa.
B02_01_Mark_V45	Iwernga	yugem	igleghutkelluku	nani	alngunak	aapghumanginaqaa	Jesus-mun	naalghusimaniluni.	Taagken	kenlanga	Jesus	alngunak	nenun	pinaniqaq,	qayughllak	yulghuteghllaget	takwaaqegkangat,	enkaam	paaghqillghani	kiyaghtekaq.	Iwernga	naken	alngunak	yulghutet	paninang	takwaaqegkangat.
B02_02_Mark_V1	Mulugpenani	Jesus	uteghniqaq	Capernaum-emun,	enkaam	ungipaqegkaat	nayuqaqegkemininniluku	mangteghami.
B02_02_Mark_V2	Yuuk	tagilaghaasalghiimi	ellnganun	kangsuutkat	repall	manughamun	qakmavek.	Jesus	ungipaqimaluku	Kiyaghneghem	akuzitanganeng,
B02_02_Mark_V3	estamat	yuget	kevegtughluku	uniiqaq	yuuk	tagitkaat	ellnganun.
B02_02_Mark_V4	Kaatulluku	itghunneghmeng	aghtuqaat,	qayughllak	yuuk	kangsuuteghllagulghii.	Enkaam	mangtegham	qaayngan	tile-ngi	ikughluki	reghighulluku,	yuuk	allighaakun	ukigtekaat	Jesus-em	nallangakun.
B02_02_Mark_V5	Jesus-em	liisimakegkangi	ugpeqilleghtulngit,	enkaam	uniiqaq	yuuk	pikaa,	“Ighnemni,	seghleghqelleghten	seghevutellengut.”
B02_02_Mark_V6	Tawani	apeghtughikayuget	Liilightuusaneng	aqumgallghiit	sumeghtaghaqat,
B02_02_Mark_V7	“Sangami	yuuk	una	tawaten	akuzii?	Akuzillgha	seghleghuuq,	qayughllak	Kiyaghneghunilghii!	Kiyaghneghhiinaaguq	seghleghqelleghneng	seghevutiyaghqaq!”
B02_02_Mark_V8	Tawaninginaq	Jesus-em	sumeghtaghallghit	liisimakegkii	enkaam	pikii,	“Sangan	tawaten	sumeghtaghaghetsi?
B02_02_Mark_V9	Nalikek	piyaqniitaghaghlleqak	uniiqaq	yuuk	piyaqumkun,	‘Seghleghqelleghten	seghevutellengut’	nalighmeng,	‘Makelluten,	allighan	tuguluku	piyugi?’
B02_02_Mark_V10	Iwernga	liisimakesugaqa	Ighnegha	Yugem	seghevutiyaqleguuq	seghleghqelleghneng	nunami	whani.”	Enkaam	uniiqaq	yuuk	pikaa,
B02_02_Mark_V11	“Ungipaatamken,	maketen,	allighan	tuguluku,	elpesinun	aglaa!”
B02_02_Mark_V12	Yuget	esghapakaat	yuuk	tawaninginaq	nekevluni,	allighani	tuguluku	aanelghii.	Enkaam	qamagtengngwaaghluteng	tawanlenguut	saghiighayukat,	usuqegkaatlu	Kiyaghneq,	“Whatelngughmeng	esghaasigasaghtukut!”
B02_02_Mark_V13	Taagken	Jesus,	esnenganun	Naayvam	Galilee-m	pinqigtekaq.	Yulghuteghllaget	takulaghaasatni	apeghtuqii.
B02_02_Mark_V14	Igleghutkelluku	esghaqaa	tax-neng	qerngughtista,	aatgha	Levi,	ighnegha	Alphaeus-em.	Aqumgaftuq	qepghaghvigmini.	Jesus-em	pikaa,	“Maligtinga.”	Levi-em	nekevluni	maligtekaa.
B02_02_Mark_V15	Tawani	ighivgaghmi,	Jesus-enkut	maligsaaghtekullghiit	Levi-enkunun	neghyaghtuqat.	Neghelgusiqiit	tax-neng	qerngughtistelghutetlu	tamaakutlu	qaatkusigalnguut	Jews-et	Liilightuusiitnun.	(Tawatelnguutlu	yuget	maligsaaghukangat	Jesus.)
B02_02_Mark_V16	Ilangi	apeghtughistengit	Liilightuusat	Pharisees-ngulghiit,	esghaghyamegteggu	Jesus	neghelgusighilghii,	aaptekiit	maligsaaghtengi,	“Sangami	Jesus	neghaqa	tax-em	qerngughtistengitnillu	seghleghqestenillu?”
B02_02_Mark_V17	Jesus-em	nagalluki	pikii,	“Aghallegtaq	qinuyulghiinun	pinguuq,	yugunqegtanun	pingunghituq.	Tawateghpigaq	ungipaasaghtuuganka	seghleghqestet	avuteghqesqelluki,	nakaan	tamaakut	seghleghqiganniluteng	pilghiit.”
B02_02_Mark_V18	Ataasimi	aghneghmi,	John-em	Paaptaayestem	maligsaaghtengillu	Pharisees-etlu	fast-engulghiit.	Ilangita	yuget	takuluku	Jesus	aaptekaat,	“Sangameng	John-em	Paaptaayestem	maligsaaghtengillu	Pharisees-etlu	maligsaaghtengit	fast-aaqat,	naqam	elpek	maligsaaghteten	pigpenateng?”
B02_02_Mark_V19	Jesus-em	kiimsiqii,	“Nulightughnaqelghiim	aqelqii	fast-elleqaat	neqenghaghqellghani?	Yeghlegillu!	Nulightughnaqelghii	paninang	tawanlluku	tawaten	pinaanghitut.
B02_02_Mark_V20	Nulightughnaqelghiistun	ayuqunga,	maligsaaghtenka	nulightughnaqelghiim	aqelqiistun	ayuqut.	Aghulaqestekanganga	elngaatall	tawani	aghneghmi	maligsaaghtenka	fast-ellequt.
B02_02_Mark_V21	“Kitum	alngunak	nutaghaq	qiipaghaq	qellughsimangilnguq	ilaaghusiqnaanghitaa	qaaslilugegnun.	Ilaaghusiqegkumigu	piigutaaghaghllequq,	enkaam	piilleq	sullevataghllequq.
B02_02_Mark_V22	Enkaamllu	kitum	alngunak	awataghpaluk	imighnaanghitaa	wine-eghraghaghmeng.	Imiqumigu	awataghpaluk	quupaghllequq	enkaam	wine-a	sakusiiqellequq,	awataghpaluklu	naavellequq.	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	wine-eghraghaq	awataghpagraghaghmun	kuuvyaghqaaguq!”
B02_02_Mark_V23	Ataasimi	Sabbath-mi,	Jesus	igleghtekaq	wheat-et	piitfigitgun.	Maligsaaghtengita	igleghalgusiitkelluku	wheat-et	piitutangitneng	ikutaghtaqukat	neghnaluteng.
B02_02_Mark_V24	Taagken	Pharisees-et	aaptekaat	Jesus,	“Esghaqaghqiqun!	Sangameng	maligsaaghteten	saghnaat	wheat-et	piitutangitneng?	Tawaten	pilleghmegteggun	qepghaghtut	Sabbath-mi,	enkaam	qaatkunneghitnguut	Liilightuusamnnun.”
B02_02_Mark_V25	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Atightiigasteggu	David-em	pillgha	qavngarugllak?	Yukullghiit	iyatiqaqngameng,
B02_02_Mark_V26	David	iteghluni	Kiyaghneghem	Mangteghaanun	neghegkaaguq	neqekrangllameng	Kiyaghneghmun	tuunegkameng.	Tawaten	pikaaguq	Abiathar,	High	Priest-nguluku.	Liilightuusamta	pillghani	priest-nginaghhaat	neghyaghqaayaghtut	tamaaken	neqekrangllameng,	iwernga	David	neghluni	yunillu	tuunegkaqii.”
B02_02_Mark_V27	Taagken	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Sabbath-a	nakmikegkaaguq	meghnaliviguluni	yugem	pinighqelleghqaanun.	Sabbath-a	nakmikegkaanghituq	yugmun	ikfiqliighutkesqelluku.
B02_02_Mark_V28	Enkaangam	whanga,	Ighneghani	Yugem,	Atanghuunga	talwa	Sabbath-mun.”
B02_03_Mark_V1	Taagken	Jesus	aglanqigtekaq	synagogue-mun,	tawanteftuq	yuuk	inglungi	iiggan	uniiqat.
B02_03_Mark_V2	Ilangita	yuget	tawanlenguut	riirngingwaaqaat	Jesus-em	naallghunnayukagu	Sabbath-mi.	Naallghuskagu	whaten	pinaluku,	“Anaggututen!”
B02_03_Mark_V3	Uniiqameng	iiggelek	yuuk	Jesus-em	pikaa,	“Tagi	whavek.”
B02_03_Mark_V4	Taagken	yuget	aaptekii,	“Liilightuusamta	sasqinkut	Sabbath-mi?	Pinitun	pisqinkuut,	nalighmeng	seghletun?	Yugulighisqinkuut,	nalighmeng	tuqutisqinkuut?”	Iwernga	yuget	qallegnanighwaaghutkat.
B02_03_Mark_V5	Jesus-em	esghapagngaaghmiki	ugumiyagutkii,	naqam	iilqutkumiita	pineghllugullghitnengllu	waakigatngitnengllu.	Taagken	Jesus-em	qiivluku	yuuk	pikaa,	“Iiggeten	nengugutiki.”	Legan	nengugutii	aga	naallghutkat.
B02_03_Mark_V6	Enkaam	Pharisees-et	aanaghesnaghluteng	synagogue-meng,	Herod-em	ilapgastengitnun	aglaghluteng	agghitkegkaat	naten	tuqutelleghqameng	Jesus.
B02_03_Mark_V7	Jesus-enkut	maligsaaghtekullghiit	Naayvamun	Galilee-mun	aglaqat.	Yulghuteghllaget	maligtekiit,	qayughllak	nagaquqaqegkangit	Jesus-em	allaaghllugwhaghtillghi.	Tamaana	yulghun	Galilee-meng,	Judea-meng,	Jerusalem-emeng,	Idumea-meng,	Jordan-em	Kiiwem	inglunganilngughneng	nunaneng,	Tyre-meng,	Sidon-meng	pingulghiit.
B02_03_Mark_V9	Yuuk	uglaghighllagyan	Jesus	maligsaaghteminun	angyameng	yataaghqutesqegkaq	luuraq	ighlleghnayukangatni	meghmun.
B02_03_Mark_V10	Yulghun	naallghuquqaqutanganeng	qamaglluteng	qinuyuget	ellnganun	kaannaqeghllakat	saaftepigesnaghnaluku.
B02_03_Mark_V11	Tamaakutlu	tughneghaat	yuget	ilungitnilnguut	esghaneghmegteggu	Jesus,	sivungakun	ullghaghlluteng	akilghuugaqelghiit,	“Kiyaghneghem	Ighneqaaten!”
B02_03_Mark_V12	Iwernga	Jesus-em	ineghtengngwaaqii	tughneghaat	kinangutni	apefqaan	pisqelluku.
B02_03_Mark_V13	Taagken	Jesus	qemimun	mayughluni	yuget	piyukegkani	tagsighteqii.	Tagilaghaasata
B02_03_Mark_V14	nakmikegkii	qula	maalghuk	siipneqluku	yuget	apostle-nguluki.	Taagken	pikii,	“Whangamnitesqellusi	nakmikamsi,	kayaglleqamsillu	ungipaghyaghtiisqellusi.
B02_03_Mark_V15	Aghtughyaghqaanghillelgullequsillu	tughneghaat	aanestesqelluki	yugneng.”
B02_03_Mark_V16	Ukut	nakmikegkaqii,	Simon,	(Jesus-em	ateghiqaa	Peter-meng);
B02_03_Mark_V17	James-enkuk	John-enkuk,	ighneghqek	Zebedee-m,	(Jesus-em	atiqakek	Boanerges-meng,	whaten	pisimeng,	“Ighneghqek	Kallugem”);
B02_03_Mark_V18	Andrew-nkut,	Philip-enkut,	Bartholomew-nkut,	Matthew-nkut,	Thomas-enkut,	James-llu	ighnegha	Alphaeus-em,	Thaddaeus-enkut,	Simon-llu	Zealot-a,
B02_03_Mark_V19	Judas	Iscariot-lu	uveghpagutiyaghqaq	Jesus-meng.
B02_03_Mark_V20	Taagken	Jesus	tukughminun	aglaqaq.	Yulghuteghllaget	aglaghtuullaataqat	ellngitnun,	repall	Jesus-enkut	maligsaaghtekullghiit	neghepagningiitkat.
B02_03_Mark_V21	Nengllugutangan	nagaqughluku	tawaten	aneghtellgha	aqfakaat,	qayughllak	yuget	pikangat	nallungughhniluku.
B02_03_Mark_V22	Ilangi	apeghtughikayuget	Liilightuusaneng	Jerusalem-emeng	tagikat	whaten	pimaaqelghiit,	“Beelzebul	Jesus-em	ilunganituq!	Enkaam	aanesqughaqii	tughneghaat	yugneng	aghtughyaghqaanghillghakun	Beelzebul-em,	umiilwaaghitgun	tughneghaat.”
B02_03_Mark_V23	Enkaam	Jesus-em	tagsighluki	yuget	ungipaghaatkii,	pikii,	“Tughneghaq	ellmineng	aanesleqaa?
B02_03_Mark_V24	Ataneghpagulleq	aafquuskumi,	taana	ataneghpagulleq	qerngaghmennaanghituq.
B02_03_Mark_V25	Nengllugutet	aafquuskumeng,	taakut	nengllugutet	qerngaghmennaanghitut.
B02_03_Mark_V26	Tawateghpigaq	Tughneghaankut	aafquulluteng	pilluguskumeng,	Tughneghaq	nekevghapagningiilluni	kenlekaghqaminun	kaallequq.
B02_03_Mark_V27	“Kina	alngunak	iteghnaanghituq	iknaqelghiim	yugem	mangteghaanun	wayaghteghnaluki	saghyangi.	Sivukluku	iknaqelghii	yuuk	asighqaghlluku,	taagken	wayaghteghlleqii	saghyangi.
B02_03_Mark_V28	“Ipa	ungipaatamsi,	yuget	seghevutellengyaghqaagut	seghleghqellghitneng,	seghletunllu	akuzitkellghitneng	Kiyaghneq.
B02_03_Mark_V29	Iwernga	kitum	alngunak	seghletun	akuzitkegkumikek	Agleghnalghiik	Taghneghak	seghevutellengnaanghituq,	qayughllak	seghleghqengnguuq	Kiyaghneghem	seghevusaghqaqenghilkanganeng.	Taana	seghleghqelleq	kenglengilnguuguq.”
B02_03_Mark_V30	Jesus	tawaten	akuzikaq	qayughllak	ilangita	pikaqegkangat,	“Tughneghalguuq	ilumikun.”
B02_03_Mark_V31	Taagken	Jesus-em	naangallu	anglegutangillu	kaatkat.	Manughamelluteng	aanesqegkaat	esghaghyugniluku.
B02_03_Mark_V32	Yulghutet	aqumuutngalghiit	Jesus-em	uvitangani	ungipaatkaat,	“Qakma	naagpeklu	anglegutegpeklu	esghaghyugaqaaten.”
B02_03_Mark_V33	Jesus-em	aaptekii,	“Kinangaawa	naaka?	Kinkungaawat	anglegutenka?”
B02_03_Mark_V34	Yugsughaluni	aqumgalghiit	pikii,	“Elpesi	naakamsillu,	anglegutkamsillu!
B02_03_Mark_V35	Kitum	alngunak	atuqegkumigu	Kiyaghneghem	piyukellgha,	anglegutkaqallu	naakaqallu.”
B02_04_Mark_V1	Taakwaningani	Jesus	apeghtughilaataqaq	Naayvam	Galilee-m	esnengani.	Elngaatall	uglapiglleghhii	yuuk	tagilaghaateghllakaq	ellnganun,	repall	angyamun	uuglluni	aqumegkaq,	llaaghanwha	yulghutet	naayvam	esnenganitkat.
B02_04_Mark_V2	Ungipaghaatetgun	allaaghiinaghmeng	apeghtuqii.	Apeghtughitkelluku	pikii,
B02_04_Mark_V3	“Nagatek!	Piitesighaghta	aglaghluni	piitesiighaghvigminun
B02_04_Mark_V4	ifkaghquqaq	piitutneng.	Ilangi	piitutet	tekitkat	tumetgun,	enkaam	qawaaget	tagiluteng	neghuqiit.
B02_04_Mark_V5	Ilangi	piitutet	tekitkat	uyghagtuqakun	sunapagilngughqun.	Tawaninginaq	piitkat,	qayughllak	sunanga	ugmestaaghhaq.
B02_04_Mark_V6	Enkaam	siqineq	piisalghiimi	maatneghan	paneghtekii	piinneghhat,	akungellghitutmeggneng	palirakegtekat.
B02_04_Mark_V7	Ilangi	piitutet	tekitkat	sikughllugtuqakun,	sikughlluget	piisalghiimeng	piitfigiqiit	grain-et.
B02_04_Mark_V8	Naqamalla	tamaakut	tekitkat	sunakegtakun	piitestighllakat	grain-meng,	ilangi	30,	ilangi	60,	enkaam	ilangi	100.”
B02_04_Mark_V9	Jesus-em	taaqniqii	whaten,	“Sigutelgukufsi	nagatusighqameng,	nagatek!”
B02_04_Mark_V10	Taam	kingunganeng	Jesus	ellnginaaghsan,	qula	maalghuk	siipneqluku	maligsaaghtengitallu	ilangitallu	tamaakut	nagatkat	aaptekaat	ungipaghaatkegkaaneng.
B02_04_Mark_V11	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Elpesinun	Kiyaghneghem	liigikestaa	talughngalghii	ipapighqellgha	Ataneghpagullghem.	Sivunghani	liitesimangisaghaa.	Iwernga	tamaakut	iqitngalghiit	Kiyaghneghem	Ataneghpagullghaneng	nagaqughaqut	sameng	tamaghhaaneng	ungipaghaatetgun.
B02_04_Mark_V12	Enkaam	‘Esghaannaqaqut,	esghaannaqaqut	esghaategpenateng.	Nagataqut,	nagataqut	liigikegpenateng.	Pikaayaquyeng	qiivnayaghtut	Kiyaghneghmun,	enkaam	seghevunnayaghii.’”
B02_04_Mark_V13	Taagken	Jesus-em	aaptekii,	“Taana	ungipaghaan	piitesighaghta	liigikenghitestegguu?	Natenmi	liigiknaqesteki	alngunak	ungipaghaatet?
B02_04_Mark_V14	Piitesighaghta	ifkaghqilghii	piitutneng,	Kiyaghneghem	akuzitanganeng	ungipaghtengatun	ayuquq.
B02_04_Mark_V15	Ilangi	yuget	qellighllakastun	tumestun	ayuqut.	Piitutet	tekinneghata	tumetgun	qawaaget	neghaqiit.	Tawateghpigaq	tamaakut	yuget	nagaquunneghata	Kiyaghneghem	akuzitanganeng	tawaninginaq	Tughneghaam	puygustaqii.
B02_04_Mark_V16	Ilangi	yuget	uyghagtuqastun	sunastun	ayuqut.	Akut	uyghagtuqamelnguut	asivapagigatut.	Tamaakut	yuget	nagaquunneghmeggni	Kiyaghneghem	akuzitanganeng	tawaninginaq	tuguklighaqiit	quyakusiqluki.
B02_04_Mark_V17	Iwernga	ugpeqngwaaghigalkangit	akuzitangi	enkaam	ugpellghit	mulungigatut.	Seghleliineghmeggni,	nalighmeng	amyuutkellengneghmeggni	apalluqluku	ugpeqilleghteng	Kiyaghneghem	akuzitanganeng	tawaninginaq	ugpeqinanighaqut.
B02_04_Mark_V18	Ilangi	yuget	sikughllugtuqastun	sunastun	ayuqut.	Piitutet	sikughllugtuqakun	tekitkat	nagungigatut,	qayughllak	sikughlluget	piitfigighaqegkangit.	Tamaakut	yuget	nagaquneghmegteki	Kiyaghneghem	akuzitangi	qaatkigatiit,
B02_04_Mark_V19	qayughllak	una	unguvalleq	nulqaaviighutkaqaat,	teghhwaaghiitkaqaatlu	aklungi,	samengllu	wata	allgeghutaghaghyugaqut.	Tawateghpigaq	sikughlluget	piitfigillghistun	piitutet,	tamaakut	yuget	piyukellghita	puygustaqiit	Kiyaghneghem	akuzitangi.
B02_04_Mark_V20	Iwernga	ilangi	yuget	pinilghiistun	sunastun	ayuqut.	Piitutet	tekitkat	pinilghiikun	sunakun	elngaatall	nawaaqut.	Ilangi	piitestiiqut	30,	ilangi	60,	ilangi	100.	Tawateghpigaq	tamaakut	yuget	nagaquneghmegteki	Kiyaghneghem	akuzitangi	qaatkaqiit,	enkaam	elngaatall	qepghaghaqut	Kiyaghneghmun.	Ilangi	wataqaaghaq	qepghaghataaghaghaqut	ilameggneng.”
B02_04_Mark_V21	Jesus-em	nagneghutkii,	“Kitum	alngunak	kenelghutak	itghullukek	sagneghem	asinganun	llinaanghitaak,	nalighmeng	qavaghvigem	asinganun.	Itupill	quulvaqun	llilleqaak.
B02_04_Mark_V22	Sangwaa	alngunak	iiqaq	qaaynganun	lliighyaghqaaguq,	sangwaallu	alngunak	saapegkaq	saaputiighyaghqaaguq.
B02_04_Mark_V23	Sigutelgukufsi	nagatusighqameng,	nagatek!”
B02_04_Mark_V24	Whatenllu	pikii,	“Nagatngwaaghtengnga!	Tuunilleghpesistungwaaq	Kiyaghneghem	tuunelleqiisi,	paninang	tuunataghaghlleqiisi.
B02_04_Mark_V25	Yuuk	salek	tuunataghaghyaghqaaguq.	Yuuk	sapagllagilnguq	sangiighhii	tuguyaghqaagut.”
B02_04_Mark_V26	Whatenllu	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Ataneghpagullgha	Kiyaghneghem	whatetuq:	yuuk	ifkaghqughaquq	piitutneng	piitesiighaghvigmini.
B02_04_Mark_V27	Piitutet	piilluteng	nawaaqut	unugtuumaan,	aghneghtuumaan	yuuk	qavaayaghngaan,	teghhumayaghngaan,	paninang	piitutet	nagwaaqut.	Yugem	nallukaqii	naten	nawaaqutangi.
B02_04_Mark_V28	Sunanginaghhaam	kayutngunani	piitutet	nagustaqii	enkaam	piitestekangaqut:	sivukluteng	sungaghyukegtaghhaat	piitaqut,	taagken	napaaziingaqut	qenwatlu	grain-engaqut.
B02_04_Mark_V29	Grain-et	qigunghata	unataghyaghqaaghtaqut,	enkaam	yugem	kepughaqii	kepuusimikun.”
B02_04_Mark_V30	Jesus-em	aaptekii,	“Samun	uspunnaqesteggu	Ataneghpagullgha	Kiyaghneghem?	Sangwaa	ungipaghaatkennaqesteggu	liigikestisiiluku?
B02_04_Mark_V31	Ataneghpagullgha	Kiyaghneghem	mustard-em	piitutngatun	ayuquq.	Mekestaalleghpigaaguq	piitutneng	nunami	whani	iwernga	yugem	piitesiighaneghminigu,
B02_04_Mark_V32	anglighllagaquq	angelleghpigaaghlluni	nunivagseghaghyaggaghneng.	Uglaapiglleghhiit	avayaghrugllagi	enkaam	qawaaget	unglusiiqut	ququngaan	akulngakun	siqinghillghakun.”
B02_04_Mark_V33	Jesus-em	atuqluki	ungipaghaatelghutet	yugnun	akuzitkegkaqii	Kiyaghneghem	Akuzitangi.	Aapqaqii	yugnun	liigikelleghtulangistun.
B02_04_Mark_V34	Quunpeng	yuget	apeghtughaqegkangi	ungipaghaatetgun,	iwernga	maligsaaghtekullghiit	ellnginaaghhneghmeggni	whateghlluwaaq	liigikestaqegkangi	sameng	pisiitangi	ungipaghaatet.
B02_04_Mark_V35	Taam	ighivgaani	Jesus-em	angyamelluni	maligsaaghteni	pikii,	“Aghviilta	naayvam	inglunganun.”	Enkaam	maligsaaghtet	uuglluteng	angyamun	unitkiit	yulghutet.	Ilangitallu	angyat	maligtekiit.
B02_04_Mark_V37	Taagken	anuqlighllakaq,	repall	imaghllugem	imighaataqegkaa	angyaq	qenwat	esleqsaghtuqaq.
B02_04_Mark_V38	Jesus	angyallimi	qavaq	akisighluni.	Maligsaaghtengita	taghtughlluku	pikaat,	“Apeghtughista,	tuquyaghngaamtaa	pizikuut?”
B02_04_Mark_V39	Jesus-em	taghtughluni	anuqallu	imaghllugetlu	ineghtekii,	“Anuqa	taaqingam,	imaghlluget	aghuliightek!”	Enkaam	ellmaaragutkelluku	amsanaghllugughtekaq.
B02_04_Mark_V40	Taagken	maligsaaghteni	aaptekii,	“Sangafsi	alingetsi?	Taawa	ugpeqigastengngaa?”
B02_04_Mark_V41	Saghiighayugllakat	repall	tallughyugllakat	alingruughumaghmeng,	enkaam	aapqughaaghutkat	ellmeggneng,	“Kinangaawa	una	yuuk,	talwa	anuqemllu	imaghllugetlu	qaatkegkangat?”
B02_05_Mark_V1	Naayvam	inglunganun	kaatkat	Jesus-enkut	maligsaaghtekullghiit,	nunangitnun	Gerasa-ghmiit.
B02_05_Mark_V2	Legan	Jesus	angyameng	quutmun	uugtuq	yuuk	aanluni	sufliitneng	llivghet,	paasqaa.
B02_05_Mark_V3	Taana	yuuk	ilumikun	tughneghaghtuqaq	lliveghnitaqelghii.	Awen	qiipraghutneng	asightaqsaqangat	iiggitgunllu	itegiitgunllu	iwernga	sakeqaqegkangi	qiipraghutet,	kagimtaqegkangillu	savikenghaaghet	itegaminilnguut.	Kitum	alngunak	asighqepagningitkaallu	aghuliightepagningitkaallu,	qayughllak	iknaqepiglleghhii.
B02_05_Mark_V5	Unugtuumaan,	aghneghtuumaan	igleghtaqelghii	lliivghet	qungangitnillu	qeminillu,	quunpeng	araghaataamaghmi,	uyghagteggun	kiitiqumaghmi	ellmineng.
B02_05_Mark_V6	Jesus	esghaghyamigu	uyavaqaanlluku	ketanqusnaq	takuluku	segesqughfikluku	maniguqaa.
B02_05_Mark_V7	Taagken	Jesus-em	yugem	ilunganilnguq	tughneghaq	pikaa,	“Uyuq	seghleq	tughneghaq,	aani	yugmeng!”	Tughneghaam	araghaataqaa,	“Jesus,	Ighnegha	Kiyaghneghem,	sanaqsinga?	Akeqi	Kiyaghneghmun	ikfiqestesaghqaafqaama	pisqellunga!”
B02_05_Mark_V9	Jesus-em	aaptekaa,	“Kinanguzin?”	Yugem	kiimsiqaa,	“Aatqaqa	‘Uglaghllak’	qayughllak	uglaghllagtukut!”
B02_05_Mark_V10	Elngaatall	Jesus-mun	aapuquutkii	tughneghaat	aghulaqestefqiita	pisqelluki	taagken	nunameng.
B02_05_Mark_V11	Taawanguq	qemim	minglengani	kurugalghuteghllaget,	neghuullghiit.
B02_05_Mark_V12	Tughneghaat	aapuquutkat	Jesus-mun,	“Kurugaghnun	kayagtikut,	ellngitnun	iteghtestikut.”
B02_05_Mark_V13	Enkaam	angeghqumakegkii.	Tughneghaat	yugmeng	aanaghesnaghluteng	kurugaghnun	iteghaatkat.	Entaqun	2,000-nguut	kurugaat,	pennaneng	asitmun	pangalgulluteng	naayvamun	ateghaatkat	enkaam	tuqulaghaatkat.
B02_05_Mark_V14	Kurugaat	aflengakistengit	qimaguutkat	neghllagmunllu	uvitanganilngughnunllu	nunanun.	Tamaani	ungipaqegkiit	ilumikun	tughneghaghtuqaqlu,	kurugaatlu.	Enkaam	yuget	esghaghyaghtuutkiit	samatangi.
B02_05_Mark_V15	Jesus-mun	kaalluteng	esghaqaat	yuuk	tughneghaghtughllagyalghii	ilumikun.	Taawanguq	aqumgaftuq	piluguwaaghluni,	umyugakeklu	naallghullutek	enkaam	alingruuqat.
B02_05_Mark_V16	Tamaakut	esghapakat	aapqaat	naallghusimaniluku	yuuk	tughneghaghtughllagyalghii,	aapqiitlu	kurugaat	samatangi.
B02_05_Mark_V17	Taagken	yulghutet	maniguutepiglluteng	Jesus	aghulaqesqegkaat	nunameggneng.
B02_05_Mark_V18	Jesus	uugtaquqlu	angyamun,	yugem	tughneghaghtuyalghiim	maniguutepiglluni	aaptekaa,	“Maligllaken?”
B02_05_Mark_V19	Iwernga	Jesus-em	ighsakluku	pikaa,	“Nengllugutegpenunllu,	ilakumtaaghpenunllu	aglaghluten	apeghnaken	Atanghem	nangllekepiglluten	apeghiillgha	elpenun.”
B02_05_Mark_V20	Enkaam	yuuk	aghulaqegkaq.	Tamaani	nunami	aatqelghiimi,	Qula	Neghllaget,	ungipaqegkaa	Jesus-em	apeghiillgha	ellminun,	tamaakut	nagaquutkat	allaaghlluwhaghyukat.
B02_05_Mark_V21	Jesus	angyakun	uteghnighyan	inglunganun	naayvam,	esnemi	yulghuteghllaget	qerngughutkat	uvitanganun.
B02_05_Mark_V22	Taagken	ataasiq	synagogue-em	umiilwaagha,	Jairus-nguftuq	aatgha,	tagiluni	Jesus-mun	segesqughtekaq	manungakun.
B02_05_Mark_V23	Maniguutepiglluni	pikaa,	“Paniggaqa	qinuyugllaguuq,	tuquyaghtungestaamaaq.	Takwaaghtigu	saafsaghtuqaghhu,	enkaam	naallghulluni	kiyaghlli!”
B02_05_Mark_V24	Enkaam	Jesus-em	maligtekaa.	Yulghuteghllagetlu	maliglleghaatkaat	Jesus,	repall	kanglluqaghlluku.
B02_05_Mark_V25	Aghnaqlu	tawanteftuq	aagtuqaataq	qula	maalghuk	siipngaan	ayumiqulleghni.	Talwa	aghallegtalghutet	kayusiitaqsaghngaatni	naallghusigalnguq,	yeghlegi	naavnginalghii.	Qenwat	maniqraggiighutkaq.
B02_05_Mark_V27	Nagaqughaqegkanga	Jesus,	enkaam	yulghuteghllaget	akulangitgun	tunutanganeng	takukaa.
B02_05_Mark_V28	Sumeghtaghaqaq,	“Aatkii	saafteqeghsaqumki	naallghunayaghtunga.”
B02_05_Mark_V29	Legan	atkuyaaghqek	saaftaak	kiitnginaamaghmi	pikaq,	enkaam	elpekegkaa	naallghutellgha	qaamnami.
B02_05_Mark_V30	Tawaninginaq	Jesus-em	liigikegkaa	aghtughyaghqaanghilleq	aanelghii	ellmineng,	enkaam	yulghuteghllaget	qiivluki	aaptekii,	“Kitum	aatkanka	saaftaki?”
B02_05_Mark_V31	Maligsaaghtengita	pikaat,	“Yulghuteghllaget	qungangitnilnguuten	sangan	kitumun	saafniluten	pizin?”
B02_05_Mark_V32	Iwernga	Jesus-em	esghaghnaqegkaa	kitumun	saaftutni.
B02_05_Mark_V33	Aghnam	liigikluku	naallghutelleni	alingem	ungelegsimaghmi	takukaa	Jesus.	Taagken	manungakun	segesqughlluni	ungipaatkaa	salleghmineng.
B02_05_Mark_V34	Jesus-em	pikaa,	“Panimni,	ugpeqilleghpek	naallghutestaaten.	Nekeggmellelighluten	aglaa,	naallghutngwaaghumaaten.”
B02_05_Mark_V35	Jesus-em	aleghquumaluku	aghnaq,	kevgat	tagiluteng	ungipaatkaat	Jairus,	“Panigen	tuqumaaq,	takusqegpenaan'ngam	Apeghtughistemun.”
B02_05_Mark_V36	Jesus-em	nagateghngaaghmiki	avelghaqiinaghluki	Jairus	pikaa,	“Alingegpenang,	taawanginaq	ugpeghi.”
B02_05_Mark_V37	Taagken	kitumun	alngunak	maligtesnaniqaq,	iwerngaqun	kelqegkii	Peter-enkut	James-enkut	John-enkut,	anglegutanga	James-em.
B02_05_Mark_V38	Jesus-enkut	kaasalghiimeng	Jairus-enkunun,	yulghuteghllaget	elngaatall	qiyaaghuuteghllaguftut	metuumaghmeng.
B02_05_Mark_V39	Jesus-em	iteghluni	yulghutet	pikii,	“Sangafsi	qiyaaghuuteghllagutsi?	Sangafsi	nepugtiighllagutsi?	Taghnughhaq	tuqullghituq,	qavaaguq!”
B02_05_Mark_V40	Iwernga	nenglaqegkaat	tawaten	piyisteng.	Qamaglluki	aanesamiki	angayuqakeklu	taakutlu	maligsaaghteni	itghutkii	taghnughhaam	nenganun.
B02_05_Mark_V41	Jesus-em	iiggakun	tuguluku	aghnaghaghhaq	pikaa,	“Talitha	kum!”	(whaten	pisiq,	“Aghnaghaghhaq,	maketesqamken!”)
B02_05_Mark_V42	Tawaninginaq	makelluni	piyukaq.	(Aghnaghaghhaq	qula	maalghuk	siipngaan	uksughtutkaftuq.)	Angayuqakeklu	maligsaaghtetlu	elngaatall	saghiighayukat!
B02_05_Mark_V43	Taagken	Jesus-em	ineghtengngwaaqii	kitumun	alngunak	ungipaqefqaan	pisqelluku,	pikiillu,	“Neghyaghqaghhaghmeng	tuuniteggu.”
B02_06_Mark_V1	Taagken	Jesus	aghulaqegkaq	Capernaum-emeng,	aglaqaq	neminun	Nazareth-mun,	maligsaaghtengitallu	maligtekaat.
B02_06_Mark_V2	Sabbath-ngughsagu	synagogue-mi	apeghtughikaq.	Yulghutet	nagalluku	saghiighayagutkaat.	Aapqughaaghutkat	ellmeggneng,	“Naken	liitaki?	Kitum	peghqinghughtestagu?	Saghiighayugnaghllaguut	allaaghlluwhaghtillghi!
B02_06_Mark_V3	Naten	tawaten	pii?	Kaapentangunghitaa,	Mary-m	ighnegha?	James-enkut,	Joses-enkut,	Judas-enkut,	Simon-enkut	anglegutkenghitakii?	Nayagillulli	maantaat?”	Enkaam	tugukliimangilkangat.
B02_06_Mark_V4	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Kitum	alngunak	uuknaliqista	siivakaqaa,	iwerngaqun	nunalgutangitallu	nalleqliitallu	nengllugutangitallu	pingigataat.”
B02_06_Mark_V5	Enkaam	tamaani	allaaghlluwhaghtipagningitkaq,	iwerngaqun	qafsinkuuraghhaat	saafluki	naallghutkii.
B02_06_Mark_V6	Enkaam	Jesus	saghiighayugllakaq,	qayughllak	ugpeqenghilkangat.	Taagken	Jesus	Nazareth-em	uvitanganilngughnun	nenun	piiqluni	apeghtuqii	yuget.
B02_06_Mark_V7	Tagsighluki	qula	maalghuk	siipneqluku	maligsaaghteni,	kayaggnaqnikii	malghukaghtiita	ungipaqisqellukillu	naallghuqiisqellukillu.	Aghulaqfagilgata	aghtughyaghqaanghilleliquqii	yugneng	aanesqiisqelluki	tughneghaat.
B02_06_Mark_V8	Liilightuqiillu,	“Igleghalleghpesini	sameng	alngunak	kelqegpenasi	iwerngaqun	ayaviighmeng.	Neqekrangllangunasi,	aqeftaghaangunasi,	maningunasi	pilghaasi.
B02_06_Mark_V9	Iwernga	kameglusi,	simiitkaghqameng	ggaatmeng	kelqegpenasi.”
B02_06_Mark_V10	Whatenllu	pikii,	“Nani	alngunak	tukughpesi	upughaskangisi	tawanlleghhaasi	kenlanga	aghulaqelleghpesinun.
B02_06_Mark_V11	Nenun	kaaskufsi	upughatingigalngughnun,	nalighmeng	nagasugigalngughnun,	uninnakesi	taana	nuna	itegasi	pagulangiimiita.	Tawaten	pikufsi	kelengasaaghlleqasi	Kiyaghneghem	aghyuulleghqaaneng!”
B02_06_Mark_V12	Enkaam	maligsaaghtet	aghulaqluteng	ungipaqikat	yugnun	avuteghqelluki	seghleghqennaniisqelluki.
B02_06_Mark_V13	Tughneghalghutet	aanesquqiit	yugneng,	mesiighqaqlukillu	qinuyulghutet	naallghuquqiit.
B02_06_Mark_V14	Umiilgem	Herod-em	nagaquqaa	qamaglluku	Jesus-em	tawaten	pillgha,	qayughllak	tamaghhaani	aapqangit	Jesus-em	allaaghlluwhaghtillghi.	Ilangi	yuget	pikat,	“John-nguuq	Paaptaayesta,	unguvaamaaq	enkaam	esgha	aghtughyaghqaanghillelek	allaaghlluwhaghtilleghmun.”
B02_06_Mark_V15	Iwernga	ilangit	yuget	pikat,	“Elijah-nguuq.”	Ilangit	pikat,	“Uuknaliqistenguuq,	neghighluku	uuknaliqistestun	ayuquq.”
B02_06_Mark_V16	Herod-em	nagaqughluku	pikaq,	“John-nguuq	Paaptaayesta,	naasqwightestekaqa	iwernga	unguvaamaaq!”
B02_06_Mark_V17	Qavnganghhaq	Herod-em	kayagutkaqegkanga	John	tuguluku,	asighqesluku	anusimingllaghtestekaa.	Tawaten	pistekaa,	qayughllak	John-em	piighaataqaa	Herod	whaten,	“Liilightuusamnni	anaggusimaaten	tugulleghpegun	anglegutegpek	Philip-em	nulighha	Herodias.”
B02_06_Mark_V19	Enkaam	Herodias-em	ugumiyaguteghllakaqegkanga	John	repall	tuqutesupigtekaqsaqanga.	Iwernga	pipagningitkaa	qayughllak	Herod-em	tawaten	pistepagningitkaa.
B02_06_Mark_V20	Herod-em	alikegkaqegkanga	John	liisimakutmineng	yuuk	pinilghii,	Kiyaghneghmun	qaatkutngaghllalghii.	Enkaam	kelengakestengngwaaqaa	sanayukatgu.	Herod-em	nagasugaqegkanga	John	qaywa	seghleghyugaqeghngaaghmi	naganneghminigu.
B02_06_Mark_V21	Taagken	Herodias	qenwatlu	pilleghqangegkaq.	Herod-em	allgeghvini	aghneq	kaasan	neqenghaghqestimalghii	kavemem	umiilwaaghitnun,	pilluwaghtet	umiilwaaghitnun,	igleghutistengitnunllu	Galilee-ghmiit.
B02_06_Mark_V22	Taagken	paniga	Herodias-em	iteghluni	neghuullghiinun	tukalegaqaq.	Herod-enkut	aqelqaqullghiit	elngaatall	efquqegkaat.	Enkaam	umiilgem	pikaa	aghnaghaq,	“Sameng	alngunak	tungsighvikegkuvnga	tuunelleqamken.”
B02_06_Mark_V23	Akeqegkaallu	whaten,	“Ipapestaaq	tuunelleqamken	sameng	alngunak	tungsiquvek,	talwa	umiilgutimalleghma	aklungingan	avellgha!”
B02_06_Mark_V24	Taagken	aghnaghaq	aanluni	naani	aapsaghtuqaa,	“Sameng	tungsighnaqsinga?”	Naangan	pikaa,	“John-em	Paaptaayestem	naasqwa	tungsighhu.”
B02_06_Mark_V25	Aghnaghaq	agliighwaghlluni	umiilegmun	tungsighvikegkaa,	“Whaa	maaten,	John-em	Paaptaayestem	naasqwa	piyugaqa	qayuutaghraagkun	lliluku!”
B02_06_Mark_V26	Umiilek	elngaatall	qivghughllakaq	iwernga	saluku	ighlekligu,	qayughllak	akeqngwaaqaqegkanga	aqelqalghutni	nagatestekluki.
B02_06_Mark_V27	Enkaam	tawaninginaq	umiilgem	kayagtekaa	kelengakista	tagitesqesluku	John-em	naasqwa.	Kelengakista	aanluni	anusimingllaghvigmun	aglaqaq	John-em	naasqwa	kepnaluku.
B02_06_Mark_V28	Naasquq	qayuutaghraagkun	lliluku	aglaalluku	aghnaghaghmun	tuunegkaa.	Enkaam	aghnaghaam	naaminun	tuunegkaa.
B02_06_Mark_V29	John-em	maligsaaghtengita	nagaqughluku,	yugusii	aqfaluku	lliifqaat.
B02_06_Mark_V30	Apostle-et	uteghnightuulluteng	Jesus-mun	aapqiit	apeghtughilleteng,	naallghuqulleghteng,	tughneghaghnengllu	aanesqulleghteng	yugneng.
B02_06_Mark_V31	Yugllagulghii	tagimaghmengllu	aghulaqumaghmengllu	pilghiit	repall	Jesus-enkut	maligsaaghtekullghiit	neghepagningiitkat.	Enkaam	maligsaaghteni	pikii,	“Natmun	aghulaqelta	paaghqillghanun,	elpesiqun	meghnaaliightesqellusi.”
B02_06_Mark_V32	Enkaam	angyakun	paaghqillghanun	aghulaqegkat	ellnginaghhaaghhnaluteng,
B02_06_Mark_V33	iwernga	yulghutem	esghaqiit	aghulaqelghiit.	Liisimakluki	navek	pinaqutangit,	ketanqusnaq	naayvam	esnengakun	maligtekiit.	Nenun	nallangiinneghata	legan	yuget	maligtaqegkangit.	Kaatkat	takukameggnun	ingyaghaghlluki	Jesus-enkut.
B02_06_Mark_V34	Jesus-em	angyameng	uuglluni	quutmun	yulghutet	esghaghluki	nangllegyagutkii,	qayughllak	penniighestun	penniighniightengilngughestun	ayuqelghiit.	Enkaam	allaaghhiinaghmeng	apeghtughtaakii.
B02_06_Mark_V35	Whanikupigsagu	maligsaaghtengita	takuluku	Jesus	pikaat,	“Maana	paaghqituq,	whanikughllagaallu.	Yuget	aglaghtuutesqiki	piitesighaghtenunllu,	nengiighhaghnunllu.	Ellmeggneng	neqengyaghtughlit	neqhyaghqameng.”
B02_06_Mark_V37	Iwernga	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Elpesi	neghyaghqaliteki.”	Aaptekaat,	“Tukfighiyaghtughtesugsikuut	200	denarii-m	akinganeng	neqekrangllameng	neghesqelluki?”
B02_06_Mark_V38	Jesus-em	aaptekii,	“Naten	uglaghqakaan	neqekrangllalgutsi?	Enta	ivaghiightek.”	Naalkusameng	ungipaatkaat,	“Taawa	tallimat	neqekrangllat,	maalghuklu	iqallugek.”
B02_06_Mark_V39	Taagken	Jesus-em	maligsaaghteminun	qafsinkaghtiita	aqumestesqegkii	vegaaghqun.
B02_06_Mark_V40	Enkaam	aqumuutkat	100-ngwaaqluteng	50-ngwaaqluteng.
B02_06_Mark_V41	Jesus-em	tuguluki	tallimat	neqekrangllat,	maalghuklu	iqallugek,	quulmun	sivuglluni	iyamsiqayugvikegkaa	Kiyaghneq.	Taagken	neqekrangllat	iiggmineng	aavgughluki	maligsaaghteminun	tunquqii	uyegtesqelluki.	Iqallugeklu	iigmineng	aavgughlukek	tunqughtestekii.
B02_06_Mark_V42	Qamagtengngwaaghluni	neghuutkaq	kepsuulluni.
B02_06_Mark_V43	Taagken	maligsaaghtet	tugulaqiit	qula	maalghuk	siipneqluku	pasketet	esleqngalghiit	kagimleghughtekaneng	neqekrangllaneng,	iqallugnengllu.
B02_06_Mark_V44	Yuget	neghuutkat	5,000-nguftut,	kesutkegpenaki	aghnatlu	taghnughhaatlu.
B02_06_Mark_V45	Legan	taaqut	Jesus-em	maligsaaghteni	qelqii	angyakun	igleghtekestiisqelluki	Bethsaida-mun,	naayvam	inglunganilngughmun.	Taagken	ellngan	yulghutet	aglaghtuutestekii	nengitnun.
B02_06_Mark_V46	Aglaghtuutesamiki	yughaghyaghtuqaq	qemimun.
B02_06_Mark_V47	Unugmi	taakwani	angyat	naayvamelluki	Jesus	ellnginaghhaakaq	quutmi.
B02_06_Mark_V48	Esghaqii	malighsaaghteni	aygughnaqutkelghiit	yaavuqumeng,	qayughllak	anuqliiskangi.	Akulegkeni	three-kellaagenkuk	six-ekellaagenkuk	unaanguluku,	takukii	meghem	qaayngakun	piyugmeng.	Naghughhnaqaqiillu
B02_06_Mark_V49	esghaqaat	meghqun	piyulghii.	Sumeghmeggni	taghneghaaniluku	araghllakat.
B02_06_Mark_V50	Qamaglluteng	alingruughutkat.	Tawaninginaq	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Ilutughtek!	Whanganguunga,	alingegpenasi.”
B02_06_Mark_V51	Legan	angyamun	uugtuq	ellmaaragllugughtekaq.	Maligsaaghtet	saghiighayugllakat,
B02_06_Mark_V52	qayughllak	paninang	liigikigalkangat	Jesus	kinangutanga,	qaywa	esghapagngaaghmegteggu	neqekrangllat	nulastekangi.	Tawatetkaalghiit	qayughllak	salin	umyugiit	reghiigalnguut.
B02_06_Mark_V53	Taagken	nagneqat	naayvam	inglunganun	enkaam	Gennesaret-kun	tamlagluteng	angyaghteng	petukaat.
B02_06_Mark_V54	Legan	angyaghteng	unitaat	yuget	liisuqnginaamaan	Jesus	pikaat.
B02_06_Mark_V55	Enkaam	kelkaghtaarragkiiqat	Jesus	kaasimaniluku.	Jesus	navek	piyaghngaan	qinuyuget	aglaataqegkangit	allighiitgun	ellnganun.
B02_06_Mark_V56	Jesus	kaanneghmini	neghllagnunllu,	nenunllu,	eslamelngughnun	akilpegaghvignun	aglaghaqelghii.	Enkaam	yuget	tagitaqegkangit	qinuyuget	akilpegaghvignun	Jesus-mun	naallghutesqelluki.	Jesus-mun	maniguututkiit	qinuyugnun	waran	saaftesqelluku	kenii,	enkaam	qamaglluteng	saaftilghiit	naallghutkat.
B02_07_Mark_V1	Pharisees-etlu	ilangillu	apeghtughikayuget	Liilightuusaneng	Jerusalem-emeng	pit,	Jesus-em	uvitanganun	qerngughutkat.
B02_07_Mark_V2	Esghaqiit	maligsaaghtengan	ilangi	uughtughpenateng	neghelghiit.	Uughtullghilnguut	Pharisees-et	pisqellghistun.
B02_07_Mark_V3	(Pharisees-etlu	Jews-etlu	qamaglluteng	neghyaghqaanghilnguut	wetkuqun	sivukluteng	uughtughwaaghluteng,	qayughllak	sivuneghmeng	apeghtuusiit	atuqngukangit.
B02_07_Mark_V4	Talwa	akilpegaghvigmeng	tagineghmeggni	neghigalnguut	wetku	sivukluten	ukmangighsaghwaaghaqelghiit.	Ilangillu	sivuneghmeng	apeghtuusalghutangit	atuqngukangit.	Atuqfagilgamegtiki	qayuusiteng,	sagneteng,	siilut	gaaghusiteng	sangighqughwaaghaqegkangit.)
B02_07_Mark_V5	Enkaam	Pharisees-etlu	apeghtughikayugetlu	Liilightuusaneng	aaptekaat	Jesus,	“Sangameng	maligsaaghteten	uughtughpenateng	neghaqat?	Sivunemta	apeghtuusiit	atuqigatiit.”
B02_07_Mark_V6	Jesus-em	kiimsiqii,	“Elqughllusi	Isaiah-m	uuknaliqutkumakangisi	piniiyugneghni	elpesi.	Whaten	igaqaaguq,	‘Kiyaghneq	piiq,	“Ukut	yuget	akuzitmegteggun	quulvaghaqaatnga,	nakaan	ilumegteggun.
B02_07_Mark_V7	Temngi	manigughaqaatnga,	qayughllak	apeghtuusaqaqiit	liilightuusangllaqateng	katam	whanga	Liilightuusaqepiglleghhiistun.”’
B02_07_Mark_V8	Enkaam	elpesi	Kiyaghneghem	Liilightuusii	pakigluki	qaatkaqasi	yuget	apeghtuusiit.”
B02_07_Mark_V9	Jesus-em	nagneghutkii,	“Pakigillepiguusi	Kiyaghneghem	Liilightuusiitnun	qaatkepigesnaghnaluki	elpesi	katam	apeghtuusasi.
B02_07_Mark_V10	Una	esgha	usputaq	tawaten	pilleghpesinun:	Moses-em	aapqaqii	Kiyaghneghem	Liilightuusii	whaten	pilghiit,	‘Quulvaghluku	atanllu	naanllu.’	Whatenllu	pikaaguq,	‘Kitum	alngunak	atanillu	naanillu	seghlequuqumikek	tuqutellengyaghqaaguq.’
B02_07_Mark_V11	Iwernga	elpesi	allanguut	apeghtughillesi.	Whaten	piiqusi,	‘Yugemnguq	atani	nalighmeng	naani	whaten	piyaghngaaghmigu,	“Kayusiitusighqalguunga	elpenun	iwernga	tuunaanghitaqa	qayughllak	Corban-nguuq.”’	(Corban	whaten	pisiiguq,	siingenllu	Kiyaghneghmun	akequsaqumaaqa.)
B02_07_Mark_V12	Tawaten	pilleghpesigun	apeghtughaqasi	yuget	kayusiinneghisaghngaatki	atangitlu	naangitlu	pisqelluki.
B02_07_Mark_V13	Enkaam	pakigaqasi	Kiyaghneghem	akuzitangi,	apeghtuusaqepigesnaghnaluki	yugnun	elpesi	katam	akuzitesi.	Tamaakut	temngi	usputaagut,	uglaapigtut	sangwaat	piiqegkesi.”
B02_07_Mark_V14	Taagken	Jesus-em	yulghutet	ellminun	tagsinqiglluki	pikii,	“Qamagtengngwaaghlusi	nagallusi	liigikiteggu	sameng	pitka.
B02_07_Mark_V15	Yuuk	neghegkaan	nukeggnaghqigataa,	seghletun	sumeghtaghallghan,	sallghanllu	nukeggnaghqaqaa.
B02_07_Mark_V16	Sigutelgukufsi	nagatusighqameng,	nagatek!”
B02_07_Mark_V17	Jesus-em	unilluki	yulghutet	iteghyan	maligsaaghtengita	aaptekaat	ungipaghaan	sameng	pisiitanga.
B02_07_Mark_V18	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Elpesillu	liigikigatsii?	Sangwaa	alngunak	yugem	neghaqegkanga	nukeggnaghqusighqaanghituq	ellnganun,
B02_07_Mark_V19	qayughllak	neghegkii	ighsaqghwanun	pinaanghitut.	Aqsaqghwanun	piiqut	enkaam	yugusiineng	aanaqut.”	(Tawaten	pilleghmikun	Jesus-em	aapghwaa	neqet	qamaglluteng	neghyaghqaaniluki.)
B02_07_Mark_V20	Pikiillu,	“Yugem	qamaken	ilumineng	aanestekaan	nukeggnaghqestaqaa.
B02_07_Mark_V21	Qaamken	yugem	ilunganeng	aanaqut:	sumeghtaghalleluget,	nengughtegpenani	kitumeng	alngunak	atuqilleq,	teglegniiq,	yugtaq,
B02_07_Mark_V22	gelgaghniiq,	pakigniiq,	alngunak	seghletun	pilleq,	puughti,	kayngusaghaatelleq,	aqina,	yulgutmeng	iqlengiqutki,	qukaayugta,	temngitwha.
B02_07_Mark_V23	Tamaakut	qamaglluteng	seghleghet	yugem	ilunganeng	aanegkat	nukeggnaghqikayuguut.”
B02_07_Mark_V24	Taagken	Jesus	aghulaqegkaq	Tyre-m	tunganganun,	kaalluni	mangteghamun	iitqaq.	Kitumun	alngunak	nallukesuguyaqanga	kaatelleni,	iwernga	ilangita	liisimakegkaat.
B02_07_Mark_V25	Aghnam	Gentile-em,	allgeqam	Phoenicia-mi,	Syria-melngughmi	nagaquqaa	Jesus	kaasimaniluku.	Paniggaa	ilumikun	tughneghalek.	Enkaam	aglaragkiighluni	Jesus-mun	segesqughlluni	manungakun,	maniguutkaq	aanestaghtesqelluku	tughneghaq	panigmineng.
B02_07_Mark_V27	Iwernga	Jesus-em	pikaa,	“Taghnughhaat	sivukluteng	neghesaghqaagut,	qayughllak	anaggutngaaq	taghnughhaat	neqngit	tuguluki	qikminun	miluuskumeng.”
B02_07_Mark_V28	Aghnam	kiimsiqaa,	“Aa-a,	Ataneq,	talwa	qikmit	tipelem	asinganilnguut	neghaqut	taghnughhaat	ifkaghqellghitneng!”
B02_07_Mark_V29	Enkaam	Jesus-em	pikaa,	“Naqamqun	tawaten	kiimsighaghpenga	aglaghhaaten,	tughneghaq	aanumaaq	panigpeneng!”
B02_07_Mark_V30	Aghnaq	neminun	aglaghyalghiimi	paniga	ingaghmeteftuq	qavaghvigmi,	taawa	llaaghan	tughneghaq	aanumalghii	paniganeng.
B02_07_Mark_V31	Taagken	Jesus	aghulaqegkaq	Tyre-meng.	Sidon-kunllu,	Qula	Neghllagteggunllu	aagluni	Naayvamun	Galilee-mun	pikaq.
B02_07_Mark_V32	Yuget	ilangita,	yuuk	nagaquusigalnguq	talwa	akuziyiilnguq	tagilluku	Jesus-mun	nangllegsiitkaat	saaftesqelluku.
B02_07_Mark_V33	Enkaam	Jesus-em	awiitutkaa	yulghutneng.	Sivukluku	tekghegni	sigutegkenun	kanaghllukek,	taagken	iqillukek	qesighluki	iiggeni,	ulunga	saaftekaa.
B02_07_Mark_V34	Taagken	sivuglluni	qilagmun	aneghpakaghluni	yuuk	pikaa,	“Ephphatha!”	(Taana	whaten	pisiilghii,	“Reghightek!”)
B02_07_Mark_V35	Tawaninginaq	yugem	sigutkek	reghiqak,	ulungallu	piniightekaq,	aga	akuzinginaamaghmi	pikaq	akuziyiilliqegpenani.
B02_07_Mark_V36	Taagken	Jesus-em	ineghtengngwaaqii	kitumun	alngunak	ungipaqefqaan	pisqelluku,	iwernga	ineghtaataghyisteng	wata	ungipaqegkaat.
B02_07_Mark_V37	Nagaquullghiit	tamaakut	elngaatall	saghiighayugllakat,	pikat,	“Uum	yugem	sallgha	qamaglluni	piniperewaaghuuq!	Talwa	nagaquusigalnguut	nagaquusagutestii,	akuziyiilnguutlu	akuziyagutestii!”
B02_08_Mark_V1	Taam	kingungiighhaaneng	yulghuteghllak	qerngughullaataqaq.	Neghyaghqaqraggiighusata	Jesus-em	maligsaaghteni	tagsighluki	pikii,
B02_08_Mark_V2	“Ukut	nangllegyagutepigtanka.	Whangamninnaqneghmeng	pingayuni	aghneghni	neghyaghqiighutut.
B02_08_Mark_V3	Nengitnun	aglaghtestekumki	neghestegpenaki	tumemi	taakwani	ulleghaallequt,	qayughllak	ilangi	uyavaneng	tagilaghaatkaagut.”
B02_08_Mark_V4	Maligsaaghtengita	aaptekaat,	“Maani	paaghqituq	naken	neqengnaqesta	whaten	uglaghqakalghiinun	naamayaghqameng?”
B02_08_Mark_V5	Jesus-em	aaptekii,	“Naten	uglaghqakaan	neqekrangllalgutsi?”	Kiimsiqaat,	“Maaghraghvinleguut	neqekrangllat.”
B02_08_Mark_V6	Enkaam	Jesus-em	yulghuteghllaget	qelqii	aqumuutesqelluki	nunakun.	Taagken	tuguluki	taakut	maaghraghvinlek	neqekrangllat	Kiyaghneq	iyamsiqayugvikluku,	kagimlluki	tuunegkii	maligsaaghteminun	uyegtesqelluki.	Enkaam	maligsaaghtengi	uyegtekat.
B02_08_Mark_V7	Qafsinkuuraghhaghnengllu	amsakalghiineng	iqallulget.	Jesus-em	iyamsiqayugvikluku	Kiyaghneq,	taakutlu	maligsaaghteminun	uyegtesqegkii.
B02_08_Mark_V8	Entaqun	4,000-nguut	yuget	kepsuulluteng	neghuutkat.	Taagken	maligsaaghtet	qerngughsaqmegteggu	siipneq,	maaghraghvinlek	pasketet	imiqiit	esleqaghaghlluki.
B02_08_Mark_V10	Jesus-em	yulghuteghllaget	aghulaquutesluki,	enkaam	maligsaaghtekullghiit	angyamun	uuglluteng	aghulaqnginaamaghmeng	pikat	Dalmanutha-mun.
B02_08_Mark_V11	Tamaanlenguut	Pharisees-et	takuluku	Jesus	aaghtiiraaqaat.	Pikaat,	“Allaaghlluwhaghtighllagi,	enkaam	ugpeqelleqaghput	aghtughyaghqaanghillghen	Kiyaghneghmeng	pingutanga.”	Tawaten	pikaat	anagniilqavigighnaluku.
B02_08_Mark_V12	Jesus-em	aneghpagluni	pikii,	“Sangameng	maaten	aghneghem	yugi	allaaghlluwhaghtilleghmeng	tungsighaqat?	Ipa	ungipaatamsi,	allaaghlluwhaghtinnaanghitamsi.”
B02_08_Mark_V13	Taagken	unilluki,	angyamun	uuglluni	inglunganun	naayvam	aghviqat.
B02_08_Mark_V14	Maligsaaghtet	puygumalghiit	neqekrangllameng	kelqegpenateng,	ataasighhaaftuq	kelqegkaat	angyamelnguq.
B02_08_Mark_V15	Jesus-em	kelengasaaqii,	“Kelengangwaaghlusi	yeast-atangitneng	Pharisees-et,	yeast-atanganengllu	Herod-em.”
B02_08_Mark_V16	Taagken	ellmeggneng	aleghquutkat,	“Tawaten	piinkut	qayughllak	neqekranglliilnguukut.”
B02_08_Mark_V17	Jesus-em	akuzitkengngukangi	apeghtuusiit	Pharisees-et,	apeghtuusiillu	Herod-em.	Liisimakegkangi	maligsaaghtengan	liigikenghilkangat	akuzitkegkaa	enkaam	aaptekii,	“Sangan	neqekranglliinnilusi	pitsi?	Paninang	nallukaqetsilluu,	liigikigatetsilluu?	Umughtakii	umyugasi?
B02_08_Mark_V18	Iyelgulghiisi,	esghiigatsii?	Sigutelguusi,	nagaquusigatsii?	Neqamikenghistekii
B02_08_Mark_V19	tallimat	neqekrangllat	kagimtekanka	5,000-enun?	Qafsinat	pasketet	siipneghmeng	imighesteki?”	Kiimsiqaat,	“Qula	maalghuk.”
B02_08_Mark_V20	Jesus-em	aaptekii,	“Maaghraghvinlek	neqekrangllat	kagimtaqngamki	4,000-enun,	qafsinat	pasketet	siipneghmeng	imighesteki?”	Kiimsiqaat,	“Maaghraghvinlek.”
B02_08_Mark_V21	Aaplaataqii,	“Sangafsi	paninang	liigikigatsi?”
B02_08_Mark_V22	Bethsaida-mun	kaasata	ilangita	yuget	Jesus-mun	tagitkaat	ayaakaq	yuuk,	saaftaghtesqelluku.
B02_08_Mark_V23	Jesus-em	ayaakaq	tasluqluku	aghulaqutkaa	nemeng.	Taagken	qesighlukek	iiskek	saaflukek	aaptekaa,	“Sameng	esghaanneghisiin?”
B02_08_Mark_V24	Yugem	sivuglluni	yugsughaluni	pikaa,	“Aa-a,	esghaghanka	yuget,	iwernga	esghaqaaluteng	llangaqa	uqfiget	piyugullghiit.”
B02_08_Mark_V25	Jesus-em	allameng	saaftekakek	yugem	iiskek.	Maatenllaam	yuuk	esghaannaqeghllagyalghiimi,	qemall	esghaasagunneqigtuq	whateghlluwaaq.
B02_08_Mark_V26	Jesus-em	agliisqegkaa	nenganun,	pikaallu,	“Aghuliifqaavek	taakwani	nemi.”
B02_08_Mark_V27	Taagken	Jesus-enkut	maligsaaghtekullghiit	aghulaqegkat	nenun	tunganganilngughnun	Caesarea	Philippi-em.	Tumemi	taakwani	maligsaaghteni	aaptekii,	“Kinangunilunga	yuget	piiqatnga?”
B02_08_Mark_V28	Kiimsiqaat,	“Ilangita	piiqaaten	John-nguniluten	Paaptaayesta,	ilangita	Elijah-nguniiqaaten,	enkaam	ilangita	naliqniluten	uuknaliqistet.”
B02_08_Mark_V29	Aaptekii,	“Elpesi	kinganguniiqestengnga?”	Peter-em	pikaa,	“Christ-anguuten.”
B02_08_Mark_V30	Taagken	Jesus-em	ineghtengngwaaqii,	“Kitumun	alngunak	apeghpenanga.”
B02_08_Mark_V31	Taagken	Jesus-em	apeghtuqestaqii	maligsaaghteni,	“Ighnegha	Yugem	elngaatall	ikfiqepestaaghyaghqaaguq,	ighsaksaghqaqaatlu	siivanlleghet,	chief	priest-et,	apeghtughikayugetlu	Liilightuusaneng.	Taagken	tuqulleqaat	iwernga	pingayiitangani	aghneghem	unguvaghllequq.”
B02_08_Mark_V32	Whateghlluwaaq	ungipaatkii.	Peter-em	iqitulluku	aghyuuqaa.
B02_08_Mark_V33	Iwernga	Jesus-em	qiivluni	esghaqii	maligsaaghteni	taagken	Peter	aghyuuqaa.	Pikaa,	“Awiiten	whangamneng,	Tughneghaq.	Sumeghtaghalleghten	yugem	sumeghtaghalqii,	Kiyaghneghem	sumeghtaghalqenghitii!”
B02_08_Mark_V34	Taagken	Jesus-em	yulghuteghllagetlu	maligsaaghtenillu	tagsighteghluki	pikii,	“Kitum	alngunak	maligsukuminga,	ellmineng	katam	piyukelleni	peglluki,	qaquurani	uyamigluku	maligllinga.
B02_08_Mark_V35	Kitum	alngunak	yuguliyukumigu	unguvalleni	iflayaghqaqaa.	Iwernga	kitum	alngunak	iflakumigu	unguvalleni	whanga	apalluqlunga,	Pinilghiitlu	Ungipat	apalluqluki	yuguliyaghqaqaa.
B02_08_Mark_V36	Sangwaangam	yugem	pinighqusiqelleqagu	piliilluku	nunaghllak,	iflakumikek	unguvasigni?
B02_08_Mark_V37	Sameng'ngam	yuuk	veghtusiqelleqa	unguvasigminun?
B02_08_Mark_V38	Maaten	aghneghem	yugi	ataasiighmenneghitut	Kiyaghneghmun,	seghleghqumanguutlu.	Maani	aghneghni	kitum	alngunak	kaynguyaguskanganga,	apeghtuusankallu,	whangallu	Ighneghani	Yugem	kaynguyagulleqaqa	tagikuma	aghtughyaghqaanghillelighlunga	Atamneng	kelqelluki	agleghnalghiit	yaqulget.”
B02_09_Mark_V1	Nagneghutkiillu	whaten,	“Ipa	ungipaatamsi,	ilasi	nekevghallghiit	whani	tuqunaanghitut	kenlanga	esghalleghmeggnun	Ataneghpagullgha	Kiyaghneghem	tagikan	aghtughyaghqaanghilleghtuumaghmi.”
B02_09_Mark_V2	Aghvinlek	aghneq	atughluku,	Jesus-em	kelqelluki	Peter-enkut,	James-enkut,	John-enkut,	mayuqat	uusqalghiimun	naayghamun.	Ellnginaghhaalghiit	tawani	Jesus-em	yugusii	allangughtekaq	esghaamallghitni.
B02_09_Mark_V3	Aatkii	qelmeghtekat	qatetun,	qaatghataghaghluteng	kitum	alngunak	nunami	qateghsaghaqegkanganeng.
B02_09_Mark_V4	Taagken	maligsaaghtet	esghapakagket	Elijah-nkuk	Moses-enkuk	aliighlutek	aleghquqangak	Jesus.
B02_09_Mark_V5	Enkaam	maligsaaghtet	alingruughuteghllakat	repall	sameng	pipagningitkat.	Taagken	Peter-em	pikaa	Jesus,	“Apeghtughista,	itagnapigtuq	whaanlenguukut!	Pingayut	azigutat	nekefnaqaput,	elpenunllu	Moses-munllu	Elijah-munllu.”
B02_09_Mark_V7	Taagken	qilawaaq	aliighluni	saapegkii.	Qilawaaghmeng	mem	pikii,	“Unanguuq	piniqepigtekegka	Ighneqa;	nagataqiteggu!”
B02_09_Mark_V8	Taagken	yugsughaaghaghsalghiimeng	Moses-enkuk	Elijah-nkuk	aviituk,	Jesus-nginaghhaq	tawanteftuq.
B02_09_Mark_V9	Ukigutkelluku	naayghameng	Jesus-em	ungipaqesnanighwaaqaa	esghaatellghat	kenlanga	Ighnegha	Yugem	tuqulleghmeng	unguvaghtekan.
B02_09_Mark_V10	Enkaam	ineghsisteng	qaatkegkaat,	iwernga	ellnginaaghhneghmeggni	piiqelghiit,	“Samengtuq	pisiiwa	‘Tuqulleghmeng	unguvaghtelleq?’”
B02_09_Mark_V11	Taagken	aaptekaat	Jesus,	“Sangan	apeghtughikayuget	Liilightuusaneng	piiqatgu	Elijah	sivukluni	tagipestaaghyaghqaaniluku?”
B02_09_Mark_V12	Kiimsiqii,	“Ipanguuq	Elijah	sivukluni	tagipestaaghyaghqaaguq	yataaghqennaluku	sangwaa	tamaghhaan.	Aaptaghllamsi,	naqam	sangan	Akuzitet	Igaqegkat	pikaqatgu,	Ighnegha	Yugem	ikfiqeghllagyaghqaaniluku,	sasiinghilngughestunllu	kiyaghusaghqaaniluku?
B02_09_Mark_V13	Iwernga	ungipaannaqamsi	Elijah	tagikaaguq,	yuget	piyukelleghmegestun	pikaqaat	katam	tawaten	Akuzitet	Igaqegkat	pinaqnillghistun.”
B02_09_Mark_V14	Takuyaqmegteki	ilangi	maligsaaghtet,	yulghuteghllak	tawantuteftuq.	Ilangita	apeghtughikayuget	Liilightuusaneng	aaghtiiraaghaqeftiit	maligsaaghtet.
B02_09_Mark_V15	Legan	yuget	esghaghluku	Jesus	saghiighayugllagluteng	paayghaghlluku	quyakegkaat.
B02_09_Mark_V16	Jesus-em	maligsaaghteni	aaptekii,	“Sameng	aaghtiiraaghaqesteki	apeghtughikayuget	Liilightuusaneng?”
B02_09_Mark_V17	Yulghuteghllaget	akulngitneng	yugem	kiimsiqaa,	“Apeghtughista,	ighneqa	tagisaghaqa	elpenun,	qayughllak	ilumikun	tughneghalguuq.	Taam	tughneghaam	akuzisigataa.
B02_09_Mark_V18	Kaatepiggneghminigu	iqustaqaa,	qaanghallu	nuvaglliighqestaqaa,	gguutngi	terqitaagtaghtestaqii,	teveghqwaastaqaallu.	Maligsaaghtegpenun	kayagutaghsaghaqa	tughneghaq	aanestesqelluku	iwernga	pipagningitaat.”
B02_09_Mark_V19	Jesus-em	maligsaaghteni	pikii,	“Elpesi	yugni	ugpeqillghitusi!	Naten	tagkaan	elpesininnaqsinga	ugpeqesqellunga?	Mekelghiiq	whavek	tagiteggu!”
B02_09_Mark_V20	Enkaam	tagitkaat.	Legan	tughneghaam	esghaghluku	Jesus,	mekelghiiq	iqusluku	sayugpagtaghtestekaa.	Tamaani	temngi	ullghitaperewaaghtestekaa,	qaanghallu	nuvaglliightestekaa.
B02_09_Mark_V21	Jesus-em	aaptekaa	atanga,	“Qavngaghhaaneng	tawateta?”	Kiimsiqaa,	“Mekestaghhaatmineng	ima.
B02_09_Mark_V22	Uglaghngaan	kenghegnunllu	meghmunllu	iqustaqsaghaa	tuqusqelluku.	Piyaghqaakuvek	nangllegyagullutung	kayusiitaghtikung!”
B02_09_Mark_V23	Jesus-em	pikaa,	“Sangavek	tawaten	pizin,	‘Piyaghqaakuvek’?	Kiyaghneghem	sangwaa	alngunak	piyaghqaqaa	yugmun	ugpelghiimun.”
B02_09_Mark_V24	Tawaninginaq	mekelghiighem	atanga	iglagtuluni	pikaq,	“Ugpeghtunga,	iwernga	ugpelleghtughtaghaqaghnga!”
B02_09_Mark_V25	Jesus-em	esghaghluki	wata	yuget	tagilaghaallghiit	qevuulluku	aghyuuqaa	tughneghaq,	“Uyuq	tughneghaq	tuuslaghtestilghiillu	akuzistingigalnguqlu	qelghamken	aani	mekelghiighmeng,	allamengllu	itefqaavek	ellnganun	pilghaaten.”
B02_09_Mark_V26	Tughneghaam	mekelghiiq	araghaataghtesteghllagluku,	sayugpagtaghtesteghllagluku,	aanegkaq.	Legan	mekelghiiq	esghaqaaluni	tuqukaq	repall	esghapalghiit	pikat,	“Tuqumaaq!”
B02_09_Mark_V27	Iwernga	Jesus-em	iiggakun	tuguluku	kayusiitkaa	nekevesqelluku	enkaam	nekevegkaq.
B02_09_Mark_V28	Jesus	mangteghamun	iteghyan	ellnginaghhaaghsameng	maligsaaghtengita	aaptekaat,	“Sangan	whangkuta	aanesneghmeng	aghtughesteggu	tughneghaq?”
B02_09_Mark_V29	Jesus-em	kiimsiqii,	“Tawatelnguq	tughneghaq	yughaghhiinaam	aanesaghqaqaa,	saam	alla	pinaanghitaa.”
B02_09_Mark_V30	Taagken	nemeng	aghulaqluteng	nagneqat	Galilee-kun.	Jesus-em	kitumun	alngunak	liisimakesugumangitkaa	naantuleni,
B02_09_Mark_V31	qayughllak	apeghtuungukangi	maligsaaghteni	tuqulleghqamineng.	Pikii,	“Ighnegha	Yugem	tuguluku	tuunelleqaat	yugnun	tuqutesqelluku,	naqamenraq	pingayut	aghneghet	atughluki	unguvaghllequq.”
B02_09_Mark_V32	Iwernga	liigikumangilkangat	apeghtuusaa	sameng	pisiitanga,	enkaam	aapsugumangilkangat	tetugluteng.
B02_09_Mark_V33	Capernaum-emun	kaalluteng,	iteghaasameng	Jesus-em	aaptekii,	“Igleghutkelluku	sangwaa	aaghtiiraaghutkaqesteggu?”
B02_09_Mark_V34	Kiimsighyugumangilkangat,	qayughllak	igleghutkelluku	aaghtiiraaghutkat	nalighteng	angelleghpigaayaghqaatanga.
B02_09_Mark_V35	Jesus-em	aqumluni,	qula	maalghuk	siipneqluku	maligsaaghteni	tuqlughluki	pikii,	“Kina	alngunak	sivuliighsukumi	nekeglli	kinguliiluni,	qepghaghtengulillu	tamaghhaanun.”
B02_09_Mark_V36	Taagken	taghnughhaq	tuguluku	nekevestekaa	qukiitgun.	Qelluku	pikii,
B02_09_Mark_V37	“Kitum	alngunak	tugukliqumigu	taghnughhaghhaq	uutun	ayuqelghii	whanga	apalluqlunga,	tuguklighaqaanga	whanga.	Kitum	alngunak	tugukliquminga,	tuguklighlleqaa	Ataka	kayagtikaq	whangamneng.”
B02_09_Mark_V38	Mulugpenateng	John-em	pikaa,	“Apeghtughista,	yuuk	esghaamaaghput	ateghpegun	aanesqulghii	tughneghaghneng.	Ineghsimaaghput	qayughllak	whangkunnun	ilatnganghilnguq.”
B02_09_Mark_V39	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Ineghtegpenaan!	Qayughllak	kina	alngunak	atemkun	allaaghlluwhaghtingukumi	seghletun	akuzitkelghaghtughnaanghitaanga.
B02_09_Mark_V40	Kitum	alngunak	kipullegmun	pinghilkanginkut,	qepghalgutkaghput.
B02_09_Mark_V41	Ipa	ungipaatamsi,	kitum	alngunak	meghsikangisi	whanga	pikutemneng,	ipapestaaq	akileghtuusangyaghqaaguq.”
B02_09_Mark_V42	“Ataasiq	taghnughhaq	ugpeqingalghii	whangamneng,	yugem	seghleghqestekagu,	pinighataghaghnayaghtuq	taana	yuuk	meghmun	ateghsaqumi	uyaqghwakun	qaamqaghfikluku	uyghagllagmeng.
B02_09_Mark_V43	Iiggegpek	seghleghqestekangaten	kepnaketen.	Pinighataghaghnayaghtuten	yugusighpek	nalighnegha	iflakuvgu	unguvalleghpek	iflalleghqaaneng	quunperugllak.	Taana	pinighataghaghtuq	inglugtun	iiggelighluten	hell-mun	aglalleghqaghpeneng.	Tawani	kumaghughngalghii	keneq	qaamyaghqaanghituq.
B02_09_Mark_V44	Tawani	‘kinguget	neghegkayuget	yugmeng	tuquyaghqaanghitut,	kumaghughngalghiillu	keneq	qaamyaghqaanghituq’.
B02_09_Mark_V45	Itegaghpek	seghleghqestekangaten,	iiknaketen!	Pinighataghaghnayaghtuten	yugusighpek	nalighnegha	iflakuvgu	unguvalleghpek	iflalleghqaaneng	quunperugllak.	Taana	pinighataghaghtuq	inglugtun	itegalighluten	hell-mun	miluutelleghqaghpeneng.
B02_09_Mark_V46	Tawani	‘kinguget	neghegkayuget	yugmeng	tuquyaghqaanghitut,	kumaghughngalghiillu	keneq	qaamyaghqaanghituq’.
B02_09_Mark_V47	Iyegpek	seghleghqestekangaten,	ipugnaken!	Pinighataghaghnayaghtuten	Ataneghpagullghanun	Kiyaghneghem	iitquvek	inglupigaghmeng	iiskelluten,	inglugtun	iyelguluten	hell-mun	miluutelleghqaghpeneng.
B02_09_Mark_V48	Tawani	‘kinguget	neghegkayuget	yugmeng	tuquyaghqaanghitut,	kumaghughngalghiillu	keneq	qaamyaghqaanghituq’.
B02_09_Mark_V49	Tamaghhaghmi	taghyulighllequq	keneghmeng.
B02_09_Mark_V50	“Taghyuq	pinightuq	iwernga	taghyughningiiskan,	naten	elpesi	taghyughnighllaataghnayaghesteggu?	Taghyughningiitegpenasi,	nekeggmetullusillu.”
B02_10_Mark_V1	Taagken	Jesus	aghulaqegkaq	tamaaken	nunameng.	Aglaghluni	nunamun	aatqelghiimun	Judea-mun,	aghviqakek	Kiiwek	Jordan-ek.	Yulghutem	qerngughfiklaataqaa	enkaam	apeghtuqii	piiqelleghmitun.
B02_10_Mark_V2	Ilangita	Pharisees-et	takuluku	anagniilqavigighnaqutkelluku	aaptekaat,	“Liilightuusamnni	itagnaghtaa	yugem	nuliini	pegtekumigu?”
B02_10_Mark_V3	Jesus-em	kiimsiqii	aaptemmeng,	“Sangaawami	Moses-em	qelghusaa?”
B02_10_Mark_V4	Kiimsiqaat,	“Moses-em	pilleghqalitkaqaa	yuuk	pegtusim	igii	imighluki	pegtesqelluku	nulighha.”
B02_10_Mark_V5	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Tawaten	Moses-em	Liilightuusalitkaqiisi	pineghllugllagutegpesineng.
B02_10_Mark_V6	Iwernga	nunangllaghyuwhaalleghmeng	‘Kiyaghneghem	ulimakaqaak	yuuklu	aghnaqlu.’
B02_10_Mark_V7	Taana	apalluqluku	yugem	unillukek	atanillu	naanillu	nuliighminun	lliighwaaghyaghqaaguq.
B02_10_Mark_V8	Enkaam	maalghugunanighllequk,	ataasiighllequk.
B02_10_Mark_V9	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	Kiyaghneghem	qerngughutestekakek	yeqay	yugem	pellghututesneghillikek.”
B02_10_Mark_V10	Mangteghamun	iteghaasameng	maligsaaghtet	aaptekaat	Jesus	tamaaken	pillghaneng.
B02_10_Mark_V11	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Yugem	nuliini	peglluku	allaneng	nulightuqumi,	taawa	gelgaghniighllequq.
B02_10_Mark_V12	Tawateghpigaq	aghnam	ugini	peglluku	allaneng	ugiiqumi,	taawa	gelgaghniighllequq.”
B02_10_Mark_V13	Ilangita	yuget	tagitkiit	taghnughhaat	Jesus-mun	saafluki	quyastesqelluki,	iwernga	maligsaaghtet	ineghtekiit	tagitilghiit.
B02_10_Mark_V14	Jesus-em	esghaghluki	seghleghyagulluki	maligsaaghteni	pikii,	“Taghnughhaat	tagilit	whangamnun.	Ineghtegpenaki,	qayughllak	Ataneghpagullgha	Kiyaghneghem	taghnughhaghestun	ayuqelghiit	pikaat.
B02_10_Mark_V15	Ipa	ungipaatamsi,	kitum	alngunak	tuguklinghilkumigu	Ataneghpagullgha	Kiyaghneghem	taghnughhaghtun,	iteghnaanghituq.”
B02_10_Mark_V16	Taagken	taghnughhaat	tugaaqluki,	saaftaqluki	quyastekii.
B02_10_Mark_V17	Jesus	igleghhneqigtaquqlu,	yugem	ketanqusnaq	takuluku	manungakun	segesqughlluni	aaptekaa,	“Pinilghii	Apeghtughista,	naten	salunga	kenlengilnguq	unguvalleq	allgeghhnayaghsikun?”
B02_10_Mark_V18	Jesus-em	aaptekaa,	“Sangan	pinighnizinga?	Kina	alngunak	pininghituq,	Kiyaghneghhiinaaguq	pinilghii.
B02_10_Mark_V19	Liilightuusat	liisimakaten:	‘Yugtaghpenang;	gelgaghniighpenang;	teglegpenang;	iqlengiqutkegpenaki	yuget;	puughtigpenang;	quulvaghlukek	atanllu	naanllu.’”
B02_10_Mark_V20	Yugem	pikaa,	“Apeghtughista,	ima	nukalpigaatemneng	qaatkengngwaanka	taakut	Liilightuusat.”
B02_10_Mark_V21	Jesus-em	piniqepiglluku	qiivluku	pikaa,	“Ataasiiguq	piyaghqan.	Akikughyaghtughhu	qamaglluku	saghyan,	enkaam	akinga	tunqughnaken	aklumalghiinun.	Tawaten	pikuvek	aklungillequten	qilagmi.	Taagken	maligsaghtughnakevnga.”
B02_10_Mark_V22	Tawaten	piyatni	yuuk	nulgiiqaq,	iqitkaq	iilqepiglluni	qayughllak	aklungitepiglleghhii.
B02_10_Mark_V23	Jesus	yugsughaluni	maligsaaghteni	pikii,	“Piyaqnapigtuq	aklungilngughni	itelleghqaa	Ataneghpagullgha	Kiyaghneghem!”
B02_10_Mark_V24	Tawaten	piyisteng	maligsaaghtet	saghiighayukat.	Jesus-em	pilaataqii,	“Taghnughhaghni,	piyaqnapigtuq	itelleghqaq	Ataneghpagullghanun	Kiyaghneghem!
B02_10_Mark_V25	Piyaqniisaghqaaguq	camel-em	suflughutelleghqaa	sikuum	iiyngakun,	aklungilnguum	yugem	itelleghqaaneng	Ataneghpagullghanun	Kiyaghneghem.”
B02_10_Mark_V26	Maligsaaghtet	wataqaaghaq	saghiighayukat,	enkaam	ellmeggneng	aapqughaaghutkat,	“Kinangam	yugulillengelleqa?”
B02_10_Mark_V27	Jesus-em	qiivluki	pikii,	“Yuget	piyaghqaqenghilkangit,	Kiyaghneghem	piyaghqaqii.”
B02_10_Mark_V28	Taagken	Peter-em	pikaa,	“Esghaqaghqutqun,	sangwaa	qamaglluku	unilluku	maliglleghaatamken.”
B02_10_Mark_V29	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Ipa	ungipaatamsi,	kitum	alngunak	uniskumiki	mangteghani,	anglegutni,	naani,	atani,	avaqutani,	nunani	apalluqlunga	whanga,	Pinilghiitlu	Ungipat,
B02_10_Mark_V30	allgeghutaaghaghyaghqaaguq	whani	kiyaghtaalleghmi.	Mangteghaa,	anglegutangi,	naanga,	avaqutii,	nunanga,	nulaghllagyaghqaagut;	tamaakunun	maligulluku	amyuutkellengyaghqaaguq.	Taagken	taakwaningani	kenlengilngughmeng	unguvallengyaghqaaguq.
B02_10_Mark_V31	Iwernga	uglalghiit	angelleghpigaat	ukaliighsaghqaagut	taagani,	enkaam	uglalghiit	ukalighpigaat	angelleghpigaaghsaghqaagut.”
B02_10_Mark_V32	Jesus	aga	sivungitnilnguq	igleghanguluki	tumetgun	Jerusalem-emun	ayuqelghiitgun.	Maligsaaghtengi	saghiighayukat,	yugetlu	alingumaghmeng	maligtekaat.	Jesus-em	qula	maalghuk	siipneqluku	maligsaaghteni	aafulluki	ungipaallaataqii	salleghqamineng.
B02_10_Mark_V33	Pikii,	“Nagatek,	Jerusalem-ennaqukut.	Tawani	Ighnegha	Yugem	tuunelleqaat	chief	priest-enunllu	apeghtughikayugnunllu	Liilightuusaneng.	Nanqiglluku	tuqusaghqaanilleqaat,	enkaam	tuunelleqaat	Gentile-enun.
B02_10_Mark_V34	Taakut	legasiighwaatkelleqaat,	qesiqulleqaat,	kagsagmiglleqaat,	tuqulleqaatlu.	Pingayut	aghneghet	atughluki	unguvaghllequq.”
B02_10_Mark_V35	Taagken	James-enkuk	John-enkuk,	Zebedee-m	ighneghegkenka	takuluku	Jesus	pikaak,	“Apeghtughista,	elpenun	sameng	pisqesugtukung.”
B02_10_Mark_V36	Jesus-em	aaptekakek,	“Sasqesugestek	whangamnun?”
B02_10_Mark_V37	Kiimsiqaak,	“Nighughqengngalghiimi	Ataneghpagulleghpeni	aqumegkuvek	aqumelgusighyugamken,	nalighpung	aghenqigneghpenilluku,	nalighpung	saghumigneghpenilluku.”
B02_10_Mark_V38	Jesus-em	pikakek,	“Nallukaghtek	sameng	tungsilleghtek.	Meghyaghqamneng	qayuusimelngughmeng	meghelleqestaak?	Paaptaayelleghqamtun	paaptaayelleqestaak?”
B02_10_Mark_V39	Kiimsiqaak,	“Piyaghqaagukung.”	Jesus-em	pikakek,	“Meghyaghqaqa	qayuusimelnguq	qaywa	meghelleqaghtek,	paaptaayellequteklu	paaptaayelleghqamtun.
B02_10_Mark_V40	Iwernga	whanga	nakmiksaghqaqenghitanka	kinkut	aqumyaghqaatangi	aghenqignemkunllu	saghumignemkunllu,	yataaghqutkat	tamaakut	aqumyaghqaagut.”
B02_10_Mark_V41	Taakut	qula	malighsaaghtet	nagaqughlukek	James-enkuk	John-enkuk	pillghak,	ugumiyagutkagket.
B02_10_Mark_V42	Enkaam	Jesus-em	qerngughlluki	pikii,	“Liisimakasi	Gentile-et	igleghutistengita	atanghutaqiit	yuteng,	aangwaaghughtekatlu	yukeghqutaqiit.
B02_10_Mark_V43	Iwernga	tawatesaghqaanghitusi	elpesi.	Nalighsi	aangwaaghuyukumi	qepghaghtenguli	ilaminun,
B02_10_Mark_V44	nalighsillu	aangelleghpigaayukumi	qepghaghtelaaghughlli	tamanganun.
B02_10_Mark_V45	Talwa	Ighnegha	Yugem	tagikaanghituq	qepghaatesqelluni,	tagikaaguq	qepghaatinalunillu	tuunalukullu	unguvalleni	yugulinaluki	yulghutet.”
B02_10_Mark_V46	Taagken	Jesus-enkut	maligsaaghtekullghiit,	yulghuteghllagetlu	Jericho-mun	kaalluteng,	aghulaqegkat.	Taawaanguq	ayaakaq	yuuk,	aatgha	Bartimaeus,	ighnegha	Timaeus-em	aqumluni	tumet	saningitgun	tungsighraghaqelghii.
B02_10_Mark_V47	Nagaqughyamigu	Jesus	Nazareth-eghmii,	tughwaaghniluku	akilghuukaq,	“Jesus!	Ighneghani	David-em!	Nangllegyagutaghtinga!”
B02_10_Mark_V48	Uglalghiim	yugem	aghyuuqaat	nepiighesqelluku	iwernga	qevuutaghalluni	akilghuukaq,	“Ighneghani	David-em,	nangllegyagutaghtinga!”
B02_10_Mark_V49	Jesus-em	aghuliighluni	pikii,	“Tagisqiteggu.”	Enkaam	tuqlughluku	ayaakaq	pikaat,	“Seghleghhalek,	tuqlughaaten	nekevi!”
B02_10_Mark_V50	Qaasliik	atkuyaaghegni	mataghaghllukek	nekefqaghlluni	takukaa	Jesus.
B02_10_Mark_V51	Jesus-em	aaptekaa,	“Sasqelluten	piiqsin?”	Ayaakam	kiimsiqaa,	“Apeghtughista,	esghaasagunneqigsugtunga.”
B02_10_Mark_V52	Jesus-em	pikaa,	“Igleghlleghhaaten,	ugpeqilleghpek	naallghutestaaten.”	Tawaninginaq	esghaasagutkaq	taagken	maligtekaa	Jesus.
B02_11_Mark_V1	Tughaaghyalghiimeng	Jerusalem-emun,	kaatkat	Bethphage-munllu	Bethany-munllu,	Mount	Olives-mi.	Taagken	Jesus-em	kayagtekakek	maalghuk	maligsaaghtegni	nemun	pisqellukek.	Pikakek,	“Kaataghesnaquftek	esghaghlleqaghtek	donkey-ghaq	petugngalghii	kitum	alngunak	igleghutkumangilkanga.	Itemulluku	taginnakesek.
B02_11_Mark_V3	Kitum	alngunak	aaptekangistek	whaten,	‘Sanaqestegnegu?’	ungipaannakesek,	‘Atanghem	atuqsugaa.	Taaqaghesnaqumigu	veghutesnaaghaa.’”
B02_11_Mark_V4	Enkaam	nemun	kaallutek	tumenilluku	esghaqaak	donkey-ghaq	petugngalghii	mangtegham	amigan	tungangakun.	Itemsimaluku
B02_11_Mark_V5	yuget	nekevghataaghullghiit	tawani	aaptekagket,	“Sangan	itemutestegnegu	donkey-ghaq?”
B02_11_Mark_V6	Kiimsiqiik	Jesus-em	apeghtullghatun	enkaam	yuget	nepiighutkagket.
B02_11_Mark_V7	Jesus-mun	kaatulluku	donkey-ghaq,	qaasliit	atkuyaatek	teghikusam	qaayngakun	lliyagneki,	Jesus	uuglluni	igleghtekaq.
B02_11_Mark_V8	Tamaakut	yulghutet	igleghullghiit	tumetgun	saaghquqiit	qaasliit	atkuyaateng,	ilangit	avayameng	ququngalegmeng	ikutaqluteng	tumet	saaghqughvikegkiit.
B02_11_Mark_V9	Jesus-em	sivunganilnguutlu	kingunganilnguutlu	akilghuutkat,	“Usuqnaghhalek	Kiyaghneq!	Kiyaghneghem	quyasligu	tagilghii	aatghakun	Atanghem!
B02_11_Mark_V10	Kiyaghneghem	quyasligu	tagilghii	ataneghpagullgha	sivunemta	David-em!	Usuqnaghhalek	Kiyaghneq	qulighpigaghmelnguq	qilagmi!”
B02_11_Mark_V11	Jesus	kaalluni	Jerusalem-emun,	aglaqaq	Temple-mun.	Tawani	sangwaa	qamaglluku	yuvghiiqaa.	Whanikungulghii,	kelqelluki	qula	maalghuk	siipneqluku	maligsaaghteni	aglaqaq	Bethany-mun.
B02_11_Mark_V12	Unaamingani,	Bethany-meng	uteghniitkelluku	Jesus	iyataqaq.
B02_11_Mark_V13	Uyavaneng	esghaqaa	figs-em	uqfiga	ququngaghtuqaq,	enkaam	esghaghyaghtuqaa	figs-elgunayukan.	Kaasaqminigu	ququngaraaghinaaftuq,	qayughllak	salin	figs-et	piisugniilnguut.
B02_11_Mark_V14	Jesus-em	uqfik	pikaa,	“Allamengllu	kitum	alngunak	figs-etughviknaanghitaaten!”	Maligsaaghtengita	nagatkaat.
B02_11_Mark_V15	Kaasameng	Jerusalem-emun,	Jesus,	Temple-mun	pikaq.	Tawani	aanesquqii	tukfightulghiitlu	akilpegalghiitlu.	Manimeng	naveghqughtet	tipelngit	ulleghquqii,	aqumutiitlu	qawaagmeng	akilpegaghtet.
B02_11_Mark_V16	Nangaqaghsaghqaananightestekiillu	kinkut	alngunak	sameng	tugumiilget	Temple-em	manughaakun.
B02_11_Mark_V17	Taagken	apeghtuqii	yuget,	“Kiyaghneq	pikaaguq	Akuzitni	Igaqegkani,	‘Mangteghaqa,	yughaghviguyaghqaaguq	tamaghhaanun	yuganun	nunam.’	Iwernga	elpesi	iighaghvigughtaghsi	wayaghniightenun!”
B02_11_Mark_V18	Chief	priest-etlu,	apeghtughikayugetlu	Liilightuusaneng	nagaqughluku	tawaten	pillgha,	akuzimghhutkegkaat	naten	tuqutelleghqameng,	naqam	alikumaan.	Alikegkaat,	qayughllak	qamaglluteng	yulghuteghllaget	saghiighayagutngukangit	apeghiillghi.
B02_11_Mark_V19	Ighivgaghyagu	Jesus-enkut	maligsaaghtekullghiit	aghulaqegkat	Jerusalem-emeng.
B02_11_Mark_V20	Unaanguluku	igleghutkelluku	esghaqaat	figs-em	uqfiga	palighwaaghumalghii	akughhaghminun	kenlanga.
B02_11_Mark_V21	Peter-em	esghaghluku	neqaatkaa	Jesus-em	pillgha.	Enkaam	pikaa,	“Apeghtughista,	ii-i,	figs-em	uqfiga	ineghtengngwaaqan	palighwaaghumaaq.”
B02_11_Mark_V22	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Ugpeqiteggu	Kiyaghneq.
B02_11_Mark_V23	Ipa	ungipaatamsi,	kitum	alngunak	malghuklillngunani	ilumikun,	ugpeqegkumikillu	akuzitni	piyaghqaatangi,	una	naayghaq	whaten	pikumigu,	‘Kelliinun	aatghi,’	taawa	apeghiighyaghqaaguq	ellnganun.
B02_11_Mark_V24	Enkaam	ungipaatamsi:	sangwaa	alngunak	aklukegkaghsi	yughaatkegkufsigu	ugpeqluku	allgeghsaghqaqutsi,	taawa	allgeghlleqaghsi.
B02_11_Mark_V25	Nekevneghpesini	yughaghnalusi,	seghevutaqiteki	seghletun	pistesi,	enkaam	Atagpesi	qilagmelnguum	seghevulleqii	seghleghqellesi.”
B02_11_Mark_V26	Iwernga	seghevutinghilkufsi,	talwa	Atagpesi	qilagmelnguum	seghevunnaanghitii	seghleghqellesi.
B02_11_Mark_V27	Jesus-enkut	maligsaaghtekullghiit	kaanneqigtekat	Jerusalem-emun.	Jesus	igleghsimaluku	Temple-em	manughaani,	chief	priest-etlu,	apeghtughikayugetlu	Liilightuusaneng,	Elder-etlu	takuluku
B02_11_Mark_V28	aaptekaat,	“Saam	pilleghqaakun	aanesqughsiki	akilpegaghtet?	Kitum	qelellghakun	tawaten	pinguzin?”
B02_11_Mark_V29	Jesus-em	kiimsiqii,	“Ungipaalleqamsi	kitum	qelelghakun	tawaten	pikaatka	kiimsiqufsinga.
B02_11_Mark_V30	John-em	paaptaayeghillgha	Kiyaghneghmeng	pingwaa,	nalighmeng	yugneng?	Ungipaatengnga.”
B02_11_Mark_V31	Ellmeggneng	akuzimghhutkat,	“Kiyaghneghmeng	piknikumteggu,	pilleqiinkut,	‘Sangan'ngam	ugpeqenghisteggu	John?’
B02_11_Mark_V32	Yugneng	piknikumteggu	yuget	anguyiilleqiinkut.”	(Alingegkat	yugneng,	qayughllak	yuget	qamaglluteng	ugpeqngukangat	John	uuknaliqistengutanga.)
B02_11_Mark_V33	Enkaam	Jesus	kiimsiqaat,	“Nallukaghput.”	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Whangallu	ungipaannaanghitamsi	kitum	qelellghakun	tawaten	pikaatka.”
B02_12_Mark_V1	Taagken	Jesus-em	ungipaghaatetgun	aleghquqii.	Pikii,	“Taawanguq	yuuk	piitesiighaqaq	grapes-meng,	mingllusiqaallu	uvitanga	piitesighaghvini.	Laagutkakek	grapes-mun	qageghquusik,	nekeftekaallu	kelengakivigkaq.	Taagken	piitesighaghvini	navghitkaa	grapes-meng	piitesighaghtenun	nengitesqelluni,	enkaam	ellnga	natmun	aghulaqegkaq.
B02_12_Mark_V2	Saghnayaghqaaghsata	ataasiq	qepghaghteni	kevgaqegkaa	nengini	grapes-et	aqfasqelluki.
B02_12_Mark_V3	Kaasan	taakut	aflengakistet	akuqaghluku	qevutiighluku	avangunaan	aglaghtestekaat.
B02_12_Mark_V4	Kevgaqlaataqaa	ilanga	qepghaghteni.	Taana	naasqwakun	kiitiquluku,	kayngusaghaatestekaat.
B02_12_Mark_V5	Kevgaqiilaataqaq	ilanganeng	qepghaghtemi	enkaam	taana	tuqutkaat.	Ilangillu	qepghaghtelghuteni	kevgaqenghaki	legan	tawaten	piiqegkangit,	ilangit	qevutiiqiit,	ilangit	tuququqiit.
B02_12_Mark_V6	“Qenwat	ataasighhaaghtuq	kevgaqsaghqaa,	ighnegha	piniqumtaagha.	Kevgaqegkaa	sumeghtaghaamaghmi	whaten,	‘Ighneqa	siivakelleqaat.’
B02_12_Mark_V7	Iwernga	taakut	aflengakistet	ilateng	pikiit,	‘Uum	piliisaghqaqaa	una	piitesiighaghvik.	Tuqutelteggu	enkaam	piitesiighaghvik	whangkuta	piliilleqaghput!’
B02_12_Mark_V8	Enkaam	akuqaghluku,	tuqulluku	yugusii	egtekaat	piitesiighaghvigmeng.”
B02_12_Mark_V9	Jesus-em	aaptekii,	“Salleqang'ngam	piitesiighaghvilek?	Tagiluni	navghitivikegkaqsaqenni	taakut	tuququghluki,	enkaam	piitesiighaghvini	allanun	navghilleqaa.
B02_12_Mark_V10	Atightiigasteggu	una	Akuzitni	Igaqegkani?	‘Uyghak	mangteghangllaghtet	ighsakegkaat	piyalghiimi	megnunalleghpigaaftuq	uyghak.
B02_12_Mark_V11	Taana	Atanghem	apeghiiqaqaa,	Allaaghlluwhaghyugnapigtuq!’”
B02_12_Mark_V12	Jews-et	igleghutistengita	tuguyupigtekaqsaqangat,	qayughllak	liigikelghiit	ungipaghaatetgun	Jesus-em	ellngit	akuzitkaqeftii.	Iwernga	alingegkat	yulghutneng	enkaam	unilluku	aghulaqegkat.
B02_12_Mark_V13	Taam	kingunganeng	Jews-et	igleghutistengita	kayagtekiit	ilangi	Pharisees-etlu	maligsaaghtengillu	Herod-em	anagniilqavigiisqelluku	Jesus.	Kayagtekiit	anagniilqavigiisqelluku	akuzillghakun.
B02_12_Mark_V14	Kaalluku	pikaat,	“Apeghtughista,	liisimakamken	ataasiighmetuten.	Waakigataten	yuget	sumeghtaghallghit,	talwa	waakigataten	yuget	sanguyaghngaata,	iwernga	ipapighqelluten	apeghtuusaqaqan	Kiyaghneghem	piyukellgha	yugnun.	Ungipaataghtikut,	Kiyaghneghem	Liilightuusaani	elqughutngaa	llivikilleghqaghput	tax-eneng	Caesar-mun?	Llivikiltaa-a	nalighmeng	pinghitelta?”
B02_12_Mark_V15	Iwernga	Jesus-em	liisimakegkangi	seghletun	pingukangat	enkaam	pikii,	“Sangama	anagvigighnaqutkestengnga?	Manilitaghtengnga,	esghaqaghlakun.”
B02_12_Mark_V16	Tuunyatni	aaptekii,	“Kitum	gginaqagullu	aatqagullu	una?”	Kiimsiqaat,	“Caesar-em.”
B02_12_Mark_V17	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Tuuniteki	Caesar-mun	tamaakut	Caesar-em	pingi.	Tuuniteki	Kiyaghneghmun	tamaakut	Kiyaghneghem	pingi.”	Enkaam	saghiighayagutkaat	Jesus.
B02_12_Mark_V18	Taagken	ilangi	Sadducees-et,	Jesus-mun	pikat.	(Tamaakut	piiqelghiit	tuqukat	unguvaghyaghqaanghinniluki.)
B02_12_Mark_V19	Pikaat,	“Apeghtughista,	Moses-em	Liilightuusangllaqaqiinkut	whaten,	‘Yuuk	nuliilek	avaqutigpenani	tuqukan	anglegutangan	tuguyaghqaqaa	aghnaq	avaqutinnaluku	anglegutni	tuqukaq.’
B02_12_Mark_V20	Taawanguq	maaghragvinlek	yuget	anglegutkullghiit.	Nuyeklighpigaq	nulightughluni	avaqutigpenani	tuqukaq.
B02_12_Mark_V21	Enkaam	tuunglighhaan	tugukaa	aghnaq,	iwernga	ellngallu	tuqukaq	avaqutigpenani.	Pingayiitangan	tuguluku	aghnaq,	tuqukaq	avaqutigpenani.
B02_12_Mark_V22	Qamaglluteng	tugaaqluku	aghnaq	tuqulaghaatkat	avaqutigpenateng.	Kingulighpigaaluni	aghnaq	tuqukaq.
B02_12_Mark_V23	Qamaglluteng	maaghraghvinlek	anglegutkullghiit	nulighqegkaqsaqangat.	Aghneghmi	tawani	tuqukat	unguvaghtuutellghitni,	naliita	aghnaq	nulighqelleqagu?”
B02_12_Mark_V24	Jesus-em	kiimsiqii,	“Sumeghtaghallesi	anaggutngaat	qayughllak	liigikigalkesi	Akuzitet	Igaqegkat,	nallukegkesillu	Kiyaghneghem	aghtughyaghqaanghillgha.
B02_12_Mark_V25	Tuqukat	unguvaghtuuskumeng	tuqulleghmeng,	qilagmelngughestun	yaqulgestun	ayuqsaghqaagut,	nengughutusaghqaanghitut.
B02_12_Mark_V26	Atightiigastegguu	Kiyaghneghem	apellgha	tuqukat	unguvalleghqiitneng	tuqulleghmeng?	Moses-em	igaani	apeghngaaq	kumaghughngalghiimi	uqfillegaghmi.	Tawani	Kiyaghneghem	pikaqaa	Moses,	‘Whanga	Kiyaghneqaanga	Abraham-em,	Kiyaghneqaanga	Isaac-em,	Kiyaghneqaanga	Jacob-em.’
B02_12_Mark_V27	Taana	whaten	pisiiguq,	Kiyaghneq,	Kiyaghneqenghitaat	tuqukat,	Kiyaghneqaat	unguvalghiit.	Enkaam	anaggutepigsimaasi!”
B02_12_Mark_V28	Apeghtughikayuk	Liilightuusaneng	tagiluni	nagatkii	aaghtiiraaghullghiit.	Nagalluku	Jesus-em	kiimsighilaataqullgha	Sadducees-enun,	aaptekaa,	“Natungaawa	Liilightuusaq	megnunalleghpigaq?”
B02_12_Mark_V29	Jesus-em	kiimsiqaa,	“Megnunallegpigaq	unanguuq:	‘Nagatek,	Israel-eghmiini!	Ataneq	Kiyaghneghput	taananginaghhaaguq	Ataneq.
B02_12_Mark_V30	Ataneq	Kiyaghneghen	piniqsaghqaqan	tamaghhaakun	ilugpegun,	tamaghhaakun	unguvasighpegun,	tamaghhaakun	umyugaghpegun,	qamagllukullu	iknaqelleghpegun.’
B02_12_Mark_V31	Tuunglighha	whatetuq:	‘Piniqsaghqaqaten	yulguteten,	piniqelleghpetun	elpeneng	katam.’	Alla	Liilightuusiituq	taakugetun	megnunaghtutkalghiimeng.”
B02_12_Mark_V32	Apeghtughikayugem	Liilightuusaneng	Jesus	pikaa,	“Apeghtughista,	elqughaghtan!	Ipanguuq	taana	pillghen,	Ataneq	taananginaghhaaguq	Kiyaghneq,	alla	avangituq	kiyaghneghmeng	iwerngaqun	ellnga.
B02_12_Mark_V33	Enkaam	yugem	piniqsaghqaqaa	Kiyaghneq	tamaghhaakun	ilumi,	tamaghhaakun	umyugagmi,	tamaghhaakunllu	iknaqelleghmi.	Piniqsaghqaqiillu	yulgutni	katam	ellmineng	piniqelleghmitun.	Taakuk	Liilightuusak	megnunaghataghaghtuk	paneghlluku	tunusaqegkaneng,	nalighmeng	aghqutkegkaneng.”
B02_12_Mark_V34	Jesus-em	liigiksamigu	yugem	kiimsiitnga	elqughutngalghii,	pikaa,	“Qantaghantuten	Ataneghpagullghaneng	Kiyaghneghem.”	Taam	kingunganeng	kitum	alngunak	tetugyagutkaa	aapqughaaneghmeng	Jesus.
B02_12_Mark_V35	Temple-mi,	Jesus-em	apeghtughitkelluku	aaptekii,	“Sangan	apeghtughikayuget	Liilightuusaneng	piiqatgu	Christ-a	David-mun	Ighneqniluku?
B02_12_Mark_V36	Agleghnalghiim	Taghnegham	David	whaten	pistekaqaa,	‘Atanghem	pii	Atanqa:	Aqumi	whagun	aghenqignemkun	kenlanga	anguyagten	itegaghpek	asinganun	lliightellemnun.’
B02_12_Mark_V37	“David-em	ellngan	katam	atiqaqaa,	‘Ataneghmeng’	enkaam	naten	Christ-a	Ighneqagu	David-em?”	Yulghutet	quyakusiqinaghluku	nagatkaat	Jesus.
B02_12_Mark_V38	Apeghtuutkelluki	pikii,	“Kelengalusi	apeghtughikayugneng	Liilightuusaneng.	Aasuneghtuut	atkuyaaghmeng	akughtuqameng,	igleghsuneghtuutlu	akilpegaghvigni	yugnun	qungughfikesqelluteng.
B02_12_Mark_V39	Aqumyuneghtuut	aangwaaghughtekat	aqumutiitgun,	synagogue-nillu	neqenghaghqelghiinillu.
B02_12_Mark_V40	Esghaghlaataqwaaqiit	ugingighat	mangteghiighaqluki.	Taagken	pinighniluteng	pisqelluteng	taakluku	yughaghaqut.	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	aghyuullengeghllagyaghqaagut!”
B02_12_Mark_V41	Temple-mi,	Jesus-em	aqumgatkelluku	tungangakun	manilghutam,	esghapakii	yulghutet	kanaghtiighaatalghiit	manimeggneng.	Aklungilnguut	yulghutet	manilghutmeng	kanaghquqat.
B02_12_Mark_V42	Taagken	aklumalghii	ugingighaq	iteghluni	kanaghtekakek	maalghuk	maningiighhaak,	qerngaagmek	penny-nguftuk.
B02_12_Mark_V43	Jesus-em	maligsaaghteni	tuqlughluki	pikii,	“Ipa	ungipaatamsi,	uum	aklumalghiim	ugingigham	tuunegkakek	qaayghutinguuk	aklungilnguut	tuunegkiitneng.
B02_12_Mark_V44	Yuget	kanaghtinguut	aklungimeggneng,	iwernga	uum	aghnam	kanaghtaa	qamaglluku	maningiighhani,	akluknguyaqanga	ellminun	kiyaghusighqaaluku.”
B02_13_Mark_V1	Jesus	aanumaluku	Temple-meng,	ataasim	maligsaaghtengan	pikaa,	“Apeghtughista,	ii-i!	Esghaqaghqiqun	maakut	pinighnaghllaget	mangteghat	uyghagrukutaaghllagneng	ulimaaghet.”
B02_13_Mark_V2	Jesus-em	pikaa,	“Esghaghsikii	mangteghaghllaget	maakut?	Talwa	ataasiq	uyghak	nemininnaanghituq;	qamaglluteng	ulleghqughyaghqaagut.”
B02_13_Mark_V3	Mount	Olives-mi,	Jesus	ellnginaghhaghmi	aqumgamaluku	Temple-mun	ayuqluni,	Peter-enkut	James-enkut	John-enkut	Andrew-nkut	takukaat.
B02_13_Mark_V4	Aaptekaat,	“Ungipaatikut,	qakun	tamaakut	piyaghqaawat?	Sangulleqa	liisimakusighqaghput	tamaakut	apeghiilleghqiitnun?”
B02_13_Mark_V5	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Kelengatek,	kitumun	alngunak	puughtestegpenasi.
B02_13_Mark_V6	Uglaapiglleghhii	tagiyaghqaaguq	atuqluku	aatqa,	whaten	piiqluteng,	‘Ellnganguunga!’	Enkaam	uglaapiglleghhii	puughqughyaghqaqaat.
B02_13_Mark_V7	Nagaququfsiki	pilluwat,	akusqaghtaatkellghetlu	pilluwat,	alingegpenasi.	Tamaana	piyaghqaaguq,	salin	iquggnaqngunghituq.
B02_13_Mark_V8	Nunam	ramkengi	pilluwutullequt,	nunamllu	ataneghpagullghi	sughugaallequt,	nunatlu	nani	alngunak	tuyepeghtaghaqluteng	piyaghqaagut,	neqangisagllagaqlunillu	piyaghqaaguq.	Qamaglluteng	tamaakut	aghnam	ighniyukestallghatun	ayuqut.
B02_13_Mark_V9	“Iwernga	elpesi	kelengalusi.	Tugulusi	agghistenun	aglaalleqiisi.	Synagogue-ni	kagsagmiglleqiisi.	Whanga	apalluqlunga	nekevellequsi	sivungitni	igleghutistetlu	umiilgetlu	ungipaghtengulusi	Pinilghiineng	Ungipaneng.
B02_13_Mark_V10	Pinilghiit	Ungipat	ungipaqsaghqaagut	tamanganun	ramkenun	sivungani	iqugtellghem.
B02_13_Mark_V11	Tugulusi	aglaaskangisi	nanqigtivigmun	sumeghtaghaqestaghpenasi	akuzitkaghqameng.	Pilleghqaq	kaataqegkan	akuziiqnaaghtusi	pisqelleghpesistun,	qayughllak	elpesingunaanghitut	akuzilghiit,	Agleghnalghiik	Taghneghak	elpesigun	akuziiqnaaghtuk.
B02_13_Mark_V12	Yuget	angleguteteng	tuqutesleqiit,	yuget	avaqutateng	tawateghpigaq	pisleqiit.	Taghnughhaatlu	angayuqateng	kipullginaaghluki	tuqutesleqiit.
B02_13_Mark_V13	Whanga	apalluqlunga	qamaglluni	yugem	ugumiilleqiisi.	Iwernga	kina	alngunak	nuqenneghtuqaq	kenlemun	yugulillengyaghqaaguq.”
B02_13_Mark_V14	(Yeqay	atightulghiim	liigikligu	una	uuknaliqelleq!)	“Esghaqufsigu	agleghniighutista	paaghqiitestilghii,	nekaghqaqenghilkemini	nekevelghii,	tamaakut	Judea-melnguut	anagniighhaat	naayghanun.
B02_13_Mark_V15	Yuuk	mangtegham	qaaynganilnguq	qamavek	kelqesaghqameng	aqfatefqaami	pilghaaq.
B02_13_Mark_V16	Yugem	piitesighaghvigmelnguum	qaasligni	aqfafqaamikek	pilghaaq.
B02_13_Mark_V17	Seghleghwaaghunaqnguut	tamaakut	qumilgetlu	mamaghtilghiitlu	tamaani	aghneghni!
B02_13_Mark_V18	Yughaghtek	Kiyaghneghmun	uksumi	tawaten	pifqaan	pisqelluku!
B02_13_Mark_V19	Qayughllak	tamaani	aghneghni	seghleliiq	seghleghataghaayaghqaaguq	seghleliighaqelleghneng	ima	Kiyaghneghem	ulimayuwhaallghaneng	nuna	whavemun	kenlanga.	Allamengllu	tawatelnguq	seghleliiq	pinaanghituq.
B02_13_Mark_V20	Atanghem	takellimangisaqaki	tamaakut	aghneghet,	kina	alngunak	unguvanayanghituq.	Iwernga	apalluqluki	nakmikegkani	aghneghet	takellikaqii.
B02_13_Mark_V21	“Taagken	kitum	alngunak	pikangisi,	‘Esghaghteggu,	Christ-a	whaa!’	nalighmeng	‘Esghaghteggu,	tazigna	esgha!’	ugpeqegpenaan.
B02_13_Mark_V22	Christ-asighwaaghetlu	uuknaliqistesighwaaghetlu	allgeghtuusaghqaagut.	Allaaghlluwhaghtighllagaataghyaghqaagutlu,	saghiighanaghqeghllagaataghyaghqaagutlu	puughqughnaluki	yuget,	talwa	Kiyaghneghem	nakmikegkii	puughsaqlegukumegteki	pilleqiit.
