B02_13_Mark_V23	Enkaam	kelengalusi!	Sameng	tamaghhaaneng	ungipaatekestaghamsi	tamaakut	pistegpenaki.
B02_13_Mark_V24	“‘Kingunganeng	taam	seghleliilleghllagem	siqineq	mamlegllequq,	tanqiq	nighugunnanighllequq,
B02_13_Mark_V25	ighaleqetaaghet	ifkaquullequt	qilagameng,	aghtughyaghqaanghillghet	qilagamelnguut	igleghallghit	alngunaghqeslequt.’
B02_13_Mark_V26	“Taagken	yuget	esghaghlleqaat	Ighnegha	Yugem	tagilghii	qilawaaghteggun	aghtughyaghqaanghillelighllaglunillu	nighughqellelighllaglunillu.
B02_13_Mark_V27	“Taagken	yaqulget	kayaglleqii	qerngughtesqelluki	nakmikegkani	yuget	nunataghhaaneng	tamaghhaaneng.
B02_13_Mark_V28	“Liitfikiteggu	figs-em	uqfiga.	Avayii	uniilliighaghluteng	ququngii	piitekestaqata	sungaghyuketun	liisimakelleqaghsi	kiigyaghtulleq.
B02_13_Mark_V29	Figs-em	uqfiganeng	liitelleghpesistun	esghaqufsiki	tamaakut	qilagamelnguut	apellemtun	pilghiit,	liisimakelleqaghsi	Ighneghan	Yugem	kaasaghtungestallgha,	aaqun	amigmun	lliighumaaq.
B02_13_Mark_V30	Ipa	ungipaatamsi,	maaten	unguvalghiit	tuqunaanghitut	sivungani	qamaglluteng	tamaakut	pilleghqiita.
B02_13_Mark_V31	Qilagallu	nunallu	aviighusaghqaaguk,	iwernga	whanga	akuzitenka	aviighusagqaanghitut.
B02_13_Mark_V32	“Iwernga	kitum	alngunak	nallukaa	nani	aghneghmillu	aflumillu	tagiyaghqaatanga.	Talwa	yaqulget	qilagmelnguut	nallukaat,	Ighneghemllu	nallukaa,	Atanginaghhaam	liisimakaa.
B02_13_Mark_V33	Kelengatek,	waaknanighpenasi	qayughllak	nallukaghsi	qakun	tagilleghqaa.
B02_13_Mark_V34	Yugtun	ayuqsaghqaaguq	natmun	pilghiitun.	Aghulaqellghilluni	qepghaghteni	aflengakistengllaghlleqii	mangteghaminun,	ungipaalleqiillu	sayaghqiitneng.	Amigniighteminunllu	kelengakesqegkaa	uteghnilleghqani.
B02_13_Mark_V35	Enkaam	elpesi	kelengatek,	qayughllak	nallukaghsi	qakun	mangteghalek	uteghnighyaghqaatanga.	Walluumllu	tagiiqli	ighivgaghmi,	unugem	qukaani,	aghtaghaqestami,	nalighmeng	unaanguluku.
B02_13_Mark_V36	Enkaangam	kelengatek	luuraq	kaatqaghtekumi	qavaalusi	angunayukangisi.
B02_13_Mark_V37	Aapqegka	una	elpesinun,	tamaghhaghllaganun	pingwaaqa:	Kelengalusi!”
B02_14_Mark_V1	Neqenghaghqelleghqaa	Passover-em,	Neqenghaghqelleghqaallu	Yeast-alillgilnguum	Neqekrangllam	kaasaghqak	maalghuk	aghneghek	atughlukek.	Chief	priest-etlu,	apeghtughikayugetlu	Liilightuusaneng	paninang	agghitngulghiit	aksaqluku	tuguluku	Jesus	tuqunnaluku.
B02_14_Mark_V2	Iwernga	neqenghaghqemmi	piyugumangilkangat	luuraq	yuget	seghleliighqiighllagnayukata.
B02_14_Mark_V3	Bethany-minguq	taawa	yuuk	atighaqegkangat,	Simon,	Leper-a.	Simon-enkuni	Jesus	neghumaluku,	aghnaq	iitqaq	tugumiiqlukek	alabaster-ek	aqimleghutak	akitupiglleghhiik	tepengllaasik,	nard-epigmeng	ulimaaghek.	Sigiqlukek	aqimleghutam	paaskek	kuuvegkakek	Jesus-em	naasqwakun.
B02_14_Mark_V4	Tawanlenguut	ilangi	ugumiyugluteng	ilateng	pikiit,	“Sangan	tepengllaasik	sakusiiqakek?
B02_14_Mark_V5	Akiklukek	allgeghutkennayaghtuk	300	siipngalghiimun	denarii-mun	enkaam	akinga	tunqughnayaghtuq	aklumalghiinun!”	Taagken	aghyuuqaat	aghnaq.
B02_14_Mark_V6	Iwernga	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Avelghaghteggu!	Sangan	seghlequughesteggu?	Piniipigtuq	whangamnun	tawaten	pillgha.
B02_14_Mark_V7	Aklumalghiit	quunpeng	tamaansaghqaagut,	enkaam	qakun	alngunak	kayusiitaqnaaghasi.	Iwernga	whanga	quunpeng	elpesininnaanghitunga.
B02_14_Mark_V8	Uum	aghnam	apeghiighaa	piyaghqani;	tepengllaghqekestaghaa	yugusiqa	llivelleghqamnun.
B02_14_Mark_V9	Ipa	ungipaatamsi,	nani	alngunak	nunataghhaani	tamaghhaani	Pinilghiit	Ungipat	ungipaqneghmegteki,	aapghaqnaaghaat	aghnam	tawaten	pillgha	yugnun	neqamikesqelluku.”
B02_14_Mark_V10	Taagken	Judas	Iscariot,	ilangat	qula	maalghuk	siipneqluku	maligsaaghtet,	chief	priest-enun	pikaq	uveghpagusugniluku	Jesus	ellngitnun,	tugusqelluku.
B02_14_Mark_V11	Tawaten	piyisteng	elngaatall	efquqegkaat,	akeqegkaatlu	manililleqniluku.	Enkaam	Judas	pilleghqangnaqutkegkaq	uveghpagunnaluku.
B02_14_Mark_V12	Sivuliq	aghnegha	Yeast-alillghilnguum	Neqekrangllam	Neqenghaghqellgha	kaatkaq.	Tawani	aghneghmi,	Jews-et	iiwleng	tuqutaqegkangit	penniighaghaat	Passover-em	Neqenghaghqellghanun.	Maligsaaghtet	aaptekaat	Jesus,	“Nani	yataaghqullaken	Passover-em	Neqenghaghqelleghqaaneng?”
B02_14_Mark_V13	Taagken	Jesus-em	pikakek	maalghuk	maligsaaghtegni,	“Jerusalem-emun	aglaghtek,	yugem	meghtalghiim	nallaghlleqiistek,	maliggnakesek.
B02_14_Mark_V14	Mangteghamun	iitqan	taam	mangtegham	yuga	pinakesek,	‘Apeghtughistem	whaten	pisqaaten,	Nani	maligsaaghtekullghiini	neghnaqesteggu	Passover-em	Neqenghaghqellgha?’
B02_14_Mark_V15	Kelguvikelleqiistek	qemtamelngughmeng	neghllagmeng,	sangwaa	qamaglluni	apeghiighwaaghluni	ayuquq.	Tawani	yataaghqunnakefkut.”
B02_14_Mark_V16	Maligsaaghtek	aghulaqlutek	Jerusalem-emun,	kaasalghiimek	sangwaa	qamaglluni	Jesus-em	apellghatun	ayuqeftuq.	Enkaam	Passover-em	neqekaghqaa	yataaghqegkaak.
B02_14_Mark_V17	Ighivgaghyagu,	Jesus-em	kelqelluki	qula	maalghuk	siipneqluku	maligsaaghteni	aglaqat	tawavek	mangteghamun.
B02_14_Mark_V18	Neghuutnguluteng	tipelegni	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Ipa	ungipaatamsi,	nalighpesi	neghelgusighilghiim	whangamneng	uveghpagunnaqngwaanga.”
B02_14_Mark_V19	Maligsaaghtet	seghleghyugluteng	kipullgusnaq	aapqughaaqaat,	“Whangangwaa?”
B02_14_Mark_V20	Jesus-em	kiimsiqii,	“Naliqaghsi	elpesi	qula	maalghuk	siipngalghiini,	whangamnun	maligulluni	sagneghmun	neptekanga	neqekrangllaq.
B02_14_Mark_V21	Ighnegha	Yugem	tuquyaghqaaguq	Akuzitet	Igaqegkat	pinaqnillghistun.	Iwernga	seghleghwaaghunaqnguuq	taana	yuuk	uveghpagutilghii	Ighneghaneng	Yugem!	Itagnaghnayaghtuq	allgeghumangisaqumi!”
B02_14_Mark_V22	Neghuutnguluteng	Jesus-em	tugukaa	neqekrangllaq.	Iyamsiqayugvikluku	Kiyaghneq,	aavgughluku	tunquqii	maligsaaghteni.	Pikii,	“Tuguluku	neghiteggu,	una	yugusiqaqa.”
B02_14_Mark_V23	Taagken	tuguluku	qayuusiq	wine-meng	imalek,	iyamsiqayugvikluku	Kiyaghneq,	tuunegkaa	ellngitnun,	qamaglluteng	meghvikaataqaat.
B02_14_Mark_V24	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Una	aakwaqa,	taaggun	Kiyaghneghem	akequsaa	apeghiighyaghqaaguq.	Tuqukuma	aakwa	kuuvellequq	uglaapiglleghiinun	yugnun.
B02_14_Mark_V25	Ipa	ungipaatamsi,	wine-meng	alla	meghnaanghitunga	kenlanga	aghneghmi	tawani	wine-eghraghaq	meghegkumkun	Ataneghpagullghani	Kiyaghneghem.”
B02_14_Mark_V26	Taagken	ilagaan	atughluku,	aanluteng	Mount	Olives-mun	pikat.
B02_14_Mark_V27	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Uniqaghaalleqaghpesinga	qayughllak	Akuzitni	Igaqegkani	Kiyaghneq	pikaaguq,	‘Tuqulleqaqa	penniighniighta	enkaam	penniighet	mingiqellequt.’
B02_14_Mark_V28	Iwernga	kingunganeng	unguvaghtestekanganga	Galilee-mun	aglaqestaghllequnga	sivugpesini.”
B02_14_Mark_V29	Peter-em	pikaa,	“Uniteqeghhnaanghitamken	qaywa	ilanka	qamaglluteng	qimaguuteghngaata!”
B02_14_Mark_V30	Jesus-em	pikaa	Peter,	“Ipa	ungipaatamken,	unukun	rooster-em	qalghilleni	alghightestegpenaan	nallunqelleqaghpenga	ketwhell	pingayuneng.”
B02_14_Mark_V31	Iwernga	Peter-em	sagiqepiglluni	pikaa,	“Qaywa	tuqulgusighyaghngaamken,	nallunqennaanghitamken!”	Ilangitallu	qamaglluteng	tawaten	pikaat.
B02_14_Mark_V32	Kaalluteng	tawavek	atilqelghiimun	Gethsemane-meng,	Jesus-em	pikii	maligsaaghteni,	“Aqumitek	taaggun,	yughaamalunga.”
B02_14_Mark_V33	Peter-enkut	James-enkut	John-enkut	kelqegkii.	Taagken	Jesus	alingruughllakestaqaqlu	seghleliighllakestaqaqlu.
B02_14_Mark_V34	Enkaam	pikii,	“Unguvasigka	qivghughllaguuq	repall	tuquyaghqaaghllunga.	Tawanllusi	kelengalgusightengnga.”
B02_14_Mark_V35	Tazingapighqaaghluni,	nunamun	sikmuulluni	yughaqaq	pilleghqalgukumi	ikfiqusighqani	atuqefqaan	pinaluku.
B02_14_Mark_V36	Pikaq,	“Abba,	Ataay,	sangwaa	qamaglluku	piyaghqaqan.	Awiitigu	una	qayuusiq	whangamneng,	iwernga	whanga	piyukelqa	avelghaghluku	elpek	piyukellghen	pigu.”
B02_14_Mark_V37	Taagken	takuyaqminiki	pingayut	maligsaaghteni,	qavaaftut.	Peter	pikaa,	“Simon,	qavaaziin?	Ataasighhaq	aflu	teghhumatkenneghmeng	aghtughsiguu?”
B02_14_Mark_V38	Taagken	pikii,	“Kelengatek,	yughaghtek,	nanghiiqullengenghitesqellusi.	Ipapestaaq	taghneghak	piyaghqaaghngaaghmek	iwerngaqun	yugusiq	kayaatuq.”
B02_14_Mark_V39	Tazingavek	aglanqiglluni	yughaqaq	taakut	ataasit	akuzitkelluki.
B02_14_Mark_V40	Takunqigsaqminiki	maligsaaghteni,	taawa	qavaatnguftut,	qayughllak	qavam	sakniqestekangi.	Kukriqegkatlu	sameng	pilleghqameng.
B02_14_Mark_V41	Pingayiitkun	takuluki	pikii,	“Taawa	qavaawaqetsii,	meghnaaliiqetsii?	Tawaten'ngam!	Taawa	aflu	kaatuq,	Ighnegha	Yugem	uveghpagusaghqaaghtuq	seghleghqestenun.
B02_14_Mark_V42	Nekevitek,	igleghtelta.	Esghaqaghtegguqun,	uka	uveghpaqutisteka!”
B02_14_Mark_V43	Jesus	paninang	akuzimaluku,	Judas	kaatkaq,	qula	maalghuk	siipneqluku	maligsaaghtet	ilangat.	Yulghutet	maligtekaat,	ilangi	savigpalighluteng,	ilangi	anagutalighluteng.	Chief	priest-etlu,	apeghtughikayugetlu	Liilightuusaneng,	siivanlleghetlu	kayagtekiit	maligtesqelluku	Judas.	(Taana	Judas	qula	maalghuk	siipneqluku	maligsaaghtet	ilakegkangat.)
B02_14_Mark_V44	Uveghpagutistem	pikaqegkangi,	“Yuuk	naaghyaghqaqa	tugunakesi,	enkaam	aghulaqunnakesi	kelengakistelighluku.”
B02_14_Mark_V45	Judas-em	kaatutkelluku	nagneghvikluku	Jesus	pikaa,	“Apeghtughista!”	Taagken	naaqaa.
B02_14_Mark_V46	Enkaam	Jesus	tuguluku	nuqneqaat.
B02_14_Mark_V47	Iwernga	ataasim	tawanlenguum	savigpani	nusugluku	high	priest-em	qepghaghtelaagha	sigutngighaghtekaa.
B02_14_Mark_V48	Taagken	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Tuguyaghtughestengngaa	savigpagtuumaghpesi,	anagutaghtuumaghpesi	nikimqun	wayaghniightestun	ayuqlunga?
B02_14_Mark_V49	Aghhutanga	tamaghhaan	apeghtughiiqunga	Temple-mi	tugungigataghpesinga.	Iwernga	tawaten	pilleghpesigun	Akuzitet	Igaqegkat	pillghit	apeghiightestasi.”
B02_14_Mark_V50	Taagken	qamaglluteng	maligsaaghtet	unilluku,	qimaguutkat.
B02_14_Mark_V51	Nukalpigam	maligtekaa	Jesus	qiipaghaghmeng	saputaqiinaghluni.	Tugukaqsaqangat
B02_14_Mark_V52	iwernga	saputani	unitqaghlluku	qimakaq	amsikaghmi.
B02_14_Mark_V53	Taagken	Jesus	aglaatkaat	High	Priest-em	mangteghaanun.	Chief	priest-etlu,	siivanlleghetlu,	apeghtughikayugetlu	Liilightuusaneng	qamaglluteng	tawantullghiit.
B02_14_Mark_V54	Uyavaqaanlluni	Peter-em	maligsaaqaa	Jesus	courtyard-nganun	High	priest-em	mangteghaan.	Tawani	kelengakistet	akulngitgun	aqumluni	ughugsiqaq	kenghem	manungani.
B02_14_Mark_V55	Chief	priest-etlu	qamagllutengllu	agghistet	tuqutesupigtekangat	Jesus.	Enkaam	tagsiqlighaqluki	yuget	aapghesqegkaat	Jesus	sameng	anaggusimatanga.	Iwernga	naalkusimangilnguut	tuqutusighqameng,
B02_14_Mark_V56	qayughllak	uglapiglleghhiit	temngi	iqlengiqutkegkaat	Jesus,	aapqiitlu	allakullghiit.
B02_14_Mark_V57	Taagken	ilangi	yuget	nekevluteng	iqlengiqutkegkaat	Jesus,	pikat,
B02_14_Mark_V58	“Nagatkaqaghput	whaten	pilghii,	‘Una	Temple-a	yuget	ulimaaghat	naafqelleqaqa.	Enkaam	pingayut	aghneghet	atughluki	allaneng	nekeftillequnga	yugem	ulimaaqenghilkanganeng!’”
B02_14_Mark_V59	Talwa	taakutlu	apellghit	allakutkat.
B02_14_Mark_V60	High	Priest-a	sivungitgun	nekevluni	aaptekaa	Jesus,	“Avutkillghitnun	sameng	piyaghqiisiin?”
B02_14_Mark_V61	Iwernga	Jesus	qaalkaamangilnguq,	kiimsiimangilkanga.	High	priest-em	aaplaataqaa,	“Christ-anguziin,	Ighnegha	Manigughaqegkemta?”
B02_14_Mark_V62	Jesus-em	kiimsiqaa,	“Taananguunga.	Esghaghlleqaghsi	Ighnegha	Yugem	aqumgalghii	aghenqigneghakun	Aghtughyaghqaanghillelgem.	Esghaghlleqaghsillu	tagilghii	qilagem	qilawaaghitgun!”
B02_14_Mark_V63	High	Priest-em	aatkani	piigluki	pikaq,	“Liisimakestengisaghngaamta	lliightukut!
B02_14_Mark_V64	Nagataghsi	seghletun	akuzilghii,	Kiyaghneghunilghii.	Naten	elpesi	agghitkesteggu?”	Agghillghat	ataasiightekaq,	qamaglluteng	tuqusaghqaanikaat.
B02_14_Mark_V65	Taagken	ilangita	qesiqukaat	Jesus,	gginaa	saapluku	tenglugpagaataqaat.	Aaptekaat,	“Uuknaliqistengukuvek,	ungipaatikut	kitum	tenglugtaten?”	Taagken	kelengakistet	tuguluku	qasaghtaataqaat.
B02_14_Mark_V66	Peter	paninang	qakma	manughamelluku,	ataasiq	aghnaghaq	high	priest-em	qepghaghtenga	tagikaq.
B02_14_Mark_V67	Esghaqaa	Peter	ughugsilghii.	Liisuqsamigu	pikaa,	“Elpeklu	Jesus-metkayuguuten	Nazareth-eghmiimi.”
B02_14_Mark_V68	Iwernga	mesighaqaq,	“Nallukaqa	sameng	piiquten	talwa	liigikenghitaqa	sameng	piten.”	Taagken	Peter	aglaghaquqlu	amigmun	aanaluni,	rooster-a	qalghiqaq.
B02_14_Mark_V69	Aghnaghaam	qepghaghtem	esghaghyamigu	allameng	tawanlenguut	pikii,	“Una	yuuk	taakut	ilakaat!”
B02_14_Mark_V70	Iwernga	Peter	mesighaghlaataqaq.	Mulunghituq	nekevghallghiit	pikaat	Peter,	“Mesighaghpagningituten,	taakut	ilakaaten	qayughllak	elpeklu	Galilee-ghmiinguuten.”
B02_14_Mark_V71	Taagken	Peter-em	siingvallaghmeng	pikii,	“Iqlengiqngukuma	Kiyaghneghem	aghyuughlinga!	Nallukaqa	yuuk	akuzitkegkesi!”
B02_14_Mark_V72	Legan	nepiightuq	rooster-em	qalghilleni	alghiqaa.	Tawani	Peter-em	neqaatkaa	Jesus-em	whaten	pillgha,	“Rooster-em	qalghilleni	alghightestegpenaan	nallunqelleqaghpenga	ketwhell	pingayuneng.”	Taagken	qiyaaghwaghllakaq.
B02_15_Mark_V1	Aghtaghaqiinaghyagu	chief	priest-etlu,	siivanlleghetlu,	apeghtughikayugetlu	Liilightuusaneng,	qamagllutengllu	agghistet	qerngughutkat	agghinnaluteng.	Taagken	Jesus	asighqesluku	aglaalluku	Pilate-mun,	tuunegkaat	ellnganun.
B02_15_Mark_V2	Pilate-em	aaptekaa,	“Jews-et	umiilkataan?”	Jesus-em	kiimsiqaa,	“Elpek	esgha	umiilgunikevnga.”
B02_15_Mark_V3	Chief	priest-et	uglaapiglleghhiineng	allaaghhiinaghneng	anaggunikaat.
B02_15_Mark_V4	Pilate-em	aaplaataqaa,	“Kiimsiitkaghqiisiin?	Naganneghisikii	uglaapiglleghhiineng	allaaghhiinaghneng	anaggunnikangaten?”
B02_15_Mark_V5	Iwernga	Jesus	sameng	pimangitkaq	enkaam	Pilate	saghiighayukaq.
B02_15_Mark_V6	Tamaghhaani	Passover-em	Neqenghaghqellghani,	Pilate-em	aanestaqegkanga	ataasiq	anusimingllaghaq	yuget	nakmikegkaat.
B02_15_Mark_V7	Taawanguq	Barabbas	anusimingllaghvigmelnguq,	maligulluni	ilangitnun	yugnun	yugtaghaataqaq	seghleliighqiighllagmi.
B02_15_Mark_V8	Yulghutet	tagiluteng	Pilate-mun	aanestesqegkaat	ataasiq	anusimingllaghaq	tawaten	piiqellghatun.
B02_15_Mark_V9	Aaptekii,	“Aanestesugestegguu	Jews-et	Umiilgat?”
B02_15_Mark_V10	Pilate-em	liisimakngwaaqangi	chief	priest-et	aqinakluku	Jesus	tagitngukangat	ellnganun.
B02_15_Mark_V11	Chief	priest-et	aaghqutaqegkiit	yulghutet	Barabbas	aanestesqelluku	avelghaghluku	Jesus.
B02_15_Mark_V12	Pilate-em	yulghutet	aaplaataqii,	“Sanaqsikunmi	umiilkenniiqegkesi	Jews-enun?”
B02_15_Mark_V13	Akilghuukat,	“Qaquuraghtestigu!”
B02_15_Mark_V14	Pilate-em	aaptekii,	“Sangan,	sameng	seghleghmeng	pimaa?”	Iwernga	iglagtaaghalluteng	akilghuukat,	“Qaquuraghtestigu!”
B02_15_Mark_V15	Enkaam	Pilate-em	efqughsugluki	yulghutet,	aanestekaa	Barabbas.	Taagken	Jesus	kagsagmigtesluku	tuunegkaa	pilluwaghtenun	qaquuriisqelluku.
B02_15_Mark_V16	Pilluwaghtet	itghutkaat	Jesus	umiilgem	mangteghaanun	(atilqelghii	Praetorium).	Taagken	pilluwaghtelghuteteng	qerngughtekiit.
B02_15_Mark_V17	Jesus-mun	aatestekagket	esnegrukegtak	atkuyaaghek.	Sikughllugmeng	qaghpangllaghluku	aatestekaat	naasqwakun.
B02_15_Mark_V18	Taagken	legasiighwaatkegkaat,	“Quulvaghamken	elpek	Umiilgat	Jews-et!”
B02_15_Mark_V19	Unaghsiighwaghmeng	naasqwakun	anaguleghluku,	qesiquluku,	manungakun	segesqughlluteng	qungughfikegkaat.
B02_15_Mark_V20	Legasiighwaatkenneghmeng	taaqsamegteggu	esnegrukegtak	atkuyaaghqek	mataghllukek	ellngan	katam	aatkii	aatestekiit.	Taagken	aanutkaat	qaquuraghnaluku.
B02_15_Mark_V21	Tumeni	taakwani	nallaqaat	yuuk,	aatqelghii	Simon-meng,	Cyrene-eghmii,	atangak	Alexander-enkuk	Rufus-enkuk.	Naken	qantaghaneng	taginguftuq	Jerusalem-emun.	Pilluwaghtet	qelghutkaat	Simon-mun	uyamigesqelluku	Jesus-em	qaquuraa.
B02_15_Mark_V22	Jesus	aglaatkaat	Golgotha-mun.	(Golgotha	whaten	pisiiguq,	“Yugem	Naasqwan	Nenga.”)
B02_15_Mark_V23	Tawani	tuunegkaat	wine-meng	myrrh-meng	akumegkameng,	iwernga	Jesus-em	ighsakegkaa.
B02_15_Mark_V24	Taagken	pilluwaghtet	qaquuraghyamegteggu	ateghtiiraaghulluki	aatkii	tugulaqiit.
B02_15_Mark_V25	Qaquuraqaqegkangat	unaanguluku	9-eklaagmi.
B02_15_Mark_V26	Qaquuraakun	nekegtekaat	avutkilleghteng	igaqngalghii	whaten,	Umiilgat	Jews-et.
B02_15_Mark_V27	Maalghuklu	wayaghniightek	qaquuraqagket,	ataasiq	Jesus-em	aghenqigneghakun,	aallgha	saghumigneghakun.
B02_15_Mark_V28	Akuzitet	Igaqegkat	whaten	pillghat	apeghiightuq,	“Ilalkiitkaqegkangat	seghletun	pistenun.”
B02_15_Mark_V29	Yuget	naghughlleghhiit	naasquteng	ufsugusimiita	legasiighwaatkegkaat	Jesus,	“Seghleghhalek,	elpek!	Temple-a	naafqelluku	nekefsaghqaqngukuvgu	pingayut	aghneghet	atughluki,
B02_15_Mark_V30	sangan	yuguliluten	elpeneng	qaquurameng	ukignanighsin?”
B02_15_Mark_V31	Chief	priest-etlu	apeghtughikayugetlu	Liilightuusaneng	legasiighwaatkegkaat	Jesus,	ilateng	pikiit,	“Yuguliiqi	ilangit	naqam	ellmineng	katam	yugulipagningituq!
B02_15_Mark_V32	Christ-a,	Umiilga	Israel-em,	ukigli	maaten	qaquurameng,	enkaam	esghapagluku	ugpeqelteggu.”	Qaquuralgutegkenkallu	seghlequuqaak.
B02_15_Mark_V33	Taagken	qamaglluni	nuna	mamleghqwaakaq	aghneghem	qukaaneng	kenlanga	3-klaagmun.
B02_15_Mark_V34	Tawani	3-klaagmi	Jesus	akilghuughllakaq,	“Eloi,	Eloi,	lama	Sabachthani?”	whaten	pisiq,	“Kiyaghnemni,	Kiyaghnemni,	sangama	unisinga?”
B02_15_Mark_V35	Ilangita	yuget	nekevghallghiit	nagalluku	pikat,	“Nagataghtekqun,	Elijah	tuqlughaghaa!”
B02_15_Mark_V36	Yuuk	ataasiq	aqfaquqaq	mesiqayugmeng.	Taagken	nepluku	quwaalghiimun	wine-mun	unaghsiighwaghqun	nekeglluku	nengugutkaa	Jesus-mun	melugriisqelluku.	Pikaq,	“Wiintaku,	esghapakaalteggu	Elijah-m	iiksaghtughaqsaaghaa	qaquurameng!”
B02_15_Mark_V37	Taagken	Jesus	araghllagluni	tuqukaq.
B02_15_Mark_V38	Temple-melnguq	safkaaghun	malghughqegkaq,	piikaq	pikegken	kanavek.
B02_15_Mark_V39	Pilluwaghtet	umiilwaaghita	qaquuram	manunganilnguum,	esghapagyamigu	Jesus	tawaten	tuqulghii,	pikaq,	“Ipapestaaq	una	yuuk	Ighnequmaagu	Kiyaghneghem!”
B02_15_Mark_V40	Aghnam	ilangi	uyavaneng	esghapakat.	Tawanteftut	Mary,	Magdala-ghmii,	Salome-llu,	Mary-llu	naangak	uyuqliim	James-em,	Joses-emllu.
B02_15_Mark_V41	Jesus,	Galilee-melluku	taakut	aghnat	maligsaaqaqegkangatlu	kayusiitkaqegkangatlu.	Ilangillu	aghnalghutet	tawanlenguut,	maligulluteng	ellnganun	Jerusalem-etkat.
B02_15_Mark_V42	Taawanguq	yuuk,	aatqelghii	Joseph-meng,	Arimathea-ghmii,	siivakumtaaq	ilangat	agghistet.	Ellnganllu	utaqangukanga	piinlilleghqaa	Ataneghpagullgha	Kiyaghneghem.	Whanikuyagu,	Yataaghqellghem	Aghneghani,	sivungiighhaani	Sabbath-em,	tetugnanighluni	Pilate-mun	piluni	tungsiqaa	Jesus-em	yugusii.
B02_15_Mark_V44	Pilate-em	saghiighayagutkaa	nagaqughluku	Jesus	tuqulghaghtuumaniluku.	Enkaam	pilluwaghtet	umiilwaaghat	tagsighluku	aaptekaa,	“Llaaghaan	Jesus	tuqulghaghtuumaa?”
B02_15_Mark_V45	Umiilwaaghmeng	liigiksamigu	Jesus-em	tuqullgha,	Joseph-mun	tugusqegkaa	yugusii.
B02_15_Mark_V46	Enkaam	Joseph	tukfighiyaghtuqaq	qatelghiimeng	qiipaghaghmeng	lliiveghyaghqanun	atuqaqegkemeggneng.	Taagken	iikluku	yugusii	qaquurameng,	iimgutkaa	qiipaghaghqun.	Taawanguq	uyghagrukutaaghllak	sanimineng	ilutmun	laakaq	lliivghuluni.	Tawavek	yugusiq	kanaghtekaa.	Taagken	uyghagrugllak	ullghitaghtaqaa	lliivghem	paaynganun.
B02_15_Mark_V47	Mary-m	Magdala-ghmiim,	Mary-mllu	Joses-em	naangan	esghapakaak	nagun	Jesus	llimatanga.
B02_16_Mark_V1	Sabbath-a	alpagyan	Mary,	Magdala-ghmii,	Mary-llu	naanga	James-em,	Salome-llu,	tepengllaasingegkat	Jesus-em	yugusii	angighhnaluku.
B02_16_Mark_V2	Sivuliim	aghneghani	santillghem,	unaangupiglluku	siqineq	piitekestaaluku	lliveghtekat.
B02_16_Mark_V3	Tumemi	taakwani	aapqughwaaghutkat,	“Kitumngam	ullghitaghtaannaqinkut	uyghagllagmeng	lliivghem	paaynganilngughmeng?”
B02_16_Mark_V4	Taagken	sivugsalghiimeng	uyghagllak	awitngwaaghluni	ayuqeftuq.
B02_16_Mark_V5	Lliveghmun	iteghluteng	esghaqaat	nukalpigaq	qatelghiimeng	atkuyaalek	aqumgalghii	aghenqigneghani.	Aghnat	elngaatall	saghiighayukat.
B02_16_Mark_V6	Nukalpigam	pikii,	“Saghiighayugpenasi,	liisimakamsi	ivaangwaaghsi	Jesus,	Nazareth-eghmii,	qaquuraqaayalghii.	Whaanneghituq,	unguvaghtestekaaguq!	Esghaqaghtegguqun,	whagun	llikaqsaghaat.
B02_16_Mark_V7	Ungipaasaghtughteki	maligsaaghtengi,	Peter-llu,	aga	Galilee-mun	sivullgaaghumaaq	pinaqnilleghmitun.	Taagani	esghaghlleqaghsi.”
B02_16_Mark_V8	Aanluteng	anagniiqat	lliveghmeng,	qayughllak	kukragyugumaghmeng	alingruughulghiit,	repall	ungeleglluteng.	Talwa	kina	alngunak	sameng	pimangilkangat,	qayughllak	alingruughulghiit.
B02_16_Mark_V9	Sivuliim	aghneghani	santillghem,	unaangupiglluku	Jesus	unguvaqaalghii	tuqulleghmeng.	Aliighviksuwhaaqaa	Mary,	Magdala-ghmii.	(Aghnameng	taagken	aanestekaqegkangi	maaghraghvinlek	tughneghaat.)
B02_16_Mark_V10	Ungipaasaghtuqii	ellnganisalghiit	qivghumaluki,	qiyamaluki.
B02_16_Mark_V11	Iwernga	ungipaasisteng	Jesus	unguvaamaniluku	tuqulleghmeng,	ellminunllu	esghaamaniluku	ugpequmangilkangat.
B02_16_Mark_V12	Taam	kingunganeng	Jesus-em	allanguluni	aliighvikegkakek	maalghuk	maligsaaghtegni,	navek	pimalukek.
B02_16_Mark_V13	Uteghnighlutek	ungipitkaqsaqangik	ilatek	iwernga	ugpequmangilkegket.
B02_16_Mark_V14	Taam	kingunganeng	Jesus-em	aliighvikegkii	qula	ataasiq	siipneqluku	maligsaaghteni	neghuusimaluki.	Aghyuuqii	ugpeqinghitellghitnengllu	aygughikellghitnengllu	esghaatkat	ellmineng	unguvaghtestelleghmi	kingunganeng.
B02_16_Mark_V15	Pikii,	“Aghulaqlusi	nunataghhaanun	tamaghhaanun	ungipaqiteki	Pinilghiit	Ungipat	tamaghhaanun	yugnun.
B02_16_Mark_V16	Kina	alngunak	ugpeqilghiillu	paaptaayelghiillu	yugulillengyaghqaaguq.	Iwernga	kina	alngunak	ugpeqinghilnguq	aghyuullengyaghqaaguq	seghleghqelleghminun.
B02_16_Mark_V17	Ugpeqat	allaaghlluwhaghtillequt	liigikesqelluku	aghtughyaghqaanghilleghteng	Kiyaghneghmeng	pingutanga.	Enkaam	atemkun	aanesqughlleqiit	tughneghaat	yugneng;	akuzillequt	allastun	ulustun;
B02_16_Mark_V18	tugusaghngaaghmeng	nemeghyameng,	nalighmeng	meghyaghngaaghmeng	tuqunalghiimeng	sanaanghitut;	qinuyulghiit	saafneghmegteki	naallghutaqellequt.”
B02_16_Mark_V19	Atanghem	Jesus-em	maligsaaghteni	aleghquneghmeng	taaqsaki,	Kiyaghneghem	mayughtestekaa	qilagmun,	enkaam	aqumegkaq	Kiyaghneghem	aghenqigneghakun.
B02_16_Mark_V20	Taagken	maligsaaghtet	aghulaqluteng	tamanganun	ungipaqikat	Pinilghiineng	Ungipaneng.	Atanghem	qepghalgusiqii,	ipapighqestekaallu	ungipaq	allaaghlluwhaghtistelleghmikun.	Amen.
B03_01_Luke_V1	Angellemni	Theophilus,	Uglalghiim	yugem	igaquqaqiit	tawaten	pillghet	akulemnni.	Igaquqiit	taakunguut	ataasit	nagaquqaput	esghapakaneng	tawaten	pillghistun	ima	piinlillghitneng.	Ellngitallu	qepghaatkaqaat	Kiyaghneq	ungipaqelleghmegteggun	ungipaq	Christ-ameng	ayuqelghii.
B03_01_Luke_V3	Nagatkaqanka	apellghit,	atightughwaaqaqankallu	igaqullghit	piinlillghitneng.	Enkaam	igaqughyuganka	elpenun	tawatetngwaaghluki	pillghistun.
B03_01_Luke_V4	Tawaten	liisimakelleqaten	ipangutangi	tamaakut	apeghtuutkat	elpenun.
B03_01_Luke_V5	Herod	umiilkengnguluku	Judea-m,	tamaanteftuq	priest-a,	aatgha	Zechariah.	Qepghalgutkegkangi	priest-et	atilqelghiit	Abijah	priest-et.	Nulighhan	aatgha	Elizabeth-nguuq,	Aaron-em	kingunghan	priest-em	paniga.
B03_01_Luke_V6	Kiyaghneghmun	elqughutngalutek	kiyaghtaaghek.	Qaatkepigtekangik	Atanghem	qelghusiillu	Liilightuusiillu,	avutnginnalutek.
B03_01_Luke_V7	Taawanginaq	taghnughhiilnguuk,	qayughllak	Elizabeth	qumingepagningilnguq,	tawaveklu	qamagllutek	siivanlleghughtekak.
B03_01_Luke_V8	Ataasimi	aghneghmi,	Zechariah,	qepghaamalghii	Temple-mi,	qayughllak	Abijah	priest-et	qepghalleghqaat	kaallghii.
B03_01_Luke_V9	Nangaghneghmeng	pillghistun	priest-et	ateghtiiraalleghqun	nakmikegkaat	Zechariah.	Enkaam	iteghluni	Atanghem	Temple-nganun	paneghreghaqaq	incense-meng.
B03_01_Luke_V10	Tawani	aflungani	incense-meng	paneghreghallghem,	qakma	yulghuteghllaget	yughaatet.
B03_01_Luke_V11	Tawani	Atanghem	yaqulgan	aliighvikegkaa	nekevghaghmi	aghenqigneghanilluni	aghqefigan	incense-em.
B03_01_Luke_V12	Zechariah	upuqaq	esghaghyamigu	yaqulek,	alingruughllakaqlu.
B03_01_Luke_V13	Iwernga	yaqulgem	pikaa,	“Alingegpenang	Zechariah,	yughaghten	nagaqullengumaat.	Nuliighpek	Elizabeth-em	ighnengunnaqngwaaten,	atighlleqan	John-meng.
B03_01_Luke_V14	Enkaam	quyaghllagllequten,	uglamllu	quyakelleqaat	allgellgha,
B03_01_Luke_V15	qayughllak	ellnga	qepghaghtekeghllaglleqaa	Atanghem.	Meghyaghqaanghituq	wine-meng,	nalighmeng	suumnalghiimeng	aqimlemeng,	imighngayaghqaaguqlu	Agleghnalghiigneng	Taghneghagneng	talwa	allgellghilluni.
B03_01_Luke_V16	Israel-eghmiilghutetlu	uteghtesqughlleqii	Ataneghmun	Kiyaghneghitnun.
B03_01_Luke_V17	Ellnga	sivukluni	qepghaghllequq,	taagken	Ataneq	qepghaghllequq.	Ellnga	ataasigneng	taghneghalgullequqlu	aghtughyaghqaanghillelgullequqlu	uuknaliqistetun	Elijah-tun.	Atanun	sumeghtaghaatkesagutesleqii	avaqutiit,	qaatkusigalnguutlu	nallghusaghnaqngwii	peghqinelleghmun	Kiyaghneghem	elqughutngallghanun.	Enkaam	yataaghqelleqii	yuget	Atanghem	tagilleghqaanun.”
B03_01_Luke_V18	Zechariah-m	pikaa	yaqulek,	“Naten	liisimakelleqsikun	apellghen?	Nanevgaghllagumaanga,	nulighqallu	aghnalqwaalghii.”
B03_01_Luke_V19	Yaqulgem	pikaa,	“Gabriel-nguunga,	nekevghalghii	Kiyaghneghem	nayuutngallghani.	Elpenun	kayagtaagunga,	ungipaasaghtuugamken	whaken	pinilghiimeng	ungipameng.
B03_01_Luke_V20	Nagataghten,	taawa	akuzinanighnaquten	kenlanga	aapqanka	elpenun	apeghiightuutellghitnun,	qayughllak	ugpeqenghilketen	akuzitenka,	apeghiighyaghqat	pilleghqiit	kaaskata.”
B03_01_Luke_V21	Yuget	utaqiilghiit	Zechariah-meng	sumeghtaghaqat	sangami	muluughllagutanga	Temple-mi.
B03_01_Luke_V22	Aanyalghiimi	aleghqughpagningitkii,	enkaam	liigikegkaat	esghawaaghumaniluku	Temple-mi.
B03_01_Luke_V23	Enkaam	qepghalleni	apeghiighyamigu	neminun	aglaqaq.
B03_01_Luke_V24	Mulunghituq	taakut	aghneghet	kingungitneng	nulighha	Elizabeth	qumingegkaq,	enkaam	tallimat	tanqit	aananiqaq	whaten	pimaghmi,
B03_01_Luke_V25	“Qenwatlu	Atanghem	nangllegyagutaanga,	iqitaa	kayngusaghaatelqa	taghnughhangenghitellemneng.”
B03_01_Luke_V26	Aghvinliitangani	tanqim	Kiyaghneghem	kayagtekaa	yaqulek	Gabriel	Nazareth-mun,	Galilee-melngughmun.
B03_01_Luke_V27	Yugmun	atuqesimangilngughmun	aghnaghaghmun,	aang'ghutngwaaqamun	Joseph-mun,	kingunghanun	David-em.	Yugmun	atuqesimangilnguum	aghnaghaam	aatgha	Mary-nguftuq.
B03_01_Luke_V28	Yaqulgem	takuluku	pikaa,	“Nekeggmelleq	elpenilli!	Atanghem	nakmikumaaten	aghnat	akulngitneng.”
B03_01_Luke_V29	Iwernga	Mary-m	seghleliighutkeghllakaa	nagalluku	tawaten	pillgha,	sumeghtaghaatkegkaallu	sangami	tawaten	quyakutni.
B03_01_Luke_V30	Yaqulgem	pikaa,	“Alingegpenang	Mary,	qayughllak	efqughnaghtuten	Kiyaghneghmi.
B03_01_Luke_V31	Nagataghten,	taawa	qumingnaqnguuten,	ighnengellequten	enkaam	atighlleqan	Jesus-meng.
B03_01_Luke_V32	Aangellequq,	atighyaghqaaguqlu	Ighnegha	Kiyaghneghllagem;	enkaam	Atanghem	Kiyaghneghem	umiilgughtesleqaa	sivunghatun	David-etun.
B03_01_Luke_V33	Igleghutillequq	Jacob-em	kingunghitneng	Israel-eghmiineng	quunperugllak;	Ataneghpagullghallu	kenlengituq.”
B03_01_Luke_V34	Mary-m	pikaa	yaqulek,	“Naten	una	piyaghqaawa	yugmun	atuqesigalnguunga?”
B03_01_Luke_V35	Yaqulgem	pikaa,	“Agleghnalghiim	Taghnegham	takulleqaaten,	enkaam	Kiyaghneghem	aghtughyaghqaanghillghan	taghneghangullghiistun	alkwaaghlleqaaten.	Taana	apalluqluku	taghnughhaq	agleghnaghllequq	aatqesaghqaqaallu	Kiyaghneghem	Ighnegha.
B03_01_Luke_V36	Nagataghten,	ilakwaaghen	Elizabeth,	aghnalqwaaghllagluni	qumingumaaq,	ighnengnaqnguuq.	Una	whaa	aghvinliitkaa	tanqiq,	piiqsaqangat	avanginniluku,
B03_01_Luke_V37	qayughllak	Kiyaghneghmi	sangwaa	qamaglluni	piyaqniituq.”
B03_01_Luke_V38	Mary-m	pikaa,	“Taawa	whanga,	Atanghem	qepghaghtekaanga;	legan	tawaten	pinaqnilleghpetun	apeghiighhaaq.”	Taagken	yaqulgem	unitkaa.
B03_01_Luke_V39	Mulunghituq	Mary,	yataaghqelluni	taayughqemmeng	aglaqaq	neghllagmun,	akulngitnilngughnun	qemilghutngan	Judea-m.
B03_01_Luke_V40	Mary	kaalluni	Zechariah-nkunun	iteghluni	quyakegkaa	Elizabeth.
B03_01_Luke_V41	Legan	Elizabeth-em	nagaqughaa	Mary-m	quyakillgha,	taghnughhaq	qumiga	qapragaghtekaq,	Agleghnalghiimllu	Taghnegham	imiqaa	Elizabeth,
B03_01_Luke_V42	iglagtuluni	pikaq,	“Quyastekaaguten	akulngitni	aghnat,	quyastekaaguqlu	taghnughhaq	ighniyaghqan!
B03_01_Luke_V43	Quulvallengepestaaghtunga	qayughllak	Ataneghma	naangan	laalighfikegkanganga!
B03_01_Luke_V44	Legan	quyakillghen	nagaqughaqa,	taghnughhaq	qama	quyam	qapragaghtuq.
B03_01_Luke_V45	Quyanaghhalek	Atanghem	akuzitanga	ugpeqegken	apeghiighlleqniluku	elpenun!”
B03_01_Luke_V46	Mary	pikaq,	“Unguvasigma	usuqaa	Ataneq,
B03_01_Luke_V47	taghneghagkallu	quyaghllaguuk	Kiyaghneghmi,	Yugulighistemni,
B03_01_Luke_V48	qayughllak	ellngan	esghaghlunga	nakmikaanga,	ukalighpigaq	qepghaghteni.	Whaken	kenlekluku	yugem	kinguliighaam	qamaglluni	atighyaghqaqaanga	quyastekaalunga,
B03_01_Luke_V49	qayughllak	Aghtughyaghqaanghiteghllagem	Kiyaghneghem	apeghiighuteghllagaanga.	Aatgha	agleghnaghtuq.
B03_01_Luke_V50	Nangllekaqaa	yuuk	qamagtengngwaaghluku	ellmineng	talluqilghii,	kinguliighaghneng	tuunglighhiitnun.
B03_01_Luke_V51	Iknaqepiglleghiikun	aghtughyaghqaanghilleghmikun	kayaalqaqii	qukaayuglleghhiit	sumeghtaghalleghmegteggun.
B03_01_Luke_V52	Umiilegllaget	ateghtaqii	aqumutiitneng,	enkaam	quulvaghaqii	ukalighpigaat.
B03_01_Luke_V53	Iyatalghiit	neqnilghiimeng	kepsughtaqii,	enkaam	aklungilnguut	aghulaqestaqii	avangunaki.
B03_01_Luke_V54	Kayusighaqii	qepghaghteni	Israel-eghmiit,	qayughllak	nangllegtalghii,
B03_01_Luke_V55	Abraham-emunllu	kingunghanunllu	quunperugllak	akeqelleghmitun	sivuneput.”
B03_01_Luke_V56	Mary-m	nayuqegkaa	Elizabeth	pingayut	tanqit,	taagken	neminun	aglaqaq.
B03_01_Luke_V57	Elizabeth-em	ighnilleghqaa	kaalluni,	ighnengegkaq.
B03_01_Luke_V58	Uvilighneghitallu	nalleqliitallu	nagaqughluku	Atanghem	nangllekeghllallgha	Elizabeth,	quyakusaghtuqaat.
B03_01_Luke_V59	Pingayuneng	inglulek	aghneq	atughluku	yuget	tagilaghaatkat	circumcise-enaluku	taghnughhaq,	atighnaqsaghaatlu	Zechariah-meng,	atangan	aatghaneng.
B03_01_Luke_V60	Iwernga	naangan	pikii,	“Nakaa,	aatgha	John-nguuq.”
B03_01_Luke_V61	Yuget	pikaat,	“Nalighhiiniit	nalleqlitek	taagken	aatghitut.”
B03_01_Luke_V62	Taagken	apaqumeng	atanga	aaptekaat	kitumeng	atighnaqutanga.
B03_01_Luke_V63	Zechariah	igaghyaghqameng	tungsighluni,	igaqegkaa,	“Aatgha	John-nguuq.”	Tawanlenguut	qamaglluteng	allaaghlluwhaghyukat.
B03_01_Luke_V64	Tawaninginaq	Zechariah	akuziyaqlegughtekaq,	usuqegkaallu	Kiyaghneq.
B03_01_Luke_V65	Qamaglluteng	uvilighneghit	tallughyukat.	Judea-mi	ungipaq	mingitkaat	yugnun	tamaani	kiyaghlleghhiinun	akulngitni	qemit.
B03_01_Luke_V66	Qamaglluteng	nagaquutkat	tawaten	pilleghneng	sumeghtaghaatkelluki	pikat,	“Taghnughhaq	una	sastengunaqngwaatuq	anglikumi?”	Qayughllak	ipa	nalluniitkaalghii	Atanghem	aghtughyaghqaanghillgha	ellnganilnguq.
B03_01_Luke_V67	John-em	atanga	Zechariah,	Aleghnalghiim	Taghnegham	imighluku	uuknaliqegkaq,
B03_01_Luke_V68	“Yeqay	usuqelteggu	Ataneq	Kiyaghnegha	Israel-em,	qayughllak	itemusaghtughii	yuni.
B03_01_Luke_V69	Yataaghqutiinkut	Yugulighisteghllagmeng,	qepghaghtemi	David-em	kingunghaneng.
B03_01_Luke_V70	Tawaten	neghighluku	akeqikaaguq	agleghnalghiitgun	uuknaliqistemikun,
B03_01_Luke_V71	yuguliyaghqaaluta	anguyamnneng,	tamaghhiitnengllu	ugumikistemnneng.
B03_01_Luke_V72	Nagneghutkaqaa	nangllegtalleni	sivunemnnun,	apeghiighlleqnilukullu	agleghnalghii	akequsani.
B03_01_Luke_V73	Akequsangllaqaaguq	sivunemnnun	Abraham-emun.
B03_01_Luke_V74	Akeqiinkut	yugulilleqniluta	anguyamnneng,	enkaam	qepghaalleqaghput	alingegpenaamta	anguyamnneng,
B03_01_Luke_V75	tuun'ngwaaghluta	ellnganun,	qaatkullutallu	piyukellghanun	unguvalleghput	qamagtiiluku.
B03_01_Luke_V76	Enkaam	elpek	taghnughamni,	atighyaghqaaguten	uuknaliqistenga	Aangepiglleghhiim	Kiyaghneghllagem.	Kayaggnaqngwaaten	sivutghulluku	Ataneq	yataaghqesqelluki	yuget	tugukliisqelluku	tagikan.
B03_01_Luke_V77	Ungipaalleqaten	Kiyaghneghem	yugi	yugulilleghmeng	seghevutillghakun	seghleghqellghitneng,
B03_01_Luke_V78	qayughllak	Kiyaghneghput	nangllegtaghllagtuq.	Kayaglleqaa	Yugughlighista,	ellnga	siqinghem	piitekestallghatun	ayuqsaghqaaguq
B03_01_Luke_V79	qilagmeng	kukeggnaluki	tamaakut	kiyaghlleghhiit	taghneghangutellghanilnguut	tuqullghem,	maghyaghqughnaluta	tuumnganun	nekeggmellghem.”
B03_01_Luke_V80	Taghnughhaq	anglikaq,	iknaqughtekaqlu	taghneghamikun.	Kilgaanitkaq	kenlanga	ungipaghyaghtulleghminun	Israel-eghmiinun.
B03_02_Luke_V1	Kingunganeng	John-em	allgellghan,	tamaani	pilleghni	Rome-em	Umiilegpigaan	Augustus-em,	qelqaa	yuuk	qamagtengngwaaghluku,	aatghit	igaqestesaghtiisqelluki	igalghutmikun.	Tawaten	pistekii	kesnaluki	yuget	uglaghtalangit	igleghutkaminilnguut	nunani.
B03_02_Luke_V2	Taana	sivulighpigaalghii	yugmeng	kestilleq,	Quirinius	governor-kengnguluku	Syria-m.
B03_02_Luke_V3	Qamagtengngwaaghluteng	yuget	ellmeng	katam	allgeghvigmeggnun	aglaghtuutkat	ateteng	igaqesqelluki.
B03_02_Luke_V4	Nazareth-meng,	Galilee-melngughmeng,	Joseph-llu	aghulaqegkaq	Bethlehem-emun,	Judea-melngughmun,	umiilgem	David-em	allgeghviganun.	Tamaavek	pikaalghii	qayughllak	kingunqegkanga	David-em.
B03_02_Luke_V5	Joseph-em	ateni	igaqestesaghtuqaa,	nuliighqani	Mary	kelqelluku,	aqsaliighlluni	ayuqelghii.
B03_02_Luke_V6	Tamaansimalukek	ighniyaghqaaghtekaq.
B03_02_Luke_V7	Aantekaa	ighneqsuwhaani,	enkaam	qiipaghaghqun	yuungiilluku,	aghsukaa	neghqusitagnekun,	qayughllak	nekaghqiilnguuk	aqelqalghutami.
B03_02_Luke_V8	Unugmi	tawani,	nunivagmi	penniighniightet	aflengakingulghiit	penniighmeggneng.
B03_02_Luke_V9	Atanghem	yaqulgan	aliighvikegkii,	nighughqellghanllu	Atanghem	kukegtekii,	enkaam	alingruughuteghllakat.
B03_02_Luke_V10	Yaqulgem	pikii,	“Alingegpenasi	nagataghtek,	pinilghiimeng	ungipameng	tagitaqamsi	quyanapiglleghhiimeng	yugnun	tamaghhaanun.
B03_02_Luke_V11	Aghneghmi	whani	elpesinun	allgeghaquq	Yugulighista,	neghllagani	David-em,	Christ-anguuq	Ataneq.
B03_02_Luke_V12	Whaten	liisimakelleqaghsi;	esghaghlleqaghsi	taghnughhaq	qiipaghaghqun	yuungiilluni,	aghsugngaaq	neghqusitagnekun.”
B03_02_Luke_V13	Nuuskagan	ilatqaghtaatkat	yaqulegmun	qilagem	pilluwaghtelghuteghllagi	yaqulelghutet,	usuqegkaat	Kiyaghneq,	pikat,
B03_02_Luke_V14	“Usuqnaghhalek	Kiyaghneghmun,	qilagem	uusqalleghpigaanilngughmun,	nekeggmellelgulitlu	nunamelnguut	efquqegkii!”
B03_02_Luke_V15	Yaqulget	mayughtuusata	qilagmun,	penniighniightet	ellmeggneng	pikat,	“Bethlehem-emun	esghaghyaghtuulteggu	taghnughhaq	allgelghii,	Atanghem	liisimakestekanga	whangkunnun.”
B03_02_Luke_V16	Enkaam	aglaragkiighluteng	esghaqiit	Mary-nkut,	Joseph-enkut,	taghnughhaqlu	aghsugngalghii	neghqusitagni.
B03_02_Luke_V17	Penniighniightet	esghaghyamegteggu	taghnughhaq,	tamanganun	aapqaat	tamaana	yaqulgem	apellgha	ellmeggnun.
B03_02_Luke_V18	Penniighniightet	ungipaqellghitneng	nagaquullghiit	qamaglluteng	allaaghlluwhaghyukat.
B03_02_Luke_V19	Iwernga	Mary-m	qaalkaghpenani	ilumikegkii	tamaakut	pillghet,	awen	sumeghtaghaatkaqegkangi.
B03_02_Luke_V20	Penniighniightet	uteghniqat	usuqumaan,	quulvamaan	Kiyaghneq,	qayughllak	nagaquqaatlu	esghaqaatlu	yaqulgem	apellghatun	ayuqegkaq.
B03_02_Luke_V21	Pingayuneng	inglulek	aghneq	atughluku,	taghnughhaq	circumise-eyan	atiqaat,	Jesus-meng.	Yaqulgem	tuunegkaa	ateq	Mary-mun	salin	qumingellghilluku.
B03_02_Luke_V22	Moses-em	Liilightuusaan	qelellghatun	pelungighsalleghqaak	kaatkaq.	Enkaam	Jerusalem-emun	aglaatkaak	taghnughhaq	Ataneghmun	tuunaluku.
B03_02_Luke_V23	Liilightuusaani	Atanghem	igaqngaaq,	“Tamaghhaghmi	aghnam	ighneqsuwhaagha	aafsaghqaaguq	Ataneghmun.”
B03_02_Luke_V24	Atanghem	Liilightuusaan	qelghutellghatun	aghqutkesaghqaalghiik	maalghuk	dove-ek,	nalighmeng	maalghuk	pigeon-aaghaak.
B03_02_Luke_V25	Jerusalem-emeteftuq	yuuk,	aatgha	Simeon.	Qaatkutngalghiillu	maniguutkayuklu	Kiyaghneghmun.	Utaqiingulghii	Kiyaghneghmun	yugulisqelluki	Israel-eghmiit.	Agleghnalghiik	Taghneghak	ellnganilnguuk.
B03_02_Luke_V26	Agleghnalghiim	Taghnegham	akeqegkaa	tuqunaanghinniluku	kenlanga	esghalleghqaanun	Messiah	Atanghem	akequsaqegkaa.
B03_02_Luke_V27	Taghnegham	maghyaghqullghakun	iteghyaghtuqaq	Temple-mun.	Liilightuusat	pisqellghistun	angayuqagkenka	taghnughhaq	Jesus	itghutkaak	Temple-mun.
B03_02_Luke_V28	Simeon-em	tuguluku	taghnughhaq	iyamsiqayugvikegkaa	Kiyaghneq,	pikaq,
B03_02_Luke_V29	“Ataneq,	yeqay	maaten	qepghaghten	aghulaqestigu	nekeggmelluku,	qayughllak	akeqelleghpetun,	whanga	katam	iyegemneng	esghaghaqa	kayagtekan	Yugulighistenguluku.
B03_02_Luke_V31	Yataaghqegkaqan	yugnun	tamaghhaanun	esghiisqelluku.
B03_02_Luke_V32	Nighuguuq	Gentile-enun	liigikestilghii	Kiyaghneghmeng,	ellnga	apalluqluku	yugten	Israel-eghmiit	quulvallengeghllagllequt.”
B03_02_Luke_V33	Taagken	taghnughhaam	atanganllu	naanganllu	saghiighayagutkaak	tawaten	akuzitkesagu.
B03_02_Luke_V34	Simeon-em	Kiyaghneghmun	tungsiitkakek	quyastesqellukek.	Enkaam	naanga	Mary	pikaa,	“Nagataghtinga,	una	taghnughhaq	Kiyaghneghem	nakmikegkaqaa.	Ilangi	Israel-eghmiilghutet	nanqiglleqii	aghyuughyaghqaaluki,	ilangi	yuguliyaghqaaluki.	Kiyaghneghem	kayagtengngwaa	ellminun	ungipaghtenguluku,	iwernga	yulghutet	ighsakelleqaat,
B03_02_Luke_V35	enkaam	tawaten	pilleghmegteggun	liitesleqiit	aksaqngalghiit	sumeghtaghalleteng.	Enkaam	elpek	Mary,	qivghum	kagimlleqaak	unguvasigken,	katam	tawaten	savigpagem	kaapellghatun.”
B03_02_Luke_V36	Taawallunguq	uuknaliqista	aghnaq,	aatgha	Anna,	Phanuel-em	paniga,	Asher-em	ramkenganeng	pi.	Aghnalqwaaghuftuq,	ugilgukaaftuq	maaghragvinlek	ayumiqulleq.
B03_02_Luke_V37	Taagken	ugingiitelleghmineng	84-ngughtekangi	ayumiqullghet.	Awen	tagiiqelghii	Temple-mun,	aghneghuyaghngaan,	unuguyaghngaan	Kiyaghneq	manigughaqegkanga,	fast-aaqlunillu	yughaghaqlunillu.
B03_02_Luke_V38	Tawani	ataasimi	aflumi,	Anna-m	takuluki	Kiyaghneq	iyamsiqayugvikegkaa.	Taghnughhaq	akuzitkegkaa	tamaghhiitnun	utaqiilghiinun	Messiah-meng,	ellnganun	itemutesqelluku	Jerusalem.
B03_02_Luke_V39	Joseph-enkuk	Mary-nkuk	qamaglluki	apeghiighyamegneki	Atanghem	Liilightuusiita	pisqellghit,	uteghniqak	Nazareth-mun,	Galilee-melngughmun.
B03_02_Luke_V40	Taghnughhaq	anglikaq,	iknaqughtekaqlu,	imighngaghmi	peghqinelleghmeng;	Kiyaghneghem	kayusiqaallu	quyastekaallu.
B03_02_Luke_V41	Ayumiqulleq	tamaghhaan	angayuqakek	Jerusalem-etaqelghiit,	neqenghaghqellghanun	Passover-em.
B03_02_Luke_V42	Jesus-em	uksughtulanga	qula	maalghugughsan,	piiqelleghmegetun	neqenghaghqelleghmun	pikak	kelqelluku	Jesus.
B03_02_Luke_V43	Neqenghaghqelleq	apeghiighyan	uteghniqak,	iwernga	mekelghiiq	Jesus	unegtekaq	Jerusalem-emi.	Angayuqagkenka	nallukegkangak.
B03_02_Luke_V44	Sumeghmegni	igleghalgutegmegninniluku	aghnelqusiq	igleghtekak.	Taagken	ivaqaak	ilakwaaghmegnillu	ilakumtaaghmegnillu.
B03_02_Luke_V45	Naalkenghisamegnegu	Jerusalem-emun	ivaghyaghtuqaak.
B03_02_Luke_V46	Pingayut	aghneghet	atughluki	naalkegkaak	uvitanganilluku	Temple-em,	aqumluni	apeghtughistet	akulngitni,	nagataqeftiillu	aapqughaaghaqeftiillu.
B03_02_Luke_V47	Qamaglluteng	nagatullghiit	ellnganeng	saghiighayagutkaat	liigikingallghanengllu	kiimsightughillghanengllu.
B03_02_Luke_V48	Angayuqagkenka	esghaghluku	saghiighayagutkaak.	Naangan	pikaa,	“Ighnemni,	esghaqaghqung,	sangan	whaten	aneghsikung?	Atagpeklu	whangallu	elngaatall	ivanghiighutamken,	repall	peng'giilluten.”
B03_02_Luke_V49	Kiimsiqakek,	“Sangan	ivaghestegnenga?	Nallukestegneguu	Atama	mangteghaanisaghqapestaaghulghiinga?”
B03_02_Luke_V50	Iwernga	liigikumangilkangak	sameng	tawaten	pingutanga.
B03_02_Luke_V51	Taagken	maligllukek	uteghniqaq	Nazareth-mun,	qaatkutngakaalghiillu	elkegkenun.	Naangan	tamaana	qamaglluku	umyugaghmikegkaa.
B03_02_Luke_V52	Jesus	anglitkelluku	peghqinghughtekaq,	efqughnaghtengnginaqaq	Kiyaghneghmillu	yugnillu.
B03_03_Luke_V1	Akimigaaghtengngukanga	ayumiqulleq	igleghutillghan	Tiberius	Caesar-em,	Pontius	Pilate,	governer-nguluku	Judea-mun.	Enkaam	Herod,	igleghutistengulghii	Galilee-mun,	anglegutangallu	Philip,	igleghutistengulghii	Ituraea-nkugnun,	Trachonitis-enkugnun.	Lysanias-llu	igleghutistengulghii	Abilene-mun.
B03_03_Luke_V2	Annas-enkuk	Caiaphus-enkuk	high	priest-ngulghiik.	Tamaani	pilleghmi,	Kiyaghneghem	aleghquqaa	John	kilgaanisimaluku.	John	ighneqegkanga	Zechariah-m.
B03_03_Luke_V3	Taagken	John	igleghtekaq	uvitangani	Kiiwem	Jordan-em,	ungipaqikaq	yugnun	peglluki	seghleghqellghit	paaptaayesqelluki,	enkaam	seghevutellengelleqniluki	seghleghqellghitneng.
B03_03_Luke_V4	Igaqngakaalghiit	igatgun	akuzitangi	uuknalqistem	Isaiah-m	whaten,	“Ma	akilghuugaquq	kilgaani	whaten;	‘Yataaghqiteggu	tuumkaghqaa	Atanghem,	taklaghteggu	tuumkaghqaa.
B03_03_Luke_V5	Qamaglluni	suqluneq	imighllequq,	qamagllutengllu	naayghat,	qemit	asivaghllequt,	enkaam	agughpiiraaghet	tumet	taklaghrukguullequt,	tuumllugmelnguutlu	tuumkwhuughlleqii.
B03_03_Luke_V6	Qamaglluni	yugem	esghaghlleqaa	Kiyaghneghem	yugulighillgha	yugneng!’”
B03_03_Luke_V7	Taagken	yulghuteghllaget	tagilaghaatkat	ellnganun	paaptaayesqelluteng.	John-em	pikii,	“Elpesi	nemeghyani!	Kitum	kelengasaaghtisi	anagesqellusi	Kiyaghneghem	aghyuughilleghqaaneng	kaannaqelghiimeng?
B03_03_Luke_V8	Kiyaghtaalleghpesi	ipapighqelligu	avuteghqumaasi	seghleghqelleghpesineng.	Sumeghtaghaghpenasi	itagnaghnilusi	Kiyaghneghmi	qayughllak	Abraham-em	kingunqegkangisi.	Ungipaatamsi,	Kiyaghneghem	uyghaget	maakut	taghnughhangllaghnayaghii	Abraham-emun.
B03_03_Luke_V9	Talwa	maaten	qalqalima	uqliilluni	ayuquq	kepnaluki	uqfiget	akwiitgun.	Qamaglluni	uqfik	pinilghiimeng	piitestinghilnguq	kepluni	kenghegnun	miluusaghqaaguq.”
B03_03_Luke_V10	Yulghuteghllaget	aaptekaat,	“Sanaqestangam?”
B03_03_Luke_V11	Kiimsiqii,	“Maalghugegneng	qaaslilgukuvek,	aleghqek	tuunakegken	avangilngughmun	yugmun,	enkaam	neqelgukuvek	tawatenllu	pilghaaten.”
B03_03_Luke_V12	Ilangillu	tax-meng	qerngughtistet	tagiluteng	paaptaayestekat	ellnganun.	Aaptekaat,	“Apeghtughista,	whangkuta	sanaqesta?”
B03_03_Luke_V13	Kiimsiqii,	“Tuwaaqiteggu	naamignganginaghhaq	tax-elleq,	wata	tugutegpenasi.”
B03_03_Luke_V14	Pilluwaghtetlu	aaptekaat,	“Whangkutamii-i,	sanaqesta?”	Kiimsiqii,	“Akeqsagtegpenaki	yuget	ellngitnun	manilitesqellusi	nalighmeng	temngi	avutkegpenaki.	Itagnaqaqiteki	akileghtuusaghpesi	angtalangit.”
B03_03_Luke_V15	Yuget	sighimaluteng	lliiqat,	qamagllutengllu	sumeghtaghaatkegkaat	John,	Christ-angunayukan.
B03_03_Luke_V16	Enkaam	John-em	pikii,	“Tagiyaghqaq	taana	aghtughyaghqaanghiteghllagtuq	whangamneng,	enkaam	whanga	pininghitngwaaghtunga	itemsaghqaaluki	singii.	Paaptaayeghiiqunga	meghqun,	iwernga	ellngan	paaptaayelleqiisi	Agleghnalghiigneng	Taghneghagneng,	keneghmengllu.
B03_03_Luke_V17	Tugumiilguuq	pekutameng	malliighnaluki	wheat-et.	Taagken	wheat-et	kagpaglleqii,	iwernga	mallat	paneghlleqii	qaamyaghqaanghilnguugnekun	kenghegnekun.”
B03_03_Luke_V18	John-em	ungipaasimanginaqii	yuget	naten	allangughnaqesqelluki	kiyaghtaallghit,	ellngitnun	ungipaqinguluni	Pinilghiineng	Ungipaneng.
B03_03_Luke_V19	Iwernga	John-em	aghyuughmikaqegkanga	governor-a	Herod,	qayughllak	tugukaqegkanga	Herodias,	anglegutmi	Philip-em	nulighha.	Aghyuughmikaallu	Herod	seghletun	pillghaneng	apalluqluku.
B03_03_Luke_V20	Taagken	Herod	wata	seghleghataghatun	pikaq	anusimingllaghtestekaa	John.
B03_03_Luke_V21	Kingungitneng	qamaglluteng	yuget	paaptaayestellghita,	Jesus-llu	paaptaayestekaq.	Jesus	yughaamaluku,	qilak	qelpeqaq,
B03_03_Luke_V22	taagken	Agleghnalghiik	Taghneghak	dove-ngulutek	ukikak	ellnganun.	Qilagmeng	ma	pikaq,	“Ighneqamken,	piniqepigkamken,	efquqepigtamken.”
B03_03_Luke_V23	Jesus-em	piinlighaqngamigu	qepghaqani,	entaqun	30-nguuq	uksughtulanga.	Yuget	sumeghtaghaatkegkaat	ighneqniluku	Joseph-mun.	Joseph,	ighneqegkanga	Heli-m.
B03_03_Luke_V24	Heli,	ighneqegkanga	Matthat-em.	Matthat,	ighneqegkanga	Levi-m.	Levi,	ighneqegkanga	Melchi-m.	Melchi,	ighneqegkanga	Jannai-m.	Jannai,	ighneqegkanga	Joseph-em.
B03_03_Luke_V25	Joseph,	ighneqegkanga	Mattathias-em.	Mattathias,	ighneqegkanga	Amos-em.	Amos,	ighneqegkanga	Nahum-em.	Nahum,	ighneqegkanga	Esli-m.	Esli,	ighneqegkanga	Naggai-m.
B03_03_Luke_V26	Naggai,	ighneqegkanga	Maath-em.	Maath,	ighneqegkanga	Mattathias-em.	Mattathias,	ighneqegkanga	Semein-em.	Semein,	ighneqegkanga	Josech-em.	Josech,	ighneqegkanga	Joda-m.
B03_03_Luke_V27	Joda,	ighneqegkanga	Joanan-em.	Joanan,	ighneqegkanga	Rhesa-m.	Rhesa,	ighneqegkanga	Zerubbabel-em.	Zerubbabel,	ighneqegkanga	Shealtiel-em.	Shealtiel,	ighneqegkanga	Neri-m.
B03_03_Luke_V28	Neri,	ighneqegkanga	Melchi-m.	Melchi,	ighneqegkanga	Addi-m.	Addi,	ighneqegkanga	Cosam-em.	Cosam,	ighneqegkanga	Elmadam-em.	Elmadam,	ighneqegkanga	Er-em.
B03_03_Luke_V29	Er,	ighneqegkanga	Joshua-m.	Joshua,	ighneqegkqanga	Eliezer-em.	Eliezer,	ighneqegkanga	Jorim-em.	Jorim,	ighneqegkanga	Matthat-em.	Matthat,	ighneqegkanga	Levi-m.
B03_03_Luke_V30	Levi,	ighneqegkanga	Simeon-em.	Simeon,	ighneqegkanga	Judah-m.	Judah,	ighneqegkanga	Joseph-em.	Joseph,	ighneqegkanga	Jonam-em.	Jonam,	ighneqegkanga	Eliakim-em.
B03_03_Luke_V31	Eliakim,	ighneqegkanga	Melea-m.	Melea,	ighneqegkanga	Menna-m.	Menna,	ighneqegkanga	Mattatha-m.	Mattatha,	ighneqegkanga,	Nathan-em.	Nathan,	ighneqegkanga	David-em.
B03_03_Luke_V32	David,	ighneqegkanga	Jesse-m.	Jesse,	ighneqegkanga	Obed-em.	Obed,	ighneqegkanga	Boaz-em.	Boaz,	ighneqegkanga	Salmon-em.	Salmon,	ighneqegkanga	Nashon-em.
B03_03_Luke_V33	Nashon,	ighneqegkanga	Amminadab-em.	Amminadab,	ighneqegkanga	Admin-em.	Admin,	ighneqegkanga	Arni-m.	Arni,	ighneqegkanga	Hezron-em.	Hezron,	ighneqegkanga	Perez-em.	Perez,	ighneqegkanga	Judah-m.
B03_03_Luke_V34	Judah,	ighneqegkanga	Jacob-em.	Jacob,	ighneqegkanga	Isaac-em.	Isaac,	ighneqegkanga	Abraham-em.	Abraham,	ighneqegkanga	Terah-m.	Terah,	ighneqegkanga	Nahor-em.
B03_03_Luke_V35	Nahor,	ighneqegkanga	Serug-em.	Serug,	ighneqegkanga	Reu-em.	Reu,	ighneqegkanga	Peleg-em.	Peleg,	ighneqegkanga	Eber-em.	Eber,	ighneqegkanga	Shelah-m.
B03_03_Luke_V36	Shelah,	ighneqegkanga	Cainan-em.	Cainan,	ighneqegkanga	Arphaxad-em.	Arphaxad,	ighneqegkanga	Shem-em.	Shem,	ighneqegkanga	Noah-m.	Noah	ighneqegkanga	Lamech-em.
B03_03_Luke_V37	Lamech,	ighneqegkanga	Methuselah-m.	Methuselah,	ighneqegkanga	Enoch-em.	Enoch,	ighneqegkanga	Jared-em.	Jared,	ighneqegkanga	Mahalaleel-em.	Mahalaleel,	ighneqegkanga	Cainan-em.
B03_03_Luke_V38	Cainan,	ighneqegkanga	Enos-em.	Enos,	ighneqegkanga	Seth-em.	Seth,	ighneqegkanga	Adam-em.	Enkaam	Adam	ighneqegkanga	Kiyaghneghem.
B03_04_Luke_V1	Taagken	Jesus,	Agleghnalghiigneng	Taghneghagneng	esleqngalghii,	uteghniqaq	Kiiwegneng	Jordan-egneng,	enkaam	Taghnegham	aghulaqutkaa	kilgaanun.
B03_04_Luke_V2	Tughneghaam	seghleghqesnaqutkegkaa	40	aghneq.	Tamaani	aghneghni	Jesus	neghumangilnguq.	Taakut	aghneghet	kingungitneng	iyataghllakaq.
B03_04_Luke_V3	Tughneghaam	pikaa,	“Kiyaghneghem	Ighneqngukangaten,	una	uyghak	neqnghugtestigu.”
B03_04_Luke_V4	Jesus-em	pikaa,	“Akuzitet	Igaqegkat	pikaagut,	‘Yuuk	kiyaghhnaanghituq	neqnginaghhaghqun.’”
B03_04_Luke_V5	Taagken	Tughneghaam	mayuutkaa	uusqapiglleghhiimun,	natengiighhaq	kelguvikegkaa	nunam	ataneghpagullghitneng.
B03_04_Luke_V6	Pikaa,	“Elpenun	tuunelleqanka	qamaglluki	tamaakut	ataneghpagullghet,	aghtughyaghqaanghillghetlu.	Qamaglluteng	whangamnun	tagivaqaagut	enkaam	kitumun	alngunak	tuunyukegkamnun	tuunelleqanka.
B03_04_Luke_V7	Manigughyaquvnga	qamaglluki	elpek	pikaaghhnayaghaten.”
B03_04_Luke_V8	Jesus-em	pikaa,	“Akuzitet	Igaqegkat	pikaagut,	‘Manigughyaghqaqan	Ataneq	Kiyaghneghen,	ellnginaaguqlu	qepghaasaghqan.’”
B03_04_Luke_V9	Taagken	Tughneghaam	aglaatkaa	Jerusalem-emun,	nekevestekaa	Temple-em	uusqalghakun.	Pikaa,	“Kiyaghneghem	Ighneqngukangaten,	qetgeghi	tesamavek,
B03_04_Luke_V10	qayughllak	Akuzitet	Igaqegkat	pikaagut,	‘Kiyaghneghemnguq	yaqulegminun	paqnasightesaghtughlleqaaten!’
B03_04_Luke_V11	Pikaagutlu,	‘Iiggmeggneng	nuqneqelleqaaten,	luuraq	itegaghten	uygaghquunnayukata.’”
B03_04_Luke_V12	Jesus-em	pikaa,	“Akuzitet	Igaqegkat	pikaagut,	‘Ataneq	Kiyaghneghen	nanghiiqugpenaan	sasqelluku	ellngan	piyukelqenghilkanganeng.’”
B03_04_Luke_V13	Taagken	Tughneghaam	apeghiighyamiki	seghleghqestinaqutkelleni	Jesus-mun,	unitkaa	kenlanga	alla	pilleghqangelleghqaminun.
B03_04_Luke_V14	Taagken	Jesus	uteghniqaq	Galilee-mun	aghtughyaghqaanghillelighluni	Agleghnalghiignekun	Taghneghagnekun.	Tamaghhaani	nunani	yuget	ungipaqegkaat.
B03_04_Luke_V15	Apeghtughiiqelghiillu	synagogue-ngitni,	qamagllutengllu	yuget	usuqegkaat.
B03_04_Luke_V16	Taagken	Jesus	anglivigminun	Nazareth-mun	pikaq.	Sabbath-ngughsagu	piiqelleghmitun	synagogue-mun	aglaqaq.	Nekevegkaq	atightughnaluni	Akuzitneng	Igaqegkaneng.
B03_04_Luke_V17	Tuunegkaat	uuknaliqistem	Isaiah-m	igaaneng.	Qelpeghtekii	whaten	igaqngalghiimun,
B03_04_Luke_V18	“Atanghem	Taghneghakek	whangamnituk,	qayughllak	nakmikegkaqaanga	Pinilghiineng	Ungipaneng	ungipaqisqellunga	aklumalghiinun.	Kayagtaanga	anusimingllaghat	itemutesqelluki,	ayaakatlu	esghaasagutesqelluki,	amyuqetaatkesilghiitlu	itemutesqelluki	amyuqetaatkistengitneng.
B03_04_Luke_V19	Apeghyaghtiisqaallu	ayumiqulleq	kaanniluku	Atanghem	yugulighilleghqaallu	quyastilleghqaallu	yugneng.”
B03_04_Luke_V20	Atightuneghmeng	apeghiighyamiki	igat	tuunegkii	aflengakistemun	taagken	aqumegkaq.	Synagogue-melnguut	qamaglluteng	esghapagtuutkaat	sameng	pilleghqaaneng.
B03_04_Luke_V21	Pikii,	“Aghneghmi	whani,	nagasimaneghpesini	ukut	Akuzitet	Igaqegkat	aapqaat	apeghiightuq.”
B03_04_Luke_V22	Akuzineghmeng	taaqsan	qamaglluteng	nagallghiit	efquqegkiit	akuzillghi,	saghiighayagutkiitlu	akuzitangi	nangllegtallelguniluki.	Aapqughaaghutkat,	“Una	Joseph-em	ighneqenghitaguu?”
B03_04_Luke_V23	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Nalluneqnangunaan	whangamnun	apeghlleqaghsi	whaten	pilleq,	‘Aghallegtaq,	elpeneng	naallghuten.’	Nagaquqaqaput	Capernaum-emi	pikaghten,	maanillu	anglivigpeni	tamaakut	piightiki,	enkaam	ugpeqelleqamken	Messiah-nguniluten.”
B03_04_Luke_V24	Pikiillu,	“Ipa	piimsi,	uuknaliqista	tuguklightengituq	ellmi	katam	anglivigmini.
B03_04_Luke_V25	Iwernga	ipa	ungipaatamsi,	Israel-mi,	Elijah	kiyaghtengnguluku,	ugingighhaghtuuq.	Tamaani	pilleghni	eslallugughhneghitkaaguq	pingayut	ayumiqullghet,	aghvinlek	tanqit	ilalluki,	enkaam	neqangisagllakaaguq	tamaghhaani	nunangani	Israel-em.
B03_04_Luke_V26	Iwernga	Kiyaghneghem	Elijah-mun	kayusighyaghtiisqellghitii	nalighhiiniit	ugingighat	Israel-melnguut.	Yeghlegi	kayusiisaghtiisqegkaqaa	Gentile-a	ugingighaq,	kiyaghlleghhii	Zarephath-mi,	Sidon-melngughmi.
B03_04_Luke_V27	Enkaamllu	Israel-mi	leper-ekaghtuuq,	kiyaghtellghani	uuknaliqistem	Elisha-m.	Nalighhiiniit	ukmangillghitutlu	naallghutellghitutlu,	iwerngaqun	Gentile-a	Naaman,	Syria-ghmii.”
B03_04_Luke_V28	Qamaglluteng	synagogue-melnguut	sakriteghllakat	nagasamegteggu	Jesus-em	tawaten	pillgha.
B03_04_Luke_V29	Taagken	nekevuulluteng,	ayagaghtaamaan	neghllagmeng	aanutkaat.	Taana	neghllagat	qemikun	nekeftekaalghii	enkaam	aghulaqutkaat	qemim	qagughruganun	siingnaluku	tesamavek.
B03_04_Luke_V30	Iwernga	akulngitgun	naghughqughluki	aghulaqegkaq.
B03_04_Luke_V31	Taagken	Jesus	tesamavek	Capernaun-emun	pikaq,	neghllagmun	Galilee-melngughmun.	Sabbath-mi	apeghtughimaluku,
B03_04_Luke_V32	saghiighayagutkaat	apeghtughillgha,	qayughllak	apeghtughikaq	aghtughyaghqaanghillelighluni	Kiyaghneghmeng.
B03_04_Luke_V33	Synagogue-meteftuq	yuuk	ilumikun	tughneghalek.	Iglagtupiglluni	akilghuumeng	pikaq,
B03_04_Luke_V34	“Avelghaghqut!	Jesus	Nazareth-eghmii,	sanaqsikut?	Naafqesaghtuuzikuut?	Liisimakamken	kinanguten,	Agleghnalghiikaaten	Kiyaghneghem.”
B03_04_Luke_V35	Iwernga	Jesus-em	aghyuuqaa,	“Qallegpenang	ellnganeng	aani!”	Tughneghaam	iqusluku	manungitgun,	aqnighqegpenaan	aanegkaq.
B03_04_Luke_V36	Qamaglluteng	yuget	saghiighayugumaghmeng	pikat,	“Aghtughyaghqaanghitaghhalek	akuzitangi!	Pilleghqalighlunillu	aghtughyaghqaanghillelighluni	qeleghyaqminiki	tughneghaat	legan	aanleghaatut!”
B03_04_Luke_V37	Jesus-em	tawaten	pillgha	ungipaqegkaat	nani	alngunak	tamaani.
B03_04_Luke_V38	Jesus	nekevluni,	synagogue-meng	aanluni,	Simon-enkunun	aglaghluni	iitqaq.	Simon-em	sakinga	aghnaq	puqleghaghllak,	enkaam	naallghutaghtesqegkaat	ellnganun.
B03_04_Luke_V39	Takuluku	qavaghviganun	nekevghaghmi	qulangighluku	puqleghanga	eflequqaa	enkaam	puqleghangiitkaq.	Tawaninginaq	makelluni	kepsiiqukii.
B03_04_Luke_V40	Siqineq	teviimaluku,	Jesus-mun	yuget	tagiquutkiit	qinuyugngalghiit	allaaghhiinaghneng	aqnighneghneng.	Qamaglluki	saaftaqluki	naallghuquqii.
B03_04_Luke_V41	Tughneghaatlu	aanleghaatkat	yugneng	akilghuumaghmeng,	“Elpek	Kiyaghneghem	Ighneqaaten!”	Iwernga	aghyuuqii,	akuzisnaniqiillu	qayughllak	liisimakegkangat	ellnga	Christ-angulghii.
B03_04_Luke_V42	Aghsagu	Jesus	kilgaanun	pikaq.	Yuget	ivaghyaghtughluku,	naalkesamegteggu	aghulaqesnaniqaat.
B03_04_Luke_V43	Iwernga	pikii,	“Ungipaqepestaaghyaghtughnaqngwaaqa	Ataneghpagullgha	Kiyaghneghem	ilangitnunllu	neghllagnun,	qayughllak	taana	apalluqluku	kayagtekaagunga.”
B03_04_Luke_V44	Enkaam	ungipaqimanginaqaq	synagogue-ngitni	Judea-m.
B03_05_Luke_V1	Ataasimi	aghneghmi,	Naayvam	Gennesaret-em	esnengani,	Jesus	nekevghanguluku	yuget	kanglluqaghtekaat	nagannaluki	Kiyaghneghem	Akuzitangi.
B03_05_Luke_V2	Esghaqakek	maalghuk	angyak	esnemi	sayugngalghiik.	Naqam	yugit	iqalleniightet	aviiteftut,	ughvughyaghtuumakangit	negaghpateng.
B03_05_Luke_V3	Uuglluni	Simon-em	angyaanun,	awavaghqaaghutesqegkaq	esnemeng.	Taagken	aqumluni	angyakun	yuget	apeghtuqii.
B03_05_Luke_V4	Apeghtughineghmeng	taaqsami,	Simon	pikaa,	“Uusqallghanun	awavaghluten	negaghpagten	ateghtiki	naaptesqelluki.”
B03_05_Luke_V5	Simon-em	pikaa,	“Yuguniiq,	unulqusiq	iqalliniightaayaghtukut	sakengellghitukut!	Iwernga	kayagtekevnga	negaghpaget	ateghnaqanka.”
B03_05_Luke_V6	Legan	ateghtiit	naapqaghiighllakat	repall	piiguqestaghluteng	lliiqat.
B03_05_Luke_V7	Angyam	aallghanilnguut	ilateng	apaqiit	kayusighyaghtiisqelluteng.	Kaasisteng	angyak	imiqagket	esleqaghaghllukek	repall	kalefqaghtekat.
B03_05_Luke_V8	Iwernga	Simon	Peter-em	esghaghyamigu	allaaghlluwhaghtilleq,	Jesus-em	sivungakun	niinghulluni	pikaa,	“Ataneq,	whangamnitegpenang	qayughllak	seghleghqestenguunga!”
B03_05_Luke_V9	Simon-enkut	yukullghiit	saghiighayukat	naapqaghiilleghmeggneng,
B03_05_Luke_V10	qepghalgutkeklu	James-enkuk	John-enkuk,	Zebedee-m	ighneghqek.	Jesus-em	pikaa	Simon,	“Alingegpenang,	whaken	kenlekluku	yugmeng	naapsagunnaqnguuten.”
B03_05_Luke_V11	Angyak	quutmun	sayuglukek,	unitkiit	sangwaat	qamaglluki	enkaam	maligtekaat	Jesus.
B03_05_Luke_V12	Jesus	ilangitnisimaluku	neghllaget,	yuuk	tamaanteftuq	elngaatall	leper-eghllagngalghii.	Esghaghyamigu	Jesus,	sivungakun	niinghutkaq	maniguutepiglluni	pikaa,	“Ataneq,	piyukelqegkuvgu	ukmangighnga.”
B03_05_Luke_V13	Jesus-em	nengugluni	saafsimaan	pikaa,	“Piyukelqaqa;	ukmangiighten.”	Tawaninginaq	leprosy-ngiitkaq.
B03_05_Luke_V14	Jesus-em	ineghtengngwaaqaa,	“Kina	alngunak	ungipaategpenaan,	iwernga	aglaa	priest-mun	yuvghiighesqelluten.	Taagken	aghqerraaghhaaten	Moses-em	qelghutellghatun	ipapighqesqelluku	ukmangiightellghen.”
B03_05_Luke_V15	Iwernga	Jesus	wataqaaghaq	ungipaqegkaat	tamaghhaani,	enkaam	yulghuteghllaget	takulaghaasimanginaqaat	nagannaluku,	naallghutesqellutengllu	aqnighneghmeggneng.
B03_05_Luke_V16	Iwernga	kilgaanun	awen	aghulaqaqelghii	yughaghnaluni.
B03_05_Luke_V17	Ataasimi	aghneghmi,	Jesus	apeghtughimaluku,	tawani	aqumgatnguftut	Pharisees-etlu	apeghtughikaygetlu	Liilightuusaneng.	Taakut	tagilaghaatkaaftut	tamaghhiitneng	Galilee-m	nengitneng,	Judea-m	nengitneng,	Jerusalem-emengllu.	Atanghem	aghtughyaghqaanghillgha	naallghutimun	ellnganilguq.
B03_05_Luke_V18	Ilangita	yuget	tagitkaat	ellnganun	uniiqaq	yuuk	allighaakun.	Mangteghamun	itghutfigkameng	ivaghikat,	Jesus-em	manungakun	llinaluku.
B03_05_Luke_V19	Iwernga	itghunneghmeng	aghtuqaat	qayughllak	yuget	kanglluutngaghllagulghiit,	enkaam	mangtegham	qaaynganun	mayuutkaat.	Tawani	tile-em	ilangi	iqiqughluki,	reghighulluku	ukigtekaat	allighaakun	akulngitnun	yuget	manunganilnguut	Jesus-em.
B03_05_Luke_V20	Liisimakegkangi	ugpeqillelgulghiit	enkaam	yuuk	pikaa,	“Seghevutanka	seghleghqelleghten.”
B03_05_Luke_V21	Apeghtughikayuget	Liilightuusaneng,	Pharisees-etlu	umyugamegteggun	aapqughaaghutkat,	“Kingangaawa	una	yuuk	Kiyaghneghukallghuughunilghii?	Kiyaghneghhiinaaguq	seghevutiyaghqaq	seghleghqelleghneng.”
B03_05_Luke_V22	Jesus-em	liisimakegkangi	sumeghtaghallghit	enkaam	aaptekii,	“Sangan	tawaten	sumeghtaghaghetsi?
B03_05_Luke_V23	Nalikek	whaten	pillghek	piyaqniitak,	‘Seghleghqelleghten	seghevutut’,	nalighmeng,	‘Makelluten	piyugi’?
B03_05_Luke_V24	Iwernga	elpesinun	liisimakesugaqa	Ighnegha	Yugem	aghtughyaghqaanghillelguuq	nunami	seghevutiyaghqaaluni	seghleghqelleghneng.”	Taagken	pikaa	uniiqaayalghii	yuuk,	“Ungipaatamken,	maketen,	tuguluku	allighan,	elpesinun	aglaa!”
B03_05_Luke_V25	Yulghutet	esghaamanghitni	tawaninginaq	yuuk	makelluni,	allighani	tuguluku	ellmeggnun	aglaqaq,	usuqumaan	Kiyaghneq.
B03_05_Luke_V26	Qamaglluteng	yulghutet	saghiighayugllakat,	usuqegkaatlu	Kiyaghneq,	pikat,	“Aghneghmi	whani	elngaatall	esghapagtukut	allaaghlluwhaghmeng!”
B03_05_Luke_V27	Tawaten	pillghet	kingungitneng,	Jesus	navek	piluni	esghaqaa	tax-meng	qerngughtista,	aatgha	Levi.	Aqumgaftuq	tax-meng	qerngughtivigmini,	pikaa,	“Maligtinga.”
B03_05_Luke_V28	Nekevluni	sangwaa	qamaglluku	unilluku	maligtekaa.
B03_05_Luke_V29	Taagken	mulunghituq	Levi-m	ellmeggni	neqenghaghquteghllakaa	Jesus.	Tawanteftut	tax-meng	qerngughtistelghutetlu	ilangitlu	yuget,	aqumelgusiqiit	tipelegni.
B03_05_Luke_V30	Pharisees-etlu	apeghtughistengitlu	Liilightuusat	qikeghqukat	maligsaaghtenganun,	“Sangan	neghelgusighaqestekillu	meghelgusighaqestekillu	tax-meng	qerngughtistetlu	seghleghqestetlu?”
B03_05_Luke_V31	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Yugunqegtat	aghallegtaghsughniitut	iwerngaqun	tamaakut	qinuyulghiit.
B03_05_Luke_V32	Tagingunghitunga	tagsiqlighnaluki	elqughutngalghiit	yuget.	Iwernga	taginguunga	seghleghqestet	avuteghqelluki	seghleghqennaniisqelluki.”
B03_05_Luke_V33	Ilangita	yuget	Jesus	pikaat,	“John-em	maligsaaghtengi	awen	fast-aaqutlu	yughaghaqutlu.	Pharisees-etlu	maligsaaghtengit	tawaten	piiqut.	Iwernga	elpek	maligsaaghteten	neghaqutlu	meghaqutlu.”
B03_05_Luke_V34	Jesus-em	aaptekii,	“Nengughhnaqelghiik	aqelqiik	fast-elleqaat	nulightughnaqelghii	ellngitnilluku?
B03_05_Luke_V35	Iwernga	pilleghqaq	kaallequq	nulightughnaqelghii	ellngitneng	iqilleqaat,	elngaatall	tawani	fast-ellequt.”
B03_05_Luke_V36	Enkaamllu	Jesus-em	ungipaghaatkii,	“Kitum	alngunak	ikuviknaanghitaak	qaaslighraghaak,	ilaaghnalukek	qaaslilugek.	Tawaten	pikumikek	piiglleqaak	qaaslighraghaak	enkaam	nutaghaq	ilaaghutkaa	allangumighullequq.
B03_05_Luke_V37	Nalighmeng	kitum	alngunak	awataghpaluget	imighnaanghitii	wine-eghraghaghmeng.	Imiqumiki	awataghpaluget	quupaghllequt	enkaam	wine-eghraghaq	sakusiiqellequq.	Awataghpalugetlu	atuuyaghqaananighllequt.
B03_05_Luke_V38	Itupill	wine-eghraghaq	kuuvyaghqaaguq	awataghpagraghaghmun!
B03_05_Luke_V39	Kina	alngunak	wine-elugmeng	meghluni,	meghyugnaanghituq	wine-eghraghaghmeng	qayughllak	whaten	piyaghqaaguq,	‘Wine-eluk	neqnighataghaghtuq	wine-eghraghaghmeng.’”
B03_06_Luke_V1	Sabbath-em	aghneghani,	Jesus	igleghtekaq	wheat-et	piitfigitgun.	Maligsaaghtengi	ikutaqluteng	wheat-em	piitutanganeng,	iiggmeggneng	mingwaagaqluki	qantiit	ikughnaluki	neghegkiit	piitutet.
B03_06_Luke_V2	Ilangita	Pharisees-et	pikiit,	“Tawaten	piyaghqaanghitusi.	Liilightuusamnni	iinghutngaaq	Sabbath-mi	saghnalleghqaq.”
B03_06_Luke_V3	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Atightiigastegguu	David-em	pillgha	iyataghaqngami,	taakutlu	ellnganilnguut?
B03_06_Luke_V4	Iteghluni	Tabernacle-mun	tuguluku	neqekrangllaq	tuunegkaq	Kiyaghneghmun,	ikulluni	neghegkaaguq,	neghestekaqiillu	yuni.	Liilightuusamta	pillghani	kitum	alngunak	neghyaghaqenghitaa	neqekrangllaq	iwerngaqun	priest-et.”
B03_06_Luke_V5	Taagken	pikii,	“Ighnegha	Yugem	Atanqaa	Sabbath-em.”
B03_06_Luke_V6	Ilangani	Sabbath-em,	Jesus	iteghluni	synagogue-mun	apeghtughikaq.	Tawanteftuq	yuuk	aghenqigneghet	iiggi	uniiqaat.
B03_06_Luke_V7	Ilangita	apeghtughikayuget	Liilightuusaneng,	Pharisees-etlu	riirngingwaaqaat	Jesus	naallghutinayukan	Sabbath-mi	anagguniluku	piyaghqaaluku.
B03_06_Luke_V8	Iwernga	liisimakutmineng	sumeghtaghallghit,	yuuk	iiggelek	uniighngalghiimeng	pikaa,	“Tagi	whavek	nekevyaghtaa.”	Nekevluni	tazingavek	aglaqaq.
B03_06_Luke_V9	Taagken	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Aaptaghllamsi,	Liilightuusamta	sasqinkut	Sabbath-mi?	Pinitun	pisqinkuut	nalighmeng	seghletun?	Yugulighisqinkuut	unguvalleghmeng	nalighmeng	tuqutisqinkut?”
B03_06_Luke_V10	Qamaglluki	esghaghteghluki,	yuuk	pikaa,	“Iiggeten	nengugutiki.”	Iiggeni	nengugutii,	aga	naallghutkat.
B03_06_Luke_V11	Enkaam	ugumiyaguteghllagluku	Jesus	agghitkegkaat	sanaluku.
B03_06_Luke_V12	Tawani	pilleghmi	Jesus	naayghamun	mayuqaq	yughaghnaluni.	Unulqusiq	yughaqaq	Kiyaghneghmun.
B03_06_Luke_V13	Aghsagu	tuqlughluki	maligsaaghteni,	taakuneng	nakmiiqaq	qula	maalghuk	siipneqluku	enkaam	atiqii	apostle-et.
B03_06_Luke_V14	Aatghit;	Simon-enkunguut,	(Jesus-em	ateghiqaa	Peter-meng),	Andrew-nkut	anglegutanga,	James-enkut,	John-enkut,	Philip-enkut,	Bartholomew-nkut,
B03_06_Luke_V15	Matthew-nkut,	Thomas-enkut,	James-enkut	ighnegha	Alphaeus-em,	Simon-enkut	atelek	Zealot-meng,
B03_06_Luke_V16	Judas-enkut,	ighnegha	James-em,	Judas	Iscariot-lu,	uveghpagutistengughtekaq.
B03_06_Luke_V17	Jesus-enkut	apostle-kullghiit	ukigluteng	naayghameng,	lliivneqegtellghakun	nunam	nekevghalgusiqii	maligsaaghtelghuteghllani.	Yulghuteghllaget	tagilaghaatkat	tamaaghhaaneng	Judea-m,	Jerusalem-emengllu,	esnegkenengllu	Tyre-nkuk	Sidon-enkuk.	Nagasaghtuutkaat,	naallghutesqellutengllu	aqnighneghmeggneng	pikat.
B03_06_Luke_V18	Naallghuquqiillu	tamaakut	tughneghaat	seghleliighqestekiit.
B03_06_Luke_V19	Qamaglluteng	yulghuteghllaget	saafnaqutkegkaat	Jesus,	qayughllak	ellnganeng	aghtughyaghqaanghilleq	aan'ngulghii	enkaam	qamaglluteng	naallghuquutkat.
B03_06_Luke_V20	Taagken	Jesus-em	esghaghteghluki	maligsaaghteni	pikii,	“Elpesi	aklumalghiini	quyaslelguusi,	qayughllak	Ataneghpagullgha	Kiyaghneghem	elpesi	pikaghsi!
B03_06_Luke_V21	Elpesi	iyatalghiini	quyaslelguusi,	qayughllak	kepsughyaghqaagusi.	Elpesi	qiyalghiini	quyaslelguusi,	qayughllak	nenglaghyaghqaagusi!
B03_06_Luke_V22	Quyaslelguusi	yuget	ugumikenghisi,	ighsakenghisi,	seghlequunghisi,	seghleghunikangisillu.	Tawaten	piiqiisi	qayughllak	maligsaaghtekegkangisi	Ighneghan	Yugem!
B03_06_Luke_V23	“Tawaten	pikangisi	elngaatall	quyalghaasi,	qetgeghaqlusi	quyam	angtalanganeng,	qayughllak	qilagmi	akileghtuusalegllaguusi.	Amenqun	sivunghani,	sivunghita	amyuqetaatkegkaqegkangit	uuknaliqistet.
B03_06_Luke_V24	Iwernga	seghleghwaaghunaqnguusi	elpesi	aklungilngughni,	qayughllak	whani	unguvalleghmi	kiyaghllaataqulleghsi	taananginaaguq	pikaghqaghsi!
B03_06_Luke_V25	Seghleghwaaghunaqnguusi	elpesi	kepsughngalghiini	maaten,	qayughllak	iyatiqellequsi!	Seghleghwaaghunaqnguusi	elpesi	nenglalghiini	maaten,	qayughllak	qiyaaghwaghllagllequsi!
B03_06_Luke_V26	Seghleghwaaghunaqnguusi	elpesi	qamaglluteng	yuget	itagnatun	akuzitkegkangisi,	qayughllak	sivunghita	tawateghpigaq	akuzitkegkaqiit	uuknaliqistesighwaaghet.”
B03_06_Luke_V27	“Iwernga	whanga	piimsi	nagallghiini:	Piniqluki	anguyasi,	pinitun	piiqiteki	ugumikistesi.
B03_06_Luke_V28	Quyastesqaqiteki	Kiyaghneghmun	tamaakut	uyvalaghistesi,	yughaatkaqlukillu	amyuqetaatkistesi.
B03_06_Luke_V29	Kitum	alngunak	ullungagpegun	qasaghtekangaten,	inglungallu	qasaghtesnaken.	Kitum	alngunak	qaasligken	tugukakek,	ggategkenllu	ellnganun	pisqennakegken.
B03_06_Luke_V30	Qamaglluki	tungsighniilghiit	tuunaqiteki.	Kitum	tuguvikumakangisi	saghyagpesineng,	veghtegpenaki.
B03_06_Luke_V31	Yulgutesi	piiqiteki	tawaten	pisqesulleghpesistun	elpesinun.
B03_06_Luke_V32	“Piniqistenginasi	piniqnaqngukufsiki,	sighimagpenasi	quyastelleghmeng	allgeghutelleghqaghpesineng.
B03_06_Luke_V33	Pinitun	pistenginasi	pinitun	pinaqngukufsiki,	sighimagpenasi	quyastelleghmeng	allgeghutelleghqaghpesineng.	Talwa	seghleghqestet	tawaten	piiqut.
B03_06_Luke_V34	Navghitkufsiki	tamaakut	sumeghpesini	veghutiyaghqat,	sighimagpenasi	quyastelleghmeng	allgeghutelleghqaghpesineng.	Talwa	seghleghqestet	navghitiiqut	seghleghqestenun,	tamaakut	navghaqat	veghutaqiit	navghateng	almesiqluki	angtalngit.
B03_06_Luke_V35	Iwernga	piniqluki	anguyasi,	pinitun	piiqitek,	navghitiiqiteklu,	sighimakegpenaki	veghutelleghqiit.	Akileghtuusaghqalegllaguusi,	avaqutiistunllu	Kiyaghneghllagem	pillequsi,	qayughllak	nangllegtaghtuq	iyamsiqayugigalngughnunllu,	seghletunllu	pistenun.
B03_06_Luke_V36	Nangllegtaghtek	katam	tawaten	Atagpesi	nangllegtallghatun.
B03_06_Luke_V37	“Nanqigtegpenaki	yulgutesi,	enkaam	Kiyaghneghem	nanqiggneghilleqiisi.	Anaggunnigpenaki	kinkut	enkaam	Kiyaghneghem	anaggunninghillisi.	Seghevutiiqitek	enkaam	Kiyaghneghem	seghevulleqiisi.
B03_06_Luke_V38	Tuuniiqitek	yulgutegpesinun	enkaam	Kiyaghneghem	tuunelleqiisi.	Tuunegkani	elpesinun	kenegtaqluki,	ufsugutaqluki,	nekegsaghwaaghlleqii,	wata	ilaaghataghaghlleqii	tevughasluki	kenisi.	Tawaten	tuunilleghpesistun	Kiyaghneghem	tuunelleqiisi.”
B03_06_Luke_V39	Taagken	Jesus-em	ungipaghaatkii;	“Ayaakam	yugem	maghyaghqughlleqaguu	ayaakaq	yuuk?	Maghyaghququmigu	laagwaaghmun	kalefkagtaallequk.
B03_06_Luke_V40	Igaghyaghta	aangataghanghituq	apeghtughistemineng.	Iwernga	igaghyaghta	peghqightengngwaaqumi,	apeghtughistemitun	lliighllequq.
B03_06_Luke_V41	“Sangan	esghaghsigu	yulgutegpek	iisqughutesqughhaa,	esghaghpenaan	elpek	katam	iisqughuten	unaghsighllak?
B03_06_Luke_V42	Sangan	yulguten	pizigu,	‘Iisqughutngiqaghlaken’	elpek	paninang	iisqughutelighluten	unaghsighllagmeng?	Uyuq	piniiyugneq!	Sivukluku	unaghsighllak	iyegpengneng	nusugluku,	elngaatall	whateghllugwaaq	esghaghluku	yulgutegpek	iiynga	iisqughutngighnaken.
B03_06_Luke_V43	“Uqfik	pinilghii	piitestingigatuq	seghleghmeng.	Uqfik	seghleq	piitestingigatuq	pinilghiimeng.
B03_06_Luke_V44	Uqfik	natelnguutanga	liigiksaghqaaguq	piitestekaakun.	Sikughlluget	piitestingigatut	figs-meng,	nalighmeng	neghyaghqaanghilnguut	nunivagseghat	piitestingigatut	grapes-meng.
B03_06_Luke_V45	Pinilghii	yuuk	atuqiiquq	pinilghiimeng	ilumikegkamineng,	iwernga	seghleq	yuuk	atuqiiquq	seghleghmeng	ilumikegkamineng.	Yuuk	akuzikayuguuq	ilumikegkamineng.
B03_06_Luke_V46	“Sangan	tuqlughestengnga,	‘Ataneq,	Ataneq?’	naqam	pisqellghenka	atuqegpenaki?
B03_06_Luke_V47	Kina	alngunak	tagiluni	whangamnun,	nagalluki	akuzitenka	qaatkegkaki,	ungipaalleqamsi	natetulanganeng.
B03_06_Luke_V48	Yugtun	mangteghangllalghiitun	ayuquq.	Nuna	samaverugllak	laagluku	uyghagmun,	tunemighluku	taaggun	nekefleqaa	mangteghaq.	Kiiwek	uleveghllaglutek	tawalliima	mangteghaq	qapragtellghilkanga	qayughllak	uyghagmeng	tunemighluni	nekeftekaalghii.
B03_06_Luke_V49	Iwernga	kitum	alngunak	nagalluki	akuzitenka,	qaatkenghilkumiki	yugtun	ayuquq	tunemangunaan	mangteghangllalghiitun.	Kiiwek	uleveghllaglutek	aga	mangteghaq	naafqeghllakaa.”
B03_07_Luke_V1	Jesus-em	aleghquneghmeng	apeghiighyamiki	yuget	aglaqaq	Capernaum-emun.
B03_07_Luke_V2	Taawanguq	centurion-a	qepghaghtelaalek,	megnukumtaagha,	enraqlu	qinuyugllakaq	repall	tuquyaghtungestaghluni.
B03_07_Luke_V3	Centurion-em	nagaqughluku	Jesus,	kevgaqegkii	Jews-et	siivanlleghit	naallghusaghtuqiisqelluku	qepghaghtelaani.
B03_07_Luke_V4	Jesus-mun	kaasameng	nangllegsipiglluteng	pikaat,	“Centurion-em	kayutkesupigtaaten.	Yuuk	taana	kevgaqiilghii	pinighllagtuq	kayusighyaghqapiguuq,
B03_07_Luke_V5	qayughllak	piniqepigtii	yuput,	synagogue-engllaqaqiinkutlu.”
B03_07_Luke_V6	Enkaam	Jesus-em	maligtekii.	Kaasaghtughaqutlu	mangteghamun	centurion-em	ilakumtaaghminun	ungipaasaghtiisqegkaa	whaten,	“Ataneq,	nagneghnaqegpenang	qayughllak	itagnanghitunga	elpenun	iteghviksaghqaalunga	mangteghamnun.
B03_07_Luke_V7	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	whangamneng	takupagningitamken.	Legan	tawanlluten	naallghutesqigu	qepghaghteka	enkaam	naallghulli.
B03_07_Luke_V8	Whangallu	umiilelguunga	qelghikayugmeng	enkaam	asinganitunga	umiilegma.	Pilluwaghtenka	asimnitut,	ataasiq	qelqumkun,	‘Aghulaqi’	aga	aghulaqellequq.	Ilanga	pikumkun,	‘Tagi’	tagillequq.	Qepghaghteka	qelqumkun,	‘Una	piightigu’,	aga	pilleqaa.”
B03_07_Luke_V9	Jesus-em	nagalluku	tawaten	pillgha,	allaaghlluwaghyagutkaa	enkaam	yulghuteghllaget	maligtilghiit	ellmineng	pikii,	“Ungipaatamsi,	nallaataghsigatunga	kitumeng	alngunak	talwa	Israel-mi,	uutun	yugtun	ugpeqilleghtutkalghiimeng.”
B03_07_Luke_V10	Kevgat	uteghnighluteng	centurion-emem	mangteghaanun	esghaqaat	qepghaghtelaagha	naallghutngwaaghluni.
B03_07_Luke_V11	Unaamingani	Jesus	aglaqaq	neghllagmun	atilqelghii	Nain,	maligsaaghtengitallu	yulghuteghllagetlu	maligtekaat.
B03_07_Luke_V12	Kaataquqlu	iteghviganun	neghllagem,	yuget	aanutaqeftaat	tuqukaq	yuuk	lliveghnaluku.	Ugingigham	kezemaghhaaftuq	ighnegha,	enkaam	neghllagem	yulghutngan	maliglleghaataqeftaat	aghnaq.
B03_07_Luke_V13	Atanghem	esghaghluku	aghnaq	nangllegyagulluku	pikaa,	“Qiyagpenang.”
B03_07_Luke_V14	Taagken	takuluku	saaftekakek	kevgusik	enkaam	kevgistet	aghuliiqat.	Taagken	tuqukaq	pikaa,	“Nukalpigaq,	ungipaatamken,	unguvaa!”
B03_07_Luke_V15	Tuqukaq	aqumluni	akuzinginaamaghmi	pikaq	enkaam	Jesus-em	pegtekaa	naanganun.
B03_07_Luke_V16	Qamaglluteng	yulghuteghllaget	tallughyuguteghllakat,	usuqegkaatlu	Kiyaghneq,	pikat,	“Uuknaliqisteghllagem	kaasimiinkut!”	Whatenllu	pikat,	“Kiyaghneghem	kayusighyaghtughii	yuni!”
B03_07_Luke_V17	Taana	ungipaq	mingitkaat	Judea-lqaaghaghmi,	uvitanganilngughnunllu	nunanun.
B03_07_Luke_V18	John-em	maligsaaghtengita	ellnganun	apeghteqiit	qamaglluki	Jesus-em	apeghiightuqii.
B03_07_Luke_V19	Enkaam	John-em	maalghuggiinaak	maligsaaghtegni	tagsighlukek	kevgaqegkakek	Ataneghmun,	aaptesqelluku	whaten,	“Elpengwaa	taginaqnikaat,	nalighmeng	sighimakeltegguu	kina	alla	tagiyaghqaq?”
B03_07_Luke_V20	Yugek	kaallutek	Jesus	pikaak,	“John-em	Paaptaayestem	kevgaqiinkung	aaptesqelluten	whaten,	‘Elpengwaa	taginaqnikaat,	nalighmeng	sighimakeltegguu	kina	alla	tagiyaghqaq?’”
B03_07_Luke_V21	Tawani	pilleghmi	Jesus-em	naallghuquqii	yulghutet	qinuyugitneng,	aqnighneghitneng,	tughneghaat	yuget	ilungitneng	aanestaqluki,	ayaakatlu	esghaasagutestaqluki.
B03_07_Luke_V22	Enkaam	kevgak	kiimsiqakek,	“Aglaghlutek	John-mun	ungipaategnegu	esghapakaghpetegnengllu	nagatkaghpetegnengllu.	Ayaakat	esghaasagutut,	piyugigasalghiit	piyugyagutut,	leprosy-lguyalghiit	ukmangiightii,	tuuslaghyalghiit	nagaquusagutut,	tuqukaayalghiit	unguvaghtestut	unguvalleghmun,	aklumalghiinunllu	Pinilghii	Ungipaq	ungipaquq.
B03_07_Luke_V23	Quyastekaaguq	kitum	alngunak	taaqenghilkuminga	ugpeqneghmeng!”
B03_07_Luke_V24	John-em	kevgakek	aghulaqsayek,	Jesus-em	akuzitkegkaa	John	yulghuteghllagnun;	“Kilgaanun	piiqngafsi,	sangwaa	esghaghesteggu?	Vegaaq	anuqem	ufsuguskangaa?
B03_07_Luke_V25	Sangwaa	esghaghyaghtuqaqesteggu?	Yuuk	aarraghngalghii?	Tawaten	aarraghngalghiitlu,	aklungiteghllagetlu	kiyaghtaqut	umiilget	nengitni.
B03_07_Luke_V26	Sangwaa	esghaghyaghtuqaqesteggu?	Uuknaliqistaa?	Aa-a,	ungipaatamsi,	esghaqaghsi	uuknaliqisteneng	aangataghaghtuq.
B03_07_Luke_V27	John-nguuq	Akuzitet	Igaqegkat	aapqaat,	‘Kiyaghneq	piiq,	Sivugpeni	kayaglleqaqa	ungipaghteka	yataaghqesqelluku	tuumkaghqan.’
B03_07_Luke_V28	Ungipaatamsi,	yugyaggaghneng	allgeghaqelghiineng	John	aangelleghpigaaguq.	Iwernga	kina	alngunak	ukalighpigaq	Ataneghpagullghani	Kiyaghneghem	John-meng	aangataghaghtuq.”
B03_07_Luke_V29	(Qamaglluteng	tamaakut	yuget,	talwa	tax-meng	qerngughtistet,	nagasamegteki	Jesus-em	apeghtughillghi	tuguklighiit	Kiyaghneghem	qelghusii	elqughutnganiluki.	Tawaten	pikaagut	qayughllak	sivunghani	tugukliqaqegkangit	John-em	apeghtughillghi.	Enkaam	John-mun	paaptaayestekaalghiit.
B03_07_Luke_V30	Iwernga	Pharisees-etlu	apeghtughikayugetlu	Liilightuusaneng	tugukliimangitiit	John-em	apeghtughillghi,	enkaam	ellnganun	paaptaayesugumangitut.	Tawaten	pilleghmegteggun	ighsakegkaqaat	Kiyaghneghem	uspeqellgha	ellmeggnun.)
B03_07_Luke_V31	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Maaten	kiyaghlleghhiit	yuget	tuguklighinghilnguut	apeghtughillemnun,	samun	inglunnaqsingi?	Natetat?
B03_07_Luke_V32	Taghnughhaghestun	ayuqut	aqumuulluteng	akilpegaghvigni,	ilateng	akilghuukangit	whaten,	‘Qalghightaatamsi,	tukaleganghitusi!	Qiyiqutukut,	qiyiqenghitusi!’
B03_07_Luke_V33	Elpesi	maaten	kiyaghlleghhiini	taakustun	taghnughhaghestun	ayuqusi.	John	Paaptaayesta	tagiiqngami	neqekrangllaghtuumangituqlu	meghumangituqlu	wine-meng	enkaam	pikaagusi,	‘Tughneghalguuq.’
B03_07_Luke_V34	Ighnegha	Yugem	tagiluni,	neghelgusighiiqlu	meghelgusighiiqlu	yugneng	enkaam	pikaagusi,	‘Yuukqun	taana	esghaqaghteggu!	Neghevalluuguq,	meghevalluuguq,	ilakumtaaqaatlu	tax-meng	qerngughtistet,	seghleghqestetlu!’
B03_07_Luke_V35	Naqamllu	tamaakut	apeghtuusamneng	tuguklighilghiit	kiyaghllequt	pinitun.	Tawaten	pillghem	ipapighqelleqaa	apeghtuutkegkaqa	Kiyaghneghem	peghqinelqaa!”
B03_07_Luke_V36	Ataasim	Pharisee-m	Jesus	neghyaghtiisqegkaa	ellmeggnun.	Enkaam	Pharisee-nkunun	aglaghluni	aqumegkaq	neghnaluni.
B03_07_Luke_V37	Tamaanteftuq	neghllagmi	aghnaq	seghleghqesta.	Nagaqughyamigu	Jesus	neghaqniluku	Pharisee-nkuni,	kelqegkakek	alabaster-ek	aqimleghutak	akitupiglleghhiimeng	tepengllaasimeng	imalgek.
B03_07_Luke_V38	Iteghluni	nekevegkaq	tunutangakun	Jesus-em	itegaan.	Qiyatkelluku	qunimineng	aghistekii	itegii,	enkaam	nuyamineng	sangighquqii.	Taagken	naaghaqluki,	angighhegkii	tepengllaasimeng.
B03_07_Luke_V39	Neghyaghtiisqikam	Pharisee-m	esghapagluku	sumeghtaghaqaq,	“Una	yuuk	uuknaliqistenguyaqumi,	liisimaknayaghaa	aghnaq	kinangutanga,	sastengutangallu	saafqughaalghii	ellnganeng,	qayughllak	seghleghqestenguuq.”
B03_07_Luke_V40	Jesus-em	pikaa,	“Simon,	ungipaataghsugamken	sameng.”	Simon-em	aaptekaa,	“Apeghtughista,	sameng?”
B03_07_Luke_V41	Jesus-em	pikaa,	“Maalghuk	yugek	navghaamalghiik	manimeng	navghitikayugmeng.	Aallgha	navghaqaq	500	denarii-meng,	ilanga	50	denarii-meng.
B03_07_Luke_V42	Nalighhiinaagkenka	llivikepagningitkiik	navghatek	enkaam	navghitikam	puygusqegkiik	navghallghik.	Naligkenka	yugek	piniqataghaghlleqagnegu?”
B03_07_Luke_V43	Simon-em	kiimsiqaa,	“Entaqun	aangluku	navghitkaan.”	Jesus-em	pikaa,	“Elqughaghtan.”
B03_07_Luke_V44	Taagken	qiivluku	aghnaq	Simon	pikaa,	“Esghaghsiguu	una	aghnaq?	Iitghaqngama	whavek	meghmeng	tuunellghitaghpenga	iteganka	ughviisqelluki.	Iwernga	uum	aghnam	iteganka	ughvughii	qunimineng,	sangigtaqluki	nuyamineng.
B03_07_Luke_V45	Upughasimangitaghpenga	naaghmeng,	iwernga	iitghutmineng	aghnam	aghuliighunneghitii	naaghmineghmeng	iteganka.
B03_07_Luke_V46	Naasquqa	mesiighmeng	kuuvikellghitan,	iwernga	ellngan	iteganka	kuuvikii	tepenglaasimeng.
B03_07_Luke_V47	Ungipaatamken,	seghevutellengut	seghleghqellelghuteghllagi,	tamaaken	apalluqluku	piniqellelegllaguuq.	Tawateghpigaq	kina	alngunak	seghevutellengevleghaqaq	piniqellevleghallgaaguq.”
B03_07_Luke_V48	Taagken	Jesus-em	aghnaq	pikaa,	“Seghleghqelleghten	seghevutellengumaat.”
B03_07_Luke_V49	Taagken	tipelegni	ellnganeng	aqumgalgusighilghiit	aapqughaghutkat,	“Kinangaawa	una	seghevutiiqelghii	seghleghqelleghneng?”
B03_07_Luke_V50	Jesus-em	aghnaq	pikaa,	“Ugpeqilleghpek	yugulillengestaaten,	aglaa	nekeggmellelighluten.”
B03_08_Luke_V1	Mulugpenani	Jesus	ighleghtekaq	neghllagnunllu	nengiighhaghnunllu.	Ungipaqikaq	Pinilghiineng	Ungipaneng	Ataneghpagullghaneng	Kiyaghneghem	ayuqelghiimeng.	Qula	maalghuk	siipneqluku	malighsaaghtengita	maligtekaat,
B03_08_Luke_V2	ilangillu	aghnat	maligutkat.	Aghnaneng	aanesquqaqegkangi	tughneghaat,	naallghuquqaqegkangillu	aqnighneghitneng.	Taakunguftut	Mary	Magdala-ghmii	(ellnganeng	aanestekaqegkangi	maaraghvinlek	tughneghaat),
B03_08_Luke_V3	Joanna,	Susanna,	ilangillu	aghnat.	Taakut	aghnat	pitutalmeggneng	kayusiitaqegkangit	Jesus-enkut	maligsaaghtekullghiit.	(Joanna-m	uginga	Chuza,	aflengakistenguftuq	Herod-em	mangteghaaneng).
B03_08_Luke_V4	Neghllagneng	tamaghhiitneng	yulghuteghllaget	tagilaghaatkat	Jesus-mun.	Qerngughuteghllagyata	ungipaghaatkii,
B03_08_Luke_V5	“Piitesighaghta	piitesighaghyaghtuqaq	piitesighaghvigminun.	Miluuqughyaqminiki	piitutet	ilangi	tekitkat	tumetgun	enkaam	yuget	tutmaasghaqegkiit;	taagken	qawaaget	tagiluteng	neghegkiit.
B03_08_Luke_V6	Ilangi	piitutet	tekitkat	uyghagtuqakun	naguyalghiimeng	paliqat,	qayughllak	sunanga	yukutanneghilnguq.
B03_08_Luke_V7	Ilangi	piitutet	tekitkat	sikughllugtuqakun,	sikughlluget	maligulluteng	naguyalghiimeng	piitfigiqiit.
B03_08_Luke_V8	Enkaam	ilangi	piitutet	tekitkat	sunakegtakun,	piitestikat	pinilghiineng	nunivagseghaghneng.	Tamaghhaghmeng	tamaakut	100-kaghtaan	piitutengaqut.”	Jesus-em	akuzilleni	taaqniqii,	“Sigutelguusi,	nagatek!”
B03_08_Luke_V9	Maligsaaghtengita	aaptekaat	Jesus	sameng	pisiitanga	taana	ungipaghaan.
B03_08_Luke_V10	Kiimsiqii,	“Kiyaghneghem	nakmikumiisi	liigikesqelluki	talughngalghiit	ipapillghi	Ataneghpagulleghmi.	Iwernga	ilangitni	yugni	ungipaghaatnginaawaqut.	Enkaam	esghaateghngaaghmeng	esghaasigatut,	nagateghngaaghmeng	liigikigatut.
B03_08_Luke_V11	“Taana	ungipaghaan	whaten	pisiiguq:	Piitutet	Kiyaghneghem	akuzitkii.
B03_08_Luke_V12	Piitutet	tekitkat	tumetgun	inglutngaat	nagatkanun	Kiyaghneghem	akuzitanganeng.	Taagken	Tughneghaam	tagiluni	tugaaqii	akuzitet	ilungitneng	ugpeqifqiitallu	yugulillengefqiitallu	pisqelluki.
B03_08_Luke_V13	Piitutet	tekitkat	uyghagtuqakun	usputngaat	nagatkanun	Kiyaghneghem	akuzitanganeng.	Nagalluki	akuzitet	quyakusiqluki	tuguklighaqiit,	iwernga	qamaverugllak	ilumeggnun	iteghtesigatiit.	Ugpeqiighlluteng,	iwernga	nanghiiqullengneghmeggni	ugpeqinanighaqut.
B03_08_Luke_V14	Piitutet	tekitkat	sikughllugtuqakun	usputngaat	nagatkanun	Kiyaghneghem	akuzitanganeng.	Iwernga	sumeghyalinkut,	aklunginkut,	teghignaanllu	unguvallghem	piitfigighaqii,	enkaam	piitestekiit	angtaniisigatut.
B03_08_Luke_V15	Enkaam	piitutet	tekitkat	sunakegtakun	usputngaat	nagatkanun	Kiyaghneghem	akuzitanganeng.	Neqamikaqiitlu	pinilghiikun	ipapighqengngalghiikun	ilumegteggun.	Nagneghaqut	qaatkelluki	akuzitangi	enkaam	piitestekastun	ayuqut	piitesqughllalghiit	pinilghiineng.
B03_08_Luke_V16	“Kitum	alngunak	kenelghutak	kumaghllukek	sagneghem	asinganun	llinaanghitaak,	nalighmeng	qavaghvigem	asinganun.	Itupill	quulvaqun	llilleqaak,	itelghiinun	nighuk	esghiisqelluku.
B03_08_Luke_V17	Qayughllak	sangwaa	alngunak	iighngalghii	Kiyaghneghem	aliighsaghqaqaa,	sangwaallu	alngunak	saapngalghii	qaaynganun	lliightesleqaa.
B03_08_Luke_V18	Enkaam	nagatngwaaghtek.	Kitum	alngunak	liigikegkumiki	apeghtuusanka	liigikellengataghaghllequq.	Iwernga	kitum	alngunak	liigikenghilkumiki	apeghtuusanka	talwa	liigiknikii	iqilleqiit.”
B03_08_Luke_V19	Taagken	Jesus-em	naanganllu	anglegutangitallu	takukaat,	iwernga	kaanneghmeng	aghtuqaat	qayughllak	yulghuteghllaget	kanglluqaghlluku	ayuqegkangat.
B03_08_Luke_V20	Kitum	ungipaatkaa,	“Naanllu	anglegutetenllu	qakma	nekevghataaghutaqut,	esghaghyugaqaaten.”
B03_08_Luke_V21	Iwernga	pikii,	“Naakallu	anglegutenkallu	tamaakunguut	nagallghiit	akuzitanganeng	Kiyaghneghem,	qaatkegkangitlu.”
B03_08_Luke_V22	Ataasimi	aghneghmi	Jesus-em	maligsaaghteni	pikii,	“Naayvam	inglunganun	aghviilta.”	Angyamun	uughquulluteng	aghulaqegkat.
B03_08_Luke_V23	Telaanangamaluki	Jesus	qavaqaq.	Naayvami	anuqliiteghllakii,	angyaatlu	meghem	imighaataqegkaa	enkaam	yakughniighllakat.
B03_08_Luke_V24	Maligsaaghtengita	takuluku	taghtughlluku	pikaat,	“Yuguniiq,	Yuguniiq,	tuqulaghaannaqukut!”	Jesus-em	makelluni	ineghtekii	anuqallu	imaghllugetlu	enkaam	naangegkat,	amsanaghtengnginaamaghmi	pikaq.
B03_08_Luke_V25	Aaptekii,	“Sangama	ugpeqenghitestengnga?”	Iwernga	alingengulghiitlu	allaghlluwhaghyugulghiitlu	enkaam	ellmeggneng	ilateng	aapqughaaghutkiit,	“Kinangaawa	una	yuuk,	talwa	ineghtekangi	anuqallu	imaghllugetlu	enkaam	legan	qaatkegkangat?”
B03_08_Luke_V26	Taagken	kaatkat	Gerasa-ghmiit	nunangitnun,	naayvam	inglunganilnguq	Galilee-meng.
B03_08_Luke_V27	Legan	Jesus	quutmun	uugtuq,	nallaqaa	yuuk	ilumikun	tughneghaghtuqaq,	nemeng	pinguftuq.	Pilugugigalnguq	qavngaghhaaneng,	kiyaghsigalnguqlu	mangteghani	naqam	lliveghnitaqelghii.
B03_08_Luke_V28	Jesus-em	qelqaa	tughneghaq	ellnganeng	aanesqelluku.	Taagken	yuuk	araghaataghllagluni	sikmuutkaq	manungakun,	maniguutepiglluni	iglagtupiglluni	pikaa,	“Jesus,	Ighnegha	Qulighpigaghllagem	Kiyaghneghem,	sanaqsinga?	Maniguutepigtunga	ikfiqestefqaama	pisqellunga.”	Tawaten	pikaa	qayughllak	Jesus-em	qelqanga	yugmeng	aanesqelluku	tughneghaq.	(Uglaghngaan	tughneghaam	tugughllagaqegkanga.	Yuget	kelengakaqsaqangat,	qiipraghutnengllu	asightaqsaqangit	iiggillu	itegiillu,	iwernga	sakequghaqegkangi.	Enkaangam	tughneghaam	kilgaanun	aghulaqestekaa.)
B03_08_Luke_V30	Taagken	Jesus-em	aaptekaa,	“Kinanguzin?”	Kiimsiqaa,	“Aatqaqa,	‘Uglaghllak!’”	qayughllak	tughneghalghuteghllaget	iteghukaqegkangat.
B03_08_Luke_V31	Taakut	tughneghaat	Jesus-mun	aapuquusimanginaqat	aglaghtestefqaameng	Abyss-mun	pisqelluteng.
B03_08_Luke_V32	Taawa	qemim	minglengani	kurugalghuteghllaget	neghuutaqeftut.	Tughneghaat	aapuquutkat	Jesus-mun	kurugaghnun	iteghtesqelluteng	enkaam	iteghaatestekii.
B03_08_Luke_V33	Taagken	tughneghaat	yugmeng	aanleghaalluteng	iteghaatkat	kurugaghnun.	Kurughaat	pennanun	pangalgulluteng	naayvamun	ifkaqulluteng	tuqulaghaatkat.
B03_08_Luke_V34	Kurugaat	aflengakistengita	esghapagluku	tawaten	pilleq,	qimaguulluteng	ungipaqegkaat	neghllagmi,	uvitanganilngughnillu	nunani.
B03_08_Luke_V35	Taagken	yuget	esghaghyaghtuutkaat	sangwaa	samatanga.	Kaalluteng	Jesus-mun	esghaqaat	yuuk	tughneghiighulluni.	Aqumgaftuq	Jesus-em	manungani	pilugugwaaghluni,	umyugakeklu	naallghutngwaaghlutek	enkaam	alingruughuteghllakat.
B03_08_Luke_V36	Tamaakut	esghapakat	ungipaqegkaat	yuuk	ilumikun	tughneghaghtughllagyalghii	naten	naallghutkaatanga.
