B03_08_Luke_V37	Taagken	qamaglluteng	yuget	Gerasa-ghmiit	nunangitnilnguut	aghulaqeskegkaat	Jesus,	qayughllak	alingruughuteghllagulghiit.	Enkaam	Jesus-enkut	angyamun	uuglleghaalluteng	aghulaqegkat.
B03_08_Luke_V38	Yuuk	tughneghaghtughllagyalghii	aapuquutkaayalghii	Jesus-mun	maligunnaluni,	iwernga	Jesus-em	aghulaqesqegkaa.	Pikaa,
B03_08_Luke_V39	“Uteghnighluten	negpenun,	aapghhu	naten	angkaan	Kiyaghneghem	apeghiillgha	elpenun.”	Enkaam	ellmeggnun	aglaghluni	tamaghhaani	neghllagem	aapqaa	Jesus-em	apeghillgha	ellminun.
B03_08_Luke_V40	Jesus	uteghnighyan	yulghuteghllaget	upughatkaat	qayughllak	utaqangukangat.
B03_08_Luke_V41	Taagken	yuuk	atelek	Jairus-meng	tagikaq,	igleghutistenga	synagogue-em.	Jesus-em	manungakun	niinghulluni	maniguutkaq	ellmeggnun	piightesqelluku,
B03_08_Luke_V42	qayughllak	kezemaghhaq	paniga,	qula	maalghuk	siipneqluku	uksughtutkalghii,	tuqunaqnguftuq.	Aglaamaluku	yulghuteghllaget	kanglluqaghtekaat	Jesus.
B03_08_Luke_V43	Akulngitniteftuq	aghnaq	aagtuqaataaftuq	qula	maalghuk	siipngaan	ayumiqulleghni.	Maningiitkaq	llivikuusaqneghmeng	aghallegtanun,	naqamllu	kitum	alngunak	naallghutepagningitkaa.
B03_08_Luke_V44	Tunutanganeng	Jesus	takuluku	atkuyaaghan	keniin	esnengakun	saaftekaa,	enkaam	kiitnginaamaghmi	pikaq.
B03_08_Luke_V45	Jesus-em	aaptekii,	“Kitum	saaftanga?”	Qamaglluteng	mesighaghyata,	Peter-em	pikaa,	“Yuguniiq,	yulghuteghllaget	kanglluqaghlluten	ayuqaaten.”
B03_08_Luke_V46	Iwernga	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Kitum	saaftaanga,	qayughllak	elpekaqa	aghtughyaghqaanghilleq	aanelghii	whangamneng.”
B03_08_Luke_V47	Aghnaq	piyalghiimi	aksaqfigiteftuq	enkaam	ungelegsimaghmi	tagikaq.	Jesus-em	sivungakun	niinghulluni,	yulghutet	nagasimanghitni	ungipaatkaa	sangan	saaftelleghmineng,	tawaninginaqlu	naallghutelleghmineng.
B03_08_Luke_V48	Jesus-em	pikaa,	“Panimni,	ugpeqilleghpek	naallghutestaaten,	aglaa	nekeggmellelighluten.”
B03_08_Luke_V49	Salin	Jesus	akuzimaluku,	igleghutistenkuneng	yuuk	tagiluni	Jairus	pikaa,	“Panigen	tuqumaaq,	Apeghtughista	qinuyugtegpenaan'ngam.”
B03_08_Luke_V50	Iwernga	Jesus-em	nagalluku,	pikaa	Jairus,	“Alingegpenang.	Taawanginaghhaq	ugpeghi,	piniighhnaaghaa.”
B03_08_Luke_V51	Jesus	mangteghamun	kaasami	kitumun	alngunak	itelgusightesimangilnguq.	Iwerngaqun	iteghtestekii	Peter-enkut	John-enkut	James-enkut,	taghnughaamllu	atanga,	naangallu.
B03_08_Luke_V52	Qamaglluteng	yuget	qiyaaghuuteghllagulghiit	aghnaghaghhaghmun	tuqulghiimun.	Iwernga	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Qiyagpenasi	qayughllak	tuqullghituq,	qavaghaquq.”
B03_08_Luke_V53	Nenglaqegkaat	liisimakluku	tuqukaatanga.
B03_08_Luke_V54	Iwernga	tuguluku	iiggakun	tuqluumaan	pikaa,	“Taghnughhaq,	maketen.”
B03_08_Luke_V55	Aghnaghaghhaq	unguvaghluni,	nekevegkaq.	Jesus-em	kayagutkaa	sameng	neghestesqelluku.
B03_08_Luke_V56	Angayuqakek	saghiighayukak,	iwernga	ineghtekakek	kina	alngunak	ungipaatefqaan	pisqelluku	tawaten	pilleghmeng.
B03_09_Luke_V1	Jesus-em	tuqluqii	qula	maalghuk	siipneqluku	maligsaaghteni.	Qerngughusata	aghtughyaghqaanghilleliquqiillu	pilleghqaliquqiillu	yugneng	aanestesqelluki	qamaglluki	tughneghaat,	naallghutesqellukillu	aqnighneghet.
B03_09_Luke_V2	Taagken	ungipaqiyaghtiisqegkii	Ataneghpagullghaneng	Kiyaghneghem,	naallghuqiisqellukillu	qinuyulghiit.
B03_09_Luke_V3	Pikii,	“Igleghalleghpesinun	sameng	alngunak	kelqegpenasi.	Ayaviingunasi,	aqeftaghaangunasi,	neqngunasi,	maningunasi,	talwa	kelqefqaafsi	simiitkaghqameng	ggaatmeng.
B03_09_Luke_V4	Kinkunun	alngunak	iteghlusi	upughaskangisi	tawanlleghhaasi	kenlanga	aghulaqelleghqaghpesinun.
B03_09_Luke_V5	Enkaam	kinkut	upughanneghilkangisi,	aghulaqneghpesini	nemeng	taagken,	tukaataqiteki	pagulangi	itegaghpesi.	Tawaten	pikufsi	liisimakelleqaat	kelengasaaghilleghsi	Kiyaghneghem	aghyuulleghqaaneng.”
B03_09_Luke_V6	Maligsaaghtet	aghulaqluteng	nengiighhaat	takuughaqiit,	ungipaqikat	Pinilghiineng	Ungipaneng,	naallghuquqatlu	tamaghhiitni.
B03_09_Luke_V7	Herod-em	igleghutistengan	Galilee-m,	nagaqughluki	Jesus-em	allaaghlluwhaghtillghi	teggellghhiiqaq,	qayughllak	ilangita	yuget	pikangat	John	Paaptaayesta	unguvaamaniluku	tuqulleghmeng.
B03_09_Luke_V8	Paninang	ilangita	pikaat	Elijah-nguniluku,	enkaam	ilangita	pikaat	naliq	ayumightaq	uuknaliqista	unguvaamaniluku.
B03_09_Luke_V9	Herod	pikaq,	“John	naasqwightestekaqaqa,	iwernga	kinangaawaqa	yuuk	nagaqughaqegkegka	tawaten	piiqelghii?”	Enkaam	Herod-em	esghaghyukaa	Jesus.
B03_09_Luke_V10	Apostle-et	uteghnighluteng,	Jesus	ungipaatkaat	apeghiighutelleghmeggneng.	Aghulaqutkii	neghllagmun	Bethsaida-mun	ellnginaanaluteng.
B03_09_Luke_V11	Yulghutet	naantulanga	liigiksamegteggu	maligtekaat.	Kaasata	quyakluki	ellngitnun	akuzitkegkaa	Ataneghpagullgha	Kiyaghneghem,	naallghutesulghiitlu	naallghuquqii.
B03_09_Luke_V12	Whanikuyagu,	qula	maalghuk	siipneqluku	maligsaaghtengita	takuluku	pikaat,	“Maana	paaghqituq	enkaam	yulghutet	aglaghtuutesqiki	qantaghanlengughnun	nengiighhaghnunllu	piitesighaghtenunllu.	Tamaani	tukughqangnayaghtutlu	neghyaghqangnayaghtutlu.”
B03_09_Luke_V13	Iwernga	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Elpesi	sameng	neghyaghqaliteki.”	Pikaat,	“Legan	taawa	tallimat	neqekrangllat,	iqallugeklu	naamapagningitut	whaten	uglaghqakalghiinun	yugnun.	Wetkuqun	navek	neqengyaghtughtesukufkut	taawa	neghqennayaghaput	qamaglluki.”
B03_09_Luke_V14	Tawanlenguut	entaqun	5,000-nguut	yuget,	kesutkegpenaki	aghnatlu	taghnughhaatlu.	Maligsaaghteni	pikii,	“Aqumuutesqiteki	qerngaqaghtiita,	fifty-ngwaaqluki.”
B03_09_Luke_V15	Maligsaaghtet	pisqelleghmegestun	qamaglluki	aqumuutestekiit.
B03_09_Luke_V16	Taagken	Jesus-em	tuguluki	tallimat	neqekrangllat,	iqallugeklu	qilagmun	sivuglluni,	iyamsiqayugvikegkaa	Kiyaghneq.	Taagken	iiggmineng	aavghughluki	tuunegkii	maligsaaghteminun	uyegtesqelluki	yugnun.
B03_09_Luke_V17	Qamaglluteng	neghuutkat	kepsuulluteng.	Maligsaaghtet	tugulaghluki	siipneghit	imightuqiit	qula	maalghuk	siipneqluku	pasketet.
B03_09_Luke_V18	Ataasimi	aghneghmi	Jesus	ellnginaghmi	yughalghii.	Maligsaaghtengi	qantaghanlenguut	enkaam	aaptekii,	“Yuget	kinangunilunga	piiqatnga?”
B03_09_Luke_V19	Kiimsiqaat,	“John-nguniiqaaten	Paaptaayesta,	iwernga	ilangita	Elijah-nguniiqaaten.	Enkaam	ilangita	piiqaaten	naliit	ayumightaq	uuknaliqista	unguvaqaq.”
B03_09_Luke_V20	Aaptekii,	“Elpesimi	kinanguniiqestengnga?”	Peter-em	kiimsiqaa,	“Christ-akaaten	Kiyaghneghem.”
B03_09_Luke_V21	Iwernga	Jesus-em	ineghtengngwaaqii	ungipaatefqaan	kina	alngunak	pisqelluku.
B03_09_Luke_V22	Pikii,	“Ighnegha	Yugem	uglalghiimeng	ikfiqepestaaghyaghqaaguq,	ighsaksaghqaqaatlu	siivanlleghet,	chief	priest-et,	apeghtughikayugetlu	Liilightuusaneng.	Taagken	tuqulleqaat,	iwernga	pingayiitangani	aghneghem	unguvaghllequq.”
B03_09_Luke_V23	Taagken	qamaglluki	pikii,	“Kitum	alngunak	maligsukuminga,	ellmi	katam	piyukelleni	peglluki,	aghhutanga	tamaghhaan	tuguluku	qaquurani,	maligllinga.
B03_09_Luke_V24	Enkaam	kitum	alngunak	peggneghilkumigu	unguvalleni,	iflayaghqaqaa.	Iwernga	kitum	alngunak	pegtekumigu	unguvalleni	whanga	apalluqlunga,	yugulilleqaa.
B03_09_Luke_V25	Sangwaa	yugem	allgeghlleqagu	iingunaan	nuna	piliilluku	iflakumigu	nalighmeng	naafqegkumigu	unguvalleni?
B03_09_Luke_V26	Kitum	alngunak	kayngukegkanganga,	akuzitenkallu,	Ighneghan	Yugem	kayngukelleqaa	tagikumi	nighughqelleghmikun,	nighughqengngallghitgunllu	Atam,	agleghnalghiitlu	yaqulget.
B03_09_Luke_V27	Iwernga	ipa	ungipaatamsi,	ilasi	nekevghallghiit	whani	tuquyaghqaanghitut	kenlanga	esghalleghmeggnun	Ataneghpagullgha	Kiyaghneghem.”
B03_09_Luke_V28	Tawaten	Jesus	akuziluni,	pingayuneng	inglulek	aghneghet	atughluki,	kelqegkii	Peter-enkut	John-enkut	James-enkut.	Mayuqat	naayghamun	yughaghnaluni.
B03_09_Luke_V29	Yughaamaluku,	gginaa	allangughtekaq,	aatkiillu	qaterakguutkat	nighugraketun.
B03_09_Luke_V30	Taagken	aliighaghtekak	maalghuk	yugek	nighugullutek	qilagem	nighughqellghakun,	Moses-enkunguftuk	Elijah-nkuk.	Aleghqughaqeftaak	Jesus	tuqulleghqaaneng	Jerusalem-emi;	tawaten	tuqukumi	apeghiighlleqaa	Kiyaghneghem	uspeqellgha.
B03_09_Luke_V32	Peter-enkut	qavanghaateghllakat,	iwernga	taghtughluteng	esghaqaat	Jesus-em	nighughqellgha,	yugeklu	nekevghalgutkek.
B03_09_Luke_V33	Yugek	unitaqaaklu	Jesus,	Peter-em	pikaa,	“Yuguniiq,	itagnapigtuq	whaanlenguukut!	Pingayut	azigutat	nekefnaqaput	elpenunllu	Moses-munllu	Elijah-munllu.”	(Peter	akuzikaq	nallukluku	sameng	piiqutni.)
B03_09_Luke_V34	Salin	akuzimaluku	qilagwaaq	aliighluni	saapegkii.	Maligsaaghtet	alingegkat	qilagwaaghem	saapsisteng.
B03_09_Luke_V35	Qilagwaaghmeng	mem	pikii,	“Una	Ighneqaqa,	nakmikegkaqa!	Nagataqiteggu!”
B03_09_Luke_V36	Ma	nepiighyalghiimi	Jesus	ellnginaaftuq.	Maligsaaghtet	sameng	pimangilnguut,	esghaqaghtengllu	aapghumangilkangat	kitumun	alngunak.
B03_09_Luke_V37	Unaamingani	naayghameng	ukigyalghiimeng	yulghuteghllaget	Jesus	utaqaaqeftaat.
B03_09_Luke_V38	Yulghuteghllaget	akulngitneng	yuuk	akilghuukaq,	“Apeghtughista,	maniguutunga	elpenun	ighneqa	esghaqiisqelluku	qayughllak	kezemaghhaalghii	avaqutaqa.
B03_09_Luke_V39	Ilumikun	tughneghalghuuq,	tugupiggneghminigu	araghaataghqaqaa,	sayugpagtaghtesimaan	kenlanga	qaangha	puuglliighqellghanun.	Aqnighqeghllagaqaa,	unitelqungigataallu.
B03_09_Luke_V40	Maligsaaghtegpenun	aanestaghtesqumayaghaqa	iwernga	pipagningitaat.”
B03_09_Luke_V41	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Kii,	elpesi	yugni	ugpellghitusillu	seghleghwaaghuusillu!	Naten	tagkaan	elpesininnaqsinga	ugpeqesqellunga?”	Taagken	yuuk	pikaa,	“Ighneghen	tagitigu	whavek.”
B03_09_Luke_V42	Tagimaluku	tughneghaam	ulleghlluku	sayugpagtaghtestekaa.	Iwernga	Jesus-em	qelqaa	tughneghaq	aanesqelluku,	enkaam	naallghulluku	mekelghiiq	atanganun	tuunegkaa.
B03_09_Luke_V43	Qamaglluteng	yuget	saghiighayagutkaat	aghtughyaghqaanghitelleghllaga	Kiyaghneghem.	Paninang	yuget	saghiighayugumaluki	tamaghhaaneng	Jesus-em	apeghiillghaneng,	maligsaaghteni	pikii,
B03_09_Luke_V44	“Nagatngwaaghtek,	puygugpenaan	una:	Ighnegha	Yugem	uveghpagutellengnaqnguuq	taagken	yuget	tugulleqaat.”
B03_09_Luke_V45	Iwernga	liigikumangilkangat	tawaten	pillgha	qayughllak	umyugiit	liigiksaghqaananighqegkaalghiit.	Tetukaat	aapneghmeng	sangami	tawaten	akuzillghaneng.
B03_09_Luke_V46	Taam	kingunaneng	maligsaaghtet	aaghtiiraaghutkat	nalighteng	angelleghpigaayaghqaatanga.
B03_09_Luke_V47	Iwernga	Jesus-em	liisimakegkii	sumeghtaghallghit.	Enkaam	tuguluku	taghnughhaq	saaghwmikun	nekevestekaa.
B03_09_Luke_V48	Pikii,	“Kitum	alngunak	atemkun	tugukliqumigu	una	taghnughhaq,	tuguklighlleqaanga.	Enkaam	kitum	alngunak	tugukliquminga,	tuguklighlleqaa	kayagtisteka.	Kina	alngunak	ukalighpigaq	akulegpesinilnguq,	angelleghpigaaguq.”
B03_09_Luke_V49	John-em	pikaa,	“Yuguniiq,	esghaamaghput	yuuk	ateghpegun	aanesqulghii	tughneghaghneng.	Enkaam	ineghsimaaghput	qayughllak	whangkunnun	ilatnganghilnguq.”
B03_09_Luke_V50	Jesus-em	pikaa,	“Ineghtegpenaan	qayughllak	kina	alngunak	elpesinun	kipullgginaanghilnguq	elpesinun	ayuquq.”
B03_09_Luke_V51	Tughaaghyan	Jesus-em	qilagmun	mayulleghqani,	qakiqniqepigtekaq	Jerusalem-ennaluni.
B03_09_Luke_V52	Kayagtekii	ilangi	ungipaghtet	igleghtekestiisqelluki	sivumini.	Samaria-mun	pikat	nekaghqangusaghtughnaluku.
B03_09_Luke_V53	Iwernga	Samaria-ghmiit	upughanneghitkaat	qayughllak	Jerusalem-emun	maniguusaghtuulghii.
B03_09_Luke_V54	Maligsaaghtegkenka,	James-enkuk	John-enkuk	esghapagluki	yuget	ighsakegkangat	Jesus,	aaptekaak,	“Ataneq,	Kiyaghneghmun	tungsiiteltekii-i	qilagmeng	ukigtesqelluku	keneq	paneghtesqelluki?”
B03_09_Luke_V55	Jesus-em	qiivlukek	aghyuuqakek.
B03_09_Luke_V56	Taagken	ilanganun	nem	aglaqat.
B03_09_Luke_V57	Tumetgun	igleghsimaluki	yugem	Jesus	pikaa,	“Maliglleqamken	navek	alngunak	pikuvek.”
B03_09_Luke_V58	Jesus-em	pikaa,	“Kaviighet	riigtelguut,	qawaaget	unglutelguut,	iwernga	Ighnegha	Yugem	nekaghqiituq.”
B03_09_Luke_V59	Taagken	ilanga	yuuk	Jesus-em	pikaa,	“Maligtinga.”	Iwernga	yugem	pikaa,	“Ataneq,	maliglleqamken	iwernga	sivukluku	ataka	qungughyaghtughnaqaqa.”
B03_09_Luke_V60	Jesus-em	pikaa,	“Tamaakut	tuqukat	qungughlitki	tuqumasliiteng.	Iwernga	elpek,	aghulaqluten	ungipaqsaghtughhu	Ataneghpagullgha	Kiyaghneghem.”
B03_09_Luke_V61	Ilangan	yugem	pikaa,	“Ataneq,	maliglleqamken	iwernga	sivukluki	nemiinka	ungipaasaghtuqaghnaqanka.”
B03_09_Luke_V62	Jesus-em	pikaa,	“Kina	alngunak	piitesighaghvigmini	peksighqimaluni	nunameng	qiivaataqumi	uteghmun	itagnaghnaanghituq	Ataneghpagullghanun	Kiyaghneghem.”
B03_10_Luke_V1	Taam	kingunganeng,	Atanghem	maligsaaghtemineng	nakmikegkii	72-ghyaget	yuget.	Takuughaghyaghqaminun	kayagtekii	malghukaghtiita	igleghtekestiisqelluki.
B03_10_Luke_V2	Pikii,	“Uglalghiim	yugem	ugpeqsugaqiit	Pinilghiit	Ungipat.	Tamaakunguut	usputngalghiit	nunivagseghanun	unataghyaqleggiinaaghtekat.	Taawanginaq	palapigtut	qepghaghtet.	Enkaangam	yughaghtek	Atanghanun	unataghyaghqat	kayagtisqelluku	qepghaghtekaghqameng	unataghyaghqaanun.
B03_10_Luke_V3	Aghulaqitek!	Taawa	kayagtamsi	penniighaghaastun	ayuqlusi	qungangitnun	amaat.
B03_10_Luke_V4	Kelqegpenasi	manimeng,	aqeftaghaaghmeng,	simiitkaghqameng	kamegmeng.	Tumeni	aghuliighlusi	kimaawisightughpenasi	aleghqughyaghqaaluki	yuget.
B03_10_Luke_V5	Iteneghpesini	mangteghanun,	sivuklusi	whaten	piiqiteki,	‘Kiyaghneghem	nekeggmellelisilli!’
B03_10_Luke_V6	Mangtegham	yugan	upughaskangisi	nekeggmellelighluni	taawa	Kiyaghneghem	nekeggmellelilleqii.	Iwernga	upughanneghilkangisi,	Kiyaghneghem	nekeggmellelgusnaanghitii.
B03_10_Luke_V7	Tawantaqitek	ataasimi	mangteghami,	neghaqluki	sangwaat	upughatusiit.	Tawaten	piiqitek	qayughllak	qepghaghta	akileghtuusangaquq	qepghalleghminun.	Tukughpesineng	aanaqlusi	kinkunun	nuugtaataghpenasi.
B03_10_Luke_V8	Kaanneghpesini	nenun,	tugukliqangisi	upughatusiit	neqet	neghaqiteki.
B03_10_Luke_V9	Naallghuqughteki	qinuyugtiighit,	whatenllu	piiqluki,	‘Ataneghpagullgha	Kiyaghneghem	whaa	maantuq.’
B03_10_Luke_V10	Iwernga	kaanneghpesini	nenun,	tuguklinghilkangisi,	tuumngitnun	aglaghlusi	yugtuqami	whaten	pilghaasi,
B03_10_Luke_V11	‘Talwa	nunagpesi	pagulanga	itegamteggun	nevegkaq	paallgaghput.	Tawaten	piikut	kelguviknalusi	anaggullghhiisi	ighsakelleghpesigun	Kiyaghneghem	ungipaa.	Iwernga	neqamikiteggu	Ataneghpagullgha	Kiyaghneghem	whaa	maantuq!’
B03_10_Luke_V12	Ungipaatamsi,	Nanqigtillghem	Aghneghani	Sodom-eghmiit	aghyuulleghqestaaghaayaghqaagut	taam	nem	yuganeng.
B03_10_Luke_V13	“Seghleghwaaghunaqnguusi,	Chorazin-eghmiini!	Seghleghwaaghunaqnguusi,	Bethsaida-ghmiini!	Elpesini	allaaghlluwaghtilleghllaget	apeghiiqat	pikaayaqata	Tyre-millu	Sidon-millu,	yugit	avuteghqegkaanayaghtut	seghleghqennanighnayaghtut.	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	aalluteng	suvinalghiimeng	qiipaghaghqameng	aqumnayaghtut	panetelleghteggun.
B03_10_Luke_V14	Nanqigtillghem	Aghneghani,	Tyre-ghmiitlu	Sidon-eghmiitlu	aghyuulleghqestaaghaayaghqaagut	elpesineng.
B03_10_Luke_V15	Enkaam	elpesi,	Capernaum-eghmiini!	Qaywa	anglisteghllagyaghngaaghpesi	elpesineng	katam,	repall	sumeghpesini	usuqellengelleqnilusi	qilagmi,	yeghlegi	ukiglleqiisi	hell-mun!”
B03_10_Luke_V16	Maligsaaghteni	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Kitum	alngunak	nagaskumisi,	nagalleqaatnga	whanga.	Kitum	alngunak	ighsakegkumisi,	ighsakelleqaatnga	whanga,	enkaam	kitum	alngunak	ighsakegkuminga,	ighsakelleqaat	kayagtisteka.”
B03_10_Luke_V17	Tagtalmi	taakwani	72-ghyaget	maligsaaghtet	uteghniqat	quyaghllagumaghmeng.	Jesus	pikaat,	“Ataneq,	talwa	tughneghaat	qaatkaqiinkut	ateghpegun	qelenemteki!”
B03_10_Luke_V18	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Aa-a,	esghaamaaqa	Tughneghaq,	qilagmeng	ifkalghii	nighwaagpagtastun.
B03_10_Luke_V19	Nagatek!	Aghtughyaghqaanghillelisimaamsi	tuutesqelluki	nemeghyat,	scorpion-et,	kayaalqesqellukillu	qamaglluki	aghtughyaghqaanghillghi	anguyagem.	Enkaam	saam	alngunak	aqnighhnaanghitiisi.
B03_10_Luke_V20	Itagnalghiinguuq	quyalghiisi	qayughllak	tughneghaat	qaatkegkangisi,	iwernga	quyaaghataghaghtek	qayughllak	atesi	igaqelghiit	qilagmi.”
B03_10_Luke_V21	Tawani	pilleghmi	Agleghnalghiim	Taghnegham	Jesus	quyastekaa.	Pikaq,	“Ataay,	Atangha	qilagemllu	nunamllu,	iyamsiqayugvikamken!	Elpek	tamaakut	talughtaten	peghqinelghiinengllu	liitkanengllu,	naqam	liitestaten	taghnughhaghestun	ayuqelghiinun.	Aa-a,	Ataay,	taananguuq	piyukellghen.”
B03_10_Luke_V22	Taagken	Jesus-em	pikii	yuget,	“Atama	tuunumaanga	sameng	tamaghhaaneng.	Kitum	alngunak	nallukaa	Ighneq	kinangutanga,	iwerngaqun	Atam.	Kitum	alngunak	nallukaa	Ata	kinangutanga,	iwerngaqun	Ighneghem.	Ighneghemllu	liitesleqaa	Ata	kitumun	alngunak	nakmikegkaminun.”
B03_10_Luke_V23	Taagken	qiivluki	maligsaaghteni,	ellnginiit	pikii,	“Quyastekaagusi	esghaallghiisi	sameng	esghaqaghpesineng!
B03_10_Luke_V24	Ungipaatamsi,	uuknaliqistelghutetlu	umiilgetlu	esghaghyukiit	esghaghasi,	esghaamangilkangit.	Nagaqughyukiit	nagaqughasi,	nagaquumangilkangit.”
B03_10_Luke_V25	Apeghtughikayugem	Liilightuusaneng	takuluku	anagvigighnaluku	aaptekaa,	“Apeghtughista,	naten	salunga	allgeghhnayaghsikun	kenlengilnguq	unguvalleq?”
B03_10_Luke_V26	Jesus-em	kiimsiqaa,	“Sangwaa	Liilightuusani	igaqngaa?	Naten	liigikaqsiki	atightuneghpeki?”
B03_10_Luke_V27	Yugem	kiimsiqaa,	“	‘Piniqsaghqaqan	Ataneq	Kiyaghneghen,	qamaglluku	ilugpegun,	qamaglluku	unguvasighpegun,	qamaglluku	iknaqelleghpegun,	qamaglluku	umyugaghpegun.’	Enkaam,	‘Piniqsaghqaqan	yulguten	elpeneng	katam	piniqelleghpetun.’”
B03_10_Luke_V28	Jesus-em	pikaa,	“Elqughaghtan.	Tawaten	pi	enkaam	kenlengilngughmeng	unguvallengellequten.”
B03_10_Luke_V29	Iwernga	apeghtughikayuk	Liilightuusaneng	liigikesukaq	Jesus-mun	qaatkutngwaaghluni	ayuqniluni	Liilightuusanun,	enkaam	aaptekaa,	“Kinangaawa	yulgutka?”
B03_10_Luke_V30	Jesus-em	kiimsiqaa,	“Taawanguq	yuuk	Jerusalem-emeng	ukikaq	Jericho-mun.	Wayaghniightet	sughugluku,	qesugughluki	aatkii,	anagulqaat.	Taagken	tuqutevzighluku	unitkaat.
B03_10_Luke_V31	Enraqlu	priest-a	taakwagun	tumetgun	igleghtekaq.	Iwernga	esghaghyamigu	yuuk	naghughtekaa	tumet	inglungitgun.
B03_10_Luke_V32	Mulugpenani	Levite-a	kaalluni,	esghaghluku,	ellnganllu	naghughtekaa	tumet	inglungitgun.
B03_10_Luke_V33	Iwernga	Samaria-ghmii,	taakwagun	tumetgun	igleghangulghii.	Kaalluku	esghaghyamigu	nanglegyagutkaa.
B03_10_Luke_V34	Takuluku	kiingi	mesiighmengllu	wine-mengllu	ughvughteghluki,	qantaghtuqii.	Taagken	donkey-minun	qaakluku	aglaatkaa	aqelqalghutamun,	tawani	aflengakegkaa.
B03_10_Luke_V35	Unaamingani	tugulukek	maalghuk	denarii-ek,	tuunutkellukek	aqelqalghutam	aflengakistenganun	pikaa,	‘Aflengakaghtigu.	Kayusiitaghaamakuvgu	uteghniquma	llivikelleqamken.’”
B03_10_Luke_V36	Taagken	Jesus-em	aaptekaa,	“Sumeghpeni	taakuneng	pingayuneng	naliit	yulgutepiigufta	yugmun	wayaghniightet	amyuutkegkiitnun?”
B03_10_Luke_V37	Apeghtughikayugem	Liilightuusaneng	kiimsiqaa,	“Taananguuq	nangllekikaq	yugmun.”	Jesus-em	pikaa,	“Aghulaqluten,	elpeklu	tawaten	pi.”
B03_10_Luke_V38	Jesus-enkut	maligsaaghtekullghiit	igleghutkelluku	kaatkat	nengiighhaghmun.	Tamaanteftuq	aghnaq,	aatgha	Martha,	Jesus-enkut	maligsaaghtekullghiit	upughatkii	ellmeggnitesqelluki.
B03_10_Luke_V39	Anglegutangan	aatgha	Mary-nguftuq;	aqumluni	Jesus-em	itegaan	manungakun	nagatkaa	apeghtughilghii.
B03_10_Luke_V40	Iwernga	Martha-m	yataaghquteghllagukangi	aqelqani	neghyaghqameng,	enkaam	Jesus	takuluku	pikaa,	“Ataneq,	waakenghisiguu	anglegutma	ellnginaghma	qepghaghtestekanganga?	Kayusiitesqaghtinga!”
B03_10_Luke_V41	Atanghem	pikaa,	“Martha,	Martha,	uglalghiimeng	sumeghyaliiqutenllu	seghleliighaqutenllu
B03_10_Luke_V42	iwernga	ataasighhaaguq	aklunalghii.	Mary-m	nakmikumaa	taana	pinillgha,	ellnganeng	iqisaghqaanghituq.”
B03_11_Luke_V1	Ataasimi	pilleghmi	nani	Jesus	yughaamalghii,	taaqaquqlu	yughaneghmeng,	ataasim	maligsaaghtengan	pikaa,	“Ataneq,	apeghtuqaghqut	yughalleghmeng,	katam	John-em	apeghtullghatun	yughalleghmeng	maligsaaghteni.”
B03_11_Luke_V2	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Whaten	yughaghaqitek,	‘Ataay,	agleghnalghii	aatghen	quulvallengli,	yughaghtukut	Ataneghpagullghen	tagisqelluku.
B03_11_Luke_V3	Aghhutanga	tamaghhaan	neghyaghqaliteqeghtikut.
B03_11_Luke_V4	Seghevutaghtiki	seghleghqelleput	qayughllak	seghevutaqaput	qamaglluki	seghletun	pisteput.	Nanghiiqullengestegpenaamtallu.’”
B03_11_Luke_V5	Taagken	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Ilakumtaalguyaquvek	unugem	qukaani	mangteghaanun	piluten,	tungsighyaquvek,	‘Ilakumtaamni,	pingayuneng	neqekrangllaghhiisiin?
B03_11_Luke_V6	Ilakumtaaqa	igleghalghii	kaatuq,	ellnganun	neghyaghqaqraggiitunga.’
B03_11_Luke_V7	Qamaken	ilakumtaaghpek	kiimsighyaqumiten,	‘Qinuyugtegpenanga.	Amik	maghqatngaaq,	taghnughaqullghiini	ingaghquusimaakut.	Maketepagningitunga	tuunyaghqaaluten	sameng	alngunak.’
B03_11_Luke_V8	Ungipaatamsi,	qaywa	ilakumtaaqeghngaaghmiten	makennaanghituq	tuunyaghqaaluten	sameng.	Iwernga	makellequq	tuunaluten	aklukegkaghpeneng	qayughllak	sagiqeghllagulghiiten.
B03_11_Luke_V9	Enkaam	whanga	ungipaatamsi,	aaptek,	allgeghullequsi;	ivaghitek,	naalkullequsi;	tenglugtughtek	amigkun,	qelpeghulleqiisi.
B03_11_Luke_V10	Qayughllak	kina	alngunak	aapleghhii,	allgeghusaghqaaguq;	kina	alngunak	ivaghilghii,	naalkusaghqaaguq,	kina	alngunak	tenglugtulghii	amigkun,	qelpeghulleqaa.
B03_11_Luke_V11	Nalighpesi	atani,	ighneghpek	iqallugniighviksaqangaten,	yeghlegi	tuunayaghsiguu	nemeghyameng?
B03_11_Luke_V12	Nalighmeng	ighneghpek	manigniighviksaqangaten,	tuunayaghsiguu	scorpion-meng?
B03_11_Luke_V13	Seghleghqestengughngaaghpesi,	liisimakusi	pinilghiimeng	tuunilleghmeng	avaqutaghpesinun.	Ata	qilagmelnguq	tuuniighataghaghyugluni	ayuquq	Agleghnalghiigneng	Taghneghneng	tamaakunun	aapleghhiinun!”
B03_11_Luke_V14	Ataasimi	aghneghmi	Jesus-em	aanestekaa	tughneghaq	yugmeng.	Tughneghaam	yuuk	akuzisigalkanga.	Tughneghaq	aanyan,	yuuk	akuziyagutkaq	enkaam	qamaglluteng	yuget	tawanlenguut	saghiighayagutkaat.
B03_11_Luke_V15	Iwernga	ilangita	yuget	pikaat,	“Aanestiiquq	tughneghaghneng	aghtughyaghqaanghillghakun	Beelzebul-em,	tughneghaat	igleghutistengitgun.”
B03_11_Luke_V16	Ilangita	yuget	anagniilqavigighnaluku	Jesus,	allaaghlluwhaghtisqegkaat	kelguvikesqelluteng	Kiyaghneghmun	kayagtekaqutanga.
B03_11_Luke_V17	Iwernga	Jesus-em	liisimakegkangi	sumeghtaghallghit	enkaam	pikii,	“Alngunak	ataneghpagulleq	aafquulluni	pilluguskumi,	naavellequq.	Nengllugutet	aafquulluteng	pilluguskumeng,	qerngaghmennaanghitut.
B03_11_Luke_V18	Enkaam	Tughneghaam	ataneghpagullghanilnguut	aafquulluteng	pilluguskumeng,	Tughneghaam	ataneghpagullgha	kenletghuullequq.	Elpesi	aanesqughniiqaghpesinga	tughneghaghneng	aghtughyaghqaanghillghakun	Beelzebul-em,	iwernga	anaggutusi.
B03_11_Luke_V19	Aanesquungukuma	tughneghaghneng	Beelzebul-kun,	natenmi	ilagpesi	aanesqughaqatki	tughneghaat?	Enkaam	ilagpesi	nanqiglleqiisi	anaggunnilusi.
B03_11_Luke_V20	Iwernga	Kiyaghneghem	aghtughyaghqaanghillghakun	aanesquungukuma	tughneghaghneng,	taawa	taam	ipapighqaa	Ataneghpagullgha	Kiyaghneghem	kaasimaaq	elpesinun.”
B03_11_Luke_V21	Iknaqelghiim	yugem	guututetuqam	kelengakegkumigu	mangteghani,	qamaglluteng	saghyangi	paqniisaghqaagut.
B03_11_Luke_V22	Iwernga	iknaqataghalghiim	yugem	sughukumigu	kayaalqelleqaa.	Enkaam	tugulaghlleqii	neghyukumtaaghi	guututangi,	uyeglleqiillu	saghyangi.
B03_11_Luke_V23	“Kina	alngunak	whangamninneghilnguq	kipullginaaghtekaqa;	kitum	alngunak	qerngughtilgusinghilkuminga	mingitistenguuq.
B03_11_Luke_V24	“Tughneghaq	yugmeng	aanegkumi,	igleghllequq	meqraggiilngughmi	nunami,	ivaghillequq	meghnaalivigkameng.	Naalkunneghisami	pikaq,	‘Kiyaghfiksaqemnun	uteghhnaqunga.’
B03_11_Luke_V25	Kaasalghiimi,	aallwhaaghluni,	mingllegtengngwaaghluni	ayuqeftuq.
B03_11_Luke_V26	Taagken	aanluni	tagitkii	maaghraghvinlek	tughneghaat	ellmineng	seghleghataghalghiit.	Iteghaalluteng	yugmun	tawantekat.	Enkaam	taana	yuuk	sivunghaneng	wataqaaghaq	seghleghwaaghughtekaq.”
B03_11_Luke_V27	Tawaten	Jesus	piyan,	yulghuteghllaget	akulngitneng	aghnam	iglagtupiglluni	pikaa,	“Quyastekaaguq	aghnaq	ighniluten	mamaghtikaq	elpeneng!”
B03_11_Luke_V28	Iwernga	Jesus-em	pikaa,	“Itupill,	quyastaghaqaagut	tamaakut	Kiyaghneghem	akuzitangi	nagalluki	qaatkegkangit!”
B03_11_Luke_V29	Yulghutet	nulanginaghyata	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Aghneghem	uum	yugi	seghleghqumanguut.	Naqam	allaaghlluwhaghtitesqut	whangamnun.	Yeghlegillu!	Taananginaghhaq	allaaghlluwhaghtilleq	esghaghlleqaghsi	Kiyaghneghem	allaaghlluwhaaghtillgha	Jonah-mun.
B03_11_Luke_V30	Katam	tawaten	Kiyaghneghem	atuqellghatun	allaaghlluwhaghtilleq	Jonah-mun	kelengasaaghnaluki	Ninevah-ghmiit,	tawaten	Kiyaghneghem	atuqsaghqaqaa	allaaghlluwhaghtilleq	Ighneghanun	Yugem	kelengasaaghnaluki	aghneghem	maaten	yugi.
B03_11_Luke_V31	Nanqigtillghem	Aghneghani	Kiyaghneghem	nanqigtekangisi	elpesi	kiyaghlleghhiini	aghneghmi	whani,	Queen-ngan	Sheba-m	nekevluni	anaggutnganilleqiisi	aghyuughyaghqapestaaghunilusi.	Tagikaaguq	uyavaghpanlengughmeng	nemineng	nagannaluku	Solomon-em	peghqinellgha.	Iwernga	kina	aangataghalghii	Solomon-meng	whaantuq,	tawalliima	ighsakaqaghsi.
B03_11_Luke_V32	Nanqigtillghem	Aghneghani,	Kiyaghneghem	nanqigtekangisi	elpesi	kiyaghlleghhiini	aghneghmi	whani,	Nineveh-ghmiit	nekevluteng	anaggunnilleqiisi	aghyuughyaghqapestaaghunilusi.	Uuknaliqista	Jonah	ungipaghyan,	Nineveh-ghmiit	avuteghqelluteng	seghleghqennaniqaagut.	Iwernga	elpesi	avuteghqellusi	seghleghqennaniimangitusi,	qaywa	nagatkaqeghngaaghpesigu	kina	aangataghalghii	Jonah-meng!”
B03_11_Luke_V33	“Kitum	alngunak	kenelghutak	kumaghllukek	iighnaanghitaak	nalighmeng	sagneghmun	asingiinnaanghitaak.	Itupill	llilleqaak	quulvaqun	itelghiinun	esghiisqelluku	nighuk.
B03_11_Luke_V34	Iyegken	kenelghutastun	ayuquk	yugusighpenun.	Iiskegtekuvek	iingunaghmi	yugusin	nighugllagullequq,	iwernga	iyellugmeskuvek	iingunaghmi	yugusin	mamlegllagullequq.
B03_11_Luke_V35	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	kelengakigu	nighuk	ilugpenilnguq	mamlegughtestegpenaan.
B03_11_Luke_V36	Iingunaghmi	yugusin	esleqngakumi	nighugmeng	nalighneghhaa	mamlengunaan,	taawa	kuukgullequten	nighugraketun	katam	kenelghutak	kuukgutellghegketun	elpenun.”
B03_11_Luke_V37	Jesus	akuzineghmeng	taaqsan,	Pharisee-m	ellmeggnun	neghyaghtiisqegkaa.	Enkaam	iteghluni	aqumegkaq	tipelegni.
B03_11_Luke_V38	Pharisee-m	esghaghluku	saghiighayagutkaa	uughtunghilnguq	neghelleghqami	sivungani.
B03_11_Luke_V39	Enkaam	Atanghem	pikaa,	“Elpesi	Pharisees-eni,	sangigtaqasi	qaayngi	qayuusighpesillu	sagneghpesillu,	iwernga	ilugpesigun	nukeggnaghtusi,	esleqngaasi	pakigneghmengllu	seghleghmengllu.
B03_11_Luke_V40	Liigikigatngwaaghtusi!	Kiyaghneghem	ulimaaqenghitaguu	yugusim	qaayngallu	ilungallu?
B03_11_Luke_V41	Itupill	tuunitek	aklumalghiinun	ilugpesineng	enkaam	qayesillu	ilusillu	iqangiitngwaaghlleqii.
B03_11_Luke_V42	“Seghleghwaaghunaqnguusi	elpesi	Pharisees-eni!	Tuunaqasi	qulaghqellesi	Kiyaghneghmun,	talwa	mint-esi,	rue-si,	alngunaklu	neqem	neqnighsaatangi.	Iwernga	avelghasingwaaghaqaghsi	pinitun	pilleq	yulgutegpesinun,	piniqingalleqlu	Kiyaghneghmun.	Taakuk	piyaghqapestaaqagsi	maligullukek	tuunilleghpesistun	qulaghqelleghpesineng.
B03_11_Luke_V43	“Seghleghwaaghunaqnguusi	elpesi	Pharisees-eni!	Synagogue-nni	aqumyuneghtuusi	aangwaaghet	aqumutiitgun.	Akilpegaghvignillu	quyakesugaqusi	aangwaaghulusi.
B03_11_Luke_V44	Seghleghwaaghunaqnguusi	elpesi!	Leganqun	nalluniighumangilngughestun	lliivghestun	ayuqusi	yuget	esghiigalkangit.	Qaayngitgun	piyuneghmegteki	ukmangiinnanighaqut.”
B03_11_Luke_V45	Ataasim	apeghtughikayugem	Liilightuusaneng	pikaa,	“Apeghtughista,	tawaten	pilleghpek	kayngusaakiinkut!”
B03_11_Luke_V46	Jesus-em	pikaa,	“Seghleghwaaghunaqnguusi	elpesillu	apeghtughikayugni	Liilightuusaneng!	Apeghtughillesi	piyaqnapigtut	yugnun	qaatkesaghqaaluteng.	Uqigtuqastun	akmagestun	ayuqut	yugnun	akmagtestaqegkesi,	naqamllu	talwa	ataasiq	ighneghwaaghsi	atuqigataghsi	kayusiinnaluki	akmagitneng.
B03_11_Luke_V47	Seghleghwaaghunaqnguusi	elpesi!	Pinighnaghsaghaqasi	lliivghit	quulvaghnaluki	uuknaliqistet	sivuneghpesi	tuququqiit.
B03_11_Luke_V48	Tawaten	pilleghpesigun	kelgutngwaaghsi	itagnaqilleghsi	sivuneghpesi	pillghitnun.	Ellngita	tuququqiit	uuknaliqistet,	elpesi	pinighnaghsaghaqasi	lliivghit.
B03_11_Luke_V49	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	peghqinelleghmikun	Kiyaghneq	pikaaguq,	‘Kayagfikelleqanka	uuknaliqistenengllu	apostle-enengllu,	tuqulleqiit	ilangi,	amyuqetaatkelleqiit	ilangi.’
B03_11_Luke_V50	Enkaangam	aghneghni	maaten	kiyaghlleghhiit	aghyuughyaghqaagut	apalluqluki	sivunghita	tuququqaqegkangit	qamaglluki	uuknaliqistet	nunam	ulimayuwhaallghaneng,
B03_11_Luke_V51	taagegken	ima	Abel-em	tuqutellghaneng	Zechariah-m	tuqutellghanun.	Zechariah	tuqutkaqegkangat	akulegkeni	aghqefigemllu	Agleghnalghiimllu	Nengan.	Aa-a,	ungipaatamsi,	kiyaghlleghiit	aghneghni	maaten	aghyuullengyaghqaagut	tawaten	pilleghnun.
B03_11_Luke_V52	“Seghleghwaaghunaqnguusi	elpesi	liisimallelegllagni	Liilightuusaneng!	Aghulaqusimaaghsi	key	qelpeghusighqaq	amiganun	liisimallghem	Kiyaghneghmeng	ayuqelghii;	elpesi	iteghyugigatusi	enkaam	tamaakut	iteghnaqelghiit	aghuliightaqasi.”
B03_11_Luke_V53	Jesus	iqisan	apeghtughikayugetlu	Liilightuusaneng,	Pharisees-etlu	ugumiyaguteghllakaat.	Taagken	kenlanga	seghlequughllagyagutkaatlu	aapqughwaaghtaakaatlu	piyaqnalghiineng,
B03_11_Luke_V54	sameng	pisqelluku	anagngalghiimeng	anagvigighnaluku.
B03_12_Luke_V1	Tawaten	pimaluki	thousand-nelghutet	yuget	qerngughutkat,	repall	ilateng	tuutqaghtaqluki	pikiit.	Jesus-em	sivukluki	maligsaaghteni	pikii,	“Kelengalusi	Pharisees-et	yeast-angitneng.	Piniiyugtellghat	piiqaqa.
B03_12_Luke_V2	Sangwaa	saapegkaq	saaputiighyaghqaaguq.	Qamaglluni	aksaqegkaq	qayvighqesaghqaaguq.
B03_12_Luke_V3	Sameng	pillesi	aksaqluku	nagaqughyaghqaqiit	qagani.	Sangwaatlu	sigutquutkegkasi	uumgullusi	nemi	ungipaqsaghqaagut	tamangani.
B03_12_Luke_V4	“Ungipaatamsi	ilakumtaamni,	alikegpenaki	tamaakut	tuqutikayuget	yugusimeng,	iwernga	taam	kingunganeng	alla	sanaanghitiisi.
B03_12_Luke_V5	Iwernga	kelengasaaghnaqamsi	kitumeng	aliksaghqameng.	Alikiteggu	Kiyaghneq,	tuquskumisi	aghtughyaghqaanghillelguuq	miluusaghqaalusi	hell-mun.	Aa-a,	ungipaatamsi	alikiteggu!
B03_12_Luke_V6	“Tallimat	qateghyiighaghhaat	akikegkayugunghitaat	maalghugegnun	penny-gnun?	Tawalliima	nalighhiiniit	Kiyaghneghem	puygunaanghitii.
B03_12_Luke_V7	Talwa	nuyaghpesi	uglaghtalangi	Kiyaghneghem	liisimakii.	Alingegpenasi,	Kiyaghneghem	megnukataghaghiisi	qateghyiighalghutneng	pakiggullusi.
B03_12_Luke_V8	“Enkaam	ungipaatamsi,	kitum	alngunak	ungipaaskaki	sivungitni	yuget	whangamnun	pikniluteng,	Ighneghanllu	Yugem	piknilleqii	sivungitni	Kiyaghneghem	yaqulelghutangan.
B03_12_Luke_V9	Iwernga	kitum	alngunak	ungipaaskaki	sivungitni	yuget	whangamnun	pikenghinniluteng,	Ighneghan	Yugem	pikenghinnilleqii	sivungitni	Kiyaghneghem	yaqulelghutangan.
B03_12_Luke_V10	“Kitum	alngunak	seghletun	akuzitkegkumigu	Ighnegha	Yugem,	Kiyaghneghem	seghevusaghqaqaa.	Iwernga	kitum	alngunak	seghletun	akuzitkegkumikek	Agleghnalghiik	Taghneghak,	Kiyaghneghem	seghevunnaanghitaa.
B03_12_Luke_V11	“Aglaaskangisi	synagogue-nnun,	sivungitnun	governor-et,	nalighmeng	igleghutistet	teggellghiighpenasi	naten	kiimsilleghqaghpesineng,	nalighmeng	sameng	pilleghqaghpesineng.
B03_12_Luke_V12	Tawani	pilleghmi	Agleghnalghiim	Taghnegham	akuzitkaghqalilleqiisi	sameng	pilleghqameng.”
B03_12_Luke_V13	Yulghuteghllaget	akulngitneng	yugem	Jesus	pikaa,	“Apeghtughista,	anglegutka	ungipaataghtigu,	atamtunguq	unitkaaneng	saghyameng	nengitaghllinga.”
B03_12_Luke_V14	Iwernga	Jesus-em	aaptekaa,	“Yugmi	whani,	kitum	nanqigtistengllaghtanga,	nalighmeng	nengighqistengllaghtanga	elpetegnun?”
B03_12_Luke_V15	Taagken	qamaglluki	pikii,	“Kelengalusi	allaaghiinaghmeng	pakigniightelleghmeng,	qayughllak	yugem	unguvalleghpigaa	saghyiightelleghqun	ayuqenghituq.”
B03_12_Luke_V16	Taagken	Jesus-em	ungipaghaatkii,	“Yuuk	aklungilnguq	nunalguftuq	piitestighllakayugmeng.
B03_12_Luke_V17	Sumeghtaghaqaq,	‘Naten	sanaqsinga?	Piitesteghllakamnun	kagpagvigitunga.’
B03_12_Luke_V18	Ellmineng	kiimsiqaq,	Whaten	pinaqunga.	Kagpagvigenka	ifkaghqughluki,	aangataghalghiineng	kagpagvigkaneng	nekefqughnaqunga.	Enkaam	qamaglluki	grain-enka,	saghyankallu	kagpaglleqanka.
B03_12_Luke_V19	Taagken	pillequnga	unguvasimnun,	‘Unguvasimni,	kagpagighllagtunga	ayumiqullelghutnun!	Taawa	sananighnaqunga,	neghaqlunga,	meghaqlunga,	pinighyuuggnaqunga!’
B03_12_Luke_V20	Iwernga	Kiyaghneghem	pikaa,	‘Uyuq	nalluuqaq!	Unukun	unguvasin	tuqunaqnguuq.	Kagpagllakaghten	tamaakut	kitum	piknaqaki?’”
B03_12_Luke_V21	Jesus-em	taaqniqii,	“Taatun	yugtun	ayuqut	tamaakut	sameng	tamaghhaaneng	kagpagilghiit	ellmeggnun	katam,	iwernga	Kiyaghneghmi	aklumalghiinguut.”
B03_12_Luke_V22	Taagken	Jesus-em	maligsaaghteni	pikii,	“Tamaaken	apalluqluku	ungipaatamsi,	nulqaviighutkegpenaan	unguvalleghsi,	sameng	neghelleghqaghsi,	nalighmeng	sameng	aatelleghqaghsi.
B03_12_Luke_V23	Unguvalleq	megnunaghataghaghtuq	neqneng,	yugusiqlu	megnunaghataghaghtuq	aatkaneng.
B03_12_Luke_V24	Esghaqaghtekiqun	meteghlluget,	piitesighiigatut,	nalighmeng	unatiigatut,	nalighmeng	kagpagingigatut,	naqamllu	Kiyaghneghem	neghqaqii.	Elpesi	megnunaghataghaghtusi	qawaagneng!
B03_12_Luke_V25	Enkaam	nalighpesi	nulqaviighutkelluku	unguvalleni	taakughteregaghlleqaguu?
B03_12_Luke_V26	Nulqaviighem	uyguvleghaghnaanghitutanganeng	unguvalleq,	sangan'ngam	sangwaat	alngunak	nulqaviighutkaqesteki?
B03_12_Luke_V27	Esghaqaghtekiqun	piitesighaat	nagulghiit,	qepghiigatut	nalighmeng	aatkanglliigatut	ellmeggneng.	Iwernga	ungipaatamsi,	talwa	Solomon,	aklungiteghllagmini	aasimangituq	piitesighaghestun	pinightutkalghiimeng.
B03_12_Luke_V28	Kiyaghneghem	aasightughaqii	vegaaghet	piitfigmeggnilnguut	aghneghmi	tawani,	iwernga	unaamingani	qiitaqiit.	Kiyaghneghem	aasightuungukaki	vegaaghet,	elpesi	aasightughataghaghnaanghitisii?	Ugpeqilleghqestaapiguusi!
B03_12_Luke_V29	Sumeghtaghaamanginaghpenasi	sameng	neghelleghqaghpesinengllu	meghelleghqaghpesinengllu.	Nulqaviighutkegpenaki	tamaakut,
B03_12_Luke_V30	qayughllak	ugpeqingigalnguut	Kiyaghneghmeng	nulqaviighutkaqiit	tamaakut.	Atagpesi	liisimakii	aklukegkasi.
B03_12_Luke_V31	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	kiyaghtelleghpesini	megnunalleghpigaaghtestekek	Kiyaghneghem	Ataneghpagullghallu	piyukellghallu.	Tawaten	pikufsi	Kiyaghneghem	tuunelleqii	qamaglluki	aklukegkasi.
B03_12_Luke_V32	“Alingegpenasi	penniighhamni,	qayughllak	Atagpesi	quyakusiqluku	tuunyugaqaa	elpesinun	Ataneghpagulleq.
B03_12_Luke_V33	Saghyasi	akikluki	maniliteki	aklumalghiit.	Enkaam	elpesi	kagpagillequsi	aklungigpesineng	qilagmi.	Tawaten	pikufsi	qilagmi	aqeftaghaalgullequsi	naavyaghqaanghilngughmeng.	Tawani	aklungisi	naangyaghqaanghilnguut,	teglegniightetlu	tugunaanghitiit,	moth-etlu	naafqennaanghitiit.
B03_12_Luke_V34	Aklungisi	naantekata	sumeghtaghallesillu	tawanllequt.
B03_12_Luke_V35	“Samun	tamaghhaanun	yataghqengngwaaghlusi,	aatkasi	aasaqleggiinaaghluki,	kenelghutasi	kumaghtengngwaaghluki.
B03_12_Luke_V36	Tawaten	pikufsi	qepghaghtestun	ayuqellequsi	utaqiilghiit	umiilegmeggneng	uteghnilleghqaaneng	nengughutellghem	neqenghaghqellghaneng.	Enkaam	kaalluni	tenglugtuqan	qelpeghutqaghlleqaat.
B03_12_Luke_V37	Quyanapigtut	qepghaghtet	teghhumaghmeng	apeghiighwaaghluteng	ayuqelghiit	umiilgita	kaaskumiki!	Ipa	ungipaatamsi,	umiilgem	qepghaghteni	aqumuutesluki	tipelegnekun,	taagken	kenigni	tafsiillukek	kepsiiqulleqii	neqmeng.
B03_12_Luke_V38	Tagiiqlillu	unugem	qukaghtestegpenaan	nalighmeng	unugem	qukaan	kingunganeng.	Iwernga	qakun	alngunak	tagikumi	tamaakut	qepghaghtet	apeghiighwaaqat	quyastellelguyaghqaagut.
B03_12_Luke_V39	Iwernga	liisimakluku	una,	mangteghalgem	liisimaksaqumigu	qakun	teglegniightem	tagilleghqaa,	uninnaanghitaa	mangteghani	tegleghniighta	naafqulluni	iteghnayukan.
B03_12_Luke_V40	Elpesillu	apeghiighsaghwaaghlusi	pitek	qayughllak	Ighnegha	Yugem	tagiyaghqaaguq	waakenghillghaghulluni.”
B03_12_Luke_V41	Peter-em	aaptekaa,	“Ataneq,	ungipaghaan	aapqan,	whangkunnun	pingwaa,	nalighmeng	tamaghhaanun?”
B03_12_Luke_V42	Atanghem	kiimsiqaa	whaten,	“Kinangaawa	ataasiighmelnguq,	peghqinelghii	qepghaghta?	Taananguyaghqaaguq	umiilgan	igleghutistengllaqaa	qepghaghteminun,	neqelitaatiisqellukillu	aghhutanga	tamaghhaan.
B03_12_Luke_V43	Taana	qepghaghta	quyastellengyaghqaaguq,	umiilgem	kaalluni	esghaqumigu	qelelleghmitun	pilghii.
B03_12_Luke_V44	Ipa	ungipaatamsi,	taana	qepghaghta	umiilgan	igleghutistengllaghyaghqaqaa	saminun	tamaghhaanun.
B03_12_Luke_V45	Iwernga	taana	qepghaghta	sumeghtaghaamakumi	whaten,	‘Umiilka	muluuq	tagigpenani’,	enkaam	qevutqughyagulleqii	qepghaghtet	yugetlu	aghnatlu.	Neghaqluni,	meghaqluni,	suumaqlunillu	pillequq.
B03_12_Luke_V46	Taagken	umiilga	kaallequq	nallutghaaghulluni,	sighimakenghilkangani	aghneghem.	Enkaam	umiilgem	aghyuughmigtaaghllaglleqaa,	ilatesleqaallu	ataasiighneghilngughnun.
B03_12_Luke_V47	Qepghaghta	apeghiighsallghilnguq	nalighmeng	umiilegmi	piyukellghatun	piyunghilnguq	anagulellengeghllagllequq.
B03_12_Luke_V48	Iwernga	qepghaghtem	nallukegkumigu	sasqesullgha	umiilegmi,	anaggutkaayaghngaaghmi	aghsaan	ayuqluku	anagulellengellequq.	Yuuk	tuunellengeghllakaq	sameng,	sayaghqaghtullequq;	yuuk	wata	tuunellengeghllakaq	sameng,	wataqaaghaq	sayaghqaghtughllagllequq.
B03_12_Luke_V49	“Tagikaagunga	keneghmeng	milughnaluku	nuna,	whaatuq	maaten	kumalghii!
B03_12_Luke_V50	Iwernga	taam	sivungani	paaptaayeyaghqaagunga	ikfiqelleghqunllu	tuqulleghqunllu.	Enkaam	seghleliighllaguunga	kenlanga	paaptaayelqa	apeghiillghanun.
B03_12_Luke_V51	Sumeghpesini	taginnilunga	nekeggmelleghmeng	pistengngaa	nunamun?	Yeghlegillu,	ungipaatamsi,	aafquutestiyaghtuugunga.
B03_12_Luke_V52	Whaken	kenlekluku	nengllugutkullghiit	tallimat	aafquullequt	apalluqlunga	whanga.	Pingayut	kipullginaaghlleqagket	maalghuk,	enkaam	maalghuk	kipullginaaghlleqiik	pingayut.
B03_12_Luke_V53	Ellngit	aafqemeraaghullequt;	atam	kipullginaaghlleqaa	ighneni,	enkaam	ighneghem	kipullginaaghlleqaa	atani.	Naam	kipullginaaghlleqaa	panini,	enkaam	panigan	kipullginaaghlleqaa	naani.	Aghnam	kipullginaaghlleqaa	ukaani,	enkaam	ukaaghan	kipullginaaglleqaa	aghnaq	sakini.”
B03_12_Luke_V54	Taagken	Jesus-em	yulghuteghllaget	pikii,	“Esghaqufsigu	qilagwaaq	mayulghii	pakfallamelluku,	tawaninginaq	pillequsi,	‘Eslallugughnaqaa’	pinaqnilleghpesistun	pillequq.
B03_12_Luke_V55	Anuqa	ikevaaghtekan,	pillequsi,	‘Puqlaghqwaanaqaa’	pinaqnilleghpesistun	pillequq.
B03_12_Luke_V56	Liisimakisighwaalghiini	elpesi!	Nunamllu	qilagamllu	nekegnegha	esghaneghpesigu,	eslam	natetulanga	liisimakaqaghsi.	Sangan'ngam	liisimaksunghisteki	maaten	sangwaat	sallghet	sameng	pisiitangi?
B03_12_Luke_V57	“Sangan	liigikigasteggu	elpesineng	katam	sangwaa	pinitun	pillghutanga?
B03_12_Luke_V58	Avutkistegpek	nanqigtivigmun	aglaasimaluten,	tumemi	taakwani	kaatfagilgaftek	nallghusaghnaken	qaniqutelleghtek.	Pinghilkuvek	ighsagpegun	aglaalleqaaten	nanqigtistemun.	Enkaam	nanqigtistem	tuunelleqaaten	umiilwaaghmun	anusiminglliisqelluten.
B03_12_Luke_V59	Ungipaatamken,	aanaanghituten	kenlanga	kingulighpigaq	manin	llivikuusaqelleghpenun.”
B03_13_Luke_V1	Tamaani	pilleghni	ilangi	yuget	tamaanteftut,	ungipaatkaat	Jesus	Pilate-mun	tuqutesimaniluki	ilangi	Galilee-eghmiit	aghqerraaghumaluki	Kiyaghneghmun.	Aawitlu	akumutesimaniluki	aawitnun	teghikusat.
B03_13_Luke_V2	Jesus-em	aaptekii,	“Sumeghpesinii	taakut	Galilee-ghmiit	seghleghqengngaaghataghaghpetaat	ilangitneng	Galilee-ghmiineng	qayughllak	tawaten	tuqutkaalghiit?
B03_13_Luke_V3	Ungipaatamsi,	nakaa!	Avuteghqellusi	seghleghqennaniimakufsi	taawa	qamagllusi	elpesillu	tuqullequsi	ellngistun.
B03_13_Luke_V4	Neqamikenghistekii	Siloam-emi	qula	pingayuneng	inglulek	yuget	tower-em	ulleghvikluki	tuququqii?	Sumeghpesinii	taakut	seghleghqengngaaghataghaghtaat	Jerusalem-emi	kiyaghlleghhiineng?
B03_13_Luke_V5	Ungipaatamsi,	nakaa!	Avuteghqellusi	seghleghqennaniimakufsi	taawa	qamagllusi	elpesillu	tuqullequsi	ellngistun.”
B03_13_Luke_V6	Taagken	Jesus-em	ungipaghaatkii,	“Yugem	piitesighaghtestekaa	figs-em	uqfiga	grapes-mun	piitesighaghvigmini.	Esghaghyaghtughaqegkanga	piitestimanayukan,	iwernga	avangitaqelghii.
B03_13_Luke_V7	Enkaam	piitesighaghteni	pikaa,	‘Ii-i,	pingayuni	ayumiqulleghni	esghaghyaghtughaqsaghaqa	uqfik	piitestimanayukan	iwernga	avangitaquq.	Kepigu!	Piitfigillghaannaquq.’
B03_13_Luke_V8	Iwernga	piitesighaghtem	pikaa,	‘Yuguniiq,	wiin	whani	ayumiqulleghmi	avelghaghhu.	Uvitanga	laagnaqaqa,	enkaam	katagughvikelleqaqa	piinnaasimeng.
B03_13_Luke_V9	Ayumiqun	piitquumakumi	pinighllequq,	enan	piitestinghilkan,	kepesnaken.’”
B03_13_Luke_V10	Taagken	ataasimi	Sabbath-em	aghneghani,	synagogue-mi	Jesus	apeghtughikaq.
B03_13_Luke_V11	Tawanteftughnguq	aghnaq	qula	pingayuneng	inglulek	ayumiqulleghni	tughneghaam	kayaaleghqegkaa.	Pakegngastekaa	enkaam	taklaghruketun	nekevigalnguq.
B03_13_Luke_V12	Jesus-em	esghaghyamigu	tagsighluku	pikaa,	“Aghnaq,	itemutamken	kayaaleghqengngalleghpeneng.”
B03_13_Luke_V13	Taagken	saaftekaa,	enkaam	taklaghrukguutnginaamaghmi	pikaq,	usuqikaqlu	Kiyaghneghmeng.
B03_13_Luke_V14	Synagogue-em	igleghutistengan	ugumiyagutkaa	Jesus	qayughllak	naallghutilghii	Sabbath-mi.	Enkaam	pikii	yuget,	“Aghvinleguut	aghneghet	qepghaghvigkaput,	enkaam	tagiiqitek	taakuni	aghneghni	naallghutesqellusi,	nakaan	Sabbath-mi!”
B03_13_Luke_V15	Atanghem	pikaa,	“Uyuq	piniiyugneq!	Sabbath-mi,	tamaghaghpesi	ox-esi	nalighmeng	donkey-si	itemulluki	meghesaghtughaqasi.
B03_13_Luke_V16	Una	aghnaq	kingunqaa	Abraham-em,	Tughneghaam	asighqegkaqaa	qula	pingayuneng	inglulegni	ayumiqulleghni.	Ipapestaaq	anaggutellghunghituq	itemutelleghqaa	Sabbath-mi!”
B03_13_Luke_V17	Jesus-em	tawaten	piyisteng,	qamaglluteng	anguyagi	kaynguyugutkat.	Enkaam	qamaglluteng	yuget	quyateghllakat	pinighrakegtaneng	apeghiiqaaneng.
B03_13_Luke_V18	Taagken	Jesus-em	aaptekii,	“Nateta	Kiyaghneghem	Ataneghpagullgha?	Samun	inglunnaqsikun?
B03_13_Luke_V19	Mustard-em	piitutangatun	ayuquq,	yugem	tuguluku	piitesighaqanga	piitesighaghvigmikun.	Naguyalghiimi	uqfigughtekaq,	enkaam	avayaakun	qawaaget	unglusikat.”
B03_13_Luke_V20	Allameng	Jesus-em	aaptekii,	“Samun	inglunnaqsikun	Ataneghpagullgha	Kiyaghneghem?
B03_13_Luke_V21	Yeast-atun	ayuquq	aghnam	akuututaqegkanga	avlawaghllagmun,	enkaam	akuutaghllak	ghhuughtesteghllakaa.”
B03_13_Luke_V22	Jesus	aglaatkelluku	Jerusalem-emun,	apeghtughimaghmi	pikaq	nenillu,	nengiighhaghnillu.
B03_13_Luke_V23	Kitum	aaptekaa,	“Ataneq,	palasqughhaawaat	yuget	yuguliyaghqat?”	Jesus-em	kiimsiqii,
B03_13_Luke_V24	“Sagiqlusi	iteghnaqutkitek	kagpestaaghhaghqun	amigkun.	Ungipaatamsi,	uglaapiglleghiit	yuget	iteghnaqutkellequt,	taawanginaq	iteghpagningitut.
B03_13_Luke_V25	Mangtegham	yugan	makelluni	amik	umegyaghtughlleqaa.	Enkaam	tesqakmani	nekevghallequsi,	tenglugtughllequsillu	whaten	pimaghpesi,	‘Ataneq,	qelpeghutaghtikut!’	Kiimsighlleqiisi,	‘Nallukamsi,	nallukaqallu	naken	pingutsi.’
B03_13_Luke_V26	Taagken	pilleqaghsi,	‘Neghelghusighaqamkenllu,	meghelghusighaqamkenllu,	apeghtughikaagutenllu	tumemnni.’
B03_13_Luke_V27	Iwernga	pilaataghlleqiisi,	‘Ungipaatamsi,	nallukamsi,	nallukaqallu	naken	pingutsi.	Iqillaghaatek	whangamneng	elpesi	seghletun	pisteni!’
B03_13_Luke_V28	Taagken	qiyaaghwaghllagllequsi,	ggutesillu	terqitaagtaamiita.	Tawaten	pillequsi	esghaqufsiki	Abraham-enkut	Isaac-enkut	Jacob-enkut,	qamagllukillu	uuknaliqistet.	Ellngit	Ataneghpagullghanillequt	Kiyaghneghem,	iwernga	elpesi	eslatmun	miluulleqiisi!
B03_13_Luke_V29	Enkaam	yuget	tagillequt	asivaghmeng,	pakfallameng,	aywaaneng,	ikevaghmeng.	Taagken	aqumellequt	tipelegni	Ataneghpagullghani	Kiyaghneghem.
B03_13_Luke_V30	Nagataghtekqun,	tamaakut	ukaliit	megnunaghsaghqaagut,	enkaam	megnunalghiit	ukaliighsaghqaagut.”
B03_13_Luke_V31	Tawani	pilleghmi	ilangita	Pharisees-et	takuluku	Jesus	pikaat,	“Maaken	iqilluten	natmun	aghulaqi	qayughllak	Herod-em	tuqutestesugaqaaten.”
B03_13_Luke_V32	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Ungipaasaghtughteggu	taana	kaviiq,	‘Nagaten,	aghneghmi	aanesquugunga	tughneghaghneng,	naallghuquugungallu	qinuyulghiineng.	Unaamillu	tawateghpigaq	pillequnga.	Taagken	pingayaani	aghneghem	qepghaqaqa	apeghiighlleqaqa.’
B03_13_Luke_V33	Naqamllu	igleghsaghqapestaaghuunga	aghneghmi,	unaami,	awakaghaanillu,	qayughllak	itagnanghituq	uuknaliqista	tuqusaghqaaluni	nani	alngunak	iwerngaqun	Jerusalem-emi.
B03_13_Luke_V34	“Kaay	Jerusalem,	Jerusalem!	Tuququqaqaten	uuknaliqistet,	milughpagaataghlukillu	tuququqaqaten	Kiyaghneghem	kayagtekii	elpenun.	Uglaapiglluku	qerngughsugaqsaghanka	yugten	whangamnun,	katam	tawaten	qawaagem	yaqugmi	asinganun	qerngughtellghatun	amaaghani.	Iwernga	tawaten	pistesimangitaghpenga!
B03_13_Luke_V35	Nagaten,	mangteghan	paaghqiilleqaa	qayughllak	Kiyaghneghem	uninnaqaatenllu	paqniighsaghnanighnaqaatenllu.	Ungipaatamken,	esghaghnaanghitaghpenga	kenlanga	whaten	pilleghqaghpenun,	‘Kiyaghneghem	quyasligu	tagilghii	aatghakun	Atanghem!’”
B03_14_Luke_V1	Ataasimi	Sabbath-mi,	Jesus	neghyaghtughyan	ataasimun	igleghutistengitnun	Pharisees-et,	tawanlenguut	yuget	riirngingwaaqaat.
B03_14_Luke_V2	Jesus-em	manunganiteftuq	yuuk,	ighukeklu,	tallikekllu	puuvngalghiik.
B03_14_Luke_V3	Jesus-em	aleghquqii	apeghtughikayuget	Liilightuusaneng,	Pharisees-etlu,	aaptekii,	“Liilightuusamtaa	naallghutisqinkuut	Sabbath-mi,	nalighmeng	pisnanightinkuut?”
B03_14_Luke_V4	Iwernga	nepiighwaaghutkat.	Taagken	saafluku	yuuk	naallghulluku,	aglaghtestekaa.
B03_14_Luke_V5	Taagken	aaptekii,	“Nalighsi	ighnelgukumi,	nalighmeng	ox-elgukumi,	Sabbath-mi	meghtaghvigmun	ifkaqan,	tawaninginaq	sayugnayaghtaguu	Sabbath-ngughngaan?”
B03_14_Luke_V6	Taawa	kiimsighpagningitkaat.
B03_14_Luke_V7	Jesus-em	esghaqii	ilangi	aqellqat	aqumuullghiit	aangwaaghet	aqumutiitgun.	Enkaam	ungipaghaatkii,
B03_14_Luke_V8	“Tagsiqlillengegkuvek	nengughhnaqelghiik	neqenghaghqellghegkenun,	aqumefqaavek	pilghaaten	aangwaaghet	aqumutiitgun,	kina	tagsiqliqaanayukan	aangwaaghataghalghii	elpeneng.
B03_14_Luke_V9	Tagsiqlighikam	elpetegneng	tagiluni	whaten	pilleqaaten,	‘Aqumestigu	taana	aqumvigpegun.’	Elngaatall	tawani	kaynguyugllequten	nuugtekuvek	ukavanlenguum	aqumutagkenun.
B03_14_Luke_V10	Iwernga	tagsiqliqangaten,	aqumyaghtughhaaten	aqumutam	ukavantellghanun.	Tagsiqlightegpek	tagiluni	pilleqaaten,	‘Ilakumtaamni,	aqumyaghtaa	aangwaaghughtekat	aqumutiitnun.’	Elngaatall	quulvallengellequten	aqelqalghutet	esghaamanghitni.
B03_14_Luke_V11	Tamaghhaghmeng	ellmeggneng	aangwaaghughtekat	qusevegtellengyaghqaagut,	iwernga	tamaghhaghmeng	ellmeggneng	quseveglleghhiit,	taawa	aangwaaghughtellengyaghqaagut.”
B03_14_Luke_V12	Taagken	Jesus-em	tagsiqlighteni	pikaa,	“Neghyaghtiisqikuvek	tagsiqlifqiita	ilakumtaaghten,	angleguteten,	ilakwaaghten,	nalighmeng	aklungilnguut	uvilighneghten,	qayughllak	uteghmun	ellngitallu	ellmeggnun	neghyaghtiisqennayukangaten.	Tawaten	pikufki	akitkallghuughlleqaaten.
B03_14_Luke_V13	Iwernga	neqenghaghqestinaqngukuvek,	tagsiqlighnaketen	aklumalghiit,	yugusiit	nalighneghllugmelnguut,	ighullugmelnguut,	ayaakatlu.
B03_14_Luke_V14	Enkaam	quyastellengellequten	qayughllak	tamaakut	akitepagningitaaten.	Kiyaghneghem	akileghtughlleqaaten	unguvaghtekumiki	qaatkutngalghiit	yuget.”
B03_14_Luke_V15	Tipelegni	ataasim	aqumgalghiim	nagalluku	Jesus	pikaa,	“Quyastekaagut	neghyaghtughyaghqat	neqenghaghqellghanun	Ataneghpagullghan	Kiyaghneghem!”
B03_14_Luke_V16	Iwernga	Jesus-em	pikaa,	“Yuuk	neqenghaghqinaqumalghii,	uglaqlu	tagsiqliqaa.
B03_14_Luke_V17	Neqet	apeghiighyata,	qepghaghteni	kayagtekaa	whaten	piyaghtiisqelluki	tagsiqliqani,	‘Tagilaghaatek,	neghyaqleggiinaaghtukut!’
B03_14_Luke_V18	Iwernga	qamaglluteng	tagsiqliqii	apghusiighutkat.	Sivuliim	qepghaghta	pikaa,	‘Piitesighaghvingumaanga,	esghaghyaghtupestaaghnaqngwaaqa.	Umiilgen	ungipaataghnaken,	qivghukaqanguq	neghyaghtughpagningilnguunga!’
B03_14_Luke_V19	Tuunglighhaan	pikaa,	‘Tallimat	inglukullghiit	ox-et	tukfiimaanka,	nanghiiquyaghtughnaqaqanka	qepghallegtulngit.	Umiilgen	ungipaataghhnaken,	qivghukaqanguq	neghyaghtughpagningilnguunga.’
B03_14_Luke_V20	Enkaam	ilangan	pikaa,	‘Nulightunghhaagunga,	enkaam	neghyaghtughpagningitunga.’
B03_14_Luke_V21	Qepghaghtem	tagiluni	umiilegminun	aapqii	sameng	pillghit.	Taagken	umiilgem	sakriteghllagumaghmi	qepghaghteni	pikaa,	‘Aanqaghlluten	neghllagem	tuumngitneng	tagiquutiki	aklumalghiit,	yugusiit	nalighneghllugmelnguut,	ayaakat,	ighullugmelnguut.’
B03_14_Luke_V22	Mulugpenani	qepghaghtem	pikaa,	‘Yuguniiq,	qelelleghpetun	apeghiightuq,	iwernga	paninang	nekaghqaghllaguuq.’
B03_14_Luke_V23	Umiilgem	pikaa,	‘Aanluten	neghllagmeng	tumenilnguut	yuget	tagilaghaatesqiki	enkaam	mangteghaqa	esleqaghaghlli.
B03_14_Luke_V24	Ungipaatamsi,	tamaakut	tagsiqliqaqsaqenka	neghnaanghitut	neqenghaghqusimneng.’”
B03_14_Luke_V25	Yulghuteghllaget	maliglleghaatkaat	Jesus.	Qiivluki	pikii,
B03_14_Luke_V26	“Kina	alngunak	tagilghii	whangamnun	maligsaaghteknaanghitaqa	wetkuqun	piniqataghaquminga	pakiggullunga	atamineng,	naamineng,	nuliighmineng,	avaqutamineng,	anglegutmineng,	nayagmineng,	ellminengllu	katam.
B03_14_Luke_V27	Kitum	alngunak	ellmi	katam	qaquurani	uyaminghilkumigullu	maligtekumingallu,	maligsaaghtekepagningitaqa.”
B03_14_Luke_V28	Taagken	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Nalighsi	tower-engllaghyugukumi,	sivukluni	aqumluni	akitulanga	naraqelleqaa	naamayaghqaanayukan	manini.
B03_14_Luke_V29	Naraqenghilkumigu	manini,	tunemangllaghluku	tower-a	peglleqaa.	Enkaam	yuget	esghaghluku	nenglaghyugsaatkelleqaat.
B03_14_Luke_V30	Pillequt,	‘Uum	yugem	piinlighluku	nekeftekani	taaqepagningitaa.’”
B03_14_Luke_V31	Taagken	Jesus-em	aaptekii,	“Sanayaghtatuq	umiilek	ilangan	umiilgem	sughugnaqngukangatni?	Sivukluni	aqumaghlluni	akuzimghhutkennayaghaa	ilaminun	kayaalqiiyaghqaanayukami	10,000-meng	pilluwaghtelighluni,	pilluwaghyaghyaqumigu	umiilek	20,000-meng	pilluwaghtelek.
B03_14_Luke_V32	Iwernga	kayaalqiipagningilkumi,	taagken	umiilek	salin	uyavanteghllagluku	kayaglleqii	akuzistekaghqani	ellnganun.	Whaten	piyaghtiisqelleqaa,	‘Sasqesugsikut	nekeggmetunnaluta?’”
B03_14_Luke_V33	Jesus-em	nagneghutkii,	“Enkaam	una	sumegtaghaatkiteggu,	kitum	alngunak	pegsunghilkumiki	qamaglluki	ellmi	pini,	maligsaaghtekepagningitaqa.”
B03_14_Luke_V34	Jesus-em	taaqniqii,	“Taghyuq	pinightuq,	iwernga	taghyughningiiskumi	allamengllu	taghyughnighunnaanghituq.
B03_14_Luke_V35	Taawa	pinighnaanghituq	sunamun,	nalighmeng	piinnasiiluni	piitesighaghvigmun,	enkaam	yuget	eglleqaat.	Nagatek,	sigutelguusi!”
B03_15_Luke_V1	Ataasimi	aghneghmi,	tax-meng	qerngughtistelghutetlu,	ilangillu	seghleghqestelghutet	nagasaatkat	Jesus-mun.
B03_15_Luke_V2	Pharisees-etlu,	apeghtughikayugetlu	Liilightuusaneng	qikeghqukat,	“Uum	yugem	tuguklighaqii	seghleghqestet,	neghelgusighaqiillu.”
B03_15_Luke_V3	Enkaam	Jesus-em	ungipaghaatkii,
B03_15_Luke_V4	“Nalighsi	100-meng	penniilguyaqumi,	ataasiq	iflayaqumigu,	sanayaghta?	Unilluki	99-et	penniini	neghumaluki	vegaaghtuqami,	ivaghyaghtughnayaghaa	iflakaq	penniini	kenlanga	naalkelleghminun.
B03_15_Luke_V5	Naalkesamigu,	quyapiglluni	uyamikaa.
B03_15_Luke_V6	Ellmeggnun	kaalluni	tagsiqliqii	ilakumtaani,	uviqlinillu	pikii,	‘Quyalgusiqaghtengnga,	qayughllak	naalkaqa	penniiqa	iflakaayalghii!’
B03_15_Luke_V7	Ungipaatamsi,	tawateghpigaq	qilagmi	quyakataghaghlleqaat	ataasiq	seghleghqesta	avuteghqelluni	seghleghqennanilghii,	pakiggulluku	taakuneng	99-eghyagneng	pinilghiineng	yugneng	avuteghqesaghqaanghilngughneng.”
B03_15_Luke_V8	Taagken	Jesus-em	ilanganeng	ungipaghaatkii,	“Aghnaq	qulaghyak	silver-meng	coin-elguyaqumi,	ataasiq	iflayaqumigu,	sanayaghta?	Kenelghutak	kumaghllukek	mangteghani	allegnayaghaa	ivaghingwaaghumaghmi	kenlanga	naalkelleghminun.
B03_15_Luke_V9	Naalkesamigu	tagsiqliqii	ilakumtaani,	uviqlinillu	pikii,	‘Quyalgusiqaghtengnga,	qayughllak	naalkaqa	coin-eka	iflakaqsaqegka!’
B03_15_Luke_V10	Ungipaatamsi,	tawateghpigaq	Kiyaghneghem	yaqulgi	quyaaqut	ataasiq	seghleghqesta	avuteghqelluni	seghleghqennanilghii.”
B03_15_Luke_V11	Taagken	Jesus-em	ilanganeng	ungipaghaatkii,	“Taawanguq	yuuk	maalghugegneng	ighnelek.
B03_15_Luke_V12	Uyuqliim	ighneghan	pikaa	atani,	‘Ataay,	saghyagpeneng	tuuninga	nengighqamneng.’	Enkaam	atangan	tuunegkakek	ighneghegni	nengighqagkeneng.
B03_15_Luke_V13	Mulunghituq,	uyuqliim	ighneghan	akikughluki	nengini	aghulaqegkaq	uyavanlengughmun	nunamun.	Tamaani	manini	sakusiiqluku,
B03_15_Luke_V14	saqraggiighutkaq.	Enraqlu	tamaana	nuna	neqangisagllagughtekaq	enkaam	nuughteghllagughtekaq.
B03_15_Luke_V15	Enkaam	qepghaghyaqaq	yugmun	tamaanlengughmun;	taagken	yugem	qepghaqalitkaa	neghqistenguluku	kurugaghneng.
B03_15_Luke_V16	Iyatam	angtalanganeng	kurugaat	neghqutkiitneng	neghyaghngaaghmi	lliiqaq,	kitumllu	alngunak	neghyaghqalisigalkanga.
B03_15_Luke_V17	Qenwatlu	liisaaghaqaq,	‘Paneghniqumalunga	maani,	qamaglluteng	atama	akileghtughluteng	qepghaghtengi	neghaqut	kepsuulluteng,	masisu	siiptiigaqut!
B03_15_Luke_V18	Aglaghnaqunga	atamnun	whaten	pinaluku,	Ataay,	seghleghqumaanga	Kiyaghneghmunllu,	elpenunllu.
B03_15_Luke_V19	Ighneghulungangam	piyaghqaananighnga.	Akileghtuqayugestun	qepghaghtegpetun	lliightestinga.’
B03_15_Luke_V20	Enkaam	nekevluni	ataminun	aglaqaq.	Iwernga	salin	uyavanlluku	atangan	esghaqaa.	Nangllegyaguteghllagluku	aqfaasnaq	payeghluku	qetqaghlluku	naaqaa.
B03_15_Luke_V21	Ighneghan	pikaa,	‘Ataay,	seghleghqumaanga	Kiyaghneghmunllu	elpenunllu.	Ighneghulungangam	piyaghqaananighnga.’
B03_15_Luke_V22	Iwernga	atangan	pikii	qepghaghteni,	‘Uuhuk,	pinilleghpigaak	atkuyaaghek	tagillukek	aatestekek,	alangqughiitighteggullu,	kamegteggullu.
B03_15_Luke_V23	Enkaam	quwintallghaneng	kaawaghaam	tuqutiighuteggu.	Neqenghaghqeghllagnaqukut	quyaghllagem	angtalanganeng,
B03_15_Luke_V24	qayughllak	ighneqa	una	tuqukaayalghii,	unguvaamaaq;	iflakaayalghii	naalkumaaq.’	Enkaam	neqenghaghqeghllakat.
B03_15_Luke_V25	“Tawani	pilleghmi,	nuyekliq	ighnegha	piitesighaghvigmelnguq.	Mangteghamun	kaasaghtughluni	nagaquqii	aynganangalghiitlu	tukalegalghiitlu.
B03_15_Luke_V26	Ataasiq	qepghagata	tuqlughluku	aaptekaa	saaqutangi.
B03_15_Luke_V27	Qepghaghtem	pikaa,	‘Uyughaan	kaasimaaq.	Atagpek	tuqutiighutesimaa	quwintallghaneng	kaawaghaam,	qayughllak	kaallghii	yaywaaseng	pinighluni.’
B03_15_Luke_V28	Anengaa	sakritkaq,	iteghyugumangitkaqlu.	Atangan	aanvikluku	iitghesqughaaqaa.
B03_15_Luke_V29	Iwernga	atani	pikaa,	‘Ayumiqullelghutni	qepghaateghllagamken,	qaatkenghisigatanka	qelghutkaghten.	Tawalliima	goat-aaghaghmeng	tuqutiighusigataghpenga	ilakumtaaqullghiini	neqenghaghqesqelluta.
B03_15_Luke_V30	Iwernga	uum	ighneghpek	sakusiiqegkaqaa	manin	aghnanun	yugusimeggneng	akikikayugneng.	Enkaam	uteghnighyan	whaa	elpek	tuqutiighutestan	quwintallghaneng	kaawaghaam!’
B03_15_Luke_V31	Atangan	pikaa,	‘Ighnemni,	quunpeng	elpek	whangkunnitaquten.	Qamaglluki	saghyanka	elpek	pikaten.
B03_15_Luke_V32	Iwernga	quyaluta	neqenghaghqengnguukut,	qayughllak	una	uyughaan	tuqukaayalghii,	unguvaamaaq;	iflakaayalghii	naalkumaaq.’”
B03_16_Luke_V1	Taagken	Jesus-em	ungipaghaatkii	maligsaaghteni,	“Taawanguq	aklungilnguq	yuuk	qepghaghtelguftuq,	umiilgutistengllaqaa	saghyaminun.	Ataasimi	aghneghmi	kitum	ungipaasimakanga	aklungilnguq	yuuk	umiilgutistengllaqaanun	sakusiiqniluki	saghyangi.
B03_16_Luke_V2	Enkaam	tagsighluku	pikaa,	‘Samaniluten	nagaqughaqsiken?	Umiilgutinanighnaquten	saghyamnun.	Enkaangam	whangamnun	tagitiki	igaghten;	yuvghiighnaqanka.’
B03_16_Luke_V3	Taana	yuuk	sumeghtaghaqaq,	‘Umiilegma	taaqestaanga	qepghaqamneng.	Sanaqsingangam?	Kayaatepigtunga	laagmun,	kaynguyugaqungallu	tungsighniilleghqamneng.
B03_16_Luke_V4	Qepghaqiighuskuma	paninang	yugnun	tuguklightesugtunga	ellngitnun.’	Enkaam	tawaten	pikaq.
B03_16_Luke_V5	Tagsiqlighteqii	ataasikaghtiita	asengelget	umiilegmineng.	Sivuliq	aaptekaa,	‘Naten	angkaan	asingemazigu	umiilka?’
B03_16_Luke_V6	Kiimsiqaa,	‘100-nguut	aqimleghutaghllaget	olives-em	mesiighaneng	imalget.’	Taagken	pikaa,	‘Tuguluku	asengegpek	igaa,	aqumqaghlluten	igaqigu	50’.
B03_16_Luke_V7	Taagken	ilanga	aaptekaa,	‘Elpek	naten	angkaan	asingemazigu?’	Kiimsiqaa,	‘1,000	bushels-nguut	wheat-et’	Taam	yugem	pikaa,	‘Tuguluku	asengegpek	igaa,	igaqigu	800’.
B03_16_Luke_V8	Umiilgan	usuqegkaa	ataasiighneghilnguq	qepghaghteni	peghqiniqellghaneng.	Ipanguuq	uum	nunam	yugi	ilameggneng	akilpeganeghmeggni,	tukfightuneghmeggni,	peghqiniqataghaghaqut	nighugmelngughneng	yugneng.
B03_16_Luke_V9	Ungipaatamsi,	nunamelnguq	aklungisi	kayusiitusiqiteggu	yugnun	ilakumtaangllaasiiluku	elpesinun.	Taagken	tuqukufsi	aklungisi	unilleqasi,	enkaam	upughatellengellequsi	kenlengilngughnun	nekaghqanun.
B03_16_Luke_V10	Kina	alngunak	ataasiighmeskumi	sayaghqasqughhaghminun,	ataasiighmellequqlu	sayaghqalghutminun.	Kina	alngunak	ipapighqigalkumi	sayaghqasqughhaghminun,	ipapighqennaanghituqlu	sayaghqalghutminun.
B03_16_Luke_V11	Ataasiighmesimangilkufsi	atuqaqngafsiki	aklungit	nunamelnguut,	kitumngam	neghyukulleqaki	elpesinun	aklungipiiget?
B03_16_Luke_V12	Enkaam	ataasiighmesimangilkufsi	kinkut	pingitnun,	kitumngam	tuunelleqisi	elpesi	pigpesineng?
B03_16_Luke_V13	Qepghaghtem	qepghaannaanghitaak	maalghuk	umiilgek.	Maalghugegneng	umiilelgukumi	ugumikelleqaa	aallgha,	piniqelleqaa	ilanga,	nalighmeng	qaatkelleqaa	aallgha,	siivaknaanghitaa	ilanga.	Piniqnaanghitagsi	qerngaagkenka	Kiyaghneghenkuk	maninkuk.”
B03_16_Luke_V14	Pharisees-et	maniyuneghpalluut	nagasamegteggu	tamaana	qamaglluku,	legasiighwaatkegkaat	Jesus.
B03_16_Luke_V15	Iwernga	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Elpesi	pinighsugningllaghaqusi	yuget	esghaamanghitni,	iwernga	Kiyaghneghem	liisimakiisi	ipa	natetulesi	ilugpesigun.	Sangwaat	yuget	megnukegkiit	satngunghitut	Kiyaghneghem	esghaamanghani.
B03_16_Luke_V16	“Kiyaghneghem	yugnun	tuunegkaqii	Liilightuusatlu	uuknaliqistetlu	igaqegkiit	atuqesqelluki	kenlanga	John-em	Paaptaayestem	tagillghanun.	Taam	kingunganeng	Pinilghiit	Ungipat	Ataneghpagullghaneng	Kiyaghneghem	ayuqelghiit	ungipaqinguut.	Enkaam	qamaglluteng	yuget	qevuutepiglluteng	iteghnaqutkeghllakaat.
B03_16_Luke_V17	Iwernga	piyaqnaghataghaghtuq	iqitelleghqaa	ataasiq	tagneqraghhaq	Liilightuusaneng,	qilagenkuk	nunankuk	aviighutelleghqagkeneng.
B03_16_Luke_V18	“Kitum	alngunak	peglluku	nuliini,	allaneng	nulightuqumi	gelghaghniighllequq.	Kitumllu	alngunak	tugukumigu	pegtekaq	aghnaq	gelghaghniighllequq.”
B03_16_Luke_V19	Taagken	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Taawanguq	aklungilnguq	yuuk	pilugugngalghii	akitupiglleghhiineng	aatkaneng.	Aghhutanga	tamaghhaan	neqem	akitullghinaaneng	neghaqelghii	siiptiighllagaqluni.
B03_16_Luke_V20	Taawallunguq	aklumalghii	yuuk	aatgha	Lazarus.	Aghhutanga	tamaghhaan	tagitaqegkangat	aklungilnguum	mangteghaanun	lliiqluku	eslaklighneghakun	amigllagan.	Kitumun	neghestesupigtaqsalghii	ifkaghqelleghmeng	asinganilngughmeng	tipelngan	aklungilnguum.	Uvinga	alqwaaghngalghii	ukiqelleghmeng	enkaam	qikmit	tagiluteng	alungraqaqegkangit.
B03_16_Luke_V22	Tagtalmi	aklumalghii	yuuk	tuqukaq,	enkaam	yaqulget	aglaatkaat	Abraham-em	nayaanun.	Aklungilnguqlu	yuuk	tuquyan	lliifqaat.
B03_16_Luke_V23	Hades-mi	aklungilnguq	yuuk	ikfiqeghllaguftuq.	Quulmun	esghaghyalghiimi,	uyavaghpanllukek	esghaqakek	Abraham-enkuk	Lazarus-enkuk	saaqwliqullutek.
B03_16_Luke_V24	Enkaam	aklungilnguq	yuuk	akilghuukaq,	‘Ataay,	Abraham,	nangllegyaguteqeghtinga!	Kayagtigu	Lazarus,	ighneghwaani	nepluku	meghmun	uluka	nenglekegsaghtuqaghligu,	qayughllak	kenghem	ikfiqesteghllagwaanga!’
B03_16_Luke_V25	Iwernga	Abraham-em	pikaa,	‘Ighnemni,	neqamikan	nunami	kiyagtaaghuluten	pinilghiimeng	pilgukaalghiiten,	Lazarus	pilgumaluku	seghleghmeng.	Iwernga	maaten	itagnaghillengumaaq,	elpek	ikfiqeghllagumaluten.
B03_16_Luke_V26	Taam	saaghwakun,	akulemnnituq	aangepiglleghhii	aghvighyaghllak.	Enkaam	ukegken	kina	aghvighpagningituq	elpesinun,	taagegken	kina	aghvighpagningituq	whangkunnun.’
B03_16_Luke_V27	Aklungilnguum	yugem	pikaa,	‘Naqam	Ataay,	tungsighvikaghllaken,	Lazarus	kayagtaghtigu	atama	mangteghaanun,
B03_16_Luke_V28	qayughllak	tallimaneng	anglegutelguunga.	Kelengasaaghyaghtughliki	luuraq	taginayukata	whavek	ikfiqfigllagmun!’
B03_16_Luke_V29	Iwernga	Abraham-em	pikaa,	‘Igaquqiit	Moses-emllu	uuknaliqistetlu	ellngitnitut,	liitiviknakangit.’
B03_16_Luke_V30	Aklungilnguum	yugem	pikaa,	‘Nakaan,	ataay	Abraham!	Itupill	kitum	tuqumasliighneng	takuyaqumiki,	avuteghqelluteng	seghleghqennanighnayaghtut.’
B03_16_Luke_V31	Iwernga	Abraham-em	pikaa,	‘Liitfikumangilkumegteki	igaquqiit	Moses-emllu	uuknaliqistetlu,	talwa	ugpeghtesnaanghitii	tuqumasliighem	unguvaghluni	ungipaaskumiki.’”
B03_17_Luke_V1	Jesus-em	maligsaaghteni	pikii,	“Seghleghqestinaqutkellghet	quunpeng	piyaghqaagut.	Iwernga	seghleghwaaghunaqnguuq	taana	seghleghqestinaqutkilghii	yugneng.
B03_17_Luke_V2	Taam	yugem	seghleghqestekagu	naliit	mekestaaghhaat	ugpeqingalghiit	whangamneng,	itagnaghnayaghtuq	yuget	qaamqaghfikluku	uyghagllagmeng	uyaqghwakun	miluusaqumegteggu	kelliimun.
B03_17_Luke_V3	Enkaam	kelengalusi!	Seghleghqesnaqutkegpenaki	yuget.	“Ugpeqaalguten	seghleghqegkan,	aghyuughnaken.	Enkaam	avuteghqelluni	seghleghqennaniqan,	seghevunnaken.
B03_17_Luke_V4	Ataasimi	aghneghmi	maaghraghvinlegneng	seghletun	pikangaten,	tagiighaataqanllu	elpenun	maaghraghvinlegneng	whaten	pimaghmi,	‘Qivghukepigtamken	seghletun	piighaatallemneng’,	seghevutepestaaghyaghqaqan.”
B03_17_Luke_V5	Apostle-et	Ataneq	pikaat,	“Ugpeqilleghtughtaghaqaghqut!”
B03_17_Luke_V6	Atanghem	pikii,	“Ugpeqillelguyaqufsi	mustard-em	piitutangatun	angkalghiimeng,	una	mulberry	uqfik	whaten	pikufsigu,	‘Akughtuumaghpek	iikluten,	piisaghtaa	kelliikun’,	qaatkennayaghiisi.”
B03_17_Luke_V7	“Nalighsi	qepghaghtelguyaqumi	piitesighaghvigmi	nunamun	laagwaaghtemeng,	nalighmeng	penniighmeng	aflengakikayugmeng,	uteghniqan	qepghaghvigmineng	pinayaghsiguu,	‘Esnevaghaghlluten,	neghi’?
B03_17_Luke_V8	Nakaa!	Itupill	whaten	pilleqan,	‘Yataaghqigu	neghyaghqaqa.	Simightughluten	kepsiiqunga	neghyaghqamneng,	meghyaghqamneng.	Neneghmeng	taaqegkuma,	neghumaghpek,	meghumaghpek	pilghaaten.’
B03_17_Luke_V9	Umiilgem	iyamsiqayugviknaanghitaa	qepghaghteni	qayughllak	taawaraaghinaq	qelellghatun	piiqelghii.
B03_17_Luke_V10	Elpesillu	tawatetusi.	Apeghiighumakufsiki	qamaglluki	Kiyaghneghem	qelghutkii,	whaten	pillequsi,	‘Qepghaghtenginaagukut;	taawaraaghinaq	qelghutkaghhiinaat	piiqaput.’”
B03_17_Luke_V11	Jesus	Jerusalem-emun	pitkelluku,	igleghtekaq	akulegkenkun	Samaria-nkuk	Galilee-nkuk.
B03_17_Luke_V12	Nengiighhaghmun	kaataquqlu,	qulaghyaget	yuget	leprosy-lget	nallaqaat.	Uyavaqaanlluteng
B03_17_Luke_V13	akilghuukat,	“Jesus!	Yuguniiq!	Nangllegyagutaghtikut!”
B03_17_Luke_V14	Esghaghyamiki	pikii,	“Aglaghtek	priest-enun	yuvghiighesqellusi.”	Igleghsimaluteng	naallghutkat,	ukmangiitkat	leprosy-meggneng.
B03_17_Luke_V15	Taagken	ataasim	esghaghluku	naallghutelleni,	Jesus-mun	uteghlluni,	iglagtuluni	usuqegkaa	Kiyaghneq.
B03_17_Luke_V16	Jesus-em	itegaan	sivungakun	sekelluni	nunamun	iyamsiqayugvikegkaa.	Yuuk	taana	Samaria-ghmiinguftuq.
B03_17_Luke_V17	Taagken	Jesus	pikaq,	“Qulanguyaghtut	naallghutkanka.	Naaki	estamaneng	inglulget	yuget?
B03_17_Luke_V18	Una	nakumii,	ellnginaawaa	uteghlluni	usuqiyaghtulghii	Kiyaghneghmun?”
B03_17_Luke_V19	Taagken	Jesus-em	pikaa,	“Nekevluten	ighleghten,	ugpeqilleghpek	naallghutestaaten.”
B03_17_Luke_V20	Ilangita	Pharisees-et	aaptekaat	Jesus	qakun	Ataneghpagullgha	Kiyaghneghem	tagiyaghqaatanga.	Kiimsiqii,	“Ataneghpagullgha	Kiyaghneghem	taginguuq	iwernga	yuget	esghaghyaghqaqenghitaat	qayughllak	nalluniighusiilnguq.
B03_17_Luke_V21	Enkaam	kina	alngunak	whaten	pinaanghituq,	‘Ii-i,	whaantuq!’	nalighmeng	‘Esgha	tazigna!’	qayughllak	Ataneghpagullgha	Kiyaghneghem	ilugpesinituq.”
B03_17_Luke_V22	Taagken	maligsaaghteni	pikii,	“Ukegkuni	aghneghni	tagilghiini	whangamnisugllagllequsi,	Ighneghani	Yugem,	waran	ataasimun	aghneghmun,	iwernga	taana	aghneq	esghaghnaanghitaghsi.
B03_17_Luke_V23	Yuget	ungipaalleqiisi,	‘Ii-i,	esgha	tazigna	Ighnegha	Yugem!’	nalighmeng	‘Ii-i,	whaantuq!’	Iwernga	takugpenaki,	maligtegpenaki.
B03_17_Luke_V24	Katam	nighugpaguutellghem	nighugtellghatun	qilaga	inglunganeng	agavek	inglunganun,	tawatesaghqaaguq	Ighnegha	Yugem	uteghniqumi	nunamun.
B03_17_Luke_V25	Iwernga	sivukluni,	Ighnegha	Yugem	uglalghiimeng	ikfiqepestaaghyaghqaaguq,	ighsaksaghqaqaatlu	maaten	kiyaghlleghhiit	yuget.
B03_17_Luke_V26	Sivungani	uteghnilleghqaan	Ighneghan	Yugem,	yuget	kiyaghtaallghit	tawatesaghqaagut	yuget	kiyaghtellghistun	taagani	aghneghni	Noah	kiyaghtengnguluku.
B03_17_Luke_V27	Yuget	neghaqluteng,	meghaqluteng,	nengughutaqluteng,	aang'ghutiiqluteng	pikaagut	kenlanga	Noah-m	ark-mun	itellghanun.	Taagken	uleveghllagem	tuququqaqii	qamagtengngwaaghluki.
B03_17_Luke_V28	Yuget	kiyaghtaallghit	tawatesaghqaagut	yuget	kiyaghtellghistun	taagani	aghneghni	Lot	kiyaghtengnguluku.	Yuget	neghaqluteng,	meghaqluteng,	tukfighiiqluteng,	akikiiqluteng,	piitesighaghaqluteng,	nekeftiiqluteng	pikaagut.
B03_17_Luke_V29	Iwernga	tawani	aghneghmi	Lot	aghulaqsan	Sodom-emeng,	qilagmeng	eslallugughtekaaguq	keneghmengllu	sulphur-mengllu,	enkaam	tuququqaqii	qamagtengngwaaghluki.
B03_17_Luke_V30	“Tawani	aghneghmi	Ighnegha	Yugem	aliightekan,	yuget	kiyaghtaallghat	almesiqsaghqaqaa	yuget	kiyaghtaalqesaqangistun	sivunghani.
B03_17_Luke_V31	Taam	aghneghani,	yuuk	mangtegham	qaaynganilnguq	ukifqaami	pilghaaq	mangteghami	ilunganun	saghyaqunaluni.	Tawateghpigaq	piitesighaghvigmelnguq	mangteghaminun	pifqaami	pilghaaq.
B03_17_Luke_V32	Neqamikiteggu	sakaatanga	Lot-em	nulighha!
B03_17_Luke_V33	Enkaam	kitum	alngunak	peggneghilkumigu	unguvalleni	Ataneghmun,	iflayaghqaqaa.	Iwernga	kitum	alngunak	pegtekumigu	unguvalleni	Ataneghmun,	unguvallengepiigllequq.
B03_17_Luke_V34	Ungipaatamsi,	Ighnegha	Yugem	tagikan,	tawani	unugmi,	maalghuk	qavaallequk	ataasimi	qavaghvigmi.	Aallgha	tugulleqaa,	ilanga	uneglleqaa.
B03_17_Luke_V35	Maalghuk	aghnak	qerngaagmek	kagimtillequk	grain-meng.	Aallgha	tugulleqaa,	ilanga	uneglleqaa.
B03_17_Luke_V36	Maalghuk	yugek	piitesighaghvigmellequk.	Aallgha	tugulleqaa,	ilanga	uneglleqaa.”
B03_17_Luke_V37	Maligsaaghtet	aaptekaat,	“Ataneq,	nani	tamaakut	piyaghqaagwat?”	Jesus-em	kiimsiqii,	“Nani	alngunak	kemegkwaalgukan	qawaagpaget	qerngughfikelleqaat.”
B03_18_Luke_V1	Taagken	Jesus-em	ungipaghaatkii	maligsaaghteni	apeghtughnaluki	quunpeng	yughiisqelluki	iilqayufqiita.
B03_18_Luke_V2	Pikii,	“Taawanguq	neghllagmi	nanqigtista	alingigalnguq	Kiyaghneghmeng,	asistaaghaqegkangillu	yuget.
B03_18_Luke_V3	Tamaanteftuqlunguq	neghllagmi	ugingighaq.	Nanqigtista	awen	takqwaaqegkanga	whaten	piiqluku,	‘Nallghusaataghtinga	anguyiqelghiimeng	whangamnun!’
B03_18_Luke_V4	Nanqigtistem	kayusiisunghiteghngaaghmigu	iwernga	tagtalmi	sumeghtaghaqaq,	‘Qaywa	alikigateghngaamkun	Kiyaghneq,	asistaaghaqeghngaamkillu	yuget,
B03_18_Luke_V5	kayusiinnaqaqa	ugingighaq	qayughllak	qinuyugsimanginaghnaqaanga.	Kayusiinneghilkumkun	qinuughhnaqaanga.’”
B03_18_Luke_V6	Taagken	Atanghem	nagneghutkii,	“Liitivikiteggu	seghleghem	nanqigtistem	pillgha.
B03_18_Luke_V7	Kiyaghneghem	nallghusaasaghqaqii	nakmikegkani	yughalghiit	aghneghtuumaan,	unugtuumaan.	Kiyaghneq	sukangisigatuq	kiimsighilleghminun.
B03_18_Luke_V8	Ungipaatamsi,	Kiyaghneghem	nallghusaatqaghsaghqaqii.	Qaywaa	Ighnegha	Yugem	uteghniqumi,	nunami	naalkulleqaa	ugpeqillelegmeng?”
B03_18_Luke_V9	Jesus-em	unallu	ungipaghaatkegkaa	yugnun	sumeghmeggni	pinighniluteng	pilghiinun,	asistaaghiiqlutengllu	pilghiinun	tamanganun.
B03_18_Luke_V10	Pikii,	“Maalghuk	yugek	Temple-mun	yughaghyaghtuumalghiik,	ataasiq	Pharisee,	ilanga	tax-meng	qerngughtista.
B03_18_Luke_V11	Pharisee	nekevluni	ellmineng	yughaatkegkaq,	‘Kiyaghneq,	iyamsiqayugvikamken	ilangistun	yuget	ayuqenghitunga,	wayaghniightengunghitunga,	Liilightuusaneng	naafqiistengunghitunga,	gelgaghniightengunghitunga,	talwa	uutun	tax-meng	qerngughtistetun	ayuqenghitunga.
B03_18_Luke_V12	Santilleghni	maalghugegneng	fast-aaqunga,	allgeghneghmallu	qulaghqellgha	tuunaqaqa.’
B03_18_Luke_V13	Iwernga	tax-meng	qerngughtista,	uyavanlluni	nekevghaghmi	talwa	sivugtegpenani	qilagmun,	naqam	sakimani	tenglugmigumiita	pikaq,	‘Kiyaghneq,	seghleghqestenguunga.	Nangllegyaguteqaghtinga!’”
B03_18_Luke_V14	Taagken	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Ungipaatamsi,	tax-meng	qerngughtista	neminun	aglaqaaguq	nallghusallengluni	Kiyaghneghem	elqughutngallghanun,	nakaan	Pharisee.	Qayughllak	kina	alngunak	ellmineng	anglisleghhii	ukavaghsaghqaaguq,	enkaam	kina	alngunak	ellmineng	ukavaghlleghhii	anglistellengyaghqaaguq.”
B03_18_Luke_V15	Taagken	ilangita	yuget	talwa	taghnughhaghhateng	tagitkiit	Jesus-mun	saafluki	quyastesqelluki.	Taawanginaq	maligsaaghtet	esghaghyamegteki	ineghtekiit	angayuqiit	tagitefqiita	pisqelluki.
B03_18_Luke_V16	Iwernga	Jesus-em	tagsighluki	taghnughhaat,	maligsaaghteni	pikii,	“Yeqay	taghnughhaat	tagilit	whangamnun,	aghuliightefqiita,	qayughllak	Ataneghpagullgha	Kiyaghneghem	taghnughhaghestun	ayuqelghiit	pikaat.
B03_18_Luke_V17	Ipa	ungipaatamsi,	kitum	alngunak	tuguklinghilkumigu	Ataneghpagullgha	Kiyaghneghem	taghnughhaghtun,	iteghnaanghituq.”
B03_18_Luke_V18	Ilangani	pilleghmi	igleghutistem	Jesus	aaptekaa,	“Pinilghii	Apeghtughista,	naten	sakuma	allgeghhnayaghsikun	kenlengilnguq	unguvalleq?”
B03_18_Luke_V19	Jesus-em	kiimsiqaa,	“Sangama	pinilghiingunizinga?	Kiyaghneghhiinaaguq	pinilghii,	kina	alngunak	pininghituq.
B03_18_Luke_V20	Liisimakaten	Liilightuusat,	‘Gelgaghniighpenang,	Yugtaghpenang,	Teglegpenang,	Iqlengiqutkigpenang,	Quulvaghlukek	atanllu	naanllu.’”
B03_18_Luke_V21	Yugem	pikaa,	“Anglinghhaatemneng	ima	qaatkengngwaanka	taakut	qamaglluki	Liilightuusat.”
B03_18_Luke_V22	Jesus-em	nagasamigu	pikaa,	“Ataasiq	paninang	piyaghqaqan.	Qamaglluki	saghyaten	akikughluki,	akingi	uyeggnaketen	aklumalghiinun,	enkaam	qilagmi	aklungilgullequten.	Taagken	tagiluten	maligtinga.”
B03_18_Luke_V23	Iwernga	yugem	nagalluku	iilqeghllakaq,	qayughllak	aklungitepiglleghhii.
B03_18_Luke_V24	Jesus-em	esghapagluku	illqelghii	pikaq,	“Piyaqnapigtuq	aklungilngughnun	itelleghqaat	Ataneghpagullgha	Kiyaghneghem!
B03_18_Luke_V25	Ipa	piyaqniisaghqaaguq	camel-em	suflughutelleghqaa	sikuum	iiyngakun,	aklungilnguum	yugem	itelleghqaaneng	Ataneghpagullgha	Kiyaghneghem.”
B03_18_Luke_V26	Tamaakut	nagallghiit	aaptekaat,	“Kinangam	yugulillengelleqa?”
B03_18_Luke_V27	Jesus-em	kiimsiqii,	“Yuget	piyaghqaqenghilkangit,	Kiyaghneghem	piyaghqaqii.”
B03_18_Luke_V28	Taagken	Peter-em	pikaa,	“Ii-i!	Unilluki	neput,	maligtamken.”
B03_18_Luke_V29	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Ipa	ungipaatamsi,	kitum	alngunak	uniskumigu	neni,	nuliini,	angleguteni,	angayuqagni,	avaqutani	apalluqluku	Ataneghpagullgha	Kiyaghneghem,
B03_18_Luke_V30	whani	kiyaghtaalleghmi	allgeghuteghllagyaghqaaguq.	Enkaamllu	qilagmi	kenlengilngughmeng	unguvallengellequq.”
B03_18_Luke_V31	Taagken	Jesus-em	awiitutaghlluki	qula	maalghuk	siipneqluku	maligsaaghteni	pikii,	“Nagataghtek!	Jerusalem-emun	pinaqukut.	Uuknaliqistet	igaqullghit	Ighneghaneng	Yugem	ayuqelghiit	qamaglluteng	apeghiighnaqnguut.
B03_18_Luke_V32	Jerusalem-emi	Jews-et	igleghutistengita	tuguluku	tuunelleqaat	Gentile-enun.	Enkaam	legasiighwaatkelleqaat,	kayngusaakelleqaat,	qesiqulleqaat,
B03_18_Luke_V33	kagsagmiglleqaatlu.	Taagken	tuqulleqaat,	iwernga	pingayiitangani	aghneghem	unguvaghllequq	unguvalleghmun.”
B03_18_Luke_V34	Iwernga	maligsaaghtengita	liigikepagningitkaat	qayughllak	sameng	pillgha	whateghlluwaaghunghilnguq	ellngitni.	Nallukegkaat	sangwaa	akuzitkaqutanga.
B03_18_Luke_V35	Jesus	kaasaghtughaquqlu	Jericho-mun,	ayaakaq	yuuk	aqumgaftuq	tumet	saaghwitni,	tungsighralghii.
B03_18_Luke_V36	Yulghuteghllaget	naghughqaallghiit	nagasamiki,	aapqughaaqaq	sangwaa	saaqutanga.
B03_18_Luke_V37	Ungipaatkaat,	“Jesus	Nazareth-eghmii	naghughtaquq.”
B03_18_Luke_V38	Ayaakaq	yuuk	akilghuukaq,	“Jesus,	Ighnegha	David-em!	Nangllegyaguteqeghtinga!”
B03_18_Luke_V39	Tamaakut	sivullgaalghiit	ineghtekaat	nepiighesqelluku.	Iwernga	iglaghtaaghalluni	akilghuukaq,	“Ighnegha	David-em,	nangllegyaguteqeghtinga!”
B03_18_Luke_V40	Jesus-em	aghuliighluni	tagitestekaa,	tughaaghyatni	aaptekaa,
B03_18_Luke_V41	“Sameng	sasqelluten	piiqsin?”	Kiimsiqaa,	“Ataneq,	esghaasagusugtunga.”
B03_18_Luke_V42	Jesus-em	pikaa,	“Esghaasaguten!	Ugpeqilleghpek	naallghutaaten.”
B03_18_Luke_V43	Tawaninginaq	esghaasagulluni	maligtekaa,	usuqumaan	Kiyaghneq.	Qamaglluteng	yulghuteghllaget	esghaghyamegteggu	ellngitallu	usuqegkaat	Kiyaghneq.
B03_19_Luke_V1	Jesus	kaalluni	Jericho-mun	akulngakun	igleghtekaa.
B03_19_Luke_V2	Taawanguq	umiilgat	tax-meng	qerngughtistet,	aatgha	Zacchaeus,	aklungilnguq.
B03_19_Luke_V3	Esghaghyukaa	naliitanga	Jesus,	iwernga	amsakaghtaghhaatmineng	esghaamangilkanga	qayughllak	yugtupiglleghhii.
B03_19_Luke_V4	Enkaam	aqfaatkaq	sivutghulluki	yulghutet,	taagken	mayuqaa	sycamore-a	uqfik	esghaghnaluku	Jesus	qayughllak	taakwagun	naghughhnaqelghii.
B03_19_Luke_V5	Jesus	kaalluni	uqfigmun,	sivugfikluku	pikaa,	“Zacchaeus,	egmiinaq	ukigi	qayughllak	aghneghmi	whani	elpesinitepestaaghnaqnguunga.”
B03_19_Luke_V6	Ukigaghlluni,	ellmeggnun	Jesus	aglaalluku	quyakepiglluku	upughatkaa.
B03_19_Luke_V7	Yulghutet	esghapagluku	qamaglluteng	akuzimleghaatkegkaat,	“Seghleghqestemun	aga	aqelqaayaghtughtuq!”
B03_19_Luke_V8	Iwernga	Zacchaeus-em	nekevluni	Ataneq	pikaa,	“Ataneq,	aveglluku	aklungika	tuunaqaqa	aklumalghiinun.	Enkaam	puughsimakumkun	kina	estamaghqelluku	veghulleqaqa.”
B03_19_Luke_V9	Jesus-em	pikaa,	“Aghneghmi	whani,	uum	yugem	ugpeqegkaqutmineng	Kiyaghneq,	ellnga	kingunqaaghtepiigaa	Abraham-em.	Enkaam	Kiyaghneghem	yugulii	mangteghami	whani	kiyaghlleghhiit.
B03_19_Luke_V10	Ighnegha	Yugem	tagikaaguq	ivaghinaluni	iflakaneng	yugulinaluki.”
B03_19_Luke_V11	Yuget	nagatngukangat	Jesus.	Sumeghmeggni	kaaskumi	Jerusalem-emun	Ataneghpagullgha	Kiyaghneghem	piinlighaghhnaqniluku	pikaat.	Enkaam	liigikesqelluki	Jesus-em	ungipaghaatkii.
B03_19_Luke_V12	Pikii,	“Aangwaaq	yuuk	aghulaqumalghii	uyavanun	nunamun	umiilgughhnaluni,	apeghiiqumi	uteghnighyaghqaaluni.
B03_19_Luke_V13	Aghulaqfagilgami	tagsighteghluki	qula	qepghaghteni	tunquqii	gold-meng	coin-meng.	Pikii,	‘Kenlanga	uteghnillemnun	tukfighisiqitekillu	akilpegaasiqitekillu	nulastesqelluku	manika.’
B03_19_Luke_V14	Iwernga	nunalgutangita	ugumikegkangat,	enkaam	aghulaqsan	kayagtekiit	yuget	umiilegpigaghmun	whaten	pisqelluku,	‘Taana	yuuk	umiilkesunghitaghput.’
B03_19_Luke_V15	“Iwernga	Umiilegpigaam	aangwaaq	yuuk	umiilgughtestekaa.	Uteghnighluni	nunaminun	tagsiqliqii	qepghaghtet	manilitkani	liigiknaluki	naten	angkaan	allgeghusimatangi.
B03_19_Luke_V16	“Sivuliim	tagiluni	pikaa,	‘Ataneq,	taagken	tagivaqaghpeneng	allgeghsimaanka	qulaghyaget	gold-et	coin-et.’
B03_19_Luke_V17	Umiilgem	pikaa,	‘Seghleghhalek,	pinilghiinguuten	qepghaghta!	Ataasiighmetutegpeneng	sasqughhaghmun,	igleghutistengllaghnaqamken	qulaghyagnun	neghllagnun.’
B03_19_Luke_V18	Tuunglighhaan	qepghaghtem	tagiluni	pikaa,	‘Ataneq,	taagken	tagivaqaghpeneng	allgeghsimaanka	tallimagyaget	gold-et	coin-et.’
B03_19_Luke_V19	Umiilgem	pikaa,	‘Elpek	igleghunnaqaten	tallimat	neghllaget.’
B03_19_Luke_V20	Taagken	pingayaat	qepghaghtet	tagiluni	pikaa,	‘Ataneq,	ang,	gold-a	coin-en,	kakegllugiitakun	iimgulluku	iiqaqaqa.
B03_19_Luke_V21	Alikamken	aaghsaghqaanghitutegpeneng.	Tugutkayuguuten	elpek	pikenghilkegpeneng,	saghnakayuguutenllu	piitesighaqaqenghilkegpeneng.’
B03_19_Luke_V22	Umiilgem	pikaa,	‘Uyuq,	seghleq	qepghaghta.	Akuziteten	elpenun	nanqigtusiqnaqanka.	Liisimakaghpenga	aaghsaghqaanghilnguugunga.	Tugutkayuguunga	whanga	pikenghilkemneng,	unataqayuguungallu	piitistekaqenghilkemneng.
B03_19_Luke_V23	Sangan'ngam	manika	kanaghhnanighsigu	bank-amun?	Uteghnillemni	veghhnayaghaqa	allgeghnelighluku.’
B03_19_Luke_V24	Taagken	nekevghallghiit	tawani,	pikii,	‘Tuguluku	ellnganeng	gold-a	coin-a	tuuniteggu	qepghaghtemun	qulaghyak	coin-elegmun.’
B03_19_Luke_V25	Pikaat,	‘Ataneq,	siingenllu	qulaghyak	coin-elguuq!’
B03_19_Luke_V26	Umiilgem	pikii,	‘Ungipaatamsi,	tamaghhaghmi	sameng	allgeghutkaq	tuunegkamneng	tuunataghaghyaghqaaguq.	Iwernga	taana	allgeghutellghilnguq,	talwa	salgughngaan	ellnganeng	iqilleqiit.
B03_19_Luke_V27	Taagken	umiilek	pikaq,	Naaki	tamaakut	anguyagenka	umiilgutesunghilnguut	whangamnun?	Tagilluki	whavek	tuququghteki	manumni!’”
B03_19_Luke_V28	Ungipaghaneghmeng	apeghiighyami	Jesus-em	sivullgaaqii	Jerusalem-emun.
B03_19_Luke_V29	Tughaaghaqaaklu	Bethphage-enkuk	Bethany-nkuk,	Mount	Olives-melnguuk,	maalghuk	maligsaaghtegni	kayagtekakek	sivullgaaqestiisqellukek.
B03_19_Luke_V30	Pikakek,	“Tazingavek	nemun	aglaghtek,	iitghutkelluku	esghaghlleqaghtek	donkey-ghaq	petugngalghii;	kitum	alngunak	igleghusiqigalkanga.	Itemulluku	taginnakesek.
B03_19_Luke_V31	Kitum	aaptekangistek,	‘Sangan	itemutestegnegu?’	Whaten	kiimsighnaaghaghtek,	‘Atanghem	atuqsugaa.’”
B03_19_Luke_V32	Taagken	aghulaqlutek	esghaqaak	Jesus-em	apellghatun	ayuqluku.
B03_19_Luke_V33	Itemusimaluku	donkey-ghaq	yugita	aaptekagket,	“Sangan	donkey-ghaq	itemutestegnegu?”
B03_19_Luke_V34	Kiimsiqiik,	“Atanghem	atuqsugaa.”
B03_19_Luke_V35	Enkaam	Jesus-mun	tagilluku,	qaaslimeggneng	tefqughvikluku	donkey-ghaq,	taagken	Jesus	aqumestekaat	qaayngakun.
B03_19_Luke_V36	Igleghsan,	yuget	qaasliteng	saaghquqiit	tuumkaghqaakun.
B03_19_Luke_V37	Jerusalem-emun	kaasaghtughluni,	kaataqaallu	ukigyaghaq	tumenilnguq	Mount	Olives-meng,	iingunaghmeng	maligsaaghtelghuteghllagi	quyateghllagughtekat.	Iglagtupigllutengllu	usuqegkaat	Kiyaghneq	Jesus-em	allaaghlluwhaghtilleghllaganeng	esghapakameggneng.
B03_19_Luke_V38	Pikat,	“Kiyaghneghem	quyasligu	Umiilek	tagilghii	aatghakun	Atanghem!	Nekeggmelleq	qilagmi,	usuqnaghhaleklu	Kiyaghneq	uusqalleghpigaghmelnguq!”
B03_19_Luke_V39	Taagken	ilangi	Pharisees-et	yulghutnilnguut	pikaat,	“Apeghtughista,	maligsaaghteten	nepiighesqiki.”
B03_19_Luke_V40	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Ungipaatamsi,	nepiighngayaqata,	uyghaget	akilghuughllagnayaghtut.”
B03_19_Luke_V41	Jesus	kaasaghtughluni	Jerusalem-emun,	esghaghyamigu	qiyakegkaa.
B03_19_Luke_V42	Pikaa,	“Whaa	maaten	liisimakegkentuq	sangutanga	aklukegkan	kiyaghtesqelluten	nekeggmelleghmi!	Iwernga	maaten	liigikepagningitan.
B03_19_Luke_V43	Aghneghet	kaannaqnguut	anguyagpek	amigiiritaghvingllaghlleqaaten	uzimun.	Aghuliighhnaqngwaat	igleghalleq	iteghmunllu	aanmunllu,	kangllulleqaatenllu	uzimun.
B03_19_Luke_V44	Naafqelleqaaten,	tuququghlleqiitlu	yugten	mingllutegpek	ilunganilnguut,	talwa	ataasiq	uyghak	nemininnanghituq.	Tamaakut	qamaglluteng	piyaghqaagut	qayughllak	liigikenghilken	Kiyaghneghem	yuguliyaghtuqaqsaqangaten!”
B03_19_Luke_V45	Taagken	Jesus	iitghaqngami	Temple-mun,	yuget	tukfightulghiitlu	akilpegalghiitlu	sakritutepiglluki	eslatmun	aanesquqii.
B03_19_Luke_V46	Ungipaatkii,	“Igaqngaaq	Akuzitni	Igaqegkani	Kiyaghneq	pikaaguq,	‘Mangteghaqa	yughaghviguuq	yugnun’,	iwernga	elpesi	iighaghvingllaghaghsi	teglegniightenun!”
B03_19_Luke_V47	Aghhutanga	tamaghhaan,	Jesus	apeghtughikaq	Temple-mi.	Chief	priest-etlu,	apeghtughikayugetlu	Liilightuusaneng,	igleghutistengitallu	yuget	agghitkengngukangat	naten	tuqutelleghqameng.
B03_19_Luke_V48	Iwernga	tuqutepagningitkaat	qayughllak	yulghuteghllaget	kanglluluku	nagatngwaaghutngukangit	apeghtuusii.
B03_20_Luke_V1	Aataasimi	aghneghmi,	Temple-mi,	Jesus	apeghtughimaluku	yugnun,	ungipaqimalukullu	Pinilghiineng	Ungipaneng,	chief	priest-etlu,	apeghtughikayugetlu	Liilightuusaneng,	siivanllequlluteng	takukaat.
B03_20_Luke_V2	Pikaat,	“Ungipaatikut	kitum	qeleghtaten	tawaten	pisqelluten,	nalighmeng	kitum	qelellghakun	tawaten	pinguzin?”
B03_20_Luke_V3	Kiimsiqii,	“Whangallu	aaptaghllamsi.	Ungipaataghtengnga,
B03_20_Luke_V4	John-em	paaptaayeghillgha	Kiyaghneghmeng	pingwaa,	nalighmeng	yugneng?”
B03_20_Luke_V5	Ellmeggneng	akuzimghutkelluku,	pikat,	“Sameng	pinaqesta?	Kiimsiqumteggu	Kiyaghneghmeng	pinguniluku,	whaten	pilleqiinkut,	‘Sanganmi	ugpeqenghitesteggu	John?’
B03_20_Luke_V6	Iwernga,	‘Yugneng	pingunikumteggu’,	qamaglluteng	yuget	milughpagaataghlleqiinkut,	qayughllak	ugpeqngukangat	John	uuknaliqistenguniluku.”
B03_20_Luke_V7	Enkaam	kiimsiqaat	nallukniluku	naken	pingutanga.
B03_20_Luke_V8	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Whangallu	ungipaannaanghitamsi	kitumeng	qelellengegkaatka	tamaavek	pikamnun.”
B03_20_Luke_V9	Taagken	Jesus-em	yuget	ungipaghaatkii,	“Yuuk	piitesighaghvigmini	grapes-meng	piitesighaamalghii.	Navghilluku	aflengakistenun	taagken	ilanganun	nunam	aghulaqluni	muluughllakaq.
B03_20_Luke_V10	Grapes-et	saghnayaghqaaghsata,	qepghaghta	kevgaqegkaa	aflengakistenun	nengini	aqfasqelluki.	Iwernga	aflengakistet	qevuutiighluku	aghulaqestekaat	avangunaan.
B03_20_Luke_V11	Ilanga	qepghaghta	kevgaqegkaa,	ellngallu	qevutiighluku,	kayngusaakluku	aghulaqestekaat	avangunaan.
B03_20_Luke_V12	Enkaam	pingayiitangat	qepghaghta	kevgaqegkaa,	taana	kiitiquluku	eslatmun	miluutkaat.
B03_20_Luke_V13	Taagken	grapes-em	piitesighaghvigan	yuga	pikaq,	‘Sanaqsinga?	Kevaqnaqaqa	whanga	katam	piniqegkaqa	ighneqa,	luuraq	siivaknayukatgu.’
B03_20_Luke_V14	Iwernga	aflengakistet	esghaghyamegteggu	pikat,	‘Una	pagitiyaghqaaguq	whaken	piitesighaghvigmeng,	tuqutelteggu	enkaam	piitesighaghvik	whangkuta	piliilleqaghput.’
B03_20_Luke_V15	Aanesluku	piitesighaghvigmeng	tuqutkaat.”	Taagken	Jesus-em	aaptekii,	“Piitesighaghvilgem	salleqakingam	taakut	aflengakistet?
B03_20_Luke_V16	Tagiluni	tuququghlleqii,	enkaam	piitesighaghvini	tuunelleqaa	ilangitnun.”	Nagasamegteggu	tawaten	pilghii,	pikaat,	“Kiyaghneghem	tawatelluku	apeghiightesneghilligu!”
B03_20_Luke_V17	Iwernga	esghaamakngwaaghluki	aaptekii,	“Una	Akuzin	Igaqegkaq	sameng	pisiiwa?	‘Uyghak	mangteghangllaghtet	ighsakegkaat,	megnunalleghpigaaghtekaaguq	uyghak.’
B03_20_Luke_V18	Tamaghhaghmi	iqulghii	taaggun	uyghagkun	kagimyaghqaaguq.	Iwernga	uyghagem	ulleghvikegkumigu	kina	kagimqelleqaa	pagulanguluku.”
B03_20_Luke_V19	Apeghtughikayugetlu	Liilightuusaneng,	chief	priest-etlu	liigikegkat	Jesus-mun	ellmeng	akuzitkengnguniluteng	ungipaghaatmikun.	Enkaam	tawaninginaq	tuguyukaat	iwernga	alikegkiit	yuget	seghleliighqiinayukata.
