B03_20_Luke_V20	Enkaam	iiskughtengngwaaqaat	Jesus	qayughllak	tuunyukangat	Rome-em	governor-nganun,	ellnganun	nanqigtesqelluku.	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	kayagtekiit	riirngistet	nagatesqelluku	Jesus.	Ipapighqesighwaaghluki	anaggutesnaqutkesqelluku	Jesus	akuzillghakun.
B03_20_Luke_V21	Taakut	riirngistet	pikaat,	“Apeghtughista,	whangkuta	liisimakamken	akuzilleghtenllu	apeghtughilleghtenllu	ipanguut.	Atunengwaaq	pikayuguuten	yugnun,	apeghtughaqatenllu	ipalleghmeng	Kiyaghneghem	piyukellghaneng	ayuqelghiimeng.
B03_20_Luke_V22	Ungipaataghtikut,	Kiyaghneghem	Liilightuusaani	elqughutngaa	llivikilleghqaghput	tax-meng	Caesar-mun?	Llivikiltaa-a	nalighmeng	pinghitelta?”
B03_20_Luke_V23	Iwernga	Jesus-em	liisimakegkangi	peghqiniqellghit	enkaam	pikii,
B03_20_Luke_V24	“Kelguvikitengnga	coin-meng.	Kitum	gginaallu,	aatghallu	coin-meta?”	Kiimsiqaat,	“Caesar-em.”
B03_20_Luke_V25	Pikii,	“Tuuniteki	Caesar-mun	tamaakut	Caesar-em	pingi,	enkaam	tuuniteki	Kiyaghneghmun	tamaakut	Kiyaghneghem	pingi.”
B03_20_Luke_V26	Enkaam	riirngistet	Jesus	akuzillghakun	anaggutestepagningitkaat	yuget	sivungitni.	Saghiighayagulluki	kiimsiitangi,	qallegnaniqat.
B03_20_Luke_V27	Taagken	ilangi	Sadducees-et	tagikat	Jesus-mun.	Ellngita	ugpeqngukangit	tuqukat	unguvaghyaghqaanghinniluki.
B03_20_Luke_V28	Pikaat,	“Apeghtughista,	Liilightuusamnni	Moses-em	igaqegkaqaa	whaten,	yugem	anglegutanga	nulightughluni	tuqumakan	avaqutigpenani,	anglegutangan	tuguyaghqaqaa	nulighqesaqanga	avaqutinnaluku	anglegutni	tuqukaq.
B03_20_Luke_V29	Taawanguq	maaghraghvinlek	yuget	anglegutkullghiit.	Nuyekliq	nulightughluni	tuqukaq	avaqutigpenani.
B03_20_Luke_V30	Tuunglighhaan	tuguluku	ugingighaq,	ellngallu	tuqukaq.
B03_20_Luke_V31	Pingagayiitangitallu	tuguluku,	ellngallu	tuqukaq.	Qenwat	qamaglluteng	maaghraghvinlegyaget	anglegutkullghiit	tuqulaghaatkat	avaqutigpenateng.
B03_20_Luke_V32	Kinguliiluni	aghnaq	tuqukaq.
B03_20_Luke_V33	Qamagllutengqun	maaghraghvinlegyaget	nulighhuluku	tugukaqegkangat.	Enkaangam	kitum	nulighqelleqagu	aghnaq	tuqukat	unguvaghtuuskata?”
B03_20_Luke_V34	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Kiyaghtaalleghmi	maaten	yuget	nulightughaqut,	aghnat	aang'ghutaqiit.
B03_20_Luke_V35	Iwernga	tamaakut	Kiyaghneghem	itagnaqegkii	tuqulleghmeng	unguvaghtuusaghqaagut,	kiyaghllequtlu	nutaghami	nunami,	tugutunnaanghitut.
B03_20_Luke_V36	Tawani	unguvalleghmi	yaqulgestun	ayuqsaghqaagut	tuqunaanghitut.	Avaqutaqii	Kiyaghneghem,	qayughllak	tuqulleghmeng	unguvaghtekaagut.
B03_20_Luke_V37	Whateghlluwaaq	Moses-em	ipapighqegkaqii	tuqukat	unguvaghsaghqaaniluki.	Igatgun	igaqaqngamigu	uqfillegaq	kumaghughngalghii	whaten	pikaaguq,	Ataneq	‘Kiyaghneqaa	Abraham-em,	Kiyaghneqaa	Isaac-em,	Kiyaghneqaa	Jacob-em.’
B03_20_Luke_V38	Ellnga	Kiyaghneqaat	unguvalghiit,	qayughllak	ellngani	qamaglluteng	paninang	unguvalghiinguut.	Ellnga	Kiyaghneqenghitaat	tuqukat.”
B03_20_Luke_V39	Ilangita	apeghtughikayuget	Liilightuusaneng	pikaat,	“Apeghtughista,	kiimsighlaataqwaaten.”
B03_20_Luke_V40	Taagken	tetugyagutkaat	aapqughaaneghmeng.
B03_20_Luke_V41	Taagken	Jesus-em	aaptekii,	“Sanganmi	yuget	Christ-a	ighneqniiqatgu	David-mun?
B03_20_Luke_V42	Igaani	Psalms-em	David	pikaalghii,	‘Atanghem	Kiyaghneghem	pikaqaa	Atanqa,	Aqumi	aghenqignemkun,
B03_20_Luke_V43	kenlanga	anguyagten	asingiitellemnun	itegaghpek.’
B03_20_Luke_V44	David-em	tuqluqaa	‘Ataneghmeng’	enkaam	natenmi	ighneqelleqagu?”
B03_20_Luke_V45	Yuget	ellminun	nagatusimaluki,	Jesus-em	maligsaaghteni	pikii,
B03_20_Luke_V46	“Kelengalusi	apeghtughikayugneng	Liilightuusaneng.	Igleghsuneghtuut	aalluteng	akughtuqameng	atkuyaaghmeng,	akilpegaghvignillu	quyakesugaqut	aangwaaghughtekaaluteng.	Synagogue-nillu	neqenghaghqelghiinillu	aqumyuneghtuut	aangwaaghughtekat	aqumutiitgun.
B03_20_Luke_V47	Esghaghlaataquluki	ugingighat	mangteghiighaqiit.	Taagken	pinighniluteng	pisqelluteng	taakluku	yughaghaqut.	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	aghyuullengeghllagyaghqaagut!”
B03_21_Luke_V1	Jesus	Temple-mesimaluni,	esghapakii	aklungilnguut	tunusameggneng	manilghutagnun	kanaghtilghiit.
B03_21_Luke_V2	Taagken	esghapakaa	aklumalghii	ugingighaq	manilghutagnun	kanaghtilghii	maalghugegneng	coin-ngiighhaagneng.
B03_21_Luke_V3	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Ipa	ungipaatamsi,	una	aklumalghii	ugingighaq	kanaghtinguuq	uglaghataghaghluku	tamaakuneng	aklungilngughneng.
B03_21_Luke_V4	Tamaakut	tunquugut	aklungighllagmeggneng,	iwernga	ugingigham	aklumaghllagmini	qamaglluku	tuunaa	kiyaghusighqaqsaqeni.”
B03_21_Luke_V5	Ilangita	maligsaaghtengan	akuzitkegkaat	Temple-a.	Pinighyagutkiit	pinighnaghllaget	uyghaget,	tunusatlu	tuunegkat	Kiyaghneghmun	pinighnaghsaasiqegkiit	Temple-mun.	Iwernga	Jesus-em	pikii,
B03_21_Luke_V6	“Tamaakut	esghaghteghasi,	pilleghqaq	kaasaghqaaguq	talwa	ataasiq	uyghak	tawanlenguq	nemininnanghituq,	qamaglluteng	ulleghqughyaghqaagut.”
B03_21_Luke_V7	Ilangita	maligsaaghtengan	aaptekaat,	“Apeghtughista,	qakun	tamaakut	piyaghqaawat?	Sangulleqa	liisimakusighqaghput	tamaakut	piyaghqaaghtekata?”
B03_21_Luke_V8	Kiimsiqii,	“Kelengatek,	puughtestegpenasi,	qayughllak	uglaq	taginaqnguuq	aatqa	atuqluku	whaten	pimaghmeng,	‘Whanga	Christ-anguunga!’	piiqellequtlu,	‘Pilleghqaq	kaatuq!’	Iwernga	maligsaqunaki.
B03_21_Luke_V9	Kakavegpenasi	nagaququfsiki	nunat	pillugutnguniluki,	nunalgutkullghiitlu	pillugutnguniluki.	Sivukluni	tamaana	piyaghqapestaaghuq,	iwernga	tawaninginaq	iqugtelleq	pinaanghituq.”
B03_21_Luke_V10	Taagken	pikii,	“Nunat	pillugullequt,	ataneghpagullghetlu	pillugutullequt.
B03_21_Luke_V11	Nani	alngunak	nunat	uvelegtaghllagllequt,	neqangisagllagllequt,	allegvikikayugetlu	aqnighneghet	pillequt.	Yuget	esghaghlleqiit	sangwaat	qilagami,	kakavaataghnalghiit,	allaaghlluwhaghyugnalghiitlu.
B03_21_Luke_V12	Iwernga	qamaglluki	tamaakut	pistegpenaki,	tugulusi	amyuqetaatkelleqiisi.	Synagogue-nun	aglaallusi	nanqiglleqiisi	enkaam	anusimingllaghlleqiisi.	Aglaalleqiisi	umiilegnunllu	governor-nunllu	nanqigtesqellusi	whanga	apalluqlunga.
B03_21_Luke_V13	Taana	pilleghqaqaghsi	ungipaqesqellunga	whanga.
B03_21_Luke_V14	Enkaangam	sumeghtaghaatkekestaghpenaan	sameng	pilleghqaghsi.
B03_21_Luke_V15	Whanga	akuzitkaghqalilleqamsi,	peghqinellelilleqamsillu	repall	anguyagpesi	kipullginaaghpagningitiit	akuzillesi	nalighmeng	temnginguninaanghitiit.
B03_21_Luke_V16	Talwa	angayuqaghpesi,	anglegutegpesi,	ilakwaaghpesi,	ilakumtaaghpesi	uveghpagulleqiisi	igleghutistenun,	enkaam	ilasi	tuqulleqiit.
B03_21_Luke_V17	Whanga	apalluqlunga	tamaghhaghmi	yugem	ugumikeraaghlleqiisi.
B03_21_Luke_V18	Iwernga	naasqughpesineng	ataasiq	nuyaq	iflanaanghituq.
B03_21_Luke_V19	Ugpeqillesi	ayepsugitestekufsiki	allgeghlleqaghsi	unguvalleghsi.
B03_21_Luke_V20	“Tawani	esghaqufsigu	Jerusalem	kangllukangat	pilluwaghtet,	taawa	liisimakelleqaghsi	qantaghaqun	naafqelleghqaa.
B03_21_Luke_V21	Taagken	Judea-melnguut	anagniighhaat	naayghanun,	Jerusalem-emelnguutlu	aghulaqelghaat,	eslataanilnguutlu	itefqaameng	pilghaat.
B03_21_Luke_V22	Qayughllak	tamaakuni	aghneghni	Kiyaghneghem	aghyuughlleqii	Jews-et.	Enkaam	uuknaliqistet	igaquqiit	taakuneng	aghneghneng	qamaglluteng	apeghiighllequt.
B03_21_Luke_V23	Seghleghwaaghunaqnguut	qumilgetlu	mamaghtalgetlu	anagniighnaqutkelleghqiit.	Seghleliighllagem	kaannaqngwaa	Israel-em	nunanga	qayughllak	Kiyaghneghem	aghyuughnaqngwii	yugi.
B03_21_Luke_V24	Ilangi	tuqulleqiit	savigpagkun,	ilangi	tuguluki	aghulaqulleqiit	tamanganun	nunanun.	Enkaam	Gentile-et	kayaalqelleqaatlu	igleghulleqaatlu	Jerusalem,	kenlanga	pilleghqaat	kenletghuutellghanun.
B03_21_Luke_V25	“Taakwaningani	sangwaat	alingruughnalghiit	pillequt	siqineghqun,	tanqikun,	ighaleqetaaghteggun.	Nunami,	nunataghhaani	tamaghhaani	yuget	alingruughllagllequtlu	kukragyugllequtlu	sangami	kellii	qallaghtelleghllaganengllu	qagingughtelleghllaganengllu.
B03_21_Luke_V26	Yuget	esghaqumegteki	aghtughyaghqaanghillghet	qilagami	qapraghqesleghhiit	igleghneghmeggneng,	teggellghiighutkeghllaglleqaat	saaqutanga	nuna.	Enkaam	alingruughem	tuquraagllequt.
B03_21_Luke_V27	Taagken	esghaghlleqaat	Ighnegha	Yugem	tagilghii	qilagwaaghqun	aghtughyaghqaanghillelighlunillu	nighughqellelighllaglunillu.
B03_21_Luke_V28	Tamaana	tawaten	pikestaqan,	nekevlusi	sivuglleghhaasi,	qayughllak	yugulillengyaghtungestaghtusi.”
B03_21_Luke_V29	Taagken	Jesus-em	ungipaghaatkii,	“Esghaqaghteggu	figs-em	uqfiga,	qamagllukillu	uqfilghutet.
B03_21_Luke_V30	Esghaneghpesiki	ququngangekestanghata,	liisimakaqaghsi	kiigyaghtulghii.
B03_21_Luke_V31	Tawateghpigaq	qamagtengngwaaghluki	aapqanka	esghaqufsiki,	liisimakelleqaghsi	Ataneghpagullgha	Kiyaghneghem	kaasaghtungestalghii.
B03_21_Luke_V32	Ipa	ungipaatamsi,	maaten	unguvalghiit	tuqulaghaatestegpenaki	qamaglluteng	tamaakut	piyaghqaagut.
B03_21_Luke_V33	Qilagenkuk,	nunankuk	aviighusaghqaaguk,	iwernga	whanga	akuzitenka	aviighunnaanghitut.
B03_21_Luke_V34	“Kelengalusi,	aghsaghpaagtegpenasi	neqenghaghqemmeng,	meghuutelleghmeng,	nalighmeng	sumeghyaligpenasi	nunam	pinganeng.	Tawaten	pikufsi	taam	aghneghem	kaatqaghnayukangisi	naapleghhiistun.
B03_21_Luke_V35	Taana	Aghneq	kaasaghqaaguq	iingunaghhaanun	yugnun	nunamelngughnun.
B03_21_Luke_V36	Enkaam	kelengatek	quunpeng!	Yughaghtek	anagyaqlegesqelluki	tamaakut	qamaglluki	pikata,	nekevyaqlegesqellusi	sivungakun	Ighneghan	Yugem.”
B03_21_Luke_V37	Aghhutanga	tamaghhaan	Jesus	apeghtughiiqelghii	Temple-mi,	iwernga	aaneghmini	unugmi	Mount	Olives-metaqelghii.
B03_21_Luke_V38	Unaanguluku	yuget	qamaglluteng	aglaghtuutaqelghiit	Temple-mun	nagannaluku.
B03_22_Luke_V1	Kaasaghtuungulghii	“Neqenghaghqellgha	Yeast-aliimangilnguum	Neqekrangllam”,	atilqelghii	Passover-meng.
B03_22_Luke_V2	Chief	priest-etlu,	apeghtughikayugetlu	Liilightuusaneng	agghitkengngukangat	naten	tuqutelleghqameng	Jesus.	Iwernga	agghitkelleteng	liisimakesunghilkangit	yugnun	qayughllak	alingelghiit	seghleliighqiighllagnayukata.
B03_22_Luke_V3	Taagken	Tughneghaam	iitqaa	Judas	Iscariot,	ilatngalghii	qula	maalghuk	siipneqluku	malighsaaghtenun.
B03_22_Luke_V4	Enkaam	aleghqughyaghtuqii	chief	priest-etlu,	umiilwaaghitlu	Temple-em	kelengakistengita	naten	uveghpagunnaluku	Jesus	ellngitnun.
B03_22_Luke_V5	Tawaten	pinaqellghaneng	quyakat	enkaam	akeqegkaat	manililleqniluku.
B03_22_Luke_V6	Judas-em	itagnaqluki	uveghpagutilleghqangnaqutkegkaq	Jesus-meng,	iwernga	yugtuqami	piyugumangilkanga.
B03_22_Luke_V7	Aghneq	kaatkaq	Neqenghaghqelleghqaanun	Yeast-aliimangilnguum	Neqekrangllam.	Tawani	aghneghmi	tamaghhaghmeng	nengllugutet	tuqutiighaqelghiit	penniighaghaghmeng	Passover-mun.
B03_22_Luke_V8	Enkaam	Jesus-em	pikakek	Peter-enkuk	John-enkuk,	“Yataaghqesaghtughtegnegu	Passover-em	neqekaghqaa	neghuunnaluta.”
B03_22_Luke_V9	Aaptekaak,	“Nani	yataaghqestesugsigu?”
B03_22_Luke_V10	Kiimsiqakek,	“Nagataghtek!	Iitquftek	neghllagmun,	yugem	nallaghlleqiistek	tugumiilguuq	melghutagneng.	Malignakesek	mangteghamun	iitqan,
B03_22_Luke_V11	enkaam	mangtegham	yuga	pinakesek,	‘Apeghtughistem	aaptaaten,	malighsaaghtekullghiini	natungaawa	neghvigkaghput	Passover-mun?’
B03_22_Luke_V12	Taagken	mayuulleqiistek	qemtamun	nunatuqameng	nelek,	neghuutelleghqamun	atughqalwaalek.	Tawani	yataaghqilghaatek.”
B03_22_Luke_V13	Aglaghlutek	piyalghiimek	sangwaa	qamaglluni	Jesus-em	apellghatun	ayuqegkaq,	enkaam	yataaghqegkaak	Passover-em	neqekaghqaa.
B03_22_Luke_V14	Neghvigkaq	kaasan	Jesus-llu	apostle-etlu	iggasighquutkat	neghnaluteng.
B03_22_Luke_V15	Pikii,	“Neghelgutkesupigtamsi	Passover-em	neqnganeng	sivutghulluku	ikfiqelleghqaqa!
B03_22_Luke_V16	Ungipaatamsi,	alla	neghyaghqaqenghitaqa	taana	kenlanga	Ataneghpagulleghmini	Kiyaghneghem	apeghiiqagu	uspeqelleni	Passover-mun.”
B03_22_Luke_V17	Taagken	tuguluku	qayuusiq,	iyamsiqayugvikluku	Kiyaghneq,	pikaq,	“Tuguluku	qayuusiq	meghvikaataghteggu.
B03_22_Luke_V18	Ungipaatamsi,	whaken	kenlekluku	meghnaanghitaqa	wine-a	kenlanga	Ataneghpagullgha	Kiyaghneghem	kaatellghanun.”
B03_22_Luke_V19	Taagken	tuguluku	neqekrangllaq,	iyamsiqayugvikluku	Kiyaghneq,	aavgughluku	tunquqii,	whaten	pimiita,	“Una	yugusiqaqa	tuunegkegka	elpesi	apalluqlusi.	Neghaqiteggu	neqamikusiiluku	whangamnun.”
B03_22_Luke_V20	Neneghmeng	taaqsameng	tawateghpigaq	tuunegkii	qayuusimelngughmeng	wine-meng,	whaten	pimiita,	“Una	qayuusiq	Kiyaghneghem	nutaghaaguq	akequsaa	aamkun,	kuuvelghii	elpesi	apalluqlusi.
B03_22_Luke_V21	“Iwernga	nagatek!	Uveghpagutisteka	whaantuq,	neghelgusighaqaanga!
B03_22_Luke_V22	Kiyaghneghem	tawaten	uspeqelqaa	Ighneghan	Yugem	tuqulleghqaa.	Iwernga	seghleghwaaghunaqnguuq	taana	yuuk	uveghpagutiyaghqaq	ellnganeng!”
B03_22_Luke_V23	Taagken	malighsaaghtet	aapqughaaghutkat	ellmeggneng	nalighteng	tawaten	piyaghqaatanga.
B03_22_Luke_V24	Taagken	malighsaghtet	aaghtiiraaghutkat	nalighteng	angelleghpigaayaghqaatanga.
B03_22_Luke_V25	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Gentile-et	umiilgita	atanghutaqiit	yuteng,	igleghutistengitlu	atightesugaqut	‘Kayutngit	Yuget’	tawatenneghiteghngaaghmeng.
B03_22_Luke_V26	Iwernga	elpesi	tawatesaghqaanghitusi.	Itupill	akulegpesini	angelleghpigaat	uyuqlighpigaastun	lliighlit,	enkaam	igleghutista	qepghaghtestun	lliighli.
B03_22_Luke_V27	Nalikek	aangataghaghta,	aqumgalghii	tipelegni,	nalighmeng	kepsiiqulghii?	Aqumgalghii	aangataghaghtuq.	Iwernga	akulegpesini	whanganguuq	kepsiiqulghii	elpesinun.
B03_22_Luke_V28	“Elpesinguut	whangamnitkat	nanghiighsaghallemni.
B03_22_Luke_V29	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	ataneghpagullelitamsi	katam	Atama	tagivallghatun	whangamnun.
B03_22_Luke_V30	Enkaam	Ataneghpagullemni	neghellequsillu	meghellequsillu	tipelegemni.	Aqumellequsillu	umiilgusim	aqumutiitgun	nanqigsaghqaaluki	qula	maalghuk	siipneqluku	Israel-em	ramkengi.”
B03_22_Luke_V31	Jesus-em	pikaa	Peter,	“Simon,	Simon!	Nagaten!	Tughneghaq	pilleghqangumaaq	Kiyaghneghmeng	nanghiiqunaluki	ugpeqillesi.	Aaftesugiisi	whangamneng	katam	piitesighaghtem	avullghatun	mallat	wheat-neng.
B03_22_Luke_V32	Iwernga	yughaatkumaamken	Simon,	ugpeqillghen	pegtefqaan	pisqelluku.	Enkaam	ugpeqenqigtekuvnga,	iknaqughsaghyaghqaqaten	maligsaaghtelgutegpek	ugpeqillghit.”
B03_22_Luke_V33	Peter-em	pikaa,	“Ataneq,	maligsaqleggiinaaghsimaamken	anusimingllaghvigmun,	tuqulgusighnalutenllu!”
B03_22_Luke_V34	Jesus-em	pikaa,	“Peter,	ungipaatamken,	unukun	pingayuneng	nallunqelleqaghpenga	sivungani	rooster-em	qalghilleghqaan.”
B03_22_Luke_V35	Taagken	Jesus-em	aaptekii,	“Kayagtaqngamsi	manilghutangunasi,	aqeftaghaangunasi,	nalighmeng	kaamngunasi	sameng	aklumatsi?”	Kiimsiqaat,	“Aklumangitukut.”
B03_22_Luke_V36	Pikii,	“Iwernga	maaten,	kina	alngunak	manilghutalgukumi,	nalighmeng	aqeftaghaalgukumi	kelqelli.	Kina	alngunak	savigpagiskumi	qaasligni	akiklukek	pikengli.
B03_22_Luke_V37	Ungipaatamsi,	igaqngaaq	Akuzitni	Igaqegkani,	‘Ilalkiisimaat	Liilightuusat	naafqiistengitnun.’	Taana	Akuzin	Igaqegkaq	whangamneng	ayuquq,	enkaam	apeghiighyaghqaaghtuq.”
B03_22_Luke_V38	Maligsaaghtet	pikaat,	“Ii-i	Ataneq!	Whaa	maalghuk	savigpagek.”	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Tawatenginaghngam!”
B03_22_Luke_V39	Jesus-enkut	maligsaaghtekullghiit	aanluteng	Jerusalem-emeng,	piiqelleghmegestun	aglaqat	Mount	Olives-mun.
B03_22_Luke_V40	Kaasameng	takukameggnun	pikii,	“Yughaghtek	aaghqutaqenghitesqellusi	nanghiiqulleghmun.”
B03_22_Luke_V41	Uyghagem	miluutellghan	uyaatulngatun	tazingavek	aglaqaq	unilluki	maligsaaghteni.	Enkaam	segesqughlluni	yughaqaq,
B03_22_Luke_V42	“Atamni,	piyukellqegkuvgu	awiitigu	una	qayuusiq	whangamneng.	Iwernga	whanga	piyukelqa	avelghaghluku	elpek	piyukellghen	apeghiighli.”
B03_22_Luke_V43	Qilagmeng	yaqulgem	takuluku	iknaqughsaqaa.
B03_22_Luke_V44	Ikfiqeghllagem	angtalanganeng	taakunginaghhaagneng	yughaqaq,	qesightellghallu	aawestun	uqlughqaqaq	nunamun.
B03_22_Luke_V45	Yughaneghmeng	taaqsami	nekevluni	malighsaaghteminun	piyalghiimi	qavaatnguftut,	qayughllak	qivghullghem	paghyughqegkangi.
B03_22_Luke_V46	Pikii,	“Sangafsi	qavaghaqetsi?	Makellusi	yughaghtek	aaghqutaqenghitesqellusi	nanghiiqulleghmun.”
B03_22_Luke_V47	Jesus	akuzimaluku,	Judas-em	maghyaghquqii	yulghutet	ellnganun.	(Judas	ilatngalghii	qula	maalghuk	siipneqluku	maligsaaghtenun.)	Takukaa	Jesus	naaghnaluku.
B03_22_Luke_V48	Taagken	Jesus-em	aaptekaa,	“Judas,	naaghsiguu	Ighnegha	Yugem	uveghpagunnaluku	anguyaganun?”
B03_22_Luke_V49	Maligsaaghtet	Jesus-melnguut	liigikluku	sangwaa	sanaqutanga,	aaptekaat,	“Ataneq,	pilluwaaltekii	savigpamteggun?”
B03_22_Luke_V50	Aga	naliita	savigpagmineng	ilefkaghaghtekaa	aghenqigneghan	sigutnga	qepghaghtelaaghan	high	priest-em.
B03_22_Luke_V51	Iwernga	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Haamangam,	tawaten'ngam	pitek!”	Enkaam	saafluku	qepghaghtelaaghem	sigutnga	maamestekaa.
B03_22_Luke_V52	Taagken	Jesus-em	aaptekii	chief	priest-et,	umiilwaaghi	Temple-em	kelengakistengita,	siivanlleghetlu	aqfaaghilghiit	ellmineng,	“Tuguyaghtuungustengngaa	savigpagtuumaghpesi,	anagutaghtuumaghpesi	nikimqun	wayaghniightengulunga?
B03_22_Luke_V53	Aghhutanga	tamaghhaan	elpesinitaqngama	Temple-mi,	tugunaqutkumangitaghpesinga.	Iwernga	una	aflukaghsi,	qayughllak	aghtughyaghqaanghillgha	mamlegem	igleghutinguuq.”
B03_22_Luke_V54	Taagken	Jesus	tuguluku	aghulaqutkaat,	aglaatkaat	high	priest-em	mangteghaanun.	Uyavaqaanlluni	Peter-em	maligtekaa.
B03_22_Luke_V55	Courtyard-em	qukaani,	kumaaqiyameng	qerngaghmeng	aqumuutkat.	Peter-llu	akulngitgun	aqumegkaq.
B03_22_Luke_V56	Taagken	aghnaghaam	qepghaghtem	esghaghyamigu	aqumgalghii	kenghegni,	esghapagtughluku	pikaq,	“Unallu	yuuk	ellnganitkayuguuq!”
B03_22_Luke_V57	Iwernga	Peter	mesighaqaq,	“Aghnami	whani,	nallukaqa	kingangutanga!”
B03_22_Luke_V58	Mulugpenani	yugem	esghaghluku	pikaa,	“Elpeklu	naliqaaten	maligsaaghtengan!”	Iwernga	Peter-em	pikaa,	“Yugmi	whani,	maligsaaghtekenghitaanga!”
B03_22_Luke_V59	Taagken	entaqun	ataasiq	aflu	naghughtaquqlu	ilangan	yugem	sagiqutkaa,	“Ipapestaaq	una	yuuk	ellnganitkaaguq,	qayughllak	Gallilee-ghmiinguuq!”
B03_22_Luke_V60	Iwernga	Peter-em	pikaa,	“Yugmi	whani,	sameng	piiquten	nallukaqa!”	Tawaninginaq	tawaten	akuzimaluku,	rooster-a	qalghiqaq.
B03_22_Luke_V61	Atanghem	qiivluku	esghaqaa	Peter	iyegkenkun.	Taagken	Peter-em	neqanguqii	Atanghem	akuzitangi,	pikaqegkanga,	“Unukun	rooster-a	qalghightestegpenaan	pingayuneng	nallunqelleqaghpenga.”
B03_22_Luke_V62	Enkaam	Peter	aanluni	qiyaaghwaghllakaq.
B03_22_Luke_V63	Yuget	kelengakilghiit	Jesus-meng	legasiighwaatkegkaatlu	qevuutiiqaatlu.
B03_22_Luke_V64	Qiipaghaghmeng	iiskek	saaplukek	tengluwaataatkaat.	Taagken	pikaat,	“Uuknaliqistenguuten.	Ungipaatikut	kitum	tenglugtaten?”
B03_22_Luke_V65	Seghlequughtaakaatlu.
B03_22_Luke_V66	Aghsagu,	Jews-et	siivanlleghit,	chief	priest-et,	apeghtughikayugetlu	Liilightuusaneng	qerngughulluteng,	Jesus	tagitestekaat.
B03_22_Luke_V67	Pikaat,	“Christ-angukuvek	ungipaatikut.”	Iwernga	pikii,	“Ungipaaskumsi,	ugpeqnaanghitaghpesinga.
B03_22_Luke_V68	Aaptekumsillu	kiimsighnaanghitaghpesinga.
B03_22_Luke_V69	Iwernga	qantaghaqun	Ighnegha	Yugem	aqumellequq	aghenqigneghakun	Aghtughyaghqaanghiteghllagem	Kiyaghneghem.”
B03_22_Luke_V70	Qamaglluteng	aaptekaat.	“Awii,	Kiyaghneghem	Ighneqaten?”	Kiimsiqii,	“Elpesi	taananguniighpesinga.”
B03_22_Luke_V71	Taagken	pikat,	“Taawa	liisimakistesughniighutiinkut!	Ellnganeng	katam	nagaqughaghput	Kiyaghneghmun	Ighneqniluni	piiq.”
B03_23_Luke_V1	Taagken	qamaglluteng	taakut	agghistet	nekevuulluteng	Jesus	aglaatkaat	Pilate-m	sivunganun.
B03_23_Luke_V2	Pilate	pikaat,	“Liitaghput	uum	yugem	seghletun	igleghutaqeftii	yuput.	Tax-meng	llivikisnanighaqeftii	Caesar-mun,	ellminengllu	piiquq	Christ-anguniluni,	umiilek.”
B03_23_Luke_V3	Pilate-em	aaptekaa,	“Umiilkataan	Jews-et?”	Jesus-em	kiimsiqaa,	“Elpek	taananguniighpenga.”
B03_23_Luke_V4	Taagken	Pilate-em	pikii	chief	priest-etlu	yulghuteghllagetlu,	“Una	yuuk	anaggutellghituq.”
B03_23_Luke_V5	Iwernga	wata	sagiqutkaat,	“Tamaghhaani	Judea-mi	apeghtughilleghmikun	seghleliighutesteghllagaqii	yuget.	Piinlighluni	Galilee-mi,	whaa	maavek	kaatuq.”
B03_23_Luke_V6	Pilate-em	nagalluki	aaptekii,	“Una	yuuk	Galilee-ghmiingwaa?”
B03_23_Luke_V7	Liisamigu	Jesus,	Herod-em	igleghutkaaneng	pingutanga,	aglaatestekaa	Herod-mun.	Ellngallu	Jerusalem-ememelnguq	tamaani	pilleghni.
B03_23_Luke_V8	Herod-em	esghaghyamigu	Jesus,	quyaghllakaq.	Esghaghyupigtaqegkanga	qayughllak	nagaqughaqegkanga,	sighimakegkaallu	allaaghlluwhaghtisqelluku.
B03_23_Luke_V9	Enkaam	aapqughaaghtaakaa,	iwernga	Jesus-em	kiimsiimangilkanga.
B03_23_Luke_V10	Chief	priest-etlu,	apeghtughikayugetlu	Liilightuusaneng	esnevaghluteng	ugumiyupiglluteng	Jesus	anagguteghllagumaniluku	pikaat.
B03_23_Luke_V11	Herod-enkut	pilluwaghtekullghiit	asistaaqaat	legasiighwaatkumaan.	Taagken	aateslukek	akitupiglleghhiik	atkuyaaghek,	uutghutestekaat	Pilate-mun.
B03_23_Luke_V12	Tawani	aghneghmi	Herod-enkuk	Pilate-enkuk	ilaliighutkak;	sivunghani	anguyakusalghiik.
B03_23_Luke_V13	Taagken	Pilate-em	qerngughtestekii	chief	priest-et,	igleghutistet,	yugetlu.
B03_23_Luke_V14	Pikii,	“Whangamnun	tagitaghsi	una	yuuk	qayughllak	seghletun	ighleghutingunikesi	yugnun.	Sivugpesini	aapqughaaghyaqegka	anaggunnilleghpesineng,	taawa	liigikaqa	anaggutellghiteftuq.
B03_23_Luke_V15	Talwa	Herod-em	anaggunnillghitaa	enkaam	uutghutestaa	whangkunnun.	Taawa	una	yuuk	avangituq	tuqusaghqaaluni.
B03_23_Luke_V16	Enkaangam	aghyuughmigtaasluku	itemutesleqaqa.”
B03_23_Luke_V17	Ayumiqulleq	tamaghhaan	Passover-mi,	piiqelleghmegestun	Pilate-em	itemutesaghqaqegkanga	ataasiq	anusimingllaghaq	yugnun.
B03_23_Luke_V18	Iwernga	qamaglluteng	yulghuteghllaget	akilghuutkat,	“Tuqutestigu!	Barabbas	itemutestigu	whangkunnun!”
B03_23_Luke_V19	(Barabbas	anusimingllaqaqegkangat	qayughllak	ilatngakaalghii	seghleliighqiighllak	piiqngan	Jerusalem-emi,	yugtalleghmunllu.)
B03_23_Luke_V20	Allameng	Pilate-em	pikii	itemutesugniluku	Jesus.
B03_23_Luke_V21	Iwernga	yuget	akilghuukat,	“Qaquuraghtestigu,	qaquuraghtestigu!”
B03_23_Luke_V22	Pingayiitkun	Pilate-em	pikii,	“Sangan,	sameng	anaggutkaawa?	Aapqughaaghluku	liigiksaqegka	anaggutellghiteftuq	tuqusaghqaaluni.	Enkaangam	aghyuughmigtaasluku	itemutesnaqaqa.”
B03_23_Luke_V23	Iwernga	araghaatallghat	iglagtughtengnginaqaq	Jesus	qaquuriisqelluku.	Qenwat	araghaatallghat	aaghtikaq.
B03_23_Luke_V24	Enkaam	Pilate-em	itagnaqegkaa	yuget	piyukellghat.
B03_23_Luke_V25	Taagken	Pilate-m	aanestekaa	Barabbas	yuget	piyukellghistun.	(Anusimingllaqaqegkangat	seghleliighqiilleghmunllu	yugtalleghmunllu.)	Enkaam	Jesus	pegtekaa	yugnun	piyukellghistun	pisqelluku.
B03_23_Luke_V26	Taagken	Rome-em	pilluwaghtengita	Jesus	aanutkaat.	Igleghsimaluteng	nallaqaat	yuuk,	aatgha	Simon,	Cyrene-eghmii,	tagingulghii	Jerusalem-emun	taagegken	nunameng.	Pilluwaghtet	akuqaghluku,	Jesus-em	qaquuraa	iisqaghmigtesluku	maligtestekaat	kingunganeng.
B03_23_Luke_V27	Yulghuteghllaget	maligtekaat	Jesus,	ilangita	aghnat	uupteghllagumaghmeng	qiyakegkaat.
B03_23_Luke_V28	Iwernga	Jesus-em	qiivluki	pikii,	“Aghniitni	Jerusalem-em!	Qiyakegpenanga,	iwernga	qiyakitek	elpesineng,	avaqutaghpesinunllu.
B03_23_Luke_V29	Qayughllak	aghneghet	uka	taginguut	yuget	pillequt,	‘Quyastekaagut	aghnat	qumingigalnguut,	taghnughhangigalnguut,	mamaghtingigalnguut!’
B03_23_Luke_V30	Taagken	naayghat	pilleqiit,	‘Ulleghvikikut!’	qemitlu	pilleqiit,	‘Saapikut!’
B03_23_Luke_V31	Yuget	tawaten	pikumeng	uqfik	sungaghyuguluku,	sangwaa	salleqa	kiinqan?”
B03_23_Luke_V32	Tamaanteftuk	maalghuk	yugek	liilightuusameng	naafqiikak.	Ilangita	pilluwaghtet	aanutkagket	tuqunnalukek	maligullukek	Jesus-mun.
B03_23_Luke_V33	Kaasameng	tawavek	atilqelghiimun,	“Yugem	Naasqwa,”	tawani	qaquuraqaat.	Taakuklu	yugek	liilightuusameng	naafqiikak	qaquuraqagket,	ataasiq	aghenqigneghakun,	ilanga	saghumigneghakun.
B03_23_Luke_V34	Jesus	pikaq,	“Ataay,	seghevutiki,	qayughllak	naallukut	saaqutseng.”	Pilluwaghtet	ateghtiiraaghutkelluki	aatkii	nengiitkiit.
B03_23_Luke_V35	Nekevgaghmeng	yuget	esghapakat.	Tawani	igleghutistet	legasiighwaatkegkaat	Jesus	whaten,	“Yuguliiqii	ilangi;	yeqay	ellmineng	yugulili	Christ-angukumi,	Kiyaghneghem	Nakmikegkaa!”
B03_23_Luke_V36	Pilluwaghtetlu	legasiighwaatkegkaat.	Tagitkaat	quwaalghiimeng	wine-meng,
B03_23_Luke_V37	pikaat,	“Umiilkengngukangaten	Jews-et,	elpeneng	katam	yuguli!”
B03_23_Luke_V38	Naasqwan	quulngakun	nekegtekaat	whaten	igaqngalghii,	“Una	Umiilkaat	Jews-et.”
B03_23_Luke_V39	Liilightuusameng	naafqiistem	aallghan	qaquuralgutangan	legasiighwaatkegkaa,	pikaa,	“Christ-anguziin?	Elpeneng	yuguli,	whangkutungllu!”
B03_23_Luke_V40	Iwernga	ilangan	aghyuughmikaa,	“Alikenghisiguu	Kiyaghneq?	Qerngaamta	pingayuni	taagken	ataasimeng	aghyuullengukut.
B03_23_Luke_V41	Naqamenraq	whangkutung	elqughullutung	aghyuullengukung,	iwernga	una	yuuk	sameng	anaggusimangituq.”
B03_23_Luke_V42	Taagken	Jesus	pikaa,	“Jesus,	neqamiknakevnga	Umiilguluten	tagikuvek!”
B03_23_Luke_V43	Jesus-em	pikaa,	“Ipa	ungipaatamken,	aghneghmi	whani	whangamnillequten	Paradise-mi.”
B03_23_Luke_V44	Aghneghem	qukaghaqaallu	siqineq	kuukgunaniqaq	enkaam	nuna	qamaglluni	mamleghqwaaghllakaq	kenlanga	three-kellaagmun.	Safkaaghunllu	Temple-melnguq	piikaq	malghughqelluni.
B03_23_Luke_V46	Taagken	Jesus	iglagtupiglluni	pikaq,	“Ataay,	taghneghagka	aflengakelleghqaghpenun	pegtagka!”	Tawaten	piluni	tuqukaq.
B03_23_Luke_V47	Pilluwaghtet	umiilwaaghita	esghapagluku	tawaten	pilleq,	Kiyaghneq	usuqegkaa,	“Ipapestaaq	una	yuuk	pinilghiinguuq!”
B03_23_Luke_V48	Yulghuteghllaget	qerngughutkat	esghapagnaluteng,	esghapagluki	tawaten	pillghet	nemeggnun	aglaghtuutkat	sakimateng	tenglugmigumiita.
B03_23_Luke_V49	Qamaglluteng	liisimakistengita	Jesus-em,	aghnatlu	ellnganun	maligutkat	Galilee-meng,	uyavaqaanlluteng	nekevghaghmeng	esghapakiit	tawaten	pillghet.
B03_23_Luke_V50	Tamaanteftuq	yuuk	aatgha	Joseph,	Arimathea-meng	pinguftuq	Judea-melngughmeng.	Yuuk	pinilghii,	malighqutaqngalghii	Liilightuusanun,	utaqiingulghiillu	Ataneghpagullghanun	Kiyaghneghem.	Qaywa	ilatngaghngaaghmi	Agghistenun,	itagnaqumangilkangi	agghillghit,	apeghiiqiitlu	Jesus-mun.
B03_23_Luke_V52	Taam	yugem	Pilate-mun	tungsighyaghtuqaa	Jesus-em	yugusii.
B03_23_Luke_V53	Taagken	yugusii	qaquurameng	iikluku	ukigtekaa.	Iimgulluku	qiipaghaghqun	linen-kun,	lliifqaa	laawaaqakun	uyghaghrughllagkun.	Taana	lliveq	atuqumangilnguq.
B03_23_Luke_V54	Aghnat	Jesus-mun	maligutkat	Galilee-meng,	lliveghmun	maligtekaat	Joseph.	Tawani	esghapakaat	naten	yugusii	llikaatanga.	Taagken	uteghnighluteng	yataaghqegkiit	neqnighsaasitlu	tepengllaasitlu	angighhunnaluki	Jesus-em	yugusiinun.	Aghneqegkanga	yataaghqutilleghqam	Sabbath-mun,	whaa	Sabbath	piinlighnaqelghii.	Enkaam	aghnat	meghnaalikat	Liilightuusat	qelellghistun.
B03_24_Luke_V1	Sivulighmi	aghneghani	santillghem,	unaangupiglluku,	taakut	aghnat	lliveghtekat	kelqelluki	yataaghqegkateng	neqnighsaasit.
B03_24_Luke_V2	Lliveghmun	kaasalghiimeng	uyghagllak	paaynganeng	ullghitaghngaftuq.
B03_24_Luke_V3	Iteghaasalghiimeng	aviiteftuq	yugusii	Atanghem	Jesus-em.
B03_24_Luke_V4	Kukriqutkumaluku	samatanga,	yugek	aliighaghtekak	saaghwitgun,	aatkiik	nighugllagek.
B03_24_Luke_V5	Aghnat	alingruughutkat	repall	gginateng	seketestekiit	nunamun,	yugek	aaptekiit,	“Sangan	ivaghitsi	unguvalghiimeng	akulngitni	tuqukat?
B03_24_Luke_V6	Whaanneghituq;	unguvaghsimaaq	tuqulleghmeng.	Amenqun	salin	Galilee-melluni	ungipaatkaqegkangisi,
B03_24_Luke_V7	‘Ighnegha	Yugem	tuunepestaaghyaghqaqaat	seghleghqestenun	qaquuriisqelluku,	taagken	pingayaani	aghneghem	unguvaghllequq	tuqulleghmeng.’”
B03_24_Luke_V8	Taagken	aghnat	neqanguqiit	Jesus-em	akuzitangi.
B03_24_Luke_V9	Lliveghmeng	uteghnighluteng	tamaana	qamaglluku	aapqaat	qula	ataasiq	siipneqluku	apostle-enun,	ilangitnunllu	maligsaaghtengitnun.
B03_24_Luke_V10	Taakut	lliveghtekat	Mary	Magdala-ghmiinkut,	Joanna-nkut,	Mary-llu	naanga	James-em,	ilangillu	aghnat.	Ungipaatkiit	apostle-et	tamaaken	pilleghneng,
B03_24_Luke_V11	iwernga	apostle-et	sumeghmeggni	temngi	piniluki	pikiit	enkaam	ugpequmangilkangit.
B03_24_Luke_V12	Naqamenraq	Peter	nekevluni	lliveghmun	ketanqukaq.	Kaasami	lliveghmun	qineghtekaq,	esghaqii	qiipagharaaghinaat	linen-et	lliluteng.	Taagken	aglaqaq	sumeghtaghaatkumaan	Jesus	samatanga.
B03_24_Luke_V13	Tawani	ataasimi	aghneghmi,	maalghuk	maligsaaghtekek	aghulaqegkak	nengiighhaghmun	aatgha	Emmaus,	Jerusalem-emeng	entaqun	maaghraghvinlek	miles-ngulghii.
B03_24_Luke_V14	Akuzitkegkaak	qamaglluku	tamaana	tawaten	pilleq.
B03_24_Luke_V15	Akuzitkumaluku	tamaana	pilleq,	Jesus-em	kaallukek	igleghalghusiqakek.
B03_24_Luke_V16	Iwernga	nallukegkaak	kinangutanga	qayughllak	Kiyaghneghem	liisuqesneghilkanga.
B03_24_Luke_V17	Jesus-em	aaptekakek,	“Igleghutkelluku	sangwaa	akuzitkaqestegnegu?”	Aghuliiqak,	esghaqaalutek	qivghungaghllagek.
B03_24_Luke_V18	Taagken	aallghan,	Cleopas-meng	atelgem	aaptekaa,	“Ellnginaaziin	laalightaq	Jerusalem-emun	nallukilghii	tamaaken	apeghiiqaneng	akugwaaq?”
B03_24_Luke_V19	Aaptekakek,	“Sangwaa	saa?”	Kiimsiqaak.	“Jesus	Nazareth-eghmii	akuzimghhutkaqaghpung.	Uuknaliqistenguyaghtuq,	qepghallghillu	apeghtughillghillu	aghtughyaghqaanghisaghtut	Kiyaghneghmillu	yugnillu.
B03_24_Luke_V20	Chief	priest-emtallu	igleghutistemtallu	tuunegkaqaat	Rome-em	governor-nganun	tuqutesqelluku,	enkaam	qaquuraghtestekaqaa.
B03_24_Luke_V21	Sighimaknguyaghaghput	ellnganun	itemunnaqniluku	Israel.	Taam	saaghwakun,	una	aghneq	pingayiitkaa	taagken	tawaten	pilleghmeng.
B03_24_Luke_V22	Ilangita	aghnamta	saghiighayugsimiinkut.	Aghtaghaghaqaallu	lliveghlluteng
B03_24_Luke_V23	aviilngaamakangat	Jesus-em	yugusii.	Tagiluteng	aapghaat	yaqulgegneng	esghaghwaalleghteng,	yaqulgek	ungipaasimakangik	aghnat	unguvaamaniluku.
B03_24_Luke_V24	Taagken	ilaput	lliveghlluteng	aapghaat	tawatengngwaaq	aghnat	apellghistun,	iwernga	esghallghitaat	Jesus.”
B03_24_Luke_V25	Taagken	Jesus-em	pikakek,	“Nallughhaghmeng	yugegni!	Piyaqnaghhaghmeng	ugpeqinaqelleghtek	uuknaliqistet	akuzitkegkiitneng.
B03_24_Luke_V26	Pikaagut	Christ-a	ikfiqepestaaghluni	tuqulleqniluku	iteghvagilgami	nighughqelleghminun.”
B03_24_Luke_V27	Enkaam	Jesus-em	piinliisiqluki	igaquqiit	Moses-enkut,	qamagllutengllu	uuknaliqistet,	liigikestekakek	Akuzitneng	Igaqegkaneng	ellmineng	ayuqelghiineng.
B03_24_Luke_V28	Kaasaghtuqat	Emmaus-mun,	Jesus	nagneghsugnighqegkaq.
B03_24_Luke_V29	Iwernga	ighlekluku	pikaak,	“Whangkutegniten,	whanikunaqaa	mamleggnaqegkanga.”	Enkaam	elkegnitkaq.
B03_24_Luke_V30	Tipelegni	aqumelgusighlukek,	neqekrangllaq	tuguluku	iyamsiqayugvikluku	Kiyaghneq,	ikutaqlukek	tuunegkakek.
B03_24_Luke_V31	Taagken	Kiyaghneghem	liisuqestekaak	Jesus-ngutanga,	esghaamanghegkenengllu	aviitqaghtekaq.
B03_24_Luke_V32	Ellmetegneng	pikak,	“Qaamggunqun	quyaghllagtukung	aleghqughaqngamikung	tumemi,	liigikestaqngamikung	Akuzitneng	Igaqegkaneng!”
B03_24_Luke_V33	Tawaninginaq	yugek	nekevlutek	uteghniqak	Jerusalem-emun.	Tawani	qerngughutngaftut	qula	ataasiq	siipneqluku	maligsaaghtet,	tamaakutlu	ellngitnilnguut.
B03_24_Luke_V34	Kaasayek	taakut	ungipaatkagket	maligsaaghtek,	“Ataneq	unguvapestaaghumaaq	tuqulleghmeng!	Aliighvikumaallu	Simon!”
B03_24_Luke_V35	Taagken	yugek	aapqaak	tumemellutek	sangwaa	sakaatanga,	natenllu	liisuqelleghtek	Ataneq	neqekrangllaq	aavgughaqngagu.
B03_24_Luke_V36	Yugek	ungipamsukumaluku	tawaten	pilleq,	Jesus	ellnga	katam	nekevghaftuq	akulngitni,	pikii,	“Nekeggmelleq	elpesinilli!”
B03_24_Luke_V37	Upughluteng	alingruuqat,	sumeghmeggni	esghaanniluteng	taghneghameng	pikat.
B03_24_Luke_V38	Iwernga	Jesus-em	aaptekii,	“Sangafsi	alingruughetsi?	Sangan	aygughitiqetsi?
B03_24_Luke_V39	Esghaqaghtekiqun	iigenkallu	itegankallu,	whanganguunga.	Saaflunga	liisimakelleqaghpesinga,	qayughllak	taghneghak	kemekragituklu	neghqwaaghituklu,	esghaghaghpesinga	whanga	pilguunga.”
B03_24_Luke_V40	Tawaten	piluki	Jesus-em	kelguvikegkii	iigminengllu	itegaminengllu.
B03_24_Luke_V41	Iwernga	ugpeqngwaaghumangilkangat	qayughllak	quyaghllagulghiitlu	saghiighayugllagulghiitlu.	Enkaam	aaptekii,	“Whani	sameng	neghyaghqiitsii?”
B03_24_Luke_V42	Tuunegkaat	gaaqameng	iqallugmeng,
B03_24_Luke_V43	tuguluku	neghegkaa	esghaamanghitni.
B03_24_Luke_V44	Taagken	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Elpesinitngulunga	whaten	ungipaatkaqamsi:	Sangwaat	qamaglluteng	whangamneng	ayuqelghiit	igaqegkat	apeghiighyaghqaagut,	Moses-em	Liilightuusaanilnguut,	uuknaliqistet	igaqegkiitngilnguut,	psalms-enilnguutlu.”
B03_24_Luke_V45	Taagken	umyugiit	liigikestekii	Akuzitneng	Igaqegkaneng.
B03_24_Luke_V46	Pikii,	“Whaten	igaqegkaaguq:	‘Christ-a	ikfiqepestaaghyaghqaaguq,	taagken	pingayaani	aghneghem	unguvapestaaghyaghqaaguq	tuqulleghmeng.’
B03_24_Luke_V47	Whatenllu	igaqegkaalghii:	‘Maligsaaghtengi	ungipaqillequt	Aatghakun,	piinlighluteng	Jerusalem-emeng	taagken	tamaghhaanun	ramkenun.	Ungipaasaghqaqiit	avuteghqelluki	seghleghqennaniisqelluki	Kiyaghneghmun	seghevutesqelluki.’
B03_24_Luke_V48	Elpesi	liisimakistenguusi	ikfiqellemnun,	tuqullemnun,	unguvaghtestellemnun.
B03_24_Luke_V49	Enkaam	taawa	kayaglleqagka	Atama	akequsakek	elpesinun.	Iwernga	utaqiilghaasi	maani	Jerusalem-emi,	kenlanga	aatesfikelleghpesinun	aghtughyaghqaanghilleghmeng	qilagmeng	pamaken.”
B03_24_Luke_V50	Taagken	aghulaqutkii	uyavantulangatun	Bethany-m,	tawani	iiggeni	nengugulluki	quyastekii.
B03_24_Luke_V51	Quyasimaluki	unitkii,	Kiyaghneghem	qilagmun	mayuutestekaa.
B03_24_Luke_V52	Tawani	manigughluku	uteghniqat	Jerusalem-emun	quyallelighllagluteng,
B03_24_Luke_V53	enkaam	iiwleng	Temple-metaqelghiit	Kiyaghneq	usuqaqegkangat.
B04_01_John_V1	Piinlighyuwhaalleghmeng	Akuzin	tawantekaq,	Akuzin	Kiyaghneghmetkaq,	Akuzin	Kiyaghneghulghii.
B04_01_John_V2	Ellnga	Kiyaghneghmetkaq	piinlighyuggaalleghmeng	ima.
B04_01_John_V3	Kiyaghneghem	ellngakun	sangwaa	qamagtengngwaaghluku	ulimakaa,	talwa	sangwaa	ataasighhaq	ulimamangitaa	Akuzitngunani.
B04_01_John_V4	Akuzitmetuq	unguvalleq,	taana	unguvalleq	nighuguuq	yugnun.
B04_01_John_V5	Taana	nighuk	kuukgutnguuq	mamlegmi,	mamlegem	kayaalqumangitaa.
B04_01_John_V6	Taawanguq	yuuk	Kiyaghneghem	kayagtekaa,	aatgha	John.
B04_01_John_V7	John-em	apeghyaghtuqaa	nighuk	qamaglluki	yuget	ugpeghesqelluki	ungipaqilleghmikun.
B04_01_John_V8	Ellnga	nighugunghituq,	iwernga	apeghyaghtuuwaa	nighuk.
B04_01_John_V9	Taana	nighupiiguuq	tagikaq	nunamun,	nighugullghii	tamaghhaanun	yugnun.
B04_01_John_V10	Taana	Akuzin	nunametkaq.	Qaywa	nuna	ulimakaayaghngaan	ellngakun,	tawalliima	nunam	yugita	nallukegkaat.
B04_01_John_V11	Tagikaayalghii	ellmi	katam	yugminun,	iwernga	tugukliimangilkangat.
B04_01_John_V12	Iwernga	qamaglluki	tuguklighilghiitlu	ugpelghiitlu	ellmineng,	avaqutaliisaghqaaghtestekaqii	Kiyaghneghmun.
B04_01_John_V13	Avaqutaliisimangitii	yugkun	allgeghaqelghiistun,	talwa	yugem	piyukellghakun	nalighmeng	nakmikellghakun.	Kiyaghneghem	ellmineng	katam	avaqutaliitkaqii.
B04_01_John_V14	Akuzin	kemgughlluni	akulemnnitkaq.	Ellngakun	Kiyaghneq	liitestengngwaaqaaguq,	liitestengngwaaqaqaallu	piniqelleni	whangkunnun.	Esghaqaqaghput	taawa	seghleghllaguftuq.	Seghleghllaguftuq	qayughllak	taananginaghhaalghii	Ighnegha	Atam.
B04_01_John_V15	John-em	Paaptaayestem	aapqaqaa,	akilghuutkegkaqaa	whaten,	“Taananguuq	aapqaqa	elpesinun	whaten	piiqngama,	‘Kingumneng	tagiyaghqaq	aangeghllagtuq	whangamneng,	qayughllak	kiyaghtengngulghii	talwa	allgellghillunga.’”
B04_01_John_V16	Piniqingaghllagutmineng	quyastaqiinkut	uteghpagtiinaq.
B04_01_John_V17	Kiyaghneghem	tuunegkaqii	Liilightuusat	Moses-kun,	iwernga	piniqelleqlu	ipalleqlu	liitestekaqaak	Jesus	Christ-akun.
B04_01_John_V18	Kitum	alngunak	esghiigataa	Kiyaghneq.	Taananginaghhaam	Ighneghem	qantaghantelleghpigaam	Atamun,	liitestekaa	yugnun.
B04_01_John_V19	Jerusalem-emeng	Jews-et	igleghutistengit	kayagtikat	priest-enengllu	Levite-enengllu	aaptesqelluku	John	whaten,	“Kinanguzin?”
B04_01_John_V20	Aapsatni	kiimsighaghtekii	whateghlluwaaq,	“Whanga	Christ-angunghitunga.”
B04_01_John_V21	Enkaam	aaptekaat,	“Kinanguzinmi?	Elijah-nguziin?”	John-em	kiimsiqii,	“Nakaa.”	Aaplaataqaat,	“Uuknaliqistenguziin?”	Kiimsiqii,	“Nakaa.”
B04_01_John_V22	Pikaat,	“Ungipaatikut	kinanguten,	qayughllak	ungipaasaghtupestaaghnaqaput	kayagtikat	whangkunneng.	Aapghi	kinanguten.”
B04_01_John_V23	John-em	pikii,	“Uuknaliqista	Isaiah	pikaaguq,	‘Ma	akilghuugaquq	kilgaani	whaten,	Taklaghteggu	tuumkaghqaa	Atanghem’.	Taana	yuuk	akilghuulghii	whanganguuq.”
B04_01_John_V24	Pharisees-et	taakut	kayagtekaqegkangit	John-mun.
B04_01_John_V25	Aaptekaat,	“Christ-angunghilkuvek,	Elijah-ngunghilkuvek,	uuknaliqistengunghilkuvek,	sangavek	paaptaayeghiiqsin?”
B04_01_John_V26	John-em	kiimsiqii,	“Paaptaayeghiiqunga	meghqun.	Akulegpesinituq	kina	nallukegkaghsi.
B04_01_John_V27	Taananguuq	tagiyaghqaq	kingumneng,	seghleghllaguuq	repall	whanga	pininghitunga	itemsaghqaaluki	singii.”
B04_01_John_V28	Qamaglluteng	tamaakut	pikaagut	Bethany-mi	inglunganilngughmi	Kiiwegni	Jordan-egni.	Taakwani	John	paaptaayeghingulghii	yugneng.
B04_01_John_V29	Unaamingani	John-em	esghaghluku	Jesus	tagilghii	ellminun	yuget	pikii,	“Ii-i,	taanata	Penniighaghaa	Kiyaghneghem	iqitiyaghqaq	seghleghqellghaneng	nunam	yugan.
B04_01_John_V30	Taananguuq	aapqaqa	whaten,	‘Yuuk	taginaqnguuq	kingumneng,	iwernga	aangwaaghuuq	whangamneng,	qayughllak	kiyaghtengnguuq	talwa	allgellghillunga.’
B04_01_John_V31	Whangallu	nalluksaghaqa	kinangutanga,	iwernga	paaptaayeghiyaghtuugunga	meghqun	liitesqelluku	kinangutanga	Israel-eghmiinun.”
B04_01_John_V32	Taagken	John-em	ungipaqegkaqaa,	“Kiyaghneghem	kayagtekaqaanga	paaptaayeghisqellunga	meghqun.	Paninang	nalluknguluku	kinangutanga,	Kiyaghneghem	ungipaatkaqaanga,	‘Esghaghlleqagken	Taghneghak	ukilghiik	yugmun.	Taana	yuuk	paaptaayeghiyaghqaaguq	Agleghnalghiignekun	Taghneghagnekun.’	Enkaam	esghaghagka	qilagmeng	Taghneghak	ukilghiik	dove-ngulutek	Jesus-mun,	ellnganitkaklu”
B04_01_John_V34	Taagken	John-em	pikii,	“Tawatelluku	esghaqaqaqa,	ungipaatamsi,	taana	Ighneqaa	Kiyaghneghem.”
B04_01_John_V35	Unaamingani	John	tawanllaataqaq,	maalghuklu	maligsaaghtekek.
B04_01_John_V36	John-em	esghaghluku	Jesus	naghughlleghhii	pikaq,	“Esgha	taanata	Penniighaghaa	Kiyaghneghem!”
B04_01_John_V37	Taakuk	maligsaaghtek	nagalluku	John,	maligtekaak	Jesus.
B04_01_John_V38	Jesus-em	qiivluni	esghaghlukek	maligullghiik	ellminun	aaptekakek,	“Sangwaa	piiqestegnegu?”	Kiimsiqaak,	“Rabbi,	naantaqsin?”	(“Rabbi”	whaten	pisiiguq,	“Apeghtughista”.)
B04_01_John_V39	Pikakek,	“Maligllunga	esghaghyaghtughtegnegu.”	Enkaam	maligtekaak	kiyaghfiganun,	tawantekak	4-eklaagmeng	kenlanga	unulleghmun.
B04_01_John_V40	Yugem	aallgha	nagatkaq	John-meng	akuzilghiimeng,	maligtikaq	Jesus-meng	Andrew-nguftuq,	Simon	Peter-em	anglegutanga.
B04_01_John_V41	Tawaninginaq	Andrew	anglegutminun	Simon-mun	aglaghluni	pikaa,	“Naalkumaaghpung	Messiah.”	(“Messiah”	whaten	pisiiguq,	“Christ-a”.)
B04_01_John_V42	Taagken	Simon	aglaatkaa	Jesus-mun.	Jesus-em	esghaghluku	pikaa,	“Elpek	Simon-nguuten	ighnegha	John-em.	Aatghen	Cephas-ngullequq,	whaten	pisiq,	Peter.”
B04_01_John_V43	Unaamingani	Jesus	Galilee-nnaqumalghii.	Nallaghluku	yuuk	aatgha	Philip,	pikaa,	“Maligtinga.”
B04_01_John_V44	(Philip	Bethsaida-ghmiingulghii,	Andrew-nkugetun	Peter-enkugetun.)
B04_01_John_V45	Taagken	Philip-em	ivaghyaghtughluku	Nathanael	ungipaatkaa,	“Nallaamaaghput	yuuk	Moses-em	igaqegkaa	igiitgun	Liilightuusat,	uuknaliqistetlu	igaqegkaqaat	igamegteggun.	Jesus-nguuq	Nazareth-eghmii,	ighnegha	Joseph-em.”
B04_01_John_V46	Nathanael-em	aaptekaa,	“Sangwaangam	pinilghii	Nazareth-meng	allgeghlleqefta?”	Philip-em	kiimsiqaa,	“Esghaghyaghtuqaghhuqun.”
B04_01_John_V47	Jesus-em	esghaghyamigu	Nathanael	tagilghii	ellminun	pikaa,	“Taanata	Israel-eghmiipik,	temngitwhangilnguq.”
B04_01_John_V48	Nathanael-em	aaptekaa,	“Naten	liisimaksinga?”	Jesus-em	kiimsiqaa,	“Esghaqaqamken	asinganilluten	figs-em	uqfigan,	talwa	salin	Philip-em	apellghillunga	elpenun.”
B04_01_John_V49	Nathanael-em	pikaa,	“Apeghtughista,	elpek	Ighneqaaten	Kiyaghneghem!	Elpek	Umiilkaaten	Israel-em!”
B04_01_John_V50	Jesus-em	pikaa,	“Ugpeghsiin	qayughllak	ungipaaskemken	esghaamaniluten	asingani	figs-em	uqfigan?	Sangwaat	aangataghalghiit	tamaakuneng	esghaghlleqaten.”
B04_01_John_V51	Taagken	pikii	“Ipa	ungipaatamsi,	esghaghlleqaghsi	qilak	qelpelghii,	Kiyaghneghemllu	yaqulgi	mayulghiit,	ukilghiit	Ighneghakun	Yugem.”
B04_02_John_V1	Pingayiitangani	aghneghet	taawanguq	nengughhnaqelghiik	Cana-mi,	Galilee-melngughmi.	Jesus-em	naanga	tawanlenguq,
B04_02_John_V2	Jesus-enkutlu	maligsaaghtekullghiit	tagsiqliqaalghiit	nengughhnaqelghiignun.
B04_02_John_V3	Wine-a	qamagsatgu,	naangan	Jesus	pikaa,	“Wine-ngiitut.”
B04_02_John_V4	Jesus-em	pikaa,	“Aghnami	whani,	sasqegpenanga,	salin	pilleghqaqa	kaasigatuq.”
B04_02_John_V5	Taagken	Jesus-em	naangan	pikii	qepghaghtet,	“Sasqegkangisi	legan	pilghaasi.”
B04_02_John_V6	Taawanguq	aghvinleguftut	uyghagmeng	ulimaaghet	melghutat.	Ilangi	20-gallons-ngulghiit,	ilangi	30	gallons-ngulghiit.	(Jews-et	atuqaqegkangit	ukmangighsamun	Moses-em	Liilightuusaan	pisqellghatun.)
B04_02_John_V7	Jesus-em	pikii	qepghaghtet,	“Imighteki	taakut	melghutat	meghmeng.”	Imiqiit	eslemkaghaghtaghluki.
B04_02_John_V8	Taagken	pikii,	“Meghmeng	imiillusi	aglaateggu	neqenghaghqem	umiilga.”	Enkaam	imiilluteng	aglaatkaat.
B04_02_John_V9	Umiilgem	naasiiqaa	meq	wine-ngughtekaq.	Nallukegkanga	naken	taana	wine-a	pingutanga.	(Taakut	qepghaghtet	liisimakegkangat	qayughllak	imiilluteng	meghmeng	pikaalghiit.)	Enkaam	umiilgem	tuqlughluku	nulightughnaqelghii
B04_02_John_V10	pikaa,	“Tamaghhaghmi	kiyang	pinilghiimeng	wine-meng	atuqaquq	sivukluni	enkaam	aqelqat	kepsuunneghata	tamaana	aghsaan	ayuqelghii	wine-a	kinguliiluku	atughaqaat.	Iwernga	pinillgha	wine-em	atuqumangisimazigu	sivukluku.”
B04_02_John_V11	Cana-mi,	Galilee-melngughmi	Jesus-em	apeghiiqaa	allaaghlluwhaghtilleqsuwhaani.	Taaggun	allaaghlluwhaghtilleghmikun	yugnun	esghaghtestekaa	aangelleghllani.	Enkaam	maligsaaghtengita	ugpeqegkaat	ipa	Messiah-nguniluku.
B04_02_John_V12	Taam	kingunganeng	Jesus,	naanga,	anglegutangi,	maligsaaghtengillu	aglaqat	Capernaum-emun,	tamaantekat	qafsinat	aghneghet.
B04_02_John_V13	Jews-et	neqenghaghqesaghtungestalghiit	Passover-mun	enkaam	Jesus	aglaqaq	Jerusalem-emun.
B04_02_John_V14	Temple-mi	esghaqii	yuget	akikulghiit	ox-eneng,	penniighneng,	dove-eneng.	Esghaqiillu	manimeng	naveghqughtet	aqumluteng	tipelemeggni.
B04_02_John_V15	Jesus-em	kagsagutangllaghluni	tapghaghmeng,	Temple-meng	aanesquqii	maligulluki	penniighnunllu	ox-enunllu.	Manilghutiit	kataguutaqluki	mingilatkii,	ulleghquqiillu	tipelngit.
B04_02_John_V16	Taagken	yuget	akilpegalghiit	dove-eneng	qelqii	whaten,	“Aanuteki	whaken!	Atama	Mangteghaa	akilpegaghvigughtegpenaan.”
B04_02_John_V17	Maligsaaghtengita	neqaatkaat	Akuzitet	Igaqegkat	pillghat,	“Megnukingalqa	Mangteghaghpenun	naafqutkennaqngwaaqa.”
B04_02_John_V18	Taagken	Jews-et	igleghutestengita	aaptekaat	Jesus,	“Kitum	qeleghtaten	tawaten	pisqelluten?	Kiyaghneghem	pisqumakangaten,	allaaghlluwhaghti	ipapighqusighqameng.”
B04_02_John_V19	Jesus-em	kiimsiqii,	“Naafqiteggu	una	temple-a,	pingayuni	aghneghni	nekefleqaqa.”
B04_02_John_V20	Aaptekaat,	“Elpaak	nekefleqsiguu	pingayuni	aghneghni?	46-nguut	ayumiqullghet	nekeftusiqegkaat	uumun	Temple-mun.”
B04_02_John_V21	Iwernga	Jesus-em	akuzitkengngukanga	ellmi	yugusini	temple-nguluku.
B04_02_John_V22	Unguvaghtaqngan	tuqulleghmeng	maligsaaghtengita	neqaatkaat	whaten	pillgha,	“Una	temple-a,	pingayuni	aghneghni	nekefleqaqa.”	Enkaam	ugpeqegkiit	Akuzitet	Igaqegkat,	Jesus-emllu	akuzillghi.
B04_02_John_V23	Jesus	Jerusalem-emelluku	Passover-em	neqenghaghqellghani,	uglapiglleghhiit	esghapagluki	allaaghlluwhaghtillghi	ugpeqegkaqegkangat,
B04_02_John_V24	iwernga	Jesus-em	ugpequmangilkangi.
B04_02_John_V25	Kinkunun	alngunak	ungipaanneghisaghngaatni	ayuqelghii	yugneng	qayughllak	liisimakegkangi	natetulangi.
B04_03_John_V1	Taawanguq	yuuk	aatghha	Nicodemus,	Pharisee	Jews-et	igleghutistengat.
B04_03_John_V2	Unugyagu	Jesus-mun	aglaghluni	pikaa,	“Rabbi,	whangkuta	liisimakamken	apeghtughistenguuten	kayagtekaa	Kiyaghneghem.	Kina	alngunak	allaaghlluwhaghtinaanghituq	elpetun	tawaten	wetkuqun	Kiyaghneq	ellnganiskan.”
B04_03_John_V3	Jesus-em	pikaa,	“Ipa	ungipaatamken,	kitum	alngunak	esghaghnaanghitaa	Ataneghpagullgha	Kiyaghneghem	wetkuqun	allgenqigtekumi.”
B04_03_John_V4	Nicodemus-em	aaptekaa,	“Naten'ngam	anglikaq	yuuk	allgenqiglleqa?	Ipapestaaq	iteghnaanghituq	naami	qantagkenun	allgenqiggnaluni.”
B04_03_John_V5	Jesus-em	kiimsiqaa,	“Ipa	piimken,	kina	alngunak	iteghnaanghituq	Ataneghpagullghanun	Kiyaghneghem	wetkuqun	allgenqigtekumi	meghqunllu,	Taghneghagnekunllu.
B04_03_John_V6	Tamaana	kemegkun	allgeqaq	kemguuq,	iwernga	tamaana	taghneghagnekun	allgeqaq	taghneghaaquq.
B04_03_John_V7	Saghiighayugpenang	qayughllak	ungipaaskemken,	‘Elpesi	allgenqigsaghqapestaaghuusi.’
B04_03_John_V8	Anuqa	naken	alngunak	piiquq,	nagataqan	sulugtallgha,	iwernga	nallukngwaaghan	naken	piiqutangallu	naveklu	piiqutanga.	Tawateghpigaq	ayuquq	tamaghhaghmi	allgelghii	Taghneghagnekun.”
B04_03_John_V9	Nicodemus-em	aaptekaa,	“Naten'ngam	taana	piyaghqaawa?”
B04_03_John_V10	Jesus-em	kiimsiqaa,	“Elpek	apeghtughistelgaghlluten	Israel-eghmiinun,	paninang	nalluksiguu	taana?
B04_03_John_V11	Ipa	piimken,	akuzitkaqaghput	liisimakegkaghput,	aapghaqaghput	esghaqaghput,	paninang	nalighhiinaghpesi	ugpeqigataa	ungipaghput.
B04_03_John_V12	Aapghaqanka	elpesinun	nunam	pingi	iwernga	ugpeqigataghpesinga,	naten'ngam	ugpeqelleqesteki	aapqumki	qilagem	pingi?
B04_03_John_V13	Kina	alngunak	mayiigatuq	qilagmun	iwerngaqun	Ighnegha	Yugem	ukikaq	qilagmeng.”
B04_03_John_V14	Kilgaani	katam	Moses-em	napaghtellghatun	napaqakun	bronze-a	nemeghyaq,	tawateghpigaq	Ighnegha	Yugem	napaghsaghqaalghii.
B04_03_John_V15	Enkaam	kina	alngunak	ugpeqilghii	ellnganeng	kenlengilngughmeng	unguvallelgullequq.
B04_03_John_V16	Kiyaghneghem	piniqepigtutmineng	nunam	yuga	tuunegkaa	kezemaghhaq	Ighneni.	Ighnegha	kitum	alngunak	ugpeqegkumigu	tuqunaanghituq,	iwernga	allgeghlleqaa	kenlengilnguq	unguvalleq.
B04_03_John_V17	Kiyaghneghem	kayagsimangitaa	Ighneni	nunamun	aghyuughisqelluku	nunam	yuganeng,	kayagtekaqaa	yugulighistenguluku	yugnun.
B04_03_John_V18	Kina	alngunak	ugpeqilghii	Ighneghmeng	aghyuullengnaanghituq.	Kina	alngunak	ugpeqinghilnguq	nanqigtengngwaaqaaguq	aghyuughyaghqaaluni,	qayughllak	ugpeqenghilkanga	kezemaghhaq	Ighnegha	Kiyaghneghem.
B04_03_John_V19	Esgha	una	apallaa	Kiyaghneghem	aghyuughisighqaa	yugnun:	nighuk	tagikaayaghngaan	nunamun,	yuget	piniqataghaqaat	mamlek	nighugmeng	qayughllak	seghletun	piiqelghiit.
B04_03_John_V20	Kitum	alngunak	seghletun	pikayugem	ugumikaa	nighuk,	enkaam	taginaanghituq	nighugmun	seghletun	pilleni	esghaghnayukatki.
B04_03_John_V21	Iwernga	kina	alngunak	ipapighqelluni	pikayuk	tagiyaghqaaguq	nighugmun,	esghiisqelluku	qepghaqani	Kiyaghneghem	piyukellghakun	ayuqelghii.
B04_03_John_V22	Kingunganeng	taam	Jesus-enkut	maligsaaghtekullghiit	aglaqat	Judea-mun.	Maligsaaghteminun	maligulluni	tamaantutkelluku	paaptaayekii	yuget.
B04_03_John_V23	John-llu	paaptaayeghingulghii	Aenon-mi,	Salim-emeng	qantaghanlengughmi,	qayughllak	meghllagulghii	tamaana.	Yuget	tagilaghaatngulghiit	ellnganun	paaptaayesqelluteng.
B04_03_John_V24	(John	salin	anusimingllaghvigmun	kanaghtellghilnguq.)
B04_03_John_V25	Ilangita	John-em	maligsaaghtengita	aaghtiiraaqaat	ataasiq	Jew	ukmangighsalleghmeng	Moses-em	Liilightuusaanilngughmeng.
B04_03_John_V26	Enkaam	aglaghluteng	John-mun	ungipaatkaat,	“Apeghtughista,	neqamikenghisiguu	yuuk	elpenitkaq	inglungani	Jordan-em,	akuzitkegkan?	Whaa	maaten	paaptaayeghiiquq,	enkaam	qamaglluteng	yuget	aglaghtuutnguut	ellnganun.”
B04_03_John_V27	John-em	kiimsiqii,	“Kina	alngunak	allgeghunnaanghituq	sameng	wetkuqun	Kiyaghneghem	tuunegkumigu.
B04_03_John_V28	Elpesi	liisimakistekamsi	whaten	piiqngama,	‘Whanga	Christ-angunghitunga	iwernga	kayagtekaagunga	sivungani.’
B04_03_John_V29	Ugiighnaqelghii	ugikaghqaan	ellngan	pikaa.	Nulightughnaqelghiim	ilakumtaagha,	kayutanga	utaqiigaquq	nagasugnimaghmi	menganeng.	Ilakumtaaghan	nagaquneghminigu	menga	quyaghllagaquq.	Tawateghpigaq	whangallu	quyalqa	iighwightuq.
B04_03_John_V30	Ellnga	megnunaghataghaghnaqnguuq,	whanga	ukavaghnaqnguunga.”
B04_03_John_V31	Ellnga	taana	pamakaghtaq	aangeghllagtuq	tamaghhaghllaganeng.	Ellnga	taana	nunameng	pi,	nunam	pikaa	enkaam	akuzikayuguuq	nunam	pinganeng.	Ellnga	taana	qilagmeng	pi,	quliiguq	tamaghaghllaganeng.
B04_03_John_V32	Aapghaqaa	esghaqanillu	nagaquqanillu	iwernga	kitum	alngunak	ugpeqigatii	akuzitangi.
B04_03_John_V33	Kitum	alngunak	ugpeqegkumiki	akuzitangi,	tawaten	pilleghmikun	ipapighqaqaa	Kiyaghneq	ipangutanga.
B04_03_John_V34	Taam	Kiyaghneghem	kayagtekaan	atuqaqii	Kiyaghneghem	akuzitangi,	qayughllak	Kiyaghneghem	Taghneghagni	tuun'ngukek	ellnganun	iingunalkighllukek.
B04_03_John_V35	Atam	piniqepigtaa	Ighneq,	enkaam	aghtughyaghqaanghillelitkaqaa	samun	tamaghhaanun.
B04_03_John_V36	Kina	alngunak	ugpelghii	Ighneghqun,	kenlengilngughmeng	unguvallelguuq.	Kitum	alngunak	qaatkenghilkumigu	Ighneq	unguvallengeqeghhnaanghituq,	taawanginaq	Kiyaghneghem	aghyuullghanisaghqaaguq	quunpeng.
B04_04_John_V1	Pharisees-et	nagaquumakangat	palaghhaaghhniluki	yuget	tagilaghaallghiit	John-mun,	naqam	nulaniluki	tagilaghaallghiit	Jesus-mun	maligsaaghtengunalutengllu,	paaptaayesqellutengllu.
B04_04_John_V2	(Iwernga	Jesus-em	ellngan	katam	paaptaayelanghilkangi,	malighsaaghtengita	paaptaayelaqangit.)
B04_04_John_V3	Atanghem	liigiksamiki	Pharisees-enun	taana	nagaquumaniluku,	aghulaqluni	Judea-meng	Galilee-nneqigtekaq.
B04_04_John_V4	Tuumkaghqaanilnguq	Samaria.
B04_04_John_V5	Kaatkaq	Sychar-mun,	Samaria-melngughmun	uyavantepagllagunghilnguq	piitesiighaghvigmeng	Jacob-em	tuunegkaaneng	ighneghminun	Joseph-mun.
B04_04_John_V6	Jacob-emllu	meghtaghviga	tawanlenguq.	Jesus	igleghteghllagem	meghnulghii	enkaam	aqumegkaq	saaghwakun	meghtaghvigem,	aghneghem	qukaani.
B04_04_John_V7	Maligsaaghtengi	Sychar-mun	neqengyaghtuqaalghiit.	Taagken	Samaria-ghmii	aghnaq,	Sychar-meng	meghtaqaq.	Jesus-em	pikaa,	“Meghsiightinga.”
B04_04_John_V9	Aghnam	pikaa,	“Jew-nguuten,	whanga	Samaria-ghmiinguunga,	sangavek	whangamnun	meghsisqesin?”	(Tawaten	pikaqegkanga	qayughllak	Jews-et	talwa	aleghqughyaghqaqenghilkangit	Samaria-ghmiit.)
B04_04_John_V10	Jesus-em	kiimsiqaa,	“Huuk,	liisimaksaquvgu	Kiyaghneghem	tuunyaghqaa,	liisimaksaquvgullu	kinangutanga	meghsingllalghii	elpenun,	meghsingllaghviknayaghan	unguvallengestikayugmeng	meghmeng.”
B04_04_John_V11	Aghnam	pikaa,	“Yuguniiq,	meghtaghvik	uusqapigtuq,	talwa	qaltiituten.	Naken'ngam	unguvallengestikayugmeng	mengelleqsin?
B04_04_John_V12	Sivunemta	Jacob-em	tuunegkaqaa	una	meghtaghvik	whangkunnun.	Ellngallu,	ighneghillu,	teghikusiillu	qamaglluteng	meghegkaagut	taagken.	Aangwaaghuniluten	Jacob-meng	pinguziin?”
B04_04_John_V13	Jesus-em	kiimsiqaa,	“Kina	alngunak	meghelghii	whaken	meghmeng	alla	meqsugyaghqaaguq.
B04_04_John_V14	Meq	whanga	tuunyaghqaqa	kitum	alngunak	meghegkumigu	allamengllu	meqsugnaanghituq.	Meq	tuunyaghqaqa	ellnganun	tawaten	lliighyaghqaaguq	sengngulghiistun,	tevughalghii	ellngan	ilunganeng.	Taana	meq	kenlengilngughmeng	unguvallengusighqaqaa.”
B04_04_John_V15	Aghnam	pikaa,	“Yuguniiq,	taagken	meghmeng	meghsinga	enkaam	alla	meqsunghillanga,	talwa	whavek	meghtaghnanighlanga.”
B04_04_John_V16	Jesus-em	pikaa,	“Ugin	aqfagu	enkaam	tagilghaaten.”
B04_04_John_V17	Aghnam	pikaa,	“Ugingitunga.”	Jesus-em	pikaa,	“Ipa	uginginniiten.
B04_04_John_V18	Ugikegkaqaten	tallimat	yuget.	Maaten	taana	yuuk	kiyaghfigen	ugikenghitan.	Ungipaataghpenga	ipapigmeng.”
B04_04_John_V19	Aghnam	pikaa,	“Yuguniiq,	taawa	liigikamken	uuknaliqistenguftuten.
B04_04_John_V20	Sivuneghma	maniguqaqaat	Kiyaghneq	whani	naayghami,	iwernga	elpesi	Jews-eni	Jerusalem-nguniiqaghsi	maniiguutfigkaq	Kiyaghneghmun.”
B04_04_John_V21	Jesus-em	pikaa,	“Aghnami	whani,	ugpeqinga,	taakwaningani	yuget	manigughnanighlleqaat	Ata	whani	naayghami	talwa	Jerusalem-emi.
B04_04_John_V22	Elpesi	Samaria-ghmiini	talwa	nallukaghsi	kinangutanga	maniguqaghsi.	Whangkuta	Jews-eni	liisimakaghput	kinangutanga	maniguqaghput,	qayughllak	Jews-etgun	Kiyaghneghem	akequsaqegkaqaa	yugulilleq.
B04_04_John_V23	Iwernga	pilleghqaq	uka	taginguuq,	aaqun	kaalluni	ayuquq	maniguutepikayuget	manigughlleqaat	Ata	Taghneghagnekunllu	ipalleghqunllu.	Tawatelnguut	maniguutkayuget	Atam	maniguutesugaqii	ellminun.
B04_04_John_V24	Kiyaghneq	Taghneghaaguq,	tamaakut	maniguullghiit	ellnganun	manigughyaghqaqaat	Taghneghagnekunllu	ipalleghqunllu.”
B04_04_John_V25	Aghnam	pikaa,	“Liisimakaqa	Messiah	tagillequq,	atilqelghii	Christ-ameng.	Tagikumi	ungipaalleqiinkut	sameng	tamaghhaaneng.”
B04_04_John_V26	Jesus-em	pikaa,	“Whanga	taananguunga	aleghquqen.”
B04_04_John_V27	Whaallu	Jesus-em	maligsaaghtengi	uteghniqat.	Esghaghlukek	Jesus-enkuk	aghnaankuk	aleghquullghiik	elngaatall	saghiighayagutkagket.	Iwernga	nalighhiiniita	pimangilkangat	aghnaq,	“Sameng	pizin?”	Nalighmeng	Jesus	aapsimangilkangat,	“Sangan	aghnaq	aleghqughsigu?”
B04_04_John_V28	Taagken	aghnam	melghutagni	unillukek,	Sychar-mun	aglaghluni	yuget	pikii,
B04_04_John_V29	“Esghaghyaghtuqaghtegguqun	meghtaghvigmelnguq	yuuk.	Sallemneng	tamaghhaaneng	ungipaataanga.	Qaa	Christ-anguuq?”
B04_04_John_V30	Enkaam	yuget	taagken	nemeng	esghaghyaghtuutkaat	Jesus.
B04_04_John_V31	Salin	kaatellghilluki	maligsaaghtengita	Jesus	piighaataqaat,	“Apeghtughista,	sangiighhaghmeng	neqaa.”
B04_04_John_V32	Iwernga	pikii,	“Whanga	neqelguunga	neghyaghqameng	elpesi	nallukngwaaqaghpesineng.”
B04_04_John_V33	Maligsaaghtet	ellmeggneng	aapqughaaghutkat,	“Qaa	kitum	neqmeng	tagisimaa?”
B04_04_John_V34	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Neqeka	qaatkutellghuuq	kayagtikameng	whangamneng,	apeghiighesqellukullu	qepghaqaq	tagivaqani	whangamnun.
B04_04_John_V35	Nagataqasi	yuget	pilghiit,	‘Taagken	piitesighalleghmeng	estamat	tanqit	atughluki,	unatalleghqaq	kaataquq.’	Ungipaataghllamsi,	yuvghiighwaaqaghtekiqun	piitesiighaghviget,	tamaakut	piitkat	unataghyaghqaaghtut.
B04_04_John_V36	Yuuk	unatalghii	wheat-meng	akileghtuusangyaghqaaguq	qepghaqaminun,	enkaam	quyayaghqaaguq	maligulluni	piitesiighaqamun.	Tawateghpigaq	yugem	ungipalleghmikun	kenlengilngughmeng	unguvallengestekumiki	akileghtuusangyaghqaaguq.	Taanallu	quyayaghqaaguq	maligulluni	ungipaqiyuwhaaqanun	whangamneng.
B04_04_John_V37	Taana	akuzilleq	ipanguuq,	‘Ataasiq	yuuk	piitesiighaghaquq,	ilanga	yuuk	unataghaquq.’
B04_04_John_V38	Kayagtekaqamsi	unatiisqellusi	piitesighaghvigmi	piitesighaamangilkegpesineng.	Ilangit	piitesiighaqaagut,	iwernga	elpesi	unataqayuguusi	piitestekiitneng,	enkaam	elpesillu	akileghtuusangellequsi	qepghaqiitneng.”
B04_04_John_V39	Sychar-mi,	Samaria-ghmiilghutet	ugpeqegkaat	Jesus	qayughllak	aghnam	ungipaatkaqegkangi,	“Taam	yugem	ungipaataanga	sallemneng	tamaghhaaneng.”
B04_04_John_V40	Samaria-ghmiit	kaalluku	Jesus	ellmeggnitesqegkaat.	Jesus	tamaantekaq	maalghuk	aghneghek,
B04_04_John_V41	enkaam	wata	ugpeghtuutkat	akuzitangi	nagalluki.
B04_04_John_V42	Taana	aghnaq	pikaat,	“Nagasuwhaaghaqngamken	ugpeqegkaqaput	akuziteten.	Iwernga	maaten	whangkunneng	katam	nagalluku	liitaghput	taana	yuuk	ipa	yugulighistekeftaa	nunam	yugan.”
B04_04_John_V43	Maalghuk	aghneghek	atughlukek,	Jesus	Sychar-meng	aghulaqegkaq	Galilee-mun.
B04_04_John_V44	(Jesus	ellmineng	katam	pikaalghii,	“Uuknaliqista	nunalgutangan	tugukliigataat	uuknaliqistenguluku.”)
B04_04_John_V45	Kaasan	Galilee-mun,	yuget	tugukliqaat	qayughllak	esghapakaqegkangat	sallgha	qamaglluku	Jerusalem-emi,	Passover-mun	neqenghaghqengnguluteng.
B04_04_John_V46	Enkaam	Jesus	aglanqigtekaq	Cana-mun,	Galilee-melngughmun,	meq	wine-ngughtestefigminun.	Taawanguq	kavemem	umiilwaagha,	Capernaum-emi	ighnegha	qinuyugllak.
B04_04_John_V47	Nagaqughyamigu	Jesus	tagimaniluku	Judea-meng,	Galilee-mun	takuluku	maniiguutkaq	naallghusaghtuqiisqelluku	ighneni	tuquyaghtungestalghii.
B04_04_John_V48	Jesus-em	pikaa,	“Ugpeqinaanghitusi	wetkuqun	esghapakufsiki	aangelghiit	allaaghlluwhaghtillghet.”
B04_04_John_V49	Umiilwaaghem	pikaa,	“Yuguniiq,	maligtinga	taghnughhaqa	tuquvagilgan.”
B04_04_John_V50	Jesus-em	pikaa,	“Aglaa,	ighneghen	unguvallequq.”	Yugem	ugpeqegkii	Jesus-em	akuzitangi	enkaam	aglaqaq.
B04_04_John_V51	Tumangani	taakwani	qepghaghtengita	nallaghluku	ungipaatkaat,	“Ighneghen	piniighsimaaq.”
B04_04_John_V52	Aaptekii	naniklaagmi	piniighsimatanga.	Pikaat,	“Ighivgaq	one-eklaagmi	puqleghangiitkaaguq.”
B04_04_John_V53	Atangan	liisimakegkanga	tawani	aflumi	Jesus-em	pikaqegkanga,	“Ighneghen	unguvallequq.”	Enkaangam	nengllugutkullghiit	ugpeghtuutkat.
B04_04_John_V54	Taana	tuungliqegkanga	Jesus-em	allaaghlluwhaghtillghan	tagiluni	Judea-meng	Galilee-mun.
B04_05_John_V1	Taam	kingunganeng	Jesus,	Jerusalem-etkaq	Jews-et	neqenghaghqellghitnun.
B04_05_John_V2	Taawanguq	Jerusalem-emi,	Sheep	Gate-em	tungangani	naayvaghaaq	tallimaneng	porch-elek,	Hebrew-stun	atillgha	Bethzatha.
B04_05_John_V3	Uglapiglleghhii	qinuyuk	ingaghmetullghii	porch-eni,	ayaakat,	piyugigalnguut,	uniiqat.	(Pagughrugughhneghsighaqegkangat	meq	ateghyuwhaaghnaluteng.
B04_05_John_V4	Ilangani	aghneghem,	yaqulga	Atanghem	ateneghmini	naayvaghaaghmun	pagughrugughtestaqegkanga	meq.	Enkaam	kina	ateghyuwhaalghii	meghmun	naallghutaqelghii	sameng	alngunak	aqnighneghmineng.)
B04_05_John_V5	Taawanguq	yuuk	qinuyugngalghii	38	ayumiqulleghni.
B04_05_John_V6	Jesus-em	esghaqaa.	Liisimakegkaa	qavngarugllak	ima	qinuyukaq	enkaam	aaptekaa,	“Naallghusugsiin?”
B04_05_John_V7	Qinuyulghiim	kiimsiqaa,	“Yuguniiq,	meq	pagughrugughhneghani	kayutkaghqiitaqunga.	Ateghnaqutkaqsaghtunga	ima	kitum	ingyaghaghtaqaanga.”
B04_05_John_V8	Jesus-em	pikaa,	“Nekevi,	allighan	tuguluku	piyugi.”
B04_05_John_V9	Tawaninginaq	yuuk	naallghulluni,	allighani	tuguluku	piyukaq.	Sabbath-ngulghii	tawani	aghneghmi.
B04_05_John_V10	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	Jews-et	igleghutistengita	pikaat	naallghutkaq	yuuk,	“Aghneghmi	Sabbath-nguuq,	Liilightuusamnni	allighan	igleghusaghqaqenghisaghan	Sabbath-mi.”
B04_05_John_V11	Pikii,	“Yugem	naallghutistema	piinga,	‘Allighan	tuguluku	piyugi.’”
B04_05_John_V12	Aaptekaat,	“Kitum	naallghulluten	allighan	tuguluku	piyugesqaten?”
B04_05_John_V13	Iwernga	yugem	nallukegkaa	naallghutisteni	kinangutanga,	qayughllak	uglapiglleghii	yuuk	tawanlenguq,	Jesus-llu	esghaghtengngunani	iqitkaalghii.
B04_05_John_V14	Aghneghmi	taakwani	Temple-mi,	Jesus-em	nallaqaa	taana	yuuk	naallghutkani,	pikaa,	“Uyuq,	naallghusimaaten.	Seghleghqennanii	luuraq	sangwaa	seghleghataghalghii	ikfiqutkennayukavgu	seghleghqumanginaquvek.”
B04_05_John_V15	Taagken	yugem	ungipaasaghtuqii	Jews-et	igleghutistengit	Jesus-nguniluku	naallghutisteni.
B04_05_John_V16	Taagken	kenlanga	Jews-et	igleghutistengita	seghletun	piyagutkaat	Jesus,	Sabbath-mi	naallghutillghaneng	apalluqluku.
B04_05_John_V17	Iwernga	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Ataka	quunpeng	qepghaaguq,	whangallu	qepghaghyaghqaagunga.”
B04_05_John_V18	Enkaam	Jews-et	igleghutistengita	wataqaaghaq	tuqusukaat.	Pikat,	“Jesus-em	Sabbath-em	Liilightuusaa	naafqinaghpenaan	pikaaguqlu	Kiyaghneq	Atakniluku.	Tawaten	akuzilleghmikun	Kiyaghneghtungwaaq	ayuqniluni	piiquq.”
B04_05_John_V19	Iwernga	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Ipa	piimsi,	Ighneq	ellnginaghmi	sayaghqaanghituq,	Atamineng	esghapakaghhiinani	piiqaa.	Atami	pillghatun	piiquq.
B04_05_John_V20	Atam	piniqaa	Ighneni,	enkaam	kelguvikaqaa	sameng	tamaghhaaneng	salleghmineng.	Iwernga	taakuneng	aangataghalghiineng	kelguviksaghqaqaa	saghiighayugesqellusi.
B04_05_John_V21	Atam	unguvaghtesluki	tuqukat	unguvallelitaqii,	enkaam	tawateghpigaq	Ighneq	unguvallelitikayuguuq	piyukegkaminun.
B04_05_John_V22	Ata	nanqigtingigatuq	kitumeng	alngunak.	Iwernga	aghtughyaghqaanghillelitkaqaa	Ighneni	qamaglluku	nanqigtilleq	ellnganun	pisqelluku.
B04_05_John_V23	Kiyaghneghem	tawaten	pikaqaa	Ighneni	tamaghhaanun	quulviisqelluku	katam	tawaten	quulvallghistun	Ata.	Kitum	taam	quulviigalkumigu	Ighneq	quulviigataa	Ata	kayagtikaq	Ighneghmeng.
B04_05_John_V24	“Ipa	piimsi,	kitum	nagaskumiki	akuzitenka,	ugpeqegkumigullu	kayagtisteka,	kenlengilngughmeng	unguvallelguuq.	Nanqigtellengnaanghituq	aghyuughyaghqaaluni	qayughllak	tuqumeng	unguvalleghmun	lliiqaaguq.
B04_05_John_V25	Ipa	piimsi,	pilleghqaq	uka	taginguuq,	whaa	kaasimaaq,	tuqukat	nagaqughlleqaat	menga	Ighneghan	Kiyaghneghem.	Tamaakut	nagaquullghiit	unguvallequt,
B04_05_John_V26	qayughllak	Ata	unguvallghuuq,	enkaam	unguvalleq	ellnganeng	pinguuq.	Tawateghpigaq	Ighnegha	unguvallghuuq,	qayughllak	Atam	tawatetestekanga.
B04_05_John_V27	Aghtughyaghqaanghillelitkaqaallu	Ighneni	nanqigtilleghmun	qayughllak	Ighneqegkanga	Yugem.
B04_05_John_V28	“Saghiighayagutegpenaan	una:	pilleghqaq	taginguuq	qamaglluteng	tuqukat	lliveghmelnguut	nagaqughluku	menga,
B04_05_John_V29	aanleghaasaghqaagut	lliveghmeggneng.	Tamaakut	pinitun	pikat	unguvaghtesaghqaagut	unguvalleghmun.	Iwernga	tamaakut	seghletun	pikat	unguvaghtesaghqaagut	nanqigtelleghmun	aghyuughyaghqaaluteng.
B04_05_John_V30	“Nanqigsigataqa	kina	alngunak	sivukluku	aaptellngunaan	Ata.	Enkaam	nanqigtiiqunga	ellngan	pisqellghinaghhaatun.	Nanqigtilqa	elqughutngaaq,	qayughllak	nanqigtiiqunga	Atam	kayagtikam	whangamneng	piyukellghatun.	Whanga	piyukellemtun	pingigatunga.
B04_05_John_V31	“Aapquma	whangamneng,	yuget	ugpeqnaanghitiit	akuzitenka,	wetkuqun	kitum	alla	aapqanganga.
B04_05_John_V32	Iwernga	kitum	aapghaqaanga	tawaten,	liisimakanka	aapqii	ipanguut	qayughllak	aapghisteka	Atakaqa.
B04_05_John_V33	Elpesi	yuget	kayagtekaqasi	John-mun,	apellghi	whangamneng	ipanguut.
B04_05_John_V34	Yuget	apenghisaghngaaghmegtengnga,	iwernga	tawaten	piinga	elpesi	yugulillengesqellusi.
B04_05_John_V35	John	kenelghutastun	kumangayaghtuqlu	kuukgutngayaghtuqlu.	Akuzitangi	nighugestun	ayuqsaghtut	enkaam	elpesi	natengiighhaq	akuzitangakun	quyastesukaagusi.
B04_05_John_V36	John-em	akuzitangan	liitestekaqaanga	yugnun.	Iwernga	wataqaaghaq	John-em	akuzitanganeng	qepghalleghma	liitestaghaghaanga	yugnun.	Qepghaghanka	Atama	pisqegkii	enkaam	qepghalleghma	liitestaa	yugnun	Atamnun	kayagtekaqnilunga.
B04_05_John_V37	Kayagtikam	whangamneng,	Atam	ellmineng	katam	aapghwaa	ipapighqelleq	whangamneng	ayuqelghii.	Nagaqiigatngwaaghaghsi	menga,	esghiigatngwaaghaghsi	natetulanga,
B04_05_John_V38	tugukliigatasillu	akuzitangi,	qayughllak	ugpeqigataghsi	Atam	kayagtekaa.
B04_05_John_V39	Ivaghivikaqasi	Akuzitet	Igaqegkat,	qayughllak	sumeghpesini	kenlengilngughmeng	unguvallengviknaluki	piiqasi.	Taakusta	ataasit	Akuzitet	Igaqegkat	aapghilghiit	whangamneng.
B04_05_John_V40	Naqam	whangamnun	tagiyugigatusi	unguvallelitesqellusi.
B04_05_John_V41	“Yugnun	usuqesunghitunga.
B04_05_John_V42	Liisimakamsi	elpesi,	piniqellghitusi	ilugpesini	Kiyaghneghmun.
B04_05_John_V43	Atama	kayagtekaqaanga	akuzistengulunga	ellminun,	iwernga	elpesi	tugukliigataghpesinga.	Naqam	kina	tagiluni	ellminun	katam	akuzilghii	tuguklighaqluku.
B04_05_John_V44	Naten'ngam	ugpeqelleqesteggu	tagikaatka	Kiyaghneghmeng	usuqesugukufsi	ilagpesinun,	naqam	taananginaghhaam	Kiyaghneghem	usuqelleghqaa	avelghaghluku?
B04_05_John_V45	Sumeghtaghaghpenasi	apeghlleqniluku	anaggutelleghsi	Atamun.	Moses-nguuq	aapghiyaghqaq	anaggutelleghpesineng	qaywa	sighimaksaghngaaghpesigu	yugulisqellusi.
B04_05_John_V46	Moses	ipa	ugpequmakufsigu	ugpeqnayaghaghpesinga	qayughllak	igaqegkaqaanga	igatgun.
B04_05_John_V47	Enkaam	Moses-em	igaqegkii	ugpeqigalkufsiki,	natenngam	ugpeqelleqesteki	akuzitenka?”
B04_06_John_V1	Kingunganeng	taam,	Jesus-em	aghviqaa	Naayvaq	Galilee,	aatqelghiillu	Tiberias-meng.
B04_06_John_V2	Uglapiglleghhiim	maliglleghaatkaat	qayughllak	naallghuquulghii	qinuyugneng	allaaghlluwhaghtilleghqun.
B04_06_John_V3	Kaalluteng	Jesus-enkut	maligsaaghtekullghiit	mayughluteng	naayghamun	aqumuutkat.
B04_06_John_V4	Jews-et	Passover-mun	Neqenghaghqellghat	kaasaghtulghii.
B04_06_John_V5	Jesus-em	sivuglluni	esghaqii	yulghuteghllaget	tagilaghaallghiit	ellminun.	Aaptekaa	Philip,	“Naken	tukfighinayaghesta	neqmeng	yulghuteghllagnun	neghyaghqameng?”
B04_06_John_V6	Tawaten	aaptekaa	Philip	naten	pilleghqaa	esghaghnaluku,	liisimakeghngaaghmigu	ellmi	salleghqani.
B04_06_John_V7	Philip-em	kiimsiqaa,	“200	denarius-elgughngaamta	naamayaghqameng	neqengnaanghitukut,	talwa	sasqughhaghmeng	tunqughngaamteki.”
B04_06_John_V8	Ilangallu	maligsaaghta	tawanlenguq,	Simon	Peter-em	anglegutanga	Andrew.	Andrew-m	pikaa	Jesus,
B04_06_John_V9	“Esgha	una	mekelghiighhaq	tallimaneng	neqekrangllallgaq,	maalghuklu	iqallugek,	iwernga	naamanaanghitut.”
B04_06_John_V10	Jesus-em	maligsaaghteni	pikii,	“Yuget	aqumuutesqiteki.”	(Tamaana	vegaaghllagulghii.)	Enkaam	entaqun	5,000-nguut	yuget	aqumuutkat,	kesutkegpenaki	aghnatlu,	taghnughhaatlu.
B04_06_John_V11	Taagken	Jesus-em	tuguluki	neqekrangllat,	iyamsiqayugluni	Kiyaghneghmun,	tunqughtestekii	aqumuutkaghllagnun	tamaavek.	Tawateghpigaq	iqallugek	pikakek,	qamaglluteng	neghuutkat	kepsulleghmeggnun.
B04_06_John_V12	Qamaglluteng	kepsuusata	Jesus-em	maligsaaghteni	pikii,	“Qerngughteggu	tamaana	neghumangilkangat,	sakusiiqegpenaki.”
B04_06_John_V13	Enkaam	qerngughlluki	imiqiit	qula	maalghuk	siipneqluku	pasketet	siipneghitneng	tallimat	neqekrangllat.
B04_06_John_V14	Taana	allaaghlluwhaghtilleq	yuget	esghapagluku	pikat,	“Ipapestaaq	una	uuknaliqistenguuq	tagiyaghqaanikaat	nunamun.”
B04_06_John_V15	Jesus-em	liisimakegkanga	yuget	aqfaluku	umiilengllaghnaqutkennaqngukangat,	enkaam	naayghamun	aglaqaq	ellnginaghhaanaluni.
B04_06_John_V16	Tawani	ighivgaghmi,	Jesus-em	maligsaaghtengi	ukikat	Naayvamun	Galilee-mun.
B04_06_John_V17	Mamlegtekanga,	Jesus-llu	paninang	aviilnguq,	enkaam	maligsaaghtengi	angyamun	uughquulluteng	aglaqat	Capernaum-emun	inglunganilngughmun	naayvam.
B04_06_John_V18	Taagken	naayvaq	imaghllugughtekaq	qayughllak	anuqlighllakanga.
B04_06_John_V19	Iiwenllu	angwaaghmeng	naayvam	qukaanun	lliighaqut,	esghaqaat	Jesus	meghqun	piyugmeng	tagilghii	angyamun	enkaam	alingruughutkat.
B04_06_John_V20	Iwernga	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Alingegpenasi,	Whanganguunga.”
B04_06_John_V21	Enkaam	uugtesukaat	angyamun.	Taagken	tawaninginaq	quutmun	kaatkat	takukameggnun.
B04_06_John_V22	Yulghuteghllaget	unegtekat	inglungani	naayvam,	unaamingani	piyalghiimeng	Jesus	aviituq.	Liisimakegkangat	ataasiinaalghii	angyaq	esnami.	Jesus	maligusimangilnguq	maligsaaghteminun	angyakun,	ellnginaghmeng	pikaalghiit	unilluku.
B04_06_John_V23	Taagken	ilangi	angyat	kaatquutkat	Tiberias-meng.	Tamlakat	tungangakun	yulghuteghllaget	neghuutfigitgun	ighivgaq.	Neghegkaalghiit	neqekrangllameng,	kingunganeng	Jesus-em	iyamsiqayullghan.
B04_06_John_V24	Yulghuteghllaget	piyalghiimeng	Jesus-enkut	maligsaaghtekullghiit	aviitut,	enkaam	angyanun	uuglleghaalluteng	Capernaum-emun	ivaghyaghtuqaat	Jesus.
B04_06_John_V25	Naalkesamegteggu	Jesus	aaptekaat,	“Apeghtughista,	qavngaq	maavek	kaasin?”
B04_06_John_V26	Jesus-em	kiimsiqii,	“Ipa	ungipaatamsi,	ivaghaghpesinga	qayughllak	neghelghiisi	neqekrangllameng	kepsughaaghlusi.	Ivanghitaghpesinga	allaaghlluwhaghtillghenka	apalluqluki.
B04_06_John_V27	Qepghaategpenaan	neqa	mulungigalnguq.	Yeghlegi	qepghaataqiteggu	neqa	naavyaghqaanghilnguq,	kenlengunaan	unguvallengestikayuk.	Tawatelnguq	neqa	Ighneghan	Yugem	tuunyaghqaqa	elpesinun,	qayughllak	Kiyaghneghem	Atam	itagnaqegkaqaa	ellnga.”
B04_06_John_V28	Yuget	aaptekaat	Jesus,	“Sangaawat	qepghaqat	Kiyaghneghem	pisqesukii	whangkunnun?”
B04_06_John_V29	Jesus-em	kiimsiqii,	“Elpesinun	qepghaqaq	Kiyaghneghem	pisqesukaa	esgha	una:	ugpeqesqelluku	taana	ataasiq	Kiyaghneghem	kayagtekaa.”
B04_06_John_V30	Enkaam	yuget	aaptekaat,	“Sangwaa	allaaghlluwhaghtilleq	pinayaghsigu?	Esghapagyaqumteggu	elngaatall	ugpeqnayaghamken.	Sanayaghsin?
B04_06_John_V31	Sivuneput	neghegkaagut	manna-meng	kilgaani.	Akuzitni	Igaqegkani	igaqegkaaguq	whaten,	‘Qilagmeng	pamaken	tuunegkaqii	neqekrangllameng	neghesqelluki.’”
B04_06_John_V32	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Ipa	ungipaatamsi,	qilagmeng	pamaken	Moses-ngunghituq	tuunikaq	neqekrangllameng.	Qilagmeng	pamaken	Atakaqa	tuunikayuk	neqekrangllapigmeng	elpesinun.
B04_06_John_V33	Kiyaghneghem	neqekrangllaa	esgha	taana	ataasiq	ukikaq	qilagmeng,	tuunilghii	unguvalleghmeng	nunam	yuganun.”
B04_06_John_V34	Yuget	pikaat,	“Yuguniiq,	iiwleng	tuunikut	tawatelngughmeng	neqekrangllameng.”
B04_06_John_V35	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Whanganguuq	neqekrangllaq	unguvallelitikayuk.	Kina	taana	tagilghii	whangamnun	allamengllu	iyataghnaanghituq.	Kitum	taam	ugpeqegkuminga	allamengllu	meqsugnaanghituq.
B04_06_John_V36	Iwernga	sivunghani	ungipaatellemtun	piimsi,	esghaqaqaghpesinga	iwernga	salin	ugpeqigataghpesinga.
B04_06_John_V37	Kina	alngunak	Atam	tagivaqaa	tagiyaghqaaguq	whangamnun.	Ighsaksaghqaqenghitaqa	kina	alngunak	tagilghii	whangamnun,
B04_06_John_V38	qayughllak	ukikaagunga	qilagmeng	atuqnaluku	piyukellgha	Kayagtistema.	Whanga	piyukelqa	piyaghtuunghitaqa.
B04_06_John_V39	Kayagtistema	ifliisunghitaanga	taakuneng	tagivaqamineng,	talwa	ataasighhaq.	Itupill	whangamnun	unguvaghtesqesuwii	kingulighmi	aghneghmi.
B04_06_John_V40	Una	Atama	piyukelqaa:	kitum	alngunak	esghaghluku	Ighneq	ugpeqegkumigu	kenlengilngughmeng	unguvallengellequq.	Enkaam	unguvaghlleqaqa	kingulighmi	aghneghmi.”
B04_06_John_V41	Jews-et	ungyupghutkaat	Jesus-em	whaten	pillgha,	“Whanga	neqekrangllaguunga	ukikaq	qilagmeng.”
B04_06_John_V42	Pikat,	“Jesus-nguuq,	Joseph-em	ighneqaa,	liisimakagput	atangallu	naangallu.	Sangami	whaten	pii,	‘Ukikaagunga	qilagmeng?’”
B04_06_John_V43	Iwernga	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Ungyupeghtegpenasi.
B04_06_John_V44	Atanguuq	kayagtikaq	whangamneng.	Kina	alngunak	taginaanghituq	whangamnun	wetkuqun	Atam	tagistekumigu	whangamnun.	Enkaam	unguvaghlleqaqa	kingulighmi	aghneghmi.
B04_06_John_V45	Uuknaliqistet	igaqegkaqaat	una,	‘Kiyaghneghem	apeghtughyaghqaqii	qamaglluki	yuget.’	Tamaghhaghmi	nagallghii,	liillghii	Atameng	tagikayuguuq	whangamnun.
B04_06_John_V46	Sumeghtaghaghpenasi	kitumun	alngunak	esghaamaniluku	Ata.	Kiyaghneghmeng	tagikam	ellnginaghhaghmi	esghaqaqaa	Ata.
B04_06_John_V47	“Ipa	ungipaatamsi,	ellnga	taana	ugpeqilghii	kenlengilngughmeng	unguvallelguuq.
B04_06_John_V48	Whanga	neqekrangllaagunga	tuunikayuk	kenlengilngughmeng	unguvalleghmeng.
B04_06_John_V49	Sivunesi	neghegkaagut	manna-meng	kilgaani,	iwernga	paninang	tuqulaghaatkaagut.
B04_06_John_V50	Iwernga	una	neqekrangllaq	ukikaq	qilagmeng,	kitum	alngunak	neghegkumigu	tuqunaanghitngwaaghtuq.
B04_06_John_V51	Whanga	unguvallelitikayuguunga,	neqekrangllaq	ukikaq	qilagmeng.	Kitum	alngunak	neghegkumigu	taana	neqekrangllaq,	kiyaghsaghqaaguq	quunperugllak.	Taana	neqekrangllaq	kemekrakaqa,	tuunaqegkegka	nunam	yugi	unguvallengesqelluki.”
B04_06_John_V52	Taagken	Jews-et	aaghtiiraaghusagutkat	ellmeggneng.	Pikat,	“Naten	uum	yugem	kemekrani	tuunaqagu	neghesqelluku?”
B04_06_John_V53	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Ipa	ungipaatamsi,	Ighneghan	Yugem	kemekraga	neghyaghqaqaghsi,	aawallu	meghyaghqaqaghsi.	Tawaten	pinghilkufsi,	unguvallepigitusi	ilugpesini.
B04_06_John_V54	Kitum	alngunak	neghegkumigu	kemekraka,	meghegkumigu	aakwa,	kenlengilngughmeng	unguvallelguuq,	unguvaghlleqaqallu	kingulighmi	aghneghmi.
B04_06_John_V55	Kemekraka	neqeghpigaaguq,	aakwallu	meghyaghqapiiguuq.
B04_06_John_V56	Kitum	alngunak	neghegkumigu	kemekraka,	meghegkumigu	aakwa,	kiyaghtengnguuq	whangamni,	whanga	kiyaghtengnguunga	ellngan	ilungani.
B04_06_John_V57	Atam	unguvastikayugem	kayagtekaqaanga,	whangallu	unguvastaqaanga.	Enkaam	kitum	alngunak	neghegkuminga	unguvallequq	whanga	apalluqlunga.
B04_06_John_V58	Sivunemta	neghegkiistun	neqekrangllastun	ayuqenghitunga.	Neghegkaagut	neqekrangllameng	iwernga	paninang	tuqulaghaatkaagut.	Neqekrangllaagunga	ukikaq	qilagmeng.	Kina	alngunak	neghegkumi	taagken	neqekrangllameng	kiyaghsaghqaaguq	quunperugllak.”
B04_06_John_V59	Jesus-em	tamaana	qamaglluku	aapqaa	apeghtughinguluni	synagogue-ngani	Capernaum-em.
B04_06_John_V60	Jesus-em	maligsaaghtengita	nagalluku	allulluteng	pikat,	“Una	apeghtuusaq	piyaqnapigtuq,	kitumngam	tuguklighlleqagu?”
B04_06_John_V61	Ungipaatestengngunani	Jesus-em	liisimakegkangi	maligsaaghteni	ungyupghullghiit	tawaten,	enkaam	pikii,	“Taam	apeghtullghem	iilqayugtestisii?
B04_06_John_V62	Sameng'ngam	pinayaghetsi	esghaghyaqufsigu	Ighnegha	Yugem	mayulghii	neksaqeminun	sivunghani?
B04_06_John_V63	Taghneghak	unguvallelitikayuguuk,	iwernga	yuuk	unguvallelitinaanghituq.	Akuzitenka	elpesinun	taghneghaagutlu	unguvallghuutlu.
B04_06_John_V64	Iwernga	ilagpesi	ugpeqigatiit	akuzitenka.”	(Jesus-em	liisimakegkangi	kinkut	ugpeqinghilnguut.	Liisimakegkangi	ima	piinlighyuwhaalleghmeng.	Talwa	liisimakegkanga	kinangutanga	uveghpagutiyaghqaq	ellmineng.)
B04_06_John_V65	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Ilagpesi	ugpeqinghitellgha	apalluqluku	whaten	pikaagunga,	‘Atam	tagisneghilkumigu	yuuk	whangamnun,	taginaanghitngwaaghtuq.’”
B04_06_John_V66	Kingunganeng	Jesus-em	tawaten	pillghan	uglapiglleghhiim	maligsaaghtengan	unitkaa	maligsaaghnaniqaat.
B04_06_John_V67	Jesus-em	aaptekii	qula	maalghuk	siipneqluku	maligsaaghtet,	“Elpesillu	aghulaqsugetsii?”
B04_06_John_V68	Simon	Peter-em	kiimsiqaa,	“Ataneq,	kitumun'ngam	pilleqesta?	Elpek	akuzitegpek	aapghaqaa	naten	allgeghutelleghqaq	kenlengilngughmeng	unguvalleghmeng.
B04_06_John_V69	Whangkuta	ugpeqamken,	liitkaqamken	elpek	Agleghnalghiikaaten	Kiyaghneghem.”
B04_06_John_V70	Taagken	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Nakmikegkaqaqa	qula	maalghuk	siipneqluku	maligsaaghtekaghqaq,	elpesinguut.	Iwernga	nalighsi	ataasiq	tughneghaaguq.”
B04_06_John_V71	Jesus-em	akuzitkengngukanga	Judas,	ighnegha	Simon	Iscariot-em	qayughllak	taakwaningani	uveghpagusaghqaqegkanga.	Judas	ilakegkangat	taakut	qula	maalghuk	siipngalghiit	maligsaaghtet.
B04_07_John_V1	Kingunganeng	taam	Jesus	igleghakaq	Galilee-mi.	Igleghayugumangilnguq	Judea-mi,	qayughllak	Jews-et	igleghutistengit	tamaanlenguut	tuqusugukangat.
B04_07_John_V2	Jews-et	neqenghaghqelleghqaat	aatqelghii	tabernacles-meng	kaasaghtungestalghii.
B04_07_John_V3	Jesus-em	anglegutangita	pikaat,	“Aghulaqi	maaken,	aglaa	Judea-mun	maligsaaghteten	esghapagesqelluki	allaaghlluwhaghtilleghpeneng.
B04_07_John_V4	Kitum	alngunak	apeghseghuuyulghiim	aksaqigataa	salleni.	Enkaam	tawaten	pinaqngukuvek	tamaghhaghmi	yugem	esghapagliten!”
B04_07_John_V5	(Talwa	anglegutangita	Jesus	ugpeqenghilkangat.)
B04_07_John_V6	Jesus-em	anglegutni	pikii,	“Judea-telleghqaqa	salin	kaasigatuq,	iwernga	elpesi	alngunak	aghneghni	piyaghqaagusi.
B04_07_John_V7	Nunam	yugan	ugumiknaanghitiisi,	whanga	ugumikaatnga	qayughllak	aapghaqegkegka	seghleq	atuqaqegkangat.
B04_07_John_V8	Enkaam	elpesi	neqenghaghqelghiinun	pitek;	whanga	pinaqenghitunga	qayughllak	aghneqa	salin	kaasigatuq.”
B04_07_John_V9	Jesus-em	tawaten	piluki	ellnga	Galilee-metkaq.
B04_07_John_V10	Jesus-em	anglegutangi	neqenghaghqemmun	pikat.	Taagken	kingungitneng	yugnun	esghaghtesukaghpenani	ellngallu	pikaq.
B04_07_John_V11	Neqenghaghqemmi	Jews-et	igleghutistengita	ivaqaat	Jesus,	pimaghmeng,	“Naagu	taana	yuuk?”
B04_07_John_V12	Uglapiglleghhiit	yuget	tawanlenguut	sigutquutkegkaat	Jesus.	Ilangita	pikaat,	“Jesus	piniipigtuq	yuuk.”	Ilangita	pikaat,	“Nakaa,	puughtaqii	yuget.”
B04_07_John_V13	Iwernga	kitum	alngunak	qaayngakun	akuzitkumangilkanga	Jesus,	alingluni	Jews-et	igleghutistengitneng.
B04_07_John_V14	Neqenghaghqellgha	santillghem	qukaghitaquqlu,	Jesus	Temple-mun	aglaghluni	apeghtughikaq.
B04_07_John_V15	Jews-et	igleghutistengita	saghiighayagulluku	pikat,	“Naten	una	yuuk	liiteghllagta	igaghyaamangilnguq?”
B04_07_John_V16	Jesus-em	kiimsiqii,	“Apeghtuusanka	whangamneng	pingunghitut,	Kayagtistemneng	pinguut.
B04_07_John_V17	Kitum	alngunak	Kiyaghneghem	piyukellgha	atuqsugukumigu	liisimaksaghqaqaa,	apeghtughilqa	Kiyaghneghmeng	pingutanga,	nalighmeng	whangamneng	katam	pingutanga.
B04_07_John_V18	Kina	alngunak	apeghtughilghii	ellmi	katam	sumeghtaghalleghmineng	quulvallengnaqutkengnguuq.	Iwernga	kina	alngunak	quulvallengestinaqutkelghii	kayagtikamun,	akuzinguuq	ipapigmeng,	iqlengiqigatuq.
B04_07_John_V19	Qamagllusi	liisimakaghsi	Moses-em	Liilightuusalitkaqiisi,	iwernga	nalighhiinaghpesi	qaatkigatasi.	Sangamangam	tuqunnaqutkestengnga?”
B04_07_John_V20	Yuget	kiimsiqaat,	“Tughneghaam	iitghumaaten.	Kitum	tuqunnaqutkaten?”
B04_07_John_V21	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Ataasimeng	allaaghlluwhaghtiyama	Sabbath-mi	qamagllusi	saghiighayugtusi.
B04_07_John_V22	Moses-em	qelqaqiisi	circumcise-esqelluki	ighnesi	(qaywa	sivunesi	circumcise-ekaaghngaata	Moses-em	circumcise-esqellghan	sivungani).	Naqam	elpesi	circumcise-eyaghqaanghata	ighnesi	Sabbath-mi	piiqasi.
B04_07_John_V23	Naafqengngunghilkufsigu	Moses-em	Liilightuusaa	circumcise-eghilleghpesigun	Sabbath-mi,	sangama	ugumiyagutestengnga	yuuk	naallghutngwaallemneng	Sabbath-mi?
B04_07_John_V24	Nanqigtigpenasi	yuget	saaqutangi	liigikngwaaghpenaki,	nanqigtiiqitek	elqughullusi.”
B04_07_John_V25	Taagken	ilangi	Jerusalem-eghmiit	pikat,	“Taanata	yuuk	tuqusukangat.
B04_07_John_V26	Naqam	esgha	apeghtughilghii	yugnun,	naqamllu	igleghutistemta	sanaqigataat.	Qaa	whaa	liigikaat	Christ-angutanga,	Kiyaghneghem	kayagtekaa?
B04_07_John_V27	Iwernga	whangkuta	liisimakaghput	taana	yuuk	naken	pingutanga.	Christ-apik	tagikan,	kitum	alngunak	nalluksaghqaqaa	naken	pingutanga.”
B04_07_John_V28	Jesus	paninang	apeghtughinguluni	Temple-mi,	iglagtuluni	pikaq,	“Qaywa	liisimakngwaaghestegguu	kinangutka,	nakenllu	pingutka?	Whangamneng	tagimangitunga.	Kayagtisteka	ipapiguuq,	iwernga	elpesi	nallukaghsi.
B04_07_John_V29	Whanga	liisimakaqa	qayughllak	ellnganeng	tagikaagunga,	ellngan	kayagtekaqaanga.”
B04_07_John_V30	Jesus	tawaten	piyan	ilangita	yuget	tugunaqutkegkaat.	Iwernga	kitum	alngunak	agtuqaamangilkanga	qayughllak	aghnegha	salin	kaasigalnguq.
B04_07_John_V31	Iwernga	uglapiglleghhiit	yuget	ugpeqegkangat	Jesus.	Enkaam	pikat,	“Liisimakaghput	una	yuuk	Christ-anguuq,	qayughllak	uglaapiglluku	allaaghlluwhaghtiiq	Christ-am	piyaghqaaneng.”
B04_07_John_V32	Ilangita	Pharisees-et	nagaquqiit	yuget	tawaten	akuzimleghaallghiit	Jesus-meng,	enkaam	ellngitallu,	chief	priest-etlu	kayagtekiit	kelengakistet	tugusqelluku.
B04_07_John_V33	Taagken	Jesus	pikaq,	“Natengiighhaq	elpesinillunga	aglaghllequnga	Kayagtistemnun.
B04_07_John_V34	Ivaghlleqaghpesinga	iwernga	naalkennaanghitaghpesinga.	Takukamnun	aglaghpagningitusi.”
B04_07_John_V35	Jews-et	igleghutistengita	ilateng	pikiit,	“Navek	una	yuuk	pinaqa	naalkesaghqaafqaami?	Greek-et	akulangitnilnguut	yuput	takulaghnaqakii?	Qaa	apeghtughillequq	Greek-enun?
B04_07_John_V36	Samengtuq	Jesus	pii	whaten	piiqngami,	‘Ivaghlleqaghpesinga	iwernga	naalkennaanghitaghpesinga;	takukamnun	aglaghnaanghitusi’?”
B04_07_John_V37	Kinguliq	aghnegha	neqenghaghqellghem	megnunalleghpigaalghii.	Tawani	aghneghmi,	Jesus	nekevluni	iglagtuluni	pikii,	“Kina	alngunak	meqsukumi	tagiluni	whangamnun	meghli.
B04_07_John_V38	Kitum	alngunak	ugpeqegkuminga,	ilunganeng	qamaken	kiiwet	maaqsaghqaagut	unguvallengestikayuget	meghet.”	Akuzitet	Igaqegkat	tawaten	pikaagut.
B04_07_John_V39	Jesus-em	akuzitkengngukek	Agleghnalghiik	Taghneghak.	Kiyaghneghem	Taghneghagni	salin	tuunigataak	qayughllak	salin	kevgigalkanga	Jesus	quulvalleliteghllagnaluku.	Iwernga	taakwaningani	tamaakut	ugpeqilghiit	Jesus-meng,	allgeghusaghqaagut	Taghneghagneng.
B04_07_John_V40	Nagasamegteggu	Jesus	tawaten	akuzilghii	ilangi	yuget	pikat,	“Una	yuuk	ipapestaaq	uuknaliqistenguuq	neghyukegkaghput.”
B04_07_John_V41	Ilangita	pikaat,	“Christ-anguuq.”	Iwernga	ilangita	pikaat,	“Christ-a	tagiyaghqaawaa	Galilee-meng?
B04_07_John_V42	Akuzitet	Igaqegkat	pikaagut	Christ-a	tagilleqniluku	David-em	nengllugutanganeng,	allgeghlleqnilukullu	Bethlehem-emi,	David-em	kiyaghfiganeng.”
B04_07_John_V43	Ilangita	yuget	ipapighqutkumangilkangat	Jesus,
B04_07_John_V44	enkaam	tuguyukaat	iwernga	kitum	alngunak	agtuqaamangilkanga.
B04_07_John_V45	Kelengakistet	kayagtekaayalghiit	tugusqelluku	Jesus,	kaasata	chief	priest-etlu,	Pharisees-etlu	aaptekiit,	“Sangan	taginnanighesteggu	Jesus?”
B04_07_John_V46	Kiimsiqiit,	“Kina	alngunak	taatun	yugtun	akuzingigatuq.”
B04_07_John_V47	Pharisees-et	aaptekiit,	“Elpesillu	Jesus-em	puughtisii?
B04_07_John_V48	Whangkuta	igleghutistenillu,	Pharisees-enillu	liisimakaput	Moses-em	Liilightuusii.	Nalimtaa-a	ugpeqatgu	Jesus?	Nakaa!
B04_07_John_V49	Tamaakut	yulghutet	nallukiit	Moses-em	Liilightuusii,	enkaam	Kiyaghneghem	naafqelleqii.”
B04_07_John_V50	(Ataasiq	Jews-et	igleghutistengat	Nicodemus-nguftuq,	sivunghani	Jesus-mun	pikaq.)	Nicodemus-em	pikii,
B04_07_John_V51	“Liilightuusamnni	nanqigsaghqaqenghitaghput	yuuk,	wetqukun	nagalluku	liigikegkumteggu	samatanga.”
B04_07_John_V52	Pikaat,	“Elpeklu	Galilee-meng	pinguzin?	Liinnaqiki	Akuzitet	Igaqegkat.	Liilleqan	uuknaliqistengituq	tagikameng	Galilee-meng.”
B04_07_John_V53	Qamaglluni	tamaana	aghulaquutkaq,	nemeggnun	aglaghtuutkaq.
B04_08_John_V1	Jesus	aglaqaq	Mount	Olives-mun.
B04_08_John_V2	Unaanguluku	aglanqigtekaq	Temple-mun.	Yulghun	tagilaghaasan	Jesus-em	aqumluni	apeghtuqii.
B04_08_John_V3	Liilightuusaneng	apeghtughikayugetlu,	Pharisees-etlu	tagitkaat	aghnaq	anguksakaq	gelgaghniighumaluku.	Nekevesluku	sivungitgun	yuget,
B04_08_John_V4	Jesus	pikaat,	“Apeghtughista,	una	aghnaq	anguksakaaguq	gelgaghniighumaluku.
B04_08_John_V5	Liilightuusaan	Moses-em	qelghusaqaa,	aghnat	tawaten	pikata	tuqutesqelluki	milughpagaataghhiinaq.	Elpek	sameng	pinayaghsigu?”
B04_08_John_V6	Jesus	aaptekaat	tawaten	Liilightuusat	kipullegmun	sameng	pisqelluki,	qayughllak	anaggutesugukangat.	Jesus	peghleghlluni	ighneghwaaghmineng	igaqaq	nunakun.
B04_08_John_V7	Aaptaataghyatni	Jesus-em	nekevluni	pikii,	“Nalighpesi	seghleghqelleqraggiilnguum	milughyuwhaaghligu	uyghagmeng.”
B04_08_John_V8	Alla	peghleghlluni	ighneghwaaghmineng	igaqaq	nunakun.
