B04_08_John_V9	Nagasamegteggu	Jesus,	aghulaquutekestaqat.	Nuyekliit	sivukluteng,	taagken	tamaakut	ilangit	aghulaquutkat.	Jesus	ellnginaghhaaghtekaq,	iwerngaqun	taana	aghnaq	paninang	nekevghalghii	sivungani.
B04_08_John_V10	Jesus-em	nekevenqiglluni	aaptekaa,	“Aghnami,	naaki	anaggunnisteten?	Nalighhiiniitaa-a	aghyuughyaghqaaniluten	pinghitataan?”
B04_08_John_V11	Kiimsiqaa,	“Yuguniiq,	nalighhiiniita	pinghitaatnga.”	Enkaam	Jesus-em	pikaa,	“Whangallu	aghyuughyaghqaaniluten	pinaqenghitamken.	Aghulaqi,	alla	seghleghqegpenang.”
B04_08_John_V12	Taakwaningani	Jesus-em	aleghqughlaataqii	yuget.	Pikii,	“Whanga	nighuguunga	nunam	yuganun.	Kitum	maligtekuminga	mamlegmi	kiyaghhnaanghituq,	kenelgullequq	unguvallelitikayugmeng.”
B04_08_John_V13	Pharisees-et	pikaat	Jesus,	“Taawa	apeghlaataghtuten	elpeneng,	iwernga	akuziteten	ipapighqusighqiitut.”
B04_08_John_V14	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Akuzitkeghngaaghma	whangamneng	katam,	akuzitenka	ipanguut	qayughllak	liisimakaqa	naken	tagikaatka,	liisimakaqallu	takuyaghqaqa.	Elpesi	nallukaghsi	naken	pimatka,	talwa	nallukaghsi	takuyaghqaqa.
B04_08_John_V15	Nanqigtiiqusi	nunam	yugatun,	whanga	nanqigsigataqa	kina	alngunak.
B04_08_John_V16	Nanqigtinaqsaquma	nanqigtilqa	elqughutnganayaghtuq	qayughllak	ellnginaanghitunga:	Ata	Kayagtisteka	whangamnituq.
B04_08_John_V17	Liilightuusaghpesini	igaqngaaq	maalghuk	yugek	sangwaa	aapqumegnegu	tawatengwaaq,	akuzillghik	ugpeqelleqiit	ipanguniluki.
B04_08_John_V18	Enkaam	whangamneng	aapghaqunga,	Atamllu	Kayagtistema	aapghaqaanga.”
B04_08_John_V19	Aaptekaat,	“Naagu	Atan?”	Jesus-em	kiimsiqii,	“Nallukaghpesikung	Atakullghiigni.	Iwernga	whanga	liisimaksaqufsinga,	Atakallu	liisimaknayaghaghsi.”
B04_08_John_V20	Jesus	apeghtughingulghii	tawaten	Temple-mi	manimeng	aflengakivigan	tungangani.	Iwernga	kitum	alngunak	tugumangitkaa,	qayughllak	pilleghqaa	salin	kaasigalnguq.
B04_08_John_V21	Allameng	Jesus-em	pikii	yuget,	“Unilleqamsi,	ivaghlleqaghpesinga,	iwernga	tuqullequsi	seghleghqelleghtuumaghpesi.	Takukamnun	aglaghnaanghitusi.”
B04_08_John_V22	Taagken	Jews-et	igleghutistengit	pikat,	“Jesus	whaten	piiq,	‘Takukamnun	aglaghnaanghitusi.’	Qaa	ellmineng	tuqunnaquq?”
B04_08_John_V23	Iwernga	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Elpesi	maaken	nunameng	pinguusi,	whanga	pamaken	pinguunga.	Elpesi	nunam	pikiisi,	whanga	nunam	pikenghitaanga.
B04_08_John_V24	Enkaam	ungipaatamsi	tuqulleqnilusi	seghleghqelleghtuumaghpesi.	Aa-a	tuqullequsi	seghleghqelleghtuumaghpesi	ugpeqenghilkufsinga	whanga	whangangutka.”
B04_08_John_V25	Aaptekaat,	“Kinanguzinmi?”	Jesus-em	kiimsiqii,	“Whanganguunga	aapghaqellemtun	piinlighyuwhaalleghmeng	ima.
B04_08_John_V26	Akuzitkesaghqaghllaguunga	elpesineng,	nanqigtusighqaghtuungallu	elpesinun.	Iwernga	Kayagtikaq	whangamneng	ipanguuq,	enkaam	nunam	yuganun	aapghaqanka	nagatkanka	ellnganeng.”
B04_08_John_V27	Yuget	liigikumangilkangat	Jesus-mun	akuzitkengngutanga	Ata.
B04_08_John_V28	Enkaam	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Kefkufsigu	Ighnegha	Yugem	liilleqaghsi	whanga	whangangutka.	Liilleqaghsi	sangwaa	maana	piiqegkegka	whangamneng	pingigatulka.	Liilleqaghsi	akuzitkegkayugutka	Atam	apeghtuusaqegkaghhiinaa	whangamnun.
B04_08_John_V29	Kayagtikaq	whangamneng	whangamnituq.	Iiwleng	atuqegkayuwaaqa	efqughtinalghii	ellnganun	enkaam	unisigataanga.”
B04_08_John_V30	Jesus	tawaten	akuzimaluku,	uglapiglleghhiim	ugpeqegkaa.
B04_08_John_V31	Jesus-em	pikii	Jews-et	ugpeqilghiit	ellmineng,	“Nagnequfsi	qaatkullusi	apeghtullemnun,	ipapestaaq	maligsaaghtekamsi.
B04_08_John_V32	Ipapighqelleq	liilleqaghsi	enkaam	ipapighqellghem	itemulleqiisi.”
B04_08_John_V33	Pikaat,	“Abraham-em	kingunqiinkut,	qepghaghtelaaghungigatukut.	Sangamta	pizikut	itemusaghqaaniluta?”
B04_08_John_V34	Jesus-em	kiimsiqii,	“Ipa	ungipaatamsi,	kina	alngunak	seghleghqengngalghii,	seghleghqelleghmun	qepghaghtelaaghestun	ayuquq.
B04_08_John_V35	Qepghaghtelaaq	nengllugutenisaghqaanghituq	quunperugllak.	Iwernga	nengllugutet	ighneghat	ellngitnisaghqaaguq	quunperugllak.
B04_08_John_V36	Enkaam	Ighneghem	itemestekangisi,	ipapestaaq	itemyaghqaagusi.
B04_08_John_V37	Liisimakamsi	Abraham-em	kingunqiisi.	Iwernga	tuqusuwaqaghpesinga	qayughllak	tugukliigalkesi	apeghtuusanka.
B04_08_John_V38	Ungipaatamsi	Atama	kelgutkaaneng	whangamnun,	iwernga	elpesi	atagpesi	qelghutkaa	piiqaghsi.”
B04_08_John_V39	Kiimsiqaat,	“Whangkuta	atakaghput	Abraham.”	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Ipa	Abraham-em	avaqutaqsaqangisi,	atuqaqnayaghaghsi	Abraham-em	pikaa.
B04_08_John_V40	Iwernga	whaa	elpesi	tuqunnaqutkaqaghpesinga,	whanga	ipapigmeng	ungipaatikayuk	nagaquqamneng	Kiyaghneghmeng.	Abraham	tawaten	pinayanghituq.
B04_08_John_V41	Atuqngwaaghsi	atagpesi	pikaa.”	Jews-et	pikaat,	“Kiyaghneghhiinaaguq	Atavut,	enkaam	whangkuta	ellngan	ighnepikiinkut.”
B04_08_John_V42	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Kiyaghneq	ipa	Ataksaqufsigu	piniqnayaghaghpesinga,	qayughllak	tagikaagunga	Kiyaghneghmeng,	enkaam	whaa	whaantunga.	Whangamneng	tagimangitunga,	Kiyaghneghem	kayagtekaqaanga.
B04_08_John_V43	Liigikigataghsi	sameng	pilqa	qayughllak	tuguklighyaghqaqenghilkesi	apeghtughillghenka.
B04_08_John_V44	Avaqutaqiisi	atagpesi	tughneghaam,	enkaam	atuqsuwaqaghsi	atagpesi	piyukellgha.	Piinlighyuwhaalleghmeng	ima	yugtaghtenguuq.	Ipapighqelleq	atuqaghsigataa	qayughllak	ipapighqellghilnguq.	Iqlengiqneghmini	taawanginaghhaq	ayghiitkani	piiqegkanga	qayughllak	iqlengiqestengulghii,	atakegkanga	iqlengam.
B04_08_John_V45	Iwernga	whanga	akuziiqunga	ipapigmeng,	enkaam	tamaaken	apalluqluku	ugpeqigataghpesinga.
B04_08_John_V46	Nalighpesi	ipapighqutkennayaghtanga	seghleghqestengutka?	Qaywa	akuzighngaaghma	ipapigmeng,	sangamangam	ugpeqigastengnga?
B04_08_John_V47	Kitum	alngunak	Kiyaghneghem	pingan	tuguklighaqii	Kiyaghneghem	akuzitangi.	Iwernga	elpesi	tugukliigatasi	Kiyaghneghem	akuzitangi,	qayughllak	Kiyaghneghem	pikenghilkangisi.”
B04_08_John_V48	Jews-et	pikaat,	“Piimken,	Samaria-ghmiinguuten,	tughneghaamllu	iitghumaaten.	Ipa	pizikaan?”
B04_08_John_V49	Jesus-em	kiimsiqii,	“Tughneghaam	itellghitaanga.	Quulvaghaqaqa	Ataka	iwernga	elpesi	quulviigataghpesinga.
B04_08_John_V50	years-ngughsigatuten.”	58	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Ipa	ungipaatamsi,	talwa	sivungani	Abraham-em	Whanganguunga.”	59	Jesus	tawaten	piyan,	yuget	uyghagmeng	tugulaatkat	milughpagaataghnaluku.	Iwernga	Jesus	iighluni	aanegkaq	Temple-meng.
B04_08_John_V51	Ipa	ungipaatamsi,	kitum	alngunak	qaatkegkumiki	apeghtughillghenka,	tuqunaanghitngwaaghtuq.”
B04_08_John_V52	Jews-et	pikaat	Jesus,	“Taawa	liitamken	tughneghalguftuten	ilugpeni.	Talwa	Abraham-llu,	uuknaliqistetlu	tuqulaghaatkaagut.	Iwernga	elpek	piiten,	‘Kitum	alngunak	qaatkegkumiki	apeghtughillghenka,	tuqunaanghitngwaaghtuq.’
B04_08_John_V53	Sumeghpenii	aangataghaghsiin	atamnneng	Abraham-emeng?	Abraham	tuqukaaguq,	uuknaliqistetlu	tuqulaghaatkaagut.	Kinanguniluten	piiqsin?”
B04_08_John_V54	Jesus-em	kiimsiqii,	“Whangamneng	quulvaquma	taana	quulvalleq	sasiinaanghituq.	Quulvaghikayuk	whangamneng	Atakaqa.	Elpesi	Kiyaghneqniiqluku
B04_08_John_V55	nallukaghsi.	Whanga	liisimakaqa.	Nalluknikumkun	iqlengiqestengullequnga	elpesistun.	Iwernga	whanga	liisimakaqa,	qaatkaqankallu	sameng	pillghi.
B04_08_John_V56	Atazi	Abraham	quyaghllakaaguq	esghaghlleqniluku	tagilqa.	Esghaqaqaa,	enkaam	quyakaaguq.”
B04_08_John_V57	Jews-et	pikaat,	“Ay?	Sameng	pizin?	Esghaamangitngwaaghan	Abraham.	Talwa	salin
B04_09_John_V1	Jesus-em	igleghutkelluku	esghaqaa	yuuk	ayaangaghmi	allgeqaq.
B04_09_John_V2	Maligsaaghtengan	aaptekaa,	“Apeghtughista,	kitum	seghleghqellghan	una	yuuk	ayaangaghmi	allgeghtestagu,	ellngan	seghleghqellghaan	nalighmeng	angayuqagkenka?”
B04_09_John_V3	Jesus-em	kiimsiqii,	“Uum	yugem	nalighmeng	angayuqagkenka	seghleghqellghita	ayaangasneghitaa.	Una	yuuk	ayaangaghmi	allgeqaaguq	esghiisqelluku	Kiyaghneghem	aghtughyaghqaanghillgha	ellngakun.
B04_09_John_V4	Nagneghutepestaaghyaghqaqaput	qepghaqii	Kayagtistema	paninang	aghneghuluku.	Unugyaghtughaa,	kina	alngunak	qepghaghnaanghituq	unugmi.
B04_09_John_V5	Paninang	nunamellunga	nighukaanga	nunam	yugan.”
B04_09_John_V6	Tawaten	pitkelluku	nunakun	qesighluni	sunameng	akumluku	angighhegkakek	yugem	iiskek.
B04_09_John_V7	Taagken	yuuk	pikaa,	“Naayvaghaghmun	Siloam-emun	aghmigyaghtaa.”	(Siloam	whaten	pisiilghii,	“Tuyuqaq”.)	Enkaam	yuuk	aghmigyaghtughluni	tagiyalghiimi	esghaasagulluni.
B04_09_John_V8	Uvilighneghitallu	ilangitallu	awen	esghaghaqegkangat	taana	yuuk	tungsighralghii	enkaam	aapqughaaghutkat,	“Unangunghitaa	yuuk	aqumluni	tungsighraghaqsalghii?”
B04_09_John_V9	Ilangi	pikat,	“Aa-a	taananguuq.”	Iwernga	ilangi	pikat,	“Nakaa,	allanguuq,	kinanguuq	ellngasugnilnguq.”	Enkaam	ayaangayalghiim	pikii,	“Taananguunga.”
B04_09_John_V10	Aaptekaat,	“Naten	esghaasagusin?”
B04_09_John_V11	Kiimsiqii,	“Yugem	aatqelghiim	Jesus-meng	qesighluni	sunameng	akumluku	angighllukek	iyegka	aghmigyaghtiisqaanga	Siloam-emun.	Enkaam	aghmiglunga	esghaasagutunga.”
B04_09_John_V12	Aaptekaat,	“Naagu	taana	yuuk?”	Yugem	kiimsiqii,	“Saa,	nallukaqa!”
B04_09_John_V13	Taagken	ayaangayalghii	yuget	aglaatkaat	Pharisees-enun.
B04_09_John_V14	(Tawani	aghneghmi	Sabbath-ngulghii	Jesus-em	qesighluni	sunameng	akumluku	esghaasagutestaqngamigu	yuuk.)
B04_09_John_V15	Pharisees-et	aaptekaat	yuuk,	“Naten	esghaghyagusin?”	Kiimsiqii,	“Yugem	angighllukek	sunameng	iyegka,	aghmigyalghiinga	esghaghtunga.”
B04_09_John_V16	Ilangi	Pharisees-et	pikat,	“Una	yuuk	Kiyaghneghmeng	pingunghituq,	qayughllak	qaatkigatii	Liilightuusat	Sabbath-meng	ayuqelghiit.”	Iwernga	ilangi	pikat,	“Yuuk	seghleghqesta,	allaaghlluwhaghtilaghnaanghituq	tawatelngughmeng.”	Aaghtiiraaghutkat.
B04_09_John_V17	Alla	aaptekaat	yuuk,	“Ellngan	esghaghtestaaten.	Sameng	pinayaghsigu?”	Yugem	kiimsiqii,	“Uuknaliqistenguuq.”
B04_09_John_V18	Jews-et	igleghutistengita	ugpequmangilkangat	ayaangayaatangallu,	esghaghyagutellghallu,	enkaam	aqfastekagket	angayuqakek.
B04_09_John_V19	Aaptekagket,	“Una	ighneqestegnegu?	Ayaangaghmi	allgeghumanikesek,	naten	esghaghyaguta?”
B04_09_John_V20	Angayuqagkenka	kiimsiqii,	“Liisimakaghpung	ighneqaghpung.	Liisimakaghpung	ayaangaghmi	allgeqaaguq,
B04_09_John_V21	iwernga	nallukaghpung	naten	esghaghyagusimatanga.	Talwa	nallukaghpung	kitum	esghaghyagutestellgha.	Aapteggu	yugughtekaaguq,	kiimsighnaaghiisi	ellmineng.”
B04_09_John_V22	Angayuqakek	tawaten	pikak	alinglutek	Jews-et	igleghutistengitneng.	Igleghutistet	ataasiightengngwaaqat	kitum	alngunak	ugpeqnikagu	Jesus,	Christ-anguniluku	iqitesaghqaaluku	synagogue-nneng.
B04_09_John_V23	Taana	apalluqluku	angayuqakek	whaten	pikak,	“Yugughtekaaguq,	aapteggu.”
B04_09_John_V24	Enkaam	Jews-et	igleghutistengita	tuqlunqiglluku	ayaangayalghii	yuuk,	pikaat,	“Usuqigu	Kiyaghneq.	Liisimakaghput	taana	yuuk,	Jesus,	seghleghqestenguuq.”
B04_09_John_V25	Pikii,	“Nallukaqa	seghleghqestengutanga,	iwernga	liisimakngwaaghaqa	ayaangayalghiinga	whaa	esghaghyagutunga.”
B04_09_John_V26	Jews-et	igleghutistengita	aaptekaat,	“Saaten?	Naten	esghaghyagutestaten?”
B04_09_John_V27	Kiimsiqii,	“Ungipaatngwaaghamsi,	iwernga	nagasugigataghpesinga.	Sangan	alla	nagasugesteggu?	Elpesillu	maligsaaghtengughsugetsii	ellnganun?”
B04_09_John_V28	Taagken	ugumiyagulluku	pikaat,	“Elpek	maligsaaghtekaaten.	Whangkuta	Moses-em	maligsaaghtekiinkut.
B04_09_John_V29	Liisimakaghput	Kiyaghneghem	aleghquqaqaa	Moses.	Iwernga	taana	yuuk,	Jesus,	nallukaghput	naken	pingutanga.”
B04_09_John_V30	Yugem	pikii,	“Kii!	Elpesi	igleghutisteni	nallukumasteggu	naken	tagikaatanga,	naqamllu	ellngan	esghaghyagutestaanga.
B04_09_John_V31	Qamaglluta	liisimakngwaaghaghput	Kiyaghneghem	nagasigatii	seghleghqestet.	Iwernga	Kiyaghneghem	nagatkayuwaa	kina	alngunak	maniguullghii,	qaatkullghii	ellminun.
B04_09_John_V32	Ima	nuna	piinlighyuwhaallghaneng	kitum	alngunak	nagaqiigataa	kina	alngunak	esghaghtestiniluku	ayaangaghmi	allgeqameng.
B04_09_John_V33	Taana	yuuk	Kiyaghneghmeng	pingunghisaqumi	sanayanghituq.”
B04_09_John_V34	Pikaat,	“Seghleghqestenguuten	ima	allgenghaghhaategpeneng,	sangan'ngam	whangkuta	apeghtughnaqutkesikut?”	Taagken	aanestestekaat	synagogue-meng.
B04_09_John_V35	Jesus-em	nagaquqaa	ayaangayalghii	yuuk	aanesimaniluku	synagogue-meng.	Enkaam	ivaghluku	naalkesamigu	pikaa,	“Ugpeqsigu	Ighnegha	Yugem?”
B04_09_John_V36	Yugem	aaptekaa,	“Yuguniiq,	kingangaawa	Ighnegha	Yugem?	Ungipaatinga	enkaam	ugpeqlakun.”
B04_09_John_V37	Jesus-em	pikaa,	“Esghamaan,	aleghqughaqaaten.”
B04_09_John_V38	Yugem	pikaa,	“Aa-a,	Ataneq,	ugpeghtunga.”	Taagken	segesqughlluni	maniguqaa	Jesus.
B04_09_John_V39	Jesus	pikaq,	“Taginguunga	nunamun	aafqughnaluki	yuget,	tamaakut	esghiigasalghiit	esghiisqelluki,	tamaakut	esghaqayuget	ayaasnaluki.”
B04_09_John_V40	Ilangita	Pharisees-et	tunganganilnguut	Jesus-em	nagalluku	aaptekaat,	“Sameng	pizin?	Whangkutallu	ayaanganizikuut?”
B04_09_John_V41	Jesus-em	kiimsiqii,	“Ayaangayaqufsi	Kiyaghneghem	pinayanghitiisi	seghleghqestengunilusi.	Iwernga	whaten	pikaategpesineng,	‘Esghaqayuguukut’	tamaaken	apalluqluku	Kiyaghneghem	piiqiisi	seghleghqestengunilusi.”
B04_10_John_V1	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Ipa	ungipaatamsi,	yuuk	nagun	alngunak	mayughluni	penniilghutamun	iitqumi	amigunghilngughqun,	teglegniightenguuqlu,	wayaghtenguuqlu.
B04_10_John_V2	Yuuk	itelghii	amigkun	penniighniightenguuq,	enkaam
B04_10_John_V3	kelengakistem	amigmelnguum	qelpeghutaqaa.	Penniighet	nagaquneghmegteggu	menga	takwaaqaat.	Taam	pennighniightem	ellmi	katam	penniini	aatghitgun	tuqlughteghluki	aanutaqii.
B04_10_John_V4	Ellngan	katam	penniighi	qamaglluteng	aanleghaanneghata,	penniighniighta	sivungitni	igleghtaquq	enkaam	pennighet	maliglleghaataqaat,	qayughllak	menga	liisimakegkangat.
B04_10_John_V5	Maliggnaanghitaat	kina	nallukegkaghteng	yeghlegi	qimaguusaghqaagut,	qayughllak	nallukegkangat	menga.”
B04_10_John_V6	Taaggun	ungipaghaatkun	Jesus-em	ungipaatkii	taakut	Pharisees-et,	iwernga	liigikumangilkangat	sameng	pisiitanga.
B04_10_John_V7	Enkaam	Jesus-em	pilaataqii,	“Ipa	ungipaatamsi,	whanga	amiguunga	penniighnun.
B04_10_John_V8	Qamaglluteng	yuget	sivumni	tagikat	teglegniightenguutlu	wayaghtenguutlu	enkaam	penniighet	nagasimangitiit	taakut.
B04_10_John_V9	Whanga	amiguunga,	kina	alngunak	iitqumi	whangamkun	yugulillengyaghqaaguq.	Enkaam	iitghaqluni,	aanaqluni,	naalkutaqlunillu	neghyaghqameng	pillequq.
B04_10_John_V10	Teglegniighta	taawanginaq	teglegyaqayuguuq,	yugtaghyaqayuguuq,	naafqiiyaqayuguuq,	iwernga	whanga	tagikaagunga	yuget	unguvallengesqelluki	unguvallepigmeng.
B04_10_John_V11	“Whanga	pinilghiinguunga	penniighniighta.	Pinilghiim	penniighniightem	tuqumatkesaghqaqii	penniini.
B04_10_John_V12	Akileghtuqayuk	penniighniightengunghituq	enkaam	penniighet	ellngan	pikengitii.	Taam	qepghaghtem	esghaqumigu	amaa	tagilghii,	qimagyaghqaaguq	penniighet	unilluki.	Taana	amaa	penniightekan	qamaglluteng	penniighet	mingillequt.
B04_10_John_V13	Yuuk	akileghtuqayuk	qimagyaghqaaguq,	qayughllak	temngi	qepghaghtengulghii	enkaam	legan	waaknaanghitii	penniighet.
B04_10_John_V14	Whanga	pinilghiinguunga	penniighniighta.	Atam	liisimakellghatun	whanga,	whangallu	liisimakellemtun	Ata,	tawateghpigaq	liisimakanka	penniighenka,	penniighma	liisimakaatnga.	Tuqumatkelleqanka	penniighenka.
B04_10_John_V16	Penniightuunga	penniilghutamenneghilngughmeng.	Ellngitlu	tagisaghqapestaaqanka,	nagalleqaat	meka	enkaam	penniighenka	ataasistun	lliighllequt,	ataasiq	penniighniightekluku.
B04_10_John_V17	“Atam	piniqaanga	qayughllak	unguvalqa	tuunyukestaghluku	ayuqaqa	veghhneqiggnaluku.
B04_10_John_V18	Kitum	alngunak	iqinnaanghitaa	unguvalqa,	qayughllak	whangamneng	katam	tuunyugluku	ayuqaqa.	Tuunilleghqalguunga	unguvallemneng,	veghtilleghqalguunga	unguvallemneng.	Tawaten	Atama	qelqaqaanga.”
B04_10_John_V19	Allameng	Jews-et	aaghtiiraaghutkat,	Jesus-em	akuzitangi	apalluqluki.
B04_10_John_V20	Uglapiglleghhiit	pikat,	“Taana	yuuk	tughneghaam	iteghluku	nallungughtestekaqaa,	sangan'ngam	nagataqesteggu?”
B04_10_John_V21	Iwernga	ilangi	pikat,	“Yuuk	tughneghaam	nallungughtestekaa	tawaten	akuzinaanghituq.	Tughneghaam	esghaghtesagulleqaguu	ayaakaq?”
B04_10_John_V22	Uksuulghii,	Jerusalem-emi	Jews-et	neqenghaghqelghiit	neqamiknaluku	Dedicate-ellgha	Temple-em.
B04_10_John_V23	Jesus	igleghtengngulghii	Solomon's	Porch-mi,	tungangani	Temple-em.
B04_10_John_V24	Jews-et	uvitangighluku	pikaat,	“Naten	tagkaan	kukriqutkesnaqsin	whangkunnun?	Christ-angukuvek	ungipaatngwaaghqut.”
B04_10_John_V25	Jesus-em	kiimsiqii,	“Ungipaatngwaaqaqamsi	iwernga	ugpeqigataghpesinga.	Allaaghlluwhaghtiiqunga	Atama	Aatghakun	liigikesqellunga	kinangutka.
B04_10_John_V26	Iwernga	elpesi	ugpeghigatusi	qayughllak	penniiqenghilkemsi.
B04_10_John_V27	Liisimakanka	penniighenka,	nagalluku	meka	maligtaqaatnga.
B04_10_John_V28	Tuunanka	kenlengilngughmeng	unguvalleghmeng,	enkaam	tuqunaanghitngwaaghtut.	Kitum	alngunak	akuqaghnaanghitii	iiggemneng.
B04_10_John_V29	Atama	tagivaqaqii	penniighenka.	Aangeghllagtuq	kitumeng	alngunak,	enkaam	kitum	alngunak	akuqaghnaanghitii	Atama	iigganeng.
B04_10_John_V30	Atakullghiigni	ataasistun	ayuqukung.”
B04_10_John_V31	Taagken	Jews-et	tugulaallaataqat	uyghagmeng	tuqunnaluku	Jesus.
B04_10_John_V32	Iwernga	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Esghapagaghpesinga	uglapiglleghhii	aneghneghqilleq	apeghiighaqa	Atama	aghtughyaghqaanghillghakun.	Naliitnun	taakut	aneghneghqilleghma	milughpagaataghyugestengnga?”
B04_10_John_V33	Jews-et	kiimsiqaat,	“Tuqunnaqenghitamken	aneghneghqillghen	apalluqluku,	taawanginaq	akuzillghen	apalluqaghput.	Temngi	yuguuten.	Kiyaghneghmun	seghleghqeghllakaaguten	Kiyaghneghtun	ayuqniluten	piiqngavek!”
B04_10_John_V34	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Liilightuusaghpesini	igaqngaaq	Kiyaghneghem	pillgha	whaten,	‘Elpesi	kiyaghneghuusi.’
B04_10_John_V35	Liisimakaput	Akuzitet	Igaqegkat	allangughsaghqaanghitut.	Akuzitni	Igaqegkani	Kiyaghneghem	kiyaghneghunimakaki
B04_10_John_V36	sangamangam	seghleghqeghllagumanistengnga	Kiyaghneghmun?	Apalluqestegguu	Kiyaghneghmun	Ighneqnilqa?	Atam	nakmikegkaqaanga,	kayagtekaqaanga	nunamun.
B04_10_John_V37	Atuqenghilkumkun	Atama	piiqegkanga,	elngaatall	ugpeqenghinnakefsinga,
B04_10_John_V38	iwernga	atuqaqaqa	Atama	piiqegkanga.	Ugpeqenghiteghngaaghpesinga	whanga,	ugpeqiteki	qepghaqanka	enkaam	liilleqaghsi,	liigikelleqaghsi	Ata	whangamnitutanga,	whanga	ellngani.”
B04_10_John_V39	Taagken	Jews-et	tugunaqlaataghyaghaat,	iwernga	Jesus	anakaq	ellngitneng.
B04_10_John_V40	Taagken	Jesus-em	aghvighlukek	Kiiwek	Jordan-meng	aatqelghiik	aglanqigtekaq	John-em	paaptaayeviksuwhaallghanun,	enkaam	tamaantekaq.
B04_10_John_V41	Uglapiglleghhii	yuuk	tagilaghaatkaq	ellnganun,	pikat,	“John	allaaghlluwhaghtimangituq,	iwernga	John-em	apellgha	uumeng	yugmeng	qamaglluni	ipanguuq.”
B04_10_John_V42	Tawani	uglapiglleghhiim	ugpeqegkaa	Jesus.
B04_11_John_V1	Taawanguq	yuuk,	aatqelghii	Lazarus-meng	qinuyukaq.	Bethany-mi	kiyaghtengngulghii	nayagegmini	Mary-nkugni	Martha-nkugni.
B04_11_John_V2	(Taam	Mary-m	taakwaningani	Atanghem	itegii	kuuvikluki	tepengllaasimeng	nuyamineng	sangigsaghqaqii.	Mary-m	kuugqegkanga	Lazarus	qinuyulghii.)
B04_11_John_V3	Mary-nkuk	Martha-nkuk	ungipaasaghtiisqegkaak	Jesus,	“Ataneq,	piniqegkan	qinuyuguuq.”
B04_11_John_V4	Jesus	ungipaasatni	pikaq,	“Qinuyullghan	apallaa	tuqullghunghituq	iwernga	usuqisiiluni	Kiyaghneghmun	pinguuq,	esghiisqellukullu	aghtughyaghqaanghilleghllaga	Ighneghan	Kiyaghneghem.”
B04_11_John_V5	Jesus-em	piniqegkek	Martha-nkuk	anglegutkullghiik,	Lazarus-llu.
B04_11_John_V6	Iwernga	nagaqughngaaghmigu	Lazarus-em	qinuyullgha,	paninang	maalghuk	aghneghek	tamaantekaq.
B04_11_John_V7	Taagken	Jesus-em	maligsaaghteni	pikii,	“Judea-nneqigtelta.”
B04_11_John_V8	Maligsaaghtengita	pikaat,	“Apeghtughista,	legan	qantaghaqun	Jews-et	tuqunnaqegkaqaaten	milughpagaatameng.	Whaa	alla	aglanqigsugsiin?”
B04_11_John_V9	Jesus-em	kiimsiqii,	“Aghneghem	ataasim	avellgha	nighuguq.	Kina	alngunak	igleghtekumi	aghneghmi	naaggnaanghituq,	qayughllak	esghaghaqaa	tumeni	nunam	nighugakun.
B04_11_John_V10	Iwernga	kina	alngunak	igleghtekumi	unugmi	naagsaghqaaguq	qayughllak	nighugilnguq	ilumini.”
B04_11_John_V11	Jesus	tawaten	piluni	pikiillu,	“Ilakumtaaghput	Lazarus	qavaaguq,	taghtughsaghtughnaqaqa.”
B04_11_John_V12	Maligsaaghtengita	pikaat,	“Ataneq,	qavaakumi	piniighlleqaa.”
B04_11_John_V13	Jesus-em	pinguyaqangi	Lazarus	tuqumaniluku,	iwernga	maligsaaghtengita	sumeghtaghaatkegkaat	Lazarus	qavaaniluku.
B04_11_John_V14	Enkaam	Jesus-em	ungipaatngwaaqii,	“Lazarus	tuqumaaq.
B04_11_John_V15	Quyaanga	ellnganinneghitkaalghiinga	tuqaaqngan.	Apalluqaqa	elpesinun	ugpeqataghhiisqellunga.	Tagitek,	takulteggu.”
B04_11_John_V16	Taagken	Thomas-em	(Malghimengllu	aatqelghiim)	pikii	maligsaaghtelgutni,	“Whangkutallu	tuqulgusighyaghtuulteggu.”
B04_11_John_V17	Jesus-em	kaalluni	Bethany-mun	nagaquqaa	Lazarus	tuqumaniluku,	enmis	estamagughtaqeftii	aghneghet	llivelleghmineng.
B04_11_John_V18	Bethany	qantaghanlenguq	Jerusalem-emeng,
B04_11_John_V19	enkaam	uglapiglleghhiit	Jews-et	tagilaghaatkat	ilutughsaghnalukek	Martha-nkuk	Mary-nkuk,	kuugghegkenka	tuqullghaneng.
B04_11_John_V20	Martha-m	nagaqughyamigu	Jesus	taginiluku	paasqaa,	Mary	nemetkaq.
B04_11_John_V21	Martha-m	pikaa	Jesus,	“Ataneq,	maantekaayaquvek	kuugqa	tuqunayanghituq.
B04_11_John_V22	Iwernga	liisimakaqa,	talwa	maaten	Kiyaghneghem	tuunyaghqaqaaten	sameng	alngunak	aaptekuvek.”
B04_11_John_V23	Jesus-em	pikaa,	“Kuugghen	unguvaghllequq	unguvalleghmun.”
B04_11_John_V24	Martha-m	pikaa,	“Liisimakaqa	unguvaghllequq	tuqukat	unguvaghtuuskata	kingulighmi	aghneghmi.”
B04_11_John_V25	Jesus-em	pikaa,	“Whanga	tuqulleghmeng	unguvaghtellghuungallu	unguvallghuungallu.	Kitum	alngunak	ugpeqegkuminga	tuquyaghngaaghmi,	unguvallelguyaghqaaguq.
B04_11_John_V26	Enkaam	kina	alngunak	kiyaghtekumi	whangamni,	ugpeqegkumingallu,	tuqunaanghitngwaaghtuq.	Martha,	ugpeqsiguu	taana?”
B04_11_John_V27	Martha-m	kiimsiqaa,	“Aa-a	Ataneq,	ugpeqamken	Christ-anguuten,	Ighnegha	Kiyaghneghem.	Elpenguuq	tagiyaghqaanikaat	nunamun.”
B04_11_John_V28	Martha-m	tawaten	piluku	aglaqaq.	Tuqlughluku	anglegutni	Mary,	ellnginaaghulluku	pikaa,	“Apeghtughista	kaasimaaq,	aaptaqaaten.”
B04_11_John_V29	Ungipaasatni,	Mary	nekefqaghtekaq	Jesus-mun	pinaluni.
B04_11_John_V30	(Jesus	paninang	neghpigaghmun	agliigalnguq,	salin	Martha-m	nallaghviganilnguq.)
B04_11_John_V31	Jews-et	Mary-nkunilnguut	ilutughsaghilghiit	Mary-meng	esghapagluku	nekefqaghlluni	aanyan	maligtekaat.	Sumeghmeggni	lliveghmun	qiyayaghtughnaqniluku	pikaat.
B04_11_John_V32	Iwernga	Mary	aglaqaq	Jesus-mun.	Esghaghyamigu	sikmuulluni	manungakun	pikaa,	“Ataneq,	maantekaayaquvek	kuugqa	tuqunayanghituq.”
B04_11_John_V33	Jesus-em	esghaghluku	Mary	qiyalghii,	tamaakutlu	Jews-et	maligutkat	qiyaaghuullghiit	elngaatall	seghleliighllakaq.
B04_11_John_V34	Aaptekii,	“Nagun	lliivghumasteggu?”	Pikaat,	“Ataneq,	tagi,	esghaghyaghtughhu.”
B04_11_John_V35	Jesus	qiyakaq.
B04_11_John_V36	Enkaam	Jews-et	pikat,	“Esghaghhu	tawateghllak	piniqumaagu	Lazarus.”
B04_11_John_V37	Iwernga	ilangi	pikat,	“Jesus-em	naallghusimakumigu	ayaakaq,	sangan	Lazarus	tuqunghitesnanightagu?”
B04_11_John_V38	Jesus	lliveghmun	aglaatkelluku	alla	seghleliinqigteghllakaq.	Lazarus-em	lliivgha	sufluulghii,	uyghagrugllagmeng	paaynga	saapluni.
B04_11_John_V39	Jesus	pikaq,	“Iqiteggu	uyghak.”	Martha-m	pikaa,	“Ataneq,	estamagughtii	aghneghet	tuqutmineng	enkaam	tepengeghllagtuq.”	(Martha	nayakegkanga	tuqukam	yugem.)
B04_11_John_V40	Jesus-em	pikaa,	“Ungipaatkaqamken	ugpeghyaquvek	esghaghlleqan	Kiyaghneghem	aghtughyaghqaanghillgha.”
B04_11_John_V41	Taagken	iqitkaat	uyghak	paaynganeng	llivghem.	Jesus	quulmun	esghaghluni	pikaq,	“Ataay,	iyamsiqayugvikamken	nagataqegkevnga.
B04_11_John_V42	Liisimakaqa	quunpeng	nagaqughaqaghpenga.	Iwernga	tawaten	piinga	yuget	uvitemnilnguut	apalluqluki,	ugpeqesqelluku	elpenun	kayagtekaatka.”
B04_11_John_V43	Jesus	tawaten	piluni,	iglagtupiglluni	pikaq,	“Lazarus,	aani.”
B04_11_John_V44	Yuuk	tuqukaayalghii	aanegkaq.	Iiggillu	itegiillu	iimguvikngalghiit	qiipaghaghmeng,	gginaallu	qantaghluni	allaneng	qiipaghaghmeng.	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Qiipaghaat	iikiteki	enkaam	igleghlli.”
B04_11_John_V45	Taakut	Jews-et	maligutkat	Mary-mun	esghapakaat	Jesus	unguvaghtilghii,	enkaam	uglapiglleghhiim	ugpeqegkaat	Jesus.
B04_11_John_V46	Iwernga	ilangi	Jews-et	Pharisees-enun	pikat,	ungipaatkiit	Jesus-em	unguvaghtillghaneng.
B04_11_John_V47	Taagken	chief	priest-etlu,	Pharisees-etlu	qerngughlluki	agghistet	aaptekiit,	“Sanaqestangam?	Taana	yuuk	allaaghlluwhaghtighllaguuq.
B04_11_John_V48	Nagneghtestekumteggu	tawaten,	tamaghhaghmi	ugpeqelleqaat.	Enkaam	Rome-eghmiit	tagiluteng	naafqelleqaat	Temple-allu	yuputlu.”
B04_11_John_V49	Caiaphas-llu	tawanlenguq,	high	priest-ngulghii	tawani	ayumiqulleghmi.	Caiaphas-em	pikii,	“Elpesi	nallukngwaaghtusi!
B04_11_John_V50	Itagnaghataghaghnayaghtuq	ataasim	yugem	tuqumatkesaqumiki	yuget,	qamaglluteng	yumta	naafqelleghqiitneng.	Iwernga	elpesi	liigikigataghsi	taana.”
B04_11_John_V51	Caiaphas	ellmineng	tawaten	akuzimangilnguq,	Kiyaghneghem	akuzistekaqaa	qayughllak	high	priest-ngulghii	tawani	ayumiqulleghmi.	Tawaten	pilleghmikun	uuknaliqutkegkaa	Jesus-mun	tuqutkelleqniluki	Jews-et.
B04_11_John_V52	Jews-nginaat	tuqutkegpenaki	iwernga	qamaglluki	Kiyaghneghem	avaqutii	mingitngalghiit	tamangani	tuqutkesaghqaqii	ataasiightesqelluki	nengllugutkullghiit.
B04_11_John_V53	Taagken	aghneghmeng	kenlanga	Jews-et	igleghutistengita	agghitkegkaat	naten	tuqutelleghqameng	Jesus.
B04_11_John_V54	Enkaam	Jesus	aliilluni	alngunak	igleghhnaniqaq	Jews-et	akulngitni.	Iwernga	tamaaken	aghulaqegkaq	kilgaan	tunganganun,	nemun	atilqelghii	Ephraim.	Maligsaaghtekullghiit	tamaantekat.
B04_11_John_V55	Jews-et	Neqenghaghqellghat	Passover-mun	kaasaghtulghii,	enkaam	naken	alngunak	uglapiglleghhii	yuuk	aglaghtuutkaq	Jerusalem-emun.	Tawani	yataaghqegkat	neqenghaghqelleghmun	ukmangighsalleghmegteggun	Liilightuusat	pisqellghistun.
B04_11_John_V56	Yuget	ivaqaat	Jesus	enkaam	qerngughusameng	Temple-mi	aaptekiit	ilateng,	“Jesus-llu	taginaqaqaa	Neqenghaghqemmun?	Sumeghpesini	sanaqa?”
B04_11_John_V57	Chief	priest-etlu	Pharisees-etlu	tugunaluku	Jesus	liilightuutkaqegkangat	yugnun,	“Nalighpesi	liisimakegkumigu	Jesus-em	naantulanga	wataghllak	ungipaannakefsikut.”
B04_12_John_V1	Aghvinlegughtaquqlu	aghneq	Neqenghaghqellghanun	Passover-em,	Jesus	Bethany-tkaq,	Lazarus-em	kiyaghfiganun.	(Taana	Lazarus	Jesus-em	unguvaghtekaqaa	tuqulleghmeng).
B04_12_John_V2	Tawani	Jesus	yataaghqutkaat	neqenghaghqunnaluku	enkaam	Martha-m	ketfaghtuutkii	aqelqat.	Lazarus-llu	tawanlenguq	maligulluni	Jesus-mun.
B04_12_John_V3	Taagken	Mary-m	tagitkakek	akitupiglleghhiik	tepengllaasik	nard-epigmeng	ulimaaghek.	Jesus-em	itegii	kuuvikluki	sangigtekii	nuyamineng.	Enkaam	mangtegham	ilunga	tepengllaasighpagnighqwaakaq.
B04_12_John_V4	Judas	Iscariot-lu	tawanlenguq,	Jesus-em	maligsaaghtenga.	(Taakwangingani	uveghpagusaghqaqngukanga	Jesus).	Judas	pikaq,
B04_12_John_V5	“Taakuk	tepengllaasik	300	denarii-em	akikaak.	Akiksaqlegestun,	akinga	taana	aklumalghiinun	tunqughnayaghtuq.”
B04_12_John_V6	Tawaten	pikaalghii	megnukelghiistun	aklumalghiit	iwernga	megnukepigtekanga	mani.	Aflengakistengulghii	maligsaaghtet	manilghutiitneng	enkaam	tugutkayugulghii	ellminun	katam	atughqameng	teglegniightengutmineng.
B04_12_John_V7	Jesus-em	pikaa,	“Avelghaghhu,	aflengakumaak	tepengllaasik	aghneghmun	whavek	yataaghqennaluku	llivelleghqaqa.
B04_12_John_V8	Aklumalghiit	quunpeng	tamaantut.	Whanga	quunpeng	elpesininnaanghitunga.”
B04_12_John_V9	Uglapiglleghhiit	Jews-et	nagaqughluku	Jesus	Bethany-menniluku	esghaghyaghtuutkaat,	tawaveklu	Lazarus	esghaghnaluku	Jesus-em	unguvaghtekaa.
B04_12_John_V10	Lazarus	apalluqluku	uglapiglleghhiit	Jews-et	unilluki	igleghutisteteng	ugpeqegkaat	Jesus.	Enkaam	taakut	chief	priest-et	agghitngwaaqat	tuqunnaluku	Jesus,	enraghngam	whaa	agghitkegkaat	Lazarus-lu	tuqunnaluku.
B04_12_John_V12	Unaamingani	yulghuteghllaget	Neqenghaghqellghanun	Passover-em	tagilaghaatkat,	nagaquqat	Jesus	tagiiqniluku	Jerusalem-emun.
B04_12_John_V13	Enkaam	kepuulluteng	palm-et	uqfiget	avayiitneng	paasqaat	Jesus	akilghuumaghmeng,	“Usuqnaghhalek	Kiyaghneq!	Kiyaghneghem	quyasligu	Umiilga	Israel-em	tagilghii	Aatghakun	Atanghem!”
B04_12_John_V14	Jesus-em	navghaghluku	donkey-ghaq	qaayngakun	aqumegkaq	tawatengwaaq	Akuzitet	Igaqegkat	pinaqnillghistun.	Taakut	Akuzitet	whaten	pikaagut,
B04_12_John_V15	“Alingegpenasi,	yugani	Jerusalem-em!	Esghaghteggu,	umiilegsi	tagiiquq	aqumluni	donkey-ghaam	qaayngakun.”
B04_12_John_V16	Tawani	pilleghmi	Jesus-em	maligsaaghtengita	liigikumangilkangat	taana	uuknaliqelleq.	Wetku	kingunganeng	Jesus-em	unguvalghanllu,	mayullghanllu	qilagmun	neqaatkaat	taana	uuknaliqelleq,	neqaatkiitlu	apeghiiqiit	ellnganun.
B04_12_John_V17	Yulghutet	ungipaqngukangat	esghapalleghteng	Jesus-em	unguvaghtillgha	Lazarus-meng,	aanesqellghallu	lliveghmeng.
B04_12_John_V18	Enkaam	uglapiglleghhiim	yugem	paasqaat	Jesus,	qayughllak	nagaquqaqegkangat	taana	allaaghlluwhaghtilleq.
B04_12_John_V19	Taagken	Pharisees-et	ilateng	pikiit,	“Sangwaa	tamaghhaghmi	anaggutnguuq	whangkunnun.	Esghaqaghtegguqun,	iingunaghhaghmi	yugem	maligtengngwaa	Jesus.”
B04_12_John_V20	Ilangillu	Greek-et	Jerusalem-etkaalghiit	maniguunnaluteng	Neqenghaghqellghani	Passover-em.
B04_12_John_V21	Aglaghluteng	Philip-mun,	pikaat,	“Yuguniiq,	esghaghyuwaqaghput	Jesus.”	(Philip	Bethsaida-meng	pingulghii,	Galilee-melngughmeng.)
B04_12_John_V22	Enkaam	Philip-em	ungipaalluku	Andrew,	ungipaasaghtuqaak	Jesus.
B04_12_John_V23	Jesus-em	pikakek,	“Aflu	kaasimaaq	Ighneghan	Yugem	quulvallengeghllalleghqaa.
B04_12_John_V24	Ipa	ungipaatamsi,	wetkuqun	piitun	ifkaghlluni	nunamun	iteghluni	tuqukumi	piitesqughllagyaghqaaguq,	aamtaam	tuqunghilkumi	taawa	ataasighhaallequq	piitun.
B04_12_John_V25	Kitum	alngunak	piniqegkumigu	unguvalleni	iflayaghqaqaa.	Iwernga	kitum	alngunak	ugumikegkumigu	unguvalleni	whani	nunami	kenlengilngughmeng	unguvallengyaghqaaguq.
B04_12_John_V26	Kitum	alngunak	qepghaasukuminga	maligsaghqaqaanga.	Enkaam	qepghaghteka	whangamnisaghqaaguq	naansaghngaaghma.	Atama	quulvaghyaghqaqaa	kina	alngunak	qepghaatilghii	whangamneng.”
B04_12_John_V27	“Maaten	unguvasigka	seghleliighuuk.	Sameng	pilanga?	Whaten	pilangaa,	‘Ataay,	yugulinga	ikfiqelleghqamneng’?	Nakaa,	tawaten	pinaanghitunga	qayughllak	tagikaagunga	ikfiqnalunga.
B04_12_John_V28	Ataay,	aangelleghllaga	ateghpek	aliightigu.”	Taagken	ma	qilagmeng	pikaq,	“Aangelleghllaga	ateghma	aliighsimaaqa,	alla	aliighlleqaqa.”
B04_12_John_V29	Yulghutem	nekevghallghiim	tawani	nagalluku	taana	ma	pikat,	“Kallugughtaa.”	Iwernga	ilangi	pikat,	“Yaqulgem	aleghqughwaa	Jesus.”
B04_12_John_V30	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Ma	taana	elpesinun	ayuquq,	whangamnun	pingunghituq.
B04_12_John_V31	Whaa	maaten	Kiyaghneghem	nanqiggnaqaa	nunam	yuga,	whaa	maaten	Kiyaghneghem	eggnaqngwaa	igleghutistenga	uum	nunam.
B04_12_John_V32	Whanga	kevellengegkuma	nunameng,	taaggun	tagilaghaatesleqaqa	qamaglluku	yuuk	whangamnun.”
B04_12_John_V33	Jesus	tawaten	pikaq	apeghnaluku	naten	tuqulleghqani.
B04_12_John_V34	Yulghuteghllaget	pikaat,	“Nagaquqaqaghput	Liilightuusaaneng	Moses-em,	Christ-anguq	kiyaghsaghqaaguq	quunperugllak.	Enkaam	sangavek	pizin,	‘Ighnegha	Yugem	kevellengyaghqaaguq’?	Kinangaawa	taana,	‘Ighnegha	Yugem’?”
B04_12_John_V35	Taagken	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Nighuk	elpesininnaqnguuq	natengiighhaq.	Enkaam	igleghtek	nighugaghluku,	mamlegfagilgan.	Kina	alngunak	igleghlleghhii	mamlegmi	nallukuq	natmun	piiqutni.
B04_12_John_V36	Enkaam	nighuk	paninang	elpesinilluku	ugpeqiteggu,	avaqutaliitesqellusi	nighugmun.”	Jesus	tawaten	piluni	kagtaghtekaq	ellngitneng.
B04_12_John_V37	Yuget	esghapagyaghngaaghmegteggu	Jesus	uglapiglluku	allaaghlluwhaghtilghii	paninang	ugpequmangilkangat.
B04_12_John_V38	Ugpequmangitellghita	apeghiightestekaa	Isaiah-m	uuknaliqistem	whaten	pillgha:	“Ataneq,	kitum	ugpeqaki	sangwaat	aapqaput?	Atanghem	aghtughyaghqaanghilleni	kitumun	esghaghtestagu?”
B04_12_John_V39	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	ugpeghpagningitkaagut.	Isaiah	whatenllu	uuknaliqegkaaguq,
B04_12_John_V40	Kiyaghneq	pikaaguq,	“Iiyngit	ayaastekaqanka	esghaannayukata.	Umyugiitlu	liigiksaghqaananighqegkaqanka	luuraq	qiivnayukata	whangamnun	naallghutesqelluteng.”
B04_12_John_V41	Isaiah	tawaten	pikaaguq	esghaqaqutmineng	Jesus-em	nighughqelleghqaa	enkaam	akuzitkegkaqegkanga.
B04_12_John_V42	Qaywa	uglapiglleghiit	Jews-et	ugpeqenghisaghngaatgu	Jesus,	naqamenraq	uglapighlleghhiit	igleghutistengita	ugpeqegkaat	Jesus,	Christ-angutanga.	Iwernga	aapghumangilkangat	alingluteng	Pharisees-et	aanesnayukangisteng	synagogue-meng,
B04_12_John_V43	qayughllak	taakut	igleghutistet	usuqellengyugaqut	yugneng	pakiggulluku	Kiyaghneghem	usuqelleghqaaneng.
B04_12_John_V44	Jesus	akilghuukaq,	“Kitum	alngunak	ugpeqegkuminga,	whanganginaghma	ugpeqegpenanga,	ugpeqngwaa	Kayagtisteka.
B04_12_John_V45	Kitum	alngunak	esghaquminga,	esghaangwaa	Kayagtisteka.
B04_12_John_V46	Tagikaagunga	nunamun	nighugulunga,	kitum	alngunak	ugpeqegkanganga	mamlegmennanighllequq.
B04_12_John_V47	Kitum	alngunak	nagalluki	akuzitenka	qaatkenghilkaki,	nanqiggnaanghitaqa	aghyughyaghqaaniluku,	qayughllak	nanqigsaghtuunghitanka	nunam	yugi,	yeghlegi	yuguliyaghtuuwanka.
B04_12_John_V48	Kitum	alngunak	ighsakegkangangallu	tuguklinghilkakillu	akuzitenka	nanqigtistekaghqalguuq.	Akuzitet	akuzitkegkanka	nanqiglleqaat	kingulighmi	aghneghmi,
B04_12_John_V49	qayughllak	akuzitenka	whanga	pikenghitanka.	Atam	Kayagtistema	qelghutkaaneng	akuziiqunga.
B04_12_John_V50	Liisimakanka	qelghusii	kenlengilngughmeng	unguvallengestikayuguut.	Enkaam	akuzitkaqegkenka	Atam	qelghusaqii	whangamnun	akuzitkesqelluki.”
B04_13_John_V1	Ataasiightekaq	aghneq	Passover-em	Neqenghaghqelleghqaanun.	Jesus-em	liisimakegkanga	qantaghaqun	Atamun	aglalleghqani	unilluku	una	nuna.	Quunpeng	piniqegkaqii	tamaakut	ellmi	pini	nunamelnguut,	piniqegkaqii	kenlemun.
B04_13_John_V2	Tawani	ighivgaghmi	Jesus-enkut	maligsaaghtekullghiit	qerngughutkat	neghnaluteng.	Tughneghaam	apeghiiqaa	sumeghtaghaatkesqelleq	Judas	Iscariot-mun	uveghpagutesqelluku	Jesus.	(Judas	ighneqegkanga	Simon-em.)
B04_13_John_V3	Jesus-em	liisimakegkanga	Atam	tuunegkaqegkanga	aghtughyaghqaanghilleghmeng	samun	tamaghhaanun.	Liisimakegkangallu	Kiyaghneghmeng	pingutni,	aglalleghqanillu	Kiyaghneghmun.
B04_13_John_V4	Neghuutnguluteng	tawani	Jesus	nekevluni,	qaasliit	aatkani	mataghqughluki,	veglluk	qukamikun	qillghutkaa.
B04_13_John_V5	Taagken	aghmigusik	meghmeng	imighlukek	maligsaaghtemi	itegiit	ughvughtuqii,	qukaminilngughmeng	vegllugmeng	sangigtaqluki.
B04_13_John_V6	Jesus-em	kaatkaa	Simon	Peter,	Peter-em	aaptekaa,	“Ataneq,	iteganka	ughvughnaqsikii?”
B04_13_John_V7	Jesus-em	kiimsiqaa,	“Liigiknaanghitan	saaqutka	maaten	iwernga	taakwaningani	liigikellequten.”
B04_13_John_V8	Peter-em	pikaa,	“Iteganka	ughvughnaanghitngwaaghaten.”	Jesus-em	pikaa,	“Ughvunghilkumki	itegaghten,	maligsaaghteknanighlleqamken.”
B04_13_John_V9	Simon	Peter-em	pikaa,	“Ataneq,	naqam	iteganka	ughvuneghmeng	taaqegkufki	iiggenkallu	naasquqallu	pinaketen.”
B04_13_John_V10	Jesus-em	pikaa,	“Yuuk	ughvughqenneghmini	iqangiitaqaa,	itegaghhiinii	ughvughyaghqaawaqut	qagani	igleghlluni	iteneghmini.	Qamagllusi	iqangitusi,	iwerngaqun	kina	ataasiq.”
B04_13_John_V11	Jesus-em	liisimakegkanga	kinangutanga	uveghpagutiyaghqaq	ellmineng.	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	whaten	pikaalghii,	“Qamagllusi	iqangitusi,	iwerngaqun	kina	ataasiq.”
B04_13_John_V12	Taaqsamiki	itegiit	ughvughtuneghmeng	qaasliit	aatkani	aalluki	aqumenqiglluni	aaptekii,	“Liigikenghistegguu	taana	ughvughtughilqa	itegaghpesineng?
B04_13_John_V13	Tuqlughaqaghpesinga	Apeghtughistemengllu,	Ataneghmengllu,	elqughaghtaqaghpesinga,	qayughllak	tawatetunga.
B04_13_John_V14	Whanga,	Ataneghpesini,	Apeghtughistegpesini	ughvuumakumki	itegasi	elpesillu	ughvughyaghqaqasi	ilagpesi	itegiit.
B04_13_John_V15	Tawaten	piinga	usputaqesqelluku	elpesinun.	Enkaam	elpesillu	piiqitek	whanga	pillemtun	elpesinun.
B04_13_John_V16	Ipa	ungipaatamsi,	qepghaghta	aangataghanghituq	umiilegmineng,	ungipaghtallu	aangataghanghituq	kayagtistemineng.
B04_13_John_V17	Liisimakegkufsiki	tamaakut	quyallequsi	tawaten	pikufsi.
B04_13_John_V18	“Akuzitkengngunghitamsi	qamagllusi.	Liisimakanka	natetulangi	nakmikegkanka.	Iwernga	apeghiighyaghqaaguq	Akuzitnilnguq	Igaqegkani	whaten	pilleq,	‘Yugem	neghelgusighikam	whangamneng	uveghpagutkaqaanga’.
B04_13_John_V19	Ungipaatamsi	taana	sivutghulluku,	enkaam	apeghiiqan	ugpeqelleqaghpesinga	whanga	ellnganguunga.
B04_13_John_V20	Ipa	ungipaatamsi,	kitum	alngunak	tugukliqumigu	kayagtekaqa,	whangallu	tuguklighlleqaanga.	Enkaam	kitum	alngunak	tugukliquminga,	tuguklighlleqaa	Kayagtikaq	whangamneng.”
B04_13_John_V21	Jesus-em	apeghluku	uveghpagutelleghqani	elngaatall	qaamggurugllak	qivghughllakaq,	pikii,	“Ipa	ungipaatamsi,	nalighpesi	uveghpagunnaqngwaanga.”
B04_13_John_V22	Maligsaaghtet	esghaqaqutkat	ellmeggneng	qayughllak	nalluneqsukegkaat	kina	pitanga.
B04_13_John_V23	Ataasiq	maligsaaghta	piniqegkaa	Jesus-em	aqumgalghii	saaghwani.
B04_13_John_V24	Simon	Peter-em	apaquluku	taana	maligsaaghta	aaptesqegkaa	kina	piiqutanga.
B04_13_John_V25	Taam	maligsaaghtem	mallegluni	Jesus-mun	aaptekaa,	“Ataneq,	kinangaawa	uveghpagutinaqelghii	elpeneng?”
B04_13_John_V26	Jesus-em	kiimsiqaa,	“Nepluku	neqekrangllaq	qayuusimun	tuunelleqaqa	uveghpagutiyaghqamun	whangamneng.”	Enkaam	Jesus-em	tuguluku	neqekrangllaq,	nepluku,	tuunegkaa	Judas	Iscariot-mun,	ighneghanun	Simon-em.
B04_13_John_V27	Legan	Judas-em	tuwaa	neqekrangllaq,	Tughneghaam	iitqaa	Judas.	Jesus-em	pikaa	Judas,	“Taana	piyaghqan	piighaghtigu.”
B04_13_John_V28	Nalighhiiniita	tawanlenguut	liigikumangilkangat	sameng	Jesus-em	Judas	pitanga.
B04_13_John_V29	Judas-em	aflengakngukek	manilghutak,	enkaam	sumeghtaghaatkegkaat	sameng	tukfighiyaghtiisqenniluku	aklukegkameng	neqenghaghqemmun,	nalighmeng	aklumalghiinun	tuuniyaghtiisqenniluku.
B04_13_John_V30	Enkaam	Judas-em	neghluku	neqekrangllaq	aanegkaq.	Unugulghii	tawani.
B04_13_John_V31	Judas	aanyan	Jesus	pikaq,	“Whaa	maaten	yuget	esghaghaat	naten	Ighnegha	Yugem	quulvallengellgha,	enkaam	ellngakun	Kiyaghneq	quulvallenguq.
B04_13_John_V32	Kiyaghneq	quulvallengengukan	Ighneghakun	Yugem,	Kiyaghneghem	quulvaghyaghqaqaa	ellmikun	qantaghaghhaqun.
B04_13_John_V33	“Taghnughhaghhamni,	unisaghtungestaghamsi.	Qaywa	ivaghyaghngaaghpesinga,	takukamnun	pinaanghitusi.	Jews-et	igleghutistengitlu	ungipaatkaqanka	tawaten.
B04_13_John_V34	Ungipaannaqamsi	nutaghameng	qelghusameng:	Piniqutullusi.	Piniqutusaghqaagusi	katam	whanga	piniqellemtun	elpesi.
B04_13_John_V35	Piniquskufsi	tamaghhaghmi	yugem	liisimakelleqiisi	whangamnun	maligsaaghtekutsi.”
B04_13_John_V36	Simon	Peter-em	aaptekaa	Jesus,	“Ataneq,	navek	pinaqsin?”	Jesus-em	kiimsiqaa,	“Takuyaghqamnun	maliggnaanghitaghpenga	maaten	iwernga	taakwaningani	maligullequten.”
B04_13_John_V37	Peter-em	aaptekaa,	“Ataneq,	sangan	maliggnaqenghisiken	maaten?	Tuqutkesaqlegwaamken	whaa.”
B04_13_John_V38	Jesus-em	kiimsiqaa,	“Ipaa	tuqutkelleqsingaa?	Ipa	ungipaatamken,	pingayuneng	nallunqelleqaghpenga	rooster-a	qalghightestegpenaan.”
B04_14_John_V1	Jesus	pilaataqaq,	“Qaamnasi	seghleliightestegpenaki,	sighimakiteggu	Kiyaghneq,	sighimakitengnga	whangallu.
B04_14_John_V2	Uglaapigtuq	nekaghqaq	Atama	mangteghaani	enkaam	yataaghqusaghtughnaqamsi	nekaghqameng.	Tawatenneghisaqan	ungipaannayanghitamsi.
B04_14_John_V3	Yataaghqunneghmeng	apeghiiqumsi	taginqigllunga	tuguklighlleqamsi,	whangamnitesqellusi	kiyaghfimni.
B04_14_John_V4	Liisimakaghsi	tuma	takunaqegkegka.”
B04_14_John_V5	Thomas-em	pikaa	Jesus,	“Ataneq,	nallukaghput	navek	pinaquten	enkaam	naten'ngam	liisimakelleqesteggu	tuma?”
B04_14_John_V6	Jesus-em	kiimsiqaa,	“Whanga	tuumnguunga,	ipapillghuunga,	unguvallghuunga.	Kina	alngunak	Atamun	aglaghnaanghituq	wetqukun	whangamkun.
B04_14_John_V7	Liisimakngwaaghyaqufsinga,	liisimaknayaghaghsi	Atakallu.	Iwernga	whaken	kenlanga	liitaghsillu	esghaghaghsillu.”
B04_14_John_V8	Philip-em	pikaa,	“Ataneq,	kelgutigu	Ata	whangkunnun	enkaam	itagnaghilta.”
B04_14_John_V9	Jesus-em	pikaa,	“Philip,	elpesinitunga	qavngarugllaggaaneng,	taawaa	nallukaqsingaa?	Kitum	esghaamakuminga,	esghaqaqaallu	Ata.	Enkaam	sangavek	pizin,	‘Kelgutigu	Ata	whangkunnun’?
B04_14_John_V10	Ugpeqenghistengngaa	Atam	ilunganilnguunga,	Ata	whanga	ilumni?	Akuzitenka	whanga	katam	akuzitkenghitanka.	Ata	ilumnilnguq	qepghaghaquq	whangamkun.
B04_14_John_V11	Ugpeqitengnga	Atam	ilunganinnilunga	pilghiinga,	Atallu	ilumninnikegka.	Nalighmeng	ugpeqitengnga	allaaghlluwhaghtillghenka	apalluqluki.
B04_14_John_V12	Ipa	ungipaatamsi,	kitum	ugpeqegkuminga,	taakut	ataasit	qepghaqanka	pilleqii.	Talwa	aangataghalghiit	tamaakuneng	pilleqii	qayughllak	aglaghnaqunga	Atamun.
B04_14_John_V13	Aaptekufsi	sameng	alngunak	Atemkun	legan	pilleqaqa,	Atam	aangelleghllaga	kelgutesqelluku	Ighneghqun.
B04_14_John_V14	Sameng	alngunak	aaptekufsinga	Atemkun	pilleqaqa.
B04_14_John_V15	“Piniqegkufsinga	qaatkelleqasi	qelghusanka.
B04_14_John_V16	Aapleqaqa	Ata	tuunesqellusi	allaneng	Kayutkaghqameng,	enkaam	tuunelleqiisi	Kayutkaghqameng	elpesinisaghqameng	quunperugllak.
B04_14_John_V17	Taakuk	Kayutek	Taghneghaaguk	apeghtughlleqiisi	Kiyaghneghem	ipapillghaneng.	Nunam	yugan	tuguklighnaanghitaa	qayughllak	esghiigalkanga	talwa	nallukegkanga.	Iwernga	elpesi	liisimakaghsi	qayughllak	elpesinituq,	ilugpesinisaghqaaguqlu.
B04_14_John_V18	“Uninnaanghitamsi	ellnginaghhaghpesi	yaywaalistun.	Taginqigllequnga	elpesinun.
B04_14_John_V19	Maateqwaaqun	nunam	yugan	esghaghnanighnaqaatnga,	iwernga	elpesi	esghaghlleqaghpesinga,	qayughllak	unguvalghiinga,	elpesillu	unguvallequsi.
B04_14_John_V20	Enkaam	tawani	aghneghmi	unguvaghtellemni	liilleqaghsi	Atama	ilunganitulka,	elpesillu	ilumnitelleghsi,	whangallu	ilugpesinitulka.
B04_14_John_V21	“Kitum	tugukliqumiki	qelghusanka,	qaatkegkumikillu,	piniqistekaqa,	Atamallu	piniqelleqaa.	Whangallu	piniqelleqaqa,	liiteslequngallu	ellnganun.”
B04_14_John_V22	Taagken	Judas-em	pikaa,	(Judas	Iscariot-ngunghilnguum)	“Ataneq,	sangavek	liitesnaqsin	whangkunnun,	naqam	nunam	yuganun	liitestegpenang?”
B04_14_John_V23	Jesus-em	kiimsiqaa,	“Kitum	piniqegkuminga	qaatkelleqii	apeghtuusanka.	Atama	piniqelleqaa	enkaam	Atakullghiigni	takuluku	kiyaghfikelleqaghpung.
B04_14_John_V24	Kitum	piniqenghilkuminga	qaatkennaanghitii	apeghtuusanka.	Apeghtuusat	nagatkesi	whangamneng	pingunghitut,	Atameng	pinguut	Kayagtistemneng.
B04_14_John_V25	“Ungipaatamsi	tamaaken	elpesinillunga.
B04_14_John_V26	Kayutem	apeghtughlleqiisi	sameng	tamaghhaaneng.	Neqaghtesleqii	qamaglluki	tamaakut	aapqanka	elpesinun.	Taakuk	Kayutek	Agleghnalghiinguuk	Taghneghak,	Atam	kayagsaghqakek	Atemkun.
B04_14_John_V27	“Univikamsi	nekeggmelleghmeng.	Nekeggmelqa	tuunaqa	elpesinun.	Nunam	tuunellghatun	tuuneghitamsi.	Enkaam	ilusi	seghleliightestegpenaki	talwa	alingegpenasi.
B04_14_John_V28	Nagatkaqaghpesinga	whaten	pilghiinga,	‘Aghulaqnaqunga	iwernga	taginqigllequnga	elpesinun.’	Piniqegkaqsaqufsinga	quyanayaghtusi	ungipaataqngamsi	Atamun	aglaghnaqnilunga,	qayughllak	aangeghllagtuq	whangamneng.
B04_14_John_V29	Whaa	ungipaatamsi	taagken	sivutghulluku	pilleghqaa	enkaam	apeghiiqan	ugpeghllequsi.
B04_14_John_V30	Aleghqughnanighyaghtungestaghamsi,	qayughllak	igleghutistenga	nunam	uum	taginguuq.	Aghtughyaghqaanghillghituq	whangamnun,
B04_14_John_V31	iwernga	Atam	qelghutkii	pisqellghwaaghatun	atuqaqanka	nunam	yuganun	liitesqelluku	piniqilqa	Atamun.	Nekevitek,	aghulaqelta.”
B04_15_John_V1	“Whanga	vine-epiguunga,	Ataka	piitesiighaghtenguuq.
B04_15_John_V2	Qamaglluki	avayanka	piitestingigalnguut	ikughaqii.	Qamaglluki	avayat	piitestikayuget	kepughvikaqii	piitestighataghiisqelluki.
B04_15_John_V3	Elpesi	ukmangighwaaghlusi	ayuqusi	akuzitetgun	akuzitkegkamkun	elpesinun.
B04_15_John_V4	Whangamnitekestaghtek	whanga	elpesinitellemtun.	Avayaraaghinaq	piitestinaanghituq	wetkuqun	vine-meskumi.	Tawatetusi	ellnginaghpesi	piitestinaanghitusi	wetkuqun	whangamnitekestaqufsi.
B04_15_John_V5	“Whanga	vine-nguunga,	elpesi	avayaagusi.	Kina	alngunak	piitesqughllagyaghqaaguq	whangamnitekestaqumi,	whanga	ellngani.	Iwernga	whangangunasi	sanaanghitusi.
B04_15_John_V6	Kina	alngunak	whangamninneghilkumi	avayastun	ayuquq	eglluni	paliqaq.	Tawatelnguut	avayat	qerngughlluki	paneghtaqiit.
B04_15_John_V7	Whangamnitekestaqufsi,	akuzitenka	elpesinitestekufsiki	aapleghhaasi	sameng	alngunak	piyukegkaghpesineng	enkaam	allgeghullequsi.
B04_15_John_V8	Ataka	usuqellengellequq	piitesqughllakufsi,	liigikeslequsillu	whangamnun	maligsaaghtekutsi.
B04_15_John_V9	Piniqamsi	katam	Atam	piniqillghatun	whanga.	Piniqellemnitekestaghtek.
B04_15_John_V10	Qaatkegkufsiki	qelghusanka	piniqellemnitekestaghllequsi	tawateghpigaq	Atama	piniqellghanitellemtun	qaatkutellemkun	qelghusaanun.
B04_15_John_V11	“Ungipaatamsi	tamaaken	quyamalqa	elpesinitesqelluku,	quyamalleghsi	iighwiisqelluku.
B04_15_John_V12	Unanguuq	qelghusaqa	elpesinun:	piniqutullusi	whanga	piniqellemtun	elpesi.
B04_15_John_V13	Yugem	tuqumatkegkumiki	ilakumtaani	piniqellgha	aangepigtuq.	Kina	alla	piniqellghituq	taameng	aangataghalghiimeng.
B04_15_John_V14	Ilakumtaaqaghpesinga,	qelghutkanka	qaatkegkufsiki.
B04_15_John_V15	Whaken	kenlekluku	qepghaghtengulusi	atighnaanghitamsi,	qayughllak	qepghaghtem	nallukaa	umiileni	saaqutanga.	Iwernga	maaten	atighamsi	ilakumtaaghmeng,	qayughllak	liitestekegka	elpesinun	qamaglluku	nagatkaqa	Atamneng.
B04_15_John_V16	Elpesi	nakmikumangitaghpesinga,	whanga	nakmikegkaqamsi,	qepghaqalitamsillu.	Enkaam	aghulaqlusi	piitesqughtek,	piitesqulleghsi	nagneghasqesuwaqa.	Tawaten	pikufsi	Atam	tuunelleqiisi	sameng	alngunak	aaptekufsi	Atemkun.
B04_15_John_V17	Una	qelghusaqaqa,	piniqutullusi.”
B04_15_John_V18	“Nunam	yugan	ugumikegkangisi,	neqamikluku	whanga	sivuklunga	ugumikegkaqaatnga.
B04_15_John_V19	Nunam	piksaqumisi,	yugan	piniqnayaghiisi	piniqututelleghmegestun.	Iwernga	whanga	nakmikegkaqamsi	whaken	nunameng	enkaam	nunam	pikenghitiisi.	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	nunam	yugan	ugumikiisi.
B04_15_John_V20	Neqamikluku	aapqaqa	elpesinun:	Qepghaghta	aangataghanghituq	umiilegmineng.	Amyuutkumakumegtengnga	elpesillu	amyuutkelleqiisi.	Qaatkumakumegteki	apeghtuusanka,	elpesillu	apeghtuusasi	qaatkelleqiit.
B04_15_John_V21	Tawaten	pilleqiisi	whanga	apalluqlunga	qayughllak	nallukaat	kayagtisteka.
B04_15_John_V22	Tagilunga	aleghquumangisaqumki	liinnayanghitut	seghleghqestengutseng.	Iwernga	whaa	anagniilqavigiitii	seghleghqelleghmeggneng.
B04_15_John_V23	Kitum	ugumikegkuminga,	ugumikaallu	Ataka.
B04_15_John_V24	Akulngitni	allaaghlluwhaghtiighaataqaagunga	kitum	alngunak	pingigalkanganeng.	Esghapakaqeghngaaghmegteki	allaaghlluwhaghtillghenka	paninang	ugpeqellghitaatnga,	ugumikiinkung	Atakullghiigni	enkaam	seghleghqestenguut	nanqigtellengyaghqat.
B04_15_John_V25	Tawaten	pilleghmegteggun	apeghiiqaqaat	Akuzitet	Igaqegkat	whaten	pillghat,	‘Ugumikaatnga	apallungunaan.’
B04_15_John_V26	“Kayutek	kayaglleqagka	elpesinun,	Atameng	pinguuk.	Taghneghaaguk	apeghtughiyaghqak	Kiyaghneghem	ipapillghaneng.	Tagikumi	ungipaqelleqaanga.
B04_15_John_V27	Elpesillu	ungipaqelleqaghpesinga	yugnun,	qayughllak	whangamnitkaalghiisi	qepghaghyuwhaallghaneng	ima.
B04_16_John_V1	“Ungipaatamsi	tamaaken	iilqayufqaafsi	pisqellusi	amyuutkegkangisi.
B04_16_John_V2	Yuget	iqitesleqiisi	synagogue-meggneng.	Aa-a,	pilleghqaq	taginguuq,	kitum	alngunak	tuquskumisi	sumeghtaghaghyaghqaaguq	qepghaatnguniluku	Kiyaghneq.
B04_16_John_V3	Tawaten	piyaghqaqiisi	qayughllak	liisimangilkanginkung	Atakullghiigni.
B04_16_John_V4	Ungipaatamsi	tamaaken	maaten	pilleghqaq	kaaskan	neqamikesqelluki	aapqanka.	Ungipaasimangitamsi	tamaaken	piinlighyuwhaalleghmi	maligsaaghtengughtaqngafsi	qayughllak	elpesinilnguunga.
B04_16_John_V5	“Maaten	uteghnighnaqnguunga	Kayagtistemnun;	iwernga	nalighpesi	aapneghitaghpesinga	whaten,	‘Navek	pinaqsin?’
B04_16_John_V6	Qivghughllaguusi	qayughllak	ungipaaskemsi	tamaaken.
B04_16_John_V7	Iwernga	ungipaannaqamsi	ipapigmeng:	pinighataghaghyaghqaagusi	aghulaqegkuma,	qayughllak	kayagfikelleqamsi	Kayutkaghqagneng.	Aghulaqenghilkuma	Kayutkaghqak	taginaanghituk	elpesinun.
B04_16_John_V8	Kayutek	tagikumek	liigilliighqelleqii	nunam	yugi	seghleghqelleghmeng,	elqughutngalleghmeng,	nanqigtilleghmeng.
B04_16_John_V9	Liigikesleqii	seghleghqestengutangi,	qayughllak	whanga	ugpeqigalkangatnga.
B04_16_John_V10	Liigikesleqaa	elqughutngalleq,	qayughllak	aglaghnaqelghiinga	Atamun	enkaam	esghaghnanighlleqaghpesinga.
B04_16_John_V11	Liigikesleqaa	nanqigtelleq,	qayughllak	igleghutistenga	nunam	uum	nanqigtellengwaaghluni	ayuquq	aghyuughyaghqaaluni.
B04_16_John_V12	“Paninang	apeghyaghqaghllaguunga	elpesinun	iwernga	salin	liigikepagningitasi.
B04_16_John_V13	Iwernga	Taghneghak	apeghtughilghiik	Kiyaghneghem	ipapillghaneng,	tagikumi	maghyaghqughlleqiisi	ipapilleperegwaaghmun.	Akuzitkennaanghitii	ellmi	katam	akuzitni,	iwernga	akuzillequq	nagaquqaghhiinaghmineng.	Enkaam	ungipaalleqiisi	sangwaa	sayaghqaatanga	taakwaningani.
B04_16_John_V14	Quulvaghlleqaanga	qayughllak	tuguklighluki	whanga	akuzitenka	apeghlleqii	elpesinun.
B04_16_John_V15	Qamagtengngwaaghluku	Atam	pinga	whanga	pikaqa.	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	piinga,	Taghnegham	tuguklighluki	tuunegkanka	apeghlleqii	elpesinun.
B04_16_John_V16	“Qantaghaqun	esghaghnanighlleqaghpesinga	iwernga	mulugpenasi	esghanqiglleqaghpesinga.”
B04_16_John_V17	Ilangita	maligsaaghtet	ilateng	aaptekiit,	“Sameng	piinkut	Jesus-em	whaten	pilleghmikun,	‘Qantaghaqun	esghaghnanighlleqaghpesinga	iwernga	mulugpenasi	esghanqiglleqaghpesinga’?	Taanallu	sangaawa	whaten	pillgha,	‘Qayughllak	aglaghnaqunga	Atamun’?”
B04_16_John_V18	Pikat,	“Sameng	pii	tawaten	pilleghmikun,	‘Qantaghaqun’?	Nallukaghput	sameng	pisiitanga.”
B04_16_John_V19	Jesus-em	liisimakegkangi	aapsukangat	enkaam	pikii,	“Elpesineng	aapqughwaaghusiqestegguu	sameng	pitka	whaten	pillemkun,	‘Qantaghaqun	esghaghnanighlleqaghpesinga	iwernga	mulugpenasi	esghanqiglleqaghpesinga?’
B04_16_John_V20	Ipa	ungipaatamsi,	qiyayaghqaagusillu	qivghuyaghqaagusillu	iwernga	nunam	yugi	quyayaghqaagut.	Elpesi	qivghuyaghqaagusi	iwernga	qivghullesi	quyallghughsaghqaagut.
B04_16_John_V21	Aghnaq	ighniyuneghmini	ikfiqaquq,	qayughllak	ighnilleghqaa	kaallghii.	Iwernga	ighniyami	puygaa	ikfiqelleni,	qayughllak	quyakegkanga	taghnughhaq	allgelghii	nunamun.
B04_16_John_V22	Qivghunguusi	maaten	iwernga	esghaghlleqamsi	allameng	enkaam	quyallequsi.	Kitum	alngunak	iqinnaanghitaa	quyalleghsi.
B04_16_John_V23	“Tawani	aghneghmi	aapnaanghitaghpesinga	sameng	alngunak.	Ipa	ungipaatamsi,	Atama	tuunelleqiisi	sameng	alngunak	aaptekufsi	Atemkun.
B04_16_John_V24	Whavemun	kenlanga	aapsigatusi	sameng	alngunak	Atemkun.	Aaptek	allgeghullequsi	enkaam	quyalleghsi	iighwighllequq.
B04_16_John_V25	“Ungipaatkaqamsi	tamaakuneng	ungipaghaatetgun.	Iwernga	ungipaghaatneng	atuqnanilleghqaqa	kaallequq	enkaam	whateghlluwaaq	apeghyagulleqaqa	Ata	elpesinun.
B04_16_John_V26	Taana	pilleghqaq	kaaskan	elpesineng	katam	aapleghhaasi	Atemkun.	Enkaam	ungipaatamsi	whanga	aaptunnanighlleqamsi	Atamun,
B04_16_John_V27	qayughllak	Atam	ellmineng	katam	piniqiisi.	Piniqiisi	qayughllak	piniqegkefsinga,	ugpeqegkesillu	Atameng	tagikaatka.
B04_16_John_V28	Atameng	tagikaagunga	nunamun.	Maaten	unilluku	nuna	aglaghnaqunga	Atamun.”
B04_16_John_V29	Maligsaaghtengita	pikaat	Jesus,	“Taawa	aleghqughaghpekut	whateghlluwaaq	atuqegpenaki	ungipaghaatet!
B04_16_John_V30	Whaa	liitamken	sangwaa	tamaghhaan	liisimakeftan.	Liisimakaqaten	yugem	aapsaghqii	talwa	aaptestegpenaki	enkaangam	kitum	alngunak	aapneghiteghngaaghmiten	sameng	alngunak	ayuquten.	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	ugpeqamken	Kiyaghneghmeng	tagikaaten.”
B04_16_John_V31	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Qenwatlu	ugpeghetsii?
B04_16_John_V32	Mingitelleghqaghsi	kaasaghtughtuq,	talwa	whaa	kaalluni	ayuquq.	Qamagllusi	negpesinun	aglaghtuullequsi,	unilleqaghpesinga	ellnginaghhaghma.	Iwernga	paninang	ellnginaghhaanaanghitunga	qayughllak	Ata	whangamnilnguq.
B04_16_John_V33	Ungipaatamsi	tamaaken	nekeggmellelgusqellusi	whangamkun.	Nunami	whani	seghleliighllequsi	iwernga	ilutulusi	qayughllak	kayaallqegkaqaqa	nuna.”
B04_17_John_V1	Jesus	taaqsami	akuzineghmeng	sivuglluni	qilagmun	yughaqaq,	“Ataay,	aghneq	kaatuq.	Quulvaghhu	Ighneghen,	quulviisqelluten	Ighneghpenun.
B04_17_John_V2	Ighneq	Atanengllaqaqan	tamaghhanun	yugnun.	Enkaam	kenlengilnguq	unguvalleq	tuun'ngwaa	tamaghhiitnun	tuunegkaghpenun	ellnganun.
B04_17_John_V3	Yuget	kenlengilngughmeng	unguvallengaqut	liitelleghmegteggun	elpek,	taananginaghhaq	Kiyaghneghpigaq,	liitelleghmegteggunllu	Jesus	Christ-a	elpek	kayagtekan.
B04_17_John_V4	Quulvaamaamken	nunami	whani	apeghiillemkun	qepghaqaq	qelghutkan	whangamnun	pisqelluku.
B04_17_John_V5	Enkaangam	Ataay,	manugpenisimalunga	quulvaghnga	quulvalleghmeng	whanga	piksaqemneng	elpenillunga,	sivungani	nunam	ulimallghan.
B04_17_John_V6	“Liitestekaqaqa	natetulen	yugnun	tagivaqaghpenun	nunameng	whaken.	Elpek	piksaqeten	tagivaqaghten	whangamnun.	Qaatkegkaqiit	akuziteten.
B04_17_John_V7	Qenwatlu	liitiit	sangwaat	qamaglluki	tagivaqaghten	elpeneng	pingutangi,
B04_17_John_V8	qayughllak	apeghtuusaqegkaghten	whangamnun	apeghtuusaqegkaqanka	ellngitnun.	Tugukliimiit	enkaam	liitaat	ipapestaaq	tagikaatka	elpeneng.	Ugpeqaatlu	elpenun	kayagtekaatka.
B04_17_John_V9	“Yughaatkengngwaanka	ellngit.	Yughaatkengngunghitanka	yuget	nunam	pingi.	Yughaatkengngwaanka	tamaakut	tagivaqaghten	qayughllak	elpek	pikegketen.
B04_17_John_V10	Qamaglluki	whanga	pinka	elpek	pikaten;	qamaglluki	elpek	piten	whanga	pikanka.	Ellngitgun	aangelleghllaka	kelgulluni	ayuquq.
B04_17_John_V11	Aglaghyaghtungestaghtunga	elpenun,	nunamennanighyaghtungestaghtunga,	iwernga	ellngit	nunamellequt.	Agleghnalghii	Ata,	aflengakiki	aghtughyaghqaanghillghakun	ateghpek,	tagivaqaghten	whangamnun,	ataasiisqelluki	ataasiillemtegetun.
B04_17_John_V12	Ellngitnillunga	aflengakegkaqanka	aghtughyaghqaanghillghakun	ateghpek,	tagivaqaghten	whangamnun.	Kelengakegkaqanka,	enkaam	talwa	ataasiq	iflallghituq,	iwerngaqun	ataasiq	yuuk	iflayaghqaq,	Akuzitet	Igaqegkat	apeghiighesqelluki.
B04_17_John_V13	Whaa	maaten	elpenun	aglaghnaqunga.	Iwernga	tawaten	yughaghtunga	paninang	nunamellunga,	quyalqa	ilungitnitesqelluku	whanga	pima.
B04_17_John_V14	Aapqaqanka	Akuziteten	ellngitnun,	enkaam	nunam	yugan	ugumikii	qayughllak	nunam	pikenghilkangi	whangamtun.
B04_17_John_V15	Yughaatkengngunghitanka	elpenun	iqitesqelluki	nunameng.	Iwernga	yughaatkengngwaanka	elpenun	aflengakaghtesqelluki	Tughneghaghmeng.
B04_17_John_V16	Nunam	pikenghitii	katam	whanga	pikenghitellghatun.
B04_17_John_V17	Aaftiki	elpenun	ipapilleghqun;	akuziten	ipapillghuuq.
B04_17_John_V18	Kayagtekaqanka	nunamun,	kayagtelleghpetun	whanga.
B04_17_John_V19	Ellngit	apalluqluki	whangamneng	aaftekaagunga	elpenun,	ellngitlu	aaftesqelluki	akuzitegpegun	ipapilleghqun.
B04_17_John_V20	“Yughaatkengngwaanka	taakut	yuget,	yughaatkengngwaanka	tamaakutlu	yuget	ugpeqiyaghqat	whangamneng	ungipaqillghitgun	maligsaaghtema.
B04_17_John_V21	Yughaghtunga	qamaglluki	ataasiisqelluki.	Ataay,	yeqay	ilumtegnitestiki	katam	tawaten	elpek	ilumnitelleghpetun,	whanga	elpek	ilugpenitellemtun.	Ilumtegnitestiki	nunam	yuganun	ugpeqesqelluku	elpenun	kayagsimatka.
B04_17_John_V22	Quulvaqaqanka	katam	tawaten	quulvalleghpetun	whanga,	ellngit	ataasiisqelluki	katam	tawaten	whangkutung	ataasiillemtegetun.
B04_17_John_V23	Whanga	ilungitnitunga,	elpek	ilumnituten	ellngit	ataasiightengngwaaghesqelluki.	Enkaam	nunam	yugan	liilleqaat	elpenun	kayagsimatka.	Liilleqaatlu	piniqellghen	tamaakunun	ugpeqilghiinun	whangamneng,	whangamnun	piniqelleghpetun	ayuqelghii.
B04_17_John_V24	“Ataay,	ukut	yuget	tagivaqaghten	whangamnitesuwaqanka,	ellngitnun	esghiisqelluku	nighughqelqa.	Piniqutegpeneng	taana	nighughqelleq	tagivaqaqan	sivungani	nunangllallghem.
B04_17_John_V25	Kaay	elqughutngalghii	Ata,	nunam	yugan	nallukaaten;	whanga	liisimakamken.	Taakutlu	tagivaqaghpek	liisimakaat	elpenun	kayagsimatka.
B04_17_John_V26	Liitestekaqanka	natetulegpeneng.	Liitesimanginaghnaqamken	piniqellghen	whangamnun	ilungitnitesqelluku,	whangallu	ilungitninnalunga.”
B04_18_John_V1	Jesus	yughaneghmeng	taaqluni,	maligsaaghtekullghiit	aghviqat	suqlunghegnekun	aatqelghiik	Kidron-meng.	Taawanguq	inglugkeni	olives-et	uqfigit;	tawavek	aglaqat.
B04_18_John_V2	Jesus-em	uveghpagutistengan,	Judas-em	liisimakegkanga	taana	takukaat,	qayughllak	Jesus-enkut	maligsaaghtekullghiit	tawavek	pituqat.
B04_18_John_V3	Enkaam	Judas	chief	priest-enunllu,	Pharisees-enunllu	aqfatkaq	kelengakistenengllu,	ilangitnengllu	Rome-em	pilluwaghtengitneng.	Taagken	maghyaghquqii	uqfigtuqamun.	Taakut	kelqegkat	guututmeng,	ilangi	unaghsimeng	kumangalghiimeng,	ilangi	kenelghutameng.
B04_18_John_V4	Jesus-em	liisimakegkanga	qamaglluku	salleghqani,	enkaam	takuluki	aaptekii,	“Kina	ivaghaqesteggu?”
B04_18_John_V5	Kiimsiqaat,	“Jesus	Nazareth-eghmii.”	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Whanga	Jesus-nguunga.”	(Judas-lu	uveghpagutista	nekevghalghii	pilluwaghteni.)
B04_18_John_V6	Jesus-em	tawaten	piyisteng,	“Whanga	Jesus-nguunga,”	taakut	yuget	uteghmiiqaghluteng	ulleghaatkat.
B04_18_John_V7	Jesus-em	aaplaataqii,	“Kina	ivaghaqesteggu?”	Kiimsiqaat,	“Jesus	Nazareth-eghmii.”
B04_18_John_V8	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Ungipaatamsi,	whanga	Jesus-nguunga.	Whangangukan	ivaqaghsi	ukut	yuget	aghulaqesteki.”
B04_18_John_V9	Jesus	tawaten	pikaalghii	apeghiighesqelluku	whaten	pilleni,	“Ataay,	tagivaqaghpeneng	talwa	ataasiq	yuuk	iflamangitaqa.”
B04_18_John_V10	Taagken	Simon	Peter-em	savigpani	nusugaghlluku	ilefkaghaghtekaa	Malchus-em	aghenqigneq	sigutnga.	(Malchus,	high	priest-em	qepghaghtelaaqegkanga.)
B04_18_John_V11	Jesus-em	pikaa	Peter,	“Savigpagen	kanaghtigu.	Qayuusiq	meghenghillakuun	Atam	tagivaqaa?”
B04_18_John_V12	Taagken	pilluwaghtet,	umiilgatlu,	kelengakistetlu	Jews-et	takuluku	Jesus,	tuguluku	asighqegkaat.
B04_18_John_V13	Enkaam	sivukluku	aglaatkaat	Annas-mun,	sakinganun	Caiaphas-em.	(Tawani	ayumiqulleghmi	Caiaphas	high	priest-ngulghii.)
B04_18_John_V14	Caiaphas-em	pikaqegkangi	Jews-et	igleghutistet,	pinighataghaghlleqniluku	ataasiq	yuuk	tuqumatkiyaqan	yugnun.
B04_18_John_V15	Simon	Peter-emllu,	ilanganllu	maligsaaghtem	kingunganeng	maligtekaak	Jesus.	High	priest-em	liisimakegkanga	aallgha	maligsaaghta.	Enkaam	legan	taam	maligsaaghtem	maligtekaa	Jesus,	high	priest-em	mangteghaan	uvitanganun.
B04_18_John_V16	Peter	nekevghamaluku	amigem	tungangani,	aallghan	maligsaaghtem,	high	priest-em	liisimakegkaan,	aanluni	aleghqughluku	aghnaghaq	amigniighta	iteghtestekaa	Peter.
B04_18_John_V17	Aghnaghaam	amigniightem	aaptekaa	Peter,	“Elpekluu	taam	yugem	maligsaaghtekaten?”	Peter-em	kiimsiqaa,	“Nakaa!	Maligsaaghtekenghitaanga!”
B04_18_John_V18	Qepghaghtetlu	kelengakistetlu	charcoal-meng	kumaghtikaalghiit	ughugsighnaluteng	qayughllak	aqlaghalnguq.	Peter-llu	tawani	ughugsiqaq.
B04_18_John_V19	Qama	ilungani	high	priest-em	aapqughwaaqaa	Jesus,	maligsaaghtenganengllu	apeghtughillghanengllu.
B04_18_John_V20	Jesus-em	kiimsiqaa,	“Yugtuqami	akuziiqunga.	Quunpeng	apeghtughiiqunga	qamaglluteng	Jews-et	qerngughutfigitni,	synagogue-ni,	Temple-millu.	Sangwaa	alngunak	aksaqluku	akuzitkigataqa.
B04_18_John_V21	Enkaam	sangama	aapqughwaaghsinga?	Aaptiki	yuget	nagatkat	apeghtughillemneng.	Liisimakaat	sameng	pimatka.”
B04_18_John_V22	Jesus	tawaten	piyan	kelengakistem	tunganganilnguum	qasaghlluku	aaptekaa,	“Sangan	tawaten	kiimsighsigu	high	priest-a?”
B04_18_John_V23	Jesus-em	kiimsiqaa,	“Sameng	seghletun	akuzimakuma,	aapghu	seghletun	akuzilqa.	Iwernga	elqughusimakuma	sangama	qasaghsinga?”
B04_18_John_V24	Taagken	Annas-em,	aglaatestekaa	Jesus	asighqengngaan	Caiaphas-mun,	high	priest-mun.
B04_18_John_V25	Simon	Peter	nekevghaghmi	ughugsiimaluku	aaptekaat,	“Elpekluu	maligsaaghtekaten	taam	yugem?”	Peter	mesighaqaq,	“Nakaa!	Maligsaaghtekenghitaanga!”
B04_18_John_V26	Ataasiq	qepghaghtenga	high	priest-em	tawanlenguq,	ilakwaagha	yugem,	Peter-em	sigutngighaghtekaan.	Qepghaghtem	aaptekaa,	“Esghaghsugnisiken	ellnganilluten	olives-meng	uqfigtuqami?”
B04_18_John_V27	Allameng	Peter	mesighaghlaataqaq.	Aga	tawaninginaq	rooster-a	qalghiqaq.
B04_18_John_V28	Taagken	unaangupiglluku	Jews-et	igleghutistengita	aglaatkaat	Jesus	Caiaphas-em	mangteghaaneng,	Rome-em	umiilegpagan	palace-nganun.	Taakut	igleghutistet	iitghumangilnguut	palace-mun,	qayughllak	ukmangighsaghwaaqaalghiit	Moses-em	Liilightuusaan	pisqellghatun	neghnaluteng	Passover-mi.
B04_18_John_V29	Enkaam	Pilate-em	aanvikluki	aaptekii,	“Sameng	anaggusimafta	una	yuuk?”
B04_18_John_V30	Kiimsiqaat,	“Una	yuuk	taginnayanghitaghput	elpenun	anaggusimangisaqan.”
B04_18_John_V31	Pilate-em	pikii,	“Aglaalluku	elpesineng	nanqigteggu	Liilightuusaghpesi	pisqellghatun.”	Pikaat,	“Rome-em	liilightuusiitni	whangkuta	Jews-eni	aghyuughisiqsaghqaqenghitaghput	tuqutilleq.”
B04_18_John_V32	(Tawaten	akuzillghita	apeghiiqaat	Jesus-em	apellgha	naten	tuqulleghqamineng.)
B04_18_John_V33	Taagken	Pilate	itenqiglluni	palace-mun,	tagitesluku	Jesus	aaptekaa,	“Elpaak	umiilkaten	Jews-et?”
B04_18_John_V34	Jesus-em	kiimsiqaa,	“Elpeneng	aapsinga	tawaten?	Nalighmeng	kitum	ungipaatkaqaaten	whangamneng?”
B04_18_John_V35	Pilate-em	kiimsiqaa,	“Sumeghpeni	Jew-nguzingaa?	Elpek	katam	yugpek,	chief	priest-etlu	tagitkaqaaten	whangamnun.	Sameng	anaggusimazin?”
B04_18_John_V36	Jesus-em	pikaa,	“Ataneghpagulqa	uum	nunam	pikenghitaa.	Ataneghpagulqa	nunameng	pinguyaqan,	qepghaghtema	pilluwaannayaghaatnga	Jews-enun	tuunefqaama	pisqellunga.	Iwernga	Ataneghpagulqa	nunameng	pingunghituq.”
B04_18_John_V37	Pilate-em	pikaa,	“Taawa	umiilguftuten!”	Jesus-em	pikaa,	“Elpek	umiilguniighpenga.	Tagikaagunga	nunamun	una	apalluqluku:	apeghnaluku	ipapighqelleq	yugnun;	taana	apalluqluku	allgeqaagunga.	Qamaglluni	piniqingalghii	ipapilleghmeng	nagatkayuguuq	whangamnun.”
B04_18_John_V38	Pilate-em	aaptekaa,	“Sangaawa	ipapighqelleq?”	Tawaten	piluni	Jews-et	aanviklaataqii.	Pikii,	“Una	yuuk	naalkefikenghitaqa	sameng	anaggusimatanga	aghyuughusighqameng.
B04_18_John_V39	Iwernga	elpesi	nangaghneqegkesi,	Passover-mi	whangamnun	aanestesugaqegkesi	ataasiq	anusimingllaghaq.	Itemutesugestegguu	una	umiilga	Jews-et?”
B04_18_John_V40	Akilghuukat,	“Nakaa,	ellnga	pifqaan,	Barabbas	aanestigu!”	(Barabbas	wayaghniightengulghii.)
B04_19_John_V1	Enkaam	Pilate-em	qelghutkaa	iqitulluku	Jesus	kagsagmigesqelluku.
B04_19_John_V2	Pilluwaghtet	qaghpangllaqaat	sikughllugtuqameng	avayameng.	Aatesluku	qaghpa	Jesus-em	naasqwakun,	esnegrukegtagnengllu	atkuyaaqaat.
B04_19_John_V3	Taagken	Jesus	takuluku	legasiighwaatkegkaat,	“Hail,	Quulvaghamken,	Umiilgat	Jews-et!”	qasaghtaataqaatlu.
B04_19_John_V4	Pilate-em	aaneqiglluni	pikii	Jews-et,	“Esghaghteggu,	aanutesnaqaqa	Jesus	elpesinun,	liigikesqellusi	naalkefikenghitaqa	anaggutelleghmeng.”
B04_19_John_V5	Taagken	Jesus	aanusaqmegteggu	qaghpaluni	sikughllugmeng,	atkuyaaghlunillu	esnegrukegtagneng	ayuqeftuq.	Pilate-em	pikii	Jews-et,	“Taanata	yuuk!	Esghaqaghtegguqun!”
B04_19_John_V6	Chief	priest-etlu,	kelengakistetlu	Jews-et	esghaghluku	Jesus	akilghuutkat,	“Qaquuraghtestigu!	Qaquuraghtestigu!”	Iwernga	Pilate-em	pikii,	“Elpesineng	aghulaqulluku	qaquuragteggu,	qayughllak	whanga	naalkefikenghitaqa	sameng	anaggutelleghmeng.”
B04_19_John_V7	Jews-et	pikaat,	“Liilightuusamnni	tuqusaghqaaguq,	qayughllak	Ighneqniluni	Kiyaghneghmun	pikaaguq.”
B04_19_John_V8	Pilate-em	nagalluki	tawaten	pilghiit	wataqaaghaq	alingegkaq.
B04_19_John_V9	Itenqiglluni	palace-mun	aaptekaa	Jesus,	“Naken	pinguzin?”	Iwernga	Jesus-em	kiimsiimangitkaa.
B04_19_John_V10	Pilate-em	aaptekaa,	“Aleghqughyunghisingaa?	Liisimakenghisiguu	itemutesqennayaqemken,	nalighmeng	qaquuriisqennayaqemken?”
B04_19_John_V11	Jesus-em	kiimsiqaa,	“Qeleghnaanghitaten	pilluwaghtet	qaquuriisqellunga	wetkuqun	Kiyaghneghem	piyukelqegkagu.	Enkaam	yuuk	tagitisteka	seghleghqelleghtaaghatuq	elpeneng.”
B04_19_John_V12	Kingunganeng	taam	Pilate-em	itemunnaqutkegkaqsaqanga	Jesus,	iwernga	Jews-et	akilghuukat,	“Kina	alngunak	ellmineng	umiilengllalghii,	anguyaguuq	Caesar-mun.	Itemuskuvgu	taana	yuuk	ilakumtaaqenghitaaten	Caesar-em.”
B04_19_John_V13	Pilate-em	nagalluki	taakut	akuzitet,	aanutestekaa	Jesus,	Stone	Pavement-mun.	(Hebrew-stun	taana	ateq	Gabbatha-ngulghii.)	Taagken	Pilate	aqumegkaq	nanqigtivigem	aqumutaakun.
B04_19_John_V14	(Aghneghem	qukaghnaqegkanga	Yataaghqillghem	Aghneghani	Passover-mun.)	Pilate-em	pikii	Jews-et,	“Taawa	Umiilegsi!”
B04_19_John_V15	Jews-et	akilghuutkat,	“Sanguluku,	sanguluku,	qaquuraghtestigu!”	Pilate-em	aaptekii,	“Whangamnun	qaquuraghtestesugestegguu	umiilegsi?”	Chief	priest-et	kiimsiqaat,	“Caesar-nginaghhaaguq	umiilegput.”
B04_19_John_V16	Enkaam	Pilate-em	pegtekaa	Jesus	ellngitnun	qaquuriisqelluku.
B04_19_John_V17	Taagken	pilluwaghtet	aanutkaat	Jesus	uyamigtesluku	qaquuraa.	Aglaatkaat	tawavek	atilqelghiimun,	“Yugem	Naasqwan	Nenga.”	(Taana	Hebrew-stun,	Golgotha-ngulghii.)
B04_19_John_V18	Tawani	qaquuraqaat,	maalghuklu	yugek	maligullukek	qaquuraqagket.	Aallgha	aghenqigneghanilluku,	ilanga	saghumigneghanilluku,	Jesus	qukaanilluku.
B04_19_John_V19	Pilate-em	igaqestekaqegkanga,	Jesus	Nazareth-eghmii,	Umiilgat	Jews-et.	Taagken	nekegtestekaa	qaquuraakun	Jesus-em.
B04_19_John_V20	Taana	igaqegkaalghii	Hebrew-t,	Latin-et,	Greek-et	ulungistun.	Uglalghiit	Jews-et	atightuqaat,	qayughllak	qaquuraghviga	Jesus-em	qantaghanlenguq	Jerusalem-emeng.
B04_19_John_V21	Jews-et	chief	priest-ngita	takuluku	Pilate	pikaat,	“Tawaten	igaqsaghqaanghisaghtuq,	‘Umiilgat	Jews-et.’	Whaten	igaqsaghqaayaghtuq,	‘Una	yuuk	pikaaguq,	Whanga	Umiilkaatnga	Jews-et.’”
B04_19_John_V22	Pilate-em	pikii,	“Igaqestekaqa	tawatennaqnguuq.”
B04_19_John_V23	Pilluwaghtet	tuquuqaasamegteggu	Jesus	qaquuramun	tuguluki	aatkii,	estamaghqegkiit,	ataasikaghtaan	tugulaatkat.	Ataasik	atkuyaaghqek	kelungunatek	ulimaaghek	tuuymegneng	kenimegnun.
B04_19_John_V24	Pilluwaghtet	pikat,	“Taakuk	iighwiigkenka	ateghtiiraaghusiqeltekek.”	Tawaten	pilleghmegteggun	Akuzitet	Igaqegkat	apeghiightestekiit	whaten	pillghit:	“Aatkanka	nengiitkaqiit,	enkaam	taakuk	atkuyaaghegka	ateghtiiraaghusiqegkaqagket.”
B04_19_John_V25	Pilluwaghtet	tawaten	pimaluki,	taawanguq	estamat	aghnat	nekevghallghiit	qaquram	tungangani:	Jesus-em	naanga,	naanganllu	anglegutanga,	Mary-llu	Clopas-em	nulighha,	Mary-llu	Magdala-ghmii.
B04_19_John_V26	Jesus-em	esghaqakek	naanillu,	piniqegkanillu	maligsaaghteni	nekevghalghiik	tawani.	Naani	pikaa,	“Aghnami	whani,	taana	ighneliitan.”
B04_19_John_V27	Taagken	maligsaaghteni	pikaa,	“Taana	naaliitan.”	Taagken	kenlanga	maligsaaghtengan	aglaatkaa	ellmeggnun.
B04_19_John_V28	Taam	kingunganeng	Jesus-em	liisimakegkaa	sangwaa	tamaghhaghmi	whaa	apeghiilghii.	Enkaam	Akuzitet	Igaqegkat	apeghiighesqelluki	whaten	pikaq,	“Meqsugtunga.”
B04_19_John_V29	Taawanguq	sagneghwaaq	quwaalghiimeng	wine-meng	imalek.	Pilluwaghtet	nekeglluku	nepsagusiq	hyssop-em	unaghsiighwaaghakun,	nepluku	wine-mun	Jesus-em	qaanghanun	nengugutkaat.
B04_19_John_V30	Jesus-em	naasiighluku	wine-a,	pikaq,	“Taawa	apeghiightuq.”	Guughtutkelluku	taghneghagni	pegtekakek.
B04_19_John_V31	Yataaghqivigutanganeng	Aghneq,	Jews-et	igleghutistengita	taakut	yugusit	qaquurametesunghilkangit,	qayughllak	unaamingani	Sabbath-ngumaghmi,	Passover-emllu	aghneqegkanga.	Enkaam	Pilate-mun	qelghutesqegkiit	pilluwaghtenun	ayemqiisqelluki	ighungit	tuquragkiighesqelluki,	iqinnaluki	qaquuriitneng.
B04_19_John_V32	Taagken	pilluwaghtet	takuluku	sivuliq	yuuk,	ayemquqagket	ighukek,	aallghanllu	ighukek	ayemquqagket.	Taakuk	qaquuraqaqegkegket	maligullukek	Jesus-mun.
B04_19_John_V33	Jesus-em	ighukek	ayemsimangilkegket	qayughllak	takuyaqmegteggu	tuqungwaaghluni	ayuqeftuq.
B04_19_John_V34	Iwernga	ataasim	pilluwaghtem	panamineng	kenuqaqaa	Jesus	saningakun.	Tawaninginaq	aakwlu	meqlu	maaqegkak.
B04_19_John_V35	(Esghapakam	tamaaken	aapghii	tamaakut.	Akuzitkegkii	ipanguut,	liisimakuqlu	ungipaqngwaa	ipapilleq.	Aapghii	tamaakut	elpesillu	ugpeghesqellusi.)
B04_19_John_V36	Tamaakut	apeghiiqaagut	Akuzitet	Igaqegkat	apeghiighesqelluki:	“Talwa	ataasiq	neghqwaagha	ayemyaghqaanghituq.”
B04_19_John_V37	Whatenllu	Akuzitet	Igaqegkat	pikaagut,	“Esghapaglleqaat	panakaghteng.”
B04_19_John_V38	Taam	kingunganeng	yugem	Arimathea-ghmiim,	aatqelghiim	Joseph-meng,	Jesus-em	yugusii	aghulaqutkaa	Pilate-em	angeghyagu.	(Joseph	maligsaaghtekegkanga	Jesus-em,	iwernga	aksaqluku	pikaalghii	alingluni	Jews-et	igleghutistengitneng.)
B04_19_John_V39	Nicodemus-em	maligtekaa	Joseph,	kelqelluni	tepengllaasimeng	100	pounds,	myrrh-enkugneng,	aloes-enkugneng	akumutngalghiigneng.	(Taana	Nicodemus	sivunghani	Jesus-mun	pikaalghii	unugmi.)
B04_19_John_V40	Taakuk	yugek	aghulaqulluku	Jesus-em	yugusii	tepengllaghqumaan	iimgutkaak	qiipaghaghqun.	(Tawaten	Jews-et	lliivghaqegkangit	yuget	tuqukat.)
B04_19_John_V41	Jesus-em	qaquuraghvigan	tungangani	taawanguq	garden-a	uqfigtuqaq.	Tawanteftuq	nutaghaghlluk	lliveq,	salin	lliveghvikellghilnguq.
B04_19_John_V42	Taayughqengngulghiik	qayughllak	Jews-et	Yataaghqefikegkangat	Aghneq	taana,	enkaam	taaggun	qantaghanlengughqun	lliifqaak.
B04_20_John_V1	Sivulighmi	aghneghani	santillghem,	Mary	Magdala-ghmii	lliveghtekaq	salin	mamlegluku.	Esghaqaa	uyghagrugllak	iqilluni	lliivghem	paaynganeng.
B04_20_John_V2	Enkaam	ketanqusnaq	aglaqaq	Simon	Peter-munllu	ilanganunllu	maligsaaghtemun,	Jesus-em	piniqegkaanun.	Mary-m	pikakek,	“Nuugsimaat	Ataneq	lliivghaneng.	Nallukaghput	navek	llimatanga.”
B04_20_John_V3	Enkaam	Peter-enkuk	aallghallu	maligsaaghta	lliveghtekak
B04_20_John_V4	ketanqusnaq.	Aallgha	Peter-meng	sukalnguq,	enkaam	sivukluni	kaatkaq.
B04_20_John_V5	Guughlluni	qineghsalghiimi	esghaqii	qiipaghaat,	iwernga	iitghumangilnguq.
B04_20_John_V6	Kingungiighhaaneng	Simon	Peter	kaalluni	iitqaq	lliveghmun,	esghaqii	qiipaghaat	tawani.
B04_20_John_V7	Esghaqaallu	allakaghmi	qiipaghaq	Jesus-em	naasqwakun	iimgutngayalghii.
B04_20_John_V8	Taagken	aallgha	maligsaaghta	kaasuwhaaqaq	lliveghmun	iitqaq.	Esghaghyamigu	ugpeqegkaa	Jesus.
B04_20_John_V9	Salin	esghallghilluki	liigikumangitkangak	Akuzitnilnguq	Igaqegkaq	unguvapestaaghyaghqaaniluku	tuqulleghmeng.
B04_20_John_V10	Taagken	maligsaaghtek	aglaqak	nemegnun.
B04_20_John_V11	Iwernga	lliveghmi	Mary	qiyiqegkaq.	Qiyanqusiin	guughlluni	ilutmun	qineghsalghiimi,
B04_20_John_V12	esghaqakek	maalghuk	yaqulgek	atkuyaalgek	qatelghiimeng.	Aqumgaftuk	Jesus-em	yugusiin	lliviksaqangakun,	aallgha	naasqwan	nengakun,	ilanga	itegaan	nengakun.
B04_20_John_V13	Aaptekaak,	“Aghnaq,	sangavek	qiyaaqsin?”	Kiimsiqakek,	“Nuugsimaat	Atanqa.	Nallukaqa	navek	llimatangat.”
B04_20_John_V14	Mary	tawaten	piluni	qiivutkelluku	esghaqaa	Jesus	nekevghalghii,	iwernga	nallukegkaa	Jesus-ngutanga.
B04_20_John_V15	Jesus-em	aaptekaa,	“Aghnaq,	sangavek	qiyaaqsin?	Kina	ivaghaqsigu?”	Mary-m	piitesiighaghtenguniluku	pikaqsaqanga,	enkaam	pikaa,	“Yuguniiq,	nusugumakuvgu	ungipaatinga	navek	llimaten,	enkaam	aqfalleqaqa.”
B04_20_John_V16	Jesus-em	pikaa,	“Mary”.	Mary-m	qiivluku	pikaa	Hebrew-stun,	“Rabboni”.	(Whaten	pisiq,	“Apeghtughista”.)
B04_20_John_V17	Jesus-em	pikaa,	“Saaftegpenanga,	salin	mayiigatunga	Atamun.	Iwernga	aglaghluten	anglegutemnun	ungipaannaketen,	‘Mayughnaqunga	Atamnun,	elpesillu	Atagpesinun,	Kiyaghnemnun,	elpesillu	Kiyaghneghpesinun.’”
B04_20_John_V18	Mary	Magdala-ghmii	aglaghluni	maligsaaghtenun	pikii,	“Esghaamaaqa	Ataneq.”	Enkaam	ungipaatkiillu	Jesus-em	ungipaatesqellghaneng.
B04_20_John_V19	Sivuliilghii	aghnegha	santillghem.	Ighivgaani	tawani	maligsaaghtet	qerngughutkat.	Alingluteng	Jews-et	igleghutistengitneng,	amiget	maghqatngastekiit.	Jesus	tagiluni	akulangitgun	nekevluni	pikii,	“Nekeggmelleq	elpesinilli.”
B04_20_John_V20	Tawaten	piluni,	kelgutkii	iiggenillu	saninillu,	enkaam	maligsaaghtet	quyaghllakat	esghaghluku	Ataneq.
B04_20_John_V21	Taagken	Jesus-em	pilaataqii,	“Nekeggmelleq	elpesinilli.	Katam	tawaten	Atam	kayagtellghatun	whanga,	tawateghpigaq	kayagtamsi.”
B04_20_John_V22	Tawaten	piluni,	aneghziigluki	pikii,	“Tuguklightekek	Agleghnalghiik	Taghneghak.
B04_20_John_V23	Seghevuskufsiki	kinkut	alngunak	seghleghqellghitneng,	Kiyaghneghem	seghevulleqii.	Seghevunneghilkufsiki,	Kiyaghneghem	seghevunnaanghitii.”
B04_20_John_V24	Thomas,	(aatghan	aallgha	Malghi)	maligsaaghtenisimangilnguq	Jesus-em	takwaaqngaki.	Thomas	qula	maalghuk	siipneqegkangat	maligsaaghtet.
B04_20_John_V25	Ilangita	maligsaaghtet	ungipaatkaat	Thomas,	“Esghaamaaghput	Ataneq!”	Iwernga	Thomas-em	pikii,	“Ugpeqnaanghitaqa	wetkuqun	esghaqumki	tuquuqallghi	iigganilnguut.	Ugpeqnaanghitaqallu	wetkuqun	saaftekumki	tuquuqallghetlu,	saninganilnguqlu	panalleq.”
B04_20_John_V26	Santilleq	ataasiq	atughluku	maligsaaghtet	tawanllaataqat	mangteghami,	Thomas-llu	tawanlenguq.	Amiget	maghqatngaghngaata	Jesus-em	iteghvikluki	nekevegkaq	akulangitgun.	Pikii,	“Nekeggmelleq	elpesinilli.”
B04_20_John_V27	Taagken	Thomas	pikaa,	“Esghaghluki	iiggenka	saaftiki,	saaftigullu	sanika.	Aygughitiqefqaavegngam,	ugpeghi.”
B04_20_John_V28	Thomas-em	pikaa,	“Atanemni,	Kiyaghnemni!”
B04_20_John_V29	Taagken	Jesus-em	pikaa,	“Ugpeqiiten	qayughllak	esghaqevnga.	Quyanaghhalek	tamaakut	ugpelghiit	esghaghpenanga.”
B04_20_John_V30	Jesus	uglaghngaan	allaaghlluwhaghtiighaataqaaguq	esghaamanghitni	maligsaaghtemi,	igaqumangilnguugut	ukuni	igani.
B04_20_John_V31	Iwernga	ukut	igaqngalghiit	igaqegkaagut	elpesinun	ugpeqesqelluku	Jesus,	Christ-angutanga,	Ighnegha	Kiyaghneghem.	Ugpeqelleghpesigun	unguvallengellequsi	Aatghakun.
B04_21_John_V1	Taakwaningani	Jesus	esghaghteslaataqaq	maligsaaghteminun	Naayvami	Tiberias-mi.	Whaten	esghaghtestekaaguq.
B04_21_John_V2	Ilanginguq	maligsaaghtem	qerngaghmetkat	naayvami.	Simon	Peter-enkunguftut,	Thomas-enkut	(aatghan	aallgha	Malghi),	Nathanael-enkut,	Cana-meng	pi	Galilee-melngughmeng,	Zebedee-mllu	ighneghqek,	alla	maalghuk	maligsaaghtek.
B04_21_John_V3	Simon	Peter-em	pikii,	“Iqalliniighyaghnaqunga.”	Pikaat,	“Maliggnaqamken”.	Enkaam	angyakun	kelluteng	unulqusiq	iqalluggnaqutkegkaayalghiit,	iwernga	pikengumangitkat.
B04_21_John_V4	Aghtaghaghaqaallu	maligsaaghtet	esghaqaat	Jesus	nekevghalghii	esnemi,	iwernga	kinangutanga	nallukegkangat.
B04_21_John_V5	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Ilakumtaamni,	iqalluggneghitsii?”	Kiimsiqaat,	“Nakaa”.
B04_21_John_V6	Pikii,	“Ateghteggu	negaghpagsi	angyaghpesi	aghenqigneghakun,	enkaam	pikengellequsi.”	Pisqellghatun	pikat.	Naapqaghighllakat	repall	negaghpak	qaakneghmeng	aghtuqaat	angyamun.
B04_21_John_V7	Maligsaaghtem	Jesus-em	piniqegkaan	pikaa	Peter,	“Atanghuuq!”	Simon	Peter-em	nagaqughyamigu	pilugugluni	qetgeqaq	meghmun.	(Peter	amsikaghtekaayalghii	qepghaghnaluni.)
B04_21_John_V8	Maligsaaghtet	angyamelnguut	esnamun	qamuqaat	naapqaghiighngalghii	negaghpak.	Awavantepanghilnguut	quutmeng,	entaqun	100	yards	uyatutkalghiit.
B04_21_John_V9	Maligsaaghtet	uuglleghaasalghiimeng	quutmun	esghaqagket	aniighwtekak	kenghek,	iqallugmeng	ugkelgek.	Taawallu	neqekrangllalguftuq.
B04_21_John_V10	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Tagitek	iqallugtaghpesineng.”
B04_21_John_V11	Enkaam	Simon	Peter	angyamun	uuglluni	sayukaa	negaghpak	quutmun.	Taawanguq	153-nguftut	iqallugpaghqughllaget	naaptekat,	naqamllu	negaghpak	piigumangilnguq.
B04_21_John_V12	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Neghyaghtughtek.”	Nalighhiiniita	maligsaaghtet	aapneghmeng	tetukaat	kinangutanga,	liisimakluku	Atanghutanga.
B04_21_John_V13	Jesus-em	tuguluku	neqekrangllaq	tunquqaa	ellngitnun,	iqallugetlu	tawaten	pikii.
B04_21_John_V14	Taana	pingayiitkegkanga	Jesus-em	esghaghtestellgha	maligsaaghteminun,	unguvaghtestelleghmi	kingunganeng.
B04_21_John_V15	Taaqsameng	neneghmeng	Jesus-em	aaptekaa	Simon	Peter,	“Simon,	ighnegha	John-em,	piniqataghaghsingaa	ukuneng?”	Kiimsiqaa,	“Aa-a	Ataneq,	liisimakaghpenga	piniqegkemken.”	Jesus-em	pikaa,	“Neghqiki	penniighaghaanka.”
B04_21_John_V16	Alla	Jesus-em	aaptekaa,	“Simon,	ighnegha	John-em,	piniqsingaa?”	Kiimsiqaa,	“Aa-a	Ataneq,	liisimakaghpenga	piniqegkemken.”	Jesus-em	pikaa,	“Aflengakiki	penniighenka.”
B04_21_John_V17	Pingayiitkun	aaptekaa,	“Simon,	ighnegha	John-em,	piniqsingaa?”	Peter	seghleghyukaq,	qayughllak	Jesus-em	pingayuneng	aaptekanga,	“Piniqsingaa?”	Peter-em	kiimsiqaa,	“Ataneq,	liisimakan	sangwaa	qamaglluku.	Liisimakaghpenga	piniqegkemken.”	Jesus-em	pikaa,	“Neghqiki	penniighenka.
B04_21_John_V18	Ipa	ungipaatamken,	nukalpigaaluten	elpeneng	tafsiluten	navek	piyukelleghpenun	piiquten.	Iwernga	nanevgaquvek,	iiggeten	kevegluki,	kitum	tafsiluten	aglaalleqaaten	takuyukegkaqenghilkegpenun.”
B04_21_John_V19	Tawaten	pilleghmikun	Jesus-em	ungipaatnguftaa	Peter	naten	tuquyaghqaatanga,	enkaam	tuqulleghmikun	quulvaghyaghqaa	Kiyaghneq.	Taagken	Jesus-em	pikaa	Peter,	“Maligtinga.”
B04_21_John_V20	Peter-em	qiivluni	esghaqaa	maligsaaghta	Jesus-em	piniqegkaa	maligullghii.	(Taananguuq	maligsaaghta	ayaqightekaq	Jesus-kun	neghuutnguluteng	aaptikaq,	“Ataneq,	kitum	uveghpagunnaqaten?”)
B04_21_John_V21	Peter-em	esghaghluku	taana	maligsaaghta,	aaptekaa	Jesus,	“Ataneq,	ellngangam	salleqa?”
B04_21_John_V22	Jesus-em	kiimsiqaa,	“Kiyaghtesukumkun	kenlanga	tagillemnun,	agghitkesaghqaqenghitan	elpek.	Maligtengnginaghnga.”
B04_21_John_V23	Enkaam	ugpeqani	ungipaq	mingitkaq,	taana	maligsaaghta	tuqunaanghinniluku.	Iwernga	Jesus-em	pimangitaa	tuqunaanghinniluku.	Whaten	pikaaguq,	“Kiyaghtesukumkun	kenlanga	tagillemnun,	agghitkesaghqaqenghitan	elpek.”
B04_21_John_V24	Ellnganguuq	maligsaaghta	aapghiiqelghii	tamaaken	pilleghneng,	igaquqaqiillu	tamaakut.	Liisimakaput	aapqii	ipanguut.
B04_21_John_V25	Uglaapigtut	igaqullghilnguut	Jesus-em	pikii.	Igaquqaayaqumeng	qamaglluteng	sumemni	entaqun	iingunaghmi	nuna	llivigiinnayaghaa	igalghuteghllagnun.
B05_01_Acts_V1	Theophilus,	igangllaqaqsuwhaamkun	igaqegkaqaqa	qamagtengngwaaghluku	Jesus-em	qepghallghallu	apeghtughillghallu,	piinlighyuwhaallghaneng	kenlanga	Kiyaghneghem	qilagmun	mayughtesleghanun.	Sivukluni	nakmiiqaaguq	apostle-kaghqameng	enkaam	apeghtughllakaqii	uglapiglleghhiimeng	aghtughyaghqaanghillghakun	Agleghnalghiim	Taghnegham.	Taakwaningani	anguyagita	qaquuraghluku	tuqutkaqaat	iwernga	pingayut	aghneghet	atughluki	unguvaqaaguq.	Unguvalleghmi	kingunganeng	40	aghneq	nunametkaaguq,	enkaam	uglaapiglluku	apostle-enun	esghaghtestaataqaaguq	ipapestaaq	unguvaamaniluni,	aleghqughnalukillu	Ataneghpagullghaneng	Kiyaghneghem.	Allameng	qerngughusata	Jesus-em	liilightuqii	apostle-et,	“Wataghllak	aghulaqegpenasi	Jerusalem-emeng	kenlanga	allgeghtelleghpesinun	Agleghnalghiik	Taghneghak.	Atama	akequsaqegkaqaak	tuunelleqnilukek	elpesinun	katam	tawaten	apellemtun.	John	paaptaayeghikaaguq	meghqun,	iwernga	Atama	paaptaayeyaghtungestaghiisi	Agleghnalghiigneng	Taghneghagneng.”	Taakusta	igaqegkanka	igangllaqaqsuwhaamkun.
B05_01_Acts_V6	Sivungiighhaani	Jesus-em	mayulleghqaan	qilagmun,	apostle-et	qerngughusameng	aaptekaat	Jesus,	“Ataneq,	Israel-em	atanghutillgha	pisneqiggnaqsiguu?”
B05_01_Acts_V7	Jesus-em	pikii,	“Atanginaghhaghma	liisimakii	qayughllak	ellngan	aghtughyaghqaanghilleghmikun	uspeqegkaqii.	Elpesi	liisimaksaghqaqenghitasi	sangwaat	qakun	pilleghqii.
B05_01_Acts_V8	Iwernga	aghtughyaghqaanghillengellequsi	Agleghnalghiik	Taghneghak	iitqayek	ilugpesinun.	Taagken	ungipaqelleqaghpesinga	Jerusalem-emi,	Judea-mi,	Samaria-mi,	uyavaghpanillu	nunani.”
B05_01_Acts_V9	Akuzineghmeng	taaqngan	Kiyaghneghem	mayughtestekaa	qilagmun.	Esghapagusimaluku	qilawaaghem	talughtekaa	esghaamallghitneng.
B05_01_Acts_V10	Apostle-et	quulmun	esghapagtuusimaluki,	maalghuk	yugek	qatelghiimeng	aatkaqelghiik	aliighaghtekak	saaghwitgun.
B05_01_Acts_V11	Pikiik,	“Yugitni	Galilee-m,	sangafsi	quulmun	esghapagtuutaqetsi?	Taagna	Jesus	Kiyaghneghem	mayughtestekanga	ukigyaghqaaguq	esghapalleghpesistungwaaq	mayullghatun	qilagmun.”
B05_01_Acts_V12	Taagken	apostle-et	uteghniqat	Jerusalem-emun	Mount	Olives-meng.	Mount	Olives	qantaghaghhanlenguq	Jerusalem-emeng.
B05_01_Acts_V13	Peter-enkut,	John-enkut,	James-enkut,	Andrew-nkut,	Philip-enkut,	Thomas-enkut,	Bartholomew-nkut,	Matthew-nkut,	James,	ighnegha	Alphaeus-em,	Judas,	ighnegha	James-em,	Simon	Zealot-a,	kaalluteng	Jerusalem-emun	mayuqat	qemtamun	nayumeggnun.
B05_01_Acts_V14	Taakut	apostle-et,	aghnatlu	ugpeqat,	Mary-llu	Jesus-em	naanga,	Jesus-em	anglegutangillu	qerngughulluteng	elngaatall	ipapighqelluteng	yughaghaqelghiit	ataasistun.
B05_01_Acts_V15	Taagken	qafsinat	aghneghet	atughluki	ugpeqat	qerngughutkat,	entaqun	120-nguut.	Tawani	Peter-em	nekevluni	pikii,
B05_01_Acts_V16	“Ugpeqaalgutemni,	neqamikaghsi	qepghalgutfut	Judas,	Jesus-em	nakmikegkaa.	Ayumirugllak	Agleghnalghiim	Taghnegham	uuknaliqutkegkaqaa	David-kun.	Taana	uuknaliqelleq	apeghiiqaaguq	Judas-em	uveghpagutaqngagu	Jesus.	Jesus-em	tugiistengi	Judas-em	maghyaghquqaqii,	enkaam	akileghtuusangegkaaguq	manimeng.	Taagken	akileghtuusamineng	nunangluni	qemitkaaguq	ellmineng	tawani.	Yugusii	ifkaghyalghiimi	quupaghtekaq	repall	ighneghii	aanqaghlluteng.	Jerusalem-eghmiit	nagaqughyamegteggu	tuqumatanga	tawani	nunami,	atiqaat	taana	nuna	Akeldama-meng,	whaten	pisiq,	‘Nuna	aaghwqegkaq.’”
B05_01_Acts_V20	Peter-em	nagneghutkii,	“David	whaten	igaqaaguq	Psalms-mi:	‘Mangteghaa	paaghqiilli,	allamengllu	kina	alngunak	tawantefqaami	pili.’	Igaqegkaalghiillu	whaten,	‘Qepghaqaa	kitumun	tugusaqumi.’
B05_01_Acts_V21	“Enkaam	nakmiighelta	apostle-kaghqameng	tugusqelluku	Judas-em	qepghaqaqsaqanga.	Kina	nakmikelteggu	maligsaaghikaq	whangkunneng	igleghalgusighaqngamteggu	Jesus.
