Tawantekaalghii	ima	John-em	ungipaqellghaneng	paaptaayelleq	kenlanga	Kiyaghneghem	mayughtestellghanun	Jesus	qilagmun.	Enkaam	whangkunnun	maligulluni	ungipaghli	ellminunllu	esghaamaniluku	Jesus	unguvallghan	kingunganeng.”
B05_01_Acts_V23	Enkaam	ugpeqat	nakmikegkagket	maalghuk	yugek:	Matthias-enkuk,	Joseph	Justus-enkuk,	allameng	atelek	Barsabbas-meng.
B05_01_Acts_V24	Taagken	yughaqat,	“Ataneq,	simighistekaghqangyugaqukut	Judas-mun,	qayughllak	uniskanga	qepghaqani	nekaghqaminun	aglalghii.	Qamaglluku	umyugaq	liisimakan.	Enkaam	naliq	nakmiksigu	apostle-nguluku	qepghaghtekaghqaq	elpenun?”
B05_01_Acts_V26	Taagken	maalghuk	uyghagek	samun	kanaghllukek	aghulasaqmegteggu	aallgha	aanqaghsalghiimi	Matthias-nguftuq	nakmikegkaq.	Enkaam	ilatkaq	qula	ataasiq	siipneqluku	apostle-enun.
B05_02_Acts_V1	Pentecost-em	aghneghanun	Jerusalem-eghmiit	ugpeqat	qerngughutkat	ataasimi	mangteghami.
B05_02_Acts_V2	Taagken	nuuskagllagan	anuqeghllagestun	sulugllagem	qilagmeng	pamaken	ukigluni	imiqaa	mangteghaq.
B05_02_Acts_V3	Taagken	llangaqa	ulusugnilnguut	kenghhaat	allgeqat,	esghapakiit	ilameggnun	nekeghqaallghiit.
B05_02_Acts_V4	Enkaam	Kiyaghneghem	imiqii	Agleghnalghiigneng	Taghneghagneng	qamaglluki	tawanlenguut.	Taghnegham	aghtughyaghqaanghilleghmikun	akuzistekii	nakumiistun.
B05_02_Acts_V5	Tamaanguq	Jerusalem-emi,	Jews-et	Kiyaghneghmun	qaatkutngalghiit.	Naken	nunaneng	tagiiqluteng	Jerusalem-eghmiingughquutkat.
B05_02_Acts_V6	Nagaquusameng	sulugllagmeng	uplegutkiit	ugpeqat	qerngughfigitnun.	Kaasalghiimeng	nakumiistun	ugpeqat	akuziteghllaguftut	repall	kukriqutkegkiit.
B05_02_Acts_V7	Saghiighayagusimiita	pikat,	“Ukut	akuzillghiit	Galilee-ghmiinguut.
B05_02_Acts_V8	Naten	ukut	qamaglluta	akuzillemtestun	akuziit	nallukngwaaqameggneng?
B05_02_Acts_V9	Whaa	whaantutut	Parthia-ghmiit,	Media-ghmiit,	Elam-eghmiit,	Mesopotamia-ghmiit,	Judea-ghmiit,	Cappadocia-ghmiit,	Pontus-eghmiit,	Asia-ghmiit,
B05_02_Acts_V10	Phrygia-ghmiit,	Pamphyllia-ghmiit,	Egypt-eghmiit,	Libya-ghmiit	Cyrene-em	tunganganeng	pit,	Crete-eghmiit,	Arabia-ghmiit,	whaa	whaantutlu	Rome-emeng	laalightat	Jews-et,	Gentile-etlu	maniguutkayuget	Jews-estun.	Nagataput	akuzillemtestun	ungipaghtut	Kiyaghneghem	apeghiilleghllaganeng.”
B05_02_Acts_V12	Qamagtengngwaaghluteng	saghiighayagutkiitlu	kukriqutkegkiitlu	ugpeqat,	enkaam	ellmeggneng	aapqughwaaghutkat,	“Saaqat	ukut?”
B05_02_Acts_V13	Iwernga	ilangita	nenglaghyugsaatkumiita	pikiit,	“Ukut	yuget	megheghllaguut!”
B05_02_Acts_V14	Peter-llu	tawanlenguq	apostle-elgutmini.	Nekevluni	iglagtuluni	yuget	pikii,	“Jew-lgutemni,	nagatngwaaqaghtengnga.
B05_02_Acts_V15	Megheghllagunighngaaghpesikut	megheghllagunghitukut	nutaanqun	9-eklaakanga	unaanguluku.
B05_02_Acts_V16	Una	whaten	aneghtelleq	Joel-em	uuknaliqutkegkaqaa	whaten:
B05_02_Acts_V17	‘Kiyaghneq	pikaaguq,	Kingulighni	aghneghni	Taghneghagka	kayagsaghqaqagka	tamaghhaanun	yugnun.	Enkaam	ighnesi,	panisi	uuknaliqsaghqaagut,	nukalpigasi	esghaghwaaghyaghqaagut,	nanevgasi	qavangughyaghqaagut.
B05_02_Acts_V18	Talwa	qepghaghtemnun	yugnunllu	aghnanunllu	Taghneghagka	kayagsaghqaqagka	uuknaliqesqelluki.
B05_02_Acts_V19	Yugnun	esghaghtesaghqaqanka	sangwaat	saghiighanalghiit	qilagmillu	nunamillu:	aakwh,	keneq,	agepsughllak,
B05_02_Acts_V20	siqiineq	mamlegsaghqaq,	tanqiq	kavighsaghqaq	aawestun.	Tamaakut	kingungitneng	megnunapiglleghhii	Atanghem	nanqigtivigkaa	aghneq	piyaghqaaguq.
B05_02_Acts_V21	Iwernga	aghneq	taana	kaatestegpenaan,	kina	alngunak	seghevutesqelghii	Ataneghmun	yugulillengyaghqaaguq.’	Tawaten	Joel	uuknaliqegkaaguq.
B05_02_Acts_V22	“Israel-eghmiini,	nagataghtengnga,	liisimakegkaghsi	Nazareth-eghmii	Jesus,	uglapiglluku	allaaghlluwhaghtighllagaataqaalghii.	Kiyaghneghem	tawaten	pistekaqaa	aghtughyaghqaanghilleghmikun	elpesinun	liitesqelluku	ellminun	nakmikegkaqutni.
B05_02_Acts_V23	Kiyaghneghem	liisimalleghmikun	tuunegkaqaa	Jesus	elpesinun	piyukelleghpesistun	pisqelluku.	Taagken	elpesi	qaquuraghtestaghsi	tamaakunun	waakigalngughnun	Kiyaghneghem	Liilightuusaanun.
B05_02_Acts_V24	Iwernga	Kiyaghneghem	tuqulleghmeng	unguvaghtestekaqaa,	itemutkaqaa	tuqullghem	asighqutellghaneng,	talwa	tuqullghem	nuqneghpagningitkaqaa.
B05_02_Acts_V25	David-em	akuzitkegkaqaa	Jesus	whaten:	‘Esghaghaqaqa	Ataneq	sivumnilluku	quunpeng:	unisigataanga,	enkaangam	seghleghmun	qapragtesnaanghitunga.
B05_02_Acts_V26	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	qaamnaka	quyaghllaguuq,	akuzillghenka	quyalleperewaaghmeng	ayuqut.	Tuquyaghqaaghngaaghma	sighimaknaqamken	Ataneq,
B05_02_Acts_V27	qayughllak	uninnaanghitagken	unguvasigka	tuqumalghiini,	talwa	Seghleghqumangilnguum	yugusii	aghusnaanghitan.
B05_02_Acts_V28	Apeghtuqaqaghpenga	kenlengilngughmeng	unguvallengelleghqameng,	whangamnisimanginalleghpek	quyasteghllawaanga.’”
B05_02_Acts_V29	Peter-em	nagneghutkii,	“Jew-lgutemni,	whateghlluwaaq	apeghyugaqa	sivuneghput	David.	Liisimakaghput	tuqukaaguq,	lliivghallu	naantulanga	liisimakaghput.
B05_02_Acts_V30	Unguvanguluku	Kiyaghneghem	akeqegkaqaa,	‘Ipapestaaq	kingunghen	ataasiq	igleghutiyaghqaaguq	yugpeneng.’	David-em	uuknaliqistengutmineng	liisimakegkaqaa	Kiyaghneghem	akequsaa.	Uuknaliqutkegkaqaa	Christ-a	tuqumalghiininnaanghinniluku	talwa	yugusii	aghunaanghinniluku,	unguvaqaaniluku	tuqulleghmeng.
B05_02_Acts_V32	Taananguuq	Jesus	Kiyaghneghem	unguvaghtekaa	tuqulleghmeng	enkaam	whangkuta	liisimakistenguukut.
B05_02_Acts_V33	Kiyaghneghem	nekegtekaqaa	Jesus	aghenqigneghmikun,	tawaten	quulvaqaqaa.	Akeqelleghmitun	Jesus,	tuunegkaqaak	Agleghnalghiik	Taghneghak	ellnganun,	enkaam	Jesus-em	whangkunnun	tuunaak.	Tamaakut	saghiighanalghiit	esghaqesi,	nagaskesi	Taghnegham	aghtughyaghqaanghillghakun	pillghuut.
B05_02_Acts_V34	“David	pikaaguq	whaten:	‘Atanghem	pii	Atanqa,	Aqumi	aghenqignemkun	kenlanga	kayaalqestellemnun	anguyagten.’	David	mayuumangitutmineng	qilagmun	Jesus-etun,	ellmineng	akuzitkengngunghituq,	akuzitkengngwaa	Jesus.
B05_02_Acts_V36	“Ungipaataghllamsi	qamagllusi	Israel-eghmiini,	Kiyaghneghem	ipapestaaq	nakmikegkaqaa	Jesus	Atanghulukullu	Christ-angulukullu.	Taananguuq	Jesus	qaquuraqaghsi!”
B05_02_Acts_V37	Yuget	nagalluku	Peter,	seghleghyugllakat	enkaam	Peter-llu	apostle-elgutangillu	aaptekiit,	“Ugpeqaalgutemnni,	sanaqesta?”
B05_02_Acts_V38	Peter-em	kiimsiqii,	“Avuteghqellusi,	seghleghqennanighlusi	qiivitek	Kiyaghneghmun,	paaptaayeteklu	Aatghakun	Jesus	Christ-am,	seghleghqellesi	seghevutellengesqelluki,	enkaam	Kiyaghneghem	tunusakek	Agleghnalghiik	Taghneghak	allgeghtekek.
B05_02_Acts_V39	Ataneq	Kiyaghneghput	tawaten	piyaghqaaguq,	qayughllak	akequsaqegkaqaak	Taghneghagni	elpesinun,	kinguneghpesinun,	kitumunllu	alngunak	uyavaghpansaghngaan	tuqluqaminun.”
B05_02_Acts_V40	Peter-em	tawatenginaq	pigpenaki	wata	sameng	allaaghhiinaghmeng	pikii.	Kelengasaaqiillu,	“Kiyaghneghem	aghyuughyaghqaqii	seghletun	pistet,	enkaam	ellngistun	seghletun	pigpenasi	luuraq	elpesillu	aghyuughyaaghiisi.”
B05_02_Acts_V41	Taagken	ugpeqilghiit	ungipaaneng	paaptaayekat.	Enkaam	tawani	aghneghmi	3,000	yuuk	ilatkaq	ugpeqanun.
B05_02_Acts_V42	Ugpeqat	iiwleng	qerngughutngulghiit	liinnaluteng	apostle-eneng.	Christ-akun	anglegutkullghiistun	kiyaghtaaghet,	neghaqelghiit,	yughaghaqelghiit	qerngaghmeng.
B05_02_Acts_V43	Apostle-et	uglaghngaan	allaaghlluwhaghtikaalghiit	Kiyaghneghem	aghtughyaghqaanghillghakun.	Enkaam	qamaglluni	saghiighayukaalghii,	tallughyagutkaqegkangatlu	Kiyaghneq.
B05_02_Acts_V44	Ugpeqat	qamaglluteng	nagneqaalghiit	ataasistun,	saghyateng	atunem	atuqluki.
B05_02_Acts_V45	Akikluki	nunatengllu	saghyatengllu,	allgeghtateng	manit	tuunaqegkangit	sameng	aklulghiinun.
B05_02_Acts_V46	Aghhutanga	tamaghhaan	qerngughutaqelghiit	Temple-mi.	Neghelgutengllaghaqluki	ilateng,	quyakusiqinaghluki	neqeteng	upughatusiqaqegkangit.
B05_02_Acts_V47	Kitumun	alngunak	piniqnighllaget,	usuqumanginaghaqegkangatlu	Kiyaghneq.	Aghhutanga	tamaghhaan	Atanghem	yugulingukangi	yuget,	enkaam	ugpeqat	nulamanginaqat.
B05_03_Acts_V1	Taagken	Peter-enkuk	John-enkuk	aglaqak	Temple-mun	3-klaagem	yughaatellghani.
B05_03_Acts_V2	Taawanguq	yuuk	piyugigalnguq	ima	allgenghhaghhaatmineng,	aqumluni	tungangakun	Temple-em	iteghvigani	atilqelghii,	Pinighnalghii	Amigllak.	Aghhutanga	tamaghhaan	kinkut	kevegtughaqegkangat	tawavek	naghughtaneng	tungsighniighesqelluku	manimeng.
B05_03_Acts_V3	Esghaghyamikek	Peter-enkuk	John-enkuk	itelghiik	Temple-mun	tungsighvikegkakek	manimeng.
B05_03_Acts_V4	Qerngaagmek	esghaghluku	yuuk	tawavek,	Peter-em	pikaa,	“Ukavek	qiivi	whangkutegnun.”
B05_03_Acts_V5	Sighimapiglluni	tuunaqniluni	qiivegkakek.
B05_03_Acts_V6	Peter-em	pikaa,	“Maniqraggiitngwaaghtunga	iwernga	sameng	tuunaqamken.	Aatghakun	Jesus	Christ-am	Nazareth-eghmiim,	piyugi!”
B05_03_Acts_V7	Tuguluki	aghenqigneghi	iiggi	nekevesimaluku	yugem	itegiillu	tukughiillu	iknaqughtekat,
B05_03_Acts_V8	repall	qetgeqaamaghmi	nekevegkaq	aga	piyuginaamaghmi	pikaq.	Taagken	maligllukek	iitqaq	Temple-mun	piyugumaghmi,	qetgeqaghaqluni,	usuqumaan	Kiyaghneq.
B05_03_Acts_V9	Temple-metullghiim	esghaqaat	piyulghii,	usuqilghii	Kiyaghneghmeng.
B05_03_Acts_V10	Liisuqegkaat	tungsighraghtenguyalghii	aqumluni	tungangani	iteghvigan	Temple-em.	Saghiighayagutkaat	esghaghyamegteggu	yuuk	piyulghii.
B05_03_Acts_V11	Paninang	naallghutkam	yugem	Peter-enkuk	John-enkuk	qetngamalukek,	yulghutem	saghiighayugumaghmeng	kanglluqaghtekiit	Solomon-em	Porch-ngani.
B05_03_Acts_V12	Peter-em	esghaghyamiki	pikii,	“Israel-eghmiini,	sangafsi	saghiighayugetsi?	Sangamta	esghapagtuutestekut?	Piyugtesneghitaghpung	una	yuuk	aghtughyaghqaanghillemtegnegun,	nalighmeng	piniitemtegneng.	Piyugigalnguum	yugem	Jesus	ugpeqsaqminigu	naallghutuq.
B05_03_Acts_V13	Abraham-enkut,	Isaac-enkut,	Jacob-enkut,	sivunemtallu	qamaglluteng	maniguqiita	Kiyaghneghem	quulvaghaa	Qepghaghteni	Jesus.	Iwernga	elpesi	aglaatkaqaghsi	Pilate-mun	nanqigtesqelluku,	ighsakegkaqaghsillu	Pilate-em	itemusugaqngagu.
B05_03_Acts_V14	Yeghlegi	Pilate-mun	yugtaghalqaq	itemutesqegkaqaghsi	ighsakluku	Jesus,	Seghleghqumangilnguq,	Qaatkutngaghllalghii.
B05_03_Acts_V15	Tawaten	pilleghpesigun	tuqutestekaqaghsi	Unguvallghem	Allgeghvigpigaa,	iwernga	Kiyaghneghem	unguvaghtestekaqaa	tuqulleghmeng.	Liisimakngwaaghaghpung,	qayughllak	esghaqaqaghpung	unguvallghan	kingunganeng	enkaam	apeghyaghqaqaghpung.
B05_03_Acts_V16	Esghaqesi	una	yuuk	nekevghalghii	sivugpesini,	qamagllusi	liisimakaghsi	piyugigasalghiinguuq	ima	allgenghhaghhaatmineng.	Iknaqughtekaaguq	ugpeqluku	aatgha	taam	ataasim	Jesus-em	Kiyaghneghem	unguvaghtekaan	tuqulleghmeng.	Aa-a,	ugpeqillghan	Jesus-kun	naallghutngwaaghaa,	esghaqesi	maaten.
B05_03_Acts_V17	“Jew-lgutemni,	neghighluku	Kiyaghneghem	aapqaa	uuknaliqistetgun	nakmikegkani	Christ-a	ikfiqluni	tuqulleqniluku.	Taana	uuknaliqellghat	apeghiiqaaguq	igleghutistekullghiini	tuqutestaqngafsigu	Jesus,	nallukluku	Christ-angutanga.
B05_03_Acts_V19	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	avuteghqellusi,	seghleghqennanighlusi	qiivitek	Kiyaghneghmun.	Ugpeqiteggu	Ataneq	enkaam	sangiglleqii	seghleghqellesi.
B05_03_Acts_V20	Tawaten	pikufsi	Atanghem	nutaghtaqnaaghii	taghneghasi,	kayaggneqiglleqaallu	Jesus	nakmikegkani	Christ-anguluku	elpesinun.
B05_03_Acts_V21	Iwernga	Jesus	tagivagilgami	qilagmesaghqaaguq	kenlanga	Kiyaghneghem	nutaghtellghanun	sangwaa	qamaglluku.	Tawaten	Kiyaghneq	akeqikaaguq	neghighluku	uuknaliqistetgun	aaftekamikun	ellminun	qepghaghtenguluki.
B05_03_Acts_V22	Moses	pikaaguq,	‘Atanghem	Kiyaghneghem	uuknaliqista	nakmikelleqaa	yugpesineng,	whanga	nakmikelleghmitun	uuknaliqistengulunga.	Nagatngwaaghnakesi	akuzillgha	qamaglluku.
B05_03_Acts_V23	Tamaakut	naganneghilnguut	uuknaliqistemun	Kiyaghneghem	yuganeng	aafluki	tuqusaghqaagut.’
B05_03_Acts_V24	“Sangwaa	maana	atughput	kiyaghtellemnni	Samuel-em	uuknaliqutkegkaqaa.	Samuel-em	kingunganeng	ilangitallu	uuknaliqistet	uuknaliqutqegkaqiit.
B05_03_Acts_V25	Kingunqiisi	uuknaliqistet	enkaam	Kiyaghneghem	aapqii	akequsat	ellngitgun,	elpesinunllu	pinguut.	Tawateghpigaq	Abraham-emllu	kingunqiisi.	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	Kiyaghneghem	akeqaqngamiki	sivunesi	Abraham-kun	whaten,	‘Abraham,	kinguneghpegun	quyasleqanka	qamagtengngwaaghluki	nunam	yugi,’	akequsaq	taana	elpesinunllu	pinguuq.
B05_03_Acts_V26	Enkaangam	Kiyaghneghem	nakmikegkani	Qepghaghteni	kayagsuwhaaqaqaa	elpesinun.	Kayagtekaqaa	quyasnalusi	qamagllusi	tunutestelleghmikun	seghleghqumalleghpesineng.”
B05_04_Acts_V1	Peter-enkuk	John-enkuk	paninang	ungipaamalukek	Solomon-em	Porch-ngani,	priest-etlu	umiilgatlu	Temple-em	kelengakistengita,	Sadducees-etlu	tagilaghaatkat.
B05_04_Acts_V2	Piyukumangilkangat	apostle-ek	apeghtuusaak	yugnun	Jesus	unguvaqaaniluku	tuqulleghmeng,	taam	ipapighqegkanga	tuqukat	unguvaghyaghqaaniluki	unguvalleghmun.
B05_04_Acts_V3	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	apostle-ek	tugulukek	anusimingllaqagket.	Siingenllu	unugnaqegkanga	unaaqusitkagket	nanqigtegpenakek.
B05_04_Acts_V4	Iwernga	tamaana	ilanga	uglapiglleghhii	nagatkaq	Peter-enkugneng	John-enkugneng	ugpeghtuutkaq.	Enkaangam	yuggiinaat	ugpeqat	entaqun	5,000-ngughtekat,	aghnatlu	taghnughhaatlu	ugpeqat	ilategpenaki.
B05_04_Acts_V5	Unaamingani	Jerusalem-emi	qerngughutkat	Jews-et	igleghutistengit,	siivanlleghet,	apeghtughikayugetlu	Liilightuusaneng,
B05_04_Acts_V6	High	Priest-a	Annas,	Caiaphas,	John,	Alexander,	ilangillu	high	priest-em	ilakwaaghi.
B05_04_Acts_V7	Taagken	apostle-ek	tagiteslukek	aaptekagket,	“Kitum	aghtughyaghqaanghillghakun	yuuk	piyugtesagutestegnegu?	Kitum	aatgha	atuqluku	tawaten	pistek?”
B05_04_Acts_V8	Peter-em	kiimsiqii	Agleghnalghiim	Taghnegham	aghtughyaghqaanghillghakun,	“Igleghutistenillu	siivanlleghnillu,
B05_04_Acts_V9	aaptaghpesikung	aneghneghtillemtegneng,	naten	naallghusimatanga	piyugigalnguq	yuuk.
B05_04_Acts_V10	Enkaangam	liigikesugamsi	qamagllusi,	ilangillu	Israel-eghmiit	qamaglluki	naten	una	yuuk	naallghutkaatanga.	Naallghutkaaguq	Aatghakun	Jesus	Christ-am	Nazareth-eghmiim.	Ellngan	aghtughyaghqaanghillghan	naallghutkaqaa,	elpesi	qaquuraqaghpesi,	Kiyaghneghem	unguvaghtestekaan	tuqulleghmeng.	Enkaam	una	yuuk	piyugigasalghii	whaa	maaten	nekevghaaq	sivugpesini.
B05_04_Acts_V11	Jesus-nguuq	ukut	Akuzitet	Igaqegkat	pikaat,	‘Uyghak	ighsakegkaghsi	elpesi	mangteghangllaghteni,	piyalghiimi	megnunalleghpigaaftuq	uyghak.’
B05_04_Acts_V12	Enkaam	Kiyaghneghem	kayagtekaqaa	nunamun,	ellnginaghhaaguq	yugulighiyaghqaq.	Alla	naten	yuuk	yugulillengnaanghituq	iwerngaqun	aataghakun	Jesus-em.”
B05_04_Acts_V13	Jews-et	agghistengita	saghiighayagutkagket	Peter-enkuk	John-enkuk	tetunghitellghegkeneng,	qayughllak	liisimakegkegket	igaghyaamangilnguuk.	Liigiksaqmegtekek	Jesus-metkaatmegneng	tawaten	akuzinguftuk.
B05_04_Acts_V14	Enkaam	aaghtiiraaghpagningitkagket,	qayughllak	esghaqaat	yuuk	naallghutngwaaghluni	nekevghalghii	Peter-enkugni	John-enkugni.
B05_04_Acts_V15	Agghivigmeng	agghistet	aanestekiit	Peter-enkut	John-enkut	naallghutkaqlu	yuuk,	enkaam	ellngit	agghitnginaamaghmeng	pikat.
B05_04_Acts_V16	Aapqughaaghutkat	ellmeggneng,	“Naten	pinaqestekek	yugek?	Seghleghhalek	ipanguninaqaghput	allaaghlluwhaghtillghak,	qayughllak	Jerusalem-eghmiit	qamaglluteng	liisimakaat.
B05_04_Acts_V17	Taawanginaq	ineghsaqumtekek	allallu	akuzitkefqaan	Jesus	pisqelluku	kitumun	alngunak	wata	kinkut	alngunak	nagaqughnayukatgu.”
B05_04_Acts_V18	Enkaam	iteghteslukek	ineghtengngwaaqagket,	“Allamengllu	akuzitkefqaan,	apeghtuusaqefqaan	Jesus	pinakesek.”
B05_04_Acts_V19	Iwernga	Peter-enkuk	John-enkuk	kiimsiqiit,	“Qaatkellamsii	Kiyaghneq	avelghaghluku?	Naliq	efqughnaghta	Kiyaghneghmi?	Ataasiighteki	umyugasi.
B05_04_Acts_V20	Whangkutung	akuzitkenneghmeng	taaqnaanghitaghpung	esghaqaghpungllu	nagaquqaghpungllu.”
B05_04_Acts_V21	Agghistet	aghyuughpagningitkagket,	qayughllak	qamaglluteng	yuget	usuqegkangat	Kiyaghneq	allaaghlluwhaghtilleghmun.	Enkaam	temngi	alingsequlukek	aanestekagket.
B05_04_Acts_V22	Taana	yuuk	40	ayumiqulleq	siipngaan	uksughtutkalghii,	piyugpagningisalghii	iwernga	maaten	naallghullghii.
B05_04_Acts_V23	Peter-enkuk	John-enkuk	aanesistek	aglaqak	ugpeqaalgutmegnun.	Ungipaqak	chief	priest-etlu	siivanlleghetlu	pillghitneng.
B05_04_Acts_V24	Nagallukek	ataasiighlluteng	yughaqat	Kiyaghneghmun,	“Ataneq,	ulimakaqaten	qilak,	nuna,	meq,	sangwaallu	alngunak	taakunilnguq,	igleghutngwaatenllu	qamaglluki.
B05_04_Acts_V25	Ayumirugllak	Agleghnalghiignekun	Taghneghagnekun	akuzikaaguten	sivunemteggun	David-kun	qepghaghtegpegun	whaten,	‘Sangan	Gentile-et	temngi	sakrituteghllagtatkek	Atanghenkuk	Christ-akullghiik,	sanganllu	yuget	seghletun	piyupigtatkek	pipagningiteghngaaghmegtekek?
B05_04_Acts_V26	Nunam	umiilgillu	igleghutistetlu	qerngughulluteng	yataaghqutut	pilluwaghnalukek	Atanghenkuk	Christ-akullghiik!’
B05_04_Acts_V27	“Ipapestaaq	maani	Jerusalem-emi	tawaten	pikaagut.	Herod-enkuk	Pontius	Pilate-enkuk	ilatkaaguk	Gentile-enunllu	Israel-eghmiinunllu	kipullginaaghnaluku,	Jesus	Seghleghqumangilnguq	Qepghaghten,	nakmikegkan	Christ-anguluku.
B05_04_Acts_V28	Ataneq	liisimakngwaaqenllu	yataaghqegkaqegkenllu	tawaten	pilleghqaa	enkaam	tawaten	pikaagut.
B05_04_Acts_V29	Nagataqaten	maaten	whaa	alingsiqukanginkut	ikfiqesleqniluta.	Ataneq,	iknaqughsaqaghtikut	enkaam	tetugpenaamta	ungipaalta	ungipaghpeneng,
B05_04_Acts_V30	whangkutgun	naallghutiki	qinuyuget,	allaaghlluwhaghtistikutlu	aatghakun	Jesus-em,	Seghleghqumangilngughqun	Qepghaghtegpegun.”
B05_04_Acts_V31	Yughaneghmeng	taaqaqutlu	qerngughutfigat	mangteghaq	ufsugutkaq.	Agleghnalghiim	Taghnegham	imiqii	qamaglluki,	enkaam	tetugpenateng	ungipaghyagutkat	Kiyaghneghem	ungipaaneng.
B05_04_Acts_V32	Apostle-et	aghtughyaghqaanghillelighllagluteng	ungipaqegkaat	Ataneq	Jesus	unguvaqaaniluku	tuqulleghmeng.	Kiyaghneghem	quyasteghllagukangillu	qamaglluki	ugpeqat.	Ugpeqat	ataasistun	lliiqat	ilumegteggunllu	unguvasimegteggunllu.	Enkaam	kina	alngunak	pingigalnguq	saghyateng	ellnginaghmeggnun	pikniluki,	atunem	atuqaqegkangit.
B05_04_Acts_V34	Nunalget,	mangteghalget	akikneghmegteki	nunatengllu	mangteghatengllu,	allgeghtateng	manit	apostle-enun	tuunaqegkangit.	Enkaam	ugpeqat	sameng	aklunghata	manilitaqegkangit,	tawaten	kina	alngunak	aklumangilnguq.
B05_04_Acts_V36	Joseph	tawanlenguq,	Cyprus-eghmii,	Levi-em	kingungha,	ellnganllu	akikluku	nunani	tuunegkaa	allgeghtani	apostle-enun.	Apostle-et	atiqaat	Barnabas-meng	whaten	pisimeng,	“Kayemesta.”
B05_05_Acts_V1	Taawanguq	yuuk	aatgha	Ananias,	nulighha	Sapphira.	Akikegkaa	nalighnegha	nunami.
B05_05_Acts_V2	Nuliighmi	liisimanghani	aksaqegkaa	ilanga	manim	ellminun	pinguluku.	Taana	siipneni	tuunegkaa	apostle-enun	sumeghmini	qamaglluku	tuuniluku	pisqelluku.
B05_05_Acts_V3	Yeghlegi	Peter-em	aaptekaa,	“Sangan	qaatkesigu	Tughneghaam	nanghiiqullgha	iqlengiqesqelluten	Agleghnalghiignun	Taghneghagnun	aksaqelleghpegun	ilanga	manim?
B05_05_Acts_V4	Sangan	tawaten	sumeghtaghaamazin?	Yugnun	iqlengiqenghituten,	Kiyaghneghmun	iqlengiquten.	Akikellghilluku	nunan	elpek	piksaghan,	enkaam	akikaqngavgu	maningallu	taana	piyukelleghpetun	piyaghqaqsaghan.”
B05_05_Acts_V5	Legan	Ananias-em	Peter	nagalluku	uullghaghlluni	tuqukaq.	Nukalpigat	iteghluteng	qiipaghakun	iimgulluku	yugusii	aanulluku	lliifqaat.	Ungipaq	Ananias-em	iqlengiqellghallu	tuqullghallu	mingitkaq,	enkaam	nagaquutkat	alingruughuteghllakat.
B05_05_Acts_V7	Pingayut	aflut	atughluki	Ananias-em	tuqullghaneng,	nulighha	iitqaq	nallukluku	ugini	samatanga.
B05_05_Acts_V8	Peter-em	aaptekaa,	“Tawaten	akitutkaan	akikestegneguu	nunayek?”	Sapphira-m	kiimsiqaa,	“Aa-a.”
B05_05_Acts_V9	Peter-em	aaplaataqaa,	“Sangaftek	ugikullghiigni	sumeghtaghaamastek	nanghiiqunalukek	Atanghem	Taghneghakek?	Yuget	lliivghikat	ugigpeneng	qakma	manughametut.	Elpeklu	tawaten	pilleqaaten.”
B05_05_Acts_V10	Tawanighlluggiinaq	ellngallu	uullghaghlluni	tuqukaq.	Nukalpigat	iteghyalghiimeng	Sapphira-llu	taawa	tuqumalghii,	enkaam	aanulluku	ugingan	saaghwakun	lliifqaat.
B05_05_Acts_V11	Qamagtengngwaaghluteng	ugpeqat,	qamagllutengllu	nagaquullghiit	Ananias-enkuk	Sapphira-nkuk	tuqullghegkeneng	alingruughuteghllakat.
B05_05_Acts_V12	Yulghutet	qungangitni	apostle-et	allaaghlluwhaghtighllagumanginaqat.	Qamaglluteng	ugpeqatlu	apostle-etlu	qerngughutaqelghiit	Temple-em	manughaani	aatqelghiimi,	Solomon-em	Porch-ngani.
B05_05_Acts_V13	Iwernga	yuget	ugpeqillghilnguut	Jesus-meng	ilasigalnguut	ugpeqanun	qayughllak	alingekanighaqelghiit,	naqam	pinighniiqegkangit.
B05_05_Acts_V14	Iwernga	uglapiglleghiit	yugetlu	aghnatlu	ugpeqngukangat	Ataneq	Jesus,	enkaam	ugpeqat	nulamanginaqat.
B05_05_Acts_V15	Apostle-et	allaaghlluwhaghtillghit	apalluqluki	kinkut	alngunak	qinuyugtiiteng	allighiitgun	tagilluki	tumetgun	lliiqegkangit.	Tawaten	pikiit	qayughllak	Peter-em	naghughtekaki	luuraq	taghneghangutellghan	naallghunnayukaki	qinuyulghiit.
B05_05_Acts_V16	Enkaam	Jerusalem-emun	qantaghanlengughneng	nunaneng	tagilaghaatkaq	yulghun	Jerusalem-emun.	Qinuyugtiitengllu	tamaakutlu	tughneghalget	ilumegteggun	tagitkiit	apostle-enun,	enkaam	qamaglluteng	tagitkiit	naallghuquutkat.
B05_05_Acts_V17	High	priest-enkut	ilakullghiit	Sadducees-et	aqinatkat	apostle-neng
B05_05_Acts_V18	enkaam	tugusluki	kanaghtestekiit	anusimingllaghvigmun.
B05_05_Acts_V19	Iwernga	unugyan	yaqulgan	Atanghem	qelpeghtekii	anusimingllaghvigem	amigi.	Enkaam	aanulluki	apostle-et	pikii,
B05_05_Acts_V20	“Aglaghlusi	Temple-mun,	qamaglluku	apeghteggu	una	nutaghaq	kiyaghtaalleq	Jesus	Christ-akun	ayuqelghii.”
B05_05_Acts_V21	Apostle-et	qaatkegkaat	yaqulek.	Aghtaghaghaqaallu	iteghluteng	Temple-mun	apeghtughikat.	High	priest-enkut	ilakullghiit	qerngughtekiit	Jews-et	siivanlleghitlu	qamagllukillu	agghistet,	agghitkennaluki	apostle-et.	Taagken	anusimingllaghvigem	umiilwaaghitnun	aqfastekiit	apostle-et.
B05_05_Acts_V22	Iwernga	umiilwaaghet	anusimingllaghvigmun	kaasalghiimeng	apostle-et	aviiteftut.	Enkaam	agghistenun	aglaghluteng	ungipaatkiit,
B05_05_Acts_V23	“Anusimingllaghvigmun	kaasalghiikut	amiget	maghqaqughwaaghngaftut,	kelengakistetlu	amignituteftut	naqam	iteghyalghiikut	paaghqiteftuq!”
B05_05_Acts_V24	Temple-em	kelengakistengita	umiilgatlu,	chief	priest-etlu	ungipaasisteng	kukriqutkegkiit	samatangi	apostle-et.
B05_05_Acts_V25	Taagken	kitum	iteghluni	pikii,	“Taakut	yuget	anusimingllaqaqsaqesi	inga	Temple-mi	apeghtughiiqut.”
B05_05_Acts_V26	Kelengakistet	umiilkullghiit	aqfakiit	apostle-et.	Seghletun	pimangilkangit,	qayughllak	alingelghiit	yugneng	Temple-melngughneng	tuqunnayukangisteng	milughpagaataghhiinaq.
B05_05_Acts_V27	Tagilluki	itghutkiit	agghistenun	enkaam	high	priest-em	pikii	apostle-et,
B05_05_Acts_V28	“Ineghtengngwaaqaqsaghamsi	allamengllu	apeghtughifqaafsi	Aatghakun	Jesus-em	pisqellusi,	iwernga	qaatkumangitaghpesikut!	Yeghlegi	allulluteng	Jerusalem-eghmiit	liitaat	apeghtuusaghsi,	whangkutallu	avutngusnaqutkaghpekut	Jesus-em	tuqullghanun.”
B05_05_Acts_V29	Peter-em	kiimsiitkii	apostle-et,	“Qaatkesaghqaqaghput	Kiyaghneq	avelghaghluki	yuget.
B05_05_Acts_V30	Qaquuraghluku	tuqutestekaqaghsi	Jesus,	iwernga	Kiyaghneghem,	sivunemta	maniguqiita	unguvaghtestekaqaa	tuqulleghmeng.
B05_05_Acts_V31	Enkaangam	quulvaghnaluku	Jesus	aghenqigneghmikun	nekegtekaqaa	Igleghutistengulukullu	Yugulighistengulukullu.	Tawaten	pikaqaa	Israel-eghmiit	avuteghqesaghqaaghtesqelluki	seghleghqennaniisqelluki,	qiivesqelluki	Kiyaghneghmun,	seghevunnalukillu	seghleghqellghitneng.
B05_05_Acts_V32	Whangkuta	ungipaghtenguukut	tamaakunun	pilleghnun,	maligulluta	Agleghnalghiignun	Taghneghagnun	Kiyaghneghem	tuunegkagkenun	tamaakunun	qaatkullghiinun	ellminun.”
B05_05_Acts_V33	Agghistet	sakritutkaalghiit	Peter-em	kiimsighyisteng	tawaten,	repall	tuqusukaqegkangit	apostle-et.
B05_05_Acts_V34	Iwernga	ataasiq	agghista	nekevegkaq	akuzinaluni.	Gamaliel-nguftuq,	Pharisee,	apeghtughistengat	Jews-et	Liilightuusiita,	elngaatall	kitum	alngunak	qaatkumtaagha.	Kelengakistenun	aanutaghtesqegkii	apostle-et.
B05_05_Acts_V35	Taagken	agghistelgutni	pikii,	“Israel-eghmiilgutemni,	piraamsilluki	taakut	yuget	piteki.
B05_05_Acts_V36	Neqamikenghistegguu	qavnganghhaq	Theudas	pikaalghii	igleghutesteghllaguniluni.	Enkaam	400	yuuk	maligsaaghikaq	ellnganeng.	Iwernga	Theudas	tuqusatgu	maligsaaghtengi	qimaguutkat,	talwa	kitum	alngunak	allamengllu	akuzitkesugumangilkangat.
B05_05_Acts_V37	Taakwaningani	Judas-llu	Galilee-ghmii,	qerngughtikaq	yugkameng	kavema	kestistiiqngan	yugem	uglaghtalanganeng.	Iwernga	ellngallu	tuqutaqngatgu	yugi	mingitkaagut.
B05_05_Acts_V38	Enkaam	whaa	sumemni	itagnaghnayaghtukut	safqiita	qakemkut	yuget	piyaqumteki.	Ellmeggneng	pingukumeng	tawaten	pillghat	satngunanighllequq.
B05_05_Acts_V39	Iwernga	Kiyaghneghem	pilqegkagu	aghuliighhnaanghitasi,	kipullginaaghlleqaghsillu	Kiyaghneq.”	Enkaam	agghistet	qaatkegkaat	Gamaliel.
B05_05_Acts_V40	Taagken	kelengakistenun	itghutesluki	apostle-et	kagsagmigtestekiit.	Ineghtengngwaaqiitlu	ungipaqnaniisqelluku	Jesus.	Apeghiighyamegteki	aanestekiit.
B05_05_Acts_V41	Apostle-et	aanesisteng	quyaghllakat,	qayughllak	Kiyaghneghem	kayngusaghaatestekaqegkangi	Jesus	apalluqluku.
B05_05_Acts_V42	Aghhutanga	tamaghhaan	Temple-millu	kinkunillu	ungipaqaqegkangat,	apeghtuusaqaqegkangat	Jesus,	Christ-anguniluku	Kiyaghneghem	nakmikegkaa.
B05_06_Acts_V1	Tamaani	aghneghni	ugpeqat	nulanguluki	Greek-stun	akuzikayuget	Jews-et	seghleghyukat,	Hebrew-stun	akuzikayugneng	Jews-eneng,	qayughllak	ugingighaghtiiteng	aklukegkiitneng	tuunlaaghigalkangit.	Enkaam	yiillgikiit,	“Aghhutanga	tamaghhaan	uyegtistet	palasqughhaan	tuunaqiit	whangkuta	ugingighaput.”
B05_06_Acts_V2	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	qula	maalghuk	siipneqluku	apostle-et,	qerngughlluki	ugpeqat	pikiit,	“Anaggullequkut	pegtekumteggu	ungipaqilleghput	Kiyaghneghem	akuzitanganeng	uyegtistengughhnaluta.
B05_06_Acts_V3	Ugpeqaalgutemnni,	tamaaken	apalluqluku	nakmikiteki	maaghraghvinlek	yuuk	pinilghii,	Agleghnalghiigneng	Taghneghagneng	imighngalghiit,	peghqinelghiit,	uyegtistengllaghlleqaput.
B05_06_Acts_V4	Tawaten	pikumta	whangkuta	apostle-eni	yughaamanginaghllequkut,	ungipaqimanginaghllequkut	Kiyaghneghem	ungipaaneng.”
B05_06_Acts_V5	Ugpeqat	efquqegkiit	apostle-et	agghillghit.	Enkaam	nakmikegkaat	Stephen,	elngaatall	ugpeqingaghllak	Kiyaghneghmeng,	imighngalghiillu	Agleghnalghiigneng	Taghneghagneng.	Nakmikegkiitlu	Philip-enkut,	Prochorus-enkut,	Nicanor-enkut,	Timon-enkut,	Parmenas-enkut,	Nicolaus-llu	Gentile-a	Antioch-eghmii	Jews-estun	maniguusagutkaq.
B05_06_Acts_V6	Taakut	yuget	tagitkiit	apostle-enun	yughaatkesqelluki,	naasqwitgun	saafluki	yughaatkegkiit.
B05_06_Acts_V7	Kiyaghneghem	ungipii	mingisimanginaqiit.	Enkaam	nulakaalghiit	ugpeqat	Jerusalem-emi,	priest-elghutetlu	ilalghutngit	ugpeghtuutkat	maligulluteng.
B05_06_Acts_V8	Stephen	kayusillelegllagutminengllu	aghtughyaghqaanghillelegllagutminengllu	Agleghnalghiigneng	Taghneghagneng	allaaghlluwhaghtighllagaataqaq.
B05_06_Acts_V9	Taagken	ilangita	Jews-et,	Cyrene-eghmiinguyalghiitlu,	Alexandria-ghmiinguyalghiitlu	aaghtiiraaghyaghtuqaat	Stephen.	Taakut	yuget	synagogue-ngita	aatqeftaa,	“Itemutkat	Qepghaghtelaaghet.”	Yuget	Cilicia-ghmiinguyalghiitlu,	Asia-ghmiinguyalghiitlu	ilatkat	taakunun.
B05_06_Acts_V10	Iwernga	Stephen,	Agleghnalghiim	Taghnegham	peghqinepiglluku	akuzistekaa	repall	kiimsighpagningitkaat.
B05_06_Acts_V11	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	ilangi	yuget	aksaqluku	akileghtuqiit	iqlengiqutkesqelluku	Stephen	whaten,	“Nagatkaqaghput	seghlequuqek	Moses-enkuk	Kiyaghneghenkuk.”
B05_06_Acts_V12	Siivanlleghetlu,	apeghtughikayugetlu	Liilightuusaneng,	ilangillu	yuget	nagalluteng	iqlengiqellghitneng	sakritutkat.	Taagken	aaghtiiraaghulluteng	aglaatkaat	Stephen	agghistenun.
B05_06_Acts_V13	Taam	kingunganeng	yuget	tagitkiit	agghistenun	iqlengiqutkesqelluku	Stephen.	Pikat,	“Stephen-em	quunpeng	seghletun	akuzitkaqaa	Temple-a,	Liilightuusatlu	Moses-em	tuunegkii	whangkunnun.
B05_06_Acts_V14	Nagatkaqaghputlu	pilghii	Jesus-emnguq	Nazareth-eghmiim	naafqelleqaa	Temple-a,	allangughlleqaallunguq	kiyaghtaalleghput	Moses-em	apeghtuutkaa	whangkunnun.”
B05_06_Acts_V15	Qamaglluteng	tawanlenguut	esghaqaat	Stephen-em	gginaa	kuukgullghii	yaqulgem	gginaatun.
B05_07_Acts_V1	Taagken	high	priest-em	aaptekaa	Stephen,	“Ipa	tawaten	akuzikaaziin	ukut	avutkistegpek	apellghistun?”
B05_07_Acts_V2	Stephen-em	kiimsiqaa,	“Anglegutemnillu,	siivanlleghnillu,	nagataghtengnga	ungipamsugunnaqamsi!	Sivuneghput	Abraham	salin	Mesopotamia-melluku,	nuugtellghilluku	Haran-mun,	Nighughqengngalghiim	Kiyaghneghem	aliighvikluku
B05_07_Acts_V3	pikaa,	‘Unitigu	allgeghvigen	nuna,	ilakwaaghtenllu,	aghulaqi	maghyaghqughnaaghamken.’
B05_07_Acts_V4	Enkaam	Abraham	aghulaqegkaq	Chaldea-meng,	nuugtekaq	Haran-mun.	Atanga	tuquyan,	Kiyaghneghem	maghyaghquqaa	Abraham	nunamun	maaten	kiyaghfigpesinun.
B05_07_Acts_V5	Tagisuwhaaghaqngamigu	natengiighhaq	nunalisimangitaa	ellnganun	pikaghqameng.	Iwernga	talwa	salin	avaqutiilluku	Kiyaghneghem	akequsaqegkaqaa	una	nuna	ellnganunllu	kingunghanunllu.
B05_07_Acts_V6	Kiyaghneghem	whatenllu	pikaqaa,	‘Kinguneghten	aghulaqsaghqaagut	nunakenghilkemeggnun	enkaam	nunataallequt.	Tamaani	qepghaghtelaaghuyaghqaagutlu	amyuqetaatkesighllagyaghqaagutlu	400	ayumiqullelghutni.
B05_07_Acts_V7	Iwernga	aghyuughlleqanka	qepghaghtelaaghughtestilghiit.	Kingunganeng	aghyuughilleghma	kinguneghten	tagillequt	nunamun	akequsaqegkamnun,	tamaani	manigughlleqaatnga.’	Tawaten	Kiyaghneq	pikaaguq.
B05_07_Acts_V8	Taagken	Kiyaghneq	akequsangllaqaq	Abraham-emun	nalluniighutkesqelluku	circumcise-elleq.	Enkaam	Abraham	circumcise-ekaq.	Ighnengyami	Isaac-meng	pingayuneng	inglulek	aghneq	atughyagu	circumcise-ekaa	ellngallu.	Tawateghpigaq	Isaac-em	circumcise-ekaa	ighneni	Jacob.	Jacob-em	circumcise-elaqii	qula	maalghuk	siipneqluku	ighneni.	Taakut	piinliisiqii	ramkengan	Israel-em.
B05_07_Acts_V9	“Anglilaghaalluteng	Jacob-em	ighneghita	aqinakepigtekaat	anglegutseng	Joseph,	enkaam	akikegkaat	Egypt-eghmiinun	qepghaghtelaaghuluku.	Iwernga	Kiyaghneghem	nayuqegkaa,
B05_07_Acts_V10	seghleliinghani	kayusighaqegkanga.	Kiyaghneghem	peghqinellelitkaa	enkaam	Pharaoh-m	umiilgan	Egypt-em,	efquqluku	umiilgataghaaghtestekaa	Egypt-mun,	igleghutistengllaqaallu	mangteghaminunllu,	qepghaghteminunllu.
B05_07_Acts_V11	Taagken	neqangisagllakaq	Egypt-millu,	Canaan-millu,	elngaatall	uglaq	iyatiquteghllakaq.	Sivuneputlu	neqangisagllakat.
B05_07_Acts_V12	Jacob-em	nagaqughyamiki	Egypt-eghmiit	grain-meng	kagpagllagumaniluki,	ighneni	pikengyaghtiisqegkii.
B05_07_Acts_V13	Tuunglighhaani	alla	piyata,	Joseph-em	anengani	ungipaatkii	ellngitnun	uyughaqniluni.	Enkaam	umiilgem	Pharaoh-m	anglegutkututangi	liigikegkii.
B05_07_Acts_V14	Taagken	Joseph-em	lipeghsaqaa	atani	Jacob,	nengllugutelghutangillu	nuugtesqelluki	Egypt-mun.	Qamaglluteng	75-nguftut.
B05_07_Acts_V15	Enkaam	Jacob-enkut	nuugtekat.	Tamaani	Jacob	tuqukaq,	kingunganeng	tagtalmi	taakwani	ilangillu	sivuneput	tuqulaghaatkat.
B05_07_Acts_V16	Taakwaningani	neghqwaaghit	aglaalluki	Shechem-emun,	llivenqigtekiit	nunakun	Abraham-em	tukfiqaakun	Hamor-em	kingunghaneng.
B05_07_Acts_V17	“Kiyaghneghem	Abraham-emun	akequsaa	piyaghtungestaghaquqlu,	sivuneput	nulaghllakat	Egypt-mi.
B05_07_Acts_V18	Taagken	Egypt	nutaghameng	umiilengegkaq,	taam	umiilgem	nallukngwaaqanga	Joseph.
B05_07_Acts_V19	Sivunemta	nulaghllallghit	apalluqluki	umiilgem	peghqiniqulluki	ikfiqestekii	sivuneput,	talwa	taghnughhaghhiit	aanutestaqluki	pikii	tuqusqelluki.
B05_07_Acts_V20	Tawaten	kiyaghsimaluki	Moses	allgeqaq,	yuukegtepiglleghii	taghnughhaq.	Angayuqagkenka	nemegni	iighaghtumeng	aflengakegkaak	pingayut	tanqit.
B05_07_Acts_V21	Iighaghtughpagningiisamegnegu	aanutkaak.	Umiilgem	panigan	naalkelluku	allughqiluku,	anglistekaa	ighneqelghiistun.
B05_07_Acts_V22	Egypt-eghmiit	apeghtuqaat	liitkameggneng.	Enkaam	Moses	peghqinghughighllagyalghiimi	akuzillguughqaaghllakaq,	aghtiigalnguqlu	sameng	tamaghhaaneng.
B05_07_Acts_V23	“Moses	40	uksughtutkalighyami	Israel-eghmiilgutni	esghaghyugluki	esghaghyaghtuqii.
B05_07_Acts_V24	Tawani	esghaqaa	Egypt-eghmiim	amyuutkegkanga	Israel-eghmii.	Enkaam	Moses-em	Israel-eghmii	igughluku	tuqutkaa	Egypt-eghmii.
B05_07_Acts_V25	Tawani	sumeghtaghaqaayalghii	Israel-eghmiilgutminun	liigikelleqniluku	Kiyaghneghmun	kayagtelleni	ellngitnun	aghulaqutistenguluku	Egypt-meng.	Iwernga	liigikumangilkangat.
B05_07_Acts_V26	Unaamingani	esghaqakek	Israel-eghmiik	pillugullghiik.	Akuzinnaqutkegkaqsaqek,	‘Pillugutegpenatek	yulgutkututek.’
B05_07_Acts_V27	Yeghlegi	amyuqetiqelghiim	yugem	ayagaghlluku	Moses	pikaa,	‘Kitum	igleghutistengllaghtaten,	nanqigtistengllaghtatenllu	whangkunnun?
B05_07_Acts_V28	Whangallu	tuqusugsingaa	ighivgaq	tuqutelleghpetun	Egypt-eghmii?’
B05_07_Acts_V29	Yugem	tawaten	piyatni	Moses	qimakaq	Midian-mun,	tamaani	allaneghtaakaq.	Qenwat	nulightughluni	ighnengegkaq	maalghugegneng.
B05_07_Acts_V30	“Moses,	40	ayumiqulleq	Midian-metutkelluku	kilgaanun	aghulaqegkaq	Mount	Sinai-em	uvitanganun.	Tawani	esghaqaa	yaqulek	kumaghulghiimi	uqfillegami.
B05_07_Acts_V31	Allaaghlluwhaghyagutkaqegkanga.	Kenqigtengngwaaghnaluku	takukaa,	kaasaghtughaqaallu	Atanghem	pikaa,
B05_07_Acts_V32	‘Kiyaghneghuunga,	sivuneghpek	Abraham-enkut	Isaac-enkut	Jacob-enkut	Kiyaghneqaatnga.’	Moses	alingruuqaq	repall	ungelegtekaq	talwa	esghaghyugumangitkaa.
B05_07_Acts_V33	Atanghem	pikaa,	‘Kaamgegken	mataghtikek	qayughllak	whanga	apalluqlunga	agleghnalghiinguuq	nekevghavigen.
B05_07_Acts_V34	Esghapaganka	yugenka	amyuutkegkangit	Egypt-mi,	nagatanka	ngilleglleghhiit.	Ukigtunga	yugulinaluki	Egypt-eghmiineng.	Enkaam	whaa	kayaggnaqamken	Egypt-mun.’
B05_07_Acts_V35	“Taananguuq	Moses	Israel-eghmiit	ighsakaqngamegteggu	pikaat,	‘Kitum	igleghutistengllaghtatenllu	nanqigtistengllaghtatenllu	whangkunnun?’	Iwernga	ellnganguuq	Kiyaghneghem	uteghnightestekaa	Egypt-mun	igleghutistengulukullu	yugulighistengulukullu	ellngitnun.	Tawaten	Kiyaghneghem	pikaqaa	yaqulegkun	kumaghulghiimi	uqfillegami.
B05_07_Acts_V36	Moses	allaaghluwhaghtighllagaataghluni	Egypt-mi,	aghulaqutkaqii	sivuneput	Egypt-meng.	Wata	allaaghlluwhaghtiighaataqaaguq	Red	Sea-millu,	igleghalleghmeggnillu	kilgaani	maghyaghqughaqngamiki
B05_07_Acts_V40	ayumiqulleghni	igleghangulusi	kilgaani	aghqerraaghumangitaghpesinga	tuqutiineghpesini	teghikusameng.
B05_07_Acts_V37	Taananguuq	Moses	Israel-eghmiinun	whaten	pikaq,	‘Kiyaghneghem	uuknaliqista	nakmikelleqaa	yugpesineng	whanga	nakmikelleghmitun	uuknaliqistengulunga.’
B05_07_Acts_V38	Taananguuq	Moses	sivunemnnitkaq	qerngughutaqngata	kilgaani	Mount	Sinai-em	tungangangi.	Tawani	naayghami	yaqulgem	aleghqughyatni	tugukii	Kiyaghneghem	Liilightuusii	apeghtuusat	naten	kiyaghtelleghqameng.	Taagken	aapqii	taakut	sivunemnnun	enkaam	ellngita	nagneghtekaqiit	whangkunnun.
B05_07_Acts_V39	“Iwernga	sivunemta	Moses	qaatkesugumangitaatlu,	igleghutisteksugumangitaatlu,	yeghlegi	uteghsukaagut	Egypt-mun.
B05_07_Acts_V40	Enkaam	kiyaghnengllaqat	kaawaghaghsugnilngughmeng,	aghqerraaqaatlu.	Neqenghaghqegkatlu	quulvaghnaluku	ulimaaghteng.
B05_07_Acts_V41	“Tawaten	piyata	Kiyaghneghem	tunutkiillu,	pegtekiillu	elngaatall	maniguutesqelluki	siqineghmun,	tanqimun,	ighaleqetaaghnunllu.	Ataneq	whaten	pikaaguq	uuknaliqistet	igaqellghitni,	‘Israel-eghmiini,
B05_07_Acts_V42	Yeghlegi	kelqutaaqegkaqasi	tiintat	manigughviguluki	kiyaghnengllaqamun	Moloch-mun,	kelqutaaqegkaqaghsillu	ighaleqetaangllaqaq	maniguusiiluku	Rephan-mun.	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	anguyagpesinun	aghulaqutesleqamsi	naghughlluku	Babylon.’”
B05_07_Acts_V40	Stephen	paninang	akuzikaq,	“Sivuneput	kilgaanilluki	Kiyaghneghem	tiintanglliisqegkii	amimeng	manigughviguluki	ellminun.	Ulimakaqiit	tawatengwaaq	Kiyaghneghem	apeghtuutellghatun	Moses-mun.	Kelqutaaqegkiit	taakut	tiintat	neqanguusiiluki	Kiyaghneghem	nayuutngallghanun.
B05_07_Acts_V43	Taakwaningani	Moses	tuquyan	Kiyaghneghem	nakmikegkaa	Joshua	igleghutistekesqelluku	sivunemnnun.	Joshua-m	maghyaghqughyisteng	nunamun	Kiyaghneghem	akequsaqegkaanun	taakut	tiintat	kelqegkiit.	Takukameggnun	nunamun	kaasalghiimeng	yulguftuq.	Iwernga	Kiyaghneghem	sivunemnnun	ighlleghtestekii	yugi,	enkaam	sivuneput	nelikat	taaggun	nunakun.	Tamaani	nagneghutkiit	taakut	tiintat	maniguutfiguluki	Kiyaghneghmun	kenlanga	umiileliitelleghmeggnun	David.
B05_07_Acts_V44	David-em	kiyaghtaallgha	elngaatall	efqughnapigtekaalghii	Kiyaghneghmi.	Enkaam	David-em	aaptekaqsaqanga	whaten,	‘Kiyaghnegha	Jacob-em,	mangteghangllaghlakaan?’	Iwernga	Kiyaghneghem	pisimangilkanga,
B05_07_Acts_V45	yeghlegi	David-em	ighneghan	Solomon-em	mangteghangllaqaa	Kiyaghneq.
B05_07_Acts_V46	“Iwernga	Kiyaghneghllak	kiyaghsigatuq	mangteghani	yuget	ulimaaghitni.	Whaten	Ataneq	pikaaguq	uuknaliqistem	igaqellghani,
B05_07_Acts_V47	‘Qilak	aqumutaqaqa,	nunallu	itegaghiitaqaqa.	Sangan	mangteghangllaghnaqestengnga?	Meghnalivigitaangunghitunga.
B05_07_Acts_V48	Ulimaaqenghiisikuun	sangwaa	qamatengngwaaghluku?’”
B05_07_Acts_V49	Stephen-em	nagneghutkii,	“Pineghllugllagni	elpesi,	qaatkesugigataghsi,	ugpeqsugigataghsi	Kiyaghneq.	Kiyaghneghem	ungipii	nagasugigatasi,	ighsakeraaghaqagsillu	Agleghnalghiik	Taghneghak	sivuneghpesistungwaaq.
B05_07_Acts_V50	Qamaglluki	Kiyaghneghem	uuknaliqistengi	sivuneghpesi	amyuutkegkaqiit.	Tuququqaqiit	uuknaliqistet	uuknaliqutkesatgu	Seghleghqumangilnguq	tagiyaghqaaningatgu.	Enkaam	kaasan,	uveghpagulluku	tuqutkaqaghsi.
B05_07_Acts_V51	Elpesinguusi	Kiyaghneghem	yaqulegteggun	tuunegkii	Liilightuusaneng,	qaatkumangitasi.”
B05_07_Acts_V52	Agghistet	nagalluku	Stephen	sakrituteghllakat	repall	ggiistaghaatkaat.
B05_07_Acts_V53	Iwernga	Stephen,	imighngalghii	Agleghnalghiigneng	Taghneghagneng,	sivugsalghiimi	qilagmun	esghaqaa	Kiyaghneghem	nighughqellgha,	Jesus-llu	nekevghalghii	Kiyaghneghem	aghenqigneghani.
B05_07_Acts_V54	Pikii,	“Esghaqaghtegguqun!	Esghaghaqa	qilak	qelpelghii,	Ighneghallu	Yugem	nekevghalghii	Kiyaghneghem	aghenqigneghani!”
B05_07_Acts_V55	Agghistet	siguteteng	saapluki	iiggmeggneng,	araghaataasimaghmeng	qamaglluteng	sughukaat	Stephen.
B05_07_Acts_V56	Siingvagaatameng	aghulaqutkaat	Jerusalem-emeng,	tuqunnaluku	milughpagaataghhiinaq.	Taagken	Stephen-em	avutkistengita	qaasliteng	mataghlluki	nukalpigam	Saul-em	saaghwakun	lliluki	milughpagaataghyuggaaqaat.	Tamaakutlu	ilangita	milughpagaataqaat.
B05_07_Acts_V57	Whaa	uyghagem	tekiqaghvikngatni	Stephen	yughaqaq,	“Ataneq	Jesus,	taghneghagka	tuguklighqek.”
B05_07_Acts_V58	Segesqughlluni	iglagtupiglluni	pikaq,	“Ataneq,	seghevutiki	whaken	seghleghqellghitneng.”	Tawaten	piluni	tuqukaq.
B05_08_Acts_V1	Saul-em	itagnaqegkaa	Stephen-em	tuqutellgha.	Yuget	piniqingalghiit	Kiyaghneghmeng	lliifqaat	Stephen	qiyakeghllagumaan.	Taagken	aghneghmeng	kenlanga	amyuutkeghllagyagutkiit	ugpeqat	Jerusalem-emelnguut.	Saul-em	elngaatall	amyuutkegkii	ugpeqat	naangesqelluki.	Iitghaqluni	nengitnun	qamughsiighmeng	aanuquqii	aghnatlu,	yugetlu	anusimingllaghtesqughnaluki.	Qamagtengngwaaghluteng	ugpeqat,	pelleghmun	qimaguutkat	nunanun	Judea-melngughnunllu,	Samaria-melngughnunllu,	apostle-nginaghhaat	qimagumangilnguut.
B05_08_Acts_V4	Tamaakut	ugpeqat	qimaguutkat	tamanganun	ungipaqikat	Pinilghiineng	Ungipaneng	naansaghngaaghmeng.
B05_08_Acts_V5	Philip	Samaria-lluni	ungipaqegkaa	Christ-a,	allaaghlluwhaghtighllagaataqaqlu.
B05_08_Acts_V6	Enkaam	yuget	nagatngwaaqaqegkangat	esghapagluki	allaaghlluwhaghtillghi.
B05_08_Acts_V7	Uglapiglleghhiineng	yugneng	aanesquqii	tughneghaat	akilghuungitgun.	Tamaakutlu	piyugigalnguut,	uniiqatlu	naallghuquqii.
B05_08_Acts_V8	Enkaangam	Samaria-ghmiit	elngaatall	quyaghllakat.
B05_08_Acts_V9	Samaria-minguq	taawa	alignalghii	yuuk,	aatgha	Simon.	Salin	Philip	kaatellghilluku	alignaghtaalleghmikun	saghiighayugtaqegkangi	yuget,	qukaayugtaqelghiillu	aghtiiganniluni.
B05_08_Acts_V10	Enkaam	qamaglluteng	tamaanlenguut,	pingwaaghllagneng,	ukavanlleghpigaghnun	nagasukestaghluku	ayuqegkangat.	Pikaat,	“Una	yuuk	aghtughyaghqaanghillengeghllakaaguq	Kiyaghneghmeng.”
B05_08_Acts_V11	Yuget	nagasupiglluku	ayuqegkangat,	qayughllak	qavngarugllaggaaneng	allaaghlluwhaghyugtekayugukangi	alignaghtaalleghmikun.
B05_08_Acts_V12	Iwernga	Philip-em	ungipaqsaki	Pinilghiit	Ungipat	Kiyaghneghem	Ataneghpagullghaneng	ayuqelghiit,	Aatghanengllu	Jesus	Christ-am	ugpeqegkiit	ungipii.	Tamaakut	yugetlu,	aghnatlu	ugpeqilghiit	paaptaayekat.
B05_08_Acts_V13	Talwa	Simon-emllu	ugpeqegkii.	Enkaam	paaptaayelleghmi	kingunganeng	maligsaaqaa	Philip.	Esghapagluku	Philip	allaaghhiinaghneng	allaaghlluwhaghtiighaatalghii	saghiighayukaq.
B05_08_Acts_V14	Apostle-et	Jerusalem-emelnguut	nagaqughluki	Samaria-ghmiit	ugpeghniluki	Kiyaghneghem	Ungipaaneng,	kayagtekagket	Peter-enkuk	John-enkuk	ellngitnun.
B05_08_Acts_V15	Samaria-ghmiit	ugpeqiit	paaptaayekat	Aatghinaghhaakun	Atanghem	Jesus-em,	naqam	salin	nalighhiiniita	allgeghsigalkegket	Agleghnalghiik	Taghneghak.	Peter-enkuk	John-enkuk	Samaria-mun	kaallutek	aglaqak	ugpeqanun.	Taagken	saaftaqluki	yughaatkaataqiik,	enkaam	Agleghnalghiik	Taghneghak	allgeghtekagket.
B05_08_Acts_V18	Simon-em	esghapakakek	apostle-ek,	saafneghmegneki	ugpeqat	allgeghutaqelghiit	Agleghnalghiigneng	Taghneghagneng.
B05_08_Acts_V19	Enkaam	apostle-ek	pikakek,	“Tukfighiighllanga	aghtughyaghqaanghilleghmeng	whangallu	saaftekumki	yuget	allgeghutesqelluki	Agleghnalghiigneng	Taghneghagneng.”
B05_08_Acts_V20	Iwernga	Peter-em	pikaa,	“Yeqay	Kiyaghneghem	naafqelliten	manituumaghpek.	Sumeghpenii-i	Kiyaghneghem	tunusaa	tukfighlleqniluku	pizigu?
B05_08_Acts_V21	Qepghalgusighinaanghituten,	qayughllak	sumeghtaghallghen	anaggutngaaq	Kiyaghneghem	esghaamallghani.
B05_08_Acts_V22	Avuteghqelluten	seghleghqusiqnanighhungam	taana	seghlepestaaq	piyukellghen.	Enkaam	yughaa	Ataneghmun	luuraq	seghevunnayukagu	taana	seghlepestaaq	seghleghqellghen.
B05_08_Acts_V23	Taawa	liigikamken	aqinallelegllaguutenllu	asighqengngaatenllu	seghleghqelleghpeneng.”
B05_08_Acts_V24	Simon-em	pikakek,	“Yughaatkaghtegnenga	Ataneghmun	tawaten	pilleghpesistun	pifqaama	pisqellunga.”
B05_08_Acts_V25	Taagken	Peter-enkuk	John-enkuk	tistemunilutek,	ungipaqilutek	Atanghem	ungipaaneng	aghulaqegkak	Jerusalem-emun.	Samaria-mi	igleghangulutek,	nenun	kaanneghmegni	Pinilghiineng	Ungipaneng	ungipaghaqelghiik.
B05_08_Acts_V26	Taagken	yaqulgan	Atanghem	pikaa	Philip,	“Yataaghqelluten	ikevaam	tunganganilengughnun	tumenun	aglaa	paaghqillghanilngughnun,	Jerusalem-emeng	Gaza-mun	ayuqelghiinun.”
B05_08_Acts_V27	Enkaam	yataaghqelluni	aghulaqegkaq.	Taakwani	tumangani	esghaqaa	Ethiopia-ghmii	eunuch,	Ethiopia-m	Queen-ngan	Candace-em,	manimeng	aflengakistenga.	Jerusalem-emeng	uteghnighaqeftuq	neminun	maniguusaghtughluni	Kiyaghneghmun.	Chariot-mikun	igleghutkelluku	atightughaqeftii	uuknaliqestem	Isaiah-m	igaqegkii.
B05_08_Acts_V29	Agleghnalghiim	Taghnegham	pikaa	Philip,	“Chariot-ngan	saaghwanun	aglaghluten	maligsaaghhu.”
B05_08_Acts_V30	Enkaam	malighqaghluku	nagatkaa	atightulghii	uuknaliqestem	Isaiah-am	igaqegkaaneng.	Philip-em	aaptekaa,	“Liigiksikii	atightuqaghten?”
B05_08_Acts_V31	Kiimsiqaa,	“Naten	liigikesqelluki	piziki,	wetkuqun	kitum	liigikestekaki	whangamnun	sameng	piiqutangi.”	Taagken	uugtesluku	saaghwmikun	aqumesqegkaa.
B05_08_Acts_V32	Eunuch-em	atightughaqeftii	Kiyaghneghem	akuzitangi	whaten	pilghiit:	“Penniighet	tuqusaghtunghisteng	qalghiigatut,	penniighaghaatlu	qigunghisteng	qalghiigatut,	tawateghpigaq	ellngallu	sameng	piighsimangilnguq.
B05_08_Acts_V33	Kayngusaakestaqngatgu	igughistengitkaq.	Unguvallgha	kenletghuutestekaq	nunami.	Enkaam	kitumngam	aapghwaaghlleqaki	seghleghtulangi	yulgutangan	tamaani	pilleghmi?”
B05_08_Acts_V34	Eunuch-em	aaptekaa	Philip,	“Ungipaataghtinga	uuknaliqista	ellmineng	akuzitkaqaa,	nalighmeng	kina	alla	piiqagu?”
B05_08_Acts_V35	Philip-em	piinliisiqluki	Isaiah-am	igaqegkii,	ungipaatkaa	Pinilghiineng	Ungipaneng	Jesus-meng.
B05_08_Acts_V36	Igleghutkelluku	meghmun	kaasamek	eunuch-em	pikaa,	“Esgha	taana	meq!	Sangwaangam	eltuusiqelleqsikun	paaptaayelleghqamnun?”
B05_08_Acts_V37	Philip-em	pikaa,	“Ipapighqelluten	ugpequvek	paaptaayelleqamken.”	Eunuch-em	kiimsiqaa,	“Aa,	ugpeqaqa	Jesus	Christ-a	Ighneqaa	Kiyaghneghem.”
B05_08_Acts_V38	Enkaam	eunuch-em	igleghutisteni	aghuliighesqegkaa.	Ateghlutek	chariot-meng	meghmun	aatqak,	enkaam	Philip-em	tawani	paaptaayekaa.
B05_08_Acts_V39	Meghmeng	uugsayek	Atanghem	Taghneghagkenka	aghulaqutkaa	Philip,	enkaam	eunuch-em	alla	esghamangitkaa,	iwernga	nagneqaq	quyallelighllagluni.
B05_08_Acts_V40	Taana	Philip	piyalghiimi	Azotus-meteftuq.	Caesarea-mun	aglaatkelluku	nenun	kaanneghmini	Pinilghiineng	Ungipaneng	ungipaghaqelghii.
B05_09_Acts_V1	Saul	Jerusalem-emelluni	taawa	paninang	alingsiqukii	tuququghnaqniluki	maligsaaghtengi	Atanghem.	Qenwat	Damascus-esukaq,	luuraq	Jesus-em	maligsaaghtengi	yugetlu	aghnatlu	tamaannayukata.	Esghaqumiki	taginnaluki	Jerusalem-emun	anusiminglliisqelluki.	Enkaam	high	priest-mun	piluni	latangllaatesqegkaq	pilleghqalitesqelluni	igleghutistengitnun	synagogue-et	Damascus-melngughnun,	tawaten	pinaluni.
B05_09_Acts_V3	Enkaam	Saul	aghulaqegkaq	Damascus-mun.	Iiwenllu	kaasaghtughaquq,	qilagmeng	nighugllagem	kukegtekaa.
B05_09_Acts_V4	Uullghaghlluni	nagaquqaa	ma	whaten	pilghii,	“Saul,	Saul,	sangama	amyuutkumanginaghsinga?”
B05_09_Acts_V5	Saul-em	aaptekaa,	“Kinanguzin	Ataneq?”	Mem	kiimsiqaa,	“Jesus-nguunga	amyuutkegkan.
B05_09_Acts_V6	Makelluten	aglaa	Damascus-mun,	tawani	kitum	ungipaalleqaaten	naten	pilleghqaghpeneng.”
B05_09_Acts_V7	Yuget	igleghalgutangi	aghuliiqat	tawani,	akuzipagningunateng	nagatkaat	ma,	naqam	kina	alngunak	esghaamangilkangat.
B05_09_Acts_V8	Saul	makesalghiimi	esghaanneghituq	qayughllak	ayaamalghii.	Enkaam	tasluqluku	aglaatkaat	Damascus-mun.
B05_09_Acts_V9	Pingayut	aghneghet	ayaangakaq,	talwa	neghumangilnguqlu,	meghumangilnguqlu.
B05_09_Acts_V10	Taawanguq	Damascus-mi,	yuuk	ugpeqingalghii	Jesus-meng,	aatgha	Ananias.	Esghaaghwaalleghqun	Atanghem	tuqluqaa,	“Ananias.”	Kiimsiqaa,	“Ay,	Ataneq?”
B05_09_Acts_V11	Atanghem	pikaa,	“Tumenun	aglaa	aatqelghiinun,	‘Taklaghrukegtaq’	Taagken	Judas-enkunun	aapsaghtughhu	yuuk,	Saul-nguuq,	Tarsus-meng	pinguuq,	yughaghaquq.
B05_09_Acts_V12	Esghaghwaaghqun	esghamaa	yuuk	itelghii,	aatgha	Ananias,	saafsaqminigu	esghaghyagunneqigtuq.”
B05_09_Acts_V13	Iwernga	Ananias-em	pikaa,	“Ataneq,	nagaqughaqaqa	taana	yuuk	uglapiglleghhiineng,	apeghnaqepigtaqaat	seghletun	pilleghllaga	yugpenun	Jerusalem-emi.
B05_09_Acts_V14	Pilleghqangegkaaguq	chief	priest-eneng	tagiluni	Damascus-mun	tugulaghnaluki	qamaglluki	yughaqayuget	ateghpegun.”
B05_09_Acts_V15	Iwernga	Atanghem	pikaa,	“Aglaa,	takugu	qayughllak	nakmikumaaqa	ungipaqesqellunga	Gentile-enun,	umiilegnun,	Israel-eghmiinunllu.
B05_09_Acts_V16	Liigikesnaqngwaaqa	aangluku	ikfiqelleghmeng	whanga	apalluqlunga.”
B05_09_Acts_V17	Enkaam	Ananias-em	takukaa	Saul.	Iteghluni	saafsimaan	pikaa,	“Anglegutemni	Saul,	Atanghem	Jesus-em	esghaqaghpek	tumeni	taginguluten,	kayagtaanga	elpenun.	Kayagutaaten	saaftesqelluten	esghaasagunneqigtesqelluten,	imiisqellutenllu	Agleghnalghiigneng	Taghneghagneng.”
B05_09_Acts_V18	Tawaninginaq	iqallugem	qaltesugningi	iyegkeneng	ifkaquutkat,	enkaam	esghasagutkaq.	Taagken	makelluni	paaptaayekaq.
B05_09_Acts_V19	Taam	kingunganeng	neghyalghiimi	iknaqsuugtekaq.	Saul	ugpeqanitkaq	Damascus-mi	qafsinat	aghneghet.
B05_09_Acts_V20	Mulugpenani	synagogue-ni	ungipaqegkaa	Jesus,	Ighneqniluku	Kiyaghneghmun.
B05_09_Acts_V21	Nagatullghiim	saghiighayagutkaat	repall	ellmeggneng	aapqughaghutkat,	“Unangunghitaa-a	yuuk	Jerusalem-emi	amyuqetiqeghllakaq	yughaqayugneng	Jesus-em	aatghakun?	Maavek	taginguyalghii	tawaten	pinaluni,	ugpeqat	tugulaghnaluki,	aglannaluki	chief	priest-enun.”
B05_09_Acts_V22	Saul-em	ungipaqilleghmikun	wata	liigikestaghaqaa	Jesus,	Christ-angutanga	repall	Jews-et	Damascus-melnguut	aaghtiiraaghpagningitkaat.
B05_09_Acts_V23	Saul	ungipaqilqinaghyan	tawaten	qafsinegyagllak	aghneq,	Jews-et	wataqaaghaq	ugumiyagutkaat,	repall	qerngughulluteng	agghitkegkaat	tuqunnaluku.
B05_09_Acts_V24	Enkaam	aghneghtuumaan,	unugtuumaan	Damascus-em	amigllalghutngani	kelengakegkaat	tuqunnaluku.	Iwernga	Saul-em	nagaquqaa	tawaten	agghillghat.
B05_09_Acts_V25	Enkaam	unugmi	ataasimi,	Saul-em	maligsaaghtengita	pasket-eghrugllagegnekun	mingllutmeng	eslatmun	ukigtekaat.
B05_09_Acts_V26	Taagken	Saul	kaasami	Jerusalem-emun	ilannaqegkaayaalghii	Jesus-em	maligsaaghtengitnun.	Taawanginaq	iingunaghhaghmeng	alikegkaat,	qayughllak	aygughikegkaat	ellngallu	maligsaaghtengughsimatanga.
B05_09_Acts_V27	Iwernga	Barnabas-em	Saul	aglaalluku	apostle-enun	aapqaa	Saul-mun	tumemi	esghaamaniluku	Ataneq,	aleghquutkaaniluteklu.	Aapqaallu	Damascus-mi	ungipaqaaniluku	tetugpenani	Aatghakun	Jesus-em.
B05_09_Acts_V28	Enkaam	tugukliqaat.	Taagken	kenlanga	Saul	ugpeqanitkaq.	Igleghutkelluku	Jerusalem-emi,	ungipaqikaq	tetugpenani	aatghakun	Atanghem.	Iwernga	ilangita	Jews-et	Greek-estun	akuzikayuget	aaghtiiraaqaan	tuqusukaqegkangat.
B05_09_Acts_V30	Ugpeqat	liigiksamegteggu	Jews-enun	tuqunnaqniluku	Saul,	aglaatkaat	Caesarea-mun,	taagken	kayagtekaat	Tarsus-mun.
B05_09_Acts_V31	Qamaglluteng	ugpeqat	Judea-mi,	Galilee-mi,	Samaria-millu	amyuutkestengngunateng	kiyaghtekat.	Ugpellghit	iknaqughtekat,	alingaqelghiit	qaatkunneghitelleghqameggneng	Ataneghmun,	Agleghnalghiimllu	Taghnegham	kayusiingukangi	enkaam	ugpeqat	nulakat.
B05_09_Acts_V32	Peter-em	igleghatkelluku	laalighfikuqii	Kiyaghneghem	yugi	naansaghngaata.	Ataasimi	aghneghmi	laalightekaq	Lydda-melngughnun.
B05_09_Acts_V33	Tamaani	esghaqaa	yuuk	aatgha	Aeneas,	pingayuneng	inglulek	ayumiqulleq	makesigalnguq	uniighngatmiineng.
B05_09_Acts_V34	Peter-em	pikaa,	“Aeneas,	Jesus	Christ-am	naallghutaaten,	makelluten	allighan	iimggu.”	Tawaninginaq	Aeneas	maketkaq.
B05_09_Acts_V35	Uglapiglleghhiit	Lydda-ghmiitlu	Sharon-eghmiitlu	esghaghyamegteggu	Aeneas	naallghulluni,	ugpeghtuutkat	Ataneghqun.
B05_09_Acts_V36	Joppa-minguq	taawa	ugpeqaq	aghnaq	aatgha	Tabitha,	(Greek-stun	Dorcas,	whaten	pisiq,	quyngiq),	quunpeng	kayusighimaghllak,	kiyang	tamaakunun	aklumalghiinun.
B05_09_Acts_V37	Taagken	qinuyugluni	tuqukaq	enkaam	ughvughqelluku	qemtamun	mayuutkaat.
B05_09_Acts_V38	Joppa-ghmiit	ugpeqat	nagaquqaat	Peter	Lydda-menniluku.	Lydda,	Joppa-meng	qantaghaghhanlenguq,	enkaam	ugpeqat	kevgaqegkagket	maalghuk	yugek	Peter-mun	tagiragkiighesqelluku	Joppa-mun.
B05_09_Acts_V39	Peter-em	yataaghqelluni	maligtekakek.	Kaasan	qemtamun	mayuutkaat.	Legan	iteghtuq	ugingighat	qiyamaghmeng	kanglluqaghlluku	kelguvikegkaat	aatkaneng	Dorcas-em	ulimaaghaneng.
B05_09_Acts_V40	Peter-em	aanesqughluki	segesqughlluni	yughaqaq.	Taaqluni	yughaneghmeng	qiivluku	yugusiq	pikaa,	“Tabitha,	maketen.”	Tabitha	esghaatkelluku	esghaghyamigu	Peter	aqumegkaq.
B05_09_Acts_V41	Peter-em	iiggakun	tuguluku	nekevestekaa.	Taagken	tuqluqii	ugpeqatlu	ugingighatlu	esghiisqelluku	unguvaamatanga.
B05_09_Acts_V42	Qamagtengngwaaghluteng	Joppa-ghmiit	nagaquqaat	Tabitha-m	unguvallgha	enkaam	uglapiglleghhiim	ugpeqegkaat	Ataneq.
B05_09_Acts_V43	Peter	mulukaq	Joppa-mi,	Simon-enkunitkaq	sanaghtistemi.
B05_10_Acts_V1	Caesarea-minguq	taawa	yuuk	aatgha	Cornelius.	Umiilgat	Rome-em	pilluwaghtengita	Italy-meng	pit.
B05_10_Acts_V2	Yuuk	pinilghii,	kayusighimaghllak	aklumalghiinun,	yughatuqaqlu	Kiyaghneghmun.	Nengllugutkullghiit,	qepghaghtekullghiit	maniguutkayuget	Kiyaghneghmun.
B05_10_Acts_V3	Ataasimi	aghneghmi	3-klaagmi	esghaghwaaqaq.	Whateghlluwaaq	esghaqaa	Kiyaghneghem	yaqulga	itelghii,	yaqulgem	tuqluqaa,	“Cornelius!”
B05_10_Acts_V4	Alingruughumaghmi	esghapagtughluku	yaqulek	aaptekaa,	“Ataneq,	sameng	pizin?”	Yaqulgem	pikaa,	“Kiyaghneghem	nagaquumii	yughalleghten,	efquqepigtaallu	kayusighillghen	aklumalghiinun	enkaam	neqamikaaten.
B05_10_Acts_V5	Joppa-mun	aqfastigu	yuuk	aatqelghii	Simon	Peter-meng.
B05_10_Acts_V6	Simon-enkunituq	sanaghtistemi,	mangteghaa	esnemetuq.”
B05_10_Acts_V7	Yaqulgem	tawaten	piluku	unitkaa.	Taagken	Cornelius-em	tuqluqakek	maalghuk	qepghaghtegni,	pillugwaghtallu.	Taana	pilluwaghta	Cornelius-em	kayutanga	maniguutkayuk	Kiyaghneghmun.
B05_10_Acts_V8	Tagiyata	ungipaatngwaaqii	esghaghwaalleghmineng,	taagken	kevgaqegkii	Joppa-mun.
B05_10_Acts_V9	Unaamingani	aghneghem	qukaani	kevgat	kaasaghtughaqutlu	Joppa-mun,	Peter	mayuqaq	mangtegham	qaaynganun	yughaghnaluni.
B05_10_Acts_V10	Taagken	iyataqaq,	sameng	neghyukaq.	Sama	neqmeng	yataaghqumaluki	Peter	esghaghwaaqaq.
B05_10_Acts_V11	Esghaqaa	qilak	qelpelghii,	taagken	esghaqaa	qiipaghaghllagsugnilnguq	ukigtekangat	nunamun	estamatgun	tekerqaakun.
B05_10_Acts_V12	Taawanguq	imaqeftuq	allaaghhiinaghneng	teghikusaneng,	reptile-eneng,	qawaagnengllu	tengaakayugneng.
B05_10_Acts_V13	Taagken	mem	pikaa,	“Peter,	makelluten	tuqutiluten	neghi!”
B05_10_Acts_V14	Iwernga	Peter-em	pikaa,	“Yeghlegillu,	Ataneq!	Neghigatunga	iinghutkameng	ukmanginneghilngughmeng	teghikusameng.”
B05_10_Acts_V15	Mem	pilaataqaa,	“Kiyaghneghem	ukmangiqaqii	taakut,	ukmanginneghinniluki	pigpenaki.”
B05_10_Acts_V16	Tawaten	pikaq	pingayuneng	ketwhell.	Taagken	tawaninginaq	taana	iingunaghmi	qilagmun	mayuutkaq.
B05_10_Acts_V17	Peter-em	kukriqutkegkaa	sameng	pisiitanga	esghaghwaalleni.	Tawaten	pimaluku	Cornelius-em	kevgiita	liitkaat	Simon-em	mangteghaa	naantulanga,	enkaam	manughaanun	kaatkat.
B05_10_Acts_V18	Qamavek	aaptekiit,	“Whani	aqelqaanghitaa	yuuk	aatgha	Simon	Peter?”
B05_10_Acts_V19	Peter-em	paninang	sumeghtaghaatkumaluku	esghaghwaalleni,	Taghnegham	pikaa,	“Uyuq,	yuget	pingayut	ivaghaqaaten.
B05_10_Acts_V20	Ukigluten	qaqilqafqaavek	maligtiki,	qayughllak	whanga	kayagtanka	elpenun.”
B05_10_Acts_V21	Enkaam	Peter-em	ukigluni	pikii,	“Whanganguuq	ivaqaghsi.	Sameng	pistengnga?”
B05_10_Acts_V22	Kiimsiqaat,	“Cornelius-em	kevgaqiinkut,	umiilguuq	Rome-em	pilluwaghtengitnun.	Yuuk	pinighllagtuq	maniguutkayuk	Kiyaghneghmun,	qamagllutengllu	Jews-et	siivakepigtaqaat.	Kiyaghneghem	yaqulgan	pikaqaa	Cornelius,	‘Aqfastigu	Peter	elpesinun	pisqelluku,	nagatesqelluku	sameng	pilleghqaa	elpenun.’”
B05_10_Acts_V23	Taagken	Peter-em	iitghesqegkii,	tawanillu	qaviisqegkii.	Unaamingani	yataaghqelluni	maligtekii	Cornelius-em	kevgii,	ugpeqatlu	ilangi	Joppa-meng	maligutkat.
B05_10_Acts_V24	Taagken	unaamingani	kaatkat	Caesarea-mun.	Cornelius-em	ilakwaanillu	ilakumtaanillu	tagilaghaatesluki	ellmeggnun	utaqakaat	Peter.
B05_10_Acts_V25	Peter	iitghaquqlu	Cornelius-em	payeghluku	segesqughfikegkaa	manigughnaluku.
B05_10_Acts_V26	Iwernga	Peter-em	nekevestutkelluku	pikaa,	“Nekevi,	whangallu	yuguunga.”
B05_10_Acts_V27	Iitghutkelluku	Peter-em	aleghquqaa	Cornelius.	Iteghyalghiimi	taawa	yuuk	qerngughuteghllagumalghii	tawani.
B05_10_Acts_V28	Peter-em	pikii,	“Liisimakngwaaghaghsi	whangkuta	Jews-eni	Liilightuusamta	ineghtekaqiinkut	ilatefqaamta	pisqelluta	Gentile-enun,	talwa	laalighfikesnaniqaqii.	Iwernga	Kiyaghneghem	kelguvikaanga	kina	alngunak	ukmanginneghinniluku	sumeghtaghaatkefqaan	pisqelluku.
B05_10_Acts_V29	Aqfasafsinga	tagiinga	qaqilqagpenanga.	Sangama	piiqestengnga?”
B05_10_Acts_V30	Cornelius-em	pikaa,	“Whaten	lliighumaan	akuwaaq	piiqellemtun	yughaamalunga	3-kellaagmi,	yuuk	manumkun	nekevuq	aatkii	nighugllaget.
B05_10_Acts_V31	Whaa	piinga,	‘Cornelius!	Kiyaghneghem	yughalleghten	nagaquumii,	neqamikiillu	aklumalghiinun	kayusighilleghten.
B05_10_Acts_V32	Joppa-mun	kina	kevgaqigu	aqfasqelluku	Simon	Peter.	Simon-enkunituq	sanaghtistemi,	mangteghaa	esnemetuq.’
B05_10_Acts_V33	Enkaam	tawaninginaq	aqfasqamken,	quyakamken	tagilghiiten.	Liisimakluku	Kiyaghneghem	nayuqellgha	qamaglluta	whaanlengughni	nagaqughyugaghput	sangwaa	qamaglluku	Atanghem	elpenun	aapghesqegkaa	whangkunnun.”
B05_10_Acts_V34	Taagken	Peter-em	pikii,	“Taawa	ipa	liigikaqa	Kiyaghneq	taniillghiteftuq,	tawatengwaaq	pikayuguftaa	tamaghhaghllagan	yuuk	ataasistun.
B05_10_Acts_V35	Tuguklighyaghqaqaa	kina	alngunak	nakumiinguyaghngaan	alikilghii	ellmineng,	pinitunllu	pikayuk.
B05_10_Acts_V36	Liisimakaghsi	Kiyaghneghem	ungipaa	ungipaqegkaq	Israel-eghmiinun,	taana	Pinilghii	Ungipaq	yuget	nekeggmellengusighqaqaat	Kiyaghneghmun	Jesus	Christ-akun.	Jesus	Christ-a,	Atanqaa	tamaghhaghwaaghmi	yugem.
B05_10_Acts_V37	Liisimakaghsi	taana	ungipaq	mingitkaaguq	Judea-lqaaghaghmi,	piinliqaq	Galilee-mi	John-em	ungipaqaqngagu	paaptaayelleq.
B05_10_Acts_V38	Liisimakaghsi	Jesus	Nazareth-eghmii,	Kiyaghneghem	imiqaa	Agleghnalghiigneng	Taghneghagneng,	aghtughyaghqaanghilleghmengllu.	Navek	alngunak	pineghmini	pinitun	piiqegkangi	yuget,	naallghuquqiillu	tamaakut	Tughneghaam	aaghqutaqegkii,	qayughllak	Kiyaghneq	Jesus-melnguq.
B05_10_Acts_V39	Whangkuta	apostle-eni	liisimakistenguukut	tamaghhaanun	tawaten	pillghanun	Jews-et	nunangitni,	Jerusalem-emillu.	Tuqutkaqaat	tuquuqaalluku	qaquurakun.
B05_10_Acts_V40	Iwernga	pingayiitangani	aghneghem	Kiyaghneghem	unguvaghtestekaqaa	tuqulleghmeng,	esghaghtestekaqaallu	yugnun.
B05_10_Acts_V41	Iwernga	qamaglluni	yugem	esghaamangitaa.	Whangkuta	esghaqaqaghput	qayughllak	Kiyaghneghem	nakmikegkaqiinkut	liisimakistenguluta.	Talwa	neghelgusiqaqaghputlu	meghelgusiqaqaghputlu	kingunganeng	unguvaghtestellghan	tuqulleghmeng.
B05_10_Acts_V42	Taagken	kayagtekaqiinkut	ungipaqesqelluku	Pinilghii	Ungipaq,	aapghesqegkaaguqlu	Kiyaghneghmun	nakmikegkaqniluni	nanqigtistenguluni	unguvalghiinunllu	tuqukanunllu.
B05_10_Acts_V43	Qamaglluteng	uuknaliqistet	pikaagut,	kitumnguq	alngunak	ugpeqegkumigu	aatghakun,	seghevutellengyaghqaaguq	seghleghqelleghmineng.”
B05_10_Acts_V44	Peter	paninang	akuzimaluku	qamaglluki	nagallghiit	ungipameng	Agleghnalghiim	Taghnegham	iitqii,	enkaam	allaaghlluwhatun	akuzistekiillu	usuqistekiillu	Kiyaghneghmeng.	Circumcise-ekat	ugpeqat	Joppa-meng	maligutkat	Peter-mun	saghiighayukat	nagasamegteki	tawaten	akuzillghiit.	Liigikegkaat	Kiyaghneghem	Agleghnalghiik	Taghneghak	tunusaqegkek	talwa	Gentile-enun.	Taagken	Peter-em	pikii,
B05_10_Acts_V47	“Ukut	yuget	allgeghutut	Agleghnalghiigneng	Taghneghagneng	whangkuteghpigaghestun.	Kitumngam	paaptaayesnanighnaqaki	meghqun?”
B05_10_Acts_V48	Taagken	qelqii	paaptaayesqelluki	Aatghakun	Jesus	Christ-am.	Taam	kingunganeng	ellmeggnitaghiisqegkaat	Peter.
B05_11_Acts_V1	Apostle-etlu	ugpeqatlu	Judea-melnguut	nagaquqiit	Gentile-enunllu	ugpequmaniluki	Kiyaghneghem	akuzitangi.
B05_11_Acts_V2	Peter	kaasan	Jerusalem-emun,	Jews-et	ugpeqat	circumcise-eghiyukat	Gentile-et	ugpeqiitneng	seghlequuqaat	Peter,	pikaat,
B05_11_Acts_V3	“Sangan	circumcize-emangilnguut	iteghvikluki	nengitnun	neghelgusighsiki?”
B05_11_Acts_V4	Liigikesqelluki	Peter-em	esghaghwaalleghmineng	kenlanga	aapqaa	sangwaa	qamaglluku	apeghiiqaq.
B05_11_Acts_V5	“Joppa-mi	yughaamalunga	esghaghwaaqaagunga.	Esghaghaqa	qiipaghaghllagsugni	estamatgun	tekerqaakun	ukigtekangat	qilagmeng	whangamnun.
B05_11_Acts_V6	Tawavek	yuvghiighwaaghyaqegka	imaqeftuq	allaaghhiinaghneng	teghikusaneng,	reptile-eneng,	qawaagneng	tengaakayugneng.
B05_11_Acts_V7	Taagken	ma	nagaqughaqa	whaten	pilghii,	‘Peter,	makelluten	tuqutiluten	neghi!’
B05_11_Acts_V8	Iwernga	kiimsighaqa,	‘Yeghlegillu	Ataneq!	Neghigatanka	tamaakut	ukmanginneghilnguut	neqet	iinghutkat.’
B05_11_Acts_V9	“Mem	pilaataghaanga	qilagmeng,	‘Kiyaghneghem	ukmangiqaqii	tamaakut,	ukmanginneghinniluki	sumeghtaghaatkesaghqaqenghitaten.’
B05_11_Acts_V10	Tawaten	pikaaguq	pingayuneng	ketwhell.	Taagken	qamaglluteng	taakut	aga	qilagmun	mayuutaqutlu,
B05_11_Acts_V11	whaa	yuget	pingayut	kaatut	tukumnun,	kevgaaftut	whangamnun	Caesarea-meng.
B05_11_Acts_V12	Agleghnalghiim	Taghnegham	qaqilqafqaama	maligtesqii.	Ukutlu	aghvinlek	yuget	ugpeqaalguteput	maligutut	Joppa-meng	Caesarea-mun.	Kaalluta	Cornelius-enkunun	iteghaatukut.
B05_11_Acts_V13	Cornelius-em	aapghaa	yaqulegmeng	esghaatelleni	nemini,	yaqulgemnguq	whaten	pii,	‘Joppa-mun	aqfastigu	yuuk	aatqelghii	Simon	Peter-meng.
B05_11_Acts_V14	Ungipaalleqiisi	nengllugutkullghiini	naten	yugulillengelleghqameng.’
B05_11_Acts_V15	Enkaam	akuziiqungallu	Agleghnalghiim	Taghnegham	iitghii	tawatengwaaq	whangkunnun	itelleghmitun	Pentecost-em	Aghneghani.
B05_11_Acts_V16	Taagken	neqangughaqa	Atanghem	pillgha	whaten,	‘John	paaptaayelaqaaguq	meghqun,	iwernga	elpesi	paaptaayellequsi	Agleghnalghiignekun	Taghneghagnekun.’
B05_11_Acts_V17	Enkaam	Kiyaghneghem	tuunumakaki	Gentile-et	taagken	ataasimeng	tunusameng	tuunegkamineng	whangkunnun	ugpeqaqngamteggu	Ataneq	Jesus	Christ-a,	whanga	kinanguzinga	aghuliighhnaqsaghqaaluku	Kiyaghneq	tawaten	pillghaneng	Gentile-enun?”
B05_11_Acts_V18	Tawaten	Peter-em	piyisteng	qallegnanighluteng,	yeghlegi	usuqegkaat	Kiyaghneq.	Pikat,	“Taawa	liigikaghput	Kiyaghneghem	talwa	Gentile-et	pilleghqalisimakangi	avuteghqesqelluki	seghleghqellghitneng,	unguvallengesqellukillu	kenlengilngughmeng	unguvalleghmeng!”
B05_11_Acts_V19	Stephen-em	tuqutellgha	kenlekluku	Jews-et	amyuutkegkiit	ugpeqat,	enkaam	anakat	Jerusalem-emeng.	Aghulaquutkat	kenlanga	Phoenicia-mun,	Cyprus-mun,	Antioch-munllu.	Igleghutkelluku	ungipaqegkiit	Pinilghiit	Ungipat	Jews-nginaghhaghnun.
B05_11_Acts_V20	Iwernga	ilangi	ugpeqat	Cyprus-mengllu	Cyrene-mengllu	Antioch-etkat,	kaalluteng	ungipaqegkaat	Ataneq	Jesus	talwa	Jews-ngunghilngughnun.
B05_11_Acts_V21	Atanghem	aghtughyaghqaanghillgha	ellngitnitkaalghii,	enkaam	uglapestaaq	yuuk	ugpeghtuulluni	qiivuutkaq	Ataneghmun.
B05_11_Acts_V22	Ugpeqat	Jerusalem-emelnguut	nagalluku	Peter,	Barnabas	kayagtekaat	Antioch-mun.
B05_11_Acts_V23	Kaasalghiimi	uglaapiglleghhii	yuuk	ugpeghtuulluni	ayuqeftuq,	enkaam	quyaghllakaq	qayughllak	liigikegkaa	Kiyaghneghem	piniqingalleghllaga	yugnun.	Barnabas	pinilghiingulghii	yuuk,	imighngaghllaklu	Agleghnalghiigneng	Taghneghagneng,	ugpeqillelegllaklu.	Taagken	allangughtefqiita	ataasiighmetekestiisqegkii	Ataneghmun.	Wataqaaghaq	ilangitallu	yuget	ugpeqegkaat	Ataneq.
B05_11_Acts_V25	Taagken	Barnabas-em	Saul	ivaghyaghtuqaa	Tarsus-mun.
B05_11_Acts_V26	Naalkesamigu	kelqegkaa	Antioch-mun.	Ataasiq	ayumiqulleq	tamaantelleghmegni	ilataqlutek	ugpeqanun	apeghtughikak	yulghuteghllagnun.	Tamaani	Antioch-mi	ugpeqat	atighyuwhaaqiit,	“Christian-et.”
B05_11_Acts_V27	Tamaani	ilangi	uuknaliqistem	Jerusalem-emeng	Antioch-mun	tagikat.
B05_11_Acts_V28	Ataasiq	Agabus-nguftuq,	nekevluni	uuknaliqegkaq	Taghneghagnekun	neqangisagllagnaqniluku	tamangani.	Taawa	neqangisagllakaq	Claudius	Umiilegpigaaluku.
B05_11_Acts_V29	Ugpeqat	ugpeqaalguteteng	Judea-melnguut	kayusighyukiit	pitutalmegestun.
B05_11_Acts_V30	Enkaam	qerngughtiluteng	manimeng	tuyughikat	elder-enun	Jerusalem-emelngughnun	Barnabas-enkugnekun	Saul-enkugnekun.
B05_12_Acts_V1	Nani	tamaani	pilleghmi	Umiilgem	Herod-em	amyuutkesagutkii	ilangi	ugpeqat.
B05_12_Acts_V2	John-em	anglegutanga	James	tuqutestekaa	savigpagkun.
B05_12_Acts_V3	Umiilgem	Herod-em	liigiksamigu	Jews-eneng	efqughtilleni	tawaten	pilleghmikun,	qelghutkaa	Peter	tugusqelluku.	(Tawaten	pikaaftuq	Neqenghaghqengnguluki	Yeast-aliimangilngughmeng	Neqekrangllameng.)
B05_12_Acts_V4	Peter	tuguyatgu,	Umiilgem	Herod-em	qelghutkaa	16-eghyagnun	pilluwaghtenun	kelengakesqelluku	estamakaghtiita	kipullgutaqluki.	Yugtuqami	nanqigsukaa	kingunganeng	Passover-em.
B05_12_Acts_V5	Enkaam	Peter	anusimingllaghvigmetestekaa.	Iwernga	ugpeqat	yughaatkeghllakaat	Kiyaghneghmun.
B05_12_Acts_V6	Peter	qavaalghii	maalghuk	kelengakistek	akulegkeni,	petugngalghiillu	malghugneghteggun	qiipraghutetgun.	Allameng	anusimingllaghvigem	amiga	kelengakistelek.	Whaa	aghtekan	Herod-em	tagitesnaqngukanga	yugnun	nanqigtesqelluku.
B05_12_Acts_V7	Atanghem	yaqulga	aliighaghtekaq,	enkaam	nighuk	kuukgutkaq	anusimingllaghvigem	ilunganun.	Yaqulgem	Peter	tuuyngakun	aghulalluku,	teghtughlluku	pikaa,	“Egmiinaq	maketen!”	Tawaninginaq	qiipraghutet	ifkaquutkat	iigganeng.
B05_12_Acts_V8	Taagken	yaqulgem	pikaa,	“Pilugugluten	kaamgegken	aatikek.”	Peter	pisqellghatun	pikaq.	Yaqulgem	pilaataqaa,	“Qaasligken	aallukek	maligtinga.”
B05_12_Acts_V9	Enkaam	Peter-em	maligtekaa.	Ugpequmangitngwaaqaqsaqanga	aanutelleni,	yeghlegi	sumeghtaghaqaq	esghaghwaaghniluni.
B05_12_Acts_V10	Sivuliitlu	tuunglighhiillu	kelengakistet	naghughlluki	kaatkak	savikenghaaghmun	amigmun.	Amik	ellmineng	qelpeghyan,	aanlutek	igleghteghngaagmek	tumetgun	yaqulek	aviitqaghtekaq.
B05_12_Acts_V11	Taagken	Peter-em	liigikngwaaqaa	samatni	enkaam	pikaq,	“Taawa	ipanguftuq	Atanghem	kayagsimaa	yaquleni	iqitutesqellunga	Herod-meng,	Jews-etlu	salleghqiitneng.”
B05_12_Acts_V12	Liigikluku	samatni	Mary-nkunun	aglaqaq,	John	Mark-em	naanganun.	Tawani	yulghun	qerngughulluni	yughaateghllagulghii	qerngaghmi.
B05_12_Acts_V13	Peter	eslaklighqun	amigkun	tenglugtughyan	aghnaghaam	qepghaghtem,	Rhoda-m	qelpeghusaghtuqaa.
B05_12_Acts_V14	Liisuqsamigu	Peter-em	menga,	quyaghllagem	angtalanganeng	qelpeghutegpenaan,	yeghlegi	ilutmun	iitqaghlluni	aapqaa	qakma	Peter	manughamenniluku.
B05_12_Acts_V15	Iwernga	pikaat,	“Temngi	piiten!”	Iwernga	sagiqutkii	ipanguniluku.	Taagken	pikaat,	“Yaqulkenghitaguwha.”
B05_12_Acts_V16	Qakma	Peter	tenglugtuumanginaqaq.	Qelpeghusaqmegteggu	ellnganguftuq	enkaam	saghiighayukat.
B05_12_Acts_V17	Peter-em	apaqukii	qallegnaniisqelluki,	enkaam	ungipamsugutngwaaqii	Atanghem	aanutellghaneng	anusimingllaghvigmeng.	Pikiillu,	“Aapqaghnakefsinga	James-munllu	ugpeqaalgutemnnunllu	tawaten	pimanilunga.”	Taagken	aanluni	natmun	pikaq.
B05_12_Acts_V18	Aghtaghaghaqaallu	kelengakistet	aviilngaqaat	Peter,	alingrughumaghmeng	kukriqegkat	samatanga.
B05_12_Acts_V19	Herod-em	ivaghtesimayaqanga	iwernga	naalkumangitkaat.	Enkaam	kelengakistet	aapqughaaghtesluki	nalluksatgu	tuququghtestekii.	Taam	kingunganeng	Herod	Judea-meng	Caesarea-lluni	tamaanteghraakaq.
B05_12_Acts_V20	Umiilgem	Herod-em	ugumiyaguteghllagukangi	Tyre-eghmiitlu	Sidon-eghmiitlu,	iwernga	tamaakumiit	yuget	kayagtekiit	Blastus-mun	akuzitunnaqaghtesqelluteng	Herod-mun.	Blastus	igleghutistekegkanga	Umiilgem	Herod-em	mangteghaghllagan.	Kaalluteng	aaptekaat	Blastus	akuzitutaghtesqelluteng	umiilegmun.	Tawaten	pikaalghiit	neqengnanighnayukameng	Herod-em	nunanganeng.
B05_12_Acts_V21	Tawani	aghneghmi	pivigkameggni	Herod-em	umiilgusit	aatkani	aatqughluki	aqumluni	aqumutaghllagegmikun	akuzikaq.
B05_12_Acts_V22	Taaqsan	akuzineghmeng	yuget	akilghuukat,	“Yugunghituq	akuzilghii,	naliqaat	kiyaghneghet!”
B05_12_Acts_V23	Tawaninginaq	Atanghem	yaqulgan	qinuyugtesteghllakaa	Herod,	qayughllak	tugukliqanga	quulvalleq	Kiyaghneghem	pinga.	Unguvaghmi	kingugtaaghllagluni	tuqukaq.
B05_12_Acts_V24	Taawa	Kiyaghneghem	ungipii	mingisimanginaqat	enkaam	wata	yuuk	ugpeghtuutkaq.
B05_12_Acts_V25	Taakuk	Barnabas-enkuk	Saul-enkuk	apeghiighyamegnegu	qepghaqaghtek	Jerusalem-emi,	Antioch-mun	uteghniqak	kelqelluku	John	Mark.
B05_13_Acts_V1	Antioch-mi	ugpeqam	ilangi	uuknaliqistenguftutlu	apeghtughistenguftutlu.	Taakunguftut	Barnabas,	Simeon,	atilqelghii	Niger-meng,	Lucius	(Cyrene-meng	pi),	Manaen	(anglilgutanga	umiilgem	Herod-em),	Saul-llu.
B05_13_Acts_V2	Maniguusimaluki	Ataneghmun,	fast-emalukillu,	Agleghnalghiim	Taghnegham	pikii,	“Aaftekek	Barnabas-enkuk	Saul-enkuk,	qayughllak	nakmikagka	allaneng	qepghaqameng	qepghiisqellukek	whangamnun.”
B05_13_Acts_V3	Taaqsameng	fast-elleghmengllu	yughalleghmengllu	saaflukek	yughaatkellukek	aghulaqestekagket.
B05_13_Acts_V4	Barnabas-enkuk	Saul-enkuk,	Agleghnalghiim	Taghnegham	kayagsistek,	Seleucia-tkak	kelqelluku	John	Mark	kayutnguluku.	Tamaaken	angyaghpagkun	qiighqamun	Cyprus-mun	pikat.	Kaasameng	Salamis-mun	synagogue-ngitni	ungipaqikat	akuzitanganeng	Kiyaghneghem.
B05_13_Acts_V6	Salamis-meng	igleghakat	inglunganun	qiighqam	Paphos-mun	kaatelleghmeggnun	kenlanga.	Tamaani	nallaqaat	yuuk	alignalghii	aatgha	Bar-Jesus,	uuknaliqestesighwaaq,	Jews-a.
B05_13_Acts_V7	Qiighqam	Governor-ngan	Sergius	Paulus-em	ilakumtaagha.	Sergius	Paulus	pillegllak.	Aqfastekakek	Barnabas-enkuk	Saul-enkuk	nagannaluki	Kiyaghneghem	akuzitangi.
B05_13_Acts_V8	Iwernga	Bar-Jesus-em	alignalghiim,	ateghalgem	Elymas-meng,	aaghtiiraaqakek	governor-a	ugpeghnayukan.	(Ateq	Elymas,	Greek-stun	whaten	pisiilghii,	alignalghii.)
B05_13_Acts_V9	Taagken	Saul-em,	ateghaqelghiim	Paul-meng,	imighngalghiim	Agleghnalghiigneng	Taghneghagneng,	esghapagtughluku	alignalghii
B05_13_Acts_V10	pikaa,	“Uyuq	Tughneghaam	ighnegha!	Ugumikan	sangwaa	qamaglluku	pinilghii.	Iqlengasagllaguutenllu	seghletunllu	pisteghllaguuten.	Taaqnaqenghisikii	iqlengiqusiqneghmeng	Atanghem	apeghtuusii?
B05_13_Acts_V11	Whaa	Atanghem	aghyuughnaqaaten	ayaastemmeng,	enkaam	esghaatelghaghtughnaanghituten	aghneghem	nighuganeng.”	Tawaninginaq	Elymas-em	iiskek	mamleghqwaakak,	enkaam	tamaani	eflughwaaghmeng	ivaghikaq	kitumun	tasluqiisqelluni.
B05_13_Acts_V12	Governor-a	ugpeqaq	esghapagluku	tawaten	pilghii,	saghiighayagutkaallu	apeghtuusaq	Ataneghmeng	ayuqelghii.
B05_13_Acts_V13	Paul-enkut	igleghalgutkullghiit	angyaghpagkun	igleghtekat	Paphos-meng,	Perga-mun	Pamphylia-melngughmun.	Tamaanlluki	John	Mark-em	unilluki	Jerusalem-emun	uteghniqaq.
B05_13_Acts_V14	Taagken	Paul-enkut	Perga-meng,	Antioch-etkat	Pisidia-melngughmun.	Sabbath-ngughsagu	synagogue-ngitnun	iteghluteng	aqumegkat.
B05_13_Acts_V15	Igleghutistengi	synagogue-em,	taaqsameng	atightuneghmeng	Liilightuusanengllu	uuknaliqistetlu	igaqegkiitneng,	kevgaqutkiit	Paul-enkut	whaten	pisqelluki,	“Ugpeqaalgutemnni,	ungipalgukufsi	iknaqsuugusighqameng	ugpellemnnun,	saaqetsi	akuzitek.”
B05_13_Acts_V16	Taagken	Paul	nekevluni	apaqumaghmi	pikii,	“Israel-eghmiini,	elpesillu	Gentile-eni	maniguutkayugni	Kiyaghneghmun,	nagatengnga!
B05_13_Acts_V17	Whangkuta	Israel-eghmiini	maniguqamta	Kiyaghneghem	nakmikegkaqii	sivuneput,	nulasteghllakaqiillu	nunataawaqngata	Egypt-mi.	Taakwaningani	qepghaghtelaaghughtekat	iwernga	Kiyaghneghem	aghtughyaghqaanghilleghllagmikun	aghulaqutkaqii	Egypt-meng.
B05_13_Acts_V18	Kilgaanilluki	qaatkutepagllanghiteghngaata	ellminun	paninang	aflengakegkaqii	ketwhell	40	ayumiqulleghni.
B05_13_Acts_V19	Taagken	Kiyaghneghem	naafqesamiki	taakut	maaghraghvinlek	ramket	Canaan-melnguut	nunaksaqangat	piliitestekaqaa	sivunemnnun	pagitaqesqelluku.
B05_13_Acts_V20	Entaqun	450-nguut	ayumiqullghet	Kiyaghneghem	nakmikellghaneng	sivuneput	kenlanga	nuna	piliitellghitnun.	“Taam	kingunganeng	nanqigtistengestaataqaqii	igleghutesqelluki	kenlanga	Samuel	uuknaliqista	igleghutistekaaghtellghitnun.
B05_13_Acts_V21	Taagken	umiilengyuwaqngata	Kiyaghneghem	nakmikegkaqaa	Saul	umiilkesqelluku	Kish-em	ighnegha,	Benjamin-em	ramkenganeng	pi.	Umiilgukaaguq	40	ayumiqulleghni.
B05_13_Acts_V22	Kiyaghneghem	umiilgunanightesamigu	Saul,	David	umiileliitestekaa	ellngitnun.	Kiyaghneghem	akuzitkegkaqaa	whaten,	‘Jesse-m	ighnegha	David	umiilgughtesugaqa.	Tawatelnguq	yuuk	piyukaqaqa,	qayughllak	piyaghqaqaa	sangwaa	alngunak	piyukegkaqa.’
B05_13_Acts_V23	“Taakwaningani	David-em	kingunghakun	Kiyaghneghem	akeqilleghmitun	allgeghtestekaqaa	Yugulighista	Israel-eghmiinun.	Taana	yugulighista	Jesus-nguuq.
B05_13_Acts_V24	Jesus-em	salin	qepghaqani	piinlillghilluku	John	ungipaqikaaguq	Israel-eghmiinun	whaten,	‘Avuteghqellusi,	seghleghqennanighlusi,	paaptaayetek.’
B05_13_Acts_V25	John-em	qepghaqani	taaqsaghtungestaghluku	pikaaguq,	‘Kinangunilunga	piiqestengnga?	Whangangunghituq	utaqakaghsi.	Kingumneng	tagiyaghqaaguq	aangeghllalghii,	repall	whanga	pininghitunga	singiinun	itemtistengulunga.’
B05_13_Acts_V26	“Ugpeqaalgutemni,	Abraham-em	kingunghitni,	Gentile-enillu	maniguutkayugni	Kiyaghneghmun,	taana	ungipaa	yugulillghem	whangkunnun	pinguuq!
B05_13_Acts_V27	Jerusalem-eghmiit	igleghutistekullghiit	nallukegkaqaat	Jesus	Yugulighistengutanga,	qaywa	Sabbath-a	tamaghhaan	nagateghngaaghmegteki	uuknaliqistet	igaqegkiit.	Naqam	uuknaliqistet	igaqegkiit	apeghiiqaqiit	agghitkaqngamegteggu	Jesus	tuqunnaluku.
B05_13_Acts_V28	Taawa	legan	temngi	apalliiteghngaan	tuqutusighqameng	Pilate-mun	tuqutesqegkaqaat.
B05_13_Acts_V29	Legan	Akuzitet	Igaqegkat	pinaqnillghistun	pikaqaat.	Taagken	qaquurameng	ateghlluku	lliifqaqaat,
B05_13_Acts_V30	iwernga	Kiyaghneghem	unguvaghtestekaqaa	tuqulleghmeng.
B05_13_Acts_V31	Taam	kingunganeng	igleghalgutkegkiita	Jesus-em	Galilee-meng,	Jerusalem-emun	esghaghaataqaqaat	qafsinegyagni	aghneghni.	Ellnginguut	ungipalghiit	yumnnun	esghaamaniluku	Jesus	unguvaluku.
B05_13_Acts_V32	“Whaten	pikaagut,	‘Ungipaatamsi	Pinilghiineng	Ungipaneng	Kiyaghneghem	akequsaqegkaaneng	sivunemnnun.
B05_13_Acts_V33	Apeghiighumaa	akequsani	whangkunnun	kingunghitnun,	unguvaghtestelleghmikun	Jesus	tuqulleghmeng.’	Kiyaghneq	pikaaguq	whaten	Psalm	2-mi,	‘Elpek	Ighneqamken,	aghneghmi	whani	Ataliitaghpenga.’
B05_13_Acts_V34	Kiyaghneghem	unguvaghtestekaqaa	Jesus	tuqulleghmeng	enkaangam	allamengllu	tuqunaanghituq	aghyughyaghqaaluni.	Enkaam	Kiyaghneq	pikaaguq,	‘Agleghnalghiit	akequsaqegkanka	David-mun	ipapestaaq	quyastisiqelleqanka	elpesinun.’
B05_13_Acts_V35	Ilangani	Psalms-em	Kiyaghneq	pikaaguq,	‘Agleghnalghiin	aghusnaanghitaqa	lliveghmi.’
B05_13_Acts_V36	“David-em	unguvalleghmini	atuqegkaqaa	Kiyaghneghem	piyukellgha.	Taagken	qavaghyan	qunguqaqaat	sivunghan	saaghwitgun,	yugusii	aghukaaguq	lliveghmi.
B05_13_Acts_V37	Iwernga	taana	Kiyaghneghem	unguvaghtestekaa	tuqulleghmeng	aghumangituq.
B05_13_Acts_V38	Ugpeqaalgutemni,	elpesinun	liitesqesugaqa	Jesus-kun	yuget	seghleghqellghit	seghevutellengegkayuguut.	Taanata	ungipaqegkegka	elpesinun.
B05_13_Acts_V39	Qaatkutellghem	Moses-em	Liilightuusiitgun	kina	alngunak	itemunnaanghitaa	seghleghqellghaneng,	iwernga	kitum	alngunak	ugpeqegkumigu	Jesus,	itemusaghqaaguq	tamaghhaaneng	seghleghqelleghmineng.
B05_13_Acts_V40	Kiyaghneq	pikaaguq	uuknaliqistetgun	whaten,	‘Nagatek	elpesi	aygughitalghiini.	Saaqetsi	saghiighayuglusi	tuqutek,	qayughllak	unguvangulusi	sallequnga	iwernga	ugpeqnaanghitaghsi	talwa	kitum	ungipaateghngiisi.’	Kelengalusi,	luuraq	tawaten	pinayukafsi.”
B05_13_Acts_V42	Paul-enkuk	Barnabas-enkuk	synagogue-meng	aanumalukek	alla	tagisqegkagket	tuunglighhaani	Sabbath-em,	wata	ungipiqutesqelluteng.
B05_13_Acts_V43	Aanleghaasameng	Jews-elghutetlu,	Gentile-elghutetlu	maniguutkayuget	Kiyaghneghmun	Jews-estun,	maligutkat	Paul-enkugnun	Barnabas-enkugnun.	Apostle-ek	kayemegkiik	kiyaghtekestiisqelluki	sighimakluku	Kiyaghneghem	nangllegtallgha.
B05_13_Acts_V44	Tuunglighhaani	Sabbath-em	qamagtevzighluteng	Antioch-eghmiit	nagasaatkat	Atanghem	ungipaaneng.
B05_13_Acts_V45	Jews-et	aqinakat	esghaghyamegteki	yulghuteghllaget	enkaam	Paul	kipullginaqaat,	seghleqegkaatlu.
B05_13_Acts_V46	Iwernga	Paul-enkuk	Barnabas-enkuk	tetugpenaki	Jews-et	pikiik,	“Kiyaghneghem	ungipaa	elpesinun	sivukluni	apeghyaghqaayaghtuq	iwernga	nagasugumangitusi.	Kiyaghneghem	ungipaa	ighsakegkaqutegpesineng,	palaqegkaategpesinengllu	kenlengilngughmeng	unguvallengelleghqaghpesineng,	whaa	Gentile-enun	ungipaqinaqukut	Kiyaghneghem	ungipaaneng.
B05_13_Acts_V47	Tawaten	piikut	qayughllak	Atanghem	qelqaqiinkut	whaten,	‘Nakmikegkaqamsi	nighugulusi	Gentile-enun,	aapghesqelluku	yugulilleq	nunataghhaanun	tamaghhaanun.’”
B05_13_Acts_V48	Gentile-et	nagaqughluki	taakut	akuzitet	quyaghllakat,	pikaalghiitlu,	“Kiyaghneghem	ungipaa	piniipigtuq.”	Tamaakut	Kiyaghneghem	nakmikegkii	kenlengilngughmeng	unguvallengesqelluki	ugpeqikat	ungipameng.
B05_13_Acts_V49	Enkaam	tamaani	Antioch-mi,	uvitanganilngughnillu	nunani	Atanghem	ungipaa	mingitkaq.
B05_13_Acts_V50	Iwernga	Jews-et	takukiit	Gentile-et	aghniit	maniguutkayuget	Kiyaghneghmun,	igleghutistengillu	Antioch-em	naavguunnalukek	Paul-enkuk	Barnabas-enkuk.	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	amyuutkegkagket	taakuk	yugek,	aghulaqestekagketlu	nunameggneng.
B05_13_Acts_V51	Enkaam	apostle-ek	itegatek	pagulangiqiik	kelgunnaluku	peggniluki	kipullginaalghiit	Kiyaghneghem	ungipaaneng.	Taagken	Iconium-emun	aghulaqegkak.
B05_13_Acts_V52	Iwernga	tamaakut	ugpeqat	Antioch-melnguut	quyangaghllagetlu,	imighngalghiitlu	Agleghnalghiigneng	Taghneghagneng.
B05_14_Acts_V1	Iconium-emi	Paul-enkuk	Barnabas-enkuk	piiqelleghmegetun	synagogue-mun	aglaqak.	Tawani	whateghlluwaaq	akuzikak	repall	Jews-elghutetlu,	Gentile-elghutetlu	ugpeghtuutkat.
B05_14_Acts_V2	Enkaam	Iconium-emetelqinaqak,	tamaani	tetugpenatek	ungipaqikak	Ataneghmeng.	Paul-enkuk	Barnabas-enkuk	Atanghem	allaaghlluwhaghtisteghllagaataqakek	yugnun	ipangutanga	liigikesqelluku	ungipaqegkaak	Atanghem	nangllegtallgha.	Iwernga	ugpeghyugumangilnguut	Jews-et	Gentile-enun	seghletun	sumeghtaghaatkestekiit	ugpeqat.
B05_14_Acts_V4	Enkaam	Iconium-eghmiit	malghughkegkat,	ilangi	ilatkat	Jews-enun,	ilangi	apostle-enun.
B05_14_Acts_V5	Taagken	ilangita	Gentile-etlu,	Jews-etlu	maligulluteng	igleghutistemeggnun	amyuutkesukagket	apostle-ek,	milughpagaataghhiinaqlu	tuqusukagket.
B05_14_Acts_V6	Nagaqughyamek	yugnun	tawaten	pinaqnilutek,	qimakak	Lycaonia-m	neghllagegkenun	Lystra-munllu,	Derbe-munllu,	uvitegkenilngughnunllu	nenun.
B05_14_Acts_V7	Enkaam	tamaani	ungipaqegkiik	Pinilghiit	Ungipat.
B05_14_Acts_V8	Lystra-minguq	taawa	yuuk	itegii	natelnguut	allgenghhaghhaatmineng	ima	enkaam	piyugigalnguq.
B05_14_Acts_V9	Aqumgaghmi	tawani	nagatkaa	Paul	akuzilghii.	Paul-em	liigikegkaa	yuuk	ugpelghii	Kiyaghneghmun	naallghulleqniluni.
B05_14_Acts_V10	Enkaam	qiivluku	tawavek	iglagtupiglluni	pikaa,	“Nekevngwaaghi	itegaghpegun!”	Aga	yuuk	nekefqaghlluni	tamaani	piyukaq.
B05_14_Acts_V11	Yulghutet	esghapagluku	Paul-em	naallghutillgha	araghaataatkat	Lycaonia-ghmiistun,	“Yuguluteng	kiyaghneghet	takwiinkut!”
B05_14_Acts_V12	Barnabas	Zeus-ngunikaat	enkaam	Paul	Hermes-ngunikaat	kiyang	akuzistengutanganeng.
B05_14_Acts_V13	Priest-ngan	Zeus-emllu,	yugetlu	aghqerraaghyukagket	Paul-enkuk	Barnabas-enkuk.	Enkaam	priest-a	tagitkaq	teghikusamengllu	piitesiighaghmengllu	Lystra-m	mingllutangan	amigllaganun.	(Temple-a	kiyaghnengllaqamun	Zeus-mun	amigllagem	tunganganilnguq).
B05_14_Acts_V14	Iwernga	apostle-ek	Barnabas-enkuk	Paul-enkuk	liigiksamegneki	sanaqutangi	aatkatek	piiguqiik.	Taagken	aqfaasnaq	yugnun	qungangiitkak	araamaagmek,
B05_14_Acts_V15	“Ukughsi	yugni,	sangafsi	tawaten	pitsi?	Whangkutungllu	yuguukung	elpesistungwaaq!	Ungipaqiyaghtuugukung	Pinilghiineng	Ungipaneng	elpesinun,	tunullusi	satngunghilngughneng	maniguqaghpesineng	qiivesqellusi	unguvalghiimun	Kiyaghneghmun.	Ellngan	ulimakaqii	qilak,	nuna,	kellii,	sangwaallu	tamaghhaan	taakunilnguq.
B05_14_Acts_V16	Sivunghani	agani	Kiyaghneghem	qamaglluki	ramket	Jews-ngunghilnguut	piyukellghistun	pistekaqii.
B05_14_Acts_V17	Iwernga	tawateteghngaata	paninang	liisimakestekaaguq	unguvaniluni	pinitun	pilleghmikun	tamaghhaanun.	Eslallugughtestaqaa	nunivagseghat	nagusqelluki.	Ayumiqulleq	kaspuglluku	piitestaqii	piisaghqat	piitfigit	kaanneghata	neqelgusqellusi,	quyangasqellusillu.”
B05_14_Acts_V18	Paul-enkuk	Barnabas-enkuk	tawaten	akuzighngaayek	taawa	paninang	Lystra-ghmiit	aghqerraaghnaqutkegkagket.	Iwernga	pegnem	pisneghitkak.
B05_14_Acts_V19	Taagken	ilangi	Jews-et	Antioch-mengllu	Iconium-emengllu	kaatkat	Lystra-mun.	Lystra-ghmiinun	naavguullukek	ugumiitestekagket.	Enkaam	Jews-etlu,	Lystra-ghmiitlu	Paul	milughpagaataghluku	qamuqaat	nem	kelutanganun	sumeghmeggni	tuqumaniluku.
B05_14_Acts_V20	Iwernga	ugpeqat	takulaghaasatni	Paul	nekevluni	aglanqigtekaq	nemun.	Taagken	unaamingani	elkek	Barnabas-enkuk	Derbe-mun	aglaqak.
B05_14_Acts_V21	Paul-enkuk	Barnabas-enkuk	ungipaqikak	Pinilghiineng	Ungipaneng	Derbe-mi	enkaam	uglaq	maligsaaghtengughtekaq.	Taagken	Lystra-mun	pinqigtekak,	taagken	Iconium-emun,	Antioch-munllu	pikak	Pisidia-melngughmun.
B05_14_Acts_V22	Takuughaqamegni	tamaani	apeghtuqiik	ugpeqat	ugpeqillghit	wata	iknaqughtesqelluki,	kayemegkiiklu	ugpellghit	aghuliitesqelluki.	Pikiik,	“Uglapestaaq	seghleliilleq	atuqsaghqapestaaqaghput	iteghyaghqaaghhnaluta	Ataneghpagullghanun	Kiyaghneghem.”
B05_14_Acts_V23	Takuughaqamegnillu	nakmiightuqak	Elder-kaghqameng	igleghutesqelluki	ugpeqat.	Taagken	yughaamaagmek	fast-ekak.	Taam	kingunganeng	Ataneghmun	ugpeqegkamegnun	yughaatkegkiik	Elder-et	aflengakesqelluki.
B05_14_Acts_V24	Taagken	Pisidia-kun	igleghakak	Pamphylia-mun.
B05_14_Acts_V25	Tamaani	Perga-mi,	Pamphylia-melngughmi	ungipaqikak	Kiyaghneghem	akuzitanganeng.	Taaqsamek	tesamavek	Attalia-mun	pikak.
B05_14_Acts_V26	Taagken	Antioch-mun	angyaghpagkun	aghulaqegkak.	(Tamaani	Antioch-mi	ugpeqat	Paul-enkuk	Barnabas-enkuk	aghulaqellghillukek	yughaatkegkaqegkegket.	Aaputkaqegkegket	Kiyaghneghmun	kayusiitesqellukek	ungipaqillghegkeni.	Taananguuq	qepghaqaq	apeghiiqaak.)
B05_14_Acts_V27	Kaasamek	Antioch-mun	ugpeqat	qerngughtekiik.	Ungipaatkiik	Kiyaghneghem	apeghiillghaneng	ellmetegnegun,	aapqaaklu	Kiyaghneghmun	ugpeqilleghqalitellghi	Gentile-et.
B05_14_Acts_V28	Tamaani	muluughllakak	ugpeqani.
B05_15_Acts_V1	Taagken	Judea-meng	ilangi	yuget	tagiluteng	Antioch-mun	ugpeqanun	apeghtughikat,	“Yugulillengnaanghitusi	wetkuqun	circumcise-ekufsi	Moses-em	Liilightuusaan	qelellghatun.”
B05_15_Acts_V2	Iwernga	Paul-enkuk	Barnabas-enkuk	elngaatall	aaghtiiraaqiik	taakut	yuget	apeghtuusiitneng.	Enkaam	ugpeqat	nakmikegkiit	Paul-enkuk,	Barnabas-enkuk,	ilangillu	yuget	Antioch-meng	pit,	Jerusalem-etesqelluki	aapsaghtiisqelluki	apostle-etlu	Elder-etlu	qerngaghmelnguut	naliq	apeghtuusaq	elqughutngatanga.
B05_15_Acts_V3	Kayagsisteng	Paul-enkut	igleghatkelluku	Phoenicia-kunllu,	Samaria-kunllu	ugpeqat	tamaanlenguut	ungipaatkiit	Gentile-et	Kiyaghneghmun	qiivuusimaniluki,	enkaam	qamaglluteng	ugpeqat	quyateghllakat.
B05_15_Acts_V4	Kaasata	Jerusalem-emun	apostle-etlu,	Elder-etlu,	ugpeqatlu	upughatkiit.	Taagken	Paul-enkut	apeghlaataqaat	Kiyaghneghem	apeghiillgha	ellmegteggun.
B05_15_Acts_V5	Ilangi	ugpeqat	Pharisees-et	nekevluteng	pikat,	“Tamaakut	Gentile-et	yugulillengyaghqaanghitut	wetkuqun	circumcise-elutengllu,	qaatkullutengllu	Moses-em	Liilightuusaanun.”
B05_15_Acts_V6	Taagken	apostle-etlu	Elder-etlu	qerngughutkat	agghitkennalukek	taakuk.
