B05_15_Acts_V7	Akuzitkenneghpagllakaat.	Taagken	Peter-em	nekevluni	pikii,	“Ugpeqaalgutemni,	liisimakaghsi	qavngaq	Kiyaghneghem	nakmikegkaqaanga	Gentile-enun	ungipaqisqellunga	Pinilghiineng	Ungipaneng	ugpeghesqelluki.
B05_15_Acts_V8	Kiyaghneghem	liisimakilghiim	yugem	tamaghhaan	sumeghtaghallghaneng,	tugukliqaqii	Gentile-et.	Kelgutkaqaa	tuguklighilleni	ellngitneng	tuunelleghmikun	Agleghnalghiik	Taghneghak	katam	tawaten	whangkunnun	tuunelleghmitun.
B05_15_Acts_V9	Whangkutestungwaaq	kiyaghutaqii;	whangkutestungwaaq	ukmangighaqii	ilungit	ugpenghata.
B05_15_Acts_V10	Enkaam	sangan'ngam	Kiyaghneq	sakraasnaqutkengngusteggu	qelelleghpesigun	Gentile-et	ugpeqiit	qaatkelluki	Liilightuusaput	kiyaghtesqelluki?	Talwa	sivunemtallu	whangkutallu	qaatkepagningilkeput	taakut	Liilightuusat	yugulillengnaluta.
B05_15_Acts_V11	Iwernga	ugpeqaghput	Kiyaghneghem	yugulikaqiinkut	kayusillghakun	Atanghem	Jesus-em	tawateghpigaq	Gentile-enun	pilleghmitun.”
B05_15_Acts_V12	Taagken	tawantullghiit	qallegnanighwaaghulluteng	nagatkagket	Barnabas-enkuk,	Paul-enkuk	aapqangik	ellmetegnegun	Kiyaghneghem	allaaghlluwhaghtillghi	Gentile-enun.
B05_15_Acts_V13	Akuzineghmeng	taaqsayek	James-em	pikii,	“Ugpeqaalgutemni,	nagataghtengnga!
B05_15_Acts_V14	Simon	Peter-em	ungipaatiinkut	naten	Kiyaghneghem	nakmikuqestallghi	Gentile-et	ellminun	katam	yuguluki.	Tawaten	pilleghmikun	liigikestekaqii	ellngitlu	piniqniluki.
B05_15_Acts_V15	Enkaam	Kiyaghneghem	sallgha	Gentile-enun	elqughutuq	uuknaliqistet	igaqegkiitnun.	Akuzitni	Igaqegkani	Ataneq	pikaaguq:
B05_15_Acts_V16	‘David-em	mangteghaa	uulqaaguq	iwernga	uteghnighlunga	nekefneqiglleqaqa.	Naavumayaghngaan	nallghusaghlleqaqa.
B05_15_Acts_V17	Taagken	qamaglluteng	ilangi	yuget	Gentile-eneng	nakmikegkama	whangamnun	katam	pinguluki,	ellngita	liisuglleqaat	Ataneq.
B05_15_Acts_V18	Atanghuuq	tawaten	akuzikaq,	ima	qavngarugllak	ellngan	liitestekaqii	tamaakut.’”
B05_15_Acts_V19	James-em	nagneghutkii,	“Enkaam	whanga	sumemni	Gentile-et	qiivegkat	Kiyaghneghmun	qaatkutesqughaafqiita	Liilightuusamnnun	pilteki.
B05_15_Acts_V20	Itupill	latatgun	neghesnaniilteki	neqmeng	aghqutkegkameng	kiyaghnengllaqanun,	qemitkameng	teghikusameng,	aawmeng;	ineghteltekillu	seghleghqusiqefqaan	sex	pisqelluku.
B05_15_Acts_V21	Tawaten	piyaghqaanghitut	qayughllak	Moses-em	Liilightuusaan	iinghutkaqii	tamaakut.	Ima	qavngarugllaggaaneng	Jews-et	nagataqiit	Liilightuusat	atightughluki	ungipaqenghatki	Sabbath-a	tamaghhaan,	nani	alngunak	synagogue-ni.”
B05_15_Acts_V22	Taagken	apostle-et,	Elder-et,	qamagllutengllu	ugpeqat	nakmiiqat	yugmeggneng	maligutesaghqameng	Paul-enkugnun	Barnabas-enkugnun	Antioch-mun	pinaqelghiignun.	Nakmikegkagket	Silas-enkuk	Judas-enkuk	ateghaqelghii	Barsabbas-meng.	Taakuk	yugek	Jerusalem-eghmiit	ugpeqiita	siivakepigtekagket.
B05_15_Acts_V23	Elkegnekun	tuyuqiit	latat	whaten	igaqegkat:	“Whangkuta	apostle-enillu	Elder-enillu	lataaqukut	Gentile-enun	ugpeqaalgutemnnun	Antioch-melngughnun,	Syria-melngughnun,	Cilicia-melngughnunllu,	quyakamsi!
B05_15_Acts_V24	Nagaquumaakut	yumtanguq	ilangita	takulusi	sameng	pilusi	seghleghyugtekaqiisillu	kukragyugtekaqiisillu.	Naqamllu	whangkuta	tawaten	pisqumangitaput.
B05_15_Acts_V25	Enkaam	qerngaamta	agghilluta	nakmikagput	Judas-enkuk	Silas-enkuk	maligutesqellukek	piniqegkamnnun	ugpeqaalgutemnnun	Barnabas-enkugnun	Paul-enkugnun,	elpesinun	pinaqelghiignun.
B05_15_Acts_V26	Taakuk	Barnabas-enkuk	Paul-enkuk	tuqusaghngiistek	pikaaguk	apalluqluku	Ataneghput	Jesus	Christ-a.
B05_15_Acts_V27	Judas-enkuk	Silas-enkuk	kayaggnaqagput	aapghwaaghesqelluki	taakut	ataasit	latatkegkaput	elpesinun.
B05_15_Acts_V28	Agleghnalghiimllu	Taghnegham,	whangkutallu	itagnaqamsi	allulluki	Jews-et	Liilightuusiit	atuqenghisaghngaaghpesiki	pisqelluki.	Iwernga	ukut	Liilightuusat	elpesinun	atuqesugaput:
B05_15_Acts_V29	Neghegpenasi	neqmeng	aghqutkegkameng	kiyaghnengllaqanun,	aawmeng,	teghikusameng	qemitkameng,	nuqetutaqiteggullu	sex-kun	seghleghqelleq.	Maligtekufsiki	taakut	Liilightuusat	taawa	pinitun	pillequsi.	Tawatenginaq	lataamsi.”
B05_15_Acts_V30	Taagken	taakut	yuget	aghulaqegkat	Jerusalem-emeng	Antioch-mun.	Kaasameng	qerngughlluki	ugpeqat	tuunegkiit	latat.
B05_15_Acts_V31	Atightughluki	latat	elngaatall	quyateghllakat	qayughllak	ilutughlleghiit.
B05_15_Acts_V32	Judas-enkuk	Silas-enkuk	elkeklu	uuknaliqistengulghiik,	enkaam	ungipaqiighaataghllakak	ugpeqanun	ugpellghit	iknaqughtesqelluki.
B05_15_Acts_V33	Tamaantelqinaghlutek	aghulaqsukak.	Enkaam	ugpeqat	aghulaqestekagket	whaten	pilukek,	“Nekeggmellelgutek	igleghalleghpetegni.”	Taagken	uteghniqak	kayagtistemegnun	Jerusalem-emelngughnun.
B05_15_Acts_V34	Iwernga	Silas	tamaansukaq.
B05_15_Acts_V35	Taakuk	Paul-enkuk	Barnabas-enkuk	Antioch-metaaghaqak.	Elkeklu	maligullutek	uglapiglleghhiinun	ugpeqanun	apeghtughikaklu	ungipaqikaklu	ungipaaneng	Atanghem.
B05_15_Acts_V36	Tagtalmi	Paul-em	pikaa	Barnabas,	“Takuughaqaaltegneki	ungipaqivikegkapung	Atanghem	ungipaaneng,	esghaghyaghtuultegneki	natetulangi	ugpeqaalgutepung.”
B05_15_Acts_V37	Barnabas-em	kelqesukaa	John	Mark,
B05_15_Acts_V38	iwernga	Paul-em	kelqesugumangilkanga,	qayughllak	Pamphylia-melluteng	John	Mark-em	unitkakek	qepghaqaghteng	taaqestegpenaan.
B05_15_Acts_V39	Paul-enkuk	Barnabas-enkuk	aaghtiiraaghutkeghllagluku	pelleghmun	aghulaquutkak.	Barnabas-em	kelqelluku	Mark	angyaghpagkun	Cyprus-mun	pikaq.
B05_15_Acts_V40	Enkaam	Paul-em	aghulaqfagilgami	nakmikegkaa	Silas	kelqennaluku.	Taagken	ugpeqat	yughaatkellukek	neghyukutkagket	Ataneghmun	aflengakesqellukek.
B05_15_Acts_V41	Igleghtekak	Syria-kunllu	Cilicia-kunllu	iknaqughsaamiita	ugpeqat	ugpellghit.
B05_16_Acts_V1	Paul	Derbe-tkaq	enkaam	taagken	nagneqaq	Lystra-mun,	tamaani	nallaqaa	ugpeqaq	yuuk	aatqelghii	Timothy-meng.	Naangallu	ugpeqaalghii	Jews-a,	naqam	atanga	Greek-a.
B05_16_Acts_V2	Ugpeqat	qamaglluteng	Lystra-melnguutlu	Iconium-emelnguutlu	akuzitkaqegkangat	Timothy	piniipiggniluku.
B05_16_Acts_V3	Paul-em	kelqesukaa	Timothy	kayutnguluku	enkaam	circumcise-estekaa.	Tawaten	pistekaa	tugukliisqelluku	Jews-enun,	qayughllak	tamaanlenguut	Jews-et	liisimakegkangat	atanga	Greek-ngulghii.
B05_16_Acts_V4	Taagken	igleghanguluteng	neghllagnun	kaanneghmeggni	ugpeqat	qaatkutesqaqegkangit	apostle-etlu,	Elder-etlu	liilightuusangllaqiitnun	Jerusalem-emi.
B05_16_Acts_V5	Enkaam	ugpeqat	wata	ugpeqiighataghaqat,	nulamanginaqatlu	aghhutanga	tamaghhaan.
B05_16_Acts_V6	Paul-enkut	igleghtekat	akulegkenkun	Phrygia-mllu,	Galatia-mllu,	qayughllak	Agleghnalghiim	Taghnegham	ungipaghtesimangilkangi	ungipameng	Asia-mi.
B05_16_Acts_V7	Tughwaaghluteng	Mysia-mun	nagneghnaqegkaayalghiit	Bithynia-mun,	iwernga	Jesus-em	Taghneghagkenka	pisneghitkii.
B05_16_Acts_V8	Enkaam	Mysia	naghughlluku	tesamavek	Troas-mun	pikat.
B05_16_Acts_V9	Unugmi	tawani	Paul-em	esghaghwaalleghqun	esghaqaa	yuuk	Macedonia-ghmii	tagsighralghii.	Yugem	maniguutepiglluni	pikaa,	“Tagiluten	Macedonia-mun	kayusiitaghtikut!”
B05_16_Acts_V10	Legan	Paul-em	esghaghwaallghan	kingunganeng	yataaghqukut	Macedonia-mun	pinaluta,	qayughllak	liigikegkefut	Kiyaghneghem	ungipaqisukanginkut	Pinilghiineng	Ungipaneng	tamaani.
B05_16_Acts_V11	Enkaam	telanangameng	nangaqaghtukut	Troas-meng	Samothrace-mun.	Unaamingani	Neapolis-mun	piikut.
B05_16_Acts_V12	Taagken	quutkun	kaatukut	neghllagmun	Philippi-mun	Macedonia-melngughmun	Rome-eghmiit	nelikiitnun.	Qafsinat	aghneghet	tamaantukut.
B05_16_Acts_V13	Tamaansimaluta	Sabbath-ngughsagu	mingllutem	amigllagakun	aanluta	kiiwegnun	piikut,	Jews-et	tawani	yughaataqnayukata.	Aghnam	ilangi	tawantuteftut	enkaam	aqumuulluta	aleghqughaput.
B05_16_Acts_V14	Ataasiq	nagallghii	Lydia-nguftuq,	Thyatira-ghmii,	akilpegaqayuk	esnegrukegtameng	qiipaghaghmeng,	maniguutkayuk	Kiyaghneghmun.	Atanghem	liigikestengngwaaqii	Paul-em	akuzitangi	Lydia-mun	enkaam	ugpeqegkii.
B05_16_Acts_V15	Qamaglluteng	nengllugutkullghiit	paaptaayeyameng	Lydia-m	aqelqangllaghiinkut,	“Sumeghpesini	ipapik	ugpeghumakuma	Ataneghqun,	whangkunnitaghhnayanghitsii?”	Enkaam	sagiqusinkut	ellngitnitukut.
B05_16_Acts_V16	Ataasimi	aghneghmi	kiiwem	esnenganilngughmun	yughaatfigmun	aglaamaluta,	nallaghaghput	qepghaghtelaaq	aghnaghaq	ilumikun	tughneghalek.	Taam	tughneghaam	uuknaliqutkestaqegkangi	sangwaat	sayaghqat	sivutghulluki.	Enkaam	piliitestengita	aklungighisiqngukangat.
B05_16_Acts_V17	Taam	aghnaghaam	maligsaaghiinkut	Paul-llu	whangkuta	akilghuumaghmi,	“Ukut	yuget	qepghaghtekii	Aangelleghpigaam	Kiyaghneghem!	Ungipaataqiisi	naten	yugulillengelleghqameng!”
B05_16_Acts_V18	Qafsinegllak	aghneq	tawaten	piiq.	Qenwatlu	Paul-em	qinuyagulluku	tughneghaq	ilunganilnguq	qiivluku	pikaa,	“Aatghakun	Jesus	Christ-am	qelghamken	aanesqelluten	ellnganeng!”	Tawaninginaq	tughneghaq	ilunganeng	aanegkaq.
B05_16_Acts_V19	Piliitestengita	liigiksamegteggu	allgeghututkesaghqaananiimatseng	aghnaghaq,	Paul-enkuk	Silas-enkuk	akuqaqagket.	Qamughsiighmeng	aglaatkagket	igleghutistenun	akilpegaghvigmelngughnun.
B05_16_Acts_V20	Taagken	igleghutistet	aglaallukek	Rome-eghmiit	nanqigtistengitnun	pikiit,	“Yugek	ukuk	Jew-nguuk,	seghleliighqiinguuk	maani.
B05_16_Acts_V21	Apeghtughiiquk	kiyaghtaalleghmeng	whangkuta	Rome-eghmiini	liilightuusamta	iinghutkiitneng.	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	apeghtuusiik	atuqnaanghitaput.”
B05_16_Acts_V22	Enkaam	yulghun	ilatqaghtaalluni	sughukagket	Paul-enkuk	Silas-enkuk.	Nanqigtistet	qelghutkagket	aatkiik	qesugumeng	mataghqughluki	anagulghesqellukek.
B05_16_Acts_V23	Anaguleghtaaneghmeng	taaqlukek	anusimingllaghvigmun	kanaghtekagket.	Taagken	anusimingllaghvigem	umiilganun	maghqatutngwaaghesqegkagket.
B05_16_Acts_V24	Anusimingllaghvigem	umiilgan	tawaten	kayagsatni	iluklighpigaghmun	qamavek	kanaghtekakek.	Taagken	umughllagmeng	unaghsimeng	tukughusighlukek,	maghqatkiit	taakut	tukughutet	qapragyaghqaagpenakek.
B05_16_Acts_V25	Nani	tamaani	unugem	qukaani	Paul-enkuk	Silas-enkuk	yughaamaagmek	ilagaqak	usuqilleghmeng	Kiyaghneghmun,	anusimingllaghat	tawanlenguut	nagatkagket.
B05_16_Acts_V26	Nuuskagllagan	nuna	tuyepeghtaqaq,	repall	anusimingllaghvik	tunemaghtuumaan	aghulatkaa.	Tawaninginaq	amiget	qelpeghaghtaatkat,	anusimingllaghanengllu	qiipraghutet	ilefkaghaghtaatkat.
B05_16_Acts_V27	Anusimingllaghvigem	umiilga	taghtughyalghiimi,	amiget	qelpatuteftut.	Sumeghmini	anusimingllaghat	qimaguusimaniluki	savigpani	nusugluku	ellmineng	tuqunnaqegkaq.
B05_16_Acts_V28	Iwernga	Paul-em	iglagtupiglluni	pikaa,	“Tuqunnaqegpenang	elpeneng	qayughllak	qamaglluta	whaantutukut!”
B05_16_Acts_V29	Anusimingllaghvigem	umiilga	keneghmeng	tungsighluni	iitqaghtekaq.	Alingruughem	ungelegsimaghmi	Paul-enkuk	Silas-enkuk	manugkenkun	segesqughtekaq.
B05_16_Acts_V30	Taagken	aanututkellukek	aaptekakek,	“Yugegni	ukughtek,	naten	salunga	yugulillengnayaghsinga?”
B05_16_Acts_V31	Pikaak,	“Ugpeqigu	Ataneq	Jesus	enkaam	yugulillengellequten,	nengllugutetenllu	yugulillengellequt.”
B05_16_Acts_V32	Taagken	Paul-enkuk	Silas-enkuk	ungipaqegkaak	Ataneq	ellnganunllu	nengllugutanganunllu.
B05_16_Acts_V33	Tawani	unugmi	anusimingllaghvigem	umiilgan	ughvughteqii	taakuk	yugek	anagulellghegkenka	kiingik.	Taagken	nengllugutkullghiit	paaptaayenginaamaghmeng	pikat.
B05_16_Acts_V34	Paul-enkuk	Silas-enkuk	ellmeggnun	aglaallukek	neghestekagket.	Nengllugutkullghiit	quyateghllakat	qayughllak	ugpeqegkangat	Kiyaghneq.
B05_16_Acts_V35	Aghsagu	Rome-eghmiit	nanqigtistengita	kevgaqegkiit	umiilwaateng	ungipaasaghtiisqelluku	anusimingllaghvigem	umiilga	whaten,	“Paul-enkuk	Silas-enkuk	aanestikek.”
B05_16_Acts_V36	Enkaam	anusimingllaghvigem	umiilgan	Paul	pikaa,	“Nanqigtistet	kayagutiistek	aaneslamtegnguq	enkaam	aanelghaatek,	aghulaqitek	nekeggmellutek.”
B05_16_Acts_V37	Iwernga	Paul-em	umiilwaaghet	pikii,	“Rome-eghmiingughngaamtung	yugtuqami	anaguleghtaakaqiinkung,	talwa	ipapighqutkegpenaan	sameng	anaggusimatfung.	Taagken	anusimingllaghiinkung.	Enraghngam	whaa	maaten	aksaqluku	aanesnaqinkuung?	Yeghlegillu!	Ellmeggneng	nanqigtistet	tagiluteng	aaneslinkung.”
B05_16_Acts_V38	Paul-em	tawaten	piyisteng	umiilwaaghet	ungipaasaghtuqiit	nanqigtistet.	Enkaam	nanqigtistet	alingegkat	Paul-enkuk	Silas-enkuk	nagaqughlukek	Rome-eghmiingutkek.
B05_16_Acts_V39	Taagken	takulukek	qivghuklukek	aanestekagket	anusimingllaghvigmeng,	aghulaqesqegkagketlu.
B05_16_Acts_V40	Enkaam	Paul-enkuk	Silas-enkuk	anusimingllaghvigmeng	aanyamek,	Lydia-nkunun	pikak.	Tawani	laalighfikluki	ugpeqat	kayemluki	aghulaqegkak.
B05_17_Acts_V1	Paul-enkut	igleghtekat	Amphipolis-kunllu,	Apollonia-kunllu	Thessalonica-mun	kaatelleghmeggnun	kenlanga.	Tamaani	Jews-et	synagogue-elget.
B05_17_Acts_V2	Paul	piiqelleghmitun	synagogue-mun	pikaq.	Pingayuni	Sabbath-eni	Paul-em	liigikesnaqutkegkii	yuget	Christ-ameng	Akuzitetgun	Igaqegkatgun.
B05_17_Acts_V3	Uuknaliqelleghteggun	liigikesnaqutkegkaa	ipa	Christ-a	tuquyaghqapestaaghunilukullu	unguvaghyaghqapestaaghunilukullu	tuqulleghmeng.	Pikii,	“Una	Jesus	aapqegka	elpesinun	Christ-anguuq.”
B05_17_Acts_V4	Ilangi	Jews-et	ugpeghluteng	ilatkat	Paul-enkugnun	Silas-enkugnun.	Tamaakutlu	Greek-elghutet	maniguutkayuget	Kiyaghneghmun,	aghnalghutetlu	pingwaaghet	ugpeghtuutkat.
B05_17_Acts_V5	Taagken	ugpeqaanghilnguut	Jews-et	aqinaklukek	Paul-enkuk	Silas-enkuk	tesqagantaqelghiineng	sangigalngughneng	yugneng	qerngughtiluteng	seghleliighqiighllakat.	Qenwat	qamagtengngwaaghluki	Thessalonica-ghmiit	qapraghqegkiit.	Taagken	ketanqusnaq	Jason-enkunun	aglaghluteng	iitqaghtaatkat	Paul-enkuk	Silas-enkuk	aanunnalukek	yulghutnun.
B05_17_Acts_V6	Iwernga	naalkenghisamegtekek,	Jason-llu	ilangillu	ugpeqat	qamughsiiqiit	Thessalonica-m	igleghutistengitnun.	Akilghuukat,	“Paul-enkuk	Silas-enkuk	navek	alngunak	pineghmegni	seghleliighqiigaquk,	whaa	maanillu	tawaten	piiquk.
B05_17_Acts_V7	Caesar-em	liilightuusii	kipullegmun	piiqiik	whaten	pilleghmegnegun,	‘Jesus	umiilegpigaaguq,	Caesar	umiilgunghituq.’	Jason-em	ellmeggnitestaqaak	Paul-enkuk	Silas-enkuk.”
B05_17_Acts_V8	Tawaten	piyata	yugetlu	igleghutistengillu	Thessalonica-m	sakraaghllakat.
B05_17_Acts_V9	Taagken	igleghutistet	pikiit	Jason-enkut,	“Qelghutagput	Paul-enkuk	Silas-enkuk	elpesinun	aghulaqestesqellukek	Thessalonica-meng,	iwernga	sivuklusi	manilitikut.	Aghulaqegkayek	manizi	veghulleqaghput.”	Taagken	aglaghtestekiit.
B05_17_Acts_V10	Mamlegtaghesnaghyagu	ugpeqat	Paul-enkuk	Silas-enkuk	aghulaqestekagket	Berea-mun.	Kaasamek	synagogue-mun	pikak.
B05_17_Acts_V11	Tamaakut	Jews-ngit	nagasukestaghlukek	ayuqegkegket	Paul-enkuk	Silas-enkuk,	Thessalonica-melngughneng.	Aghhutanga	tamaghhaan	Jews-et	ellmeggneng	liinnaqegkiit	Akuzitet	Igaqegkat,	liigiknaluki	Paul-enkuk	Silas-enkuk	apeghtughillghik	ipangutangi.
B05_17_Acts_V12	Enkaam	uglapiglleghhiit	ugpeghtuutkat,	uglapiglleghhiitlu	pingwaaghet	Greek-et	aghniitlu	yugitlu	ugpeghtuutkat.
B05_17_Acts_V13	Iwernga	Jews-et	Thessalonica-melnguut	nagaqughyamegteggu	Paul	ungipaqiniluku	akuzitanganeng	Kiyaghneghem	Berea-mi,	Berea-tkat.	Kaalluteng	qapraghqiikat	yugneng	seghleliighqiikat	tamaani.
B05_17_Acts_V14	Enkaam	ugpeqat	Paul	esnemun	atghaatqaghtestekaat	iwernga	Silas-enkuk	Timothy-nkuk	Berea-metkak.
B05_17_Acts_V15	Yuget	igleghutilghiit	Paul-meng	maligutkat	Athens-mun	kenlanga.	Uteghnighnaqngata	Berea-mun	Paul-em	lipeghsaqakek	Silas-enkuk	Timothy-nkuk	takusqelluni	piyaghqaaghtaghesnaqayek.
B05_17_Acts_V16	Athens-mi	Paul	utaqiitkelluku	Silas-enkugneng	Timothy-nkugneng,	yuvghiighyalghiimi	tamaani	seghleghyugllakaq,	qayughllak	kiyaghnengllaqaghtupigteftuq.
B05_17_Acts_V17	Enkaam	Paul-em	synagogue-mi	Jews-etlu	Gentile-etlu,	maniguutkayuget	Kiyaghneghmun	liigikesnaqutkegkii	Jesus,	Christ-anguniluku.	Akilpegaghvigmillu	aghhutanga	tamaghhaan	kinkut	alngunak	tawanneghata	aapghaqegkanga	Christ-a.
B05_17_Acts_V18	Ilangita	apeghtughistengita	Epicurean-etlu,	Stoic-etlu	takuluku	Paul	aaghtiiraaqaat.	Ilangita	ilateng	aaptekiit,	“Una	akuzivallughllak	sameng	piiqa?”	Tamaakut	ilangita	pikaat,	“Llangaqa	nakumiit	kiyaghneghit	akuzitkaqii.”	Tawaten	pikat	qayughllak	Paul-em	ungipaqngukanga	Jesus,	unguvallghallu	tuqulleghmeng.
B05_17_Acts_V19	Taagken	Paul-mun	maligtestekat	agghistenun	Areopagus-melngughnun.	Enkaam	kaasameng	pikaat,	“Taana	nutaghaq	apeghtuusaqaqegken	liisuwaghput.
B05_17_Acts_V20	Sangwaa	taana	aapqan	allaaghlluwhaaguq	whangkunni,	enkaam	liigiksuwaghput	sameng	pisiitanga.”
B05_17_Acts_V21	(Sangwaat	nutaghat	apeghtuusat	pinghata	Athens-eghmiitlu,	nakumiitlu	tamaavek	lliiqat	apeghyuwaqiitlu	nagasugaqiitlu.)
B05_17_Acts_V22	Enkaam	Areopagus-mi	Paul-em	nekevluni	pikii,	“Athens-eghmiini,	liigikamsi	elngaatall	maniguutkayuguftusi	elpesi	yugni.
B05_17_Acts_V23	Igleghsalghiinga	qagani	akulmi,	esghaghanka	manigughvilghutesi,	aghqefiklu	ataasiq	igaqfikngalghii	whaten,	‘Nallukegkamun	Kiyaghneghmun.’	Taananguuq	Kiyaghneq	nallukeghngaaghpesigu	maniguqaghsi	apeghyukegka	elpesinun.
B05_17_Acts_V24	Taam	Kiyaghneghem	ulimakaqaa	nuna,	sangwaallu	qamagtengngwaaghluku	nunamelnguq.	Atanqaa	qilagemllu	nunamllu	enkaam	maniguutfingllaqanisigatuq.
B05_17_Acts_V25	Taananguuq	Kiyaghneq	tuunikayuk	unguvalleghmeng,	aneghneghmeng,	samengllu	tamaghhaaneng	yugnun.	Akluksaghqaqenghitaa	yuget	kayusillghat	qayughllak	sangwaa	tamaghhaan	aklukigataa.
B05_17_Acts_V26	Kiyaghneghem	ulimakaqaa	ataasiq	yuuk,	enkaam	taagken	ataasimeng	allgeqaaguq	allaaghhiinaq	yuuk	nunamelnguq	whani.	Iingkerugllak	yataaghqegkaqiillu	qakun	yuget	allgeghyaghqaatangi,	nanillu	kiyaghsaghqaatangi.
B05_17_Acts_V27	Tawaten	pikaqii	yugnun	iviisqelluni	luuraq	naalkennayukangatni.	Naqamllu	nalighhiinamnneng	uyavanneghituq
B05_17_Acts_V28	qayughllak	‘Ellngakun	kiyaghtengnguukutlu,	qapraguukutlu,	allgeqaagukutlu.’	Talwa	ilangi	igangllaghtesi	whaten	pikaalghiit,	‘Ipapestaaq	avaqutaqiinkut.’
B05_17_Acts_V29	“Kiyaghneghem	avaqutaqutanganeng	sumeghtaghaatkesaghqaqenghitaghput	yuget	ulimaaghistun	gold-meng,	silver-meng,	nalighmeng	uyghagmeng	ayuqluki.	Yuget	sumeghtaghallghistun	ayuqenghituq.
B05_17_Acts_V30	Sivunghani	agani	yuget	salin	nallukluku	Kiyaghneq,	aghyuughyugumangitii	aghyuusaqeghngaata.	Iwernga	maaten	qelghwii	qamaglluki	yuget	naansaghngaata	avuteghqelluki,	seghleghqennaniisqelluki.
B05_17_Acts_V31	Kiyaghneghem	tawaten	qelqaqii	qayughllak	nekegtekaqaa	aghneq	nanqigtiviguluku.	Nakmikegkamikun	yugkun	yuuk	tamaghhaan	tawateghlluwaaq	nanqigsaghqaqaa.	Liitesnaluku	nakmikegkani	yuuk	unguvaghtestekaqaa	tuqulleghmeng.”
B05_17_Acts_V32	Nagalluku	Paul-em	aapqanga	yuuk	unguvaghtesimaniluku	tuqulleghmeng,	ilangita	legasiighwaatkegkaat,	iwernga	ilangita	pikaat	Paul,	“Wataqaaghaq	nagasuwaghput	alla	apeghnaqegkuvgu.”
B05_17_Acts_V33	Taagken	Paul-em	unitkii,
B05_17_Acts_V34	iwernga	ilangita	maligsaaghluku	Paul	ugpeghtuutkat.	Ataasiq	Dionysius-nguftuq,	Areopagus-mi	agghista,	aghnaqlu	aatqelghii	Damaris-meng,	kinkutlu	ilangi	ugpeghtuutkat.
B05_18_Acts_V1	Taam	kingunganeng	Paul	Corinth-etkaq	Athens-meng.
B05_18_Acts_V2	Tamaani	nallaqaa	Jew	aatgha	Aquila,	Pontus-mi	allgeqaq.	Italy-meng	kaanneghhaaftuk	nulighqullghiik	Priscilla-nkuk,	qayughllak	Umiilegpigaam	Claudius-em	eflequqii	Jews-et	Rome-emeng.	Paul-em	laalighfiklukek
B05_18_Acts_V3	elkegkenitkaq	qayughllak	qepghaqaak	ellngan	qepghaqaatun	ayuqelghii.	Tiintangllallghem	akinga	kiyaghusiqegkangat.
B05_18_Acts_V4	Sabbath-a	tamaghhaan	Paul	synagogue-mun	piluni	ungipaghaqelghii	Jews-enunllu,	Greek-enunllu	ugpeghesqelluki.
B05_18_Acts_V5	Silas-enkuk	Timothy-nkuk	kaatkak	Macedonia-meng,	taagken	kenlekluku	Paul	ungipaqinginaghluni	lliiqaq.	Jews-enun	aapqaa	Jesus,	Christ-anguniluku.
B05_18_Acts_V6	Jews-et	kipullginaaghyatnillu	seghletunllu	akuzitkesatni,	aatkami	pagulangi	ufsugulluki	pikii,	“Iflakufsi	elpesi	pilqaghsi,	whanga	pilqennaanghitaqa.	Whaken	kenlekluku	Gentile-enun	ungipaqinaqunga.”
B05_18_Acts_V7	Enkaam	unilluki	Jews-et	Titius	Justus-mun	lliiqaq,	Gentile-mun	maniguutkayugmun	Kiyaghneghmun.	Mangteghaa	synagogue-em	saaghwanilnguq.
B05_18_Acts_V8	Synagogue-em	igleghutistenga	Crispus-nguftuq.	Qamaglluteng	nengllugutkullghiit	ugpeqegkaat	Ataneq.	Corinth-eghmiilghutetlu	nagalluku	Paul	ugpeghluteng	paaptaayekat.
B05_18_Acts_V9	Taagken	unugmi	ataasimi	Paul	esghaghwaalleghqun	Atanghem	pikaa,	“Alingegpenang,	yeghlegi	ungipaqikestaa	iilqayufqaavek
B05_18_Acts_V10	qayughllak	elpenitaqunga.	Kitumun	alngunak	aqnightesnaanghitamken,	qayughllak	neghllagmi	whani	uglapiglleghhii	yuuk	whanga	pikaqa.”
B05_18_Acts_V11	Enkaam	Paul	tamaani	apeghtughikaq	Kiyaghneghem	akuzitanganeng	ataasiq	ayumiqulleq	alla	aghvinlek	tanqit	ilalluki.
B05_18_Acts_V12	Gallio,	Rome-em	umiilgughtestaqngagu	Greece-mun,	Jews-et	qerngughulluteng	sughugluku	Paul	aglaatkaat	nanqigtivigmun.
B05_18_Acts_V13	Kaatulluku	pikat,	“Uum	yugem	apeghtughaqii	yuget	Kiyaghneq	manigiisqelluku	allanguluku	Liilightuusamnneng!”
B05_18_Acts_V14	Iiwenllu	Paul	akuzinaqaquq,	Gallio-m	Jews-et	pikii,	“Una	yuuk	tegleguqaayaqan,	yugtaqaayaqan	nalighmeng	sangwaa	alngunak	seghlepestaaq	pikaqsaqagu	ilapgapestaaghnayaghamsi.
B05_18_Acts_V15	Iwernga	una	yuuk	tawaten	pimangituq.	Aaghtiiraaghutkengngunghitasi	Rome-em	liilightuusii,	aaghtiiraaghutkengngwaasi	elpesi	katam	Liilightuusasi,	akuzitetlu	aatghetlu	sameng	pisiitangi.	Tamaaken	nanqigtiyaghqaanghitunga,	elpesineng	piteki.”
B05_18_Acts_V16	Enkaam	eflequqii	aanesqelluki.
B05_18_Acts_V17	Taagken	yuget	akuqaghluku	synagogue-em	igleghutistenga	Sosthenes,	qevutiiqaat	nanqigtivigem	manughaani	iwernga	Gallio-m	avelghaqiinaqii.
B05_18_Acts_V18	Taam	kingunganeng	Paul	paninang	ugpeqanitkaq	qafsinegllak	aghneq	Corinth-mi.	Taagken	angyaghpagkun	aghulaqegkaq	Syria-mun	kelqellukek	Priscilla-nkuk	Aquila-nkuk.	Kaasameng	Cenchrea-mun	Paul	qiguqaq	liigikesqelluku	akequsani	Kiyaghneghmun	apeghiillgha.
B05_18_Acts_V19	Kaalluteng	Ephesus-mun,	tamaani	Paul-em	unitkakek	Priscilla-nkuk	Aquila-nkuk,	synagogue-elluni	liigikesnaqutkegkaa	Jews-enun	Jesus,	Christ-anguniluku.
B05_18_Acts_V20	Ellmeggnitaghiisqegkaqsaqangat	iwernga	pipagningitkaq.
B05_18_Acts_V21	Enkaam	aghulaqnaqngami	pikii,	“Kiyaghneghem	piyukelqegkagu	alla	tagillequnga.”	Taagken	Ephesus-meng	angyaghpagkun	aghulaqegkaq.
B05_18_Acts_V22	Kaalluni	Caesarea-mun	nagneqaq	Jerusalem-emun	laalighfiknaluki	ugpeqat,	taagken	Antioch-etkaq.
B05_18_Acts_V23	Tamaantaghlluni	aghulaqegkaq.	Igleghutkelluku	Galatia-kunllu	Phrygia-kunllu,	qamaglluki	ugpeqat	kayemumiita	pikii.
B05_18_Acts_V24	Paul	tawaten	aneghsimaluku	Apollos,	Ephesus-mun	kaatkaq.	Jew-ngulghii	allgeqaq	Alexandria-mi.	Elngaatall	akuzillegllaklu	liiteghllakaqlu	Akuzitneng	Igaqegkaneng.
B05_18_Acts_V25	Salin	Alexandria-melluku	kitum	apeghtuqaqegkanga	Atanghem	tumanganeng.	Enkaam	sagiqepiglluni	akuzitkengngukangallu	apeghtuusaqngukangallu	elqughaghlluku	Jesus,	apeghtuusiillu.	Naqam	liisimakegkanga	paaptaayelleq	John-em	apeghtuutellghiinaatun	ayuqelghii.
B05_18_Acts_V26	Ephesus-mi	Apollos	synagogue-elluni	tetugpenani	ungipaqikaq.	Priscilla-nkuk	Aquila-nkuk	nagalluku	aqelqangllaqaak	liigikestaghaghnaluku	Kiyaghneghem	tumanganeng,	wataqaaghaq	elqughaghlluku.
B05_18_Acts_V27	Apollos	Greece-mun	piyugyan,	ugpeqat	kayemegkaat	enkaam	latakat	Greece-eghmiit	ugpeqiitnun	upughatesqelluku.	Taakut	Greece-eghmiit	ugpeqegkaqegkangat	Jesus	Kiyaghneghem	kayusillghakun.	Apollos-em	kaalluni	elngaatall	iknaqughsaqaqegkangi	ugpellghit	apeghtughilleghmikun.
B05_18_Acts_V28	Yugtuqami	aaghtiiraaghllakii	Jews-et,	Akuzitet	Igaqegkat	ipapighqusiqluki	Jesus,	Christ-anguniluku.
B05_19_Acts_V1	Apollos	Corinth-melluku,	Paul	quutkun	igleghakaq	Ephesus-mun	kenlanga.	Tamaani	ilangi	maligsaaghtet	nallaghluki
B05_19_Acts_V2	aaptekii,	“Agleghnalghiik	Taghneghak	allgeghsimastekek	ugpeghaqngafsi?”	Pikaat,	“Nakaa,	nallukngwaaghagput	Agleghnalghiik	Taghneghak.”
B05_19_Acts_V3	Aaplaataqii,	“Samunmi	paaptaayematsi?”	Kiimsiqaat,	“John-em	paaptaayellghatun.”
B05_19_Acts_V4	Paul-em	pikii,	“John-em	paaptaayeghillgha	avuteghqelluteng	seghleghqennanilghinun	ayuquq.	Pikaqiillu	ugpeqesqelluku	kingumineng	tagiyaghqaq,	taana	Jesus-nguuq.”
B05_19_Acts_V5	Nagaqughyamegteggu	taana,	paaptaayekat	aatghakun	Atanghem	Jesus-em.
B05_19_Acts_V6	Paul-em	saafsaqminiki	Agleghnalghiik	Taghneghak	iitqak	ellngitnun.	Taagken	akuzikat	allaaghhiinaastun	ulustun,	uuknaliqumaghmengllu	pikat.
B05_19_Acts_V7	Entaqun	qula	maalghuk	siipneqluku	yuuk	tawantuq.
B05_19_Acts_V8	Pingayuni	tanqini	Sabbath-a	tamaghhaan	Paul-em	tetukaghpenani	aleghquqii	yuget	synagogue-mi.	Aaghhnaqutkegkii,	liigikesnaqutkegkii	Ataneghpagullghaneng	Kiyaghneghem.
B05_19_Acts_V9	Iwernga	ilangi	pineghllulghiit	ugpeghyunghitkat,	enkaam	sivungitni	yuget	seghletun	akuzitkegkaat	kiyaghtaalleq	Atanghem	apeghtuusaa.	Enkaam	Paul-em	unitkii	kelqelluki	ugpeqat.	Taagken	aghhutanga	tamaghhaan	Tyrannus-em	apeghtughivigani,	Paul-em	aleghqughaqegkangi	yuget.
B05_19_Acts_V10	Tawaten	pikaq	maalghuk	ayumiqullghek,	enkaam	tamaghhaghmeng	Jews-etlu	Greek-etlu	Asia-melnguut	nagaquqiit	akuzitangi	Atanghem.
B05_19_Acts_V11	Kiyaghneq	allaaghlluwhaghtiighaataqaq	saghiighanalghiimeng	Paul-kun.
B05_19_Acts_V12	Talwa	ilangita	yuget	Paul-em	kakegllugiitiillu,	aatkiillu	llineghmegteki	qinuyugnun	naallghutaqelghiit,	tughneghaatlu	ilungitnilnguut	aanaqelghiit.
B05_19_Acts_V13	Ilangi	Jews-et	igleghangulghiit	nunanun,	yugneng	aanesquungukangit	tughneghaat.	Taagken	Atanghem	Jesus-em	aatgha	aanesquusiqnaqutkegkaqsaqangat.	Pikat,	“Qelghamken	aanesqelluten	taaggun	ataasikun	Jesus-kun	Paul-em	ungipaqegkaakun.”
B05_19_Acts_V14	Sceva-m	maaghraghvilek	ighneghi	tawaten	pikat.	(Taana	Sceva	Jew-ngulghii	high	priest-a.)
B05_19_Acts_V15	Iwernga	tughneghaam	pikii,	“Liisimakaqa	Jesus,	liisimakaqa	Paul,	elpesi	kinkungutsi?”
B05_19_Acts_V16	Taagken	yugem	ilumikun	tughneghalgem	qetgeghvikluki	taakut	yuget	qevutiiqii,	iknaqepigtutmineng	qamaglluki	avangilkegkii.	Enkaam	mangteghaaneng	aanqaghtalluteng	qimaguutkat	amsikaghmeng,	kiitiqullelighluteng.
B05_19_Acts_V17	Qamaglluteng	Ephesus-eghmiit,	Jews-etlu	Greek-etlu	alingruughutkat	taana	nagaqughluku,	enkaam	aatgha	Jesus-em	wataqaaghaq	quulvaqaat.
B05_19_Acts_V18	Uglapiglleghhiit	ugpenghhaqaniit	yugtuqami	apeghraqiit	alignaghtaalleteng.
B05_19_Acts_V19	Uglapiglleghhiit	alignaghtaaqayuguyalghiit	tagiquulluki	alignaghtaaghusit	igateng	paneghquqiit	yulghutet	esghaamanghitni.	Igalghutet	akitulesughyaqmegteki	50,000	silver	drachmas-et	akikeftiit.
B05_19_Acts_V20	Tamaana	apalluqluku	wataqaaghaq	akuzitangi	Atanghem	mingitkat,	enkaam	uglapiglleghhiit	ugpeqegkiit.
B05_19_Acts_V21	Kingungitneng	tamaakut	Paul	qakiqniqegkaq	Jerusalem-emun	pinaluni,	Macedonia-kunllu	Greece-kunllu	aagluni.	Pikaq,	“Jerusalem-etaghllunga	taagken	Rome-esaghqapestaaghuunga.”
B05_19_Acts_V22	Taagken	Paul-em	kayutegni	Timothy-nkuk	Erastus-enkuk	kayagtekakek	aglaqestiisqellukek	Macedonia-mun,	ellnga	Asia-metaghaqaq.
B05_19_Acts_V23	Nani	tamaani	pilleghmi	uglaapiglleghhiit	Ephesus-eghmiit	elngaatall	seghleliighutkegkaat	kiyaghtaalleq	Atanghem	apeghtuusaqegkaa.
B05_19_Acts_V24	Tamaana	seghleliilleq	Demetrius-em	silver-meng	ulimastem	piinliqaa.	Tawaten	pikaq	qayughllak	ulimalgutkullghiit	elngaatall	maningllaasiqngukangit	silver-meng	ulimaaghet	temple-engwaaghhaat.	Tamaakut	temple-engwaaghhaat	kiyaghnengllaqamun	Artemis-mun	maniguutfigestun	ayuqelghiit.
B05_19_Acts_V25	Demetrius-em	ulimalgutnillu	ilangillu	tawatelngughmeng	ulimakayuget	qerngughlluki	pikii,	“Ukughsi	yugni,	liisimakaghsi	elngaatall	maningllaghaqukut	qepghaqamnneng.
B05_19_Acts_V26	Iwernga	esghapagaghsillu	nagataghsillu	Paul-em	pillgha.	Piiquq	kiyaghnengllaqat	kiyaghnepigunghinniluki.	Enkaam	uglapiglleghhii	yuuk	allangughqughaa	maani	Ephesus-mi,	maaninginaagpenaan	tamaghhaanillu	Asia-mi	piiquq.
B05_19_Acts_V27	Seghleghhalek	sanghilkumta	qepghaqaghput	ukavaghllequq.	Liisimakaghsi	qamaglluteng	Asia-ghmiitlu	nunataghhaanilnguutlu	manigughaqaat	aghnaq	kiyaghneq	Artemis.	Sanghilkumta	yuget	sumeghtaghaatkesagulleqaat	temple-a	megnuniinniluku,	Artemis-emllu	aangelleghllaga	satngunanighllequq.”
B05_19_Acts_V28	Taakut	yuget	nagalluku	Demetrius	elngaatall	sakraakat,	akilghuughllakatlu,	“Aangeghllagtuq	Artemis-nga	Ephesus-em!”
B05_19_Acts_V29	Mulugpenateng	qamaglluteng	Ephesus-eghmiit	ketanqwaaghaatkat	akilghuumaghmeng	nallukeghngaaghmegteki	saaqutangi.	Paul-em	igleghalgutkek	Gaius-enkuk	Aristarchus-enkuk	Macedonia-ghmiik	tamaanlenguuk	uvitangitni.	Ilangita	yuget	taakuk	akuqaghlukek	qamuqlukek	ketarwakat	qerngughutfigllagmun	maliglluki	yulghuteghllaget.
B05_19_Acts_V30	Paul	iteghyukaayalghii	yulghun	aleghqughnaluku	iwernga	ugpeqat	ighlekegkaat.
B05_19_Acts_V31	Talwa	ilangita	Asia-m	igleghutistengita	kevgaqutkaat	ilakumtaaghteng	Paul	wataghllak	itefqaan	qerngughutfigllagmun	pisqelluku.
B05_19_Acts_V32	Taakut	qerngughutfigllagmelnguut	wanlegi	nepugllagughtekat.	Ilangi	yuget	sameng	akilghuughllaget,	ilangi	sameng	allaneng	akilghuughllaget.	Kiyang	allulluteng	nallukegkangat	sangameng	qerngughusimatseng.
B05_19_Acts_V33	Taagken	yuuk	aatqelghii	Alexander-meng,	Jews-et	apeghtughwaaghluku	sameng	pilleghqameng,	akuziyaghtiisqegkaat	sivungitnun	yulghuteghllaget.	Alexander-em	iiggeni	nengugutkii	nagatesqelluni	yugnun.
B05_19_Acts_V34	Iwernga	yulghuteghllaget	liigiksamegteggu	Alexander	Jew-ngutanga,	qerngaghllagmeng	akilghuughllakat,	“Aangeghllagtuq	Artemis-nga	Ephesus-em!”	Tawaten	akilghuukat	ketwhell	maalghuk	afluk.
B05_19_Acts_V35	Ataasim	Ephesus-em	umiilwaaghan	nepiightesteqaghsamiki	yulghutet	pikii,	“Ephesus-eghmiini,	tamaghhaghllagmi	liisimakaa	Ephesus	aflengakistekaa	aangelghiim	Artemis-em	temple-ngan,	agleghnalghiimllu	uyghagem	ifkaqam	qilagmeng.
B05_19_Acts_V36	Kitum	alngunak	aygughiknaanghitiinkut	taakugneng	aflengakestengutfut	enkaam	nepiightek.	Sangwaa	temngighllak	apeghiighvagilgafsigu	sumeghtaghaghtek.
B05_19_Acts_V37	Taakuk	yugek	whavek	tagitkaqagsi	talwa	sameng	teglenghiteghngaayek	temple-eneng,	akuzitkenghiteghngaagnegullu	sameng	seghleghmeng	kiyaghneghput	Artemis.
B05_19_Acts_V38	Una	nanqigtivigunghituq.	Demetrius-enkut	qepghaghtekullghiit	sameng	apallulgukumeng	nanqigtivigmun	aglaghlit.	Tawani	nanqigtistenun	apeghnakangit	apalluteng	enkaam	elngaatall	avutkiiraaghhaat.
B05_19_Acts_V39	Wata	sameng	piyaghqalgukufsi	sameng	tamaaken	qerngughutfigpigaghmi	agghitkennakesi.
B05_19_Acts_V40	Tawaten	piimsi	qayughllak	Rome-em	umiilgita	nagaququmegteggu	una	seghleliilleq	aghneghmi	whani,	taana	apalluqluku	qaatkunneghinniluta	liilightuusameggnun	pinaqiinkut.	Sameng'ngam	pilleqesteki	qayughllak	apalliitukut	seghleliighqiillemnnun.”
B05_19_Acts_V41	Taam	umiilwaaghem	tawaten	piluki	aglaghtuutestekii.
B05_20_Acts_V1	Taana	seghleliilleghllak	alpagyan	Paul-em	aqfastekii	ugpeqat.	Kayemluki	aghulaqegkaq	Macedonia-mun.
B05_20_Acts_V2	Enkaam	Macedonia-kun	igleghutkelluku	laalighqwaaghvikegkii	ugpeqat,	kayemumiita	pikii.	Taagken	nagneqaq	Greece-mun,
B05_20_Acts_V3	tamaantekaq	pingayut	tanqit.	Yataaghqaquqlu	angyaghpagkun	Syria-nnaluni,	liigikegkii	Jews-en'nguq	yataaghqaqeftut	tuqunnaluku.	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	uteghsukaq	Macedonia-kun	Jerusalem-emun.
B05_20_Acts_V4	Maligtestekeftii	Sopater,	ighnegha	Pyrrhus-em,	Berea-ghmii,	Aristarchus-enkuk	Secundus-enkuk	Thessalonica-ghmiik,	Gaius	Derbe-ghmii,	Tychicus-enkuk	Trophimus-enkuk	Asia-ghmiik,	Timothy-llu.
B05_20_Acts_V5	Taakut	aghulaqekestaghluteng	Troas-mun,	tamaani	utaqiigut	whangkunneng.
B05_20_Acts_V6	Kingunganeng	Neqenghaghqellghan	Yeast-aliimangilnguum	Neqekrangllam,	Philippi-meng	angyaghpagkun	aghulaqukut.	Tallimat	aghneghet	atughluki	kaataput	ilaput	Troas-mi.	Tamaantukut	maaghraghvinlek	aghneq.
B05_20_Acts_V7	Sivulighmi	aghneghani	santillghem	Troas-eghmiit	ugpeqiitlu	whangkutallu	qerngughutukut	neghnaluta	Atanghem	Neqenghaghqellghaneng.	Sivukluni	Paul	ungipaqikaq	unugem	qukaanun	kenlanga,	qayughllak	unaami	aghulaqsugulghii.
B05_20_Acts_V8	Qemtamelnguukut	kenelghutaghtuqami.
B05_20_Acts_V9	Nukalpigaq	Eutychus,	aqumluni	qergesem	esnengakun	nagatkaq.	Paul	ungipaqimaluku	qenwat	Eutychus	qavaghnikaq.	Qenwatlu	umuqilluni	qavaghyalghiimi	eslatmun	ifkaqaq	pamaken	pingayaaneng	qemtam.	Aanluteng	tuguyaqmegteggu	tuquluni.
B05_20_Acts_V10	Iwernga	Paul-em	ukiragkiighluni	segesqughfikluku	qetkaa.	Pikii,	“Alingegpenasi,	whaa	unguvaamaaq!”
B05_20_Acts_V11	Taagken	mayughtuulluteng	Paul-em	neqekrangllaq	aavgughluku	neghegkat.	Aleghquutkat	unulqusiq	kenlanga	aghtelleghmun,	taagken	Paul	aghulaqegkaq.
B05_20_Acts_V12	Ugpeqat	nukalpigaq	aglaatkaat	nenganun	ilutullengeghllagluteng	unguvallgha	apalluqlluku.
B05_20_Acts_V13	Angyaghpagkun	aghulaqukut	Assos-mun	sivungani	Paul-em,	qayughllak	quutkun	Assos-mun	piluni	wetku	tamaani	uuggnaqnilghii	angyaghpagmun.
B05_20_Acts_V14	Kaasan	Assos-mun	qaakluku	angyaghpagmun	Mitylene-etukut.
B05_20_Acts_V15	Unaamingani	Mitylene-meng	aghulaqluta	aghuliightukut	Chios-em	tungangakun.	Taagken	unaamingani	kaatukut	Samos-mun,	enkaam	awakaghaani	kaatukut	Miletus-mun.
B05_20_Acts_V16	Paul-em	naghughsukaa	Ephesus	qayughllak	Asia-mi	kimaawiyunghilnguq.	Pilleghqalgukumi	Jerusalem-emun	kaasupigtengngulghii	angiinnaluni	Pentecost-mun.
B05_20_Acts_V17	Miletus-melluni	Paul-em	tagsiqliqii	ugpeqat	Elder-ngit	Ephesus-melnguut.
B05_20_Acts_V18	Kaasata	pikii,	“Liisimakaghsi	naten	kiyaghtaalqa	elpesinillunga	Asia-mun	kaasuwhaallemneng	ima.
B05_20_Acts_V19	Qepghaatkaqaqa	Ataneq	qusevegtepigllunga,	qunituumaghmallu	qaywa	Jews-et	seghleliighqeghllagngaatngallu,	tuqunnaqutkeghngaatngallu.
B05_20_Acts_V20	Iwernga	liisimakaghsi	nuqetusigatanka	sangwaat	kayutkaghqasi	ungipaqinemni,	apeghtunemsi	yugtuqamillu	negpesinillu.
B05_20_Acts_V21	Qevuulluki	qelghaqsaghanka	Jews-etlu	Greek-etlu	avuteghqelluki	seghleghqennaniqata	qiivesqelluki	Kiyaghneghmun,	ugpeqisqellukillu	Atanemnneng	Jesus	Christ-ameng.
B05_20_Acts_V22	Whaa	maaten	qaatkullunga	Agleghnalghiignun	Taghneghagnun	Jerusalem-ennaqunga,	nallukaqa	sayaghqaqaatnga	Jerusalem-eghmiit.
B05_20_Acts_V23	Iwerngaqun	tamaghhiitni	nunani	takukamni	Agleghnalghiim	Taghnegham	ungipaataqaanga	Jerusalem-emi	seghleliighlleqnilungallu	anusimingllaghlleqnilungallu	yugnun.
B05_20_Acts_V24	Iwernga	whanga	katam	unguvalqa	waakigataqa	apeghiiqaghhnaluku	qepghaqaq	Atanghem	Jesus-em	qelghutkaa	whangamnun.	Aapghesqegkaqii	Pinilghiit	Ungipat	Kiyaghneghem	piniqellghaneng	ayuqelghiit.
B05_20_Acts_V25	“Liisimakaqa	allameng	esghaghnaanghitaghpesinga,	elpesi	ungipiqutkamni	Ataneghpagullghaneng	Kiyaghneghem.
B05_20_Acts_V26	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	aghneghmi	whani	ungipaannaqamsi	malghuklillngunaan,	nalighsi	iflakan	whanga	pilqenghitaqa,
B05_20_Acts_V27	qayughllak	nuqetusimangitaqa	sangwaa	tamaghhaan	Kiyaghneghem	liitesukaa	elpesinun.
B05_20_Acts_V28	Kiyaghneghem	yugi	penniighestun	ayuqut,	enkaam	Agleghnalghiim	Taghnegham	elpesinun	aflengakesqii	katam	tawaten	penniighniightem	aflengakellghatun	penniini.	Enkaam	kelengangwaaghlusi,	Kiyaghneghemllu	yugi	kelengakngwaaghluki.	Aflengakiteki	qayughllak	Kiyaghneghem	tukfiqaqii	ellmi	katam	aawmikun.
B05_20_Acts_V29	Liisimakaqa	uniskumsi	apeghtughistesighwaaghet	takulleqiisi.	Katam	tawatetut	ugighsalghiistun	amaastun	naafqiinaqelghiit	penniighmeng,	naafqennaqutkelleqiit	ugpeqat	apeghtughilleghmegteggun.
B05_20_Acts_V30	Talwa	ilangi	ugpeqaalgutesi	iqlengiqsaghqaagut	ugpeqesqelluki	apeghtughilleteng,	ugpeghteqeghtekumegteki	maligsaaghteknaluki.
B05_20_Acts_V31	Enkaam	kelengangwaaghlusi	puughtellengnayukafsi.	Neqamikluku	pingayut	ayumiqullghet	kelengasaaqaqamsi	qamagllusi	tamaaken	aghneghtuumaan,	unugtuumaan	seghleliighllaghngaaghma,	qunituumaghma.
B05_20_Acts_V32	“Naangniitkennaqaqa,	neghyukutamsi	Kiyaghneghmun	aflengakesqellusi,	ungipamunllu	piniqellghanun	quyastesqellusi.	Nagatelleghpesigun	taana	ungipaq	ugpellesi	iknaqughllequtlu	allgeghlleqaghsillu	elpesi	piliisaghqaghsi	Kiyaghneghmeng.	Taana	piliisaghqaq	tamaakunun	pinguuq	aaftekaminun	ellminun	katam	yuguluki.
B05_20_Acts_V33	Elpesinitaqngama	manigpesinengllu	aatkaghpesinengllu	qiliighumangitunga.
B05_20_Acts_V34	Liisimakaghpesinga	sangwaa	aklukegkaqa,	ilamallu	whangamnilnguut	aklukegkiit	qepghaatkayuwaanka	allgeghhnaluki.
B05_20_Acts_V35	Sangwaa	qamaglluku	pikaqaqa	elpesinun	usputaasqelluku,	whangamtun	ughleghiilleghpesigun	kayusiitesqelluki	pipagningilnguut.	Neqamikluku	Atanghem	Jesus-em	whaten	pillgha,	‘Quyanaghataghaghtuq	tuuniilleq	allgeghutelleghmeng.’”
B05_20_Acts_V36	Paul	tawaten	akuzineghmeng	taaqsami,	segesqughlluni	yughalgusiqii.
B05_20_Acts_V37	Qamaglluteng	qiyamaghmeng	Paul	qetaqluku	naaghaataqaat.
B05_20_Acts_V38	Qivghukelleghpigaqegkangat	qayughllak	pikaqegkangi	allamengllu	esghaghnaanghinniluteng.	Taagken	qanikaat	angyaghpagmun.
B05_21_Acts_V1	Unisamteki	ugpeqat	angyaghpagmun	uuglluta	nangaqaghtukut	Cos-mun.	Unaamingani	Rhodes-mun	kaalluta	taagken	nagneghtukut	Patara-mun.
B05_21_Acts_V2	Tawani	angyaghpagmeng	naalkutukut	Phoenicia-nnaqelghiimeng	enkaam	uuglluta	aghulaqukut.
B05_21_Acts_V3	Esghaghyamteggu	qiighqaq	Cyprus	uughqangakun	nagneghtukut	Syria-m	esnengakun	Tyre-mun.	Tawani	usingighaat	angyaghpak.
B05_21_Acts_V4	Tamaani	ivaghluki	ugpeqat	naalkesamteki	ellngitnitukut	ataasiq	santilleq.	Agleghnalghiignekun	Taghneghagnekun	ugpeqat	Paul	Jerusalem-etesnaniqaat.
B05_21_Acts_V5	Aghulaqsaghqaaghtengngamta	ugpeqaalgutemta	nulighqullghiit,	avaqutaqullghiit	maligtiinkut	esnamun.	Tawani	segesqughquulluta	yughaatukut.
B05_21_Acts_V6	Taagken	uugtukut	angyaghpagmun,	qaniighisteput	nemeggnun	aglaghtuutut.
B05_21_Acts_V7	Aghulaqluta	Tyre-meng	kaatukut	Ptolemais-mun.	Tamaani	quyakluki	ugpeqaalguteput	ataasiq	aghneq	ellngitnitukut.
B05_21_Acts_V8	Unamingani	Caesarea-mun	kaalluta	Philip-enkunitukut	evangelist-emi.	Maaghraghvinleqegkangat	nakmikegkat	kayutnguluki.
B05_21_Acts_V9	Estamaneng	panilek	ugiighumangilngughmeng,	qamaglluteng	uuknaliqistet.
B05_21_Acts_V10	Salin	tamaansimaluta	uuknaliqista	Agabus,	Judea-meng	kaatuq.
B05_21_Acts_V11	Whangkunnun	tagiluni	Paul-em	tafsinga	iikluku	asighqelluki	iteganillu	iiggenillu	piinkut,	“Agleghnalghiik	Taghneghak	piik,	‘Jerusalem-emi	tafsim	uum	yumanga	Jews-et	asighqesaghqaqaat,	taagken	tuunelleqaat	Gentile-enun.’”
B05_21_Acts_V12	Whangkutallu	ilangitallu	yuget	nagalluku	Agabus	tawaten	pilghii	ighlegaatkesaghaghput	Paul	Jerusalem-etefqaan	pisqelluku.
B05_21_Acts_V13	Iwernga	Paul-em	piinkut,	“Sangafsi	qiyamaghpesi	tawaten	pistengnga?	Seghleliighqaghpesinga!	Whaa	apeghiighwaaghlunga	ayuqunga	asighqesaghqaalunga	Jerusalem-emi,	talwa	tuquyaghqaalunga	apalluqluku	Ataneq	Jesus.”
B05_21_Acts_V14	Paul	sagiqsan	iilqayagutaghput	enkaangam	piighput,	“Yeqay	Atanghem	piyukellgha	apeghiighli.”
B05_21_Acts_V15	Enkaam	qafsina	aghneq	atughluku	yataaghqelluta	aghulaqukut	Jerusalem-emun.
B05_21_Acts_V16	Ilangita	ugpeqat	Caesarea-ghmiit	maligtiinkut,	kaasamta	Jerusalem-emun	aglaatiinkut	tukughqamnnun	Mnason-enkunun,	Cyprus-eghmiimun.	Ugpeqaqsuwhaaghteggun	maligulluni	ugpeqegkaa	Jesus.
B05_21_Acts_V17	Jerusalem-emi	ugpeqaalgutemta	quyakluta	upughatiinkut.
B05_21_Acts_V18	Unaamingani	Paul	maliglluku	esghaghyaghtughyaqefut	James,	Elder-etlu	qamaglluteng	tawanteftut.
B05_21_Acts_V19	Paul-em	quyakegkii.	Taagken	ungipaatkii	tamaghhaaneng	Kiyaghneghem	apeghiillghaneng	qepghalleghmikun	Gentile-enilluni.
B05_21_Acts_V20	Nagalluku	usuqegkaat	Kiyaghneq.	Taagken	pikaat	Paul,	“Ugpeqaalgutemni,	liisimakan	uglapestaaghllaget	Jews-et	ugpeqaat	Christ-a.	Elngaatall	qaatkusimanginaghyugaqutlu	Moses-em	Liilightuusaanun.
B05_21_Acts_V21	Ungipaataqiinnguq	apeghtughaqatennguq	qamaglluki	Jews-et,	Gentile-et	nunangitnilnguut	qaatkutefqiita	Moses-em	Liilightuusaanun	pisqelluki.	Piiqatenllunguq	ighneghit	circumcise-enghisaghngaata,	talwanguq	atuqesnanighaqan	Jews-et	kiyaghtaallghat.
B05_21_Acts_V22	Kaasimaniluten	nagaqupestaaghnaqngwaaten.	Sanaqestangam?
B05_21_Acts_V23	Itagnapiggnayaghtuq	pisqellemtestun	piyaquvek.	Estamat	yumta	apeghiighyaghtungestaamiit	akeqilleghteng	Kiyaghneghmun.
B05_21_Acts_V24	Elpeklu	maliglluki	Temple-mun	ukmangighyaghtaa	Moses-em	Liilightuusaan	qelellghatun.	Tukfighnaketenllu	teghikusat	aghqutkaghqasi	enkaam	aghqerraghhaasi	Kiyaghneghmun.	Taam	kingunganeng	yuget	taakut	taawa	meqestengngwaaghluteng	qigughyaghqaaghllequt	Liilightuusat	pisqellghistun.	Elpeklu	ukmangiquvek	qamaglluteng	Jews-et	liigikelleqaat	qaatkutngallghen	Moses-em	Liilightuusaanun.	Liigikelleqaatlu	nagaquqaghteng	tamaana	temngingutanga.
B05_21_Acts_V25	Taakut	Gentile-et	ugpeqiit	ungipaatkaqaput	latatgun	qaatkesqelluki	ukut,	‘Neghegpenasi	neqmeng	aghqutkegkameng	kiyaghnengllaqanun.	Neghegpenasi	aawmeng.	Neghegpenasi	qemitkameng	teghikusameng.	Nuqetaqiteklu	sex-kun	seghleghqelleghmeng.’”
B05_21_Acts_V26	Enkaam	unaamingani	Paul	ukmangighyaghtuqaq	Liilightuusat	pisqellghistun	maliglluki	estamat	yuget	ukmangighyaghtulghiit.	Taagken	Paul	Temple-mun	iteghluni	priest-et	pikii,	“Santilleq	atughluku	estamat	yuget	ukmangighsalleghteng	apeghiighnaqaat	Liilightuusat	pisqellghistun.	Tukfighlleqanka	teghikusat	aghqutkaghqiit	enkaam	aghqerraaghutaataqaghnakesi	taakut	yuget.”
B05_21_Acts_V27	Iiwenllu	santilleq	naangnaqaquq	taakut	yuget	ukmangighsallghat,	Asia-meng	pit	Jews-et	esghaqaat	Paul	Temple-melluku.	Aga	akuqaghluku	akilghuukat,
B05_21_Acts_V28	“Israel-eghmiini,	tagiightekqun!	Una	yuuk	navek	alngunak	pineghmini	seghlequughaqiinkut	Jews-eni	whangkuta,	Liilightuusaputlu.	Wataqaaghaq	seghleghataghaaguq	tagitaqngamiki	Gentile-et	Temple-mun	Liilightuusat	iinghutkiit.	Sakusiiqaqaallu	una	agleghnalghii	Temple-a.”
B05_21_Acts_V29	(Tawaten	pikiit	sumeghmeggni	Paul-mun	Gentile-a	itghusimaniluku	Temple-mun,	qayughllak	Jerusalem-emi	esghaqaqegkegket	Trophimus-enkuk	qerngaghmellukek.	Trophimus	Gentile-ngulghii	Ephesus-eghmii.)
B05_21_Acts_V30	Jerusalem-eghmiit	ugumiyugllakat,	ketanqusnaq	aglaghtuutkat	Temple-mun	akilghuusimaghmeng,	seghleliighqiighllakat.	Temple-mi	Paul	akuqaghluku	qamuqaat	eslatmun.	Tawaninginaq	kitum	amigllaget	uumkii.
B05_21_Acts_V31	Tuqunnaqutkumaluku	Paul	Rome-eghmiit	pilluwaghtengita	umiilgat	ungipangegkaq	qaga	iingunaghmi	seghleliighqiighllaguniluku.
B05_21_Acts_V32	Tawaninginaq	Rome-eghmiit	pilluwaghtengita	umiilgat	kelqegkaq	umiilwaaghnengllu	pilluwaghtenengllu	enkaam	aqfaasnaq	aglaqat.	Yulghuteghllaget	esghaghluki	pilluwaghtet	qevuutiighnaniqaat	Paul.
B05_21_Acts_V33	Taagken	pilluwaghtet	umiilgita	tuguluku	Paul	asighqestekaa	malghugneghneng	qiipraghutneng.	Pilluwaghtet	umiilgita	aaptekii,	“Kinangaawa	una	yuuk?	Samaa?”
B05_21_Acts_V34	Ataasikun	akilghuumeng	kiimsiisaqmegteggu	repall	umiilgem	liigikenghitkii	sameng	pitangi.	Enkaam	pilluwaghtet	umiilgita	yugminun	aglaatesqegkaa	Paul	pilluwaghtet	mangteghiitnun.
B05_21_Acts_V35	Tutemqiiraaghnun	kaatulluku	pilluwaghtet	kefkaat	Paul,	qayughllak	yulghuteghllaget	suugllugughteghllalghiit.
B05_21_Acts_V36	Yulghuteghllaget	maliglleghaatkaat	akilghuusimaghmeng,	“Tuquteggu!”
B05_21_Acts_V37	Pilluwaghtet	itghunnaqngatni	Paul-em	aaptekaa	pilluwaghtet	umiilgat	Greek-estun,	“Aleghquqaghnayanghisikaan?”	Kiimsiiqaa,	“Awii	Greek-estun	akuzikayuguziin?
B05_21_Acts_V38	Taanangunghisiin	Egypt-eghmii	qavnganghhaq	qerngughtikaq	yugmeng	awiinnaluku	Rome-em	kavemenga,	kilgaanun	aghulaqutkii	4,000	yuget	atelget,	Yugtaghtet?”
B05_21_Acts_V39	Paul-em	kiimsiiqaa,	“Jew-nguunga,	Cilicia-ghmii,	allgeqaagunga	neghllagmi	Tarsus-mi.	Aleghquqaghnayanghisingii	yuget?”
B05_21_Acts_V40	Pilluwaghtet	umiilgita	angeghqumaksatni,	Paul	nekevluni	tutemqiiraaghteggun	iiggeni	nengugutkii	nepighesqelluki.	Enkaam	qallegnanighyata	aleghquqii	Hebrew-stun.
B05_22_Acts_V1	Paul-em	pikii,	“Anglegutemnillu	siivanlleghnillu	nagataghtengnga,	liigikesnaqutkaghhnaqamsi	saaqutemneng.”
B05_22_Acts_V2	Jews-et	nagasamegteggu	akuzilghii	ellmegestun	elngaatall	qallegnanighwaaghutkat.
B05_22_Acts_V3	Taagken	pikii,	“Jew-nguunga	allgeqaq	Tarsus-mi	Cilicia-melngughmi	iwernga	maani	Jerusalem-emi	anglikaagunga.	Gamaliel	apeghtughistekluku	liitngwaaqaqanka	Liilightuusat	sivunemta	apeghtuusaqegkiit,	enkaam	tuunegkaagunga	Kiyaghneghmun	qaatkengngwaaghnaluku	katam	tawaten	elpesistun.
B05_22_Acts_V4	Elngaatall	amyuqetaatkegkaqanka	tamaakut	qaatkutngalghiit	Jesus-em	apeghtuusaanun	repall	tuqunnaqutkegkaqanka.	Yugetlu	aghnatlu	tugustaqluki	anusimingllaghtesquqaqanka.
B05_22_Acts_V5	High	priest-emllu	agghistetlu	ipanguninaaghaat	apelqa	elpesinun.	Whangamkun	latat	tuyughiit	Jews-elgutemnnun	Damascus-melngughnun,	latatkumakangatnga	ivaghiyaghtuunilunga	ugpeqaneng.	Naalkegkumki	asighqelluki	taginnaqnguyaghanka	Jerusalem-emun	aghyuughnaluki.
B05_22_Acts_V6	“Taagken	Jerusalem-emeng	Damascus-mun	kaasaghtughaqungallu	aghneghem	qukaani	qilagmeng	nighugllak	kuukgutqaghtuq	whangamnun.
B05_22_Acts_V7	Uullghaghllunga	nunamun	nagaqughaqa	ma	pilghii,	‘Saul,	Saul,	sangama	amyuutkaqsinga?’
B05_22_Acts_V8	Aaptaqa,	‘Kinanguzin,	Ataneq?’	Kiimsighaanga,	‘Jesus-nguunga	Nazareth-eghmii	amyuqetaatkegken.’
B05_22_Acts_V9	Tamaakut	igleghalgutma	esghaqaqaat	nighuk	iwernga	aleghqughtema	menga	nagaquumangitaat.
B05_22_Acts_V10	Enkaam	aaptaqa,	‘Ataneq,	salanga?’	Atanghem	piinga,	‘Nekevluten	aglaa	Damascus-mun.	Tawani	kitum	ungipaalleqaaten	Kiyaghneghem	yataaghqegkaaneng	elpenun.’
B05_22_Acts_V11	Ayaamalghiinga	nighugllagem	angtalanganeng	enkaam	igleghalgutma	taslughaatnga	Damascus-mun.
B05_22_Acts_V12	“Kaasamta	yugem	Ananias-nguuniiqegkangita	esghaghyaghtughaanga.	Elngaatall	qaatkutngalghii	Liilightuusamnnun,	Damascus-eghmiit	Jews-et	pinistaghhiinatun	akuzitkaqegkangat.
B05_22_Acts_V13	Takulunga	piinga,	‘Anglegutemni	Saul,	esghasagunneqigten!’	Enkaam	tawaninginaq	esghaasagullunga	esghaghaqa.
B05_22_Acts_V14	Piinga,	‘Kiyaghneghem,	sivunemta	maniguqiita,	nakmikaaten	elpenun	liigikesqelluku	piyukelleni,	esghiisqelluku	Seghleghqumangilnguq	Qepghaghteni,	nagatesqelluku	aleghquqangaten.
B05_22_Acts_V15	Enkaam	ungipaghtekelleqaaten	tamanganun	esghaatelleghpenengllu	nagatelleghpenengllu.
B05_22_Acts_V16	Sameng	utaqiigaqsin?	Saaqsin	paaptaayesten,	seghleghqelleghten	ughvughtestiki	tuqlughilleghpegun	Aatghakun	Atanghem.’
B05_22_Acts_V17	“Taagken	Jerusalem-emun	taginqigllunga,	Temple-mi	yughaamalunga	esghaghwaalleghqun
B05_22_Acts_V18	esghaghaqa	Ataneq.	Piinga,	‘Aghulaqragkiighi	Jerusalem-emeng	qayughllak	maani	tuguklighnaanghitaat	ungipan	whangamneng	ayuqelghii.’
B05_22_Acts_V19	Kiimsighaqa,	‘Ataneq,	Jerusalem-eghmiit	liisimakngwaaghaat	synagogue-nnun	piiqlunga	tugulaqaqanka	ugpelghiit	elpeneng,	anaguleghtestaqankallu	anusimingllaghtestaqankallu.
B05_22_Acts_V20	Ungipaghten	Stephen	tuqutaqngatgu	legan	itagnaqegkaqaqa,	taakut	tuqutistengita	qaasliit	aatkiit	aflengakegkaqanka.’
B05_22_Acts_V21	Atanghem	piinga,	‘Aghulaqi,	kayaggnaqngwaamken	agavek	uyavanun	Gentile-enun.’”
B05_22_Acts_V22	Tamaakut	yulghutet	nagatkaat	Paul	kenlanga	Gentile-enun	pinaqnillghanun.	Taagken	akilghuughllakat,	“Tuquteggu!	Unguvanguyaghqaanghituq!”
B05_22_Acts_V23	Sakrituteghllagem	angtalanganeng	akilghuutkelluku	qaasliit	aatkateng	nengugulluki	aghulatkiit,	sunamengllu	quulmun	milughmikat.
B05_22_Acts_V24	Pilluwaghtet	umiilgita	esghapagluki	pilluwaghteminun	itghutesqegkaa	Paul	pilluwaghtet	mangteghiitnun.	Kayagutkaallu	kagsagmigesqelluku	aapghesqelluku	sangan	yulghuteghllagnun	akilghuutkutanga.
B05_22_Acts_V25	Iwernga	asighqesatni	Paul-em	aaptekaa	umiilwaaq,	“Rome-em	liilightuusiitni	itagnaghyaghqaawaa	kagsagmikufsigu	Rome-eghmii,	talwa	nanqigtegpenaan	sameng	anaggusimatanga?”
B05_22_Acts_V26	Paul-em	tawaten	piyatni	umiilwaaghem	umiilegteng	takuluku	pikaa,	“Sanaqsin?	Una	yuuk	Rome-eghmiinguuq!”
B05_22_Acts_V27	Taagken	umiilgem	takuluku	Paul	aaptekaa,	“Ipa	Rome-eghmiinguziin?”	Kiimsiqaa,	“Aa-a.”
B05_22_Acts_V28	Pilluwaghtet	umiilgita	pikaa,	“Whanga	llivikuteghllaglunga	Rome-eghmiingughtekaagunga.”	Paul-em	pikaa,	“Whanga	Rome-eghmiingulunga	allgeqaagunga.”
B05_22_Acts_V29	Taakut	aapqughaaghtekaghqaqsaqangi	tawaninginaq	iqillaghaatkat	ellnganeng.	Pilluwaghtet	umiilgita	liigiksamigu	Paul	Rome-eghmiingutanga	alingegkaq	qayughllak	asighqestekaqegkanga.
B05_22_Acts_V30	Pilluwaghtet	umiilgita	liigikesukaa	Jews-enun	sameng	apalluqutanga	Paul.	Enkaam	unaamingani	qiipraghutngightestekaa.	Taagken	chief	priest-etlu	agghistetlu	qerngughutesluki	aglaatkaa	Paul	ellngitnun.
B05_23_Acts_V1	Paul-em	qiivluki	agghistet	pikii,	“Jew-lgutemni,	aghneghmun	whavek	kenlanga	seghleghyugutangitunga	kiyaghtellemni	Kiyaghneghmun.”
B05_23_Acts_V2	Aga	High	Priest-em	Ananias-em	nekevghalghiinun	Paul-em	tungangani	qelghutkaa	Paul	qasaghtesqelluku	qaanghakun.
B05_23_Acts_V3	Taagken	Paul-em	pikaa,	“Ipapestaaq	Kiyaghneghem	aghyuughlleqaaten,	uyuq	piniiyugneq!	Liilightuusatgun	nanqigsaghqaqaghpenga	iwernga	elpek	naafqaten	Liilightuusat	qasaghtestelleghpegun.”
B05_23_Acts_V4	Paul-em	saaghwanilnguut	nekevghalghiit	pikaat,	“Seghletun	aleghqughan	Kiyaghneghem	high	priest-nga.”
B05_23_Acts_V5	Paul-em	pikii,	“Jew-lgutemni,	liisimaksaqumkun	high	priest-ngutanga	tawaten	pinayanghitaqa,	qayughllak	liisimaksaghaqa	Akuzitngi	Igaqegkani	whaten	pilleq,	‘Igleghutilghiit	yugpesineng	seghletun	akuzitkesaghqaqenghitasi.’”
B05_23_Acts_V6	Paul-em	liigikluki	ilangi	Sadducees-ngutangi,	ilangi	Pharisees-ngutangi	iglagtuluni	pikii,	“Jew-lgutemni,	Pharisee-nguunga,	sivunghenkallu	Pharisees-nguut.	Whaa	nanqiggnaqaghpesinga	qayughllak	ugpeqegkenka	tuqukat	unguvaghsaghqaatangi.”
B05_23_Acts_V7	Paul	tawaten	piyan	Pharisees-etlu	Sadducees-etlu	aaghtiiraaghutkat	aga	malghughqengnginaamaghmeng	pikat.
B05_23_Acts_V8	(Tawaten	pikat	qayughllak	Pharisees-et	ugpeqngukangit	tuqukat	unguvaghyaghqaaniluki,	yaqulegtuniluku,	taghneghaghtunilukullu,	naqam	Sadducees-et	ugpeqigalkangit	tamaakut).
B05_23_Acts_V9	Qenwat	aaghtiiraaghullghiit	iglagtughtekat.	Ilangita	Pharisees-et	apeghtughikayuget	Liilightuusaneng	mesiighaatkaat	Paul	whaten,	“Sameng	seghleghmeng	naalkefikneghmeng	aghtughaghput,	ipa	entaqun	taghnegham	nalighmeng	yaqulgem	aleghquumaa.”
B05_23_Acts_V10	Wanlegi	aaghtiiraaghuteghllagyata	repall	Paul	wayaalluku	lliighyatgu,	pilluwaghtet	umiilgita	yakughyagulluku	aqnighhnayukatgu	pilluwaghteminun	aqfasluku	awitutesqegkaa	agghisteneng.	Enkaam	aglaatesqegkaa	pilluwaghtet	mangteghiitnun.
B05_23_Acts_V11	Tawani	unugmi	Atanghem	aliighvikluku	Paul	pikaa,	“Ilutuluten,	katam	tawaten	Jerusalem-emi	ungipaqelleghpetun,	Rome-emillu	ungipaqelleqaghpenga.”
B05_23_Acts_V12	Unaamingani	40-neng	uglalghiit	Jews-et	agghilluteng	tuqunnaqegkaat	Paul.	Ellmeggneng	akequtkat	neghnaanghinnilutengllu,	meghnaanghinnilutengllu	kenlanga	tuqutelleghmeggnun.
B05_23_Acts_V14	Enkaam	chief	priest-enunllu	siivanlleghnunllu	aglaghluteng	pikiit,	“Ipapestaaq	akeqiikut	neghnaanghinniluta	kenlanga	tuqutellemnnun	Paul.
B05_23_Acts_V15	Elpesillu	agghistetlu	aapteggu	pilluwaghtet	umiilgat	taginneqigtesqelluku	Paul	aapqughaaghwaaghnaqniluku.	Enkaam	tumemi	taakwani	whangkuta	tuqulleqaghput.”
B05_23_Acts_V16	Iwernga	Paul-em	uyghungan	nagaqughluki	agghillghit	ungipaasaghtuqaa	Paul	pilluwaghtet	mangteghiitnun.
B05_23_Acts_V17	Ungipaasatni	Paul-em	tuqlughluku	umiilwaaq	pikaa,	“Uum	nukalpigaam	ungipaasuwaqaa	pilluwaghtet	umiilgat	sameng,	aglaataghtigu.”
B05_23_Acts_V18	Umiilwaaghem	tuguluku,	aglaalluku	pilluwaghtet	umiilgat	pikaa,	“Anusimingllagham	Paul-em	tagitesqaa	elpenun	una	nukalpigaq,	samenguq	ungipaasuwaaten.”
B05_23_Acts_V19	Umiilgem	tasluqluku	iqitulluku	ellnginaaghsamek	aaptekaa,	“Sameng	ungipaasugsinga?”
B05_23_Acts_V20	Kiimsiqaa,	“Jews-et	agghisimaat	aapnaluteng	Paul	aglaataghtesqelluku	agghivigmun	unaami,	aapqughwaghataghaghnaqniluku.
B05_23_Acts_V21	Ugpeqegpenaki,	qayughllak	40-neng	uglaghtut	yuget	iighluteng	tumemi	utaqiinaqnilghiit	tuqunnaluku.	Akeqimaat	neghnaanghinnilutengllu,	meghnaanghinnilutengllu	kenlanga	tuqutelleghmeggnun	Paul.	Apeghiighluteng	utaqiigaqut	naten	pilleghqaghpeneng.”
B05_23_Acts_V22	Umiilgem	ineghtengngwaaqaa	nukalpigaq,	“Kina	alngunak	ungipaategpenaan	ungipaasaghtuumanilunga.”	Taagken	aanestekaa.
B05_23_Acts_V23	Taagken	pilluwaghtet	umiilgita	tagsiqlighlukek	umiilwaaghek	pikakek,	“Ungipaasaghtughteki	200	pilluwaghtet,	70	kuunitistet,	200	panastet	igleghsaqleggiinaaghllinnguq	Caesarea-mun,	ighivgaqun	9-eklaagmi.
B05_23_Acts_V24	Paul-llu	kuunimeng	yataaghqunnakesi	igleghusighqameng,	wataghllak	pinitun	kaatunnakesi	Governor-mun	Felix-mun.”
B05_23_Acts_V25	Taagken	governor-mun	latatkegkaa	Paul:
B05_23_Acts_V26	Ukut	latat	Claudius	Lysias-meng	pinguut	Angellemnun	Governor-mun	Felix-mun,	quyakamken.
B05_23_Acts_V27	Jews-et	tugukaqaat	Paul,	tuqunnaqaqsaghpetaatlu	iwernga	liigikluku	Rome-eghmiingutanga	pilluwaghtekullghiini	aqfaaghput	aqnighhnayukatgu.
B05_23_Acts_V28	Liigiksugluku	Jews-enun	sameng	apalluqutanga	agghistengitnun	aglaataqa.
B05_23_Acts_V29	Iwernga	liigiksaqegka	sameng	apalliiteftuq	tuqusaghqaaluni,	talwa	anusimingllaghyaghqaaluni.	Taawanginaq	Jews-et	qaatkuuneghinniluku	Liilightuusameggnun	piiqeftaat.
B05_23_Acts_V30	Ungipaasatnga	Jews-ennguq	tuqunnaqaqaat	Paul,	tawaninginaq	elpenun	aglaatestaqa.	Taakutlu	avutkistengi	kayagtanka	elpenun	apeghyaghtiisqelluku	apallaat.
B05_23_Acts_V31	Enkaam	unugmi	tawani	pilluwaghtet	kayagtelleghmegestun	aghulaqutkaat	Paul	kenlanga	Antipatris-mun.
B05_23_Acts_V32	Unaamingani	ilangi	uteghniqat	pilluwaghtet	mangteghiitnun,	taakut	kuunitistet	nagneghutkaat	Paul	Caesarea-mun.
B05_23_Acts_V33	Kaalluteng	Paul	aglaatkaat	governor-mun,	latatlu	tuunegkiit.
B05_23_Acts_V34	Governor-em	latat	atightughluki	aaptekaa	Paul,	“Nalighneghaneng	Rome-em	pinguzin?”	Paul-em	kiimsiqaa,	“Cilicia-meng”.
B05_23_Acts_V35	Governor-em	pilaataqaa,	“Avutkisteten	kaaskata	nanqiglleqamken.”	Taagken	kelengakistenun	kayagutkaa	kelengakesqelluku	Praetorium-emi	mangteghami	Herod-em	ulimastekaani.
B05_24_Acts_V1	Tallimat	aghneghet	atughluki	High	Priest-a	Ananias,	ilangillu	siivanlleghet,	akuzistekaghqaatlu	Tertullus,	kaatkat	Caesarea-mun.	Nanqigtivigmi	Governor-mun	Felix-mun	aapqiit	Paul-em	seghletun	pillghi.
B05_24_Acts_V2	Tuqlughyatni	Tertullus	pikaq,	“Angellemni	Governor	Felix-mi,	elpek	apalluqluten	nekeggmellelguukut	nunamnni	qavngarugllaggaaneng.	Tamaakutlu	kiyaghtellemnni	allangughquqaghten	pinightut.
B05_24_Acts_V3	Salleghpenun	tamaghhaanun	iyamsiqayugllaguukut.
B05_24_Acts_V4	Kimaawisnayukamken	takestaaghhaaluku	akuzinaqunga,	iyamsiqayugvikamken	nagannaqegkefkut.
B05_24_Acts_V5	Una	yuuk	Paul	seghleliighqistenguuq.	Seghleliighqaqii	qamaglluki	Jews-et	naansaghngaata.	Maghyaghqughtekaat	Jesus-em	Nazareth-eghmiim	maligsaaghtengita.
B05_24_Acts_V6	Talwa	sakusiiqnaqegkaqsaghaa	Temple-a,	iwernga	tugukaqaghput.
B05_24_Acts_V7	Nanqiggnaqegkaqsaghaghput	liillightuusamta	pillghatun,	taawanginaq	pilluwaghtet	umiilgita	Lysias-em	tagiluni	pilluwaghteminun	wayaghtestekaqaa	whangkunneng.	Taagken	qelghii	avutkistengi	elpenun	tagisqelluki.
B05_24_Acts_V8	Governor	Felix-mi,	aapqughaaquvgu	liigikelleqaten	anaggunnilleput	ipangutangi.”
B05_24_Acts_V9	Jews-et	ilatqaghtekat	Tertullus-mun,	akuzillghi	qamaglluki	ipangunikiit.
B05_24_Acts_V10	Taagken	governor-em	Paul	akuzisqegkaa.	Enkaam	Paul	pikaq,	“Governor	Felix-mi,	quyaanga	mesighaghnaqelghiinga	elpenun,	qayughllak	liisimakamken	qavngarugllaggaaneng	nanqigtistenguuten	whangkunnun	Jews-enun.
B05_24_Acts_V11	Elpeni	liigiksugnaghtuq	ipangutanga	akugaarugllak	Jerusalem-etelqa	maniguunnalunga	Kiyaghneghmun.
B05_24_Acts_V12	Anaggunnistema	liisimakaatnga	aaghtiiraaghumangitaqa	kina	alngunak,	qapraghqiimangitungallu	yugneng	Temple-mi,	synagogue-nnillu,	talwa	nani	alngunak	Jerusalem-emi.
B05_24_Acts_V13	Enkaangam	tawaten	pimanighngaaghmegtengnga	ipapighqennaanghitaat.
B05_24_Acts_V14	Iwernga	apeghnaqaqa	una	elpesinun,	manigughaqaqa	Kiyaghneghat	sivunemta	maliglluku	Tumanga	Jesus-em.	Ukut	yuget	pikangat	temnginguniluku.	Iwernga	whangallu	ellngistun	ugpeqanka	Moses-em	Liilightuusii,	uuknaliqistetlu	igaqegkiit.
B05_24_Acts_V15	Anaggunnistemtunllu	ugpeqaqa	Kiyaghneghem	unguvaghtesaghqaqii	qamagtengngwaaghluki	tuqukat	pinighyaghngaata,	seghleghuyaghngaata.
B05_24_Acts_V16	Enkaangam	quunpeng	kiyaghhnaqutkaqunga	seghleghyugutkaghqiillunga	Kiyaghneghmunllu	yugnunllu.
B05_24_Acts_V17	“Qafsinegyak	ayumiqulleq	atughluku	qantaghaqunghhaq	uteghnightunga	Jerusalem-emun	manilinnaluki	aklumalghiit	Jews-elgutenka,	aghqerraaghnalungallu	Kiyaghneghmun.
B05_24_Acts_V18	Pelungighsaneghmeng	apeghiighlunga	Temple-mi	aghqerraaghumalunga,	ilangita	Jews-et	Asia-meng	pit	esghaghaatnga.	Uvitka	paaghqituqlu	seghleliighituqlu.
B05_24_Acts_V19	Taakut	Jews-et	sangameng	taginghitat?	Sameng	anaggusimakuma	ellnginguyaghtut	aapghistekaghqanka	seghletun	pillemneng	iwernga	aviitut.
B05_24_Acts_V20	Yeqay	ukut	whaanlenguut	nagatkaqaatnga	mesighaghaqngama	Jews-et	agghivigitni,	apeghlitgu	anaggutelleghmeng	naalkefikumakumegtengnga.
B05_24_Acts_V21	Entaqun	ellngitni	seghleghuuq	whaten	piiqngamki,	‘Nanqigtaghpesinga	qayughllak	ugpeqegkenka	tuqukat	unguvaghyaghqaaniluki.’”
B05_24_Acts_V22	Iwernga	Felix-em,	liisimakngwaaghluku	kiyaghtaalleq	Jesus-em	apeghtuusaa,	wintakusitkaa	nanqigtegpenaan	Paul.	Pikaq,	“Pilluwaghtet	umiilgat	Lysias	kaaskan	agghitkelleqaqa	Paul.”
B05_24_Acts_V23	Taagken	umiilwaaghmun	kayagutkaa	Paul	kelengakesqelluku,	naqam	anusimingllaghtesnaniqaa.	Ighsakesnaniqiillu	ilakumtaaghita	sameng	taginneghatgu	aklukegkaaneng.
B05_24_Acts_V24	Qafsinat	aghneghet	atughluki	Felix-em	Jews-a	nuliini,	Drusilla,	kelqelluku	tagikaq.	Tagsiqlighluku	Paul,	nagatkaak	ungipalghii	ugpeqilleghmeng	Jesus	Christ-akun.
B05_24_Acts_V25	Paul-em	akuzitkesaki	ukut:	pinitun	kiyaghtaalleq,	nuqenneghtulleq,	Kiyaghneghemllu	nanqigtilleghqaa	tamaghhaanun.	Governor	Felix-em	alingluni	pikaa,	“Aanelghaaten'ngam,	alla	aqfasleqamken	pilleghqangegkuma.”
B05_24_Acts_V26	Tawani	pilleghmi	Felix	neghyunguyalghii	Paul-mun	manililleqniluni	pegtekumigu.	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	tagsiqlighaqegkanga	mulutegpenaan	aleghquunnalutek.
B05_24_Acts_V27	Taagken	maalghuk	ayumiqullghek	atughlukek,	Porcius	Festus	governor-ngughtekaq.	Iwernga	Felix-em	efqughsugluki	Jews-et	Paul	unitkaa	paninang	qiipraghusighngaluku.
B05_25_Acts_V1	Festus	kaasami	Caesarea-mun	igleghutinaluni,	pingayut	aghneghet	atughluki	aghulaqegkaq	Jerusalem-emun.
B05_25_Acts_V2	Tawani	chief	priest-etlu,	igleghutistengitallu	Jews-et	ungipitkaat,	Paul	seghleliighqiighllakaaniluku	Jews-eneng.
B05_25_Acts_V3	Sagiqutkaat	Festus-mun,	Paul	tagitesqelluku	Jerusalem-emun	qayughllak	aksaqluku	tuqusukaat	tumangani.
B05_25_Acts_V4	Iwernga	Festus-em	pikii,	“Paul	kelengakaqaghput	Caesarea-mi.	Qantaghaqun	uteghnighyaghqaagunga,
B05_25_Acts_V5	igleghutistegpesi	maliggnakangatnga.	Elngaatall	tawani	sameng	anaggusimakan	apeghnakangat.”
B05_25_Acts_V6	Festus	Jerusalem-emetaghaqaq	pingayuneng	inglulek	nalighmeng	qula	aghneq,	taagken	Caesarea-tkaq.	Unaamingani	nanqigtivigem	aqumutagkenkun	aqumluni	aqfastekaa	Paul.
B05_25_Acts_V7	Tagisatgu,	Jerusalem-eghmiit	Jews-et	kanglluqaghlluku	anaggutaataghllagumanikaat	iwernga	ipapighqepagningitkiit	anaggutellghi.
B05_25_Acts_V8	Paul	mesighaqaq,	“Qaatkiganneghitanka	Jews-et	Liilightuusiit,	seghletun	pingigatunga	Temple-mi,	seghletun	pimangitaqa	Rome-em	Umiilegpigaa.”
B05_25_Acts_V9	Festus-em	efqughsugluki	Jews-et	aaptekaa	Paul,	“Jerusalem-emi	whangamnun	nanqigtesugsiin?”
B05_25_Acts_V10	Paul-em	kiimsiqaa,	“Nakaa!	Whaa	Umiilegpigaam	nanqigtivigani	nekevghaanga	enkaam	tamaaken	apalluqluku	whani	nanqigsaghqaagunga.	Liisimakngwaaghan	Jews-enun	anaggutellghitunga.
B05_25_Acts_V11	Anaggusimakuma	Rome-em	liilightuusaan	pillghani	repall	tuqusaghqaalunga,	anagnaqnaanghitaqa	tuqulleq.	Iwernga	Jews-et	anaggunnillghat	temngingukan,	kitum	alngunak	Jews-enun	sastekanganga,	taana	yuuk	qaatkunnaanghituq	Rome-em	liilightuusaanun.	Rome-em	Umiilegpigaanun	nanqigtesugtunga.”
B05_25_Acts_V12	Festus-enkut	agghilgutkullghiit	agghinneghmeng	taaqsameng	Paul-em	piyukellghaneng,	Paul	pikaa,	“Nanqigtesugulghiiten	Umiilegpigaghmun,	Umiilegpigaghmun	aglaghllequten.”
B05_25_Acts_V13	Taam	kingungiighhaaneng	Umiilek	Agrippa	kaatkaq	Caesarea-mun	kelqelluku	nayani	Bernice,	quyaknaluku	Governor	Festus.
B05_25_Acts_V14	Tamaansimalukek	Festus-em	ungipamsugutkaa	Agrippa	Paul-meng.	Pikaa,	“Governor-ngughsalghiinga	Felix-em	yuuk	anusimingllaghvigmetestaqeftaa	maani.
B05_25_Acts_V15	Jerusalem-emellunga	chief	priest-etlu,	igleghutistengitallu	Jews-et	ungipaataatnga	Paul-em	anaggutellghaneng.	Taagken	aaptaatnga	whangamnun	tuqutestesqelluku,
B05_25_Acts_V16	iwernga	kiimsiqaqanka,	‘Whangkuta	Rome-eghmiini	kinkut	alngunak	nanqigtegpenaki	tuqusigataput.	Liilightuusaput	whaten	pikaagut,	Seghletun	pinikaat,	sivukluni	apeghtesaghqaaguq	ipa	pimatanga	anaggunnistet	nagatestekluki.	Taagken	liigikelleqaghput	salleghqaghput.’
B05_25_Acts_V17	Enkaam	Paul-em	anaggunnistengi	tagilaghaasata	aga	unaamingani	aqumegkaagunga	nanqigtivigkun,	tagitestekaqaqallu	Paul.
B05_25_Acts_V18	Anaggunistengi	nekevuulluteng	seghletun	pillghi	apeghyaqmegteki	sumeghtaghaatkellemtun	seghleghtutkanghiteftut.
B05_25_Acts_V19	Taawanginaghhaq	aaghtiiraaghumakangat	ugpeqilleghmeggneng,	taanallu	yuuk	aatqelghii	Jesus-meng	tuqumaniluku,	iwernga	Paul-em	sagiqutkaqaa	unguvaamaniluku.
B05_25_Acts_V20	Liisimakepagunghitutemneng	tamaakut,	Paul	aaptaqa	nanqigtesugutanga	Jerusalem-emi.
B05_25_Acts_V21	Iwernga	Paul-em	kiimsighaanga,	‘Nanqigtesugtunga	Umiilegpigaghmun.	Kelengakestinga	kenlanga	aglaghtestelleghpenun	ellnganun.’	Enkaam	anusimingllaghvigmun	kanaghtesneqigtaqa	kenlanga	aglaghtestelleghqamnun	Umiilegpigaghmun.”
B05_25_Acts_V22	Agrippa-m	pikaa	Festus,	“Whangallu	nagasugaqa	Paul.”	Pikaa,	“Unaami	nagalleqan.”
B05_25_Acts_V23	Unaamingani	Agrippa-nkuk	Bernice-enkuk	iitqak	qerngughutfigllagmun	elngaatall	aarraghwaaghlutek	umiilgem	aatkaaneng,	maligtestekluki	umiilgitlu	pilluwaghtet,	igleghutistengillu	Caesarea-m.	Taagken	Festus-em	itghutesqegkaa	Paul.
B05_25_Acts_V24	Festus-em	pikii,	“Umiilegmi	Agrippa-mi,	elpesillu	qamagllusi	whaanlengughni,	una	yuuk	esghaqesi,	Paul-nguuq.	Qamaglluteng	Jews-et	maanlenguut,	Jerusalem-emelnguutlu	qikeghqukegkaqaat	whangamkun	repall	akilghuutkegkaqaat	tuqusaghqaaniluku.
B05_25_Acts_V25	Iwernga	nanqigsaqegka	sameng	apalliiteftuq	tuqusaghqaaluni.	Ellmineng	nanqigtesukaatanganeng	Umiilegpigaghmun	aglaghtesnaluku	piiqaqa.
B05_25_Acts_V26	Iwernga	latatgun	sameng	ipapighqengngalghiimeng	apeghyaghqiitunga	Umiilegpigaghmun	uumeng	yugmeng	ayuqelghiimeng.	Enkaam	tagitaqa	sivugpesinun,	kiyang	elpenun	Umiilegmi	Agrippa-mi!	Neghyukaqa	aapqughaaqumteggu	sameng	latasighqameng	naalkefiknayukamkun.
B05_25_Acts_V27	Whangamni	temnginguuq	aglaghtestekumkun	anusimingllaghaq	Umiilegpigaghmun	sameng	anaggutelleghmeng	apallungunaan.”
B05_26_Acts_V1	Agrippa-m	pikaa	Paul,	“Taawa	mesighaghyaghqaaghtuten,	saaqsin	akuzi.”	Paul-em	iiggeni	nengugulluki,	pikaa,
B05_26_Acts_V2	“Umiilegmi	Agrippa-mi,	aghneghmi	whani	elngaatall	aneghneghtunga	sivugpeni	mesighaghnaqelghiinga	Jews-et	anaggutelqennikangitneng,
B05_26_Acts_V3	qayughllak	nallukenghitngwaaghaten	Jews-et	nangaghneghitlu	apalluqutkaqegkangitlu.	Enkaam	nangllegsipigllunga	aaptamken	nagataghtesqellunga.
B05_26_Acts_V4	“Nunamnilnguutlu	Jerusalem-emelnguutlu	qamaglluteng	Jews-et	liisimakaat	kiyaghtaalqa	anglinghhaatemneng	ima.
B05_26_Acts_V5	Apeghyugyaqumegteggu	liisimakegkaghteng	apeghnayaghaatnga	iiwleng	qaatkutngalghiinga	Jews-et	Liilightuusiitnun.
B05_26_Acts_V6	Whaa	Jews-et	tagistaatnga	whavek	nanqigtesqellunga	qayughllak	neghyukngukegka	Kiyaghneghem	unguvaghtilleghqaa	tuqukaneng	akequsaqegkaa	sivunemnnun.
B05_26_Acts_V7	Taanata	akequsaq	qula	maalghuk	siipneqelghiit	ramkemta	neghyukegkangat	allgeghhnaluku,	elngaatall	maniguutnguluteng	Kiyaghneghmun	unugtuumaan,	aghneghtuumaan.	Umiilegmi,	iwernga	taana	ataasiq	neghyukilleq	apalluqluku	Jews-et	nanqigtesugaatnga.
B05_26_Acts_V8	Sangafsi	sumeghtaghaghaqetsi	Kiyaghneq	unguvaghtipagninginniluku	tuqukaneng?
B05_26_Acts_V9	“Sivunghani	agani	ugpeqepigtekaqaqa	kipullginaalleghllaka	elqughutnganiluku	aatghaneng	Jesus-em	Nazareth-eghmiim.
B05_26_Acts_V10	Tawaten	pikaagunga	Jerusalem-emi.	Chief	priest-eneng	pilleghqangegkaagunga	anusimingllaghtesnaluki	ugpeqalghutet.	Tuququghnaqngatki	itagnaqepigtekaqanka	tuqutesqelluki.
B05_26_Acts_V11	Uglaghngaan	aghyuughtestekaqanka	tamaghhiitni	synagogue-nni,	whatenllu	pisnaqutkegkaqanka,	‘Ugpeqnaniimaaqa	Jesus.’	Ugumiyagutepigtekaqanka	repall	malighqaqaqanka	talwa	Gentile-et	nunangitnun	amyuutkennaluki.
B05_26_Acts_V12	“Tamaaken	apalluqluku	Damascus-etunga	pilleghqalighlunga,	qelellelighlunga	chief	priest-eneng.
B05_26_Acts_V13	Umiilegmi,	igleghtaaluta	aghneq	qukaghitaquqlu	esghaghaqa	nighuk	nighugataghalghii	siqineghmeng,	kuukgullghii	qilagmeng	pamaken.	Elngaatall	nighupiglluni	kuukgutkaaguq	uvitemnun,	igleghalgutemnunllu.
B05_26_Acts_V14	Qamaglluta	ulleghaatukut	nunamun.	Taagken	ma	nagaqughaqa	whaten	pilghii	Hebrew-ghmiistun,	‘Saul,	Saul!	Sangama	amyuutkesinga?	Aqnighquuguten	elpeneng	amyuutkilleghpegun,	tawateghpigaq	ox-em	aqnighqullghatun	ketngighqulleghmikun	yugmi	maghyaghquusii.’
B05_26_Acts_V15	Aaptaqa,	‘Kinanguzin	Ataneq?’	Atanghem	kiimsighaanga,	‘Jesus-nguunga,	amyuutkegken.
B05_26_Acts_V16	Nekevi.	Aliighvikamken	qayughllak	nakmikamken	qepghaghtengulutenllu	liisimakistengulutenllu.	Apeghnaketen	tamaakut	esghaaqaghten	aghneghmi	whani,	tamaakutlu	kelgusaghqanka	kinguvaqun	aliighvikegkumken.
B05_26_Acts_V17	Yuguliiqnaaghamkenllu	elpek	katam	yugpeneng,	Gentile-enengllu.	Ellngitnun	kayaggnaqngwaamken
B05_26_Acts_V18	esghaghtestesqelluki,	tunulluki	mamlegmeng	qiivesqelluki	nighughmun,	tunulluki	Tughneghaam	aghtughyaghqaanghillghaneng	qiivesqelluki	Kiyaghneghem	aghtughyaghqaanghillghanun.	Taagken	Kiyaghneghem	seghevulleqii	seghleghqellghitneng,	ilalleqiillu	tamaavek	aaftekaminun	ugpeqillghitgun	whangamneng.’
B05_26_Acts_V19	“Umiilegmi	Agrippa-mi,	qaatkegkaqaqa	taana	esghaghwaalqa	qilagmeng.
B05_26_Acts_V20	Sivuklunga	ungipaqiinga	Damascus-mi	taagken	Jerusalem-emi,	tamanganillu	Judea-mi.	Ungipaqiinga	Jews-enunllu	Gentile-enunllu	avuteghqelluki	seghleghqennanighluki	qiivesqelluki	Kiyaghneghmun,	pinitunllu	pisqanka	ipapighqutkesqelluku	avuteghqelluteng	seghleghqennaniimatangi.
B05_26_Acts_V21	Tawaten	ungipaqilqa	apalluqluku	Temple-mi	Jews-et	tugulunga	tuqunnaqutkegkaqaatnga.
B05_26_Acts_V22	Iwernga	Kiyaghneghem	kayusiitaqaanga	whavemun	kenlanga,	enkaam	sivugpesigun	nekevlunga	aapghaqa	Christ-a	pingwaaghllagnunllu	ukavantalghiinunllu.	Aapqaqa	taananguuq	ataasiq	uuknaliqistetlu	Moses-emllu	uuknaliqutkegkaat.
B05_26_Acts_V23	Pikaagut	Christ-a	ikfiqepestaaghlleqniluku	enkaam	sivuliiluni	unguvaghyaghqaaniluku	tuqulleghmeng.	Apeghyaghqaanilukullu	nighuga	yugulillghem	yugnunllu	Gentile-enunllu.”
B05_26_Acts_V24	Paul	mesighaamaluku	Festus-em	akilghuughllakaa,	“Paul,	nallungughtuten!	Liitelleghllagpek	nallungughtestaaten!”
B05_26_Acts_V25	Iwernga	Paul-em	pikaa,	“Governor	Festus-mi,	nallungughtellghitunga,	liisimalunga	ipameng	akuzinguunga.
B05_26_Acts_V26	Umiilgem	Agrippa-m	liisimakngwaaghaa	tamaana	enkaam	tetugpenaan	aleghqughaqa.	Liisimakaqa	nagaquqaqii	qamaglluki	tamaakut	qayughllak	aksaqluku	pikaanghitut.
B05_26_Acts_V27	Umiilegmi	Agrippa-mi,	ugpeqaqsikii	uuknaliqistet	igaqegkiit?	Liisimakamken	ugpeqaqaten!”
B05_26_Acts_V28	Umiilgem	Agrippa-m	aaptekaa	Paul,	“Sumeghpenii-i	whaa	takesqughhaan	aleghqughlunga	ugpeghtesnaqsingaa	Christ-ameng?”
B05_26_Acts_V29	Paul-em	kiimsiqaa,	“Takesqughhaaghngaan,	nalighmeng	taakluku	aleghqughyaghngaamken	yughaatkengngwaamken	Kiyaghneghmun	ugpeghesqelluten.	Ellnginaghpek	yughaatkengngunghitamken,	yughaatkengngwaamsi	qamagllusi	nagallghiini	whangamneng	aghneghmi	whani,	whangamtun	lliighesqellusi	iwerngaqun	qiipraghutngunasi!”
B05_26_Acts_V30	Taagken	Umiilek	Agrippa,	Governor	Festus,	Bernice,	tamaakutlu	ilangi	nekevuutkat.
B05_26_Acts_V31	Aanluteng	ellmeggneng	aleghquutkat,	“Uumun	yugmun	sameng	apalliitukut	tuqutusighqameng	nalighmeng	anusimingllaasighqameng.”
B05_26_Acts_V32	Agrippa-m	pikaa	Festus,	“Aanesnayaghaghput	Umiilegpigaghmun	nanqigtesqelluni	pikaanghisaqan.”
B05_27_Acts_V1	Festus-em	Italy-tesqesugyinkut	angyaghpagkun,	aglaatestekii	Paul-llu	ilangillu	anusimingllaghat	umiilwaaghmun	Julius-mun.	Julius-enkut	pilluwaghtekullghiit	aatqelghiit,	“Umiilegpigaam	Pilluwaghtengi.”
B05_27_Acts_V2	Taawa	angyaghpak	Adramyttium-emeng	pi,	aghulaqsaqleggiinaaghtekaq	nenun	Asia-m	esnenganilngughnun.	Tawavek	uuglluta	aghulaqukut.	Aristarchus-em	maligtiinkut	Thessalonica-ghmiim.	(Thessalonica	Macedonia-melnguq).
B05_27_Acts_V3	Unaamingani	kaatukut	Sidon-mun.	Julius-em	pinitungwaaq	pikaa	Paul,	laalightestaqluku	ilakumtaaghanun	Sidon-mi,	sameng	aklukegkaaneng	tuunaqluku	pisqelluku.
B05_27_Acts_V4	Sidon-meng	aghulaqukut	anuqa	aygumun	enkaam	igleghtukut	uqiinellghakun	qiighqam	Cyprus-em.
B05_27_Acts_V5	Igleghaakut	esnengakun	Cilicia-mllu	Pamphylia-mllu,	taagken	nagneghtukut	Myra-mun	Lycia-melngughmun.
B05_27_Acts_V6	Tamaanteftuq	angyaghpak	Alexandria-meng	pi,	enkaam	Umiilwaaghem	Julius-em	liigikluku	Italy-nnaqutanga	uugtestiinkut.
B05_27_Acts_V7	Nunmaasqughhaq	igleghtukut	qafsinegyagllak	aghneq,	iwernga	piyaqliighngaamta	kaatukut	Cnidus-mun.	Anuqliitem	igleghapagningiitesinkut	taagavek,	igleghtukut	uqiinellghakun	qiighqam	Crete-em,	naghughlluku	Salmone.
B05_27_Acts_V8	Esnengiighhaakun	igleghtukut	piyaqliighngaamta,	kaatukut	kangighamun	aatqelghiimun,	Uqitaghvik	Kangighaq,	taana	qantaghanlenguq	Lasea-meng.
B05_27_Acts_V9	Tamaanteghllagtukut	qenwat	yakughnaghtaa	taakluku	igleghamun,	siingenllu	Aghneq	naghughlleghhii	priest-et	aghqerraaghvigat	seghleghqellghitnun	Jews-et.	Enkaam	Paul-em	kelengasaaghii	angyaghpagem	umiilwaaghi.
B05_27_Acts_V10	Pikii,	“Ukughsi	yugni,	sumemni	whaa	elngaatall	yakughniighnaqukut	igleghallemnni.	Iflaaqelteggullu	angyaghpagput	usituumaan,	entaqun	talwa	tuqulaghaallequkut.”
B05_27_Acts_V11	Iwernga	Umiilwaaghem	Julius-em	nagatkaqegkek	angyaghpagemllu	umiilga,	angyaghpaleklu	yuuk	avelghaghluku	Paul.
B05_27_Acts_V12	Allullutengllu	angyaghpagem	yugi	igleghsukat	qayughllak	taana	kangighaq	yakughnalghii	angyaghpagmun	uksughfiguluni.	Kaannaqnaluteng	Phoenix-mun	pikat	uksughsaghqaaluteng	tamaani.	Phoenix-em	kangighaa	qiighqamelnguq	Crete-mi,	northwest-munllu	southwest-munllu	ayuqelghii.
B05_27_Acts_V13	Ikegkemeng	anuqataghaaghsan	angyaghpagem	yugi	pikat,	“Taanata	anuqa	utaqakaghput.”	Enkaam	uyghiita	sayugluku	telanangaakut	Crete-em	esnengiighhaakun.
B05_27_Acts_V14	Iwernga	anuqlighllagtuq	nakaghyameng	enkaam	qiighqameng	atghaghteghllagaa.
B05_27_Acts_V15	Angyaghpak	awatmun	tengsagu	quutmun	taglaghnaqutkesaghluta	iilqayugtukut	enkaam	upuupeng	tengtestukut.
B05_27_Acts_V16	Qiighqasqughhaam	Cauda-m	uughqanganun	lliighusinkut	uqiteghraagtukut.	Tawani	qamuqsaqefut	angyaghhaghput	piyaqliighutkeghngaamteggu	qaakaghput.
B05_27_Acts_V17	Taagken	angyaghpak	ayugighsaghaat	asighlluku	tapghaghmeng.	Alingluteng	qenaaghllughquunnayukameng	Syrtis-mi	telanangat	ifkaghqughluki	tengtestukut.
B05_27_Acts_V18	Unaamingani	paninang	esla	almesiqeghllagyagu,	angyaghpagem	usingan	ilangi	meghmun	ateghqughiit.
B05_27_Acts_V19	Awakaghaani	esla	almesiqsagu	angyaghpagem	sanqutngi	ateghqughiit.
B05_27_Acts_V20	Qafsinegllak	aghneq	siqinngunani,	ighaleqetaangunani	piiq	eslam	seghleghllagem	angtalanganeng.	Enkaam	talwa	iilqayugtukut,	isigimaqun	tuqulaghaannaqelghiikut.
B05_27_Acts_V21	Yuget	neghegpenateng	muluughllagyata	Paul-em	nekevluni	pikii,	“Ukughsi	yugni,	nagatkaqsaqufsinga	kennayanghilnguukut	Crete-meng	enkaam	aghsaan	seghleliighnayanghitusi,	saghyangiinnayanghitusi.
B05_27_Acts_V22	Iwernga	iilqayugpenasi,	nalighhiinaghsi	tuqunaanghituq	iwerngaqun	angyaghpagiillequkut.
B05_27_Acts_V23	Unuk	Kiyaghneghem	yaqulgan	takukaqaanga.	Taanata	Kiyaghneq	manigughaqegkegka,	ellngan	pikaanga.
B05_27_Acts_V24	Yaqulgem	piinga,	‘Paul,	alingegpenang,	kaallequten	Rome-emun,	nekevellequten	sivungakun	Umiilegpigaam.	Yughaatkegkaqutegpeneng	angyaghpagmetelguteten	qamaglluki	Kiyaghneghem	yugulilleqii.’
B05_27_Acts_V25	Enkaam	quyatek,	ugpeqiinga	Kiyaghneghqun	tawatetngwaaghesqelluku	ungipaatellemtun.
B05_27_Acts_V26	Iwerngaqun	angyaghpagiillequkut	qiighqami.”
B05_27_Acts_V27	Qula	estamat	siipneqluku	unuk	Kelliimi	Adriatic-mi	tengtiinkut.	Taakwani	unugem	qukaani	yulaaghet	piiqut	quutmun	tughwaaghsugninniluta.
B05_27_Acts_V28	Tapghaq	uqigkutighluku	meghmun	ateghsaqmegteggu	yuginaq	yaagneq	uusqaghtutkaftuq.	Tazingapighqaaghyamta	tapghaq	ateghllaataghyaqmegteggu	akimigaq	yaagneq	uusqaghtutkaliimalghii.
B05_27_Acts_V29	Yulaaghet	alingegkat	angyaghpak	qalmesinnayukan	enkaam	estamaneng	uyghighaat	kingungakun.	Taagken	yughaghtut	aghhragkiighesqelluku.
B05_27_Acts_V30	Angyaghpagem	yulaaghi	anagnaqegkat	sivuyaga	angyaghpagem	uyghiitelighnaqesighwaaghutkelluku,	angyaghhaq	meghmun	ateghtekaat.
B05_27_Acts_V31	Iwernga	Paul-em	pikii	umiilwaaqlu	pilluwaghtetlu,	“Ukut	yuget	aghulaqegkata	kayutepagiillequkut	enkaam	elpesi	tuqulaghaallequsi.”
B05_27_Acts_V32	Enkaam	pilluwaghtet	angyaghhaq	keputkaat.
B05_27_Acts_V33	Aghtaghaghnaqaqaallu	Paul-em	qamaglluki	neghesqughwaaqii,	pikii,	“Qula	estamat	siipneqluku	aghneq	neghelqunghitusi	qayughllak	elngaatall	kelengaruulghiisi.
B05_27_Acts_V34	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	neghesqughwaaghnaqamsi	iknaqughtesqellusi.	Nalighhiinaghsi	tuqunaanghituq	talwa	aqnighhnaanghituq.”
B05_27_Acts_V35	Nepiighyami	neqekrangllameng	tugulluni	igamsiqayugvikluku	Kiyaghneq	manungitni	ikulluni	neghegkaq.
B05_27_Acts_V36	Yuget	ilutughsaghyisteng	ellngitlu	qamaglluteng	neghuutkat.
B05_27_Acts_V37	Qerngaghllagemta	angyaghpagmelngughni	276-nguukut.
B05_27_Acts_V38	Qamaglluteng	neghuunneghmeng	apeghiighyameng	angyaghpak	uqengellinaluku	wheat-a	meghmun	ateghqughaat.
B05_27_Acts_V39	Aghsagu	quutmeng	esghaatut,	taawanginaq	liisuqenghitaat	natungutanga.	Iwernga	kangighalguftuq	esnalegmeng	enkaam	taaggun	tamlagnaqsugtut.
B05_27_Acts_V40	Kepuulluki	uyghiitet	unitkiit	meghmelluki,	petugutiiklu	aquutak	naghighquqiit.	Taagken	sayugluki	telaanangat	sivuyagmelnguut	tengtestut	tespikavek	esnamun.
B05_27_Acts_V41	Iwernga	angyaghpagem	sivuyaga	aghqitaghisan	kingunga	qagighllaget	kagimtaat.
B05_27_Acts_V42	Pilluwaghtet	piyaghiit	anusimingllaghat	tuququghnaluki	luuraq	quutmun	pugimluteng	navek	anagnayukata.
B05_27_Acts_V43	Iwernga	umiilwaaghem	tuqutesugumangitkaa	Paul	enkaam	iinghutkii.	Yeghlegi	qelqii	pugimaqayuggaat	quutmun	tagliisqelluki.
B05_27_Acts_V44	Tamaakut	pugimellgilnguut	angyaghpagem	ikellghaakun	tuguluki	taglaghnaqesqegkii	quutmun.	Tawaten	qamaglluta	yaywaaseng	uuglleghaatukut	quutmun.
B05_28_Acts_V1	Yaywaaseng	quutmun	uugsamta	liigikaghput	qiighqaq	Malta-ngutanga.
B05_28_Acts_V2	Tamaakumiit	elngaatall	upughatiinkut	kumaqisimaamta	qayughllak	aqlaghaghtekanga	eslallugughsimaghmi.
B05_28_Acts_V3	Paul	saqumigluni	quugkameng	qiighimaluku,	tuqunalghii	nemeghyaq	maatneghem	aanesluku	quugneng,	iiggakun	amqeghtekaa.
B05_28_Acts_V4	Tamaakumiit	esghaghluku	nemeghyaq	Paul-em	iigganeng	qughaghngalghii	ilateng	pikiit,	“Ipapestaaq	una	yuuk	yugtaghtenguuq.	Qaywa	un'gani	meghmi	tuqunghiteghngaaghmi	esghaghhu	tuquyaghqaamalghii.”
B05_28_Acts_V5	Paul-em	iiggeni	ufsugusaqminiki	nemeghyaq	ifkaghtuq	kenghegnun	iwernga	talwa	nemeghyam	aqnighsimangilkanga.
B05_28_Acts_V6	Yuget	pikaqsaqangat	Paul	puuveghllagnaqniluku	nalighmeng	tuqunaqniluku.	Iwernga	sagpenani	muluughllagyan,	sumeghtaghaatkegkaat,	“Una	naliqaat	kiyaghneghet.”
B05_28_Acts_V7	Taam	qiighqam	umiilga	Publius,	nunalguftuq	ughugsighvimta	tungangani.	Publius-em	elngaatall	upughatiinkut,	ellnganitukut	pingayut	aghneghet.
B05_28_Acts_V8	Atanga	puqleghanguftuq	aqsalliqumaghmi.	Paul-em	esghaghyaghtughluku	yughaatkelluku,	saafsaqminigu	naallghutuq.
B05_28_Acts_V9	Paul	tawaten	piyan	qamaglluteng	ilangi	qinuyuget	tagilaghaatkat	enkaam	naallghutkat.
B05_28_Acts_V10	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	tunqughtaagiinkut	tunusameng.	Tamaani	pingayut	tanqit	atughluki	aghulaqsaghqaaghsamta	tunqughtaalaataghiinkut	tumangani	atughqamnneng.	Angyaghpak	Alexandria-meng	pi	uksughsimalghii	tamaani	qiighqami.	Aatqeftaa	“Malghik	kiyaghneghek”	sivuyaganiteftuklu	ulimaaghulutek	taakuk.	Aghulaqsaghqaaghsan	taaggun	uugtukut.
B05_28_Acts_V12	Syracuse-mun	kaalluta	tamaantukut	pingayut	aghneghet.
B05_28_Acts_V13	Taagken	qapiighwtaghtukut	Rhegium-emun	kaatellemnnun	kenlanga.	Aghneq	ataasiq	atughluku	tamaani,	unaamingani	anuqataghaaghutiinkut	ikevaghmeng	enkaam	awakaghaani	Puteoli-mun	kaatukut.
B05_28_Acts_V14	Tamaanteftut	ugpeqat,	ellmeggnitesqiinkut	maaghraghvinlek	aghneq.	Taagken	Rome-emun	nagneghtukut.
B05_28_Acts_V15	Ugpeqat	Rome-emelnguut	nagaqughluta,	paayghumakanginkut	tungangitnun	Akilpegaghviget	Appius-melnguut,	ilangita	paayghumakanginkut	tungangitnun	Pingayut	Aqelqalghutat.	Paul-em	esghaghluki	ugpeqat	ilutughtekaq	enkaam	iyamsiqayugvikegkaa	Kiyaghneq.
B05_28_Acts_V16	Rome-emun	kaasamta	Paul	ellnginaghmetestaat	nani	piyukelghani	iwerngaqun	ataasim	pilluwaghtem	kelengakaa.
B05_28_Acts_V17	Pingayut	aghneghet	atughluki	Paul-em	tagsiqlighii	Jews-et	igleghutistengit.	Tagiyata	pii,	“Jew-lgutemni,	sanghiteghngaamki	yuput,	nalighmeng	kipullginaanghiteghngaamki	nangaghneghit	sivunemta,	paninang	igleghutistemta	Jerusalem-emelnguut	tugulunga	tuunaatnga	Rome-eghmiinun.
B05_28_Acts_V18	Aapqughaaghlunga	sameng	apalliisama	tuqutusighqameng	itemunnalunga	piyaghaatnga.
B05_28_Acts_V19	Iwernga	Jews-et	ighlekaatnga	enkaam	tamaaken	apalluqluku	piiqa	nanqigtista	Umiilegpigaghmun	nanqigtesugnilunga.	Umiilegpigaghmun	seghlequughyaghtuunghitanka	yulgutenka.
B05_28_Acts_V20	Enkaam	tagsiqlighamsi	apeghnaluki	tamaakut	elpesinun.	Liitesugaqallu	elpesinun	taana	ataasiq	Israel-eghmiit	neghyukegkaat	apalluqluku	qiipraghusighngaanga.”
B05_28_Acts_V21	Kiimsiqaat,	“Judea-ghmiit	latatkigataaten	whangkunnun.	Talwa	nalighhiiniita	ugpeqaalgutemta	taagegken	tagiluteng	ungipaqigataaten,	nalighmeng	seghletun	akuzitkigataaten.
B05_28_Acts_V22	Whangkuta	liisugaghput	elpenun	sameng	sumeghtaghaatkaqutangi	tamaakut	ugpeqilghiit	Jesus-meng,	qayughllak	liisimakaghput	nani	alngunak	seghlequughaqiit.”
B05_28_Acts_V23	Taagken	nakmikegkaat	aghneq	ataasiq	qerngughutfiguluku.	Taana	aghneq	kaasan	uglapiglluteng	tagilaghaatkat	Paul-em	kiyaghfiganun.	Unaaghhaaneng	unullghanun	kenlanga	apeghtuqii	Ataneghpagullghaneng	Kiyaghneghem,	liigikestengngwaaghnaqutkegkiillu	Jesus-meng	atuqluki	Liilightuusii	Moses-em,	uuknaliqistetlu	igaqegkiit.
B05_28_Acts_V24	Ilangita	ugpeqegkaat	iwernga	ilangita	ugpequmangilkangat.
B05_28_Acts_V25	Enkaam	aaghtiiraaghutkat.	Nekevuutaqutlu	aanleghaannaluteng	Paul-em	pikii,	“Agleghnalghiik	Taghneghak	ipa	pimalghiik	sivuneghpesigun	uuknaliqistekun	Isaiah-kun.
B05_28_Acts_V26	Whaten	pikaaguq,	‘Takuluki	ukut	yuget	whaten	piki,	Nagasaghngaaghpesi,	esghapagngaaghpesi	liigiknaanghitusi.
B05_28_Acts_V27	Taakut	yuget	tawatetut	qayughllak	umyugiit	pineghlluugtekaagut	enkaam	sigutetengllu	iyetengllu	saapegkaqiit.	Tawatenneghisaqumeng	esghaannayaghtut,	nagaquunnayaghtut,	liigiknayaghtut,	qiivnayaghtutlu	whangamnun	naallghutesqelluteng.’”
B05_28_Acts_V28	Paul-em	taaqniitkun	pikii,	“Elpesinun	liigikesugaqa,	Kiyaghneghem	kayagtengngwaaqaqii	ungipaghteni	ungipiisqelluki	yugulilleghmeng	Gentile-enun.	Ellngit	nagatepestaaghyaghqaagut.”
B05_28_Acts_V29	Tawaten	Paul	piyan	Jews-et	aaghtiiraaghuteghllagumaghmeng	aanleghaatkat.
B05_28_Acts_V30	Maalghuk	ayumiqullghek	Paul-em	kiyaghfikegkaa	mangteghaq	llivikaqluku.	Upughataqegkangi	qamaglluki	iteghteni,
B05_28_Acts_V31	tetugpenanillu	ungipaqaq	Ataneghpagullghaneng	Kiyaghneghem.	Apeghtuutkegkaallu	Ataneq	Jesus	Christ-a.	Tawaten	pillgha	kitum	alngunak	aghuliighsimangilkanga.
B06_01_Romans_V1	Ukut	latat	Paul-meng	pinguut;	qepghaghtekaanga	Jesus	Christ-am.	Kiyaghneghem	tuqluqaqaanga	apostle-ngulunga,	nakmikegkaqaangallu	ungipaqesqelluki	Pinilghiit	Ungipani.
B06_01_Romans_V2	Ayumiq	Kiyaghneghem	akequsaqegkaqii	taakut	Pinilghiit	Ungipat	uuknaliqistemikun.	Uuknaliqutkegkaqiit	agleghnalghiitgun	Akuzitetgun	Igaqegkatgun.
B06_01_Romans_V3	Taakut	Pinilghiit	Ungipat	Kiyaghneghem	Ighneghaneng	ayuqut.	Yuguluni	allgeqaaguq	Umiilgem	David-em	kingunghitgun.
B06_01_Romans_V4	Agleghnalghiim	Taghnegham	liigikestiinkut	Ataneghput	Jesus	Christ-a,	Kiyaghneghem	aghtughyaghqaanghilnguuguq	Ighnegha.	Taghnegham	ipapighqegkaqaa	unguvaghtesluku	Jesus	tuqulleghmeng.
B06_01_Romans_V5	Ellngakun	nangllekellengumaanga	apostle-ngulunga.	Tawaten	Kiyaghneghem	pikaqaanga	tuqliisqelluki	nunataghhaan	yugi	ugpeqesqellukullu,	qaatkesqellukullu	Christ-a.	Enkaam	Christ-am	aatgha	quulvallengellequq.
B06_01_Romans_V6	Elpesillu	Rome-emelngughni,	Kiyaghneghem	tuqluqaqiisi	Jesus	Christ-amun	pikesqellusi.
B06_01_Romans_V7	Qamagllusi	elpesi	Rome-emelngughni	Kiyaghneghem	piniqegkiitni,	tuqluqiitnillu	yuknalusi:	Kiyaghneghem	Atamta,	Atanghemllu	Jesus	Christ-am	kayusiillisi,	nekeggmellelisillillu.
B06_01_Romans_V8	Sivukluku	tamaghhaghpesinun	iyamsiqayugvikaqa	Kiyaghneqa	Jesus	Christ-akun,	qayughllak	ungipaa	ugpeqilleghpesi	mingitnguuq	yulghutnun	tamaghhaani.
B06_01_Romans_V9	Pinaqelqa	qamaglluku	qepghaataqaqa	Kiyaghneq,	ungipaqnaluki	Pinilghiit	Ungipat	Ighneghaneng	ayuqelghiit.	Kiyaghneq	liisimakistekaqa	quunpeng	yughaatkengngukemsi.
B06_01_Romans_V10	Yughaghaqungallu	Kiyaghneghmun	piyukelqegkagu	qenwatlu	elpesinun	piyaghqaalunga.
