B06_01_Romans_V11	Esghaghyupigtaqamsi	quyastellelinnalusi	Kiyaghneghem	Taghneghagkeneng	iknaqsuugtesqellusi.
B06_01_Romans_V12	Whaten	pingwaamsi:	qerngaamta	kayemutunnaluta,	elpesi	ugpeqillemkun,	whanga	ugpeqilleghpesigun.
B06_01_Romans_V13	Ugpeqaalgutemni,	liisimakesugamsi	awen	laalighfiksugaqamsi	iwernga	saam	quunpeng	pinghitestaqaanga.	Enkaam	maaten	kayusiisuganka	Rome-eghmiit	ugpeghesqelluki	Christ-akun,	ilangitnun	Gentile-enun	pillemtun.
B06_01_Romans_V14	Kiyaghneghem	nakmikegkaqaanga	ungipaqesqelluki	Pinilghiit	Ungipat.	Enkaam	ungipaqsaghqaqanka	tamaghhaanun,	Greek-enunllu	Greek-ngunghilngughnunllu,	peghqineghnunllu	nalluuqanunllu.
B06_01_Romans_V15	Enkaam	whaa	ungipaqiyugllaguunga	Pinilghiineng	Ungipaneng	elpesinunllu	kiyaghlleghhiini	Rome-emi.
B06_01_Romans_V16	Kayngukigatanka	Pinilghiit	Ungipat:	Kiyaghneghem	aghtughyaghqaanghilqii	yugulilleghmun	tamaghhaanun	ugpeqilghiinun.	Sivukluteng	ungipaqegkaagut	Jews-enun	taagken	Gentile-enun.
B06_01_Romans_V17	Taakut	Pinilghiit	Ungipat	liigikestiinkut	naten	Kiyaghneghem	nallghusaghaqutangi	yuget	elqughutngalleghminun.	Ugpeqillghiniitgun	Kiyaghneq	tawaten	piiquq.	Katam	Akuzitni	Igaqegkani	igaqngaaq,	“Nallghughqegkaq	Kiyaghneghem	elqughutngallghanun	kiyaghllequq	neghyukluku	ellnga.”
B06_01_Romans_V18	Qilagmeng	Kiyaghneghem	yuget	liigikestii	sakritutnguniluki,	aghyuughlleqnilukillu	seghleghqellghitnun,	seghletunllu	pillghitnun.	Seghletun	pillghita	liigiknanightestiit	Kiyaghneghem	ipapillghaneng.
B06_01_Romans_V19	Sangwaa	yuget	liisimakegkaat	Kiyaghneghmeng	ayuqelghii	whateghlluwaaghuuq	ellngitnun	qayughllak	Kiyaghneghem	whateghlluwaaghughtaa	ellngitnun.
B06_01_Romans_V20	Kiyaghneghem	ulimatanganeng	nuna,	yuget	liigikngwaaghaqaat	aghtughyaghqaanghillgha	aghuliighigalnguq,	ipallu	Kiyaghneghutanga.	Qaywa	yuget	esghaghpagningiteghngaaghmegtekek	taakuk,	paninang	liisimakagket	Kiyaghneghem	ulimaaghakun.	Enkaam	yuget	apalliitut	whaten	pilleghqameng,	Nallukaghput	Kiyaghnelgutanga.
B06_01_Romans_V21	Liisimakeghngaaghmegteggu	Kiyaghneq,	quulviigataat	Kiyaghneghuluku,	iyamsiqayugvikigataatlu.	Yeghlegi	sumeghtaghallghit	Kiyaghneghmeng	satngunaniqaagut,	umyugiitlu	liigiknaniqaagut.
B06_01_Romans_V22	Peghqinghuniiqut	iwernga	nalluughtaqut.
B06_01_Romans_V23	Enkaam	manigughpenaan	Kiyaghneq	tuquyaghqaghhaanghilnguq,	yeghlegi	manigughaqiit	kiyaghnengllaqateng	yugsugnilnguut,	qawaagsugnilnguut,	teghikusaghsugnilnguut,	nalighmeng	nemeghyaghsugnilnguut.
B06_01_Romans_V24	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	Kiyaghneghem	pegtii	atuqesqelluki	nukeggnalghiit	sex-kun	seghleghqellghet	piyukeghllakiit.	Enkaam	atuqaqiit	yugusiteng	anagngaluki,	seghleghqaqluteng	sex-kun	ilameggnun,
B06_01_Romans_V25	qayughllak	ipapilleq	Kiyaghneghmeng	ayuqelghii	naavghusimaat	iqlengamun.	Enkaangam	manigughaqiitlu,	qepghaataqiitlu	Kiyaghneghem	ulimaaghi,	avelghaghluku	Ulimaghista	ellnga	katam.	Ellnganguuq	usuqsaghqaq	quunperugllak	kenlengunaan!	Amen.
B06_01_Romans_V26	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	Kiyaghneghem	pegtii	atuqesqelluki	seghleghqellghet	piyukeghllakiit.	Aghnat	sex-eyugnanighiit	yuget,	yeghlegi	sex-eyagutut	aghnaalgutmeggneng.
B06_01_Romans_V27	Tawateghpigaq	yugetlu	sex-eyugnanighiit	aghnat,	yeghlegi	sex-eyaguteghllagtut	yulgutmeggneng.	Tawaten	pikaatangitneng	Kiyaghneghem	aghyuughii	yugusiitgun	apalluqluki	anaggutelleghllagit.
B06_01_Romans_V28	Tamaakut	yuget	sumeghmeggni	satngunghinniiqaat	liisimakipiilleq	Kiyaghneghmeng	ayuqelghii.	Enkaam	Kiyaghneghem	pegtii	satngunghilngughnun	sumeghtaghallghitnun,	atughqaqenghisaqangitnunllu.
B06_01_Romans_V29	Allaaghhinaghmeng	seghleghmeng	pimanginaghaqut,	seghleghqaqut,	pakigneghuut,	ugumiketaghtutlu.	Aqinaketaghtut,	yugtaghyuneghtuut,	pilluwaghyuneghtuut,	puughtiyuneghtuut,	sumeghtaghaatkaqiitlu	ilateng	seghlepiguluki.	Yiillgiiqut,
B06_01_Romans_V30	seghletun	akuzitkaqiit	ilateng.	Ugumikaat	Kiyaghneq,	yukeghqenghuut,	qukaayugneghuutlu.	Sumeghtaghaghaqut	wata	seghletun	pinaluteng;	qaatkusigatut	angayuqameggnun,
B06_01_Romans_V31	nalluut,	akequsateng	atuqigatiit,	nangllegyugigatut,	nafughtiitaqutlu	ilameggnun.
B06_01_Romans_V32	Liisimakiit	Kiyaghneghem	Liilightuusii	pilghiit	tawatelnguut	yuget	allgeghsaghqaqaan'nguq	tuqulleq.	Nagneghutnginaghpenaki	tamaakut	atuqegkateng,	talwa	itagnaqaqiit	tawaten	pilghiit.
B06_02_Romans_V1	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	nanqigtikuvek	yugneng	anagniilqavigituten.	Nanqiggneghpeki,	elpeneng	nanqigtaquten	aghyuughyaghqaaluten	qayughllak	elpeklu	ellngistun	piiqelghiiten.
B06_02_Romans_V2	Kiyaghneq	nanqigtiiquq	yugneng	seghlepestaatun	pilghiineng,	liisimakaghputlu	nanqigtillghi	elqughutngaat.
B06_02_Romans_V3	Iwernga	nanqigtaqaten	anaggullghiit,	naqamllu	elpek	katam	piiqaten	tamaakut	ataasit	anaggutellghet.	Enkaam	sumeghpenii	anagyaghqaaniluku	piziguu	Kiyaghneghem	nanqigtillgha?
B06_02_Romans_V4	Liigikenghisiguu	nangllegtaghtulanga	Kiyaghneghem?	Aghyuughaghsigalkangaten	tawaninginaq	qayughllak	nuqetutaqegkangaten.	Sumeghpenii-i	taakut	satngunghitaat?	Liisimakenghisiguu	Kiyaghneghem	nangllekaqegkangaten	qayughllak	avuteghqesqesukangaten?
B06_02_Romans_V5	Iwernga	elpek	aleghquneghlluguuten,	pineghlluguuten;	tamaaken	apalluqluku	avuteghqesugigatuten.	Enkaangaam	elpek	katam	ulimangwaan	aghyuullengelleghqan	seghleghataghaaluku	Nanqigtillghem	Aghneghani.	Tawani	Aghneghmi	Kiyaghneghem	aliighlleqaak	sakraallenillu,	elqughutngalghiillu	nanqigtilleni.
B06_02_Romans_V6	Nanqiglleqii	tamaghhiita	yuget	apeghiighutellghistun.
B06_02_Romans_V7	Ilangi	yuget	pinitun	pimanginaghaqut	qayughllak	Kiyaghneghmeng	allgeghsukangit	usuqelleq,	quulvalleq,	yugusiqlu	tuquyaghqaanghilnguq.	Enkaam	Kiyaghneghem	kenlengilngughmeng	unguvallelilleqii.
B06_02_Romans_V8	Iwernga	ilangi	yuget	ellnginaayugneghuut.	Ugpeqsugigataat	ipapilleq	seghlepestaatun	pinaluteng.	Enkaam	Kiyaghneghem	sakrituteghllagluki,	aghyuughllaglleqii.
B06_02_Romans_V9	Qamagtengngwaaghluni	nunamelnguq	yuuk,	Jews-a	nalighmeng	Gentile-a,	seghlepestaatun	pikaq,	Kiyaghneghem	aghyuughlleqaa	seghleliighmengllu	ikfiqelleghmengllu.
B06_02_Romans_V10	Iwernga	qamagtengngwaaghluni	yuuk,	Jews-a	nalighmeng	Gentile-a,	pinitun	pikaq,	Kiyaghneghem	usuqelleqaa,	quulvaghlleqaa,	nekeggmellelilleqaallu.
B06_02_Romans_V11	Taniillngunaki	Kiyaghneghem	nanqiglleqii	qamagtengngwaaghluki	yuget.
B06_02_Romans_V12	Gentile-et	allgeghtellghitiit	Liilightuusat	Kiyaghneghem	tuunegkii	Moses-mun.	Enkaam	seghleghqelghiit	nallukluki	Liilightuusat,	tuqukata	Kiyaghneghem	nanqiggnaanghitii	Liilightuusatgun.	Jews-et	Liilightuusalguut,	enkaam	seghleghqegkata	Kiyaghneghem	nanqiglleqii	Liilightuusatgun.
B06_02_Romans_V13	Tamaakut	nagataghesnalghiit	Liilightuusaminun,	Kiyaghneghem	nallghusiigatii	elqughutngalleghminun.	Iwernga	qaatkullghiit	Liilightuusaminun	nallghughqaqii	elqughutngalleghminun.
B06_02_Romans_V14	Gentile-et	allgeghtellghitiit	Kiyaghneghem	Liilightuusii.	Iwernga	qaatkenneghmegteki	taakut	Liilightuusat,	qaatkutellghita	Liilightuusalgestun	ayuqestiit	ilumegteggun,	allgeghtekaqenghiteghngaaghmegteki.
B06_02_Romans_V15	Qaatkutellghita	yugnun	liigikestiit	ilumegteggun	liisimakiit	Liilightuusat	qelghusiit.	Sumeghtaghallghitallu	liisimakestiit	Liilightuusat	ilungitnitulangi,	qayughllak	sumeghtaghallghita	ilangakun	anaggunniiqiit	nalighmeng	ilangakun	itagnaghniiqiit.
B06_02_Romans_V16	Nanqigtillghem	Aghneghani,	Kiyaghneghem	nanqiglleqii	yuget	aksaqegkiit	Christ	Jesus-kun.	Aapghaqaqa	taana	ungipaqnemki	Pinilghiit	Ungipat.
B06_02_Romans_V17	Maaten'ngam	latayuganka	Jews-et.	Jew-ngukuvek,	neghyukaten	Liilightuusat	Kiyaghneghem	tuunegkaqii	yugpenun.	Qukaayugtutenllu	Kiyaghneghmun	pikniluten.
B06_02_Romans_V18	Liilightuusatgun	liisimakan	sangwaa	Kiyaghneghem	sasqesullgha	elpenun,	natenllu	nakmiksaghqaatanga	sangwaa	elqughutngalghii.
B06_02_Romans_V19	Enkaam	sumeghpeni	maghyaghqughtenguniiquten	ayaakanun,	nighuguniiqutenllu	mamlegmelngughnun.
B06_02_Romans_V20	Sumeghpeni	nallghusaghtenguniiquten	nalluuqanun,	apeghtughistenguniiqutengllu	taghnughhaghnun.	Liilightuusalgutegpeneng,	sumeghpeni	liisimakniluku	sangwaa	tamaghhaan	piiqan,	qamagllukullu	ipapilleq.
B06_02_Romans_V21	Apeghtughaqaten	ilaten,	sangan	elpeneng	apeghtiigasin?	Ungipaqiiquten,	“Teglegpenang,”	elpaa-ak,	teglekiigasiin?
B06_02_Romans_V22	Piiquten,	“Gelgaghniighpenang,”	elpaak,	gelgaghniiqiigasiin?	Ugumikepigtaten	kiyaghnengllaqat,	elpaak,	tugunniiqiigasiin	temple-ngitneng?
B06_02_Romans_V23	Qukaayugtaquten	qayughllak	Kiyaghneghem	Liilightuusani	tuunegkaqii	yugpenun.	Iwernga	qaatkenghinneghpeki	Liilightuusat	quulviigatan	Kiyaghneq.
B06_02_Romans_V24	Akuzitni	Igaqegkani	igaqngaaq,	“Apalluqlusi	elpesi	Jews-eni,	Gentile-et	sanguughtaqaat	Kiyaghneghem	aatgha.”
B06_02_Romans_V25	Qaatkengngukufki	Kiyaghneghem	Liilightuusii	circumcise-ellghen	pinightuq.	Iwernga	qaatkenghilkufki	Liilightuusat	circumcise-ellghilngughestun	ayuquten.	Enkaam	quyastellengnaanghituten	Kiyaghneghem	akequsaaneng.
B06_02_Romans_V26	Gentile-a	circumcise-ellghilnguq	qaatkullghii	qelghusiitnun	Liilightuusat,	Kiyaghneghem	tuguklighlleqaa	nikimqun	circumcise-ekaaluku.
B06_02_Romans_V27	Elpesi	Jews-eni	Liilightuusalguusi	igaqngalghiineng,	circumcise-ekaagusillu,	taawanginaq	qaatkigatasi	Liilightuusat.	Iwernga	Gentile-et	circumcise-ellghilnguut,	qaatkaqiit	Liilightuusat.	Enkaam	qaatkutellghitgun	Kiyaghneghem	nanqiglleqiisi	aghyuughyaghqaalusi.
B06_02_Romans_V28	Circumcise-enginaghluku	yugem	yugusii	Jew-pigughtesnaanghitaa.	Circumcise-ellepiik	pingigatuq	yugusim	qaaynginaakun.
B06_02_Romans_V29	Itupill,	yuuk	Jew-piiguuq	Jew-ngukumi	ilumikun.	Ighsaqghwa	circumcise-ekaaguq	Agleghnalghiignekun	Taghneghagnekun,	nakaan	igaqegkatgun	Liilightuusatgun.	Enkaam	Kiyaghneghmeng	usuqellengellequq,	nakaan	yugneng.
B06_03_Romans_V1	Sangwaa	aneghneghqusiigwa	yuuk	allgequmi	Jew-nguluni?	Sangwaa	aneghneghqusiigwa	circumcise-elleghmun?
B06_03_Romans_V2	Uglaapigtut	aneghneghqusit!	Sivulighpigaq	Kiyaghneghem	neghyukutkaqii	Jews-enun	Akuzitet	Igaqegkat.
B06_03_Romans_V3	Ilangi	ataasiighmenneghilkata	Kiyaghneghmun,	Kiyaghneq	ataasiighmenneghitesleqatguu?
B06_03_Romans_V4	Yeghlegillu!	Tamaghhaghmi	yuuk	iqlengiqestengughngaan,	Kiyaghneq	ipanguuq.	Akuzitni	Igaqegkani	Kiyaghneghmeng	ayuqelghii	igaqngaaq	whaten,	“Akuzineghpeni,	tamaghhaghmi	liisimakelleqaaten	elqughutnganiluten.	Yuget	nanqigtekangaten,	ipapighqelleqaten	anaggutnganiluki.”
B06_03_Romans_V5	Anaggunnemta,	anaggutellemta	yuget	liigikestengngwaaghaqiit	Kiyaghneq	elqughutnganiluku.	Enkaam	pilleqestaa	Kiyaghneq	anaggunniluku	aghyuuqanginkut	anaggutellemnnun?	(Akuzinguunga	yugestun.)
B06_03_Romans_V6	Tawatenneghituq!	Kiyaghneq	elqughutnganghilkan,	natenmi	Kiyaghneghem	nanqiglleqaki	nunam	yugi?
B06_03_Romans_V7	Iwernga	yuuk	pinayalghii,	“Iqlengiqelleghma	yuget	usuqistaqiit	Kiyaghneghmun	qayughllak	iqlengiqelleghma	aliightaqaa	Kiyaghneghem	ipangullgha.	Enkaam	sangan'ngam	Kiyaghneghem	nanqigtanga	aghyuughyaghqaalunga	seghleghqestetun?”
B06_03_Romans_V8	Yuuk	pinayalghiillu,	“Seghletun	pilta	sangwaa	pinilghii	apeghiighesqelluku	seghletun	pillemnneng.”	Ilangi	yuget	temngimeng	piiqut	whangkuta	apeghtughiiqniluta	tawaten.	Nanqigtellengyaghqaagut	aghyuughyaghqaaluteng,	aghyuulleghqamegestun.
B06_03_Romans_V9	Enkaam	whangkuta	Jews-enii,	pinighataghaghestaa	Gentile-eneng?	Nakaa,	yeghlegillu!	Aapghwaaqaqanka	Jews-etlu,	Gentile-etlu	tawateghpigaq	seghleghqellghem	aaghqutaqluki	ayuqii.
B06_03_Romans_V10	Akuzitni	Igaqegkani	igaqngaaq,	“Taawa	kina	alngunak	elqughutnganghituq,	talwa	ataasighhaq.
B06_03_Romans_V11	Kina	alngunak	liigikigatuq,	kitum	alngunak	iviigataa	Kiyaghneq.
B06_03_Romans_V12	Qamaglluni	yuuk	tunutkaaguq	Kiyaghneghmeng;	qamaglluteng	anaggutkaagut;	kina	alngunak	pinitun	pingigatuq,	talwa	ataasighhaq.
B06_03_Romans_V13	Ighsalqiit	qelpalngughestun	lliivghestun	ayuqut;	uluteng	atuqngwiit	puughtimun,	qezimegteggun	poison-elguut	nemeghyastun;
B06_03_Romans_V14	qaanghit	imighngaat	curse-elleghnengllu,	ugumiketiqelleghmengllu.
B06_03_Romans_V15	Yugtaghirakegtut;
B06_03_Romans_V16	navek	alngunak	pineghmeggni	naafqiistengwaaqut,	seghleliighqistengwaaqutlu.
B06_03_Romans_V17	Nallukaat	nekeggmelluni	kiyaghtelleghqaq,
B06_03_Romans_V18	talwa	alikigataat	Kiyaghneq.”
B06_03_Romans_V19	Liisimakaput	Jews-et	Liilightuusalget	qaatkesaghqaqiit	qelghusiit.	Enkaam	taakut	Liilightuusat	nepiighqelleqiit	yuget	whaten	pilleghqiitneng,	“Nallukaput	sangutangi	seghleghqellghet.”	Liilightuusatlu	liigikesleqiit	Kiyaghneghmun	nanqiglleqniluki	qamaglluki	nunam	yugi.
B06_03_Romans_V20	Nanqigtekumiki	yuget	nallghusaghnaanghitii	elqughutngalleghminun	qaatkutellghitgun	Liilightuusanun.	Itupill	Liilightuusat	liitestii	yuget	seghleghqestenguniluki.
B06_03_Romans_V21	Iwernga	Kiyaghneghem	yuget	liigikestii	nallghusaghlleqniluki	elqughutngalleghminun,	nakaan	qaatkutellghitgun	Liilightuusanun.	Kiyaghneghem	aapqaqaa	taana	Liilightuusatgunllu,	uuknaliqistetgunllu.
B06_03_Romans_V22	Kiyaghneghem	yuget	nallghusaqaqii	elqughutngalleghminun	ugpeqillghitgun	Jesus	Christ-akun.	Taana	ipanguuq	tamaghhaanun	ugpelghiinun	Christ-akun	qayughllak	allakunneghitut
B06_03_Romans_V23	qamaglluteng	seghleghqegkaatmeggneng.	Enkaam	nuughhutkaagut	Kiyaghneghem	aangelleghllaganun.
B06_03_Romans_V24	Iwernga	Kiyaghneghem	akingilngughqun	tunusamikun	nallghusaqaqii	elqughutngalleghminun	itemutistengitgun,	Christ	Jesus-kun.
B06_03_Romans_V25	Kiyaghneghem	tuunegkaqaa	Jesus	aghqutnguluku	seghleghqelleghnun.	Enkaam	Jesus-em	aawakun	seghevutaqii	yuget	seghleghqellghit	ugpeqingalghiit	ellngakun.	Tawaten	liigikestekaqaa	elqughutnganiluni.	Sivunghani	agani	Kiyaghneghem	nuqetutkaqii	yuget	enkaam	nepiighutkaqii	seghleghqellghit.
B06_03_Romans_V26	Iwernga	uumi	pilleghmi	ipapighqaa	elqughutnganiluni	nallghusalleghmikun	alngunak	yuuk	elqughutngalleghminun	apalluqluki	ugpeqillghit	Jesus-kun.
B06_03_Romans_V27	Enkaam	sangaawa	qukaayugutkesaghqaghput?	Qukaayugutkaghqiitukut!	Qukaayuggnaanghitestaa	qayughllak	qaatkennaqutkegkeput	Liilightuusat?	Nakaa,	qayughllak	Kiyaghneghem	nallghusaqangi	yuget	elqughutngalleghminun	ugpeqillghitgun	Jesus-kun,	nakaan	qaatkutellghitgun	Liilightuusanun.
B06_03_Romans_V28	Enkaam	liigikaghput	yuuk	nallghusaqaaguq	Kiyaghneghem	elqughutngallghanun	ugpeqilleghqun,	nakaan	qaatkutelleghqun	Liilightuusanun.
B06_03_Romans_V29	Kiyaghneq	Jews-nginaghhaat	Kiyaghneqatguu?	Gentile-etlu	Kiyaghneqenghitatguu?	Aa-a,	Gentile-etlu	Kiyaghneqaat,
B06_03_Romans_V30	ataasighhaatanganeng	Kiyaghneq.	Enkaam	nallghusaghlleqii	Jews-et	elqughutngalleghminun	ugpeqillghitgun,	Gentile-etlu	ugpeqillghitgun.
B06_03_Romans_V31	Liilightuusaat	satngunanighqestekii	ugpeqillemteggun?	Nakaa!	Yeghlegillu!	Ugpeqillemta	qaatkesugtestaqii	Liilightuusat	qelghutkiit.
B06_04_Romans_V1	Sameng'ngam	pilleqesta	Abraham-emeng,	sivunemnneng	whangkuta	Jews-eni?	Sameng	liitkaawa?
B06_04_Romans_V2	Kiyaghneghem	nallghusaqaqngukagu	elqughutngalleghminun	sallghakun,	sameng	qukaayugusighqalgunayaghtuq.	Iwernga	Kiyaghneghmun	qukaayugutkepagningitii	salleni.
B06_04_Romans_V3	Akuzitni	Igaqegkani	igaqngaaq	whaten,	“Abraham-em	ugpeqegkaqaa	Kiyaghneq	enkaam	ugpeqillgha	apalluqluku	Kiyaghneghem	tugukliqaqaa	elqughutngalghiinguluku.”
B06_04_Romans_V4	Yuuk	qepghalleghmineng	akileghtuusangegkayuguuq.	Akileghtuusaa	tunusaanghituq	qayughllak	ellngan	allgeghtekaqaa	qepghaalluku.
B06_04_Romans_V5	Kiyaghneghem	nallghusaghnaanghitaa	yuuk	elqughutngalleghminun	qepghaatillghakun	ellminun.	Itupill	yugem	neghyuksaghqaqaa	Kiyaghneq	nallghusaghikayuk	seghleghqesteneng	elqughutngalleghminun	ugpeqillghitgun.
B06_04_Romans_V6	Umiilgem	David-em	igaqegkaqaa	taana	ataasiq.	Pikaaguq	yuget	quyastepikaaniluki	Kiyaghneghem	nallghusaghaqngaki	elqughutngalleghminun	avelghaghluki	qepghaatillghit	Kiyaghneghmun.
B06_04_Romans_V7	“Quyastekaagut	tamaakut	seghleghqellghit	Kiyaghneghem	seghevutkii,	anaggutellghit	saapegkii!
B06_04_Romans_V8	Quyastekaaguq	yuuk	seghleghqellghi	Atanghem	sumeghmiknaniqangi.”
B06_04_Romans_V9	Taana	quyastelleq	David-em	akuzitkegkaa,	circumcise-ekaghhiinaghnun	pingwaa?	Nakaa!	Circumcise-ellghilngughnunllu	pinguuq.	Akuzitni	Igaqegkani	igaqngaaq,	“Abraham-em	ugpeqegkaqaa	Kiyaghneq,	enkaam	ugpeqillgha	apalluqluku	Kiyaghneghem	tugukliqaqaa	elqughutngaluku.”
B06_04_Romans_V10	Qavngaq	Kiyaghneghem	tugukliqaqagu?	Sivungani	circumcise-ellghaan	nalighmeng	kingunganeng?	Sivungani	circumcise-ellghan,	nakaan	kingunganeng.
B06_04_Romans_V11	Tagtalmi	taakwani	Abraham	circumcise-ekaaguq.	Circumcise-ellgha	nalluniilkutaaguq	ipapighqusiiluni	Kiyaghneghem	nallghusaqaqegkanga	elqughutngalleghminun	ugpeqillghakun.	Salin	circumcise-ellghilluku	Kiyaghneghem	tugukliqaqaa	elqughutngaluku.	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	Abraham	atanguuq	tamaghhaanun	ugpeqilghiinun	circumcise-ellghiteghngaata,	enkaam	Kiyaghneghem	tugukliimii	elqughutngaluki.
B06_04_Romans_V12	Abraham-llu	atakaat	circumcise-ekat.	Taana	ipanguuq	taawanginaghhaq	ugpeqillelgukuyeng	Abraham-etun,	salin	circumcise-ellghilluku.
B06_04_Romans_V13	Kiyaghneghem	akeqegkaqii	Abraham-enkut	kingunqullghiit	iingunaghhaan	nuna	ellngitnun	pagilleqniluku.	Akequsaqellghitaa	taana	Abraham-emun	qayughllak	qaatkegkangi	Liilightuusat.	Itupill	Kiyaghneghem	akeqegkaqaa	qayughllak	ugpeqegkanga	enkaam	Kiyaghneghem	tugukliqaqaa	elqughutngaluku.
B06_04_Romans_V14	Kiyaghneghem	akequsaa	tuunyaghqaayaqan	qaatkullghiinun	Liilightuusanun,	taawa	ugpeqilleq	satngunghituq.	Kiyaghneghemllu	akequsaa	satngunghituq.
B06_04_Romans_V15	Kiyaghneq	sakritaquq	yuget	qaatkunneghinneghata	Liilightuusanun	tuunegkaanun	Moses-mun.	Iwernga	Liilightuusiisaqan	taawa	yuget	qaatkunneghitusiinnayaghtut.
B06_04_Romans_V16	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	ugpeqilleghmegteggun	yuget	allgeghtaat	Kiyaghneghem	akequsaa	akingilnguuluku	tunusaq.	Enkaam	qamaglluteng	Abraham-em	kingunghita	allgeghtepestaaghlleqaat	Kiyaghneghem	akequsaa.	Taana	akequsaq	Jews-nginaghhaghnun	ayuqenghituq	Liilightuusalegnun.	Iwernga	ugpeqilghiinunllu	ayuquq	Abraham-em	ugpeqillghatun.	Enkaam	Abraham	qamaglluta	atakaghput	ugpeqilghiini.
B06_04_Romans_V17	Akuzitni	Igaqegkani	igaqngaaq,	“Atangughtestamken	uglapiglleghhiinun	nunat	yugitnun.”	Kiyaghneghem	tawaten	akeqegkaqaa	Abraham	qayughllak	ugpeqegkanga	Kiyaghneq.	Kiyaghneghuuq	tuqukaneng	unguvaghtikayuk,	qelghilleghmikunllu	ulimatkayuk	sameng	sangilngughmeng.
B06_04_Romans_V18	Abraham-em	avaqutilleghqaa	sighimaniitkaaguq.	Iwernga	ugpeqegkaqaa	Kiyaghneq,	sighimakumanginaqaqaallu.	Enkaam	atangughtekaaguq	uglaapiglleghhiinun	nunat	yugitnun.	Whaten	Kiyaghneghem	pikaqaa,	“Kinguneghten	kestepagningisaghqaagut.”
B06_04_Romans_V19	Abraham-em	nulighha,	Sarah,	qumingepagningitkaalghii.	Ellnga	Abraham	100	ayumiqulleghtutkalighyaghtughluni,	tuqumun	tughaaghulghii.	Iwernga	tamaakut	suumqeghngaaghmiki,	ugpeqillgha	Kiyaghneghmun	ukavaamangilnguq.
B06_04_Romans_V20	Ugpeqinaniimangituq	talwa	aygughikumangitaa	Kiyaghneghem	akequsaa.	Iwernga	ugpeqiighataghaqaq,	usuqegkaallu	Kiyaghneq.
B06_04_Romans_V21	Abraham-em	ipapighqutkengngwaaqaqaa	Kiyaghneghmun	piyaghqaqniluku	akequsaqegkani.
B06_04_Romans_V22	Akuzitni	Igaqegkani	igaqngaaq,	“Kiyaghneghem	tuguqliqaqaa	elqughutngaluku,”	apalluqluku	ugpeqillgha.
B06_04_Romans_V23	Taakut	akuzitet,	“Kiyaghneghem	tuguqliqaqaa	elqughutngaluku,”	igaqegkaagut	nakaan	Abraham-nginaghmun,
B06_04_Romans_V24	iwernga	igaqegkaagut	whangkunnunllu.	Kiyaghneghem	tuguklighlleqiinkut	elqughutngaluta	qayughllak	ugpeqegkefut	ellnga.	Ellnganguuq	Jesus-meng	Atanemnneng	unguvaghtestikaq.
B06_04_Romans_V25	Kiyaghneghem	tuunegkaqaa	Jesus	tuqumatkesqelluki	seghleghqelleput,	unguvaghtekaqaallu	nallghusaghnaluta	elqughutngalleghminun.
B06_05_Romans_V1	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	nallghusaqaatemnneng	Kiyaghneghem	elqughutngallghanun	ugpeqillemteggun,	nekeggmellelguukut	Kiyaghneghmi	Atanemteggun	Jesus	Christ-akun.
B06_05_Romans_V2	Apalluqluku	ugpeqilleghput	Jesus-em	kiyaghtestiinkut	Kiyaghneghem	piniqellghani.	Enkaam	quyaghllaguukut	qayughllak	liisimakngwaaghaghput	Kiyaghneghem	nengightesleqiinkut	nighughqelleghmineng.
B06_05_Romans_V3	Taam	saaghwakun	quyaaqukut	seghleliillemnni	qayughllak	liisimakaghput	seghleliillghem	nuqenneghtullengestaqiinkut.
B06_05_Romans_V4	Nuqenneghtullemteggun	Kiyaghneghem	itagnaqaqiinkut.	Itagnaqillghan	sighimallengestaqiinkut.
B06_05_Romans_V5	Taam	sighimallghem	iilqamiqnaanghitiinkut	qayughllak	Kiyaghneghem	kuuvegkaqaa	piniqelleni	qamavek	ilumnnun	Agleghnalghiignekun	Taghneghagnekun,	Kiyaghneghem	tuunegkamikun	whangkunnun.
B06_05_Romans_V6	Yugulipagningilluta	Christ-am	tuqumatkegkaqii	seghleghqestet,	tawani	pilleghqaghlluwaaghmi	Kiyaghneghem	nakmikegkaani.
B06_05_Romans_V7	Entaqun	qafsinkuuraghhiinaat	tuqumatkiyugnayaghtut	elqughutngalghiimun	yugmun.	Nalighmeng	entaqun	kina	tuqumatkiyugnayaghtuq	pinilghiimun	yugmun.
B06_05_Romans_V8	Iwernga	Kiyaghneghem	kelgutkaqaa	piniqelleni	whangkunnun,	paninang	seghleghqestenguluta	Christ-am	tuqumatkegkaqiinkut!
B06_05_Romans_V9	Nalluneqniighaghput	Kiyaghneghem	nallghusaamiinkut	elqughutngalleghminun	Christ-am	aawakun.	Nalluneqniighataghaghaghput	yugulillengellequkut	Christ-akun	Kiyaghneghem	sakraallghaneng.
B06_05_Romans_V10	Whangkuta	Kiyaghneghem	anguyaksaghiinkut,	iwernga	ilaliiqaqiinkut	tuqullghakun	Ighneghmi.	Maaten	Kiyaghneghem	ilakumtaaqiinkut,	enkaam	nalluneqniighataghaghaghput	yugulillengellequkut	Christ-am	unguvallghakun!
B06_05_Romans_V11	Taam	saaghwakun,	quyaghllaguukut	Kiyaghneghmi	Atanemteggun	Jesus	Christ-akun.	Ellnganguuq	whangkunnun	ilaliighutestilghii	Kiyaghneghmun.
B06_05_Romans_V12	Yuksuwhaaq,	Adam,	seghleghqaqngan,	seghleghqellghan	tuqulleq	iteghtestekaqaa	nunamun.	Enkaam	qamaglluni	yuuk	tuquyaghqaaguq	qayughllak	qamaglluni	seghleghqegkaaguq.
B06_05_Romans_V13	Seghleghqellelgukaaguq	nunami	salin	Kiyaghneghem	tuunellghilluki	Liilightuusat	Moses-mun.	Iwernga	Kiyaghneghem	nanqigtellghitii	yuget	aghyuughyaghqaaluki	seghleghqellghitnun	qayughllak	Liilightusiilnguq.
B06_05_Romans_V14	Paninang	yuget	kiyaghtekaagut	ima	Adam-emeng	Moses-mun,	qamaglluteng	tuquyaghqaagut,	maligulluteng	tamaakut	seghleghqellghit	Adam-em	seghleghqellghatun	ayuqenghilnguut.	Adam	Christ-atun	ayuquq,	tagiyaghqatun.
B06_05_Romans_V15	Iwernga	Kiyaghneghem	tunusaa	Adam-em	seghleghqellghatun	ayuqenghituq.	Ipanguuq	uglapiglleghhiit	yuget	tuqukaagut	apalluqluku	ataasim	yugem	seghleghqellgha.	Iwernga	Kiyaghneghem	piniqellgha	seghleghllaguuq.	Enkaam	uglaapiglleghhiit	yuget	allgeghtekaqaat	Kiyaghneghem	aqeghqengngalghii	akingilnguq	tunusaa,	piniqellghakun	ataasim	yugem	Jesus	Christ-am.
B06_05_Romans_V16	Allakuteghllagtuk,	Adam-em	seghleghqellghallu,	tunusaallu	Kiyaghneghem.	Kingunganeng	Adam	seghleghqaqngan	Kiyaghneghem	nanqigtekaqaa	aghyuughyaghqaaluku.	Iwernga	kingungitneng	yulghuteghllaget	seghleghqaqngata,	Kiyaghneghem	akingilngughqun	tunusamikun	nallghusaghtestekaqii	elqughutngalleghminun.
B06_05_Romans_V17	Ataasiq	yuuk	seghleghqegkaaguq	enkaam	ellnga	apalluqluku,	tuqullghem	igleghutii	qamaglluki	yuget.	Iwernga	sangwaa	Kiyaghneghem	apeghiiqaa	ataasikun	yugkun,	Jesus	Christ-akun,	aangataghaghtuq	seghleghqellghaneng	ataasim	yugem.	Enkaam	allgeghullghiit	Kiyaghneghem	kemnapiglleghhiimeng	piniqellghaneng,	tunusaanengllu	elqughutngallghaneng,	qamaglluteng	igleghutillequt	kiyaghtelleghmi	ataasikun	yugkun	Jesus	Christ-akun.
B06_05_Romans_V18	Apalluqluku	Adam-em	ataasiq	seghleghqellgha,	Kiyaghneghem	nanqigtekaqii	qamaglluki	yuget	aghyuughyaghqaaluki.	Tawateghpigaq	apalluqluku	Christ-am	ataasiq	elqughutngalghii	pillgha	Kiyaghneghem	nallghusaghii	qamaglluki	yuget	elqughutngalleghminun,	tuuniillu	unguvalleghmeng.
B06_05_Romans_V19	Qaatkunneghitellghakun	ataasim	yugem,	uglaapiglleghhiit	yuget	seghleghqestengughtekaagut.	Tawateghpigaq,	qaatkutellghakun	ataasim	yugem,	uglaapiglleghhiit	yuget	nallghusaghyaghqaagut	Kiyaghneghem	elqughutngallghanun.
B06_05_Romans_V20	Liilightuusat	Kiyaghneghem	tuunegkii	Moses-mun	yuget	liisaaghaghtestiit	seghleghqelleghmeng.	Iwernga	yuget	seghleghqataghaghyata	Kiyaghneghem	nangllegtallgha	nulanginaqaq.
B06_05_Romans_V21	Seghleghqellghem	igleghutkaqii	yuget	tuqulleghqun.	Iwernga	Kiyaghneghem	piniqellghan	igleghutngwii	yuget	nallghusalleghmikun	ellngit	elqughutngalleghminun.	Enkaam	allgeghtaat	kenlengilnguq	unguvalleq	Jesus	Christ-akun	Atanemteggun.
B06_06_Romans_V1	Sameng'ngam	pilleqesta?	Seghleghqumanginaaltaa-a	Kiyaghneghem	nangllegtallgha	nulasqelluku?
B06_06_Romans_V2	Nakaa!	Qayughllak	tuqukastun	ayuqukut,	enkaam	tuqukaakumta	naten	seghleghqumanginaghnaqesta?
B06_06_Romans_V3	Liisimakaghsi,	qamaglluta	paaptaayaaqngamta	ilatkaagukut	Christ	Jesus-mun.	Ilatkaagutkutlu	tuqullghanun	paaptaayaaqngamta.
B06_06_Romans_V4	Paaptaayellemteggun	tuquqaagukutlu	qungukaagukutlu	Christ-ami.	Aghtughyaghqaanghilleghllagmikun	Atam	unguvaghtekaqaa	Christ-a	tuqulleghmeng.	Enkaam	kiyaghsaghqaaghllequkut	kiyaghtaallelighraghaghluta.
B06_06_Romans_V5	Kiyaghneghem	ilasimakanginkut	Christ-amun	tuqullghakun,	taagken	ilatestepestaaghlleqiinkutlu	ellnganun	unguvaghtesluta	ellngatun.
B06_06_Romans_V6	Liisimakaghput	whangkuteluguyalghiit	qaquuraatkaagut	Christ-akun	igleqataqnaniisqelluta	seghleghqellghem	aghtughyaghqaanghillghanun,	qepghaghtelaaghunanighnalutallu	seghleghqelleghmun.
B06_06_Romans_V7	Yuuk	tuquneghmini	itemaquq	aghtughyaghqaanghillghaneng	seghleghqellghem.
B06_06_Romans_V8	Tuqumakumta	Christ-ami,	ugpeqaghput	kiyaghtelgusighyaghqaqaghputlu	ellnga.
B06_06_Romans_V9	Liisimakaghput	Christ-a	unguvaghtestekaaguq	tuqulleghmeng	enkaam	allamengllu	tuquyaghqaanghituq	qayughllak	tuqulleq	aghtughyaghqaanghillghiitkaaguq	ellnganun.
B06_06_Romans_V10	Ataasighhaghmeng	tuqukaaguq	kayaalqennaluku	seghleghqelleq.	Iwernga	unguvatmineng,	kiyaghtengnguuq	Kiyaghneghmun.
B06_06_Romans_V11	Tawateghpigaq	sumeghtaghaghtek	tuqukaalusi	seghleghqellghem	aghtughyaghqaanghillghanun,	sumeghtaghaghteklu	unguvangulusi	Kiyaghneghmun	Christ	Jesus-kun.
B06_06_Romans_V12	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	seghleghqelleghmun	igleqataqestegpenaki	yugusisi	tuqukayuget.	Seghleghqellghem	igleqataqegkaki	yugusisi,	qaatkesuglleqasi	yugusighpesi	seghleghqengngalghiit	piyukellghi.
B06_06_Romans_V13	Alngunak	nalighneghi	yugusighpesi	tuunegpenaki	seghleghqusiiluki,	qayughllak	tawaten	pikufsi	tuunelleqasi	seghleghmun.	Itupill	tuunitek	Kiyaghneghmun.	Tuqukastun	ayuqsaghtusi,	iwernga	Kiyaghneghem	unguvaghtekaqiisi.	Enkaam	tuuniteki	iinguniita	yugusisi	Kiyaghneghmun	ellnganun	atuqesqelluki	elqughutngalleghmun.
B06_06_Romans_V14	Seghleghqellghem	igleqataqnaanghitiisi	qayughllak	igleqataqngwiisi	Kiyaghneghem	piniqellghan;	igleqataqngunghitiisi	Liilightuusat.
B06_06_Romans_V15	Enkaam	sanaqestangam?	Itagnaghtaa-a	seghleghqelleghqaghput	qayughllak	Kiyaghneghem	piniqellghan	igleqataqngukanginkut	nakaan	Liilightuusat?	Nakaa,	itagnanghituq!
B06_06_Romans_V16	Liisimakaqusi	tuunegkufsi	kitumun	qaatkesaghqaaluku,	taawa	ellngan	qepghaghtelaaqaaghlleqiisi.	Qaatkegkufsigu	seghleghqelleq,	tuqusleqiisi.	Iwernga	qaatkegkufsigu	Kiyaghneq,	nallghusaghlleqiisi	elqughutngalleghminun.
B06_06_Romans_V17	Qepghaghtelaaghuyaghtusi	seghleghqelleghmun.	Iwernga	iyamsiqayugvikaqa	Kiyaghneq	qayughllak	maaten	qamakerugllak	qaatkegkesi	apeghtuusaghraghaat	apeghtuusaqegkat	elpesinun.
B06_06_Romans_V18	Itemutkaagusi	seghleghqelleghmeng	enkaam	qepghaghtelaaghughtekaagusi	elqughutngalleghmun.
B06_06_Romans_V19	Tamaakut	liigikneghllugutangitneng	elpesinun,	usputaqngwaanka	qepghaghtelaaghetlu	piliitestengitlu.	Sivunghani	tuunegkayuguyaghasi	yugusisi	qepghaghtelaaghuluki	nukeggnalghiinunllu	nulamanginalghiinunllu	seghletun	pilleghnun.	Maaten	tuuniteki	yugusisi	qepghaghtelaaghuluki	elqughutngalleghmun	kiyaghtesqellusi	pelungillusi.
B06_06_Romans_V20	Qepghaghtelaaghwaaqngafsi	seghleghqelleghmun,	elqughutngallghem	igleqataqellghitiisi.
B06_06_Romans_V21	Sivunghani	seghletun	pikaagusi,	iwernga	maaten	kayngukaaghtasi	tamaakut	seghletun	pikasi.	Sangaawa	allgeghtekaghsi	tamaakut	piluki?	Allgeghtekaqaghsi	tuqullghiinaghhaq.
B06_06_Romans_V22	Iwernga	maaten	itemullusi	seghleghqelleghmeng	qepghaghtelaaghughtekaagusi	Kiyaghneghmun.	Enkaam	Kiyaghneghem	pelungiightesimiisi,	allgeghutesimiisillu	kenlengilngughmeng	unguvalleghmeng.
B06_06_Romans_V23	Akileghtuusaa	seghleghqellghem	tuqullghuuq;	iwernga	Kiyaghneghem	akingilnguq	tunusaa	kenlengilnguuguq	unguvalleq	Christ	Jesus-kun	Atanemteggun.
B06_07_Romans_V1	Ugpeqaalgutemni,	lataamsi	liisimakilghiini	Liilightuusaneng.	Enkaam	liigikasi	Liilightuusat	qelghaqiit	yuget	kiyaghtengnguluki.
B06_07_Romans_V2	Ugiiqaq	aghnaq	usputaaguq.	Liilightuusam	qelellghani	aghnaq	ugiminisaghqaaguq	tagtalngatun	ugimi	kiyaghtellghan.	Iwernga	tuqukan	ugini,	taawa	itemellequq	Liilightuusaaneng	nengughtellghem.
B06_07_Romans_V3	Iwernga,	ugini	unguvaluku	allami	yugmi	kiyaghtekumi	gelgaghniightenguluni	atighyaghqaaguq.	Iwernga	uginga	tuqumakan,	itemellequq	taagken	Liilightuusameng.	Gelgaghniighunghituq	ugiinqigtekumi.
B06_07_Romans_V4	Ugpeqaalgutemni,	elpesillu	itemumaasi	Liilightuusaneng	qayughllak	tuqukaagusi	Christ-ami.	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	Christ-am	pikiisi.	Ellnganguuq	Kiyaghneghem	unguvaghtekaa	tuqulleghmeng,	whangkunnun	qepghaatesqelluku	Kiyaghneq.
B06_07_Romans_V5	Sivunghani	qaatkaqaput	seghleghqengngalghiit	piyukellghi	yugusimta.	Liilightuusat	atuqistesugaqiinkut	tamaakuneng.	Enkaam	atuqegkumteki	tuqusleqiinkut.
B06_07_Romans_V6	Sivunghani	anusimingllaghastun	ayuqsaghtukut	Liilightuusanun.	Tuqukaatemnneng	Christ-ami,	itemutkaagukut	qaatkusaghqaallemnneng	Liilightuusanun.	Enkaam	qepghaatngwaaghput	Kiyaghneq	unguvalleghraghamteggun	Taghneghagnekun,	nakaan	unguvallelumteggun	Liilightuusatgun.
B06_07_Romans_V7	Sameng'ngam	pilleqesta?	Liilightuusaat	seghleghqellghwaat?	Yeghlegillu!	Taakut	Liilightuusat	liitestekaqii	whangamnun	seghleghqellghet	sangutangi.	Liinnayanghitaqa	qiliiqetiqelleq	sangutanga	Liilightuusaq	whaten	qelghimangisaqan,	“Qiliiqetiqegpenang.”
B06_07_Romans_V8	Iwernga	atuqluku	taana	qelghusaq,	seghleghqellghem	allaaghhiinaghneng	qiliiqetangllaqaqaanga.	Liilightuusangunateng	seghleghqellghet	tuqungaat.
B06_07_Romans_V9	Sivunghani	kiyaghtengnguyaghtunga	Liilightuusangunaan;	iwernga	liisaqegka	taana	qelghusaq,	seghleghqelleq	unguvaghluni	enkaam	tuquunga.
B06_07_Romans_V10	Qelghusaq	unguvastiyaghqaayalghii	whangamnun,	yeghlegi	tuqustaanga.
B06_07_Romans_V11	Taaggun	qelghusakun,	seghleghqellghem	puughsaqlegughtaanga.	Enkaam	atuqluku	qelghusaq	seghleghqellghem	tuqutaanga.
B06_07_Romans_V12	Iwernga	Liilightuusat	agleghnalghiinguut,	qelghusaqlu	agleghnalghiinguuq,	elqughutngaaqlu,	pinightuqlu.
B06_07_Romans_V13	Taam	qelghusam	pinilghiim,	tuqustangaa?	Yeghlegillu!	Seghleghqellghem	tuqutaanga	atuqluku	sangwaa	pinilghii.	Enkaam	liitaghput	qelghusakun	seghleghqelleq	elngaatall	seghlepiguuq.
B06_07_Romans_V14	Liisimakaput	Liilightuusat	Kiyaghneghem	Taghneghaaneng	pinguut,	iwernga	maghyaghquunghitaanga	Taghnegham.	Maghyaghquungwaanga	yugusima	piyukellghan,	enkaam	qepghaghtelaaghuunga	seghleghqelleghmun.
B06_07_Romans_V15	Liigikigataqa	saaqutka	qayughllak	atuqigataqa	sangwaa	atuqsukaqa.	Itupill	atuqaqaqa	sangwaa	ugumikegkaqa.
B06_07_Romans_V16	Iwernga	atuqegkumki	ugumikegkanka	atuqsunghiteghngaamki,	taawa	itagnaqaqanka	Liilightuusat	piniitangi.
B06_07_Romans_V17	Enkaam	whangangunghituq	tawaten	piiqelghii,	itupill	seghleghqelleq	ilumnilnguq	tawaten	piiquq.
B06_07_Romans_V18	Liisimakaqa	avangitunga	pinilghiimeng	ilumni,	yugusimni.	Pinitun	piyugaqsaghngaaghma,	pipagningitaqa.
B06_07_Romans_V19	Pingigataqa	pinilghii	piyukegkaqa,	yeghlegi	seghleq	piiqaqa	piyukenghitkaqa.
B06_07_Romans_V20	Enkaam	piyukenghitkaqa	pinemkun,	taawa	whangangunghituq	tawaten	pilghii.	Itupill	seghleghqellghwaaquq	ilumnilnguq	tawaten	piiqelghii.
B06_07_Romans_V21	Enkaam	liitaqa	taana:	pinitun	pinaqeghngaghma,	paninang	seghleq	tawantaquq.
B06_07_Romans_V22	Qaamkerugllak	pinighyuugusiqanka	Kiyaghneghem	Liilightuusii.
B06_07_Romans_V23	Iwernga	liitaqa	taawa	ilanga	liilightuusaq	yugusimnituq.	Pilluwaqangi	Kiyaghneghem	Liilightuusii	umyugama	itagnaqegkii.	Liilightuusam	yugusimnilnguum	seghleghqestaqaanga,	enkaam	anusimingllaghastun	ayuqunga	taamun	liilightuusamun.
B06_07_Romans_V24	Seghleghwaaghuunga!	Kitumngam	itemulleqanga	whaken	yugusimeng	tuqustiyaghqameng	whangamneng?
B06_07_Romans_V25	Iyamsiqanaghhalek	Kiyaghneghmun	itemuskanganga	Jesus	Christ-akun	Atanemteggun!	Enkaangam	qaatkanka	Kiyaghneghem	Liilightuusii	umyugamkun,	iwernga	yugusimkun	qaatkaqa	liilightuusaq	seghleghqestilghii	whangamneng.
B06_08_Romans_V1	Enkaangam	kinkut	alngunak	Christ	Jesus-mun	ilatkaakata	Kiyaghneghem	nanqiggnaanghitii	aghyuughyaghqaaluki.
B06_08_Romans_V2	Qayughllak	Liilightuusaan	Taghnegham	unguvallelitilghiim	Christ	Jesus-kun	itemutkaqaanga	liilightuusaaneng	seghleghqellghemllu	tuqullghemllu.
B06_08_Romans_V3	Moses-em	Liilightuusii	tawaten	pipagningitut	qayughllak	yugusimta	piyukellghita	kayaaleghqegkaqii	Liilightuusat.	Iwernga	Kiyaghneghem	pikaqaa	Liilightuusat	pipagningitkaat.	Kayagtekaqaa	ellmi	katam	Ighneni	nunamun	seghleghqumalghiitun	yugtun	ayuqluku.	Tuunegkaqaa	Ighneni	aghqutnguluku	seghleghqellemnnun.	Tawaten	nanqigtekaqaa	seghleghqelleq	yugusimelluku,
B06_08_Romans_V4	whangkunnun	qaatkesaqlegughtesqelluki	Liilightuusat	elqughutngalghiit	qelghusii.	Whangkunguut	kiyaghlleghhiit	malighqutaqluta	Taghnegham	piyukellghanun,	nakaan	yugusimta	piyukellghitnun.
B06_08_Romans_V5	Tamaakut	kiyaghlleghhiit	malighqutaqluteng	yugusimeng	piyukellghitnun,	sumeghtaghaatkengnginaghaqiit	piyukelleteng.	Iwernga	tamaakut	kiyaghlleghhiit	malighqutaqluteng	Taghneghagnun,	sumeghtaghaatkengnginaghaqiit	Taghnegham	piyukellghi.
B06_08_Romans_V6	Umyugaput	malighqutaqegkata	yugusimta	piyukellghanun,	tuqullequkut.	Iwernga	umyugaput	malighqutaqegkata	Taghneghagnun,	Kiyaghneghem	unguvallelilleqiinkutlu	nekeggmellelilleqiinkutlu.
B06_08_Romans_V7	Umyugaput	malighqutaqenghata	yugusimta	piyukellghanun,	anguyagwaaqukut	Kiyaghneghmun	qayughllak	qaatkigalkeput	Liilightuusii.	Ipa	qaatkepagningitaput	Kiyaghneghem	Liilightuusii.
B06_08_Romans_V8	Tamaakut	malighqutaqngalghiit	yugusimeng	piyukellghanun	efqughtepagningitaat	Kiyaghneq.
B06_08_Romans_V9	Iwernga	elpesi	igleqataqngunghitiisi	yugusighpesi	piyukellghan.	Igleqataqngwiisi	Kiyaghneghem	Taghneghagkenka,	qayughllak	ipa	kiyaghtengngulghii	ilugpesini.	Christ-am	Taghneghakek	kiyaghtengngunghilkayek	ilungani	yugem,	pikenghitaa	Christ-am.
B06_08_Romans_V10	Yugusisi	tuqunaqnguut	apalluqluki	seghleghqellesi.	Iwernga	Christ-a	kiyaghtengngukan	ilugpesini,	taawa	Taghnegham	unguvallelilleqiisi,	qayughllak	Christ-am	nallghusaghtestekaqiisi	Kiyaghneghem	elqughutngallghanun.
B06_08_Romans_V11	Kiyaghneghem	Taghneghakek	unguvaghtikak	Jesus-meng,	kiyaghtengnguuk	ilugpesini.	Katam	Kiyaghneghem	unguvaghtestellghatun	Christ	Jesus,	unguvaghtesleqii	yugusisi	Taghneghagmikun	kiyaghlleghhiignekun	ilugpesini.
B06_08_Romans_V12	Enkaangam	ugpeqaalgutemni,	kiyaghsaghqaagukut	Kiyaghneghem	Taghneghagkenka	kiyaghtesqesullghatun,	nakaan	yugusimta	kiyaghtesqesullghatun.
B06_08_Romans_V13	Kiyaghtengngukufsi	malighqutaqlusi	yugusighpesi	piyukellghanun,	tuqullequsi.	Iwernga	Taghneghagnekun	tuquskufsiki	yugusighpesi	seghleghqeng'ngalghiit	piiqegkangit,	taawa	kiyaghllequsi.
B06_08_Romans_V14	Qayughllak	tamaakut	maghyaghquqii	Kiyaghneghem	Taghneghagkenka	Kiyaghneghem	avaqutaqii.
B06_08_Romans_V15	Taghnegham	allgeghtekaghpesi	Kiyaghneghmeng	qepghaghtelaaghughtesneqiggnaanghitiisi	alingelleghmun.	Yeghlegi	Taghnegham	Kiyaghneghmun	avaqutaqestiisi.	Enkaam	ellngakun	tuqlughaghaghput	Kiyaghneq,	“Abba!	Ataay!”
B06_08_Romans_V16	Kiyaghneghem	Taghneghakek	ellmegneng	ilatkaaguk	taghneghamnnun	ungipaannaluta	Kiyaghneghmun	avaqutaqniluta.
B06_08_Romans_V17	Kiyaghneghem	avaqutaqutanganeng,	Kiyaghneghem	pagitistekiinkut,	Christ-amllu	pagitistelgutkiinkut.	Nighughqellengellequkut	Christ-atun	ikfiqegkumta	Christ-am	ikfiqellghatun.
B06_08_Romans_V18	Sumemni	ikfiqelleput	unguvallemnni	inglutepagningitut	nighughqelleghmun	Kiyaghneghem	aliighsaghqaanun	whangkunnun.
B06_08_Romans_V19	Ulimaaq	qamaglluni	utaqiinguuq	qelanellelighluni	Kiyaghneghmun	aliightesqelluki	kinkungutangi	avaqutii.
B06_08_Romans_V20	Kiyaghneghem	nanqigtekaqaa	ulimaaq	aghyughyaghqaaluku	enkaam	atuunanightestaa.	Ulimaaq	nanqigtesunghitkaaguq,	iwernga	Kiyaghneghem	tawaten	piyukegkaqaa.	Naqamllu	paninang	sighimallelguuq
B06_08_Romans_V21	qayughllak	ataasimi	aghneghmi	Kiyaghneghem	itemulleqaa	ulimaaq	aghulleghmeng.	Taagken	ulimaaq	ilallequq	itemngalleghllagitnun	Kiyaghneghem	avaqutiitnun.
B06_08_Romans_V22	Liisimakaghput	whavemun	kenlanga	iingunaghmi	ulimaaq	ngillegtengnguuq	aqnighqellghatun	ighniyulghiim.
B06_08_Romans_V23	Iwernga	ulimaaghhiinaanghituq	ngilleglleghhii,	whangkutallu	ngillegtengnguukut.	Whangkunguukut	Agleghnalghiigneng	Taghneghagneng	pilegni	Kiyaghneghem	tunusaqsugwhaagha	whangkunnun.	Ngillegtengnguukutlu	ilumteggun	utaqiimaluta	Kiyaghneghmun	allughqisqelluta	avaqutaaluta	ellnganun,	itemutesqellukillu	yugusiput	seghleghqelleghmeng.
B06_08_Romans_V24	Taaggun	sighimalleghqun	yugulikaagukut.	Iwernga	allgeghsimakumteggu	sighimakegkaghput,	taawa	sighimallghunghituq.	Yuget	sighimangigatut	sameng	allgeghtengngwaaqameggneng.
B06_08_Romans_V25	Iwernga	sighimamakumta	sameng	allgeghtekaqenghilkemnneng,	utaqalleqaghput	qelaneghpenaamta.
B06_08_Romans_V26	Tawateghpigaq	Taghnegham	kayusighaqiinkut	kayaatellemnni,	qayughllak	nallukelghiikut	naten	yughalleghqaqsaqemtestun.	Iwernga	Taghnegham	ellmineng	katam	yughaataqiinkut	Kiyaghneghmun	ngillegtelleghllagkun	akuzitngunaan.
B06_08_Romans_V27	Kiyaghneghem	liisimakii	yuget	sumeghtaghallghit.	Liisimakiillu	sumeghtaghallghi	Taghnegham,	qayughllak	Taghnegham	yughaatkaqii	yugi	Kiyaghneghem	piyukellghatun	ayuqluki.
B06_08_Romans_V28	Liisimakaghput	Kiyaghneghem	sangwaat	qamaglluki	qepghaghtestaqii	qerngiita	pinighqelleghqiitnun	piniqistemi.	Ellnginguut	tuqluqii	uspeqelleghmitun.
B06_08_Romans_V29	Tamaakunguut	Kiyaghneghem	nakmikekestaqii.	Aaftekaqiillu	Ighneghmitun	lliighesqelluki.	Tawaten	pikaaguq	Ighneni	allgeghyuwhaaghumasqelluku	anglegutelghutanganeng.
B06_08_Romans_V30	Enkaam	Kiyaghneghem	aaftekani	tuqluqaqii.	Tamaakutlu	tuqluqani	nallghusaqaqii	elqughutngalleghminun.	Tamaakutlu	nallghusaqani	elqughutngalleghminun	quulvaqaqii.
B06_08_Romans_V31	Sameng'ngam	pinaqesteggu	una?	Kiyaghneq	whangkunnun	ayuqngukan,	kitumngam	tengvimun	pilleqinkut?
B06_08_Romans_V32	Ighlekumangitaa	ellmi	katam	Ighneni;	itupill	tuunegkaqaa	aghqutnguluku	tamaghhamnnun!	Kiyaghneghem	tuunumakanginkut	Ighneghmineng,	taawa	ellngakun	ighlegpenani	tuunelleqiinkut	sameng	tamaghhaaneng.
B06_08_Romans_V33	Kitumngam	anaggunnilleqaki	Kiyaghneghem	nakmikegkii	yuget?	Kiyaghneghem	ellmineng	katam	anaggutellghinnikaqii!
B06_08_Romans_V34	Kinangam	pilleqa	Kiyaghneghem	yugi	nanqigsaghqaaniluki	aghyuughyaghqaaluteng?	Christ	Jesus-em	pilleqaguu?	Nakaa,	qayughllak	ellnganguuq	tuqumatkikaq	whangkunnun,	unguvaghtekaaguqlu	tuqulleghmeng.	Maaten	yughaatkaqiinkut	aqumluni	aghenqigneghani	Kiyaghneghem.
B06_08_Romans_V35	Saamngam	iqitesleqinkut	piniqellghaneng	Christ-am?	Seghleliillghaam,	piyaqliillghaam,	amyuqetaatkellghaam,	paneghniqellghaam,	aklumallghaam,	yakughnaam,	nalighmeng	tuqutellghaam?
B06_08_Romans_V36	Igaqngaaq	Akuzitni	Igaqegkani	whaten,	“Elpek	apalluqluten	aghhutanga	tamaghhaan	yuget	tuqusugaqiinkut.	Sumeghtaghalleghmeggni	penniighestun	ayuqniiqiinkut	tuqusaghqat.”
B06_08_Romans_V37	Iwernga	tamaakut	qamaglluki	kayaalqengngwaaqaqaput	Christ-akun	piniqistemteggun.
B06_08_Romans_V38	Liisimakngwaaghaqa	saam	alngunak	iqitesnaanghitiinkut	Kiyaghneghem	piniqellghaneng:	talwa	tuqullghem,	unguvallghem,	yaqulget,	nalighmeng	tughneghat.	Talwa	sangwaa	saghngaan	aghneghmi	nalighmeng	sivumi	agani,	nalighmeng	aghtughyaghqaanghillghet.
B06_08_Romans_V39	Talwa	sangwaat	qulemnni	nalighmeng	asimnni.	Ulimaaghmi	iqitestiyaghqaqraggiituq	whangkunneng	Kiyaghneghem	piniqellghaneng	Christ	Jesus-kun	Atanemteggun.
B06_09_Romans_V1	Apeghyukaqa	elpesinun	ipanguuq.	Iqlengiqngunghitunga	qayughllak	Christ-am	pikaanga,	Agleghnalghiim	Taghneghamllu	igleghutngwaak	umyugagka.
B06_09_Romans_V2	Ungipaasugamsi	whaten:	qivghughllaguunga	qayughllak	qaamggurugllak	ilumkun	naangigalngughmeng	aqnighqutkeghllagwaanka
B06_09_Romans_V3	yulgutenka,	Jews-et.	Piyaqleguyaqan,	ellngit	apalluqluki	Kiyaghneghemtuq	nanqigtekanganga	aghyuughnalunga,	iqitestekangangallu	Christ-ameng.
B06_09_Romans_V4	Yulgutenka	Israel-em	kingunqii,	Kiyaghneghem	allughqikaqii	ellminun	avaqutaaluki.	Aliightekaqaa	nighughqelleni	ellngitnun.	Akequuqaqii	salleghqamineng	ellngitnun.	Tuunegkaqii	Liilightuusamineng.	Apeghtuqaqii	ellminun	maniguutelleghqameng	elqughulluki.	Akequuqaqiillu	quyasleqniluki	qaatkegkangatni.
B06_09_Romans_V5	Kingunqiit	sivuneqsuwhaamta,	taakutgun	kinguneghteggun	Christ-a	allgeqaaguq	yuguluni.	Ellnga	Kiyaghneghuuq	igleghutilghii	sameng	tamaghhaaneng.	Usuqellengi	quunperugllak	kenlengunaan!	Amen.
B06_09_Romans_V6	Kiyaghneghaam	akequsani	pimangitaguu	Israel-eghmiinun?	Nakaa!	Akequsani	pikaqaa	ellngitnun,	iwernga	ilanginaghhii	kingunghi	Israel-em	Israel-eghmiipiguut.
B06_09_Romans_V7	Ilanginaghhiillu	Abraham-em	kingunghi	ellngan	avaqutapiikii.	Kiyaghneghem	pikaqaa	Abraham	whaten,	“Kingunghet	elpenun	akequsanka	Isaac-ekun	ayuqsaghqaagut.”
B06_09_Romans_V8	Taana	whaten	pisiiguq,	ilangi	avaqutat	allgeqat	Abraham-emun	avaqutaqenghitii	Kiyaghneghem.	Iwernga	allgeqaghhiinaat	Kiyaghneghem	akequsaakun	Abraham-emun	kingunepiikii	Abraham-em.
B06_09_Romans_V9	Kiyaghneghem	akequsaa	Abraham-emun	whatetuq,	“Ayumiqun	uteghniquma	whaten	lliiqan	Sarah	ighnengellequq.”
B06_09_Romans_V10	Taana	Sarah-m	ighnegha	Isaac-nguuq,	sivuneghput.	Nulightughluni	Rebecca-meng,	atakaak	malghik	ighneghegkenka	Rebecca-m.
B06_09_Romans_V11	Talwa	salin	allgellghillukek,	salinllu	pingigallukek	pinilghiimeng	nalighmeng	seghleghmeng,	Kiyaghneghem	pikaqaa	Rebecca,	“Nuyekliim	qepghaalleqaa	uyuqliq.”	Ataneq	tawaten	pikaaguq	liigikesqelluku	ellnginaghmi	nakmiightenguniluni	salleghqamineng.	Kiyaghneghem	nakmikegkaqaa	taana	ighneq	qayughllak	ellnganguuq	Kiyaghneghem	tuqlughyukaa.	Nakmikegkaqenghitaa	qayughllak	taam	ighneghem	sangwaa	pikaqutanganeng.
B06_09_Romans_V13	Akuzitni	Igaqegkani	igaqegkaalghii,	“Piniqegkaqaqa	Jacob,	naqam	ugumikegkaqaqa	Esau.”
B06_09_Romans_V14	Sameng'ngam	pinaqesteggu	taana?	Kiyaghneq	anaggutaa?	Yeghlegillu!
B06_09_Romans_V15	Qayughllak	Moses	whaten	pikaqaa,	“Nangllegtaghllequnga	kitumun	alngunak	nanglleqsaghqamnun;	nafughtaghllequnga	kitumun	alngunak	nafuqsaghqamnun.”
B06_09_Romans_V16	Enkaangam	yuget	allgeghtepagningitaat	Kiyaghneghem	nangllegtallgha	piyukluku	nalighmeng	salleghmegteggun.	Kiyaghneghhiinaaguq	nakmiighyaghqaq	nanglleksaghqaminun.
B06_09_Romans_V17	Akuzitni	Igakegkani	igaqngaaq	Kiyaghneghem	pikaqaa	Pharaoh	whaten,	“Umiilgughtestekaqamken	kelgunnaluku	aghtughyaghqaanghilqa	elpegun.	Enkaam	yuget	nunataghhaani	tamaghhaani	ungipaqelleqaat	aatqa.”
B06_09_Romans_V18	Enkaam	Kiyaghneghem	nangllegyagutkayugaa	kina	alngunak	piyukegkani,	pineghlluugtestaqaallu	kina	alngunak	piyukegkani.
B06_09_Romans_V19	Enkaam	aapleqaghpenga	whaten,	“Kiyaghneq	tawatetngukan,	sangan'ngam	nanqiglleqaki	kinkut	alngunak	aghyuughyaghqaaluki?	Kitum	alngunak	aygiinaghyaghqaqenghitaa	Kiyaghneghem	piyukellgha.”
B06_09_Romans_V20	Iwernga	kinanguzin,	yugmi,	veghusnaasken	Kiyaghneq?	Qikumeng	ulimaaghem	sagneghem	aapsigataa	ulimasteni	whaten,	“Sangama	whatellunga	ulimazinga?”
B06_09_Romans_V21	Yugem	qikumeng	sagnengllaghtem	piyukelleghmitun	atuqsaghqaqaa	qiku.	Ulimayukumikek	maalghuk	ataasimeng	qikumeng	piyaghqaqaak,	aallgha	megnunalghiimun	atuuluku,	ilanga	samun	alngunak	atuuluku.
B06_09_Romans_V22	Kiyaghneghem	kelgusukaqaa	ugumiyulleghllani,	liisimakesugaallu	aghtughyaghqaanghilleni.	Iwernga	nuqetunneghpakaqii	nanqigtekani	naafqennaluki.
B06_09_Romans_V23	Tawaten	pikaaguq	liisimakesqelluku	nighughqelleghllani	nangllekegkaminun.	Yataaghqekestaqaqii	ellngitnun	allgeghtesqelluku	nighughqelleni.
B06_09_Romans_V24	Talwa	whangkutallu	tuqluqaqiinkut,	nakaan	Jew-nginaghneng	iwernga	Gentile-enengllu.
B06_09_Romans_V25	Hosea-m	uuknaliqellghani	Kiyaghneq	pikaaguq	whaten	Gentile-eneng,	“Tamaakut	yukenghilkenka,	atighlleqanka,	‘Yugenka’.	Tamaakut	yuget	piniqenghilkenka,	atighlleqanka,	‘Piniqegkanka’.
B06_09_Romans_V26	Tawani	Kiyaghneghem	ungipaatfigitni,	‘Yukenghitamsi’,	tawanillu	atighlleqiit,	‘Avaqutii	unguvalghiim	Kiyaghneghem.’”
B06_09_Romans_V27	Isaiah-m	akilghuutkegkaqaa	Israel	whaten,	“Qaywa	Israel-eghmiit	esnem	qenaavzeghaatun	uglaghtatkalighngaata,	tawalliima	qafsinkuuraghhaat	yugulillengyaghqaagut,
B06_09_Romans_V28	qayughllak	Atanghem	kimaawillngunani	nanqigtengngwaaghlleqii	nunam	yugi.”
B06_09_Romans_V29	Sivunghani	Isaiah-m	pinaqnillghatun	ayuquq,	“Atanghem	aghtughyaghqaghhaanghilnguum	siipusimangisaqanginkut	kinguneghmeng,	qamagtengngwaaghluta	naafqellengnayaghtukut	Sodom-enkuk	Gomorrah-nkuk	neghllagegketun.”
B06_09_Romans_V30	Sameng'ngam	pilleqesta?	Gentile-et,	ellmeggneng	nallghusaghnaqutkumangitut	Kiyaghneghmun,	iwernga	Kiyaghneghem	nallghusaqaqii	elqughutngalleghminun	apalluqluku	ugpeqillghat.
B06_09_Romans_V31	Israel-eghmiit	malighqutaqnaqutkegkaagut	Liilightuusanun	elqughutnganaluteng	Kiyaghneghmun,	iwernga	pilaataqumangitut.
B06_09_Romans_V32	Sangameng	pilaataqunghitat?	Qayughllak	nallghusaghnaqutkelghiit	ellmeggneng	Kiyaghneghmun	salleghmegteggun,	neghyukegpenaan	Kiyaghneghmun	nallghusiisqelluteng	elqughutngallghanun.	Enkaam	naagtaqut	“naagtusikun	uyghagkun.”
B06_09_Romans_V33	Igaqegkaalghii	Akuzitni	Igaqegkani	whaten:	“Ii-i,	Zion-mi	nekegtaqa	uyghak	yuget	naagtesqelluki,	taam	uyghagem	iqusleqii.	Iwernga	kina	alngunak	ugpequmi	ellngakun	kaynguyugnaanghituq.”
B06_10_Romans_V1	Ugpeqaalgutemni,	qamagun	ilumkun	piyukepigtaqanka	whanga	katam	yugenka	Jews-et	yugulillengesqelluki!	Elngaatall	Kiyaghneghmun	yughaatkaqanka!
B06_10_Romans_V2	Whaten	piighhnaqanka	yugenka:	Qepghaasupigtaqaat	Kiyaghneq	iwernga	liigikigataat	naten	Kiyaghneq	qepghaatesugaqutni	ellngitnun.
B06_10_Romans_V3	Liigikellghitaat	naten	Kiyaghneghem	nallghusaghaqutangi	yuget	elqughutngalleghminun.	Enkaam	elqughutngangllaghnaqutkaqut	qaatkelluki	Liilightuusii.	Tawaten	pilleghmegteggun	tugukliigataat	Kiyaghneghem	elqughutngallgha.
B06_10_Romans_V4	Christ-a	kenlekaat	Liilightuusat.	Enkaam	tamaghhaghmi	ugpeqillelek	Kiyaghneghem	nallghusaghlleqaa	elqughutngalleghminun.
B06_10_Romans_V5	Moses	igaqaaguq	Kiyaghneghmeng	nallghusaghilghiimeng	yugneng	elqughutngalleghminun	qaatkutellghitgun	Liilightuusanun.	Whaten	igaqegkaqaa,	“Yugem	qaatkumakaki	Liilightuusat,	taakutgun	kiyaghllequq.”
B06_10_Romans_V6	Iwernga	nallghusaqaq	Kiyaghneghem	elqughutngallghanun	ugpeqilleghqun,	qelqaaguq,	“Aaptegpenang,	‘Kina	mayughlleqa	qilagmun?’”	(ukiggnaluku	Christ-a	nunamun).
B06_10_Romans_V7	Nalighmeng	aaptegpenang,	“Kina	ukiglleqa	Abyss-mun?”	(mayuunnaluku	Christ-a	tuqumeng.)
B06_10_Romans_V8	Akuzitni	Igaqegkani	whaten	igaqngaaq,	“Kiyaghneghem	ungipaa	qantaghantuq	elpenun.	Akuzitkelleqan	qaneghpegun,	ugpeqelleqanllu	ilugpegun.”	(Kiyaghneghem	ungipaa	ugpeqilleghmeng	ayuqelghii,	taananguuq	ungipaqegkefut.)
B06_10_Romans_V9	Aapquvgu	qaneghpeneng,	“Jesus	Atanghuniluku,”	ilugpenengllu	ugpeqegkuvgu	Kiyaghneghmun	unguvaghtesimaniluku	tuqulleghmeng,	yugulillengellequten.
B06_10_Romans_V10	Yuuk	ugpeghtuq	ilumikun,	enkaam	Kiyaghneghem	nallghusaghaa	elqughutngalleghminun.	Aapghaallu	qaneghmikun	ugpeqegkani,	enkaam	yugulillenguq.
B06_10_Romans_V11	Akuzitni	Igaqegkani	igaqngaaq,	“Kitum	alngunak	ugpeqegkumigu	ellnga	kaynguyugnaanghituq.”
B06_10_Romans_V12	Allangughutngitut	Jews-etlu	Greek-etlu	qayughllak	ataasiiguq	Ataneq,	Atanqaa	tamaghhaan.	Quyasteghllagaqaa	tamaghhaan	tuqlughilghii	ellmineng.
B06_10_Romans_V13	Katam	Akuzitni	Igaqegkani	igaqngalghii,	“Tamaghaghmi	tuqlughilghii	aatghakun	Atanghem	yugulillengyaghqaaguq.”
B06_10_Romans_V14	Iwernga	naten	yuget	tuqlughlleqatgu	ugpenghilkumeng?	Naten	ugpeghlleqat,	nagaquunneghilkumeng?	Natenllu	nagaqughlleqat	ungipaqistengunateng?
B06_10_Romans_V15	Naten	yuget	ungipaqilleqat	ellnganeng	wetku	kayagtellengegkuyeng?	Katam	Akuzitni	Igaqegkani	igaqngalghii,	“Pinighnaghhaghmeng	itegiit	tamaakut	ungipaqilghiit	Pinilghiineng	Ungipaneng!”
B06_10_Romans_V16	Iwernga	ilanginiita	qaatkegkaqiit	Pinilghiit	Ungipat.	Isaiah	aaptekaaguq,	“Ataneq,	kitum	ugpeqegkaqagu	ungipaghput?”
B06_10_Romans_V17	Kina	alngunak	ugpeqillelgunaanghituq	nagategpenani	ungipameng	Christ-ameng	ayuqelghiimeng.
B06_10_Romans_V18	Iwernga	piiqsingaa	Israel-eghmiit	nagaquunneghinniluki	ungipameng?	Aa-a,	nagaqupestaaqaagut.	Akuzitni	Igaqegkani	igaqngalghii,	“Mengit	aghulaqumaat	tamaghhaanun	nunam;	akuzitangitlu	kenlengitnun	nunam.”
B06_10_Romans_V19	Alla	aapqughaallelguunga:	Israel-eghmiit	liigikenghitatkii-i	Israel-eghmiingunghilnguut	ellngitlu	Kiyaghneghem	yukatkii?	Aa-a,	liigikumiit.	Sivukluku	Kiyaghneghem	Moses	whaten	pistaa:	“Elpesinun	aqinakesnaqanka	Israel-eghmiingunghilnguut.	Israel-eghmiingunghilngughteggun	liigikigalngughteggun	ugumiyugtesnaqamsi.”
B06_10_Romans_V20	Taagken	Isaiah	tetugpenani	aapghikaaguq	whaten	Kiyaghneghem	pillghaneng,	“Tamaakut	ivaghimangilnguut	whangamneng,	naalkegkaqaatnga.	Tamaakunun	aaptinghilngughnun	whangamneng,	liitestekaagunga.”
B06_10_Romans_V21	Iwernga	Israel-meng	Kiyaghneq	whatenllu	pikaaguq,	“Aghnelqusighllak	nengugutanka	iiggenka	qaatkusigalngughnunllu,	kipullginaalghiinunllu	whangamneng.”
B06_11_Romans_V1	Enkaam	aaptamsi,	“Kiyaghneghaam	Israel-eghmiit	yuksugnanightakii?”	Yeghlegillu!	Whanga	katam	Israel-eghmiinguunga,	Abraham-em	kingungha,	Benjamin-em	ramkenganeng	pinguunga.
B06_11_Romans_V2	Kiyaghneghem	yuksugnanillghitii	yuni	qayughllak	nakmikegkaqii	salin	nunangllallghilluni.	Liisimakenghistegguu	Akuzitni	Igaqegkani	Elijah-m	qikeghqutkegkaqegkangi	Kiyaghneghmun	Israel-eghmiit?	Whaten	pikaalghii,
B06_11_Romans_V3	“Ataneq,	tuququqaqiit	uuknaliqisteten,	ulleghquqaqiit	aghqefigten;	whanganginaghhaagunga	siipneq,	tuqunnaqutkaqaatngallu.”
B06_11_Romans_V4	Iwernga	Kiyaghneghem	pikaqaa,	“Paninang	7,000-meng	yulguunga	maniguusigalnguut	kiyaghnengllaqamun	Baal-mun.”
B06_11_Romans_V5	Maatenllu	tawatetut.	Siipnelguuq	Kiyaghneghem	nakmikegkaaneng	nangllegtalleghmikun.
B06_11_Romans_V6	Kiyaghneq	nakmiighumakumi	nangllegyulleghmikun,	taawa	nakmikellghitii	pinitun	pillghitgun.	Tawaten	nakmikumakumiki,	taawa	nakmikellghitii	nangllegyulleghmikun.
B06_11_Romans_V7	Whaten	piiqunga:	Israel-eghmiit	naalkellghitaat	ivaqaghteng,	Kiyaghneghem	nakmikegkaghhiiniita	naalkegkaqaat.	Ilangi	tamaakut	Kiyaghneghem	pineghlluugtestekaqii.
B06_11_Romans_V8	Katam	Akuzitni	Igaqegkani	igaqegkaalghii,	“Kiyaghneghem	umyugiit	liigiksaghqaananighqegkaqii.	Whavemun	kenlanga	aghneghmun	iiyngit	esghaghyaghqaananighqegkaqii,	sigutngitlu	nagaquusaghqaananighqegkaqii.”
B06_11_Romans_V9	David-llu	pikaaguq,	“Neqenghaghqellghit	negaghaaghllit,	naaptellghughllit,	naagtusiighllit,	aghyuughisiighllit	ellngitnun.
B06_11_Romans_V10	Iiyngit	ayaallenglit	esghaghnaniisqelluki,	qukiitlu	pakegnenglit	uqigitneng	seghleliillghita	quunperugllak.”
B06_11_Romans_V11	Enkaam	aaptamsi,	Israel-eghmiit	naagtaqngameng,	alla	nekevepagningitaqaat?	Yeghlegillu!	Iwernga	Israel-eghmiit	seghleghqellghit	apalluqluki,	Gentile-et	yugulillengut.	Enkaam	yugulillengellghita	Israel-eghmiit	aqinastiit.
B06_11_Romans_V12	Kiyaghneghem	atuqegkaqii	seghleghqellghit	Israel-eghmiit	taginnaluku	quyastelleghllak	nunam	yuganun.	Israel-eghmiit	ifliillghita	tagitaat	quyastelleghllak	Gentile-enun.	Taagken	qamaglluteng	nakmikegkat	Israel-eghmiit,	ilaskumeng	yugulikanun,	quyastellghet	natenmi	uglaghtatkalleqat!
B06_11_Romans_V13	Maaten	aleghqughyugamsi	elpesi	Gentile-eni.	Kiyaghneghem	nakmikegkaqaanga	apostle-ngulunga	Gentile-enun.	Enkaam	piraamsipigllunga	piiqaqa	una	megnunalghii	qepghaqaq	Kiyaghneghem	qelghutkaa	whangamnun.
B06_11_Romans_V14	Apeghtughillemkun	elpesinun	aqinasnaluki	piinka	Jews-elgutenka,	ilangi	yugulillengesqelluki.
B06_11_Romans_V15	Kiyaghneghem	ighsakaqngaki	Jews-et,	nunam	yugi	Jew-ngunghilnguut	ilaliightestekaqii	ellminun.	Enkaam	Jews-et	tuguklinqigtekumiki,	unguvaghlleghhiistun	tuqukat	ayuqsaghqaagut.
B06_11_Romans_V16	Neqekrangllam	ikelleqsuwhaagha	tuunegkaq	Kiyaghneghmun,	agleghnaangukan,	taawa	iingunaghmi	neqekrangllak	agleghnaghtuq.	Akghwi	uqfigem	agleghnaqata,	avayiillu	agleghnaghtut.
B06_11_Romans_V17	Jews-et	piitesighaqastun	olive-em	uqfigatun	ayuqut	ilangi	avayaan	ayemtekat.	Elpesi	Gentile-eni	avayastun	ayuqusi	ayemtekat	piitesighallghilngughmeng	olive-em	uqfiganeng.	Taameng	uqfigmeng,	kitum	tuguluku	avayaq	nekegtekumigu	piitesighaqamun	olive-em	uqfiganun,	allgeghusaghqaaguq	akum	mesaaneng	piinnapiglleghhiimeng.
B06_11_Romans_V18	Sumeghtaghaghpenasi	pinighataghaghnilusi	avayaneng	ayemtekaneng.	Qukaayugtegpenasi,	qayughllak	avayaraaghinaagusi.	Akut	iknaqughtesigatasi,	akuugut	iknaqughsaghilghiit	elpesineng.
B06_11_Romans_V19	Iwernga	pillequsi,	“Aa-a,	avayat	ayemtekaagut	nekeggnaluta	uqfigmun.”
B06_11_Romans_V20	Taana	ipanguuq.	Kiyaghneghem	ayemtaqii	avayat	qayughllak	ugpeqenghilkangat	ellnga.	Iwernga	elpesi	nekegtestekaqiisi	uqfigmun	qayughllak	ugpeqegkesi	ellnga.	Enkaam	qukaayugtegpenasi,	yeghlegi	alingitek.
B06_11_Romans_V21	Jews-et	avayaghpigaagut.	Kiyaghneghem	ayemtekaqutanganeng	avayaghpigaat,	taawa	elpesillu	ayemlleqiisi	uqfigmeng	nagneghunneghilkufsigu	ugpelleghsi.
B06_11_Romans_V22	Enkaam	liigikaghsi	Kiyaghneq	nangllegtaghtuq,	aghyuutapigtuqlu.	Aghyuughaqii	seghleghqegkat,	iwernga	nangllekaqiisi	neghyukumanginaneghpesigu	nangllegtallgha.	Iwernga	neghyuknaniimakufsigu	elpesillu	kepulleqiisi.
B06_11_Romans_V23	Jews-et	ugpeqenqigtekumegteggu	Kiyaghneq,	nekeggneqiglleqii	uqfigmun.	Kiyaghneq	aghtughyaghqaanghillelguuq	nekeggneqigsaghqaaluki	neksaqangitgun.
B06_11_Romans_V24	Elpesi	Gentile-eni	avayapikenghitiisi	piitesighaqam	olive-em	uqfigan.	Kiyaghneghem	kepegkaqiisi	piitesighallghilngughmeng	olive-em	uqfiganeng.	Taagken	nekegtekaqiisi	piitesighaqamun	olive-em	uqfiganun,	qaywa	yuget	nekegtingigasaghngaata	uqfigmun	tawatelngughmeng	avayameng.	Jews-et	piitesighaqameng	olive-em	uqfiganeng	pingutmeggneng,	Kiyaghneghmi	piyaqniitut	nekeggneqigsaghqaaluki	ellngita	katam	uqfigitnun.
B06_11_Romans_V25	Ugpeqaalgutemni,	liigikesugamsi	sameng	qayvighsimangilngughmeng	sivunghani.	Apeluugusiqa	elpesinun	unanguuq:	peghqinghuyugneghufqaafsi	pisqellusi	sumeghtaghalleghpesigun.	Ilangita	Israel-eghmiit	ugpeqsugumangitaat	Kiyaghneq.	Tawatellequt	kenlanga	Kiyaghneghem	nakmikegkii	Gentile-et	qamaglluteng	tagilaghaatellghitnun	ellminun.
B06_11_Romans_V26	Taagken	qamaglluteng	Israel-eghmiit	yugulillengellequt.	Akuzitni	Igaqegkani	igaqngalghii,	“Yugulighista	tagillequq	Zion-meng;	iqilleqii	qamaglluki	seghleghet	kingunghaneng	Jacob-em.
B06_11_Romans_V27	Taana	akequsaqaqa	ellngitnun	iqiskumki	seghleghqellghit.”
B06_11_Romans_V28	Jews-et	ighsakegkaqiit	Pinilghiit	Ungipat	enkaam	Kiyaghneghem	anguyakii.	Elpesi	apalluqlusi	Gentile-eni	Kiyaghneghem	atuqegkaqaa	ighsakillghat	quyasnalusi.	Iwernga	Jews-et	paninang	Kiyaghneghem	nakmikegkaqii	yuget.	Piniqumanginaawii	apalluqluku	akequsani	sivunghitnun.
B06_11_Romans_V29	Kiyaghneghem	umyugagni	allangughteqaghhnaanghitaak.	Veghhnaanghitii	tunusani,	peggnaanghitiillu	nakmikegkani	ellminun	yuguluki.
B06_11_Romans_V30	Sivunghani	elpesi	Gentile-eni	qaatkellghitaghsi	Kiyaghneq.	Iwernga	maaten	allgeghtaghsi	Kiyaghneghem	nangllegtallgha	qayughllak	Jews-et	qaatkunneghilnguut.
B06_11_Romans_V31	Maaten	Jews-et	qaatkusigatut	Kiyaghneghmun,	enkaam	nangllekaqiisi	Gentile-eni.	Iwernga	ilangani	aghneghem	ellngitallu	allgeghlleqaat	Kiyaghneghem	nangllegtallgha.
B06_11_Romans_V32	Qamagtengngwaaghluteng	yuget	qaatkigataat	Kiyaghneq.	Qaatkunneghitellghat	anusimingllaghvigtun	ayuquq,	Kiyaghneghem	tawavek	kanaghtaqegkangi.	Tawaten	piiquq	nanglleknaluki	qamaglluki.
B06_11_Romans_V33	Kaay,	seghleghllaguut	Kiyaghneghem	aklungingi,	peghqinellgha,	liisimallghallu!	Kitumngam	liigikngwaaghlleqaki	nanqigtillghi?	Kitumngam	liigikngwaaghlleqaki	igleghneghi?
B06_11_Romans_V34	Katam	Akuzitni	Igaqegkani	igaqngalghii,	“Kitum	liisimakakek	umyugakek	Atanghem?	Kitumngam	aleghqughlleqagu	apaqunnaluku?
B06_11_Romans_V35	Kitum	alngunak	salisigataguu-u	Ataneq,	Ataneghmun	llivikesqelluku	uteghmun?”
B06_11_Romans_V36	Sangwaa	qamaglluni	ellnganeng	pinguuq,	ellngakun	pinguuq,	ellnganunllu	pinguuq.	Ellnga	usuqellengli	quunperugllak!	Amen.
B06_12_Romans_V1	Ugpeqaalgutemni,	Kiyaghneq	nangllegtapigtutanganeng,	elngaatall	kayemamsi	tuunesqelluki	yugusisi	Kiyaghneghmun	unguvalghiinguluki	aghqutet.	Pelungillit,	tuguklighyugnaghlitlu	Kiyaghneghmun.	Taananguuq	maniguutellepigsi.
B06_12_Romans_V2	Uum	nunam	yugatun	kiyaghtegpenasi.	Yeghlegi	Kiyaghneghmun	allangughtestek	nutaghtesluki	umyugasi.	Taagken	liigikelleqaghsi	piyukellgha	Kiyaghneghem	pinilghii,	tuguklighyugnalghii,	qamagtiingwaaghngalghiillu.
B06_12_Romans_V3	Kiyaghneghem	tuunegkaqutanganeng	tunusameng	apostle-ngulunga,	tamaghhaghpesinun	piinga:	Sumeghtaghaatkegpenasi	elpesineng	pinighataghaghnilusi	ayuqelleghpesineng.	Yeghlegi	ipapighqellusi	sumeghtaghaatkaqitek	ugpeqilleghtulegpesigun	Kiyaghneghem	tuunegkaakun	elpesinun.
B06_12_Romans_V4	Yugusiput	nalighneghtupigtut,	tamaghaghmi	nalighneq	allatun	sayaghqaaguq.
B06_12_Romans_V5	Uglaghyaghngaamta,	ataasigukut	Christ-am	yugusiini.	Enkaam	whangkuta	nalighneghni	whangkunneng	pikutukut.
B06_12_Romans_V6	Qamaglluta	allakullghiineng	tunusalguukut	Kiyaghneghem	tuunegkaaneng	nangllegtalleghmikun.	Tunusaghput	ungipaqingukan	Kiyaghneghem	ungipaaneng,	ungipaqilta	ugpeqilleghtutalemtestun.
B06_12_Romans_V7	Tunusaghput	qepghaatingukan,	qepghaatilta,	apeghtughingukan,	apeghtughilta;
B06_12_Romans_V8	kayemingukan	ilameng,	kayemilta;	tuuningukan,	ighlegpenaamta	tuunilta;	igleghutingukan,	sagiqluta	igleghutilta;	nangllekingukan,	quyakusiqluku	nangllekilta.
B06_12_Romans_V9	Piniqitek	ipapighqellusi.	Ugumikluku	seghleq,	piyukumanginaghteggu	sangwaa	pinilghii.
B06_12_Romans_V10	Piniqututek	anglegutkullghiistun.	Quulvaatutaqitek	pakiggulluku	quulviisqesulleghpesineng.
B06_12_Romans_V11	Taakunginaghhaagneng	qepghaghtek,	ighsanifqaafsi.	Sagiqulluku	qepghaataqiteggu	Ataneq	qamaken	ilugpesineng.
B06_12_Romans_V12	Quyangatek	qayughllak	sighimallelguusi,	nuqetaqitek	nekeggmellusi	seghleliineghpesini,	yughaghaqiteklu	iiwleng.
B06_12_Romans_V13	Ugpeqaalgutegpesinun	aklulghiinun	tuuniiqitek,	upughatiiqitek	kinkuneng	alngunak.
B06_12_Romans_V14	Yughaatkaqiteki	amyuqetaatkistesi	Kiyaghneghmun	quyastesqelluki,	nakaan	aqnightesqelluki.
B06_12_Romans_V15	Quyalgusighaqiteki	tamaakut	quyalghiit,	qiyalgusighaqiteki	tamaakut	qiyalghiit.
B06_12_Romans_V16	Kiyaghtek	nekeggmetullusi.	Qukaayugtegpenasi	yeghlegi	ilakiteki	ukavantalghiit.	Sumeghtaghaatkegpenasi	peghqinghunilusi	ilagpesineng.
B06_12_Romans_V17	Kitum	seghletun	pikangisi,	akitegpenaki	seghletun.	Piiqiteki	pinilghiit	tuguklighyugnalghiit	tamaghhaanun.
B06_12_Romans_V18	Piyaghqaakan,	piiqiteggu	sangwaa	piyaghqaghsi	kiyaghtesqellusi	nekeggmellusi	tamaghhaanun.
B06_12_Romans_V19	Piniqegkamni,	akiniighnaqegpenaki	seghletun	pistesi,	itupill	pegteki	Kiyaghneghem	sakraallghanun.	Akuzitni	Igaqegkani	igaqngalghii	whaten,	“Whanganguuq	aghyuughiyaghqaq,	whanganguuq	akiniighyaghqaq,	piiq	Ataneq.”
B06_12_Romans_V20	Igaqngaaqlu	Akuzitni	Igaqegkani,	“Anguyagen	iyataangukan	neghesnaken,	meqsugukan	meghsinaken.	Tawaten	pikuvgu	naasqwakun	mayughfikelleqan	kumangalghiimeng	coal-meng.”
B06_12_Romans_V21	Kayaalqestegpenasi	seghleghmun,	itupill	kayaalqiteggu	seghleq	pinitun	pilleghqun.
B06_13_Romans_V1	Tamaghhaghmi	qaatkusaghqaaguq	aangwaaghughtekanun	igleghutistenun.	Kina	alngunak	igleghutistengunaanghituq	wetkuqun	Kiyaghneghem	igleghutistengughtestekumigu.	Igleghutistenguut	qayughllak	Kiyaghneghem	nekegtekaqii	igleghutisqelluki.
B06_13_Romans_V2	Kitum	alngunak	qaatkenghilkumiki	igleghutistet,	qaatkigatii	Kiyaghneghem	nakmikegkii.	Enkaam	aghyuughteslequq.
B06_13_Romans_V3	Pinitun	pikayuget	alikigatiit	igleghutistet,	iwernga	seghletun	pikayuget	aliksaghqaqiit.	Aliksunghilkufsiki	igleghutistet,	pinitun	pitek,	enkaam	usuqelleqiisi.
B06_13_Romans_V4	Igleghutistet	Kiyaghneghem	qepghaghtekii	aneghneghqelleghqaghpesinun.	Iwernga	seghletun	pikufsi,	aliknakesi,	qayughllak	Kiyaghneghem	qelghumii	aghyuughesqelluki	seghletun	pikat.	Kiyaghneghem	qepghaghtekii,	aghyuughistekiillu	seghletun	pilghiinun.
B06_13_Romans_V5	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	qaatkiteki	igleghutistet.	Qaatkiteki	qayughllak	Kiyaghneghmun	aghyuughtesunghilnguusi.	Iwernga	taananginaq	apalluunghituq.	Qaatkiteki	qayughllak	liisimakaghsi	qaatkutelleq	elqughutngaaq.
B06_13_Romans_V6	Taakuklu	apalluqlukek	llivikaqasi	tax-esi,	qayughllak	igleghutistet	qepghaagut	Kiyaghneghmun	qepghaqaten	pineghmegteki.
B06_13_Romans_V7	Enkaangam	tax-et	asengesi	qamaglluki	llivikiteki	igleghutestegpesinun.	Siivakitekillu	quulvaghtekillu	qamaglluki.
B06_13_Romans_V8	Asengegpenaan	kina	alngunak,	iwerngaqun	piniqelleghsi	asengeknginaghteggu	ilagpesinun.	Kitum	alngunak	piniqegkumiki	yulgutni	qaatkengngwii	iinguniita	Liilightuusat.
B06_13_Romans_V9	Igaqngaat	Liilightuusani	whaten,	“Gelgaghniighpenang,	Yugtaghpenang,	Teglegpenang,	Qiliiqetiqegpenang.”	Qaatkelleqaten	taakut	qelghusat,	alngunaklu	qelghusat,	qaatkegkuvgu	una	qelghusaq:	“Piniqluku	yulguten	piniqelleghpetun	elpeneng.”
B06_13_Romans_V10	Kina	alngunak	piniqikumi	yulgutmineng,	seghletun	pinaanghitii.	Piniqilleghmikun	qaatkutnguuq	iinguniitnun	Liilightuusat.
B06_13_Romans_V11	Tamaakut	piteki	qayughllak	liisimakaghsi	pilleghqaq	kaasimaaq.	Qavalghiistun	ayuqusi	iwernga	maaten	taghtughyaghqaaghtusi.	Yugulilleghput	tughaaghtuq	ugpeghyuggaallemnneng.
B06_13_Romans_V12	Unuk	alpagyaghtughtuq,	whaa	aghsaghtungestaghaa.	Taaqeltekingam	atuqneghmeng	seghleghet	yuget	piiqegkangit	mamlegmi.	Enkaam	tugulteki	pilluwaasighqat	nighugmi.
B06_13_Romans_V13	Pinitun	kiyaghtelta	katam	yugestun	kiyaghlleghhiit	nighugani	aghneghem.	Seghletun	teghigniqefqaamta,	suumefqaamta,	alngunak	sex-kun	seghleghqefqaamta,	pilluwutefqaamta,	aqinatefqaamta.
B06_13_Romans_V14	Itupill	akulghaaghestun	aateggu	Ataneq	Jesus	Christ-a,	sumeghtaghaatkefqiitallu	atuqnaluki	yugusighpesi	piyukellghit.
B06_14_Romans_V1	Upughateggu	yuuk	ugpeqilleghqestaaghhaq	akulegpesinilnguq.	Aaghtiiraaghusiqegpenaan	sangwaa	upeqegkaa	elqughutngatanga	nalighmeng	anaggutngatanga.
B06_14_Romans_V2	Ataasim	yugem	ugpeqaa	neghyaghqaaniluni	alngunak	neqmeng.	Iwernga	yuuk	ugpelleghqestaaghhaq	neghaquq	nunivagseghaghhiinaghmeng.
B06_14_Romans_V3	Yugem	neghegkayugem	alngunak	neqmeng,	siivakligu	yuuk	neqayuk	nunivagseghaghhiinaghmeng.	Yugem	neghegkayugem	nunivagseghaghhiinaghmeng,	nanqiggneghilligu	yuuk	neqayuk	alngunak	neqmeng,	qayughllak	Kiyaghneghem	tugukliimaa.
B06_14_Romans_V4	Kinanguniluten	piiqsin	nanqigtilghii	kitum	qepghaghtenganeng?	Qepghaghtem	piliitistenginaan	nanqiglleqaa	pinitun	pimatanga	nalighmeng	seghletun	pimatanga.	Atanghem	qepghaghtenga	pinitun	pillequq	qayughllak	Atanghem	kayusighyaqlegukanga	pinitun	pisqelluku.
B06_14_Romans_V5	Yugem	ugpeqaa	ataasiq	aghneq	megnunaghataghaghniluku	ilangitneng	aghneghneng.	Ilangan	yugem	ugpeqii	qamaglluteng	aghneghet	tawatelkunniluki.	Tamaghhaghmi	yugem	umyugagni	ataasiightengngwaaghlikek.
B06_14_Romans_V6	Kitum	alngunak	ugpeqegkumigu	megnunaghluku	aghneq	tawaten	piiquq	quulvaghnaluku	Ataneq.	Kitum	alngunak	neghegkumigu	alngunak	neqa	tawaten	piiquq	quulvaghnaluku	Ataneq,	qayughllak	iyamsiqayugvikaqegkanga	Kiyaghneq	neqmeng.	Kitum	alngunak	neghyunghilkumiki	ilangi	neqet	tawaten	piiquq	quulvaghnaluku	Ataneq,	iyamsiqayugvikaqegkangallu	Kiyaghneq.
B06_14_Romans_V7	Unguvangigatukut	whangkunnun,	tuqungigatukutlu	whangkunnun.
B06_14_Romans_V8	Unguvakumta,	Ataneghmun	unguvanguukut.	Tuqumakumta,	Ataneghmun	tuqullequkut.	Enkaam	unguvayaghngaamta	nalighmeng	tuquyaghngaamta	Atanghem	pikiinkut.
B06_14_Romans_V9	Christ-a	tuquluni,	unguvaghtekaaguq	Atanghunaluni	unguvalghiinunllu	tuqukanunllu.
B06_14_Romans_V10	Elpesi,	sangan	nanqigtaqesteki	ugpeqaalgutesi?	Sanganllu	siivakigasteki	ugpeqaalgutesi?	Neqamikluku,	qamaglluta	nekevyaghqaagukut	sivungakun	Kiyaghneghem,	ellnganun	nanqigtesqelluta.
B06_14_Romans_V11	Akuzitni	Igaqegkani	igaqngaaq,	“Ataneq	piiq,	qayughllak	whanga	unguvalghiinga	Kiyaghneq,	tamaghhaghmi	yuuk	segesqughquullequq	whangamnun,	tamaghhaghmillu	yugem	usuqelleqaa	Kiyaghneq.”
B06_14_Romans_V12	Enkaam	qamaglluta	Kiyaghneghmun	apeghyaghqaqaghput	salleghput,	sanganllu	tawaten	pimatfut.
B06_14_Romans_V13	Enkaangam	taaqelta	nanqigtunneghmeng.	Yeghlegi,	umyugaput	ataasiightelteki	ugpeqaalgutfut	naagtestefqaan	nalighmeng	seghleghqestegpenaan	pisteggu.
B06_14_Romans_V14	Ataneghqun	Jesus-kun	liisimakngwaaghaqa	avangituq	iinghutkameng	neqmeng.	Iwernga	yugem	ugpeqegkumigu	sangwaa	iinghutkaaluku,	taawa	ellngani	iinghutkaaguq.
B06_14_Romans_V15	Ugpeqaalguten	uniighmiqumakan	sameng	neghegkaghpeneng,	taawa	piniqnaniimaan.	Neghegkaghpenun	naafqestegpenaan	ugpeqillgha	Christ-am	tuqumatkegkaa.
B06_14_Romans_V16	Ugpeqegkan	pinightuq;	akuzitkestegpenaan	seghleghuluku.
B06_14_Romans_V17	Qayughllak	Kiyaghneghem	Ataneghpagullghani	sangwaat	neghegkaputlu	meghegkaputlu	megnunanghitut.	Ukut	megnunaghtut:	elqughutngalleq,	nekeggmelleq,	quyalleqlu;	taakut	Agleghnalghiigneng	Taghneghagneng	pinguut.
B06_14_Romans_V18	Taakut	atuqluki	qepghaatilghiim	Christ-amun,	efqughlleqaa	Kiyaghneq,	itagnaqelleqaatlu	yuget.
B06_14_Romans_V19	Enkaam	atuulteggu	nekeggmellengestiyaghqaq,	kayemututeltallu	ugpelleghtughtaghaghnaluta.
B06_14_Romans_V20	Naafqegpenaan	Kiyaghneghem	qepghallgha	apalluqluku	neqa.	Qamaglluni	neqa	neghyaghqaaguq,	iwernga	anaggutngaaq	neghelleghqaq	alngunak	neqmeng	seghleghqestiyaghqaq	kitumeng.
B06_14_Romans_V21	Itagnaghyaghqaaguq	kemekragtunghitelleq,	wine-etunghitelleq,	sangwaallu	alngunak	naagtestiyaghqaq	ugpeqaalgutegpesinun.
B06_14_Romans_V22	Kiyaghneghhiinaqlu	liisimaksaghqaqatek	tamaakut	ugpeqegkaghten.	Quyangaaquq	yuuk	atuqneghminiki	ugpeqegkani	elqughutnganiluki	seghleghnitkegpenaki.
B06_14_Romans_V23	Iwernga	yugem	neghegkani,	ugpeqegkumigu	anaggutnganiluku,	Kiyaghneghem	nanqiglleqaa	qayughllak	pinghilkanga	sangwaa	ugpeqegkani.	Sangwaa	alngunak	ugpeqegkani	anaggutnganiluku	atuqumakumigu	seghleghqellequq.
B06_15_Romans_V1	Whangkuta	ugpeqilleghtuqani	kayusiisaghqaqaput	ugpeqilleghqestaaghhaat	seghleliinghata.	Efqughsaghqaanghitukut	whangkunneng.
B06_15_Romans_V2	Itupill,	tamaghhaamta	efqughhnaqelteggu	ugpeqaalgutfut	ellngan	katam	pinighqelleghqaanun,	ugpeqilleghtughtesqelluku.
B06_15_Romans_V3	Talwa	Christ-a	efqughsimangituq	ellmineng	katam.	Yeghlegi	igaqegkaaguq	Akuzitni	Igaqegkani,	“Yuget	seghlequulghiit	elpeneng,	seghlequullghit	tekitaqut	whangamkun.”
B06_15_Romans_V4	Sivunghani	Akuzitet	Igaqegkat	igaqegkaagut	apeghtughnaluta.	Nuqenneghtustiinkut,	kayemiinkutlu	sighimallengnayukamta.
B06_15_Romans_V5	Nuqenneghtullghenkuk,	kayemellghenkuk	Kiyaghneghtaaguk.	Ellngan	kiyaghteslisi	itagnaqullusi	katam	Christ	Jesus-em	pillghatun.
B06_15_Romans_V6	Taagken	qamagllusi	qerngaghpesi	ataasistun	usuqelleqaghsi	Kiyaghneq,	Atanga	Atanemta	Jesus	Christ-am.
B06_15_Romans_V7	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	tugukliitullusi	katam	Christ-am	tugukliqayugukangisi	elpesi.	Tawaten	pikufsi	yuget	usuqelleqaat	Kiyaghneq.
B06_15_Romans_V8	Amenqun	Christ-a	qepghaghtengughtekaalghii	Jews-enun	liigikesqelluki	Kiyaghneq	iiwleng	ipapiiquq.	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	Jews-et	liisimakngwaaghaat	Kiyaghneghem	piyaghqaqii	akequsaqegkani	sivunghitnun.
B06_15_Romans_V9	Christ-a	tagikaalghiillu	Gentile-enun	usuqesqelluku	Kiyaghneq	nangllegtallghanun.	Igaqngaaq	Akuzitni	Igaqegkani,	“Enkaangam	usuqelleqamken	akulngitni	Gentile-et,	ilagaghllequngallu	usuqilleghmeng	ateghpenun.”
B06_15_Romans_V10	Akuzitni	Igaqegkani	igaqngaaqlu	whaten,	“Gentile-eni,	quyatek	maligullusi	Kiyaghneghem	yugitnun!”
B06_15_Romans_V11	Alla	Akuzitni	Igaqegkani	igaqngaaq,	“Usuqiteggu	Ataneq,	qamagllusi	Gentile-eni;	usuqiteggu,	qamagllusi	yugni!”
B06_15_Romans_V12	Isaiah	pikaaguq,	“Kingungha	Jesse-m	tagillequq	igleghunnaluki	Gentile-et,	enkaam	ellngakun	sighimallequt.”
B06_15_Romans_V13	Kiyaghneghuuq	sighimastilghii.	Imighlisi	quyalleghllagmengllu	nekeggmelleghmengllu	ugpeqelleghpesigun	ellnga.	Taagken	sighimallengataghaghllequsi	aghtughyaghqaanghillghakun	Agleghnalghiim	Taghnegham.
B06_15_Romans_V14	Ugpeqaalgutemni,	liisimakngwaaghamsi	piniipigtusi	yugni.	Liisimakaqallu	liigikngwaaghluki	ayuqasi	apeghtuusat	Kiyaghneghmeng	ayuqelghiit,	enkaam	apeghtuusaqlegwaasi	ilangitnun.
B06_15_Romans_V15	Iwernga	tetullngunanga	latakaqamsi	sameng	ilangitneng	neqangughhnalusi	tamaaken.	Tawaten	lataanga	qayughllak	Kiyaghneghem	tunusightughaanga
B06_15_Romans_V16	qepghaghtengulunga	Christ	Jesus-mun	Gentile-enun.	Priest-etun	ayuqaqunga	ungipaqinemni	Pinilghiineng	Ungipaaneng	Kiyaghneghem	Gentile-enun.	Tawaten	ungipaqiiqunga	ellngit	tunusatun	ayuqesqelluki	tuguklighyugnalghii	Kiyaghneghmun.	Agleghnalghiim	Taghnegham	agleghnaghtestaa	tunusaq.
B06_15_Romans_V17	Enkaam	qukaayugtaqunga	qepghaqamneng	Kiyaghneghmun	Christ	Jesus-kun.
B06_15_Romans_V18	Akuzitkesaghqaqanka	Christ-am	apeghiiqaghhiinii	whangamkun.	Ellnganguuq	Gentile-eneng	qaatkutestilghii	Kiyaghneghmun	ungipaqillemkunllu	qepghaqamkunllu.
B06_15_Romans_V19	Tawaten	pikaaguq	aghtughyaghqaanghillghakun	allaaghlluwhaghtillghet,	aghtughyaghqaanghillghakunllu	Agleghnalghiim	Taghnegham.	Ungipaqngwaaqaqanka	Pinilghiit	Ungipat	Christ-ameng	ayuqelghiit	tamaghhaani	Jerusalem-emeng	taagaverugllak	Illyricum-emun.
B06_15_Romans_V20	Iiwleng	piyukelqesaghaqa	ungipaqnaluki	Pinilghiit	Ungipat	nunani	nagaquusigalngughni	Christ-ameng.	Tawaten	pikaagunga	qayughllak	nekeftiyugunghilnguunga	tunemakun	ilangan	yugem	piinliqaakun.
B06_15_Romans_V21	Katam	Akuzitni	Igaqegkani	igaqngalghii	whaten,	“Tamaakut	salin	ungipaasigalnguut	ellnganeng,	esghaghlleqaat,	salinllu	nagaquusigalnguut	ellnganeng,	liigikelleqaat.”
B06_15_Romans_V22	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	uglaghngaan	elpesinun	pipagningitaqunga	qayughllak	ilangitni	nunani	ungipaqiiqelghiinga.
B06_15_Romans_V23	Iwernga	maaten	apeghiighaqa	qepghaqaqa	maani.	Uglalghiini	ayumiqulleghni	elpesinun	piyupigtaqsaghtunga,
B06_15_Romans_V24	enkaam	sunanguq	maaten	laalighfiklamsi	Spain-mun	pitkelluku.	Laalighutaghtellemta	kingunganeng	sunanguq	kayusightengnga	aghulaqnaqegkuma	Spain-mun.
B06_15_Romans_V25	Iwernga	elpesinun	pivagilgama,	Jerusalem-mennaqaqunga	kayusiinnaluki	Kiyaghneghem	yugi	tamaanlenguut.
B06_15_Romans_V26	Ugpeqat	Macedonia-melnguutlu,	Achaia-melnguutlu	quyakusiqluku	tuunikaagut	manimeng	kayusiinnaluki	aklumalghiit	akulngitnilnguut	Kiyaghneghem	yugan	Jerusalem-emi.
B06_15_Romans_V27	Quyakusiqluku	tawaten	pikaagut.	Taakut	Gentile-et	asengemiit	Jews-et	qayughllak	allgeghutkaalghiit	Kiyaghneghem	quyastillghaneng	ellngitgun.	Enkaam	Gentile-et	kayusighyaghqaqiit	Jews-et	ugpeqiit	Jerusalem-emelnguut	tuyughluki	manimeng.
B06_15_Romans_V28	Whaa	kelqennaqaqa	Gentile-et	maningat	Jews-enun.	Apeghiiqumkun	una	qepghaqaq	tuunluku	mani	ellngitnun,	laalighfiksaghtughlleqamsi,	taagken	Spain-ellequnga.
B06_15_Romans_V29	Liisimakaqa	kaaskuma	elpesinun,	pilgullequnga	Christ-am	iingunaan	quyastellghaneng.
B06_15_Romans_V30	Ugpeqaalgutemni,	Atanemteggun	Jesus	Christ-akun,	piniqellghakunllu	Taghnegham,	maligullusi	whangamnun	yughaatkeghllakaghtengnga	Kiyaghneghmun	kayusiitesqellunga.
B06_15_Romans_V31	Yughaghtek	Kiyaghneghmun	paqniighsiisqellunga	ugpeqaanghilngughneng	Judea-mi.	Yughaatkiteggullu	qepghaqaqa	Jerusalem-emi	tuguklighyugniisqelluku	Kiyaghneghem	yugitnun.
B06_15_Romans_V32	Taagken	Kiyaghneghem	piyukelqegkagu,	elpesinun	pillequnga	quyallelighllaglunga,	enkaam	pinighyuuggneqigllequnga	laalighfikumalusi.
B06_15_Romans_V33	Kiyaghneq	nekeggmellelitilghii	tamaghaghpesinilli.	Amen.
B06_16_Romans_V1	Ungipaasugamsi	ugpeqaalgutemnneng,	Phoebe-meng.	Pinilghiinguuq	deaconess-a	ugpeqanun	qerngughutkayugnun	yughaghvigani	Cenchreae-m.
B06_16_Romans_V2	Upughannakesi	Kiyaghneghem	yugita	piiqellghistun	qayughllak	Atanghem	pikaa.	Kayutkesunghisi	kayusighaqluku	qayughllak	kayuteghllaguuq	uglalghiinun	yugnun,	whangamnunllu	talwa.
B06_16_Romans_V3	Ungipaataghhnakegsi	Priscilla-nkuk	Aquila-nkuk	suumqaqagkanguq.	Qepghalgutkagka	Christ	Jesus-mun.
B06_16_Romans_V4	Talwa	tuqutelleghqaghtek	pitkegpenaan	paqniighsaghqaqaagnenga.	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	iyamsiqayugllaguunga	elkegkeneng.	Qamagllutengllu	ugpeqat	Gentile-et	yughaghvigitnilnguut	iyamsiqayuguut.
B06_16_Romans_V5	Ungipaataghhnakesi	ugpeqat	qerngughutkayuget	mangteghagkeni	suumqaqankanguq.	Ungipaataghhnakesi	piniqegkaqa	Epaenetus	suumqaqaqanguq.	Asia-mi	ellnga	ugpeghyuggaaqaaguq	Christ-akun.
B06_16_Romans_V6	Ungipaataghhnakesi	Mary	suumqaqaqanguq;	qevuulluni	qepghaatkaqiisi.
B06_16_Romans_V7	Ungipaataghhnakegsi	Andronicus-enkuk	Junias-enkuk	Jew-lgutegka,	anusimingllaghalgutkegkaqagkallu,	suumqaqagkanguq.	Apostle-nguuk	yuget	liisimakngwaaqegket;	sivumni	ugpeqaaghtekaaguk.
B06_16_Romans_V8	Ungipaataghhnakesi	Ampliatus,	piniqegkaqa	Ataneghqun,	suumqaqaqanguq.
B06_16_Romans_V9	Unipaataghhnakesi	Urbanus,	qepghalgutfut	Christ-amun,	piniqegkaqallu	Stachys,	suumqaqagkanguq.
B06_16_Romans_V10	Ungipaataghhnakesi	Apelles	suumqaqaqanguq.	Nanghiighsaghallengaqngami	ipapighqegkaqaa	ataasighmitelleni	Christ-amun.	Ungipaataghhnakesi	nengllugutangi	Aristobulus-em	suumqaqankanguq.
B06_16_Romans_V11	Ungipaataghhnakesi	Herodion,	Jew-elgutka,	suumqaqaqanguq.	Ungipaataghhnakesillu	ugpeqat	nengllugutanganilnguut	Narcissus-em	suumqaqankanguq.
B06_16_Romans_V12	Ungipaataghhnakegsi	Tryphaena-nkuk	Tryphosa-nkuk	suumqaqagkanguq.	Taakuk	aghnak	qepghaghtenguuk	Ataneghmun.	Ungipaataghhnakesillu	piniqegkaqa	Persis,	suumqaqaqanguq;	qevulluni	qepghaqaaguq	Ataneghmun.
B06_16_Romans_V13	Ungipaataghhnakegsi	Rufus-enkuk	naakullghiik,	suumqaqagkanguq.	Rufus	Atanghem	nakmikegkaqaa,	naanganllu	ighneqelghiistun	piiqaanga.
B06_16_Romans_V14	Ungipaataghhnakesi	Asyncritus-enkut,	Phlegon-enkut,	Hermes-enkut,	Patrobas-enkut,	Hermas-enkut,	qamagllukillu	ugpeqaalgutet	ellngitnilnguut,	suumqaqankanguq.
B06_16_Romans_V15	Ungipaataghhnakegsi	Philologus-enkuk,	Julia-nkuk,	Nereus-enkuk	nayakullghiik,	Olympas-llu	qamagllukillu	Kiyaghneghem	yugi	ellngitnilnguut,	suumqaqankanguq.
B06_16_Romans_V16	Quyakutaqitek	naaghutmeng	Kiyaghneghem	piniqellghakun.	Qamaglluteng	ugpeqat	Christ-am	yughaghviganilnguut,	liisimakesugiisi	suumqaqiisinguq.
B06_16_Romans_V17	Ugpeqaalgutemni,	qelghamsi	kelengasqellusi	tamaakuneng	aafquutestikayugneng,	tunutestilghiineng	yuget	ugpeqillghitneng,	kipullginaalghiineng	apeghtuusaneng	liitkaghpesineng.	Iqitngatek	tamaakuneng.
B06_16_Romans_V18	Yuget	tawaten	pikayuget	qepghaatngunghitaat	Christ-a	Ataneghput.	Taawanginaghhaq	ellmeng	katam	efquqegkaghhiinateng	piiqiit.	Apeghtughineghmeggni	akuziteghlluwhaat	atuqaqiit,	usuquughtaqiitlu	yuget	puughhnaluki	puughsugumalghiit.
B06_16_Romans_V19	Qamaglluteng	yuget	nagaquumaat	qaatkutngalleghsi	Ataneghmun,	enkaam	tamaaken	apalluqluku	quyakeghllawaamsi.	Peghqinghusugamsi	samun	pinilghiimun,	iwernga	anaggutellngunasi	seghleghmun.
B06_16_Romans_V20	Kiyaghneghem	nekeggmellelitilghiim	qantaghaqun	kagimlleqaa	Tughneghaq	itegaghpesi	asingani.	Ataneghput	Jesus	Christ-a	nangllegtaghli	elpesinun.
B06_16_Romans_V21	Qepghalgutma	Timothy-m,	Jew-lgutmallu	Lucius-enkut,	Jason-enkut,	Sosipater-enkut	suumqaqiisinguq.
B06_16_Romans_V22	Tertius-nguunga,	igaataqaqa	Paul	latanganeng.	Whangallu	suumqaqamsi	Ataneghqun.
B06_16_Romans_V23	Whanga	Paul,	Gaius-metaqunga.	Mangteghaani	qamaglluteng	ugpeqat	qerngughutkayuguut.	Ellnganllu	ugpeqatlu	suumqaqiisinguq.	Neghllamta	manimeng	aflengakistengan,	Erastus-em,	ugpeqaalgutemtallu	Quartus-em	suumqaqiisinguq.
B06_16_Romans_V25	Usuqelteggu	Kiyaghneq!	Ellngan	ayepsugighsaghyaqlegwii	ugpeqillesi	Pinilghiitgun	Ungipatgun	Jesus	Christ-ameng	ayuqelghiimeng	ungipaqumanginaghaqegkemkun	yugnun.	Taananguuq	aksaqegkaq	ungipaq	Kiyaghneghem	qayvighsimangitkaa	ima	piinlighyuggaallghaneng	nunam.
B06_16_Romans_V26	Iwernga	maaten,	piinleghilnguum	Kiyaghneghem	qayvighsimii	Pinilghiit	Ungipat	igaqullghitgun	uuknaliqistet.	Qelghusimii	Pinilghiit	Ungipat	liitesqelluki	yugnun	nunataghhaani	tamaghhaani.	Tawaten	pikaaguq	ellngitnun	ugpeqesqellunillu	qaatkesqellunillu.
B06_16_Romans_V27	Ellnginaaguq	Kiyaghneq,	peghqinelghii	samun	tamaghhaanun.	Yuget	usuqlitgu	quunperugllak	Jesus	Christ-akun!	Amen.
B07_01_1Corinthians_V1	Ukut	latat	Paul-meng	pinguut,	Kiyaghneghem	nakmikegkaaneng	Jesus	Christ-amun	apostle-nguluku.	Ugpeqaalgutfut	Sosthenes	whangamnituq.
B07_01_1Corinthians_V1	Lataaqunga	Kiyaghneghem	ugpeghtengitnun	Corinth-melngughnun,	Kiyaghneghem	aaftekaanun	yuknalusi	Christ	Jesus-kun.	Nakmikegkaqiisillu	pelungitesqellusi	maligullusi	yulghuteghllagnun	tamanganilngughnun,	yughaqayugnun	Atanemnnun	Jesus	Christ-amun,	qamagtengngwaaghluta	Atanqaghput.
B07_01_1Corinthians_V2	Kiyaghneghem	Atamta,	Atanemtallu	Jesus	Christ-am	nanglleklisillu	nekeggmellelguslilsillu.
B07_01_1Corinthians_V3	Iyamsiqayugvikaqaqa	Kiyaghneq	qayughllak	nangllekegkaqiisi	Christ	Jesus-kun.
B07_01_1Corinthians_V4	Enkaam	ellngakun	aklungighikaagusi	liigikelleghmengllu	akuzilleghmengllu.	Enkaam	maaten	liigikataghaghlleqaghsi	Christ-a,	akuzitkataghaghlleqaghsillu	Ataneq.
B07_01_1Corinthians_V5	Allangughtekamllu	kiyaghtaalleghpesi	ipapighqaa	ungipaqegkaghput	Christ-a.
B07_01_1Corinthians_V6	Agleghnalghiigneng	Taghneghagneng	tunusalguusi	sameng	tamaghhaaneng,	utaqiingulusi	Atanemta	Jesus	Christ-am	taginqigtelleghqaaneng.
B07_01_1Corinthians_V7	Kiyaghneghem	ugpellesi	iknaqughsaamanginaghnaaghii	kenlanga	kingulighpigaghmun	aghneghmun.	Inqun	anaggutellghitesqellusi	Ataneghput	Jesus	Christ-a	nanqigtikan	yugneng.
B07_01_1Corinthians_V8	Ataasiighmelnguum	Kiyaghneghem	nakmikegkaqiisi	ilatesqellusi	Ighneghminun	Jesus	Christ-amun	Atanemnnun.
B07_01_1Corinthians_V9	Ugpeqaalgutemni,	Atanemta	Jesus	Christ-am	aatghakun	piimsi	taaqesqellusi	aaghtiiraaghunneghmeng.	Aafquutegpenasi.	Sumeghtaghallesillu	sanaqellesillu	ataasiighhnaqluki.
B07_01_1Corinthians_V10	Ugpeqaalgutemni,	ilangita	Chloe-em	nengllugutangan	ungipaatkaqaatnga	aaghtiiraaghutaqnilusi.
B07_01_1Corinthians_V11	Ilasinguq	piiqut,	“Whanga	Paul-em	maligsaaghtekaanga.”	Ilasi,	“Whanga	Apollos-em.”	Ilasi	“Whanga	Peter-em.”	Paninang	ilasinguq	piiqut,	“Whanga	Christ-am	maligsaaghtekaanga.”
B07_01_1Corinthians_V12	Enkaangam	qafsinaghqaghsi	Jesus	Christ-a.	Paul-em	qaquraatkegkaqisii?	Paaptaayekaatsii	Paul-em	aatghakun?
B07_01_1Corinthians_V13	Iyamsiqayugvikaqaqa	Kiyaghneq	paaptaayemangilkegka	nalighhiinaghsi	iwerngaqun	Crispus-enkuk	Gaius-enkuk.
B07_01_1Corinthians_V14	Enkaangam	kina	alngunak	pinaanghituq	paaptaayemaniluni	atemkun.
B07_01_1Corinthians_V15	(Atwhay	paaptaayekaqankallu	Stephanas-enkut	nengllugutkullghiit.	Iwernga	neqamikenghitaqa	kina	alla	alngunak	paaptaayematka).
B07_01_1Corinthians_V16	Christ-am	paaptaayeliisqumangitaanga,	iwernga	kayagtekaqaanga	ungipaqisqellunga	Pinilghiineng	Ungipaneng.	Ungipaqingigatunga	atuqluki	yugem	peghqinellghi,	luuraq	aghtughyaghqaanghillghiitesnayukamkun	qaquuraa	Christ-am.
B07_01_1Corinthians_V17	Ungipaq	Christ-am	tuqullgha	qaquurakun	temnginguuq	iflanaqelghiinun.	Iwernga	yugulillengelghiini	whangkuta	liisimakaghput	Kiyaghneghem	aghtughyaghqaanghilqaa.
B07_01_1Corinthians_V18	Akuzitni	Igaqegkani	igaqngaaq,	“Peghqinghet	peghqinellghat	atuunanightesleqaqa.	Liitkaghllagetlu	liitellghat	sasiinanightesleqaqa.”
B07_01_1Corinthians_V19	Enkaam	sanaqan'ngam	nunam	peghqinelghiingi?	Sanaqan'ngam	apeghtughistengi	Liilightuusat?	Sanaqan'ngam	aaghtiiraaghtet?	Qamagtengngwaaghluni	liitelleghllallghat	sasiinghituq	qayughllak	Kiyaghneghem	temngitwhangllaqaqaa	peghqinellgha	nunam.
B07_01_1Corinthians_V20	Peghqinelleghmikun	Kiyaghneq	pikaaguq	nunam	yuganun	nallukelleqniluni	peghqinellghitgun.	Enkaam	Kiyaghneghem	nakmikii	yugulinaluki	qamaglluki	ugpelghiit	Christ-ameng	ungipaqegkamnneng.	Ugpeqaanghilnguut	sumeghtaghaatkaqaat	taana	ungipaqegkaghput	temnginguniluku.
B07_01_1Corinthians_V21	Jews-et	esghaasugaqut	allaaghlluwhaghtilleghneng	ugpeqnaluku	Kiyaghneghem	ungipaa;	Gentile-et	peghqinellengyugaqut	ugpeqnaluku	ungipaq	ipangutanga.
B07_01_1Corinthians_V22	Iwernga	paninang	ungipaqnaqngwaaghput	Christ-amun	tuqutkegkaqniluki	qaquurakun.	Una	ungipaq	Jews-eni	piyaqnapigtuq	ugpeqsaghqaaluni,	Gentile-eni	temngiinguuq.
B07_01_1Corinthians_V23	Iwernga	whangkunnun	Kiyaghneghem	nakmikegkaanun	Jews-ngughngaamta,	Gentile-ngughngaamta	tawatenneghituq.	Christ-am	tuqullghan	qaquurakun	liitestekaqiinkut	Kiyaghneghem	aghtughyaghqaanghillghanengllu	peghqinellghanengllu.
B07_01_1Corinthians_V24	Kiyaghneghem	temngitwhallgha	peghqinghataghgaghtuq	yugem	peghqinellghaneng.	Kiyaghneghem	kayaatellgha	iknaqataghaghtuq	yugem	iknaqellghaneng.
