B07_01_1Corinthians_V25	Ugpeqaalgutemni,	neqamikluku	natesaatsi	Kiyaghneghem	tuqlughaqngisi.	Qafsinkuuraghhaghni	peghqinghuyaghtusi	nunam	yugan	sumeghtaghaatkellghitni.	Qafsinkuuraghhaghni	aghtiigasaghtusi	igleghutistet,	nalighmeng	aklungilngughneng	nengllugutneng	pinguyaghtusi.
B07_01_1Corinthians_V26	Iwernga	Kiyaghneghem	nakmikegkaqii	tamaakut	nalluuqat	nunami	kayngusaaknaluki	peghqinelghiit,	Kiyaghneghem	nakmikegkaqii	kayaalnguut	nunami	kayngusaaknaluki	tamaakut	iknaqelghiit.
B07_01_1Corinthians_V27	Kiyaghneghem	nakmikegkaqii	ukavanlenguutlu	asitnginaaqiitlu	nunami.	Tamaakunguut	Kiyaghneghem	nakmikegkii,	yugnun	liigikesqelluki	sumeghtaghaatkegkiit	aangwaaghuluki	iwernga	Kiyaghneghmi	aangwaaghunghitut.
B07_01_1Corinthians_V28	Enkaangam	kina	alngunak	aangaayuggnaanghituq	nekevegkuni	sivungani	Kiyaghneghem.
B07_01_1Corinthians_V29	Kiyaghneghuuq	tuunistesi	unguvalleghmeng	Christ	Jesus-kun.	Kiyaghneghem	Christ	Jesus-mun	tuunestiinkut	peghqinelleghmeng,	elqughutestiinkutlu	Kiyaghneghmi,	agleghnaghtestiinkutu,	itemutestiinkutlu	seghleghqellemnneng.
B07_01_1Corinthians_V30	Enkaangam	atuqelteggu,	Akuzitni	Igaqegkani	igaqngalghii,	“Kina	alngunak	aangaayugsukuni,	aangaayugutkelliki	Atanghem	apeghiiqii	ellminun.”
B07_02_1Corinthians_V2	Pakikaqanka	tamaakut	qayughllak	ungipaqiyulghiinga	Jesus	Christ-anginaghhaghmeng	tuqullghanengllu	qaquurakun.
B07_02_1Corinthians_V1	Ugpeqaalgutemni,	ungipaqiyaghtughaqngama	elpesinun,	atuqumangitanka	akuzitet	liigikepagningilkesi.	Peghqilleghllamkun	ungipaqiyunghitunga	Kiyaghneghem	ungipaaneng	elpesinun.
B07_02_1Corinthians_V2	Elpesinitaqngama	tetugaataqaagunga,	alingruuqaagunga,	ungelegtekaagungallu.
B07_02_1Corinthians_V3	Kukragnalghiimeng	akuzitkumangitunga	peghqineghllagem	akuzitanganeng.	Iwernga	Agleghnalghiim	Taghnegham	aghtughyaghqaanghillghan	ipapighqegkaqii	apeghtughillghenka	ipangutangi.
B07_02_1Corinthians_V4	Enkaangam	ugpeghtusi	apalluqluku	Kiyaghneghem	aghtughyaghqaanghillgha,	nakaan	apalluqluku	yugem	peghqinellgha.
B07_02_1Corinthians_V5	Angtaniitkanun	ugpeqanun	apeghtuusaqaqa	Kiyaghneghem	peghqinellgha.	Iwernga	taana	peghqinelleq	nunameng	pingunghituq,	talwa	igleghutistenganeng.	Qantaghaqun	aviighusaghqaagut.
B07_02_1Corinthians_V6	Peghqinelleq	apeghtuusaqa	Kiyaghneghem	peghqinelqaa,	nallukaat	yuget.	Yuget	nallukngwaaghyaqangat	taana	peghqinelleq	kenlanga	Kiyaghneghem	liitestellghanun.	Talwa	nunangllaamangilluni	Kiyaghneghem	usuqsaghqaaluta	pikaqiinkut	peghqinelleghmikun.
B07_02_1Corinthians_V7	Nalighhiiniita	nunam	igleghutistengita	liigikumangitaat	taana	peghqinelleq.	Liigikegkaqsaqumegteggu,	qaquuraghnayanghitaat	Atangha	nighughqellghem.
B07_02_1Corinthians_V8	Igaqegkani	Akuzitni	igaqegkaaguq,	“Tamaakut	iyem	esghamangilkangi,	tamaakut	sigutem	nagaquumangilkangi,	tamaakut	umyugam	sumeghtaghaatkumangilkangi.	Kiyaghneghem	yataaghqegkaqii	piniqisteminun.”
B07_02_1Corinthians_V9	Iwernga	Kiyaghneghem	liigikestekaqii	whangkunnun	Agleghnalghiignekun	Taghneghagmikun.	Taghnegham	yuvghiighaqaa	sangwaa	tamaghhaan,	talwa	Kiyaghneghem	qaamnarugllaganilnguut.
B07_02_1Corinthians_V10	Yugem	sumeghtaghallgha	kitum	alngunak	nallukaa	iwerngaqun	ellngan	katam	taghneghagkenka.	Tawateghpigaq	Kiyaghneghem	sumeghtaghallgha	kitum	alngunak	nallukaa	iwerngaqun	ellngan	katam	Taghneghagkenka.
B07_02_1Corinthians_V11	Nunam	taghneghaaneng	allgeghusimangitukut.	Yeghlegi,	allgeghtekaqagput	Taghneghak	Kiyaghneghmeng	pik,	liigiknaluki	qamaglluki	Kiyaghneghem	tuunegkii	whangkunnun.
B07_02_1Corinthians_V12	Enkaam	akuzingigatukut	yugem	peghqinellghakun,	iwernga	atuqaqaput	akuzitet	Agleghnalghiim	Taghnegham	apeghtuutkii.	Tawaten	piiqukut	apeghtuusaqnemteki	Taghnegham	ipapillghi	tamaakunun	allgeghutkanun	Agleghnaliigneng	Taghneghagneng.
B07_02_1Corinthians_V13	Iwernga	kina	alngunak	allgeghusimangilnguq	Agleghnalghiigneng	Taghneghagneng,	tuguklighingigatuq	tunusaneng	Taghneghagneng	pineng.	Tamaakut	tunusat	temngitwhanguut	ellngani.	Liigikepagningitii	qayughllak	Agleghnalghiim	Taghnegham	kayusillghiinaakun	liigiksaghqaaguq.
B07_02_1Corinthians_V14	Yugem	allgeghutkam	Agleghnalghiigneng	Taghneghagneng	nanqigtaqaa	sangwaa	qamaglluku.	Iwernga	kitum	alngunak	nanqigsaghqaqenghitaa	ellnga.
B07_02_1Corinthians_V15	Akuzitet	Igaqegkat	pillghistun,	“Kitum	alngunak	nallukaa	Atanghem	sumeghtaghallgha.	Enkaam	kitum	alngunak	liilightughnaanghitaa.”	Iwernga	whangkuta	ugpeqani	sumeghtaghaghaqukut	Christ-am	sumeghtaghallghatun.
B07_03_1Corinthians_V3	
B07_03_1Corinthians_V1	Ugpeqaalgutemni,	elpesinitaqngama	aleghqughpagningitkaqamsi	aleghqughwaqellemtun	ugpeqaghllaget.	Yeghlegi	aleghquqaqamsi	ugpellesi	anglillghilngughestun	ayuqluki.	Ugpeqillesi	Christ-akun	taghnughhaghhaghestun	ayuqut.
B07_03_1Corinthians_V2	Kukragnangunaan	apeghtuqaqamsi.	Katam	tawaten	mamaghhaghmeng	meghesleghhiistun	pikaqamsi.	Neqepigmeng	neghestepagningitkaqamsi	qayughllak	neqepigtughpagningilnguusi	salin.	Paninang	maaten	neqepigtughpagningitaqusi,	qayughllak	ugpeqaanghilngughestun	ayuqusi	salin.	Liigikestengngwaaghsi	ugpelleghpesi	anglinghitellgha	aqinalleghpesigunllu	aghivatelleghpesigunllu.	Ugpeqaanghilngughestun	kiyaghtengnguusi.
B07_03_1Corinthians_V4	Nalighsi	pineghmini,	“Whanga	Paul-em	maligsaaghtekaanga,”	ilasillu	pineghmeggni,	“Whanga	Apollos-em	maligsaaghtekaanga,”	ugpeqaanghilngughestun	piiqusi.
B07_03_1Corinthians_V5	Kinangaawa	Apollos?	Kinanguzinga	whanga?	Qepghaghtekiinkung	Kiyaghneghem,	kayusiitkaqamsi	ugpeqesqelluku	Christ-a.	Qepghaqalestaghhiinaagukung	Ataneghem	qelghutkaaneng.
B07_03_1Corinthians_V6	Elpesi	Kiyaghneghem	piitesighaghvikiisi.	Piitesighaghaqunga,	Apollos-em	meghqaqaa,	iwernga	Kiyaghneghem	nagustaqaa.
B07_03_1Corinthians_V7	Enkaangam	kina	alngunak	piitesiighalghiillu	meghqilghiillu	ukavantuq.	Kiyaghneghhiinaq	aangeghllagtuq	nagustikayuguuq.
B07_03_1Corinthians_V8	Piitesiighaghtallu	meghqistallu	tawatelkutuk.	Kiyaghneghem	akileghtughyaghqaqaak	qepghallghegkenkun.
B07_03_1Corinthians_V9	Qepghalgutkutukung	Kiyaghneghmun;	elpesi	Kiyaghneghem	piitesiighaghvikiisi.	Kiyaghneghem	mangteghaqiisi.
B07_03_1Corinthians_V10	Kiyaghneghem	nangllegtalleq	tagivaqaa	atuqluku	piinliqaqaqa	qepghaqaq	elpesini.	Peghqinelghiistun	tunemiqaqaqa	mangteghaq	ulimayaghqaq.	Jesus	Christ-anginaaguq	tunemaq,	alla	saaghwakun	tunemaghqiituq.	Ilangita	ulimavikngwaat	qaayngakun.	Qamaglluni	piraamsiluni	ulimali.
B07_03_1Corinthians_V12	Ilangita	atughlleqaat	gold-a,	silver-a,	jewel-a,	ilangita	unaghsiq,	paliqaq	vegaaq,	ungagaqlu	tunemakun	taaggun.
B07_03_1Corinthians_V13	Sangwaa	atuqegkaghput	esghaghyaghqaqaghput	ataasikaghtaamta	qamagtengngwaaghluta	aghneghmi	tawani	Christ-am	nanqigtilleghqaani.	Kenghem	esghaghtesaghqaqaa	qepghaqaghput	natetulanga.
B07_03_1Corinthians_V14	Sangwaa	yugem	atuqegkaa	kumanghilkuni,	akileghtusangyaghqaaguq.
B07_03_1Corinthians_V15	Iwernga	ilangan	yugem	qepghaqaa	iflayaghqaaguq	kumaquni,	akileghtusangnaanghituqlu.	Naqamenraq	ellnga	yugulillengyaghqaaguq,	katam	tawaten	keneghmeng	aanelghiistun.
B07_03_1Corinthians_V16	Liisimakngwaaghaghsi	Kiyaghneghem	Temple-kiisi.	Agleghnalghiik	Taghneghakek	kiyaghtengnguuk	ilugpesini!
B07_03_1Corinthians_V17	Kitum	alngunak	naafqegkagu	Kiyaghneghem	Temple-nga,	Kiyaghneghem	naafqesaghqaqaa	ellnga,	qayughllak	Kiyaghneghem	Temple-nga	agleghnalghiinguuq.	Elpesi	Temple-kiisi.
B07_03_1Corinthians_V18	Kina	alngunak	puughtefqaami	ellmineng	pili.	Nalighsi	sumeghtaghaangukumi	liitepagllakaaniluni	nunam	peghqinellghaneng,	yeqay	maliglligu	Christ-a,	ugpeqaanghilnguut	temngingunighngaatgu.	Tawaten	pikuni	elngaatall	peghqinghughtepiiglleqaa.
B07_03_1Corinthians_V19	Kiyaghneghmi	nunam	peghqinellgha	temnginguuq.	Akuzitni	Igaqegkani	igaqngaaq,	“Peghqinghet	yuget	nunami	whani	Kiyaghneghem	pipagningiitestaqii	ellngita	katam	peghqinellghitgun.”
B07_03_1Corinthians_V20	Igaqegkaaguqlu,	“Atanghem	liisimakaa	peghqinghem	yugem	sumeghtaghallgha	sasiinghituq.”
B07_03_1Corinthians_V21	Enkaangam	kitum	alngunak	qukaayugutkesaghqaqenghitii	sangwaat	yuget	piiqegkangit.	Sangwaa	qamaglluku	Kiyaghneghem	pinighqusighqaaghtestekaqaa	elpesinun,
B07_03_1Corinthians_V22	talwa	Paul,	Apollos,	Peter-llu.	Nunallu	una,	unguvalleqlu,	tuqulleqlu,	sangwaallu	alngunak	kiyaghtaalleghmelnguq	maaten,	sangwaallu	alngunak	kaasaghqaq,	qamagtengngwaaghluki	elpesi	pikasi.
B07_03_1Corinthians_V23	Enkaam	elpesi	Christ-am	pikiisi,	Christ-a	Kiyaghneghem	pikaa.
B07_04_1Corinthians_V4	Nallukaqa	sameng	anaggusimatka,	iwernga	anaggutellghinnilunga	pinghitunga.	Atanghhiinaam	nanqigsaghqaqaanga.
B07_04_1Corinthians_V1	Sumeghtaghaatkitekut	qepghaghtekniluta	Christ-amun.	Qepghaghtenguukut	apeghtughilghiit	ipapighqelleghmeng	Kiyaghneghem	apeghtuutkaaneng	whangkunnun.
B07_04_1Corinthians_V2	Christ-am	qepghaghtengi	ataasiighmesaghqaagut.
B07_04_1Corinthians_V3	Whanga,	ataasiighmennilunga	qepghaghta	pikufsinga,	nalighmeng	ataasiighmenneghinnilunga	kitum	alngunak	pikanganga,	sumeghtaghaatkennaanghitaqa.	Talwa	whangamneng	nanqigsigatunga.
B07_04_1Corinthians_V4	Enkaangam	wiin	nanqigtegpenaan	kina	alngunak	sallghaneng.	Atanghem	taginqigtekumi	kukegsaghqaqii	yuget	ilungit	aliighqelluki	sangwaat	iighngayalghiit	tesqamani.	Aliighqesaghqaqii	sangameng	saaqutangi.	Taagken	usuqsaghqat	tamaakut	usuqellengyaghqaagut	Kiyaghneghmeng.
B07_04_1Corinthians_V5	Ugpeqaalgutemni,	elpesi	apalluqlusi	Apollos-lu	whangkutung	usputaqnguukung.	Usputaagukung	elpesinun	liitesqelluku	una	igaqnalghii	sameng	pisiitanga.	“Qaatkaqiteki	sangwaat	igaqngalghiit	Akuzitni	Igaqekani.”	Nalighhiinaghpesi	aangaayugutkesaqunaan	ataasiq	yuuk,	aallgha	ugumikluku.
B07_04_1Corinthians_V6	Kitum	pinighataghaghtestisi	ugpeqaalgutegpesineng?	Sangwaa	qamaglluku	Kiyaghneghmeng	pikaghsi.	Kiyaghneghem	tuunumakangisi,	aangaayugtegpenasi.	Ungipaghpenasi	whaten,	“Sangwa	qamaglluku	whangamneng	pikaqaqa.”
B07_04_1Corinthians_V7	Allgeghtengngwaaghumaaghsi	aklukegkaghsi	qamaglluku!	Aklungighingwaaghlusi	ayuqusi!	Whangkungunasi	umiilgughsimaasi!	Umiilgulghiisituq,	enkaam	umiilgutilgusighnayaghamsi!
B07_04_1Corinthians_V8	Sumeghtaghallemni	Kiyaghneghem	nekegtekaqiinkut	apostle-eni	ukalighpigaaluta	yugneng.	Anusimingllaghastun	ayuqukut,	tuqusaghqastun.	Yuget	qamagtengngwaaghluteng,	yaqulgetlu	esghapagaqiinkut.
B07_04_1Corinthians_V9	Whangkuta	nallungughtekaagukut	Christ-a	apalluqluku,	iwernga	elpesi	sumeghpesini	peghqinepiguusi	ugpeqani.	Yuget	waakigatiinkut,	iwernga	sumeghpesini	elpesi	nagataqiisillu	quulvaghaqiisillu,	whangkuta	pingigatiinkut.
B07_04_1Corinthians_V10	Whavemun	kenlanga	neqangisagaqukut,	meghyaghqiisagaqukut,	aatkiisagaqukut.	Yuget	qevutkaqiinkut.	Nengitukut,	igleghtaagukut	quunpeng.
B07_04_1Corinthians_V11	Qepghaghaqukutlu	qevuulluta	maningnaluta	kiyaghtaaghusighqameng.	Seghlequulghiit	whangkunneng	pinitun	aleghqughaqaput.	Ugpeqaatemnneng	amyuutkenghinkut	akuzilgiigatukutlu	akisigataputlu.
B07_04_1Corinthians_V12	Iqlengiqutkenghinkut	pinitun	aleghqughaqaput	tawaten	pifqiita	pisqelluki.	Whavemun	kenlanga	sumeghtaghaatkaqiinkut	sakwaaghestunllu	sasiinghilngughestunllu.
B07_04_1Corinthians_V13	Latangunghitunga	kaynguyuggnalusi.	Iwernga	piniqepigllusi	whanga	katam	taghnughhaqelghistun	liilightughyugaqamsi	kiyaghtaalleghqaghpesineng.
B07_04_1Corinthians_V14	Qaywa	apeghtughistetupigsaghngaaghpesi	Christ-ameng,	atatughllanghitusi.	Ugpeqsuwhaghaqngafsigu	Jesus	Christ-a	nagaqughluki	Pinilghiit	Ungipat,	tawanita	atastun	lliiqanga	elpesinun.
B07_04_1Corinthians_V15	Enkaangam	kiyaghtesupigtamsi	whangamtun.
B07_04_1Corinthians_V16	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	Timothy	kayagtengngwaaqa	elpesinun.	Ighneqelghiistun	ayuqaqa	Ataneghqun.	Ataasiighmelnguq	ugpeqaq	piniqepigtaqa.	Neqangughhnaaghiisi	naten	whanga	kiyaghtaqellemneng	Christ-amun.	Tawatelnguq	kiyaghtaalleq	apeghtuusaqaqaqa	ugpeqanun	tamanganilngughnun.
B07_04_1Corinthians_V17	Ilasi	aangaayugneghughtaqut,	qayughllak	sumeghmeggni	laalighhnaanghinnilunga	pikaqaatnga	Corinth-mun.
B07_04_1Corinthians_V18	Iwernga	Atanghem	piyukelqegkagu,	elpesinun	piyaghtungestaghtunga.	Taagken	liigikelleqanka	aangaayugneghet	aangaayugtelleghmegestun	piyaghqaatangi.
B07_04_1Corinthians_V19	Kiyaghneghem	Ataneghpagullgha	akuzitetgun	ayuqenghituq	iwernga	aghtughyaghqaanghilleghqun	ayuquq.
B07_04_1Corinthians_V20	Kaaskuma	sasqesugestengnga?	Anagutalighlungaa	aghyuughlamsii,	nalighmeng	piniqlusi,	pinitungwaaq	pilamsii?
B07_05_1Corinthians_V5	
B07_05_1Corinthians_V1	Nagaqughaqaqa	nalighpesinguq	atami	nulighha	nulighqelghiistun	ayuqaa.	Seghlepiglleghhiimeng	seghleghqengnguuq	talwa	ugpeqaanghilnguut	atuqesnayanghitaat	taana	seghleghqelleq.
B07_05_1Corinthians_V2	Paninang	yuukutkaqetsii	elpesineng	katam?	Qivghughllagyaqlegestun!	Elpesi	iqisaqlegestun	yuuk	taana	akulegpesineng.
B07_05_1Corinthians_V3	Uyavanteghllagyaghngaaghma	sumeghtaghaatkeghllawaaqa.	Tawanlengughestun	elpesini	agghitkegkaqaqa	naten	pilleghqameng	taana	yuuk	aatghakun	Atanemta	Jesus-em.	Ugpeqani,	allameng	qerngughuskufsi,	tawanlengughestun	umyugaghmiklunga,	aghtughyaghqanghillghakun	Jesus	Christ-am	yuuk	taana	elpesinitestegpenaan	allamengllu	pinakesi.	Tuuniteggu	Tughneghagh-mun,	piyukelleghmitun	yugusii	naafqelligu,	enkaam	taghneghakek	yugulillengesqellukek	Ataneq	taginqigtekan.
B07_05_1Corinthians_V6	Piniiyugtelleghsi	seghleghuuq.	Liisimakaghsi	whaten	pilleq,	“Yeast-am	ghhuughtesteghllakayuwaa	akuutaq.”
B07_05_1Corinthians_V7	Tamaaken	apallukluku	seghleghqellghet	akulegpesinilnguut	iqiteki.	Tawaten	pikufsi	pelungillequsi	akuutastun	yeast-angilngughestun.	Ipa	pelungitusi	qayughllak	Christ-a	Passover-em	penniighaghaqaa	aghqutkegkaaguq	seghleghqellemnnun.
B07_05_1Corinthians_V8	Katam	Jews-et	iqitellghistun	yeast-at	mangteghameggneng	yataaghqutfagilgamegteggu	Passover-em	neqenghaghqellgha,	tawateghpigaq	seghleghqelleput	iqilleqaput.	Enkaangam	pelungillequkut,	ipapighqengngallequkutlu.
B07_05_1Corinthians_V9	Ilangitgun	latama	ilatngasnanighamsi	ugpeqanun	anagngalghiikun	atuqullghiinun.
B07_05_1Corinthians_V10	Akuzitkengngunghitanka	uum	nunam	yugi	anagngalghiikun	atuqullghiit,	nalighmeng	pakigneghet,	wayaghniightet,	nalighmeng	tamaakut	maniguutkayuget	kiyaghnengllaqanun.	Iqisukufsi	tawatelngughneng	yugneng	nuna	unisaghqaqaghsi.
B07_05_1Corinthians_V11	Iwernga	latamkun	ilatesnaniqaqamsi	tamaakunun	ugpeqaalgutnguniluteng	pilghiinun	sex-kun	seghleghqengngukata,	nalighmeng	pakigneghukata,	maniguutkayugukata	kiyaghnengllaqanun,	seghlequughutngukata	yulgutmeng,	meghestengukata,	wayaghniightengukatallu.	Talwa	neghelgusighpenaki	tawatelnguut.
B07_05_1Corinthians_V12	Whanga	nanqigsaghqaqenghitanka	ugpeqaanghilnguut;	Kiyaghneghem	nanqigsaghqaqii.	Iwernga	elpesi	nanqigsaghqaqsaghasi	ugpeqaalgutesi.	Akuzitet	Igaqegkat	piit,	“Seghleghqesta	iqiteggu	akulegpesineng.”
B07_06_1Corinthians_V6	Yeghlegi	ugpeqam	ugpeqaalgutni	aglaataqaa	ugpeqaanghilngughnun	nanqigtistenun,	agghitkesqelluki	aaghtiiraaghutelletek.
B07_06_1Corinthians_V1	Nalighsi	aaghtiiraaneghmini	ugpeqaalgutmineng,	sangan	aglaataqagu	nanqigtivigmun?	Kaynguyugigatsii	ugpeqaanghilngughnun	nanqigtesneghpesini	elpesi	ugpeqani?	Ugpeqat	ugpeqaalgutmeggnun	taklaghutesaghqaayaghtut	aaghtiiraaghutelleghmeggneng.
B07_06_1Corinthians_V2	Liisimakenghistegguu	Kiyaghneghem	yugan	nanqigsaghqii	ugpeqaanghilnguut	ilangani	aghneghem?	Nanqigsaghqaqngukufsiki,	naten	piyaqnaghtutkalleqeftat	elpesinun	nanqigtelleghqii	piyaqniilnguut?
B07_06_1Corinthians_V3	Liisimakenghistekii	nanqigsaghqaqekeput	yaqulget?	Enkaam	taklaghqullghet	aaghtiraaghutelleghneng	whani	unguvalleghmi	piyaqniisaghqaayaghtut.
B07_06_1Corinthians_V4	Aaghtiiraaghunneghpesini	sangafsingam	ugpeqaanghilngughnun	piiqetsi	nanqigtesqellusi?
B07_06_1Corinthians_V5	Kayngunaghhaghmeng	elpesi!	Liisimakaqa	akulegpesini	liisimalghiimeng	taklaghutistekaghqalguut	ugpeqaalgutet	aaghtiiraaghullghiit.
B07_06_1Corinthians_V6	Tawatetelleghpesigun	ugpeqaanghilngughestun	kiyaghtaaghuusi.	Ugpeqaalgutesi	aglaategpenaki	nanqigtivigmun.	Nepiighutaqiteki	anagteghngiisi,	puughteghngiisi.
B07_06_1Corinthians_V7	Itupill	elpesi	katam	ugpeqaalgutesi	anagtaqasillu	puughtaqasillu.
B07_06_1Corinthians_V8	Ipapestaaq	liisimaksaghqaqsaghaghsi	seghletun	pistet	nekaghqiilnguut	Ataneghpagullghani	Kiyaghneghem.	Puughtestegpenasi	kitumun	alngunak.	Kiyaghneghem	Ataneghpagullghani	nekaghqiitut:	sex-kun	seghleghqegkayuget,	maniguutkayuget	kiyaghnengllaqanun,	gelgaghniightet,	aghnaasit,	yuget	yulgutmeggneng	atuqikayuget,	aghnat	aghnaalgutmeggneng	atuqikayuget.
B07_06_1Corinthians_V9	Tamaakutlu	teglengalghiit,	pakigneghet,	meghestet,	seghlequughtet	yugneng,	wayaghniightet,	nekaghqiitut	Ataneghpagullghani	Kiyaghneghem.
B07_06_1Corinthians_V10	Ilasi	tawatesalghiit	salin	ugpeqillghilluteng	Christ-ameng.	Iwernga	maaten	Kiyaghneghem	Taghneghagkenka	ughvughqegkaqiisi	seghleghqelleghpesineng,	aaftekaqiisi	Kiyaghneghmun,	seghleghqumangilngughestunllu	lliightekaagusi	qayughllak	ugpeqilghiisi	Ataneghqun	Jesus	Christ-akun.
B07_06_1Corinthians_V11	Ilasi	pikaagut,	“Itagnaghtuq	sangwaa	piyukelqa	piyaghngaamkun.”	Iwernga	whanga	piimsi,	ilangan	salleghpesi	kayuusiinnaanghitii	ugpellesi.	Aa,	entaqun,	“Itagnaghtuq	sangwaa	piyukelqa	piyaghngaamkun.”	Iwernga	sumeghtaghaghyalghiinga	seghleghmun	ayghipagllagnayukama	pinaanghitunga.
B07_06_1Corinthians_V12	Kinallu	pinayalghii,	“Neqa	ulimaaghuuq	aqsaqumun,	aqsaquq	neqmun.”	Aa,	iwernga	ilangani	aghneghem	Kiyaghneghem	naafqesaghqaqaak	qamagllukek	aqsaquqlu	neqallu.	Yugusiq	sex-kun	seghleghqusighqaanghisaghtuq	qayughllak	yugusiq	Ataneghmun	pinguuq,	Ataneq	yugusimnnun	pinguuq.
B07_06_1Corinthians_V13	Ilangani	aghneghem	Kiyaghneghem	makesaghqaqii	yugusiput	tuqulleghmeng	aghtughyaghqaanghilleghmikun,	tawateghpigaq	maketelleghmitun	Ataneq	Jesus	Christ-a	tuqulleghmeng.
B07_06_1Corinthians_V14	Liisimakenghistegguu	yugusisi	nalighneqegkangi	Christ-am	yugusiin?	Yugusiqa	Christ-am	piliitkaa	atuqnaaghsikuun	aghnamun	akikikayugmeng	yugusimineng?	Nakaa!	Pinaanghitaqa.
B07_06_1Corinthians_V15	Neqamikluku,	yugem	atuqegkumigu	aghnaq	akikilghii	yugusimineng	ataasiightekayugek	yugusiik.	Qayughllak	igaqngaaq	Akuzitni	Igaqegkani,	“Maalghuk	yugusik	ataasighsaghqaaguk.”
B07_06_1Corinthians_V16	Iwernga	Ataneghmun	lliiquvek,	ataasiigutek	taghneghakun.
B07_06_1Corinthians_V17	Liisimakenghistegguu	yugusisi	Kiyaghneghem	Temple-kegkangi,	Agleghnalghiim	Taghneghagkenka	kiyaghfigi?	Kiyaghneghem	tuunegkaqiisi	Agleghnalghiigneng	Taghneghaghmineng,	enkaam	maaten	Kiyaghneghem	piliitkaqiisi.	Elpesineng	pikenghitusi.	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	sex-kun	seghleghqegpenasi.	Sex-kun	seghleghqegkufsi,	nukeggnaghqelghiistun	Kiyaghneghem	Temple-nga	pilleqaghsi.	Ilangi	seghleghqellghet	tawatenneghitut.	Kiyaghneghem	tukfiqaqiisi	akitupiglluku.	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	quulvaghteggu	Kiyaghneq	yugusighpesigun.
B07_07_1Corinthians_V7	Whangamtuntuq	nulightufqaafsi,	aghnanillu	ugiifqaafsi.	Iwernga	allakutukut.	Kiyaghneghem	nuliilgustekayugii	ilangi	yuget,	ugilgustekayugii	ilangi	aghnat.	Iwernga	itagnaghtestekayugii	ilangi	yuget	nuliingunaki,	aghnatlu	ugingunaki.	Kiyaghneghem	allakullghii	tunusaq	tuunegkayuwaa	yugnunllu	aghnanunllu.
B07_07_1Corinthians_V1	Aaptekaqaghpesinga	nengughutelleghmeng	latagpesigun.	Ukusta	kiimsiitenka.	Pinightuq	yuuk	nuliingunani.
B07_07_1Corinthians_V2	Iwernga	yuuk	tamaghhaghmi	nuliilguyaghqaaguq,	aghnaq	tamaghhaghmi	ugilguyaghqaaguq,	qayughllak	nanghiiqullengnayukafsi	sex-kun	seghleghqelleghmun.
B07_07_1Corinthians_V3	Yugem	efqughsaghqaqaa	nuliini.	Tawategghpigaq	aghnam	efqusaghqaqaa	ugini	atuqutelleghmegni.
B07_07_1Corinthians_V4	Aghnam	ellnginaghmi	yugusini	pikenghitaa,	uginganllu	pikaa.	Tawateghpigaq	yugem	ellnginaghmi	yugusini	pikenghitaa,	nulighhanllu	pikaa.
B07_07_1Corinthians_V5	Nengughsimakufsi	ighsakutegpenasi.	Wetkuqun	itagnaqullusi	atuqusaghqaafqaafsi	qafsinat	unuget	yughaghataghaghnalusi.	Taagken	atuqunneqiglleghhaasi	nanghiiqullengnayukafsi	Tughneghagh-meng	qayughllak	nuqesaghqaananiqaalghiisi.
B07_07_1Corinthians_V6	Qelghunghitamsi	nulightiisqellusi	nalighmeng	ugiighesqellusi.	Iwernga	piyukufsi	pilghaasi.
B07_07_1Corinthians_V7	Unata	pikegka	nulightuumangilngughnun,	ugiighumangilngughnunllu,	ugingighanunllu:	Pinighnayaghtusi	nulightunghisaqufsi	whangamtun,	aghnanillu	ugiinghisaqufsi.
B07_07_1Corinthians_V8	Iwernga	yuuk	pinighataghaghnayaghtuq	nulightughluni	nuqetepagningilnguq	aghnaghyulleghmineng.	Aghnaqlu	pinighataghaghnayaghtuq	ugiighluni	nuqetepagnengilnguq	yugyulleghmineng.	Pinighataghaghnayaghtusi	nengughllusi	nanghiiqullengelleghqaghpesineng	seghleghqelleghmun	sex-kun.
B07_07_1Corinthians_V9	Ukut	akuzitet	whangamneng	pingunghitut,	qelghusaagut	Ataneghmeng	nengughtekanun.	Aghnaq	iqisaghqaanghituq	ugimineng.
B07_07_1Corinthians_V10	Iwernga	iqiskumi,	allaneng	ugiighyaghqaanghituq	nalighmeng	ugiminun	lliinqiglli.	Yugemllu	iqitesaghqaqenghitaa	nuliini.
B07_07_1Corinthians_V11	Una	qelghusaq	whangamneng	pinguuq	ilangitnun.	(Atanghem	sameng	piighsimangitaa.)	Yuuk	ugpeqaq	ugpeqaanghilngughmeng	nuliilgukumi	ellminisulghiimeng,	iqitesneghilligu.
B07_07_1Corinthians_V12	Aghnaqlu	ugpeqaq	ugpeqaanghilngughmeng	ugilgukumi	ellminisulghiimeng,	iqinneghilli.
B07_07_1Corinthians_V13	Inqun	yuuk	ugpeqaanghilnguq	aaftengngwaaqaaguq	Kiyaghneghmun	qayughllak	nulighha	ugpeqaalghii.	Aghnaqlu	ugpeqaanghilnguq	aaftengngwaaqaaguq	Kiyaghneghmun	qayughllak	uginga	ugpeqaalghii.	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	taghnughhiit	pelungitutlu	aaftengngwaaqaagutlu.
B07_07_1Corinthians_V14	Iwernga	naliq	ugpeqaanghilnguq	iqisukumi,	iqilli.	Taagken	ugpeqaq	yuuk	nalighmeng	aghnaq	itemli	tawatelngughmeng	nengughtelleghmineng.	Kiyaghneghem	nekeggmellusi	kiyaghtesqesugaqiisi.
B07_07_1Corinthians_V15	Ugpeqami	aghnami,	ugigpeniskuvek	kayusiitaqsaaghan	yugulilleghmun.	Nalighmeng	ugpeqami	yugmi,	nuliighpeniskuvek	kayusiitaqsaaghan	yugulilleghmun.
B07_07_1Corinthians_V16	Kiyaghneghem	ataasikaghtaghpesi	ugpeqistaqngisi	Christ-ameng,	nengughtekaatsii	nalighmeng	nengughsimangitsii?	Circumcise-ekaatsii	nalighmeng	pimangitsii?	Qepghaghtelaaghuyaghetsii	nalighmeng	qepghaghtelaaghunghitetsii?	Almesiqlusi	tawaten	nagneghtek	qayughllak	Atanghem	tawatetestekaqiisi.	Qamaglluki	ugpeqat	taagken	apeghtughaqanka.
B07_07_1Corinthians_V17	Yuuk	circumcise-ekaq	ugpeghaqngami,	allangughtefqaami	pilghaaq.	Circumcise-emangilnguqlu	ugpeqaq,	circumcise-enaqefqaami	pilghaaq.
B07_07_1Corinthians_V18	Circumcise-elleqlu	circumcise-enghitelleqlu	pitngunghituk.	Pitnguyaghqaqta	taana	qaatkelluki	Kiyaghneghem	Liilightuusii.
B07_07_1Corinthians_V19	Ataasikaghtaghpesi	ugpeqiiqngafsi,	natetelleghpesistun	almesiqiteggu.
B07_07_1Corinthians_V20	Qepghaghtelaaghuyaghsiin	Kiyaghneghem	tuqlughaqngaten?	Sumeghtaghaatkegpenaan.	Iwernga	qepghaghtelaaghunanighnaqngukuvek,	saaqsin	legan	tawaten	pilghaaten.
B07_07_1Corinthians_V21	Qepghaghtelaaq	nakmikegkaa	Atanghem,	ellngan	itemngalghiikaa.	Tawateghpigaq	qepghaghtelaaghunghilnguq	yuuk	nakmikegkaa	Christ-am,	ellngan	qepghaghtelaaqaa.
B07_07_1Corinthians_V22	Kiyaghneghem	tukfighpakaqiisi,	enkaam	qepghaghtelaaghughtegpenasi	yugnun.
B07_07_1Corinthians_V23	Ugpeqaalgutemni,	tamaghhaghpesi	aghuliisaghqaagusi	ilatngalleghpesigun	Kiyaghneghmun	almesiqlusi	tawaten	tuqlullghatun.
B07_07_1Corinthians_V24	Aaptaqaghpesinga	naten	sumeghtaghaatkaqutangi	ugiighumangilnguutlu	nulightuumangilnguutlu.	Atanghem	ungipaasimangitaanga	Liilightuusameng	tamaakunun	yugnun,	iwernga	ungipaannaqamsi	sumeghtaghallemneng.	Kiyaghneghem	nangllegtallghakun	apostle-ngughtekaagunga.	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	neghyuknakefsinga.
B07_07_1Corinthians_V25	Seghleliighllagughtuq	nuna	maaten.	Sumemni	whanga	itagnaghyaghqaaguq	yuuk	almesiqluni.
B07_07_1Corinthians_V26	Nulightuumaziin?	Iqitestegpenaan	nulighhen.	Nulightuumangilkuvek,	nulightughnaqegpenang.
B07_07_1Corinthians_V27	Iwernga	nulightuquvek	seghleghqengngunghituten.	Ugiighumangilnguq	ugiiqumi,	seghleghqengngunghituq.	Iwernga	nulightuqufsi,	aghnatlu	ugiiqumeng	piyaqliighataghaghyaghqaagusi	whani	kiyaghtaalleghmi.	Piyaqliightesunghitepigtamsi	tawaten.
B07_07_1Corinthians_V28	Ugpeqaalgutemni,	unata	pikegka:	Ataneghput	tagiyaghtungestaghtuq.	Taana	apalluqluku	nengughtekat	qepghaallitgu	Ataneq	nengughsimangilngughestun.
B07_07_1Corinthians_V29	Qivghulghiitlu	qepghaallitgu	qivghunghilngughestun.	Quyangalghiitlu	qepghaallitgu	quyanghilngughestun.	Tamaakutlu	tukfightughllakayuget	qepghaallitgu	avangilngughestun.
B07_07_1Corinthians_V30	Kiyaghtengngulusi	nunami	whani,	megnukataghaghpenaan	nunam	sanqutanga.	Qayughllak	nuna	almesiqluni	aviighusaghqaaguq.
B07_07_1Corinthians_V31	Kiyaghtaalleghmengtuq	whaken	sumeghtaghaatkegkiilnguusi.	Nulightuumangilnguq	qepghalleghqaghtaaghatuq	Atanghem	qepghaqaaneng	qayughllak	efqughsugaqegkanga.
B07_07_1Corinthians_V32	Nuliilek	qepghaghataghaqayuquuq	kiyaghtaallghem	qepghaqaaneng	qayughllak	efqughsugaqegkanga	nuliini.	Enkaam	sumeghtaghallgha	malghughqengngaaquq.
B07_07_1Corinthians_V33	Tawateghpigaq	aghnatlu	ayuqut.	Aghnat	ugingiitkat,	ugiighumangilnguutlu	qepghalleghqaghtaaghatut	Atanghem	qepghaqaaneng,	qayughllak	yugusitengllu	taghneghatengllu	tuunyugaqiit	iinguniita	Ataneghmun.	Iwernga	ugilek	qepghaghataghaqayuguuq	kiyaghtaallghem	qepghaqaaneng	qayughllak	efqughsugaqegkanga	ugini.	Ellnganllu	sumeghtaghallgha	malghughqengngaaq.
B07_07_1Corinthians_V34	Tawaten	piimsi	kayusiinnalusi.	Nengughtesnaninghitamsi.	Iwernga	nakmikesugaqa	pinilleghpigaq	elpesinun	qepghaatesqelluku	Ataneq	uglafqusingunasi.
B07_07_1Corinthians_V35	Nuliighqalgem	atuqsugyaguskumigu	nuliighqani,	nengughllik.	Enkaam	nengughtekumek	seghleghqengngunaanghituk.
B07_07_1Corinthians_V36	Iwernga	yugem	liisimakngwaaqumigu	naten	pilleghqani,	nuqetutngukumigullu	atuqsulleghmineng	nuliighqani,	pinitun	pinguuq.	Kitum	alngunak	nulightiisqughaanghilkumigu,	nulightughyunghilkumi	pinitun	pinguuq.
B07_07_1Corinthians_V37	Nuliighqalek	nengughlluni	pinitun	pinguuq,	iwernga	nuliighqalek	nengughhneghilkumi	pinighataghatun	pinguuq.
B07_07_1Corinthians_V38	Aghnaq	allaneng	ugiighyaghqaanghituq	ugini	kiyaghlluku.	Iwernga	ugini	tuqukan,	piyukelleghmineng	ugiighyaghngaaghmi	itagnaghtuq,	taawanginaq	ugpeqaghhiinaghmeng.
B07_07_1Corinthians_V39	Iwernga	quyangaaghataghaghyaghqaaguq	ugiinqiggneghilkuni.	Taakusta	sumeghtaghallghenka.	Ugpeqaqa	Kiyaghneghem	Taghneghakek	whangamnituk.
B07_08_1Corinthians_V8	Iwernga	neqa	pitngunghituq.	Kiyaghneghem	usuqataghaghnaanghitiisi	neghelleghpesigun	neqmeng.	Aghqutkegkameng	neghenghilkumta	sangwaa	alngunak	iflanaanghitaghput	Kiyaghneghmeng	ayuqelghii.	Talwa	negheghngaamta	allgeghunnanghitukut	ellnganeng.
B07_08_1Corinthians_V1	Kiimsighyuganka	aapqughaallesi	neqneng	aghqutkegkaneng	kiyaghnengllaqanun.	Ipanguuq	whaten	pilleghsi,	“Liisimallelguukut	qamaglluta.”	Tawatelnguq	liisimalleq	aangaayugtestikayuguuq,	iwernga	piniqellghem	iknaqughtengngwaa	ugpelleghput.
B07_08_1Corinthians_V2	Yuuk	pillguyugneq,	esghaghhuta	taana	paninang	liisaghqaghtuqaq.
B07_08_1Corinthians_V3	Iwernga	Kiyaghneghem	piniqisteni	whaten	piyaghqaqii,	“Whanga	pikanka.”
B07_08_1Corinthians_V4	Enkaam	neghelleqestaa	aghqutkegkameng	kiyaghnengllaqanun?	Liisimakaput	kiyaghnengllaqat	kiyaghneghunghitut.	Ataasighhaaguq	Kiyaghneq,	alla	kiyaghneghituq.
B07_08_1Corinthians_V5	Ilangita	yuget	ugpeqaqaat	kiyaghneghtuniluku,	ataneghtuniluku	qilaklu	nunallu.
B07_08_1Corinthians_V6	Iwernga	whangkuta	liisimakaghput	ataasighhaaguq	Kiyaghneq,	ellnga	Atanghuuq.	Sangwaa	qamaglluni	ellnganeng	pinguuq,	kiyaghtengnguukut	ellnganun.	Liisimakaghputlu	ataasighhaaguq	Ataneq,	Jesus	Christ-anguuq.	Ellngakun	sangwaa	qamaglluni	ulimakaaguq,	unguvanguukutlu	ellngakun.
B07_08_1Corinthians_V7	Ilangita	ugpeqat	nallukiit	kiyaghnengllaqat	kiyaghnepigunghitulangi.	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	ugpeqaqiit	neqet	aghqutkaqniluki	kiyaghnepignun.	Enkaam	neneghmeggni	aghqutkegkameng	sumeghtaghaghaqut,	“Seghleghqunga.”
B07_08_1Corinthians_V8	Ugpeqaghllagni	elpesi,	piyukelleghpesistun	piyaghqaalghiisi,	liigikngategpesineng	taana	ipapighqelleq	apeghtuusaqegkaqa.	Iwernga	kelengalusi	kayaalnguut	ugpellghit	ayuqniighqegpenaki	ellngita	sumeghtaghallghitni	anaggutngalghiimeng.
B07_08_1Corinthians_V9	Naliita	esghaqumiten	neghumaluten	kiyaghnengllaqat	temple-ngitni,	ellngallu	neghyugyaaghtuq	sumeghtaghalleghmini	anaggutngayaghngaan.
B07_08_1Corinthians_V10	Enkaam	liisimalleghpek	seghleghqestesaaghaa	kayaalnguq	ugpellgha	iflasluku,	ugpeqaalgutkan	Christ-am	tuqutkegkaa.
B07_08_1Corinthians_V11	Enkaangam	ayuqniighqegkufsiki	sumeghtaghallghitni	anaggutngalghiimeng,	seghleghqellequsi	ellngitnunllu	Christ-amunllu.
B07_08_1Corinthians_V12	Enkaam	neghellemkun	aghqutqegkameng	seghleghqesnayukamkun	ugpeqaalgutka,	allamengllu	neghnaanghitunga	sameng	tamaaken.
B07_09_1Corinthians_V9	Igaqegkaaguq	Liilightuusani,	Kiyaghneghem	tuunegkaakun	Moses-mun:	“Sugrugiitalighpenan	ox-a	wheat-et	tutmaghtesneghpesiki	qantiit	sigiqesqelluki.”	Kiyaghneghem	sumeghmikenghitaguu	ox-a?
B07_09_1Corinthians_V1	Itemngaanga,	piyukellemtun	piyaghqaagunga.	Apostle-nguunga	esghaatkaq	Jesus-meng	Atanemnneng.	Qepghaatellemkun	ellnga	ugpeqaagusi	elpesi.
B07_09_1Corinthians_V2	Talwa	ilangita	apostle-epigunghinnighngaatnga	elpesi	liisimakaghpesinga	apostle-epiiguunga	Ataneghqun,	qayughllak	kiyaghtaalleghpesi	Christ-amun	kelguskanga.
B07_09_1Corinthians_V3	Taakusta	aapghaqegkenka	seghleqistemnun.
B07_09_1Corinthians_V4	Barnabas-lu	whangkutung	tungsighnaanghistuung	neghyaghqamengllu	meghyaghqamengllu	elpesineng	apeghtuqamtegneng?
B07_09_1Corinthians_V5	Navek	pinemtung	kelqepagningitestegnekii	ugpeqat	nuliipung	ilangistun	apostle-et,	Atanghem	anglegutangistunllu,	Peter-etunllu?
B07_09_1Corinthians_V6	Barnabas-lu	whangkutuung	ellnginaghhaamtung	qepghaasimanginaghyaghqaqestegneguu	neqekaghqaghpung?
B07_09_1Corinthians_V7	Pilluwaghtem	tukfighyaghqaqenghitii	saghyani	pilluwaghtenilluni.	Tawateghpigaq	grapes-meng	piitesiighaghtem	neghegkayugii	ilangi	piitestekani.	Penniighniightemllu	penniighmi	mamaan	ilanga	pikayugaa.
B07_09_1Corinthians_V8	Taakut	usputat	yugem	apeghtuusaqii,	iwernga	Kiyaghneghem	Liilightusaanillu	apeghtuusat	tawatetut.
B07_09_1Corinthians_V9	Sangami	Kiyaghneq	tawaten	pii?	Ox-nginaghhaaq	suumqaguu?	Nakaa,	whangkutallu	suumqaqiinkut.	Ipapestaaq	whangkunnunllu	igaqegkaaguq,	qayughllak	piitesighaghvigmeng	yataaghqistenunllu	saghnastenunllu	neghyukegkayugaaput	nengighqaput.
B07_09_1Corinthians_V10	Kiyaghneghem	akuzitangi	piisaghqastun	ayuqut.	Whangkutung	piitesighaghvikegkaqamsi,	enkaam	taghneghasi	quyastekaagut.	Tungsipaglleqestuung	tungsighvikegkumsi	aklukegkamtegneng?
B07_09_1Corinthians_V11	Apeghtughistem	ilangi	elpesineng	allgeghutngukata	aklukegkameggneng,	whangkutung	wataqaaghaq	piyaghqaghpigaayaghtukung.	Yeghlegi	qepghaghyukaagukung	maningeregaghnalutung	aklukegkamtegneng	allgeghunnalutung.	Ilangani	manipagitaqukung.	Talwa	tamaani	aapsugigatamsi	akileghtiisqellutung.	Unata	apalluqa,	kitumun	alngunak	whaten	pisunghitukung,	“Paul	ungipaqiiquq	Pinilghiineng	Ungipaneng	akileghtuusangepigesnaghnaluni.”
B07_09_1Corinthians_V12	Liisimakasi	Temple-em	qepghaghtengi	neghegkayuget	neqmeng	Temple-mun	tuunegkameng.	Aghqefigemllu	qepghaghtengi	nengiqayuguut	aghqutkaghqameng.
B07_09_1Corinthians_V13	Tawatetuq	Atanghem	qelghusaa:	Ungipaghtetlu	Pinilghiineng	Ungipaneng	aklukegkateng	allgeghsaghqaqiit	tamaakuneng	ugpeqikaneng	Pinilghiineng	Ungipaneng.
B07_09_1Corinthians_V14	Elpesineng	sameng	alngunak	allgeghusigatunga	pikaghqaqsaqemneng.	Sumeghtaghaatkegpenanga	sameng	alngunak	tungsighnilunga	maaten.	Quyaaqunga	akileghtiisqigalnguunga	elpesinun	ungipaqinemni	Pinilghiineng	Ungipaneng.	Ungipaqinaqnguunga	akileghtuusiiteghngaaghma	talwa	paneghyaghngaaghma.	Enkaam	kitum	alngunak	pinaanghitaanga,	“Paul	ungipaqiiquq	Pinilghiineng	Ungipaneng	akileghtuusangepigesnaghnaluni.”
B07_09_1Corinthians_V15	Iwernga	aangaayugusighqiitunga	ungipaqinemni	Pinilghiineng	Ungipaneng,	qayughllak	Kiyaghneghem	qelqaqaanga	ungipaqisqellunga.	Seghleghwaaghunayaghtunga	qaatkenghisaqumkun	Kiyaghneq.
B07_09_1Corinthians_V16	Nakmikegkaqsaqumkun	una	qepghaqaq	whangamneng	akileghtuusaghqalgunilunga	pinayaghtunga,	iwernga	Kiyaghneghem	nakmikegkaqutanganeng	piyaghqaqaqa	akileghtuusiiteghngaaghma.	Alla	naten	pilleghqiitunga.
B07_09_1Corinthians_V17	Sangaawa	akileghtuusaqa?	Akileghtuusaqaqa	una,	quyapigtaqunga	akileghtuusangunanga	ungipaqinemni	Pinilghiineng	Ungipaneng,	qaywa	akileghtughyaghqaqsaghngaaghpesinga.
B07_09_1Corinthians_V18	Qepghaghtelaaghunghisaghngaaghma,	whangamneng	katam	qepghaghtelaaghughtekaagunga	kitumun	alngunak,	yugmun	uglalghiimun	ugpeqesqelluku	Christ-a.
B07_09_1Corinthians_V19	Jews-eninnemni	kiyaghtaqunga	ellngistun,	ugpeqesqelluku	Christ-a.	Kiyaghhnemni	Gentile-eni	Liilightuusatgun	kiyaghtaaghni,	ellngistun	kiyaghtaqunga	liisimakeghngaamkun	qaatkutellemkun	Liilightuusatgun	yugulillengyaghqaanghiteghngaaghma,	ugpeqesqelluku	Christ-a.
B07_09_1Corinthians_V20	Gentile-eninnemni	nallukilghiini	Liilightuusaneng,	ellngistun	kiyaghtaqunga	nallukelghiistun	Liilightuusat,	ugpeqesqelluku	Christ-a.	Qaatkengngunghinniluki	pingunghitanka	Kiyaghneghem	Liilightuusii,	iwernga	qaatkengngwaanka	Christ-am	Liilightuusii.
B07_09_1Corinthians_V21	Kayaalngughni	kiyaghhnemni	ellngistun	lliighaqunga,	ugpeqesqelluku	Christ-a.	Enkaangam	kinkustun	alngunak	kiyaghtaqunga	natesaghngaata,	naten	alngunak	yugulillengesqelluki.
B07_09_1Corinthians_V22	Tawaten	piiqunga	nagaqiisqeqeghlluki	Pinilghiineng	Ungipaneng,	qayughllak	quyastellengaqelghiingallu	ugpeqenghatgu	Christ-a.
B07_09_1Corinthians_V23	Qamaglluteng	ketanqustet	sivuliiyukayuguut,	iwernga	ataasighhaq	kayaalqiikayuguuq.	Kiyaghtaalleghpesini	Christ-amun,	ketanqustestun	kayaalqiinaqaqitek.
B07_09_1Corinthians_V24	Ketanqustet	ulapaqut	yugusiteng	iknaqughhnaluki	qayughllak	qaghpangyugaqelghiit	avayameng	ququngalegmeng.	Tamaakut	palighyaghqaagut.	Iwernga	qaghpa	ugpeqat	allgeghsaghqaat	quunpekaghqaaguq.
B07_09_1Corinthians_V25	Ketanqustestun	taklaghruketun	ketanqwaaqunga	kaannalunga	kenlemun.	Nalighmeng	tenglugtestun,	tenglugpagaataghaqunga	kayaalqiinalunga.
B07_09_1Corinthians_V26	Ungipaqiiqunga	naten	kiyaghtelleghqameng	Christ-amun.	Whangallu	kiyaghtengnguunga	ellnganun	enkaam	yugusimnun	qaatkestaqunga,	luuraq	pinghilkuma	Kiyaghneghem	iqinnayukanganga	ellmineng.
B07_10_1Corinthians_V10	Akuzilgaghpenasi	ilangistun.	Yaqulgem	tuqustikayugem	tuququqaqii	ilangi	sivuneput	qayughllak	akuzilgaatkaqegkangat	Kiyaghneq.
B07_10_1Corinthians_V1	Ugpeqaalgutemni,	sumeghtaghaatkesqesuganka	Jews-et,	maligsaaghikat	Moses-meng.	Egypt-meng	aghulaqaqngameng	qamaglluteng	maligtekaqaat	qilawaaq,	maghyaghqughilghii	tuumkaghqiitgun.	Kaasata	Kavilngughmun	Kelliimun,	Kiyaghneghem	pelleghtekaqegkanga	meq	aghviisqelluki	yaywaaseng.
B07_10_1Corinthians_V2	Qamaglluteng	paaptaayekaalghiit	qilawaaghqunllu	Kavilngughqunllu	Kelliikun	maligsaaghtenguluteng	Moses-mun.
B07_10_1Corinthians_V3	Qamaglluteng	neghegkaagut	manna-meng,
B07_10_1Corinthians_V4	meghegkaagut	ataasimeng	taagken	meghmeng	Kiyaghneghem	Taghneghagkenka	tuunegkaaneng.	Meghegkaqaat	meq	maaqegkaq	uyghagmeng.	Taam	uyghagem	maligsaaqaqegkangi	Kiyaghneghem	Taghneghagkenkun.	Uyghak	taana	Christ-anguuq.
B07_10_1Corinthians_V5	Tawaten	Kiyaghneghem	aflengakegkaqeghngiisteng,	paninang	allulluteng	efqughsimangilkangat	ellnga.	Enkaam	tumangani	Kiyaghneghem	tuqustaqluki	yugusighqwaaghit	mingitkaalghiit	kilgaani.
B07_10_1Corinthians_V6	Tamaana	qamaglluni	pillghat	whangkunnun	usputaaguq,	kelengasaaghiinkut	ellngistun	piyukefqaan	seghleq	pisqelluku.
B07_10_1Corinthians_V7	Manigughtengughtegpenasi	kiyaghnengllaqanun	ilangistun.	Akuzitni	Igaqegkani	igaqegkaaguq,	“Yugetlu	aghnatlu	neghaqut,	meghaqut	taagken	aghulaaqut.”	Tawaten	maniguutkaagut	gold-meng	ulimaaghmun	kaawaghaghmun.
B07_10_1Corinthians_V8	Seghleghqefqaamta	sex-kun	ilangistun.	Allgeghnegha	seghleghqellghita	23,000	yuuk	tuqulaghaatkaaguq	ataasimi	aghneghmi.
B07_10_1Corinthians_V9	Nanghiiqunaqefqaamteggu	Atanghem	nuqenneghtullgha	pilteggu,	ilangistun.	Nemeghyat	tuququqaqiit	ilangi	sivuneput	qayughllak	nanghiiqukaqegkangat	Ataneq.
B07_10_1Corinthians_V10	Qamaglluki	tamaakut	sivunemta	atuqegkiit,	usputaghqaakaagut	whangkunnun.	Igaqegkaagut	kelengasaatnguluteng	whangkunnun	kiyaghlleghhiinun	kingulighni	aghneghni,	ellngistun	pifqaamta	pisqelluta.
B07_10_1Corinthians_V11	Enkaam	kina	alngunak	sumeghmini	pikumi	ugpelleni	aghuliinniluku,	kelengali	luuraq	seghleghqesaaghtuq.
B07_10_1Corinthians_V12	Qamaglluteng	nanghiiqullesi	allakaayagunghitut	yugnun.	Iwernga	Kiyaghneq	atasiighmetuq,	nanghiiqulleghmun	qaasghutesaghqaqenghitii	iknaqellesi,	iknaqellelitaqnaaghiisi	nuqetusighqameng.	Enkaam	iqitaqellequsi	taagken	nanghiiqulleghmeng.
B07_10_1Corinthians_V13	Piniqegkamni,	maniguutegpenasi	kiyaghnengllaqanun.
B07_10_1Corinthians_V14	Aleghqughamsi	sumeghnelgulusi,	sumeghtaghaatkennakesi	sameng	pilqa.
B07_10_1Corinthians_V15	Iyamsiqayagunnemteggu	qayuusimelnguq	wine-a	Atanghem	Neqenghaghqellghani,	nengighaqukut	Christ-am	aawaneng.	Iiggemnneng	aavgughluku	neqekrangllaq	nenemteggu,	nengighaqukut	Christ-am	yugusiineng.
B07_10_1Corinthians_V16	Neqekrangllaq	aavguqaaghngaaghmi	ataasiiguq.	Uglaghllagyaghngaamta,	ataasimeng	taagken	neghaqukut.	Enkaam	kelgutaqaa	nalighnequghniluta	ataasimun	yugusimun.
B07_10_1Corinthians_V17	Sumeghtaghaatkaghtekiqun	Israel-eghmiit;	neneghmeggni	aghqutkegkameng,	ilataqut	maniguullghiinun	Kiyaghneghmun	aghqefigegni.
B07_10_1Corinthians_V18	Sumeghpesinii	kiyaghnengllaqat	kiyaghnepiwaat?	Neqetlu	aghqutkegkat	kiyaghnengllaqanun,	maniguusipiwaaqaat?
B07_10_1Corinthians_V19	Nakaa!	Nallukilghiit	Kiyaghneghmeng	aghqerraaghaqut	tughneghaghnun,	nakan	Kiyaghneghmun.	Ilatngastesunghitamsi	tughneghaghnun.
B07_10_1Corinthians_V20	Christ-amun	piliitestekaakufsi	tughneghaat	maliggnaanghitasi.	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	Atanghem	qayuusiineng	meghegkufsi,	tughneghaatlu	qayuusiitneng	meghnaanghitusi.	Tawateghpigaq	Atanghem	Neqenghaghqellghani	neghegkayugukufsi	neqekrangllameng	Atanghem	tipelegkeni,	tughneghaatlu	tipelngitni	neghnaanghitusi	neqmeng.
B07_10_1Corinthians_V21	Whangkuta	Christ-am	piliitkiitni	tughneghaat	maliggnaqegkumteki,	Kiyaghneq	qungyaghtesleqaghput.	Neqamikluku	ellnga	iknaqeghllagtuq	whangkunneng.
B07_10_1Corinthians_V22	Ilasi	pikaagut,	“Itagnaghtuq	sangwaa	piyukelqa	piyaghngaamkun.”	Iwernga	whanga	piimsi,	ilangi	sallesi	pininghitut.	Aa-a,	entaqun,	“Itagnaghtuq	sangwaa	piyukelqa	piyaghngaamkun,”	iwernga	ilangan	salleghpesi	kayuusiinnaanghitii	ugpellesi.
B07_10_1Corinthians_V23	Kina	alngunak	ellnginaayugtefqaami	piiqli,	yeghlegi	ilanillu	sumeghtaghaatkaqluki.
B07_10_1Corinthians_V24	Sangwaa	alngunak	kemekrak	tukfiqaghsi	estugaghmeng	neghaqiteggu	sumeghtaghaatkegpenaan	aghqutkegkaatanga	kiyaghnengllaqanun.
B07_10_1Corinthians_V25	Qayughllak	igaqegkaaguq	Akuzitni	Igaqegkani,	“Nuna,	sangwaatlu	qamagtengngwaaghluki	tawanlenguut	Atanghem	pikii.”
B07_10_1Corinthians_V26	Ugpeqaanghilnguum	neghyaghtiisqegkangisi	piyukufsi	pilghaasi.	Sangwaa	alngunak	ketfaghtuqaat	neghaqiteggu	sumeghtaghaatkegpenaan	aghqutkegkaatanga	kiyaghnengllaqanun.
B07_10_1Corinthians_V27	Iwernga	kitum	pikangisi,	“Taana	aghqutkegkaaguq	kiyaghnengllaqanun,”	neghegpenaan,	ungipaatistegpesi	ugpellgha	kayaalisnayukafsigu,	qayughllak	ellngani	anaggutngalghiinguuq.	Entaqun	sumeghtaghaghnayalghiisi,	“Sangamatuq	piyukellemtun	piyaghqaanghisinga?	Sangamatuq	kitum	ineghqughaghaqanga	allatun	sumeghtaghaqayugem	whangamneng?
B07_10_1Corinthians_V28	Iyamsiqayugvikegkumkun	Kiyaghneq	neghyaghqamneng,	sangan'ngam	kitum	seghlequughlleqanga	neghegkuma	iyamsiqayugutkegkamneng?”
B07_10_1Corinthians_V30	Enkaam	qamaglluku	salleghsi	quulvaasiqaqiteggu	Kiyaghneghmun,	talwa	neghellesillu	meghellesillu.
B07_10_1Corinthians_V31	Sagpenasi	seghleghqestiyaghqameng	Jews-enun,	Gentile-enun,	ugpeqanunllu.
B07_10_1Corinthians_V32	Efqughhnaqutkaqanka	yulgutenka	sallemkun	alngunak.	Whanganginamnun	pinilleghqaq	pingigataqa,	iwernga	pinighqelleghqiitnunllu	yulgutma	piiqunga,	uglalghii	yugulillengesqelluku.
B07_11_1Corinthians_V11	Iwernga	neqamikiteggu	Atanghem	uspeqellgha,	yugenkuk	aghnaankuk	aklukutngaak.
B07_11_1Corinthians_V1	Enkaam	whangamtun	piiqitek,	katam	whanga	maligtellemtun	Christ-a.
B07_11_1Corinthians_V2	Usuqamsi	neqamikegkefsinga,	atuqegkesillu	apeghtuusanka.
B07_11_1Corinthians_V3	Iwernga	liigikesugamsi	Christ-a	naasquutinguuq	tamaghhaanun	yugnun,	yuguuqlu	naasquutilghii	nuliighmineng.
B07_11_1Corinthians_V4	Nasqughiitighluni	yuuk	yughaqumi	nalighmeng	ungipaqumi	Kiyaghneghem	ungipaaneng	yughaghvigmi,	quulvaghyaghqaqenghitaa	naasquutilghi.
B07_11_1Corinthians_V5	Enkaam	aghnaq	nasqughiitighpenani	yughaqumi	nalighmeng	ungipaqumi	Kiyaghneghem	ungipaaneng,	quulvaghyaghqaqenghitaa	naasquutilghii.	Tawaten	pikumi	qigughwaaqastun	meqesluni	ayuqellequq.
B07_11_1Corinthians_V6	Aghnaq	nasqughiitighyunghilkumi,	kepughli	nuyiighulluni.	Iwernga	aghnani	kayngunalghiinguuq	qigulleqlu	nuyiighullunillu	kepulleq,	enkaam	nasqughiitighngali.
B07_11_1Corinthians_V7	Yuuk	nasqughiitighyaghqaanghituq	maniguuskumi	qayughllak	Kiyaghneghem	nangaghneghatun	ulimaaghuuq,	Kiyaghneghem	aangellgha	esghiisqelluku.	Iwernga	aghnaq	ulimaaghuq	yugem	aangellgha	esghiisqelluku.
B07_11_1Corinthians_V8	Liisimakegkesi	yuuk	aghnameng	ulimaaghunghilnguq,	iwernga	aghnaq	yugmeng	ulimaaghulghii.
B07_11_1Corinthians_V9	Yuuk	ulimaaghunghituqlu	aghnamun	iwernga	aghnaq	ulimaaghuuq	yugmun.
B07_11_1Corinthians_V10	Taana	apalluqluku	aghnaq	nasqughiitighyaghqaaguq,	enkaam	yaqulget	liigiklitgu	yuuk	aghnamun	naasquutingutanga.
B07_11_1Corinthians_V11	Aghnaqsuggaaq	yugmeng	ulimaaghughngaan,	taagken	kenlanga	yuuk	qamaglluni	allgeqaaguq	aghnameng,	iwernga	aghnatlu	yugetlu	qamaglluteng	Kiyaghneghmeng	pinguut.
B07_11_1Corinthians_V12	Sumeghtaghaatkaghtegguqun:	ipa	anaggutngaa	aghnam	nasqughiitangunani	yughallgha	Kiyaghneghmun?
B07_11_1Corinthians_V13	Yuget	quunpeng	ugpeqaqaat	nuyiightekaghnguq	yuuk	ukavaghtaquq	ellmineng,
B07_11_1Corinthians_V14	iwernga	aghnam	nuyaghllani	quulvaasiqaa.	Nasqughiitaghqaaluni	ellnganun	pikaaguq.
B07_11_1Corinthians_V15	Paninang	kina	aaghtiiraaghyugukumi	nasqughiitameng,	ungipaanneqigtaghllakun	taanata	apostle-eni	apeghtuusaqaqegkefut,	Kiyaghneghem	yugan	atuqaqaat	apeghtuusaq	naansaghngaaghmeng.
B07_11_1Corinthians_V16	Whaken	apeghtughyugamsi	qerngughutaqelleghpesineng	maniguutelleghmun.	Usuqepagningitamsi	qerngughutaqelleghpesinun	qayughllak	aqnighquutaghaghaqusi	pinighqutegpenasi.
B07_11_1Corinthians_V17	Ungipaataqaatnga	qerngughunneghpesininguq	ilasi	aafqemeraaghutaqut,	ataasistun	pigpenateng.	Ugpeqekestaghluku	lliighaqa.
B07_11_1Corinthians_V18	Entaqun	aafquutelleghpesigun	liigiksaghqaqasi	nalisi	ipa	qaatkutngatangi	Ataneghmun.
B07_11_1Corinthians_V19	Enkaam	qerngughunneghpesini	Atanghem	Neghestillghanun,	neghyaghtuunghitaqaghsi.
B07_11_1Corinthians_V20	Neghuunneghpesini	tamaghhaghpesi	neragkiighaqusi	neqegpesineng,	ilasi	utaqagpenaki.	Enkaam	ilasi	iyataghaqut,	ilasi	suumaqut.
B07_11_1Corinthians_V21	Neghigatsii-i,	meghigatsii-i	negpesini?	Nalighmeng	ugumikestekii	Kiyaghneghem	yugi?	Kayngusaghaatesnaqutkaqestekii	avangilnguut?	Sameng	pilamsi?	Usuqlamsii?	Nakaa,	usuqnaanghitamsi!
B07_11_1Corinthians_V22	Sangwaa	liitkaqa	Ataneghmeng	apeghtuusaqaqaqa	elpesinun.	Atanghem	Jesus-em	ighivgaghmi	tawani	uveghpagutelleghqamini	tugukaa	neqekrangllaq.
B07_11_1Corinthians_V23	Iyamsiqayugviksamigu	Kiyaghneq,	aavgughluku,	pikaq,	“Una	yugusiqaqa	elpesinun	pinguuq.	Neghaqiteggu	neqamikusiiluku	whangamneng.”
B07_11_1Corinthians_V24	Neneghmeng	taaqsameng,	tawateghpigaq	tuguluku	qayuusiq	wine-eghraghaghmeng	imalek,	pikaq,	“Una	qayuusiq	Kiyaghneghem	nutaghaaguq	akequsaa	aamkun.	Awen	meghaqiteggu	neqamikusiiluku	whangamneng.”
B07_11_1Corinthians_V25	Enkaam	quunpeng	neneghpesini	taagken	neqekrangllameng,	meneghpesinillu	taagken	qayuusimeng,	kelgutngwaaqaghsi	Atanghem	tuqullgha	kenlanga	alla	tagilleghqaanun.
B07_11_1Corinthians_V26	Kina	alngunak	temngi	neghegkumi	Atanghem	neqekrangllaaneng,	meghegkumillu	Atanghem	qayuusiineng,	quulvaghnaanghitaa	Atanghem	yugusiillu	aawallu.
B07_11_1Corinthians_V27	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	sivukluni	yugem	avuteghqutkelliki	seghleghqelleni	alla	piyaghqaafqiita	pinaluki.	Enkaam	neghelghaaq	neqekrangllameng,	meghelghaaqlu	qayuusimeng.
B07_11_1Corinthians_V28	Kina	alngunak	neghelghii	neqekrangllameng,	meghelghiillu	qayuusimeng,	Atanghem	yugusii	liigiknaqegpenaan	sameng	pisiitanga	nanqigtellengyaghqaaquq	Ataneghmeng.
B07_11_1Corinthians_V29	Taana	apalluqluku	uglaghtusi	kayaalngughnillu	qinuyugngalghiinillu	enkaam	qafsinat	tuqulaghaatkaagut.
B07_11_1Corinthians_V30	Iwernga	ipapighqelluta	nanqigtekumta	whangkunneng	katam	enkaam	avuteghqutkegkumteki	seghleghqelleput,	Atanghem	nanqiggnaanghitiinkut	tawaten	pikumta.
B07_11_1Corinthians_V31	Iwernga	Atanghem	apeghtughyuneghminikut	naten	kiyaghtelleghqameng,	nanqigtaqiinkut.	Aghyuughyaghqaafqaamta	pinaluta	nanqigtikumi	ugpeqingigalngughneng.
B07_11_1Corinthians_V32	Enkaam	ugpeqaalgutemni	qerngughunneghpesini	neghnalusi	Atanghem	Neqenghaghqellghaneng	neghekestaghpenasi,	utaqatutaqlusi.
B07_11_1Corinthians_V33	Iyatalghiit	tamaakut	nemeggni	neghlit	enkaangam	Atanghem	nanqiggneghilliki.	Aglaquma	elpesinun	ilangi	aaptekasi	kiimsighnaaghanka.
B07_12_1Corinthians_V12	Katam	yugusiq	ataasiq	nalighneghtughllak,	qamaglluteng	nalighneghet	yugusim	pikegkangi.	Qaywa	uglaghngaaghmeng	ataasiiguq	yugusiq,	Christ-allu	tawatetuq.
B07_12_1Corinthians_V1	Ugpeqaalgutemni,	liitesugamsi	Agleghnalghiim	Taghnegham	tunusaaneng.
B07_12_1Corinthians_V2	Neqamikaghsi	salin	ugpellghillusi	maniguutestaataqaqegkangisi	kiyaghnengllaqanun	akuzingigalngughnun.	Aaghqutaqestekaalghiisi.
B07_12_1Corinthians_V3	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	liigikesugamsi	kina	alngunak	whaten	pilghii,	“Jesus	seghleghuuq,”	Agleghnalghiim	Taghnegham	akuzistengngunghitaa	tawaten.	Iwernga	kina	alngunak	whaten	pilghii,	“Jesus	Atanghuuq,”	Agleghnalghiim	Taghnegham	akuzistengngwaa	tawaten.
B07_12_1Corinthians_V4	Agleghnalghiim	Taghnegham	tunusii	allaghhiinaagut,	iwernga	tunusat	qamaglluki	taam	ataasim	Taghnegham	tunusaqii.
B07_12_1Corinthians_V5	Uglapigtuq	allaaghhiinaq	qepghaatilleghqaq	ilamun,	iwernga	taana	ataasiq	Ataneq	qepghaatellengaquq.
B07_12_1Corinthians_V6	Uglaapigtuq	allakullghii	Kiyaghneghem	qepghaqaa,	iwernga	taam	ataasim	Kiyaghneghem	pistaqii	whangkunnun.
B07_12_1Corinthians_V7	Agleghnalghiim	Taghnegham	liitestekayugaa	aghtughyaghqaanghilleni	ugpeqatgun	tunusalitkamikun.	Tunusat	kitumun	alngunak	pinighqusighqaagut.
B07_12_1Corinthians_V8	Taam	ataasim	Taghnegham	yugem	ilangi	akuzistaqii	peghqinelleghmikun,	ilangi	liisimalleghmikun.
B07_12_1Corinthians_V9	Taam	ataasim	Taghnegham	ugpeqillelitaghaqaqii	ilangi	yuget,	ilangi	aghtughyaghqaanghillelitaqii	naallghutiyaghqaaluki	aqnighneghneng.
B07_12_1Corinthians_V10	Taghnegham	tuunegkaqii	ilangi	yuget	allaaghlluwhaghtisighqameng.	Ilangan	yugem	tugukliqaqaa	ungipaqilleghqaq	Kiyaghneghem	ungipaaneng.	Ilangan	yugem	tugukliqaqaa	liigikilleghqaq	Agleghnalghiim	Taghegham	nalighmeng	tughneghaat	igleghutngutanga	kina.	Agleghnalghiim	Taghnegham	akuzistaqii	ilangi	yuget	allaaghhiinakun	ulukun.	Enkaam	ilangitnun	mumighqughtestaqii	akuzillghet.
B07_12_1Corinthians_V11	Qamaglluteng	tamaakut	tunusat	ataasikaghtaghhaghmeng	taagken	ataasigneng	Taghneghagneng	pinguut.	Tuunyukani	tamaakut	naliitneng	tunusaghqami	tuunaqii.
B07_12_1Corinthians_V12	Qamaglluki	ugpeqat	nalighnequghii	Christ-am	yugusiin.	Ilaput	Jews-nguut,	ilangi	Gentile-et,	ilangi	qepghaghtelaaghet,	ilangi	qepghaghtelaaghunghitut.	Iwernga	qamaglluta	paaptaayekaagukut	taaggun	ataasikun	Agleghnalghiignekun	Taghneghagnekun,	Christ-amun	yugusiliitesqelluta.	Qamaglluta	tugukliqaqagput	ataasik	Taghneghak.
B07_12_1Corinthians_V13	Yugusiq	ataasiinghituq	nalighneq,	nalighneghtupigtuq.
B07_12_1Corinthians_V14	Itegat	whaten	pighngaaghmeng,	“Iiggengunghilnguunga,	yugusim	pikenghitaanga.”	Taaqnaanghitngwaaghtut	yugusimenneghmeng.
B07_12_1Corinthians_V15	Siguta	whaten	pighngaaghmi,	“Iiyngunghitunga,	yugusim	pikenghitaanga.”	Taaqnaanghitngwaaghtuq	yugusimenneghmeng.
B07_12_1Corinthians_V16	Yugusiq	iyeraaghinaayaqumi,	naten'ngam	nagaqughnayaghta?	Nalighmeng	siguteraaghinaayaqumi,	naten'ngam	naaghunnayaghta	sapagnimeng?
B07_12_1Corinthians_V17	Iwernga	Kiyaghneghem	ulimamangitii	yugusiput	tawatelluki.	Nakmikegkamineng	nalighnelightuqaqii.
B07_12_1Corinthians_V18	Yugusiq	ataasiiyaqumi	nalighneq	yugusiinayanghituq.
B07_12_1Corinthians_V19	Ipapestaaq	yugusiq	nalighneghtupigtuq.
B07_12_1Corinthians_V20	Tamaken	apalluqluku	iyem	pinanghitii	iigget,	“Aklukenghitamsi.”	Tawateghpigaq	naasqum	pinanghiti	itegat,	“Aklukenghitamsi.”
B07_12_1Corinthians_V21	Ipapestaaq	yugusimta	natangi	kayaatesugnilnguut	megnunapigtut.
B07_12_1Corinthians_V22	Yugusimta	natangi	sumemnni	megnunapagilnguut,	elngaatall	aflengakaqaput.	Yugusimta	natangi	esghaghtesugigalkeput	pilugugngaaqaput,
B07_12_1Corinthians_V23	ilangi	tamaakut	esghaghyaghngaaghmeng	ayuqelghiit	pilugugigataput.	Kiyaghneghem	ulimaaqngamigu	yugusiq,	megnunaghataghaghtestekaqii	megnunapagitesugnilnguut.
B07_12_1Corinthians_V24	Enkaam	yugusiq	qepghaqayuguuq	qerngaghmi.	Nalighneghem	qamaglluteng	aflengakaqiit	ilateng	tawatengwaaq.
B07_12_1Corinthians_V25	Ataasiq	aqninghani	qamaglluteng	aqniqayuguut.	Ataasiq	usuqellengenghani	qamaglluteng	quyakayuguut.
B07_12_1Corinthians_V26	Qamagllusi	ugpeqani	Christ-am	yugusiqiisi,	nalighnequghiisi.
B07_12_1Corinthians_V27	Kiyaghneghem	ugpeqanun	nakmikegkaqii	sivukluki	Apostle-et	aangelleghpigaaluki,	tuunglighhii	uuknaliqistet	(ungipaqilghiit	Kiyaghneghem	ungipaaneng)	pingayii	apeghtughistet,	taagken	allaaghlluwhaghtistet,	tamaakutlu	aghtughyaghqaanghillelitkat	naallghutimun,	kayusighiyaghqat	ilameggneng,	pinilghiit	igleghutistet,	tamaakutlu	allaaghhiinaastun	akuzikayuget.	Kiyaghneghem	tuunyukani	tamaakut	naliitneng	tunusaghqami	tuunaqii.
B07_12_1Corinthians_V28	Qamagllusi	Apostle-ngutsii,	uuknaliqestengutsii,	apeghtughistengutsii?	Qamagllusi	aghtughyaghqaanghillelitkaatsii	allaaghlluwhaghtisighqameng,
B07_12_1Corinthians_V29	naallghutikayugutsii?	Qamagllusi	allaaghhiinaastun	akuzikayugutsillu	mumighquqayugutsillu	allaaghhiinaghneng	akuzilleghneng?	Nakaa!
B07_12_1Corinthians_V30	Iwernga	piyukiteki	aangataghalghiit	Agleghnalghiim	Taghnegham	tunusii.	Whaa	maaten	apeghnaqaqa	pinighataghalghii	taakuneng.
B07_13_1Corinthians_V13	Enkaangam	ukut	pingayut	kenletghuunnaanghitut:	ugpelleq,	sighimalleq,	piniqelleq;	iwernga	piniqellghuuq	angelleghpigaq.
B07_13_1Corinthians_V1	Akuzikayuguyaghngaaghma	yugetlu	yaqulgetlu	akuzillghistun,	temngi	tengngaagtaghllequnga	nalighmeng	lengaaghtaghllequnga	piniqinghilkuma.
B07_13_1Corinthians_V2	Uuknaliqegkayugughngaaghma,	liigikegkayugughngaamki	aliinneghilnguut	qamaglluki,	liisimalleq	qamagtekaqsaghngaamkun,	ugpeqillelgughngaaghma	naayghanun	nuugtisighqameng,	pitngunaanghitunga	piniqinghilkuma.
B07_13_1Corinthians_V3	Tuunyaghngaamki	qamaglluki	sanka	aklumalghiinun,	nalighmeng	paneghtesaghngaaghma	ungipaqilqa	Pinilghiineng	Ungipaneng	apalluqluku,	allgeghunnaanghitunga	piniqinghilkuma.
B07_13_1Corinthians_V4	Piniqelleq	nuqenneghtuuqlu,	nangllegtaghtuqlu;	piniqelleq	aqinangituq,	nalighmeng	yamrrangituq,	nalighmeng	aangaayugneghituq.
B07_13_1Corinthians_V5	Piniqelleq	seghleghyugutngituq,	nalighmeng	ellnginaayugneghituq.	Piniqelleq	sagiqigatuq	piyukelleghmitun	pinaluni,	qikeghqungigatuq,	nalighmeng	neqamikingigatuq	anaggutelleghmeng.
B07_13_1Corinthians_V6	Piniqellghem	quyasiqigataa	seghleq,	yeghlegi	quyasiqaqaa	ipapilleq.
B07_13_1Corinthians_V7	Piniqelleq	ataasiighmetuq	sangwa	sayaghngaan.	Iiwleng	ugpeqingaaq,	iiwleng	neghyukingaaq,	iiwleng	nuqenneghtuuq.
B07_13_1Corinthians_V8	Piniqelleq	kenlengilnguq.	Uuknaliqellghet	kenletghuusaghqaagut;	allastun	akuzillghet	taaqsaghqaagut;	liisimalleq	kenletghuusaghqaaguq.
B07_13_1Corinthians_V9	Qayughllak	tunusagput	liisimalleqlu	uuknaliqelleqlu	iighwinneghilnguuk.
B07_13_1Corinthians_V10	Iwernga	iighwilnguq	kaaskan,	qamaglluteng	iighwinneghilnguut	aviighughsaghqaagut.
B07_13_1Corinthians_V11	Taghnughhaalunga	akuzikayuguyaghtunga,	sumeghtaghaqayuguyaghtunga,	liigikegkayuguyaghtunga	taghnughhaghestun,	iwernga	yugughsalghiinga	taghnughhaghestun	pinanightunga.
B07_13_1Corinthians_V12	Liigikelleghput	Kiyaghneghmeng	iighwinneghituq,	katam	tawatetuq	esghalghiistun	taghneghaghquutelugkun.	Qakuqaaqun	liigikngwaaghyaghqaghput	Kiyaghneq	qayughllak	esghaghlleqaghput	gginasaghqughluku.	Maaten	liisimalqa	iighwinneghituq.	Ilangani	aghneghem	liisimalqa	iighwighyaghqaaguq	katam	tawaten	Kiyaghneghem	liisimakngwaaqanganga	iighwighma.
B07_14_1Corinthians_V14	Yughaghyaquma	allastun	ulustun,	taghneghagka	yughaghllequk,	iwernga	umyugagma	liigiknaanghitaak.
B07_14_1Corinthians_V1	Piniqellengyugataghaghyaghqaagusi	pakiggulluku	sameng	tamaghhaaneng.	Iwernga	piyukitekillu	Agleghnalghiim	Taghnegham	tunusii,	wata	piyuksaghqaqaghsi	ungipaqilleq	Kiyaghneghem	ungipaaneng.
B07_14_1Corinthians_V2	Yuuk	akuzineghmini	allastun	ulustun	aleghqughaqaa	Kiyaghneq.	Yuget	aleghqiigatii	qayughllak	liigiknaaghitaat.	Akuziiquq	aghtughyaghqaanghillghakun	Agleghnalghiim	Taghnegham	yugem	nallukegkaaneng.
B07_14_1Corinthians_V3	Iwernga	yuuk	tunusalek	ungipaqilleghmeng	Kiyaghneghem	ungipaaneng	akuzikayuguuq	yugnun.	Akuzitangi	kayusighikayuguut,	kayemikayuguut,	ilutughsaghikayuguut	yugnun.
B07_14_1Corinthians_V4	Yuuk	akuzikayuk	allastun	ulustun	kayusiitkayuguuq	ellmineng	katam,	iwernga	yuuk	ungipaqikayuk	Kiyaghneghem	ungipaaneng	kayusighikayuguuq	ugpeqaneng.
B07_14_1Corinthians_V5	Qamagllusi	piyukaqsaghamsi	akuzisqellusi	allastun	ulustun,	iwernga	wataqaaghaqtuq	tunusalgulghiisi	ungipaqsaghqaaluki	Kiyaghneghem	ungipii.	Tamaakut	ungipaqikayuget	aangataghaghtut	akuzikayugneng	allastun	ulustun.	Akuzikayuget	allastun	ulustun	mumighqughtelguyaghqaagut	kayusiitesqelluki	ugpeqat.
B07_14_1Corinthians_V6	Ugpeqaalgutemni,	elpesinun	pilunga	aleghqughyaqumsi	allastun	ulustun	liigiksaghqaqenghilkegpesigun	naten'ngam	kayusiinnayaghestemsi?	Iwernga	apeghtughyaqumsi	Kiyaghneghem	kelgutkaaneng	whangamnun,	nalighmeng	ungipaasaqumsi	sameng	liitkamneng,	nalighmeng	uuknaliqutkesaqumkun	Kiyaghneghem	salleghqaa,	nalighmeng	apeghtughyaqumsi	ipapighqelleghmeng	elngaatall	kayusiinnayaghamsi.
B07_14_1Corinthians_V7	Flute-allu	harp-allu	seghletun	qalghightekayek	kitum	alngunak	liigiknaangitaa	sangwaa	ilagaan	atughaqutanga.
B07_14_1Corinthians_V8	Pilluwaghtem	bugle-a	qalghightekagu	seghletun	ilangita	pilluwaghtet	nallukelleqaat	pilluwalleghqaghteng.
B07_14_1Corinthians_V9	Tawateghpigaq	akuzikufsi	allastun	ulustun,	kitum	alngunak	liigiknaanghitiisi	sameng	piiqutsi.	Akuzinghilngughestun	piyaghqaagusi.
B07_14_1Corinthians_V10	Uglapigtuq	allaghhiinaq	akuzilleq,	atuqistengita	liigikaqiit.
B07_14_1Corinthians_V11	Iwernga	liigikenghilkumkun	yuuk	akuzilghii	allakun	akuzilleghqun	nakumiinguuq	whangamni,	enkaam	whangallu	nakumiingunga	ellngani.
B07_14_1Corinthians_V12	Enkaangam	elpesi,	tunusangyupigtekufsi	Agleghnalghiim	Taghnegham	tunusaaneng,	tungsightek	kayutkaghqameng	ugpeqanun.
B07_14_1Corinthians_V13	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	yuuk	akuzikayuk	allastun	ulustun,	yughaghli	mumighqughyaghqaaluku	sameng	pilleni.
B07_14_1Corinthians_V14	Sanaqsingangam?	Yughaghllequnga	taghneghamkun,	yughaghllequngallu	umyugamkun.	Tawateghpigaq	ilagaghllequnga	taghneghamkun,	ilagaghllequngallu	umyugamkun.
B07_14_1Corinthians_V15	Qayughllak	taghneghagpegun	usuqegkuvgu	Kiyaghneq	allastun	ulustun,	naten'ngam	liigikigalnguum	usuqilgusighlleqaten	Kiyaghneghmun	iyamsiqayulleghpeneng?	Nallukaa	sameng	piiquten.
B07_14_1Corinthians_V16	Yughallghen	piniipigsaghngaan	ilanga	yugem	kayusillengnaanghituq.
B07_14_1Corinthians_V17	Iyamsiqayugvikaqaqa	Kiyaghneq	akuziiqelghiinga	allastun	ulustun	uglaghataghaghluku	elpesineng.
B07_14_1Corinthians_V18	Iwernga	yughaghvigmennemni	apeghtughiyugaqunga.	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	apeghtughiiqunga	qafsinkuuraghhaat	akuzitet	atuqluki	liigiksaghqasi,	akuzinaanghitunga	allastun	ulustun	uglapiglluku	liigiksaghqaqenghilkegpesineng.
B07_14_1Corinthians_V19	Ugpeqaalgutemni,	sumeghtaghaghpenasi	taghnughhaghhaghestun.	Sumeghtaghaghaqitek	anglikastun,	iwernga	seghleghqesulleghsi	taghnughhaghhaghestun	ayuquq.
B07_14_1Corinthians_V20	Liilightuusani	igaqngaaq:	“Kiyaghneq	piiq,	‘Kayaglleqanka	yuget	allaneng	nunaneng	aleghqughyaghtiisqellusi	ellngita	katam	ulungistun.	Aleghqughlleqamsi	qaanghitgun	iwernga	paninang	nagannaanghitaghpesinga.’”
B07_14_1Corinthians_V21	Enkaam	tunusaa	akuzillghem	allastun	ulustun	ipapighqusiiguq	ugpeqingigalngughnun,	nakaan	ugpeqikayugnun.	Ungipaqilleq	ugpeqilghiinun	ayuquq,	nakaan	ugpeqingigalngughnun.
B07_14_1Corinthians_V22	Enkaangam	yughaghvigpesini	ugpeqat	qamaglluteng	akuzisaqumeng	allastun	ulustun,	ilangi	yugem	nalighmeng	ugpeqaanghilnguut	iitqumeng	nallungughhnilleqiisi.
B07_14_1Corinthians_V23	Iwernga	ugpeqaanghilnguq	nalighmeng	liigikigalnguq	yughaghvigpesinun	iteghluni	nagaskumisi	ungipalghiisi	Kiyaghneghem	ungipaaneng,	nagalluni	nanqigtengngwaaghllequq	seghleghqestenguniluni.
B07_14_1Corinthians_V24	Qamanlliqegkii	aksaqngalghiit	qayvighqellequt.	Enkaam	qungughlluni	manigughlleqaa	Kiyaghneq.	Whaten	pillequq,	“Ipapestaaq,	Kiyaghneq	whaantuq	elpesini.”
B07_14_1Corinthians_V25	Ugpeqaalgutemni,	unata	apeghtuusaqnaqutkaqegkegka.	Qerngughunneghpesini	maniguunnalusi	ilasi	ilagaghaqnaaghtut,	kina	apeghtughiiqellequq,	nalighmeng	nalighsi	ungipaghllequq	Kiyaghneghem	ungipaqesqegkaaneng,	nalighmeng	nalighsi	akuzillequq	allastun	ulustun,	nalighpesi	mumighqughlleqii.	Ugpeqat	ugpellghitnun	iknaqughusiilit	qamaglluteng.
B07_14_1Corinthians_V26	Yughaghvigmi	kina	akuzinaqngukumi	allastun	ulustun,	maalghuk	nalighmeng	pingayut	pilghaat,	utaqaluki	ilateng	taaqelleghqiit.	Kitumllu	mumighqughnakangi	sameng	pillghit.
B07_14_1Corinthians_V27	Iwernga	mumighqughtengiskan	akuzilghiimun	allastun	ulustun,	akuzifqaami	pilghaaq.	Allastun	ulustun	akuziyukumi	kavyuguutegpenani	akuzilghaaq	ellminunllu	Kiyaghneghmunllu.
B07_14_1Corinthians_V28	Uuknaliqistek	maalghuk	nalighmeng	pingayut	ungipangelghiit	Kiyaghneghmeng	akuzilit.	Qamaglluteng	nagallit,	liigiklitgu	ungipaq	Kiyaghneghmeng	pingutanga.
B07_14_1Corinthians_V29	Iwernga	kina	ungipangegkan	Kiyaghneghmeng,	akuzilghii	nepiighli,	ungipangelghii	akuzisqelluku.
B07_14_1Corinthians_V30	Tawaten	pikufsi	qamaglluteng	ungipaqiyaghqat	Kiyaghneghem	ungipaaneng	akuziiqellequt.	Enkaam	qamaglluni	nagallghii,	liilli,	taagavenginaallenglillu.
B07_14_1Corinthians_V31	Neqamikluki	ungipaqikayuget	Kiyaghneghem	ungipaaneng,	aghtughyaghqaanghillelitkaagut	akuzisighqameng,	taaqusighqamengllu.	Iiwleng	aghtughyaghqaanghillelguut	akuzisighqameng	nalighmeng	taaqusighqameng.
B07_14_1Corinthians_V32	Kiyaghneghem	alngunak	pisugigatiinkut.	Qerngughutelleput	nekegmetesugaqii.	Kiyaghneghem	yugi	qerngughunneghata,
B07_14_1Corinthians_V33	aghnat	akuzistenguyaghqaanghitut	yughaghvigni.	Akuziyaghqaanghitutlu	igleghutistenguyaghqaanghitutlu	qerngughutngalghiini,	qayughllak	Liilightusanillu	igaqngaaq	tawaten.
B07_14_1Corinthians_V34	Aapqughaghyukumeng,	ugiteng	nemeggni	aaplitki.	Yughaghvigni	aghnat	akuzilleghqaat	anaggutngaaq.
B07_14_1Corinthians_V35	Elpesi	Corinth-eghmiit	ugpeqat	aangaayugneghuusi.	Sumeghpesinii	Kiyaghneghem	akuzitangi	elpesineng	pingwaat?	Ellnginaghhaghpesinun	apeghtuutkaawaat?
B07_14_1Corinthians_V36	Kina	alngunak	sumeghmini	uuknaliqistenguniluni	pikumi,	nalighmeng	ugpeghllagumaniluni,	liigikliki	latatkegkanka	elpesinun	Ataneghem	qelghusaqii.
B07_14_1Corinthians_V37	Tuguklinghilkagu	una	apeghtuusaq,	tuguklighpenaan	ellnga.
B07_14_1Corinthians_V38	Enkaangam	ugpeqaalgutemni,	ungipaghtenguyugaqitek	Kiyaghneghem	ungipaaneng,	iwernga	taaqestegpenaki	akuzilghiit	allastun	ulustun.
B07_14_1Corinthians_V39	Yughaghvigni	sangwaa	qamaglluku	pinitungwaaq,	tawatengwaaq	piiqiteggu.
B07_15_1Corinthians_V15	Tuqukat	unguvaghtesimangilkata	tuqulleghmeng,	Kiyaghneghem	unguvaghtesimangitaa	Christ-a.	Enkaangam	whangkuta	apostle-eni	qamaglluta	iqlengiqestenguukut	qayughllak	pikaagukut,	“Kiyaghneghem	Christ-a	unguvaghtestekaqaa	tuqulleghmeng.”
B07_15_1Corinthians_V1	Ugpeqaalgutemni,	neqangughsugamsi	Pinilghiineng	Ungipaneng	ungipaqegkamneng	elpesinun.	Tugukliqaqasi	enkaam	ugpellesi	taaggun	nekegngaat	ayugilluteng.
B07_15_1Corinthians_V2	Yugulillengegkaagusi	ugpeqaqngafsiki	Pinilghiit	Ungipat,	enkaam	ugpequmanginaghteki	aapqanka.	Iwernga	ugpeqnaniqufsiki,	ugpellesi	sasiinaanghitut.
B07_15_1Corinthians_V3	Apeghtuqaqamsi	apeghtuusaqegkameng	whangamnun.	Taakut	ugpeqsaghqaqasi:	Christ-am	tuqutkegkaqii	seghleghqelleput,	katam	Akuzitet	Igaqegkat	pinaqnillghistun.
B07_15_1Corinthians_V4	Taagken	lliifqaqaat,	enkaam	pingayaani	aghneghem	unguvaqaaguq	Akuzitni	Igaqegkani	pinaqnillghistun.
B07_15_1Corinthians_V5	Peter-em	esghaqaqaa,	taagken	kingunganeng	qamaglluteng	qula	maalghuk	siipneqluku	apostle-et	esghaqaqaat.
B07_15_1Corinthians_V6	Kingungitneng	500-neng	uglalghiim	maligsaaghtengita	qerngaghllagmeng	esghaqaqaat.	Kiyang	taakut	unguvaat,	ilangi	tuqukaaghngaaghmeng.
B07_15_1Corinthians_V7	Taagken	James-em	esghaqaqaa,	enkaam	kinguvaqun	qamaglluteng	apostle-et	esghaqaqaat.
B07_15_1Corinthians_V8	Kinguliilunga	esghaqaqaqa,	ugpeghyaghqaghpagningitkaaghngaaghma	kitumi	alngunak.
B07_15_1Corinthians_V9	Ukalighpigaagunga	apostle-eni,	talwa	atighyaghqaanghisaghtunga	apostle-meng,	qayughllak	amyuqetaatqegkaqanka	Kiyaghneghem	yugi.
B07_15_1Corinthians_V10	Iwernga	Kiyaghneghem	nangllegtallghakun	apostle-nguunga.	Nangllegtallgha	whangamnun	avanginneghituq.	Qepghaghataghaghtunga	tamaghhiitneng	apostle-et,	iwernga	whangamneng	pingunghitaqa,	Kiyaghneghem	nangllegtallghakun	piiqunga.
B07_15_1Corinthians_V11	Qepghaghataghalleghput	ilamnneng	megnuniituq.	Megnunalghiita	taana	qamaglluta	ungipaqegkaqaput	elpesinun	taakut	ataasit	Pinilghiit	Ungipat,	enkaam	ugpeqegkaqasi.
B07_15_1Corinthians_V12	Ugpeqngukesi	Ungipaq	ungipaqegkaghput:	Christ-am	unguvaghtellgha	tuqulleghmeng.	Sangamengam	ilasi	piiqat,	“Tuqukat	unguvaghnaanghitut?”
B07_15_1Corinthians_V13	Kina	alngunak	unguvaghtesimangilkan,	Christ-a	paninang	tuqunganayaghtuq.
B07_15_1Corinthians_V14	Paninang	tuqungakan	ungipaghqiitukut,	enkaam	ugpeqsaghqiitusi.
B07_15_1Corinthians_V15	Tuqukat	unguvaghtesimangilkata,	Christ-allu	unguvaghtesimangituq.
B07_15_1Corinthians_V16	Christ-a	paninang	tuqungakan	ugpellesi	sasiinghitut	enkaam	aghyullengellequsi	seghleghqelleghpesinun.
B07_15_1Corinthians_V17	Ugpeqistet	Christ-akun	tuqulaghaatkat	qamaglluteng	iflanayaghtut.
B07_15_1Corinthians_V18	Neghyukilleghput	Christ-akun	whaninginaghhaq	kiyaghtaallemnni	atuukan,	nangllegnalleghpigaayaghqaagukut	yugni	kitumeng	alngunak.
B07_15_1Corinthians_V19	Ipanguuq	Christ-a	unguvaqaaguq	tuqulleghmeng,	tamaaken	apalluqluku	liisimakngwaaghaghput	whangkutallu	unguvaghtesaghqaagukut	ilangani	aghneghem.
B07_15_1Corinthians_V20	Tuqulleq	allgeqaaguq	ataasikun	yugkun,	Adam-kun.	Tawateghpigaq	unguvaghtestelleq	tuqulleghmeng	allgeqaaguq	ilangakun	yugkun,	Christ-akun.
B07_15_1Corinthians_V21	Adam-kun	qamaglluni	tuquyaghqaaguq,	iwernga	qamaglluteng	Christ-amelnguut	unguvaghtesaghqaagut	tuqulleghmeng.
B07_15_1Corinthians_V22	Qamaglluteng	tuqulaghaatkat	pilleghqateng	kaanneghata	unguvaghaqnaaghtut:	Christ-a	sivulighpigaaluni	unguvaqaaguq.	Taagken	taginqigtekan	tamaakut	ellngan	pingi	unguvaghyaghqaagut.
B07_15_1Corinthians_V23	Christ-a	umiilguyaghqaaguq	kenlanga	kayaalqelleghminun	qamagtengngwaaghluki	aghtughyaghqaanghillghet	qaatkusugigalnguut	Kiyaghneghmun,	tughneghaatlu	igleghutistet,	yugetlu	igleghutistet	ilalluki.	Christ-a	umiilguyaghqaaguq	kenlanga	Kiyaghneghem	kayaalqellghanun	qamagtengngwaaghluki	Christ-am	anguyagi.	Kingulighpigaq	anguyak	tuqullghuuq	Kiyaghneghem	kayaalqesaghqaa.	Christ-am	tuunegkagu	Ataneghpagulleq	Kiyaghneghmun	Atamun	taagken	kenla	kaallequq.	Igaqngaaq	Akuzitni	Igaqegkani,	“Kiyaghneghem	sangwaa	tamaghhaan	itegaan	asinganun	lliightesaghqaqaa.”	Whaten	pisiiguq,	Kiyaghneghem	samun	tamaghhaanun	qaatkestesaghqaqaa	Christ-a.	Iwernga	Kiyaghneghem	qaatkusaghqaaghtestekumigu	sangwaa	tamaghhaan	Christ-amun,	qaatkusaghqaaghsaghqaanghituq,	ellmineng	katam.	Tawaten	pikan,	taagken	Ighneq	ellmineng	katam	asiliighsaghqaaguq	Kiyaghneghmeng.	Elngaatall	Kiyaghneghem	sangwaa	tamaghhaan	igleghulleqaa.
B07_15_1Corinthians_V24	Ilangi	yuget	paaptaayestaqut	tuqukat	apalluqluki.	Tuqukat	unguvaghsaghqaanghilkata	tuqulleghmeng,	sangamengam	ilangi	paaptaayestaqat	tuqukat	apalluqluki?
B07_15_1Corinthians_V29	Liisimakaput	tuqukat	unguvaqaagut	tuqulleghmeng.	Enkaangam	ungipaqinguukut	Pinilghiineng	Ungipaneng	tuqunnaqsaghngiinkut	aghhutanga	tamaghhaan.
B07_15_1Corinthians_V30	Ipanguuq	tuqusaqleggiinaq	ayuqaatnga	aghhutanga	tamaghhaan.	Katam	liisimakelleghpesistun	quyakelqa	ugpelleghsi	anglilghii	Christ	Jesus-kun	Atanemteggun.	Tawateghpigaq	ipapighqutkesaghqaqaghsi	tuqusaqleggiinaq	ayuqegkangatnga	aghhutanga	tamaghhaan.
B07_15_1Corinthians_V31	Yuget	Ephesus-melnguut	pilluwaqanka	teghikusastun	ayuqut.	Allgeghunnalunga	whani	kiyaghtellemni	pilluwaqumki,	sameng	allgeghunnaanghitunga.	Tuqullemta	kingunganeng	unguvaghyaghqaanghilkumta,	“Neghelta,	meghelta,	qayughllak	unaami	tuqullequkut.”
B07_15_1Corinthians_V32	Kitumun	alngunak	puughtestegpenasi	ilakumtaangumakufsi	seghletun	pikayugmeng,	atuqsagulleqaghsi	sangwaa	piiqegkangat.
B07_15_1Corinthians_V33	Sumeghtaghaghaqlusi	piniitun,	seghleghqennanightek,	ilasi	akulegpesinilnguut	apeghtuumangilnguugut	Kiyaghneghmeng.	Qayughllak	elpesi	ugpeqani	kaynguyugyaghqaagusi.
B07_15_1Corinthians_V34	Kina	alngunak	whaten	pikan:	“Naten	tuqukat	unguvaghtestaqat	tuqulleghmeng?	Natelngughmeng	yugusilguyaghqaawat?”
B07_15_1Corinthians_V35	Uyuq	nalluuqaq!	Piituta	nunakun	peghukuvgu	tuquyaghqaaguq	sivungani	piitelleghqami.
B07_15_1Corinthians_V36	Piitutmeng	allanguluni	angliiquq.	Piitesiighaneghpeni,	piitutesquvegaghhaq	peghwaaqan	nunakun,	wheat-kaghqaq	nalighmeng	sanguyaghqaq.
B07_15_1Corinthians_V37	Piitutesquvegaghhaq	taana	Kiyaghneghem	nakmikegkamineng	yugusilitaqaa.	Allakullghiit	piitutet	allakullghiimeng	yugusighqalguut.
B07_15_1Corinthians_V38	Tawatelkutngwaaghunghitut	yugusit.	Yuget,	teghikusat,	qawaaget,	iqalluget	allakutut	yugusiit.
B07_15_1Corinthians_V39	Qilak	yugusightuuq,	nuna	yugusightuuq.	Yugusit	qilagmelnguut	ellmegestun	pinighnaghtut.	Yugusitlu	nunamelnguut	ellmegestun	pinighnaghtut.
B07_15_1Corinthians_V40	Siqineq,	tanqiq,	ighaleqetaaghetlu	allakutut	pinighnallghit.	Talwa	ighaleqetaaghet	allakaqaghtaghmeng	allakutut	pinighnallghit.
B07_15_1Corinthians_V41	Tawatesaghqaagut	tuqukat	unguvaghtestekata	tuqulleghmeng:	nunami	yugusiput	tuqaaqut,	aghwaaqut,	iwernga	yugusighraghaput	tuqunaanghitngwaaghtut.
B07_15_1Corinthians_V42	Lliifqumeng	nunamelnguut	yugusiput	seghleghughsaghqat	kayaaliyaghqat,	iwernga	yugusiq	unguvaghtestekumi	pinighnaghyaghqaqlu	iknaqsaghqaqlu.
B07_15_1Corinthians_V43	Lliveneghmini	yugusiq	yugem	pikaa.	Iwernga	yugusiq	unguvaghtestekumi	taghneghamnnun	yugusiiyaghqaaguq.	Yugusilgukata	yuget	yugusighqalguutlu	taghneghaput.
B07_15_1Corinthians_V44	Enkaam	Akuzitni	Igaqegkani	igaqegkaaguq,	“Yuksuwhaaq	Adam	unguvalghiingughtekaaguq.”	Iwernga	kinguliq	Adam	unguvallelitikayuguuq	taghneghaq,	Christ-anguuq.
B07_15_1Corinthians_V45	Sivukluta	yugem	yugusiineng	yugusingaqukut,	taagken	taakwaningani	Kiyaghneghem	yugusilitaqii	taghneghaput.
B07_15_1Corinthians_V46	Yuksuwhaaq	nunameng	pinguuq,	pagulanganeng	nunam	ulimaaghuuq,	iwernga	tuunglighhaa	yuuk	Christ-a,	qilagmeng	pinguuq.
B07_15_1Corinthians_V47	Yuget	kiyaghtekumeng	nunami	whani,	yugusilguut	Adam-em	yugusiitun	ayuqelghiimeng.	Iwernga	tamaakut	qilagmi	kiyaghsaghqat	Christ-atun	yugusilguyaghqaagut.
B07_15_1Corinthians_V48	Adam-etun	yugusilgullemtestun,	ilangani	aghneghem	Christ-atun	yugusilguyaghqaagukut.
B07_15_1Corinthians_V49	Ugpeqaalgutemni,	liitesugamsi	yugusiput	ukut	kemekragmeng,	aawmeng	ulimaaghet,	iteghnaanghitut	Ataneghpagullghanun	Kiyaghneghem.	Ilangani	aghneghem	ukut	yugusiput	tuquyaghqaagut.	Unguvanaanghitut	quunperugllak.
B07_15_1Corinthians_V50	Ungipaataghllamsi	qayvighsimangilngughmeng:	qamaglluta	tuqunaanghitukut,	iwernga	qamaglluta	allangughsaghqaagukut,
B07_15_1Corinthians_V51	sukatepiglluta	qunqallellghestun	kingulighpigaq	qalghightaq	nagaququmteggu.	Tawani	qalghightalleghmi	ugpeqat	qamaglluteng	tuqulaghaatkat	unguvaghtuusaghqaagut	nutaghameng	yugusilighluteng	tuquyaghqaanghilngughmeng.	Taagken	whangkutallu	paninang	unguvalghiini	nutaghameng	yugusingaghaghtaallequkut.
B07_15_1Corinthians_V52	Yugusiput	pagulameng	ulimaaghet	allangughsaghqapestaaghuut	naafqesaghqaanghilngughmeng.	Ukut	yugusiput	tuqukayuget	simighyaghqaagut	yugusimeng	tuquyaghqaanghilngughmeng.
B07_15_1Corinthians_V53	Enkaam	Akuzitni	Igaqegkani	igaqegkaq	apeghiighllequq:	“Tuqulleq	naafquq;	kayaalqiilleq	iighwightuq!”
B07_15_1Corinthians_V54	“Tuqu,	kayaalqiillghen	naagu?	Tuqu,	aghtughyaghqaanghillghen	aqnighquusin	whangkunnun	naagu?”
B07_15_1Corinthians_V55	Tuqullghem	aghtughyaghqaanghilleni	allgeghtaqaa	seghleghqelleghmeng	aqnighhnaluta,	enkaam	seghleghqellghem	Liilightuusat	aghtughyaghqaanghilqii.
B07_15_1Corinthians_V56	Enkaangam	iyamsiqayugvikaqaghput	Kiyaghneq	qayughllak	kayaalqiistekaqiinkut	Atanemteggun	Jesus	Christ-akun.
B07_15_1Corinthians_V57	Enkaangam,	piniqegkamni	ugpeqaalgutemni,	kayaalqiilleghqaghput	ipapestaghutanganeng,	ugpellesi	aghuliitesluki,	nuuggaghtafqaafsi,	quunpeng	qepghaghteggu	Atanghem	qepghaqaa.	Liisimakaghsi	Ataneghqun	qepghalleghsi	avanginneghituq.
B07_16_1Corinthians_V16	Qelghamsi	qaatkumanginiisqelluki	liilightullghit	tawatelnguut	yuget,	ilangillu	qepghalgutangit.
B07_16_1Corinthians_V1	Ukut	esgha	elpesinun	qelghusanka	manimeng	tuunyaghqaghpesineng	ugpeqanun	Judea-melngughnun.	Ungipaatellemtun	Galatia-ghmiit	ugpeqiit,	elpesillu	ellngistun	pitek.
B07_16_1Corinthians_V2	Sivulighpigaghmi	Santillghem	aghneghani	qamagllusi	aaftiiqitek	manimeng	allgeghneghpesineng.	Tuunyaghqaghpesi	angtalanga	allgeghneghpesi	angtalanganeng	iikluku	tuunyaghqaaguq.	Enkaam	elpesinun	pikuma	qerngughtifqaafsi	manimeng	pilghaasi.
B07_16_1Corinthians_V3	Kaaskuma	kayaglleqanka	tamaakut	nakmikegkasi	latatgun	aglaatesqelluku	tunusaghsi	Jerusalem-emun.
B07_16_1Corinthians_V4	Sumeghtaghallemni	whangallu	pilleghqaqa	pinighyaghqaakan,	maliggnakangatnga.
B07_16_1Corinthians_V5	Elpesinun	laalighhnaqegkuma	sivuklunga	Macedonia-kun	aagllequnga.
B07_16_1Corinthians_V6	Entaqun	elpesinitaghaqaghllequnga	walluumllu	uksulqusiq.	Taagken	navek	pinaqegkuma	yataaghqelgusiqaghnakefsinga.
B07_16_1Corinthians_V7	Atanghem	piyukelqegkagu	maaten	pikuma	elpesinitaghaghyugaqunga,	aagvikaghesnaghyunghitamsi.
B07_16_1Corinthians_V8	Iwernga	Ephesus-mellequnga	kenlanga	Pentecost-em	aghneghanun,
B07_16_1Corinthians_V9	qayughllak	megnunalghii,	aangelghii	qepghalleghqaqa	Ataneghmun	piiqeftuq.	Maanllequnga	qaywa	uglapiglleghhiim	anguyaksaghngaatnga.
B07_16_1Corinthians_V10	Timothy	elpesinun	pikan,	elngaatall	upughannakesi,	qayughllak	qepghaaguq	Ataneghmun	whangamtun.
B07_16_1Corinthians_V11	Qamagllusi	asitnginaaghpenaan,	enkaam	quyangaan	kayaggnakesi	whangamnun.	Utaqaaqaqa	maligulluku	ugpeqaalgutnun.
B07_16_1Corinthians_V12	Ungipaataghllamsi	ugpeqaalgutemnneng	Apollos-meng.	Elngaatall	qelqaqsaghaqa	laalighfikesqellusi	maliglluki	ilangi	ugpeqaalgutet.	Iwernga	maaten	piyunghituq.	Laalighfiknaaghiisi	pilleghqangegkumi.
B07_16_1Corinthians_V13	Kelengatek,	ugpeqilleghpesini	aghuliitek,	ilututek,	iknaqitek.
B07_16_1Corinthians_V14	Piniqelleghqun	piiqiteggu	sangwaa	tamaghhaan.
B07_16_1Corinthians_V15	Ugpeqaalgutemni,	liisimakasi	Stephanas-enkut	nengllugutkullghiit,	ugpeqaqsuwhaaghulghiit	Achaia-mi.	Ataneghmun	tuunegkaagut	ellmeggneng,	ugpeqat	ilangi	kayusiinnaluki.
B07_16_1Corinthians_V16	Quyaanga	Stephanas-enkut,	Fortunatus-enkut,	Achaicus-enkut	kaallghiit	qayughllak	kayusiitngwaatnga	aviilleghpesini.
B07_16_1Corinthians_V17	Quyastengngwaatnga	quyastelleghmegestun	elpesi.	Kayusiitillghitnun	iyamsiqayugvikelleghpesineng	liisimakestengngwaaghnakesi.
B07_16_1Corinthians_V18	Ugpeqat	Asia-melnguut	suumqaqiisinguq.	Aquila-nkuk	Priscilla-nkuk	suumqeghllagiisinguq	Ataneghqun,	qamagllutengllu	ugpeqat	qerngughutkayuget	elkegkenka	mangteghiitni.
B07_16_1Corinthians_V19	Qamaglluteng	ugpeqaalgutet	whangamnilnguut	suumqaqiisinguq.	Quyakutaqitek	naaghluki	Kiyaghneghem	piniqellghakun.
B07_16_1Corinthians_V20	Whanga	katam	iiggemneng	una	igaqaqa:	Suumqamsi.	Paul.
B07_16_1Corinthians_V21	Kitum	alngunak	piniqenghilkumigu	Ataneq,	naafqellelguuq.	“Maranatha,”	whaten	pisiiguq,	Ataneghput,	tagi!
B07_16_1Corinthians_V22	Nangllegtallgha	Atanghem	Jesus-em	elpesinilli.
B07_16_1Corinthians_V23	Piniqamsi	qamagllusi	Christ	Jesus-kun.	Amen.
B08_01_2Corinthians_V1	Ukut	latat	Paul-meng	pinguut,	apostle-nganeng	Christ	Jesus-em	Kiyaghneghem	piyukellghakun,	Timothy-mengllu	pinguut	ugpeqaalgutemnneng.	Kiyaghneghem	yugitnun	qerngughutkayugnun	yughaghvigani	Corinth-em,	tamaghhiitnunllu	Kiyaghneghem	yugitnun	iingunaghhaani	Achaia-m.
B08_01_2Corinthians_V1	Yeqay	Kiyaghneghem	Atamta,	Atanemtallu	Jesus	Christ-am	tuunlisi	quyastelleghmengllu	nekeggmelleghmengllu.
B08_01_2Corinthians_V2	Usuqelteggu	Kiyaghneq	Atanga	Atanemta	Jesus	Christ-am,	nangllegtapiglleghii	Ata,	Kiyaghneghmeng	tagiiquq	qamaglluni	kayutkaghqaq!
B08_01_2Corinthians_V3	Kayusighaqiinkut	qamaglluta	seghleliillemnni,	enkaam	whangkutallu	kayusighyaqlegwaaput	tamaakut	allaaghhiinaghmeng	seghleliilghiit,	atuqluku	ataasiq	taana	kayusilleq	allgeghtekaghput	Kiyaghneghmeng.
B08_01_2Corinthians_V4	Katam	ilatngallemtestun	Christ-am	uglaapiglleghhiinun	ikfiqellghanun,	enkaam	Christ-akun	ilatngallequkut	Kiyaghneghem	kayusilleghllaganun.
B08_01_2Corinthians_V5	Ikfiqegkumta,	kayusilleghpesinunllu	yugulilleghpesinunllu	pillghuuq;	kayusillengegkumta	taawa	elpesillu	kayusillengellequsi	enkaam	tuunellengellequsi	nekeggmellelighlusi	suflughsaghqaaluki	tamaakut	ataasit	ikfiqellghet	suflughtekaput.
B08_01_2Corinthians_V6	Enkaam	sighimakilleghput	elpesinun	aghuliituq;	liisimakaghput	taana	katam	ilatngalleghpesigun	ikfiqellemnnun,	elpesillu	ilatngaasi	kayusilleghmun	allgeghtekamnnun.
B08_01_2Corinthians_V7	Ugpeqaalgutemnni,	nallukesunghitamsi	seghleliilleghmeng	nanghiiqamnneng	Asia-mi.	Elngaatall	seghleghllaguuq	uqigtupigtekaaguq,	repall	sighimananiqaagukut	kiyaghtelleghqamnneng.
B08_01_2Corinthians_V8	Ipapestaaq	tuqunaqniluta	piyaghtukut.	Iwernga	tawaten	aneghtukut	whangkunneng	sighimakefqaamta	pisqelluta,	taawanginaghhaq	Kiyaghneq	sighimakesqelluku	unguvaghtestikayuk	tuqukaneng.
B08_01_2Corinthians_V9	Elngaatall	seghlepestaaghmeng	tuqum	tevneghaneng	yuguliinkut,	yugulilleqiinkutlu.	Enkaam	ellngakun	sighimanguukut	ellngan	yugulilaataghlleqiinkut,
B08_01_2Corinthians_V10	elpesi	kayusiisimaluta	yughalleghpesigun.	Yughaatkilleghllagsi	whangkunneng	kiimsillengellequt,	enkaam	Kiyaghneghem	quyasleqiinkut;	uglapiglleghhiitlu	iglagtughlluteng	iyamsiqayugvikelleqaat	whangkunneng.
B08_01_2Corinthians_V11	Una	esgha	qukaayugusighput,	sumeghtaghallemta	ungipaatiinkut	kiyaghtaalleghput	whani	nunami	ipapighqengngaaqlu	piniqingaaqlu,	kiyang	elpesinun.	Tawaten	piiqukut	Kiyaghneghem	piniqingalghiikun	kayusillghakun,	nakaan	yugem	peghqinellghakun.
B08_01_2Corinthians_V12	Qamaglluteng	lataput	elpesinun	piyaqniitut	atightughyaghqaalutengllu	liigiksaghqaalutengllu.	Sighimakaqamsi	liigikngwaaghesqelluku
B08_01_2Corinthians_V13	sangwaa	maaten	liigikegkaghpesi	nalighneghhiinaa,	enkaam	Aghneghani	Atanghem	Jesus-em	elpesi	qukaayugutkelleqaghpesikut	katam	whangkuta	qukaayugutkellemtestun	elpesi.
B08_01_2Corinthians_V14	Qayughllak	ipapighqutkegkaqaqa	qamaglluku	tamaana,	sivuklunga	elpesinun	laalighhnalunga	pikaayaghtunga,	quyastellengnayukafsi	malghughqengngaan.
B08_01_2Corinthians_V15	Laalighfiksukaqamsi	aglaatkelluku	Macedonia-mun,	uteghniitkellukullu	tamaaken,	kayutengnalunga	elpesineng	igleghalleghqamnun	Judea-mun.

B08_01_2Corinthians_V17	Ipapestaaq	Kiyaghneq	ataasiighmetuq,	akequsaqa	elpesinun	“Aang'ghunghituqlu”	“Nakaaghunghituqlu”.
B08_01_2Corinthians_V18	Kiyaghneghem	Ighnegha,	Jesus	Christ-a	ungipaqegkaghput	elpesinun	Silas-lu	Timothy-llu	whangallu,	“Aang'ghunghituqlu”	“Nakaaghunghituqlu”;	iwernga	ellngani	quunpeng	“Aang'ghuuq”.
B08_01_2Corinthians_V19	Ellnganguuq	“Angelleq”	tamaghhiitnun	Kiyaghneghem	akequsiitnun.	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	whangkuta	“Amen-aaghaqukut”	ellngakun	usuqnemteggu	Kiyaghneq.

B08_01_2Corinthians_V22	Tuqlughaqa	Kiyaghneq	liisimakistenguluku	qayughllak	liisimakegkanga	qaamna	iluka!	Corinth-esugunghitunga	seghleliighqesnayukamsi.

B08_02_2Corinthians_V2	Qayughllak	quyanghitestekumsi	kitumngam	whanga	qaqayugtesleqanga?	Alla	kitum	pinaanghitanga	iwerngaqun	elpesi	quyanghitestekama.
B08_02_2Corinthians_V1	Taawa	umyugagka	ataasiighsimaagka	alla	elpesinun	pikuma	quyanghitesaghqaafqaafsi	pinalusi.

B08_02_2Corinthians_V14	Qayughllak	whangkuta	tepkegtastun	neqnighsaasistun	ayuqukut	Christ-am	aghqutkegkaatun	Kiyaghneghmun.	Tepevut	mengitnguuq	yugulikanunllu	iflakanunllu.

B08_02_2Corinthians_V16	Uglapiglleghhiistun	kinkustun	ayuqenghitukut	salin	qepghaghyaghqaanghilngughestun	tamaaken	qepghaqameng.	Pinilghiit	ungipat	piiqiit	ilangistun	qepghaqastun	ayuqniluki	allgeghutusighqat	kiyaghtaaghusighqamun. B08_03_2Corinthians_V5	Ellngan	qepghaghyaqlegughtestiinkut	nutaghamun	akequsamun.	Taana	nutaghaq	akequsaq	igaqngalghiingunghituq	liilightuusaq,	iwernga	Taghneghagneng	ayuquq.	Igaqngalghiim	Liilightuusam	tagitaa	tuqulleq,	iwernga	Taghnegham	tuunaa	unguvalleq.

Liilightuusat	nighughqestighllagumakata,
B08_03_2Corinthians_V7	natenmi	angkaan	qepghallgha	Kiyaghneghem	Taghneghagkenka	nighughqestiighataghaghlleqa!

B08_03_2Corinthians_V11	Taana	sighimakutemnneng	tetugigatngwaaghtukut.
B08_03_2Corinthians_V12	Moses-etun	ayuqenghitukut,	gginani	saaputiqaa	enkaam	Israel-eghmiit	esghaamangitaat	nighugllak	aviighullghii.
B08_03_2Corinthians_V13	Umyugiit	liigikepagningiitkaagut,	whavemun	kenlanga	umyugiit	saapngaat	taagken	ataasimeng	saaputameng,	atightuneghmegteki	neghightat	akequsat.	Taana	saaputaq	iqisaghqaaguq	Christ-anginaghhaghqun.

B08_04_2Corinthians_V4	Ellngita	ugpeqigataat	ungipaghput	qayughllak	Tughneghaam,	uum	nunam	kiyaghneghan,	ayaastekaqii	umyugiit.	Esghanghitestaqaa	nighuga	Pinilghiim	Ungipam	nighughqellghaneng	Christ-am	ayuqelghii.	Christ-a	Kiyaghneghtun	ayuquq.
B08_04_2Corinthians_V1	Enkaam	Kiyaghneghem	nangllegtalleghmikun	qepghaqalitiinkut	whaken	qepghaghyaghqameng.	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	iilqayugigatukut.
B08_04_2Corinthians_V2	Ighsayagutkaqaput	aksaqegkatlu	kayngunalghiitlu.	Puughsigataput	yuget,	allangughsigataputlu	Kiyaghneghem	akuzitangi.	Whateghlluwaaqlu	apeghtuusaqaqaput	Kiyaghneghem	ipapillghi,	enkaangam	yuget	liilleqiinkut	natelnguutfut	esghaamanghani	Kiyaghneghem.
B08_04_2Corinthians_V3	Ungipaqegkaput	Pinilghiit	Ungipat	saapngakata,	saapngaat	iflayaghqaghhiinaghnun.
B08_04_2Corinthians_V4	Whangkunneng	katam	ungipaqngunghitukut,	itupill	ungipaqngwaaghput	Jesus	Christ-a	Atanghuniluku.	Qepghaghtekaghpesikut	Jesus	apalluqluku.
B08_04_2Corinthians_V5	Kiyaghneghuuq	whaten	pikaq,	“Yeqay	nighuk	kuukgulli	mamlelleghmeng!”	Ellnganguuq	ataasiq	Kiyaghneq	kuukgutestilghii	nighugmeng	ilumnnun.	Taaggun	nighugkun	liitaghput	nighughqellgha	Kiyaghneghem,	kuukgullghii	Jesus	Christ-am	gginaaneng.
B08_04_2Corinthians_V6	Iwernga	whangkunnun	Kiyaghneghem	kanaghtekaqaa	taana	nighuk	kuukgutesqelluku	ilumnni.	Whangkuta	qikustun	qantaghqastun	ayuqukut,	enkaam	tamangan	liigikelleqaat	aghtughyaghqaanghiteghllak	Kiyaghneghtaaniluku,	whangkunneng	pingunghinniluku.
B08_04_2Corinthians_V7	Seghleliillengaqukut	allaaghhiinatun	iwernga	kayaalqigatiinkut.	Ilangakun	kukragyullengaqukut	iwernga	sighimallghiisigatukut.
B08_04_2Corinthians_V8	Amyuqetaatkellengaqukut,	iwernga	Kiyaghneghem	unisigatiinkut;	aqnighqwaallengaqukut,	iwernga	tuqungigatukut.
B08_04_2Corinthians_V9	Iiwleng	tuqullgha	Jesus-em	yugusimnnituq,	esghiisqelluku	unguvallgha	Jesus-em	yugusimnni.
B08_04_2Corinthians_V10	Unguvanguluta	iiwleng	yakughnallghanitukut	tuqullghem	apalluqluku	Jesus,	esghiisqelluku	Jesus-em	unguvallgha	yugusimnni	tuqukayugni.
B08_04_2Corinthians_V11	Enkaam	whangkuta	yakughnallghanitukut	tuqullghem	qayughllak	qepghaatngukefut	Kiyaghneq.	Iwernga	qepghallemta	kenlengilngughmeng	unguvallengestengngwiisi.
B08_04_2Corinthians_V12	Igaqngaaq	Akuzitni	Igaqegkani,	“Ugpeqaqa	Kiyaghneq	enkaam	akuzitkaqaqa.”	Ugpeqilleghput	tawatetuq	igaqestetun.	Whangkutallu	ugpeqaghput	Kiyaghneq	enkaam	akuzitkaqaghput.
B08_04_2Corinthians_V13	Liisimakaghput	Kiyaghneghem	unguvaghtekaqaa	Ataneq	Jesus.	Whangkutallu	unguvaghlleqiinkut	Jesus-kun.	Taagken	aglaalleqiinkut	qerngaamta	elpesillu	tawantelleghminun.
