B08_04_2Corinthians_V14	Qamaglluteng	tamaakut	apeghiiqat	whangkunnun	elpesinun	ayuqut.	Kiyaghneghem	nangllegtallghan	nulasleqii	yuget	ugpeqilghiit	Christ-akun.	Enkaam	iyamsiqayulleghllak	Kiyaghneghmun	nulallequq,	quulvallengeghllagllequqlu.
B08_04_2Corinthians_V15	Enkaam	iilqayugigatukut.	Qaywa	yugusiput	kayaalikestaghyaghngaata,	taghneghaput	nutaghtengnguut	aghhutanga	tamaghhaan.
B08_04_2Corinthians_V16	Seghleliilleput	sasqughhaagut	muluyaghqaanghitut.	Iwernga	tamaakut	yataaghqutngwiinkut	allgeghtesqelluku	Kiyaghneghmeng	kenlengilnguq	quyalleghllak.	Enkaam	seghleliilleput	avangilngughestun	ayuqut.
B08_04_2Corinthians_V17	Sumeghtaghaatkumanginiigataput	seghleliilleput.	Itupill	sumeghtaghaatkaqaput	esghaghpagningilkeput.	Qantaghaqun	seghleliilleput	kenletghuullequt,	iwernga	quyalleghput	esghiigalkefut	quunpekaghqaaguq.
B08_05_2Corinthians_V5	Kiyaghneghem	yataaghqutkaqiinkut	whavek	allangughtelleghmun.	Whangkunnunllu	tuunegkaqaak	Taghneghagni	liisimakesqelluku	allangughtelleghqaghput	ipapestaaq	apeghiighlleqniluku.
B08_05_2Corinthians_V1	Whani	nunami	ukut	yugusiput	kiyaghfiput	tiintastun	ayuqut.	Liisimakaghput	yugusiput	tuqukata	Kiyaghneq	mangteghalguuq	qilagmi	whangkunnun	kiyaghfigkameng.	Kiyaghneghem	ulimakaqaa	mangteghaq,	yugem	ulimaaqenghitaa.	Taana	mangteghaq	quunpekaghqaaguq.
B08_05_2Corinthians_V2	Ipa	ngillegtukut	nunametnguluta	qayughllak	kiyaghsupiglleghhiikut	yugusighraghamnni	qilagmi.
B08_05_2Corinthians_V3	Aatkastun	aalleqaput	tamaakut	yugusighraghaat	amsikaghmenneghinnaluta.
B08_05_2Corinthians_V4	Yugusiput	tiintastun	ayuqut.	Tiintamelluta	ngillegtaqukutlu,	seghleliightukutlu	qayughllak	mataghsugigalkeput.	Itupill	simighyugaqaput	yugusinun	tuqungigalngughnun.
B08_05_2Corinthians_V5	Enkaam	iiwleng	ilutaaqukut.	Liisimakaghput	nemetnguluta	yugusimnni,	Ataneghmesigatukut.
B08_05_2Corinthians_V6	Kiyaghtengnguukut	ugpeqilleghqun,	nakaan	esghaqayumteggun.
B08_05_2Corinthians_V7	Enkaam	ilutaaqukut.	Unisugaqaput	yugusiput	nemennaluta	Ataneghmi.
B08_05_2Corinthians_V8	Nemesaghngaamta	nalighmeng	nemenneghiteghngaamta,	efqughsugaqaghput	Ataneq.
B08_05_2Corinthians_V9	Qamaglluta	nekevepestaaghyaghqaagukut	Christ-am	sivungakun	nanqigtesqelluta.	Ataasikaghtaamta	allgeghullequkut	pinilghiimeng	nalighmeng	seghleghmeng	apeghiighutellemtestun	yugusimteggun.
B08_05_2Corinthians_V10	Enkaangam	alikaqaghput	Ataneq,	tamaaken	apalluqluku	ugpeghtesnaqutkaqaput	yuget	Christ-akun.	Kiyaghneghem	liisimakiinkut	natelnguutfut	yugni,	sunanguq	elpesillu	liisimakitekut	tawatelluta.
B08_05_2Corinthians_V11	Elpesinun	tuguklightesnaqutkengngunghitukut	allameng.	Itupill	ungipaataqamsi	whangkunneng	elpesinun	qukaayugutkesqelluta.	Taagken	apeghyaqlegughlleqaghpesikut	qukaayugutkilghiinun	yugem	qaastulnginaghhaaneng.	Waakigataat	sangutanga	yugem	ilumikegkaa.
B08_05_2Corinthians_V12	Nallutuyiqngukumta,	Kiyaghneghmun	ayuquq,	iwernga	nallutuyiqngunghilkumta,	elpesinun	ayuquq.
B08_05_2Corinthians_V13	Christ-am	igleghutngwiinkut	piniqelleghmikun.	Liisimakngwaaghaghput	yugem	ataasim	tuqumatkegkaqaa	qamagtengngwaaghluku	yuuk.	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	qamagtengngwaaghluteng	yuget	tuqukaagut.
B08_05_2Corinthians_V14	Christ-am	tuqumatkegkaqii	qamagtengngwaaghluki	yuget.	Enkaam	kiyaghlleghhiit	kiyaghsaqlegullequt	ellnganun,	nakaan	ellmeggnun	katam.	Tuquluni	unguvaghtekaaguq	ellngit	apalluqluki.
B08_05_2Corinthians_V15	Whaken	kenlekluku	kina	alngunak	sumeghtaghaatkennaniimaaghput	nunam	yugan	sumeghtaghaatkellghatun.	Qaywa	ataasimeng	sumeghtaghaatkegkaqaghput	Christ-a	nunam	yugan	pillghatun,	tawaten	sumeghtaghaatkennaniimaaghput.
B08_05_2Corinthians_V16	Kina	alngunak	Christ-am	piliinneghminigu	nutaghaghllugughtaquq.	Kiyaghtaalleluga	aviighutaquq,	iwernga	nutaghaghlluk	kiyaghtaallgha	piinlighaquq.
B08_05_2Corinthians_V17	Kiyaghneghuuq	tawaten	pikaq.	Ellngan	ilaliighutestekaqiinkut	ellminun	Christ-akun.	Qepghaqalitiinkutlu	ilangillu	yuget	ilaliighutesqelluki	ellminun.
B08_05_2Corinthians_V18	Christ-akun	Kiyaghneghem	ilaliighwii	qamagtengngwaaghluki	yuget,	umyugaghmikegpenaki	seghleghqellghit.	Enkaangam	ungipaghqalitkaqiinkut	aapghesqelluki	naten	ellminun	ilaliighutangi	ellngit.
B08_05_2Corinthians_V19	Kiyaghneghem	kayagtekaqiinkut	ungipaghtenguluta	Christ-amun,	enkaam	whangkutgun	tagisqellusi	ellminun.	Akuzistenguukut	Christ-amun	kayemilghiit	ilaliighutesqellusi	Kiyaghneghmun.
B08_05_2Corinthians_V20	Christ-a	seghleghqumangitngwaaghtuq,	iwernga	seghleghqellemnnun	Kiyaghneghem	aghyuuqaqaa	seghleghqegkaaluku.	Enkaam	Christ-akun	Kiyaghneghem	elqughutngangllaqaqiinkut.
B08_06_2Corinthians_V6	Liigikestengnguukutlu	Kiyaghneghmun	qepghaghtekutfut	pinitun	kiyaghtaallemteggun,	liisimakillemteggun,	nuqetutillemteggun,	nangllegtallemteggun,	piniqipillemteggun,	Agleghnalghiignekun	Taghneghagnekun.
B08_06_2Corinthians_V1	Qepghalgutkututemnneng	Kiyaghneqlu,	taawa	kayemamsi	Kiyaghneghem	nangllegtallgha	tuguklighpenaan	temngitwhanguluku.
B08_06_2Corinthians_V2	Kiyaghneq	pikaaguq,	“Pilleghqaghlluwaaghmi	nagaquqaqamken,	aghneghani	yugulillghem	kayusiqaqamken.”	Ungipaatamsi,	maatenguuq	Kiyaghneghem	pilleghqaghlluwaagha;	nagatek,	maatenguuq	aghnegha	yugulighillghem!
B08_06_2Corinthians_V3	Kiyaghtaallemteggun	naagsaghanglliigataput	yuget,	seghlequufqaan	pisqelluku	qepghaqaghput	Ataneghmun.
B08_06_2Corinthians_V4	Iwernga	sallemteggun	tamaghhaakun	liigikestaqukut	yugnun	Kiyaghneghmun	qepghaghtekniluta.	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	nuqetutimallemteggun	suflughtaghaqaput	seghleliillghet,	piyaqliillghet,	ikfiqellghet.
B08_06_2Corinthians_V5	Qevutquqaagukut,	anusimingllaqaagukut,	uglaatellengegkaagukutlu.	Ughleghiiqaagukut,	qavalqumangitukut,	iyataqaagukutlu.
B08_06_2Corinthians_V6	Qepghaatngwaaghput	Kiyaghneq	ungipaqellemteggun	ipapilleq.	Atuqaqaghput	Kiyaghneghem	aghtughyaghqaanghillgha,	elqughutngalleqlu	guututkelluku	aghenqignemnnunllu	saghumignemnnunllu.
B08_06_2Corinthians_V7	Quulvallengaqukutlu	ukavaghllengaqukutlu;	seghlequughsighaqukutlu	usuqellengaqukutlu.	Iqlengalghiinguniiqiinkut,	iwernga	akuziiqukut	ipapigmeng.
B08_06_2Corinthians_V8	Yuget	nallukniqiinkut,	naqamllu	liisimakluta;	uglaghngaan	tuquvzighaqukut,	iwernga	paninang	unguvaakut.	Aghyuughyaghngiinkut,	tuqusigatiinkut.
B08_06_2Corinthians_V9	Qivghungughngaamta,	naqamllu	quyangaghllawaaqukut;	aklumaghngaamta,	naqamllu	aklungighistaqaput	yuget;	avaqraggiiteghngaamta,	naqamllu	pilwaaqukut	sameng	tamaghhaaneng.
B08_06_2Corinthians_V10	Ugpeqaalgutemnni,	Corinth-eghmiini,	ipapighqullusi	ayuqamsi.	Ungipaatamsi	piniqepigtamsi.
B08_06_2Corinthians_V11	Nuqneghusimangitamsi	piniqellemnneng,	iwernga	elpesinguut	nuqneghutikat	piniqilleghpesineng	whangkunnun.
B08_06_2Corinthians_V12	Maaten	aleghqughamsi	avaqutaqepiglleghhiistun,	piniqeqeghtikut	katam	whangkuta	piniqellemtestun	elpesi.
B08_06_2Corinthians_V13	Inglukegpenaki	ugpeqaanghilnguut.	Elqughutngallghenkuk	seghleghenkuk	inglukutepagningituk.	Nighugenkuklu	mamlegenkuklu	qerngaghmetepagningituk.
B08_06_2Corinthians_V14	Christ-am	itagnaqsaghqaqenghitngwaaghaa	Tughneghaq.	Ugpeqat	piyukellghit	allanguut	ugpeqaanghilngughneng.
B08_06_2Corinthians_V15	Kiyaghnengllaqat	manigughyaghqaanghitut	Kiyaghneghem	Temple-ngani.	Qayughllak	whangkuta	Temple-kiinkut	unguvalghiim	Kiyaghneghem,	Kiyaghneq	pikaalghii,	“Ellngitnillequngallu	akulngitnillequngallu;	Kiyaghneqelleqaatnga,	ellngitlu	yukelleqanka.”
B08_06_2Corinthians_V16	“Tamaaken	apalluqluku	Ataneq	pikaalghii,	Uniteki	tamaakut	yuget,	aaftek	ellngitneng.	Saaftegpenaki	ukmanginneghilnguut;	enkaam	tuguklighlleqamsi.
B08_06_2Corinthians_V17	Atakelleqaghpesinga,	enkaam	elpesi	ighneqelleqamsillu	panikelleqamsillu,	piiq	Ataneq	Aghtughyaghqaghhaanghilnguq.”
B08_07_2Corinthians_V7	Ilutughtekaagukut	tagiiqngan	Titus,	iwernga	ilutughllengataghaghtukut	ungipaasinkut	elpesinun	ilutughsaamaniluni.	Ungipaatiinkut	elpesinun	esghaghyupiggnilunga,	qivghuknilunga	seghleliighqelleghpesineng,	kayusighyupiggnilungallu.	Tawaten	pilleghpesi	wanlegi	quyasteghllagaanga.
B08_07_2Corinthians_V1	Piniqegkamni	ilakumtaamni,	Kiyaghneq	tamaakuneng	akequsangllaqaatanganeng	whangkunnun,	ukmangighsaalteki	allaaghhiinaat	nukeggnii	yugusimtallu	taghneghamtallu.	Pelungightengngwaaghelta	qayughllak	alikaghput	Kiyaghneq.
B08_07_2Corinthians_V2	Ilaliiqaghqut	ilugpesigun.	Kina	alngunak	anagngalghiimeng	pingigataghput,	ugpeqillgha	naafqumangitaghput,	talwa	puughneqguusimangitaghput.
B08_07_2Corinthians_V3	Ungipaatngunghitamsi	tamaakuneng	avutkennalusi.	Sivunghani	ungipaatkaqamsi	piniqepiggnilusi,	enkaam	kiyaghtelgusighlleqamsi	nalighmeng	tuqulgusighlleqamsi.
B08_07_2Corinthians_V4	Neghyukeghllaglusi	ayuqamsi,	qukaayugutkepigtamsi.	Kayemeghllagaqaghpesinga.	Enkaam	seghleliilleghllamnni	paninang	tevughaaqunga	quyalleghmeng.
B08_07_2Corinthians_V5	Kaataqngamta	Macedonia-mun,	meghnaalipagningitkaagukut.	Seghleliiqaagukut	tamangani,	yuget	aaghtiiraaqaqiinkut,	teggellghiiqaagukutlu.
B08_07_2Corinthians_V6	Iwernga	Kiyaghneghem	ilutughsaghaqii	iilqengngalghiit,	enkaam	ilutughsaghiinkut	tagistelleghmikun	Titus	whangkunnun.
B08_07_2Corinthians_V7	Qaywa	latamkun	qivghusteghngaamsi,	avuteghqutkengngunghitanka	latanka.	Sivukun	avuteghqesaghtunga	qayughllak	latama	qivghustaghtekangisi.
B08_07_2Corinthians_V8	Quyangunghitunga	latamnun	qivghusimanilusi.	Iwernga	quyaghllaguunga	qivghulleghpesi	allangughtestekaqegkangi	kiyaghtaallesi.	Qivghulleghsi	Kiyaghneghem	atuqegkaqaa	elpesinun,	enkaam	naten	alngunak	whangkuta	aqnightellghitamsi.
B08_07_2Corinthians_V9	Kiyaghneghem	atuqaqaa	qivghulleq	yugnun	avuteghqelluki	seghleghqellghitneng,	yugulillengesqelluki.	Kitum	alngunak	avuteghqutkennaanghitaa	yugulilleq.	Iwernga	qivghulleq	nunameng	pi	tuqustiiquq.
B08_07_2Corinthians_V10	Esghaqaghtegguqun	sangutanga	Kiyaghneghem	apeghiiqaa	qivghulleghpesigun.	Qivghulleghpesi	efqughutesugllagiisi	Kiyaghneghmun.	Elngaatall	ipapighqennaqutkegkaayaghtusi	anaggutellghinnilusi.	Ugumiyagutkaqaghsi	anaggutelleq,	alingruuqaagusillu.	Esghaghyupigtekaqaghpesinga,	pinitun	pikaagusi,	aghyuuqaqaghsillu	anaggutkaq.	Tawaten	pilleghpesigun	ipapighqegkaagusi	apalliinnilusi.
B08_07_2Corinthians_V11	Enkaam	qaywa	tawaten	latayaghngaamsi,	apalluqngunghitaqa	anaggutkaq,	nalighmeng	tawavek	seghletun	pikaanun.	Itupill	latakaqamsi	liigikngwaaghesqellusi	Kiyaghneghem	esghaamanghani	tuun'ngwaaghlusi	whangkunnun	ayuqelghiisi.
B08_07_2Corinthians_V12	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	ilutughtengngaakut.	Ilutughtengnginaghpenaamta,	iwernga	quyaaghataghaghtukut	esghaghluku	Titus-em	quyamallgha.	Qamagllusi	sumeghyalingiitesimaaghsi.
B08_07_2Corinthians_V13	Qanatkegkaqamsi	Titus-mun	efquqnilusi.	Elpesinun	piiqngami	liitkaqii	ipangutangi	sameng	pillghenka	elpesineng	ayuqelghiit,	enkaam	kaynguyagutellghitanka	qanatkillghenka.	Iiwleng	ipapighqelluta	aleghqughaqamsi.	Tawateghpigaq	ipanguut	qanatkilleghput	Titus-mun.
B08_07_2Corinthians_V14	Enkaam	Titus-em	wanlegi	piniqaaghtiisi	sumeghtaghaatkenneghminigu	qaatkutngalleghsi	ellminun.	Upughatkaqegkesillu	alingellelighlusi,	ungellegtellelighlusi.
B08_07_2Corinthians_V15	Quyaghllaguunga	qayughllak	neghyukeghllaglusi	ayuqamsi	samun	tamaghhaanun!
B08_08_2Corinthians_V8	Qelghunghitamsi	tuunisqellusi,	iwernga	ungipaatngwaamsi	naten	ilangit	tuunimatangi.	Enkaam	tuunilleghpesi	ipapighqelleqaa	piniqilleghsi	ipangutanga.
B08_08_2Corinthians_V1	Ugpeqaalgutemni,	whangkuta	liisimakesuwamsi	Kiyaghneghem	nangllegtallghaneng	ugpeqanun	yughaghvigitni	Macedonia-m.
B08_08_2Corinthians_V2	Ikfiqliightelleghllagita	nanghiighsaghallengesteghllakaqiit.	Qaywa	aklumaghllagyaghngaaghmeng,	paninang	quyamaghllakaagut	repall	ighlegpenateng	tuunikaagut	kayusighnaluki	ilangi	ugpeqat.
B08_08_2Corinthians_V3	Ungipaatamsi	tuunikaagut	tuunyaghqaghtutalmegestun,	talwa	tuuniighataghaqaagut.	Tawaten	pikaagut	qayughllak	ellngit	tuuniyulghiit.	Kitum	alngunak	pisqumangitii.
B08_08_2Corinthians_V4	Talwa	aapuquuteghllakaagut	tuunilgusighinaluteng	Kiyaghneghem	yugitnun.
B08_08_2Corinthians_V5	Tuunillghat	uglaqaaguq	sighimakellemnneng.	Sivukluteng	ellmeggneng	pegtut	Ataneghmun,	taagken	whangkunnun	piyukellghakun	Kiyaghneghem.
B08_08_2Corinthians_V6	Titus	elpesinitaqngami	piinlighikaaguq	qerngughtilleghpesineng	manimeng.	Enkaam	kayemaghput	kayusiisaghtiisqellusi	apeghiighesqelluku	nangllekusaghsi	tunusaq.
B08_08_2Corinthians_V7	Salleghpesigun	tamaghhaakun	pinitun	piiqusi:	ugpeqilleghpesigun,	akuzilleghpesigun,	liisimalleghpesigun,	kayusighiyukestalleghpesigun,	piniqilleghpesigunllu	whangkunnun.	Maatemillu	pinitun	piiqitek	tuunilleghpesigun.
B08_08_2Corinthians_V8	Liisimakaghsi	piniqingalleghllaga	Atanemta	Jesus	Christ-am.	Aklungighllagmini	tawalliima	ellmineng	katam	aklumaaghtekaaguq	elpesi	apalluqlusi.	Tawaten	pikaaguq	aklungighisqeqaghllusi	aklumalleghmikun.
B08_08_2Corinthians_V9	Awatangani	elpesi	qerngughtiyuwhaaqaagusi	manimeng,	tuunikaagusillu	qayughllak	tuuniyulghiisi.	Sumemni	whatelluku	piyaqufsigu,	itagnaghnayaghtusi,
B08_08_2Corinthians_V10	nagneghusaqufsigu	piinliqaghsi!	Sagiqngakaagusi	qerngughtiyuwhaaghaqngafsi	manimeng.	Enkaam	sagiqenqigllusi	apeghiighteggu	qerngughtekaghsi.	Tuunitek	tuunilleghqaghpesistun.
B08_08_2Corinthians_V11	Tuuniyupigtekufsi	Kiyaghneghem	tuguklighlleqii	tunusasi.	Piyukaqaa	yuuk	tuunisqelluku	tuunyaghqalgukan,	iwernga	avangiskan	tuuninghisaghngaan.
B08_08_2Corinthians_V12	Nuuqragtistesugunghitamsi	ilasi	nuuqragtinghisimaluki.
B08_08_2Corinthians_V13	Maaten	llileghllaglusi	ayuqusi	enkaam	kayusighyaghqaqasi	tamaakut	aklulghiit.	Iwernga	aklukufsi	taawa	ellngita	kayusighlleqiisi.	Tawaten	pikufsi	kayusiitullequsi	enkaam	atunem	pillequsi.
B08_08_2Corinthians_V14	Katam	Akuzitet	Igaqegkat	igaqellghistun,	“Yuuk	saghnaghllakaq	suyvaghsimangituq,	iwernga	yuuk	saghnapagumangilnguq	aklunaanghituq.”
B08_08_2Corinthians_V15	Iyamsiqayugvikaqa	Kiyaghneq	qayughllak	Titus	kayusighiyugtesteghllakanga	elpesineng	katam	whangkutestun.
B08_08_2Corinthians_V16	Titus	angeghqumakaaguq	elpesinun	pisqesamteggu.	Elpesinun	piyupigtekaaguq,	taana	ellngan	piyukelqaa.
B08_08_2Corinthians_V17	Ugpeqaalgutfut	Titus-mun	maligutesnaqaghput.	Qamagtengngwaaghluteng	ugpeqat	qerngughutkayuget	yughaghvigni	usuqepigtaqaat	ungipaqillghaneng	Pinilghiineng	Ungipaneng.
B08_08_2Corinthians_V18	Taananginaagpenaan,	ugpeqat	nakmikegkaqaat	maligutesqelluku	whangkutgun,	tuuniyaghtuqumta	nangllekusameng	tunusameng	ugpeqanun.	Tawaten	pinguukut	usuqellengesqelluku	Ataneq,	yugnunllu	liitesqelluku	kayusighiyulleghput.
B08_08_2Corinthians_V19	Piraamsinguukut	kitumun	alngunak	seghlequufqaamta	pisqelluta	naten	aflengakaqutfut	taana	tunusaghllak.
B08_08_2Corinthians_V20	Enkaam	tamaaken	apalluqluku	atuqsugaqaghput	Kiyaghneghmi	elqughutngalghii,	yugnillu	elqughutngalghii.
B08_08_2Corinthians_V21	Titus-enkugnunllu	maligutesnaqaghput	ilanga	ugpeqaalgutfut.	Awen	esghaghnaluku	natetulanga	piiqaghput,	piyalghiikut	iiwleng	kayusighiyukestaghluni	ayuqeftuq.	Wanlegi	maaten	kayusighiyugllagughtuq	qayughllak	neghyukeghllakangisi.
B08_08_2Corinthians_V22	Titus	qepghalgutkaqa,	qepghalgusighaqaanga	kayusiinnalusi.	Taakuklu	ugpeqaalgutek	ugpeqat	yughaghvignilnguut	kayagtekaqagket.	Quulvaghllagluku	Christ-a	ayuqaak.
B08_08_2Corinthians_V23	Enkaam	Corinth-eghmiini,	esghaghtesteggu	piniqilleghsi	taakugnun	yugegnun.	Taagken	piniqilleghpesi	ipapighqesleqiit	ugpeqat	yughaghvignilnguut	sangan	qanatkellemnneng	elpesi.
B08_09_2Corinthians_V9	Akuzitni	Igaqegkani	igaqngaaq,	“Ighlellngunani	tuuniiquq	aklumalghiinun;	pinitun	pingallgha	nagneghyaghqaaguq	quunpeng.”
B08_09_2Corinthians_V1	Latatkenghisaghngaamkun	ayuqaqa	tunusaq	tuyughyaghqaghsi	Kiyaghneghem	yugitnun	Jerusalem-em.
B08_09_2Corinthians_V2	Liisimakamsi	kayusighiyuglusi	ayuqusi	enkaam	qanatkaqamsi	ugpeqiitnun	Macedonia-m.	Whaten	pikaagunga,	“Awatangani	ima	ugpeqaalgutet	Achaia-melnguut	yataaghqegkaagut	tuuninaluteng.”	Sagiqelleghpesi	allulluki	ugpeqat	maanlenguut	tuuniyugtestekaqiitlu.
B08_09_2Corinthians_V3	Iwernga	kayaggnaqanka	ilangi	ugpeqaalguteput	elpesinun.	Apalluqaqa	qanatkilqa	elpesineng	temngingufqaan	pisqelluku.	Yataaghqesqesugamsi	katam	whanga	pisqellemtun	elpesi,
B08_09_2Corinthians_V4	luuraq	Macedonia-ghmiit	ilangita	maliggnayukangatnga	Corinth-mun.	Esghaqumisi	yataaghqellghillusi	tunusaghqaghpesineng,	taawa	whangkuta	kayngusaakelleqiinkut,	elpesillu	kaynguyugllequsi.
B08_09_2Corinthians_V5	Enkaam	sumeghtaghaghtunga	sivumni	kayagtekestaghnaluki	ilangi	ugpeqaalguteput.	Tawaten	kayusiilleqiisi	yataaghqesqelluku	akequsaqegkaghsi	tunusaq.	Taagken	kaaskuma	tunusaghsi	apeghiighngallequq,	enkaam	yuget	liisimakelleqaat	tuuniyulleghsi,	nakaan	qayughllak	tuuniyaghqaategpesineng.
B08_09_2Corinthians_V6	Neqamikluku	una,	yuuk	palaghhaghmeng	piitutmeng	piitesighaqumi,	palaghhaan	saghnallequq.	Yuuk	uglaghluku	piitutmeng	piitesighaqumi,	uglaghluku	saghnallequq.
B08_09_2Corinthians_V7	Tamaghhaghpesi	sumeghtaghaatkiteggu	tuunilleghqaghtutalesi.	Ighlegumaghpesi	tuunigpenasi	nalighmeng	tuuniyaghqaategpesineng.	Iwernga	quyakusiqluku	tuuniiqitek	qayughllak	Kiyaghneghem	piniqii	tawatelnguut	tuunistet.
B08_09_2Corinthians_V8	Kiyaghneghem	tuunyaqlegwiisi	aklukegkaghpesineng	qaayghulluku.	Enkaam	iiwleng	sameng	alngunak	pilwaaqellequsi,	siipngaanllu	kayusiitesqelluki	ilasi.
B08_09_2Corinthians_V9	Kiyaghneghuuq	tuunikayuk	piitutmeng	piitesighaghtemun,	neqmengllu	neghyaghqameng.	Tuunelleqaa	qamaglluku	piitun	aklukegkaghsi,	nagusleqiillu.	Enkaangam	unataghllagllequsi	qayughllak	ighlegilnguusi.
B08_09_2Corinthians_V10	Sakun	tamaghhaakun	aklungighisleqiisi,	naran'ngunaan	tuunisqellusi	salleghmi	tamaghhaani.	Enkaam	tuunilleghpesigun	whangkutgun	uglalghiim	iyamsiqayugvikelleqaat	Kiyaghneq.
B08_09_2Corinthians_V11	Kiyaghneghem	yugita	Jerusalem-emelnguut	allgeghlleqiit	aklukegkateng	tunusaghpesigun.	Enkaam	yulghuteghllaget	iyamsiqayulleghmeng	tevughallequt	Kiyaghneghmun.
B08_09_2Corinthians_V12	Tuunyaghqaghpesigun	ipapighqellequsi	ugpeqinganilusillu	qaatkutnganilusillu	Pinilghiinun	Ungipaanun	Christ-am.	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	yuget	usuqelleqaat	Kiyaghneq.	Usuqelleqaatlu	ighlellngunasi	tuunilleghpesineng	Jerusalem-eghmiinunllu	ilangitnunllu.
B08_09_2Corinthians_V13	Enkaangam	piniqepigllusi	yughaatkelleqiisi	apalluqluku	piniqelleghrugllak	Kiyaghneghem	tuun'ngakanga	elpesinun.
B08_09_2Corinthians_V14	Yeqay	iyamsiqayugvikelteggu	Kiyaghneq	tunusaanun	akuzitet	apeghpagningilkangat.
B08_10_2Corinthians_V10	Ilangita	piiqiit	Paul-em	latangi	seghleghllaguniluki	aghsaaghmikaghnganiluki,	naqam	whangkunninneghmini,	aghsaan	ayuqaquq,	akuziyiitaquqlu!
B08_10_2Corinthians_V1	Ilangita	yugpesi	piiqaatnga	tetugtaghnilunga	elpesininnemni,	iwernga	tetugiganniiqaatnga	elpesininneghinnemni.	Whanga	Paul,	whangamneng	katam,	Christ-am	qusevegngallghakunllu	piniqellghakunllu,
B08_10_2Corinthians_V2	tetugtesneghitaghhnakefsinga	laalighfikenqigtekumsi.	Iwernga	tetugyaghqaqenghilkumki	tamaakut	yuget	pilghiit	kiyaghtengngunilunga	nunam	yugistun,	elngaatall	tetugnaanghitanka.
B08_10_2Corinthians_V3	Nunametngughngaamta	pilluwiigatukut	nunam	yugan	pilluwallghistun.
B08_10_2Corinthians_V4	Guututet	pilluwaasiput	nunam	yugan	guututkenghitii.	Guututeput	Kiyaghneghem	aghtughyaghqaanghillghaneng	pilguut.	Naafqesaqlegwiit	ayepsugilnguut	mingllutet	anguyagem	nekefquqii	yuget	uvitangitgun.
B08_10_2Corinthians_V5	Taakutgun	guututetgun	naafqaqaput	anguyagem	iqlengii,	sumeghneghitlu	aangaayugneghet.	Apeghtughillghita	amigighaqiit	yuget	liitelleghqiitneng	Kiyaghneghmeng.	Katam	pilluwaghtet	tugutellghistun	anusimingllaghyaghqameng,	whangkutallu	tugwaaqaput	qamaglluki	sumeghneghet	qaatkutesqelluki	Christ-amun.
B08_10_2Corinthians_V6	Christ-amun	qaatkutngngwaaqufsi,	taawa	aghyuughiyaghqaaghllequkut	qaatkunneghilngughnun.
B08_10_2Corinthians_V7	Nanqigtiiqusi	esghallghiinaghpesigun.	Christ-amun	pikepestaaghnikufsi,	neqamikluku	whangkutallu	Christ-am	pikiinkut,	elpesistun.
B08_10_2Corinthians_V8	Kayngukigataqa	qanatkivleghapalqa	Atanghem	igleghutistengughtestekanganga	elpesinun.	Tawaten	pikaaguq	whangkunnun	kayemesqelluku	ugpeqilleghsi,	nakaan	naafqennaluku.
B08_10_2Corinthians_V9	Sumeghtaghaghpenasi	alingesnaqutkengngunilusi	latamkun.
B08_10_2Corinthians_V10	Tamaakut	yuget	tawaten	pikat	liigiklitgu	sameng	pilleghput	latatgun,	tamaakunguut	ataasit	piyaghqaput	ellngitnun	pikumta.
B08_10_2Corinthians_V11	Inglunnaqutkennaanghitukut	tamaakunun	aangaayuglleghhiinun.	Sumeghtaghaghaqut	aangniluteng	qayughllak	ungipaatutaqelghiit	aangniluteng.	Nalluughhaghmeng!
B08_10_2Corinthians_V12	Qukaayugutkennaanghitaghput	alngunak	qepghaqaq	Kiyaghneghem	kayagusimangilkanga	whangkunnun.	Iwernga	qukaayugutkengnginaghlleqaghput	qepghaqaq	kayagutkaa	whangkunnun.	Elpesillu	ilatngaasi	qepghaqamnnun.
B08_10_2Corinthians_V13	Sivulighpigaagukut	ungipaqiyaghtuqani	elpesinun	Pinilghiineng	Ungipaaneng	Christ-am.	Enkaam	alpagigataghput	qepghaqaq	Kiyaghneghem	kayagutkaa	whangkunnun.
B08_10_2Corinthians_V14	Qukaayugutkelleqaghput	taananginaq	qepghaqaq	pikaghput,	nakaan	ilangita	qepghaqaat.	Ugpelleghtughtekufsi	sighimaakut	kayusighataghiisqelluta	qepghaqamnneng.
B08_10_2Corinthians_V15	Enkaam	ungipaqiyaghtughllequkut	Pinilghiineng	Ungipaneng	ilangitnun	nunat.	Qukaayugutkesugunghitaghput	qepghaqaq	ilangita	apeghiiqaat.
B08_10_2Corinthians_V16	Iwernga	igaqngaaq	Akuzitni	Igaqegkani	whaten,	“Kina	alngunak	qukaayugsukumi,	qukaayugutkelligu	Atanghhiinaq.”
B08_10_2Corinthians_V17	Atanghem	tugukliigatii	pinighnilghiit.	Itupill	Atanghem	tuguklighaqii	tamaakut	pinighniluki	pikani.
B08_11_2Corinthians_V11	Kayutengllanghitutemneng	elpesinun,	sumeghpesinii-i	piniqenghinnilusi	pitsi	whangamnun?	Kiyaghneghem	liisimakaa	piniqilqa	elpesinun.
B08_11_2Corinthians_V1	Sighimakamsi	nekeggmetutesqellunga	akuzikuma	temngitwhalghiistun	natengiighhaq.	Nekeggmetuteqaghtengnga.
B08_11_2Corinthians_V2	Qungyaghaqunga	Kiyaghneghem	qungyaqellghatun	elpesi,	qayughllak	tuusimaamsi	Christ-amun.	Pelungilngughestun	ugiighnaqelghiistun	aang'ghusimaamsi	ellnganun,	ugikesqelluku	ellnginaa.
B08_11_2Corinthians_V3	Iwernga	alingutkaqamsi	anguyagem	puughhnayukangisi,	katam	tawaten	nemeghyam	peghqiniqutkelluku	puughtellghatun	Eve.	Enkaam	elpesi	piniqnanighwaaghnayukafsigu	Christ-a.
B08_11_2Corinthians_V4	Ungipaqaqngamteki	Pinilghiit	Ungipat	elpesinun,	ugpeqegkaqaghsi	Jesus,	tuguklighagsillu	Agleghnalghiik	Taghneghak.	Iwernga	nagasukestaghluki	ayuqegkaqasi	ungipaqiyaghtulghiit	ilanganeng	Jesus-em.	Tuguklighiyugtusillu	ilanganeng	taghnegham,	ugpeqsukaqasillu	ilangi	pinilghiit	ungipat.
B08_11_2Corinthians_V5	Tamaakut	ungipaqistet	apostle-nguniluteng	piiqut.	Sumeghmeggni	aangwaaghuniiqut	apostle-et.	Iwernga	liisimakanka	aangwaaghunghitut	whangamneng.
B08_11_2Corinthians_V6	Akuzillgiteghngaaghma,	liisimaghllagtunga.	Uglaghngaan	liigikestaqamsi	liisimallemneng.
B08_11_2Corinthians_V7	Elpesinun	akileghtughsaqumangitunga	ungipaqaqngamki	Pinilghiit	Ungipii	Kiyaghneghem.	Tawaten	pikaagunga	qusevegllunga	quulvaghnalusi.	Seghleghqesingaa-a	tawaten	pilunga?
B08_11_2Corinthians_V8	Ugpeqat	ilangitnilnguut	yughaghviget	akileghtuqaqaatnga	elpesinillunga.	Wayaqallghuughanka	maningitneng	kayusiinnalusi.
B08_11_2Corinthians_V9	Elpesinitaqngama	ughleghiightellghitamsi	kayusiitesqellunga	aklukegkamneng.	Ugpeqaalgutet	Macedonia-meng	tagitkaqaatnga	sameng	tamaghhaaneng	aklukegkamneng.	Enkaam	aapfikellghitamsi	aklukegkamneng,	aapfiknaanghitamsi.
B08_11_2Corinthians_V10	Kitum	alngunak	Achaia-mi	aghuliighhnaanghitaa	qukaayugtelqa	taagken.	Tawaten	piinga	Christ-am	ipapighqellghakun	whangamnilngughqun.
B08_11_2Corinthians_V11	Taawa	ighsakiivikumanginaghnaqamsi	manigpesineng.	Tawaten	piiqunga	qukaayuggnaniisqelluki	apostle-esighwaaghet	whangkutestun	qepghaghnilghiit	akileghtuusangunateng.
B08_11_2Corinthians_V12	Tamaakut	yuget	apostle-esighwaaghuut	puughtilghiit	yugneng	iqlengiqelleghmegteggun.	Yugnun	sumeghtaghaatkestaqut	Christ-amun	apostle-epiikniluteng.
B08_11_2Corinthians_V13	Taamengwhaqun.	Talwa	Tughneghaq	allangughtaquq	ellmineng	katam	aliighyaghqaaluni	kuukgutngalghiitun	yaqulegtun.
B08_11_2Corinthians_V14	Enkaam	saghiighaniitut	Tughneghaam	qepghaghtengi	tawaten	pikumeng.	Yugnun	sumeghtaghaatkestaqut	elqughutngalghiinguniluteng	qepghaghtengi	Kiyaghneghem.	Iwernga	kenlemi	Kiyaghneghem	aghyuughlleqii	elqughutngalghiimeng	aghyuulleghmeng	anaggutellghitnun.
B08_11_2Corinthians_V15	Alla	piimsi,	kitum	alngunak	sumeghtaghaatkenghillinga	temngitwhangulunga.	Iwernga	tawaten	sumeghtaghaatkengngukufsinga,	tugukliqaghtengnga	temngitwhangulunga.	Taagken	whangallu	qukaayugtevleghaghllequnga.
B08_11_2Corinthians_V16	Qukaayugutkelqa	whangamneng	Ataneghmeng	pingunghituq.	Itupill	akuzinguunga	temngi	pilghiistun.
B08_11_2Corinthians_V17	Uglalghiit	ugpeqaanghilngughestun	qukaayugtaqut	qepghaqameggneng,	enkaam	whangallu	tawaten	qukaayugllequnga.
B08_11_2Corinthians_V18	Sumeghpesini	peghqinepiggnilusi	piiqusi.	Enkaam	quyakusiqluku	nagataqasi	temngitwhalghiit.
B08_11_2Corinthians_V19	Tuguklighaqasi	qelellghit	nikimqun	elpesi	qepghaghtelaaghet	ellngitnun.	Kagukaqestaqusi,	teglegvikestaqusi,	ukaliqestaqusillu,	talwa	gginaghpesigun	qasaghtestaqlusi.
B08_11_2Corinthians_V20	Kaynguyugtunga	kayaatepigtukut	tawaten	pilleghqamnneng	elpesinun	tamaakustun	apostle-esighwaaghestun.	Kina	alngunak	qukaayugsaghqaakan,	whangallu	qukaayugllequnga.	Iwernga	tawaten	pilleghqaq	temngitwhanguuq.
B08_11_2Corinthians_V21	Taakut	apostle-esighwaaghet,	Hebrew-ngwaat?	Whangallu	Hebrew-nguunga.	Israel-eghmiingwaat?	Whangallu	Israel-eghmiinguunga.	Abraham-em	kingunqakii?	Whangallu	kingunqaanga.
B08_11_2Corinthians_V22	Christ-am	qepghaghtekakii?	Iwernga	whanga	pinighataghaghtunga	qepghaghta	ellngitneng.	Taawa	akuziinga	nallekaghnilngughestun.	Qepghaghataghaqaagunga	ellngitneng,	anusiminglaghvigmetaaghaqaagungallu	ellngitneng.	Kagsagmillengegkaagunga	kestekaanghilngughmeng,	uglaghngaan	tuquvzighaataqaagunga.
B08_11_2Corinthians_V23	Tallimagyagneng	Jews-et	igleghutistengita	kagsagmigtestaataghaatnga.	(39-ngwaaqut	ataasit	kagsagmillghet.)
B08_11_2Corinthians_V24	Rome-eghmiit	umiilwaaghita	pingayuneng	anaguleghtestekaqaatnga.	Ataasimeng	ilangita	yuget	milughpagaataghaatnga.	Pingayuneng	angyiighututaqaanga	enkaam	ataasimeng	unulqusiq,	aghnelqusiq	uughhutkaqaanga	kelliini.
B08_11_2Corinthians_V25	Uglapiglleghhiimi	igleghallemni	elngaatall	yakughniightunga	kiiwni,	wayaghniighteneng,	talwa	yulgutemnengllu,	Gentile-enengllu.	Yakughniightungallu	neghllagni,	kilgaani,	kelliinillu.	Talwa	yakughniightunga	ugpeqaalgutesighwaaghneng.
B08_11_2Corinthians_V26	Ughleghiighllakaagunga,	piyaqliighaqlunga.	Ilangani	qavaghpenanga,	iyataghngaaqlunga,	meqsugngaaqlunga.	Awen	neqngitaqlunga,	azigutiitaqlunga,	ghhuutaqlungallu	aatkiitem.
B08_11_2Corinthians_V27	Tamaakut	saaghwitgun,	aghhutanga	tamaghhaan	sumeghyalitkegkaqanka	ugpeqaalgutet	tamaghhitni	yughagvigni.
B08_11_2Corinthians_V28	Ugpeqaalgutem	ugpeqillgha	kayaanneghani,	whangallu	kayaataqunga.	Ugpeqaalguta	kitum	seghleghqesneghagu,	sakritaqunga.
B08_11_2Corinthians_V29	Qukaayuggnaqngukuma,	qukaayugllequnga	kayaalliqusimneng.
B08_11_2Corinthians_V30	Kiyaghneghem	liisimakaanga	iqlengiqnaanghitunga.	Ellnga	Atakaa	Atanghem	Jesus-em,	usuqsaghqaq	quunperugllak.
B08_11_2Corinthians_V31	Damascus-mellunga,	governor-em	tugustesukaqaanga.	(Umiilgem	Aretas-em	governor-ngughtestekaqaa.)	Enkaam	tugusqellunga	pilluwaghteni	kelengakistekaqii	neghllagem	amigllagitni.
B08_11_2Corinthians_V32	Iwernga	ilakumtaaghma	ukigtekaqaatnga	pasketegnekun	mingllutem	qergesegkenkun	enkaam	anakaagunga	governor-meng.
B08_12_2Corinthians_V12	Elpesinillunga	nekeglluwaan	uglaapiglleghhiit	allaaghhiinaat	allaaghlluwhaghtillghet	pikaqanka.	Tamaakut	ipapighqaatnga	apostle-epiigutka.
B08_12_2Corinthians_V1	Qukaayugsaghqaagunga,	aneghneghqusiinghiteghngaan.	Paninang	ungipaannaqamsi	esghaghwaallemneng,	Atanghemllu	aliighquqaaneng	whangamnun.
B08_12_2Corinthians_V2	Liisimakaqa	yuuk	Christ-amelnguq.	Qula	estamat	siipneqluki	ayumiqulleghni	agani	naghughtekani	Kiyaghneghem	mayuutqaghtekaqaa	pingayaanun	qilagem.	Nallukngwaaghaqa	yuuk	yugusiminitutanga	nalighmeng	yugusimineng	aan'ngakaatanga,	iwernga	Kiyaghneghem	liisimakaa.
B08_12_2Corinthians_V3	Liisimakaqa	taana	yuuk	Kiyaghneghem	mayuutqaghtekaqaa	Paradise-mun.	Nallukngwaaghaqa	yuuk	yugusiminitutanga	nalighmeng	yugusimineng	aan'ngakaatanga,	iwernga	Kiyaghneghem	liisimakaa.
B08_12_2Corinthians_V4	Tawani	nagatkaqii	sangwaat	apeghyaghqaanghilnguut.	Tamaakut	iinghutkaagut	yugmun	akuzitkesaghqaaluteng.
B08_12_2Corinthians_V5	Qukaayugutkennaqaqa	taana	yuuk,	iwernga	qukaayugutkennaqenghitunga	whangamneng	iwerngaqun	kayaalliqusiqegkaghhiinamneng.
B08_12_2Corinthians_V6	Qukaayugutkesukuma	whangamneng,	temngingunaanghitunga	qayughllak	apeghlleqaqa	ipapilleq.	Iwernga	qukaayugutkennanghitunga	whangamneng,	qayughllak	yugnun	sumeghtaghaatkesugtunga	elqughllunga	esghapallghitgunllu	nagatellghitgunllu	whanga.
B08_12_2Corinthians_V7	Kiyaghneghem	aliightekaqeghngaaki	whangamnun	uglaapiglleghhiit	sangwaat	qilagmi,	qukaayugtestesunghitaanga.	Enkaam	Kiyaghneghem	qusevegtesqellunga	sikughllungestaanga	yugusimkun.	Taana	sikughlluk	ungipaghtenguuq	Tughneghagh-meng.	Taam	ikfiqestaanga	qusevegngasqellunga.
B08_12_2Corinthians_V8	Pingayuneng	ketwell	Ataneghmun	yughaghaqunga	iqitesqelluku.
B08_12_2Corinthians_V9	Iwernga	piinga,	“Kayusilqa	naamaaq	elpenun	suflughtesqelluku	taana	ikfiqelleq	qayughllak	aghtughyaghqaanghilqa	iknaqelleghpigaagwaquq	kayaalliqneghpeni.”	Enkaam	quyakusiqluku	qukaayugtaqunga	kayaalliqusimneng	whangamnitesqelluku	Christ-am	aghtughyaghqaanghillgha.
B08_12_2Corinthians_V10	Taana	apalluqluku	quyaaqunga	kayaalliqnganemni,	seghlequullengnemni,	piyaqliinemni,	amyuutkellengnemni,	allaaghhiinaghmengllu	seghleliinemni	Christ-a	apalluqluku.	Qayughllak	kayaalliqnganemni	taawa	iknaqaqunga.
B08_12_2Corinthians_V11	Akuzinguunga	temngitwhastun,	iwernga	elpesi	tawaten	pistaghpesinga.	Elpesi	pinitun	akuzitkesaghqaqsaghaghpesinga	ilagpesinun.	Qaywa	sasiinghiteghngaaghma,	tamaakut	“aangwaaghet	apostle-et”	aangwaaghunghitut	whangamneng.
B08_12_2Corinthians_V12	Sakaqsingi	ugpeqat	ilangitnilnguut	yughaghviget	elpesinun	pimangilkemneng?	Ataasighhiinaq	allanguuq,	akilguqumangitamsi.	Seghevutaghtengnga	anagsimakumsi!
B08_12_2Corinthians_V13	Laalighfiknaqaqamsi	pingayiitkun,	iwernga	ughleghiighutkestesunghitunga	elpesinun.	Elpesi	sumeghmikaqamsi,	nakaan	saghyasi.	Taghnughhaqelghiistun	ayuqamsi.	Taghnughhaat	aflengakiyaghqaanghitut	angayuqameggneng,	iwernga	angayuqat	aflengaksaghqaqiit	taghnughhateng.
B08_12_2Corinthians_V14	Tuunyaghqaaghtamsi	sameng	tamaghhaaneng	whanga	pimneng,	talwa	whangamneng	tuunellequnga	elpesinun.	Piniqataghanemsi,	llangaqa	elpesi	piniqepagigataghpesinga.
B08_12_2Corinthians_V15	Elpesillu	whangallu	liisimakaghput	ughleghiightesimangitamsi.	Iwernga	ilagpesi	anaggusimaniitnga.	Piiqut	puughneqguunnilusi	iqlengiqellemkun.
B08_12_2Corinthians_V16	Naten	tawaten	pistemsi?	Sakengegkaazinga	elpesineng	kayagtaqngamki	yuget	elpesinun?
B08_12_2Corinthians_V17	Kayagtekaqaqa	Titus	elpesinun	pisqelluku,	ugpeqaalgutfutlu	maligutesqaqa.	Titus-em	puughtekaqisii?	Nakaa,	Titus-lu	whangkutung	qepghaqaghpung	ataasiiguq,	ataasikun	taghneghakun.
B08_12_2Corinthians_V18	Sumeghpesinii-i	elpesinun	ipapighqennaqutkestegneguu	anaggutellghinnilutung?	Nakaa!	Kiyaghneghem	nagaquumanghani,	akuziiqukung	Christ-am	akuzisqellghatun.	Piniqegkamni,	sangwa	qamaglluku	piiqaghpung	iknaqughsaghnaluku	ugpelleghsi.
B08_12_2Corinthians_V19	Sumeghyalitkaqamsi	elpesinun	kaaskuma	esghaqumsi	allaknayukamsi	whanga	sighimakellemneng.	Elpesillu	whanga	esghaqufsinga	allaknayukafsinga	sighimakelleghpesineng.	Sumeghyalitkaqamsi	aghivatngunayukafsi,	aqinakutngunayukafsi,	sakraatutngunayukafsi,	ellnginaayugutngunayukafsi,	seghlequughutngunayukafsi,	yiillgitngunayukafsi,	qukaayugutngunayukafsi,	suuglliqutngunayukafsi.
B08_12_2Corinthians_V20	Sumeghyaliiqunga	alla	takukumsi	Kiyaghneghma	kayngusaaknayukanganga	sivugpesini	apalluqluki	seghleghqellesi.	Enkaam	qivghughllagllequnga	qayughllak	uglalghiini	elpesi	seghleghqumanginaagusi	avuteghqegpenasi.	Paninang	sumeghtaghaghaqusi	sex-meng	pelunginneghilngughmeng,	sex-a	seghletun	atuqaqaghsi,	sex-ellghetlu	anagngalghiit	nuqetusigatasi.
B08_13_2Corinthians_V13	Qamaglluteng	ugpeqaalgutet	piniqiisinguq.
B08_13_2Corinthians_V1	Una	pingayiitkaa	laalighhnaqelleghma	elpesinun.	Akuzitni	Igaqegkani	igaqngaaq	whaten,	“Yuuk	anaggusimanikatgu,	maalghuk	nalighmeng	pingayut	liisimakistet	ipapighqesaghqaqaat	anaggutellgha.”
B08_13_2Corinthians_V2	Tuunglighhaani	laalighfikaqngamsi	kelengasaaqaqamsi	tamaakut	sivunghani	seghleghqelghiit.	Ilangitlu	kelengasaaqaqanka,	taginqigtekuma	aghyuughmiglleqniluki	seghleghqumanginaqata.	Tamaanneghiteghngaaghma	kelengasaaghnaqanka.
B08_13_2Corinthians_V3	Whangamnun	ipapighqestesukesi	Christ-a	akuziiqutanga	whangamkun.	Christ-a	kayaanneghituq	aghyuughmikumisi,	itupill	aghtughyaghqaanghituq.
B08_13_2Corinthians_V4	Qaywa	Christ-a	kayaatkaayaghtuq	qaquuraghaqngamegteggu,	maaten	kiyaghtengnguuq	Kiyaghneghem	aghtughyaghqaanghillghakun.	Whangkutallu	kayaatukut	katam	Christ-am	kayaatkaayallghatun.	Iwernga	elpesinitkumta	kayusiilleqamsi	Kiyaghneghem	aghtughyaghqaanghillghakun.
B08_13_2Corinthians_V5	Yuvghiightek	elpesineng	liigikesqelluku	ugpeqepiigutsi	Jesus	Christ-a.	Liigikenghistegguu-u	Jesus	Christ-a	kiyaghtengngutanga	ilugpesini?	Ilugpesininneghitngukan,	taawa	ugpeqepiillghitaghsi.
B08_13_2Corinthians_V6	Sunanguq	liigikiteggu	Kiyaghneghmun	itagnaqumaniluta.
B08_13_2Corinthians_V7	Yughaghaqukut	Kiyaghneghmun	kayusiitesqellusi	anaggutefqaafsi	pisqellusi.	Iwernga	yughaangunghitukut	ipapighqennaluku	elpesinun	Kiyaghneghmun	itagnaqumaniluta.	Itupill	whangkuta	yughaatkaqamsi	elqughutngaan	pisqellusi,	qaywa	yuget	pighngiinkut	itagnaqellghinniluta	Kiyaghneghmun.
B08_13_2Corinthians_V8	Kipullginaaghpagningitaghput	ipapilleq;	itupill	ilapgayaghqaqaghput.
B08_13_2Corinthians_V9	Quyaaqukut	kayaannemta,	iknaqnguneghpesini.	Enkaam	yughaatkaqamsi	veghunneqigtesqellusi	kiyaghtesqesullghanun	Kiyaghneghem.
B08_13_2Corinthians_V10	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	lataaqamsi	elpesinun	pivagilgama	qayughllak	nanqigsunghilkemsi	aghyuughmigyaghqaalusi.	Atanghem	qelqaqaanga	nanqigtestengulunga	elpesinun.	Enkaam	nanqigsugamsi	kayusiinnalusi	ugpeqilleghtughtesqellusi,	nakaan	kayaalisqellusi.
B08_13_2Corinthians_V11	Ugpeqaalgutemni,	tawaten'ngam	piinga.	Quyangatek.	Veghutek	kiyaghtesqesullghanun	Kiyaghneghem.	Pisqesullemtun	pitek.	Kiyaghtek	itagnaqullusi,	nekeggmetullusi.	Enkaam	Kiyaghneq	tenemenga	piniqellghemllu	nekeggmellghemllu	elpesinilli.
B08_13_2Corinthians_V12	Quyakututaqitek	agleghnalghiikun	naalleghqun.
B08_13_2Corinthians_V13	Nangllegtallgha	Atanghem	Jesus	Christ-am,	piniqellghallu	Kiyaghneghem,	qerngaghmetellghallu	Agleghnalghiim	Taghnegham	elpesinilli.
B09_01_Galatians_V1	Ukut	latat	Paul-meng	pinguut,	apostle-meng.	Yuget	nakmikellghitaatnga	apostle-ngulunga,	talwa	kayagtellghitaatnga.	Apostle-nguughtekaagunga	Jesus	Christ-akunllu	Kiyaghneghqunllu	Atakun,	unguvaghtestikaq	ellnganeng	tuqulleghmeng.
B09_01_Galatians_V2	Lataaqamsi	ugpeqani	Galatia-melngughni.	Qamaglluteng	ugpeqaalgutma	maanlenguut	piniqiisinguk	whangamnun	maligulluteng.
B09_01_Galatians_V3	Kiyaghneghem	Atamta,	Atanemtallu	Jesus	Christ-am	nanglleklisillu	nekeggmellelguslisilillu.
B09_01_Galatians_V4	Christ-a	ellmineng	aghqutkegkaaguq	seghleghqellemnnun,	itemunnaluta	whaken	seghleghmeng	kiyaghtaalleghmeng.	Kiyaghnemta	Atam	piyukellghatun	pikaaguq.
B09_01_Galatians_V5	Enkaam	Kiyaghneq	usuqellengli	quunperugllak	kenlengunaan.	Amen.
B09_01_Galatians_V6	Saghiighayagutamsi	aawallu	pegtaghtaghsi	tuqlughistezi	nangllegtallghakun	Christ-am,	tuguklighiisi	allaneng	“pinilghiineng	ungipaneng”.
B09_01_Galatians_V7	Avaqraggiituq	alla	“pinilghiineng	ungipaneng”.	Iwernga	ilangita	yuget	teggellghiightestaqiisi	allangughhnaqutkelleghmegteggun	Pinilghiit	Ungipat	Christ-ameng	ayuqelghiit.
B09_01_Galatians_V8	Qaywa	yaqulek	qilagmeng,	nalighmeng	nalimta	whangkuta	ungipaqegkumteki	“pinilghiit	ungipat”	allanguluki	ungipaqegkamnneng	elpesinun,	taana	ungipaqilghi	Kiyaghneghem	nanqiglligu	aghyuulleghmun.
B09_01_Galatians_V9	Sivunghani	ungipaatkaqamsi,	whaa	ungipaannaqlaataghamsi,	kitum	alngunak	ungipaqegkumiki	“pinilghiit	ungipat”	allanguluki	ugpeqegkaghpesineng,	Kiyaghneghem	nanqiglligu	aghyuulleghmun.
B09_01_Galatians_V10	Tawaten	akuzillemkun	efqughhnaqutkengngunghitanka	yuget.	Nakaa,	Kiyaghneghhiinaaguq	efqughsukaqa.	Paninang	yugnun	efqughtinaqutkengngukuma,	Christ-amun	qepghaghtengunaanghitunga.
B09_01_Galatians_V11	Ugpeqaalgutemni,	una	liisimakesugaqa	elpesinun,	Pinilghiit	Ungipat	ungipaqaqegkenka	yugneng	pingunghitut.
B09_01_Galatians_V12	Nagaquqaqenghitanka	yugneng,	talwa	kitum	alngunak	apeghtuutkumangitii	whangamnun.	Jesus	Christ-am	aliightekaqii	whangamnun.
B09_01_Galatians_V13	Nagaquqaqaghsi	natesaatka	maligtengnguluki	Jews-et	kiyaghtaallghit.	Elngaatall	nangllegyullngunanga	amyuutkegkaqanka	ugpeqat,	taakunginaghhaagneng	aviighutesnaqutkegkaqanka.
B09_01_Galatians_V14	Ingyaqaqanka	allulluki	angtaalgutenka	atuqnguluki	Jews-et	kiyaghtaallghit,	qayughllak	sagiqneghllaguyaghtunga	sivunemta	nangaghneghitnun.
B09_01_Galatians_V15	Iwernga	allgeghumangillunga	Kiyaghneghem	nakmikegkaqaanga,	nangllegtalleghmikun	tuqluqaqaanga.
B09_01_Galatians_V16	Enkaam	whangamnun	aliightekaqaa	kinangutanga	Ighneni	ungipaqesqelluku	Gentile-enun.	Kinkunun	alngunak	akuzitkesaghtullghitaqa	taana,
B09_01_Galatians_V17	talwa	Jerusalem-etellghitunga	akuzitkennaluku	apostle-ngughtekanun	sivumni.	Yeghlegi	Arabia-mun	piinga.	Tagtalmi	uteghnightunga	Damascus-mun.
B09_01_Galatians_V18	Tamaani	pingayut	ayumiqullghet	atughluki	Jerusalem-etunga	aleghqughnaluku	Cephas	(Peter).	Ellnganitunga	akimigaq	unuk.
B09_01_Galatians_V19	Kina	alla	apostle-a	aleghqunghitaqa	iwerngaqun	James,	Atanghem	anglegutanga.
B09_01_Galatians_V20	Aapqanka	ukut	ipanguut,	Kiyaghneghem	liisimakaanga	iqlengiqngunghitunga.
B09_01_Galatians_V21	Taagken	igleghaanga	Syria-munllu	Cilicia-munllu.
B09_01_Galatians_V22	Tamaani	Judea-mi	ugpeqat	Christ-akun	salin	nalliigalkangatnga	gginasaghqughlunga.
B09_01_Galatians_V23	Taawanginaq	liisimakaat	nagaqulleghteng	whaten,	“Yuuk	amyuqetiqestekegkaghput,	naafqiinaqutkegkaqlu	ugpeqillemnneng	Christ-ameng	maaten	whaa	ungipaqiiquq	ugpeqilleghmeng	Christ-akun!”
B09_01_Galatians_V24	Enkaam	Kiyaghneq	usuqaqaat	whanga	apalluqlunga.
B09_02_Galatians_V1	Qula	estamat	siipneqluku	ayumiqulleq	atughluku	uteghnightunga	Jerusalem-emun;	Barnabas-em	maligtaanga	Titus-lu	kelqaqa.
B09_02_Galatians_V2	Kiyaghneghem	liigikestaanga	Jerusalem-etesqellunga.	Kaasamta	ugpeqat	igleghutistenginiit	qerngughutaghtesqanka.	Tawani	ungipamsugutanka	naten	Gentile-enun	ungipaqillemneng	Pinilghiineng	Ungipaneng.	Tawaten	pikaagunga	luuraq	taakut	igleghutistet	apeghtughillghenka	temnginguninayukatki	sivunghanillu	maatenllu.
B09_02_Galatians_V3	Liigikanka	apeghtughillghenka	tuguklighiit	qayughllak	maligtisteka	Titus,	Greek-ngughngaan,	circumcise-esqenghilkangat.
B09_02_Galatians_V4	Iwernga	ilangi	ugpeqasighwaaghet	aksaqluku	ilatut	whangkunnun	riirnginaluku	itemngalleghput	Christ	Jesus-kun.	Qepghaghtelaaghughhneqigtesqelluta	piinkut	Liilightuusaanun.
B09_02_Galatians_V5	Ellngitnun	malighqutaqellghitukut	talwa	natengiighhaq	almesiqesqelluki	ipangullghit	Pinilghiit	Ungipat	apeghtuusaqellemtestun	elpesinun.
B09_02_Galatians_V6	Taakut	ugpeqat	igleghutistengita	allangughsimangitiit	Pinilghiit	Ungipat	ungipaqaqegkenka.	(Igleghutistenguyaghngaata,	whangamni	allangughutngitut	qayughllak	Kiyaghneq	taniillghituq.)
B09_02_Galatians_V7	Igleghutistet	liigikumaat	Kiyaghneghmun	neghyukusimaniluki	whangamnun	Pinilghiit	Ungipat	ungipaqesqelluki	Gentile-enun,	katam	tawaten	neghyukutellghatun	Peter-mun	Pinilghiit	Ungipat	ungipaqesqelluki	Jews-enun.
B09_02_Galatians_V8	Katam	Kiyaghneq	qepghaqaaguq	Peter-kun	apostle-kennaluku	Jews-enun,	whangamkunllu	qepghaqaaguq	apostle-kennalunga	Gentile-enun.
B09_02_Galatians_V9	Enkaam	taakut	igleghutistet,	James-enkut	Peter-enkut	John-enkut,	nekevghatilghiit	ugpeqanun,	liigikaat	Kiyaghneghmun	tunusalisimanilunga	tawaten	qepghiisqellunga	Gentile-enun.	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	Barnabas-lu	iiggepung	aghulatiit	tuguklighniluku	qepghaangulleghpung	Gentile-enun,	ellngit	Jews-enun.
B09_02_Galatians_V10	Taananginaq	puygusnanighaat	kayusiitesqelluki	aklumalghiit,	taanata	nagneghusupigtekegka.
B09_02_Galatians_V11	Tagtalmi	taakwani	Peter	Antioch-melluni	sameng	anaggutkaq.	Enkaam	sivungitni	ugpeqat	aghyuughmigaqa	anaggutellghaneng	apalluqluku.
B09_02_Galatians_V12	Peter	neghelgusighikayuguyalghii	Gentile-et	ugpeqiitneng	kenlanga	James-em	yuget	Antioch-etestellghitnun.	Iwernga	kaasata	neghelgusighnanighii	Gentile-et,	aaftekaqlu	ellngitneng.	Tawaten	pikaalghii	qayughllak	alingelghii	taakut	yuget	sagiqutngukangit	Gentile-et	ugpeqiit	circumcise-eyaghqaaniluki.
B09_02_Galatians_V13	Taagken	qamaglluteng	Antioch-eghmiit	Jews-et	ugpeqiit	maligutkat	Peter-em	anaggutellghanun,	talwa	Barnabas-lu	ilalluni.
B09_02_Galatians_V14	Liigiksamki	qaatkunneghitellghit	apeghtuusiitnun	Pinilghiit	Ungipat,	sivungitni	yuget	Peter	piiqa,	“Elpek	qaywa	Jew-ngughngaaghpek	kiyaghtenguuten	Gentile-estun,	nakaan	Jews-estun.	Sangitangam	Gentile-et	Jews-estun	kiyaghtesnaqutkesiki?”
B09_02_Galatians_V15	Jews-nguluta	allgeqaagukut,	nakaan	Gentile-et	seghleghqestet.
B09_02_Galatians_V16	Naqamllu	liisimakaghput	Kiyaghneghem	elqughutngalleghminun	nallghusaghnaanghitaa	yuuk	qaatkutellghakun	Liilightuusanun,	tawatenginaq	nallghusaghlleqaa	ugpeqillghakun	Jesus	Christ-ameng.	Talwa	whangkuta	Jews-eni	ugpeqegkaqaghput	Christ	Jesus,	Kiyaghneghem	elqughutngallghanun	nallghusiisqelluta	ugpeqellemteggun	Christ-a,	nakaan	qaatkutellemteggun	Liilightuusanun.	Kina	alngunak	qaatkutellghakun	Liilightuusanun	Kiyaghneghem	elqughutngalleghminun	nallghusaghyaghqaqenghitaa.
B09_02_Galatians_V17	Jews-eni	whangkuta	nallghusaghtesugukumta	Christ-akun,	nakaan	Liilightuusatgun,	ilangita	Jews-et	seghleghqestengunilleqiinkut	Gentile-estun.	Enkaam	Christ-anguftaa	seghleghqestengughtestilghii?	Yeghlegillu!
B09_02_Galatians_V18	Liilightuusat	pegtekaqanka,	atuqenqigsaguskumki	taawa	Liilightuusanun	anaggullequnga.
B09_02_Galatians_V19	Liilightuusatgun	tuqukaagunga	Liilightuusanun	kiyaghsaghqaalunga	Kiyaghneghmun.
B09_02_Galatians_V20	Qaquuraatkaagunga	Christ-amun	maligullunga,	enkaam	whangangunaniimaaq	kiyaghlleghhii;	Christ-angughsimaaq	kiyaghlleghhii	ilumni.	Kiyaghtengngughngaaghma	yugusimni,	kiyaghtengnguunga	ugpeqillemkun	Ighneghaneng	Kiyaghneghem.	Piniqegkanganga,	tuunegkaalghiillu	whangamnun.
B09_02_Galatians_V21	Enkaam	pakigigataqa	Kiyaghneghem	tunusaa.	Yuuk	qaatkutelleghmikun	Liilightuusanun	nallghusaghyaghqaayaqan	Kiyaghneghem	elqughutngallghanun,	taawa	Christ-am	tuqullgha	temngingunayaghtuq.
B09_03_Galatians_V1	Nallughhaghmeng	elpesi	Galatia-ghmiini!	Kitum	puughtisi?	Puygustegguu	aapghwaaqaqsaqegka	Jesus	Christ-am	tuqullgha	qaquurakun?
B09_03_Galatians_V2	Aaptaghllamsi:	naten	allgeghtekaqestekek	Agleghnalghiik	Taghneghak,	qaatkutelleghpesigun	Liilightuusanun	nalighmeng	ugpeqelleghpesigun	nagatkaghsi?
B09_03_Galatians_V3	Nalluupigetsii?	Agleghnalghiignekun	Taghneghagnekun	piinlighluku	nutaghaq	unguvalleghsi,	apeghiighnaqestegguu-u	elpesineng	katam?
B09_03_Galatians_V4	Ikfiqelleghsi	temnginguftaa?	Ugpeqepestaaghaqa	temngingunghituq.
B09_03_Galatians_V5	Kiyaghneghem	tuunegkaqisii-i	Taghneghagmineng,	allaaghlluwhaghtikaawalluu	akulegpesini	qayughllak	qaatkegkesi	Liilightuusat,	nalighmeng	ugpeqegkesi	nagaquqaghsi?
B09_03_Galatians_V6	Akuzitet	Igaqegkat	aapqaqaat	Abraham-em	ugpeqegkaqaa	Kiyaghneq,	enkaam	Kiyaghneghem	nallghusaqaqaa	elqughutngalleghminun.
B09_03_Galatians_V7	Enkaam	elpesi	liisimakelleqasi	tamaakut	ugpeqillelget	Kiyaghneghqun	Abraham-em	kinguneghpigaqii.
B09_03_Galatians_V8	Akuzitet	Igaqegkat	aapqestaqaqaat	Kiyaghneghmun	nallghusaghnaqniluki	Gentile-et	elqughutngalleghminun	ugpeqillghitgun.	Neghighluku	Kiyaghneghem	aapqaqaa	taana	Pinilghii	Ungipaq	Abraham-emun,	whaten	piiqngami,	“Qamagtengngwaaghluteng	nunam	ramkengi	quyastellengnaqnguut	elpegun.”
B09_03_Galatians_V9	Abraham-em	ugpeqegkaqaa	enkaam	quyastellengegkaq.	Tawateghpigaq	tamaghhaghmi	ugpeqilghii	quyastellengyaghqaaguq	ellngatun.
B09_03_Galatians_V10	Iwernga	Kiyaghneghem	aghyuughyaghqaqii	tamaakut	sighimalghiit	qaatkutelleghmegteggun	Liilightuusanun	nallghusaghlleqniluteng	elqughutngallghanun.	Qayughllak	igaqngaaq	Akuzitni	Igaqegkani	whaten,	“Kitum	alngunak	qaatkenghilkaki	tamaghhiita	igaqngalghiit	igiitgun	Liilightuusat	nanqigtellengellequq	aghyuughyaghqaaluni.”
B09_03_Galatians_V11	Whateghlluwaaq	liigiknaghtuq,	kina	alngunak	nallghusaghyaghqaanghituq	Kiyaghneghem	elqughutngallghanun	qaatkutelleghmikun	Liilightuusanun.	Qayughllak	Akuzitet	Igaqegkat	pikaagut,	“Taana	Kiyaghneghem	nallghusaqaa	elqughutngalleghminun	kiyaghllequq	ugpelleghmikun.”
B09_03_Galatians_V12	Iwernga	qaatkullghii	Liilightuusanun	sighimangunghituq	ugpelleghqun,	qayughllak	Akuzitet	Igaqegkat	pikaagut,	“Sighimalghii	Liilightuusatgun	kiyaghllequq	qaatkelluki.”
B09_03_Galatians_V13	Enkaam	Kiyaghneghem	nanqigtekaqiinkut	aghyuughnaluta	apalluqluki	Liilightuusat,	iwernga	Christ-am	naveghqellikaqiinkut	nanqiglleghqamnneng	tugulleghmikun	aghyuulleghqaghput.	Qayughllak	Akuzitet	Igaqegkat	pikaagut,	“Nanqigtekaaguq	aghyuughyaghqaaluni	tamaghhaghmi	agaghtekaq	uqfigkun.”
B09_03_Galatians_V14	Christ	Jesus-em	naveghqellikaqiinkut	enkaam	ellngakun	Kiyaghneghem	quyastekaqii	Gentile-et	taagken	ataasimeng	quyastelleghmeng	akequsaqegkaminun	Abraham-emun.	Enkaam	ugpelleghqun	allgeghtagput	Taghneghak	Kiyaghneghem	akequsaqegkakek.
B09_03_Galatians_V15	Ugpeqaalgutemni,	ungipaataghllamsi	usputaghqameng	aghhutanga	tamaghhaan	piiqelghiineng:	yugek	akequskumek	sameng,	igaqluku	igakun,	ateteklu	igaqlukek,	kitum	alngunak	aghuliighsaghqaqenghitaa	akeqututellghak	nalighmeng	ilayaghqaqenghitaa.
B09_03_Galatians_V16	Kiyaghneq	akequsangllaghteqaaguq	Abraham-emunllu	kingunghanunllu.	Kiyaghneghem	akequsangllaamangitii,	“Kingunghi,”	Akequsangllaghteqaaguq	ataasiinaghmun	kinguneghmun,	taana	Christ-anguuq.
B09_03_Galatians_V17	Taana	liigikesugaqsaghaqa:	Kiyaghneq	akequsangllaqaaguq	Abraham-emun	enkaam	akequsani	pinaqnikaqaa.	430	ayumiqullghet	kingungitneng	akeqilleghmi,	Kiyaghneghem	tuunegkii	Liilightuusat.	Taakut	Liilightuusat	taana	akequsaq	satngunanighqennaanghitaa	nalighmeng	naafqennaanghitaa.
B09_03_Galatians_V18	Liilightuusatgun	allgeghhnaqngukumteggu	Kiyaghneghem	tunusaa,	taawa	akequsaakun	allgeghhnaanghitaghput.	Iwernga	akeqilleghmikun	Kiyaghneghem	tunusani	tuunegkaqaa	Abraham-emun.
B09_03_Galatians_V19	Sangameng	Liilightuusat	tuunegkaawat?	Tuunegkaagut	yugnun	liigikesqelluki	anaggutellghit	seghleghqellghuniluki.	Taakut	Liilightuusat	tawatetkaagut	kenlanga	kinguneq	tagillghanun.	Ellnganguuq	Kiyaghneghem	akequsangllaqaa.	Taakut	Liilightuusat	Kiyaghneghem	yaqulegteggun	tuunegkaqii	Moses-mun.	Taagken	Moses-em	uygukutistem	tuunegkaqii	yugnun.
B09_03_Galatians_V20	Iwernga	uygukutistesughniituq	ataasiq	akeqikumi.	Kiyaghneq	ataasighhaatmineng	uygukutistesughniituq.
B09_03_Galatians_V21	Liilightuusaat	tengvimun	ayuqatkii	Kiyaghneghem	akequsii?	Nakaa,	yeghlegillu!	Liilightuusam	unguvallengesaghqaqsaqumikut,	taawa	Kiyaghneghem	nallghusaghnayaghiinkut	elqughutngalleghminun	taaggun	Liilightuusakun.
B09_03_Galatians_V22	Iwernga	Akuzitet	Igaqegkat	pikaagut	qamaglluki	nunam	yugi	seghleghqellghem	anusimingllaghaqii.	Enkaangam	Kiyaghneghem	akequsaqegkani	tuunelleqaa	ugpeqikaghhiinaghnun	Jesus	Christ-ameng.
B09_03_Galatians_V23	Salin	ugpellghilluku	anusimingllaghaayaghtukut	Liilightuusanun.	Liilightuusat	aaghqutaqnguyaghiinkut	kenlanga	Kiyaghneghem	whangkunnun	liitestellghanun	ugpelleq.
B09_03_Galatians_V24	Liilightuusat	apaqutisteksaghaput	kenlanga	Christ-am	tagillghanun.	Enkaam	maaten	ugpeqillemteggun	Christ-akun,	Kiyaghneghem	nallghusaghyaghqaaghtiinkut	elqughutngalleghminun.
B09_03_Galatians_V25	Ugpelleq	tagitanganeng	Christ-akun	Liilightuusat	apaqutisteknanighaput.
B09_03_Galatians_V26	Ugpeqilleghpesigun	Christ	Jesus-kun,	qamagllusi	Kiyaghneghem	avaqutaqiisi.
B09_03_Galatians_V27	Paaptaayaaqngafsi	Christ-amun,	aallghiistun	Christ-a	pikaqaghsi	tawaten	pilugugaqelleghpesistun.
B09_03_Galatians_V28	Allangughutngitut	Jews-etlu	Gentile-etlu;	allangughutngitut	qepghaghtelaaghetlu	qepghaghtelaaghunghilnguutlu;	allangughutngitut	yugetlu	aghnatlu,	qayughllak	qamagllusi	atunem	ayuqusi	Christ	Jesus-kun.
B09_03_Galatians_V29	Christ-am	pikngukangisi	taawa	Abraham-em	kingunqiisi.	Enkaam	elpesillu	piliilleqaghsi	Kiyaghneghem	akequsaa	Abraham-emun.
B09_04_Galatians_V1	Nagneghutaghllakun	whaten,	ighneq	piliitiyaghqaq	atami	saghyanganeng	qepghaghtelaaghestun	kiyaghutkayuguuq	mekestaaghhaaluni,	qaywa	ellngan	piksaghngaagu	sangwaa	tamaghhaan	atami	pinga.
B09_04_Galatians_V2	Mekestaaghhaaluku	yuget	aflengakegkaqaat,	sangwaatlu	tamaakut	ellngan	pikaghqii	kenlanga	atangan	piyaghqaaghhnillghanun.
B09_04_Galatians_V3	Whangkutallu	tawatesaghtukut.	Taghnughhaaluta	qepghaghtelaaghuyaghtukut	nunam	igleghutistengitnun	tughneghaghnun.
B09_04_Galatians_V4	Iwernga	Kiyaghneghem	nakmikegkaa	aghneq	kaasan	kayagtekaa	Ighneni,	allgeqaq	aghnakun.	Ellngan	qaatkegkaqii	Liilightuusat
B09_04_Galatians_V5	itemunnaluta	Liilightuusaneng,	avaqutaliitesqellutallu	Kiyaghneghmun.
B09_04_Galatians_V6	Elpesi	avaqutaqutmineng	Kiyaghneghem,	Ighneghmi	Taghneghakek	kayagtekaqaak	ilumnnun,	qevullutek	pikak,	“Abba,	Ata!”
B09_04_Galatians_V7	Enkaam	Kiyaghneghqun	qepghaghtelaaghunanightuten,	avaqutaqaaten.	Avaqutaqaaghtutmineng	ellmi	pini	elpenun	piliitesleqii.
B09_04_Galatians_V8	Sivunghani	nalluksaghaghsi	Kiyaghneq,	enkaam	qepghaghtelaaghuyaghtusi	kiyaghneghunghilngughnun.
B09_04_Galatians_V9	Iwernga	maaten	liisimakaghsi	Kiyaghneq,	nalighmeng	ipapestaaq	Kiyaghneghuuq	liisimakistezi.	Sangafsingam	uteghsugetsi	kayaalngughnun	sasiinghilngughnun	igleghutilghiinun	tughneghaghnun?	Sangan	tamaakunun	qepghaghtelaaghughhneqigsugetsi?
B09_04_Galatians_V10	Paninang	qaatkaqasi	apeghtughallghit	aghneghnun,	tanqinun,	ayumiqulleghnun	aghneghnunllu	salqumsivikaqegkangitnun.
B09_04_Galatians_V11	Alingutkaqamsi,	qamaglluni	qepghaatilqa	elpesinun	sasiinghinnayukan.
B09_04_Galatians_V12	Ugpeqaalgutemni,	tungsighvikamsi,	whangamtun	lliighesqeqaghllusi	qayughllak	whangallu	elpesistun	lliiqaagunga	Gentile-estun.	Sivunghani	ungipaqitaqngamsi	Pinilghiineng	Ungipaneng	seghletun	pimangitaghpesinga.	Neqamikaghsi	tawani	takukaqamsi	qayughllak	qinuyugulghiinga.
B09_04_Galatians_V14	Qaywa	qinuyulleghma	seghleliightesaghngaaghmisi	ukavaghsimangitaghpesinga	nalighmeng	ighsakumangitaghpesinga.	Yeghlegi,	upughataghpesinga	nikimqun	Kiyaghneghem	yaqulgatun,	nalighmeng	Christ	Jesus-etun.
B09_04_Galatians_V15	Naagu	quyangalqesaqesi?	Liisimakamsi	piyaqleguyaqata	iyesi	nusugluki	tagivaghnayaghasi.
B09_04_Galatians_V16	Enkaam	anguyiitestengngaa	qayughllak	ungipaaskemsi	ipapigmeng?
B09_04_Galatians_V17	Tamaakut	yuget	qaatkutesukangisi	Jews-et	Liilightuusiitnun,	piyukepigtiisi	ellmeggnun	malighqutaqesqellusi,	iwernga	apallaat	pininghituq.	Ellngita	aaftesugiisi	whangamneng,	ellnginaghmeng	maligtesqelluteng.
B09_04_Galatians_V18	Pinightuq	yuget	suumqegkumegteki	yulguteteng,	taawanginaghhaq	apalliit	piniqata.	Quunpeng	taana	ipanguuq,	aviisaghngaaghma.
B09_04_Galatians_V19	Taghnughhaghhamni,	katam	aghnam	aqnighqellghatun	ighniyulleghmini	whangallu	tawaten	aqnighqutkenneqigtengngwaamsi	kenlanga	Christ-atun	lliilleghqaghpesinun.
B09_04_Galatians_V20	Whaatuq	maaten	elpesinilnguunga	enkaam	liisimaknayalghiinga	naten	aleghqughyaghqaalusi.	Sumeghyalitkeghllawaamsi.
B09_04_Galatians_V21	Elpesi	atuqiyulghiini	Jews-et	Liilightuusiitneng,	talwa	liigikigatasi	Liilightuusat	sameng	pisiitangi.
B09_04_Galatians_V22	Igaqngaaq	Akuzitni	Igaqegkani	Abraham-nguq	maalghugegneng	ighnelguuq,	aallgha	qepghaghtelaaghqun	aghnakun,	ilanga	qepghatelaaghunghilngughqun	aghnakun.
B09_04_Galatians_V23	Ighnegha	qepghaghtelaaghqun	allgeqaaguq	yugestun	kitutun	alngunak.	Iwernga	ilanga	ighneghan	qepghaghtelaaghunghilngughqun	allgeqaaguq	qayughllak	Kiyaghneghem	akequsaqegkanga.
B09_04_Galatians_V24	Taakuk	aghnak	usputaaguk	maalghugegnun	akequsagkenun	Kiyaghneghem.	Qepghaghtelaaq	Hagar	akequsaatun	Kiyaghneghem	ayuquq	Mount	Sinai-mi	enkaam	allgeqaagut	qepghaghtelaaghqaaluteng.
B09_04_Galatians_V25	Hagar	Mount	Sinai-nguluni	ayuquq,	Arabia-melnguq.	Aghneghmimllu	Jerusalem-ngatun	ayuquq,	qayughllak	avaqutaqullghiit	qepghaghtelaaghuut	Liilightuusanun.
B09_04_Galatians_V26	Iwernga	paamna	Jerusalem	qepghaghtelaaghituq,	ellnga	naakaghput.
B09_04_Galatians_V27	Akuzitet	Igaqegkat	pikaagut,	“Quyaghllagi,	elpek	qumingigalnguuten,	aqnighqigalnguuten	ighniyulleghmeng.	Ugigpek	uniteghngaaten,	araa	quyaghllagem	angtalanganeng	qayughllak	taghnughhaghtaaghasaghqaaguten	aghnameng	ugilegmeng.”
B09_04_Galatians_V28	Ugpeqaalgutemni,	Isaac-etun	ayuqusi	qayughllak	avaqutaqiisi	Kiyaghneghem	apalluqluku	akequsani	Abraham-emun.
B09_04_Galatians_V29	Tamaani	aghneghni	taana	ighneq	allgeqaq	yugestun	kitutun	alngunak	amyuqetaatkegkaqaa	ighneq	allgeqaq	Taghnegham	pillghakun.	Paninang	maaten	tawatetuq.
B09_04_Galatians_V30	Iwernga	Akuzitet	Igaqegkat	sameng	piitgu?	“Qepghaghtelaaq	aghnaq,	ighneghallu	aghulaqestekek.	Qayughllak	qepghaghtelaaghem	aghnam	ighnegha	nengighnaanghituq	atami	saghyanganeng	maligulluni	ighneghanun	qepghaghtelaaghunghilnguum	aghnam.”
B09_04_Galatians_V31	Ugpeqaalgutemni,	whangkuta	avaqutaqenghitiinkut	qepghaghtelaaghem	aghnam,	iwernga	avaqutaqiinkut	qepghaghtelaaghunghilnguum	aghnam.
B09_05_Galatians_V1	Christ-am	whangkuta	itemutkaqutanganeng,	itemepiigumaakut.	Enkaangam	nekevghatek	aghuliilkaalusi,	qepghaghtelaaghughhneqigtegpenasi	Liilightuusanun.
B09_05_Galatians_V2	Nagatek!	Whanga,	Paul,	ungipaatamsi:	circumcise-estekufsi	Liilightuusam	pisqellghatun,	taawa	Christ-am	apeghiiqaa	kayutkennaanghitaghsi.
B09_05_Galatians_V3	Alla	kelengasaaghaqa	tamaghhaan	yuuk,	circumcise-estekumi	taawa	qaatkengngwaaghyaghqaqii	qamaglluki	Liilightuusat.
B09_05_Galatians_V4	Liilightuusatgun	nallghusaghtesnaqutkegkufsi	Kiyaghneghem	elqughutngallghanun,	aaflequsi	elpesineng	Christ-ameng,	unilleqaghsillu	Kiyaghneghem	nangllegtallgha.
B09_05_Galatians_V5	Agleghnalghiignekun	Taghneghagnekun	utaqangwaaghput	sighimalleghput	apeghiighesqelluku.	Sighimalleghput	taananguuq:	Kiyaghneghmun	nallghusiisqelluta	elqughutngallghanun	ugpeqellemteggun	Christ-a.
B09_05_Galatians_V6	Christ	Jesus-em	pikngukanginkut,	yuuk	megnunanghituq	circumcise-ekaakumi	nalighmeng	circumcise-ellghilkumi.	Una	esgha	megnunalghii,	ugpeqilleq	Christ-akun	piniqistilghii	yulgutemnneng.
B09_05_Galatians_V7	Sivunghani	pinitungwaaq	pinguyaghtusi.	Kitum	qaatkunnanightestisi	ipapighqelleghmun?
B09_05_Galatians_V8	Kiyaghneghem	tuqlughistegpesi	pilqenghitaa.
B09_05_Galatians_V9	Neqamikluku,	“Yeast-angiighhaam	ghhuughtesteghllagaqaa	akuutaq.”
B09_05_Galatians_V10	Elpesillu	whangallu	pikutanganeng	Atanghem,	nalluneqsukenghitanka	ugpeqnanifqiita	apeghtuusanka	elpesinun	pisqelluki.	Liisimakaqallu	Kiyaghneghem	aghyuughlleqaa	seghleliighqilghii	elpesineng,	kinanguyaghngaan.
B09_05_Galatians_V11	Ugpeqaalgutemni,	ungipaqingigatunga	yuget	circumcise-esqelluki.	Tawaten	ungipaqinguyaquma	Jews-et	amyuqetaatkennanighnayaghaatnga	enkaam	qaquuraa	Christ-am	sugagniighutkennayanghitaat.
B09_05_Galatians_V12	Tamaakut	seghleliighqilghiit	elpesineng	circumcise-elleghmeng,	ellngistuq	circumcise-estengnguluteng	eunuch-englallghiit	ellmeggneng.
B09_05_Galatians_V13	Ugpeqaalgutemni,	Kiyaghneghem	tagsiqaqiisi	itemngalleghmun	Christ-akun.	Taawanginaq	atuqegpenaan	itemngalleghsi	atughyaghqaaluki	seghleghqengngalghiit	piyukellghi	yugusim.	Itupill	qepghaateki	ilasi	piniqelleghpesigun.
B09_05_Galatians_V14	Qayughllak	qaatkelleqasi	qamaglluki	Liilightuusat	qaatkegkufsigu	una	Liilightuusaq:	“Piniqluku	yulguten	piniqelleghpetun	elpeneng	katam.”
B09_05_Galatians_V15	Iwernga	elpesineng	qaniqunnaqngukufsillu	pillugunnaqngukufsillu	ugighsalghiistun	teghikusastun,	kelengatek,	qayughllak	naafqutunnaqusi.
B09_05_Galatians_V16	Whaten	piimsi,	kiyaghtek	qaatkellukek	Agleghnalghiik	Taghneghak.	Tawaten	pikufsi	atuqnaanghitasi	seghleghqengngalghiit	piyukellghi	yugusim.
B09_05_Galatians_V17	Qayughllak	seghleghqengngalghiit	piyukellghi	yugusim	kipullegngaat	Taghneghagnun,	piyukellghi	Taghnegham	kipullegngaat	piyukellghanun	yugusim.	Taakuk	anguyakutuk	enkaam	atuqnaanghitasi	piyukellesi.
B09_05_Galatians_V18	Taghnegham	maghyaghquungukangisi	taawa	Liilightuusat	atuqsaghqaananighasi.
B09_05_Galatians_V19	Yugusim	seghleghqelleghtuqam	piyukellghi	nalluniitut.	Ukunguut:	alngunaseghaq,	seghletun	atuqutelleq,	nuqesigalnguut	alngunak	atuqimun,
B09_05_Galatians_V20	maniiguutelleq	kiyaghnengllaqanun,	uyviiniqelleq,	anguyiqelleq,	pillugutelleq,	qungyaqilleq,	sakritelleq,	ellnginaayugtelleq,	aafqemeraalleq,	qerngughpagtaatelleq,
B09_05_Galatians_V21	aqinalleq,	suumelleq,	qerngughulluteng	aghsaghpaagtaqut	seghletun	pilleghmun,	ilanganengllu	seghleghqelleghneng.	Kelengasaaghnaqlaataghamsi	sivunghani	pillemtun,	tamaakut	tawaten	kiyaghlleghhiit	ilatnganaanghitut	quyasleghaneng	Kiyaghneghem	Ataneghpagullghan.
B09_05_Galatians_V22	Naqamenraq	Agleghnalghiim	Taghnegham	piitestekii	ukunguut:	piniqelleq,	quyamalleq,	nekeggmelleq,	nuqenneghtulleq,	nangllegtalleq,	pinilleq,	ataasiighmetelleq,
B09_05_Galatians_V23	yakumangingitelleq,	nuqetelleqlu.	Taakut	iinghutellghitut	alngunak	liilightuusani.
B09_05_Galatians_V24	Christ	Jesus-em	pingita	qaquuraatkaqiit	seghleghqengngalghiit	piyukellghit	yugusimeng.
B09_05_Galatians_V25	Kiyaghtengngukumta	Taghneghagnekun,	qaatkeltekek	Taghneghak.
B09_05_Galatians_V26	Qukaayugneghufqaamta,	qinuyugtifqaamta,	aqinakutefqaamta.
B09_06_Galatians_V1	Ugpeqaalgutemni,	kina	seghleghqellghem	kaatfallugtekagu,	elpesi	kiyaghlleghhiini	Taghneghagnekun,	pinitungwaaq	yakuqluku	kayusiiteggu	maligunneqigtesqelluku	Ataneghmun.	Elpesillu,	kelengangwaaghlusi	luuraq	nanghiiqullengnayukafsi.
B09_06_Galatians_V2	Kayutkutullusi	seghleliilleghpesini;	tawaten	qaatkelleqaghsi	Liilightuusaq	Christ-am	qelghutkaa.
B09_06_Galatians_V3	Kina	sumeghtaghaqumi	sanguniluni,	sangunghiteghngaaghmi,	ellmineng	puughtengnguuq.
B09_06_Galatians_V4	Yeqay	tamaghhaghmi	yugem	yuvghiighwaaghligu	kiyaghtaalleni.	Enkaam	piniqan	quyaknakanga	ellmi	katam	apeghiiqani	usputaqellngunaan	kitum	apeghiiqaanun.
B09_06_Galatians_V5	Tamaghhaghmi	yugem	igleghusaghqaqii	ellmi	piyaghqani.
B09_06_Galatians_V6	Kina	alngunak	apeghtuqaq	Kiyaghneghem	apeghtuusaaneng,	pinilghiimeng	tuunili	apeghtughisteminun.
B09_06_Galatians_V7	Sumeghtaghaquvek	puughlleqniluku	Kiyaghneq	elpeneng	puughtengnguuten.	Yugem	sangwaa	piitesiighaqani	unataghyaghqaqaa.
B09_06_Galatians_V8	Piitesighaquvek	efqughhnaluku	seghleghqengngalghii	piyukellghen,	taagken	unataghlleqan	tuqulleq.	Iwernga	piitesighaquvek	efqughhnalukek	Taghneghak,	taagken	Taghneghagneng	unataghlleqan	kenlengilnguq	unguvalleq.
B09_06_Galatians_V9	Enkaam	qinuyagutegpenaan	pinitun	pilleq	pilteggu,	qayughllak	iilqayunghilkumta	pilleghqaq	kaaskan	akileghtuusangellequkut.
B09_06_Galatians_V10	Enkaam	pilleghqalgunemta	iiwleng	pinitun	piiqelteki	qamagtengngwaaghluki	yuget,	kiyang	tamaakut	angleguteliitkaput	Christ-akun.
B09_06_Galatians_V11	Esghaqaghtekiqun	yaagtughllaget	igallghenka	latamalusi!
B09_06_Galatians_V12	Yuget	esghaghsaqsuneghtuqatlu	qanatkiyuneghtuqatlu	pinitun	qepghalleghmeggneng,	ellnginguut	circumcise-esquughwaaghilghiit	elpesineng.	Tawaten	piiqut	qayughllak	alingaqelghiit	amyuqetaatkellengnayukameng	ungipaqegkumegteggu	qaquuraghhiinaa	Christ-am,	avelghaghluku	circumcise-elleq.
B09_06_Galatians_V13	Qaywa	circumcise-ekaayaghngaaghmeng,	ellngit	katam	qaatkusigatut	Liilightuusanun.	Circumcise-esqesugaqiisi	qanatkepigesnaghnalusi	ellmeggnun	circumcise-estekaqnilusi.
B09_06_Galatians_V14	Iwernga	whanga	qananaanghitunga	sameng	alngunak	iwerngaqun	qaquuraaneng	Atanemta	Jesus	Christ-am.	Tuqullghakun	qaquurami	nuna	qaquuraamaaq	whangamnun,	enkaam	whanga	qaquuraamaanga	nunamun.
B09_06_Galatians_V15	Megnunanghituq	yuuk	circumcise-ekaakumi,	nalighmeng	circumcise-ellghilkumi.	Una	megnunalghiinguuq:	Kiyaghneghem	ulimakaqiinkut	nutaghaaluta	yugni.
B09_06_Galatians_V16	Tamaghhiitnun	qaatkullghiinun	apeghtuusamnun,	yeqay	Kiyaghneghem	nekeggmellghallu	nangllegtallghallu	ellngitnilli,	Israel-nganillu	Kiyaghneghem.
B09_06_Galatians_V17	Whaken	kenlekluku	kitum	alngunak	alla	seghleliightestefqaama	pilinga	qayughllak	yugusimnilnguut	maamellghet	kelgutngwaat	qephaghtelaaghulqa	Jesus-mun.
B09_06_Galatians_V18	Ugpeqaalgutemni,	yeqay	piniqingalghii	kayusillgha	Atanemta	Jesus	Christ-am	tamaghhaghpesinilli.	Amen.
B10_01_Ephesians_V1	Ukut	latat	Paul-meng	pinguut.	Christ	Jesus-em	apostle-kaanga	Kiyaghneghem	piyukellghakun.	Latanguunga	Kiyaghneghem	yugitnun	Ephesus-melngughnun,	ataasiighmelnguut	maligsaaghtengi	Christ	Jesus-em.
B10_01_Ephesians_V2	Kiyaghneghem	Atamta,	Atanemtallu	Jesus	Christ-am	nanglleklisillu	nekeggmellelguslisillu.
B10_01_Ephesians_V3	Usuqellengli	Kiyaghneq,	Atanga	Atanemta	Jesus	Christ-am!	Christ-akun	Kiyaghneghem	quyastengngwiinkut	tamaghhaaneng	tunusameng	qilagtameng.
B10_01_Ephesians_V4	Nuna	ulimallghilluku	Kiyaghneghem	nakmikegkaqiinkut	Christ-akun	pelungitesqellutallu	avutngitesqellutallu	ellminun.
B10_01_Ephesians_V5	Qayughllak	Kiyaghneghem	piniqegkanginkut,	neghighluku	allughqinakegkaqiinkut	avaqutaaluta	Jesus	Christ-akun.	Tawaten	pikaaguq	qayughllak	piyukegkanga,	efquqegkangallu.
B10_01_Ephesians_V6	Enkaam	usuqaghput	Kiyaghneq	qayughllak	ighlegpenani	nangllekeghllagiinkut	piniqegkamikun	Ighneghmikun.
B10_01_Ephesians_V7	Christ-am	aawakun,	Kiyaghneghem	itemutkaqiinkut	seghleghqellemnneng.	Seghevutii	seghleghqelleput	apalluqluku	nangllegtalleghllani
B10_01_Ephesians_V8	aqeghqusiqeghllakanga	whangkunnun.	Peghqinghustiinkutlu	liigikestiinkutlu
B10_01_Ephesians_V9	uspeqelleghmineng	salin	aliighsigalkemmineng	sivunghani.	Taananguuq	Kiyaghneghem	uspeqegkaa,	pikaqaa	Christ-akun.
B10_01_Ephesians_V10	Kiyaghneghem	uspeqelleni	apeghiighlleqaa	pilleghqaghllugwaaghmi.	Qamagtengngwaaghluki	ulimaani	qilagmelnguutlu	nunamelnguutlu	qerngughlleqii,	Christ-amun	igleghutesqelluki.
B10_01_Ephesians_V11	Christ-akun	Kiyaghneghem	nakmikegkaqiinkut	ellminun	yuguluta.	Ayumirugllak	piyukelleghmitun	uspeqegkaqaa.	Ellngan	sangwaa	tamaghhaan	piyukelleghmitun	pistaqaa.
B10_01_Ephesians_V12	Whangkuta	Jews-eni	ugpeqani	sighimakiyuwhaaqaagukut	Christ-akun.	Enkaam	kiyaghtaallemteggun	usuqesleqaghput	Kiyaghneq	aangelleghllaganun.
B10_01_Ephesians_V13	Christ-akun	elpesillu	nagaquqaqaghsi	ipapik	ungipaq.	Pinilghiinguuq	Ungipaq	ungipaatilghii	yugulilleghpesineng.	Ugpeqaqngafsigu	Christ-a,	Kiyaghneghem	nalluniiqaqiisi	Agleghnalghiigneng	Taghneghagneng,	akequsaqegkamineng	tuunelleqnilukek.
B10_01_Ephesians_V14	Agleghnalghiim	Taghnegham	ipapighqestiinkut	pagitaghqamnneng	kenlanga	whangkuta	piliitelleghqamnnun.	Enkaam	usuqelleqaghput	Kiyaghneq	aangelleghllaganun!
B10_01_Ephesians_V15	Nagaquumaaqa	ugpeqilleghsi	Ataneghqun	Jesus-kun,	piniqelleghsillu	tamaghhiitnun	Kiyaghneghem	yugitnun.	Tamaaken	apalluqluku,
B10_01_Ephesians_V16	neqamikaqamsi	yughanemni,	iyamsiqayagunneghmeng	taaqigatamsi	Kiyaghneghmun.
B10_01_Ephesians_V17	Ataghllakaa	Atanemta	Jesus	Christ-am.	Ellnganun	tungsiitaqamsi	peghqinghusqellusi	Taghneghagkenkun,	liigikataghiisqellusi	Kiyaghneghmeng.
B10_01_Ephesians_V18	Yughaatkaqa	nighuk	kuukgutesqelluku	ilugpesinun,	liigikesqelluku	sighimalleq	Kiyaghneghem	elpesinun	pikestekaa	qayughllak	nakmikegkaqiisi.	Yughaatkamsillu	liigikesqelluki	kemnaghllaget	quyastelleghllaget	Kiyaghneghem	akequsaqegkii	yugminun.
B10_01_Ephesians_V19	Yughaghtungallu	liigikesqelluku	seghleghllaguuq	Kiyaghneghem	aghtughyaghqaanghilleghllaga	qepghalghii	whangkunni	ugpeqilghiini.	Taana	aghtughyaghqaanghitelleghllak	ataasiiguq	Kiyaghneghem	unguvaghtisiqegkaa	Christ-amun	tuqulleghmeng.	Taagken	qilagmi	Kiyaghneghem	aqumesimaa	aghenqigneghmikun.
B10_01_Ephesians_V21	Kiyaghneghem	qulighpigaaghtestekaqaa	Christ-a	tamaghhiitneng	igleghutisteneng,	qelghikayugneng,	aghtughyaghqaanghillelegneng,	umiilegnengllu.	Aatgha	ingyaatngaghllagtuq	ateghyaggaghneng	nunami	whani,	nunaghraghaghqamillu.
B10_01_Ephesians_V22	Kiyaghneghem	llikaqaa	sangwaa	qamagtengngwaaghluku	Christ-am	itegaan	asinganun,	naasquutistengllaqaqaallu	samun	tamaghhaanun	apalluqluki	ugpeqat.
B10_01_Ephesians_V23	Qamaglluteng	ugpeqat	yugusiqii	Christ-am,	enkaam	ellnga	iighwightuq.	Christ-am	iighwightaa	sangwaa	qamaglluku	nani	alngunak.
B10_02_Ephesians_V1	Sivunghani	taghneghasi	tuqungayaghtut	qayughllak	qaatkumangilkesi	Kiyaghneq,	seghleghqestenguyaghtusillu.
B10_02_Ephesians_V2	Tawatesaghtusi	kiyaghtengngulusi	nunam	seghleghmun	igleghneghanun.	Qaatkengnguyaghaghsillu	igleghutistengat	tughneghaat	qilagamelnguut.	Ellnganguuq	aangwaalleghpigaq	tughneghaq	igleghutilghii	yugneng	qaatkusigalngughneng	Kiyaghneghmun.
B10_02_Ephesians_V3	Qamaglluta	kiyaghtekaagukut	tamaakustun	yugestun.	Atuqegkaqaput	seghleghqengngalghiit	piyukellghi	yugusimtallu	umyugamtallu.	Enkaam	qamaglluta	allgeqaatemnneng	seghleghqestenguluta,	aghyuullengnaqnguyaghtukut	Kiyaghneghem	sakraallghakun.
B10_02_Ephesians_V4	Iwernga	Kiyaghneq	nangllegtaghllagtuq,	piniqepigtiinkutlu.
B10_02_Ephesians_V5	Qaywa	taghneghaput	tuqungayaghngiita	apalluqluki	seghleghqelleput,	Kiyaghneghem	unguvaghtiinkut	maligulluta	Christ-amun.	(Yugulikaagusi	Kiyaghneghem	nangllekellghakun.)
B10_02_Ephesians_V6	Kiyaghneghem	unguvaghtiinkut	maligulluta	Christ	Jesus-mun,	whangkunnunllu	aqumelgusightestaa	qilagmi.
B10_02_Ephesians_V7	Kiyaghneq	tawaten	pikaaguq	kinguliighaghnun	liitesqelluku	piniqelleghrukutaaghllani	whangkunnun	Christ	Jesus-kun.
B10_02_Ephesians_V8	Kiyaghneghem	nangllegtallghakun	yugulikaagusi	ugpeqilleghpesigun.	Yugulilleghsi	elpesineng	pilqenghitaghsi,	Kiyaghneghem	tunusaqaa	elpesinun.
B10_02_Ephesians_V9	Yugulillghitiisi	apalluqluku	salleghsi,	enkaam	qukaayugutkesaghqaqenghitaghsi.
B10_02_Ephesians_V10	Kiyaghneghem	ulimaaqiinkut	tawatelluta.	Christ	Jesus-kun	ulimaaqiinkut	qepghiisqelluki	pinilghiit	qepghaqat.	Sivunghani	taakut	pinilghiit	qepghaqat	yataaghqengngwaaqaqii	whangkunnun	qepghiisqelluki	kiyaghtellemnni.
B10_02_Ephesians_V11	Neqamikluku	Gentile-ngulusi	allgeqaagusi.	Jews-et	atighaqiisi	“circumcise-ellghilnguut”,	ellmeggneng	atiqayuguut	“circumcise-ekat”.	(Circumcise-ellghat	yugusighhiiniitnituq.)
B10_02_Ephesians_V12	Neqamikluku	tamaani	pilleghni	nalluksaghaghsi	Christ-a	kinangutanga.	Nunataayaghtusi	Israel-eghmiinun	enkaam	ilatellghisaghtusi	Kiyaghneghem	akequsaqegkaanun	ellngitnun.	Nunami	whani	kiyaghtengnguyaghtusi	sighimallngunasillu	Kiyaghnengunasillu.
B10_02_Ephesians_V13	Iwernga	maaten	pilleghmi	Christ	Jesus-mun	ilasimaasi.	Sivunghani	awavansaghtusi	Kiyaghneghmeng,	iwernga	maaten	pilleghmi	tughaaghusimaasi	ellnganun	Christ-am	aawakun.
B10_02_Ephesians_V14	Christ-a	ellnga	katam	nekeggmelqaghput.	Ellnganguuq	ataasiightestilghii	Jews-enengllu	Gentile-enengllu.	Naafqegkaqaa	minglluta	aaftilghii	whangkunneng,	enkaam	anguyakunnanighqegkaqiinkut.
B10_02_Ephesians_V15	Christ-am	tuqulleghmikun	atuunanighqegkaqii	Jews-et	Liilightuusiitlu	qelghusiitlu.	Tawaten	pikaaguq	Jews-etlu	Gentile-etlu	ataasiightesqelluki	ellmikun.	Enkaam	nekeggmellengestekaqii.
B10_02_Ephesians_V16	Tuqulleghmikun	qaquurakun,	Christ-am	ugumikunnanighqii	Jews-etlu	Gentile-etlu.	Taagken	ataasiightestii,	ilaliighutestiillu	Kiyaghneghmun.
B10_02_Ephesians_V17	Christ-a	tagiluni	ungipaqikaaguq	nekeggmelleghmeng	elpesinun	Gentile-enun,	awavantengnguyalghiisi	Kiyaghneghmun.	Ungipaqikaaguqlu	nekeggmelleghmeng	Jews-enun,	qantaghantengngulghiit	Kiyaghneghmun.
B10_02_Ephesians_V18	Enkaam	Christ-akun	Jews-enillu	Gentile-enillu	tagiyaqlegughtukut	Atamun	ataasikun	Taghneghakun.
B10_02_Ephesians_V19	Enkaangam	elpesi	Gentile-eni	nunataananightusi.	Itupill	nunalgutkaaghtiisi	Kiyaghneghem	yugita,	ilatusillu	nengllugutanganun	Kiyaghneghem.
B10_02_Ephesians_V20	Mangteghaatun	ayuqusi	nekeftekat	tunemangllaqiitgun	apostle-etlu	uuknaliqistetlu.	Christ	Jesus	ellnga	katam	kangigham	uyghakaa.
B10_02_Ephesians_V21	Qamaglluteng	mangtegham	nalighneghi	nekeghquutngaat	qerngaghmeng	Christ-akun.	Taakut	nalighneghet	nulayalghiimeng	temple-ngughtengnguut	Ataneghmun.	Taana	temple-a	agleghnaghtuq.
B10_02_Ephesians_V22	Ilatngalleghpesigun	Christ-amun,	maligullusi	ilangitnun	ugpeqanun	nekeftengnguusi	mangteghamun	Kiyaghneghem	kiyaghfiganun	Taghneghagmikun.
B10_03_Ephesians_V1	Tamaaken	apalluqluku,	whanga,	Paul,	anusimingllaghvigmetunga	qayughllak	qepghaaskegka	Christ	Jesus	elpesi	apalluqlusi	Gentile-eni.
B10_03_Ephesians_V2	Entaqun	nagaquumaaghsi	Kiyaghneghem	nangllegtalleghmikun	qepghaqalitkaqaanga	elpesinun.
B10_03_Ephesians_V3	Kiyaghneghem	liitestaa	whangamnun	qayvightellghilnguq	uspeqelleni.	Qavnganghhaq	latatkaghtekaqaqa	taana.
B10_03_Ephesians_V4	Atightuqufsigu	latatkegkaqa	liilleqaghsi	liigikelqa	qayvightellghilnguq	uspeqelleq	Christ-ameng	ayuqelghii.
B10_03_Ephesians_V5	Sivunghani	Kiyaghneghem	ungipaatellghitii	yuget	qayvightellghilngughmeng	uspeqelleghmineng.	Iwernga	ukuni	aghneghni	Agleghnalghiignekun	Taghneghagnekun	qayvightaa	uspeqelleni	agleghnalghiinun	apostle-minunllu	uuknaliqisteminunllu.
B10_03_Ephesians_V6	Whatetuq	uspeqellgha:	Gentile-et	ugpeqilleghmegteggun	Pinilghiineng	Ungipaneng	ilasimaat	Jews-enun	Kiyaghneghem	quyastellghanun.	Nalighneqaaghsimii	ataasim	yugusim,	enkaam	ilatut	Kiyaghneghem	akequsaanun	Christ	Jesus-kun.
B10_03_Ephesians_V7	Kiyaghneghem	nangllegtalleghmikun,	aghtughyaghqaanghilleghmikunllu	tunusalitaanga	qepghaghtengulunga	ungipaqesqelluki	Pinilghiit	Ungipat.
B10_03_Ephesians_V8	Ukalighpigaagunga	tamaghhiitneng	Kiyaghneghem	yuganeng.	Tawalliima	Kiyaghneghem	nangllegtalleghmikun	tunusalitaanga	whaten:	nakmikaanga	Gentile-enun	ungipaqesqelluki	Pinilghiit	Ungipat	Christ-am	aklunginganeng	ayuqelghiit.	Aklungingi	ingyaatngaat	yuget	liigikellghitneng.
B10_03_Ephesians_V9	Kiyaghneghem	nakmikegkaqaangallu	liigikestesqelluki	qamaglluki	yuget	qayvighsimangilngughmeng	uspeqelleghmineng.	Kiyaghneghem,	ulimaghikam	sameng	tamaghhaaneng,	qayvightellghitaa	uspeqelleni	piinlighyuggaalleghmeng	maatemun.
B10_03_Ephesians_V10	Taagken	qilagnilnguut:	igleghutilghiitlu,	aghtughyaghqaanghillelgetlu,	Kiyaghneghem	liitesleqii	allaaghhiinaghmeng	peghqinelleghmineng.	Tawaten	pillequq	yugmikun	yughaghvignilngughteggun.
B10_03_Ephesians_V11	Tamaakunguut	Kiyaghneghem	uspeqegkii	salin	nunangllalghilluni.	Apeghiighumii	Christ	Jesus-kun	Atanemteggun.
B10_03_Ephesians_V12	Ugpeqillemteggun	Christ-akun	aglaghyaghqaaghsimaakut	Kiyaghneghmun	tetullngunaamtallu	alingellngunaamtallu.
B10_03_Ephesians_V13	Enkaangam	iilqayagutegpenaan	ugpeqilleghsi	apalluqluku	ikfiqutkengngukemsi.	Ikfiqelleghma	quulvaghtesleqiisi.
B10_03_Ephesians_V14	Enkaam	taana	apalluqluku	segesqughtunga	sivungani	Atam.
B10_03_Ephesians_V15	Ellnganguuq	atighilghii	tamaghhiitneng	nengllugutneng	qilagmelngughnengllu	nunamelngughnengllu.
B10_03_Ephesians_V16	Yughaghtunga	Kiyaghneghmun	aklungighllaganeng	aghtughyaghqaanghillelitesqellusi	iknaqughsiisqeluki	ilusi	qaamkut	Taghneghagkenkun.
B10_03_Ephesians_V17	Yughaatkamsi	Christ-a	kiyaghtesqelluku	ilugpesini	ugpeqilleghpesigun.	Yughaatkamsi	akulgusqellusillu,	tunemalgusqellusillu	piniqelleghqun.
B10_03_Ephesians_V18	Yughaatkamsi,	qamagllukillu	Kiyaghneghem	yugi,	liigiksaqlegusqelluku	Christ-am	piniqellghan,	iqetulanga,	tagtalanga,	uusqaghtulanga,	samavneghtulangallu.
B10_03_Ephesians_V19	Elpesinun	liisimakesqesugaqa	Christ-am	piniqellgha,	qaywa	piyaqnaghngaan	liigikngwaalleghqaa.	Taagken	piniqellghakun,	Kiyaghneghem	nangaghneghatun	wata	lliighllequsi.
B10_03_Ephesians_V20	Kiyaghneghem	aghtughyaghqaanghillghakun	qepghalghiikun	ilumnni,	ellngan	piyaqlegwaa	qaayghulluku	sangwaa	alngunak	aaptekaghput	nalighmeng	sumeghtaghaatkegkaghput.
B10_03_Ephesians_V21	Kiyaghneq	usuqellengli	ugpeqatgun	yughaghvignilngughteggun,	Christ	Jesus-kunllu.	Usuqiteggu	quunperugllak	kenlengunaan.	Amen.
B10_04_Ephesians_V1	Anusimingllaghaagunga	qayughllak	qepghaaskegka	Ataneq.	Kiyaghneghem	nakmikegkaqiisi	ellminun	yugulusi;	tamaaken	apalluqluku	kayemamsi	kiyaghtesqellusi	Kiyaghneghem	kiyaghtesqesullghatun.
B10_04_Ephesians_V2	Iiwleng	qusevegllusi,	yakumangilliqegpenasi,	nuqenneghtulusi,	tugukliitullusi	piniqelleghqun.
B10_04_Ephesians_V3	Kiyaghneghem	Taghneghagkenka	qerngughutkaqiisi	nekeggmelleghqun.	Enkaam	nanghiiqughllagtek	iiwleng	kiyaghtek	tawaten.
B10_04_Ephesians_V4	Ataasiiguq	yugusiq,	ataasiiguklu	Taghneghak,	katam	tawaten	ataasimun	sighimalleghmun	Kiyaghneghem	tagsighiisi.
B10_04_Ephesians_V5	Ataasiiguq	Ataneq,	ataasiiguq	ugpeqilleq,	ataasiiguq	paaptaayelleq.
B10_04_Ephesians_V6	Ataasiiguq	Kiyaghneq,	Atakaat	saam	tamaghhaan.	Ellngan	igleghutngwaa	sangwaa	tamaghhaan,	tamaghhaanituq,	sametuqlu	alngunak.
B10_04_Ephesians_V7	Christ-am	tamaghhaamta	tuunegkaqiinkut	tunusameng	qepghaqani	pisqelluku.	Tuunegkaqii	taakut	tunusat	tuunyukelleghmitun.
B10_04_Ephesians_V8	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	Akuzitni	Igaqegkani	igaqegkaalghii,	“Mayughaqngami	uusqalleghmun	tugukaqii	uglaapiglleghhiit	wayaqat,	yugetlu	tunusaliquqaqii.”
B10_04_Ephesians_V9	Sameng	pisiiwa,	“Mayuqaaguq”?	Whaten	pisiiguq,	sivukluni	ukikaaguq	samavek	asilighneghanun	nunam.
B10_04_Ephesians_V10	Enkaam	ellnga	taana	ukikaq	samavek,	ellnganguuq	ataasiq	taana	mayuqaq	pamavek	ingyaghluki	qilaget,	imighnaluku	sangwaa	qamaglluku	nayuutngalleghmineng.
B10_04_Ephesians_V11	Ellnganguuq	tunusaliquqaq	yugnun:	ilangi	apostle-nguluki,	ilangi	uuknaliqistenguluki,	ilangi	evangelist-nguluki,	ilangi	yughaghtenguluki,	apeghtughistengulukillu.
B10_04_Ephesians_V12	Taakut	tunusalitkaqii	apeghtiisqelluki	Kiyaghneghem	yugi	ellngitnun	qepghaatesqelluku	ellnga.	Kiyaghneq	tawaten	pikaaguq	ellngitnun	nekeftesqelluku	Christ-am	yugusii.
B10_04_Ephesians_V13	Taana	qepghaqaq	nagneghllequq	kenlanga	ataasiightellemnnun	ugpeqillemteggun,	liisimakellemteggunllu	Ighnegha	Kiyaghneghem.	Taagken	angtaniitngwaaghluta	Christ-atun	lliighllequkut.
B10_04_Ephesians_V14	Enkaam	taghnughhaghhaananighllequkut.	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	puughtesnaanghitukut	yugnun	temngimeng	apeghtughillghitgun.	Apeghtughillghit	anuqestunllu	imaghllugestunllu	ayuqut	nuugtaatalghiit	yugneng.	Tamaakut	peghqinelghiit,	iqlengalghiit	yuget,	iqlengateng	ipasugnighsaghaqiit	maghyaghquneghlluggnaluki	yuget.
B10_04_Ephesians_V15	Itupill	akuzitkelteggu	ipapilleq	piniqelleghqun,	enkaam	wata	Christ-atun	lliighllequkut	sallemteggun	tamaghhaakun.	Christ-a	naasquqaat	ugpeqat.
B10_04_Ephesians_V16	Ugpeqani	yugusiqiinkut	Christ-am.	Ellngakun	iingunaghmi	yugusiq	qerngughutkaaguqlu	nuverraatkaaguqlu	yugusim	ivalungakun.	Qamaglluteng	nalighneghet	qepghanneghmeggni	qepghalleghqamegestun,	taawa	yugusiq	nagwaaquq,	iknaqughsaghaquqlu	piniqelleghqun.
B10_04_Ephesians_V17	Enkaangam	Atanghem	aatghakun	whaten	piimsillu	kelengasaaghamsillu:	kiyaghtegpenasingam	Gentile-et	kiyaghtaallghistun.	Sumeghtaghallghit	sasiinghilnguugut,
B10_04_Ephesians_V18	umyugiitlu	liigikingigalnguugut.	Ilatnganghitut	unguvalleghmun	Kiyaghneghem	tuunegkaanun,	qayughllak	nallukngwaaghaat,	pineghlluguutlu.
B10_04_Ephesians_V19	Talwa	kaynguyugyaghqaananiimaat;	atuqaqiitlu	sangwaat	alngunak	seghleghet	yugusimeng	piyukegkiit.	Nagneghusugaqiit	qamaglluki	seghleghet	nuqetutegpenaki.
B10_04_Ephesians_V20	Iwernga	tamaakut	liitellghitasi	Christ-am	apeghtuusiitneng!
B10_04_Ephesians_V21	Nagaqupestaaqaqaghsi	ellnga,	qayughllak	maligsaaghtekegkangisi.	Enkaam	apeghtuqaagusi	ipa	apeghtuusaaneng	Jesus-em.
B10_04_Ephesians_V22	Whaten	apeghtuqaqiisi:	seghleghet	piyukelleghpesi	puughlleqiisillu	naafqelleqiisillu.	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	pegteki	nangaghnelusillu	kiyaghtaalqesaqesillu.
B10_04_Ephesians_V23	Itupill	taghnegham	nutaghlliki	umyugasi.
B10_04_Ephesians_V24	Enkaam	atuqiteggu	nangaghneghraghaghsi	qayughllak	Kiyaghneghem	ulimakaqaa	ellmitun	ayuqluku:	elqughutngapiigluku,	agleghnaghlukullu.
B10_04_Ephesians_V25	Enkaam	iqlengiqnanightegngam!	Itupill	iiwleng	apeghteggu	ipapilleq	ilagpesinun,	qayughllak	qamaglluta	nalighnequghiinkut	Christ-am	yugusiin.
B10_04_Ephesians_V26	Sakritek	iwernga	seghleghqegpenasi.	Siqineq	tevightestegpenaan	paninang	sakritngulusi.
B10_04_Ephesians_V27	Talwa	tughneghaq	pilleghqalitegpenaan	nanghiiqusqellusi	seghleghqelleghmun.
B10_04_Ephesians_V28	Tegleghniighta	teglegnanighli.	Itupill	qepghaghli	allgeghusaghqaaluni	aklukegkamineng,	tuuniyaghqaaghllequqlu	aklukilghiinun.
B10_04_Ephesians_V29	Akuzitkigpenasi	seghleghmeng.	Itupill	aleghqughteki	pinitun	yuget	aklukillghitni.	Pinilghiit	akuzitet	kayemyaghqaqiit,	aneghneghqesaghqaqiit	nagallghiit.
B10_04_Ephesians_V30	Qivghustegpenakeklu	Agleghnalghiik	Taghneghakek	Kiyaghneghem.	Taghneghagmineng	nalluniiqaqiisi	ellmi	piknalusi.	Tawaten	pikaaguq	elpesinun	liisimakesqelluku	itemulleqiisi	seghleghqelleghpesineng	Itemutellghem	Aghnegha	kaaskan.
B10_04_Ephesians_V31	Pegteggu	ugumikeraaq,	sakraa,	sakraaghllak,	yupighqaghaataq,	seghlequuq,	qamagllukillu	seghleghet.
B10_04_Ephesians_V32	Yeghlegi	nangllegtaghtek,	nafughtaghtek	ilagpesinun,	seghevutullusillu,	katam	Kiyaghneghem	seghevutkaqegkangisi	Christ-akun.
B10_05_Ephesians_V1	Kiyaghneghem	elpesi	avaqutaqutanganeng	piniqepigtekii,	ayuqesighaghteggu.
B10_05_Ephesians_V2	Kiyaghtaallesi	aaghqutaqesteki	piniqelleghmun,	katam	Christ-am	piniqegkanginkut,	tuqumatkegkaqegkanginkutlu.	Tuqullgha	tepkegtatun	tunusatun	ayuquq	Kiyaghneghmun,	aghqutnguuqlu	ellnganun.
B10_05_Ephesians_V3	Elpesi	Kiyaghneghem	yukegkangisi,	enkaam	kitumun	alngunak	allaniightestengunifqaafsi,	nalighmeng	alngunak	sex-kun	seghleghqestengunifqaafsi,	nalighmeng	pakigniightengunifqaafsi.	Tamaakut	seghleghuut	enkaam	Kiyaghneghem	yugita	piyaghqaqenghitiit.
B10_05_Ephesians_V4	Kayngusaghaategpenasi,	temngitwhameng	akuzitkegpenasi	sex-meng,	nalighmeng	amyughaaghutkegpenasi	sex-meng.	Itupill	iyamsiqayugviksaghqaqaghsi	Kiyaghneq.
B10_05_Ephesians_V5	Nalluneqnaghhiituq	una:	Kina	alngunak	pagisaghqiituq	Ataneghpagullghani	Christ-amllu	Kiyaghneghemllu	seghleghqelghii	allaniighmeng,	alngunak	sex-kun	seghleghqelleghmeng,	nalighmeng	pakigniighmeng.	(Pakigneghet	manigughtenguut	kiyaghnengllaqanun.)
B10_05_Ephesians_V6	Yugnun	puughtestegpenasi	ungipaaskangisi	tamaakut	seghleghqellghet	seghleghunghinniluki.	Iwernga	tawatelnguut	seghleghqellghet	Kiyaghneq	sakraasteghllagaqaat	qaatkunneghilnguut	ellminun.
B10_05_Ephesians_V7	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	ilategpenasi	tawatelngughnun	yugnun.
B10_05_Ephesians_V8	Yugestun	ayuqsaghtusi	kiyaghlleghhiit	mamlegmi,	iwernga	maaten	kiyaghtengnguusi	nighugmi	qayughllak	Atanghem	pikegkangisi.	Enkaam	kiyaghtek	yugestun	nighugmelngughestun.
B10_05_Ephesians_V9	(Qayughllak	kiyaghhneghpesini	nighugmi	pinightestaqiisi,	elqughutngastaqiisi,	ipangustaqiisi.)
B10_05_Ephesians_V10	Liinnaqiteggullu	sangwaa	efqughnalghii	Ataneghmun.
B10_05_Ephesians_V11	Ilatqaghtaghpenasi	yugnun	satngunghilngughmeng	pilghiinun	mamlegmi.	Itupill	liigikesteki	tawaten	pillghit	seghleghuut.
B10_05_Ephesians_V12	Kayngunapigtut	talwa	akuzitkesaghqaaluteng	tamaakut	piiqegkangit	aksaqluku.
B10_05_Ephesians_V13	Iwernga	qamagtengngwaaghluteng	aliightekumeng	nighugmun,	taawa	nateteghpigaatangi	whateghlluwaaq	aliighllequt,	qayughllak	sangwaa	qamaglluni	nighugem	esghaghyaghqaaghtesleqaa.
B10_05_Ephesians_V14	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	yuget	pikaagut,	“Qavalghiimi,	taghtughhaaten.	Unguvaa	tuqulleghmeng	enkaam	Christ-am	kukeglleqaaten.”
B10_05_Ephesians_V15	Enkaam	kelengalusi	kiyaghtek.	Peghqinghunghilngughestun	kiyaghtegpenasi;	itupill	peghqinghestun	kiyaghtek.
B10_05_Ephesians_V16	Pinitun	atuqiteggu	tamaghhaan	pilleghqaghsi	qayughllak	aghneghni	maaten	yuget	seghletun	piiqut.
B10_05_Ephesians_V17	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	nallufqaafsi,	iwernga	liigikiteggu	sangwaa	Atanghem	pisqesullgha	elpesinun.
B10_05_Ephesians_V18	Suumegpenasi	wine-meng	qayughllak	naafqelleqiisi.	Iwernga	imightek	Taghneghagneng,
B10_05_Ephesians_V19	aleghquutaqlusi	akuzitangitneng	psalms-et,	ilagaatet,	taghneghakunllu	ilagaatneng.	Ilagaghaqitek	ilagaatnengllu	psalms-enengllu	Ataneghmun,	usuqillelighlusi	ilugpesigun.
B10_05_Ephesians_V20	Aatghakun	Atanemta	Jesus	Christ-am,	iyamsiqayugvikumanginaghteggu	Kiyaghneq	Atanga	saam	tamaghhaan.
B10_05_Ephesians_V21	Malighqutaqngalusi	ilagpesinun	qayughllak	siivakngukesi	Christ-a.
B10_05_Ephesians_V22	Nuliighni,	malighqutaqlusi	ugigpesinun	katam	Ataneghmun	pilghiistun.
B10_05_Ephesians_V23	Qayughllak	ugi	naasquqaa	nulighhan	katam	Christ-a	naasquqegkangat	ugpeqat.	Christ-a	Yugulighistekaat	ugpeqat;	ellngan	yugusiqii.
