B10_05_Ephesians_V24	Katam	ugpeqat	malighqutaqellghistun	Christ-amun,	tawateghpigaq	salleghqun	tamaghhaakun	nulighhet	malighqutaqsaghqaagut	ugimeggnun.
B10_05_Ephesians_V25	Ugini,	piniqluki	nuliisi	katam	Christ-am	piniqellghatun	ugpeqat.	Piniqepigtekaqii	repall	tuqumatkegkaqii.
B10_05_Ephesians_V26	Ugpeqat	agleghnaghsaqaqii	aghtughyaghqaanghillghakun	akuzitmi,	pelungighsaqaqiillu	aghvigluki	meghqun.
B10_05_Ephesians_V27	Christ-a	tawaten	pikaaguq	aang'ghunnaluki	ugpeqat	ellminun	katam	pinighnalghiitun	ugiighnaqelghiitun.	Tuqukaaguq	ugpeqat	tagneqriitesqelluki,	ungllevregiitesqelluki	nalighmeng	sameng	alngunak	afkuyiitesqelluki.	Enkaam	nuliighqaa	agleghnaghllequq,	avutngillequqlu.
B10_05_Ephesians_V28	Ugim	piniqsaghqaqaa	nuliini	piniqelleghmitun	yugusini.	Ugi	piniqilghii	nuliighmineng	ellmineng	piniqnguuq.
B10_05_Ephesians_V29	Kitum	alngunak	ugumikigataa	ellmi	katam	yugusini.	Yeghlegi,	neghestaqaallu	aflengakaqaallu,	katam	tawaten	Christ-am	piiqellghatun	ugpeqanun,
B10_05_Ephesians_V30	qayughllak	nalighnequghiinkut	ellngan	yugusiin.
B10_05_Ephesians_V31	Akuzitni	Igaqegkani	whaten	igaqngaaq,	“Tamaaken	apalluqluku	yugem	unilleqaak	atanillu	naanillu	ilannaluni	nuliighminun.	Enkaam	nulighqullghiik	ataasiighllequk.”
B10_05_Ephesians_V32	Taam	Akuzitem	Igaqegkam	qayvightaa	megnunapiglleghhii	ipapilleq:	Christ-allu	ugpeqatlu	ataasiigut.
B10_05_Ephesians_V33	Iwernga	taana	elpesinunllu	ayuquq:	tamaghhaghmi	ugim	piniqepestaaghyaghqaqaa	nuliini	ellmineng	katam	piniqelghiistun.	Tamaghhaghmillu	nulighhem	siivaksaghqaqaa	ugini.
B10_06_Ephesians_V1	Taghnughhaghni,	qaatkullusi	angayuqaghpesinun	Atanghem	pisqesullghatun	elpesinun.	Tawaten	elqughutngaaq.
B10_06_Ephesians_V2	Akuzitni	Igaqegkani	whaten	Kiyaghneq	qelghikaaguq,	“Quulvaghluku	atanllu	naanllu.”	Taana	qelghusaq	sivuliiguq	akequsalek.
B10_06_Ephesians_V3	Whaten	Kiyaghneq	pikaaguq,	“Kiyaghtaallghen	itagnaghllequq,	taaklukullu	kiyaghllequten	nunami.”
B10_06_Ephesians_V4	Angayuqani,	sakritestegpenaki	taghnughhasi.	Yeghlegi	anglisteki	peghqigsaghlukillu	apeghtughaghlukillu	Atanghem	pisqellghatun.
B10_06_Ephesians_V5	Qepghaghtelaaghni,	alingellelighlusillu	ungelegllelighlusillu	qaatkiteki	piliitistesi	nunami	whani.	Ipapighqellusi	qepghaataqiteki,	katam	Christ-a	qepghaatelleghpesistun.
B10_06_Ephesians_V6	Piliitistesi	qaatkiteki	qaywa	esghapanghiteghngiisi.	Qepghaghtek	efqughhnaluki	piliitistesi	katam	efqughtelleghpesistun	Ataneq.	Ilugpesineng	atuqiteggu	Kiyaghneghem	piyukellgha	Christ-amun	qepghaghtelaaqelghiistun.
B10_06_Ephesians_V7	Enkaam	qepghaghtek	sagiqlusi	Ataneghmun	pilghiistun,	nakaan	yugnun.
B10_06_Ephesians_V8	Neqamikluku	Atanghem	akileghtughyaghqaqii	yuget	qamaglluki,	pinitun	pillghitnun.	Ataneq	tawaten	pillequq	qepghaghtelaaghnunllu	qepghaghtelaaghunghilngughnunllu.
B10_06_Ephesians_V9	Piliitisteni,	pinitun	piteki	qepghaghtelaasi	katam	ungipaatellemtun	ellngit	pinitun	pisqellusi.	Alingsequgpenaki.	Neqamikluku	elpesillu	qepghaghtelaasillu	ataasimeng	Atanelguusi	qilagmelngughmeng.	Ellngan	nanqigsaghqaqii	yuget	qamaglluki	taniillngunaki.
B10_06_Ephesians_V10	Kinguliq	apeghyaghqaqa	unanguuq,	iknaqellengitek	Ataneghmeng,	aghtughyaghqaanghilleghllaganengllu.
B10_06_Ephesians_V11	Aatekek	iingunaagkenka	akulghaaghek	Kiyaghneghem	yataaghqegkakek	elpesinun.	Taagken	tengvimun	nekevghasaghqaaghlleqasi	Tughneghaam	puughtillghi.
B10_06_Ephesians_V12	Neqamikluku,	pilluwaangunghitaput	yuget.	Itupill	pilluwaangwaaput	igleghutilghiit,	aghtughyaghqaanghillelget,	igleghutilghiit	nunam	mamleganeng,	seghleghetlu	tughneghaat	qilaganilnguut.
B10_06_Ephesians_V13	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	aatekek	iingunaagkenka	akulghaaghqek	Kiyaghneghem	yataaghqegkakek	elpesinun!	Enkaam	seghleliighem	aghneghani	pilluwaghyaqlegulleqasi	anguyagem	sughugallghi.	Taagken	pilluwaneghmeng	apeghiiqufsi,	elpesi	paninang	nekevghangullequsi.
B10_06_Ephesians_V14	Enkaam	nekevghamanginaghtek.	Ipapilleq	tafsiiteggu,	elqughutngalleqlu	sakimagiitiiteggu.
B10_06_Ephesians_V15	Pinilghiit	Ungipat	nekeggmelleghmeng	ayuqelghiit,	kamiiteki.
B10_06_Ephesians_V16	Tamaakut	saaghwitgun,	atuqiteggu	ugpeqilleq	amiigighaghtaasiiluku	qaamsaghqaaluki	kumangalghiit	aaygungi	Tughnegham.
B10_06_Ephesians_V17	Aateggu	yugulilleq	naasqughiitaaluku,	Taghneghamllu	savigpaga,	Kiyaghneghem	akuzitkaa.
B10_06_Ephesians_V18	Iiwleng	yughaghtek	Taghnegham	maghyaghquutellghakun.	Atuqluki	allaaghhiinaat	yughallghet,	aapniighteklu	Kiyaghneghmun.	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	kelengalusi,	iilqayugpenasi.	Iiwleng	yughaatkelluki	qamaglluki	Kiyaghneghem	yugi.
B10_06_Ephesians_V19	Whangallu	yughaatkitengnga	Kiyaghneghmun	akuzitelitesqellunga.	Taagken	tetugpenanga	apeghlleqaqa	sangwaa	Kiyaghneghem	salin	liigikestellghilkanga	Pinilghiineng	Ungipaneng	ayuqelghii.
B10_06_Ephesians_V20	Kiyaghneghem	nakmikegkaqaanga	akuzistengulunga	ellminun.	Enkaam	tamaaken	apalluqluku	anusimingllaghaagunga	qiipraghusighlunga.	Yughaghtek	ungipaqinalunga	tetugpenanga	katam	Kiyaghneghem	piyukellghatun.
B10_06_Ephesians_V21	Liisimakesugamsi	natetulemnengllu	saaqutemnengllu.	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	kayagsimaaqa	Tychicus	elpesinun.	Piniqegkaghput	ugpeqaalgutfut,	ataasiighmelnguuguqlu	qepghaghtenga	Atanghem.	Kaaskumi	ungipaalleqiisi	sameng	tamaghhaaneng	whangamneng,	kayemelleqiisillu.
B10_06_Ephesians_V23	Kiyaghneghmeng	Atameng,	Ataneghmengllu	Jesus	Christ-ameng	elpesinun	pinguuk	nekeggmelleqlu,	piniqelleqlu	ugpeqillelek.
B10_06_Ephesians_V24	Nangllegtalleq	tamaghhaghpesinun	pinguuq	piniqilghiini	Atanemnneng	Jesus	Christ-ameng	piniqellelighluku	naangyaghqaanghilngughmeng.
B11_01_Philippians_V1	Ukut	latat	Paul-mengllu	Timothy-mengllu	pinguut,	qepghaghtekiinkung	Christ	Jesus-em.	Lataaqamsi	qamagllusi	Kiyaghneghem	yugitni,	yughaghvigem	igleghutistengitni,	deacon-enillu	Philippi-melngughni,	ugpeqilghiit	Christ	Jesus-kun.
B11_01_Philippians_V2	Kiyaghneghem	Atamta,	Atanemtallu	Jesus	Christ-am	nanglleklisillu	nekeggmellelguslisillu.
B11_01_Philippians_V3	Iyamsiqayugvikaqaqa	Kiyaghneqa	elpesineng	sumeghtaghaatkennemsi.
B11_01_Philippians_V4	Yughaatkennemsi	quyapigtaqunga,
B11_01_Philippians_V5	qayughllak	neqamikaqa	ungipaqilgusiqaqaghpesinga	Pinilghiineng	Ungipaneng.	Kayusiqaqaghpesinga	ugpeqiyuggaalleghpesineng	Pinilghiineng	Ungipaneng	whavemun	kenlanga.
B11_01_Philippians_V6	Liisimakngwaaghaqa	Kiyaghneq	piinlighikaq	pinilghiimeng	qepghaqameng	ilugpesini,	ellngan	apeghiighlleqaa	Christ	Jesus	uteghniqan.
B11_01_Philippians_V7	Itagnapigtuq	whangamni	sumeghtaghaatkennemsi	tawaten	qayughllak	ilumnitaqusi.	Ungipaqingulungallu	ipapighqingulungallu	Pinilghiit	Ungipat	ipanguniluki,	maatenllu	anusimingllaghvigmellunga,	qamagllusi	allgeghtengngwaaghsi	Kiyaghneghem	nangllegtallgha	whangamnun	maligullusi.
B11_01_Philippians_V8	Kiyaghneq	liisimakistekaqa	esghaghyupigtaqamsi,	qayughllak	qamagllusi	piniqamsi	Christ	Jesus-em	piniqellghatun	elpesi.
B11_01_Philippians_V9	Yughaatkaqamsi	piniqighllagesqellusi,	liisimallengataghiisqellusi,	liigikellengataghiisqellusillu.
B11_01_Philippians_V10	Tawaten	lliiqufsi	kiyaghtelleghpesini	sangwaa	pinilleghpigaq	nakmikumanginaghyagulleqaghsi.	Taagken	Christ-a	taginqigtekan	pelungillequsillu	anaggutellghillequsillu.
B11_01_Philippians_V11	Enkaam	unguvallesi	imighllequt	ipapestaaq	piniipiglleghhiimeng	Jesus	Christ-anginaghhaam	piitestekaaneng.	Taagken	yuget	quulvaghlleqaatlu,	usuqelleqaatlu	Kiyaghneq.
B11_01_Philippians_V12	Ugpeqaalgutemni,	elpesinun	liisimakesugaqa	anusimingllaghvigmetelleghma	ipapestaaq	uglalghii	yuuk	nagatestaa	Pinilghiineng	Ungipaneng.
B11_01_Philippians_V13	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	qamaglluteng	umiilgem	mangteghaan	kelengakistengita	liitaat	anusimingllaghaagunga	qayughllak	qepghaghtekegkanganga	Christ-am.
B11_01_Philippians_V14	Anusimingllaghvigmetelleghma	allulluteng	ugpeqalghutet	ugpeqiighataghaghtestii	Ataneghqun.	Enkaam	wata	tetugnanighataghaghtut	ungipaqneghmegteggu	Christ-a.
B11_01_Philippians_V15	Ipanguuq	ilangi	ungipaqinguut	Christ-ameng	qayughllak	aqinakngukangatngallu	aaghtiiraaghukangatngallu.	Iwernga	ilangi	ungipaqinguut	Christ-ameng	elqughulluteng.
B11_01_Philippians_V16	Ungipaqinguut	qayughllak	piniqegkangatnga.	Liisimakegkangat	Kiyaghneghem	tagistekaqaanga	whavek	nekevghatesqelluki	Pinilghiit	Ungipat	anguyamnneng.
B11_01_Philippians_V17	Iwernga	ilangit	ungipaqinguut	Christ-ameng	ellnginaayugtem,	ipapighqegpenateng.	Sumeghmeggni	tawaten	pilleghmegteggun	seghleliighqataghaghnilunga	piitnga	anusimingllaghvigmesimalunga.
B11_01_Philippians_V18	Itagnaghtuq,	ungipaqillghat	elqughutngayaghngaan	nalighmeng	sameng	allaneng	apallulguyaghngaan,	ungipaqillghita	quyastaqaanga,	qayughllak	ungipaqinguut	Christ-ameng	uglapiglleghiinun.
B11_01_Philippians_V19	Aa-a	quyangallequnga,	qayughllak	liisimakaqa	aanyaghqaagunga	anusimingllaghvigmeng	yughaatkelleghpesigun,	kayusillghakunllu	Jesus	Christ-am	Taghneghaan.
B11_01_Philippians_V20	Piyukelleghllakallu,	sighimakelleghllakallu	esgha	taana,	kayngusaghaatefqaama	pinalunga	Christ-amun.	Itupill	kiyaghsugaqunga	ilutulunga	wataqaaghaq	maaten	anusimingllaghvigmetellemni.	Enkaam	Christ-a	quulvallengellequq	unguvaghngaaghma,	nalighmeng	tuquyaghngaaghma.
B11_01_Philippians_V21	Whangamni	unguvalleq	Christ-anguuq,	enkaam	tuqulleq	allgeghutaghallghuuq.
B11_01_Philippians_V22	Iwernga	unguvanaqngukuma	qepghaghataghaghllequnga	Christ-amun.	Nalikek	nakmikelleghqaqa	nallukaqa,	unguvalleq	nalighmeng	tuqulleq.
B11_01_Philippians_V23	Kukriqnguunga	naligkeneng	nakmiilleghqamneng.	Aghulaqsupigtaqsaghtunga	Christ-amennalunga,	qayughllak	pinighataghaghyaghqaaguq	taana.
B11_01_Philippians_V24	Iwernga	megnunaghataghaghtuq	elpesi	apalluqlusi	unguvanguunga.
B11_01_Philippians_V25	Ipapighqutkumaaqa	taana,	liisimakaqa	wiin	unguvanaqnguunga.	Elpesininnaqnguunga	kayusiinnalusi	nagusqellusi,	quyamallengesqellusi	ugpelleghpesigun.
B11_01_Philippians_V26	Elpesinun	pikuma,	usuqataghaghlleqaghsi	Christ	Jesus	whanga	apalluqlunga.
B11_01_Philippians_V27	Sayaghngaatnga	nagneghuteki	kiyaghtaallesi	Christ-am	apeghtullghatun	Pinilghiitgun	Ungipatgun.	Enkaam	esghaghyaghtuqumsi,	nalighmeng	aviiteghngaaghma	nagaququmsi,	liigikelleqaqa	ataasistun	pilleghsi.	Liigikelleqaqallu	qerngaghpesi	nekevghannaqutkellesi	Pinilghiit	Ungipat	anguyagpesineng.
B11_01_Philippians_V28	Alikegpenaki	anguyasi,	quunpeng	ilutullusi.	Enkaam	tawaten	pilleghpesi	ipapighqelleqaat	ellngit	kayaalqiinaanghitut.	Elpesi	kayaalqiillequsi	qayughllak	Kiyaghneghuuq	kayaalqiistilghii	elpesineng.
B11_01_Philippians_V29	Elpesinun	qepghaasaqlegughtestekaqaa	Christ-a,	ugpeqnginaghpenaan,	ikfiqelgusiqesillu.
B11_01_Philippians_V30	Pilluwalgusightengnga.	Sivunghani	esghapakaqaghpesinga	piyaqliilghiinga,	nagaquqaqasillu	piyaqliillghenka	maaten.	Elpesillu	tamaakut	ataasit	piyaqliighutkennaqngwaasi.
B11_02_Philippians_V1	Kiyaghtaalleghpesi	Christ-akun	iknaqughtisii?	Piniqellghan	ilutughtisii?	Quyaaqetsii	ataasistun	lliilghiisi	ugpeqaalgutkullghiini	Agleghnalghiignekun	Taghneghagnekun?	Pinitun	piiqestekii,	nangllekaqestekii	ilasi?
B11_02_Philippians_V2	Tawatetngukufsi,	quyamasteghllagtengnga	piniqutelleghpesigun,	ataasistun	sumeghtaghalleghpesigun,	ataasistun	pilleghpesigun.
B11_02_Philippians_V3	Ellnginaayugneghugpenasi,	aangaayugneghugpenasi.	Yeghlegi	qusevgutullusi,	ilagpesineng	pinighataghaghnilusi	sumeghtaghaghpenasi.
B11_02_Philippians_V4	Suumqegpenaki	piyukellghiinasi,	yeghlegi	piyukellesi	pakikaghluki	kayusiitaqluki	ilasi.
B11_02_Philippians_V5	Sumeghnesi	Christ	Jesus-em	sumeghneghatun	ayuqlit.
B11_02_Philippians_V6	Jesus	Kiyaghneghtun	ayuqsaghngaaghmi	sumeghtaghaamangituq	Kiyaghneq	ingluksaghqaaluku.
B11_02_Philippians_V7	Yeghlegi	Kiyaghneghulleni	pakigluku,	qepghaghtestun	lliiqaaguq.	Yugestun	lliiqaaguq,	allgeqaaguqlu	yugestun.
B11_02_Philippians_V8	Yugughsami	qusevegtekaaguq	enkaam	qaatkutkaaguq	tuqulleghmun,	talwa	tuqukaaguq	qaquurakun.
B11_02_Philippians_V9	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	Kiyaghneghem	nekegtekaqaa	Jesus	aangelleghpigaaluku,	atiqaqaallu	Ataneghmeng	aangelleghpigaghmeng	ateghyaggaghneng.
B11_02_Philippians_V10	Enkaangam	qamagtengngwaaghluni	qilagmelnguum,	nunamelnguum,	nunam	asinganilnguum	quulvaghlleqaat	Jesus	qungughquutelleghmegteggunllu	apelleghmegteggunllu,	“Jesus	Christ-a	Atanghuuq.”	Tawaten	pilleghmegteggun	quulvaghlleqaat	Kiyaghneq	Ata.
B11_02_Philippians_V12	Enkaangam	piniqegkamni,	elpesinillunga	qaatkumanginaqaqaghpesinga,	maaten	aviillemni	qaatkataghaghtengnga.	Iighwightesqelluku	yugulilleghsi	qepghaamanginaghtek	alingellelighlusillu	ungelegtellelighlusillu;
B11_02_Philippians_V13	qayughllak	Kiyaghneq	quunpeng	qepghaaguq	elpesini	atuqsagutesqelluku	piyukelleni,	qaatkusagutesqellusillu	piyukelleghminun.
B11_02_Philippians_V14	Sangwaa	tamaghhaan	piiqiteggu	akuzilgafqaafsi,	nalighmeng	aaghtiiraaghutefqaafsi.
B11_02_Philippians_V15	Enkaam	avutngillequsillu	pelungillequsillu.	Kiyaghneghem	avaqutii	avutngisaghqaagut	kiyaghtengnguluteng	akulngitni	puughtinghetlu	seghleghqestetlu.	Kuukgutepestaaghyaghqaagusi	ighaleqetaaghestun	nunami,
B11_02_Philippians_V16	ungipaqingulusi	ellngitnun	Christ-ameng	unguvallengestikayugmeng.	Enkaam	taginqigtekan	quyasleqaghpesinga	elngaatall,	qayughllak	kiyaghtaalleghpesi	kelgusaghqaqaa	qepghalqa	temngingunghilnguq.
B11_02_Philippians_V17	Ugpeqilleghsillu	qepghalleghsillu	Kiyaghneghmun	aghqutestun	ayuqut.	Tuquskangatnga	whani	anusimingllaghvigmi	quyallequnga,	qayughllak	tuqulqa	aghqutestun	ayuqsaghqaaguq	tuunelghii	elpesi	aghqutegpesinun	iighwiisiiluni.	Taam	qamaglluta	quyasleqiinkut.
B11_02_Philippians_V18	Tawateghpigaq	elpesillu	quyayaghqaagusi,	quyalgusighllagyaghqaqaghpesinga.
B11_02_Philippians_V19	Atanghem	piyukelqegkagu,	Timothy	kayagsaghtungestaghaqa	elpesinun.	Enkaam	quyallequnga	ungipangegkuma	elpesineng.
B11_02_Philippians_V20	Timothy-nginaghhaam	sumeghtaghaatkaqiisi	sumeghtaghaatkellemtun.
B11_02_Philippians_V21	Tamaakut	ilangi	kiyang	ellmeggneng	katam	sumeghtaghaatkaqut	Jesus	Christ-am	qepghaqaa	avelghaghluku.
B11_02_Philippians_V22	Iwernga	Timothy	liisimakngwaaghaghsi	natetulanga.	Ighneghestun	kayuusiitkaqaanga	ungipaqingulunga	Pinilghiineng	Ungipaneng.
B11_02_Philippians_V23	Liigikaghesnaqumkun	aanesaghqaatka	anusimingllaghvigmeng	kayaglleqaqa	elpesinun.
B11_02_Philippians_V24	Neghyukaqa	Ataneq	whangallu	elpesinun	piyaghtungestaghtunga.
B11_02_Philippians_V25	Sumeghtaghaatkaqaqa	ugpeqaalgutfut	Epaphroditus	elpesinun	uteghnightesnaluku.	Kayutkaghqaghyugumalunga	tagistekaqegkesi	kayusiitesqellunga.	Qerngaamtung	qepghaqaagukungllu	ungipaqikaagukungllu	Pinilghiineng	Ungipaneng.	Nekevghatkaqapungllu	Pinilghiit	Ungipat	kipullginaalghiineng.
B11_02_Philippians_V26	Aglaghtesnaqaqa	elpesinun	qayughllak	aghyuqnguuq.	Peng'gaqiisi	qayughllak	nagaquqaqegkesi	qinuyullghaneng.
B11_02_Philippians_V27	Ipanguuq	qinuyugllakaaguq	repall	tuquvziqaaguq.	Iwernga	Kiyaghneghem	nangllegyagutkaqaa,	whangallu	nangllegyagutkaqaanga.	Tuqumayaqan	wataqaaghaq	qivghullengataghaghnayaghtunga.
B11_02_Philippians_V28	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	wataqaaghaq	aglaghtesugaqa	elpesinun.	Kaaskan	esghaqufsigu	quyallequsi,	enkaangam	itagnaghillequnga	whangallu.
B11_02_Philippians_V29	Epaphroditus	tuquyaghngaaghmi	qepghaqaaguq	Christ-amun,	aaqun	tuquvziqaaguq.	Kayusiitkaqaanga	qayughllak	elpesi	kayusiitepagningitkaqaghpesinga,	aviilnguusi.	Quyakusiqluku	upughannakesi	qayughllak	anglegutkaghsi	Ataneghqun.	Enkaam	quulvaghluki	qamaglluki	yuget	Epaphroditus-etun	ayuqelghiit.
B11_03_Philippians_V1	Ugpeqaalgutemni,	naangniitkun	ungipaasuwamsi,	“Quyamaaqitek	Ataneghqun!”	Qinuyagusigatunga	ungipaanneqiggnemsi	latatgun	igaqegkamneng	sivunghani,	enkaam	ilallequq	paqniitelleghpesinun.
B11_03_Philippians_V2	Kelengalusi	seghletun	pikayugneng,	tamaakuneng	qikmineng,	yuguut	sagiqutilghiit	kepfikesqelluki	yugusit.
B11_03_Philippians_V3	Whangkutanguukut	ugpeqani	circumcise-epiiwaaqani	qayughllak	manigughaqaghput	Kiyaghneq	Taghneghagkenkun,	usuqaqaghputlu	Christ	Jesus.	Neghyungigatukutlu	Kiyaghneghmun	piliitesqelluta	whangkuta	katam	sallemteggun.
B11_03_Philippians_V4	Kina	alngunak	Kiyaghneghem	piliisaghqaqsaqagu	ellngan	katam	sallghakun,	whanga	piyaghqaayaghtunga.	Yuget	tawaten	piyaghqaayaqata	whanga	wataqaaghaq	pinayaghtunga	ukut	apalluqluki:
B11_03_Philippians_V5	Circumcise-ekaqaatnga	pingayuneng	inglulek	aghneq	atughyamkun	kingunganeng	allgelleghma.	Israel-eghmiineng	pinguunga,	ramkenganeng	Benjamin-em.	Hebrew-piiguunga,	angayuqagkallu	Hebrew-nguuk.	Malighqutaqngaghllagtunga	Jewish-et	Liilightuusiitnun,	tamaaken	apalluqluku	Pharisee-ngughtunga.
B11_03_Philippians_V6	Sagiqepigllunga	amyuqetaatkegkaqanka	ugpeqat.	Qaatkengngwaaqaqanka	Jews-et	Liilightuusiit	repall	anaggutelleghmun	avutngitkaagunga.
B11_03_Philippians_V7	Iwernga	tamaakut	allgeghtekaqnikaqsaqenka	iflamaanka	apalluqluku	Christ-a.
B11_03_Philippians_V8	Ipa	sangwaat	qamaglluki	iflamaanka	apalluqluku	megnunaghtulnga	liitngwaallemneng	Christ	Jesus,	Atanqa.	Ellnga	apalluqluku	sangwaat	qamaglluki	egsimaanka.	Esghaghanka	mallastun	ayuqluki	allgeghteqeghnaluku	Christ-a,
B11_03_Philippians_V9	ilatngwaaghtungallu	ellnganun.	Ugpeqnaniimaaqa	whangamneng	pinighnaqelleq	qaatkutellemkun	Kiyaghneghem	Liilightuusaanun.	Yeghlegi	liisimakaqa	Kiyaghneghem	pinightestaqaanga	qayughllak	ugpeqegkegka	Christ-a.	Una	pinilleq	Kiyaghneghmeng	ayuquq,	yuget	allgeghtaqaat	ugpeqilleghmegteggun	Christ-ameng.
B11_03_Philippians_V10	Piyukelleghllakaqa,	liinnaluku	Christ-a,	nanghiighnalukullu	aghtughyaghqaanghillgha	unguvaghtellghan;	ilannalungallu	ikfiqellghanun,	ellngatunllu	lliighyaghqaalunga	tuqullghani.
B11_03_Philippians_V11	Tawaten	pikuma,	Kiyaghneq	sighimakaqa	whangallu	unguvaghtesqellunga	tuqulleghmeng.
B11_03_Philippians_V12	Whaten	pingunghitunga,	“Christ-atun	lliighumaanga	nalighmeng	Christ-atun	kiyaghtaqunga	quunpeng.”	Iwernga	pinaqellghaqa	qamaglluku	atuqngwaaqa	Christ-am	piyukellghatun	lliighnalunga	atuqnalukullu	pisqesullgha	whangamnun.
B11_03_Philippians_V13	Ugpeqaalgutemni,	sumeghtaghiigatunga	kayaalqelghagtuumaniluku.	Iwernga	ataasiq	piiqaqa,	puyguluku	sangwaa	tunutemnilnguq	sivutmiighnaqutkaqunga	kaannaluku	sangwaa	sivumnilnguq.
B11_03_Philippians_V14	Enkaam	taklaghruketun	kilgaaqunguunga	kayaalqiisiqnaluku	akileghtuusaq,	Kiyaghneghem	tuqluutkaanun	pamavek	Christ	Jesus-kun.
B11_03_Philippians_V15	Tawaten	sumeghtaghanghilkufsi,	Kiyaghneghem	liigikesnaaghii	sumeghtaghallesi	anaggutngalghiit.
B11_03_Philippians_V16	Una	megnunapigtuq,	nagneghutelteki	kiyaghtaalleput	maliglluku	ipapighqelleq	liitkaghput.
B11_03_Philippians_V17	Ugpeqaalgutemni,	usputaqlunga	maligtengnga.	Esghapagluki	ilangillu	kiyaghlleghhiit	whangamtun.
B11_03_Philippians_V18	Sivunghani	uglaghngaan	ungipaataataqaqamsi,	maaten	ungipaannaqlaataghamsi	qunituumaghma.	Uglaapigtut	kiyaghlleghhiit	anguyaguluteng	Christ-am	tuqullghaneng	qaquurakun.
B11_03_Philippians_V19	Suumqaqiit	yugusimeng	piyukellghit	kiyang,	Kiyaghneq	avelghaghluku.	Kaynguyugusighqaqsaqeteng	aangaayugusiqaqiit.	Sumeghtaghaatkaqaat	nunamelngughhiinaq	kiyaghtaalleghteng	enkaam	naafqellengyaghqaagut	hell-mi.
B11_03_Philippians_V20	Iwernga	ugpeqani	whangkuta	qilagmiinguukut.	Enkaam	utaqangwaaghput	yugulighista,	Ataneq	Jesus	Christ-a,	ukigyaghqaq	whangkunnun	qilagmeng	pamaken.
B11_03_Philippians_V21	Tagikumi	allangughsaghqaqii	kayaalnguut,	tuqumun	ayuqelghiit	yugusiput.	Unguvaghtekatun	yugusimitun	lliighsaghqaqii	aghtughyaghqaanghilleghmikun.	Taaggun	ataasikun	aghtughyaghqaanghilleghqun	igleghusaghqaaghlleqaa	sangwaa	qamagtengngwaaghluku.
B11_04_Philippians_V1	Enkaangam	piniqegkamni	ugpeqaalgutemni,	esghaghyupigtamsi,	quyamasiqamsi,	akileghtuusaqamsillu	qepghallemnun.	Tawaten	aghuliitekestaghtek	Ataneghqun.
B11_04_Philippians_V2	Euodia,	Syntyche,	qevuullunga	qeleghnaqamtek,	taaqitek	aghivanneghmeng.	Ataasistun	lliightek,	qayughllak	ugpeqaalgutkututek	Ataneghqun.
B11_04_Philippians_V3	Qepghalgutemni	Syzygus,	elpeklu	kayuusiitaghtikek	aghnak	taakuk	taaqesqellukek	aghivanneghmeng.	Elkegkenka	qevuullutek	qepghalgusiqaqiinkut	Clement-lu	ilangillu	qepghalgutenka,	qamaglluta	ungipaqinguluta	Pinilghiineng	Ungipaneng	yulghuteghllagnun.	Qepghalgutma	qamaglluteng	aatghit	igaqngaat	Igaakun	Unguvallghem.	Tawantut	igani	aatghit	qamaglluteng	kenlengilngughmeng	unguvallengegkat.
B11_04_Philippians_V4	Iiwleng	quyamaaqitek	Ataneghqun.	Pinaqlaataghamsi,	Quyamaaqitek!
B11_04_Philippians_V5	Nuqenneghtulleghsi	yugem	qamaglluni	liilligu.	Ataneq	tagiyaghtungestaghtuq.
B11_04_Philippians_V6	Sumeghyalitkegpenaan	sangwaa	alngunak.	Yeghlegi,	sameng	aklukufsi	yughaneghpesini	tungsighaqitek	Kiyaghneghmun	tuunesqellusi.	Iiwleng	tungsighaqitek	igamsiqayullelighlusi.
B11_04_Philippians_V7	Enkaam	Kiyaghneghem	ilusillu	umyugasillu	nekeggmetesnaaghii	Christ	Jesus-kun.	Kiyaghneghem	nekeggmellgha	aangeghllagtuq,	kitum	alngunak	liigikngwaaghnaanghitaa.
B11_04_Philippians_V8	Enkaangam	ugpeqaalgutemni,	naangniitangakun	latama	ungipaasuwamsi	sumeghtaghaatkumanginiisqelluki	pinilghiitlu	usuqsaghqatlu	whatelnguut:	tamaakut	ipapiget,	quulvaghyaghqat,	elqughutngalghiit,	pelungilnguut,	piniqsaghqat,	tamaakutlu	pinitun	akuzitkesaghqat.
B11_04_Philippians_V9	Sangwaa	qamaglluku	nagneghuteggu	liitkaghsi	whangamneng	apeghtughillemkunllu	kiyaghtaallemkunllu.	Enkaam	Kiyaghneq	nekeggmellelitikayuk	elpesinillequq.
B11_04_Philippians_V10	Elngaatall	quyapigtunga	Ataneghqun	qayughllak	qavngarugllaggaaneng	whaa	allameng	kayusiillaataqefsinga!	Liisimakaqa	kayusiisukaqaghpesinga,	iwernga	pipagningitkaagusi.
B11_04_Philippians_V11	Aklungunilunga	pingunghitunga	qayughllak	natesaghngaaghma	itagnaghaqunga.
B11_04_Philippians_V12	Ilangani	nuughngaghma	kiyaghtaqunga,	ilangani	siiptiilunga	kiyaghtaqunga.	Itagnaghyagusimaanga	nani	alngunak	satulemtun	kiyaghhnemni.	Itagnaghaqunga	kepsughngaghma	kiyaghhnemni,	iyataghngaaghmallu	kiyaghhnemni,	talwa	aklumaghngaaghmallu,	aklunghiteghngaaghmallu.
B11_04_Philippians_V13	Sangwaa	alngunak	piyaghqaqaqa	Christ-akun	iknaqughsaghtemkun.
B11_04_Philippians_V14	Paninang	elpesi	pinitungwaaq	kayusiitaqaghpesinga	seghleliinemni.
B11_04_Philippians_V15	Elpesi	Philippi-yeghmiini,	liisimakngwaaghaghsi	aghulaqaqngama	Macedonia-meng,	ungipaqiyuwhaaghaqngama	Pinilghiineng	Ungipaneng,	ellnginaagusi	ugpeqani	kayusighikat	whangameng.	Ellnginaagusi	ilatngalghiit	allgeghutellemnunllu	ifliillemnunllu.
B11_04_Philippians_V16	Ataasighhaagpenaan	aklupignemni	manimeng	Thessalonica-mellunga,	tuyughaqaghpesinga.
B11_04_Philippians_V17	Iwernga	liigikesugamsi	tunusasi	manit	megnunalleghpigaanghitut	whangamni.	Megnunalleghpigaqta	esgha	una:	akileghtuusaghqaq	allgeghsaghqaghsi	Kiyaghneghmeng	pinitun	pillesi	apalluqluki.
B11_04_Philippians_V18	Whaa	maaten	naamaanga,	aa-a,	talwa	siiptiilunga	ayuqunga.	Tuyuusasi	Epaphroditus-kun	qamaglluteng	kaasimaat,	enkaam	whaa	aklungigatunga.	Tunusasi	whangamnun	aghqutkegkastun	ayuqut	Kiyaghneghmi	efqughtinapiglleghhiit.
B11_04_Philippians_V19	Enkaangam	Kiyaghneghma	yataaghqunnaaghiisi	sameng	tamaghhaaneng	aklukegkaghpesineng	aklungitelleghllagmikun	Christ	Jesus-kun.
B11_04_Philippians_V20	Kiyaghnemnnun,	Atamun	usuqilta,	quunperugllak	kenlengunaan.	Amen.
B11_04_Philippians_V21	Ungipaataghnakesi	qamaglluki	ugpeqat	Christ	Jesus-kun	suumqaqankanguq.	Ugpeqaalgutet	whangamnilnguut	suumqaqiisinguq.
B11_04_Philippians_V22	Qamaglluteng	Kiyaghneghem	yugan	suumqaqiisinguq,	kiyang	taakut	Caesar-em	mangteghaghmiingita.
B11_04_Philippians_V23	Nangllegtallgha	Jesus	Christ-am	taghneghaghpesinilli.
B12_01_Colossians_V1	Ukut	latat	Paul-meng	pinguut.	Kiyaghneghem	piyukellghakun	apostle-ngughtekaagunga	Christ	Jesus-mun.	Timothy-mengllu	pinguut	ugpeqaalgutemnneng.
B12_01_Colossians_V2	Kiyaghneghem	yugitnun	pinguut	Colossae-melngughnun,	ataasiighmelnguut	ugpeqaalgutet	Christ-akun.	Kiyaghneghem	Atamta,	nanglleklisillu	nekeggmellelisillillu.
B12_01_Colossians_V3	Iiwleng	iyamsiqayugvikaqaghput	Kiyaghneq,	Atanga	Atanemta	Jesus	Christ-am,	yughaatkennemsi.
B12_01_Colossians_V4	Tawaten	piiqukut	qayughllak	nagaquumaaghput	ugpeqilleghsi	Christ	Jesus-meng,	piniqilleghsillu	tamaghhiitnun	Kiyaghneghem	yugitnun.
B12_01_Colossians_V5	Pinilghiit	Ungipat	ungipapiguut.	Nagaqughyuwhaaghaqngafsiki,	liitkaagusi	sighimalleghmeng	Kiyaghneghem	tuunegkaaneng	elpesinun.	Enkaam	sighmalleghpesi	ugpeqillelgustaqiisillu	piniqillelgustaqiisillu.	Qilagmi	Kiyaghneghem	kagpagumaa	elpesinun	sangwaa	sighimakegkaghsi.
B12_01_Colossians_V6	Pinilghiit	Ungipat	quyastimanginaagut	yugnun.	Enkaam	Pinilghiit	Ungipat	mingitnguut	iingunaghhaanun	nunam,	katam	tawaten	quyastillghistun	elpesinun	nagaqughyuwhaaghaqngafsigu	Kiyaghneghem	nangllegtallgha.	Taagken	kenlanga	liitaghsi	Kiyaghneghem	nangllegtallgha.
B12_01_Colossians_V7	Liitkaqaghsi	Kiyaghneghem	nanglleghtallgha	Epaphras-meng,	piniqegkamnneng	qepghalgutemnneng.	Ataasiighmelluni	qepghaaguq	Christ-amun,	qepghaqaqaa	whangkuta	qepghaghyukaqsaqefut.
B12_01_Colossians_V8	Ellngan	ungipaasimiinkut	piniqilleghmeng	Agleghnalghiim	Taghnegham	tuunegkaaneng	elpesinun.
B12_01_Colossians_V9	Aghneghmeng	taagken	nagaquutemnneng	tamaakut,	yughaatkennaniigatamsi.	Tungsiitngwaamsi	Kiyaghneghmun	liisimakesqelluku	qamaglluku	ellngan	piyukellgha.	Yughaatkaqamsillu	peghqinghusqellusi,	liigikesqellukillu	sangwaat	Agleghnalghiim	Taghnegham	apeghtuutkii.
B12_01_Colossians_V10	Taagken	kiyaghsaghqaaghllequsi	Atanghem	piyukellghatun,	iiwleng	atuqaqelleqaghsi	sangwaa	efqughnalghii	ellngani.	Tawaten	kiyaghtelleghpesini	allaaghhiinaq	pinilghii	qepghaghlleqaghsi	enkaam	wata	liilleqaghsi	Kiyaghneq.
B12_01_Colossians_V11	Yughaatkaqamsi	Kiyaghneghmun	iknaqughsiisqellusi	ilugpesigun	aghtughyaghqaanghilleghllagmikun.	Tawaten	piiquq	nuqenneghtughteghllagesqellusi	nekeggmellelighlusi	samun	tamaghhaanun.
B12_01_Colossians_V12	Enkaam	quyamallelighllaglusi	iyamsiqayugvikelleqaghsi	Ata.	Ellngangulghii	elpesinun	nengilgutestikaq	sameng	tamaghhaaneng	akequsaqegkamineng	tuunelleqniluki	yuni	kiyaghlleghhiit	nighugmi.
B12_01_Colossians_V13	Ellngan	yugulikaqiinkut	aghtughyaghqaanghillghaneng	mamlegem	enkaam	tagitkaqiinkut	Ataneghpagullghanun	piniqegkami	Ighneghmi.
B12_01_Colossians_V14	Ellngan	tukfiqaqiinkut,	seghevutkaqiillu	seghleghqelleput.
B12_01_Colossians_V15	Christ-a	tawatetngwaaghtuq	aliinneghilngughtun	Kiyaghneghtun.	Kiyaghtenguuq	sivungani	sangwaa	alngunak	ulimallghilluku,	enkaam	qulighpigaaguq	ulimaaghyaggaghneng.
B12_01_Colossians_V16	Ellngakun	Kiyaghneghem	ulimakaqii	sangwaat	qamaglluki	qilagmelnguutlu	nunamelnguutlu.	Ulimakaqii	esghaqayuput,	esghiigalkeputlu	tamaakutlu	umiilget,	atanghet,	igleghutistet,	pilleghqalgetlu.	Kiyaghneghem	ulimakaqii	sangwaat	qamaglluki	Christ-akun,	Christ-amunllu.
B12_01_Colossians_V17	Christ-a	tawantekaaguq	sivungitni	sangwaat	alngunak,	aghtughyaghqaanghillghakunllu	sangwaat	qamaglluki	ellngan	nekaghqaghlluwaaghitnitestaqii.
B12_01_Colossians_V18	Ellnga	naasquutinguuq	ugpeqanun	yughaghvigmelngughnun,	ellngan	yugusiqii.	Ellngan	yugusiq	unguvangustengngwaa.	Ellnganguuq	unguvaghyuwhaaqaq	tuqulleghmeng,	enkaam	qulighpigaaguq	samun	tamaghhaanun.
B12_01_Colossians_V19	Kiyaghneghem	piyukelqaa	qamagtengngwaaghluni	ellmi	katam	kiyaghhnaluni	Ighneghmi	ilungani.
B12_01_Colossians_V20	Kiyaghneghem	Ighneghmikun	veghutestekaqii	ellminun	sangwaat	qamaglluki	nunamillu	qilagmillu.	Enkaam	aawakun	Ighneghmi	tuqaaqngan	qaquurami	ilaliighutestekaqii	ellminun.
B12_01_Colossians_V21	Ataasimeng	pelleghngayaghtusi	Kiyaghneghmeng.	Enkaam	anguyaksaghiisi	sumeghtaghalleghpesigun,	seghletunllu	pilleghpesigun.
B12_01_Colossians_V22	Iwernga	Kiyaghneghem	ilaliighunneqigtestiisi	ellminun	Ighneghmi	yugusiin	tuqullghakun.	Tawaten	pikaaguq	taginnalusi	nayuutngalleghminun	agleghnaghlusi,	pelungillusi,	avutngillusillu.
B12_01_Colossians_V23	Kiyaghneq	tawaten	pillequq	nagnequfsi	ugpeqluki	Pinilghiit	Ungipat	aygughikellngunaki.	Iqitegpenasi	sighmalleghmeng	allgeghtekaghpesineng	nagaqughaqngafsiki	Pinilghiit	Ungipat.	Taakut	Pinilghiit	Ungipat	ungipaqnguut	tamaghhaani	nunam.	Kiyaghneghem	nakmikegkaqaanga,	whanga	Paul,	qepghaghtengulunga	ellminun	ungipaqesqelluki	Pinilghiit	Ungipat.
B12_01_Colossians_V24	Ikfiqelleghma	yugusimkun	elpesi	apalluqlusi	quyasteghllagaanga.	Tawaten	kayusighinguunga	apeghiighnaluki	Christ-am	ikfiqellghi	yugusiminun.	Ellngan	yugusii	ugpeqaagut	yughaghvigmelnguut.
B12_01_Colossians_V25	Kiyaghneghem	qepghaghtengllaqaqaanga	ugpeqanun.	Tagivaqaqaa	una	qepghaqaq	kayusiitesqellusi,	elpesinun	liigikngwaaghesqelluki	Kiyaghneghem	akuzitangi.
B12_01_Colossians_V26	Sivunghani	Kiyaghneghem	qayvighsimangitaa	una	ipapilleq	tamaghhaanun	yugnun,	iwernga	maaten	qayvightengngwaa	ellmi	yugminun.
B12_01_Colossians_V27	Kiyaghneghuuq	nakmiilghii	yugminun	liisimakesqelluku	sangwaa	qayvightellghilkenni	sivunghani.	Nakmikegkaqaa	liisimakesqelluku	aangelleghllaga	uum	ipapillghem	akulngitni	Gentile-et.	Ipapilleq	qayvightekaa	unanguuq:	Christ-a	kiyaghtengnguuq	ilugpesini.	Christ-anguuq	sighimavut	kiyaghtesqelluta	Kiyaghneghmi	ellngan	nighughqellghani.
B12_01_Colossians_V28	Enkaam	ungipaqngwaaghput	Christ-a	tamaghhaanun.	Qamaglluku	peghqinelleghqun,	kelengasaaghaqaputlu	apeghtughaqaputlu	qamaglluki	yuget.	Tawaten	piiqukut	taginnaluki	ataasikaghtiita	yuget	Kiyaghneghem	nayuutngallghanun	angtaniitkaaluki	Christ-akun.
B12_01_Colossians_V29	Taana	pinaluku	taakunginaghhaagneng	ughleghiightunga	atuqluku	Christ-am	aghtughyaghqaanghillgha	qepghalghii	iknaqepiglluni	ilumnni.
B12_02_Colossians_V1	Ungipaataghllamsi	taakunginaghhaagneng	qepghaatillemneng	elpesinun,	ugpeqanunllu	Laodicea-melngughnun,	tamaghhaanunllu	esghaasigalngughneng	whangamneng.
B12_02_Colossians_V2	Tawaten	piiqunga	ilungit	ilutughllengesqelluki,	ataasiightesqellukillu	piniqelleghqun.	Enkaam	liigikngwaaghlleqaat	sangwaa	Kiyaghneghem	qayvighsimangilkanga	sivunghani.	Taana	Kiyaghneghem	qayvightekaa	Christ-anguq.
B12_02_Colossians_V3	Qamaglluki	Kiyaghneghem	peghqinellghillu	liigikingallghillu	Christ-ametut.	Taakuk	aklungistun	ayuquk	iighngalghiik	Christ-ami.
B12_02_Colossians_V4	Ungipaatamsi,	kitumun	alngunak	puughtestegpenasi	temngineng	apeghtughallghitneng,	qaywa	ipasugniteghngaata.
B12_02_Colossians_V5	Qaywa	uyavansaghngaaghma	elpesineng,	umyugamkun	elpesinitaqunga.	Quyaanga	qayughllak	kiyaghlleghhiisi	Kiyaghneghem	pisqellghatun,	ugpeqilleghsillu	Christ-akun	aghuliilnguq.
B12_02_Colossians_V6	Tuguklilleghpesistun	Christ	Jesus	Atanghuluku,	tawateghpigaq	ugpeqilleghqun	kiyaghtek	ellngakun.
B12_02_Colossians_V7	Ellngakun	akulgutek	asivanun	samavek,	ellngakun	nekefteki	kiyaghtaallesi	enkaam	iknaqughtek	ugpeqilleghpesigun	apeghtulleghpesistun.	Iyamsiqayugumanginaghtek.
B12_02_Colossians_V8	Kelengalusi!	Kitumun	alngunak	aghulaqutestegpenasi	temngitwhatgun	apeghtughallghitgun.	Tamaakut	apeghtughallghet	yuget	sumeghtaghallghitneng	pinguut,	tughneghaghnengllu	pinguut,	igleghutilghiit	whani	nunami.	Christ-ameng	pingunghitut,
B12_02_Colossians_V9	qayughllak	qamagtengngwaaghluni	Kiyaghneq	kiyaghtengnguuq	Christ-am	yugusiini.
B12_02_Colossians_V10	Christ-a	naasquutinguuq	igleghutistenunllu	pilleghqalegnunllu.	Ilateslusi	Christ-amun	Kiyaghneghem	tuunegkaqiisi	unguvallepigmeng.
B12_02_Colossians_V11	Ilatngalleghpesigun	Christ-amun	circumcise-ekaagusi.	Circumcise-elleghsi	yuget	pistellghitaat,	iwernga	Christ-am	pistekaqaa.	Enkaam	itemutkaqiisi	aghtughyaghqaanghillghaneng	yugusighpesi	seghleghqengngalghiit	piyukellghitneng.
B12_02_Colossians_V12	Paaptaayaaqngafsi	qunguutkaagusi	Christ-akun.	Taagken	maketkaagusi	unguvalleghmun	Christ-akun	qayughllak	ugpeqegkesi	Kiyaghneghem	aghtughyaghqaanghillgha.	Kiyaghneghem	maketkaqaa	Christ-a	tuqumeng.
B12_02_Colossians_V13	Tuqukaagusi	qayughllak	seghleghqestenguyalghiisi,	qayughllaklu	circumcise-elghilnguusi	yugusighpesigun.	Iwernga	Kiyaghneghem	unguvaghtestekaqiisi	Christ-akun	qayughllak	seghevutkaqii	qamaglluki	seghleghqelleput.
B12_02_Colossians_V14	Qaatkenghitaqngamteki	Kiyaghneghem	Liilightuusi	seghleghqellghet	pikaput	igaqegkaagut.	Kiyaghneghem	iqitkaqii	igaquqat	seghleghqelleput	tuquqaalluki	Christ-am	qaquuraanun.
B12_02_Colossians_V15	Kiyaghneghem	wayaghteqaqii	guututangit	igleghutilghiitlu	aghtughyaghqaanghillelgetlu	tughneghaat.	Tawaten	tamanganun	esghaghtestekaa	kayaalqiilleni	tamaakuneng	tughneghaghneng.
B12_02_Colossians_V16	Kitumun	alngunak	nanqigtestegpenasi	neghelleghmengllu	meghelleghmengllu,	neqenghaghqellghet	aghneghitneng,	nutaghat	tanqit	aghneghitneng,	nalighmeng	Sabbath-et	aghneghitneng.
B12_02_Colossians_V17	Taakut	taghneghangullghiistun	ayuqut	taakunun	piyaghqanun	aga	sivumelngughnun.	Iwernga	tamaakut	ipapiget	Christ-ametut.
B12_02_Colossians_V18	Ilangi	yugem	qusevegngasugnighqesuneghtuut,	manigughaqiitlu	yaqulget.	Iiwleng	akuzitkaqiit	esghaghwaalleteng	esghaqateng.	Ellngitnun	ungipaatestegpenasi	anaggutnganilusi.	Ellngit	esleqngaat	temngitwhameng	qukaayuglleghmeng	qayughllak	sumeghneghit	yugem	sumeghneqii.
B12_02_Colossians_V19	Ellngit	ilannanightut	Christ-amun	naasquutilghiimeng	yugusimun.	Igleghutngwaa	iingunaan	yugusiq,	iknaqughsaghaqaallu	neghqaqluku.	Qerngaghmetestaqaa	yugusiq	atuqesluki	nafliillu	ivalungillu.	Enkaam	yugusiq	nagunguuq	Kiyaghneghem	nagustesqesullghatun.
B12_02_Colossians_V20	Christ-a	tuqaaqngan	tuqulgusiqallghuuqaqaghsi.	Enkaam	itemutkaagusi	tughneghaghneng	igleghutilghiineng	whani	nunami.	Sangan'ngam	kiyaghtaqetsi	nunamun	pikepiglleghhiistun?	Sangan	qaatkaqesteki	liilightughallghit	whatelnguut,
B12_02_Colossians_V21	“Saflegpenaan,	Naasiighpenaan,	Saaftegpenaan?”
B12_02_Colossians_V22	Taakut	liilightughallghet	yuget	neghegkiitnengllu	meghegkiitnengllu	ayuqut.	Enkaam	neghegkiitlu	meghegkiitlu	atuqsaghqaananighaqut.	Tamaakut	liilightughallghet	taawanginaghhaq	yuget	liilightughalqiitlu	apeghtuusaqiitlu.
B12_02_Colossians_V23	Tamaakut	liilightughallghet	apeghtughiit	yuget	peghqinesighwaaghesqelluki.	Apeghtughiitlu	amyuutkesqelluki	yugusiit,	atuqnaniisqelluki	yugusiita	pikyukellghit.	Iwernga	tawaten	pillghita	aghuliighsigatiit	atuqnanilleghqameng	tamaakut	seghleghqellghet.	Tamaakut	liilightughallghet	ipasugnitut	iwernga	temnginguut	apeghtuusat.
B12_03_Colossians_V1	Unguvaghtekaategpesineng	maligullusi	Christ-amun,	piyukaqiteki	sangwaat	Kiyaghneghem	elpesinun	pikesqelluki	qilagmelnguut.	Tawani	Christ-a	aqumgaaq	aghenqigneghakun	Kiyaghneghem.
B12_03_Colossians_V2	Suumqaqiteki	tamaakut	qilagmelnguut,	nakaan	tamaakut	nunamelnguut.
B12_03_Colossians_V3	Tawaten	sumeghtaghaghaqitek	qayughllak	tuqukaagusi.	Unguvalleghsi	iighngaaq	Christ-ami	Kiyaghneghqun.
B12_03_Colossians_V4	Christ-a	unguvalqaghput.	Aliiqan,	elpesillu	aliilgusighlleqaghsi	nighughqellghani.
B12_03_Colossians_V5	Taaqiteki	atuqneghmeng	yugusighpesi	seghleghet	piyukellghit,	katam	allaniiq,	ukmanginneghilnguq	kiyaghtaalleq,	atuqsullgha	seghleghem,	pakigniiqlu.	Pakigniiq	maniguullghiistun	kiyaghnengllaqanun	ayuquq.
B12_03_Colossians_V6	Tamaakut	apalluqluki	Kiyaghneghem	sakraalleghllaga	taginguuq	qaatkusigalngughnun	ellnganun.
B12_03_Colossians_V7	Sivunghani	tawaten	kiyaghtengnguyaghtusi.
B12_03_Colossians_V8	Iwernga	maaten	atuqnanighteki	qamaglluki	ukut:	sakraa,	sakraaghllak,	ugumikeraaq,	seghlequuq,	seghleghmengllu	akuzitkilleq.
B12_03_Colossians_V9	Iqlengiqutegpenasi	qayughllak	taaqumaaghsi	kiyaghtaallelugsi,	ayghiitkaqsaqesillu.
B12_03_Colossians_V10	Enkaam	kiyaghtaalleghraghaq	atuqaaghsimaaghsi.	Nutaghtengnguusi,	Ulimaghistegpesistunllu	lliighuusi.	Tamaaken	apalluquku	liigikekestaghaghsi	Kiyaghneq	kinaghpigaatanga.
B12_03_Colossians_V11	Kiyaghtaalleghraghaghmi,	allangughutngitut	akulngitni	Gentile-etlu	Jews-etlu,	akulngitni	circumcise-ekatlu	circumcise-ellghilnguutlu,	akulngitni	barbarian-etlu,	Scythian-etlu,	akulngitnillu	qepghaghtelaaghetlu,	qepghaghtelaaghunghilnguutlu.	Iwernga	Christ-a	qulighpigaaguq,	kiyaghtengnguuqlu	tamaghhamnni	ugpeqani.
B12_03_Colossians_V12	Kiyaghneghem	yukiisi	agleghnalghiit,	piniqepigtiisillu.	Nakmikegkaqiisi.	Enkaam	nangllegtaghlusi,	nangllekilusi,	qusevegllusi,	yakuqlusi,	nuqenneghtulusillu.
B12_03_Colossians_V13	Sakritutegpenasi	iwernga	seghevutullusi.	Kinkut	anagtekangisi	seghevunnakesi	katam	Atanghem	seghevutellghistun	elpesi.
B12_03_Colossians_V14	Qamaglluteng	tamaakut	megnunaghtut	iwernga	piniqelleq	megnunalleghpigaaguq.	Piniqutellghem	ataasiightengngwaaghiinkut.
B12_03_Colossians_V15	Tamaghhaghpesi	nalighneqiisi	Christ-am	yugusiin,	enkaam	nakmikegkaagusi	kiyaghtesqellusi	qerngaghpesi	nekeggmelleghqun.	Taana	apalluqluku	Christ-am	nekeggmellghan	igleghulliki	ilusi.	Iyamsiqayugngateklu.
B12_03_Colossians_V16	Yeqay	Christ-am	apeghtuusii	kemnaghluteng	kiyaghllit	ilugpesini.	Apeghtuututaqlusi,	kelengasaaghututaqlusillu	tamaghhaakun	peghqinelleghqun.	Ilagaghtek	Kiyaghneghmun	iyamsiqayullelighlusi	ilugpesigun,	ilagaghtek	psalms-neng,	ilagaatneng,	maniguutmunllu	ilagaatneng.
B12_03_Colossians_V17	Enkaam	sangwaa	pikaghsi,	akuzitkun	nalighmeng	qepghalleghqun	qamaglluku	piiqiteggu	aatghakun	Atanghem	Jesus-em.	Ellngakun	iyamsiqayugvikiteggu	Kiyaghneq	Ata.
B12_03_Colossians_V18	Nuliighni,	malighqutaqlusi	ugigpesinun	qayughllak	tawaten	Atanghem	pisqesuwiisi.
B12_03_Colossians_V19	Ugini,	piniqluki	nuliisi,	yakuqluki	piiqiteki.
B12_03_Colossians_V20	Taghnughhaghni,	qaatkelluki	angayuqasi	salleghqun	tamaghhaakun,	qayughllak	tawaten	pillghem	efqughtaqaa	Ataneq.
B12_03_Colossians_V21	Atani,	sakraasaghaghpenaki	taghnughhasi	luuraq	iilqennayukata.
B12_03_Colossians_V22	Qepghaghtelaaghni,	iiwleng	qaatkelluki	piliitistesi.	Iiwlengllu	efqughhnaqluki	esghapagughngaata	nalighmeng	esghapagunghiteghngaata.	Qepghaateki	ipapighqellusi	qayughllak	tawaten	quulvaangwaaghsi	Ataneq.
B12_03_Colossians_V23	Salleghpesini	tamaghhaani	qepghaghaqitek	pinaqellghaghsi	qamagtiiluku	qepghaatepiglleghhiistun	Ataneq,	nakaan	yugnun.
B12_03_Colossians_V24	Neqamikluku	Atanghuuq	Christ-a	qepghaatkaghsi.	Allgeghlleqaghsi	akileghtuusaghsi	ellnganeng.	Akileghtuusaq	akequsaqegkaqaa	tuunelleqniluku	yugminun.
B12_03_Colossians_V25	Iwernga	kina	alngunak	seghletun	pista	nallangighyaghqaaguq	seghletun	pillghanun	qayughllak	Kiyaghneghem	nanqigsaghqaqaa	tamaghhaan	yuuk	tawateghlluwaaq.
B12_04_Colossians_V1	Qepghaghtelaaghet	piliitistengitni,	pinitungwaaqlu	atunengwaaqlu	piiqiteki	qepghaghtelaasi,	liisimakluku	elpesillu	Piliitistelguusi	qilagmi.
B12_04_Colossians_V2	Yughaamanginaghtek,	iilqayugpenasillu	yughaghaqitek	iyamsiqayugvikumaan	Kiyaghneq.
B12_04_Colossians_V3	Yughaqufsi,	yughaatkennakefsikutlu.	Yughaghtek	Kiyaghneghmun	qelpeghutesqelluta	amigmeng	mingitesqelluki	akuzitangi	Christ-ameng	ayuqelghiit.	Sivunghani	Kiyaghneghem	qayvighsimangitaa	ipapilleq	Christ-ameng	ayuqelghii.	Iwernga	Kiyaghneghem	ungipaataanga	ungipaqesqelluku	taana	qayvighsimangilnguq	ipapilleq.	Ungipaqegkaqutemneng	taana	ipapilleq	anusimingllaghaatnga.
B12_04_Colossians_V4	Enkaam	yughaatkitengnga	una	ungipaq	ungipaqsaghqaaluku	whateghlluwaaq	katam	Kiyaghneghem	whangamnun	pisqellghatun.
B12_04_Colossians_V5	Peghqinghwaaqitek	ugpeqaanghilngughninneghpesini.	Atuqaqiteggu	tamaghhaan	pilleghqaghsi	ungipaasaghqaaluki	Christ-ameng.
B12_04_Colossians_V6	Aleghquneghpesiki	iiwleng	nangllegtaghlusi,	akuziiqlusi	itagnaghyugnaghlusi,	nagasugnaghlusillu.	Tawaten	piiqitek	liisimakesqellusi	naten	kiimsilleghqiit	aapqughaallghit.
B12_04_Colossians_V7	Tychicus	ugpeqaalgutkaqa,	piniqepigtekaqa.	Qepghalgutkaqa,	qepghaataqaallu	Ataneq	whangamnun	maligulluni.
B12_04_Colossians_V8	Kayagtaqa	elpesinun,	liisimakesqelluku	natetulvut	enkaam	kayemellengesqellusi.	Ungipaannaaghiisi	whangamneng.
B12_04_Colossians_V9	Kayagtaqallu	Onesimus	elpesinun.	Piniqegkaaguq	ataasiighmelnguq	ugpeqaalgun,	elpesineng	pinguuq.	Tychicus-enkuk	ungipaalleqiisi	sameng	tamaghhaaneng	salleghneng	maani.
B12_04_Colossians_V10	Aristarchus-em	anusimingllaghalgutma,	Mark-emllu	atalgutangan	Barnabas-em	suumqaqiisinguq.	(Ungipaatkaqamsi	latatgun	Mark-meng,	kaasimakan	elpesinun	upughatesqelluku.)
B12_04_Colossians_V11	Jesus-emllu,	alla	atelgem	Justus-meng	suumqaqiisinguq.	Taakunginaagut	Jews-et	ugpeqat,	qepghalgusighaqaatnga	Ataneghpagullghanun	Kiyaghneghem.	Ilutuqutkanka	elngaatall.
B12_04_Colossians_V12	Epaphras,	qepghaghtenga	Christ	Jesus-em,	elpesineng	pinguuq,	ellnganllu	suumqaqiisinguq.	Iiwleng	taakunginaghhaagneng	yughaatkaqiisi	angtaniitesqellusi,	liisimakngngwaaghesqelluku	sangwaa	Kiyaghneghem	pisqesullgha	elpesinun,	elpesinunllu	qamagtengngwaaghluku	piyukellgha	pikesqelluku.
B12_04_Colossians_V13	Ungipaasugamsi	Epaphras	qepghaghllakaaguq	kayusiinnalusi,	kayusiinnalukillu	Laodicea-ghmiitlu	Hierapolis-eghmiitllu.
B12_04_Colossians_V14	Luke-emllu	piniqepigtekamta	aghallegtam,	Demas-emllu	suumqaqiisinguq.
B12_04_Colossians_V15	Ugpeqaalgutnun	Laodicea-melngughnun,	Nympha-munllu,	ugpeqaalgutnunllu	qernughutkayugnun	maniguunnaluteng	mangteghaani,	ungipaannakesi	suumqaqankanguq.
B12_04_Colossians_V16	Atightughnakesi	ukut	latat	ugpeqanun	qerngughutkayugnun	yughaghvigani	Colossae-m.	Wataghllaklu	atightughnakesi	ukut	latat	Laodicea-ghmiit	ugpeqiitnun.	Atightughnakesillu	latat	Laodicea-ghmiit	ugpeqiita	tuyughyaghqiit	elpesinun.
B12_04_Colossians_V17	Archippus	ungipaataghnnakesi	whaten,	“Wataghllak	apeghiighnaken	qepghaqaq	Atanghem	qelghutkaa	elpenun.”
B12_04_Colossians_V18	Whanga,	Paul,	whanga	katam	iiggemneng	una	igaqaqa.	Neqamiklunga	anusimingllaghaagunga,	qiipraghusighlunga	ayuqunga.	Qamagllusi	suumqaqamsi.	Kiyaghneq	nangllegtaghli	elpesinun.
B13_01_1Thess_V1	Ukut	latat	Paul-meng,	Silas-meng,	Timothy-mengllu	pinguut,	Thessalonica-ghmiit	ugpeqiitnun	Kiyaghneghem	Atam	pingi	Atanghemllu	Jesus	Christ-am.	Kiyaghneghem	nangllekillghallu	nekeggmellghallu	elpesinillik.
B13_01_1Thess_V1	Quunpeng	iyamsiqayugvikaqaghput	Kiyaghneq	tamaghhaghpesinun,	iiwlengllu	yughaatkaqamsi.
B13_01_1Thess_V2	Yughanemta	Kiyaghneghmun	Atamnnun	neqamikaqaghput	qepghalleghsi	ugpelleghpesigun,	qepghalleghsi	piniqelleghpesigun.	Iyamsiqayugvikaqaghputlu	ugpelleghsi	nagneghuskesi	iknaqluku	qayughllak	sighimangulghiisi	Atanemteggun	Jesus	Christ-akun.
B13_01_1Thess_V3	Ugpeqaalgutemnni,	Kiyaghneghem	piniqegkaani,	liisimakaghput	nakmikegkaqiisi
B13_01_1Thess_V4	qayughllak	Pinilghiineng	Ungipaneng	tagitaqngamsi,	akuziteraaghinaghteggun	pimangitukut,	iwernga	aghtughyaghqaanghilleghqunllu,	Agleghnalghiignekunllu	Taghneghagnekun	pikaagukut.	Enkaam	ugpeqasi	Pinilghiit	Ungipat	ipangutangi.	Liisimakaghsillu	naten	kiyaghtekaatfut	elpesinilluta,	tawaten	kayusiinnalusi	kiyaghtekaagukut.
B13_01_1Thess_V5	Enkaam	whangkutestunllu	Ataneghtunllu	lliightek.	Qaywa	ikfiqeghllagngaaghpesi,	tuguklighasi	Pinilghiit	Ungipat	quyamallelighlusi	Agleghnalghiigneng	Taghneghagneng.
B13_01_1Thess_V6	Enkaam	usputaaghtusi	tamaghhiitnun	ugpeqanun	Macedonia-millu	Achaia-millu.
B13_01_1Thess_V7	Atanghem	ungipaa	mingitnguuq	elpesineng	Macedonia-millu	Achaia-millu.	Ugpeqilleghsillu	Kiyaghneghmeng	liitaat	tamangani.	Enkaam	whangkuta	sameng	pinghisaghngaamteggu	ugpeqilleghsi,	qayughllak	siingenllu	yuget	nagaquumaat.
B13_01_1Thess_V8	Tamangani	aapghaqaat	upughatilleghllagsi	whangkunneng	elpesinitnguluta.	Qiivumanilusillu	unguvalghiimun	Kiyaghnepigmun	qepghaannaluku,	peglluki	kiyaghnengllaqat.
B13_01_1Thess_V9	Utaqaaqaghsillunguq	Kiyaghneghem	Ighnegha,	Jesus,	tagiyaghqaq	qilagmeng.	Ellnganguuq	Kiyaghneghem	unguvaghtekaa	tuqulleghmeng,	yuguliiqiinkutlu	Kiyaghneghem	sakraallghaneng	kaasaghqameng.
B13_02_1Thess_V2	Iwernga	sivunghani	elpesinun	pillemta,	liisimakaghsi	Philippi-mi	ikfiqliightestekaqiinkutlu	seghlequuqaqiinkutlu.	Tamaanlluta	qaywa	uglalghiim	yugem	aghuliighhnaqutkeghngiinkut	Kiyaghneghem	ilutustekaqiinkut,	enkaam	ungipaasaghtughamsi	Pinilghiineng	Ungipaaneng	Kiyaghneghem.
B13_02_1Thess_V1	Ugpeqaalgutemnni,	liisimakaghsi	elpesinun	pilleghput	temngingunghitkaaguq.
B13_02_1Thess_V2	Ungipaqilleghput	ipanguuq.	Iqlengiqngunghitukut	elpesinun,	seghleghmeng	piyukegkiitukut	elpesinun,	puughhnaqutkigatamsi.
B13_02_1Thess_V3	Yeghlegi,	ungipaqaqaput	Pinilghiit	Ungipat	qayughllak	Kiyaghneghem	itagnaqluta	neghyukutkaqii	whangkunnun.	Akuzillemteggun	efqughhnaqutkengngunghitaput	yuget,	iwernga	efqughsukaghput	Kiyaghneghuuq,	nanqigtingalghii	ilumta	sumeghtaghallghaneng.
B13_02_1Thess_V4	Liisimakaghsi	usuquughsaghtuunghitamsi	nalighmeng	sakengviksaghtuunghitamsi.	Kiyaghneq	liisimakistekaghput.
B13_02_1Thess_V5	Usuqesaayugtengngunghitukut	yugneng,	elpesineng,	nalighmeng	kinkuneng.
B13_02_1Thess_V6	Apostle-ngutemnneng	Christ-amun,	tungsighniighviksaghqaqsaghamsi	sameng	alngunak.	Iwernga	elpesinilluta	yakumangilliqutkumangitamsi,	yeghlegi	mamaghtikayugestun	naastun	aflengakilghiistun	taghnughhaghmeggneng	ayuqegkaagukut.
B13_02_1Thess_V7	Piniqepigtamsi,	enkaam	quyakusiqinaghluku	elpesinun	liisimakesugaput	Kiyaghneghem	Pinilghiit	Ungipii.	Pinilghiinginaat	Ungipat	pigpenaki,	quyakusiqinaghluku	sameng	tamaghhaaneng	kayusighyuglusi	ayuqamsi,	qayughllak	piniqsaliitkaqamsi.
B13_02_1Thess_V8	Ugpeqaalgutemnni,	neqamikaghsi	naten	angkaan	qepghalleghputlu	ughleghiilleghputlu!	Qepghaqaagukut	unugtuumaan,	aghneghtuumaan	qayughllak	elpesinun	uqigtuqutnguyunghilnguukut;	elpesinisimaluta	ungipaqikaagukut	Pinilghiineng	Ungipaaneng	Kiyaghneghem.
B13_02_1Thess_V9	Elpesillu	Kiyaghneqlu	liisimakistekamsi.	Elpesini	ugpeqani	kiyaghtekaagukut	pelungilluta,	ipapighqelluta,	anaggutellngunaamta.
B13_02_1Thess_V10	Liisimakaghsi	katam	atam	aflengakillghatun	taghnughhaghmineng,	whangkutallu	tamaghhaghpesi	tawaten	katam	aflengakegkaqamsi.	Kayemegkaqamsi,	ilutughsaqaqamsi,	qelghutaataqaqaghput	elpesinun	atuqesqelluku	kiyaghtaalleq	efqughnalghii	Kiyaghneghmi.	Tuqluungwiisi	ilatesqellusi	ellmi	katam	Ataneghpagulleghminunllu	pinighnalleghllagminunllu.
B13_02_1Thess_V11	Iyamsiqayugvikumanginaangwaaghputlu	Kiyaghneq	una	apalluqluku:	whangkunneng	nagaqughluku	tuguklighaghsi	Kiyaghneghem	ungipaa.	Elpesi	tuguklighaghsi	Kiyaghneghmeng	ungipaaluku,	nakaan	yugneng	ungipaaluku.	Taananguuq	Kiyaghneghem	ungipaghpigaa	qepghalghii	elpesini	ugpeqilghiini.
B13_02_1Thess_V13	Ugpeqaalgutemnni,	elpesi	tawatetusi	ugpeqistengistun	Christ	Jesus-em	qerngughutkayuget	yughaghvigitni	Kiyaghneghem	Judea-mi.	Nunalgutegpesi	ikfiqestekaqiisi	katam	Jews-et	ikfiqestellghistun	ugpeqat	Judea-mi.
B13_02_1Thess_V14	Jews-nguut	tuqutikat	Ataneghmeng	Jesus-meng,	uuknaliqistenengllu,	amyuqetaatkegkaqiinkutlu.	Efqughhneghitaat	Kiyaghneq,	kipullginaaghuutlu	tamaghhaanun	yugnun
B13_02_1Thess_V15	aghuliighhnaqutkelleghmegteggun	ungipaqilleghput	Gentile-enun	yugulillengnayukata.	Tawaten	pilleghmegteggun	ilamanginaghiit	seghleghqelleteng	enkaam	qenwatlu	Kiyaghneghem	ugumiyaguteghllagluki	qantaghaqun	aghyuughlleqii.
B13_02_1Thess_V16	Ugpeqaalgutemnni,	amyuqetaatkistemta	aghulaqestaqngamikut	Thessalonica-meng,	pellghututestaghtiinkut,	iwernga	paninang	sumeghmikaqamsi.	Esghaghyupigtaqsaghamsi	gginasaghqughlusi
B13_02_1Thess_V17	enkaam	takunaqutkaqsaghamsi.	Whanga,	Paul,	takunaqutkaataghaqsaghamsi	iwernga	Tughneghaam	amigighaghtaqiinkut.
B13_02_1Thess_V18	Elpesi	sighimalqamsi,	quyasiqamsi,	qaghpakamsillu.	Taana	qaghpa	whangkuta	qukaayugusiqelleqaghput	manungani	Atanemta	Jesus-em	tagikan.
B13_02_1Thess_V19	Ipapestaaq	elpesi	qukaayugusiqamsillu	quyasiqamsillu!
B13_03_1Thess_V3	qayughllak	iilqayugtesunghilkemsi	ugpeqilleghpesineng	seghleliillesi	apalluqluki.	Iwernga	liisimakaghsi	ugpeqani	whangkuta	seghleliighyaghqaagukut.
B13_03_1Thess_V1	Iwernga	esghaatusigatutemnneng	qavngaghhaaneng	pelleghngatutelleghput	nuqetutepagningiitaghput.	Enkaam	agghitkaagukut	whanga	ellnginaghma	Athens-mennalunga,
B13_03_1Thess_V2	kayagtekaqaghpungllu	Timothy	elpesinun.	Ugpeqaalgutkaghpung,	qepgalgusighaqiinkung	Kiyaghneghmun.	Ungipaqilgusighaqiinkung	Pinilghiineng	Ungipaneng	Christ-ameng	ayuqelghiineng.	Kayagtekaqaghpung	iknaqughsaghyaghtiisqelluki	ugpeqillesi,	kayemesqellusillu,
B13_03_1Thess_V3	Elpesinilluta	ungipaatngwaaqaqamsi	amyuqetaatkellengelleqniluta;	enkaam	liisimakaghsi	taawa	ipa	ikfiqutkegkaqaghput	amyuqetaatkelleq.
B13_03_1Thess_V4	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	aghtughyagusama	nuqenneghmeng,	kayagtekaqaqa	Timothy	elpesinun	liigiknaluku	ugpeqilleghsi	natetaqutanga.	Pengkaqamsi	qayughllak	Tughneghaam	nanghiiqumanayukangisi	ugpeqinaniisqellusi,	enkaam	qepghalleghput	temngisugnighsimanayukan.
B13_03_1Thess_V5	Iwernga	Timothy-m	uteghnighluni	ungipaatiinkung	quyanalghiimeng	ungipameng	ugpeqilleghpesinengllu	piniqelleghpesinengllu.	Ungipaataqiinkungllu	iiwleng	neqamikaqnilutung	pinitun,	esghaghyugaqnilutungllu	katam	whangkutung	esghaghyullemtestegetun	elpesi.
B13_03_1Thess_V6	Ugpeqaalgutemnni,	seghleliighllagumaluta,	ikfiqeghllagumaluta	ilutughtukut	qayughllak	nagneghutngukesi	ugpeqilleghsi.
B13_03_1Thess_V7	Whaa	aneghtaghaghtukut	qayughllak	aghuliilkaalghiisi	Ataneghqun.
B13_03_1Thess_V8	Enkaam	iyamsiqayugvikngwaaghput	Kiyaghneq	elpesineng.	Elpesi	apalluqlusi	quyaghllaguukut	sivungani	Kiyaghnemta.
B13_03_1Thess_V9	Taakunginaghhaagneng	yughaatkengngwaamsi	unugtuumaan,	aghneghtuumaan	alla	esghaghyaghqaalusi,	ilayaghqaaluki	ugpeqilleghpesi	aklukegkiit.
B13_03_1Thess_V10	Kiyaghnemta,	Atam	ellmineng	katam,	Atanemtallu	Jesus-em	qantaghaqun	elpesinun	piyaghqaaghteslikut!
B13_03_1Thess_V11	Atanghem,	piniqsaliitutestaghaghlisi.	Piniqelleghsillu	tevughasligu	tamaghhaanun	yugnun,	katam	whangkuta	piniqellemtestun	elpesi.
B13_03_1Thess_V12	Tawaten	ayepsugighsaghlleqii	ilusi	avutngitesqellusillu	pelungitesqellusillu	sivungani	Kiyaghnemta	Atam,	Atanemta	Jesus-em	tagillghani.	Tawani	kelqelleqii	qamagtengngwaaghluki	ellmi	yuni.
B13_04_1Thess_V4	Liitesugiisillu	tamaghaghpesi	nuqetutesqelluki	yugusisi	pinilleghmun	enkaam	kiyaghllequsi	pelungillusi,	efqughnaghlusi	Kiyaghneghmunllu	yugnunllu.
B13_04_1Thess_V1	Ugpeqaalgutemnni,	alaghrang	whaten	pinaqamsi,	liitivikegkaqaghpekut	naten	kiyaghtelleghqameng	efqughnaghlusi	Kiyaghneghmun,	esgha	tawaten	kiyaghlleghhiisi.	Aatghakun	Atanghem	Jesus-em	kayemamsi	wataqaaghaq	tawaten	pisqellusi.
B13_04_1Thess_V2	Liisimakasi	sangwaat	qelghutkaput	elpesinun	pisqelluki	Ataneghqun	Jesus-kun.
B13_04_1Thess_V3	Whatetuq	Kiyaghneghem	piyukellgha	elpesinun:	pelungitesugiisi	seghleghqestesunghitiisi	atuqutelleghqun.
B13_04_1Thess_V4	Ilapgategpenasi	yugusighpesi	atuqiyullghanun	ugpeqaanghilnguut	pillghistun	nallukilghiit	Kiyaghneghmeng.
B13_04_1Thess_V5	Kitum	alngunak	sakusiiqefqaan	piligu	ugpeqaalgutmi	inglunga	atuqilleghmun.	Atanghem	aghyuughllaglleqii	tawaten	pikayuget.	Sivunghani	kelengasaaghllakaqamsi	tamaaken.
B13_04_1Thess_V6	Kiyaghneghem	nakmikegkaqiinkut	kiyaghtesqelluta	pelungilluta,	seghleghqellngunaamta.
B13_04_1Thess_V7	Enkaangam	kitum	alngunak	qaatkenghilkumiki	tamaakut	apeghtuusat,	Kiyaghneghuuq	qaatkenghilkanga	nakaan	yuuk.	Kiyaghneghuuq	tuunistezi	Agleghnalghiigneng	Taghneghagneng.
B13_04_1Thess_V8	Kitum	alngunak	latanghisaghngaaghmisi	ayuqiisi	ungipaannalusi	piniqesqelluki	ugpeqaalgutesi,	qayughllak	Kiyaghneghem	apeghtuqaqiisi	piniqutesqellusi.
B13_04_1Thess_V9	Ipanguuq	piniqasi	qamaglluki	ugpeqaalgutesi	tamaghhaani	Macedonia-mi.	Iwernga	ugpeqaalgutemnni,	qelghamsi	piniqutaghiisqellusi.
B13_04_1Thess_V10	Pinaqellghaghsi	qamaglluku	kiyaghtek	nekeggmellelighlusi,	elpesi	sayaghqasi	piiqiteki,	avelghaghluki	ilagpesi	sayaghqiit.	Qepghaghtek	allgeghusaghqaalusi	aklukegkaghpesineng	katam	whangkuta	qelellemtestun.
B13_04_1Thess_V11	Tawaten	pikufsi	neghyuknaanghitasi	kinkut	alngunak	aklukegkaghpesinun,	ugpeqaanghilnguutlu	siivakelleqiisi.
B13_04_1Thess_V12	Ugpeqaalgutemnni,	liisimakesugamsi	ugpeqaneng	qavalghiineng	qivghukefqiita	pisqelluki	sighimallghilngughestun.
B13_04_1Thess_V13	Ugpeqaghput	Jesus	tuquluni	unguvaqaaguq.	Enkaam	ugpeqaghput	Kiyaghneghem	tagilleqii	Jesus-kun	tamaakut	qavaqat	ugpeqiluteng	ellnganeng.
B13_04_1Thess_V14	Ungipaatngwaaghamsi	Atanghem	apeghtuutkaaneng.	Ataneq	tagikan,	whangkuta	paninang	unguvalghiini	ingyaghaghnaanghitaput	tamaakut	qavaqat.
B13_04_1Thess_V15	Ataneq	ellnga	katam	qilagmeng	ukigllequq,	yuget	nagaqughlleqaat	iglagtuqaq	qelelleq,	menga	archangel-em,	qalghightaatangallu	Kiyaghneghem.	Tamaakut	ugpeqiluteng	Christ-ameng	tuqulaghaatkat	unguvaghyuggaaghllequt.
B13_04_1Thess_V16	Taagken	whangkuta	unguvalghiini	unegtekani,	Kiyaghneghem	qerngughutesluta,	ellngitnun,	ghhataghaghtaatesleqiinkut	qilagwaaghnun	paayghesqelluku	Ataneq	eslami.	Enkaam	Ataneghmellequkut	quunperugllak.
B13_04_1Thess_V17	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	ilutughsaasiqaqiteki	taakut	akuzitet.
B13_05_1Thess_V5	Qamagllusi	avaqutaqiisi	nighugem,	avaqutaqiisillu	aghneghem.	Unugem	pikenghitiinkut	nalighmeng	mamlegllagem.
B13_05_1Thess_V1	Ugpeqaalgutemnni,	elpesinun	latatkenniitut	qakun	tamaakut	piyaghqaatangi.
B13_05_1Thess_V2	Qayughllak	elpesi	liisimakngwaaghaghsi	Aghnegha	Atanghem	tagiyaghqaaguq	waakenghillghaghulluni	tagillghatun	teglegniightem	unugmi.
B13_05_1Thess_V3	Yuget	whaten	pimaluki,	“Nekeggmellelguukutlu	paqniitukutlu,”	naafqellghem	kaatqaghlleqii	katam	aghnam	ighniyullghan	aqnighqellghatun.	Yuget	anagnaanghitaat	taana	naafqelleq.
B13_05_1Thess_V4	Iwernga	elpesi	ugpeqaalgutemnni,	mamlegllagmenneghitusi	enkaam	Aghneghan	Aghneghem	waakenghillghaghhnaanghitiisi	tegleghniightetun.
B13_05_1Thess_V5	Enkaam	qavaafqaamta	pilta	ilangistun,	itupill	teghumalta,	liisimaluta.
B13_05_1Thess_V6	Tamaakut	qavalghiit	qavaghaqut	unugmi,	tamaakut	meghelghiit	suumaqut	unugmi.
B13_05_1Thess_V7	Iwernga	Atanghem	pikiinkut	enkaam	liisimaluta	kiyaghtelta.	Paqniighsaasilleghqamnnun	sakimamteggun	aatelteggu	sighimalleq	yugulilleghmun.
B13_05_1Thess_V8	Kiyaghneghem	piyukelqenghitaa	ikfiqesqelluta	sakraalleghmeng,	iwernga	yugulillengesugiinkut	Atanemteggun	Jesus	Christ-akun.
B13_05_1Thess_V9	Jesus-em	tuqumatkegkaqiinkut	ellminitesqelluta	unguvayaghngaamta,	tuqukaayaghngaamta	tagikumi.
B13_05_1Thess_V10	Tamaakut	apalluqluki	kayemututaqiteklu	kayutkutaqiteklu	whaa	maaten	pilleghpesistun.
B13_05_1Thess_V11	Ugpeqaalgutemnni,	siivakiteki	Ataneghmun	qepghalghiit	akulegpesini.	Ellngan	nakmikegkaqii	igleghutistengulukillu	apeghtughistengulukillu	elpesinun.
B13_05_1Thess_V12	Siivakeghllagaqitekillu	piniqaqitekillu	apalluqluki	qepghallghit.	Nekeggmetullusi	pitek.
B13_05_1Thess_V13	Ugpeqaalgutemnni,	kelengasaaghteki	ighsanitalghiit,	ilutughsaghteki	alingtalghiit,	kayusighteki	kayaalnguut,	negkeghlluwaan	piiqiteki	qamaglluki.
B13_05_1Thess_V14	Wataghllak	akisaqunaki	seghletun	pistesi	iwernga	pinitun	piiqiteki	ilasi,	qamagllukillu	yuget.
B13_05_1Thess_V15	Quyamanginaghlusi,
B13_05_1Thess_V16	yughaamanginaghlusi,
B13_05_1Thess_V17	iyamsiqayuglusi	tamaghhaani	nekegneghmi.	Taakunguut	Kiyaghneghem	piyukellghi	elpesinun	Christ	Jesus-em	piliitkiitnun.
B13_05_1Thess_V18	Qaamtegpenakek	Agleghnalghiik	Taghneghak,
B13_05_1Thess_V19	sasiinghinnigpenaki	uuknaliqillghet.
B13_05_1Thess_V20	Iwernga	sangwaa	qamaglluku	nanghiiqwaaqiteggu	enkaam	tuguklighaqluki	sangwaat	pinilghiit,
B13_05_1Thess_V21	iqitngatek	tamaghhaaneng	seghleghmeng.
B13_05_1Thess_V22	Kiyaghneghem	nekeggmellelitistem	iighwightengngwaaghlusi	pelungighllisi.	Avutngitesliki	taghneghasi,	unguvasisi,	yugusisi	Ataneghput	Jesus	Christ-a	tagikan.
B13_05_1Thess_V23	Tagsiqlightegpesi	pilleqii	tamaakut	qayughllak	ataasiighmetuq.
B13_05_1Thess_V24	Ugpeqaalgutemnni,	yughaatkaqluta.
B13_05_1Thess_V25	Quyakaqiteki	ugpeqaalgutesi	naaghluki	Kiyaghneghem	piniqellghakun.
B13_05_1Thess_V26	Qelghamsi	Atanghem	pilleghqalitellghakun	ukut	latat	atightiisqelluki	tamaghhiitnun	ugpeqaalgutegpesinun.
B13_05_1Thess_V27	Piniqellgha	Atanghem	Jesus	Christ-am	elpesinilli.
B14_01_2Thess_V1	Ukut	latat	Paul-meng,	Silas-meng	Timothy-mengllu	pinguut.	Ugpeqanun	Thessalonica-melngughnun	Kiyaghneghem	Atamta	pingitnun,	Atanghemllu	Jesus	Christ-am.
B14_01_2Thess_V1	Nangllegtalleqlu	nekeggmelleqlu	elpesinun	pinguuk	Kiyaghneghmeng	Atameng,	Ataneghmengllu	Jesus	Christ-ameng.
B14_01_2Thess_V2	Ugpeqaalgutemnni,	iiwleng	iyamsiqayagusaghqaqamsi	Kiyaghneghmun.	Elqughutngaaq	tawaten	pilleghqaghput,	qayughllak	ugpeqineghtughtaghalghiisillu,	piniqutaghaghlusillu	lliightusi.
B14_01_2Thess_V3	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	qanatkaqamsi	ilangitnun	ugpeqat	Kiyaghneghem	yughaghvigitnilngughnun.	Aapghaqaghput	nuqetutineghtulleghsillu,	ugpeqilleghsillu	qaywa	amyuutkellengeghngaaghpesi,	ikfiqellengeghngaaghpesillu.
B14_01_2Thess_V4	Tamaakut	ipapighqaat	Kiyaghneghem	nanqigtillgha	elqughutngalghiinguuq.	Enkaam	Kiyaghneghem	aapghiisi	itagnaghnilusi	kiyaghtesqellusi	Ataneghpagulleghmini	qayughllak	ikfiqutkengngukesi.
B14_01_2Thess_V5	Kiyaghneghem	piyaghqaqaa	sangwaa	elqughutngalghii:	ikfiqesaghqaqii	tamaakut	ikfiqestilghiit	elpesineng.
B14_01_2Thess_V6	Enkaam	elpesi	ikfiqelghiini	Kiyaghneghem	meghnaalisnaaghiisi	ikfiqelleghmeng	whangkutallu	maligulluta.	Tawaten	pillequq	aliightekumiki	Ataneq	Jesus,	iknaqeghllalghiitlu	yaqulgi.	Qilagmeng	ukigllequt	keneghmelluteng	kumaghughngalghiimi.
B14_01_2Thess_V7	Taagken	Jesus-em	aghyuughlleqii	tamaakut	nallukilghiit	Kiyaghneghmeng,	qaatkusigalnguutlu	Pinilghiineng	Ungipaaneng	Jesus-meng	ayuqelghiit.
B14_01_2Thess_V8	Aghyuughnaqngwiillu	kenlengilngughmeng	naafqelleghmeng,	iqitesnaqnguutlu	Ataneghmeng,	nighuganengllu	aghtughyaghqaanghillghan.
B14_01_2Thess_V9	Tamaakut	piyaghqaagut	tawani	Aghneghmi	Ataneq	Jesus	tagikan.	Qamaglluteng	yuget	ugpeqikat	ellnganeng	usuqelleqaat,	saghiighayagulleqaatlu.	Elpesi	akulngitnillequsi	qayughllak	ugpeqegkesi	ungipaq	aapqaghput	elpesinun.
B14_01_2Thess_V10	Enkaam	quunpeng	yughaatkaqamsi	whaten:	Kiyaghneghem	apeghlisi	kiyaghtengngunilusi	ellmi	kiyaghtesqesulleghmitun.	Aghtughyaghqaanghilleghmikunllu	naamiglligu	qamaglluku	piyukelleghsi	pinilleghmun,	qepghallghillu	ugpeqilleghpesi.
B14_01_2Thess_V11	Enkaam	aatgha	Atanemta	Jesus-em	quulvallengellequq	elpesigun,	elpesillu	ellngakun	quulvallengellequsi	nafughtallghakunllu	nangllegtallghakunllu	Kiyaghnemta,	Atanemtallu	Jesus	Christ-am.
B14_02_2Thess_V2	Umyugasi	qapragaghtesunghitngwaaghaput	nalighmeng	kakavesunghitaput	nagaququfsigu	Aghnegha	Atanghem	kaasimaniluku.	Entaqun	kitum	uuknaliqutkegkaqaa,	nalighmeng	kitum	ungipaqegkaqaa,	nalighmeng	kitum	latatkumaniluku	whangkunnun	pikaqaa.
B14_02_2Thess_V1	Ugpeqaalgutemnni,	ungipaasugamsi	tagilleghqaaneng	Atanemta	Jesus	Christ-am,	qerngughutelleghqamnnengllu	ellnganun.
B14_02_2Thess_V2	Iwernga	puughtestegpenasi!	Taana	Aghnegha	Atanghem	kaannaanghituq	kenlanga	yuget	malighqutaqsugnanilghitnun	Kiyaghneghem	igleghutillghanun,	kaatellghanunllu	Seghlepestaaghem	Yugem.	(Ellnga	naafqesaghqaaguq	hell-mi.)
B14_02_2Thess_V3	Taam	yugem	kipullginaaghlleqii	kiyaghnengllaqat	nalighmeng	manigughyaghqat,	tamaakuneng	ellmineng	qulighpigaaghsaghqaaguq.	Enkaangam	iteghluni	Kiyaghneghem	Temple-nganun	aqumluni	Kiyaghneghunillequq.
B14_02_2Thess_V4	Neqamikenghistegguu	salin	elpesinillunga	ungipaatkaqegkemsi	tamaaken?
B14_02_2Thess_V5	Liisimakaghsi	kitum	maaten	nuqneqaqaa	Seghlepestaaq	Yuuk	tagilleghqaaneng.	Wetku	aghneni	kaaskan	tagillequq.
B14_02_2Thess_V6	Aawallu	qayvighsimangilnguq	aghtughyaghqaanghillgha	seghleghqellghem	qepghaaghsimaaq	nunami.	Iwernga	maaten	kitum	kimaawistaqaa	taana	seghleghqelleq.	Kimaawististenga	tawaten	pillequq	kenlanga	Kiyaghneghem	iqitestellghanun.
B14_02_2Thess_V7	Taagken	Seghlepestaaq	Yuuk	aliightesllequq,	iwernga	Atanghem	Jesus-em	tagikumi	tuqulleqaa	aneghneghaneng	qaneghmi,	naafqelleqaallu	nighugllagakun	tagilleghmi.
B14_02_2Thess_V8	Sivutghulluku	Atanghem	Jesus-em	tagilleghqaa,	Seghlepestaaq	Yuuk	tagillequq	aghtughyaghqaanghillelighluni	Tughneghagh-meng.	Taana	Yuuk	allaaghlluwhaghtisighwaaghllequq	allaaghhiinaghmeng	saghiighanalghiineng.
B14_02_2Thess_V9	Atuqelleqiillu	allaaghhiinaat	seghleghet	puughhnaluki	tuquyaghqat.	Tuquyaghqaagut	qayughllak	ugpeqsunghilkangat	ipalleq	yugulisighqaqsaqeseng.
B14_02_2Thess_V10	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	Kiyaghneghem	puughneqguutesleqii	ugpeqesqelluki	sangwaat	ipangunghilnguut.
B14_02_2Thess_V11	Enkaam	qamagtengngwaaghluteng	ugpeqinghilnguut	ipapilleghmeng	nanqigsaghqaagut	aghyuughyaghqaaluteng	qayughllak	pinighyuugusiqegkangat	seghlleghqelleq.
B14_02_2Thess_V12	Ugpeqaalgutemnni,	iiwleng	iyamsiqayagusaghqaqamsi	Kiyaghneghmun,	elpesi	piniqegkiitni	Atanghem.	Iyamsiqayugvikaqaghputlu	Kiyaghneq	qayughllak	nakmikegkaqiisi	yugulisqellusi	ima	piinlighyuwhaallghaneng	nunam.	Yugulikaagusi	pelungighsallghakun	Agleghnalghiim	Taghnegham,	ugpeqelleghpesigunllu	ipapilleq.
B14_02_2Thess_V13	Tawaten	kiyaghtaalleghmun	Kiyaghneghem	tagsiqaqiisi	Pinilghiitgun	Ungipatgun	ungipaqegkamegteggun;	tagisqaqiisi	piliitesqelluku	nengighqaghsi	pinighnallgha	Atanemta	Jesus	Christ-am.
B14_02_2Thess_V14	Enkaam	ugpeqaalgutemnni,	aghuliitekestaghtek,	ugpeqekestaghteggu	ipapilleq	apeghtuutkaghput	elpesinun	ungipaqillemteggunllu	latallemteggunllu.
B14_02_2Thess_V15	Kiyaghneghem	Atamta,	piniqistemta,	nangllegtalleghmikun	tuunegkaqiinkut	kenlengilngughmeng	ilutulleghmeng,	pinilghiimengllu	sighimalleghmeng.	Atanemta	Jesus	Christ-am	ellngan	katam,	Kiyaghneghemllu	Atamta,	elkegkenka
B14_02_2Thess_V16	ilutughsaghlisillu,	iknaqughsaghlisillu	tamaghhaakun	pinilghiikun	qepghalleghpesigunllu	akuzilleghpesigunllu.
B14_03_2Thess_V3	Iwernga	Ataneq	ataasiighmetuq;	iknakqughsaghlleqiisillu	paqniighsaghlleqiisillu	Tughneghaghmeng.
B14_03_2Thess_V1	Ugpeqaalgutemnni,	taaqniitkun	sameng	piighaataqaghlamsi.	Yughaatkitekut	Atanghem	ungipaa	mingirragkiighesqelluku,	yugnunllu	quulviisqelluku,	katam	elpesi	pilleghpesistun.
B14_03_2Thess_V2	Yughaatkitekutlu	Kiyaghneghmun	yugulisqelluta	seghleghneng	yugneng,	qayughllak	uglalghii	yuuk	ugpeqillelgunghituq.
B14_03_2Thess_V3	Atanghem	nalluneqniighumaa	whangkunnun	qaatkutnguusi	qelellemnnun,	qaatkumanginaghlleqaghsillu.
B14_03_2Thess_V4	Atanghem	liigikeslisi	wataqaaghaq	Kiyaghneghem	piniqellghaneng,	Christ-amllu	nuqetutineghtullghaneng.
B14_03_2Thess_V5	Ugpeqaalgutemnni,	aatghakun	Atanemta	Jesus	Christ-am	qelghamsi	iqitngasqellusi	tamaghhiitneng	ugpeqaalgutegpesineng	ighsanitalghiinengllu	malighqutaqigalngughnengllu	apeghtuutkamnneng	elpesinun.
B14_03_2Thess_V6	Elpesi	katam	liisimakaghsi	ayuqesighaghyaghqaqsaghaghpekut;	elpesinilluta	ighsanitiqumangitukut.
B14_03_2Thess_V7	Tugukliigataput	neqet	kinkuneng	alngunak	tukfillngunaki.	Iwernga	unugtuumaan,	aghneghtuumaan	qepghaqaagukut,	ughleghiiqaagukut	uqigtuqutnguyunghitutemnneng	nalighhiinaghpesinun.
B14_03_2Thess_V8	Elpesinun	aapsaqleguyaghtukut	kayusiitesqelluta,	yeghlegi	qepghaqaagukut	aflengaknaluta	whangkunneng	usputaanaluta	elpesinun	ayuqesighiisqelluta.
B14_03_2Thess_V9	Talwa	elpesinilluta	whaten	qelqaqegkemsi,	“Kina	alngunak	qepghaghyunghilnguq	neghestegpenaan.”
B14_03_2Thess_V10	Tawaten	pikaagukut	qayughllak	nagaqughaqukut	ilasinguq	ighsanitaghtut,	qepghaghyugigatut,	yeghlegi	yanutqwaaqiinguq	yuget.
B14_03_2Thess_V11	Aatghakun	Atanghem	Jesus	Christ-am	qelghaputlu	kayemaputlu	tawatelnguut	yuget	ighsanitiqefqiita	allgheghutesqelluki	kiyaghusighqiitneng.
B14_03_2Thess_V12	Ugpeqaalgutemnni,	qinuyagutegpenasi	pinitun	pineghmeng.
B14_03_2Thess_V13	Kina	alngunak	qaatkusunghilkan	sameng	pillemnnun	ukutgun	latamteggun,	suumqennakesi	kinkungutangi.	Enkaam	iqitngalghaasi	ellnganeng	kaynguyugesqelluku	anaggutellghaneng.
B14_03_2Thess_V14	Iwernga	kiyaghutegpenaan	anguyaguluku,	itupill	kelengasaaghteggu	ugpeqaalgutkelluku.
B14_03_2Thess_V15	Atanghem	ellmineng	katam	nekeggmellelitikayugem,	nekeggmellelisilli	iiwleng	sami	tamaghhaani.	Ataneq	tamaghhaaghpesinilli.
B14_03_2Thess_V16	Whanga,	Paul	whanga	katam	iiggemneng	igaqaqa	piniqilqa	elpesinun.	Tawaten	igaghaqunga	qamaglluki	latamkun	elpesinun	liisimakesqelluki	whangamneng	pingutangi.
B14_03_2Thess_V17	Nangllegtallgha	Atanemta	Jesus	Christ-am	tamaghhaghpesinilli.
B15_01_1Timothy_V1	Ukut	latat	Paul-meng	pinguut	apostle-nganeng	Christ	Jesus-em.	Apostle-ngughtekaagunga	qelellghakun	Kiyaghneghem	Yugulighistemta,	Christ	Jesus-emllu	sighimakegkamta.
B15_01_1Timothy_V1	Timothy-mun;	ighnepikamken	ugpeqillemtegnegun.	Kiyaghneghem	Atam,	Christ	Jesus-emllu	Atanemta	quyasliten,	nangllekliten,	nekeggmellelguslitenllu.
B15_01_1Timothy_V2	Aghulaqnaqumalunga	Macedonia-mun	Ephesus-metesqegkaqamken.	Ilangi	yuget	tamaanlenguut	apeghtughinguut	ipangunghilngughmeng	apeghtuusaneng.	Qeleghqi	taaqesqelluki
B15_01_1Timothy_V3	sangillghaatkegpenakinguq	akuzimghhutkelluki	ungipaghaatengllaqat,	sivunelghuteghllagetlu	aatghit.	Tamaakut	aaghtiiraaghusighhiinaagut,	kayutngunghitut	qepghaqaanun	Kiyaghneghem.	Ellngan	qepghaqaa	apeghiighaquq	ugpeqillghiinaghhaghqun.
B15_01_1Timothy_V4	Qeleluugutkaqa	ugpeqat	piniqutepiigesqelluki,	umyugaqeglluki,	ipapigmeng	ugpeqillelguluki.
B15_01_1Timothy_V5	Ilangita	yuget	pegtekaqiit	tamaakut	enkaam	aaghtiiraaghaqut	temngimeng.
B15_01_1Timothy_V6	Apeghtughistenguyugaqut	Kiyaghneghem	Liilightuusaanun.	Iwernga	liigikigatiit	akuzitkegkateng	qaywa	apeghtuusaqeghngaaghmegteki	ipasugnilluki.
B15_01_1Timothy_V7	Liisimakaput	Liilightuusat	pinightut	elqughlluki	atuqelghiini.
B15_01_1Timothy_V8	Liisimakaput	Liilightuusat	ulimaaghunghitut	pinilghiinun	yugnun.	Ulimaaghuut	liilightuusaneng	naafqiikayugnun,	qaatkusigalngughnunllu.	Ulimaaghuut	Kiyaghneghyugigalngughnun,	seghleghqestenunllu.	Ulimaaghuut	waakigalngughnun	Kiyaghneghmeng,	legasiighwaatkilghiinunllu	agleghnalghiinun.	Ulimaaghuut	tuqutikayugnun	atameggneng	nalighmeng	naameggneng,	yugtaghtenunllu.
B15_01_1Timothy_V9	Ulimaaghuut	sex-kun	seghleghqestenun,	yugnun	yulgutmeggneng	atuqikayugnun,	yugnun	akikikayugnun	yugmeng	qepghaghtelaaghuluki,	iqlengiqestenun,	iqlengalghiinun	liisimakistenun,	kipullginaalghiinunllu	Kiyaghneghem	apeghtuusiitnun	ipapighqengngalghiinun.
B15_01_1Timothy_V10	Taakut	apeghtuusat	piniipiglleghhiineng	Pinilghiineng	Ungipaneng	pinguut.	Aapghwaat	usuqnalghii	Kiyaghneq,	neghyukutkaqii	whangamnun	aapghesqelluki.
B15_01_1Timothy_V11	Iyamsiqayugvikaqa	Christ	Jesus	Ataneghput,	iknaqughsaqaqaanga	qepghaqamnun.	Iyamsiqayugvikaqa	esghaqaqaanga	ataasiighmellunga	nakmiklunga	qepghaatesqelluni.
B15_01_1Timothy_V12	Sivunghani	seghlepestaatun	akuzitkegkaqaqa	Christ-a,	seghlepestaatunllu	pikaqaqa.	Amyuqetaatkaqngamki	maligsaaghtengi	tawateteftuq	amyuqetaatkengnguftaqa	ellnga.	Tawalliima	Kiyaghneghem	nangllekegkaqegkanganga	qayughllak	salin	ugpeqigalkegka	Christ-a,	liigikumangilkegka	saaqutka.
B15_01_1Timothy_V13	Iwernga	Atanemta	nangllekeghllakaqaanga!	Ugpeqillelitkaqaanga,	piniqellelitkaqaangallu	Christ	Jesus-melngughmeng.
B15_01_1Timothy_V14	Sameng	pilleghqaqa	ipanguuq	enkaam	qamaglluni	ugpeqsaghqaaguq,	“Christ	Jesus	tagikaaguq	nunamun	yugulinaluki	seghleghqestet.”	Whanga	seghlelleghpigaagunga	seghleghqesteneng.
B15_01_1Timothy_V15	Naqamllu	Kiyaghneghem	nangllegyagutkaqaanga.	Enkaam	usputaagunga	naten	tagkaan	Christ	Jesus-em	utaqiilleghqaaneng	seghleghqesteneng	ugpeqesqelluni.	Taana	usputaq	tamaakunun	ayuquq	ugpeqiyaghqanun	ellnganeng	unguvallengesqelluki	kenlengilngughmeng.
B15_01_1Timothy_V16	Umiilegmun	kenlengilngughmun,	tuqupagningilngughmun,	aliinneghilngughmun,	ellnginaa	Kiyaghneghuuq;	ellnga	quulvallenglillu	usuqellenglillu	quunperugllak	kenlengunaan!	Amen.
B15_01_1Timothy_V17	Timothy-mi	ighnemni,	qavngaq	ilangita	uuknaliqistet	akuzitkegkaqaaten.	Enkaam	maaten	qelghamken	akuzitangit	guututkiki	pilluwamun.	Tawaten	pinitun	pilluwaghllequten	Christ-amun.
B15_01_1Timothy_V18	Ugpeqikestaa	Christ-akun	atuqluku	liisimakegkan	elqughutngalghii.	Ilangita	yuget	atuqigatiit	liisimakegkateng	elqughutngalghiit	enkaam	naafqaqiit	ugpeqilleteng	katam	angyaghpagiillghiistun.
B15_01_1Timothy_V19	Hymenaeus-enkuk	Alexander-enkuk	tamaakut	akulngitnituk.	Tuunegkaqagka	Tughneghagh-mun	liitesqellukek	seghlepestaatun	akuzitkefqaan	Kiyaghneq	pisqelluku.
B15_02_1Timothy_V2	Yughaatkiki	umiilget,	qamagllukillu	igleghutilghiit,	kiyaghsaghqaaluta	nekeggmelluta	maniguusimaluta,	quulvaamalukullu	Kiyaghneq.
B15_02_1Timothy_V1	Sivukluku	kayemamken	yughaatkesqelluki	qamaglluki	yuget,	tungsiitesqelluki	Kiyaghneghmun	aklukegkiitneng,	iyamsiqayagunnaketenllu	Kiyaghneghmun.
B15_02_1Timothy_V2	Tawatelnguq	yughalleq	pinightuq,	efqughnaghtuq	Kiyaghneghmi	Yugulighistemnni,
B15_02_1Timothy_V3	qayughllak	qamaglluku	yuuk	yugulillengesugaa,	liitesugaallu	ipapilleq.
B15_02_1Timothy_V4	Taawa	ataasiinaaguq	Kiyaghneq,	ataasiinaaguqlu	ilaliighutista	Kiyaghneghmunllu	yugnunllu.	Taananguuq	yuuk	Christ	Jesus.
B15_02_1Timothy_V5	Ellmineng	tuunegkaaguq	aghqutnguluni	itemunnaluki	seghleghqellghitneng	qamaglluki	yuget.	Taananguuq	pilleghqaghlluwaaq	Kiyaghneghem	kelgutillgha	yugulillengesugniluki	yuget	qamaglluki.
B15_02_1Timothy_V6	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	Kiyaghneghem	nakmikegkaqaanga	ungipaqistengulunga,	apostle-ngulunga.	Kayagtaanga	apeghtiisqelluki	Gentile-et	ugpeqilleghmengllu	ipapilleghmengllu.	Ipa	ungipaatamken,	iqlengiqngunghitunga!
B15_02_1Timothy_V7	Tamaghhaani	yughaghvigni	yugiinaat	yughiisqesuganka.	Tamaakungulit	kiyaghlleghhit	qaatkulluteng	Kiyaghneghem	piyukellghanun.	Yughaghlit	nengugulluki	iiggeteng	sakraallngunatengllu	aaghtiiraallngunatengllu.
B15_02_1Timothy_V8	Piyukankallu	aghnat	pinighnallghit	kelgutesqelluki	pinitun	pilugullghitgun.	Aatkiit	mallegngafqiita	nalighmeng	kayngunaghyaghqaafqiita.	Itupill	pinighnalleteng	kelgullitki	aneghneghqilleghmegteggun,	nakaan	nuyaqegsaghwaalleghqun	nalighmeng	gold-mengllu	pearl-mengllu	ullngaqluteng	nalighmeng	akituqameng	aatkameng	aalluteng.	Tawaten	pilleq	elqughutngaaq	aghnanun	maniguutkayugunilghiinun	Kiyaghneghmun.
B15_02_1Timothy_V9	Yuget	apeghtughinghata	yughaghvigni	aghnat	nagasaghqaagut	nepiighngaghmeng,	malighqutaqluteng.
B15_02_1Timothy_V11	Aghnat	apeghtughistesugigatanka	nalighmeng	igleghutistengusugigatanka	yugnun.	Nepiighngayaghqaagut,
B15_02_1Timothy_V12	qayughllak	Kiyaghneghem	ulimayuggaaqaqaa	Adam,	taagken	Eve.
B15_02_1Timothy_V13	Adam-ngunghituq	puughtellengegkaq,	iwernga	aghnaaguq	puughtellengegkaq	enkaam	seghleghqestengughtekaaquq.
B15_02_1Timothy_V14	Iwernga	aghnat	ighniightuqumeng	taghnughhaghneng	yugulillengellequt	nagneghumakuyeng	neghyukluku	Jesus,	piniqimanginaqumeng	ilameggneng,	kiyaghsimanginaqumengllu	agleghnaghluku	kiyaghtaalleghmeng	qusevegtellelighluteng.
B15_03_1Timothy_V3	Suumestenguyaghqaanghituq,	suuglluguyaghqaanghituq	iwernga	nanglleghtaghyaghqaaguq,	qanengnaqigasaghqaaguq,	maniyuneghtuyaghqaanghituq.
B15_03_1Timothy_V1	Whaten	pilleq	ipanguuq:	Kina	alngunak	igleghutistenguyukumi	ugpeqanun	taana	qepghaqaq	piyukegkaa	piniipigtuq.
B15_03_1Timothy_V2	Igleghutista	avutngisaghqaaguq,	ataasimeng	nuliilguyaghqaaguq,	nuqenneghtuyaghqaaguq,	sumeghtaghaqegsaghqaaguq,	yupiinghuyaghqaaguq,	upughanghuyaghqaaguq,	apeghtughiyaqleguuqlu.
B15_03_1Timothy_V3	Igleghutistem	igleghutngwaaghyaghqaqii	mangteghaghmiini,	avaqutanillu	apeghtughyaghqaqii	veghusnaatefqaami	qaatkesqelluni.
B15_03_1Timothy_V4	Igleghutista	igleghutillgiskumi	ellmi	katam	nengllugutmineng,	naten'ngam	aflengakelleqaki	ugpeqistengi	Kiyaghneghem?
B15_03_1Timothy_V5	Igleghutista	ugpenghhaanghisaghqaaguq,	luuraq	qukaayugtepagnayukan	enkaam	nanqigtellengellequq	aghyuughyaghqaaluni	Tughneghaghtun.
B15_03_1Timothy_V6	Igleghutista	pinitun	kiyaghsaghqaaguq	ugpeqaanghilngughnun	akuzitkesqelluku	itagnaghluku.	Enkaam	seghlequughpagningilleqaat,	Tughneghaamllu	kayaalqepagningilleqaa.
B15_03_1Timothy_V7	Tawateghpigaq	Deacon-etlu	pinighluki	akuzitkesaghqaagut,	ipapighqengngayaghqaagut,	wine-meng	meghepagyaghqaanghitut,	pakigneghuyaghqaanghitutlu	manimeng.
B15_03_1Timothy_V8	Pegsaghqaqenghitiit	apeghtuusat	Kiyaghneghem	qayvighqegkii,	umyugiitlu	seghleghyugisaghqaagut.
B15_03_1Timothy_V9	Igleghutistet	nakmiighvagilgameng	deacon-kaghqameng	qepghaqalilluki	liigiknakangit	piniitangi	yuget.	Taagken	deacon-ngughtesnakangit.
B15_03_1Timothy_V10	Tawateghpigaq	aghnatlu	pinighluki	akuzitkesaghqaagut,	yiillgiyaghqaanghitut,	iwernga	nuqenneghtuyaghqaagut,	ataasiighmesaghqaagutlu	sakun	tamaghhaakun.
B15_03_1Timothy_V11	Deacon-et	ataasimeng	nuliilguyaghqaagut,	igleghutngwaaghyaghqaqiit	avaqutatengllu	mangteghaghmiitengllu.
B15_03_1Timothy_V12	Tamaakut	deacon-et	qepghaqegtat	quulvallengyaghqaagut,	nalluneqsuknaanghitaatlu	ugpeqilleghteng	Christ	Jesus-kun.
B15_03_1Timothy_V13	Sunanguq	qantaghaqun	elpenun	pilanga,	iwernga	maaten	elpenun	latatkanka	tamaakut	apeghtuusat.
B15_03_1Timothy_V14	Enkaam	kimaawimakuma	latama	liisimakesleqaaten	naten	ugpeqat	kiyaghsaghqaatangi	Kiyaghneghem	nengllugutanganilnguut.	Ellnginguut	ugpeqistengi	unguvalghiim	Kiyaghneghem,	aghveghaqetaagut,	tunemaagutlu	ipapilleghmun.
B15_03_1Timothy_V15	Nalluneqnaghhangunaki	ugpeqaput	apeghtuusat	Kiyaghneghem	qayvightekii	seghleghllaguutlu	ipapestaaghuutlu:	Christ-a	allgeqaaguq	yugusipiguluni,	Kiyaghneghem	Taghneghagkenka	liisimakestii	tamaakut	ellngan	pikii	elqughutngatangi,	yaqulgetlu	esghaqaqaat.	Ungipaqegkaaguq	nunataghhaani	tamaghhaani,	ugpeqegkaqaat	nunataghhani	tamaghhaani,	taagken	qilagmun	mayuutkaguq.
B15_04_1Timothy_V4	Kiyaghneghem	ulimaaghi	qamaglluteng	pinilghiinguut.	Enkaam	ighsaksaghqaanghitut	tugukliimakumeng	iyamsiqayagulluki.
B15_04_1Timothy_V1	Agleghnalghiik	Taghneghak	whateghlluwaaq	piik	kingulighni	aghneghni	ilangita	yuget	peglleqaat	ugpeqilleghteng	Christ-akun.	Tawaten	pillequt	qayughllak	qaatkelleqegkangit	iqlengalghiit	tughneghaat,	apeghtuusiitlu.
B15_04_1Timothy_V2	Tawatelnguut	apeghtuusat	iqlengalghiineng	pinguut.	Iqlengiqelleteng	aapghaqiit	ipapigsugnighqelluki.	Nagannaniqaqiit	umyugateng	liisimakilghiit	elqughutngalleghmengllu	anaggutngalleghmengllu.
B15_04_1Timothy_V3	Tawatelnguut	yuget	nengughutesnanighiiqut,	ilangillu	neqem	neghesnanighaqiit.	Iwernga	Kiyaghneghem	ulimaaqii	qamaglluki	neqet	neghyaghqaaluki	iyamsiqayagutaqluki.	Ugpeqat	liisimakilghiit	ipapilleghmeng	liisimakiit	tamaakut.
B15_04_1Timothy_V4	Akuzitangakun	Kiyaghneghem,	yughakunllu	aaftekaagut	agleghnaghluki.
B15_04_1Timothy_V5	Tamaakut	apeghtuusat	liigikestengngwaaqufki	ugpeqaalgutegpenun,	pinilghiingullequten	qepghaghtenga	Christ	Jesus-em.	Ugpeqillghen	iknaqughlleqaa	liisimanginaqufki	ipapillghet	ugpeqat	ugpeqaqegkangit,	pinilghiitlu	apeghtuusat	qaatkegkaghten.
B15_04_1Timothy_V6	Nagategpenaki	sasiinghilnguut	ungipaghaatet	tengvimun	ayuqelghiit	Kiyaghneghem	ipapillghanun.	Yeghlegi	peghqigsaatkigu	Kiyaghneghmun	ayuqelghii	kiyaghtaalleq.
B15_04_1Timothy_V7	Yugusim	ulapellgha	pinightuq,	iwernga	kiyaghtelleghput	Kiyaghneghem	piyukellghatun	ayuqelghii	pinighataghaghtuq.	Kayusiisaghqaqiinkut	whani	unguvallemnni,	tuunglighhaanillu	unguvallghem.
B15_04_1Timothy_V8	Taana	pilleq	ipanguuq,	enkaam	qamagtengngwaaghluni	ugpeqsaghqaaguq.
B15_04_1Timothy_V9	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	qepghaghllaguukutlu	sagiqliightengnguukutlu	yugnun	ugpeqesqelluku	ipapilleq.	Tawaten	piikut	qayughllak	neghyukaghput	unguvalghii	Kiyaghneq,	Yugulighistengat	qamaglluteng	yuget,	kiyang	tamaakut	ugpelghiit	ellngakun.
B15_04_1Timothy_V10	Qeleghqi	apeghtughqi	tamaaken.
B15_04_1Timothy_V11	Kitumun	alngunak	palaqestegpenaan	anglinghhaamallghen.	Iwernga	ugpeqanun	usputaawi	akuzilleghpegun,	salleghpegun,	piniqelleghpegun,	ugpeqilleghpegun,	pelungilluten	kiyaghtelleghpegun.
B15_04_1Timothy_V12	Kaatellemnun	kenlanga,	ugpeqat	qerngughunneghata	atightuutaqiki	Akuzitneng	Igaqegkaneng,	ungipaqitaqiki,	apeghtughaqiki.
B15_04_1Timothy_V13	Atuqaqigu	taghneghagnekun	tunusaq	ilugpenilnguq.	Taana	tunusaq	tuunegkaaguq	elpenun	uuknaliqelleghqun	Elder-et	iigtighaqngaten.
B15_04_1Timothy_V14	Pinaqellghen	qamaglluku	piiqiki	qelghutkanka.	Tawaten	yuget	liilleqaat	pillguughlleghhiiten.
B15_04_1Timothy_V15	Piraamsingwaaghluten	kiyaghtaalleghpenillu	apeghtughilleghpenillu.	Tawaten	pikuvek	elpeneng	yugulillequten,	tamaakutlu	nagatesteten.
B15_05_1Timothy_V5	Ugingighaq	ilakwaaghiitkaq	sighimanguuq	Kiyaghneghqun.	Enkaam	unugtuumaan,	aghneghtuumaan	yughaamanginaaguq	kayusiitesqelluni.
B15_05_1Timothy_V1	Aghyuughpenaan	siivanlleq	yuuk,	iwernga	kavyungunaan	nallghusaghaqigu	atakelghiistun.	Uyuqliit	yuget	anglegutkelghiistun	piiqiki.
B15_05_1Timothy_V2	Siivanlleghet	aghnat	naakelghiistun	piiqiki,	enkaam	uyuqliit	aghnat	nayagestun	piiqiki,	qiliighyukefqiita.
B15_05_1Timothy_V3	Kayusiitiki	ugingighat	aflengakistengiitkat.
B15_05_1Timothy_V4	Iwernga	ugingighaq	avaqutaghtukumi	nalighmeng	eltughaghtukumi,	kelgullit	nengllugutmeggnun	kiyaghsugniluteng	Kiyaghneghem	kiyaghtesqellghatun.	Aflengakelleghmegteggun	angayuqateng	akinaqelleqiit	enkaam	efqughlleqaat	Kiyaghneq.
B15_05_1Timothy_V5	Iwernga	ugingighaq	teghigniqnginaqumi	ellmineng	efqughhnaluni,	unguvaghngaaghmi	tuqukastun	ayuqsaghqaaguq.
B15_05_1Timothy_V6	Qeleghqi	ugpeqat	tamaakut	pisqelluki	enkaam	kitum	alngunak	seghlequunghillitki.
B15_05_1Timothy_V7	Kitum	alngunak	aflengakenghilkumiki	ilakwaani,	wata	ellmi	katam	nengllugutni,	tawaten	pilleghmikun	pegtekaqaa	ugpeqilleni.	Enkaam	seghleghataghaallequq	ugpeqaanghilngughmeng.
B15_05_1Timothy_V8	Ugingighaq	60	uksughtutkaliimakan,	nengughtekaakanllu	ataasimeng,	aatgha	igaqsaghngaaghmi	ayuquq	ugingighat	atelghutiitgun.
B15_05_1Timothy_V9	Amalleqa	tamangan	liisimakaat	qepghallegtulanga,	katam	avaqutani	pinitun	anglistellghatun,	upughaneghtulanga,	ugpeqaalgutmi	itegiit	ughvughaqluki,	kayusighiiqluni	seghleliilghiineng,	quunpengllu	pinitun	piiqelghii.
B15_05_1Timothy_V10	Iwernga	nuteghat	ugingighat	aatghit	igaqegpenaki	atelghutatgun.	Yugusiita	piyukellghan	sakniqesneghisteng	ugiighyugllequt.	Tawaten	pimakumeng	naafqelleqaat	akeqilleghteng	Christ-amun.
B15_05_1Timothy_V11	Enkaam	Kiyaghneghem	nanqiglleqii	aghyuughyaghqaaluki	qayughllak	naafqegkangat	akeqilleghteng.
B15_05_1Timothy_V12	Taam	saaghwakun	ighsanitaghtaqii,	itghiitughtaqii,	yiillgitughtaqii,	yanutquneghtughtaqii,	akuzitkaqiitlu	sangwaat	akuzitkesaghqaqenghilketeng.
B15_05_1Timothy_V13	Enkaam	itagnaghataghaghnayaghtut	nuteghat	uginghighat	ugiighyaquyeng,	taghnughhangluteng,	aflengakesqellukillu	nengllugutangit.	Tawaten	pikumeng	anguyak	seghlequughvigiitesleqaat	whangkunneng.
B15_05_1Timothy_V14	Aawallu	ilangi	nuteghat	ugingighat	ugpeqaananighluteng	maligusimaat	Tughneghagh-mun.
B15_05_1Timothy_V15	Ugpeqaq	aghnaq	ilakwaalgukumi	ugingighaneng,	ellngan	kayusiisaghqaqii.	Enkaam	ilangita	ugpeqat	kayusiinneghisaghngaaghmegteki	ayuqiit.	Taagken	ugpeqat	kayusiilleqiit	uginghighat	aflengakistengiitkat.
B15_05_1Timothy_V16	Elder-et	igleghutiyuqat	yugaghvigmi,	taakunginaghhaagnengllu	qepghalghiit	apeghtughilleghqun,	ungipaqilleghqunllu,	quulvaghaqiteki	malghughqelluki	akileghtuusiit.
B15_05_1Timothy_V17	Qayughllak	Akuzitet	Igaqegkat	piit,	“Ox-a	tutmalghii	grain-meng	malliighnaluki,	neghesqelluku	grain-meng	sugrugiitighpenaan.”	Amalleqa,	“Qepghaghta	akileghtughyaghqaaguq	qepghallghanun.”
B15_05_1Timothy_V18	Nagategpenaki	kinkut	alngunak	avutkilghiit	Elder-meng	anaggusimaniluku,	wetkuqun	avutkilghii	liisimakistelgukan	maalghugegneng	nalighmeng	pingayuneng.
B15_05_1Timothy_V19	Kina	alngunak	seghleghqumanginaqan,	aghyuughnaken	seghleghqennaniisqelluku	ugpeqat	manungitni.	Tawaten	pikuvgu	ilangi	tamaakut	alingellequt.
B15_05_1Timothy_V20	Tamaakut	qelghutanka	elpenun	qaatkesqelluki,	pakiggutifqaavek	nalighmeng	taniilqifqaavek	pisqelluten.	Tawaten	qelghamken	esghaamanghitni	Kiyaghneghenkut,	Christ	Jesus-enkut,	nakmikegkatlu	yaqulget.
B15_05_1Timothy_V21	Iigtighaghtegpenaan	kina	igleghutistekaghqaaluku	yughaghvigmi.	Taayughqegkuvek	ilalkiinnayukavek	seghleghqellghanun.	Kiyaghtekestaa	pelungilluten.
B15_05_1Timothy_V22	Meghhiinaghmeng	meghegpenang,	iwernga	wine-ngiighhaghmeng	meqaghaqluten	kayutkelleqan	aqsaqughpenun,	qinuyugaatalleghpenunllu.
B15_05_1Timothy_V23	Ilangita	yuget	seghleghqellghit	aliitngwaaghaqut,	talwa	salin	nanqigtellghilluteng.	Iwernga	ilangita	yuget	seghleghqellghit	aliighsaghqaagut	kinguvaqwaaqun.
B15_05_1Timothy_V24	Tawateghpigaq	aneghneghqillghat	aliitngwaaghaqut,	iwernga	tamaakut	aliinneghilnguut	iighnganaanghitut.
B15_06_1Timothy_V6	Iwernga	allgeghuteghllagllequkut	kiyaghtekumta	Kiyaghneghem	kiyaghtesqesullghatun	itagnaqluku	pitutalvut.
B15_06_1Timothy_V1	Qamaglluteng	qepghaghtelaaghet	siivakeghllaglitki	tamaakut	piliitisteteng,	enkaam	kitum	alngunak	seghletun	akuzitkenghillikek	aatgha	Kiyaghneghem,	apeghtughilleghputlu.
B15_06_1Timothy_V2	Qepghaghtelaaghet	piliitistengit	ugpeqaalgutngukata	siivakataghaghlitki	qayughllak	ugpeqaalgutkegkangit.	Enkaam	qepghaataghaghlitki	qayughllak	kayusiingwiit	ugpeqaalguteteng	piniqegkateng.	Tamaakut	apeghtuusaqikillu	ungipaqikillu.
B15_06_1Timothy_V3	Kina	alngunak	apeghtughikumi	allanguluku	tamaakuneng	apeghtuusaneng,	itagnaqenghitii	apeghtuusapigi	Atanemta	Jesus	Christ-am.	Ellngan	apeghtuusaan	ungipaatiinkut	Kiyaghneghem	piyukellghatun	kiyaghtelleghqameng.
B15_06_1Timothy_V4	Kina	alngunak	allatun	apeghtughilghii	aangaayugneghllaguuq,	liigikigatuq	sameng	alngunak.	Aaghtiiraaghyuneghtuuqlu	qaniqsuneghtuuqlu	akuzitneng.	Tawaten	pillghem	allgeghtaqii:	aqinalleq,	aghivatelleq,	seghlequughutelleq,	ugpequnnanilleq.
B15_06_1Timothy_V5	Tawatelnguut	quunpeng	aaghtiiraaghutestiiqut.	Umyugiit	sumeghneghlluugtaqut	enkaam	liisimaknanighaqaat	ipapilleq.	Sumeghmeggni	qepghaaskumegteggu	Kiyaghneq	aklungighilleqniluteng	piiqut.
