B15_06_1Timothy_V6	Allgeghaqngamta	nunamun	kelqutngitukut,	tuqukumtallu	kelqutelgunaanghitukut.
B15_06_1Timothy_V7	Enkaam	itagnaghllequkut	neqelgukumta,	aatkalgukumta.
B15_06_1Timothy_V8	Iwernga	tamaakut	aklungighiyulghiit	nanghiiqullengaqut.	Seghleghem	piyukellghita	tugwaaqii	enkaam	temngitwhaghllagughtaqut.	Taagken	piyukellghita	sayugaqii	naafqelleghmun.
B15_06_1Timothy_V9	Manimeng	piniqilleq	akuqaa	qamaglluni	seghleghem.	Ilangita	yuget	pegtaqaat	ugpeqilleghteng	qayughllak	manitughqaaghllagyulghiit.	Enkaam	ellmeggneng	qivghughllagughtaqut.
B15_06_1Timothy_V10	Iwernga	elpek	Kiyaghneghem	yukaaten,	enkaam	iqitngaluten	tamaakuneng.	Sagiqutiki	elqughutngalleq,	kiyaghten	Kiyaghneghem	kiyaghtesqellghatun,	ugpeqillelighluten,	piniqillelighluten,	nuqenneghtuluten,	nangllegtaghluten.
B15_06_1Timothy_V11	Pilluwaatigu	ugpeqilleq	qayughllak	tawaten	pilluwalleq	pinilghiinguuq.	Tugugullu	kenlengilnguq	unguvalleq.	Kiyaghneghem	tagsiqaqaaten	tugukliisqelluku	taana	unguvalleq	aapghaqngavgu	ugpeqillghen	ugpeqalghutnun.
B15_06_1Timothy_V12	Qeleghnaqamken	nagasimanghani	Kiyaghneghem,	unguvallelitikam	samun	tamaghhaanun	unguvalghiinun,	nagasimanghanillu	Christ	Jesus-em,	kiimsighilaataqughikam	Pontius	Pilate-mun.
B15_06_1Timothy_V13	Qelghamken	piraamsiluten	qaatkesqelluki	qamaglluki	qelgutkanka	elpenun.	Nagneghutiki	kenlanga	Atanemta	Jesus	Christ-am	uteghninqiglleghanun.	Tawaten	pikuvek	kitum	alngunak	anagguniluten	pinaanghitaaten.
B15_06_1Timothy_V14	Kiyaghneghem	pilleghqaghlluwaaghmini	tagisleqaa	Jesus	Christ-a.	Usuqnalghii	Kiyaghneq,	ellnginaaguq	Igleghutisteghllak,	ellnganguuq	Umiilgat	umiilget,	Atanghat	atanghet.
B15_06_1Timothy_V15	Ellngiinaaguq	tuqungigalnguq.	Kiyaghtengnguuq	nighugrakegllagmi	repall	kitum	alngunak	tughaaghpagningitaa.	Kitum	alngunak	esghiigataa,	talwa	esghaghnaanghitaa.	Kiyaghneghem	piklikek	quulvalleqlu	aghtughyaghqaanghilleqlu	quunperugllak.	Amen.
B15_06_1Timothy_V16	Qukaayugtesnanighqi	tamaakut	aklungilnguut	nunami	whani,	talwa	sighimasnanighqi	aklungingitgun	nalluneqnalghiitgun.	Iwernga	sighimasqiki	Kiyaghneghqun.	Ellngan	ighlegutegpenaamta	tuunaqiinkut	sameng	tamaghhaaneng	pinighyuugusighqameng.
B15_06_1Timothy_V17	Aklungilnguut	pinitun	pisqiki,	aklungitesqiki	pinitun	qepghalleghqun,	ighlellngunaki	tuuniyukestaghluki	ilangitnun	yugnun.
B15_06_1Timothy_V18	Tawaten	pikumeng	kagpaglleqaat	aklungi	ellmeggnun.	Taana	aklungi	ayugilnguuguq	tunemaq	aagnakaghqiitnilnguq.	Enkaam	unguvallengellequt	unguvallepigmeng.
B15_06_1Timothy_V19	Timothy,	kelengakluki	tamaakut	Kiyaghneghem	neghyukutkii	elpenun.	Iqitngaluten	ugpeqaanghilnguut	temngitwhaneng	akuzitngitnengllu,	aaghtiiraaghutellghitnengllu.	Tamaakut	ugpeqaanghilnguut	sumeghmeggni	liisimallepiilguniiqut,	iwernga	ipangunghituq.
B15_06_1Timothy_V20	Ilangita	pegsimaat	ugpeqilleghteng	qayughllak	ugpeqegkangat	ipangunghilnguq	liisimalleq.	Kiyaghneghem	quyaslisi.
B16_01_2Timothy_V1	Ukut	latat	Paul-meng	pinguut	apostle-nganeng	Christ	Jesus-em	Kiyaghneghem	piyukellghakun.	Kayagtekaqaanga	aapghesqelluku	akequsaqegkaq	unguvalleq	Christ	Jesus-melnguq.
B16_01_2Timothy_V1	Timothy-mun	piniqepigtekamnun	ighnemnun.	Kiyaghneghem	Atam,	Christ	Jesus-emllu	Atanemta	quyasliten,	nangllekliten,	nekeggmellelguslitenllu.
B16_01_2Timothy_V2	Unugtuumaan,	aghneghtuumaan	yughallemkun	iyamsiqayugvikaqaqa	Kiyaghneq	elpeneng.	Qepghaataqaqa	seghleghyullngunanga,	katam	sivunemtun.
B16_01_2Timothy_V3	Esghaghyupigtaqamken	allameng,	qayughllak	neqamikaqa	pellghututaqngamtung	qiyakaalghiiten.	Enkaam	quyaghllagllequnga	qerngughunneqigtekumtung.
B16_01_2Timothy_V4	Neqamikaqa	ugpeqillepiigen.	Taananguuq	ataasiq	ugpeqilleq	nengyughpek	Lois-em,	naagpeklu	Eunice-em	atuqegkangak.	Liisimakngwaaghaqa	elpeklu	atuqngwaan.
B16_01_2Timothy_V5	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	neqangughsugamken,	atuqumanginaghhu	tunusan	Kiyaghneghmeng,	tuunegkaqaa	iigtighaqngamken.
B16_01_2Timothy_V6	Kiyaghneghem	taghneghalitellghitiinkut	alingyugnalghiimeng.	Itupill	Taghneghagkenka	imiqaqiinkut	aghtughyaghqaanghilleghmeng,	piniqelleghmeng,	nuqetelleghmengllu.
B16_01_2Timothy_V7	Kayngukegpenaan	ungipaqigu	Ataneghput,	talwa	kaynguyagutegpenanga	anusimingllaghaagunga	Christ-a	apalluqluku.	Itupill	aghtughyaghqaanghillghakun	Kiyaghneghem	ikfiqelgusighnga	Pinilghiit	Ungipat	apalluqluki.
B16_01_2Timothy_V8	Kiyaghneghem	yugulikaqiinkutlu	nakmikegkaqiinkutlu	pelungitesqelluta.	Tawaten	pikaaguq	apalluqluki	ellmi	katam	uspeqellenillu	piniqillenillu,	nakaan	qepghalleghput	apalluqluku.	Piniqegkaqiinkut	Christ	Jesus-kun	sivutghulluku	piinlilleghqaan	nunam.
B16_01_2Timothy_V9	Iwernga	whaa	piniqelleni	liitestaa	whangkunnun	tagillghakun	Yugulighistemta	Christ	Jesus-em.	Christ-am	naafqegkaqaa	tuqulleq,	taagken	Pinilghiitgun	Ungipatgun	liitestiinkut	tuqungigalngughmeng	unguvalleghmeng.
B16_01_2Timothy_V10	Pinilghiit	Ungipat	apalluqluki	Kiyaghneghem	nakmikegkaqaanga	ungipaqistengulunga,	apostle-ngulunga,	apeghtughistengulungallu.
B16_01_2Timothy_V11	Taakut	apalluqluki	ikfiqnguunga.	Iwernga	kaynguyunghitunga	qayughllak	liisimakaqa	kinangutanga	ugpeqegkaqa.	Liisimakngwaaghaqa	ellngan	kelengaksaqlegwaa	sangwaa	neghyukutkaqa	ellnganun	kenlanga	kingulighmun	Aghneghmun.
B16_01_2Timothy_V12	Maligtiki	apeghtuusapiget	nagaquqaghten	whangamneng.	Usputaagut	atughqaqaten.	Apeghtuusaqiki	ugpeqilleghqunllu	piniqelleghqunllu	allgeghtekaqaten	Christ	Jesus-meng.
B16_01_2Timothy_V13	Kelengakigu	ipapilleq	neghyukutkaq	elpenun.	Kelengakigu	kayutkellukek	Agleghnalghiik	Taghneghak	kiyaghlleghhiik	ilumnni.
B16_01_2Timothy_V14	Liisimakan	qamagtevzighluteng	ugpeqat	Asia-melnguut	kayusighyugnaniimaatnga,	talwa	Phygelus-enkuk	Hermogenes-enkuk.
B16_01_2Timothy_V15	Yughaatkengngwaanka	Ataneghmun	nangllegyagutesqelluki	Onesiphorus-em	nengllugutangi,	qayughllak	uglaghngaan	ilutughsaghaqaanga.	Kaynguyagusimangitaallu	anusimingllaghaamalqa.
B16_01_2Timothy_V16	Kaataqngami	Rome-emun	ivan'ghiighutkaqaanga	kenlanga	naalkelleghminun.
B16_01_2Timothy_V17	Ataneghmun	yughaatkaqaqa	Onesiphorus	nangllegyagutesqelluku	tawani	Aghneghmi!	Liisimakan	kayutkeghllakaqaqa	Ephesus-mi.
B16_02_2Timothy_V2	Elpeklu	tawantutkatlu	nagatkaqasi	apeghtuusanka.	Enkaam	apeghtuusanka	neghyukutiki	ataasiighmelngughnun.	Taagken	ellngita	apeghtuusaqlegulleqiit	ilameggnun.
B16_02_2Timothy_V1	Enkaangam	elpek	ighnemni,	iknaqi	atuqelleghpegun	piniqellgha	Christ	Jesus-em.
B16_02_2Timothy_V2	Ikfiqelgusighqut	pinilghiitun	pilluwaghtengatun	Christ	Jesus-em.
B16_02_2Timothy_V3	Pilluwaghtem	ilatngalghiim	pilluwaghtenun	efqughsugaqaa	umiileni,	enkaam	akumghhuusigatuq	pilluwaghtengunghilnguut	kiyaghtaallghitnun.
B16_02_2Timothy_V4	Kayaalqiiraaghta	kilgaaqumun	malighqutaqenghilkumi	liilightuusameggnun,	allgeghunnaanghituq	qaghpanganeng	kayaalqiistem.
B16_02_2Timothy_V5	Ughleghiighllakaq	piitesighaghta	nengighyuwhaaghyaghqaaguq	unataqata.
B16_02_2Timothy_V6	Sumeghtaaghaatkiki	sameng	pillghenka	qayughllak	Atanghem	liigiksagutesleqaaten	sameng	tamaghhaaneng.
B16_02_2Timothy_V7	Neqamikluku	Kiyaghneghem	unguvaghtestekaqaa	Jesus	Christ-a	tuqulleghmeng,	kingunqaa	David-em.	Tamaakunguut	ungipaqaqegkenka	apenemki	Pinilghiit	Ungipat.
B16_02_2Timothy_V8	Ikfiqnguunga	qayughllak	ungipaqegkenka	Pinilghiit	Ungipat.	Talwa	qiipraghusighlunga	ayuqunga	liilightuusameng	naafqiistetun.	Iwernga	akuzitangi	Kiyaghneghem	qiipraghutngitut.
B16_02_2Timothy_V9	Enkaam	ikfiqusiqsugluku	ayuqaqa	sangwaa	tamaghhaan	Kiyaghneghem	nakmikegkii	yugulillengesqelluki	Christ	Jesus-kun.	Yugulilleghmegteggun	nighughqellengellequt	kenlengilngughmeng.
B16_02_2Timothy_V10	Maakut	pillghet	ipanguut:	Tuqulgusiimakumteggu,	kiyaghtelgusighlleqaghput.
B16_02_2Timothy_V11	Iilqayunghilkumta,	igleghutilgusighlleqaghput.	Nallunqegkumteggu,	ellnganllu	nallunqelleqiinkut.
B16_02_2Timothy_V12	Ataasiighmenneghilkumta,	ellnga	ataasiighmetaquq	qayughllak	taaqnaanghituq	ataasiighmenneghmeng.
B16_02_2Timothy_V13	Kitumun	alngunak	puygustegpenaki	tamaakut.	Kiyaghneghem	nagasimanghani,	kelengasaaghqi	qaniqututkefqiita	akuzitet	pisqelluki.	Qaniqutellghat	kayutngunaanghituq,	naafqengnginaghlleqaat	ugpeqillghat	nagallghiit.
B16_02_2Timothy_V14	Taakunginaghhaagneng	qepghaa	Kiyaghneghmun	itagnaqesqelluten.	Qepghaghtengu	kayngukingigalnguq	qepghaqamineng.	Elqughaghllukullu	apeghtuusaqigu	Kiyaghneghem	ungipaghpigaa.
B16_02_2Timothy_V15	Iqitngaluten	temngitwhaneng,	sameng	pisiinghilngughneng	aleghquutelleghneng.	Tawatelnguut	aleghquutellghet	uyavaataghaghlleqiit	yuget	Kiyaghneghmeng.
B16_02_2Timothy_V16	Tawatelnguut	temngitwhat	apeghtuusat	aqnighneghestun	ayuqut	mingitkayuget	maamyaghqaanghilnguut.	Hymenaeus-enkuk	Philetus-enkuk	apeghtughillghik	tawatelnguugut.
B16_02_2Timothy_V17	Pegtekaqiik	apeghtuusapiget	qayughllak	piiquk	siingenllu	tuqukat	unguvaghtesimaniluki.	Enkaam	ilangitnun	ugpeqnanightestekaqaak	ipapilleq.
B16_02_2Timothy_V18	Iwernga	ayugilnguq	tunemaq	Kiyaghneghem	nekegtekaa	qapragtepagningituq.	Taaggun	tunemakun	igaqngaat	akuzitet:	“Atanghem	liisimakii	ellmi	pini.”	Whatenllu	igaqngaaq,	“Kina	alngunak	tuqlughilghii	aatghaneng	Ataneghem,	seghletun	pineghmeng	taaqli.”
B16_02_2Timothy_V19	Mangteghaghllagmi	allaaghhiinaghmeng	salghutaghtuuq:	ilangi	ulimaaghuut	gold-meng,	silver-meng,	unaghsimeng,	qikumengllu.	Ilangi	salghutat	megnunalghiinun	atuugut,	ilangi	samun	alngungak.
B16_02_2Timothy_V20	Kina	alngunak	ellmineng	katam	pelungighsaqumi	seghleghmeng,	salghutaghtun	atughqaaghllequq	megnunalghiimun.	Aaftekaaghllequq	atuuluni	mangtegham	yuganun.	Taagken	atughqaaghllequq	alngunak	pinilghiimun	qepghaqamun.
B16_02_2Timothy_V21	Iqitngaluten	sameng	seghleghmeng	anglinghhat	atuqsugaqegkangitneng.	Quunpeng	atuqaqigu	elqughutngalleq.	Ataasiighmelluten,	piniqingaluten,	nekeggmellutenllu.	Tamaakut	atuqiki,	maligulluten	tuqlughilghiinun	Ataneghmun	qamaken	pelungilngughmeng	ilumeggneng.
B16_02_2Timothy_V22	Iqitngaluten	temngitwhaneng	aleghquutellghitneng	yuget	akuzitkilghiineng	liigikumangilkemeggneng.	Liisimakaten	aaghtiiraaghutestikayuguut.
B16_02_2Timothy_V23	Atanghem	qepghaghtenga	aaghtiiraaghtengunghituq.	Itupill	nangllegtaghyaghqaaguq	tamanganun.	Pinilghiinguyaghqaaguq	apeghtughista.	Nuqenneghtuyaghqaaguq.
B16_02_2Timothy_V24	Atanghem	qepghaghtenga	kavyugisaghqaaguq	apeghtughikumi	kipullginaalghiinun.	Walluumllu	Kiyaghneghem	avuteghqestaqliki	ugpeqesqelluku	ipapilleq.
B16_02_2Timothy_V25	Enkaam	liisaaghaghyaqumeng	anagnayaghaat	Tughneghaam	negaghaa.	Tughneghaam	naapsimaneghminiki	aaghqutaqaqii.
B16_03_2Timothy_V3	Piniqinaanghitut,	seghevutinaanghitut,	iqlengiqutkillequt,	suugllugullequt,	amyuqetiqellequt,	ugumikelleqaatlu	sangwaa	alngunak	pinilghii.
B16_03_2Timothy_V1	Liisimakesugamken	kingulighni	aghneghni	seghleliighllaguyaghqaaguq.
B16_03_2Timothy_V2	Yuget	ellmeggneng	piniqellequt,	maniyuneghtullequt,	yamrratullequt,	aangaayugllequtlu.	Seghlequughlleqiit	ilateng,	qaatkennaanghitiit	angayuqateng,	iyamsiqayugnaanghitut,	waaknanighlleqaatlu	Kiyaghneq.
B16_03_2Timothy_V3	Uveghpagulleqiit	ilateng,	nangyiighullequt,	qukaayugteghllagllequt,	teghigniqelleq	piniqataghaghlleqaat	pakiggulluku	Kiyaghneghmeng.
B16_03_2Timothy_V4	Qaaymegteggun	ugpeqaayugllequt,	iwernga	kiyaghtaallghita	apeghlleqaat	avangitulngi	Kiyaghneghem	aghtughyaghqaanghillghaneng.	Iqitngaluten	tawatelngughneng	yugneng.
B16_03_2Timothy_V5	Ilangi	tamaakut	nenun	iitghaataghllequt	aaghqutaqepigesnaghnaluki	nallekaghnilnguut	aghnat.	Tamaakut	aghnat	seghleghqellghita	uqigtuqusighllaglleqii,	seghleghemllu	piyukellelghutngita	aaghqutaqelleqii.
B16_03_2Timothy_V6	Tamaakut	aghnat	nagallequt	apeghtughillghanun	kitum	alngunak,	taawanginaq	liinnaanghitaat	ipapilleq.
B16_03_2Timothy_V7	Tamaakut	apeghtughilghiit	ellngitnun	kipullginaaghlleqaat	ipapilleq,	katam	Jannes-enkuk	Jambres-enkuk	kipullginaallghegketun	Moses.	Umyugaghlluugllequt,	ugpeqillghatlu	ipangunghillequq.
B16_03_2Timothy_V8	Iwernga	tawaten	pillghat	mulunaanghituq.	Temngitwhallghat	aliillequq	tamanganun,	katam	Jannes-enkuk	Jambres-enkuk	temngitwhallghak	aliitngallghatun.
B16_03_2Timothy_V9	Iwernga	elpek	liisimakngwaaghaten	apeghtughillghenka,	kiyaghtaalqa,	apallaallu	kiyaghtelleghma.	Liisimakanllu	ugpeqilqa,	iilqayunghitelqa,	piniqilqa,	aghuliilkaamalqa.
B16_03_2Timothy_V10	Liisimakan	amyuqetaatkesilqa,	ikfiqelqallu.	Liisimakan	tawaten	pikaqaatnga	Antioch-mi,	Iconium-emi,	Lystra-millu.	Uglaghngaan	amyuqetaatkellengegkaagunga,	tawalliima	Atanghem	yugulikaqaanga	tamaghhiitneng.
B16_03_2Timothy_V11	Tamaghhaghmi	amyuqetaatkellengellequq	kiyaghsulghii	Kiyaghneghem	piyukellghatun	Christ	Jesus-kun.
B16_03_2Timothy_V12	Seghleghet	yuget,	puughtistetlu,	seghleghughtaghaghllequt.	Puughqughllequt,	ellngitlu	puughtellengellequt.
B16_03_2Timothy_V13	Iwernga	elpek	atuqumanginaghqi	apeghtuusat	liitkaghten,	ugpeqepiikaghten.	Liisimakaten	ipangutangi,	qayughllak	liisimakaten	kinkungutangi	apeghtughistekegkaghten.
B16_03_2Timothy_V14	Ima	taghnughhaategpeneng	liisimakegkaqaten	agleghnalghiit	Akuzitet	Igaqegkat.	Akuzitet	Igaqegkat	apeghtughyaqlegwaaten	yugulilleghqameng	ugpeqilleghpegun	Christ	Jesus-kun.
B16_03_2Timothy_V15	Qamaglluteng	Akuzitet	Igaqegkat	Kiyaghneghem	aneghziilqii.	Enkaam	apeghtughisighqaagut,	aghyuughusiighqaagut,	nallghusaasighqaagut	anaggutelleghmun,	apeghtughisighqaagutlu	pinitun	kiyaghtaalleghqamun.
B16_03_2Timothy_V16	Enkaam	atuqluki	Akuzitet	Igaqegkat,	Kiyaghneghem	qepghaghtenga	peghqigsaghwaaghngallequq,	yataaghqengngallequqlu	tamaghhaanun	aneghneghqilleghmun.
B16_04_2Timothy_V4	Nagasugnanighllequt	ipapilleghmun,	nagasugyagullequt	temnginun	ungipaghanun.
B16_04_2Timothy_V1	Christ	Jesus	tagikumi	igleghutinaluni	Ataneghpagulleghmini,	nanqiglleqii	unguvalghiitlu	tuqukatlu.	Enkaam	nagasimanghegkeni	Kiyaghneghenkuk	Christ	Jesus-enkuk,	qelghamken
B16_04_2Timothy_V2	ungipaqiki	Pinilghiit	Ungipat.	Sagiqluten	ungipaqiki	yugnun	nagasugughngaata	nalighmeng	nagasugunghiteghngaata.	Nekeggmelluten	apeghtughilleghpegun	ugpeghtesnaqiki,	ineghtiki	anaggutellghitneng,	kayemikillu.
B16_04_2Timothy_V3	Pilleghqaq	taginguuq	yuget	nagasugnanighllequt	ipapignun	apeghtuusanun.	Ivaghillequt	piyukegkameggneng	apeghtughistelghutneng	nagatepigesnaghnaluki	nagaqughyukegkaghhiinateng.
B16_04_2Timothy_V4	Iwernga	elpek	iiwleng	nekeggmelluten,	nagneghutigu	sangwaa	piyaghqan	ikfiqngughngaaghpek,	ungipaqikestaa	Pinilghiineng	Ungipaneng.	Elpek	qepghaghtekegkangaten	Kiyaghneghem,	apeghiighhu	qamaglluku	qepghaqaq	elpenun	pisqegkaa.
B16_04_2Timothy_V5	Whanga	aghqutkesaghqaaghsimaanga	Kiyaghneghmun,	tuqulleghqaqa	kaasaghtuumaaq.
B16_04_2Timothy_V6	Pilluwaamaaqa	pinilghii	pilluwalleq,	apeghiighaqa	kilgaaqulqa,	ataasiighmesimanginaqaagunga	Ataneghmun.
B16_04_2Timothy_V7	Enkaam	taawa	Kiyaghneghem	utaqiitngwaa	whangamnun	qaghpanga	elqughutngallghem.	Atanghem	elqughlluku	nanqigtistem	akileghtughlleqaanga	Nanqigtillghem	Aghneghani.	Whanganginaagpenanga	iwernga	akileghtughlleqii	qamaglluki	tamaakut	qelanelghiit	tagilleghqaaneng.
B16_04_2Timothy_V8	Pinaqellghaagken	qamagllukek	tagiragkiighi	whangamnun.
B16_04_2Timothy_V9	Demas-em	piniqsaliisimaa	nunam	kiyaghtaallgha	enkaam	unisimaanga,	aghulaqumaaq	Thessalonica-mun.	Crescens	Galatia-simaaq	enkaam	Titus	Dalmatia-mun	pimaaq.
B16_04_2Timothy_V10	Luke-nginaghhaq	whangamnituq.	Mark	aqfaluku	kelqennaken	qayughllak	kayutkepigtaqa	qepghallemni.
B16_04_2Timothy_V11	Tychicus	Ephesus-mun	kayagsimaaqa.
B16_04_2Timothy_V12	Troas-mellunga	unitkaqagka	qaasligka	Carpus-enkuni.	Taginaqegkuvek	tagitaghhnakegken.	Tagitaghhnaketenllu	iimgat	iganka,	kiyang	taakut	amiirameng	ulimaaghet.
B16_04_2Timothy_V13	Alexander-em	siilumeng	sangllaghtem	elngaatall	seghletun	pikaqaanga.	Atanghem	aghyuughnaaghaa	tawaten	pillghaneng.
B16_04_2Timothy_V14	Elpeklu	kelengakluku	tawaten	pinayukangaten	qayughllak	ungipaghput	ugumikepigtaa.
B16_04_2Timothy_V15	Nanqigtistemun	aglaasuwhaaghaqngatnga	kitum	alngunak	mesighaasaghtullghitaanga,	yeghlegi	uniqaghaatkaqaatnga.	Yughaatkaqanka	Kiyaghneghmun	akinaqefqiita	pisqelluki	tawaten	pillghitneng.
B16_04_2Timothy_V16	Iwernga	Ataneq	whangamnitkaaguq.	Iknaqusiqaqaangallu	ungipaqesqelluki	iinguniita	Pinilghiit	Ungipat	qamaglluki	Gentile-et	nagaqiisqelluki.	Enkaam	Kiyaghneghem	yugulikaqaanga	tuqutelleghqameng.
B16_04_2Timothy_V17	Atanghem	yuguliyaghqaqaanga	tamaghhaaneng	seghleghem	sughugallghaneng,	enkaam	paqnanangunaan	aglaalleqaanga	qilagmelngughmun	Ataneghpagulleghminun.	Ellnganun	usuqilleq	quunperugllak	kenlengunaan.	Amen.
B16_04_2Timothy_V18	Ungipaataghhnaketen	Priscilla-nkuk	Aquila-nkuk,	Onesiphorus-enkutlu	nengllugutkullghiit	suumqaqankanguq.
B16_04_2Timothy_V19	Erastus	unegtekaaguq	Corinth-mi;	qinuyugutanganeng	Trophimus	unitkaqaqa	Miletus-mi.
B16_04_2Timothy_V20	Uksughvagilgan	taginaqeghllagi.	Eubulus-enkut,	Pudens-enkut,	Linus-enkut,	Claudia-nkut,	ilangitallu	ugpeqaalgutet	ungipaatesqiisi	suumqaqiisinguq.
B16_04_2Timothy_V21	Ataneq	taghneghaghpenilli,	quyaslisillu.
B17_01_Titus_V1	Ukut	latat	Paul-meng	pinguut	qepghaghtenganeng	Kiyaghneghem,	apostle-nganengllu	Jesus	Christ-am.	Kayagtekaagunga	kayusiitesqelluki	Kiyaghneghem	nakmikegkii	yuget	ugpelleghtughtaghiisqelluki,	liitesqellukullu	ipapilleq.	Taam	ipapillghem	kayusighlleqii	yuget	kiyaghtelleghqiit	Kiyaghneghem	piyukellghatun.
B17_01_Titus_V2	Taagken	ataasimeng	ipapilleghmeng	sighimallelguukut	kenlengilngughmeng	unguvalleghmeng.	Iqlengiqigatngwaaghem	Kiyaghneghem	akequsaqegkaqaa	taana	unguvalleq	ima	ayumirugllaggaaneng.
B17_01_Titus_V3	Enkaam	pilleghqaghlluwaaghmini	Kiyaghneghem	liitestekaqaa	taana	kenlengilnguq	unguvalleq	ungipamikun.	Whangamnun	neghyukutkaqaa	ungipani	enkaam	ungipaqaqaqa	qelghutellghatun	Kiyaghneghem	Yugulighistemta.
B17_01_Titus_V4	Ukut	latat	Titus-mun	pinguut,	ighnepikamken	ugpeqillemtegnegun.	Kiyaghneghem	Atam,	Christ	Jesus-emllu	Yugulighistemta	quyaslitenllu	nekeggmellelguslitenllu.
B17_01_Titus_V5	Unitkaqamken	Crete-mi,	apeghiighesqelluku	qepghaqaghput	apeghiillghilnguq.	Nakmiightiisqesugamken	Elder-kaghqameng	yughaghvignun	tamaghhiitni	town-et.	Neqamikluki	qelghutkanka:
B17_01_Titus_V6	Elder-kaghqaq	avutngisaghqaaguq;	ataasimeng	nuliilguyaghqaaguq,	avaqutiillu	ugpeqaayaghqaagut;	nelliqneghuyaghqaanghitut,	qaatkusigasaghqaanghitutlu.
B17_01_Titus_V7	Igleghutistengutmineng	Kiyaghneghem	qepghaqaanun,	Elder-a	avutngisaghqaaguq.	Yukeghqenghuyaghqaanghituq,	nalighmeng	kaatqaghtaamanguyaghqaanghituq,	nalighmeng	suumestenguyaghqaanghituq,	nalighmeng	suuglluguyaghqaanghituq,	nalighmeng	pakigneghuyaghqaanghituq	aklungighinaluni.
B17_01_Titus_V8	Itupill	upughanghuyaghqaaguq,	piniqistekaghqaqaa	pinillghem.	Nuqenneghtuyaghqaaguq,	elqughutngayaghqaaguq,	taghneghagmikun	pelungisaghqaaguq,	nuqetutiyaghqaaguq	alngunak	seghleghmeng.
B17_01_Titus_V9	Ellnga	ataasighmesaghqaaguq	ipapignun	apeghtuusanun	apeghtughallengelleghmitun.	Atuqluki	ipapiget	apeghtuusat	kayemelleqii	yuget,	liigikesleqiillu	apeghtughistesighwaaghet	anaggutnganiluki.
B17_01_Titus_V10	Uglaapigtut	qaatkusugigalnguut,	temngi	akuzilghiit	puughtilghiit	ilameggneng,	kiyang	tamaakunguut	apeghtughilghiit	Gentile-et	ugpeqiit	circumcise-eyaghqaaniluki.
B17_01_Titus_V11	Taaqestiki	tawaten	apeghtughillghitneng.	Temngimeng	apeghtughilleghmegteggun	alngunaseghaghqaqiit	iinguniita	nengllugutet.	Apeghtughiiqut	apeghtuusaghqaqenghilkemeggneng;	tawaten	piiqut	aklungighipigesnaghnaluteng.
B17_01_Titus_V12	Ataasim	Crete-eghmiim	uuknaliqistem	pikaqii,	“Crete-eghmiit	quunpeng	iqlengaghtut,	ugighsalghiistun	teghikusastun	ayuqut,	ighsanitalghiinguutlu	negheghllaget.”
B17_01_Titus_V13	Tawaten	pillgha	ipanguuq.	Taana	apalluqluku	qevuulluki	aghyuughqi	Crete-eghmiit	ugpeqiit	ugpeqesqelluki	ipapiget	apeghtuusat.
B17_01_Titus_V14	Ungipaatiki	nagannanighlitkinguq	Jews-et	temngi	ungipaghaatangit.	Qaatkennanighlitkinguq	yuget	qelghusangllaqiit.	Taakunguut	ighsakikat	ipapigneng	apeghtuusaneng.
B17_01_Titus_V15	Sangwaa	qamaglluni	pelungituq	tamaakunun	pelungilngughnun.	Iwernga	sangwaa	qamaglluni	pelunginneghituq	tamaakunun	pelunginneghilngughnun.	Kiyaghtengnguut	seghleghqelleghmi,	ugpeqigataatlu	Christ-a.	Umyugiitlu	sumeghneghitlu	nukeggnaghtekaagut,	enkaam	liigiksaghqaananiimaat	pinilleqlu	seghlelleqlu.
B17_01_Titus_V16	Liisimakniiqaat	Kiyaghneq	iwernga	kiyaghtaallghita	ipapighqaqaat	nallukutanga:	ugumiknipigtut,	qaatkusigatut,	sasiinghitutlu	sangwaa	alngunak	pinitun	pinaanghitaat.
B17_02_Titus_V1	Iwernga	elpek	apeghtuusaqiki	ugpeqanun	ipapiget	apeghtuusat.
B17_02_Titus_V2	Apeghtughqi	nuyekliit	yuget	nuqenneghtusqelluki,	siivaknalghiinguluki,	sumeghtaghayusqelluki,	ayepsugitesqelluki	ugpeqilleghqun,	piniqilleghqun,	nuqenneghtulleghqun.
B17_02_Titus_V3	Tawateghpigaq	apeghtughqi	nuyekliit	aghnat	kiyaghtesqelluki	tuun'ngaluki	Kiyaghneghmun.	Seghletun	akuzitkesaghqaqenghitiit	ilateng,	nalighmeng	megheghllafqiita	wine-meng.	Apeghtughiyaghqaagut	pinitun	kiyaghtaalleghqameng,
B17_02_Titus_V4	enkaam	peghqighlleqiit	uyuqliit	aghnat	piniqesqelluki	ugingitlu	avaqutiitlu.
B17_02_Titus_V5	Sumeghtaghaqegsaghqaagut,	pelungisaghqaagut	kiyaghtaalleghmeggni,	qepghaqegsaghqaagut	nemeggni,	nangllegtaghyaghqaagut,	qaatkusaghqaagut	ugimeggnun.	Enkaam	kitum	alngunak	seghlequughnaanghitii	Kiyaghneghem	apeghtuusii.
B17_02_Titus_V6	Tawateghpigaq	qeleghqi	nukalpigat	nuqenneghtusqelluki.
B17_02_Titus_V7	Elpek	salleghpegun	tamaghhaakun,	usputaawi	ellngitnun	aneghneghqilleghpegun.	Apeghtughiiqi	ipapighqelluten,	piraamsiluten.
B17_02_Titus_V8	Wataghllak	apeghtuusaqegkan	elqughutngali	enkaam	kitum	alngunak	seghlequunghillinkut.	Tawaten	pikuvek	kipullginaaghtet	seghletun	akuzitkennaanghitiinkut,	kipullginaallghitallu	kaynguyugtesleqii.
B17_02_Titus_V9	Apeghtughqi	qepghaghtelaaghet	qaatkesqelluki	piliitestengit,	efqughtengngwaaghesqellukillu.	Veghusnaghyaghqaqenghitiit,
B17_02_Titus_V10	nalighmeng	teglegviksaghqaqenghitiit.	Yeghlegi	quunpeng	pinitun,	ataasiighmelluteng	piyaghqaqiit.	Enkaam	salleghmegteggun	tamaghhaakun	piyuknangllaghlleqiit	apeghtuusii	Kiyaghneghem	Yugulighistemta.
B17_02_Titus_V11	Tawaten	kiyaghsaghqaagukut	qayughllak	Kiyaghneghem	aliightekaqaa	piniqelleni	yugulillengesqelluku	yuuk	tamaghhaan.
B17_02_Titus_V12	Taam	piniqellghem	apeghtughiinkut	pegtesqelluku	kiyaghtaalleq	Kiyaghneghmun	ayuqenghilnguq,	ighsakesqelluki	nunam	yugan	piyukellghi	seghleghqengngalghiit.	Apeghtughiinkutlu	nuqenneghtusqelluta,	elqughutngaluta,	kiyaghtesqelluta	Kiyaghneghem	piyukellghatun	nunami	whani.
B17_02_Titus_V13	Tawaten	kiyaghtelta	utaqiimaluta	quyanalghiimeng	sighimalleghmeng.	Sighimalqaghput	nighughqengngalghii	aliilleghqaa	Jesus	Christ-am	Kiyaghneghllamta	Yugulighistemta.
B17_02_Titus_V14	Ellmineng	tuunegkaaguq	yugulinaluta	tamaghhaaneng	seghleghqelleghmeng.	Tawaten	pikaaguq	qayughllak	pelungighsaghyukanginkut	ellminun	yuguluta,	sagiqluta	aneghneghqisqelluta	yugnun.
B17_02_Titus_V15	Apeghtuusaqiki	tamaakut	ugpeqanun.	Kiyaghneghem	qelghusii	atuqluki	kayemiki,	aghuliightikillu	seghletun	pingukata.	Yeqay	kitumun	alngunak	ukavaghtestegpenang.
B17_03_Titus_V1	Neqangughtiki	ugpeqat	malighqutaqesqelluki	kavemem	igleghutistengitnun,	umiilwaaghnunllu.	Qaatkutngayaghqaagut,	apeghiighngayaghqaagut	tamaghhaanun	aneghneghqilleghnun.
B17_03_Titus_V2	Ungipaatiki	kina	alngunak	seghletun	akuzitkefqaan,	aaghtiiraafqaan	pisqelluku.	Itupill	nekeggmetulluki,	qusevegngatulluki	pisqelluki	tamanganun.
B17_03_Titus_V3	Whangkutallu	sivunghani	nalluyaghtukut,	qaatkusigasaghtukut,	puughtengngayaghtukutlu.	Yugusimta	piyukellgha	ayghiilluku,	itagnaghqusiqluku	ayuqsaghaghput.	Unguvalleput	kiyaghusiqsaghaput	seghlepestaaghmun,	aqinalleghmunllu.	Yuget	ugumiksaghiinkut,	ugumikusaghtukutlu.
B17_03_Titus_V4	Iwernga	Kiyaghneghem	Yugulighistemta	liisimakestekaqiinkut	nangllegtalleghmineng,	piniqelleghminengllu.
B17_03_Titus_V5	Yugulikaqiinkut	apalluqluku	nangllegtalleni,	nakaan	aneghneghqillemteggun.	Agleghnalghiignekun	Taghneghagnekun	ughvuqaqii	seghleghqelleput,	nutaghamengllu	unguvallelitkaqiinkut.
B17_03_Titus_V6	Kiyaghneghem	kuuvegkaqaak	Agleghnalghiik	Taghneghak	kemnapigllukek	whangkunnun	Jesus	Christ-akun,	Yugulighistemteggun.
B17_03_Titus_V7	Kiyaghneq	tawaten	pikaaguq	piniqelleghmikun	nallghusaghnaluta	elqughutngalleghminun.	Enkaam	sighimallelguukut	whangkuta	piliinnaluku	kenlengilnguq	unguvalleq.
B17_03_Titus_V8	Tamaakut	pillghet	ipanguut.	Tamaakut	apeghtuusat	elpenun	sagiqutesqesuganka	yugnun	qaatkesqelluki.	Taagken	ugpellelget	Kiyaghneghqun	aneghneghqipestaaghllequt.	Tamaakut	aneghneghqillghet	pinilghiinguutlu	kayutnguutlu	tamanganun.
B17_03_Titus_V9	Iwernga	elpek	iqitngaluten	tamaakuneng	temngi	qaniqullghiineng,	aaghtiiraaghullghiineng	sivuneghmeng	aatghitneng,	Liilightuusanengllu.	Tamaana	sasiinghituq,	kayutngunaanghituq	kitumun	alngunak.
B17_03_Titus_V10	Kina	alngunak	aafquutestilghii	kelengasaaghnaken	ataasimeng	nalighmeng	alghighluku.	Naganneghilkan	peggnaken.
B17_03_Titus_V11	Liisimakan	tawatelnguum	yugem	ighsakegkaqaa	ipapilleq,	seghleghqestenguuqlu.	Enkaam	ellngan	katam	seghleghqellghan	nanqigsaghqaaghtesleqaa	aghyuughyaghqaaluku.
B17_03_Titus_V12	Aglaghtestekumkun	Artemas	nalighmeng	Tychicus	elpenun,	Nicopolis-ennaqeghllaggaaten,	qayughllak	uksughsugaqunga	tamaani.
B17_03_Titus_V13	Kayusighnaqeghllagnakegken	lawyer-a	Zenas,	Apollos-lu	igleghalleghqagkenun.	Wataghllak	yataaghqunnakegken	kelqesaghqameng	sameng	aklukegkagkeneng.
B17_03_Titus_V14	Ugpeqaalgutemta	peghqigsaatkellitgu	aneghneghqutkaghqaq	enkaam	kayusighyaqlegughhnakangit	aklukegkapilget.	Temngi	kiyaghtaafqaameng	pilit.
B17_03_Titus_V15	Qamaglluteng	whangamnilnguut	piniqiisinguq.	Piniqelleghput	aapqaghnaken	ugpeqaalgutemnnun	piniqistemnnun.	Kiyaghneghem	quyaslisi	qamagllusi.
B18_01_Philemon_V1	Ukut	latat	Paul-meng	pinguut,	anusimingllaghaq	Christ	Jesus	apalluqluku,	ugpeqaalgutemnnengllu	Timothy-meng.	Piniqegkamtegnun	qepghalgutemtegnun	Philemon-mun,
B18_01_Philemon_V2	ugpeqanunllu	qerngughutkayugnun	mangteghaghpeni,	Apphia-munllu	nayamnnun	Christ-akun,	Archippus-munllu	pilluwalgutemtegnun.
B18_01_Philemon_V3	Kiyaghneghem	Atamta,	Atanemtallu	Jesus	Christ-am	nanglleklisillu,	nekeggmellelguslisillu.
B18_01_Philemon_V4	Philemon-mi,	quunpeng	iyamsiqayugvikaqaqa	Kiyaghneqa	yughaatkennemken,
B18_01_Philemon_V5	qayughllak	nagaqughaqaqa	piniqellghen	tamaghhiitnun	Kiyaghneghem	yugitnun,	ugpeqillghenllu	Ataneghqun	Jesus-kun.
B18_01_Philemon_V6	Yughaatkaqamken	ungipaatesqelluki	ilaten	ugpeqillemnneng	Christ-akun.	Tawaten	pikuvek	liigikataghaghlleqaten	qamaglluki	quyastellghet	allgeghtekaput	Christ-akun.
B18_01_Philemon_V7	Ugpeqaalgutemni,	piniqilleghpek	Kiyaghneghem	yuganun	quyasteghllagaangallu	kayemaangallu!	Piniqelleghpek	quyastii	Kiyaghneghem	yugi.
B18_01_Philemon_V8	Tetugnaanghitunga	qeleghnaluten	Christ-akun	atuqesqelluku	elqughutngalghii,	iwernga	tawaten	pinaanghitunga.
B18_01_Philemon_V9	Piniqutelleghpung	apalluqluku	aapfikamken	atuqesqelluku	elqughutngalghii.	Whanga,	Paul,	nanevgaagunga,	anusimingllaghaagungallu	apalluqluku	Christ	Jesus.
B18_01_Philemon_V10	Whanganguuq	aaputilghii	ighnemnun,	Onesimus-mun.	Anusimingllaghvigmi	ataliitkaqaanga	Christ-akun.
B18_01_Philemon_V11	Sivunghani	sasiinghisaghtuq	elpenun,	iwernga	whaa	kayutngughtepigsimaaq	whangkutegnun.
B18_01_Philemon_V12	Onesimus	elpenun	aglaghtesnaqaqa,	leganqun	iluka	maligunnaquq	ellngakun.
B18_01_Philemon_V13	Whangamnitesuguyaghaqa	kayusiitesqellunga	anusimingllaghvigmi,	katam	elpek	kayusiinnayaqevnga	maansaquvek.	Liisimakegkenqun	anusimingllaghaalghiinga	Pinilghiit	Ungipat	apalluqluki.
B18_01_Philemon_V14	Iwernga	whangamnitesnaanghitaqa	wetkuqun	sivukluten	aaptaghlluten.	Itagnaqumakuvgu	whangamnitesqelluku	taawa	elpek	piyukelqelleqan,	qayughllak	qelghunghitamken	tawaten	pisqelluten.
B18_01_Philemon_V15	Entaqun	Onesimus	iqitaghtekaaguq	elpenisaghqaaluni	quunperugllak.
B18_01_Philemon_V16	Ellnga	paninang	qepghaghtelaaghuuq.	Iwernga	qepghaghtelaaghumalleghmineng	angliighataghaamaaq	qayughllak	piniqegkaaghsimaaq	ugpeqaalguta.	Piniqepigtaqa,	iwernga	elpek	piniqataghaghlleqan	qepghaghtelaaghuluku,	ugpeqaalgutngulukullu	Ataneghqun.
B18_01_Philemon_V17	Enkaangam	tugukliimakuvnga	qepghalgutngulunga,	tuguklighnaken	Onesimus	whangangusluku.
B18_01_Philemon_V18	Sameng	seghletun	pimakangaten	nalighmeng	asengemakangaten,	asengenga	whanga	llivikelleqaqa.
B18_01_Philemon_V19	Whaa,	whanga	katam	iiggemneng	igaghtunga	whaten:	whanga,	Paul,	llivikelleqamken.	Iwernga	puygugpenaan	unguvallghen	asengeluku	ayuqan	whangamnun.
B18_01_Philemon_V20	Aa-a,	ugpeqaalgutemni,	aapfikamken	Ataneghqun	tugukliisqelluku	Onesimus.	Tawaten	pikuvek	quyasleqaghpenga	Christ-akun!
B18_01_Philemon_V21	Lataamken	liisimakngwaaghluku	qaatkesaghqaqan	qelghutkaqa	elpenun,	repall	qaayghulluku	pillequten.
B18_01_Philemon_V22	Atwhay,	nekaghqangllaataghhnakevnga	qayughllak	sighimanguunga	Kiyaghneghem	kiimsighlleqii	yughallesi,	enkaam	elpesinun	pillequnga.
B18_01_Philemon_V23	Epaphras-emnguq	piniqiisi;	anusimingllaghalgutkaqa	apalluqluku	Christ	Jesus.
B18_01_Philemon_V24	Qepghalgutmallu	Mark-enkut,	Aristarchus-enkut,	Demas-enkut,	Luke-enkut	ellngitallunguq	piniqiisi.
B18_01_Philemon_V25	Piniqellgha	Atanghem	Jesus	Christ-am	tamaghhaghpesinilli.
B19_01_Hebrews_V1	Sivunghani	agani	uglaghlukullu,	allaaghhiinaalukullu	Kiyaghneghem	aleghquqaqii	sivuneput	uuknaliqistetgun.
B19_01_Hebrews_V2	Iwernga	ukuni	kingulighni	aghneghni	aleghquqaqiinkut	Ighneghmikun.	Ellngakun	Kiyaghneq	nunangllaqaaguq,	nakmikegkaqaallu	piliitesqelluku	sangwaa	tamaghhaan.
B19_01_Hebrews_V3	Ighneghem	kuukgutaqaa	Kiyaghneghem	nighughqellgha,	Kiyaghneghtungwaaqlu	ayuquq.	Sangwaat	qamaglluki	nagneghastengngwii	tawatelluki	aghtughyaghqaanghilnguutgun	akuzitmikun.	Ighneghem	tuunegkaqaa	ellmi	katam	unguvalleni	ukmangighnaluta	tamaghhaaneng	seghleghqellemnneng.	Apeghiighyamigu	tawaten	pilleni,	qilagmi	aqumegkaaguq	aghenqigneghakun	Kiyaghneghem,	aghtughyaghqaanghitelleghpigaam.
B19_01_Hebrews_V4	Kiyaghneghem	quliightekaqaa	Ighneq	yaqulegneng,	atelitkaqaallu	ingyaatngalghiimeng	aatghitneng.
B19_01_Hebrews_V5	Tawaten	pikaqaa	qayughllak	Kiyaghneghem	pimangitii	nalighhiiniit	yaqulget	whaten,	“Ighneqamken;	aghneghmi	Ataliitaghpenga.”	Kiyaghneghemllu	pimangitii	nalighhiiniit	yaqulget	whaten,	“Atakelleqaanga	enkaam	ellnga	Ighneqelleqaqa.”
B19_01_Hebrews_V6	Kiyaghneghem	kayagsaghqaaghsamigu	Ighneqsuwhaani	nunamun,	whatenllu	pikaaguq,	“Yeqay	qamaglluteng	Kiyaghneghem	yaqulgita	manigughlitgu.”
B19_01_Hebrews_V7	Whatenllu	pikaaguq	yaqulegneng,	“Kiyaghneghem	yaquleni	anuqestun	lliightestekaqii.	Qepghaghtengi	kumaghulghiistun	kenghestun	lliightestekaqii.”
B19_01_Hebrews_V8	Iwernga	Kiyaghneq	Ighneghmineng	whaten	pikaaguq,	“Kaay	Kiyaghneq,	aqumutagken	kenlengisaghqaaguk	quunperugllak!	Igleghulleqan	ataneghpagullghen	elqughutngallelighluku.
B19_01_Hebrews_V9	Piniqan	elqughutngalleq,	ugumikan	anaggutngalleq.	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	Kiyaghneq,	Kiyaghneghpek	nakmikumaatenllu	quulvaamaatenllu	pakiggulluku	ilagpeneng.	Enkaangam	quyastighllagtuq	anoint-eluten	mesiighmeng.”
B19_01_Hebrews_V10	Whatenllu	pikaaguq,	“Elpek,	Ataneq,	piinlighyuggaaghmi	nunangllaqaaguten,	iiggegpenengllu	qilagangllaqaaguten.
B19_01_Hebrews_V11	Qamaglluteng	aviighusaghqaagut,	iwernga	elpek	kiyaghsaghqaaguten.	Aghyughyaghqaagut	aatkastun.
B19_01_Hebrews_V12	Imegteghlleqaten	qaasligetun,	simighlleqatenllu	aatkastun.	Iwernga	elpek	quunpeng	almesiqelleqaaten,	aghyughyaghqaanghitutenllu.”
B19_01_Hebrews_V13	Kiyaghneghem	pimangitngwaaghii	nalighhiiniit	yaquleni	whaten:	“Aqumi	whagun	aghenqignemkun,	kenlanga	anguyagten	tunemaliitestellemnun	itegaghpek	asinganun.”
B19_01_Hebrews_V14	Sangaawan'ngam	yaqulget?	Qamaglluteng	taghneghaagut	qepghaatilghiit	Kiyaghneghmeng,	kayagtaqiillu	kayusiitesqelluki	tamaakut	yugulillengyaghqat.
B19_02_Hebrews_V1	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	sumeghtaghaatkengngwaaghelteki	ipapillghet	nagaquqaput	luuraq	waaknaniqestaghnayukamteki.
B19_02_Hebrews_V2	Kiyaghneghem	apeghtuusii	ipanguut;	aapqaqii	yugnun	yaqulegteggun.	Kina	alngunak	qaatkunneghilnguq	apeghtuusanun,	Kiyaghneghem	aghyuughlleqaa	aghyuulleghqaghtutalangatun.
B19_02_Hebrews_V3	Enkaam	ighsakumakumteggu	Kiyaghneghem	yugulighilleghllaga	anagpagningitaghput	aghyuughilleghqaa.	Atanghem	apeghyuggaaqaqaa	taana	yugulilleq.	Taagken	tamaakut	nagaquutkat	ellnganeng,	ipapighqaat	whangkunnun.
B19_02_Hebrews_V4	Kiyaghneghemllu	ipapighqegkaqaa	whangkunnun.	Tawaten	pikaaguq	atuqelleghmikun	allaaghhiinaat	allaaghlluwhaghtillghet,	uyegtelleghmikunllu	tunusii	Agleghnalghiim	Taghnegham	piyukelleghmitun.
B19_02_Hebrews_V5	Kiyaghneghem	nakmikellghitii	yaqulget	igleghutisqelluki	sivumelngughmun	nunakaghqamun.	(Taananguuq	nuna	akuzitkegkefut.)
B19_02_Hebrews_V6	Nalighneghitni	Akuzitni	Igaqegkani	whaten	igaqngaaq,	“Kiyaghneq,	sangaawa	yuuk	umyugaghmikaqegken,	nalighmeng	ighnegha	yugem	aflengakegkan?
B19_02_Hebrews_V7	Ulimaaqan	ukavaqaanlluku	yaqulegneng,	qaghpaliqaqan	nighughqelleghmengllu	quulvalleghmengllu,
B19_02_Hebrews_V8	igleghutistengllaqaqanllu	samun	tamaghhaanun.”	Tawanillu	Akuzitni	Igaqegkani	igaqngaaq,	Kiyaghneghem	ulimaaqaa	yuuk	“igleghutistenguluku	samun	tamaghhaanun.”	Taana	whaten	pisiiguq	sangwaa	qamaglluni	ilatngaaq	igleghutillghanun.	Naqamllu	salin	esghiigataghput	yuuk	igleghutilghii	samun	tamaghhaanun.
B19_02_Hebrews_V9	Iwernga	esghaghaghput	Jesus!	Kiyaghneghem	natengiighhaq	ukavaghtestekaqsaghaa	yaqulegneng.	Maaten	esghaghaghput	qaghpaluni	nighughqelleghmengllu	quulvalleghmengllu	qayughllak	ikfiqluni	tuqukaaguq.	Kiyaghneghem	piniqellgha	apalluqluku,	Jesus	tuqukaaguq	tamaghhaanun.
B19_02_Hebrews_V10	Kiyaghneghuuq	ulimaghikaq	sameng	tamaghhaaneng	ellminun,	nagneghastengngwiillu	tawatelluki.	Itagnapigtekaaguq	Kiyaghneghem	pinighsaghwaaqaqaa	Jesus	ikfiqelleghqun	piinlightenguluku	yugulillghitnun.	Enkaam	Jesus-em	tagisaghqaaghtekaqii	yulghutet	nighughqelleghmun.
B19_02_Hebrews_V11	Jesus-em	pelungighsaqaqii	yuget	seghleghqellghitneng.	Enkaam	ellngallu	tamaakutlu	pelungighsaqii,	qamaglluteng	Atakaat	Kiyaghneq.	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	Jesus-em	kayngukigatii	atighyaghqaaluki	anglegutnguluki.
B19_02_Hebrews_V12	Jesus-em	pikaqaa	Kiyaghneq,	“Apeghlleqaqa	aatghen	anglegutemnun;	usuqelleqamken	qerngughutkata.”
B19_02_Hebrews_V13	Whatenllu	pikaaguq,	“Neghyukelleqaqa	Kiyaghneq.”	Pikaaguqlu,	“Whaantunga,	taghnughhaatlu	Kiyaghneghem	tagivaqii	whangamnun.”
B19_02_Hebrews_V14	Taakut	taghnughhaat	yuguut	kemekralgetlu	aalguutlu,	enkaam	Jesus	ellngistun	lliiqaaguq.	Tawaten	pikaaguq	tuqunaluni	naafqennaluku	Tughneghaq,	aghtughyaghqaanghillelek	tuqumun.
B19_02_Hebrews_V15	Enkaam	tawaten	pilleghmikun	itemutkaqii	tamaakut	qepghaghtelaaghestun	ayuqelghiit	unguvalleteng	qamaglluki	qayughllak	alikngukangat	tuqulleq.
B19_02_Hebrews_V16	Whateghllugaaghuuq	yaqulgunghitut	Jesus-em	kayusiqii,	iwernga	Abraham-em	kingunghi	kayusighaqii.
B19_02_Hebrews_V17	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	Kiyaghneghem	Jesus	lliightestengngwaaghyaghqaqaa	whangkutestun.	Tawaten	qepghaasaqlegwaa	Kiyaghneq	High	Priest-nguluni,	nangllegtaghlunillu	ataasiighmellunillu.	Enkaam	tuuniyaqlegughtekaaguq	aghqutmeng	Kiyaghneghmun	seghevutesqelluki	yuget	seghleghqellghit.
B19_02_Hebrews_V18	Jesus	ikfiqegkaatminengllu	nanghiiqullengegkaatminengllu,	kayusighyaqlegwii	tamaakut	nanghiiqullengelghiit.
B19_03_Hebrews_V1	Enkaangam	ugpeqaalgutemni,	Kiyaghneghem	aaftekaqiisi	ellminun	yugulusi,	tuqluqaqiisillu	ellminitesqellusi	qilagmi.	Sumeghmikluku	Jesus.	Kiyaghneghem	kayagtekaa	Apostle-ngulukullu	High	Priest-ngulukullu	aapghaqegkefut	ugpeqniluku.
B19_03_Hebrews_V2	Jesus	ataasighmetkaaguq	Kiyaghneghmun	nakmikisteminun,	katam	Moses	ataasighmetkaq	Kiyaghneghmun	qepghaataqngamigu	Kiyaghneq	mangteghaani.
B19_03_Hebrews_V3	Tamaghhaghmi	mangteghaq	kitumeng	ulimaghistelgulghii,	iwernga	Kiyaghneghem	Jesus-kun	sangwaa	tamaghhaan	ulimaaqaa.	Yuget	usuqataghaghyaghqaqaat	Jesus	pakiggulluku	Moses-meng,	qayughllak	yuget	usuqelleqaat	mangteghangllaghta	pakiggulluku	mangteghameng.
B19_03_Hebrews_V5	Moses	ataasiighmetkaaguq	qepghaghta	Kiyaghneghem	mangteghaani,	ungipaatkaqiillu	yuget	Kiyaghneq	sameng	apeghyaghqalguniluku	taaganiqaaghaq.
B19_03_Hebrews_V6	Iwernga	Christ-a	ighneghuluni	ataasiighmetkaaguq	igleghutista	Kiyaghneghem	mangteghaani.	Whangkuta	mangteghaqiinkut	Kiyaghneghem,	ilutumanginaqumta,	ipapighqutkumanginaqumteggullu	sighimakegkaghput.
B19_03_Hebrews_V7	Enkaangam	katam	tawaten	Agleghnalghiik	Taghneghak	piik,	“Aghneghmi	whani	nagaququfsigu	Kiyaghneghem	menga,
B19_03_Hebrews_V8	pineghlliqegpenasi	sivuneghpesistun.	Tamaani	aghneghni	kilgaanilluteng	qaatkesugumangitaat	Kiyaghneq,	nanghiighsaghaqaqaatlu	nuqenneghtullgha.”
B19_03_Hebrews_V9	Kiyaghneq	piiq,	“Tamaani	40	ayumiqulleghni	sivuneghpesi	esghaqaqeghngaaghmegteki	apeghiiqanka,	paninang	nanghiighsaghaqaqaatnga.
B19_03_Hebrews_V10	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	tamaakut	yuget	sakritestekaqaatnga.	Enkaam	pikaagunga,	‘Iiwleng	ataasiighmesigatut	whangamnun,	liigikigatutlu	natelluku	kiyaghtesqesullemneng.
B19_03_Hebrews_V11	Sakritngulunga	akeqikaagunga	allangughsaghqaanghilngughmeng.’	Whaten	piinga,	‘Iteghnaanghitngwaaghaat	meghnaalivigkaq	yataaghqegkaqa	ellngitnun.’”
B19_03_Hebrews_V12	Ugpeqaalgutemni	kelengalusi,	seghleghmeng	sumeghtaghalleghnengllu	ugpenghitelleghnengllu,	iqitutestegpenasi	unguvalghiimeng	Kiyaghneghmeng.
B19_03_Hebrews_V13	Iwernga	aghhutanga	tamaghhaan	kayemutaqitek	pilleghqalgumaluku	atilqelghiimeng	“Aghneghmi.”	Tawaten	pinghilkufsi	taawa	seghleghqellghem	puughllusi	pineghllungllaghlleqiisi.
B19_03_Hebrews_V14	Iwernga	ataasiighmelkumta	unguvallemta	kenlenganun,	neghyukluku	Kiyaghneq	ugpeghyuwhaallemtestun,	taawa	Christ-am	pilgutkelleqiinkut	ellmi	pimineng.
B19_03_Hebrews_V15	Akuzitni	Igaqegkani	igaqngaaq,	“Aghneghmi	nagaququfsigu	Kiyaghneghem	menga,	pineghllugugpenasi	sivuneghpesistun	qaatkusimangilnguut	Kiyaghneghmun.”
B19_03_Hebrews_V16	Kinkungaawat	nagaquutkat	Kiyaghneghem	menganeng	naqam	qaatkutegpenateng?	Tamaakunguut	yuget	Moses-em	maghyaghquqii	Egypt-meng.
B19_03_Hebrews_V17	40	ayumiqulleghni	kinkut	Kiyaghneq	sakritestatgu?	Tamaakunguut	seghleghqelluteng	tuqulaghaatkat	kilgaani.
B19_03_Hebrews_V18	Kinkunun	Kiyaghneq	akeqikaawa	iteghnaanghitngwaaghniluki	meghnaalivigkamun	yataaghqegkaminun?	Akeqegkaqii	qaatkusimangilnguut	ellminun.
B19_03_Hebrews_V19	Taawa	liigikaghput	iteghpagningitkaagut	tawavek	meghnaalivigmun	qayughllak	ugpeqenghilkangat.
B19_04_Hebrews_V1	Kiyaghneghem	akequsaa	yugnun	aghuliituq	iitghesqelluki	meghnaalivigminun.	Iwernga	alingelta	luuraq	nalighsi	nuughhunnayukan	iteghpenani	meghnaaliviganun.
B19_04_Hebrews_V2	Pinilghii	ungipaq	Kiyaghneghem	meghnaaliviganeng	ayuqelghii	nagaquqaqaghput	katam	tamaakustun	yugestun	Moses-em	maghyaghquqiistun	Egypt-meng.	Iwernga	pinilghiim	ungipam	kayusiitellghitii	qayughllak	ugpequmangitaat	nagaquqaghteng.
B19_04_Hebrews_V3	Whangkuta	ugpelghiini	iteghllequkut	Kiyaghneghem	meghnaaliviganun.	Iwernga	Kiyaghneghem	akuzitkegkaqii	ugpeqillghilnguut	whaten,	“Sakritngulunga	akeqikaagunga	allangughsaghqaanghilngughmeng.	Whaten	piinga,	‘Iteghnaanghitngwaaghtut	meghnaalivigkamnun.’”	Tawaten	akuzikaaguq	qepghaqani	apeghiiqaqeghngaaghmiki	ima	nunangllalleghmineng.
B19_04_Hebrews_V4	Naantuq	Akuzitni	Igaqegkani	igaqluni	maaghraghvinliitanga	aghneghem	whaten,	“Kiyaghneq	meghnaalikaaguq	tamaaghhaaneng	qepghaqamineng	maaghraghvinliitangani	aghneghem.”
B19_04_Hebrews_V5	Akuzitnillu	Igaqegkani	Kiyaghneq	pikaaguq,	“Iteghnaanghitngwaaghtut	meghnaalivigkamnun.”
B19_04_Hebrews_V6	Paninang	ilangi	yuget	iteghllequt	Kiyaghneghem	meghnaaliviganun.	Iwernga	nagaquusuwhaaqat	pinilghiimeng	ungipameng,	itellghitut	meghnaalivigmun	qayughllak	qaatkutellghilnguut	Kiyaghneghmun.
B19_04_Hebrews_V7	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	Kiyaghneghem	nekegtekaqaa	ilanga	aghneq,	atilqelghii	“Aghneghmi.”	Kingurugllaganeng	Moses-em,	Kiyaghneghem	akuzitkegkaqaa	taana	aghneq	David-kun.	Uteghpagtanka	David-em	igaqegkii	Akuzitni	Igaqegkani	whaten,	“Aghneghmi	whani	nagaququfsigu	Kiyaghneghem	menga,	pineghlliqegpenasi	sivuneghpesistun.”
B19_04_Hebrews_V8	Joshua-m	maghyaghqullghitii	yuget	tawavek	meghnaalivigmun.	Liisimakaghput	qayughllak	taam	kingunganeng	Kiyaghneghem	akuzitkegkaqaa	ilanga	aghnegha	meghnaalillghem.
B19_04_Hebrews_V9	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	taawa	Sabbath-a	aghuliituq,	meghnaalivik	Kiyaghneghem	yugitnun.
B19_04_Hebrews_V10	Kina	alngunak	iitqumi	Kiyaghneghem	meghnaaliviganun,	meghnaalillequq	qepghaqamineng	katam	tawaten	Kiyaghneghem	meghnaalillghatun.
B19_04_Hebrews_V11	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	iteghnaqeghllagelta	Kiyaghneghem	meghnaaliviganun.	Qaatkenghitefqaan	pilteggu	Kiyaghneq	sivunemta	pillghistun.
B19_04_Hebrews_V12	Akuzitangi	Kiyaghneghem	unguvaat	qepghaagut.	Iipgataghaghtut	alngunak	inglugtun	ipegsaqaneng	savigpagneng.	Kaaputkayuguut	qamaverugllak	unguvasimllu	taghneghamllu	kaatutngallghegkenun,	naflutlu	paatghetlu	kaatutngallghitnun.	Kiyaghneghem	akuzitangi	nanqigtikayuguut	yugem	sumeghtaghallghanengllu	sanaqellghanengllu.
B19_04_Hebrews_V13	Sangwaa	qamagtengngwaaghluni	Kiyaghneghem	ulimaagha	iighnganghituq	Kiyaghneghmeng.	Aliitut,	whateghlluwaaghuutlu	iyegkeni.	Ellnganun	qayvighqesaghqaqaput	salleput	qamaglluki.
B19_04_Hebrews_V14	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	High	Priest-elegllaguukut	qilagmun	mayuqameng.	Jesus-nguuq,	Ighnegha	Kiyaghneghem.	Enkaam	ugpeqilleghmetekestaalta	aapqamnni	yugnun.
B19_04_Hebrews_V15	High	Priest-emta	liigikngwaaqaqii	kayaalliqusiput,	qayughllak	nunamelluni	nanghiiqullengegkaaguq	whangkutestungwaaq.	Naqamllu	seghleghqumangituq.
B19_04_Hebrews_V16	Enkaam	tetullngunaamta	aglaalta	umiilgusignun	aqumutagkenun	Kiyaghneghem,	allgeghuseghqaaluta	nangllegtallghanun.	Tawani	nangllekelleqiinkut,	kayusighlleqiinkutlu	aklukillemnni.
B19_05_Hebrews_V1	Tamaghhaan	high	priest-a	Kiyaghneghem	nakmikegkaqaa	yulgutanganeng.	Kiyaghneghmun	aglaghaquq	yuget	apalluqluki	tuunaluki	tunusiit	aghqerraaghunnalukillu	seghleghqellghitnun.
B19_05_Hebrews_V2	High	priest-a	kayaalliqegkayugutmineng	nangllegtaghyaghqaaguq	tamaakunun	nallukelghiinunllu	ugpeqinanilghiinunllu	ipapilleghmun.
B19_05_Hebrews_V3	Qayughllak	kayaalliqegkayugutmineng,	high	priest-a	aghqerraaghyaghqaaguq	ellmi	katam	seghleghqelleghminun,	seghleghqellghitnunllu	yuget.
B19_05_Hebrews_V4	Kina	alngunak	nakmikigatuq	ellmineng	high	priest-ngughhnaluni	quulvaghyaghqaaluni.	Iwernga	yuuk	high	priest-ngughtaquq	Kiyaghneghem	nakmikenghatni,	katam	tawaten	nakmikellghatun	Aaron.
B19_05_Hebrews_V5	Tawatenllu	Christ-a	quulvallghituq	ellmineng	nakmikluni	high	priest-ngughtelleghmun,	iwernga	Kiyaghneghem	nakmikegkaqaa.	Pikaqaa,	“Ighneqamken;	aghneghmi	whani	Ataliitaghpenga.”
B19_05_Hebrews_V6	Nalighneghitni	Akuzitni	Igaqegkani	Kiyaghneghem	pikaqaa,	“Priest-ngullequten	quunperugllak,	Melchizedek-em	priest-ngullghatun.”
B19_05_Hebrews_V7	Kiyaghneq	aghtughyaghqaanghillelguuq	yuguliyaghqaaluku	Jesus	tuqulleghmeng.	Enkaam	Jesus	nunametnguluni,	iglagtuluni	qunituumaghmi	yughaqaalghiillu	tungsiqaalghiillu	Kiyaghneghmun	yugulisqelluni	tuqulleghmeng.	Kiyaghneghem	nagatkaqii	yughallghi,	qayughllak	quseveglluni	qaatkegkaa	Kiyaghneghem	piyukellgha.
B19_05_Hebrews_V8	Qaywa	Jesus	Kiyaghneghem	Ighneqeghngaatni,	paninang	liitkaaguq	qaatkusimalleghmeng	ikfiqelleghmikun.
B19_05_Hebrews_V9	Apeghiighyagu	qamaglluku	Kiyaghneghem	pisqellgha,	Jesus-ngughtuq	kenlengilngughmeng	yugulillengestiyaghqaq	tamaghhaanun	qaatkullghiinun	ellminun.
B19_05_Hebrews_V10	Enkaam	Kiyaghneghem	nakmikegkaqaa	high	priest-nguluku,	Melchizedek-em	high	priest-ngullghatun.
B19_05_Hebrews_V11	Apeghyaghqaghllaguukut	tamaakuneng.	Iwernga	apeghtuneghllupigtusi	tamaakuneng	qayughllak	liigikaghaghsigalnguusi.
B19_05_Hebrews_V12	Neghipigllusi	ugpeqaalghiisi	enkaam	apeghtughiyaghqaaghtekaagusi	ilagpesinun.	Yeghlegi	paninang	aklaaqusi	kitumun	apeghtunqigtesqellusi	ugpenghhat	liisuwhaaghyaghqiitneng	Kiyaghneghem	akuzitanganeng.	Katam	taghnughhaghhaghestun	mamaghtughyugaqusi,	neqepigyugpenasi.
B19_05_Hebrews_V13	Kina	alngunak	mamaghtuqayuk	paninang	taghnughhaghhaaguq.	Salin	nallukaa	elqughutngalleqlu	anaggutngalleqlu.
B19_05_Hebrews_V14	Iwernga	neqepik	angtaniitkanun	pinguuq.	Peghqigsaqaagut	liigiksaghqaalukek	pinilghiinkuk,	seghleghenkuk.
B19_06_Hebrews_V1	Enkaam	liitelteki	apeghtuusat	angtaniitkanun	ugpeqanun	ayuqelghiit.	Liitngwaaqaqasi	apeghtuusuwhaaqat	Christ-ameng	ayuqelghiit	enkaangam	liinneqigsaghqaqenghitasi.	Liitngwaaghumaasi	atuqsaghqaafqiita	pinaluki	tamaakut	tuqumun	ayuqelghiit.	Liinneqigsaghqaqenghitaghsillu	ugpeqilleghmeng	ayuqelghii	Kiyaghneghqun,
B19_06_Hebrews_V2	paaptaayelleghneng,	iigtilleghneng,	unguvaghtilleghneng	tuqukaneng,	Kiyaghneghemllu	nanqigtilleghqaaneng	yugneng	aghyuughyaghqaaluki	kenlengunaan.
B19_06_Hebrews_V3	Kiyaghneghem	pistekanginkut,	apeghtughlleqamsi	angtaniitesqellusi	ugpeqat.
B19_06_Hebrews_V4	Tamaa	ilanganeng	yulguuq	allgeghutkaayalghiineng	Kiyaghneghem	nighuganeng,	naasiiqaqaatlu	qilagem	tunusaa.	Allgeghutkaagutlu	Agleghnalghiigneng	Taghneghagneng.	Nanghiiqaqiit	pinightulangi	Kiyaghneghem	akuzitangi,	nanghiiqaqaatlu	Kiyaghneghem	aghtughyaghqaanghillgha	nunakaghqamelnguq.	Taagken	ugpeqnaniqumegteggu	Christ-a,	avuteghqenqigtepagningiillequt	qayughllak	qaquuranqigtekangat	Kiyaghneghem	Ighnegha,	kayngusaakegkangatlu	yugtuqami.
B19_06_Hebrews_V7	Nuna	meghaquq	eslallugughnneghani,	piitestiiquqlu	nunivagseghameng	atughqameng	tamaakunun	peksighqikanun	nunameng.	Enkaam	Kiyaghneghem	pinighqestaqaa	nuna.
B19_06_Hebrews_V8	Iwernga	nuna	piitestimakumi	sikughllugnengllu	weeds-nengllu	satngunghituq.	Yakughnaanituq	Kiyaghneghem	seghleghunilleghqaaneng,	enkaam	paneghsaghqaaguq.
B19_06_Hebrews_V9	Piniqegkamnni,	qaywa	elpesinun	latatkeghngaamteki	tamaakut,	sumeghtaghaatkigatamsi	tawatellusi.	Liisimakaghput	pinighataghalghiimeng	quyastellelguusi	yugulilleghpesigun.
B19_06_Hebrews_V10	Kiyaghneq	elqughutngaan	nanqigtiiquq,	enkaam	puygunaanghitaa	qepghalleghsillu,	piniqilleghsillu	ellminun	kayusiitelleghpesigun	yugi.	Neqamikelleqaallu	paninang	kayusiitngukesi.
B19_06_Hebrews_V11	Nagneghtesugamsi	sagiqlusi	qepghaatesqelluku	Kiyaghneq	unguvalleghpesi	tagtalngatun.	Enkaam	allgeghtepestaaghlleqaghsi	sighimakegkaghsi.
B19_06_Hebrews_V12	Ighsanitalghiingughtesunghitamsi.	Yeghlegi	tamaakustun	ayuqestesugamsi	ugpeqilleghmegteggun,	nuqetutilleghmegteggunllu	allgeghusaghqat	Kiyaghneghem	akequsaqegkaaneng.
B19_06_Hebrews_V13	Kiyaghneghem	akeqaqngamigu	Abraham,	akeqegkaqaa	piyaghqapestaaghuniluku.	Avangitutanganeng	aangataghalghiimeng	ellmineng,	atuqluku	ellmi	katam	ateni	akeqikaaguq.
B19_06_Hebrews_V14	Abraham	pikaqaa,	“Quyastepestaaghluten,	uglaapiglluku	kingunelilleqamken.”
B19_06_Hebrews_V15	Abraham	qelaneghpenani	utaqiikaaguq,	enkaam	allgeghtekaqaa	Kiyaghneghem	akequsaa.
B19_06_Hebrews_V16	Kitum	neklegsuneghminigu	aaghtiiraaghutelleq,	akeqiiquq	sameng	pilleni	ipanguniluku	atuqluku	kitum	aatgha	ellmineng	aangataghalghiim.
B19_06_Hebrews_V17	Allgeghusaghqat	akequsamineng,	Kiyaghneghem	liigikestesugwii	allaangughsaghqaqenghitngwaaghniluki	agghilleni.	Enkaam	akeqikaaguq	atuqluku	ateni.
B19_06_Hebrews_V18	Kiyaghneghem	tawaten	kayemiinkut.	Kiyaghneq	iqlengiqigatuq	akeqineghmini,	iqlengiqnaanghituqlu	akeqikumi	atuqluku	ateni	ipapighqennaluku	piyaghqaqutni.	Taakuk	allangughteqaghhnaanghituk.	Whangkuta	anagniiqani	Kiyaghneghmun	paqniinnaluta,	kayemellengeghllagtukut	sighimaknaluku	Kiyaghneghem	akequsaa.
B19_06_Hebrews_V19	Taana	sighimalleq	uyghiitnguuq	unguvasimnnun,	paqnaniighutestiinkutlu	ayepsugitestiinkutlu.	Taana	sighimalleq	iteghtuq	agleghnalleghpigaghmun	nemun	safkaaghutem	awatanganilngughmun.
B19_06_Hebrews_V20	Tawavek	Jesus	iitqaaguq	sivumnni	whangkuta	apalluqluta.	High	Priest-ngughtekaaguq	quunperugllagmun,	Melchizedek-em	priest-ngumallghatun.
B19_07_Hebrews_V1	Taana	Melchizedek	umiilkesaghaa	Salem-em,	priest-ekaallu	Qulighpigaam	Kiyaghneghem.	Abraham	uteghniimaluku	pilluwameng	kayaalqughluki	umiilget,	Melchizedek-em	nallaghluku	quyastekaqaa.
B19_07_Hebrews_V2	Taagken	Abraham-em	tuunegkaa	qulaghqellghaneng	sameng	tamaghhaaneng	tugukamineng	pilluwami.	Melchizedek-em	aatgha	maalghugegneng	sameng	pisilguuq,	sivuliq	whaten	pisiiguq,	“Umiilga	Elqughutngallghem.”	Umiilkegkaatanganeng	Salem-em,	aatghan	aallgha	whaten	pisiiguq,	“Umiilga	Nekeggmellghem.”
B19_07_Hebrews_V3	Igiituq	igaqfikegkameng	Melchizedek-em	atanganengllu	naanganengllu	nalighmeng	sivunghaneng,	talwa	allgellghanengllu	tuqullghanengllu.	Kiyaghneghem	Ighneghatun	aghuliituq	priest-nguluni	quunperugllak.
B19_07_Hebrews_V4	Taawa	liigikaghsi	Melchizedek-em	aangumalleghllaga.	Talwa	sivuneqsuwhaamta	Abraham-em	tuunegkaa	Melchizedek	qulaghqellghaneng	tugulaqamineng	pilluwami.
B19_07_Hebrews_V5	Priest-et	kingunqii	Levi-em.	Liilightuusani,	Kiyaghneghem	qelqaqii	priest-et	qerngughtisqelluki	yulgutangitneng	qulaghqelleghmeng	allgeghtekiitneng.	Priest-et	tawaten	piiqut,	priest-etlu	yugetlu	Abraham-em	kingunqeghngiisteng.
B19_07_Hebrews_V6	Melchizedek	kingunqenghitaa	Levi-em,	iwernga	tugukliqaqaa	qulaghqelleq	Abraham-em	tuunyagu.	Quyastekaqaallu	Abraham,	allgeghutkaalghii	Kiyaghneghem	akequsaaneng.
B19_07_Hebrews_V7	Nalluneqniituq	taana	quyastilghii	aangataghaghtuq	taagken	quyastekameng.
B19_07_Hebrews_V8	Priest-et	yuguut	tuqukayuget	naqamllu	allgeghutkaagut	qulaghqelleghmeng.	Melchizedek-llu	allgeghutkaaguq	qulaghqelleghmeng,	iwernga	kiyaghtengnguuq,	Akuzitet	Igaqegkat	apellghistun.
B19_07_Hebrews_V9	Levi	allgeghutkaaguq	yugneng	qulaghqelleghmeng.	Pinayalghiikut	talwa	ellngallu	llivikikaaguq	qulaghqelleghmeng	Melchizedek-mun	Abraham-kun.
B19_07_Hebrews_V10	Qaywa	Levi	allgellghiteghngaaghmi,	sivuneghmi	Abraham-em	yugusiinitkaaguq	Melchizedek-em	nallaghaqngagu	Abraham.
B19_07_Hebrews_V11	Liilightuusani	igaqngaaq	priest-et	kingunqesaghqaqii	Levi-em.	Ellngita	Liilightuusat	apeghtuutkaqiit	yugnun,	iwernga	qepghaqaat	Kiyaghneghmun	nuughhutkaaguq.	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	yuget	aklukaagut	priest-meng	Melchizedek-etun	ayuqelghiimeng,	Aaron-etun	ayuqenghilnguq.
B19_07_Hebrews_V12	Levite	priest-et	simineghmegteki	allaneng	priest-eneng,	taawa	Liilightuusatlu	allangughsaghqaagut.
B19_07_Hebrews_V13	Priest-et	quunpeng	Levi-em	ramkenganeng	pinguut,	iwernga	Ataneghput	ramkenganeng	pingunghituq.	Kina	alngunak	Atanemta	ramkenganeng	pi	qepghiigatngwaaghtuq	priest-nguluni	aghqefigegni.
B19_07_Hebrews_V14	Tamaghhaghmi	liisimakaat	Ataneghput	allgeqaaguq	ramkenganun	Judah-m.	Moses-em	pimangitii	kingunghi	Judah-m	priest-nguyaghqaaniluki.
B19_07_Hebrews_V15	Enkaam	tamaakut	liigikataghaghaput	whateglluwaaq	qayughllak	ilanga	priest-em	Melchizedek-etun	ayuqelghii	tagimaaq.
B19_07_Hebrews_V16	Liilightuusat	qelghutkaqaat	priest-a	kingunqesaghqaqniluku	Levi-mun.	Ataneghput	priest-ngughtekaanghituq	Liilightuusat	pisqellghitgun,	iwernga	priest-ngughtekaaguq	aghtughyaghqaanghilngughqun	unguvalleghmikun	kenletghuusaghqaanghilngughqun.
B19_07_Hebrews_V17	Akuzitet	Igaqegkat	pikaalghiit,	“Priest-nguuten	quunperugllak,	Melchizedek-em	priest-ngullghatun.”
B19_07_Hebrews_V18	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	Kiyaghneghem	simiqaqaa	Liilightuusaq	priest-eneng	ayuqelghii	qayughllak	kayaalnguqlu	atuunghilnguqlu.
B19_07_Hebrews_V19	Liilightuusat	kina	alngunak	pistesimangitaa	Kiyaghneghem	piyukellghatun.	Enkaam	Kiyaghneghem	tuunumiinkut	pinighataghalghiimeng	sighimalleghmeng.	Taaggun	sighimalleghqun	aglaghyaghqaaghtukut	Kiyaghneghmun.
B19_07_Hebrews_V20	Taam	sighimallghem	saaghwakun	Kiyaghneq	allangughhnaanghilngughmeng	akeqimaaq.
B19_07_Hebrews_V21	Iwernga	tawatelngughmeng	akeqillghituq	Levi-em	kingunghi	priest-ngughtaqngata.	Jesus-nginaghmun	whaten	pikaaguq,	“Ataneq	akeqimaaq,	allangughhnaanghitaaklu	umyugagni;	‘Elpek	priest-nguuten	quunperugllak.’”
B19_07_Hebrews_V22	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	Jesus-nguuq	ipapighqelleq	Kiyaghneghem	akequsani	pipestaaghlleqaa.	Taana	akequsaq	pinighataghaghtuq	akequsaqegkamineng	Moses-kun.
B19_07_Hebrews_V23	Sivunghani	priest-etuyaghtuq.	Tuqunghata	ilangita	priest-et	nagneghutaqaat	qepghaqaat.
B19_07_Hebrews_V24	Iwernga	Jesus	priest-nguuq	quunperugllak	qayughllak	unguvallequq	quunpeng.
B19_07_Hebrews_V25	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	Jesus-em	iiwleng	yuguliyaqlegwii	Kiyaghneghmun	aglalghiit	ellmikun,	qayughllak	quunpeng	unguvanguuq	maniguutunnaluki	tamaakut	Kiyaghneghmun.
B19_07_Hebrews_V26	Jesus	High	Priest-nguuq	tuunikayuk	sameng	aklukegkamnneng.	Agleghnaghtuq,	avutngituq,	pelungituq,	aaftengngaaq	seghleghqesteneng,	Kiyaghneghem	quulvaqaqaa	qulighpigaghmun	qilagmun.
B19_07_Hebrews_V27	Jesus	ilangistun	high	priest-estun	ayuqenghituq.	Aghhutanga	tamaghhaan	high	priest-a	aghqerraaghyaghqaaguq,	sivukluni	ellmi	seghleghqelleghminun,	taagken	yuget	seghleghqellghitnun.	Jesus	tuunaqngami	ellmineng	katam,	aghqutkegkaaguq	seghleghqellghitnun	yuget,	ataasighhaghmeng.
B19_07_Hebrews_V28	Liilightuusani	igaqngaaq	yuget	nakmiighyaghqaaniluki	high	priest-ekaghqameng	seghleghqegkayugughngaan	alngunak	yugestun.	Kingunganeng	Kiyaghneghem	apellghan	Liilightuusat	Moses-mun,	tagtalmi	taakwani	allangughsaghqaanghilngughmeng	akeqikaaguq.	Taaggun	akeqilleghqun	Kiyaghneghem	Ighneni	High	Priest-ngughtestekaqaa,	afkuyangunaan,	quunperugllak.
B19_08_Hebrews_V1	Aapqaghput	elpesinun,	whaten	pisiiguq:	tawatelngughmeng	high	priest-elguukut	aqumgalghii	aghenqigneghani	saaghwakun	Aghtughyaghqaanghitelleghpigaam	qilagmi.
B19_08_Hebrews_V2	Qepghaatinguuq	high	priest-nguluni	sanctuary-mi.	Taana	tabernacle-epiguuq	Atanghem	nekeftekaqaa,	yugem	nekeftekaqenghitaa.
B19_08_Hebrews_V3	Tamaghhaghmi	high	priest-a	nakmikegkaaguq	tuunisqelluku	tunusaneng,	teghikusanengllu	aghqerraaghesqelluku	Kiyaghneghmun.	Enkaam	High	priest-evutlu	sameng	tuunyaghqalguyaghqaaguq	Kiyaghneghmun.
B19_08_Hebrews_V4	Jesus	nunamesaqumi	priest-ngunayanghituq,	qayughllak	priest-elguuq	nunami	tuunikayugneng	tunusaneng	Kiyaghneghmun	Liilightuusat	pisqellghistun.
B19_08_Hebrews_V5	Priest-et	qepghaqaagut	sanctuary-mi,	qilagmelngughtun	ayuqesugnilngughmi.	Salin	Moses-em	tabernacle-a	nekeftellghilluku,	Kiyaghneghem	apaqutkaqaa,	“Wataghllak	sangwaa	qamaglluku	ulimanaken	tawatengwaaq	uspeqellemtun	kelgutkamtun	elpenun	naayghami.”
B19_08_Hebrews_V6	Kiyaghneghem	Jesus	qepghaqalitkaqaa	priest-nguluku.	Qepghaqaa	megnunaghataghaghtuq	Levite-et	priest-et	qepghallghitneng.	Tawateghpigaq	akequsaghraghaq	pinighataghalghiinguuq	akequsalugmeng	qayughllak	taaggun	Jesus-em	ilaliighutestekaqii	Kiyaghneqlu	yugetlu.	Pinighataghaghtuq	qayughllak	tunemiitngaaq	akequsatgun	pinighataghalghiitgun.
B19_08_Hebrews_V7	Sivuliq	akequsaq	afkuyiisaqan,	taawa	tuungliinnayaghtuq.
B19_08_Hebrews_V8	Iwernga	Kiyaghneghem	afkuyalgunikaqii	yuni	whaten	piiqngami,	“Aghneghet	kaallequt,	piiq	Ataneq,	akequsaghraghaq	pilleqaqa	Israel-eghmiinunllu	Judah-ghmiinunllu.
B19_08_Hebrews_V9	Akequsaghraghaqa	tawatennaanghituq	akequsaqegkamtun	sivunghitnun	tasluqluki	aghulaqutaqngamki	Egypt-meng.	Qaatkusimangitut	akequsama	pisqellghatun.	Enkaam	avelghaqiinaqaqanka,	piiq	Ataneq.
B19_08_Hebrews_V10	Aghneghet	taakut	kingungitneng	una	akequsaghraghaq	pilleqaqa	Israel-eghmiinun,	piiq	Ataneq:	Liilightuusanka	umyugiitnun	kanaghlleqanka,	igaqelleqankallu	qamagun	ilungitgun.	Kiyaghneqelleqaatnga,	ellngit	yukelleqanka.
B19_08_Hebrews_V11	Nalighhiiniita	apeghtughyaghqaqenghitaa	nunalgutni,	nalighmeng	nengllugutni	liitesqelluku	Ataneq,	qayughllak	qamaglluteng	liisimakelleqaatnga,	ukalighpigaghhaghneng	pingwaaghllagnun.
B19_08_Hebrews_V12	Seghevulleqanka	anaggutellghit,	allamengllu	neqamiknaanghitanka	seghleghqellghit.”
B19_08_Hebrews_V13	Kiyaghneghem	akuzitkaqngamigu	akequsaghraghaq,	sivuliq	akequsaq	atuunanightestekaqaa.	Enkaam	sangwaa	alngunak	atuunanighluni	aghyughluni	mulugpenani	aviighullequq.
B19_09_Hebrews_V1	Akequsaqsuwhaaghmini	Kiyaghneghem	igaqegkaqii	qelghusat	naten	maniguutelleghqameng	ellminun,	natenllu	nekeftelleghqaa	sanctuary	nunami.
B19_09_Hebrews_V2	Taana	sanctuary	yuget	ulimakaat	tiintanguftuq	maalghugegneng	nelek.	Sivuliim	nem	aatqeftaa	Agleghnalghii	Na.	Ilunganiteftut	kenelghutalghutak,	tipelek	neqekrangllalgek	tuunegkameng	Kiyaghneghmun.
B19_09_Hebrews_V3	Awalighneghani	tuunglighhaan	safkaaghutem	ilanga	nem	atilqelghii	Agleghnalleghpigaq	Na.
B19_09_Hebrews_V4	Ilungani	taawa	gold-ek	aghqefigek	paneghreghaasik	incense-mun.	Taawallu	salngagek	qaspeghiqak	gold-meng,	ateghqek	ark-ek,	neqanguusighqak	Kiyaghneghem	akequsaanun.	Ark-em	imaqeftii	gold-ek	aqimleghutak	manna-meng	imalgek,	Aaron-em	ayaviigha	piitqughvikegkaq,	maalghuklu	lliivneqegtak	uyghagek	igaqughvikngalghiik	Kiyaghneghem	qelghusaaneng.
B19_09_Hebrews_V5	Quulngani	ark-em	taawa	gold-ek	cherubim-ek,	yaqghwik	taghneghangullghiik	mercy	seat-kun.	Iwernga	uumi	pilleghmi	akuzitkepagningitaput	tamaakut.
B19_09_Hebrews_V6	Sangwaa	tamaghhaan	tiintanilnguq	apeghiighluku,	taagken	aghhutanga	tamaghhaan	priest-et	iitghaqut	sivulighmun	nemun	qepghaghnaluteng.
B19_09_Hebrews_V7	Iwernga	high	priest-nginaghhaq	iteghyaghqaaguq	tuunglighhaanun	nenganun	tiintam.	Tawaten	piiquq	ataasighhaghmeng	ayumiqulleghmi.	Iteneghmini	tawavek	nemun	iiwleng	kelqesaghqaaguq	aawaneng	aghqutkegkam	teghikusam.	Tuuniiquq	aawmeng	Kiyaghneghmun	ellmi	seghleghqelleghminun,	yugetlu	seghleghqellghitnun.	Taana	aawk	seghleghqellghitnun	pinguuq	nallukluteng	pikiitnun.
B19_09_Hebrews_V8	Tamaakutgun	Agleghnalghiim	Taghnegham	liigikestiinkut	iteghvik	Agleghnalleghpigaghmun	Nemun	salin	qelpeghsigalnguq	tabernacle-a	atuqnguluku.
B19_09_Hebrews_V9	Taakut	usputaagut	maatemun.	Liigikestiinkut	tunusatlu	aghqutkegkatlu	teghikusat	nallghusaghpagningitaat	maniguutistem	sumeghnegha.
B19_09_Hebrews_V10	Tamaakut	tunusatlu	aghqutetlu	atuqegkaagut	qaatkesaghqaaluki	qelghusat	neqnengllu,	meghyaghqanengllu,	pelungighsalleghqanengllu	yugusiitneng	ayuqelghiit.	Tamaakut	qelghusat	yugusighhiinaghmun	ayuqut.	Qaatkesaghqaagut	kenlanga	Kiyaghneghem	akequsaghraghaa	atuughtellghanun.
B19_09_Hebrews_V11	Christ-a	tagiiqngami	High	Priest-nguluni,	tagitkaqii	qamaglluki	pinilghiit	quyastillghet	whaa	maaten	whaanlenguut.	Iitqaqaa	tabernacle-a	qilagmelnguq,	megnunaghataghalghiillu	pinighataghalghiillu	nunamelngughmeng	tabernacle-meng.	Qilagmelnguq	tabernacle-a	yuget	ulimaaqenghitaat	enkaam	nunam	pikenghitaa.
B19_09_Hebrews_V12	Taagken	Christ-a	iitqaaguq	ataasimeng	quunperugllak	Agleghnalleghpigaghmun	Nemun	seghleghqellemnneng	itemunnaluta	kenlengunaan.	Tawaten	pikaaguq	tuunelleghmikun	ellmi	katam	aawni,	atughpenaki	aawit	goat-etlu,	kaawaghaatlu.
B19_09_Hebrews_V13	Liightuusat	qelqaqiit	priest-enun	sivillagtiisqelluki	yuget	aawitneng	goat-et,	bull-et,	panellghanengllu	kaawaghaam.	Tawaten	piiqut	pelungighsaghnaluki	yuget	yugusiit	tuguklighyugnaghtesqelluki	Kiyaghneghmun.
B19_09_Hebrews_V14	Tamaakut	pelungighiyaqlegukata	yuget	yugusiitneng,	taawa	Christ-am	aawan	wata	pilleqii.	Pelungighlleqii	umyugasi	satngunghilngughneng	ugpeqilleghneng	elpesinun	qepghaatesqelluku	unguvalghii	Kiyaghneq.	Kenlengilnguugnekun	Taghneghagnekun,	Christ-a	seghleghqellghilnguq,	tuunegkaaguq	ellmineng	katam	Kiyaghneghmun	aghqutnguluni.
B19_09_Hebrews_V15	Enkaam	Christ-am	tagitkaqaa	Kiyaghneghem	akequsaghraghaa	yugnun	tuqluqaanun.	Christ-a	tawaten	pikaaguq	ellngitnun	allgeghtesqelluku	kenlengilnguq	pagitaq	Kiyaghneghem	akequsaqegkaa	ellngitnun.	Allgeghlleqiit	pagitat	qayughllak	Christ-am	tuqumatkegkaqegkangi.	Enkaam	yuget	kiyaghtekat	akequsaqsuwhaaghmi,	itemumaat	seghleghqelleghmeggneng.
B19_09_Hebrews_V16	Igakun	yugem	igaqughlleqii	saghyani	kitumun	pagisaghqaaniluki	tuqukumi.	Pagitiyaghqam	allgeghhnaanghitii	pagisaghqani	wetku	kitum	ipapighqegkagu	yuuk	tuqumatanga.
B19_09_Hebrews_V17	Taam	yugem	igaquqii	pitngunaanghitut	salin	kiyaghtengnguluku.	Igaquqii	pitngughllequt	kingunganeng	tuqukan.
B19_09_Hebrews_V18	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	talwa	akequsaqsuwhaaq	pitngumangituq	aawngunani.
B19_09_Hebrews_V19	Moses-em	aapqaqii	yugnun	qamaglluki	qelghusat	Liightuusanilnguut.	Taagken	kaawaghaatlu,	goat-etlu	aawitneng	tugulluni	meghmeng	akumegkaa.	Tugulluni	kavilngughmeng	wool-meng,	avayaanengllu	hyssop-em	neptekii	aawmun.	Taagken	sivillagtaqii	igat	Liilightuusalghutat,	qamagllukillu	yuget.
B19_09_Hebrews_V20	Pikii,	“Unanguuq	aawk	apeghiighilghii	Kiyaghneghem	akequsaaneng	qelghuskanga	elpesinun	qaatkesqelluku.”
B19_09_Hebrews_V21	Tawatengngwaaq	Moses-em	sivillagtaqaqii	aawmeng	tabernacle-a,	qamagllukillu	saghyat	atuqegkat	maniguutelleghmun.
B19_09_Hebrews_V22	Ipapestaaq	Liilightuusat	pillghitni,	qamagtevzigluni	sangwaa	tamaghhaghmi	pelungiqaaguq	aawkun.	Kiyaghneghem	seghevunnaanghitii	yuget	seghleghqellghit	wetkuqun	aawk	maaqegkan.
B19_09_Hebrews_V23	Nunamelnguq	tabernacle-a,	ilunganilnguutlu	saghyat	qilagmelngughestun	ayuqut.	Tamaakut	nunamelnguut	saghyat	pelungighyaghqaagut	aawitgun	teghikusat.	Iwernga	qilagmelnguut	saghyapiget	pelungighyaghqaagut	aghqutetgun	pinighataghalghiit	nunami	aghqutkegkaneng.
B19_09_Hebrews_V24	Christ-a	iitghumangituq	Agleghnalleghpigaghmun	Nemun	yuget	ulimaaghitnun.	Taana	ipapigtun	qilagmelngughtun	ayuquq.	Yeghlegi	qilagmun	iitqaaguq	enkaam	maaten	Kiyaghneghmetuq	High	Priest-nguluni	whangkunnun.
B19_09_Hebrews_V25	Christ-a	nunam	high	priest-ngatun	ayuqenghituq.	Ataasighhaghmeng	ayumiqunghani	high	priest-a	iitghaquq	Agleghnalleghpigaghmun	Nemun	kelqelluni	aawmeng	ellmi	pikenghilkemineng.	Iwernga	Christ-a	aghqutkumangituq	ellmineng	uteghpagtiinaq,
B19_09_Hebrews_V26	qayughllak	ikfiqnayaghtuq	ugliinaghluku	ima	ulimallghaneng	nunam.	Iwernga	ukuni	kingulighni	aghneghni	tagikaaguq	ataasimeng	quunperugllak	iqinnaluki	seghleghqellghet	aghqutkelleghmikun	ellmineng.
B19_09_Hebrews_V27	Tamaghaghhmi	tuquyaghqaalghii	ataasighhaghmeng,	enkaam	taam	kingunganeng	Kiyaghneghem	nanqiglleqii.
B19_09_Hebrews_V28	Tawateghpigaq	ataasighhaghmeng	Christ-a	aghqutkegkaaguq	ellmineng	iqinnaluki	seghleghqellghit	yulghutet.	Iwernga	alla	tagikumi,	aghqutkesaghtuunghituq	ellmineng	seghleghqelleghmun.	Yeghlegi	yuguliyaghtughlleqii	qelanqilghiit	ellmineng.
B19_10_Hebrews_V1	Liilightuusat	taghneghangullghiistun	ayuqut	pinilghiinun	kaasaghqanun,	iwernga	Liilightuusat	taakughpigaanghitut.	Liilightuusat	qelellghistun	Jews-et	aghqerraaghumanginaghaqut	ayumiitanga	tamaghhaan.	Iwernga	tamaakut	aghqerraallghet	ukmangighwaaghpagningitiit	seghleghqellghitneng	manigughyaghtuneghmegteggu	Kiyaghneq.
B19_10_Hebrews_V2	Yuget	maniguutestengi	Kiyaghneghem	ukmangipiigumakumeng	seghleghqelleghmeggneng,	seghleghninanighnayaghtut.	Enkaam	aghqutkinanighnayaghtut.
B19_10_Hebrews_V3	Iwernga	ayumiitanga	tamaghhaan,	tamaakut	aghqerraallghet	neqangughtestaqiit	yuget	seghleghqellghitneng,
B19_10_Hebrews_V4	qayughllak	aawita	bull-etlu	goat-etlu	seghleghqellghighpagningitiit.
B19_10_Hebrews_V5	Tamaakut	apalluqluki	Christ-a	tagiiqngami	nunamun	pikaqaa	Kiyaghneq:	“Aghquteyugumangitutenllu	tunusaghyugumangitutenllu,	iwernga	yataaghqegkaqan	yugusiq	whangamnun.
B19_10_Hebrews_V6	Efququmangitaten	teghikusat	iinguniita	paneghtekat	aghqefigegni	nalighmeng	aghqutet	seghleghqelleghnun.
B19_10_Hebrews_V7	Taagken	whanga	piiqa,	‘Ii-i	Kiyaghneq,	tagiinga	piyukelleghpetun	pinalunga,	katam	tawaten	igaquqaqegkangatnga	Akuzitni	Igaqegkani.’”
B19_10_Hebrews_V8	Christ-a	pikaalghii,	“Aghquteyugumangitutenllu	tunusaghyugumangitutenllu.	Aghquteyugumangituten	teghikusaneng	iingunaghmeng	paneghtekaneng	aghqefigegni	nalighmeng	aghqutneng	seghleghqelleghnun.	Tamaakut	efqughsimangitaaten.”	Christ-a	tawaten	pikaaguq	Liilightuusat	qelghutkaqeghngaatki	tamaakut	aghqutet	pisqelluki.
B19_10_Hebrews_V9	Taagken	pikaaguq,	“Ii-i,	tagiinga	piyukelleghpetun	pinalunga.”	Enkaam	Kiyaghneghem	qamaglluki	iqiqughluki	aghquteluget	nengitgun	nekegtekaqaa	Christ-a	aghqutnguluku.
B19_10_Hebrews_V10	Jesus	Christ-am	qaatkesaqminigu	Kiyaghneghem	piyukellgha,	pelungiqaqiinkut	seghleghqellemnneng	tuunelleghmikun	yugusini	ataasighhaghmeng	quunperugllak.
B19_10_Hebrews_V11	Aghhutanga	tamaghhaan,	tamaghhaghmeng	priest-et	nekevghaghmeng	qepghaqateng	piiqiit.	Uteghpagtiinaq	tuuniiqut	tawatelkullghiineng	aghqutneng.	Tawalliima	tamaakut	aghqutet	seghleghqellghighiyaghqaghhaanghitut.
B19_10_Hebrews_V12	Iwernga	Christ-am	tuunegkaqaa	ataasiq	aghqun	seghleghqelleghnun	quunperugllagmun.	Taagken	aqumegkaq	aghenqigneghakun	Kiyaghneghem.
B19_10_Hebrews_V13	Tawani	Christ-a	utaqiigaquq	kenlanga	Kiyaghneghem	nekegtelleghqaanun	anguyagi	itegaan	asinganun.
B19_10_Hebrews_V14	Taaggun	ataasikun	aghqutkelleghqun,	Christ-am	quunperugllak	naamigtestekaqii	pelungighsaqat	seghleghqelleghmeggneng.
B19_10_Hebrews_V15	Agleghnalghiimllu	Taghnegham	ungipaatiinkut	tamaakuneng.	Sivukluni	whaten	pikaaguq,
B19_10_Hebrews_V16	“Unanguuq	akequsaqa	yumnun,	kingungitneng	tamaakut	aghneghet,	piiq	Ataneq,	Liilightuusanka	kanaghlleqanka	ilungitnun,	igaqelleqankallu	umyuwiitgun.”
B19_10_Hebrews_V17	Taagken	piiq,	“Allamengllu	neqamiknaanghitanka	seghleghqellghit,	seghletunllu	pillghit.”
B19_10_Hebrews_V18	Enkaam	Kiyaghneghem	seghevuskaki	seghleghqellghit,	aghqutet	atuqsaghqaananighllequt	seghleghqelleghnun.
B19_10_Hebrews_V19	Tamaaken	apalluqluku,	ugpeqaalgutemni,	alingillngunaamta	itelleghqangukut	Agleghnalleghpigaghmun	aawakun	Jesus-em.
B19_10_Hebrews_V20	Qelpeghusimiinkutlu	tumeghraghaghmeng	unguvalleghmun	safkaaghutkun;	taana	safkaaghun	yugusiqaa.
B19_10_Hebrews_V21	Priest-elegllaaguukutlu	igleghutilghii	Kiyaghneghem	mangteghaaneng.
B19_10_Hebrews_V22	Tamaakut	apalluqluki	tughaaghelteggu	Kiyaghneq	ipapighqelluta,	neghyukngwaaghluku.	Tawaten	pilleghqangukut	qayughllak	umyugalluput	sivillagtaqaagut	Christ-am	aawaneng	ukmangiightesqelluki,	yugusiputlu	ughvughqegkaagut	pelungilngughqun	meghqun.
B19_10_Hebrews_V23	Yeqay	ataasiighmelluta	sighimalleghmetekestaalta	whangkunnun	piknikamnnun,	qayughllak	ugpeqaghput	Kiyaghneq	ataasiighmetuq	enkaam	piyaghqaqii	akequsani.
B19_10_Hebrews_V24	Yeqay	sumeghtaghaalta	naten	qiilngumighusaghqaaluta	piniqsaghqaaluki	ilat,	pinitunllu	piyaghqaaluta.
B19_10_Hebrews_V25	Yeqay	taaqefqaamta	qerngughunneghmeng	pilta	manigughnaluku	Kiyaghneq,	ilangita	piiqellghistun.	Yeghlegi	qerngughusimanginaalta	kayemutunnaluta.	Wata	kayemusimanginaalta	qayughllak	Atanghem	Aghnegha	tughaalghii.
B19_10_Hebrews_V26	Seghleghqesugaataqumta	kingunganeng	liilluku	ipapilleq,	taawa	aghqutkaghqiituq	iqitusighqameng	tamaavek	seghleghqelleghnun.
B19_10_Hebrews_V27	Tamaakut	tawaten	pilghiit	alingruughmeng	utaqiillequt	Kiyaghneghem	nanqigtillghaneng.	Atuqelleqaak	uguqnaghllagek	kenghek	naafqennaluki	tamaakut	kipullginaalghiit	ellmineng.
B19_10_Hebrews_V28	Maalghuk	nalighmeng	pingayut	liisimakistet	aapqatgu	yuuk	qaatkusimanginniluku	Moses-em	Liilightuusaanun,	nanqigtistem	nangllekegpenaan	tuqutesleqaa.
B19_10_Hebrews_V29	Sumeghtaghaatkaghteggu	natenmi	angkaslugan	Kiyaghneghem	aghyuughlleqagu	yuuk	tutmaasghaqiiqelghii	Ighneghaneng	Kiyaghneghem,	piiqelghii	satngunghinniluku	aawk	apeghiighutkaq	akequsaghraghaghmeng	(qaywa	Kiyaghneghem	ukmangiisiqegkaqeghngaagu	seghleghqellghanun),	seghlequughiiqelghiillu	nangllegtalghiignun	Tagneghagnun.
B19_10_Hebrews_V30	Liisimakaghput	Kiyaghneq;	ellngangulghii	whaten	pikaq,	“Whanganguuq	aghyuughiyaghqaq,	akisaghqaqanka	seghletun	pillghit.”	Whatenllu	pikaaguq,	“Atanghem	nanqigsaghqaqii	ellmi	yuni.”
B19_10_Hebrews_V31	Tatamaataghnapigtuq	kina	alngunak	iigganisaghqaq	unguvalghiim	Kiyaghneghem	Nanqigtillghem	Aghneghani!
B19_10_Hebrews_V32	Neqamikegkesi	tamaakut	aghneghet	sivunghani	liisuwhaaghaqngafsigu	ipapilleq	Christ-ameng	ayuqelghii.	Aghuliitkaagusi	ataasiighmellusi	qaywa	ikfiqeghllaghngaaghpesi.
B19_10_Hebrews_V33	Ilangakun	yugtuqami	yuget	seghletun	akuzitkaqiisillu	amyuqetaatkaqiisillu.	Ilangani	nekevghalgusighaqasi	tamaakut	amyuqetaatkesilghiit.
B19_10_Hebrews_V34	Nangllekaqasi	anusimingllaghvigmelnguut.	Talwa	quyangaaqusi	yuget	tugulanghatki	saghyasi	qayughllak	liisimakaghsi	paninang	salguusi	pinighataghalghiimeng	quunpekaghqameng.
B19_10_Hebrews_V35	Enkaangam	iilqayugpenasi	qayughllak	ilutumanginaqufsi	allgeghullequsi	akileghtuusaghllagmeng.
B19_10_Hebrews_V36	Aklukngwaaghsi	nuqenneghtulleq	atuqsaghqaaluku	Kiyaghneghem	piyukellgha.	Taagken	allgeghlleqasi	akequsaqegkii.
B19_10_Hebrews_V37	Katam	igaqngalghii	Akuzitni	Igaqegkani	whaten,	“Qantaghaqun	taana	tagiyaghqaq	kaallequq;	kimaawinaanghituq.
B19_10_Hebrews_V38	Elqughutngalghiit	yugenka	kiyaghllequt	ugpeqilleghqun.	Iwernga	kitum	alngunak	pegtekumigu	ugpeqilleni,	unguvasigma	efquqnaanghitaqa.”
B19_10_Hebrews_V39	Iwernga	whangkuta	pegtikastun	ugpeqilleghmeggneng	ayuqenghitukut,	naafqellengyaghqastun.	Iwernga	ugpeqillelguukut	enkaam	unguvasiput	yugulikaagukut.
B19_11_Hebrews_V1	Ugpeqillghem	liisimakestengngwaaghiinkut	allgeghsaghqaqniluku	sighmakegkaghput,	ipapighqusiguq	esghaghyaghqaqenghilkemnnun.
B19_11_Hebrews_V2	Ugpeqilleghmegteggun	ayumiim	yugi	itagnaqellengegkaagut	Kiyaghneghmeng.
B19_11_Hebrews_V3	Ugpeqilleghqun	liigikegkaqaghput	Kiyaghneghem	ulimaaqaa	nuna	akuzitmikun.	Tamaakut	aliilnguut	ulimaaghuut	esghaghyaghqaanghilngughmeng.
B19_11_Hebrews_V4	Ugpeqilleghqun	Abel	tuunikaaguq	Kiyaghneghmun	tuguklighyugnaghataghalghiimeng	aghqutmeng	Cain-em	aghqutkegkaaneng.	Kiyaghneq	pikaaguq	Abel	elqughutngalghiinguniluku	yuuk	ugpeqillgha	apalluqluku.	Kiyaghneghem	ipapighqegkaqaa	Abel	elqughutnganiluku	tuguklilleghmikun	tunusii.	Ugpeqilleghmikun	Abel	paninang	akuzinguuq,	tuqukaayaghngaaghmi.
B19_11_Hebrews_V5	Upeqilleghqun	Enoch	mayuutestekaaguq	qilagmun	enkaam	nanghiillghitaa	tuqulleq.	Kitum	alngunak	naalkellghitaa	qayughllak	Kiyaghneghem	tugukaqegkanga.	Mayullghilluni	qilagmun,	igaqngakaaguq	Enoch-em	efqughtekaqaa	Kiyaghneq.
B19_11_Hebrews_V6	Ugpeqillngunani	kitum	alngunak	efqughtepagningitaa	Kiyaghneq.	Kina	alngunak	tagiyukumi	Kiyaghneghmun	ugpeqepestaaghyaghqaqaa	Kiyaghnelguniluku,	akileghtughyaghqaqiillu	ivaghipiilghiit	ellmineng.
B19_11_Hebrews_V7	Ugpeqilleghqun	Noah-m	nagatkaqii	Kiyaghneghem	kelengasaaghutkii	tamaakut	salin	pingigalluki.	Enkaam	qaatkelluku	Kiyaghneq	angyaghpangllaqaaguq	nengllugutni	yugulinaluki	ulevelleghmeng.	Tawaten	pilleghmikun	Noah-m	nunam	yugi	nanqigtestekaqii	Kiyaghneghmun	aghyuughesqelluki.	Ugpeqilleni	apalluqluku	Noah-m	allgeghtekaqaa	elqughutngalleq	Kiyaghneghmeng.
B19_11_Hebrews_V8	Ugpeqilleghqun	Abraham-em	qaatkegkaqaa	Kiyaghneq	tuqlughaqngatni	aghulaqesqelluku	ilanganun	nunam.	Kiyaghneghem	akequsaqaa	taana	nuna	ellnganun	tuunelleqniluku.	Enkaam	unitkaqaa	ellmi	nunani	nallukluku	navek	pinaqutni.
B19_11_Hebrews_V9	Ugpeqilleghqun	kiyaghtekaaguq	nunataaluni	nunami	Kiyaghneghem	akequsaqegkaani.	Tiintanitkaaguq	katam	Isaac-enkuk	Jacob-enkuk	pillghegketun.	Elkegkenkallu	allgeghtekaqaak	Kiyaghneghem	akequsaqegkaa	taana	nuna.
B19_11_Hebrews_V10	Abraham	tawaten	pikaaguq	qayughllak	utaqiingulghii	kiyaghhnaluni	neghllagmi	tunemaghtuqami.	Kiyaghneghuuq	uspeqistengallu	ulimaghistengallu	neghllagem.
B19_11_Hebrews_V11	Abraham	nanevgaghllaghngaaghmi,	Sarah-llu	qumingyaghqaanghiteghngaaghmi,	paninang	ugpeqilleghqun	Sarah	qumingegkaaguq,	qayughllak	neghyukegkaqaa	Kiyaghneghmun	pilleqniluku	akequsaqegkani.
B19_11_Hebrews_V12	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	Abraham	tuquyaghtungestaqaaghngaaghmi,	paninang	kinguneghtughqaaghllakaaguq.	Ellngita	uglaghtalngit	ighaleqetaaghestun	qilagamelngughestun	ayuqut,	kestekaanghilngughestunllu	qenaavzeghaatun	esnam.
B19_11_Hebrews_V13	Qamaglluteng	tamaakut	yuget	paninang	kiyaghtekaagut	ugpeqilleghqun	tuqulleghmeggnun	kenlanga.	Tuqulaghaatkaalghiit	allgeghtegpenaki	Kiyaghneghem	akequsaqegkii	ellmeggnun.	Iwernga	ugpeqilleghqun	esghaqaqiit	Kiyaghneghem	akequsaqegkii	uyavanlluki	sivumeggnilluki	quyakegkaqiitlu.	Enkaangam	ungipaatkaqiit	yuget	nunataaniluteng	whani	nunami,	nunamun	pikenghinniluteng.
B19_11_Hebrews_V14	Tamaakut	tawaten	akuzilghiit,	whateghlluwaaq	aapghwaat	nunakaghqaghyugniluteng	ellmeggnun	pikaghqameng.
B19_11_Hebrews_V15	Suumqegkaqsaqumegteggu	taana	nuna	unitkaghteng,	uteghtelleghqalgunayaghtut.
B19_11_Hebrews_V16	Yeghlegi	piyukataghaqaqaat	pinighataghalghii	nuna,	qilaghmelnguq.	Enkaam	Kiyaghneq	kaynguyugigatuq	Kiyaghneqninghatni.	Talwa	yataaghqutkaqii	neghllagmeng.
B19_11_Hebrews_V17	Kiyaghneghem	akeqegkaqegkanga	Abraham,	“Isaac-ekun	kinguneghllagullequten.”	Ugpeqilleghqun	Abraham-em	neghyukegkaqaa	Kiyaghneq	nanghiiqwaaqngatni.	Enkaam	aghqutkesaghqaaghtekaa	kezemaghhaq	ighneni,	Isaac.
B19_11_Hebrews_V19	Abraham-em	ugpeqegkaqaa	Kiyaghneq	unguvaghtiyaqleguniluku	tuqukaneng.	Enkaam	Kiyaghneghem	tuqutesnanighaqngagu	Isaac,	Abraham-em	veghtekallghuuqaqaa	Isaac	tuqulleghmeng.
B19_11_Hebrews_V20	Ugpeqilleghqun	Isaac-em	quyastekaqaak	Jacob-enkuk	Esau-nkuk,	tungsiitkaqaak	Kiyaghneghmun	quyastesqellukek	aagnaqkaghqiik.
B19_11_Hebrews_V21	Ugpeqilleghqun	Jacob-em,	tuqunaqnguluni	quyastekaqaak	allakaqaghtaagkenka	ighneghqek	Joseph-em.	Taagken	qungughlluni	ayaviighmikun	maniguqaqaa	Kiyaghneq.
B19_11_Hebrews_V22	Ugpeqilleghqun	Joseph-em,	kenletghuunnaqellghani	unguvalleghmi,	akuzitkegkaqaa	aghulaqelleghqaat	Israel-eghmiit	Egypt-meng.	Apeghtuutkaqiillu	neghqwaani	naten	salleghqii.
B19_11_Hebrews_V23	Ugpeqilleghqun	Moses-em	angayuqagkenka	iighaghtuqaqaak	pingayut	tanqit	allgellghan	kingunganeng.	Esghaqangak	yuukegtepiglleghii,	alingumangilnguuklu	qaatkunneghisaghqaalutek	umiilgem	qelghutellghanun.
B19_11_Hebrews_V24	Ugpeqilleghqun	Moses,	yugughsami	ighsakaaguq	ighneqesneghmeng	Pharaoh-m	paniganun.
B19_11_Hebrews_V25	Yeghlegi	nakmiiqaaguq	ikfiqelgusighnaluki	Kiyaghneghem	yugi,	avelghagluku	efqughyugnallgha	seghleghqellghem	muluyaghqaanghilnguq.
B19_11_Hebrews_V26	Itupill	sumeghtaghaatkegkaqaa	ikfiqelleghqani	Christ-amun	itagnaghataghaghniluku	aklungilghutanganeng	Egypt-em.	Sumeghtaghaatkengngwii	akileghtuusaghqat	aga	sivumelnguut.
B19_11_Hebrews_V27	Ugpeqilleghqun	Moses-em	unitkaqaa	Egypt	alingellngunani	umiilgem	sakraallghaneng.	Iilqayugumangituq	qayughllak	esghalghiistun	pikaqegkanga	aliinneghilnguq	Kiyaghneq.
B19_11_Hebrews_V28	Ugpeqilleghqun	Moses-em	qelqaqii	yuget	Passover-esqelluki,	qelghutkaqaallu	aakw	sivillagtaatesqelluku	amigteggun.	Enkaam	Yaqulgan	Tuqullghem	tuqutellghitii	ighneqsuwhaaghit	Israel-eghmiit.
B19_11_Hebrews_V29	Ugpeqilleghqun	Israel-eghmiit	aghviqaqaat	Red	Sea	nikimqun	qutestun.	Iwernga	Egypt-eghmiit,	aghvighnaqutkengnguluteng	pekaqutkaagut.
B19_11_Hebrews_V30	Ugpeqilleghqun	Israel-eghmiit	maaghraghvinlegni	aghneghni	uzivgaqaqaat	Jericho-m	mingllutanga.	Taagken	minglluta	ulleghaatkaaguq.
B19_11_Hebrews_V31	Ugpeqilleghqun	Rahab-em,	yugusimineng	akikikayugem,	upughatkaqaak	Israel-eghmiit	riirngistegket.	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	tuqullghituq	maligulluni	qaatkusigalngughnun	Kiyaghneghmun.
B19_11_Hebrews_V32	Wataqaaghaq	ungipamsugullamsii	yugneng	ugpeqikaneng	Kiyaghneghmeng?	Taakeghllagyaghqaagut	akuzitkesaghqaaluki	Gideon-enkut,	Barak-enkut,	Samson-enkut,	Jephthah-nkut,	David-enkut,	Samuel-enkut,	uuknaliqistetlu.
B19_11_Hebrews_V33	Ugpeqilleghqun	ilangi	yuget	whaten	pikaagut:	kayaalqegkaqiit	ataneghpagullghet,	elqughutngaluteng	igleghutikaagut.	Enkaam	Kiyaghneghem	akequsii	tugukaqiit.	Ilangita	lion-et	qaanghit	meqetestaqiit.
B19_11_Hebrews_V34	Kumaghughllaget	kenghet	qaamtaqiit,	anagaqlukillu	tuqutistekaghqateng	savigpagkun.	Kayaataqut	iwernga	ugpeqillghita	iknaqughtaqiit.	Ugpeqilleghqun	pilluwaghtengit	iknaqughteghllagaqut	enkaam	kayaalqaqiit	ilangita	nunat	pilluwaghtengit.
B19_11_Hebrews_V35	Ugpeqilleghqun	aghnat	tuqumasliiteng	veghtaqiit	tuqulleghmeng	Kiyaghneghem	unguvaghhneghaki.	Ilangi	elngaatall	ikfiqesteghllagaqiit	pegtesqelluku	ugpeqillghat.	Iwernga	tuqunaluteng	piiqut	Kiyaghneghmun	unguvaghtesqelluteng	pinighataghalghimun	unguvalleghmun.
B19_11_Hebrews_V36	Ilangi	legasiighwaatkaqluki,	ilangi	kagsagmigaqluki,	ilangi	qiipraghusighluki	anusimingllaghaqiit.
B19_11_Hebrews_V37	Ilangi	milughpagaatameng	tuqutaqiit,	ilangi	yugusiit	pilagtughluki	malghughqaqiit,	ilangi	tuqutaqiit	savigpagkun.	Ilangi	temgi	tamaani	igleghtaqut	aalluteng	penniighemllu	goat-emllu	amiineng.	Ilangi	aklumapiglleghhiit,	yuget	amyuqetaatkegkiit,	seghletunllu	kiyaghutkiit.
B19_11_Hebrews_V38	Nunam	yugi	pinipagunghitut	kiyaghtelgusighyaghqaaluki	tamaakut	elqughutngalghiit	yuget!	Ilangi	elqughutngalghiit	temngi	tamaani	igleghakaalghiit	paaghqillghani,	naayghani,	kiyaghtaqluteng	qayeni,	laawaaghnillu.
B19_11_Hebrews_V39	Qamaglluki	tamaakut	Kiyaghneghem	itagnaqegkaqii	ugpeqillghit	apalluqluki!	Naqamllu	allgeghsimangitaat	Kiyaghneghem	akequsaqegkaa,
B19_11_Hebrews_V40	qayughllak	Kiyaghneghem	uspeqegkaa	whangkunnun	pinighataghalghiinguuq.	Uspeqillgha	whatetuq:	akequsani	pinaanghitii	ellngitnun	whangkungunaki.	Qerngaamta	qamaglluta	iighwighlleqiinkut.
B19_12_Hebrews_V1	Qamaglluteng	tamaakut	yuget	liigikestiinkut	ugpeqilleghmeggneng	naten	kiyaghtelleghmegteggun.	Maaten	uvitangighluta	esghapagaqiinkut.	Enkaam	kilgaaqustestun	iqitelteki	qamaglluki	uqigkutat,	seghleghqellghetlu	iglagullghiit	whangkunnun.	Sagiqlutangam	kilgaaqulta	sivumnnilngughmun,
B19_12_Hebrews_V2	esghaamakluku	Jesus,	piinlighistengallu	apeghiighistengallu	ugpeqillemta.	Kayngunaghtuq	tuqulleghqaq	qaquurakun,	iwernga	Jesus-em	pitkumangitaa	kayngusaghaatelleq.	Yeghlegi	nakmiiqaaguq	ikfiqnaluni	qaquurakun	apalluqluku	quyalleq	allgeghsaghqani.	Enkaam	maaten	aqumgaaq	aghenqigneghani	Kiyaghneghem.
B19_12_Hebrews_V3	Sumeghtaghaatkaghtegguqun	Jesus.	Iilqayugumangituq	qaywa	seghleghqestet	ugumikeraaghllaghngaatni.	Tawaten	elpesillu	ilutullghiinnaanghitusillu	iilqayugnaanghitusillu.
B19_12_Hebrews_V4	Seghleghqenghinnaqutkelleghpesi	salin	yugnun	tuqutesigatiisi.
B19_12_Hebrews_V5	Puygustekii	ilutughsaasit	akuzitet	ungipaatilghiit	Kiyaghneghmun	ighneqnilusi?	Akuzitni	Igaqegkani	igaqngaaq,	“Ighnemni,	avelghaqiinaghpenaan	Atanghem	nallghusanghaten,	iilqayugpenangllu	aghyuunghaten.
B19_12_Hebrews_V6	Qayughllak	qamaglluki	piniqegkani	Atanghem	apeghtughaqii	qaatkesqelluni,	aghyuughaqiillu	tugukliqani	avaqutaaluki.”
B19_12_Hebrews_V7	Tuguklighaqiteggu	Kiyaghneghem	aghyuughillgha	qayughllak	ighneqelghiistun	piiqiisi.	Qamaglluki	avaqutateng	atangita	aghyuughaqiit	nallghughqennaluki.
B19_12_Hebrews_V8	Qamaglluteng	avaqutat	aghyuullengaqut.	Aghyuullengenghilkuvek	taawa	atangilnguuguten	enkaam	avaqutapikenghitaaten.
B19_12_Hebrews_V9	Taam	saaghwakun,	atamta	nunamelnguut	aghyuughaqiinkut	apeghtughnaluta	qaatkesqelluteng,	iwernga	paninang	quulvaghaqaput.	Enkaam	Atavut	qilagmelnguq	qaatkataghaghyaghqaqaghput	unguvanaluta.
B19_12_Hebrews_V10	Atamta	nunamelnguut	aghyuughaqinkut	natengiighhaq,	sumeghmeggni	elqughlluku	aghyuughinguniluteng.	Iwernga	Kiyaghneghem	aghyuughaqiinkut	pinighqelleghqamnnun	pelungiightesqelluta	ellmitun.
B19_12_Hebrews_V11	Quyaniituq	aghyuullengnemta	qayughllak	aqnightaqegkanginkut.	Iwernga	tagtalmi,	liitfiknemteggu,	nekeggmellengaqukut	qayughllak	kiyaghsagutaqukut	elqughulluta.
B19_12_Hebrews_V12	Kevegteki	iiggesi	qughaghngalghiit,	taagken	iknaqughsaghteki	kayaalnguut	segesqusi!
B19_12_Hebrews_V13	Taklaghtiki	tuumngi	tutmalleghpek,	taagken	kayaalnguq	ighun	aanqaghnaanghituq	naflumineng,	iwernga	naallghullequq.
B19_12_Hebrews_V14	Kiyaghhnaqitek	nekeggmetullusi	tamaghhaanun	yugnun,	kiyaghhnaqiteklu	seghleghqellngunasi.	Kinkut	alngunak	pelunginneghilnguut	esghaghnaanghitaat	Ataneq.
B19_12_Hebrews_V15	Esghaamakullusi	kinkut	alngunak	luuraq	allgeghhneghisaaghaat	Kiyaghneghem	nangllegtallgha.	Nagusaqunaanllu	sungaghnilnguq	akuq	seghleliighqiiluni	naafqiiyaghqaq	yulghutmeng.
B19_12_Hebrews_V16	Esghaamakullusi	kinkut	alngunak	seghleghqesaaghtut	sex-kun,	nalighmeng	kinkut	alngunak	quulvaghinghisaaghtut	Kiyaghneghmeng	Esau-tun.	Akikegkaqegkanga	pagitaghqani	ataasighhaghmun	neghyaghqamun.
B19_12_Hebrews_V17	Liisimakaghsi	taam	kingunganeng,	allgeghsugaqngamigu	atami	quyastellgha,	atangan	ighsakegkaqaa.	Esau-m	allangughtepagningitkaqaa	apeghiiqani,	qaywa	qunituumaghmi	tungsighngaaghmigu	atami	quyastillgha.
B19_12_Hebrews_V18	Sivuneghpesistun	ayuqenghitusi	Mount	Sinai-mun	pikastun.	Esghaghyaghqaat,	saafsaghqaatlu.	Tawani	mamlegllagukaq,	naafteghllagukaq,	naayghaqlu	kumaghughllagulghii.
B19_12_Hebrews_V19	Nagaquqaat	qalghightaan	qalghighlleghhii,	nagaquqaatlu	Kiyaghneghem	menga.	Iwernga	nepiiqiisqegkaat,
B19_12_Hebrews_V20	qayughllak	tuguklighyunghilkangat	qelghillgha	whatelnguq,	“Taana	naayghaq,	yugem	nalighmeng	teghikusam	saaftekumigu,	tuqusaghqapestaaghuuq	milughpagaatameng.”
B19_12_Hebrews_V21	Moses-em	esghaqaa	kakavaataghnapiglleghhii	repall	whaten	pikaalghii,	“Ellngaatall	ungelegtunga	alingruughem.”
B19_12_Hebrews_V22	Iwernga	katam	elpesi	tagikaagusi	Mt.	Zion-mun,	qilagem	Jerusalem-nganun,	neghllaganun	unguvalghiim	Kiyaghneghem.	Tagikaagusi	kestekaanghilngughnun	yaqulegnun	qerngughutkanun	quyallelighllagluteng.
B19_12_Hebrews_V23	Tagikaagusi	qerngughutellghitnun	qamagtengngwaaghluteng	ugpeqat	ighneqsuwhaaghestun	ayuqelghiit.	Qilagmi	aatghit	igaqngaat	igatgun.	Tagikaagusi	Kiyaghneghmun	nanqigtistengitnun	qamagtengngwaaghluteng	yuget,	taghneghiitnunllu	elqughutngalghiit	yuget	iighwightestekanun.
