B19_12_Hebrews_V24	Tagikaagusi	Jesus-mun,	ellngakun	Kiyaghneq	akequsaghraghangllaqaaguq.	Tagikaagusillu	sivillagtaatkamun	aawanun	Jesus-em.	Pinighataghaghtuq	Abel-em	aawaneng,	qayughllak	Kiyaghneghem	seghevutii	seghleghqellghet	Jesus-em	aawakun.
B19_12_Hebrews_V25	Enkaam	kelengatek,	nagasunghitegpenaan	Kiyaghneq	akuzilghii.	Sivunemta	nagasunghitkaqaat	kelengasaaghillgha	nunami	whani,	enkaam	anagumangitaat	aghyuughillgha.	Whangkuta	aghyuughataghaghlleqiinkut	nagasunghilkumteggu	kelengasaallgha	qilagmeng.
B19_12_Hebrews_V26	Kiyaghneq	akuziiqngami	Mount	Sinai-meng,	mengan	ufsugutkaqaa	nuna.	Iwernga	maaten	akeqimaaq	whaten,	“Ataasighhaghmeng	ufsugunneqiglleqaqa	nuna,	iwernga	qilaklu	ufsugulleqaqa.”
B19_12_Hebrews_V27	Tawaten	akuzillghan,	“Ataasighhaghmeng	ufsugunneqiglleqaqa	nuna,”	liigikestengngwaaghiinkut	whaten,	sangwaat	qamaglluki	ulimaani,	Kiyaghneghem	iqilleqii	ufsugusaghqat.	Tamaakunginaghhaat	ufsugutepagningilnguut	tamaanllequt	quunperugllak.
B19_12_Hebrews_V28	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	iyamsiqayugvikelteggu	Kiyaghneq	qayughllak	tuunegkanginkut	ataneghpagulleghmeng	ufsugusaghqaanghilngughmeng.	Enkaangam	maniguulteggu	Kiyaghneq	efqughnalkegkaatun	alingellelighlutallu	quulvaghillelighlutallu,
B19_12_Hebrews_V29	qayughllak	Kiyaghneghput	naafqiilghiinguuq	keneq.
B19_13_Hebrews_V1	Piniqekestaghteki	ugpeqaalgutesi.
B19_13_Hebrews_V2	Upughamanginaghtek	aqiiyagnun	qayughllak	ilangita	upughataqiit	nallukluki	yaqulgutangi.
B19_13_Hebrews_V3	Neqamikluki	anusimingllaghvigmelnguut,	nikimqun	elpesillu	anusimingllaghvigmetellghistun.	Neqamikluki	ikfiqngalghiit,	nikimqun	elpesillu	ikfiqelghiistun.
B19_13_Hebrews_V4	Tamaghhaghpesi	siivakiteggu	nengughutelleq	enkaam	ugitlu	nulighhetlu	ataasiighmetullit.	Kiyaghneghem	nanqigsaghqaqii	gelgaghniilghiit,	tamaakutlu	ilanganeng	sex-kun	seghleghqelghiit.
B19_13_Hebrews_V5	Kiyaghtek	pakigneghugpenasi	manimun,	itagnaghaqiteklu	satutalegpesistun.	Kiyaghneq	pikaaguq,	“Uninnaanghitngwaaghamsi;	peggnaanghitngwaaghamsi.”
B19_13_Hebrews_V6	Enkaam	tetullngunaamta	whaten	pilta,	“Ataneq	kayutkaqa!	Alingnaanghitunga	yuget	salleghqiitneng.”
B19_13_Hebrews_V7	Neqamikluki	igleghutistesi	ungipaqikat	elpesinun	Kiyaghneghem	akuzitanganeng.	Neqamikluki	naten	kiyaghtekaatangi	enkaam	ugpellelgunaqitek	ellngistun.
B19_13_Hebrews_V8	Jesus	Christ-a	almesiqaqaa	ighivgaq,	aghneghmi,	quunperugllaklu.
B19_13_Hebrews_V9	Iqitutestegpenasi	ipapilleghmeng	allaaghhiinaghnunllu	allakaayagnunllu	apeghtuusanun.	Nangllegtallghakun	Kiyaghneghem	ayepsugighsaghteki	ilusi,	nakaan	qaatkelluki	Liilightuusat	neqneng	ayuqelghiit.	Taakut	neqet	Liilightuusiit	qaatkegkufsiki	ayepsugighsaghnaanghitiit	ilusi.
B19_13_Hebrews_V10	Priest-et	qepghalghiit	tabernacle-mi	ineghtekaagut	neghelleghqiitneng	aghqutkegkameng	aghqefimteggun.
B19_13_Hebrews_V11	High	Priest-em	tagitaqii	aawit	teghikusat	Agleghnalleghpigaghmun	aghqutkennaluki	seghleghqelleghnun.	Iwernga	kemegkwaaghit	teghikusat	neghllagmeng	iqitulluki	paneghtaqiit.
B19_13_Hebrews_V12	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	Jesus-llu	iqitutkaaguq	neghllagmeng.	Tawani	tuqukaaguq,	pelungighsaghnaluki	yuget	seghleghqellghitneng	ellmi	katam	aawmineng.
B19_13_Hebrews_V13	Enkaangam	neghllagmeng	whangkutallu	aglaalta	Jesus-mun,	seghletun	akuzitkesqelluta	katam	ellnga	seghletun	akuzitkellghistun.
B19_13_Hebrews_V14	Nunami	whani	quunpekaghqameng	neghllagitukut,	iwernga	utaqangwaaghput	neghllak	tagiyaghqaq.
B19_13_Hebrews_V15	Jesus-kun	iiwleng	aghqutkilta	Kiyaghneghmun.	Aghquteput	usuqilqaput	apenemteggu	Jesus	Atanghuniluku.
B19_13_Hebrews_V16	Puygugpenaan	pinitun	pilleq,	tuunutaqiteklu	qayughllak	tamaakut	aghqutnguut	efqughnalghiit	Kiyaghneghmun.
B19_13_Hebrews_V17	Qaatkiteki	igleghutistesi	atuqluki	qelghusiit.	Kelengakinguut	unguvasighpesineng	liisimakluku	Kiyaghneghmun	nanqigsaghqaatseng.	Quyanghitestegpenaki	igleghutistesi,	itupill	qaatkelleghpesigun	qepghaqateng	pilleqiit	quyakusiqluki.	Qaatkenghilkufsiki	kayusiitepagningitiisi.
B19_13_Hebrews_V18	Yughaatkitekut.	Liisimakukut	umyugamta	anaggutellghinniinkut,	qayughllak	iiwleng	piyukelqaghput	elqughutngalghii	piyaghqaaluku.
B19_13_Hebrews_V19	Taakunginaghhaagneng	kayagtamsi	yughaatkesqellunga	qantaghaqun	elpesinun	uteghnighnalunga.
B19_13_Hebrews_V20	Kiyaghneghem	nekeggmellelitistem	Ataneghput	Jesus	unguvaghtestekaqaa	tuqulleghmeng.	Enkaam	aawmikun	Penniighniighteghllagughtekaaguq	penniighnun.	Aawan	atuuyaghqaaghtestekaqaa	Kiyaghneghem	quunpekaghqaq	akequsaa.
B19_13_Hebrews_V21	Yughaghtunga	Kiyaghneghmun	tuunesqellusi	sameng	tamaghhaaneng	pinilghiimeng	elpesinun	piyukellgha	pisqelluku.	Jesus	Christ-akunllu	ilugpesinun	Kiyaghneghem	piligu	efqughnalghii	ellminun.	Christ	usuqellengli	quunperugllak	kenlengunaan.	Amen.
B19_13_Hebrews_V22	Ugpeqaalgutemni,	nagatngwaaqaghteki	latanka	qayughllak	kayemyugaqamsi.	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	takestaaghhaaluku	lataamsi.
B19_13_Hebrews_V23	Liisimakesugamsi	ugpeqaalgutemnneng,	Timothy-meng,	aanesimaaq	anusimingllaghvigmeng.	Kaatelghaghtughyaqan	qerngaamtung	esghaghyaghtughlleqamsi.
B19_13_Hebrews_V24	Quyakaghhnakesi	qamaglluki	igleghutistesi,	qamagllukillu	Kiyaghneghem	yugi.	Ugpeqaalgutetlu	Italy-meng	pit	quyakaghhnakiisinguq.
B19_13_Hebrews_V25	Kiyaghneghem	piniqingalghii	kayusillgha	tamaghhaghpesinilli!	Amen.
B20_01_James_V1	Ukut	latat	James-meng	pinguut	qepghaghtenganeng	Kiyaghneghemllu	Atanghemllu	Jesus	Christ-am.	Lataaqunga	Jews-et	ugpeqiitnun	mingitngalghiinun	tamangani.	Quyakamsi.
B20_01_James_V2	Ugpeqaalgutemni,	quyaaqitek	allaaghhiinaghmeng	seghleliineghpesini,
B20_01_James_V3	qayughllak	liisimakasi	seghleliilleghpesi	nanghiiqungwaat	ugpeqilleghsi,	nuqenneghtughsaghnalusi.
B20_01_James_V4	Taagken	nuqenneghtulleghsi	nagneghngasteggu.	Enkaam	tawaten	pikufsi	angtaniillequsi,	iighwighllequsi	nuughyaghqaagpenasi.
B20_01_James_V5	Nalighsi	peghqinellengyukumi	tungsighli	Kiyaghneghmeng.	Kiyaghneq	ighlegiteghllagtuq,	quyakusiqinaghluku	tuunegkayuwaa	qamaglluku	yuuk	aapleghhii.	Kiyaghneghem	tuunelleqiisi	tungsiqufsi.
B20_01_James_V6	Enkaam	aaptek	ugpeqillelighluku	malghuklillngunaan.	Malghuklingalghii	imaghllugestun	ayuquq,	anuqem	tengqaataqegkanga.
B20_01_James_V7	Malghuklingalghii	ataasiighsigatuq	salleghmikun	tamaghhaan.	Tawatelnguq	yuuk	talwa	sumeghtaghaghyaghqaanghituq	sameng	alngunak	allgeghulleqniluni	Ataneghmeng.
B20_01_James_V9	Yeqay	aklumalghii	ugpeqaalgun	quyali	quulvaghtestengngalleghmineng.
B20_01_James_V10	Yeqay	aklungilnguq	ugpeqaalgun	quyali	qusevegtestengngalleghmineng,	qayughllak	aviighusaghqaaguq	piitesighaghestun.
B20_01_James_V11	Siqineq	piinneghmini	maatneghqwaaghllagaqelghii,	piitesighaat	palightesluki.	Taagken	piitesighaat	ifkaquutaqut,	pinighniighutaqii.	Tawateghpigaq	aklungilnguq	yuuk	sakestaghngaaghmi	aviighullequq.
B20_01_James_V12	Quyanaghhalek	yugem	nanghiiqulleni	nuqetutkayugi.	Suflughtekumiki	allgeghsaghqaqaa	akileghtuusani	kenlengilnguq	unguvalleq,	Kiyaghneghem	akequsaqegkaa	tuunelleqniluku	piniqisteminun.
B20_01_James_V13	Kina	alngunak	nanghiiqullengegkumi	whaten	pifqaami,	“Kiyaghneghem	seghleghqesnaqutkaanga.”	Kiyaghneq	nanghiiqullengyaghqaghhaanghituq	seghleghmeng;	tamaaken	apalluqluku	kina	alngunak	seghleghqesnaqutkesaghqaqenghitaa.
B20_01_James_V14	Iwernga	yuuk	piyukellelugan	nanghiiqullengestaqaa	seghleghqelleghmun.	Sivukluku	piyukellelugan	sayugaqaa	seghleghqelleghmun,	taagken	seghleghqellghem	naaptaqaa.
B20_01_James_V15	Piyukellelugem	allgeghtestaqaa	seghleghqelleq.	Taagken	seghleghqelleq	anglineghmini	tuqullghughtaquq.
B20_01_James_V16	Piniqegkamni	ugpeqaalgutemni,	puughtesighpenasi.
B20_01_James_V17	Qamaglluteng	pinilghiitlu,	sallghwaaghhiilnguutlu	tunusat	qilagmeng	pinguut.	Tamaakut	Atameng	pinguut	ulimaghistenganeng	qamaglluni	nighugem;	allangughsigatuqlu,	mamlegtestingigatuqlu.
B20_01_James_V18	Kiyaghneghem	ellngan	katam	piyukelqaa,	tuunaluta	nutaghameng	unguvalleghmeng	ungipaakun	ipapighqellghem.	Tawaten	pikaaguq,	whangkuta	megnunalleghpigaasqelluta	ulimaaghyaggaghmineng.
B20_01_James_V19	Piniqegkamni	ugpeqaalgutemni,	neqamikluku	una:	tamaghhaghmi	nagasukestaghluni	piyaghqaaguq,	akuziighaghtafqaamillu	sakraagaghaghtafqaamillu,
B20_01_James_V20	qayughllak	sakraam	kayusiisigatiisi	pinitun	kiyaghtaalleghmun	Kiyaghneghem	piyukegkaanun.
B20_01_James_V21	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	pegteggu	qamagtengngwaaghluku	allaaghhiinaq	seghleq	atuqaqegkesi.	Qusevegngaghpesi	tuguklighteki	Kiyaghneghem	akuzitangi,	piitesiighaqii	ilugpesigun,	qayughllak	yuguliyaghqaqiisi	unguvasighpesineng.
B20_01_James_V22	Nagataghesnaghpenaki	Kiyaghneghem	akuzitangi	itupill	atuqiteki.	Puughtaqusi	elpesineng	katam	nagataghesnaneghpesiki	atuqegpenaki.
B20_01_James_V23	Yuuk	nagataghesnaqumi	Kiyaghneghem	akuzitanganeng	atuqegpenaki,	taghneghaghqulghiistun	ayuquq
B20_01_James_V24	tunuskumi	tawaninginaq	puygulleqaa	natetuleni.
B20_01_James_V25	Kiyaghneghem	elqughutngalghiit	Liilightuusii	itemutestiiqut	yugneng.	Yugem	liinnaqumanginaqumiki	taakut	Liilightuusat,	puygugpenaki	atuqegkumiki	Kiyaghneghem	quyasaghqaqaa	sallghakun	tamaghhaan.
B20_01_James_V26	Yuuk	sumeghtaghaqayuk	ugpeqaghllaguniluni,	naqam	akuzitkesaghqaqenghilkemmineng	akuzikayuk	temngi	puughtengnguuq	ellmineng	katam.	Ugpellgha	satngunghituq.
B20_01_James_V27	Kiyaghneghem	Atamta	pillghani	yuuk	ugpellepiilgukumi,	kayusighyaghqaqii	yaywaalitlu	ugingighatlu	seghleliinghata,	nuqesaghqaaguqlu	seghleghaneng	nunam.
B20_02_James_V1	Ugpeqaalgutemni,	ugpeqingutegpesineng	Atanemnneng	Jesus	Christ-ameng,	Atanghaneng	nighughqellghem	sumeghtaghaatkegpenaki	ilangi	yugem	megnunaghataghaghniluki	ilameggneng.
B20_02_James_V2	Maalghuk	yugek	iteghyaqayek	qerngughutfigpesinun,	aallgha	aarraghluni,	gold-meng	alangqughiitightughluni,	aallgha	aatkalukaghlluni,
B20_02_James_V3	taana	aarraghngalghii	yuuk	pikufsigu,	“Whagun	aqumi	pinillghakun	aqumutam,”	naqam	aklumalghii	yuuk	pikufsigu,	“Tawani	nekevgha,”	nalighmeng,	“Aqumi	itegama	saaghwakun,”
B20_02_James_V4	tawaten	pikufsi	pakiggulleqasi	ilangi	yuget	enkaam	seghleghqellequsi	sumeghtaghalleghpesigun.
B20_02_James_V5	Piniqegkamni	ugpeqaalgutemni,	nagataghtekqun.	Kiyaghneghem	nakmikegkaqii	aklumaalghiit	nunami	whani	ugpeqilleghtusqelluki.	Nakmikegkaqii	tuguklightenguluki	Ataneghpagulleghmineng,	akequsaqegkamineng	yugminun,	piniqingalghiinun	ellmineng.
B20_02_James_V6	Iwernga	elpesi	aklumaalghiit	yuget	ukaliistaqasi.	Liisimakasi	aklungilnguut	piyaqliighqaqiisi,	aglaataqlusi	nanqigtivigmun.
B20_02_James_V7	Ellnginguut	seghletun	akuzitkilghiit	quulvaghngalghiimeng	aatghaneng	Jesus-em,	ateq	tuunegkaq	elpesinun	qayughllak	ellngan	pikegkangisi.
B20_02_James_V8	Kiyaghneghem	Ataneghpagullghan	Liilightusaa	unaanguq:	“Piniqluku	yulguten	piniqelleghpetun	elpeneng	katam.”	Qaatqegkufsigu	taana	Liilightuusaq,	taawa	pinitun	piisi.
B20_02_James_V9	Iwernga	pakigguskufsiki	ilangi	yuget	seghleghqellequsi,	qaatkennaanghitaghsillu	taana	Liilightuusaq.
B20_02_James_V10	Kitum	qaatkesaghngaaghmiki	qamaglluki	Kiyaghneghem	Liilightuusii,	ataasiq	qaatkenghilkumigu,	qamaglluki	qaatkengngunghitii.
B20_02_James_V11	Kiyaghneq	pikaaguq,	“Gelgaghniighpenang.”	Whatenllu	pikaaguq,	“Yugtaghpenang.”	Gelgaghniinghisaghngaaghpek	yugtaquvek	taawa	qaatkengngunghitaten	Kiyaghneghem	Liilightuusii.
B20_02_James_V12	Akuzilleghpesigun,	salleghpesigun	piraamsilusi	qayughllak	elpesinguusi	nanqigsaghqat	megnunalleghpigaghqun	Liilightuusakun.	Taam	Liilightuusam	itemutkaqiisi	atuqesqelluku	Kiyaghneghem	piyukellgha	elpesinun.
B20_02_James_V13	Kiyaghneghem	nanqigtekumisi	nangllegyagunnaanghitiisi,	nangllegyagunneghilkufsiki	yulgutesi.	Iwernga	nangllekegkufsiki	yulgutesi	Kiyaghneghem	nangllegyagulleqiisi.
B20_02_James_V14	Ugpeqaalgutemni,	kina	whaten	pighngaaghmi,	“Ugpeqillelguunga,”	iwernga	taam	ugpeqillghan	yugulinaanghitaa	atuqenghilkumigu	ugpeqilleni	aneghneghqilleghmikun.	Sasiilleqangam	ugpeqillgha	aneghneghqillngunani?
B20_02_James_V15	Sanayaghetsi	ugpeqaalgutsi	aatkiisagyaqanllu,	neqangisagyaqanllu?
B20_02_James_V16	Tuunegpenaan	aklukegkaaneng	temngi	whaten	pikufsigu,	“Kiyaghneghem	quyasnaaghaaten;	sunanguq	neghyaghqangillu	aatkangillu	maqalghiimeng,”	sasiilleqan'ngam	akuzitesi	aneghneghqillngunateng?
B20_02_James_V17	Ugpeqilleqlu	tawatetuq,	aneghneghqilleghqun	atuqenghilkumi	sasiinghituq.
B20_02_James_V18	Kina	pillequq,	“Elpek	ugpeqillelguuten,	whanga	aneghneghqellelguunga.”	Kelguvikinga	ugpeqilleghpeneng	aneghneghqillghilngughmeng,	kelguvikelleqamken	ugpeqillemneng	aneghneghqillemkun.
B20_02_James_V19	Ugpeqan	ataasighhaatanga	Kiyaghneq.	Taana	pinightuq!	Tughneghaatlu	ugpeqaqaat	taana	enkaangam	alingruughaqut,	ungelegtaqut	qayughllak	liisimakegkangat	Kiyaghneghem	nanqigsaghqaqegkangi.
B20_02_James_V20	Uyuq	nalluuqaq	yuuk,	paninang	liigikigasiguu	ugpeqilleq	aneghneghqillngunani	sasiinghitulanga?
B20_02_James_V21	Sangan	Kiyaghneghem	tugukliqaqagu	sivuneghput	Abraham	seghleghqumangilngughestun?	Tugukliqaqaa	Abraham	qayughllak	ugpeqilleni	atuqegkaqaa	aneghneghqelleghmikun	aghqutkaqngamigu	ighneni	Isaac	aghqefigegnekun.
B20_02_James_V22	Liigiksiguu?	Ugpeqilleqlu	aneghneghqilleqlu	qerngaagmek	qepghaqayuguuk.	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	Abraham-em	ugpeqillgha	iighwightekaqaa	aneghneghqelleghqun.
B20_02_James_V23	Enkaam	Akuzitet	Igaqegkat	whaten	pillghit	Abraham-emeng	apeghiiqaagut,	“Abraham-em	ugpeqegkaqegkanga	Kiyaghneq.	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	Kiyaghneghem	tugukliqaqegkanga	Abraham	seghleghqumangilngughestun.”	Enkaam	Kiyaghneghem	Abraham	ilakumtaaqniluku	pikaqaa.
B20_02_James_V24	Kiyaghneghem	tuguklighaqaa	yuuk	aneghneghqillghakunllu	ugpeqillghakunllu;	tugukliigataa	ugpeqilleraaghinaakun.
B20_02_James_V25	Rahab-llu	usputaaguq.	Akikikayuguyalghii	yugusimineng.	Iwernga	Kiyaghneghem	tugukliqaqegkanga	seghleghqumangilngughestun	apalluqluku	kayusighillgha.	Joshua-m	kayagtekaqegkek	maalghuk	yugek	aksaqluku	nunangat	yuvghiighesqelluku.	Yuget	ivaghyatkek,	Rahab-em	allakun	tuumkun	anagtestekakek.
B20_02_James_V26	Enkaangam	yugusiq	taghneghangunani	tuqungaaq,	ugpeqilleqlu	aneghneghqillngunani	tuqungaaq.
B20_03_James_V1	Ugpeqaalgutemni,	allullusi	apeghtughistengughtefqaafsi	Kiyaghneghem	Akuzitanganeng,	qayughllak	liisimakaghsi	whangkuta	apeghtughisteni	nanqigtengngwaaghataghaghyaghqaagukut.
B20_03_James_V2	Qamaglluta	anaggutaghaneghtughllagtukut.	Kina	alngunak	yuuk	akuzilleghmikun	anaggusigalnguq	elqughutngapestaaghuuq.	Yugem	elqughutngalghiim	talwa	yugusinillu	agghitkelluku	ayuqsaghqaqa.
B20_03_James_V3	Savikenghaaghhaat	sanitmun	ayuqluki	kuunit	qaanghitnun	kanaghtaqaput	qaatkesqelluta	enkaam	whangkuta	igleghutaqaput.
B20_03_James_V4	Sumeghtaghaatkaghtekiqunllu	angyaghpagllaget;	aquutasquvegaghhaam	qiiftaqii	angyalgem	piyukellghanun	talwa	anuqateghllagyaghngaan.
B20_03_James_V5	Ulullu	mekestaaghhaaguq	iwernga	aangaayugneghllaguuq.	Kenghhaam	uqfilghuteghllaget	kumaghsaghqaqii!
B20_03_James_V6	Ulullu	kenghestun	ayuquq.	Esleqngaaq	seghleghqelleghmeng	enkaam	seghleghqumallgha	mingitkayuguuq	yugusimun.	Enkaam	naafqiikayuguuq	kiyaghtaallemnneng	qayughllak	hell-em	kenghan	kumaghtaqaa.
B20_03_James_V7	Allaaghhiinaat	teghikusat,	qawaaget,	nemeghyat,	meghem	teghikusii	qimugtekayuguut,	aaqun	yugem	qimugtaqii
B20_03_James_V8	iwernga	kitum	alngunak	qimuggnaanghitaa	ulu.	Neklegigalnguuguq,	seghleghuuq,	esleqngaaq	tuqunalghiimeng	poison-meng.
B20_03_James_V9	Ulu	usuqusiqaqaghput	Atanemnnun	Atamun.	Naqam	seghleghmeng	neghyugtaghaasiqaqaghput	yulgutemnnun,	Kiyaghneghem	ulimaaghitnun	ellmisugnilluki.
B20_03_James_V10	Usuqilleqlu,	seghleghmengllu	neghyugtaghalleq	aanegkayuguuk	ataasimeng	qaneghmeng.	Ugpeqaalgutemni,	tawatesaghqaanghisaghtuq.
B20_03_James_V11	Pinilghiillu	seghleqlu	meq	maaqegkayuwaak	ataasimeng	sengngumeng?
B20_03_James_V12	Ugpeqaalgutemni,	figs-em	uqfiga	piitestinaanghituq	olives-meng.	Tawateghpigaq	grapes-em	vine-nga	piitestinaanghituq	figs-meng.	Talwa	meghtaghvik	taghyughnilngughmeng	meqelghii	pinilghiimeng	meghituq.
B20_03_James_V13	Kina	akulegpesinita	peghqinelghii,	liigikimalghiillu?	Tawatetelleni	kelgulligu	pinitun	kiyaghtaalleghmikun,	aneghneghqilleghmikunllu	qusevegngaghmi.
B20_03_James_V14	Iwernga	ilugpesigun	aqinangakufsillu,	ellngiinaayugneghukufsillu	iqlengiqutkegpenaan	ipapighqelleq,	qaghyalleghpesigun	liisimanilusi.
B20_03_James_V15	Tawatelnguq	peghqinelleq	qilagtaanghituq,	nunameng	pinguuq.	Kiyaghneghem	Taghneghagkeneng	pingunghituq,	tughneghaghmeng	pinguuq.
B20_03_James_V16	Nani	alngunak	aqinallelgunghanillu,	ellnginaayugllelgunghanillu	taawa	kipullginaallelwaaquq,	sangwaatlu	allaaghhiinaat	seghleghet	tawantaqut.
B20_03_James_V17	Iwernga	peghqinelleq	qilagtaq	kiyang	pelungituq.	Amalleqaa	nekeggmetuq,	kavyugituq,	malighqutaqingaaq,	nangllegtaghtuq,	pinistaghhiinatun	pikayuguuq,	taniillghituq,	yupiinghuuq.
B20_03_James_V18	Nekeggmelleq	piitutestun	ayuquq.	Tamaakut	nekeggmelleghmun	qepghaqayuget	piitesighaghaqiit,	enkaam	saghnaaqut	elqughngalghiimengllu	pinilghiimengllu	kiyaghtaalleghmeggni.
B20_04_James_V1	Saam	aaghtiiraaghutestaqisillu,	pillugutestaqiisillu?	Apalluqaqaghsi,	seghleghem	piyukelleghpesi	pilluwaghaqii	pinilghiit	piyukellesi.
B20_04_James_V2	Qiliighaqusi	avanginneghpesini	enkaam	yugtaghyaghqaghtaqusi	allgeghhnaluki	qiliiqegkasi.	Qiliighllagaqusi	taawanginaq	allgeghtepagningitaqasi	enkaam	aaghtiiraaghutaqusi,	pilluwutaqusi.	Allgeghusigatusi	Kiyaghneq	aapsigatutegpesineng.
B20_04_James_V3	Talwa	aapteghngaaghpesigu	Kiyaghneq	allgeghsigatasi	qayughllak	seghleghmun	atughqaaluki	aaptaqelghiisi.	Piyukegkaghsi	elpesi	katam	piyukegkaghhiinaghpesinun	ayuqaqelghii.
B20_04_James_V4	Ukughsi	ataasiighneghilngughni!	Liisimakenghistegguu	piniqegkufsigu	nunam	seghlegha,	ugumikaghsi	Kiyaghneq?	Kitum	alngunak	piniqegkumigu	nunam	seghlegha	anguyaguuq	Kiyaghneghmun.
B20_04_James_V5	Sumeghtaghaghpenasi	Akuzitet	Igaqegkat	temnginguniluku	whaten	pillghat,	taghneghak	kiyaghlleghhiik	ilumnni	aqinanaqneghtuuk.
B20_04_James_V6	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	Kiyaghneghem	kayusiitaghaghaqiinkut	nuqetutesqelluki	piyukelleluput.	Iwernga	Akuzitet	Igaqegkat	piit,	“Kiyaghneghem	kayusighaqii	qusevegngalghiit	puuru	kipullegmun	piiqii	qukaayugneghet.”
B20_04_James_V7	Tuunlusi	elpesineng	katam	Kiyaghneghmun.	Ayaklighteggu	tughneghaq,	anagniighllequq	elpesineng.
B20_04_James_V8	Qantaghalliighaghtek	Kiyaghneghmun,	Kiyaghneq	qantaghalliighaghllequq	elpesinun.	Seghleghqesteni,	uughtughtek!	Elpesi	ataasiightellghilngughni,	ukmangighteki	ilusi	qaamkut.
B20_04_James_V9	Quyanghitek,	asemeghqitek,	qiyatek!	Nenglaghqiqellesi	qiyallghughteki,	quyallesi	quyanghilnguughtesteki.
B20_04_James_V10	Qusevegtek	Ataneghmun,	quulvaghlleqiisi.
B20_04_James_V11	Ugpeqaalgutemni,	seghlequughutegpenasi.	Kitum	alngunak	seghlequuqumigu	ugpeqaalguteni,	seghlequughlleqii	Liilightuusat.	Nanqigtekumigullu	ugpeqaalguteni	nanqigtengngwii	Liilightuusat.	Nanqigtekufki	Liilightuusat	qaatkengngunghitaten.	Yeghlegi	Liilightuusat	nanqigtistekaaten.
B20_04_James_V12	Kiyaghneghhiinaaguq	Liilightuusangllaghta,	nanqigtisiiluki	atuqaqii,	enkaam	sangan'ngam	nanqigsigu	yulguten?	Kiyaghneghhiinaaguq	yugulighiyaghqaq,	naafqiyaghqaq.
B20_04_James_V13	Ilasi	whaten	piiqut,	“Aghneghmi	nalighmeng	unaami	tawavek	nunamun	aghulaqellequnga.	Tamaanllequnga	ataasiq	ayumiqulleq,	maningllaghllequnga.”
B20_04_James_V14	Iwernga	nallukaghsi	unaami	salleghqaghsi!	Talwa	nallukaghsi	unguvalleghpesi	tagtalkaghqaa.	Unguvalleghsi	takesqughhaaguq,	agepsughruggaghestun	ayuquq,	mulugpenani	aviighutkayuk.
B20_04_James_V15	Itupill	whaten	piiqitek,	“Atanghem	piyukelqegkagu	unguvakestaghllequkut	enkaam	apeghiighutaqellequkut	sameng	alngunak.”
B20_04_James_V16	Tawaten	pinghilkufsi	aangaayugllequsillu	qanangullequsillu.	Tamaakut	aangaayugtellghet	seghleghuut.
B20_04_James_V17	Enkaam	kitum	alngunak	liisimakeghngaaghmigu	pinitun	pilleq	atuqenghilkumigu,	seghleghqengnguuq.
B20_05_James_V1	Nagatek	aklungilngughni!	Qiyakestaghtek,	iilqekestaghtek	qayughllak	seghleliighnaqnguusi.
B20_05_James_V2	Aklungisi	aghumaat,	aatkasi	moth-em	neghumii.
B20_05_James_V3	Gold-esillu	silver-esillu	anaghtaamaat.	Anaghtaallghita	ipapighqennaqngwaa	ellnginaayugneghulleghsillu,	pakigneghulleghsillu	nanqigtellengegkufsi.	Taagken	anaghtaallghem	yugusisi	naafqelleqii	katam	kenghestun.	Qaywa	kingulighnun	aghneghnun	lliighngaaghpesi,	qerngughtimanginaagusi	wata	aklungighinalusi.
B20_05_James_V4	Talwa	akileghtullghitasi	qepghaghtesi	unataqat	piitesiighaghvigpesini.	Nagateki	akuzilgallghit.	Atanghem	aghtughyaghqaanghiteghllagem	nagaquumii	akilghuullghit.
B20_05_James_V5	Kiyaghtaalleghpesini	whani	nunami,	aklungitutegpesineng	sangwaa	alngunak	piyukegkaghsi	allgeghtaqaghsi	efqughhnalusi	elpesineng	katam.	Tawaten	pilleghpesigun	penniighestun	ayuqusi.	Penniighet	qugilisighat	nallukaat	qantaghaqun	tuqutelleghqaghteng.	Nallukestegguu	qantaghaqun	Atanghem	nanqigtilleghqaa?
B20_05_James_V6	Elpesinguut	nanqigtistikatlu	tuqutistikatlu	anaggusimangilngughneng	yugneng,	ellngita	ayakliimangitiisi.
B20_05_James_V7	Ugpeqaalgutemni,	qelaneghpenasi	kenlanga	Atanghem	taginqigtelleghqaanun.	Piitesiighaghta	usputaqiteggu.	Nunami	piitesiighaghluni	qelaneghyukaghpenani	utaqiigaquq	uksaaghemllu	upenghaamllu	eslalluwaneng	nagustikayugmeng	piisaghqaneng.
B20_05_James_V8	Elpesillu	qelaneneghllugutek	neghyumanginaghlusi	qayughllak	Ataneq	tagiyaghtughtuq.
B20_05_James_V9	Ugpeqaalgutemni,	seghlequughpenaki	ilasi	enkaam	Atanghem	nanqiggneghillisi.	Ellnganguuq	Nanqigtista	kaasaghtungestalghii.
B20_05_James_V10	Ugpeqaalgutemni,	neqamikluki	uuknaliqistet	akuzikat	aatghakun	Atanghem.	Usputaqiteki	qelaneghpenateng	nuqenneghtuluteng	ikfiqelleghmi	pikat.
B20_05_James_V11	Quyanganiiqaput	uuknaliqistet	qayughllak	ikfiqngughngaaghmeng	paninang	neghyukumanginaqaqaat	Ataneq.	Nagaquqaqaghsi	Job-em	nuqenneghtullgha,	quyastellghallu	Ataneghmeng	ikfiqellgha	alpagyan.	Enkaam	Job-kun	Atanghem	liitestiisi	nafughtalleghminengllu	nangllegtalleghminengllu.
B20_05_James_V12	Ugpeqaalgutemni,	apeghnaqegkegka	una	megnunapigtuq.	Akeqineghpesini,	akeqigpenasi	qilagkun,	nalighmeng	nunakun,	nalighmeng	sakun	alngunak.	Piyaghqaakufsi	legan	aang'ghhaasi,	piyaghqaanghilkufsi	legan	nakaaghhaasi.	Enkaam	atuqaqiteki	akequsasi,	tawaten	pikufsi	Atanghem	nanqiggnaanghitiisi	aghyuughyaghqaalusi.
B20_05_James_V13	Kina	akulegpesini	ikfiqngwaa?	Yughaghli.	Kina	quyangaa?	Ilagaghli	usuqilleghmeng.
B20_05_James_V14	Kina	qinuyuwaa?	Tuqlughliki	Elder-et	enkaam	yughaatkellitgu	mesiighqelluku	Aatghakun	Atanghem.
B20_05_James_V15	Yughallghem	ugpeqilleghqun	naallghusaghqaqaa	qinuyulghii	yuuk.	Enkaam	Atanghem	yugunqwuughtesneqiglleqaa,	seghleghqellghillu	seghevulleqii.
B20_05_James_V16	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	aapghaqluki	seghleghqellesi	ilagpesinun,	yughaatkututaqlusi	naallghutellengesqellusi.	Elqughutngalghiim	yugem	yughallghi	iknaqeghllagtut,	allgeghutkayuguut.
B20_05_James_V17	Elijah	yuguuq	whangkutestun	ayuqelgii.	Taakunginaghhaagneng	yughaqaq	eslallugughtefqaan	pisqelluku.	Enkaam	eslallugughsimangilnguq	pingayut	ayumiqullghet	alla	aghvinlek	tanqiq	ilalluku.
B20_05_James_V18	Taagken	alla	yughaqaq	eslallugughtesqelluku.	Enkaam	eslallugughsalghiimi	nuna	piitestikaq	neghyaghqameng.
B20_05_James_V19	Ugpeqaalgutemni,	una	kinguliiguq	apeghyukegka	elpesinun.	Nalighsi	ugpeqinaniqan	apeghtuusapigneng,	kitum	kayusighligu	ugpeqinqigtelleghmun.	Tawaten	pikumigu	yugulisleqaak	seghleghqestem	unguvasikek	tuqulleghmeng.	Kiyaghneghemllu	seghuvulleqii	taam	seghleghqestem	seghleghqellelghuteghllagi.
B21_01_1Peter_V1	Ukut	latat	Peter-meng	pinguut	apostle-nganeng	Jesus	Christ-am,	Kiyaghneghem	nakmikegkiitnun	yugnun	aghulaquutestekat	Pontus-mun,	Galatia-mun,	Cappadocia-mun,	Asia-mun,	Bithynia-munllu.
B21_01_1Peter_V1	Neghighluku	Kiyaghneghem	Atam	nakmikegkaqiisi	ellminun	yugulusi,	Agleghnalghiimllu	Taghnegham	pelungighsaqaqiisi.	Tawaten	pikaaguk	qaatkutesqellusi	Jesus	Christ-amun,	ukmangiightesqellusillu	aawakun.	Kiyaghneghem	kayusillghallu	nekeggmellghallu	wata	nulalik	elpesinun.
B21_01_1Peter_V2	Usuqelteggu	Kiyaghneq,	Atanga	Atanemta	Jesus	Christ-am!	Apalluqluku	nangllegtalleghllani	allgenqigtestiinkut	unguvaghtelleghmikun	Jesus	Christ-a	tuqulleghmeng.	Taam	sighimallengesteghllagiinkut	nalluneqniilngughmeng.
B21_01_1Peter_V3	Enkaam	utaqangwaaput	piliisaghqaput	quyastelleghllaget	Kiyaghneghem	aflengakegkangi	yugminun.	Aflengakngwii	qilagmi	elpesinun	enkaam	aghunaanghitut,	naavnaanghitut,	ghevnaanghitutlu.
B21_01_1Peter_V4	Kiyaghneghem	aghtughyaghqaanghilleghmikun	paqniighsaghlleqiisi	ugpeqilleghpesigun.	Enkaam	kenletghuutelleghmi	aliighlleqaa	yugulilleq	yataghqegkaq	elpesinun.
B21_01_1Peter_V5	Taam	quyamastiisi,	qaywa	maaten	natengiighhaq	allaaghhiinaghmeng	seghleliighyaghngaaghpesi.
B21_01_1Peter_V6	Tamaakut	seghleliighet	nanghiiqusiigut	ipapighqennalusi	ugpeqillepiilgutsi.	Ugpeqilleghsi	megnunaghataghalghiinguq	gold-nneng.	Gold-et	nanghiiquneghmegteki	keneghqun	naafqegkayuguut.	Paninang	kenghet	atuqaqiit	pelungighnaluki.	Tawateghpigaq	ugpeqilleghsi	nanghiiquyaghqaaguq.	Aghuliiskan	pelungilluni,	allgeghlleqaghsi	usuqelleq,	nighughqelleq,	quulvalleq	Kiyaghneghmeng	aliightekagu	Jesus	Christ-a.
B21_01_1Peter_V7	Esghiigateghngaaghpesigu	piniqaghsi,	esghanghiteghngaaghpesigu	maaten	ugpeqaghsi.	Enkaam	quyaghllaguusi	repall	aapghwaaghpagningitaghsi	angtalanga	quyalleghpesi,
B21_01_1Peter_V8	qayughllak	allgeghtengngukesi	yugulillgha	unguvasighpesi.	Taananguuq	apallaa	ugpeqilghiisi	Christ-akun.
B21_01_1Peter_V9	Neghighluku	uuknaliqistet	liigikngwaaghnaqegkaqaat	taana	yugulilleq.	Uuknaliqutkegkaqaat	tunusaq	Kiyaghneghem	tuunyaghqaa	elpesinun.
B21_01_1Peter_V10	Taghneghakek	Christ-am	uuknaliqistet	ilungitnitkaaguk.	Ungipaatekestaqaqii	ikfiqelleghqaaneng	Christ-am,	quulvallengelleghqaghllaganengllu	ikfiqellghan	kingunganeng.	Enkaam	uuknaliqistet	liigiknaqutkegkaqaat	kinanguyaghqaatanga	Christ-a,	qakunllu	tamaakut	piyaghqaatangi.
B21_01_1Peter_V11	Kiyaghneghem	uuknaliqistet	liigikestekaqii	uuknaliqutkegkiit	ellngitnun	pingunghinniluki,	iwernga	elpesinun	pinguniluki.	Agleghnalghiik	Taghneghak	kayagtekaaguk	qilagmeng.	Ellngan	aghtughyaghqaanghillghakun	ungipaqilghiit	Pinilghiineng	Ungipaneng	ungipaatkaqiisi	tamaaken.	Talwa	yaqulget	liigiksupigtekaqiit	tamaakut.
B21_01_1Peter_V12	Enkaangam	umyugasi	apeghiighsaghwaaghluki	ayuqiteki	salleghqamun.	Umyugasi	whateghlluwaaghuluki,	sighimakngwaaghteggullu	tunusaq	yugulillengelleq	Kiyaghneghem	tuunyaghqaa	Jesus	Christ-a	tagikan.
B21_01_1Peter_V13	Qaatkullusi	Kiyaghneghmun	qayughllak	avaqutaqiisi.	Enkaam	atuqegpenaki	seghleghet	piyukellesi	atuqnguyaqesi.	Tawatesaghtusi	nallukutegpesineng	naten	Kiyaghneghem	kiyaghtesqesullghan	ayuqutanga.
B21_01_1Peter_V14	Kiyaghneq	nakmikestezi,	pelungitutanganeng	elpesillu	pelungitek	salleghpesigun	tamaghhaakun.
B21_01_1Peter_V15	Akuzitni	Igaqegkani	igaqngaaq,	“Pelungitek	qayughllak	whanga	pelungitunga.”
B21_01_1Peter_V16	Yughaneghpesini	Kiyaghneghmun	Atakniiqaghsi.	Nanqigtaqaa	atunengwaaq	yuuk	tamaghhaan	salleghtulngatun.	Enkaam	talluqiteggu	nunataamalusi	nunami	whani.
B21_01_1Peter_V17	Liisimakaghsi	sivunghani	kiyaghtekaagusi	sasiigpenasi	katam	sivuneghpesistun.	Iwernga	Kiyaghneghem	itemutkaqiisi	taagken	sasiinghilngughmeng	kiyaghtaalleghmeng.	Tukfillghitiisi	silver-meng	nalighmeng	gold-meng	naavegkayugmeng,
B21_01_1Peter_V18	iwernga	tukfiqaqiisi	megnunapiglleghhiimeng	aawaneng	Christ-am.	Ellnga	penniighaghaghtun	ayuquq	sallwhaaghhiilnguq.
B21_01_1Peter_V19	Kiyaghneghem	nakmikegkaqaa	Christ-a	talwa	sivungani	nuna	ulimallghilluku.	Maaten	kingulighni	aghneghni	aliightekaqaa	elpesi	apalluqlusi.
B21_01_1Peter_V20	Christ-akun	ugpeqaghsi	Kiyaghneq.	Ellngan	unguvaghtekaqaa	Christ-a	tuqulleghmeng,	quulvaghllakaqaallu.	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	ugpeqilleghsi,	sighimalleghsi	Kiyaghneghmun	ayuquq.
B21_01_1Peter_V21	Qaatkutelleghqun	ipapighqelleghmun	pelungightekaqasi	unguvasisi,	enkaam	piniqepiigasi	ugpeqaalgutesi.	Piniqutekestaghtek	ilugpesineng	qamaken.
B21_01_1Peter_V22	Allgenqigtekaagusi.	Unguvalleghraghaghsi	tuqukayugmeng	pingunghituq,	iwernga	tuqungigalngughmeng	pinguuq.	Allgenqigtekaagusi	Kiyaghneghem	akuzitangitgun,	unguvalghiit,	kenlengilnguut.
B21_01_1Peter_V23	Akuzitni	Igaqegkani	igaqngaaq,	“Qamaglluteng	yuget	vegaaghestun	ayuqut,	pinighnallghillu	piitesighaghestun	ayuqut.	Vegaaghet	palighaqut,	piitesighaatlu	ifkaghaqut,
B21_01_1Peter_V24	iwernga	akuzitangi	Kiyaghneghem	quunpekaghqaagut.”	Taakusta	akuzitet	Pinilghiit	Ungipat	ungipaqegkangit	elpesinun.
B21_02_1Peter_V2	Allgenghhaghhaat	quunpeng	mamaghyugaqut.	Ellngistun	quunpeng	mamaghyugtek	pelungilngughmeng	taghnegham	mamaaneng.	Angtaniitesleqaa	yugulilleghsi,
B21_02_1Peter_V1	Enkaam	taaqiteggu	allaaghhiinaq	seghleq	atuqegkaghsi.	Iqlengiqnanightek,	piniiyuggnanightek,	aqinananightek,	seghlequughunnanighteklu.
B21_02_1Peter_V2	qayughllak	naasiighaghsi	Atanghem	nangllegtallgha.
B21_02_1Peter_V3	Tagitek	Ataneghmun,	ellnga	unguvalghiinguuq	uyghak.	Yuget	ighsakegkaat	sasiinghilngughestun,	iwernga	Kiyaghneghem	nakmikegkaqaa	megnunaghluku.
B21_02_1Peter_V4	Elpesillu	unguvalghiistun	uyghagestun	ayuqusi,	enkaam	Agleghnalghiim	Taghnegham	nekeftusiqlisi	Kiyaghneghem	mangteghaanun.	Qepghaalleqaghsi	aaftekaalusi	priest-et	tuunilghiit	aghqutmeng	Kiyaghneghmun.	Ellngan	tuguklighlleqii	aghqutet	Jesus	Christ-akun.
B21_02_1Peter_V5	Igaqegkaalghii	Akuzitni	Igaqegkani	whaten,	“Zion-mi	nekegtaqaqa	megnunalghii	uyghak;	kangigham	uyghakaa	nakmikegkaqa.	Kina	alngunak	ugpeqilghii	ellnganeng	kayngumiqnaanghituq.”
B21_02_1Peter_V6	Taana	uyghak	megnunapigtuq	elpesinun	ugpeqilghiinun.	Iwernga	ugpeqingigalngughnun	whatelnguuguq,	“Taana	uyghak	mangteghangllaghtet	ighsakegkaat,	kangigham	uyghakaaghsimakanga.”
B21_02_1Peter_V7	Amalleqa,	“Taam	uyghagem	yuget	naagtestaqii,	iqustaqiillu.”	Naagtaqut	qayughllak	qaatkusigalnguut	Kiyaghneghem	akuzitanganun.	Tawaten	Kiyaghneghem	uspeqegkaqii.
B21_02_1Peter_V8	Iwernga	elpesi	yugni	nakmikegkaagusi,	umiilgem	priest-ekiisi,	aaftekaagusi	yugni,	Kiyaghneghem	ellngan	katam	yukiisi.	Nakmikegkaagusi	aapghesqelluki	allaaghlluwhaat	aneghneghqillghi	Kiyaghneghem,	tagsighikaq	elpesineng	mamlegllagmeng	ellmi	katam	allaaghlluwhaghmun	nighugminun.
B21_02_1Peter_V9	Sivunghani	Kiyaghneghem	yukenghisaghiisi,	iwernga	maaten	yuliisimiisi.	Sivunghani	nalluksaghaghsi	Kiyaghneghem	nangllegtallgha,	iwernga	maaten	allgeghsimaaghsi	nangllegtallgha.
B21_02_1Peter_V10	Ilakumtaamni,	nunataagusillu	allaneghtaagusillu	nunami	whani.	Enkaam	kayemamsi	ilapgategpenasi	yugusighpesi	piyukellghanun,	qayughllak	yugusim	piyukellghan	pilluwaangwaa	unguvasighsi.
B21_02_1Peter_V11	Pinitun	kiyaghtek	akulngitni	ugpeqaanghilnguut,	luuraq	ellngita	seghletun	pistenguninayukangisi.	Esghaqumegteki	aneghneghqillesi	usuqelleqaat	Kiyaghneq	Aghneghani	Christ-am	tagillghan.
B21_02_1Peter_V12	Ataneq	apalluqluku	malighqutaqlusi	kiyaghtek	tamaghhiitnun	kavemem	igleghutistengitnun.	Qaatkullusi	umiilegmun;	ellnganguuq	angelleghpigaq	igleghutista.
B21_02_1Peter_V13	Qaatkellukillu	igleghutistet;	umiilgem	aghyuughiyaqlegughtestaqii	seghletun	pistenun,	usuqiyaqleghughtestekaqiillu	pinitun	pistenun.
B21_02_1Peter_V14	Kiyaghneghem	piyukelqaa	pinitun	pilleghpesigun	nepiightesqelluki	nalluuqat	temngitwhameng	akuzillghiit.
B21_02_1Peter_V15	Kiyaghtek	itemngalghiistun	iwernga	itemngalleghsi	atuqefqaan	seghleghmun.	Kiyaghtek	qepghaghtelaaghulusi	Kiyaghneghmun.
B21_02_1Peter_V16	Quulvaghluku	tamaghhaa	yuuk,	piniqluki	ugpeqaalgutesi,	alikluku	Kiyaghneq,	quulvaghlukullu	umiilek.
B21_02_1Peter_V17	Elpesi	qepghaghtelaaghni	qaatkutek	piliitestegpesinun	siivakellelighlusi.	Qaatkegpenaki	nangllegtaghhiinaatlu,	umyugaqegtaghhiinaatlu,	iwernga	qaatkaqitekillu	amyuqetalghiit.
B21_02_1Peter_V18	Kiyaghneghem	efquqaqiisi	sumeghmikneghpesigu	ellnga	ikfiqngulusi	sameng	sapiglleghhiistun.
B21_02_1Peter_V19	Iwernga	suflughsimakufsiki	qevutqullesi,	seghletun	pillesi	apalluqluki,	kitum	alngunak	usuqnaanghitiisi.	Naqamenraq	suflughsimakufsigu	ikfiqelleq	pinitun	pilleghpesinun,	taawa	Kiyaghneghem	efquqelleqiisi.
B21_02_1Peter_V20	Kiyaghneghem	nakmikegkaqiisi	suflughtesqelluki	ikfiqellghet	qayughllak	Christ-am	ikfiqutkegkaqiisi.	Ikfiqellgha	usputaaguq	elpesinun	maligtesqelluku.
B21_02_1Peter_V21	Ellnga	seghleghqigatuq,	iqlengiqigatuq.
B21_02_1Peter_V22	Seghlequullengaqngami	akisimangitii.	Ikfiqaqngami	akeqsagsimangitii.	Itupill	neghyukutkaaguq	ellmineng	nanqigtikayugmun	elqughaghlluku.
B21_02_1Peter_V23	Christ-am	ellmineng	katam	aglaatkaqii	seghleghqelleput	yugusighmikluki	qaquuramun.	Tawaten	pikaaguq	tuqungasqelluta	seghleghqelleghmun	unguvasqelluta	elqughutngalleghmun.	Kiitiqullghakun	naallghutkaagusi.
B21_02_1Peter_V24	Penniighestun	aghulaqaatalghiistun	ayuqsaghtusi.	Iwernga	maaten	uteghniimaasi	Penniighniightemun	Kelengakistenganun	unguvasighpesi.
B21_03_1Peter_V3	Nuyaqegsallghem,	ullngaqellghem	gold-meng,	aarrallghem	pinighnaghsiigatii	ilusi.
B21_03_1Peter_V1	Elpesi	ugiiqani,	kiyaghtek	qaatkullusi	ugigpesinun.	Ilangi	nuliilget	ugpeqingigalnguugut	Kiyaghneghem	akuzitanganeng.	Iwernga	tawaten	kiyaghtelleghpesigun	ugpeqaaghhnayukata	sameng	pinghiteghngaaghpesiki,
B21_03_1Peter_V2	qayughllak	esghapakangat	pelungitun	kiyaghtaalleghsi,	alikilleghsillu	Kiyaghneghmun.
B21_03_1Peter_V3	Itupill	pinighnaghtek	ilugpesigun	qusevegllelighlusi,	nekeggmellelighlusillu.	Tawatelnguq	pinighnalleq	quunpekaghqaaguq,	megnunaghllagtuq	Kiyaghneghmun.
B21_03_1Peter_V4	Sivunghani	agani,	aghnat	maniguutkayuget	Kiyaghneghmun	pinighnaghsaqayuguut	ilumegteggun,	qusevegllelighluteng,	nekeggmellelighlutengllu.	Neghyukegkaqaat	Kiyaghneq,	qaatkegkaqiitlu	ugiteng.
B21_03_1Peter_V5	Sarah	tawatetkaaguq!	Qaatkegkaqaa	Abraham,	atanqennikaqaallu.	Enkaam	elpesi	panikiisi	pinitun	pimakufsi,	alingigalkufsillu	sameng	alngunak.
B21_03_1Peter_V6	Elpesillu	nulightuqani	kiyaghuteki	nuliisi	liigikluki	natetulangi	qayughllak	kayaataghaghtut	elpesineng.	Quulvaghluki	nuliisi	qayughllak	atunem	allgeghsaghqaqaghsi	Kiyaghneghem	tunusaa	kenlengilnguq	unguvalleq.	Tawaten	pikufsi	saam	alngunak	pillgilliqnaanghitii	yughallesi.
B21_03_1Peter_V7	Taaqnighnaqanka	sameng	pillghenka	whaten:	qamagllusi	ataasistun	sumeghnelgutek,	aqniqututek,	piniqutek	anglegutkullghiistun,	nangllekututek,	qusevgututek.
B21_03_1Peter_V8	Yuget	seghletun	pikangisi	akitegpenaki	seghletun,	nalighmeng	seghlequuqangisi	akitegpenaki	seghlequughmeng.	Itupill	akiteki	quyastelleghmeng,	qayughllak	Kiyaghneghem	nakmikegkaqiisi	tawaten	pisqellusi	elpesinun	allgeghtesqelluku	quyastilleni.
B21_03_1Peter_V9	Akuzitet	Igaqegkat	pillghistun,	“Kina	alngunak	quyangalghiimeng	unguvallelguyukumi,	quyamalghiinengllu	aghnelguyukumi,	seghletun	akuzineghmeng	taaqli,	iqlengiqnanighlillu.
B21_03_1Peter_V10	Seghletun	pinanighluni,	pinitun	pili.	Nekeggmennaqlunillu	kiyaghlli,
B21_03_1Peter_V11	qayughllak	Atanghem	esghapawii	elqughutngalghiit,	nagataqiillu	yughallghit.	Iwernga	Atanghem	tengvimun	ayuqii	seghletun	pilghiit.”
B21_03_1Peter_V12	Kitumngam	aqnighlleqisi	sagiqngukufsi	pinitun	pilleghmun?
B21_03_1Peter_V13	Iwernga	ikfiqeghngaaghpesi	pinitun	pilleghmun	quyastellengellequsi.	Alikegpenaki	yuget,	talwa	sumeghyaligpenasi.
B21_03_1Peter_V14	Iwernga	ilugpesigun	manigughaqiteggu	Christ-a	Atanghuluku.	Kitum	alngunak	aaptekangisi	sighimalleghmeng	ilugpesinilngughmeng	quunpeng	liigiknatun	kiimsighyaqleggiinaawaqiteki.
B21_03_1Peter_V15	Iwernga	kiimsighaqiteki	qusevegllelighlusi,	siivakillelighlusi.	Seghleghqenghilkufsi	umyugasi	seghleghninaanghitut.	Enkaam	yuget	seghlequuqangisi	pinitun	kiyaghtelleghpesineng	Christ-akun,	kaynguyugllequt	tawaten	akuzilleghmeggneng.
B21_03_1Peter_V16	Iwernga	Kiyaghneghem	piyukelqengngukagu	ikfiqesqellusi	pinitun	pilleghmun,	taana	itagnaghataghaghtuq	ikfiqelleghqaghpesineng	seghletun	pilleghmun.
B21_03_1Peter_V17	Christ-a	tuqukaaguq	ataasighhaghmeng	apalluqluki	yuget	seghleghqellghit.	Seghleghqumangituq,	iwernga	tuqumatkegkaqii	seghleghqestet	taginnaluki	Kiyaghneghmun.	Yugusii	tuqutkaaguq	iwernga	taghneghakek	unguvaghtekaaguk.
B21_03_1Peter_V18	Enkaam	taghneghaaluni	ungipaghyaghtuqaaguq	taghneghanun	anusimingllaghvigmelngughnun.
B21_03_1Peter_V19	Taakunguut	qaatkusimangilnguut	Kiyaghneghmun	neghighluku	Noah	kiyaghtengnguluku.	Noah	ark-engllaaluku	Kiyaghneq	qelaneghpenani	utaqiikaaguq	qaatkusimangilngughnun	avuteghqesqelluki.	Pingayuneng	inglullgiinaat	yuget	iteghluteng	ark-mun	yugulikaagut	meghqun.
B21_03_1Peter_V20	Taananguuq	meq	usputaq	paaptaayelleghmun	yugulighilghii	elpesineng	maaten	unguvaghtellghakun	Jesus	Christ.	Paaptaayelleq	iqangiisiinghituq	yugusimun.	Itupill	paaptaayelleghqun	akeqiikut	Kiyaghneghmun	umyugamnneng	seghleghningilngughmeng.
B21_03_1Peter_V21	Jesus	Christ-a	qilagmun	mayughluni	aghenqigneghanituq	Kiyaghneghem.	Enkaam	igleghutngwii	qamaglluki	yaqulget,	qilagem	igleghutistengi,	aghtughyaghqaanghillghetlu.
B21_04_1Peter_V4	Kiyaghhnanilghiisi	ugpeqaanghilngughestun,	liigikigataat	sangan	ilannaniitsi	seghletun	kiyaghtaalleghmeggnun,	enkaam	seghlequughaqiisi.
B21_04_1Peter_V1	Ikfiqegkaatanganeng	Christ-a	yugusimikun	elpesillu	yataaghqitek	ikfiqsaghqaalusi	Christ-atun,	qayughllak	kina	alngunak	yugusimikun	ikfiqelghii	seghleghqesugnaniimaaq.
B21_04_1Peter_V2	Enkaam	whaken	kenlekluku	unguvalleghpesi	tagtalngatun	malighqutaqegpenasi	yugusighpesi	piyukellghanun,	iwernga	atuqiteggu	Kiyaghneghem	piyukellgha.
B21_04_1Peter_V3	Sivunghani	seghletun	kiyaghtelqinaghtusi	qaatkusigalngughestun	Kiyaghneghmun.	Whaten	pikaagusi:	seghleghnapiglluku	atuqutkayuguyaghtusi,	qiliiqutaqlusi,	suumuutaqlusi,	qerngughutullusi	uglapestaaghet	seghleghet	atuqaqluki,	neqenghaghqellusi,	meghuuteghllaglusi	enkaam	alngunaseghaghllagughtaqusi,	maniguqaqasillu	iinghutkat	kiyaghnengllaqat.
B21_04_1Peter_V4	Iwernga	salleteng	ellmeggneng	katam	apeghyaghqaqiit	Kiyaghneghmun,	nanqigtiyaqleggiinaghmun	unguvalghiinengllu	tuqukanengllu.
B21_04_1Peter_V5	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	Pinilghiit	Ungipat	ungipaqegkaagut	talwa	tuqukanun.	Tamaakut	nanqigtekaagut	unguvanguluteng	nunami	whani.	Iwernga	Pinilghiit	Ungipat	ungipaqegkaagut	ellngitnun,	enkaam	taghneghiit	kiyaghsaghqaaghllequt	katam	Kiyaghneghem	kiyaghtellghatun.
B21_04_1Peter_V6	Sangwaa	qamaglluni	kenletghuusaghtughtuq.	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	whateghlluwaaghuluki	umyugasi,	nuqenneghtulusi	yughaghyaghqaalusi	yughalleghqaghpesistun.
B21_04_1Peter_V7	Megnunalleghpigaaguq	una:	piniqutepiiglusi	qayughllak	piniqellghem	seghevutestaqii	seghleghqellelghuteghllaget.
B21_04_1Peter_V8	Upughanghulusi	qikeghqufqaafsi.
B21_04_1Peter_V9	Tamaghhaghpesi	allgeghutkaagusi	tunusaneng	atughqameng	ilagpesinun.	Allaaghhiinaat	tunusat	Kiyaghneghmeng	pisi	atuqaqiteki	pinitun.
B21_04_1Peter_V10	Tunusalget	akuzimun	akuzilit	Kiyaghneghem	akuzitanganeng.	Tunusalget	qepghhaatimun	qepghhaatilit	iknaqellelighluteng	Kiyaghneghem	tuunegkaaneng.	Enkaam	salleghpesigun	tamaghhaakun	Kiyaghneq	usuqellengellequq	Jesus	Christ-akun.	Ellngan	pikaak	nighughqelleqlu	aghtughyaghqaanghilleqlu	quunperugllak	kenlengunaan.	Amen.
B21_04_1Peter_V11	Piniqegkamni	ilakumtaamni,	quupkaghpenasi	seghleliighrukutaaghllaget	kaaskangisi	nanghiighsaghaghnalusi.	Nanghiighsaghallesi	allakaayagunghitut.
B21_04_1Peter_V12	Itupill	quyatek	ilallghiisi	Christ-am	ikfiqellghanun	quyangaghllagesqellusi	nighughqellgha	aliightekan.
B21_04_1Peter_V13	Seghlequuqangisi	apalluqluku	maligsaaghtengumalleghsi	Christ-amun,	quyastellelguusi	qayughllak	Kiyaghneghem	Taghneghakek	nighughqengngalghiik	kiyaghtengnguuk	elpesini.
B21_04_1Peter_V14	Ikfiqsaghqaakufsi,	ikfiqegpenasi	yugtaghtengulusi,	teglegniightengulusi,	seghletun	pistengulusi,	nalighmeng	yanutqustengulusi.
B21_04_1Peter_V15	Naqamenraq	ikfiqsaghqaakufsi	Christian-ngutegpesineng,	kaynguyugpenasi	iwernga	usuqnakesi	Kiyaghneq	atiqangisi	Christ-am	aatghaneng.
B21_04_1Peter_V16	Nanqigtilleghqaq	kaatuq,	sivukluni	piinlighllequq	Kiyaghneghem	nengllugutangakun.	Piinlighnaqngukan	whangkutgun,	salleqan'ngam	qaatkusigalnguut	Kiyaghneghem	Pinilghiinun	Ungipaanun?
B21_04_1Peter_V17	Akuzitet	Igaqegkat	pillghistun,	“Elqughutngalghiit	pegnem	yugulikaakuyeng,	avelghasingwaalghiit	Kiyaghneghmeng,	seghleghqestetlu	naten'ngam	yugulillengelleqat?”
B21_04_1Peter_V18	Enkaangam	tamaakut	ikfiqelghiit	apalluqluku	Kiyaghneghem	piyukellgha,	elqughulluteng	pillequt,	neghyukulleqiitlu	unguvasiteng	ataasiighmelngughmun	Ulimaghistemun.
B21_05_1Peter_V5	Tawateghpigaq	elpesi	uyuqlighni	malighqutaqlusi	siivanlleghnun.	Qamagllusi	qusevgutullusi	qayughllak	Akuzitet	Igaqegkat	pikaagut,	“Kiyaghneghem	kipullegmun	ayuqii	qukaayugneghet,	iwernga	kayusighaqii	qusevegngalghiit.”
B21_05_1Peter_V1	Sameng	piighsuganka	Elder-et	yughaghvigpesinilnguut.	Whangallu	Elder-nguunga,	esghapakaqegkegkallu	Christ-am	ikfiqellgha,	ilasaghqaagungallu	Christ-am	aangelleghllaganun	Kiyaghneghem	aliightekagu.
B21_05_1Peter_V2	Enkaam	qeleghyugamsi	Elder-eni	whaten:	Penniighniightengutek	Kiyaghneghem	penniighitnun;	neghyukutkaqii	elpesinun	aflengakesqelluki.	Aflengakiteki	qayughllak	aflengaksukesi,	nakaan	qayughllak	piyaghqaategpesineng.	Kiyaghneghem	tawaten	pisqesugiisi.	Aflengakiteki	nakaan	akileghtuusangepigesnaghnalusi,	iwernga	qayughllak	kayusighyugukesi.
B21_05_1Peter_V3	Agghitkaqegpenaki	aflengakegkasi,	iwernga	maligsugnaghqitek	ellngitnun.
B21_05_1Peter_V4	Enkaam	Igleghutistengat	Penniighniightet	tagikan	allgeghullequsi	pinighnapiglleghhiimeng	qaghpameng	qelmeghiisaghqaanghilngughmeng.
B21_05_1Peter_V5	Enkaangam	elpesineng	katam	qusevegngatek	Kiyaghneghmun	aghtughyaghqaanghiteghllagmun.	Taagken	quulvaghlleqiisi	nakmikegkamini	aghneghmi.
B21_05_1Peter_V6	Qamaglluki	sumeghyalitkegkasi	pegteki	ellnganun,	qayughllak	aflengakngwiisi.
B21_05_1Peter_V7	Liisimalusi,	kelengalusi.	Anguyagsi	Tughneghaq	igleghanguuq	uginilghiitun	lion-etun,	ivaghiiquq	kina	naafqennaluku.
B21_05_1Peter_V8	Ayaklighteggu	Tughneghaq	ayepsugilngughqun	ugpeqilleghpesigun,	liisimakluki	ugpeqaalgutesi	nunataghhaanilnguut	tawaten	ellngitlu	ikfiqnguut.
B21_05_1Peter_V9	Iwernga	natengiighhaq	ikfiqelleghpesi	kingunganeng,	Kiyaghneghem	piniqingaghllagem	tamanganun,	ellngan	katam	nallghusaalleqiisi	sameng	tamaghhaaneng.	Ugpeqillesi	iknaqughsaghlleqii,	ayepsugighsaghlleqii,	aghuliilkaaghtesleqii.	Kiyaghneghem	nakmikegkaqiisi	Christ-akun	ilatesqellusi	kenlengilngughmun	aangelleghllagminun.
B21_05_1Peter_V10	Qamaglluku	aghtughyaghqaanghilleq	ellngan	pikaa	quunperugllak!	Amen.
B21_05_1Peter_V11	Silas	ataasiighmelnguuguq	ugpeqaalguta;	igaataqaanga	takestaaghhaghteggun	latamkun	elpesinun.	Latanka	Kiyaghneghem	piniqellepiiganeng	ayuqut.	Ungipaatamsillu	kayemamsillu	kiyaghtekestiisqellusi	piniqellghani.
B21_05_1Peter_V12	Ugpeqaalgutesi	Babylon-melnguut,	elpesistun	Kiyaghneghem	nakmikegkaqii.	Ellngitallu,	ighneghmallu	Mark-em	piniqiisinguq.
B21_05_1Peter_V13	Quyakutaqitek	naalleghqun	Christ-am	piniqellghakun.	Nekeggmelleq	tamaghhaghpesinilli	Christ-am	piliitkiitni.
B22_01_2Peter_V1	Ukut	latat	Simon	Peter-meng	pinguut.	Qepghaghtekaangallu,	apostle-kaangallu	Jesus	Christ-am.	Lataaqamsi	qamagllusi	allgeghutkani	ugpeqilleghmeng	whangkutestun	ayuqelghiimeng.	Allgeghtekaqaghput	ugpeqilleghput	elqughutngallghakun	Jesus	Christ-am,	Kiyaghneqegkefutlu	Yugulighistekegkefutlu.
B22_01_2Peter_V1	Piniqellghenkuk	nekeggmellghenkuk	wata	nulalik	elpesini	liisimakelleghpesigun	Kiyaghneqlu	Jesus-lu	Ataneghput.
B22_01_2Peter_V2	Jesus	aghtughyaghqaanghillelguuq	Kiyaghneghmeng.	Taaggun	aghtughyaghqaanghilleghqun	tuunegkaqiinkut	sameng	tamaghhaaneng	aklukegkamnneng	kiyaghtesqelluta	Kiyaghneghyuneghtuluta.	Tamaakut	allgeghtekaqaput	qayughllak	liisimakegkefut	Jesus.	Tuqlughiinkut	ilatesqelluta	quulvalleghminunllu	pinilleghminunllu.
B22_01_2Peter_V3	Aghtughyaghqaanghilleghmikun,	Jesus-em	tuunegkaqiinkut	akequsamineng	megnunapiglleghhiinengllu	pivagnapiglleghhiinengllu.	Tamaagun	akequsatgun	Kiyaghneghem	ilatesleqiisi	nangaghneghminun.	Taagken	anagyaqlegughlleqasi	seghleghem	piyukellghi	nunamelnguut	naafqiiyaqleget	elpesineng.
B22_01_2Peter_V4	Kiyaghneghem	nangaghnelitkaqutanganeng	elpesi,	taakunginaghhaagneng	pinaqellghaghsi	qamaglluku	ilateki	ukut	ugpeqilleghpesinun:	ugpeqilleghpesinun	ilateggu	pinilleq,	pinilleghpesinun	ilateggu	liisimalleq,
B22_01_2Peter_V5	liisimalleghpesinun	ilateggu	nuqetutilleq,	nuqetutilleghpesinun	ilateggu	aghuliilkaamalleq,	aghuliilkaamelleghpesinun	ilateggu	Kiyaghneghyuneghtulleq,
B22_01_2Peter_V6	Kiyaghneghyuneghtulleghpesinun	ilateggu	nangllekututelleq	ugpeqaalgutegpesinun,	nangllekututelleghpesinun	ilateggu	piniqelleq.
B22_01_2Peter_V7	Tamaakut	atuqngukufsiki,	nulastekufsikillu	kayusiilleqiisi	atughqaalusillu	kayutkaghqaalusillu	liisimakelleghpesigun	Ataneghput	Jesus	Christ-a.
B22_01_2Peter_V8	Iwernga	kitum	alngunak	atuqenghilkumiki	tamaakut,	amugtapigtuq	enkaam	esghaatepagningituq.	Puygukaqaallu	Kiyaghneghem	ukmangiqaqegkanga	seghleghqelleqsaqanganeng.
B22_01_2Peter_V9	Enkaangam	ugpeqaalgutemni,	nalluneqniighwaaghteggu	Kiyaghneghem	tuqluqaqiisillu	nakmikegkaqiisillu.	Tawaten	pikufsi	taawa	iqiteqaghhnaanghitusi	Christ-ameng.
B22_01_2Peter_V10	Enkaam	Kiyaghneghem	quyakusiqeghllaglusi	iteghtesleqiisi	kenlengilngughmun	Ataneghpagullghanun	Atanemtallu	Yugulighistemtallu	Jesus	Christ-am.
B22_01_2Peter_V11	Qaywa	liisimakeghngaaghpesiki	taakut	ipapillghet,	sagiqutngughngaaghpesikillu	qaatkennaluki,	iiwleng	neqangughlleqamsi	taakuneng	ipapilleghneng	elpesinun	apeghtuutkamnneng.
B22_01_2Peter_V12	Sumemni	itagnaghtuq	neqangughtaataqumsi	tamaakuneng	unguvangulunga.
B22_01_2Peter_V13	Liisimakaqa	tuquyaghtughtunga	qayughllak	Atanemta	Jesus	Christ-am	ungipaatekestaqaqaanga.
B22_01_2Peter_V14	Pinaqelqa	qamaglluku	apeghtughamsi	tamaaken,	enkaam	tuqulleghma	kingunganeng	neqaataqelleqasi.
B22_01_2Peter_V15	Atuqumangitaput	peghqiniqutngwaaghluki	ungipaghaatengllaqat	aapghaqngamtekek	elpesinun	aghtughyaghqaanghillghallu	tagillghallu	Atanemta	Jesus	Christ-am.	Whangkuta	katam	iyeghlluwaamnneng	esghaqaqaghput	ellngan	aangelleghllaga.
B22_01_2Peter_V16	Jesus-em	allgeghtaqngagu	quulvalleqlu	nighughqelleqlu	Kiyaghneghmeng	Atameng,	nagaquqaqaa	menga	Kiyaghneghem,	Qulighpigaalghii	Nighughqengngaghllak.	Atam	pikaqaa,	“Unanguuq	piniqepigtekegka	Ighneqa,	efquqepigtekegka.”
B22_01_2Peter_V17	Whangkuta	whangkunneng	katam	nagatkaqaghput	ma	qilagmeng	Jesus-metaqngamta	agleghnalghiimi	naayghami.
B22_01_2Peter_V18	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	whangkunni	nalluneqnaqraggiitut	uuknaliqistet	uuknaliqutkegkiit	ipangutangi.	Elpesinun	pinighllequt	sumeghtaghaatkengngwaaqufsiki	uuknaliqutkegkiit,	qayughllak	kenelghutam	kuukgutellghatun	ayuqut	mamlegmun.	Tawatetekestaghtek	kenlanga	Christ-am	tagilleghqaan	aghneghanun.	Taagken	nighuga	kuukgullequq	ilugpesinun,	unaangum	ighaleqetaaghatun	ayuqluni.
B22_01_2Peter_V19	Liigikngwaaghyaghqaqaghsi	una:	Kitum	alngunak	ellmineng	katam	liigikepagningitii	sameng	pisiitangi	uuknaliqellghet	Akuzitnilnguut	Igaqegkani.
B22_01_2Peter_V20	Uuknaliqistet	nakmikumangitiit	uuknaliqutkesaghqateng.	Itupill	Agleghnalghiim	Taghnegham	uuknaliqistet	akuzitelitkaqii	akuzisqelluki	Kiyaghneghtameng.
B22_02_2Peter_V2	Yulghutet	maligullequt	apeghtughistesighwaaghnun	kayngunalghinun	kiyaghtaallghitnun.	Enkaam	yuget	seghlequughlleqiit	apeghtuusapiget	atuput.
B22_02_2Peter_V1	Sivunghani	agani	uuknaliqistesiighwaaghet	akulngitnisaghtut	Kiyaghneghem	yugitni,	katam	apeghtughistesighwaaghet	akulegpesinillequt.	Nalluneghpesini	apeghtughlleqiisi	iqlengameng	naafqennaluki	ugpeqillesi.	Qaywa	Christ-am	Piliitestengita	tukfiqaqeghngiisteng	itemunnaluki	seghleghqellghitneng,	paninang	piknanighlleqaat.	Enkaam	nuuskagan	ellmeggneng	naafqeslequt.
B22_02_2Peter_V2	Pakigtelleghmegteggun	apeghtughistesighwaaghet	aklungighiyugllequt	elpesineng.	Enkaam	apeghlleqiit	apeghtuusangllaqateng	maningnaluteng	elpesineng.	Ima	neghighhaaneng	Kiyaghneq	Nanqigtistengatlu	Naafqiistengatlu	qaviigatuq	aghyuughyaqlegughllukillu	ayuqii.
B22_02_2Peter_V3	Kiyaghneghem	aghyuughumanginneghitii	yaqulget	seghleghqaqngata,	iwernga	miluutkaqii	hell-mun.	Tawani	pisaghtiighllagmi	qiipraghusighngaat,	utaqiilghiit	Aghneghanun	Nanqigtillghem.
B22_02_2Peter_V4	Neghighluku	Noah	kiyaghtengnguluku,	Kiyaghneghem	aghyuughumanginneghitii	yuget	avelghasingwaaghikat	ellmineng,	enkaam	ulevestekaqaa	nuna.	Iwernga	yugulikaqaa	Noah,	ilangillu	maaghraghvinlek	yuget.	(Noah	ungipaghtengukaaguq	elqughutngalghiimun	kiyaghtaalleghmun.)
B22_02_2Peter_V5	Kiyaghneghem	aghyuuqaqaaklu	neghllagek	Sodom-enkuk	Gomorrah-nkuk.	Naafqegkaqaak	keneghqun	kenlanga	ashes-ngughtellghegkenun.	Enkaam	usputaaghtekaqaak	sayaghqaatangi	yuget	avelghasighwaaghikat	Kiyaghneghmeng.
B22_02_2Peter_V6	Lot	elqughutngalghiinguyaghtuq	yuuk	kiyaghtekaq	akulngitni	tamaakut	seghleghet	yuget.	Aghhutanga	tamaghhaan	seghleliighutkeghllakaqii	unguvasigmikun	esghapagluki,	nagalluki	seghletun	kiyaghtaallghit,	nuqetegpenatengllu	sex-ellghit.	Enkaam	Atanghem	yugulikaqaa.
B22_02_2Peter_V7	Taawa	liitaghput,	Ataneq	liisimakuq	naten	yugulilleghqameng	elqughutngalghiit	yuget,	nanghiighsaghallengenghata.	Kelengakngwiillu	seghleghet	yuget	aghyuullengelleghmelnguut,	utaqiimaluki	Aghneghanun	Nanqigtillghem.
B22_02_2Peter_V9	Taana	aghyuulleq	kiyang	tamaakunun	ayuquq	maligullghiinun	yugusimeng	seghletun	piyukelleghllagitnun,	qaatkusugigalngughnunllu	kitumun	alngunak.	Tamaakut	apeghtughistesighwaaghet	tetugigatutlu	ellminguyugneghuutlu.	Alingegpenateng	seghlequughaqiit	nighugrakegtat.
B22_02_2Peter_V10	Yaqulget	iknaqataghaghtut,	aghtughyaghqaanghitaghaghtut	taakuneng	nighugrakegtaneng,	paninang	sivungani	Atanghem	anaggusimaninaanghitiit	nighugrakegtat.
B22_02_2Peter_V11	Iwernga	tamaakut	apeghtughistesighwaaghet	seghlequughaqiit	sangwaat	liigikegpenaki.	Teghikusastun	sumeghtaghaghpagningilnguugut.	Tuqutellengellequt	teghikusastun	allgeghluteng	teghigtughluki	tuqutkat.
B22_02_2Peter_V12	Uglalghiit	ikfiqestaqiit	enkaam	Kiyaghneghem	ikfiqesleqii.	Talwa	aghneraaghinaghmi	meghuuteghllagaqut,	yugusimengllu	seghleghet	piyukellghit	atuqaqiit.	Kayngusaghaateghllagaqut	neqenghaghqelgusiimalusi,	enkaam	akulegpesini	nukeggnaghqegkastunllu	ellmiigutkastunllu	ayuqut.
B22_02_2Peter_V13	Esghaneghmegteki	aghnat	qiliiqaqiit.	Seghleghqesuneghtuut	iwernga	seghleghqellelghutangita	kepsughsigatngwaaghiit.	Manighaqiit	yuget	puughhneqegtat	seghleghqesugesqelluki,	pakignepigtutlu.	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	Kiyaghneghem	aghyuughyaghqaqii!
B22_02_2Peter_V14	Tamaakut	apeghtughistesighwaaghet	ugpeqnaniqaqiit	apeghtuusapiget.	Enkaam	aghulaqegkaagut	Balaam-em	pillghatun	pinaluteng.	(Ighneqsaqanga	Beor-em.)	Quyaaquq	yuget	akileghtunghatni	seghletun	pisqelluku.
B22_02_2Peter_V15	Iwernga	donkey-m	akuzipagningilnguum,	yugem	mengakun	ineghtekaqaa	Balaam.	Enkaam	aghuliightekaqaa	uuknaliqista	sumeghneghiilliqellghaneng.
B22_02_2Peter_V16	Tamaakut	apeghtughistesighwaaghet	paatqastun	sengngustun	ayuqut,	qilagwaaghestunllu	ayuqut	anuqeghllagem	tengtekangi.	Kiyaghneghem	nekaghqangllaatkaqii	pisaghtiighllagmi.
B22_02_2Peter_V17	Aghsaaghmikameng	aangaayugtaqut	temngitwhameng	akuzitkelluteng.	Piiqut	itagnaghniluku	malighqutaqelleghqaq	seghleghnun	yugusim	piyukellghanun.	Enkaam	yuget	taaqaqutlu	tawaten	kiyaghtelleghmeggneng,	manighaqiit	tawaten	pinqigtesqelluki.
B22_02_2Peter_V18	Apeghtughistesighwaaghet	ungipaatkaqiit	tamaakut	yuget	itemnganiluki	samun	alngunak	piyukellghitnun,	ellngit	katam	itemngangunghiteghngaaghmeng.	Qepghaghtelaaghuut	seghleghqelleghmeggnun	enkaam	seghleghqellghita	naafqesaqlegwii.	Yuuk	qepghaghtelaaghuuq	alngunak	samun	igleqataqilghiimeng	ellminun.
B22_02_2Peter_V19	Yuget	liitaqngamegteggu	Ataneghputlu	Yugulighistevutlu	Jesus	Christ-a	anagyaghqaqaat	nukeggnaa	nunam.	Iwernga	uteghninqigtekumeng	seghletun	kiyaghtaalleghmeggnun	aaghqutaqesimakumengllu	tamaakunun,	taawa	kiyaghtaallghit	seghleghataghaayaghqaagut	piyuwhaalleghmeggneng.
B22_02_2Peter_V20	Tamaakut	yuget,	liitngwaaghluku	agleghnalghii	qelghusaq	allgeghtekaghteng,	tunutkaqaat.	Itaghnaghataghaghnayaghtut	liisimangisaqumegteggu	elqughutngalghii	kiyaghtaalleq.
B22_02_2Peter_V21	Tawaten	aneghtellghita	ipangughtestaat	yuget	pillghat,	“Qikmim	uteghfikaqaa	mighyaqani,	kurugaqlu	ughvughqegkaq	aglanqiglluni	ugharramun	mingughunneqigtaquq.”
B22_03_2Peter_V3	Liigikngwaaghyaghqaqaghsi	una:	kingulighni	aghneghni	legasiighwaghtelguyaghqaaguq;	tamaakunguut	malighqutaqngalghiit	seghleghnun	piyukegkameggnun.	Legasiighwaatkelleqaat	Kiyaghneghem	akequsaa,
B22_03_2Peter_V1	Ilakumtaamni,	ukut	alghiitkii	latalleghma	elpesinun.	Tamaghhaagkenkun	latalleghma	neqangughtesnaqutkamsi	liisimakegkaghpesineng.	Sumeghtaghiisqesugamsi	tamaakuneng	ipapighqellusi.
B22_03_2Peter_V2	Elpesinun	neqamikesuganka	agleghnalghiit	uuknaliqistet	uuknaliqutkegkiit.	Neqamikesugaqallu	qelghusaq	Atanemta	Yugulighistem	aapqaa	apostle-egpesigun.
B22_03_2Peter_V3	whaten	pillequt,	“Jesus	akeqikaaguq	taginqiglleqniluni.	Naagu?	Ima	sivuneput	tuqulaghaatellghitneng,	paninang	sangwaa	qamaglluni	almesiqaqaa	nunam	piinlillghaneng.”
B22_03_2Peter_V4	Nakmiiqaagut	avelghasingwaaghnaluku	una	ipapilleq:	neghighluku	Kiyaghneghem	akuzitmikun	ulimakaqaa	qilaga,	ulimakaqaallu	nuna	meghmeng,	meghqunllu.
B22_03_2Peter_V5	Taagken	Kiyaghneghem	meghmeng	ulevesluku	nuna	naafqegkaqaa.
B22_03_2Peter_V6	Iwernga	taaggun	akuzitkun	Kiyaghneghem	aflengakaqii	qilagallu	nunallu	naafqesaghqaaluki	keneghqun.	Aflengaknguut	kenlanga	aghneghanun	nanqigtillghem.	Tawanillu	aghneghmi	naafqelleqii	yuget	avelghasingwaaghikat	ellmineng.
B22_03_2Peter_V7	Ilakumtaamni,	puygugpenaan	una!	Ataneghmi	aghneq	ataasiq	thousand	ayumiqullghestun	ayuquq,	thousand	ayumiqullghet	ataasitun	aghneghtun	ayuquq.
B22_03_2Peter_V8	Ataneq	egnaanginneghituq	akequsani	piyaghqaaluku,	ilangita	yuget	sumeghtaghallghistun.	Yeghlegi	nekeggmetutaqiisi	qayughllak	kina	alngunak	iflayugunghilkanga.	Itupill	tamaghhaan	yuuk	avuteghqesqesugaa	seghleghqellghitneng.
B22_03_2Peter_V9	Iwernga	Aghnegha	Atanghem	tagillequq	teglegniightetun.	Tawani	Aghneghmi	qilaga	aviighusaghqaaguq	eftughuuteghllagmeng.	Sangwaat	qamaglluteng	qilagamelnguut	kenghem	ughuglleqii.	Qamagllutengllu	nunamelnguut	paneghllequt.
B22_03_2Peter_V10	Qamaglluteng	tamaakut	ughugyaghqaatangitneng,	elpesi	yugni	natelnguunaqetsi?	Kiyaghtaallesi	pelungillit,	Kiyaghneghmunllu	ayuqlit,
B22_03_2Peter_V11	utaqiimalusi	Aghneghanun	Kiyaghneghem.	Pinaqellghaghsi	qamaglluku	pinitun	pitek	aghneq	tagiragkiighesqelluku.	Tawani	aghneghmi	kenghem	naafqelleqaa	qilaga,	maatneghemllu	ughuglleqii	sangwaat	qamaglluki	qilagamelnguut.
B22_03_2Peter_V12	Iwernga	whangkuta	utaqiinguukut	Kiyaghneghem	akequsaqegkaaneng.	Pikaaguq	nutaghameng	qilagangllaghlleqniluni	nutaghamengllu	nunangllaghlleqniluni.	Tawani	elqughutngalghiinginaat	kiyaghllequt.
B22_03_2Peter_V13	Enkaangam	ilakumtaamni,	utaqiimalusi	tawavek	Aghneghmun	pinaqellghaghsi	qamaglluku	pelungiteklu	afkuyiiteklu	Kiyaghneghem	esghaamallghani.	Nekeggmeteklu	Ellngani.
B22_03_2Peter_V14	Sumeghmikiteggu	Atanemta	nuqetutillgha	elpesineng	yugulillengesqeqaghllusi.	Piniqegkamta	ugpeqaalgutemta	Paul-em	aapqaqii	taakut	ataasit	lataaqngamisi	peghqinellelighluni	Kiyaghneghtameng.
B22_03_2Peter_V15	Latatkegkaqii	tamaakut	qamaglluki	latamikun.	Nalighneghi	Paul-em	latangan	liigikneghlluguut.	Yuget	liigikellepagilnguut,	ugpeqillepagilnguut	allangughtaqiit	sameng	pisiitangi	latanganilnguut.	Tawatenllu	piiqiit	ilangi	Akuzitet	Igaqegkat	enkaam	naafqengnguut	ellmeggneng.
B22_03_2Peter_V16	Ilakumtaamni,	liisimakutegpesineng	saaqutangi	qaatkusigalnguut	liilightuusanun,	kelengatek.	Aghulaqutestegpenasi	anaggutngalghiinun	apeghtughillghitnun.	Tawaten	pikufsi	malghuklinaanghitusi	ugpeqegkaghpesineng.
B22_03_2Peter_V17	Iwernga	nagneghtek	wataqaaghaq	liisimakluku	Jesus	Christ-a,	Ataneghput,	Yugulighistevut,	nagneghteklu	wataqaaghaq	piniqellghakun.	Enkaam	Christ-a	usuqelteggu,	quulvaalteggu	maaten,	quunperugllaklu!	Amen.
B23_01_1John_V1	Taana	piinlighyuwhaalleghmeng	ayuqelghii:	nagaquqaghput,	esghaqaghput	whangkuta	katam	iyemnneng,	esghapakaghput,	saaftekaghput	iiggemnneng,	taananguuq	Akuzin	unguvalleq.
B23_01_1John_V1	Taana	unguvalleq	esghaghyaghqaaghtestaqngan	esghaqaqaghput;	enkaam	whaa	aapghaghputlu	ungipaqaghputlu	elpesinun	taana	kenlengilnguq	unguvalleq	Atamesalghii,	esghaghtestekaq	whangkunnun.
B23_01_1John_V2	Aapghaghput	elpesinun	sangwaa	esghaqaghputlu	nagatkaghputlu	ilatesqellusi	whangkunnun,	ilatngallemnnunllu	Atamun,	Ighneghanunllu	Jesus	Christ-amun.
B23_01_1John_V3	Latatkaput	tamaakut	quyalleghput	iighwiisqelluku.
B23_01_1John_V4	Una	ungipaq	nagaquqaghput	Ighneghaneng	Kiyaghneghem	apeghnaqaghput	elpesinun,	Kiyaghneghnguq	nighuguuq,	mamlelleqraggiituq.
B23_01_1John_V5	Iwernga	ilatnganikumta	ellnganun	naqam	paninang	mamlegmi	kiyaghtengnguluta,	iqlengiqnguukut,	atuqigataghputlu	ipapighqelleq.
B23_01_1John_V6	Iwernga	nighugmi	kiyaghtekumta	ellngan	nighugmetellghatun	taawa	ilatngaakut	ilamnnun,	aawanllu	Jesus-em,	Kiyaghneghem	Ighneghan,	ukmangiiwiinkut	tamaghhaaneng	seghleghqellemnneng.
B23_01_1John_V7	Seghleghqellghinnikumta	puughtengnguukut	whangkunneng	katam,	ipapighqellghitukutlu.
B23_01_1John_V8	Iwernga	aapqumteki	seghleghqelleput	Kiyaghneghmun,	seghevusaghqaqiinkut	seghleghqellemnneng,	ukmangighyaghqaqiinkutlu	tamaghhaaneng	anaggutaghallemnneng	qayughllak	ataasiighmetuqlu	elqughullunillu	ayuqelghiinguuq.
B23_01_1John_V9	Seghleghqigannikumta,	Kiyaghneq	iqlengiqestengughlleqaghput,	akuzitangillu	atuqngunghitaput.
B23_02_1John_V2	Ellnganguuq	iqitusiq	seghleghqellemnnun,	whangkunginaamta	seghleghqellemnnun	pingunghituq,	iwernga	tamaghaghllagan	yugem	seghleghqellghanun	ayuquq.
B23_02_1John_V1	Taghnughhaghhamni,	whaten	latangwaamsi	seghleghqefqaafsi	pisqellusi.	Iwernga	kina	alngunak	seghleghqegkan	Jesus	Christ-am	elqughutngalghiim	maniguututaqiinkut	Atamun.
B23_02_1John_V2	Esgha	whaten	ipapighqutkesaghqaghput	liisimakilleghput	Kiyaghneghmeng,	qaatkellemteggun	qelghusii.
B23_02_1John_V3	Kina	whaten	pilghii,	“Liisimakaqa	Kiyaghneq,”	naqam	qaatkegpenaki	qelghusii,	iqlengiqestenguuq,	nallukaallu	ipapighqelleq.
B23_02_1John_V4	Iwernga	kitum	alngunak	qaatkegkumiki	Kiyaghneghem	akuzitangi,	piniqillgha	Kiyaghneghmun	ipapestaaq	iighwiqaaguq,	tawaten	ipapighqutkesaghqaqaghput	ellnganitulvut.
B23_02_1John_V5	Kina	alngunak	pilghii	kiyaghtengnguniluni	ellngani,	kiyaghsaghqaaguq	Jesus	Christ-am	pillghatun.
B23_02_1John_V6	Piniqegkamni,	una	qelghusaq	latatkegkegka	elpesinun	nutaghaanghituq.	Taananguuq	neghightaq	qelghusaq	nagatkayugsi	ima	piinlighyuwhaalleghmeng,	taana	ungipaaguq	nagatkayugsi.
B23_02_1John_V7	Iwernga	una	qelghusaq	latatkegkegka	elpesinun	nutaghaaguq.	Taam	ipapighqellgha	esghaghluni	ayuquq	Christ-akunllu	elpesigunllu	qayughllak	mamlek	aga	naghughtengnguuq,	nighupik	kuukgutnguuq.
B23_02_1John_V8	Kina	alngunak	pilghii	nighugmenniluni	naqam	ugumikluku	ugpeqaalgutni,	paninang	mamlegmelnguuguq.
B23_02_1John_V9	Kitum	alngunak	piniqegkumigu	ugpeqaalgutni	nighugmi	kiyaghtengnguuq,	nighugmetutmineng	naagtusighqiituq.
B23_02_1John_V10	Iwernga	kitum	alngunak	ugumikegkumigu	ugpeqaalgutni,	mamlegmetuq.	Igleghtengnguuq	mamlegmi,	talwa	nallukuq	navek	pingutni	qayughllak	mamlegem	ayaastekaqaa.
B23_02_1John_V11	Taghnughhaghhamni,	lataaqamsi	qayughllak	seghleghqellesi	seghevutellengegkaagut	apalluqluku	Christ-a.
B23_02_1John_V12	Atani,	lataaqamsi	qayughllak	liisimakegkesi	ellnga	piinlighyuwhaalleghmeng	ayuqelghii.	Nukalpigani,	lataaqamsi	qayughllak	kayaalqegkaqegkesi	Tughneghaq.	Taghnughhaghni,	lataaqamsi	qayughllak	liisimakegkesi	Ata.
B23_02_1John_V13	Atani,	lataaqamsi	qayughllak	liisimakegkesi	ellnga	ima	piinlighyuwhaalleghmeng	ayuqelghii.	Nukalpigani,	lataaqamsi	qayughllak	iknaqelghiisi,	akuzitangillu	Kiyaghneghem	ilugpesinilnguut,	kayaalqegkaqegkesillu	Tughneghaq.
B23_02_1John_V14	Piniqegpenaan	nuna	talwa	sangwaa	alngunak	nunam	pinga.	Kitum	alngunak	piniqegkumigu	nuna,	piniqellghituq	Atamun.
B23_02_1John_V15	Ukut	esgha	qamaglluki	nunam	pingi:	sangwaa	yugusim	piyukellgha	seghleghqusiqaqelghii,	iyem	qiliightestellgha,	sangwaatlu	yuget	qukaayugutkaqegkangit	nunami	whani.	Taakut	Atameng	pingunghitut,	nunameng	pinguut.
B23_02_1John_V16	Nuna	aviighutnguuq,	tamaakutlu	seghleghqusiiwaqelghiit	yugem	piyukaqegkangi;	iwernga	kitum	atuqegkumigu	Kiyaghneghem	piyukellgha	kiyaghsaghqaaguq	quunperugllak	kenlengunaan.
B23_02_1John_V17	Taghnughhamni,	kenla	qantaghalliighaghtuq!	Ungipaatkaagusi	Anguyakilghii	Christ-ameng	tagilleqniluku,	whaa	maaten	uglapiglleghiit	anguyakilghiit	Christ-ameng	allgeghtuutngwaaghluteng	ayuqut,	enkaam	liisimakaghput	kenla	qantaghalliighaghtuq.
B23_02_1John_V18	Tamaakut	whangkunnisaghtut	iwernga	unitkaqiinkut	qayughllak	ilatngwaaghumangilnguut	whangkunnun.	Ilatngwaaqaayaqumeng	uninnayanghitiinkut.	Unitelleghmegteggun	liigikestengngwaaghaat	ilatngwaaghumangitelleghteng	whangkunnun.
B23_02_1John_V19	Iwernga	elpesi,	Christ-am	kuuvegkaqiisi	Agleghnalghiigneng	Taghneghagneng	enkaam	qamagllusi	liisimakaghsi	ipapighqelleq.
B23_02_1John_V20	Latangustemsii-i	ipapighqelleq	nallukutegpesineng?	Nakaa,	latangwaamsi	liisimakutegpesineng.	Liisimakegkesillu	iqlengiqelleq	ipapighqelleghmeng	pingunghilnguq.
B23_02_1John_V21	Kina	iqlengiqestengwaa?	Iqlengiqestenguuq	whaten	pilghii,	“Jesus,	Christ-angunghituq.”	Taananguq	anguyakilghii	Christ-ameng	qayughllak	ighsakegkek	Atankuk	Ighneghenkuk.
B23_02_1John_V22	Kitum	alngunak	ighsakegkumigu	Ighneq,	Atallu	ighsaksaghqaqaa;	kitum	alngunak	tugukliqumigu	Ighneq,	Atallu	tuguklighyaghqaqa.
B23_02_1John_V23	Enkaangam	iiwleng	neqamikluku	apeghtuusaq,	apeghtuusaqegkaq	elpesinun	ugpeghyuwhaalleghpesineng	ima.	Atuqumanginaqufsigu	nagaquqaghsi	taawa	iiwleng	Ighneghmellequsillu	Atamellequsillu.
B23_02_1John_V24	Unanguuq	akequsaqegkaa	tuunelleqniluku	whangkunnun,	kenlengilnguq	unguvalleq.
B23_02_1John_V25	Latasiqanka	elpesinun	tamaakut	puughtinaqutkelghiit	elpesineng	apalluqluki.
B23_02_1John_V26	Iwernga	elpesi	Christ-am	kuuvikegkaqiisi	Taghneghagmineng.	Taghneghakek	ilugpesinitutmegneng	alla	kina	alngunak	Apeghtughisteksugnaanghitaghsi,	qayughllak	Taghneghagkenka	apeghtughaqiisi	sameng	tamaghhaaneng.	Apeghtuusii	ipanguut,	temngingunghitut	enkaam	Taghnegham	apeghtulghatun	Christ-ametekestaghtek.
B23_02_1John_V27	Taghnughhamni,	Christ-ametekestaghtek	enkaam	uka	aliiqan	ilutuyaghqaaluta,	iighnaqefqaamta	kaynguyugem	ellnganeng	pilghaakut	tawani	Aghneghmi	tagillghani.
B23_02_1John_V28	Liisimakegkesi	Christ-a	elqughutngalghii.	Enkaam	liisimaksaghqaqasi	kinkut	alngunak	elqughutngaan	pikayuget	Kiyaghneghem	taghnughhaqii.
B23_03_1John_V3	Taana	kitum	alngunak	ellmineng	sighimakegkumigu	Christ-akun	pelungighsaghyaghqaaguq,	katam	Christ-am	pelungitellghatun.
B23_03_1John_V1	Esghaqaghtegguqun	Atam	piniqimalleghllaga	whangkunnun,	avaqutaqniiqiinkut	ellminun,	ipa	avaqutaqiinkut.	Tamaaken	apalluquluku	nunam	yugan	nallukiinkut	qayughllak	nallukegkangat	Kiyaghneq.
B23_03_1John_V2	Piniqegkamni,	taawa	avaqutaqegkanginkut	Kiyaghneghem,	iwernga	salin	whateghlluwaaq	liigikigataghput	naten	lliilleghqaghput.	Iwernga	liisimakaghput,	Christ-a	aliiqan	ellngatun	ayuqellequkut	qayughllak	esghaghlleqaghput	legan	tawatelluku.
B23_03_1John_V3	Kina	alngunak	seghlleghqegkayuk	qaatkusigatuq	Kiyaghneghem	Liilightuusaanun.	Seghleghqellghuuq	qaatkunneghitelleq	Kiyaghneghem	Liilightuusaanun.
B23_03_1John_V4	Liisimakaghsi	Christ-a	allgeqaaguq	iqinnaluki	seghleghqelleput,	ellnga	seghleghqellghituq.
B23_03_1John_V5	Kina	alngunak	Christ-ami	kiyaghlleghhii	seghleghqumanginaghnaangituq.	Kina	alngunak	seghleghqumanginaqumi,	liigikumangitaallu	nallukaqaallu	Christ-a.
B23_03_1John_V6	Taghnughhaghhaghni,	kitumun	alngunak	puughtestegpenasi!	Kina	alngunak	elqughulluni	pikayuk	elqughutngaaq	katam	Christ-am	elqughutngallghatun.
B23_03_1John_V7	Kina	alngunak	seghleghqumanginalghii	Tughneghaam	pikaa	qayughllak	Tughneghaq	seghleghqengngulghii	ima	piinlighyuwhaalleghmeng.	Ighnegha	Kiyaghneghem	allgeqaaguq	una	apalluqluku,	naafqennaluku	Tughneghaam	qepghaqaa.
B23_03_1John_V8	Kina	alngunak	taghnughhaa	Kiyaghneghem	seghleghqumanginiigatuq	qayughllak	Kiyaghneghem	nangaghnegha	ellnganilnguq;	qayughllaklu	Kiyaghneq	Atakegkanga,	enkaam	seghleghqumanginaghnaanghituq.
B23_03_1John_V9	Whaten	liisimaksaghqaqaput	Kiyaghneghemllu	avaqutii,	Tughneghaamllu	avaqutii:	kina	alngunak	elqughulluni	pingigalnguq	nalighmeng	ugumikingalghii	yulgutmineng	Kiyaghneghem	avaqutaqenghitaa.
B23_03_1John_V10	Ungipaq	nagaquqaghsi	piinlighyuwhaalleghpesineng	unanguuq:	piniqutusaghqaagukut.
B23_03_1John_V11	Cain-etun	ayuqsaghqaanghitukut.	Cain	Tughneghaam	pikaa	enkaam	tuqutkaqaa	ellmi	katam	anglegutni.	Sangan	tuqutagu?	Qayughllak	sallghi	anaggutngalghiit	naqam	anglegutangan	sallghi	elqughutngalghiit.
B23_03_1John_V12	Ugpeqaalgutemni,	saghiighayugpenasi	nunam	yugan	ugumikegkangisi.
B23_03_1John_V13	Liisimakukut	tuqumeng	alpakaagukut	unguvalleghmun	qayughllak	piniqegkeput	ugpeqaalguteput.	Kina	alngunak	piniqingigalnguq	paninang	tuqumetuq.
B23_03_1John_V14	Kitum	alngunak	ugumikegkumigu	ugpeqaalgutni	yugtaghtenguuq.	Liisimakaghsi	yugtaghtem	ilungani	kenlengilnguq	unguvalleq	kiyaghtengngunghituq.
B23_03_1John_V15	Whaten	esgha	liisimakegkefut	piniqelleq	sangutanga:	Christ-am	tuunellghakun	unguvalleni	whangkunnun.	Enkaam	whangkutallu	tuunelteki	unguvalleput	ugpeqaalgutemnnun.
B23_03_1John_V16	Kitum	alngunak	naamaghmi	kiyaghtaaghem	esghaghluku	ugpeqaalgutni	aklumalghii	nangllekenghilkumigu,	naten'ngam	Kiyaghneghem	piniqellgha	ilunganilleqa?
B23_03_1John_V17	Taghnughhaghhaghni!	Piniqiyaghqaanghitukut	akuziteraaghinaghteggunllu	akuzillemteggunllu.	Yeghlegi	piniqilta	ipapighqelluta	nangaghnemteggun.
B23_03_1John_V18	Enkaangam	liisimakellequkut	Kiyaghneghmun	ipapighqelleghmun	pikutfut.	Seghleghninemtallu	Kiyaghneghem	sivungani	nalluneqsuknaanghitaghput	seghevutingallgha	qayughllak	Kiyaghneq	aangataghaghtuq	seghleghyugngallemnneng,	liisimakegkangallu	sangwaa	tamaghhaan.
B23_03_1John_V19	Piniqegkamni,	seghleghninghilkumta	tetugnaanghitaghput	Kiyaghneq.
B23_03_1John_V21	Aapnemtallu	sameng	alngunak	allgeghutaqukut	ellnganeng	qayughllak	qaatkaqegkeput	qelghuusii,	atuqaqegkeputlu	efqughnalghiit	ellngani.
B23_03_1John_V22	Una	esgha	qelghusaa:	whangkunnun	ugpeqesqelluku	Ighneghmi	aatgha	Jesus	Christ-am,	piniqutullutallu	Christ-am	qelellghatun.
B23_03_1John_V23	Kitum	alngunak	qaatkegkumiki	Kiyaghneghem	qelghuusii	kiyaghtengnguuq	Kiyaghneghmi,	Kiyaghneq	ellngani.	Whaten	esgha	liisimakegkefut	Kiyaghneghem	whangkunnitellgha:	Taghneghagnekun	tuunegkamikun	whangkunnun.
B23_04_1John_V4	Taghnughhaghni,	elpesi	Kiyaghneghem	pikutanganeng,	kayaalqegkaqasi	tamaakut	qayughllak	ilugpesinilnguq	aghtughyaghqaanghitaghaghtuq	nunamelngughmeng.
B23_04_1John_V1	Piniqegkamni,	ugpeqegpenaki	qamaglluki	taghneghat.	Yeghlegi	liigiknaqaqiteki	Kiyaghneghmeng	pingutangi,	qayughllak	uglapiglleghhiit	uuknaliqistesighwaaghet	mingisimaat	nunami.
B23_04_1John_V2	Esgha	whaten	liisimaksaghqagsi	Kiyaghneghmun	Taghneghaqutkek:	tamaghhaghmi	taghnegham	aapqagu	Jesus	Christ-a	yuguluni	allgeqaaniluku,	Kiyaghneghtaaguq.
B23_04_1John_V3	Iwernga	tamaghhaghmi	taghnegham	mesiighaaskagu	Jesus	yuguluni	allgeqaanghinniluku	Kiyaghneghtaanghituq.	Taakuk	taghneghak	anguyakilghiimeng	Christ-ameng	pinguuk	nagaquqaghpesineng	tagiiyaghqaanilukek.	Taawa	maaten	kaatngwaaghlutek	nunamun	ayuquk.
B23_04_1John_V4	Tamaakut	nunam	pikii,	apeghtuusiit	nunameng	pinguut,	enkaam	nunam	yugan	nagataqiit.
B23_04_1John_V5	Iwernga	whangkuta	Kiyaghneghem	pikiinkut,	enkaam	kitum	liisimakilghiim	Kiyaghneghmeng	nagataqiinkut.	Tamaakut	ilangita	Kiyaghneghem	pikenghilkangan	nagasigatiinkut.	Enkaam	tawaten	esgha	liisimaksaghqagput	Taghneghakek	ipapighqellghem	nalighmeng	taghneghakek	ipangunghilnguum.
B23_04_1John_V6	Piniqegkamni,	yeqay	piniqututelta	qayughllak	piniqelleq	Kiyaghneghmeng	pinguuq.	Kina	alngunak	piniqingalghii	taghnughhaqaa	Kiyaghneghem,	liisimakaallu	Kiyaghneq.
B23_04_1John_V7	Kitum	alngunak	piniqinghilnguum	nallukaa	Kiyaghneq,	qayughllak	Kiyaghneq	piniqellghuuq.
B23_04_1John_V8	Kiyaghneghem	kayagtekaqaa	taananginaghhaq	Ighneni	nunamun,	unguvallengesqelluta	ellngakun.	Tawaten	pilleghmikun	Kiyaghneghem	kelgutkaqaa	piniqelleni	whangkunnun.
B23_04_1John_V9	Piniqelleq	akuzitkegkegka	whangkuta	piniqelqenghitaghput	Kiyaghneghmun.	Yeghlegi	Kiyaghneghem	piniqelqaa	whangkunnun	kelgutkaa	kayagtelleghmikun	Ighneni	iqitusiiluku	seghleghqellemnnun.
B23_04_1John_V10	Piniqegkamni,	Kiyaghneghem	piniqellgha	whangkunnun	tawateskan	whangkutallu	piniqutusaghqaagukut.
B23_04_1John_V11	Kitum	alngunak	esghiigatngwaaghaa	Kiyaghneq;	piniquskumta	Kiyaghneq	kiyaghtengnguuq	ilumnni,	piniqellghallu	iighwighyaghqaaguq	ilumnni.
B23_04_1John_V12	Kiyaghneghem	tuunegkaqiinkut	ellmi	katam	Taghneghagmineng	enkaam	liisimakaghput	kiyaghtengnguuq	whankunni,	whangkuta	ellngani.
B23_04_1John_V13	Esghaqaqaghput	Ighnegha.	Enkaam	ungipaqngwaaghput	Kiyaghneghmun	kayagtekaqniluku	Yugulighistenguluku	tamaghhaanun	yugnun.
B23_04_1John_V14	Kitum	alngunak	aapqagu	Jesus	Ighneqniluku	Kiyaghneghmun,	Kiyaghneq	kiyaghtengnguuq	ellngani,	ellnga	Kiyaghneghmi.
B23_04_1John_V15	Enkaam	whangkuta	liisimakaghputlu	ugpeqaghputlu	Kiyaghneghem	piniqillgha	whangkunnun.	Kiyaghneq	piniqellghuuq,	enkaam	kina	alngunak	kiyaghlleghhii	piniqelleghmi	kiyaghtengnguuq	Kiyaghneghmi,	Kiyaghneq	ellngani.
B23_04_1John_V16	Enkaam	piniqelleq	iighwightekaaguq	ilumnni	ilutusqelluta	Nanqigtillghem	Aghneghani.	Tawatetukut	qayughllak	Christ-atun	ayuqelghiikut	nunami	whani.
B23_04_1John_V17	Piniqelleghmi	alingelleq	aviituq	qayughllak	iighwiqam	piniqellghem	ighlleqayuwaa	alingelleq.	Enkaangam	piniqelleq	iighwiimangituq	tamaakuni	paninang	alingegkayugni,	qayughllak	alingellelguuq	aghyuulleq.
B23_04_1John_V18	Piniqiiqukut	qayughllak	Kiyaghneghem	sivukluni	piniqegkaqiinkut.
B23_04_1John_V19	Kina	pikumi,	“Piniqaqa	Kiyaghneq,”	naqam	ugumikluku	ugpeqaalgutni,	iqlengiqestenguuq.	Qayughllak	kitum	alngunak	piniqenghilkumigu	ugpeqaalgutni	esghaqayuni,	piniqnaanghitaa	Kiyaghneq	esghiigalkenni.
B23_04_1John_V20	Una	qelghusaqaa	Christ-am	whangkunnun,	kitum	piniqegkumigu	Kiyaghneq,	piniqsaghqaqaa	ugpeqaalgutnillu.
B23_05_1John_V5	Kinangaawa	kayaalqiista	nunameng?	Kitum	alngunak	ugpeqegkumigu	Jesus	Ighneqniluku	Kiyaghneghmun,	taanata	kayaalqiista.
B23_05_1John_V1	Kitum	alngunak	ugpeqngukumigu	Jesus,	Christ-angutanga,	avaqutaqaa	Kiyaghneghem,	kitum	alngunak	piniqegkumigu	Ata	piniqsaghqaqii	avaqutii.
B23_05_1John_V2	Whaten	liisimaksaghqaqaghput	piniqilleghput	Kiyaghneghem	avaqutiitnun:	piniqellemteggun	Kiyaghneq,	qaatkellemteggunllu	qelghusii.
B23_05_1John_V3	Una	piniqellghuuq	Kiyaghneghmun:	qaatkutelleghput	qelghusaanun.	Qelghusii	piyaqnaghllagunghitut,
B23_05_1John_V4	qayughllak	tamaghhaghmi	avaqutaliitkaan	Kiyaghneghem	kayaalqegkaqaa	nuna.	Whaten	esgha	kayaalqesaghqaghput	nuna,	ugpeqillemteggun.
B23_05_1John_V5	Jesus	Christ-anguuq	tagikaq.	Tagikaaguq	meghqunllu	aawhkunllu.	Tagimangituq	meghhiinaghqun	iwernga	meghqunllu	aawhkunllu	tagikaaguq.
B23_05_1John_V6	Taghnegham	aapghaa	taana	ipanguniluku	qayughllak	Taghneghak	ipapighqellghulghiik.
B23_05_1John_V7	Taawa	pingayuguut	aapghistet,	Taghneghak,	meq,	aakwh;	taakut	qamaglluteng	itagnaqulluteng	ayuqut.
B23_05_1John_V8	Ugpeqngukumteki	yuget	aapqiit	whangkunnun,	ipapestaaq	ugpeqataghaghyaghqaqaput	Kiyaghneghem	aapqii.	Kiyaghneghem	apellgha	Ighneghmun	ipanguuq.
B23_05_1John_V9	Enkaam	kitum	alngunak	ugpeqegkumigu	Ighnegha	Kiyaghneghem	qama	ilunganituq	Kiyaghneghem	aapqaa.	Iwernga	kitum	alngunak	ugpeqenghilkumigu	Kiyaghneq	iqlengiqestengllaghlleqaa,	qayughllak	Kiyaghneghem	aapqaa	Ighneghmineng	ugpeqenghilkanga.
B23_05_1John_V10	Una	Kiyaghneghem	aapqaqaa,	Kiyaghneghemnguq	tuunegkaqiinkut	kenlengilngughmeng	unguvalleghmeng,	taana	unguvalleq	Ighneghanituq.
B23_05_1John_V11	Kitum	alngunak	tugukliqumigu	Ighneq,	unguvallelguuq;	kitum	alngunak	tugukliimangilkumigu	Ighnegha	Kiyaghneghem	unguvallengellghituq.
B23_05_1John_V12	Latasiqanka	tamaakut	elpesinun	ugpeqilghiinun	aatghaneng	Ighneghan	Kiyaghneghem,	elpesinun	liisimakesqelluku	kenlengilnguq	unguvalleghsi.
B23_05_1John_V13	Nalluneqsukigataghput	Kiyaghneq;	liisimakaghput	nagataqiinkut	aapnemteggu	sameng	alngunak	piyukellghakun	ayuqelghiimeng.
B23_05_1John_V14	Liisimakegkumteggu	nagatellgha	sameng	alngunak	aaptellemnneng,	liisimakaghput	allgeghutaqukut	tungsiqamnneng	ellnganeng.
B23_05_1John_V15	Kitum	esghaqumigu	ugpeqaalgutni	seghleghqelghii	tuqumun	ayuqenghilngughmeng	yughaatkelligu	enkaam	Kiyaghneghem	tuunligu	unguvalleghmeng.	Akuzitkengngwaanka	yuget	seghleghqellghita	tuqumun	piyaghqaqenghilkangitneng.	Seghleghqellelguuq	tuqumun	ayuqelghiimun.	Iwernga	yughaatkesqengngunghitaqa	tawaten	seghleghqelghii.
B23_05_1John_V16	Qamaglluni	seghletun	pilleq	seghleghqellghuuq.	Iwernga	seghleghqellelguuq	tuqumun	ayuqenghilngughmeng.
B23_05_1John_V17	Liisimakaghput	kina	alngunak	Kiyaghneghem	avaqutaa	seghleghqumanginaghnaanghituq,	qayughllak	Ighneghan	Kiyaghneghem	aflengakngukanga	enkaam	Tughneghaam	seghletun	pinaanghitaa.
B23_05_1John_V18	Liisimakukut	Kiyaghneghem	pikiinkut	qaywa	Tughneghaam	igleghutngughngaagu	qamaglluku	nuna.
B23_05_1John_V19	Liisimakaghput	Ighneghan	Kiyaghneghem	tagiluni	liigikestekaqiinkut	liisimakesqelluku	Kiyaghnepik.	Kiyaghnepigmetukut	Ighneghanitutemnneng	Jesus	Christ-ami.	Taanata	Kiyaghnepiklu	kenlengilnguqlu	unguvalleq.
B23_05_1John_V20	Taghnughhaghhaghni,	iqitngalusi	kiyaghnesighwaaghneng!
B24_01_2John_V1	Ukut	latat	Elder-meng	pinguut	Kiyaghneghem	nakmikegkaanun	aghnamun,	avaqutaanunllu	ipapigmeng	piniqegkamnun.	Ellnginaanghitunga	piniqistezi,	qamagllutengllu	liisimakelghiit	ipapighqelleghmeng	piniqiisi,
B24_01_2John_V1	qayughllak	ipapighqelleq	ilumnnilnguq.	Taana	ipapighqelleq	ilumnnisaghqaaguq	quunperugllak.
B24_01_2John_V2	Kayusilleq,	nangllegyulleq,	nekeggmelleqlu	whangkunnillequt	kiyaghtengnguluta	ipapighqelleghqunllu	piniqelleghqunllu.	Taakut	Kiyaghneghmeng	Atameng,	Jesus	Christ-amengllu,	Atam	Ighneghaneng	pinguut.
B24_01_2John_V3	Quyapigtekaagunga	nagaqughluki	ilangi	avaqutaghten	kiyaghtengnguniluki	ipapighqelleghqun	tawateghpigaq	Atam	qelellghatun	whangkuta.
B24_01_2John_V4	Aghnami,	piimken	piniqututelta.	Taana	nutaghaanghituq	qelghuusaq	latatkegkegka	elpenun;	qelghusaaguq	ima	piinlighyuggaalleghmeng.
B24_01_2John_V5	Una	piniqellghuuq,	qaatkutelleq	Kiyaghneghem	qelghuusaanun.	Qelghuusaq	nagaquqaghsi	piinlighyuwhaalleghmeng	unanguuq:	qamagllusi	piniqullusi	kiyaghtek.
B24_01_2John_V6	Uglapiglleghhii	puughtista	nunami	mingilluni	ayuquq.	Tamaakut	yuget	apeghnaanghitaat	Jesus	Christ-a	yuguluni	allgeqaaniluku	qayughllak	ugpeqigataat.	Tawatelnguq	yuuk	puughtistenguuqlu,	anguyakilghiinguuqlu	Christ-ameng.
B24_01_2John_V7	Enkaam	kelengalusi,	pegsaqunaan	qepghaatkaghsi	akileghtuusaghqaghsi	qamaglluku	allgeghsaghqaqaghsi.
B24_01_2John_V8	Kitum	alngunak	qaasghuskumiki	apeghtuusii	Christ-am	Kiyaghneq	ellnganinneghituq.	Iwernga	kitum	alngunak	atuqumanginaqumiki	apeghtuusii	Christ-am,	Atallu	Ighneqlu	ellnganituk.
B24_01_2John_V9	Kitum	alngunak	apeghtughyaghtuqangisi	atuqegpenaki	Christ-am	apeghtuusii,	aqelqangllaghpenaan	nalighmeng	quyakegpenaan,
B24_01_2John_V10	qayughllak	kitum	alngunak	quyakegkumigu	qepghalgusiqallghuughlleqaa	seghleghmeng	qepghaqaaneng.
B24_01_2John_V11	Apeghyaghqaghllagughngaaghma	elpesinun	latatgun	piyunghitanka.	Iwernga	sunanguq	laalighfiklamsi,	aleghquunnayaghtukut	gginasaghquulluta,	enkaam	quyateghllagnayaghtukut.
B24_01_2John_V12	Avaqutiita	nakmikegkam	aakaghpesi	piniqiisinguq.
B25_01_3John_V1	Ukut	latat	Elder-meng	pinguut	Gaius-mun	ipapik	piniqegkamnun.
B25_01_3John_V1	Piniqegkamni,	liisimakaqa	unguvasigken	itagnaghtuq.	Yughaatkaqamken	itagniisqelluten	sakun	tamaghhaakun,	yugunqegtesqellutenllu.
B25_01_3John_V2	Quyapigtekaagunga	ilangita	ugpeqaalgutet	kaalluteng	ungipaasatnga	ataasiighmetelleghpeneng	ipapighqelleghmun,	iiwleng	elpesinun	atuqnguniluku	ipapighqelleq.
B25_01_3John_V3	Quyapigtaqunga	nagaqunemki	avaqutaliitkanka	atuqinguniluki	ipapighqelleghmeng.	Alla	saam	alngunak	quyasigataanga	tawaten.
B25_01_3John_V4	Piniqegkamni	ilakumtaamni,	piniipigtuq	ataasiighmelluten	qepghallghen	Kiyaghneghmun	aflengakelleghpegun	ugpeqaalgutet	talwa	tamaakut	nallukegkaghten.
B25_01_3John_V5	Maani	yughaghvigmi	aapghaqaat	piniqellghen.	Kayusiitaghtiki	nagneghutesqelluki	igleghallghit.	Kayusighillghen	Kiyaghneghem	piyukellghatun	ayuqluku
B25_01_3John_V6	qayughllak	igleghanguut	apalluqluku	Christ-a.	Tuguklighingigatut	ugpeqaanghilngughneng	kayusilleghmeng
B25_01_3John_V7	enkaam	whangkuta	ugpeqani	kayusighyaghqaqaput	tamaakut	yuget.	Tawaten	pikumta	qepghalgutkelleqiinkut	apeghtughinguluteng	ipapighqelleghmeng.
B25_01_3John_V8	Latakaayaghtunga	ugpeqanun	iwernga	Diotrephes-em	umiilguyugneghem	waakigatii	liilightullghenka.
B25_01_3John_V9	Elpesinun	pikuma	apeghlleqaqa	saaqutanga.	Seghletun	akuzitkaqiinkut,	iqlengiqutkaqiinkutlu.	Tawatenginaq	pingigatuq	upughasugigatii	ugpeqaalguteput	kaanneghata.	Upughatiyulghiit	ineghtaqii,	upughatinghatallu	eflequghaqii	ugpeqat	qerngughutfigitneng.
B25_01_3John_V10	Piniqegkamni,	seghletun	pikayugestun	pigpenang,	yeghlegi	pinitun	pikayugestun	piiqi.	Kina	alngunak	pinitun	pikayuk	Kiyaghneghem	pikaa;	iwernga	kitum	alngunak	seghletun	pikayugem	nallukaa	Kiyaghneq.
B25_01_3John_V11	Tamaghhaghmi	ugpeqam	Demetrius	pinighniiqaat	yuuk.	Ipapighqelluni	kiyaghtaallghan	ipapighqutkestaa.	Taawa	whangkutallu	tawaten	piighput,	liisimakasi	akuzilleput	ipanguut.
B25_01_3John_V12	Apeghyaghqaghllaguunga	elpenun	iwernga	latatgun	piyunghitanka.
B25_01_3John_V13	Sunanguq	qantaghaqun	esghaghlaken	enkaam	aleghquullequkung	gginasaghquullutung.
B25_01_3John_V14	Kiyaghneghem	nekeggmellgha	elpenilli.	Ilakumtaaghpek	qamaglluteng	sumeghmikaqaatenguq.	Ungipaaquqaghnaketen	qamaglluki	ilakumtaaput	sumeghmikaqapun'nguq.
B26_01_Jude_V1	Ukut	latat	Jude-meng	pinguut,	Jesus	Christ-am	qepghaghtenganeng,	James-em	uyughaaneng.	Lataaqunga	Kiyaghneghem	nakmikegkiitnun.	Kiyaghneghem	Atamta	piniqiisi,	Jesus	Christ-amllu	aflengakaqiisi.
B26_01_Jude_V2	Kiyaghneghem	nangllegtallghallu,	nekeggmellghallu,	piniqellghallu	nulali	elpesini.
B26_01_Jude_V3	Piniqegkamni,	latayupigtaqamsi	yugulillemnneng.	Iwernga	nagaqughyamki	apeghtughistesighwaaghet	elpesinilnguut,	apeghyukaqa	elpesinun	simighaqa.	Liisimakasi	Kiyaghneghem	kayagtekaqii	Apostle-etlu	ilangillu	yuget	apeghtiisqelluta	ugpeqsaghqamnneng.	Enkaam	kitum	alngunak	allangughsaghqaqenghitiit	ellngita	apeghtughillghit.	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	latanguunga	qevuullusi	kipullginaaghesqelluki	apeghtughistesighwaaghet.	Apeghtughistegpenaki	ipangunghilngughneng	apeghtuusiitneng.
B26_01_Jude_V4	Qerngughunneghpesini	maligutaqut,	iwernga	ungipaasigatiisi	sameng	apeghtughyugaqnilusi.	Tamaakut	yuget	tuguklighyugigataat	Jesus	Christ-a	taananginaghhaq	Igleghutistevut,	Ataneghputlu.	Enkaam	allangughtaqaat	apeghtuusaq	Kiyaghneghem	nangllegtallghaneng	ayuqelghii.	Whaten	piiqut,	“Kiyaghneq	nanglegtaghllagtuq,	seghevutikayuguuq	enkaam	itagnaghtuq	seghleghqesaghngaamta	sex-kun.”	Qavngarugllak	Kiyaghneghem	ungipaatkaqiinkut	aghyuughlleqniluku	kina	alngunak	apeghtughilghii	tawaten.
B26_01_Jude_V5	Ungipaatkaayaghngaaghpesi	sivunghani	Kiyaghneghem	aghyuughillghaneng	seghleghqestenun,	neqangughsugamsi	allameng	taakut	usputaqluki.	Neqamikluku	Atanghem	yugulikaqii	Israel-eghmiit	Egypt-eghmiineng,	aghulaqestekaqii	Egypt-meng.	Iwernga	kingunganeng	taam	ilangi	Israel-eghmiit	ugpeqinanighyata,	qaatkunnanighyata	ellminun,	tuqustekaqii.
B26_01_Jude_V6	Neqamikluki	yaqulget	Kiyaghneghem	pisqegkaa	nagneghusimangitkaat,	unitkaatlu	neyeng	qilak.	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	Kiyaghneghem	asighqegkii	qiipraghutneng	nekegngayaghqaneng	quunperugllak,	nekegtestekii	mamlegllagkun.	Tawantesnaqngwii	kenlanga	aghyuulleghqaminun	Nanqigtivigem	Aghneghani.
B26_01_Jude_V7	Neqamikluki	Sodom-eghmiitlu	Gomorrah-ghmiitlu,	uvitangitnilnguutlu	nunat.	Yaqulgestun	seghleghqegkaagut.	Allaaghhiinaq	seghleghqelleq	sex-kun	pikaat,	talwa	yuget	yulgutkullghiit	atuqutaqluteng,	sangwaatlu	seghleghataghaat	atuqegkaqiit.	Usputaagut	Kiyaghneghem	aghyughillghaneng	seghleghqestenun	kenlengilngughqun	keneghqun.
B26_01_Jude_V8	Apeghtughistesighwaaghet	tawatetut.	Piiqut	qavangullghitanguq	seghleghqestaqiit	sex-kun,	qaatkesigatiitlu	yuget	igleghutistet,	seghletunllu	akuzitkestaqiit	yaqulget	igleghutistet.
B26_01_Jude_V9	Naqam	Michael,	yaqulget	igleghutistengita	ilangat,	tawaten	pillghituq.	Tughneghaan-kuk	aaghtiiraaghutkaqngamegnegu	Moses-em	yugusii,	Michael-em	seghletun	akuzitkumangitaa,	anaggusimanilukullu	pillghitaa.	Yeghlegi	pikaqaa,	“Atanghem	aghyuughmigliten.”
B26_01_Jude_V10	Iwernga	tamaakut	apeghtughistesighwaaghet	sangwaa	alngunak	liigikenghilkeseng	seghletun	akuzitkaqaat.	Sangwaa	ilanga	liigikaqaat	teghikusastun	sumeghtaghiigalngughestun.	Teghikusat	piyukelleghmegestun	pikayuguut.	Tawateghpigaq	apeghtughistesighwaaghet	pikayuguut.	Enkaam	seghleghqestengughtaghaghaqut.
