B26_01_Jude_V11	Seghleghwaaghunaqnguut	ellngit!	Cain-etun	pinguut,	tuqutkaqaa	anglegutni.	Allgeghuteqaghhnaluteng	manimeng	seghletun	pikaagut	Balaam-em	pillghatun.	Korah-tun	pinguut,	qaatkesunghitkaqegkangi	igleghutistet	Kiyaghneghem	nakmikegkii.	Enkaam	Kiyaghneghem	naafqegkaqaa	ellnga,	apeghtughistesighwaaghetlu	naafqesaghqaqii.
B26_01_Jude_V12	Neqenghaghqusaghtuneghpesini,	communion-emaghpesi,	tamaakutlu	apeghtughistet	piiqut.	Yakughnaghtut	ugpeqanun	katam	tawaten	uyghagllak	meghem	asinganilnguq	yakughnalghii	angyanun.	Neghaqut	qerngaghmeng	nenglaghqiqusimaghmeng,	akuzimaghmeng	nepugllaget	kaynguyugpenateng.	Ellnginaghmeng	neghaqut	kinkut	tuunegpenaki.	Sasiinghitut	qilawaaghestun	eslallugilngughestun	ayuqut,	anuqem	naghughuskangi	quulngakun	nunam	meghisagllagem.	Sasiinghitut	piitestingigalngughestun	uqfigestun	ayuqut,	unataghvigmi.	Piitestingigalnguut	uqfiget	tuqukastun	ayuqut.	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	piitesiighaghtem	nusugaqii	paneghhnaluki.	Enkaam	maalghugegneng	tuqukallghuughaqut.
B26_01_Jude_V13	Kayngunalghiit	nangaghneghit	qagighllagestun	ayuqut,	temngi	puugllungllat.	Ighaleqetaaghestun	qaprakayugestun	ayuqut,	qayughllak	tawatelnguut	ighaleqetaaghet	nalluniighutnguyaghqaanghitut	igleghanun.	Tawateghpig-aq	igleghusaghqaqenghitaat	kina	alngunak	apeghtughillesighwaalleghmegteggun.	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	Kiyaghneghem	yataaghqutkaqii	pisaghtiighllagmeng	nekaghqameng	kenlengilngughmeng.
B26_01_Jude_V14	Enoch-nguq	maaghraghvinliitkegkangat	kingunghita	Adam-em,	ellngan	uuknaliqutkegkaqii	tamaakut	yuget.	Whaten	pikaaguq,	“Esghaghtek,	Ataneq	tagiyaghqaaguq	agleghnalghiit	yaqulelghuteghllani	kelqelluki,
B26_01_Jude_V15	nanqiggnaluki	qamagtengngwaaghluki	yuget.	Qayvighqesaghqaqii	qamagtengngwaaghluki	seghleghqestet	seghleghqellghit,	seghlepestaatunllu	akuzitkillghit	ellmineng.	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	Atanghem	aghyuughyaghqaqii	seghleghqesteghllaget.”
B26_01_Jude_V16	Tamaakut	yuget	quunpeng	temngi	akuzilgaghllaget,	efqughutkigalkangit	sangwaat	alngunak.	Sangwaat	alngunak	seghleghqusit	atuqsuneghmegteki	atuqaqiit,	piniiyugneghllaget,	usuqnguughtaqiitlu	kinkut	sameng	qiliighvikneghmegteki.
B26_01_Jude_V17	Piniqegkamni,	neqamikluki	Atanghem	Jesus	Christ-am	apostle-ngita	aapqiit	sivunghani.
B26_01_Jude_V18	Ungipaatkaqiisi	whaten,	“Kingulighni	aghneghni	nenglaghyugsaghtelguyaghqaaguq	Kiyaghneghem	ipapighqellghaneng	ayuqelghiineng.	Sangwaat	alngunak	yugusim	piyukellghi	atuqsuneghmegteki	piiqiit.”
B26_01_Jude_V19	Tamaakut	yuget	aaghtiiraaghutestiyugaqut	ugpeqaneng.	Maligtaqiit	yugusimeng	piyukellghit	seghleghqelleghmun	ayuqelghiit,	Agleghnalghiigneng	Taghneghagneng	avangitutmeggneng.
B26_01_Jude_V20	Iwernga	piniqegkamni,	wata	iknaqughsaamanginaghteggu	ugpeqaamalleghsi,	ugpeqilleghpesigun	Kiyaghneghem	agleghnalghiitgun	apeghtuusiitgun.	Yughaghaqitek	Agleghnalghiignekun	Taghneghagnekun.
B26_01_Jude_V21	Kiyaghneghem	piniqellghanitekestaghtek,	utaqiimalusi	Atanemnneng	Jesus	Christ-ameng	tuunesqellusi	kenlengilngughmeng	unguvalleghmeng	nangllegtalleghmikun.
B26_01_Jude_V22	Nangllekluki	tamaakut	malghuklingalghiit	Kiyaghneghem	ipapighqellghaneng.
B26_01_Jude_V23	Yuguliteki	akuqaqallghuulghiistun	kenghegneng.	Nangllekaqluki	ilangitlu	iwernga	piraamsingwaaghlusi	luuraq	seghleghqellghistun	piiqsaaghtusi.	Ugumikluki	seghleghqellghit	katam	ugumikelleghpesistun	nukeggnaghqeghllakiit	aatkateng	seghleghqengnguluteng.
B26_01_Jude_V24	Kiyaghneghem	kelengaksaghqaqiisi	seghleghqelleghqaghpesineng,	seghleghqellghiitesaghqaqiisillu.	Enkaam	quyaghllagllequsi	nekevegkufsi	sivungakun	nighughqellghan.
B26_01_Jude_V25	Kiyaghneq	taananginaghhaaguq	Kiyaghneq,	yugulikaqiinkut	Atanemteggun	Jesus	Christ-am	tuqullghakun.	Ima	tazimakerugllak,	maaten,	quunperugllak	kenlengunaan	Kiyaghneq	aangeghllagtuq,	aghtughyaghqaanghiteghllagtuq,	igleghutngwaa	sangwaa	qamagtengngwaaghluku,	aghtughyaghqaqenghitaa	sangwaa	qamagtengngwaaghluku.	Kiyaghneq	usuqli.	Amen.
B27_01_Revelation_V1	Whani	igani	igaqngaat	Kiyaghneghem	aliightekii	Jesus	Christ-amun.	Kiyaghneghem	aliightekaqii	ellnganun	liigikestesqelluki	qepghaghteni	sangwaat	piyaghtungestaghniluki.	Enkaam	Christ-am	kayagtekaqaa	yaquleni	qepghaghteminun	John-mun	tamaakut	liisimakesqelluki.
B27_01_Revelation_V2	Taagken	John-em	aapqaqii	qamaglluki	esghaqanillu	nagatkanillu.	Nagatkaqii	akuzitangi	Kiyaghneghem,	ungipaqlu	Jesus	Christ-ameng	ayuqelghii.
B27_01_Revelation_V3	Quyastekaaguq	atightulghii	iglagtuluni	akuzitangitneng	uuknaliqellghem.	Quyastekaagutlu	nagalluteng	qaatkullghiit	qayughllak	qantaghaqun	tamaakut	pillequt.
B27_01_Revelation_V4	Ukut	latat	John-meng	pinguut	ugpeqanun	qerngughtukayuget	maaghraghvinlegni	yughaghvigni	Asia-mi.	Nangllegtalleqlu	nekeggmelleqlu	elpesinillik	Kiyaghneghmeng,	maaghraghvinlek	taghneghaneng,	Jesus	Christ-amengllu.	Kiyaghneghuuq	kiyaghlleghhii	maaten,	ellnganguuq	kiyaghlleghhii	sivunghani,	ellnganguuq	tagiyaghqaq.	(Taakut	maaghraghvinlek	taghneghat	sivunganitut	Kiyaghneghem	umiilgusiin	aqumutaan.)	Jesus	Christ-a	ataasiighmelnguuguq	liisimakista	ipapilleghmun.	Ellnganguuq	Kiyaghneghem	unguvaghsuwhaaqaa	tuqulleghmeng.	Ellnganguuq	igleghutistengat	umiilgita	nunam.	Ellnganguuq	piniqilghii	whangkunneng,	aawmikunllu	itemutkaqiinkut	seghleghqellemnneng.	Ataneghpagulleghminitestiinkut,	priest-ngughtestiinkutlu	Kiyaghneghminun	Atamun.	Jesus	Christ-am	allgeghllikek	nighughqelleqlu,	aghtughyaghqaanghilleqlu	igleghutimun	quunperugllak	kenlengunaan!	Amen.
B27_01_Revelation_V7	Ii-i!	Jesus	tagiiquq	qilagwaagteggun.	Tamaghhaghmi	yugem	esghaghlleqaat,	talwa	tamaakut	panasqelluku	pikiita	esghaghlleqaat.	Qamaglluteng	nunam	ramkengi	qiyaaghuuteghllagllequt	apalluqluku	ellnga.	Aa-a,	tamaakut	piyaghqaagut!	Amen.
B27_01_Revelation_V8	“Whanga	Alpha-nguungallu	Omega-nguungallu,”	piiq	Ataneq	Kiyaghneq,	Aghtughyaghqaanghiteghllak.	Ellnganguuq	kiyaghlleghhii	maaten,	ellnganguuq	kiyaghlleghhii	sivunghani,	ellnganguuq	tagiyaghqaq.
B27_01_Revelation_V9	John-nguunga,	ugpeqaalgutkaghpesinga.	Ikfiqunga	elpesistun	qayughllak	Jesus-em	Ataneghpagullghan	pikiinkut.	Ellngakun	ikfiqelleput	nuqetutaput.	Aglaghtestekaagunga	qiighqamun	aatqelghii	Patmos-meng	qayughllak	ungipaqegkenka	Kiyaghneghem	akuzitangi,	ungipaqlu	Jesus-meng	ayuqelghii.
B27_01_Revelation_V10	Atanghem	Aghneghani	Agleghnalghiim	Taghnegham	iitghaanga.	Taagken	tunutemnilluku	nagaqughaqa	ma	iglagtuqaq	qalghightaatetun.
B27_01_Revelation_V11	Whaten	piiq,	“Igaqughqi	igatgun	esghaqaghten.	Taagken	tuyughnaketen	ugpeqanun	qerngughutkayugnun	maaghraghvinlegni	yughaghvigni:	Ephesus-melnguut,	Smyrna-melnguut,	Perga-melnguut,	Thyatira-melnguut,	Sardis-melnguut,	Philadelphia-melnguut,	Laodicea-melnguutlu.”
B27_01_Revelation_V12	Taagken	qiivunga	esghaghnaluku	ma	aleghqughteka.	Qiivyalghiinga	esghaghanka	maaghraghvinleguftut	gold-et	kenelghutat	tunemiit.
B27_01_Revelation_V13	Taawa	qukiitni	kina	llangaqa	ighnegha	yugem	akughtughllagegneng	atkuyaaqeftuq,	sakimagmikunllu	tafsingaftuq	gold-meng.
B27_01_Revelation_V14	Naasqwallu	nuyaallu	qateghpetuk	wool-estun	nalighmeng	anigustun,	iiskeklu	kenghem	kumangallghatun	ayuqlutek.
B27_01_Revelation_V15	Itegii	qelmeghsaqastun	siilustun	ayuqeftut	pelungighsaqat	keneghqun.	Mengallu	eftughllagatun	meghllagem	tevughallghan	ayuqluni.
B27_01_Revelation_V16	Aghenqigneghmineng	tugumiiqeftii	maagraghvinlek	ighaleqetaaghet,	qaanghanengllu	aanuq	savigpak	inglugtun	gginakek	ipegsaqak.	Gginaa	nighugllak	aghneghem	qukaan	siqinghuughtellghatun.
B27_01_Revelation_V17	Esghaghyamkun	itegaan	manungakun	uullghaghtunga	tuqukastun.	Iwernga	aghenqigneghmineng	iiggmineng	saaflunga	piinga,	“Alingegpenang,	whanga	sivuliigungallu	kinguliigungallu.
B27_01_Revelation_V18	Unguvalghiinguunga!	Tuqukaayaghtunga,	iwernga	ii-i,	unguvanguunga	quunperugllak	kenlengunaan.	Key-lguunga	Tuqulleghmunllu	Hades-munllu.
B27_01_Revelation_V19	“Saaqsin	igaqughqi	igatgun	sangwaat	qamaglluki	esghaqeten	maaten,	sangwaatlu	kinguvaqun	piyaghqat.
B27_01_Revelation_V20	Esghaghaten	maaghraghvinlek	ighaleqetaaghet	aghenqigneghma	iigganilnguut,	maaghraghvinleklu	gold-et	kenelghutat	tunemiit,	taakut	sameng	pisiitangi	salin	qayvightellghitut.	Whaten	pisiigut:	Maaghraghvinlek	ighaleqetaaghet	yaqulguut.	Kiyaghneghem	ungipaghtekii	ugpeqanun	qerngughutkayuget	maaghraghvinlegni	yughaghvigni.	Maaghraghvinlek	kenelghutam	tunemii	taakunguut	maaghraghvinlek	yughaghviget.
B27_02_Revelation_V1	“Latagu	yaqulek	igleghutilghii	ugpeqaneng	qerngughutkayuget	yughaghvigani	Ephesus-em.	Whanganguuq	tugumiilek	maaghraghvinlek	ighaleqetaaghneng	aghenqignemkun,	igleghtengnguungallu	akulngitni	maaghraghvinlek	gold-et	kenelghutat	tunemiitni.
B27_02_Revelation_V2	Liisimakamsi	saaqutsi,	ughleghiilghiisi,	iilqayunghitelleghsillu.	Liisimakamsillu	tugukliigatasi	seghleghet	yuget,	iwernga	apostle-ngunilghiit	liitaqasi	esghapagluki	temngingutangi.	Taawa	liitasi	iqlengiqestenguut.
B27_02_Revelation_V3	Meghniigatusi	ikfiqelleghpesineng	whanga	apalluqlunga,	iilqayugigatusillu.
B27_02_Revelation_V4	Iwernga	piyukenghitusiqa	elpesinun	unanguuq,	piniqnaniimaaghpesinga,	ugpeqaalgutesillu	sivunghani	piniqelleghpesistun.
B27_02_Revelation_V5	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	puygugpenaan	piniqeghllagyaqefsinga,	ugpeqaalgutesillu.	Piniqnanighaghpesinga	piiqelleghpesistun.	Enkaam	avuteghqitek.	Piniqenqigtikut	piniqsugwhaalleghpesistun.	Avuteghqenghilkufsi,	takulusi	iqilleqaqa	kenelghutaghpesi	tunemaa	nenganeng.
B27_02_Revelation_V6	Iwernga	una	pinitun	pilqaghsi:	ugumikasi	piiqegkangit	Nicolaus-em	maligsaaghtengita,	katam	whanga	ugumikellemtun.
B27_02_Revelation_V7	Sigutelgukufsi,	nagatekek	Taghneghak	sameng	piiqutkek	ugpeqanun!	Tamaakut	kayaalqiilghiit	kayaalqiilleghmeng	neghesqelleqanka	piitestekaaneng	uqfigan	unguvallghem,	tawanlenguq	Kiyaghneghem	Piitesighaghvigani.
B27_02_Revelation_V8	“Latagu	yaqulek	igleghutilghii	ugpeqaneng	qerngughutkayuget	yughaghvigani	Smyrna-m.	Una	ungipaq	whangamneng	pinguuq:	Sivuliigungallu	kinguliigungallu,	tuqulunga	unguvaqaagunga.
B27_02_Revelation_V9	Liisimakanka	seghleliillesi,	aklumanguusillu	iwernga	aklungitusi!	Liisimakaqa	seghleghet	akuzitet	ilangita	yuget	piiqegkangit	elpesinun.	Jews-nguniiqut,	Jews-epigunghiteghngaaghmeng.	Yuguut	qerngughutkayuget	Tughneghaam	synagogue-ngani.
B27_02_Revelation_V10	Alikegpenaki	tamaakut	ikfiqutkennaqegkesi.	Nagatek!	Tughneghaam	ilasi	anusimingllaghtesnaqii	nanghiiqunalusi.	Enkaam	ikfiqellequsi	qula	aghneghnun.	Iwernga	ataasiighmetek,	qaywa	tuquyaghqaaghngaaghpesi.	Tawaten	pikufsi,	akileghtuusalilleqamsi	kenlengilngughmeng	unguvalleghmeng.
B27_02_Revelation_V11	Sigutelgukufsi,	nagatekek	Taghneghak	sameng	piiqutkek	ugpeqanun!	Tamaakut	kayaalqiilghiit	kayaalqiilleghmeng,	tuunglighhaan	tuqullghem	aqnighhnaanghitii.
B27_02_Revelation_V12	“Latagu	yaqulek	igleghutilghii	ugpeqaneng	qerngughutkayuget	yughaghvigani	Pergamum-em.	Una	ungipaq	savigpalegmeng	pinguuq	inglugtun	gginalek	ipegsaqameng.
B27_02_Revelation_V13	Liisimakamsi	naantutsi,	tawantusi	Tughneghaam	umiilgutivigan	aqumutagkeni.	Whangamnun	ataasiighmetusi,	ugpeqnanillghitaghpesingallu.	Tawatetkaagusi	talwa	Antipas,	ataasiighmelnguq	ungipaghteka,	kiyaghtengnguluku.	Tawani	Tughneghaam	kiyaghfigani	tuqutkaqaat.
B27_02_Revelation_V14	Iwernga	piyukenghitusinka	elpesinun	ukunguut:	taawa	elpesinitut	ilangi	qaatkullghiit	Balaam-em	apeghtuusaanun.	Apeghtuqaqaa	Balak	naten	seghleghqestesqelluki	Israel-eghmiit.	Enkaam	Balak-em	apeghtuqaqii	neghyaghngiita	pisqelluki	neqet	aghqutkegkat	kiyaghnengllaqanun.	Apeghtuqaqiillu	itagnaghniluku	alngunak	sex-kun	seghleghqelleghqaq.
B27_02_Revelation_V15	Tawateghpigaq	ilasi	qaatkutut	Nicolaus-em	apeghtuusaanun.
B27_02_Revelation_V16	Avuteghqellusi	seghleghqennanightek!	Pinghilkufsi	qantaghaqun	takulleqamsi.	Taagken	pilluwaghlleqanka	tamaakut	yuget	savigpagmeng	qanemnilngughmeng.
B27_02_Revelation_V17	Sigutelgukufsi,	nagatekek	Taghneghak	sameng	piiqutkek	ugpeqanun	qerngughutkayuget	yughaghvigni!	Manna-meng	iighngalghiimeng,	manna-lilleqaqa	taana	kayaalqiilghii	Tughneghagh-meng.	Ellnganunllu	tuunelleqaqa	qatelghii	uyghak,	ateghraghaghmeng	igaqfikegkaq.	Kitum	alngunak	nallukegkaa	ateq	iwerngaqun	allgeghtikaghhiinaam	uyghagmeng	liisimakaa.
B27_02_Revelation_V18	“Latagu	yaqulek	igleghutilghii	ugpeqaneng	qerngughutkayuget	yughaghvigani	Thyatira-m.	Una	ungipaq	Ighneghaneng	Kiyaghneghem	pinguuq.	Iiskek	kumaghuuguk	kenghestun,	itegii	qelmeghtutkaat	siilum	qelmeghsalghatun.
B27_02_Revelation_V19	Liisimakamsi	saaqutsi.	Liisimakaqa	piniqelleghsi,	ugpeqelleghsi,	qepghaatilleghsi,	nuqetutilleghsillu.	Liisimakanka	tamaakut	wata	piiqasi	sivunghani	piiqelleghpesineng.
B27_02_Revelation_V20	Iwernga	ukunguut	tengvimun	ayuqegkanka	elpesinun:	Aghuliighnneghitaghsi	aghnaq	Jezebel	apeghtughilghii	ipangunghilngughneng.	Uuknaliqestenguniiquq	Kiyaghneghmun.	Iwernga	apeghtughilleghmikun	puughtaqii	yugenka	seghleghqesqelluki	sex-kun,	neghesqellukillu	neqet	aghqutkegkat	kiyaghnengllaqanun.
B27_02_Revelation_V21	Pilleghqalitkaqsaghaqa	avuteghqesqelluku,	iwernga	taaqsunghituq	allaniineghmeng.
B27_02_Revelation_V22	Ii-i!	Miluunnaqaqa	qavaghvigmun	tawani	ikfiqesqelluku.	Maligulluki	ellnganun	miluulleqanka	tamaakut	gelgaghniilgutangi	enkaam	ikfiqesteghllaglleqanka.	Tawaten	pillequnga	wetkuqun	avuteghkegkata	seghletun	pillghitneng.
B27_02_Revelation_V23	Tuqulleqankallu	avaqutii.	Enkaam	qamaglluteng	ugpeqat	yughaghvignilnguut	liilleqaatnga	whanganguuq	liisimakilghii	yugem	tamaghaghhmi	sumeghtaghallghitnengllu	ilumikegkiitnengllu.	Aghyuughyaghqaqamsi	tamaghaghpesi	seghleghqetulegpesistun.
B27_02_Revelation_V24	Iwernga	ilagpesi	Thyatira-mi,	maligtellghitasi	Jezebel-em	seghleghet	apeghtughillghi.	Liitellghitasillu	Tughneghaam	aksaqumtaaghllagi.	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	qelghataghaghnaanghitamsi,
B27_02_Revelation_V25	iwerngaqun	ugpequmanginaghteggu	apeghtullesi	kenlanga	uteghnillemnun.
B27_02_Revelation_V26	Ellnga	taana	kayaalqiilghii	kayaalqiilleghmeng,	atuqilghiillu	aneghneghqillemneng	kenlemun,	aghtughyaghqaanghillelilleqaqa	igleghutesqelluki	nation-et.
B27_02_Revelation_V27	Igleghutesqeluki	iron-meng	rod-elighluki	enkaam	kagimnnakangit	qikumeng	qulmesiitengllaqastun.
B27_02_Revelation_V28	Tuunelleqankallu	unaangum	ighaleqetaaghaneng.
B27_02_Revelation_V29	Sigutelgukufsi,	nagatekek	sameng	piiqutkek	Taghneghak	ugpeqanun!
B27_03_Revelation_V1	“Igaqigu	una	ungipaq	yaqulegmun	igleghutilghii	ugpeqaneng	qerngughutkayuget	yughaghvigani	Sardis-em.	Taana	Kiyaghneghem	maaghraghvinlek	taghneghaaneng	pilek	maaghragvinleklu	ighaleqetaalek,	piiq,	Liisimakamsi	saaqutsi.	Yuget	piiqiisi	unguvanilusi	iwernga	tuqungaasi.
B27_03_Revelation_V2	Taghtughlusi,	iknaqughsaghteggu	sangwaa	salin	elpesi	pizi	tuqunaqelghii.	Liitanka	ukavantut	sangwaat	piiqegkesi	Kiyaghneghma	pisqesullghaneng	elpesinun.
B27_03_Revelation_V3	Neqamikluki	apeghtuutkat	elpesinun,	nagaquqasillu.	Qaatkiteki,	avuteghqiteklu	seghleghqelleghpesineng.	Iwernga	taghtunghilkufsi,	takulleqamsi	teglegniightetun.	Nallukelleqaghsi	qakun	tagilleghqaqa	elpesinun.
B27_03_Revelation_V4	Paninang	qafsinggaagut	yuget	Sardis-mi	aatkateng	nukeggnaghqellghilkangit.	Igleghtelgusighlleqaatnga	aalluteng	qatelghiimeng	aatkameng	qayughllak	itagnalghiinguut.
B27_03_Revelation_V5	Kayaalqiilghii,	ellngistun	aallequq	qatelghiimeng	aatkameng.	Aatghallu	ghevesnaanghitaqa	Kenlengilnguum	Unguvallghem	Igaaneng.	Atamallu	yaqulganllu	sivungitni	whangamnun	piknilleqaqa.
B27_03_Revelation_V6	Sigutelgukufsi,	nagatekek	sameng	piiqutkek	Taghneghak	ugpeqanun!
B27_03_Revelation_V7	“Igaqigu	una	ungipaq	yaqulegmun	igleghutilghii	ugpeqaneng	qerngughutkayuget	yughaghvigani	Philadelphia-m.	Una	ungipaq	Agleghnalghiimeng,	Ipapigmeng	pinguuq.	Ellnganituq	David-em	key-nga.	Qelpeghtekumigu	amik,	kitum	alngunak	umegnaanghitaa.	Uumkumigullu	amik,	kitum	alngunak	qelpeghhnaanghitaa.
B27_03_Revelation_V8	Liisimakamsi	saaqutsi,	liisimakamsillu	kayaatusi.	Naqamllu	qaatkasi	apeghtuusanka,	mesighiigatusillu	whangamnun	maligsaaghteknilusi.	Ii-i,	qelpeghusimaamsi	amigmeng;	kitum	alngunak	umegyaghqaqenghilkanganeng.
B27_03_Revelation_V9	Ii-i!	Tamaakut	qerngughullghiit	Tughneghaam	synagogue-ngani,	Jews-nguniiqut.	Iwernga	iqlengiqestenguut;	Jews-ngunghitut.	Elpesinun	pisluki	qungughtesnaqanka	sivugpesigun.	Taagken	liilleqaat	piniqegkemsi.
B27_03_Revelation_V10	Qelqaqamsi	nuqetesqellusi.	Qaatkegkaqutegpesineng	qelghilqa	paqniighsaghlleqamsi	seghleliilleghneng	kaannaqelghiineng	nunataghhanun	tamaghhaanun.	Tamaakut	seghleliillghet	nanghiiqulleqiit	qamaglluki	yuget	kiyaghlleghhiit	nunami.
B27_03_Revelation_V11	Tagiyaghtughtunga.	Ayepsugillusi	ugpequmanginaghtengnga	kitumun	alngunak	wayanghitesqelluki	qaghpasi.
B27_03_Revelation_V12	Kayaalqiilghii	aghveghaqetaaghtesleqaqa	Kiyaghneghma	Temple-ngani,	allamengllu	aanaanghituq.	Enkaam	ellngakun	igaqelleqaqa	aatgha	Kiyaghneghma,	aatghallu	Kiyaghneghma	neghllagan,	Jerusalem-eghraghaq,	ukilghii	qilagmeng	Kiyaghnemneng.	Ellngakunllu	igaqelleqaqa	ateghraghaqa.
B27_03_Revelation_V13	Sigutelgukufsi	nagatekek	sameng	piiqutkek	Taghneghak	ugpeqanun!
B27_03_Revelation_V14	“Igaqigu	una	ungipaq	yaqulegmun	igleghutilghii	ugpeqaneng	qerngughutkayuget	yughaghvigani	Laodicea-m.	Una	ungipaq	Amen-meng	pinguuq.	Ataasiighmelnguuguq,	ipapighqengngalghiinguuq	liisimakista.	Ellngakun	Kiyaghneghem	ulimakaqaa	sangwaa	qamaglluku.
B27_03_Revelation_V15	Liisimakamsi	saaqutsi:	isekinanghitusi,	nalighmeng	uguqnanghitusi.	Isekinalghiisituq	nalighmeng	uguqnalghiisituq!
B27_03_Revelation_V16	Enkaam	maqaghraaggaategpesineng,	isekinanghilnguusi	nalighmeng	uguqnanghilnguusi,	qesiinnaqamsi	qanemneng!
B27_03_Revelation_V17	Piiqusi	aklunginnilusi,	allgeghuteghllagaqnilusi,	aklungigannilusillu.	Iwernga	nallukusi	seghleghwaaghuusi,	nangllegnaghtusi,	aklumaasi,	ayaangaasi,	amsikaghmetusillu.
B27_03_Revelation_V18	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	ungipaatamsi	aklungighisqellusi	gold-tengyaghtughtek	whangamnun	qigeghtengngwaaqameng	keneghqun.	Tukfighiteklu	whangamneng	qatelghiineng	aatkaneng	saapesqelluki	kayngunalghiit	amsikaghmetellesi.	Tukfighiteklu	whangamneng	aghakaghqameng	iyegpesinun	esghaasagutesqellusi.
B27_03_Revelation_V19	Tamaakut	piniqegkanka	nallghusaghaqanka,	aghyuughaqankallu.	Enkaam	sagiqneghughtek,	avuteghqellusi	seghleghqennanightek.
B27_03_Revelation_V20	Ii-i!	Nekevlunga	amigmi	tenglugtughtunga.	Kitum	alngunak	nagaququmigu	meka,	amigmeng	qelpeghusimakanganga	iteghllequnga	ellnganun.	Enkaam	neghelgusighlleqaqa,	ellnganllu	neghelgusighlleqaanga.
B27_03_Revelation_V21	Kayaalqiilunga	enkaam	aqumgaanga	saaghwani	Atama	umiilgusiikun	aqumutagkenkun.	Tawateghpigaq	kayaalqiilghii	aqumesleqaqa	saamkun	umiilgusignekun	aqumutamkun.
B27_03_Revelation_V22	Sigutelgukufsi,	nagatekek	Taghneghak	sameng	piiqutkek	ugpeqanun!”
B27_04_Revelation_V1	Taagken	tamaakut	kingungitneng	taawa	esghaghaqa	qilagmi	amik	qelpalnguq!	Ma	nagatkaqa	qalghightaatetun	ayuqelghii,	whaten	piiq,	“Mayaa	whavek.	Elpenun	esghaghtesnaqanka	sangwaat	piyaghqat.”
B27_04_Revelation_V2	Tawaninginaq	Taghneghagnitunga.	Taawa	qilagmi	esgaghagka	umiilgusik	aqumutak,	kina	aqumgaftuq.
B27_04_Revelation_V3	Aqumgalghii	umiilgusigni	esghaqaaluni	iqeghtagketun	jasper-enkuk	carnelian-enkuk	ayuquq.	Uvitangani	umiilgusim	taawa	agluk	iqeghtakek	emerald-etun	ayuqlutek.
B27_04_Revelation_V4	Uvitangani	umiilgusim	aqumutaghllagem	taawa	yuginaq	estamat	siipneqluki	umiilgusit	aqumutalghutet.	Taakutgun	aqumgatngaftut	yuginaq	estamat	siipneqluki	elder-et	qatelghiimeng	atkuyaaghulluteng,	gold-mengllu	qaghpaluteng.
B27_04_Revelation_V5	Umiilgusim	aqumutaghllagegkeneng	kallugem	nighwaagpagtii,	leveklugtii,	tengngaagtiillu	piit.	Sivugkeni	umiilgusim	aqumutaghllagem	taawa	maaghraghvinlek	torch-et	kumangalghiit,	taakut	maaghraghvinleguftut	taghneghii	Kiyaghneghem.
B27_04_Revelation_V6	Umiilgusim	aqumutaghllagem	sivugkeni	taawa	kelliisugnilnguq	qergesa,	meghraakeghtaq	crystal-estun.	Umiilgusim	aqumutaghllagem	uvitangani,	tamaghhiitni	sanigkeni,	taawa	estamat	Unguvalghiit,	iyeghllaguftut	saaymegteggunllu	aqsagemegteggunllu.
B27_04_Revelation_V7	Sivuliq	Unguvalghii	lion-esugniteftuq,	tuunglighhaa	Unguvalghii	ox-esugniteftuq,	pingayaat	sangwaa	Unguvalghii	gginalguftuq	yugem	gginaaneng,	enkaam	estamiitangat	Unguvalghii	tengaakayugtun	qawaagpagtun	ayuqeftuq.
B27_04_Revelation_V8	Enkaam	estamat	Unguvalghiit	tamaghhaghmeng	aghvinlegneng	yaqulgututeftut,	elngaatall	yugusiit	iyeghllaguftut	talwa	qamavek	yaqghwita	asingitnun.	Aghneghtuuman	unugtuumaan	taaqigalnguut	ilaganeghmeng,	“Agleghnalghii,	agleghnalghii,	agleghnalghii,	Atanghuuq	Kiyaghneq,	Aghtughyaghqaghhaanghiteghllak,	ellnganguuq	maaten,	ellnganguuq	sivunghani,	ellnganguuq	tagiyaghqaq!”
B27_04_Revelation_V9	Taakut	estamat	Unguvalghiit	ilagaghtut	ilagaatngitneng	usuqillghem,	quulvaghillghem,	iyamsiqayullghem	aqumgalghiimun	umiilgusigni	aqumutaghllagegni,	kiyaghlleghhiimun	quunperugllak	kenlengunaan.	Tawaten	pinghata
B27_04_Revelation_V10	yuginaq	estamat	siipneqluki	elder-et	niinghutaqut	sivungakun	aqumgalghiim	umiilgusim	aqumutaghllagegkenun,	manigughaqaat	kiyaghlleghhii	quunperugllak	kenlengunaan.	Taakut	elder-et	qaghpateng	mataghlluki	lliiqiit	sivungakun	umiilgusim	aqumutaghllagegkenka,	enkaam	ilagaghaqut,
B27_04_Revelation_V11	“Whangkuta	Ataneghput	Kiyaghneghput!	Elpek	tugupestaaghyaghqaqaten	usuqelleghllaget,	quulvalleghllaget,	iyamsiqayulleghllaget	aghtughyaghqaanghilleghpenun.	Ulimakaqutegpeneng	sangwaa	qamagtengngwaaghluku,	piyukelleghpetun	kiyaghllequt	enkaam	allgeghullequtlu	unguvalleghmeng.”
B27_05_Revelation_V1	Taagken	esghaghanka	iimgat	igat	aghenqigneghan	iigganilluki	aqumgalghiim	umiilgusim	aqumutagkeni.	Taakut	iimgat	igat	igaghvikegkaaftut	inglugtun,	umegluteng	maaghraghvinlek	seal-eneng.
B27_05_Revelation_V2	Taagken	esghaghaqa	aghtughyaghqaanghilnguq	yaqulek.	Iglagtuluni	aaptilghii,	“Kina	itagnaghyaghqaawa	ikughyaghqaaluki	maaghraghvinlek	seal-ellghet	qelpeghsaghqaaluki	iimgat	igat?”
B27_05_Revelation_V3	Taawa	avangituq	kitumeng	alngunak	qilagmi,	nalighmeng	nunami,	nalighmeng	nunam	asingani	itagnalghii	qelpeghsaghqaaluki	iimgat	igat,	esghaghyaghqaalukillu	ilungit.
B27_05_Revelation_V4	Enkaam	qiyaaghwaghllagtunga	qayughllak	naalkenghilkangat	kina	alngunak	itagnalghii	qelpeghsaghqaaluki	iimgat	igat,	esghaghyaghqaalukillu	ilungit.
B27_05_Revelation_V5	Taagken	ataasim	elder-eneng	piinga,	“Qiyagpenang!	Ii-i,	lion-a.	Judah-m	ramkenganeng	pinguuq,	David-emllu	kingunqaa.	Kayaalqiistenguuq	enkaam	ellnga	itagnaghtuq	ikughyaghqaaluki	maaghraghvinlek	seal-ellghet	qelpeghsaghqaaluki	iimgat	igat.”
B27_05_Revelation_V6	Taagken	esghaghaqa	Penniighaghaq	nekevghalghii	saaghwani	umiilgusim	aqumutam.	Qukiitniteftuq	estamat	unguvalghiit,	elder-etlu.	Penniighaghaq	esghaqaaluni	nikimqun	tuqutkaq.	Maaghraghvinlegneng	sighunelguftuq,	maaghraghvinlegnengllu	iyelguftuq.	Taakut	iyet	maaghraghvinlek	taghneghaqii	Kiyaghneghem,	kayagtekii	tamaghhaanun	nunam.
B27_05_Revelation_V7	Penniighaghaam	takuluku	umiillgusigni	aqumutagni	aqumgalghii,	aghenqigneghan	iigganeng	tuwii	iimgat	igat.
B27_05_Revelation_V8	Tuguyaki	iimgat	igat,	taakut	estamat	unguvalghiit,	yuginaqlu	estamat	siipneqluku	elder-et	sekequutut	nunamun	sivungakun	Penniighaghaam.	Tamaghaghmeng	tugumiiqluteng	harp-meng,	gold-mengllu	sagneghhaghneng	esleqngalghiit	incense-meng.	Incense-et	yughaqiit	Kiyaghneghem	yugita.
B27_05_Revelation_V9	Ilagaghtut	nutaghameng	ilagaatmeng	whaten:	“Itagnaghtuten	tuguyaghqaaluki	iimgat	igat,	ikughyaghqaalukillu	seal-ngit.	Tuqutkaalghiiten,	aawpenengllu	tukfiqaqaten	yuget	Kiyaghneghmun.	Ellngit	tamaghhiitneng	pinguut	ramkeneng,	uluneng,	yugneng,	nunataanengllu.
B27_05_Revelation_V10	Enkaam	Ataneghpagullghanitestaten,	priest-ngughtestatenllu	Kiyaghnemnnun,	umiilgestunllu	igleghutillequt	nunami.”
B27_05_Revelation_V11	Esghapagumalunga	nagaqughanka	mengit	yaqulelghuteghllaget.	Uglaapiglleghhiit	kestepagningilnguut.	Nekevghatnguftut	uvitangani	umiilgusim	aqumutam,	estamatlu	unguvalghiit,	elder-etlu.
B27_05_Revelation_V12	Iglagtuluteng	piiqut,	“Penniighaghaq	tuqutkaq,	itagnaghtuq	allgeghsaghqaaluku	aghtughyaghqaanghilleq,	aklungi,	peghqinelleq,	iknaqelleq,	quulvalleq,	nighughqelleq,	usuqelleqlu!”
B27_05_Revelation_V13	Taagken	nagaqughanka	tamaghhaghmeng	ulimaaghet,	qilagmelnguut,	nunamelnguut,	nunam	asinganilnguut,	kelliinilnguutlu.	Qamaglluteng	pilghiit	aqumgalghiimunllu	umiilgusigni	aqumutagni,	Penniighaghaghmunllu,	“Usuqillengitek,	quulvallengitek,	nighughqellengitek,	aghtughyaghqaanghillelguteklu	quunperugllak	kenlengunaan!”
B27_05_Revelation_V14	Taagken	estamat	unguvalghiit	piit,	“Amen,”	elder-etlu	sekequulluteng	nunamnun,	manigughagket	Kiyaghneghenkuk,	Penniighaghaankuk.
B27_06_Revelation_V1	Taagken	esghapagaqa	Penniighaghaam	qelpeghtekanga	sivuliq	seal-elleq	taakuneng	maaghraghvinlegneng	seal-elleghneng.	Tawanteftut	estamat	Unguvalghiit,	nagaqughaqa	ataasiq	pilghii,	“Tagi!”	Menga	kallugestun	tengngaalghii.
B27_06_Revelation_V2	Taagken	esghaghaqa	qatelghii	kuuni.	Igleghutistenga	ughluvelguftuq,	qaghpalitaatlu.	Ellnganguuq	kayaalqiikaq	anguyagmineng,	enkaam	aanuq	kayaalqiimanginaghnaluni.
B27_06_Revelation_V3	Penniighaghaam	qelpeghsaqminigu	tuunglighhaa	seal-ellghem,	nagaqughaqa	tuunglighhaa	Unguvalghii	pilghii,	“Tagi!”
B27_06_Revelation_V4	Ilanga	kuunim	aanuq,	kavilnguuftuq.	Igleghutistenga	pilleghqalitaat	yuget	nekeggmetunnaniitesqelluki	tuququutesqelluki.	Tuunegkaatlu	savigpagrugllagmeng.
B27_06_Revelation_V5	Taagken	Penniighaghaam	qelpeghsaqminigu	pingayiitanga	seal-ellghem,	nagaqughaqa	pingayiitangat	Unguvalghii	pilghii,	“Tagi!”	Esghaghaqa	tagnelghii	kuuni.	Igleghutistenga	aapqaasilguftuq	iiggmini.
B27_06_Revelation_V6	Nagaqughaqa	mestun	ayuqesugnilnguq	akulngitni	estamat	Unguvalghiit	pilghii,	“Quart-em	imaa	wheat-a	akikaa	ataasim	denarius-em.	Pingayut	quart-em	imii	barley-t	akikii	ataasim	denarius-em.	Iwernga	naafqegpenakek	olive-em	mesiigha,	wine-allu.”
B27_06_Revelation_V7	Taagken	Penniighaghaam	qelpeghsaqminigu	estamiitanga	seal-ellghem,	nagaqughaqa	estamiitangat	Unguvalghiit	pilghii,	“Tagi!”
B27_06_Revelation_V8	Esghaghaqa	aghsaallaak	kuuni.	Igleghutistengan	aatqeftaa	Tuqulleq,	Hades-em	maligtaa.	Pilleghqalitkaaftuk	tuquqiisqelluki	estamaghqellghan	nunam	yugi	savigpagkun,	paneghaatelleghqun,	aqnighneghqun,	ugwighsalghiitgunllu	teghikusiitgun	nunam.
B27_06_Revelation_V9	Taagken	Penniighaghaam	qelpeghsaqminigu	tallimiitanga	seal-ellghem,	esghaghanka	asinganilluki	aghqefigem	unguvasiit	tuququqat.	Tuqutkaqegkangit	qayughllak	ugpeqegkaqegkangit	Kiyaghneghem	akuzitangi,	ungipaqumanginaqiitlu.
B27_06_Revelation_V10	Akilghuughllagtut,	“Kaay	Aghtughyaghqaghhaanghiteghllak	Ataneq,	agleghnaghtutenllu,	ipapiguutenllu!	Tamaakut	nunam	yugi	tuququqat	whangkunneng,	naten	tagkaan	utaqiinnaqsiki	nanqigsaghqaalukillu	aghyuughyaghqaalukillu?”
B27_06_Revelation_V11	Taagken	ataasikaghtiita	unguvasiit	tuqutkat	qatelghiimeng	atkuyaalitkiit,	meghnaaliightesqegkiitlu.	Tawaten	piyaghqaagut	qayughllak	ilangi	ugpeqaalgutngit,	Christ-amllu	qepghaghtengi	tuqusaghqaagut	ellngita	tuqutellghistun.	Enkaam	meghnaalinaqut	kenlanga	uglaghtalngit	naamigtekata	tamaakut	tuqusaghqat.
B27_06_Revelation_V12	Esghapagaqa	Penniighaghaam	qelpeghsaqminigu	aghvinliitanga	seal-ellghem	nuna	ufsuguteghllagtuq.	Siqineq	tagneghtaa	suvinalghiitun	qiipaghaghtun	ulimakatun	goat-em	melqwaneng.	Tanqiqllu	esleqngalghii	aawestun	lliightuq.
B27_06_Revelation_V13	Ighaleqetaaghet	qilagameng	ifkaquutut	nunamun	katam	tawaten	qigumangilnguut	figs-et	ifkaquullghiit	uqfigmeng	anuqeghllagem	ufsugutellghatun.
B27_06_Revelation_V14	Qilaga	aviighutuq	iimgat	igat	imellghistun,	qamaglluteng	naayghatlu	qiighqatlu	nuughquutut	nemeggneng.
B27_06_Revelation_V15	Taagken	nunam	umiilgi,	igleghutistengi,	pilluwaghtet	umiilgit,	aklungilnguut,	qiilngumightikayuget,	tamaghhaghmeng	qepghaghtelaaghet,	qepghaghtelaaghunghilnguutlu	iightuutut	qayeni,	akulngitnillu	uyghaget	naayghani.
B27_06_Revelation_V16	Naayghanunllu	uyghagnunllu	akilghuugut,	“Ulleghvikikut	iighesqelluta	gginaaneng	aqumgalghiim	aqumutagkeni	umiilgusim,	sakraalleghllaganengllu	Penniighaghaam!
B27_06_Revelation_V17	Kaatuq	Aghneq	aghyuughilleghqaghllagak	whangkunnun	enkaam	kitumngam	anaglleqagu!”
B27_07_Revelation_V1	Tamaakut	kingungitneng	esghaghanka	estamat	yaqulget	nekevghallghiit	estamani	kangighiitni	nunam.	Yaqulget	nuqneqeftiit	estamat	anuqet	anuqlinghitesqelluku	nunami	nalighmeng	kelliini	nalighmeng	alngunak	uqfigni.
B27_07_Revelation_V2	Taagken	esghaghaqa	ilanga	yaqulek	mayulghii	asivaghmeng	tugumiilek	nalluniighutanganeng	unguvalghiim	Kiyaghneghem.	Yaqulgem	akilghuugii	estamat	yaqulget	Kiyaghneghem	tuunegkii	aghtughyaghqaanghilleghmeng	naafqesqelluku	nuna,	kelliillu.
B27_07_Revelation_V3	Yaqulgem	pii,	“Naafqegpenaan	nuna	nalighmeng	kellii	nalighmeng	uqfiget!	Utaqiitek	kenlanga	seal-ellemnnun	qawiitgun	qepghaghtengi	Kiyaghnemta.”
B27_07_Revelation_V4	Taagken	nagaqughanka	qafsingutangi	yuget	seal-elaghtuqiit	qawiitgun.	Yuget	uglaghtalangit	144,000-nguftut	tamaghhiitneng	ramkenganeng	Israel-em.
B27_07_Revelation_V5	Judah-m	ramkenganeng	12,000-nguftut,	Reuben-em	ramkenganeng	12,000-nguftut,	Gad-em	ramkenganeng	12,000-nguftut,
B27_07_Revelation_V6	Asher-em	ramkenganeng	12,000-nguftut,	Naphtali-m	ramkenganeng	12,000-nguftut,	Manasseh-m	ramkenganeng	12,000-nguftut,
B27_07_Revelation_V7	Simeon-em	ramkenganeng,	12,000-nguftut,	Levi-em	ramkenganeng,	12,000-nguftut,	Issachar-em	ramkenganeng,	12,000-nguftut,
B27_07_Revelation_V8	Zebulun-em	ramkenganeng,	12,000-nguftut,	Joseph-em	ramkenganeng,	12,000-nguftut,	Benjamin-em	ramkenganeng,	12,000-nguftut.
B27_07_Revelation_V9	Taam	kingunganeng	esghaghanka	uglapestaaghllaget	yulghuteghllaget	kitum	alngunak	kestepagningilkangi!	Tamaghhiitneng	pinguftut	nunataaneng,	ramkeneng,	yugneng,	ulunengllu.	Nekevghatnguftut	umiilgusim	aqumutam,	Penniighaghaamllu	sivugkenkun.	Qiipaghaalluteng	qatelghiineng,	tugumiighlutengllu	palm-em	uqfigan	avayiitneng.
B27_07_Revelation_V10	Akilghuuteghllagtut,	“Yugulilleq	Kiyaghnemta	pikaa	umiilgusigni	aqumutagni	aqumgalghii,	Penniighaghaamllu!”
B27_07_Revelation_V11	Qamaglluteng	yaqulget	nekevuutut	uvitangitni	umiilgusim	aqumutam,	elder-etlu,	estamatlu	unguvalghiit.	Taagken	sekequutut	nunamun	sivungakun	umiilgusim	aqumutam,	manigughaat	Kiyaghneq.
B27_07_Revelation_V12	Piit,	“Amen!	Kiyaghneghput	tamaghhaghmi	usuqligu,	nighughqelligu,	iyamsiqayugvikligu,	quulvaghligu	qayughllak	ellnganguuq	peghqinellelek,	aghtughyaghqaanghillelek,	iknaqelleleklu.	Ellnga	tawatetuq	quunperugllak	kenlengunaan!	Amen!”
B27_07_Revelation_V13	Taagken	ataasim	elder-eneng	aaptaanga,	“Kinkungaawat	qatelghiimeng	qiipaghaghngalghiit,	nakenllu	pingwaat?”
B27_07_Revelation_V14	Kiimsighaqa,	“Yuguniiq,	elpek	liisimakaten.”	Elder-em	piinga,	“Taakunguut	suflughutkat	seghleliighrukutaaghllagmeng.	Penniighaghaam	aawakun	aghvigluki	qiipaghateng,	qateghtestekaqiit.
B27_07_Revelation_V15	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	nekevghatnguut	sivugkeni	Kiyaghneghem	umiilgusiin	aqumutagkeni.	Manigughaqaat	aghneghtuumaan	unugtuumaan	Temple-ngani.	Aqumgalghiim	umiilgusigni	aqumutagni	azigutighlleqii	nayuutngalleghmineng.
B27_07_Revelation_V16	Iyatiqnanighllequt,	nalighmeng	meqsugyugnanighllequt.	Siqinghem	nalighmeng	alngunak	uguqnaghllalghiim	ugunnaanghitii.
B27_07_Revelation_V17	Penniighaghaq	umiilgusim	aqumutam	saaghwanilnguq	penniighniightekelleqaat.	Maghyaghqughlleqii	sengngulghiinun	meghnun	unguvallelitikayugnun,	Kiyaghneghemllu	quningightughlleqii.”
B27_08_Revelation_V1	Penniighaghaam	qelpeghtaqngamigu	maaghraghvinliitanga	seal-ellghem,	qilagmi	qallegnanighwaaghutut	entaqun	aflum	avellghatun	tagkaan.
B27_08_Revelation_V2	Taagken	esghaghanka	taakut	maaghraghvinlek	yaqulget	nekevghalghiit	Kiyaghneghem	sivungakun.	Tamaghhaghmeng	qalghightaatenguutut.
B27_08_Revelation_V3	Taagken	ilanga	yaqulek,	tugumiilek	gold-meng	sagneghmeng,	tagiluni	nekevuq	aghqefigegni.	Tuunegkaat	incense-elghutmeng	ilatesqelluki	qamaglluki	yughiitnun	Kiyaghneghem	yugan.	Yaqulgem	llii	gold-egnun	aghqefigegnun	sivunganilnguuk	umiilgusim	aqumutam.
B27_08_Revelation_V4	Incense-em	agepsaa	mayughtuq	maligulluni	yughallghitgun	Kiyaghneghem	yugita.	Mayughtut	Kiyaghneghmun	sagneghmeng	yaqulgem	tugumiighaneng.
B27_08_Revelation_V5	Taagken	yaqulgem,	tuguluku	sagneq,	imighaa	kenghaneng	aghqefigem.	Sagneghem	imii	miluutii	nunamun.	Enkaam	kallugughteghllagtuq,	kavlegtaghllagtuq,	nighwaaghpagtaghllagtuq,	nunallu	ufsuguteghllagtuq.
B27_08_Revelation_V6	Taagken	maaghraghvinlek	yaqulget,	qalghightaatelget	yataaghqut	qalghightinaluteng.
B27_08_Revelation_V7	Sivuliim	yaqulgem	qalghightaatni	qalghightaa.	Taagken	kaftekragenkuk,	kenghenkuk	akumlutek	aawmeng	nunamun	miluutagket.	Enkaam	pingayughqellgha	nunam	paneghtuq,	pingayughqellghitlu	uqfiget	paneghtut,	qamagllutengllu	sungaghyulghiit	vegaaghet	paneghtut.
B27_08_Revelation_V8	Tuunglighhaan	yaqulgem	qalghightaatni	qalghightaa.	Taagken	sangwaa	naayghaghllagsugnilnguq	kumaghugngalghii,	miluutaat	kelliinun.	Enkaam	pingayughqellgha	kelliim	aawgughtuq.
B27_08_Revelation_V9	Pingayughqellghit	kelliinilnguut	unguvalghiit	tuquut,	pingayughqellghitlu	angyaghpaget	naafqengngwaaghii.
B27_08_Revelation_V10	Pingayiitangita	yaqulgem	qalghightaatni	qalghightaa.	Taagken	ighaleqetaaghllak,	kumaghughngalghii	torch-etun,	qilagameng	ifkaghtuq	pingayughqellghitgun	kiiwetlu	sengngulghiitlu	meghet.
B27_08_Revelation_V11	Aatgha	ighaleqetaaghem	“Sungaghni”.	Pingayughqellgha	meghem	sungaghnightekaq	enkaam	yulghuteghllaget	meghluteng	tuqukat	qayughllak	meq	sungaghnightekaalghii.
B27_08_Revelation_V12	Estamiitangita	yaqulgem	qalghightaatni	qalghightaa.	Taagken	saam	tenpii	siqineq,	tanqiq,	ighaleqataaghetlu,	enkaam	pingayughqellghi	mamlegtii.	Pingayughqellgha	aghneghem	mamlegtaa,	pingayughqellghallu	unugem.
B27_08_Revelation_V13	Esghaghaqallu	nagaqughaqallu	qawaagpak	tengaalghii	quulvani,	iglagtuluni	pilghii,	“Seghleghwaaghunaqnguuq!	Seghleghwaaghunaqnguuq!	Seghleghwaaghunaqnguuq!	Kinguliit	pingayut	yaqulget	qalghighhnaqegkumegteki	qalghightaateteng,	taagken	elngaatall	seghlepestaaghunaqnguuq	yugnun	nunami	kiyaghlleghhiit	tamaani	pilleghni!”
B27_09_Revelation_V1	Taagken	tallimiitangita	yaqulgem	qalghightaatni	qalghightaa.	Esghaghaqa	ighaleqetaaq	ifkaqaq	qilagameng	nunamun,	key-litkaaftuqlu	qelpeghtesqelluku	asilighneghilnguq	laawaaq.
B27_09_Revelation_V2	Ighaleqetaaghem	qelpeghtaa	asilighneghilnguq	laawaaq.	Tesamaken	agepsuq	aanuq	katam	agepsaatun	egllughllagem	repall	siqineqlu	qilagallu	mamlegtaa	agepsum.
B27_09_Revelation_V3	Taagken	agepsumeng	aanleghaatut	locust-elghutet,	nunamunllu	ukigtuutut.	Kaapigaqleghutekat	yugneng,	katam	scorpion-et	kaapiiqellghistun.
B27_09_Revelation_V4	Ungipaatkaalghiit	locust-et	naafqefqiita	vegaaghet	pisqelluki	nalighmeng	sungaghyuget	nunivagseghat	nalighmeng	alngunak	uqfiget.	Aqnightesqegkiillu	tamaakunginaat	yuget	Kiyaghneghem	nalluniillghilkangi	qawiitgun.
B27_09_Revelation_V5	Locust-enun	tuququghtesnaniqii	tamaakut	yuget,	taawanginaq	ikfiqesteghllagestesqegkii	tallimanun	tanqinun.	Scorpion-et	kaapellghistun	yuget	ikfiqeghllakat.
B27_09_Revelation_V6	Taakuni	tallimani	tanqini	tamaakut	yuget	tuquyupigllequt,	iwernga	tuqupagningillequt.	Yuget	tuqunaqeghllagllequt,	iwernga	tuqunaanghitut.
B27_09_Revelation_V7	Locust-et	esghaqaaluteng	kuunistun	ayuqut	pilluwamun	yataaghqegkat.	Naasqwitniteftut	llangaqa	gold-et	qaghpat,	gginiitlu	yuget	gginiistun	ayuqluteng.
B27_09_Revelation_V8	Nuyiit	aghnat	nuyiistun	ayuqluteng,	gguutngitlu	lion-et	gguutngistun	ayuqluteng.
B27_09_Revelation_V9	Yugusimegteggun	qaltelguftut	esghaqaaluteng	savikenghaaghet	sakimagiitat.	Yaqwghitallu	sulugtallghit	llangaqa	chariot-et	kuunituqat	sukeralghiit	pilluwamun.
B27_09_Revelation_V10	Papelguftut	scorpion-estun	kaapikayugmeng.	Enkaam	tallimanun	tanqinun	yuget	ikfiqesteghllagiit	papegmeggneng	kapughluki.
B27_09_Revelation_V11	Umiilelguftut	igleghutilghii	ellngitneng,	yaqulguftuq	esghaamakistenga	asilighneghilnguum	laawaaghem.	Hebrew-stun	aatgha	Abaddon,	Greek-estun	Apollyon,	(whaten	pisiq,	“Naafqiista”).
B27_09_Revelation_V12	Sivuliq	seghlepestaaghllak	alpagtuq,	taam	kingunganeng	paninang	maalghuk	seghlepestaaghllagek	piyaghqaaguk.
B27_09_Revelation_V13	Taagken	aghvinliitangita	yaqulgem	qalghightaatni	qalghightaa.	Nagaqughaqa	ma	gold-egneng	aghqefigegneng	estamaneng	sighunelgegneng	tekerqamegnekun	Kiyaghneghem	sivunganilnguuk.
B27_09_Revelation_V14	Taam	mem	aleghqughaa	aghvinliitangat	yaqulget	qalghightaatelek.	Pikaa,	“Itemutiki	estamat	yaqulget	asighqengngalghiit	kiigwllagegni	Euphrates-egni!”
B27_09_Revelation_V15	Enkaam	estamat	yaqulget	itemutkii.	Yataaghqegkaaftut	taamun	aflumun,	aghneghmun,	tanqimun,	ayumiqulleghmunllu	tuquqiisqelluki	pingayughqellghi	yuget.
B27_09_Revelation_V16	Ungipaataanga	uglaghtalangitneng	kuunitgun	igleghlleghhiit	pilluwaghtet,	200	million-nguftut.
B27_09_Revelation_V17	Esghaghwaallemkun	esghaghanka	kuunit,	igleghutistengitlu.	Sakimagiitiit	kenghestun	kaviteftut,	sapphire-estun	sungaghyukegteftut,	sulphur-estun,	yellow-nguftut.	Kuunit	naasqwit	lion-et	naasqwistun	ayuqeftut,	qaanghitneng	aanut	keneq,	agepsuq,	sulphur-a.
B27_09_Revelation_V18	Taakutgun	pingayutgun	naafqiilleghllagteggun	tuququghiit	pingayughqellghi	yuget.	Kuunit	qaanghitneng	aanleghaatut	keneq,	agepesuq,	sulphur-a.
B27_09_Revelation_V19	Kuunit	aghtughyaghqaanghillelguut	qaanghitnillu	paapgitnillu.	Paapgit	nemeghyastun	ayuqelghiit	naasqulget	kiitiqusiit	yugnun.
B27_09_Revelation_V20	Ilangi	tamaakut	yuget	tuqutellghilkangit	tamaakut	naafqiilleghllaget,	avuteghqumangilnguut	pegsugumangilkangit	kiyaghnengllaqateng.	Manigughnaniimangitiit	tughneghaat,	kiyaghnengllaqatlu	ulimaaghet	gold-meng,	silver-meng,	siilumeng,	uyghagmeng,	unaghsimengllu.	Tamaakut	esghaasaghqaanghilnguut,	nagaquusaghqaanghilnguut,	nalighmeng	piyugyaghqaanghilnguut.
B27_09_Revelation_V21	Talwa	avuteghqutkumangilkangit	yugtalleteng,	alignaghtaalleteng,	nengughtegpenateng	atuqutelleghteng,	nalighmeng	teglegniilleteng.
B27_10_Revelation_V1	Taagken	esghaghaqa	ilanga	aghtiigateghllak	yaqulek	ukilghii	qilagmeng.	Pilugugngaftuq	qilagwaaghmeng,	naasqwan	qulangani	agluk,	gginaa	siqineghtun	kuukgulluni,	ighukeklu	kumaghulghiistun	pillar-estun	ayuqlutek.
B27_10_Revelation_V2	Tugumiiqeftii	iimgat	igaghhaat	qelpalnguut.	Aghenqigneghet	itegani	tuutestii	kelliim	meghan	qaayngakun,	saghumigneghetlu	itegani	tuutestii	quutkun.
B27_10_Revelation_V3	Iglagtupiglluni	akilghuuguq	lion-em	uwighhniillghatun.	Akilghuughllagyan	maaraghvinlegyaget	kalluget	tengngaagtaghtut.
B27_10_Revelation_V4	Maaghraghvinlegyaget	kalluget	tengngaagtaghyata	igaqnaqsaghanka	sameng	pillghit.	Iwernga	nagaqughaqa	ma	qilagmeng	pilghii,	“Aksaqiki	maaghraghvinlegyaget	kalluget	sameng	pillghit,	igaqegpenaki!”
B27_10_Revelation_V5	Taagken	esghaghaqa	yaqulek	nekevghalghii	kelliikunllu	quutkunllu.	Qilagmun	nengugutii	aghenqigneghet	iiggeni,
B27_10_Revelation_V6	akeqiiq	Kiyaghneghem	aatghakun	kiyaghlleghhii	quunperugllak	kenlengunaan.	Ellngangulghii	ulimaghikaq	qilagameng,	nunameng,	kelliineng,	samengllu	tamaghhaaneng	taakunilngughneng.	Yaqulek	piiq,	“Pilleghqaq	kaatuq.
B27_10_Revelation_V7	Iwernga	maaghraghvinliitangita	yaqulgem	qalghighhnaqegkumigu	qalghightaatni,	taawa	Kiyaghneghem	apeghiighlleqaa	uspeqilleni	qayvighsimangilkenni	sivunghani.	Uspeqillgha	ataasiiguq	aapqaa	qepghaghteminun	uuknaliqistenun.”
B27_10_Revelation_V8	Taagken	nagaquqama	mem	qilagmeng	aleghqughlaataghaanga,	“Aglaghluten	tuguki	qelpalnguut	iimgat	igat	iigganilnguut	yaqulgem	nekevghalghiim	kelliikunllu	quutkunllu.”
B27_10_Revelation_V9	Yaqulegmun	aglaghlunga	tungsighanka	imegngalghiit	igaghhaat.	Piinga,	“Tuguluki	neghiki;	aqsaqughpeni	qugaagllequt	iwernga	qaneghpeni	muugallequt	honey-stun.”
B27_10_Revelation_V10	Yaqulgem	iigganeng	tuguluki	iimgat	igaghhaat	neghanka,	imani	qanemni	muugatut	honey-stun.	Iwernga	tuufsaqenka	aqsaquqa	quwaagtaa.
B27_10_Revelation_V11	Taagken	piitnga,	“Allameng	uuknaliqutkepestaaghyaghqaqaten	yulghutet,	nunatalghutet,	alaaghhiinaat	ululghutet,	umiilelghutetlu.”
B27_11_Revelation_V1	Taagken	kitum	ayaviilitaanga	usputaasiqesqelluku.	Enkaam	kayagtaanga,	“Usputaghyaghtughhu	Kiyaghneghem	Temple-nga,	aghqefigeklu,	kesnaketenllu	yuget	maniguullghiit	tawani.
B27_11_Revelation_V2	Iwernga	usputaghpenaan	Kiyaghneghem	Temple-ngan	court-nga	eslataanilnguq,	qayughllak	tuunegkaaguq	Gentile-enun.	Tutmaasghaqnaqngwaat	Agleghnalghii	Neghllak	forty	two-ghyagni	tanqini.
B27_11_Revelation_V3	Ungipaghtegka	pilugugngalghiik	sackcloth-meng,	aghtughyaghqaanghillelelleqagka	uuknaliqesqellukek	1,260	aghneghnun.”
B27_11_Revelation_V4	Maalghuk	ungipaghtek	maalghuguuk	olive-em	uqfigek,	maalghuguuklu	kenelghutam	tunemakek	nekevghalghiik	sivungani	Atanghan	nunam.
B27_11_Revelation_V5	Enkaam	kitum	alngunak	aqnighhnaqutkegkumikek,	qaanghegkeneng	kenghem	aanluni	tuququghlleqiik	anguyagik.	Kitumllu	alngunak	aqnighhnaqutkegkumikek	taawa	tuqusaghqaaghllequq.
B27_11_Revelation_V6	Aghtughyaghqaanghillelguuk	qilaga	eslallugughnaniisqelluku	uuknaliqellghegkegni.	Aghtughyaghqaanghillelguuk	meghet	aawughtesqelluki.	Aghtughyaghqaanghillelguuklu	allaaghhiinaghneng	ikfiqnalghiineng	seghleliighllagneng,	awen	tawaten	piiqellequk	piyukelleghmegetun.
B27_11_Revelation_V7	Apeghiiqayek	ungipaneghmeng,	asilighneghilngughmeng	laawaaghmeng	aanellequq	teghikusalluuk.	Pilluwaghlleqaak	enkaam	kayaalqegkumikek	tuqulleqaak.
B27_11_Revelation_V8	Kemegkwaaghik	tamaanllequk	tuumngani	neghllagem,	Atanghita	qaquuraghvigani.	Taana	neghllak	aatqeftuq	Sodom-emengllu	Egypt-mengllu	qayughllak	yugi	Sodom-eghmiistunllu	Eygpt-eghmiistunllu	ayuqelghiit.
B27_11_Revelation_V9	Yuget	nunataghhaaneng,	ramkeneng,	allaaghhiinaghneng	uluneng,	nunatanengllu	tagillequt	esghaghnalukek	kemegkwaaghik.	Tawaten	pillequt	pingayunun	aghneghnun	avellelighluku,	kitumunllu	alngunak	qungughtesnanighlleqagket.
B27_11_Revelation_V10	Taakuk	uuknaliqistek	ikfiqestighllakaalghiik	nunam	yugitnun.	Enkaam	yuget	quyaghllagllequt,	tunquullequtlu	tunusameng	ilameggnun,	apalluqluku	tuqullghegkenun.
B27_11_Revelation_V11	Iwernga	kingungitneng	pingayut	aghneghet	avellelighluku	Kiyaghneghem	aneghneni	iteghtestekaa	uuknaliqistegnun.	Enkaam	nekevyayek,	qamaglluteng	tamaakut	esghaghlukek	alingruughuteghllakat.
B27_11_Revelation_V12	Taagken	uuknaliqistek	nagaqughaak	iglagtupiglleghhii	ma	qilagmeng	pilghii,	“Mayughtek	whavek!”	Anguyagik	esghapagumaluki	mayughtuk	qilagmun	qilawaaghqun.
B27_11_Revelation_V13	Tawani	pilleghmi	qevuutepiglluni	nuna	ufsuguteghllagtuq;	qulaghqellgha	neghllagem	naavuq.	Enkaam	seven	thousand	yuuk	tuququghaa	nunam	ufsugutelleghllagan.	Tamaakut	yuget	yaywaasekat	kakavaataateghllagluteng	usuquughtaat	Kiyaghnegha	qilagem.
B27_11_Revelation_V14	Tuunglighhaa	seghlepestaaghllagem	seghleliillghem	alpagtuq,	iwernga	esghaghteggu	pingayaa	seghlepestaaghllagem	seghleliillghem	kaasaghtungestaghtuq.
B27_11_Revelation_V15	Taagken	maaghraghvinliitangita	yaqulgem	qalghightaatni	qalghightaa.	Iglagtupiglluteng	met	qilagmi	piit,	“Ataneghpagullgha	nunam	ataneghpagulqaaghtaak	Atanemtallu	Christ-anganllu,	enkaam	Ellnga	igleghutillequq	quunperugllak	kenlengunaan!”
B27_11_Revelation_V16	Taagken	yuginaq	estamat	siipneqluku	siivanlleghet	aqumgalghiit	umiilgusitgun	aqumutamegteggun	Kiyaghneghem	sivungani,	gginateng	sekelluki	manigughaat	Kiyaghneq.
B27_11_Revelation_V17	Pikaat:	“Iyamsiqayugvikamken,	Ataneq	Kiyaghneq	Aghtughyaghqaghhaanghilnguq,	kiyaghlleghhii	maaten,	iiwlengllu	kiyaghlleghhii!	Tugumaan	aghtughyaghqaanghitelleghllagen	enkaam	piinlightuten	igleghutimun.
B27_11_Revelation_V18	Nunam	yugi	sakriteghllagtut,	iwernga	maaten	sakraalleghqan	kaatuq.	Tuqukat	nanqigsaghqaaghtut.	Akileghtughyaghqaaghtaten	qepghaghteten	uuknaliqistet,	agleghnalghiit	yugten,	qamagllukillu	siivakilghiit	elpeneng,	ukavanlenguutlu	apeghseghutlu.	Tuququlleghqan	kaatuq	tamaakunun	tuququqaneng	yugneng	nunami.”
B27_11_Revelation_V19	Taagken	Kiyaghneghem	Temple-nga	qilagmelnguq	qelpateftuq.	Tawani	Temple-ngani	esghaghagka	Ark-ek	Kiyaghneghem	Covenant-elghutakek.	Taagken	nighwaagpagtaghtuk,	eftughtaghtuk,	tengngaagtaghtuklu	kallugek;	nuna	ufsuguteghllagtuq,	kaftekragughteghllagaallu!
B27_12_Revelation_V1	Taagken	qilagami	sangwaa	saghiighanapiglleghhii	aliightuq	liigikusighqaghput	piyaghqamun:	Aghnaq	pilugugluni	siqineghmeng,	itegii	tanqikun	nekeglluteng,	naasqumikun	qaghpaluni	qula	maalghuk	siipneqluku	ighaleqetaaghneng.
B27_12_Revelation_V2	Qumilguftuq,	ighniyugem	aqnighqelluku	lliighaa,	aanaqellghan	taghnughhaam	araghqaa.
B27_12_Revelation_V3	Taagken	qilagami	sangwaa	ilanga	saghiighanapiglleghhii	aliightuq	liigikusighqaghput	apeghiighnaqelghiimun:	Taawa	kavilnguq	dragon-eghllak,	maaghraghvinlek	naasqulek,	qula	sighunelek,	enkaam	qamaglluteng	naasqwi	qaghpalgututeftut.
B27_12_Revelation_V4	Papegmineng	saqipgutii	nunamun	pingayughqellghi	qilagam	ighaleqetaaghi.	Taagken	dragon-a	nekevegkaq	manungakun	aghnam	neghnaluku	taghnughhaa	ighniighesnaqagu.
B27_12_Revelation_V5	Aghnaq	ighnenguq,	igleghusaghqii	qamagtengngwaaghluki	nunam	yugi	iron-meng	anagutalighluni.	Iwernga	aghnam	taghnughhaa	akuqaghluku	aglaataat	Kiyaghneghmun,	umiilgusigkenunllu	aqumutagnun.
B27_12_Revelation_V6	Aghnaq	qimagtuq	kilgaanun.	Tamaani	Kiyaghneghem	yataaghqutkaqegkanga	nekaghqameng,	aflengaksaghqaqegkangat	1,260	aghneghet.
B27_12_Revelation_V7	Taagken	qilagmi	pillugutut.	Michael-enkut	yaqulkullghiit	pilluwaghaat	dragon-a.	Dragon-enkut	yaqulkullghiit	pilluwaghiit	Michael-enkut	yaqulkullghiit,
B27_12_Revelation_V8	iwernga	Michael-enkut	kayaalqaat	dragon-a.	Enkaam	dragon-enkut	yaqulkullghiit	qilagmesaghqaananightut.
B27_12_Revelation_V9	Qilagmeng	miluutaat	dragon-eghllak.	(Neghightaluk	nemeghyaq	aatgha	Tughneghaq,	nalighmeng	Tughneghaq,	puughqughtenga	nunam	yugan.)	Miluutaat	nunamun	yaqulegtuumaan.
B27_12_Revelation_V10	Taagken	nagaqughaqa	ma	iglagtuluni	qilagmeng	pilghii,	“Whaa	kaasimaat	Kiyaghneghem	yugulighillgha,	aghtughyaghqaanghillgha,	ataneghpagullghallu,	Christ-anganllu	aghtughyaghqaanghillgha.	Salin	Tughneghaq	miluutellghilluku	qilagmeng,	aghneghtuumaan	unugtuumaan	anaggutnganiiqii	ugpeqaalguteput	Kiyaghneghmun.
B27_12_Revelation_V11	Ugpeqaalgutemta	kayaalqumaat	aawakun	Penniighaghaam,	ungipaqelleghmegteggunllu	Kiyaghneghem	ipapighqellgha.	Talwa	tuquyaghngaaghmeng	ayuqut	Christ-a	apalluqluku.
B27_12_Revelation_V12	Enkaam	qamagllusi	kiyaghlleghhiini	qilagmi,	quyateghllagtek!	Iwernga	seghleghwaaghunaqnguusi	nunamelngughnillu	kelliinilngughnillu!	Tughneghaam	ukigvikumiisi,	sakriteghllaguuq	qayughllak	liisimakaa	pilleghqiighusaghtughtuq.”
B27_12_Revelation_V13	Dragon-em	liigiksamigu	nunamun	miluutelleni,	malighqaghaa	aghnaq	ighnengegkaq.
B27_12_Revelation_V14	Iwernga	aghnaq	tuunegkaat	qawaagpagrugllagem	yaqugkeneng	tengaasqelluku	kilgaanun.	Tamaani	paqniillequq	nemeghyameng,	aflengakelleqaatlu	pingayut	ayumiqullghet,	aghvinlek	tanqit	ilalluki.
B27_12_Revelation_V15	Taagken	nemeghyam	ughyuutaa	meq	kiiwestun	ayuqelghii	aghnaq	maaqutesqelluku.
B27_12_Revelation_V16	Iwernga	nunam	kayusiitaa	aghnaq.	Nunam	agitaghulluku	tuuftaa	meghllak	dragon-em	ughyuutkaa.
B27_12_Revelation_V17	Taagken	dragon-em	ugumiyaguteghllagluku	aghnaq,	enkaam	pilluwaghyaghtughii	qamaglluki	ilangi	kingunghi.	Tamaakunguut	qaatkutngalghiit	Kiyaghneghem	qelghusiitnun,	ataasiighmelnguutlu	ipalleghmun	apeghtuusaqegkaanun	Jesus-em.
B27_12_Revelation_V18	Taagken	dragon-a	nekevuq	kelliim	esnaakun.
B27_13_Revelation_V1	Taagken	esghaghaqa	teghikusalluuk	aanelghii	kelliimeng.	Qulanguftut	sighunghi,	maaghraghvinlek	naasqulek.	Qamaglluteng	sighunghi	qaghpalgututeftut,	tamaghhaghmeng	naasqut	igaqughvikngaftut	ateghmeng	seghlequulghiimeng	Kiyaghneghmun.
B27_13_Revelation_V2	Taana	teghikusalluuk	leopard-esugnituq,	itegii	kayngem	itegaatun	ayuqelghiit,	qaangha	lion-em	qaanghatun	ayuqelghii.	Dragon-em	tuunaa	teghikusalluuk	aghtughyaghqaanghilleghmineng,	umiilgusigmineng	aqumutagneng,	igleghutiyaghqaaghtestaallu	ateni	atuqluku.
B27_13_Revelation_V3	Ataasiq	naasqwa	teghikusalluugem	tuqutesugnitkaq	kiitighluni,	iwernga	taana	kiiyallgha	maamegkaaftuq.	Iingunaghhaghmeng	nunam	yugita	saghiighayagulluku	maligtaat	teghikusalluuk.
B27_13_Revelation_V4	Qamaglluteng	yuget	manigughaat	dragon-a	qayughllak	teghikusalluugmun	tuunegkanga	aghtughyaghqaanghilleni.	Manigughaatlu	teghikusalluuk,	piit,	“Kinangam	teghikusalluugtun	ayuqa?	Kitumngam	pilluwaghlleqagu?”
B27_13_Revelation_V5	Taagken	teghikusalluuk	akuziyaghqaaghtuq.	Aangaayugteghllagtuq,	seghlepestaatunllu	akuzitkaa	Kiyaghneq.	Aghtughyaghqaanghillenguq	igleghutiyaghqaaluni	42-nun	tanqinun.
B27_13_Revelation_V6	Piinlighaa	seghlepestaatun	akuzitkilleni	Kiyaghneghmeng,	aatghaneng,	kiyaghfiganeng,	tamaakunengllu	kiyaghlleghhiineng	qilagmi.
B27_13_Revelation_V7	Aghtughyaghqaanghillelitaa	pilluwiisqelluki	Kiyaghneghem	yugi,	kayaalqesqellukillu.	Igleghusaghqaaghtestii	qamaglluki	ramket,	yuget,	ulut,	nunataanilnguutlu	yuget.
B27_13_Revelation_V8	Qamaglluni	nunami	kiyaghlleghhiim	manigughlleqaat	teghikusalluuk.	Iwernga	tamaakut	aatghit	igaqngalghiit	Igiitgun	Unguvallghem	manigughnaanghitaat.	Kiyaghneghem	igaqegkaqii	aatghit	nunangllallghilluni.	Taakut	igat	pikii	Penniighaghaam,	yuget	tuqutkiita.
B27_13_Revelation_V9	“Nagatek,	sigutelgukufsi:
B27_13_Revelation_V10	Kina	alngunak	tuguyaghqaakumi,	tugulleqaat.	Kina	alngunak	tuqusaghqaakumi	savigpagkun,	tuqulleqaat	savigpagkun.	Taakuk	whaten	pisiiguk:	Kiyaghneghem	yugi	nuqenneghtuyaghqaagutlu	ugpeqillelguyaghqaagutlu.”
B27_13_Revelation_V11	Taagken	esghaghaqa	ilanga	teghikusalluuk	nunameng	aanelghii.	Maalghugegneng	sighunelguftuq	penniighaghaam	sighunghatun,	akuziiqlu	dragon-etun.
B27_13_Revelation_V12	Sivuliq	teghikusalluuk	tawanlluku	tunglighhaan	teghikusalluugem	atuqaa	qamaglluku	aghtughyaghqaanghillgha.	Taaggun	aghtughyaghqaanghilleghqun	maniguutestii	qamaglluki	nunam	yugi	sivulighmun	teghikusalluugmun.	(Kiiyallghan	tuqutesugnitkaa,	iwernga	kiiyallgha	maamegkaq.)
B27_13_Revelation_V13	Tuunglighhaa	teghikusalluuk	allaaghlluwhaghtighllagaataghtuq,	talwa	qilagmeng	nunamun	keneq	ukigtestaa	yuget	esghaamanghitni.
B27_13_Revelation_V14	Tuunglighhaa	teghikusalluuk	aghtughyaghqaanghillenguq	allaaghlluwaghtiyaghqaaluni	tawantellghani	sivuliim	teghikusalluugem.	Tamaagun	allaaghlluwhaghtilleghteggun	puughtii	qamaglluki	yuget	kiyaghlleghhiit	nunami.	Qelghii	yuget	nangaghnenglliisqelluki	quulviisqelluku	sivuliq	teghikusalluuk.	(Taana	tuqutkaayalghii	savigpagkun	iwernga	unguvaqaq.)
B27_13_Revelation_V15	Tuunglighhaa	teghikusalluuk	aghtughyaghqaanghillenguq	aneghnengestiyaghqaaluni	unguvalleghmeng	nangaghneghanun	teghikusalluugem.	Enkaam	nangaghneq	akuziyaqlegughtuq.	Taagken	nangaghneghem	qelghii	yuget	tuquqiisqelluki	tamaakut	maniguusunghilnguut	ellminun.
B27_13_Revelation_V16	Tuunglighhaan	teghikusalluugem	nalluniightiisqii	number-meng	qamaglluki	yuget	aghenqigneghitgun	iiggitgun	nalighmeng	qawiitgun.	Tawaten	qelghii	aangwaaghughngaata,	ukavansaghngaata,	aklungiteghngaata,	aklumaghngaata,	qepghaghtelaaghunghiteghngaata,	qepghaghtelaaghughngaata.
B27_13_Revelation_V17	Kina	alngunak	tukfighiyaghqaanghituq	nalighmeng	akikiyaghqaanghituq	wetkuqun	nalluniillelgukumi.	Taana	nalluniilkutaq	teghikusalluugem	aatqaa	nalighmeng	aatghan	number-kaa.
B27_13_Revelation_V18	Peghqinellelgem	liigiknaaghaa	una.	Sumeghtaghalleghmikun	liigikelleqaa	sameng	pisiitanga	teghikusalluugem	number-nga.	Taana	number-a	yugmun	aatghuuq,	666-nguuq.
B27_14_Revelation_V1	Taagken	esghaghaqa	taawa	Penniighaghaq	nekevghalghii	Naayghami	Zion-mi.	Ellnganituteftut	144,000	yuget,	qagumegteggun	igaqfikegkat	aatghaneng,	Atanganllu	aatghaneng.
B27_14_Revelation_V2	Nagaqughaqallu	ma	qilagmeng.	Nagatkaaluni	llangaqa	qallangatun	meghllaget,	tengngaagatunllu	kallugem.	Nagatkaqa	ma	llangaqa	harp-estet	aynganangallghiistun	harp-etgun	ayuqelghii.
B27_14_Revelation_V3	144,000	yuget	nekevghatnguftut	sivungani	umiilgusim	aqumutam,	estamatlu	unguvalghiit,	elder-etlu.	Taakut	yuget	ilagaghaqeftut	ilagaateghraghaghmeng.	Kitum	alngunak	taana	ilagaan	liisaghqaqenghilkanga	iwerngaqun	144,000	yuget.	Ellnginguut	Kiyaghneghem	yugulikii	qungangitneng	nunam	yuganeng.
B27_14_Revelation_V4	Taakut	yuget	nukeggnaghqumangilnguugut	aghnameng	atuqilleghqun.	Maligtaqaat	Penniighaghaq	navek	alngunak	pinghani.	Kiyaghneghem	yugulikaqii	akulngitneng	nunam	yugan,	tunusaqsuwhaaghuut	Kiyaghneghmunllu	Penniighaghaghmunllu.
B27_14_Revelation_V5	feet	uusqaghtulkelluku.
B27_14_Revelation_V6	Taagken	esghaghaqa	ilanga	yaqulek	tengaalghii	quulvaghpani.	Aapghii	kenlengilnguut	Pinilghiit	Ungipat	nunami	kiyaghlleghhiinun,	tamaghhiitnun	nunataanilngughnun	yugnun,	ramkenun,	ulunun,	yugnunllu.
B27_14_Revelation_V7	Iglagtupiglluni	piiq,	“Alikiteggu	Kiyaghneq,	usuqiteggu	aangelleghllaga!	Yugneng	nanqigtilleghqaa	kaatuuq.	Manigughteggu	ulimaghikaq	qilagameng,	nunameng,	kelliineng,	sengngulghiinengllu	meghneng!”
B27_14_Revelation_V8	Tuunglighhaan	yaqulgem	maligtaa	sivuliq,	whaten	pimaghmi,	“Naavumaaq!	Babylon-eghllak	naavumaaq!	Babylon-em	seghletun	atuqillgha	sex-meng	wine-etun	ayuquq.	Wine-mineng	meghesqughii	qamaglluki	nunam	yugi,	enkaam	ellngitallu	seghletun	sex	atuqsagutaat.	Enkaam	tawaten	pilleghmegteggun	Kiyaghneghmun	aghyuughteslequt.”
B27_14_Revelation_V9	Pingayaak	yaqulgem	maligutuq	sivuliignun.	Iglagtupiglluni	piiq,	“Kitum	alngunak	maniguqumigu	teghikusalluuk,	nangaghneghallu,	allgeghsimakumigullu	nalluniilleq	qagumikun	nalighmeng	iiggmikun
B27_14_Revelation_V10	meghyaghqaqaa	wine-nga	Kiyaghneghem	sakraallghan.	Taana	wine-a	meliimangilnguq	kuuvegkaq	qayuusimun	Kiyaghneghem	sakraalqaa!	Kina	alngunak	maniguutkaq	taakugnun	ikfiqeghllagyaghqaaguq	keneghmillu,	sulphur-millu,	sivungitni	agleghnalghiitlu	yaqulget,	Penniighaghaamllu.
B27_14_Revelation_V11	Kenghem	ikfiqesteghllaglleqii,	agepsaa	mayughllequq	quunperugllak	kenlengunaan.	Ikfiqnanighnaanghitut	aghneghtuumaan	unugtumaan,	maniguutkaatmeggneng	teghikusalluugmun,	nangaghneghanun,	nalluniiqaatmeggnengllu	aatghaneng.”
B27_14_Revelation_V12	Tamaakut	qamaglluteng	whaten	pisiigut,	Kiyaghneghem	yugi	nuqenneghtupestaaghyaghqaagut.	Tamaakunguut	qaatkutngalghiit	Kiyaghneghem	qelghusaanun,	ataasiighmellutengllu	Jesus-mun.
B27_14_Revelation_V13	Taagken	nagaqughaqa	qilagmeng	ma	pilghii,	“Igaqigu	una:	Whaken	kenlekluku	quyasaghqaagut	tuquyaghqat	qepghaasimaluku	Ataneq!”	Taghneghak	piik,	“Quyanapestaaghtut!	Meghnaalillequt	ughleghiilleghmeggneng,	yuget	neqamikelleqiit	aneghneghqillghit.”
B27_14_Revelation_V14	Taagken	esghaghaqa	taawa	qatelghii	qilawaaq,	qilawaghqun	aqumgaftuq	llangaqa	ighnegha	yugem.	Naasqumikun	gold-meng	qaghpalguftuq,	tugumiiqeftaallu	ipelghii	pakregmelnguq	savik.
B27_14_Revelation_V15	Taagken	ilanga	yaqulek	aanuq	Temple-meng.	Akilghuughllagaa	aqumgalghii	qilagwaaghmi,	“Pakregmelnguq	savigen	atuqluku	unataa,	qayughllak	unatalleghqaq	kaatuq,	nunam	piitestekaa	unataghyaghqaaghtengnguuq!”
B27_14_Revelation_V16	Enkaam	qilawaaghmi	aqumgalghiim	pakregmelnguq	savini	unataasiqaa	nunamun.
B27_14_Revelation_V17	Taagken	ilanga	yaqulek	aanuq	Temple-meng	qilagmi,	ellngallu	ipelghiimeng	pakregmelngughmeng	savilguftuq.
B27_14_Revelation_V18	Taagken	ilanga	yaqulek	aanuq	aghqefigegneng	aflengakistenga	kenghan	aghqefigem.	Akilghuughllagaa	yaqulek	ipelghiimeng	pakregmelngughmeng	savilek,	“Savigpeneng	kepughqi	grapes-et	nunam	vine-nganeng,	qayughllak	grapes-et	qigumaat!”
B27_14_Revelation_V19	Enkaam	yagulgem	pakregmelnguq	savini	saqipgutaa	nunamun,	kepughii	grapes-et	nunam	vine-nganeng.	Taagken	miluqutaqii	grapes-em	qageghquusighllaganun.	Taananguuq	Kiyaghneghem	sakritfigllaga.
B27_14_Revelation_V20	Grapes-mun	qageghquusik	eslataanilnguuk	neghllagem.	Grapes-et	qageghqughyalghiimeng	aawk	maaquq	qageghquusineng	180	miles	tagtalkelluku,
B27_15_Revelation_V1	Taagken	qilagami	aliightuq	sangwaa	saghiighanapiglleghhii	liisimakusighqaghput	piyaghqamun.	Taawa	maaghraghvinlek	yaqulget,	tagitilghiit	maaghraghvinlegneng	seghleliilleghllagneng.	Taakut	seghleliilleghllaget	taaqniitkeftii	Kiyaghneghem	sakraalleghllagan.
B27_15_Revelation_V2	Taagken	esghaghaqa	kelliisugnilnguq	meghraakegtaq	siqinwaaghestun,	akumngalghii	keneghmeng.	Esghaghankallu	kayaalqiikat	teghikusalluugmeng,	nangaghneghaneng,	aatghanllu	number-nganeng.	Nekevghatnguftut	saaghwaghni	kelliim,	harp-elightuulluteng	Kiyaghneghem	tuunegkiitneng	ellngitnun.
B27_15_Revelation_V3	Ilagaghaqeftut	ilagaatanganeng	Moses-em,	(Kiyaghneghem	qepghaghtenga),	ilagaatanganengllu	Penniighaghaam:	“Kaay,	Ataneq	Kiyaghneq	Aghtughyaghqaghhaanghiteghllak,	qepghalleghten	seghleghllaguut,	allaaghlluwhaghllaguut!	Kaay,	umiilgat	nunam	yugita,	elpek	salleghten	elqughutngaatlu	ipanguutlu!
B27_15_Revelation_V4	Ataneq,	qamagtengngwaaghluteng	yuget	alikelleqaaten,	quulvaghlleqaatlu	aatghen!	Ellnginaaguten	agleghnalghii!	Qamagtengngwaaghluteng	nunatat	manigughyaghtughlleqaaten,	qayughllak	liisimakegkangat	nanqigtilleghten	elqughutngalghiit!”
B27_15_Revelation_V5	Taam	kingunganeng	esghaghaqa	qilagmi	qelpeghtekangat	Temple-a.	(Agleghnalleghpigaaguq	Na,	ellngan	yugita	liisimakusiqaat	Kiyaghneq	tawanniluku.)
B27_15_Revelation_V6	Taagken	maaghraghvinlek	yaqulget	aanleghaatut	Temple-meng	kelqelluteng	maaghraghvinlegneng	seghleliilleghllagneng.	Tamaghhaghmeng	atkuyaaghulluteng	qateghrakegtameng	nighulghiimeng,	sakimagmegteggun	gold-meng	tafsiluteng.
B27_15_Revelation_V7	Taagken	ataasim	unguvalghiim	estamaneng	taakuneng,	gold-meng	sagneliqughii	maaghraghvinlek	yaqulget.	Taakut	sagneghet	imighngaat	sakraalleghllaaganeng	Kiyaghneghem,	kiyaghlleghhii	quunperugllak	kenlengunaan.
B27_15_Revelation_V8	Temple-em	ilunga	agepsughqaagaa	Kiyaghneghem	nighughqellghanengllu,	aghtughyaghqaanghillghanengllu.	Kina	alngunak	iteghnaanghituq	Temple-mun	kenlanga	maaghraghvinlek	seghleliilleghllaget	kenletghuutellghitnun,	tagitkiit	maaghraghvinlek	yaqulget.
B27_16_Revelation_V1	Taagken	Temple-meng	nagaqughaqa	iglagtulghii	ma,	ungipaaskangi	maaghraghvinlek	yaqulget,	“Kuuvyaghtughteki	nunamun	maaghraghvinlek	sagneghet	Kiyaghneghem	sakraalleghllagi!”
B27_16_Revelation_V2	Enkaam	sivuliim	yaqulgem	sagneni	kuuvyaghtughaa	nunamun.	Taagken	seghlepestaaghllaget	aqnighnapiglleghhiit	pupiget	piitquutut	nalluniillengegkanun	teghikusalluugmeng.	Tamaakunguut	maniguutkat	nangaghneghanun.
B27_16_Revelation_V3	Tuunglighhaan	yaqulgem	sagneni	kuuvaa	kelliinun.	Taagken	kellii	aawatun	tuqukam	yugem	lliighluni,	enkaam	qamaglluteng	unguvalghiit	kelliini	tuqulaghaatut.
B27_16_Revelation_V4	Pingayiitangita	yaqulgem	sagneni	kuuvaa	kiigwnunllu,	sengngununllu	meghnun	enkaam	aawughquutut.
B27_16_Revelation_V5	Nagaqughaqa	igleghutilghii	meghneng	yaqulek	pilghii,	“Kaay,	Agleghnalghii	Kiyaghneq,	elpenguuq	maaten	kiyaghlleghhii,	elpenguuq	quunpeng	kiyaghlleghhii!	Nanqigtilleghtenllu	aghyuughilleghtenllu	elqughutngaat.
B27_16_Revelation_V6	Yuget	tuququqaqiit	yugten,	uuknaliqistetenllu,	enkaam	meghyaghqalitaten	aawmeng.	Tawaten	aghyuughyaghqaaluteng	ellmeggneng	allgeghtekaqaat!”
B27_16_Revelation_V7	Taagken	nagaqughaqa	aghqefigegneng	ma	pilghii,	“Aa-a	Ataneq,	Kiyaghneq	Aghtughyaghqaanghilnguq!	Ipanguutlu	elqughutngaatlu	nanqigtilleghqaghten!”
B27_16_Revelation_V8	Estamiitangita	yaqulgem	saghneni	kuuvaa	siqineghqun	enkaam	Kiyaghneghem	siqinghem	kenghanun	paneghtestii	yuget.
B27_16_Revelation_V9	Siqinghem	uguqnaghllagan	paneghtestii	yuget.	Enkaam	sanguughteghllagaat	aatgha	Kiyaghneghem,	igleghutistengutanganeng	tamaavek	seghleliilleghllagnun.	Avuteghqenghitutlu,	usuqenghitaatlu	Kiyaghneghem	aangelleghllaga.
B27_16_Revelation_V10	Tallimiitangita	yaqulgem	sagneni	kuuvaa	teghikusalluugem	umiilgusiin	aqumutagkenkun,	enkaam	ataneghpagullgha	mamleghqwaagaa.	Yuget	ikfiqem	uluteng	amqeghqughiit.
B27_16_Revelation_V11	Sanguughteghllagaat	Kiyaghnegha	qilagem	apalluqluku	aqnighqelleghmeggnengllu	pupigtaalleghmeggnengllu.	Avuteghqenghitutlu	seghletun	pilleghmeggneng.
B27_16_Revelation_V12	Aghvinliitangita	yaqulgem	sagneni	kuuvaa	kiiwllagegnun	Euphrates-egnun.	Kiiwek	pateghtuk	yataaghqunnaluki	tuumkaghqameng	umiilget	tagilghiit	asivaghmeng.
B27_16_Revelation_V13	Taagken	esghaghanka	pingayut	nukeggnalghiit	tughneghaat	frog-esugnilnguut.	Aanut	qaanghitneng	dragon-em,	teghikusalluugem,	uuknaliqistesighwaaghemllu.
B27_16_Revelation_V14	Taakut	tughneghaat	allaaghlluwhaghtikayuguftut.	Aghulaqut	umiilgitnun	nunataghhaan	tamaghhaan	qerngughhnaluki	pilluwamun	aghneghllagani	Kiyaghneghem	Aghtughyaghqaghhaanghilnguum.
B27_16_Revelation_V15	Ataneq	piiq,	“Nagataghtek!	Taginguunga	teglegniightetun!	Quyanaghtuq	teghhumalghii,	aatkani	piiftengngwaaghluki	ayuqegkangi.	Enkaam	igleghhnaanghituq	amsikaghmi,	kayngusaghaannaanghituqlu	tesqagani	yuget	esghaqumegteggu!”
B27_16_Revelation_V16	Taagken	tughneghaat	qerngughtiit	umiilget	Armageddon-mun.	Tawaten	Hebrew-ghmiistun	atillgha	ayuquq.
B27_16_Revelation_V17	Taagken	maaghraghvinliitangita	yaqulgem	sagneni	kuuvaa	eslakun.	Temple-mi	umiilgusigneng	aqumutaghllagegneng	iglagtupiglluni	ma	piiq,	“Apeghiightuq!”
B27_16_Revelation_V18	Taawa	nighwaagpagtaghtuq,	tengngaagtaghtuq,	kallituq,	nunallu	ufsuguteghllagtuq.	Taana	nunam	ufsugutelleghllaga	seghlelleghpigaaguq	Kiyaghneghem	yungllaghyuggallghaneng.
B27_16_Revelation_V19	Neghllak	pelleghtuq	pingayughqelluni.	Nunatlu	neghllagit	qamagtengngwaaghluteng	naavuutut.	Kiyaghneghem	neqamikii	Babylon-eghllagem	seghleghqellghi.	Enkaam	meghestaa	wine-a	qayuusimelnguq	sakritelleghllagmineng	imaqelghii.
B27_16_Revelation_V20	Qamaglluteng	qiighqat	aviighuquutut,	qamagllutengllu	naayghat	kaavuutut.
B27_16_Revelation_V21	Kaftekragrugllaget	100	uqigtutkavzilghiit	qilagameng	ifkaquutut	yugnun.	Enkaam	tamaakut	yuget	sanguughteghllagaat	Kiyaghneq	apalluqluki	kaftekragrugllaget.	Taana	seghleliilleghllak	seghlepigulghii.
B27_17_Revelation_V1	Taagken	yaqulget	maaghraghvinlegneng	sagnelget,	taakuneng	ataasim	takulunga	piinga,	“Tagi,	kelguviknaqamken	aghyuulleghqaaneng	apeghseghuum	aghnam	yugusimineng	akikikayugem,	aqumgalghii	meghllagteggun.
B27_17_Revelation_V2	Nunam	umiilgi	seghleghqaqut	atuqaqluku	aghnaq.	Seghleghet	atuqistillghi	wine-etun	ayuqut,	enkaam	nunam	yugi	suumaqut	meneghmegteggu	wine-nga.”
B27_17_Revelation_V3	Taagken	yaqulgem	Taghneghagnekun	aglaataanga	kilgaanun.	Tawani	esghaghaqa	aghnaq	aqumgalghii	kavirrakegtakun	teghikusalluugkun.	Teghikusalluuk	igaqughvikngaftuq	uzimun	sanguughtusineng	ateghneng	Kiyaghneghmun.	Maaghraghvinlek	naasqulguftuq,	quulnguftutlu	sighunghi.
B27_17_Revelation_V4	Aghnaq	pilugugngaftuq	esneyaaghmengllu	kavirrakegtamengllu,	enkaam	ullngaqluni	gold-meng,	akitughllagmeng	uyghagmeng,	pearl-mengllu.	Tugumiiqeftaa	gold-a	qayuusiq	esleqngalghii	seghleghnalghiineng	kiyaghtaalleghneng,	nukeggnalghiinengllu	sex-kun	seghleghqellghaneng.
B27_17_Revelation_V5	Qawaani	igaqngaftuq	ateq	qayvighsimangilnguq	whaten	pisiq,	Apeghseghuq	Babylon,	naakaat	yugusimeggneng	akikikayuget	aghnat,	seghleghnallghanengllu	nunam.
B27_17_Revelation_V6	Esghaghaqa	aghnaq	suumelghii	aawitneng	Kiyaghneghem	yugita,	aawitnengllu	tuququqat	qayughllak	ataasiighmelnguut	Jesus-mun.	Esghaghluku	aghnaq	saghiighayugllagtunga.
B27_17_Revelation_V7	Iwernga	yaqulgem	piinga,	“Sangavek	saghiighayugsin?	Ungipaannaqamken	qayvighsimangilngughmeng	sameng	pisiitkek	aghnaankuk,	teghikusalluugenkuk.	Taana	teghikusalluuk	igleghutilghii	aghnameng,	naasqulguuq	maaghraghvinlek,	sighunelguuqlu	qula.
B27_17_Revelation_V8	Teghikusalluuk	esghaqan	unguvayalghiinguuq,	Iwernga	tuqukaaguq.	Mayughllequq	Saamnangilngughmeng	Laagwaaghmeng	naafqellengnaluni.	Yulguuq	nunami	aatghit	igaqellghilnguut	Igiitgun	Unguvallghem	nuna	piinlillghilluku.	Tamaakut	yuget	esghaqumegteggu	teghikusalluuk	saghiighayugllequt	qayughllak	unguvayalghii,	tuqukaq	iwernga	tagiyaghqaq.
B27_17_Revelation_V9	“Sumeghtaghayuqam	liigikelleqaa	una:	Maaghraghvinlek	naasqut	maaghraghvinleguut	qemit	aghnam	aqumgavigi.
B27_17_Revelation_V10	Taakut	naasqut	maaghraghvinleguutlu	umiilget.	Tallimat	tuqukaagut,	ataasiq	igleghutinguuq,	enkaam	ataasiq	salin	tagingigatuq.	Tagikumi	igleghutiyaghqaaguq	natengiighhaq.
B27_17_Revelation_V11	Teghikusalluuk	unguvayalghii	iwernga	tuqukaq,	pingayuneng	ingluliitnguuq	umiilek.	Taana	pingayuneng	ingluliita	umiilek	ilakaat	sivuliit	maaghraghvinlek	umiilget,	naafqellengyaghtuuguq.
B27_17_Revelation_V12	“Esghaqaghten	qula	sighunghet,	qulanguut	umiilget	salin	igleghutingigatut.	Iwernga	aghtughyaghqaanghillengellequt	igleghutiyaghqaaluteng	ataasiq	aflu	maligulluteng	teghikusalluugmun.
B27_17_Revelation_V13	Taakut	ataasiq	umyugaqluku	tuunelleqiit	teghikusalluugmun	aghtughyaghqaanghilletengllu	pilleghqatengllu.
B27_17_Revelation_V14	Enkaam	pilluwaghlleqaat	Penniighaghaq.	Iwernga	Penniighaghaam	kayaalqelleqii	qayughllak	Atanqegkangat	atanghet,	Umiilkegkangatlu	umiilget.	Penniighaghaghmelnguut	tuqluqaagut,	nakmikegkaagut,	ataasiighmelnguugutlu.”
B27_17_Revelation_V15	Taagken	yaqulgem	piinga,	“Esghaghaten	meghet	aghnam	yugusimineng	akikikayugem	aqumgavigi.	Taakut	meghet	yulghuteghllaguut	nunataghhaaneng	tamaghhaaneng	pinguut,	ulukelghiit	allaaghhiinaghmeng.
B27_17_Revelation_V16	Esghaqaghpek	qula	sighunghet,	teghikusalluugemllu,	ugumiilleqaat	aghnaq	yugusimineng	akikikayuk.	Saqraggiighulluku,	amsiqaghqelluku,	kemga	neghluku,	taagken	siipnegha	kumaghlleqaat.
B27_17_Revelation_V17	Taakut	qula	sighunghet	tawaten	pikaagut	qayughllak	Kiyaghneghem	ellngitnun	atuqestekaqaa	piyukelleni.	Angeghqumatkaagutlu	tuunaluki	ataneghpagulleteng	teghikusalluugmun.	Tawaten	pikaagut	kenlanga	Kiyaghneghem	piyukellgha	apeghiillghanun.
B27_17_Revelation_V18	Taana	aghnaq	esghaqan	neghllaguuq	igleghutilghii	umiilgitneng	nunat.”
B27_18_Revelation_V1	Taam	kingunganeng	esghaghaqa	ilanga	yaqulek	qilagmeng	ukilghii.	Aghtughyaghqaanghillelegllaguftuq,	nighughqelleghmineng	iingunaghhaan	nuna	nighugtaa.
B27_18_Revelation_V2	Akilghuughllagtuq,	“Naavumaaq!	Naavumaaq	Babylon-eghllak!	Nekaaghsimaat	tughneghaat,	nukeggnalghiit	tughneghaat,	ukmanginneghilnguut	kusgenalghiit	qawaaget.
B27_18_Revelation_V3	Babylon-em	seghletun	atuqillgha	sex-meng	wine-etun	ayuquq,	nunataghhan	tamaghhaan	meghaa.	Nunam	umiilgita	atuqaqaat,	nunamllu	akilpegaghtengita	aklungighisiqngwaat	nuqetusaghqaanghilngughqun	sex-kun	atuqiyullghakun.”
B27_18_Revelation_V4	Taagken	nagaqughaqa	ilanga	ma	qilagmeng	pilghii,	“Yumni,	aanleghaatek	Babylon-meng!	Ilategpenasi	seghleghqellghanun	aghyuullengnayukafsi	ellnganun	maligullusi.
B27_18_Revelation_V5	Seghleghqellghi	mayughteghllagngaat	uusqaghtutkaghmeng	qilagtun,	Kiyaghneghem	neqamikii	seghleghqellghi.
B27_18_Revelation_V6	Seghletun	piteggu	Babylon	katam	ellngan	seghletun	pillghatun.	Malghughqelluku	seghletun	pillgha	piteggu.	Qayuusiikun	kuuviteggu	wine-a	iknaqetulnga	malghughqengngaan	ellngan	atuqaqegkanganeng.
B27_18_Revelation_V7	Ellmineng	usuqeghllagaquq,	aklungighllanillu	atuqaqaa	samun	alngunak	piyukegkaminun.	Enkaam	ikfiqesteghllagteggullu	qivghusteghllagteggullu	atunekiitesluku	qaghyalleghllaganun.	Ellmineng	piiquq,	‘Queen-nguunga	aqumgalghii	umiilgusimkun.	Ugingighaanghitunga	enkaam	qivghunaanghitngwaaghtunga!’
B27_18_Revelation_V8	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	aghneghhiinaghmi	kaalleqaa	tuqullghem,	qivghullghem,	neqangisagllagem.	Taagken	kenghem	paneghlleqaa	qayughllak	aghyuughistenga,	Ataneq	Kiyaghneq,	aghtughyaghqaanghiteghllagtuq.”
B27_18_Revelation_V9	Nunam	umiilgi	ilatkat	atuqillghanunllu	qiliighyullghanunllu,	esghaqumegteggu	agepsaa	panellghan	qiyakelleqaat,	iglagtupigllutengllu	qiyakeghllaglleqaat.
B27_18_Revelation_V10	Uyavanlluteng	nekevellequt	qayughllak	alingelghiit	ellmengllu	ilannayukameng	ikfiqellghanun.	Pillequt,	“Seghleghhaghmeng!	Seghleghhaghmeng	elpek	aangeghllak	aghtiigalnguq	neghllak,	Babylon!	Aghyuullenguten	ataasighhaghmi	aflumi!”
B27_18_Revelation_V11	Nunam	akilpegaghtengita	qiyaaghwaatkaat	qivghughllagumaghmeng,	qayughllak	kitum	alngunak	tukfighnaniqangit	saghyangit.
B27_18_Revelation_V12	Babylon-mi	akilpegaghtet	akikaqsaqangit	gold-et,	silver-et,	akitughllaget	uyghaget,	pearl-etlu;	akikaqsaqangitlu	qiipaghaghqat	ulimaaghet	linen-meng,	silk-meng,	qiipaghaghqatlu	iqeghtaqelghiit	esnegyaaghet,	kavirrakegtatlu.	Akikaqsaqangitlu	tepkegtepiglleghhiit	unaghsit,	ulimaaghet	naangquneng,	akitughllagneng	unaghsineng,	siiluneng,	savikenghaagneng,	marble-enengllu.
B27_18_Revelation_V13	Akikaqsaqangitlu	cinnamon-et,	spice-et,	incense-et,	myrrh-et,	frankincense-et;	wine-et,	olive-em	mesiighi;	avlawat,	wheat-et;	cattle-et,	penniighet,	kuunit,	wagon-et;	talwa	yuget	akikaqsaqangit	qepghaghtelaaghuluki.
B27_18_Revelation_V14	Akilpegaghtet	Babylon	pilleqaat,	“Qamaglluteng	pinilghiit	allgeghsukeghllakaghten	aviighutut.	Qamagllutengllu	aklungighllagten	qelmeghllaget	aviighutut,	allamengllu	allgeghsaghqaananighaten!”
B27_18_Revelation_V15	Akilpegaghtet	aklungighikat	akikiluteng	Babylon-mun,	nekevghallequt	uyavanlluteng	qayughllak	alingelghiit	ilannayukameng	ikfiqellghanun.	Qiyallequt	qivghughllagumaghmeng,
B27_18_Revelation_V16	whatenllu	pillequt,	“‘Seghleghwaaghuuq!	Seghleghwaaghuuq	neghllak!	Aatkayuguyaghtuq	linen-meng,	esneyaaghmeng,	kavirrakegtamengllu,	ullngaqegkayuguyaghtuqlu	gold-meng,	akitughllagmeng	uyghagmeng,	pearl-mengllu!
B27_18_Revelation_V17	Ataasimi	aflumi	aklungighllagiitaa!’	“Qamaglluteng	angyalget,	yugit,	passenger-ngit,	akilpegaghtetlu	igleghakayuget	angyaghpagteggun	allgeghunnaluteng	kiyaghusighqameggneng,	angyaghpagit	aghuliiqat	uyavanlluteng	Babylon-meng	kumaghaqngan.
B27_18_Revelation_V18	Esghaghluku	agepsaa	kumallghan,	akilghuugut,	‘Alla	neghllagituq	whatelngughmeng!’
B27_18_Revelation_V19	Naasquteng	pagulalightughiit	qiyatkelluku,	qivghutkelluku	akilghuugut,	‘Seghleghwaaghuuq!	Seghleghwaaghuuq	neghllak!	Aklungighllaganeng	qamaglluteng	angyaghpalget	aklungighikayuguyaghtut!	Iwernga	ataasimi	aflumi	aklungighllagiitaa!’”
B27_18_Revelation_V20	Taagken	qilagmeng	kina	piiq,	“Kaay	qilagmelngughni,	quyakiteggu	qayughllak	Kiyaghneghem	naafqaa	Babylon!	Quyatek	Kiyaghneghem	yugitni,	apostle-eni,	uuknaliqistenillu!	Kiyaghneghem	aghyuughaa	qayughllak	seghletun	pikaqegkangisi!”
B27_18_Revelation_V21	Taagken	iknaqeghllalghiim	yaqulgem	kevgaa	uyghagrugllak,	grain-mun	kagimtisistun	ayuqelghii.	Miluutaa	kellimun,	whaten	pimaghmi,	“Tawateghpigaq	neghllak	Babylon,	Kiyaghneghem	miluuteghllaglleqaa	asitmun	enkaam	allamengllu	esghaghnaanghitaat.
B27_18_Revelation_V22	Kitum	alngunak	nagaqughnaanghitii	harp-esteten,	pillgughikat	aynganangasteten,	flute-esteten,	qalghightaghtetenllu!	Qamaglluteng	pillgughikat	qepghaghteten	aviighusaghqaagut,	grain-meng	kagimtesteten	allallu	nagaqughnaanghitiit!
B27_18_Revelation_V23	Kenelghutam	nighuga	kuukgunnaanighnaquq	elpeni.	Mengik	nulightughnaqelghiimllu	ugiighnaqelghiimllu	nagaqughnanighnaquk	elpeni.	Akilpegaghteten	aghtiigatngwaaghyaghtut	nunataghhaani	tamaghhaani.	Alignaghtaalleghpegun	puughquqaqaten	qamagtengngwaaghluki	nunam	yugi!
B27_18_Revelation_V24	Babylon-mi	taawa	aawit	uuknaliqistet,	Kiyaghneghem	yugi,	qamagllutengllu	tuqutkat	nunami.”
B27_19_Revelation_V1	Kingunganeng	iknaqeghllalghiim	yaqulgem	akuzillghan,	qilagmi	nagaqughanka	yulghuteghllaget	akilghuulghiit,	“Hallelujah!	Yugulilleq,	quulvalleq,	aghtughyaghqaanghilleqlu	Kiyaghnemta	pikii!
B27_19_Revelation_V2	Ellngan	nanqigtillghi	ipanguut,	elqughutngaat!	Ellngan	aghyuuqaqaa	apeghseghuq	aghnaq	yugusimineng	akikikayuk	qayughllak	nunam	yugi	seghletun	pistekangi	sex-kun	atuqestaqluni.	Kiyaghneghem	akitkaqaa	qayughllak	qepghaghtengi	tuququghtestekangi.”
B27_19_Revelation_V3	Yulghuteghllaget	akilghuulaataghtut,	“Hallelujah!	Neghllagem	kumalghiim	agepsaa	mayuuguq	quunperugllak	kenlengunaan!”
B27_19_Revelation_V4	Taagken	yuginaq	estamat	siipneqluki	elder-et,	estamatlu	unguvalghiit	niinghuquulluteng	manigughaat	Kiyaghneq,	aqumgalghii	umiilgusigmikun.	Pikaat,	“Amen!	Hallelujah!”
B27_19_Revelation_V5	Taagken	umiilgusigneng	aqumutaghllagegneng	ma	whaten	piiq,	“Usuqiteggu	Kiyaghneghput,	qamagllusi	qepghaghtengani	alikilghiini	ellnganeng,	ukavanlengughnillu	aangwaaghnillu!”
B27_19_Revelation_V6	Taagken	nagaqughanka	llangaqa	mengit	yulghuteghllaget.	Nagatkaaluteng	suksugistun	tevlughteghllalghiit	meghet,	kallugemllu	tengngaagtallghatun	ayuqluteng.	Akilghuugut,	“Hallelujah!	Ataneq	Kiyaghneghput,	Aghtughyaghqaghhaanghilnguq	igleghutiiq!
B27_19_Revelation_V7	Quyatelta,	elngaatall	quyaghllageltallu	usuqelteggullu!	Penniighaghaam	nengughtelleghqaa	kaatuq,	nuliighqaallu	yataaghqumaaq.
B27_19_Revelation_V8	Kiyaghneghem	aasightuumaa	ugiighnaqelghii	pinighrakegtameng	qatelghiimeng	linen-meng.”	(“Linen-a”	whaten	pisiiguq,	elqughutngalghiit	aneghneghqillghet	Kiyaghneghem	yugita	piiqegkangit.)
B27_19_Revelation_V9	Taagken	yaqulgem	piinga,	“Una	igaqigu:	Penniighaghaam	nengughtellghan	neqenghaghqellghanun	neghyaghtiisqegkat	quyastekaagut.”	Whatenllu	piinga,	“Ukut	ipanguut	akuzitangi	Kiyaghneghem.”
B27_19_Revelation_V10	Taagken	niinghutunga	yaqulgem	itegaakun	manigughnaluku,	iwernga	piinga,	“Tawaten	pigpenang!	Manigughhu	Kiyaghneq!	Qepghaataqaqa	Kiyaghneq	elpetun,	ugpeqaalgutegpetunllu.	Ellnginguut	ataasiighmelnguut	ipalleghmun	Jesus-em	apeghtuusaqegkaanun.	Ipalleq	Jesus-em	apeghtuusaqegkaa	taananguuq	ipalleq	Kiyaghneghem	Taghneghagkenka	uuknaliqistenun	ungipaqestekaa.”
B27_19_Revelation_V11	Taagken	esghaghaqa	qilak	qelpelghii,	taawa	qatelghii	kuuni!	Kuunikun	igleghlleghhiim	aatgha	“Ataasiighmelnguq,	Ipapik”.	Elqughutngaat	nanqigtillghi,	pilluwaqangillu	anguyani.
B27_19_Revelation_V12	Iiskek	kumaghullghatun	kenghem	ayuqlutek,	naasqumikun	qaghpalghutelguftuq.	Aatgha	ellngakun	igaqngaftuq	kitum	alngunak	nallukegkanga	iwerngaqun	ellnginaan.
B27_19_Revelation_V13	Atkuyaaghek	atukek	neptekaaftuk	aawkun.	Aatqeftaa,	“Kiyaghneghem	Akuzitanga”.
B27_19_Revelation_V14	Qilagmeng	pilluwaghtengita	maligsaaghaat	uuglluteng	qatelghiitgun	kuunitgun,	atkuyaaghluteng	iqangilngughmeng	qatelghiimeng	linen-meng.
B27_19_Revelation_V15	Qaanghaneng	aanuq	ipelghii	savigpak,	taaggun	qamagtengngwaaghluki	nakumiit	kayaalqughlleqii.	Igleghulleqii	iron-meng	anagutalighluni.	Taagken	tutmaghlleqii	anguyani	katam	yuget	tutmaghaqellghistun	grapes-et	qageghquusignilnguut.	Taana	tutmalleq	sakraalleghllakaa	Kiyaghneghem	Aghtughyaghqaghhaanghilnguum.
B27_19_Revelation_V16	Atkuyaaghakunllu	qugtuqaakunllu	igaqngaftuq	ateq	whaten;	Umiilga	umiilget,	Atangha	atanghet.
B27_19_Revelation_V17	Taagken	esghaghaqa	yaqulek	nekevghalghii	siqineghqun.	Qamaglluki	qawaalghutet	quulvani	tengaalghiit	iglagtupiglluni	pii,	“Tagilaghaallusi	qerngughutek	Kiyaghneghem	neqenghaghqelleghllaganun!
B27_19_Revelation_V18	Tagitek,	neghyaghtughteki	kemegkwaaghit	umiilget,	pilluwaghtet	umiilgit,	pilluwaghtetlu.	Neghyaghtughteki	kemegkwaaghit	kuunit,	kuunikun	igleghtestet,	qamagllukillu	yuget,	qepghaghtelaaghet,	qepghaghtelaaghunghilnguut,	ukavanlenguut,	aangwaaghetlu.”
B27_19_Revelation_V19	Taagken	esghaghanka	teghikusalluuklu,	nunamllu	umiilgi,	pilluwaghtekullghiit	qerngughutut	pilluwaghnaluku	igleghlleghhii	kuunikun,	pilluwaghtengillu.
B27_19_Revelation_V20	Tugwaagket	teghikusalluugenkuk,	uuknaliqistesighwaaghenkuk	allaaghlluwaghtiighaataqaq	tawanlluku	teghikusalluuk.	(Allaaghlluwaghtiiqelleghmikun	puughquqii	nalluniillengegkat	teghikusalluugmeng,	maniguqaatlu	nangaghnegha.)	Teghikusalluugenkuk,	uuknaliqistesighwaaghenkuk	unguvaagkenka	miluutaak	naayvam	kenghanun	kumaghulghiimun	sulphur-meng.
B27_19_Revelation_V21	Pilluwaghtengik	kuunikun	igleghlleghhiim	tuququghii	savigpagkun	qaneghmineng	aanegkakun.	Taagken	qamaglluteng	qawaaget	neghiit	kemegkwaaghit	kepsuqiinalleghmeggnun.
B27_20_Revelation_V1	Taagken	esghaghaqa	yaqulek	qilagmeng	ukilghii	tugumiiqluni	key-nganeng	Saamnangilnguum	Laawaaghem,	qiipraghuteghllagnengllu.
B27_20_Revelation_V2	Kayaalqelluku	dragon-a	tuwaa.	(Dragon-a	taananguuq	ayumightaq	nemeghyaq,	aatgha	Tughneghaq,	Tughneghaq.)	Taagken	yaqulgem	asighqaa	qiipraghutneng	thousand	ayumiqulleghnun.
B27_20_Revelation_V3	Miluulluku	Laawaaghmun,	taagken	amigmeng	uumgulluku	maghqatutkaa	seal-eluku.	Enkaam	Dragon-em	puughsaghqaananighii	yuget	kenlanga	thousand	ayumiqullghet	alpallghitnun.	Alpakata	itemutaghlleqaat.
B27_20_Revelation_V4	Taagken	esghaghanka	umiilgusit	aqumutat,	aqumgalghiitlu	taakutgun.	Kiyaghneghem	nanqigtiyaghqaaghtestekii	yugneng.	Eshaghankallu	unguvasiit	tamaakut	naasqwightuqiit	apalluqluku	Jesus.	Ungipaqegkaqegkangat	ipalleq	Jesus-em	qayvighqegkaa,	akuzitangillu	Kiyaghneghem.	Taakut	maniguusimangitut	teghikusalluugmun,	nalighmeng	nangaghneghanun.	Talwa	qagumegteggun,	nalighmeng	iiggmegteggun	allgeghtellghitaat	nalluniilkutaa	teghikusalluugem.	Unguvaghtuulluteng	igleghutilgusighaat	Christ-a	thousand	ayumiqulleghnun.
B27_20_Revelation_V5	Taana	sivuliiguq	unguvaghqulleq.	(Ilangi	tamaakut	tuqukat	unguvaghtuunnaanghitut	kenlanga	thousand	ayumiqullghet	alpallghitnun.)
B27_20_Revelation_V6	Tamaakut	Kiyaghneghem	unguvaghtekii	unguvaghtuusuwhaalleghmi	quyastekaagutlu	agleghnaghtutlu.	Tuqunaanghitut	tuunglighhaani	tuqullghem.	Iwernga	priest-ngunaqnguut	Kiyaghneghmunllu	Christ-amunllu.	Igleghutilgusighlleqaatlu	Christ-a	thousand	ayumiqulleghni.
B27_20_Revelation_V7	Thousand	ayumiqullghet	alpakata,	Tughneghaq	anusimingllaghviganeng	itemusaghqaaguq.
B27_20_Revelation_V8	Enkaam	aanluni	puughqughlleqii	nunatat	mingitngalghiit	nunataghhaani	tamaghhaani.	Tamaakut	nunatat	aatqiit	Gog-enkuk	Magog-enkuk.	Yugik	uglaghllagtut	qenaavzeghaatun	esnem.	Taagken	Tughneghaam	qerngughlleqii	pilluwamun.
B27_20_Revelation_V9	Tughneghaam	pilluwaghtengi	iqelmun	mingilluteng	igleghllequt	nunakun.	Kaalluteng	kangllulleqagket	nunaaqlu	Kiyaghneghem	yugita	nayaat,	neghllaklu	Kiyaghneghem	piniqegkaa.	Taagken	qilagmeng	Kiyaghneghem	keneq	ukigtesluku	paneghtekii	pilluwaghtet.
B27_20_Revelation_V10	Taagken	Tughneghaq	puughtikaq	nunataneng,	Kiyaghneghem	yaqulgita	miluulleqaat	naayvamun	kumaghulghii	sulphur-meng.	Tawavek	miluutkaqegkegket	teghikusalluugenkuk,	uuknaliqistesighwaaghenkuk.	Tawani	ikfiqeghllagllequt	aghneghtuumaan	unugtuumaan	quunperugllak	kenlengunaan.
B27_20_Revelation_V11	Taagken	esghaghaqa	Kiyaghneq	aqumgalghii	qatelghiignekun	umiilgusignekun	aqumutaghllagegnekun.	Nunallu	qilagallu	qimaaguutuk	Kiyaghneghem	tawantellghaneng,	allallu	esghaghyaghqaagpenatek.
B27_20_Revelation_V12	Esghaghankallu	tuqulaghaatkat,	ukaliiwaqlutengllu	aangwaaghwaaqlutengllu	ayuqelghiit.	Nekevghatnguftut	sivungani	umiilgusim	aqumutaghllagem.	Taagken	igat	qelpeghtiit,	Igii	Unguvallghem,	igaqughvikegkat	aatghitneng	tamaakut	unguvayaghqat	quunperugllak.	Ilangillu	igalghutet	qelpeghtiit	igaqughvikegkat	tuqukat	kiyaghtaallghitneng	ayuqelghiit.	Kiyaghneghem	nanqigtii	atuqluki	igaquqat	igatgun.
B27_20_Revelation_V13	Taagken	kelliim	tuqumasliini	pegtii.	Tuqullghemllu	Hades-emllu	tuqumasliitek	pegtiik.	Qamagtengngwaaghluki	Kiyaghneghem	nanqigtii	kiyaghtaallghistun.
B27_20_Revelation_V14	Taagken	Tuqulleqlu	Hades-lu	miluutagket	naayvam	kenghanun.	Naayvam	kengha	tuungliqaa	tuqullghem.
B27_20_Revelation_V15	Kitum	alngunak	aatgha	igaqumangilkan	Igaani	Unguvallghem,	miluutkaat	naayvam	kenghanun.
B27_21_Revelation_V1	Taagken	esghaghagka	qilagraghaqlu	nunaghraghaqlu.	Qilaksuwhaaghiisimaaq,	nunaksuwhaaghiisimaaq,	kelliingiitkaaguqlu.
B27_21_Revelation_V2	Esghaghaqallu	Agleghnalghii	Neghllak,	Jerusalem-eghraghaq,	ukilghii	Kiyaghneghmeng	qilagmelngughmeng.	Neghllak	yataaghqelluni	ugiighnaqelghiim	ullngaqellghatun	ugiminun.
B27_21_Revelation_V3	Nagaqughaqa	ma	iglagtupiglleghhii	umiilgusigneng	aqumutagneng	pilghii,	“Esghaqaghhuqun,	Kiyaghneghem	kiyaghfiga	yugnituq!	Kiyaghfikelleqii	enkaam	ellngit	yukelleqii.	Kiyaghneq	ellnga	katam	ellngitnillequq	enkaam	ellnga	Kiyaghneqelleqaat.
B27_21_Revelation_V4	Quningighlleqii	qamaglluki.	Tuqungiilleqaa,	qivghungiilleqaa,	qiyangiilleqaa,	talwa	aqnighqengngiilleqaa	qayughllak	tamaakut	atuqsaqangit	atuqnanighlleqiit.”
B27_21_Revelation_V5	Taagken	umiilgusignilnguq	aqumutagni	piiq,	“Esghaqaghqiqun,	ulimaaqanka	sangwaat	qamagtengngwaaghluki	nutaghaaluki!”	Whatenllu	piiq,	“Igaqiki	tamaakut	aapqanka	elpenun	qayughllak	tamaakut	akuzitet	ipanguut,	ugpeqsaghqaagutlu.”
B27_21_Revelation_V6	Piingallu,	“Apeghiightuq!	Whanga	Alpha-nguunga	Omega-nguunga,	whanga	piinleghuunga	kenlenguunga.	Kina	alngunak	meqsulghii,	akingunaan	meghsilleqaqa	sengngulghiimeng	unguvallengestikayugmeng	meghmeng.
B27_21_Revelation_V7	Kitum	alngunak	kayaalqiilghiim	allgeghlleqii	tamaakut	whangamneng.	Kiyaghneqelleqaatnga	enkaam	ellngit	avaqutaqelleqanka.
B27_21_Revelation_V8	Iwernga	tamaakut	quyughtalghiit,	ugpeqillghilnguut,	seghlelleghpigaghneng	seghleghqelghiit,	yugtaghtet,	nengughtegpenateng	atuqullghiit,	alignalghiit,	maniguutkayuget	kiyaghnengllaqanun,	qamagllutengllu	iqlengalghiit,	nekaghqaat	naayvaaguq	kumaghulghii	keneghmengllu	sulphur-mengllu.	Taananguuq	tuunglii	tuqullghem.”
