B27_21_Revelation_V9	Taagken	yaqulget	maaghraghvinlegneng	sagnelget	esleqngalghiineng	kingulighneng	seghleliilleghllagneng,	ataasim	taakuneng	takwaanga.	Piinga,	“Tagi,	kelguviknaqamken	Ugiighnaqelghiimeng,	nuliighqaa	Penniighaghaam.”
B27_21_Revelation_V10	Kiyaghneghem	Taghneghagkenkun	yaqulgem	tugulunga	aglaataanga	uusqalleghpigaanun	naaygham.	Tawani	kelgutaa	Jerusalem,	Agleghnalghii	Neghllak	ukilghii	Kiyaghneghmeng	qilagmelngughmeng.
B27_21_Revelation_V11	Kuukgutngaghmi	Kiyaghneghem	nighughqellghaneng.	Neghllak	kuukgutuq	akitughllalghiitun	uyghagtun,	jasper-etun,	meghraakegtutkaghmi	crystal-etun.
B27_21_Revelation_V12	Uusqaghllagmeng	mingllutelek,	qula	maalghuk	siipneqluku	amigllalgaataq.	Qula	maalghuk	siipneqluku	yaqulget	amigllagniteftut.	Ataasikaghtaghmeng	amigllaget	igaqfikngaftut	ateghmeng	qula	maalghuk	siipneqluku	ramkenganeng	Israel-em.
B27_21_Revelation_V13	Mingllutanga	neghllagem	qula	maalghuk	siipneqluku	amigllalek,	pingayut	asivaghmi,	pingayut	aywaani,	pingayut	ikevaghmi,	pingayut	pakfallami.
B27_21_Revelation_V14	Neghllagem	mingllutanga	tunemiqaaftuq	qula	maalghuk	siipneqluku	uyghagneng.	Ataasikaghtaghmeng	uyghaget	igaqfikngaftut	ateghmeng	qula	maalghuk	siipneqluku	apostle-nganeng	Penniighaghaam.
B27_21_Revelation_V15	Yaqulek	aleghqughteka	gold-meng	usputalguftuq	usputaghnaluku	neghllak,	amigllagillu	mingllutangallu.
B27_21_Revelation_V16	Neghllak	ulluviighrakegteftuq	tagtalnga,	pateghtulngatun	ayuqeftuq.	Yaqulgem	neghllak	usputaghyaqminigu:	1,500	miles	tagtalkeftaa,	pateghtulkeftaa,	uusqaghtulkeftaallu.
B27_21_Revelation_V17	Mingllutangallu	usputaghyaqminigu,	216	feet-nguftuq	uusqaghtulnga.	Yaqulgem	usputallghatun	ayuqeftuq	yugem	usputallgha.
B27_21_Revelation_V18	Mingllutanga	ulimaaghuftuq	jasper-meng.	Neghllak	ulimaaghuftuq	gold-eperegwaaghmeng.	Gold-a	meghraakegtepiglleghhii	siqinwhaaghtun.
B27_21_Revelation_V19	Neghllagem	mingllutangan	tunemii	pinighnaaqusighluteng	allaaghhiinaghneng	akitughllagneng	uyghagneng.	Sivuliq	jasper-nguftuq,	tuunglighhaa	sapphire-nguftuq,	pingayiitangat	agate-nguftuq,	estamiitangat	emerald-nguftuq,
B27_21_Revelation_V20	tallimiitangat	onyx-nguftuq,	aghvinliitangat	carnelian-nguftuq,	maaghraghvinliitangat	chrysolite-nguftuq,	pingayuneng	ingluliitangat	beryl-nguftuq,	estamaneng	ingluliitangat	topaz-nguftuq,	quulngughutangat	chrysoprase-nguftuq,	qula	ataasiq	siipniitangat	jacinth-enguftuq,	qula	maalghuk	siipniitangat	amethyst-nguftuq.
B27_21_Revelation_V21	Qula	maalghuk	siipneqluku	amigllaget	pearl-nguftut,	tamaghhaghmeng	amigllaget	ataasimeng	pearl-meng	ulimaaghuftut.	Neghllagem	tuumngi	gold-eperegwaaghuftut;	gold-a	meghraakegtepiglleghii	siqinghwaaghtun.
B27_21_Revelation_V22	Neghllagmi	esghaanneghitunga	Temple-meng,	qayughllak	Temple-nga	Atanghuuq	Kiyaghneq	Aghtughyaghqaghhaanghilnguq,	Penniighaghaaguqlu.
B27_21_Revelation_V23	Neghllak	siqineghsughniituq,	nalighmeng	tanqighsughniituq	nighugkameng,	qayughllak	nighughqellgha	Kiyaghneghem	nighukegkanga,	Penniighaghaqlu	kenelghutaqegkanga.
B27_21_Revelation_V24	Qamagtengngwaaghluteng	nunam	yugi	kiyaghllequt	nighugakun	kuukgutngalghiikun.	Nunamllu	umiilgita	aklungiteng	tagiquutiit	neghllagmun.
B27_21_Revelation_V25	Neghllagem	amigllagi	umegnaanghitut	aghneghem	naangneghani	qayughllak	unugnaanghilnguq	tamaani.
B27_21_Revelation_V26	Nunam	yugita	neghllagmun	tagiquulleqiit	pinighnaghllaget	aklungiteng.
B27_21_Revelation_V27	Iwernga	neghllagmun	iteghyaghqaanghituq	sangwaa	seghleq,	talwa	kina	alngunak	seghleghnatun	pista,	nalighmeng	iqlengiqesta.	Iwernga	neghllagmun	iteghyaghqaagut	tamaakunginaghhaat	aatghit	igaqngalghiit	Igaakun	Unguvallghem.	Taakut	Igat	Penniighaghaam	pikii.
B27_22_Revelation_V1	Taagken	yaqulgem	kelguvikaanga	kiiwegneng	maaqelghiik	Kiyaghneghemllu	Penniighaghaamllu	umiilgusigkenka	aqumutagkeneng.	Unguvallelitikayugmeng	melgek,	meghraakegtutkalghiik	crystal-etun.
B27_22_Revelation_V2	Maaqngalghiik	qukaakun	tumangan	neghllagem.	Kiiwek	inglugtun	uqfigtuqak	unguvallelitikayugneng.	Tamaghhaghmi	uqfik	piitestikayuguuq	fruit-neng	tanqiinaghqun,	ayumiqulleghmi,	ququngiitlu	naallghutusiiftut	nunataanun.
B27_22_Revelation_V3	Sangwaa	alngunak	Kiyaghneghem	nanqigtekaa	aghyuughyaghqaaluku,	neghllagmennaanghituq.	Kiyaghneghenkuk	Penniighaghhaankuk	umiilgusik	aqumutagket	neghllagmesaghqaaguk,	Kiyaghneghemllu	qepghaghtengita	manigughlleqaat.
B27_22_Revelation_V4	Gginaa	esghaghlleqaat,	aatghallu	qawiitgun	igaqngallequq.
B27_22_Revelation_V5	Tamaani	unugnanighlleqaa,	kenelghutaghsughniighulleqii,	nalighmeng	siqineghsughniighulleqii,	qayughllak	Ataneq	Kiyaghneq	nighukelleqaat.	Igleghutillequtlu	umiilguluteng	quunperugllak	kenlengunaan.
B27_22_Revelation_V6	Taagken	yaqulgem	piinga,	“Ukut	akuzitet	ugpeqsaghqaagut,	ipanguutlu.	Atanghem,	Kiyaghneghem	igleghutilghiim	taghneghiitneng	uuknaliqistemi,	kayagtekaqaa	yaquleni	kelguvikesqelluki	qepghaghteni	sangwaat	piyaghtungestaghniluki.”
B27_22_Revelation_V7	Jesus	piiq,	“Nagatek!	Tagiyaghtughtunga!	Quyastekaagut	qaatkullghiit	uuknaliqelleghnun	igaqngalghiinun	ukutgun	igatgun.”
B27_22_Revelation_V8	Whanga,	John,	nagatkaqankallu	esghaqaqankallu	tamaakut.	Nagaqughaqngamkillu	esghaghaqngamkillu	tamaakut,	niinghutunga	yaqulgem	itegaani	manigughnaluku,	kelguvikisteka	tamaaken.
B27_22_Revelation_V9	Iwernga	piinga,	“Tawaten	pigpenang!	Whangallu	qepghaghtenguunga	elpetun,	ugpeqaalgutegpetunllu	uuknaliqistestun,	qaatkullghiistunllu	akuzitangitnun	ukut	igat.	Manigughhu	Kiyaghneq!”
B27_22_Revelation_V10	Piingallu,	“Aksaqegpenaki	uuknaliqellghet	ukut	igat	aapqiit,	qayughllak	tamaakut	pilleghqiit	kaasaghtuumaat.
B27_22_Revelation_V11	Kina	alngunak	seghletun	pilghii	nagneghli	seghletun,	enkaam	kina	alngunak	nukeggnameng	suumqelghii	nagneghli	nukeggnameng	suumqelluni.	Kina	alngunak	elqughutngalghii	nagneghli	elqughutngaluni,	kinallu	alngunak	pelungilnguq	nagneghli	pelungilluni.”
B27_22_Revelation_V12	Jesus	piiq,	“Nagatek!	Tagiyaghtughtunga!	Akileghtuusaghqanka	kelqelleqanka	nallangightughnaluki	yuget	kiyaghtaallghistun.
B27_22_Revelation_V13	Whanga	Alpha-nguunga	Omega-nguunga,	whanga	sivuliigunga	kinguliigunga,	whanga	piinleghuunga	kenlenguungallu.”
B27_22_Revelation_V14	Quyastekaagut	tamaakut	atkuyaateng	aghvikiit	iqangiitesluki.	Tamaaken	apalluqluku	neghyaghqaaghtekaagut	piitestekaaneng	unguvallelitikayugem	uqfigem.	Iteghyaghqaaghtekaagutlu	neghllagem	amigllagitgun.
B27_22_Revelation_V15	Iwernga	neghllagem	eslataanilnguut	qikmiigut,	alignalghiinguut,	nengughtegpenateng	atuqistenguut,	yugtaghtenguut,	kiyaghnengllaqanun	maniguutestenguut,	iqlengiqsuneghtuut,	iqlengiqumanginaghaqutlu.
B27_22_Revelation_V16	“Whanga,	Jesus,	kayagtekaqaqa	yaqulka	elpesinun	ugpeqanun	yughaghvignilngughnun.	Apeghlleqaak	ukuk	elpesinun,	‘Whanga	David-em	kingunqaanga,	whanga	nighugrakegtaagunga	unaangum	ighaleqetaagha.’”
B27_22_Revelation_V17	Taghneghaklu	Ugiighnaqelghiillu	piik,	“Tagi!”	Tamaghhaghmillu	nagallghii	pili,	“Tagi!”	Kina	alngunak	meqsulghii	tagili;	tuguklighligu	akingilnguq	meq	unguvallelitikayuk.
B27_22_Revelation_V18	Whanga,	John,	kelengasaaghyuganka	nagallghiit	uuknaliqelleghnun	igaqegkatgun	ukutgun	igatgun.	Kitum	alngunak	ilaraaqaki	uuknaliqutkegkat	ukuni	igani,	Kiyaghneghem	aghyuughlleqaa.	Ellnganun	ilalleqii	tamaakut	seghleliilleghllaget	igaqngalghiit	ukutgun	igatgun.
B27_22_Revelation_V19	Kitum	alngunak	ikuvikegkaki	uuknaliqutkegkat	ukuni	igani,	Kiyaghneghem	iqilleqii	nengighqii	piitestekat	uqfiganeng	unguvallelitikayugem.	Kiyaghtesnaanghitaallu	agleghnalghiimi	neghllagmi.	Taakuk	apeghngaak	ukuni	igani.
B27_22_Revelation_V20	Jesus-nguuq	aapghilghii	tamaaken	qamaglluteng	ipanguniluki.	Piiqlu,	“Ipapestaaq	tagiyaghtughtunga!”	Amen.	Tagi,	Ataneq	Jesus!
B27_22_Revelation_V21	Nangllegtallgha	Atanemta	Jesus-em	tamaghhaghpesinilli.	Amen.
